column2: Yesu Keliso ana yo'o kahihina hidede amine, higa Bana Devida ana yo'oya gitubuyemu ada Devida Abelahamo ana yo'oya gitubuyemu.
Bana Abelahamo natuna Aisake
ada Aisake natuna Yakobu,
ada Yakobu natuneyao bana Yuda watobohiyaneyao.
Bana Yuda natuneyao Felesi kadu Sala tu hinadi ma Tema,
ada Felesi natuna Hesiloni,
ada Hesiloni natuna Lamu,
ada Lamu natuna Aminadabu,
ada Aminadabu natuna Nasoni,
ada Nasoni natuna Salamoni,
ada Salamoni natuna Bowasi tu Bowasi hinana ma Leyabi,
ada Bowasi natuna Obedi tu Obedi hinana ma Luti,
ada Obedi natuna Yese,
ada Yese natuna Kini Devida.
Ma bana Devida natuna Solomoni tu Solomoni hinana ma boi nagona Yulaiya ginagidi.
Ada Solomoni natuna Lehobowamu,
ada Lehobowamu natuna Abaiya,
ada Abaiya natuna Esa,
ada Esa natuna Yehosafadi,
ada Yehosafadi natuna Yolama,
ada Yolama natuna Asaya,
ada Asaya natuna Yotama,
ada Yotama natuna Ehasi,
ada Ehasi natuna Hesekaiya,
ada Hesekaiya natuna Manasa,
ada Manasa natuna Emoni,
ada Emoni natuna Yosaiya.
Ada Yosaiya natuneyao Yekonaiya watobohiyaneyao badi himiyami miBabiloni hi'ela miIsileli tufoidi moya'aidi hikive'avidi be yadi fafali againe hinauwedi ana toveya.
Atu miBabiloni miIsileli hinauwedi gihavaina, Yekonaiya natuna Saladiyeli gitubuga,
ada Saladiyeli natuna Selubabela,
ada Selubabela natuna Abayada,
ada Abayada natuna Elayakimu,
ada Elayakimu natuna Eso,
ada Eso natuna Sedoki,
ada Sedoki natuna Ekimu,
ada Ekimu natuna Eliuda,
ada Eliuda natuna Eliyasa,
ada Eliyasa natuna Matani,
ada Matani natuna Yakobu,
ada Yakobu natuna Yosefa Meli moganedi
ada Meli Yesu hivenatunena Bana hivewagana Keliso higa Yaubada yana Tovegida.

Ada au Yesu Keliso bwaneneneyao ana loi hidede amine. Bana Abelahamo hinunauwena Devida againe ma adi loi fotini. Kadu bana Devida bwaneneneyao hinunauwena miBabiloni hi'ela miIsileli hikive'avidi ana toveya ma adi loi fotini. Kadu miIsileli yadi miyavehaila Babiloni againe ana toveya hinunauwena Keliso Tauna gitubuga ma adi loi fotini.
Ada moganena Yosefa kaliva yamumuna, yana dewa gi'ita'itave'avina. Bana keke nuwanuwana Meli yo'o matadiya ginakivewowomumuni fa'ina ginuwanuwa vaita ginakilowekauyena, higa keke ginavekotuni.

Aimo hidedemi ginuwanuwa tu Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana gi'avayaunena bana againe gilakayemu gigayo, “Yosefa, Devida bwanenena o'eni. Bana Meli fa'ina keke unamatauta. Au unanagina be ya manuweya unanauwena, fa'ina kwamana giwahiwahina-ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina givehifugena.
Ada kadu aimo natuna kaliva ginavenatunena, ada unavewagana Yesu higa tokibababala, fa'ina yana yo'o yadi dewa koyona againe ginakibababaledi.” Hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigahe.
Tu mena gaitoma moya'aina gilakayemu be gavaimi tuwaina Kaiwabu bonana ana to'awatalatalaina awane gigahe, meda anafaiweya ginayemu velemo'ena.
Bana to'awatalatalaina gigahe gigayo,
Wa'ita, ulaulatanina sa'eyana ginavehifuga be natuna kaliva ginavenatunena. Ada kwamana hinavewagana Imanuweli.
Hidedemi gigahe tu mena egana ana kaivila ma Yaubada ide buye kamimiyami.
Ada au Yosefa gi'enovilana againe gimidi be Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata givehimeyena amine gihuluva. Gina Meli givega'aulena be yana manuweya ginauwena.
Buye himiyami tu keke buye hidadauda tu natudi kaliva hivenatunena. Ada Yosefa kwamana givewagana Yesu.

Tu bana Helodi fafali ana egana Yudiya againe givehivehimeya ana toveya, Yesu Yudiya melalina ana egana Bedelihema againe gitubuga. Gimiyami tu ibadibadi adi tonuwahuya lauhanaga amine hi'ela Yelusalema againe hilakayemu.

Hiyemu hitoliluvaluva higayo, “Omi miYuda ami kini a gitubuga-ma hai gimimiyami? Yuwa amiyami tu badibadi sa'eyana higa bana kwamanai-nadi ana aituha lauhanaga amine a'itana fa'ina a'ela be anahawadavadavana.” Hidemi higahe.
Tu Kini Helodi yadi gahe kini velugana fa'ina ginogalina againe ase'asena gi'akolukoluna, kadu miYelusalema moya'aidi himatamatauta higa vaita Helodi ginanuwakoyo lakahina.
Au Helodi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala gikovavaga'auhidi be gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Gava melala againe Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso ginatubuga?”
Badi higayo, “Bedelihema Yudiya ana fafali againe ginatubuga, fa'ina Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana yana buki againe gi'etoladi gigayo,
To'awatalatalaina yana gahe hidede amine.”
Tu Helodi mena gahe-nadi ginogalini-yo ibadibadi adi tonuwahuya giyowanikauyedi, ada gitoliyedi be higa vaita gava tova badibadi-nadi gimidiyemu ma ginahalamane-hagihagiyena.

Gihalamaneni tu Bedelihema againe gi'iveninisedi gigahedi gigayo, “Wanana be kwamana wanalele-hagihagiyena ada ahe wananuhagana againe, wanayewa'ela be wanavenuwa'ataku be kadu iya akufaiweya ganana ganahawadavadavana.”

Badi tonuwahuya Kini buye hilukahihi gihavaina, hilowoga. Hinauna tu mena badibadi-nadi yana yemu lauhanaga amine himidi'itana-ma hi'ita-havagilena. Hi'ita'itani ginagonagoyedi tu kwamana yana abamiya getane gi'alovena.
Ada badibadi hi'itana againe, nuwadi gi'ayauyauna be hivemwamwala keke kabi'ona.

Ada manuweya hiluku kwamana hinana Meli buye himiyami-ma hi'itana, ada au hi'ibo'ula-mo'a kwamana hihawadavadavana. Hidavadavani-yo adi fose hi'iyauga be yadi lokolokofou hivelena, gola kadu vanedimodimo luhei adi egana falanikisenisi ada mulo, fatadi lakahina.
Tu Yaubada avayauna againe gihawatadi be keke Helodi againe hinayewadi fa'ina mali edeya hinauna tu hiyewadi yadi melaleya.

Badi tonuwahuya hina tu Yosefa Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana gi'avayaunena bana againe gilakayemu gigayo, “Umidi, kwamana hinana buye unanauwedi be yuwa fafali ana egana Idifita againe wana'ota. Yuwadedei wanamiyami tu aimo iya ganavenuwa'ata amine wanayewami. Yuwa wanamiyami, fa'ina bana Helodi kwamana ginalelelena be ginaluve'alikana fa'ina.”
Tovenuwa'ata hidedemi gigahe tu Yosefa gitowamidi, bogi nafone kwamana hinana buye ginauwedi be Idifita gava lauveya gihobuyedi.

Yuwadedei himiyami himiyami tu Helodi gi'alika. Ada au Idifita againe hina himiyami fa'ina, Kaiwabu yana gahe bonana ana to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana tuwai-mo'ena gigaheye-vagahina ma gilakayemu velemo'ena gigayo,
Natuku Idifita againe gayowanina be gi'ela.

Badi hina Idifita tu bana Helodi ibadibadi adi tonuwahuya hi'aikau ma gi'ayaunena againe gi'ago'uga-mo'a. Yana tolugaviya givehimeyedi be hinana we'owe'o kaliva moya'aidi Bedelihema melala againe kadu awa'awana melalai-dina agaidiya hinaluve'alika-'owodi. We'owe'o kaliva adi malamala luhei kadu tufoidi aimo'u, mena tovai-nadi badibadi yana yemu tonuwahuya agaidiya gihalamanena-ma amine.
Meda we'owe'o hiluve'alika-'owodi fa'ina, Yaubada yana gahe bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yelemaiya tuwai-mo'ena gigaheye-vagahina ma gilakayemu velemo'ena gigayo,
Hidedemi Yelemaiya gigaheye-vagahina.

Himiyami tu Helodi gi'alika au Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana Idifita againe Yosefa gi'avayaunena bana againe gilakayemu gigayo, “Umidi, kwamana hinana buye unanauwedi be Isileli ana fafaliya wanayewami, fa'ina badi nuwanuwadi kwamana hinaluve'alikana-ma a hi'alika.”
Au Yosefa gitowamidi kwamana hinana buye ginauwedi be Isileli ana fafaliya hiyewadi.

Hilakayemu tu Yosefa bana Akileyo valeyana ginogalina, higa bana tamana Helodi ana hilafa Yudiya againe givehivehimeya. Hidedemi ginogalini-yo gimatauta be keke nuwanuwana medede againe hinamiya. Kadu ana avayauna sa'eyana againe hawata ginogalina fa'ina, hilowoga be hina Galili ana fafali againe hitogavehaila.

E, Yosefa gina melala ana egana Nasaledi againe gimiyami. Nasaledi againe gimiyami fa'ina, Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi gahe tuwai-mo'ena hiyakahi-vagahina ma gilakayemu velemo'ena. Tokibababala fa'ina higahe higayo,
Bana'e hinavewagana kwanamiNasaledi.
Tu medema tovai-nadi Yoni Tobafitaiso gilakayemu ada givebutu Yudiya wala'aiya gilulumamala.

Gigahe gigayo, “Yami dewa koyona wanavenikohiyena be wanahagavilami, fa'ina Yaubada yana aituha a gilakayemu. Tova kabisona kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.”
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya hida kaliva Yoni fa'ine gigaheye-vagahina gigayo,
Kaliva agona hinogalina wala'aiya gikovakovadadana
gigayo, Kaiwabu yana eda wanavetauna,
yana eda ase'asemiya wanakidewedewena.
Hidedemi bana Aiseya gigahe.

Tu bana Yoni yana miyami kaliva koyokoyo'avana amine. Ana aikeva ma kameli utuutuna againe hiyogona, ada gaiyona bulumakau kwafilina againe hiyogona-ma goline gihifona. Ada anaga ma koloma, kadu ana bwai ma ma'awa gufadi.
Au kaliva moya'aidi bana againe hi'ela, miYelusalema be Yudiya ana fafali kalivadi, kadu gufa ana egana Yolidani ana fafali kalivadi moya'aidi hi'ela.
Yadi dewa koyona hiyauna be Yoni Yolidani againe gikivebafitaisoyedi.

Tu miYuda yadi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Sadusi moya'aidi hi'ela'ela be hinabafitaiso. Yoni gi'itadi-yo gidakeyedi gigayo, “Omi vaita oloto koyona ana egana vaiba natuneyao amine. Hakwadi givenuwa'atami-yo vaita Yaubada yana ila'a omi agaimiya wada'oseni? Keke amifaiweya Yaubada wana'oseni.
Omi wagahe vaita yami koyona wadahegeni-yo wadahagavilami. Au dewa yamumuna wanafaisewani-yo yami hagavila au velemo'ena ma anahalamanena.

Ada keke wananuwanuwa vaita taumiyao agaimiya wanagahe wanagayo, Ide Abelahamo bwaneneneyao fa'ina, kadu ide Yaubada natuneyao. Au gagahemi Yaubada anafaiweya ginakilowemi tu hida kabala agaidiya kaliva ginabubudi be Abelahamo ana yo'oya ginasedi.
Kadu'e adamoya tamuyoko ahe hiyadalina be ai hinalu'inubadi, ada ai sa'eyana sa'eyana guwadi keke yamumuna ma hinataladi be ai'ala'alata againe hinahegedi. Ai-dina amine omi'iyao.

E, aimo gina'ela ada yana abasaibutu ana gi'e lakahina gina'abina be witi ana abavagakolukolu againe ginasibutuna. A'a-mo'ena yana kweda againe gina'ive'ave'ahina tu yogona ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe ginaluve'alahina.” Hidedemi Yoni gilumamala.
Tu Yesu Galili ana fafaliya gitauya ada Yolidani againe gilakayemu be Yoni ginakivebafitaisoyena fa'ina.
Yoni ma nuwanuwana ginahawatana gigayo, “Gavadi-yo iya agaikuya u'ela be unabafitaiso? Iya kwamana kabisoku be vaita O againiya gada'ela gadabafitaiso.”
Tu Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Auwe keke unanuwanuwa. Adamoya unakivebafitaisoyeku be au Yaubada kaliva givehimeyeda amine kanahuluva.” Hidedemi gigahe-yo Yoni givenogala be gikivebafitaisoyena.
Ada Yesu gibafitaiso gihavaina, avaleya gilaka ada auhe'ama lobama gi'ayavalina, ada Yaubada Alu'aluwana ana ita vaita bunebune amine gihobuhobu tu Bana againe gihobu'ela ma gi'itana.
Ada Yaubada agona lobameya gikova gigayo, “Bana hidevama Natu'ase'aseku. Bana nuwaku gikiveyamumu-mo'ena.”
Ada uyadayada foti kadu bogi foti agaidiya keke tamo a'a gida'u'ani-yo mafu gilauna.
Au to'aladibidibi Setani Bana againe gilakayemu ada gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena O'eni Yaubada Natuna, hida kabala unavehimeyedi be hinave'a'a.”
Keke a'a-mo'a gagana againe kaliva yawaimi wanavivaini, tu Yaubada bonana tova moya'aina givelevelemi-ma againe yawaimi wanavaivaina.”
Au hidedemi Yaubada bonana Yesu giyakahina.
Kadu'e Setani Yesu Yelusalema againe ginauwena, manuwa-tafalolo ana udu'uduya gilakavena.
Ada gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i O'eni velemo'ena Yaubada Natuna, au babiya una'auhifu, fa'ina Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe gigayo,
Iya Yaubada yaku tovenuwa'ata ganavehimeyedi be hina'itave'avi, ada nimadiya o hinakamohi be age keke kuga ginatalani.”
Au hidedemi Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana Setani giyakahina.
Ka'i o tauni vita againe unavetalaiye digo, keke Yaubada ya Kaiwabu yana leme ana ve'o'ola againe unagaluvaluvani.”
Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu'e, Setani oya tunugi-mo'ena kabune gilakavena, ada yo'o moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya Yesu againe givehawale-'owodi, kadu yo'oi-dina moya'aidi adi kikaiwabu givehawalena.
Givehawaleni tu gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i iya agaikuya una'ibo'ula-mo'a be unahawadavadavaku amine o, yaku abavehimeya hida yo'o moya'aidi agaidiya ganavele.” Hidedemi Setani gigahe.
Yaubada yami Kaiwabu againe wana'odu'odu, Bana anakaibe wanahawadavadavana.”
Hidedemi Yaubada bonana Yesu giyakahina.
Tu Yesu Yoni valeyana ginogalina higa deliya hisena. Ada hidedemi ginogalini-yo gilowoga fafali ana egana Galili againe gina.

Ada yana melala Nasaledi againe giyemu tu keke medede againe gidamiya, au kadu gilowoga be gina Kafeneumi melala againe gimiyami. Hida melala tobu ana egana Galili liline, fafali adi egana Sebuloni kadu Nafitalai agaidiya gidauda.
Hida fafali-dina agaidiya gina gimiyami be Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya yana gahe boi tuwai-mo'ena gigaheye-vagahina ma velemo'ena ginalakayemu. Bana Aiseya gigahe gigayo,

Au hida fafali moya'aina kalivai-dina tova uyu'uyuyuna againe himimiyami tu mahalina lakahina hina'itana. Ada badi gaveyao yadi nuwanuwa uyu'uyuyuna againe himimiyami kadu alu'aluwadi vaita ali'alikadiyao amine gimimiyami, medema mahalina badi to'uyuyu ginatuvemahalidi nuwadi kadu alu'aluwadi ginamahalina.
Au hidedemi bana Aiseya gigahe.

Tu Yesu Galili ana fafaliya giyewana ana toveya, givebutu gilulumamala gigayo, “Yami dewa koyona wanavenikohiyena be wanahagavilami, fa'ina tova kabisona kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.”

Tova sa'eyana Yesu tobu ana egana Galili ana taliyeya ginauna tu kaliva sa'eyana watobohiyana gi'itadi. Kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Saimoni kadu ana egana velugana Fita, kadu taina ana egana Anidulu. Ada alevatu hisesehobuyeni tu gi'itadi, fa'ina badi tobayauma.
Gi'itadi-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ela wanamuliyeku be kaliva adi bayauma ganavehawalemi.”
Ada auhe'ama kaliva adi'iselu yadi alevatu hisehobuye-vagahini tu himuliyena.
Kadu ginauna tu kaliva sa'eyana watobohiyana gi'itadi, adi egana Yemesa kadu Yoni Sebedi natuneyao. Au badi tamadi Sebedi buye waka againe hihiyoto yadi alevatu gi'akaninina-ma hikidewedewena.
Au Yesu gikovadi ada auhe'ama yadi waka kadu tamadi buye hinuyabuyabudi tu Yesu himuliyena.

Tu Yesu Galili ana fafaliya ginunuwaliwaliliuga, miYuda yadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya givehavehawala, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina gilulumamalena, kadu kaliva yadi to'aulolo moya'aidi yadi aulolo tulina tulina ma gisisiveyawadi.

Ada au Bana valeyana Siliya ana fafali matatabuna againe ginauna fa'ina yadi to'aulolo moya'aidi Bana againe hi'aliyedi. E, to'aulolo yadi aulolo tulina tulina hi'aliyedi, kadu badi yadi aulolo againe hikoyo-mo'a higa badi wayafunediyao kadu toletolediyao kadu badi walogidi gi'a'uwa-mo'a be nau hifaniyena amanadi hi'aliyedi ada Yesu gisiveyawadi.

Ada au kaliva moya'ai-mo'edi Bana againe hiyo'oyo'o, miGalili kadu melala teni matatabudi adi egana lakahina Dekafolisi kalivadi, kadu miYelusalema miYudiya kadu fafali Yolidani yuwa fafaline kalivadi Yesu againe hiyo'oyo'o.
Tu Yesu yo'o gi'itadi-yo oya fafaline gilaka, au givetogana ada ana tomuliyamomo Bana againe hivaga'auta.
Hivaga'auta-yo au givebutu givehawaledi gigayo,
Gaveyao taudiyao nuwadiya hihawavekoyokoyoyedi, medema yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami, ase'asediya givehivehimeya.
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada nuwadi ginakiveyamumuna.
Gavadi-yo? Au babi lobama ana matatabuna adi du'u hinanuhagana.
Gaveyao nuwanuwadi lakahina yadi nuwanuwa ginayegayega kaliva mafulauga o ka'i agotaina fa'ina nuwanuwadi lakahina a'a o gufa amine, medema yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada yadi nuwanuwa amine ginaveledi, nuwanuwa yegayegana ase'asediya ginase-'owona.
Gavadi-yo? Kadu Yaubada badi'iyao ginahinekalikaliyedi.
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada hina'itahalamanena.
Gaveyao kaliva yadi vekwageya againe hikukuyedi, medema yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada ginahawavenatunedi.
Gavadi-yo? Au Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami, ase'asediya givehivehimeya.
Kadu ka'i gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina hinahawavekoyoyemi tu hinafwaya amine, ka'i hidedemi agaimiya hinahuluva omi aku tomuliya fa'ina, au yami vemwamwala gavatubuga!

Omi vaita lehaga amine tomiyababi hinafadiya. Lehaga kevakeva yana madukoyo gihawatana amine, meda omi'iyao dewa koyona ana tubuga wanahawatana. Tu ka'i lehaga yana digadigaga gidahavaina digo, keke adafaiweya kadakivedigagi-havagileni, au keke-mo'a. Ada ka'i lehaga yana digadigaga keke, kadu yana faisewa keke. Au kadahegena be kaliva hidavagavebabina.
Ka'i kaliva lamufa ginakabuna amine, keke avaeka againe ginavetalabodani, keke. Au ana abasewadi againe ginaselakahina be moya'aidi manuweya ginatuvemahalidi.
Meda anafaiweya yami mahala, higa yami dewa yamumuna, kabu'avane wanasena be kaliva moya'aidi hina'itana. Yami dewa yamumuna hina'ita-yo au Tamami lobameya gimimiyami-ma ana egana hinakilakahina.

Gagahe velemo'ena lobama be babi ginaduva-vagata amine, meda hida vehimeyai-nadi ana nuwanuwa ginaduva-vagata. E, keke tamo vehimeya kabi'ona o ka'i vehimeya kali'uhona hinahawatani, au ana nuwanuwa matatabuna ginalakayemu-'owoga.

Ada au gava kaliva hida vehimeya ana nuwanuwa kabi'o-mo'ena keke ginadibumuhigeni, o ka'i kaliva ginavehawaledi be kadu badi keke hinadibumuhigeni, au medema ana egana kabi'ona Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya. Tu gava kaliva hida vehimeya ginadibumuhigena kadu mali kaliva ginavehawaledi be hinadibumuhigena, medema ana egana lakahina Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya.

Kadu gagahemi badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kebuladiya hihuluhuluva tunutunugina. Ka'i yami huluva tunutunugina badi kalivai-dina yadi huluva keke ginatubuhegeni digo, keke amifaiweya Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wanaluku.

Hidemi vehimeya gigahe tu Iya gagahemi gava kaliva tobohiyana againe ginanuwakoyo amine, medema tovedewayauga matane ginamidi, fa'ina nuwakoyo kadu luve'alika au sa'eyana Yaubada matane. Kadu gava kaliva tobohiyana againe ginagayo, O kwavakwava kwavakwava-mo'e, medema abavedewayauga lakahina againe ginakotu. Kadu gava kaliva tobohiyana ginahawave'iyohoyohoyena, medema ai gi'alata-vagata againe hinahegena.

Ka'i tamo hakwadi nuwanuwana o ginavekotu amine, unagaluvaluva abavedewayauga ana eda againe wananauna tu wanaveyao. Ka'i keke wanamaduveyao, tovedewayauga againe ginahegenauwe ada tovedewayauga filisimani nimadiya ginaseni be deliya hinanauwe.
Gagahe velemo'ena keke hinamaduyau. Tu nagona a laufata unase-'owona, muliya hinayau.
Tu Iya gagahemi gava kaliva kwamayoku gina'italuvadigena be higa vaita buye hinadauda, medema ase'asene ahe gikelele.

Ka'i mata i'ataginiya koyona againe ginavebe'u, mata unamwamwalina be unahegena. Ka'i talaini sa'eyana unanuhegena tu lobameya unaluku, medema vita kabi'ona tu ka'i wowo tauna abaga koyona againe ginaluku, medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.

Kadu ka'i nima i'ataginiya koyona againe ginavebe'u, nima unabobona be unahegena. Ka'i talaini sa'eyana unanuhegena, medema vita kabi'ona tu ka'i wowo tauna abaga koyona againe ginaluku, medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.

Tu Iya gagahemi gava kaliva vavinena keke hidakelele tu ginakilowe-kawowodi, medema yana kilowa fa'ina badi vaita nagi ana vehimeya keke hida'abini, higa ka'i kwamayoku hinanagi-havagi, au badi adi egana to'udo. Kadu kaliva velugana ginanagidi-ma bana ana egana to'udo.

Tu Iya gagahemi yami gahe againe keke Tomiyagetane ana egana wanayakahini. E, yami gahe vaita velemo'ena ma wanayemaunena fa'ina, keke lobama ana egana wanayakahini, fa'ina lobama medema Yaubada yana didiga'u'u.
Kadu keke babi ana egana wanayakahini, fa'ina medema Yaubada agena ana abasewadi. Kadu keke Yelusalema ana egana wanayakahini, fa'ina medema Yaubada yana melala kikaiwabuna.

Meda anafaiweya yami gahe vaita velemo'ena ma wanayemaunena fa'ina, keke u'umi ana egana wanayakahini, fa'ina omi'iyao keke amifaiweya u'umi kukwauhina sa'eyana wanakivesiuni o ka'i siusiuna sa'eyana wanakivekwauhini, au hidedemi Yaubada anakaibe ana tagalowalowa.

Auwe, ka'i nuwanuwami yami gahe velemo'ena ma tovanenega hinahalamanena, au wanagaheye-mo'ena. Ka'i ehe digo, “Ehe.” Ka'i keke digo, kadu “Keke.” Ka'i Tamada ana egana buye wanayakahina, medema dewai-nadi inubana Setani againe.
Tu Iya gagahemi ka'i tamo hakwadi ginakivekoyomi, keke nimana wanafatani. Ka'i tamo hakwadi navanavami i'atagimiya ginatafina, au navanavami i'imawamiya wanahawahegena be ginatafina.
Kadu ka'i tamo hakwadi nuwanuwana ginavekotumi be ami seti ginavaina fa'ina, au ami seti kadu ami aikeva vewabana buye wanavelena.
Kadu ka'i tolugaviya sa'eyana ginakive'avimi be yana lokoloko omi ginave'avalami, higa vaita bai sa'eyana wanawahina, au bai luhei wanawahina.
Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana tamo gavadi fa'ina ginave'o'olemi, au wanavelena. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana nuwanuwana tamo gavadi yami lokoloko fa'ina ginave'o'ola be aimo ginaveleyewena au wanahawahegena.
Tu Iya gagahemi badi hitalahagiyemi-ma wananuwakabubuyedi ada badi hikivekoyomi-ma fa'idiya wanave'o'ola.

Hidede amine wanahuluva be kaliva hinahalamanena omi Tamami lobameya nunune wananauna. Au Bana givehimeya be yana kauwana tokoyona kadu toyamumu meda sa'eyana gituvemahalidi, ada wehi gi'iveninisena be toyegayegana kadu tokoyona meda sa'eyana agaidiya gihobuhobu.

Ka'i tonuwakabubugaga adi loi wananuwakabubuyedi tu keke tonuwalolona wananuwakabubuyedi, keke hida huluva fa'ina laufata yamumuna Yaubada nimane wananuhagani. Au takesi ana toyaudi kiki'afudiyao tu hidedemi taudiyao tobohiyadiyao hinuwakabubuyedi. Tu omi'iyao ma yami nuwakabubu badi takesi ana toyaudi yadi nuwakabubu gidatubuhegena.

Kadu ka'i tobohiyamiyaogaga wanalusiuleyedi tu kaliva-kawowo keke wanalusiuleyedi, keke wananuwanuwa vaita yami huluva yamumu-mo'ena. Au yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina nuwadi keke mahamahalina amanadi tu hidedemi tobohiyadiyaogaga hilusiuleyedi.
Au Tamami lobameya yana nuwanuwa mahamahali-'owogina ada meda gilubodami be yami nuwanuwa ginamahali-'owona.

Au ka'i koyokoyo wananuwakabubuyedi amine, keke kabu'avane kaliva matadiya wanavelugadi. Badi meyadi luhei koyokoyo hivelugadi againe, hiulega hiyuvena be kaliva moya'aidi tomatawabuwabu hinavaga'auta. Manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya o ka'i melaleya hinavaga'auta be meyadi luhei yadi nuwakabubu hina'itana, adi egana hinakilakahina. Keke badi'iyao amine omi wanahuluva fa'ina gagahemi velemo'ena, badi meyadi luhei adi laufata ahe hinuhagana, higa kaliva hihawaveyamumuyedi.
Tu ka'i omi'iyao ma koyokoyo wananuwakabubuyedi amine, tobohiyamiyao keke-mo'a wanavenuwa'atadi.
E, keke kaliva matadiya yami nuwakabubu wanaseyemauneni, au Tamami anakaibe matane wananuwakabubuyedi be Bana'e ami laufata aimo ginavelemi.

Tu omi'iyao ma Yaubada againe wanave'o'ola amine, yami manuwa vetawana againe amikaibe wanaluku, wana wanafalina be Tamami veuveuna againe wanave'o'ola, ada Tamami ase'asemi gi'ita'itana-ma ami laufata aimo ginavelemi.

Kadu'e wanave'o'ola againe, keke ve'o'ola-fa'ila aimo luhifufu-kawowo wanayakahini, badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina nuwadi keke mahamahalina ma hiyakahina amine. Badi hinuwanuwa vaita yadi ve'o'ola-fa'ila fa'ina Yaubada ginavenogaledi.
Au keke badi yadi dewa amine omi wanahuluva, fa'ina Tamami gavadi againe wakali'uho-ma ahe gihalamanena. Aimo keke wadave'o'ola tu Bana'e yami nuwanuwa ahe gihalamanena.
Auwe wanave'o'ola againe, hidede amine wanagahe wanagayo,
Tamama lobameya umimiyami,
a egana mahamahalina anave'amohimohinena.
Ya abavehimeya ana tova gidalakayemu ase'asemeya.
Ya vehimeya lobameya hi'ita'itave'avina amine,
meda ime babiya ada'ita'itave'avina.
Aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana amaga udavelevelema.
avenuwauluyena amine,
meda yama koyona kadu O udavenuwauluyena.
kaliva koyona Setani againe unalugolegolema.
Au hidede amine wanave'o'ola.
Ka'i omi tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona omi agaimiya hifaisewana-ma wanavenuwauluyena, au kadu Tamami lobameya yami koyona ginavenuwauluyena.
Tu ka'i omi tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona omi agaimiya hifaisewana-ma keke wanavenuwauluyeni, au kadu Tamami lobameya yami koyona keke ginavenuwauluyeni.

Tu ka'i omi ve'o'ola fa'ina wanalabelabewaviyo amine, magigimi wanakolana ada wowomi wanabunamina be walabelabewaviyo ma kaliva keke hinahalamaneni fa'ina. Bana Tamami anakaibe ginahalamanena, Bana veuveuna amanadi, ada Tamami ase'asemi ana nuwanuwa gi'ita'itana-ma ami laufata ginavelemi.
Au lokoloko hagihagina lobameya wanavagakokona, fa'ina wesede againe tumotumo o ka'i bugaga keke ginakivekoyoni, kadu tokai'afu keke adifaiweya hinaluku hinavai-kawowowoni.
Ada au ha'againe yami lokolokofou ginadauda, au medede againe nuwami ginanunauyena tova moya'aina.
Kadu'e, matami vaita nuwami ana lamufa amine. Ka'i matami ita'ita'eyana, au nuwami matatabuna mahamahalina.
Tu ka'i matami ita'italugana, au nuwami matatabuna uyu'uyuyuna, nuwanuwaluga againe wamimiyami. Ada ka'i yami nuwahinage vaita uyuyu amine, au nuwami gi'uyuyu-mo'a.

Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya taubada luhei fa'idiya ginafaisewa. Ka'i adi'iselu fa'idiya ginafaisewa digo, sa'eyana againe ginanuwanuwakoyo tu sa'eyana againe ginanuwanuwa hagihagina. Kadu sa'eyana againe ginamiyave'avina, tu sa'eyana gina'itatagona. Au keke amifaiweya wananuwanuwaluga. Ka'i nuwanuwami Yaubada digo, Yaubada ana nuwanuwa'eya. Ka'i mani digo, mani ana nuwanuwa'eya.

Manuga hiyaveyavega-ma wana'itadi. Keke hidafahafaha, keke hidayauyaudi kadu keke kweda hidayogoyogoni-yo a'a hidasewasewadi, tu au ai'adi Tamami lobameya adiga giveleveledi. Ada Tamami yana itave'avina omi agaimiya yana itave'avina manuga agaidiya gitubuhegena.
Kadu hakwadi agaimiya unavenuwanauna-yo afaiweya yawaini ana etowava babiya unakivetubugini? Keke-mo'a afaiweya.
Ada gavadi-yo ami aikeva fa'ina wanavenuwanauna? Falafalawasi wala'aiya hikabukabu-ma wananuwenuwedi. Keke hidafifaisewa, keke doki hida'alulauga.
Tu gagahemi, bana tokaiwabu ana egana Solomoni ana vaigau kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu hida falafalawasi adi vaigau bana ana vaigau hitubuhegena.

E, Yaubada isisi'u givevigauna, medema tova adamoya wala'aiya gikabu tu bogiyadi hinatuna be gina'alahina. Yaubada isisi'u givevigauna tu medema gaitoma kabi'ona. Tu omi'iyao ma gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina gina'itave'avi-mo'emi, ami vaigau ginavelemi. Wona velemona yami vetumagana kabi'ona.
Au keke wanavenuwanauna wanagayo, Gavadi kana'ani? o, Gavadi kanayuni? o ka'i, Gavadi againe kanavelifi?

Au badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma hida gaitoma fa'ina hivenuwanauna, kadu tova moya'aina hilelelena. Tu omi'iyao ma nuwanuwami hida gaitoma yami miya hagihagina fa'ina Tamami lobameya a gihalamanena.

Yaubada yana abavehimeya ana gaitoma againe wanamidihawahegemi kadu yana nuwanuwa tunutunugina wanamidilelena, ada au Bana'e gina'ita'itave'avimi be amiga ami bwai ami vaigau ginavelevelemi, au wanamiyami hagihagina.
Ada au keke bogiyadi fa'ina wanavenuwanauna vaita gava vita ginalakayemu. Tova adamoya ana vita au amifata. Keke tova adamoya ana vita bogiyadi ana vita wanave'atutamo'aini.
Au gavaiya'amine tobohiya uhawavekoyoyena, medede amine Yaubada ginahawavekoyoye. Kadu gavaiya'amine kaliva unaveledi, medede amine Yaubada ginavele.
Gavadi-yo ai ulana vaita koyona kabi'ona amine tobohiya matane u'ita'itani, tu ai-mo'ena vaita koyona lakahina amine tauni mataniya keke udanuwenuweni?
Ka'i ai-mo'ena o mataniya gidadauda, keke-mo'a afaiweya tobohiya unagaheni unagayo, Tobohiyaku, ai ulana mataniya ganavaihegena.

O meya luhei. Nagona ai-mo'ena tauni mataniya unavaihegena, higa ya dewa koyo-mo'ena unahegena, ada au afaiweya una'ita-hagihagiyena be ai ulana tobohiya matane unavaihegena, higa yana dewa koyona fa'ina unakivetuvetununa.

Tu Yaubada yana gaitoma keke kaliva koyodiyao yadi huluva vaita galu'eta amine wanaveledi. Ka'i badi agaidiya wanalukahihiyena, au hinahagaviladi be hinakivekoyomi. Ka'i odo'odo yamumu-mo'ena bawe agaidiya wanahegena, au agediya hinavagagologolohina. Meda anafaiweya ka'i Yaubada bonana kaliva koyodiyao agaidiya wanahawavemogatalena, au hinahawave'iyohoyohoyena.
Wa'ita, gaveyao hive'ove'o'ola medema Yaubada nimane hinavaina, kadu gaveyao hilelele medema hinanuhagana, ada gaveyao hikikifisifisi'a medema agaidiya Yaubada wana ginayauna.
Omi kaliva wanogali! Ka'i natumiyao hida'ela hidagayo, Kamaku, ma'i a'a, ka'i kabala wadaveledi? Keke.
O ka'i hidave'o'ola hidagayo, Kamaku, tamo igana gada'ana, ka'i oloto wadaveledi? Keke.
Omi tokoyona tu nuwakabubu yamumuna natumiyao waveleveledi. Atu ka'i Tamada lobameya wanave'ove'o'olena amine, Bana'e nuwakabubu yamumu-mo'ena ginavelevelemi.
Gavaiya'amine nuwanuwami kaliva omi hinahuluvimi, au medede amine kadu badi wanahuluvidi. Mosese yana vehimeya ana nuwanuwa kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi vehawala au hidede amine.
Kadu'e, eda'awana kabi'ona againe wanaluku, fa'ina abaga koyona ana eda'awana lalafana kadu ana eda lakahina, ada kaliva moya'aidi edai-nadi againe hinanauna.
Tu yawai-vagata ana eda'awana au kabi'ona kadu eda vitana, ada keke kaliva moya'aidi edai-nadi hidanuhagani.
Au guwadi againe wanahalamanedi. Kelefi keke ai-kawowo againe kadakoluni, kadu fiki keke aboda againe kadakoluni.
Ka'i ai yamumuna, au guwana yamumuna. Ka'i ai koyona, au guwana koyona.
Ai yamumuna keke koyona ginaveguweni, kadu ai koyona keke yamumuna ginaveguweni.
Hai ai guwana keke yamumuna, medema hinatalana be ai'ala'alata againe hinahegena.
Ada au to'awatalatalaina ve'alololodiyao, guwadi againe wanahalamanedi.

Aimo tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya moya'aidi Iya agaikuya hinagahe hinagayo, Kaiwabu, Kaiwabu, a eganeya Yaubada bonana alumamalena, kadu a eganeya yafune awavidi, kadu a eganeya aituha fifiwalana moya'aina afifaisewana.
Hidedemi badi hinagahe tu Iya ganagahedi ganagayo, Omi keke gadahalamanemi. Omi tokoyona, au wana.
Ada au gaveyao hida bonaku hinogalina be hi'abi'abina, medema vaita kaliva nuwanuwahuyana amine. Bana kalivai-nadi yana manuwa kuga againe gikivemididina.
Muliya wehi gilugaga gufa gihobu bolimana lakahina gimadu be manuwa gitafitafina. Tu manuwa kuga againe gikivemididina fa'ina, keke gidabe'u.
Tu gaveyao hida bonaku hinogalina tu keke hida'abi'abini, medema vaita kaliva kwavakwavana amine. Bana kalivai-nadi yana manuwa makameya giyogona, keke ogola gida'aiyala.
Muliya wehi gilugaga gufa gihobu bolimana lakahina gimadu be manuwa gitafitafina, au manuwa gibe'u ada au gi'ayaweli-'owona.
Keke yadi buki-vehimeya ana tovehawala amine gidavehawala, au vaita tovehimeya velemo'ena amine givehavehawala, yana vehawala ase'asedi gi'onana.
Tu Yesu oyeya gihobu'ela ada yo'o keke kabi'ona hivebwa'uliyena.
Au tovedawodawowo sa'eyana Bana againe gi'ela, tugana give'etodonena ada gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, ka'i O nuwanuwa amine o afaiweya yaku aulolo unakolana.”
Gigahe-yo Yesu nimana gitunena be gikibwa'ena ada gigahena gigayo, “Ika, Iya nuwanuwaku. Unayamumu.” Ada auhe'ama ana dawodawowo gihavaina.

Ada Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Unogali. Keke tamo hakwadi unavenuwa'atani, au abaveyao ana tofaisewa againe unamaduna ada wowo unavehawalena. Gina'ita-yo manuga luhei kadu sifi higa abaveyao Mosese boi tuwai-mo'ena givehimeyena amine ma unanauwedi be moya'aidi o uyamumu velemo'ena ma hinahalamanena.”

Gina tu Yesu Kafeneumi againe giluku ada Loma togiyomatana sa'eyana Bana againe gi'ela, gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Kauveya, aku agetoga manuweya gidadauda, gi'aulolo lakahina walogina gisi'uwana ada givedivediwe.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Gana'ela be ganasiveyawana.”
Bana togiyomatana gigahena gigayo, “Keke Kauveya, iya keke kaliva yamumuku yo yaku manuweya afaiweya unaluku. Au hidedei unamiya tu unavehimeya be O bonaniga aku agetoga ginasiveyawana.

Hidede amine afaiweya unavehimeya ma a gahalamanena, fa'ina iya kadu abavehimeya gahalamanena. Yaku tonagona yana vehimeya dibune gamimiyami, kadu yaku tolugaviyamomo yaku vehimeya dibune himimiyami. Yaku tolugaviya sa'eyana gavehimeyena gagayo, Una, ada au gitowamidi be gina. Kadu velugana gagahena gagayo, U'ela we'ai, ada au gi'ela. Kadu aku agetoga againe gagahe gagayo, Hidedemi unafaisewa, ada au yaku vehimeya amine gifaisewa.”

E, gagahemi tova mulina kaliva moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina walaube'uya kadu wa'oyeya hina'ela, Yaubada yana abageya hinaluku be yana tolameya hinavetoga. Ide miIsileli bwanenedeyao Abelahamo Aisake Yakobu badi buye hinavetoga Yaubada yana avemwamwala hina'ana lobameya.

Tu ide omi miIsileli vaita Yaubada yana yo'o kalivadi tu keke wadavetumagana velemo'ena fa'ina kabu'avane hinahegemi be umalovaneya wanamiyami, ada medede againe wanatagitagi lakahina kumimi wanahobe'uwana nuwami ginavekubokubo.”

Ada Yesu hidedemi gilukahihi gihavaina togiyomatana gigahena gigayo, “Unana ya manuweya ada gavadi fa'ina uvetumaganeku amine, au hidedemi ginalakayemu.” Ada au medema kauwanai-nadi togiyomatana ana agetoga giyamumu.
Bana togiyomatana gina tu Yesu Fita yana manuweya giluku, ada Fita lawana gi'itadi adi iviya hidadauda wowodi vaita ai.
Au nimadi gi'abina ada wowodi auhe'ama gituluna, au himidi be hivebutu Yesu anaga hikidewedewena.
Ada mala gilavina kaliva moya'aidi yafune hiluvaiyedi-ma tobohiyadiyao Yesu againe hi'aliyedi, ada yana vehimeya againe yafune giwavidi. Kadu to'aulolo moya'aidi gisiveyawa-'owodi.
Ada hidedemi gifaisewa be Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya giyakahina-ma ginalakayemu velemo'ena fa'ina. Boi tuwai-mo'ena bana Aiseya gigaheye-vagahina gigayo,
Bana Tauna yada aulolo moya'aina givaihegena, kadu ada vita gihawatana be ginahavaina.
Hidedemi Aiseya gigahe.
Tu Yesu yo'o lakahidi himidififina-ma gi'itadi againe, ana tomuliya givehimeyedi be badi Bana buye tobu yuwa fafaline hinana.
Tu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala sa'eyana Bana againe gi'ela gigahena gigayo, “Tovehawala, gahawahegeku be ha'amine ha'amine unana, iya kadu O buye kanana.”
Kadu kaliva velugana, higa ana tomuliya sa'eyana, gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, udahawahegeku be gadamiyami tu bana kamaku gadatauni-yo gada'ela gadamuliye.”
Bana Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Badi yawaidi ivaguna keke amanadi yadi to'alika hinatauna. O'eni ma auhe'ama unamuliyeku.”
Yesu gilukahihi gihavaina, wakeya giyage ana tomuliya buye'i.
Ada auhe'ama mala koyona tobu againe gilakayemu, bolimanakouko gimadu ada lefo lakahina waka tabone gi'ayavalina. Tu bana Yesu ma gi'enonuwaulu.
Badi tomuliya hina hiluvaguna higahena higayo, “Kauveya, unalugolegoleda, kabi'ona kana'alika.”
Ada tomuliya hiyaulowoga au hive'agahegahe higayo, “Biyao! Bana hima gava kaliva? Taumadi, bolimana kadu lefo Bana bonana gi'abina!”

Tu Yesu miGadala yadi fafali yuwa tobu fafaline gilakayemu, ada kaliva adi'iselu wayafunediyao edeya himaduhagana. Badi yadi abamiyami tomohuyehuyeya, ada yafune hiluvaiyedi fa'ina badi manimaninidiyao, au kaliva vevine moya'aidi himatausedi fa'ina keke medema edai-nadi againe hidanauna.

Yesu hi'ita-yo hikova'awafatafata higayo, “O'eni Yaubada Natuna. Gavadi ime agaimeya unagani-yo u'ela? Ime yafune ama vematahiwadi ana tova au aimo tova mulina tu ka'i O u'ela be unamadu-kivetavetagigima?” Hidedemi higahe.
Tu yuwa oya fafaline bawe adi yo'o lakahina adiga hilelele.
Au yafune Yesu againe hive'o'oladona higayo, “Ka'i unawavima digo, udavehimeyema be yuwa bawe moya'aidi adaluvaiyedi.”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Au wana.” Ada au kaliva hinuyabuyabudi-yo bawe hiluvaiyedi, au bawe matatabudi awaloloya hi'otahobu, tobu againe hitowa'alika.
Tu bawe adi tolufolofologahi hi'ota be hina melaleya, bawe valeyadi kaliva agaidiya hi'awatalatalainena, kadu kaliva wayafunediyao agaidiya gavadi gilakayemu-ma hilukahihiyena.
Ada au kaliva moya'aidi hinu-'owoga be Yesu hina'itana. Ada hiyemu hi'itana againe, higaheya'aya'alina be yadi fafali ginanuyabuyabuna.
Tu Yesu wakeya giyage tobu yuwa fafaline giyewana, ada Tauna yana melala againe giyemu.

Mededei kaliva sa'eyana walogina gi'a'uwana-ma gimiyami. Kaliva tufoidi bana kaliva ana iviya gidauda-ma Yesu againe hi'aliyena. Ada Yesu yadi vetumagana gi'ita-yo tovefela againe gigahe gigayo, “Natuku, keke unamatauta, au ya koyona ahe gayawelidi.”
Hidedemi gigahe-yo au Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala tufoidi nuwahinagediya higahegahe higayo, “Hida hima kaliva Yaubada gihawatagona. Yaubada anakaibe koyona adi to'aiyawela.”
Tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa a gihalamanena fa'ina gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo hidedemi nuwanuwa koyona ase'asemiya gidadauda?

Gavaimi tovefela againe ganagahe-yo ginalakayemu? Ka'i ganagayo, Ya koyona ahe gayawelidi, o ka'i ganagayo, Umidi be unaudadana. Hadema vehimeya vita-mo'ena? Me kaliva ana siveyawa vaita vita-mo'ena, fa'ina ka'i ganavehimeya tu keke ginayamumu, au taumiyao amifaiweya wana'itahalamanena kaliva adi siveyawa keke akufaiweya.

Tu hida kaliva ganasiveyawana be wana'itani-yo Iya fa'ikuya wanagahe wanagayo, Velemodi. Bana Tohobu'ela ana wavehimeya be babiya kaliva yadi koyona adi aiyawela ana tagalowalowa.” Ada au tovefela againe gigahe gigayo, “Umidi, a ivi uwahi be una ya manuweya.”
Au tovefela gimidi be gina yana manuweya.
Ada yo'o hi'ita-yo himatamatauta tu Yaubada ana egana hikilakahina higayo, “Taumadi! Yaubada hida abavehimeya lakahina, higa koyona ana aba'aiyawela, tomiyababi giveledi.”

Tu Yesu gilowoga ada ginauna tu takesi ana toyaudi sa'eyana gi'itana, ana egana Madiu. Bana takesi ana abayaudi againe gihiyoto. Ada gi'ita-yo gigahena gigayo, “Unamuliyeku.” Au bana Madiu gimidi be gimuliyena.
Muliya Madiu yana manuweya Yesu giluku be gina'a. Ada tolameya gi'au'a tu takesi ana toyaudi moya'aidi kadu tokoyona velugadiyao hi'ela, ada Yesu kadu ana tomuliya buye hi'enolukekela tu hi'au'a.

Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi tufoidi hi'itadi-yo au ana tomuliya agaidiya higahe higayo, “Gavai'ona-yo yami tovehawala wama kaliva koyodiyao takesi ana toyaudi kadu tokoyona velugadiyao buye hi'a'au'a?”
Bana Yesu yadi gahe ginogalina ada yadi dewa fa'ina gigahedi gigayo, “Badi yadi aulolo keke ma keke doketa againe hinana tu to'aulolo ma nuwanuwadi doketa yana leme.

Tu omi'iyao ma wanana Yaubada bonana sa'eyana ana nuwanuwa wanalelena be wanahalamanena higa gigayo, Keke nuwanuwaku kevakeva wanamunudi-yo abaveyao wanafaisewani, keke. Au Iya nuwanuwaku kaliva wanahinekalikaliyedi. Au hidemi Yaubada bonana. Ada toyamumu keke doketa yana leme hinaleleni amine, meda anafaiweya Iya gahobu'ela be keke toyamumu vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina-ma ganakovadi. Au gahobu'ela tokoyona ganakovadi be yaku leme againe hinahagaviladi fa'ina.”

Kadu anafaiweya keke tamo hakwadi oine ivaguna manugose kwafilidi tuwaina agaidiya ginahiwani. Ka'i hidede amine gidahiwana digo, oine ivaguna gidatubuga be kwafilidi tuwaina ahe gikwakwana-ma gida'afolena, ada au oine babiya gidamadu-'owoga kadu kwafilidi gidakoyo. Au oine ivaguna kwafilidi ivaguna agaidiya hihiwana, ada au oine ginadauda yamumuna kadu kwafilidi keke ginakoyo.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.

Yesu aimo gilulukahihi tu tonagona sa'eyana gi'ela Bana agene tugana give'etodonena ada gigahena gigayo, “Adamoya natuku kwamayoku yawaina a gihavaina, tu uda'ela nima bana againe udasena be yawaina gidatune-havagilena.”
Au Yesu gitowamidi be givebwa'uliyena, ada ana tomuliya buye hina.
Au bana gi'ela gikibwa'ena fa'ina nuwahinagene gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i ana kaleko bwatana ganakibwa'ena amine o ganayamumu.”
Gikibwa'eni-yo Yesu gihagavilana be gi'itana ada gigahena gigayo, “Natuku keke unamatauta. Uvetumaganeku fa'ina ubwaina.” Ada auhe'ama kwamayoku giyamumu.
Kadu ginauna tu tonagona yana manuweya giyemu-yo, alika ana butubutu ginogalina, yo'o hive'alulaukuhi kadu tovekulele kwamana ali'alikana ana aitauna fa'ina yadi kulele hiyuveyuvena.
Ada Yesu gi'itadi-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Moya'aimi wana. Kwamana keke gida'alika, au gi'enonuwaulu.” Tu badi hivelaigena.
Au Yesu yo'o giwavidi be hihobu tu Bana giluku vetawaneya, kwamana nimane gi'abina ada au gimidi.
Ada kwamana yana mididi-havagi valeyana medema fafali matatabuna againe ginauna.
Ada Yesu manuwa hinagene giluku-yo tomatakoyo adi'iselu Bana againe hi'ela, ada gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Iya akufaiweya ganasiveyawami ma ka'i velemo'ena wavetumaganena?”
Ada badi higayo, “Ika Kauveya.”
Yesu gigahe-yo matadi gi'aleleyena. Ada gigahedonedi gigayo, “Yami yamumu inubana keke tamo hakwadi againe wanalukahihiyeni.”
Tu badi adi'iselu hilowoga ada kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya hilukahihiyena, ada au Yesu valeyana medema fafali againe ginauna.
Ada Yesu yafune giwavi-yo kaliva awana gila'ana be givebutu gilukahihi. Au moya'aidi hiyaulowoga higayo, “Keke tamo gavadi hidede amine boi hidedei Isileli againe gidalakayemu.”

Tu Yesu melala lakahidi kadu kabi'odi moya'aidi agaidiya ginuwaliliuga, ada yadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya givehavehawala, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yaubada yana yo'o ana luku fa'ina gilulumamalena, kadu to'aulolo moya'aidi yadi aulolo tulina tulina ma gisisiveyawadi.
Ada yo'o gi'itadi againe gihinekalikaliyedi, fa'ina sifi adi to'itave'avina keke amanadi yadi nuwanuwa amine, meda badi yadi nuwanuwa gifani kadu higakowakowa.
Hidedemi gi'itadi fa'ina ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “A'a moya'aina faha againe giboyalina, higa kaliva nuwadi ahe giludigadigaga be hinavetumaganeku, tu toyaudi higa tolaumamala keke moya'aidi.
Hidema fa'ina faha ana Tovehimeya againe wanave'o'ola be yana tolaumamala gina'iveninisedi ada kibababala ana eda hinavehawaledi.”
Ada afositolo tuwelo higa bonana ana towahidadana, adi egana hidede amine. Nagona Saimoni tu ana egana velugana Fita kadu taina Anidulu, Yemesa kadu taina Yoni badi Sebedi natuneyao,
Filifi kadu Batolomiu, Tomasi kadu Madiu, bana takesi ana toyaudi amanadi, Yemesa Alifiyo natuna kadu Tadiyasi,
Saimoni bana yo'o miLoma hivenibainedi-ma kalivana, kadu Yudasi-Isikaliyota bana Yesu nibaineyao nimadiya gihawavemogatalena amanadi.

Hida kalivai-dina tuwelo Yesu gi'iveninisedi be bonana hinawahidadanena, ada hidedemi givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Keke yo'o tulidiyao yadi melala agaidiya wanana, kadu keke miSameliya yadi melala agaidiya wanana.
Au Yaubada yana sifi tonaufani miIsileli agaidiya wanana.
Wananauna tu wanalulumamala wanagayo, Yaubada yana aituha a gilakayemu. Tova kabisona kaliva yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.

Au hidedemi wanagahedi kadu to'aulolo wanasiveyawadi, to'alika wanasivemidididi tovedawodawowo wanakiveyamumudi kadu yafune kaliva hiluvaiyedi-ma wanawavidi. Hida faiwala gavele-kawowomi fa'ina, kadu yami veluga wanavele-kawowodi, keke laufata wanavaini.
Keke tamo mani, fefe o ka'i kabala wananauweni.

Keke vainuwana yamina fa'ina wananauweni, kadu keke ami aikeva ana hilafa o ka'i ami ageyafayafa o ka'i aiwala wananauweni. Ka'i tofaisewa ginafaisewa hagihagina amine o badi givelugadi-ma hida'itave'avina, anaga o ka'i yana gava'adi hidavelena.
Tu ka'i melala lakahina o ka'i kabi'ona againe wanaluku amine, kaliva nuwana yamumuna wanalelena ada bana againe wanamiyami tu wanalowoga-havagi ana toveya.
Ada manuweya wanaluku againe, tonimanuwa wanamadulusiuleyena.

Ka'i tonimanuwa nuwana yamumuna be ginavetobohiyanemi digo, yami lusiule bana'e kadu yana manuwa hinagena agaidiya ginaduva-vagata. Tu ka'i keke hinavetobohiyanemi digo, yami lusiule au kadu wanavaiyewena be yadi vemwamwala keke.

Ada ka'i tamo hakwadi keke ginavetobohiyanemi o ka'i bonami keke hinavenogaleni digo, bana kalivai-nadi o ka'i melalai-nadi wanahegedi againe fwayafwaya agemiya wanavagahegehegena, higa Yaubada yana ila'a badi agaidiya ginayemu-ma ana iya'iyaya.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena miSodoma kadu miGomola dewa koyo-mo'ena hififaisewana. Tu gagahemi velemo'ena badi kalivai-dina omi yaku kaliva hinakilowemi fa'ina, adi matahiwadi miSodoma kadu miGomola adi matahiwadi ginatubuhegena aimo vedewayauga ana toveya.
Kadu wana'itave'avimi, fa'ina aimo kaliva hinakive'avimi be kotu againe hinahegenauwemi, kadu yadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya hinavekotumi be bulava againe hinalaulaumi.

Ada kabemani kadu kini agaidiya hinahegenauwemi, ada omi aku tomuliya fa'ina hinavedewayaugimi. Tu omi badi kini agaidiya kadu yo'o tulidiyao yadi tovehimeya agaidiya Iya fa'ikuya wana'awatalatalaina.
Tu hinavekotumi ana toveya, keke wanavenuwanauna vaita ka'i gavaimi wanagahe o ka'i gava bonalaufata wanagaheyeni. Au medema tovai-nadi Yaubada gina'alavelevelemi be wanagaheyena.
Ada hifufu wanagaheyena-ma keke taumiyao yami nuwanuwa againe ginalakayemu, au Tamami Alu'aluwana awamiya ginalukahihi.

Au kaliva sa'eyana tauna tobohiyana kaliva nimadiya ginahawavemogatalena be hinaluve'alikana fa'ina, kadu anafaiweya kwamana tamana natuna ginahawavemogatalena be hinaluve'alikana. Ada we'owe'o badi tamadiyao hinadiyao agaidiya hinavenibaina be alika tamadiyao hinadiyao hinanuhagana fa'ina.
Ada omi aku tomuliya fa'ina kaliva moya'aidi omi agaimiya hinanuwanuwakoyo, tu gaveyao wana'atuvefa'ila-vagata, au Yaubada ginakibababalemi.

Ka'i melala sa'eyana againe hinakivekoyomi amine, au wana'otayabuyabudi be melala velugana againe wanana. Ada gagahemi velemo'ena miIsileli melalidi moya'aina agaidiya aimo keke wananuwaliliugi-'owoni tu Iya Tohobu'ela ganayemu.

Ka'i tosikulu yana tovehawala amine ginamiyami, au medema gilubodana, kadu ka'i tofaisewa yana tovehimeya amine ginamiyami, au medema gilubodana. E, ka'i Iya yami yo'o ana tonagona hi'ihawadamaneku hivewagaku Biyelisibuli, higa yafune adi tokaiwabu, au omi yaku yo'o hina'ihawadamane-mo'emi.
Hida bonaku ami loi agaimiya vaita uyuyuya amine gadalukahihiyeni-ma aimo uyadeyadeya yo'oya wanahawavemogatalena, ada gavadi omi yaku yo'ogaga gavehawalemi-ma aimo didigeya wanalulumamalena.

Badi wowomi hinakivekoyona be wana'alika amanadi keke wanamatausedi. Badi wowomi ka'i hinaluve'alikana tu keke adifaiweya alu'aluwami hinakivekoyoni. Bana Yaubada wowomi kadu alu'aluwami abaga koyona againe anafaiweya ginaluve'alikana fa'ina, Bana'e wanamatausena.
Manuga mukumukudiyao luhei yabune amine fatadi wani toea, tu ka'i Tamami keke nuwanuwana hina'alika, au keke sa'eyana babiya ginabe'u-yo gina'alika.
Tu omi'iyao ma utuutu u'umiya ana kilagalaga Tamami gihalamanena. Au keke wanamatauta fa'ina omi manuga wakaiwabuhegedi Yaubada matane.
Ka'i Yaubada manuga mukumukudiyao gi'ita'itave'avidi, au omi kaliva gina'ita'itave'avi-mo'emi, fa'ina keke wanamatauta.
Ada hai kaliva keke ginamatauta tu yo'o matadiya ginagahe ginagayo, Iya Yesu Keliso yana kaliva, medema fa'ine Iya kadu Kamaku matane lobameya ganagahe ganagayo, Bana'e yaku kaliva.
Tu hai kaliva ginamatauta be yo'o matadiya ginavekekeyeku ginagayo, Iya keke Yesu yana kaliva, medema fa'ine Iya kadu Kamaku matane lobameya ganagahe ganagayo, Bana'e keke yaku kaliva.
Keke wananuwanuwa vaita gadahobu'ela-yo niwalova babiya gadaseni. Keke niwalova ganaseni fa'ina gada'ela, keke. Au Iya gahobu'ela be venibaina ginalakayemu fa'ina.
E, Iya fa'ikuya
kaliva tamana againe ginavenivenibaina, kadu kwamayoku hinadi agaidiya hinavenivenibaina, kadu kwamayoku lawadi buye hinave'avenivenibaina.
Ada au kaliva nibaineyao tauna ana yo'o agaidiya hinatowamidi.
Hai tomuliya tama o ka'i hina wai hinagona ya nuwenuweya, keke afaiweya unamuliyeku. Kadu hai kaliva natu kaliva o kwamayoku wai hinagona ya nuwenuweya, keke afaiweya unamuliyeku.
Kadu hai tomuliya keke nuwanuwa tavagikuya unanunaudadana kadu Iya fa'ikuya alika unanuhagani, keke afaiweya unamuliyeku.
Ada hai kaliva nuwanuwa yawaini tauni unalugolegolena, au yawaini unanuhegena. Tu hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya kaliva nimadiya yawaini unanuhegena, au yawai-vagahi unanuhagana.

Kadu gaveyao Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hinavetobohiyanena bana Yaubada yana kaliva fa'ina, au to'awatalatalaina ana laufata amine kadu badi adi laufata hinavaina. Kadu gaveyao kaliva yegayegana hinavetobohiyanena bana yana huluva yegayegana fa'ina, au kaliva yegayegana ana laufata amine kadu badi adi laufata hinavaina.
Ada ka'i tamo hakwadi gufa abayuyu yaku kwamana kabisona sa'eyana unavelena bana yaku kaliva fa'ina, au wona velemona a laufata unavaina.” Au hidede amine Yesu ana tomuliya gikivetuvetunudi.
Yesu ana tomuliya tuwelo gikivetuvetunudi gihavaina, gilowoga be gina Galili melalai-dina agaidiya givehavehawala ada Yaubada bonana gilulumamaledi.
Tu Yoni Tobafitaiso deliya gimiyami, ada Keliso yana faisewa valeyana ginogalini-yo ana tomuliya tufoidi Bana againe gi'iveninisedi be hinatoliluveluvena.
Badi hi'ela Yesu againe higahe higayo, “Yoni gigahema vaita kaliva sa'eyana higa Yaubada yana Tovegida gina'ela. Ka'i O'eni bana kalivai-nina o ka'i kaliva sa'eyana aimo anabodana?”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Wanana ada gavaimi wanoganogalina kadu wa'ita'itana-ma Yoni wanavenuwa'atana.

E, wanagahena higa vaita tomatakoyo matadi gimahalina tovefela hinunudadana tovedawodawowo yadi aulolo gihavaina totagakweu tagadi gi'afolena to'alika himididi-havagi, kadu koyokoyo Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yaubada yana kibababala fa'ina hi'ela'ela hinoganogalina.
Kadu Yoni yana toliluvaluva inubaku fa'ina wanagahena hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya keke gidanuwaluga, medema yana vemwamwala gavatubuga!”

Badi Yoni ana tomuliya hilowoga be hinauna tu Yesu yo'oyo'o agaidiya givebutu Yoni fa'ine gilukahihi gigayo, “Boi omi'iyao Yoni wa'itana yamina babigaga againe ana toveya, wanuwanuwa ma vaita gavadi wada'itani? Isisi'u bolimana againe gilewalewa amine, ka'i wana vaita kaliva kowakowana wada'itani?

Keke hidede amine wada'itani tu wana be ka'i gavadi wana'itani? Ka'i kaliva ana wavaigau vaita wada'itani? Keke, fa'ina kaliva adi vaigau hagihagina ma tokikaiwabu yadi manuwa lakahina againe himimiyami.

Au wanagaheku, omi wana ka'i gavadi wada'itani? Ka'i wana be Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina wana'itana? E, wona velemona to'awatalatalaina wa'itana tu bana Yoni to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi gikaiwabuhegedi.
Tuwai-mo'ena bana Yoni fa'ine Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe higa vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida againe gidagahe gidagayo,
U'ita, yaku tovenuwa'ata gana'iveninisena
be bana wai ginanagona,
ya eda kaliva ase'asediya ginakidewedewena.

Au gagahemi velemo'ena Yoni Tobafitaiso kaliva moya'aidi babiya hitubuyemu-ma gikaiwabuhegedi, tu gava kaliva ana egana kabisona Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya tu givetumagane-mo'eku, medema bana Yoni ana egana ginakaiwabuhegena.

E, Yoni Tobafitaiso tomiyababi moya'aidi gikaiwabuhegedi, fa'ina omi gaveyao kaliva koyomiyao yana laumamala fifiwalana ase'asemi gi'onana be nuwanuwami lakahina Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wanaluku. Nuwanuwami lakahina wanaluku fa'ina wayo'oyo'o wafifaiwala alu'aluwami givedivediwe be higa vaita Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wanaluku. Ada au Yoni givebutu gilumamala ana toveya hidedemi wahuluhuluva wanunauwena adamoya Iya yaku toveya.
Ada boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi kadu Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina hilulukahihi be hinunauwena Yoni yana toveya.

Ada boi tuwai-mo'ena to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi higaheye-vagahina vaita aimo tova mulina to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana vaita Elaiya amine ginalakayemu. Ada ka'i nuwanuwami yaku venuwa'ata wanavetumaganena digo, au hidedemi wanahalamanena higa Yoni au vaita bana Elaiya amine.
Kaliva watagami, au bonaku wadavenogalena.

Tu omi kaliva hida tovai-nadi babiya watubuyemu-ma gavadi amine yo ganahawaluveluvemi? Au omi we'owe'o amidiya, melaleya hihiyoto tu hivetavetaunega. Yo'o sa'eyana yo'o velugadi agaidiya hikovakova higayo, Modawa akalikalina tu omi keke wadavagavaga wadayeluyelu. Alulaukuhi vaita alika ana tova amine tu omi keke wadatagitagiya. Gavaimi anaga-yo nuwami anakiveyamumuni? Hidede amine we'owe'o higahe.

Tu Iya Tohobu'ela ga'ela ada a'a yamumuna ga'au'ana kadu oine gayuyuna, ada au kadu Iya wahawavekoyoyeku wagayo, Wa'ita, Bana hima to'a-fa'ila oine ana toyu-fa'ila, kadu takesi ana toyaudi be tokoyona velugadiyao givetobohiyanedi. Hidedemi wagahe tu gavaimi anahuluva-yo nuwami anakiveyamumuni? Tu Yoni kadu Iya'eku ama'iselu Yaubada yana nuwahuya againe ka'i velemo'ena afifaisewa ma yama faisewa guwana againe wanahalamanena.” Au hidedemi Yesu yo'o agaidiya gigahe.

Kadu'e, melala tufoidi agaidiya Yesu yana aituha fifiwaladi moya'ai-mo'edi gifaisewadi tu kaliva yadi dewa koyona keke hidavenikohiyeni-yo hidahagaviladi, fa'ina Yesu givebutu melalai-dina gihawavekoyoyedi.

Gigayo, “Hoiyoi miKolasini! Hoiyoi miBedasaida! Tova vita-mo'ena agaimiya ginalakayemu. Gavadi-yo? Ka'i aituha fifiwaladi omi hinafamiya gafaisewadi-ma badi miTaiya miSaidoni kaliva koyodiyao hinafadiya gadafaisewadi digo, badi tuwai-mo'ena yadi dewa koyona hidahegena, hidaludabudabu hidave'ofu higa yadi nuwavilana ana iya'iyaya hida'iveyemaunina.

Au gagahemi aimo vedewayauga ana toveya omi miKolosini kadu miBedasaida ami matahiwadi miTaiya miSaidoni adi matahiwadi ginatubuhegena, fa'ina yaku aituha fifiwaladi wa'itadi tu keke wadavetumaganeku.

Ada omi miKafeneumi ma nuwanuwami taumiyao ami egana wanakilakahina vaita lobameya wadalaka tu abaga koyona againe hinahegehobuyemi. Ka'i hida yaku aituha fifiwaladi omi hinafamiya gafaisewadi-ma badi miSodoma hinafadiya boi tuwai-mo'ena gadafaisewadi digo, miSodoma yadi dewa koyo-mo'ena fa'ina keke hidakwaha-'owoga, au tova adamoya aimo hidamiyami.
Au gagahemi aimo vedewayauga ana toveya omi miKafeneumi ami matahiwadi miSodoma adi matahiwadi ginatubuhegena, fa'ina yaku aituha fifiwaladi wa'itadi tu keke wadavetumaganeku.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Ika Kamaku, ya nuwanuwa yamumuna amine au ahe uhuluva.” Hidedemi Yesu give'o'ola.
Au gaveyao moya'aimi wafaisewa-fa'ila be vainuwana vitana wawahiwahina fa'ina wowomi gilogilogi, au Iya agaikuya wana'ela be wanaveyawai.

Yaku vehimeya vaita ewa amine. Yaku ewa unavaina be vainuwana buye kana'avalana, higa yaku vehimeya ana itave'avina againe ganavelugami. Iya kaliva umaumaku, ada keke Tauku aku egana gadakilakahini fa'ina halamana Iya agaikuya wanavaina, ada ase'asemi ana vainuwana ganavetaigina.
Yaku ewa higa yaku vehawala keke vitana, kadu yaku vainuwana higa yaku vehimeya au ihayana.” Hidede amine Yesu gigahe.
Tu badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi hi'itadi againe Yesu higahena higayo, “U'ita, a tomuliyamomo sabati ana vehimeya keke hida'itave'avini.”

Kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa yadi dewa sabati againe yada buki-vehimeya againe ma'i wahawahawana o ka'i keke? Badi manuwa-tafalolo againe hififaisewa sabati ana toveya. Sabati ana hawata faisewa fa'ina hiyaweyawelina nonogana adi vita keke. Meda anafaiweya aku tomuliyamomo adi vita keke.
Wanogali! Manuwa-tafalolo ana kaiwabu lakahina tu tokaiwabu sa'eyana gilakayemu-ma manuwa-tafalolo ana kaiwabu gitubuhegena.
Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana ana nuwanuwa keke wadahalamaneni, gigayo,
Keke nuwanuwaku kevakeva aku abaveyao fa'ina wanakabukabudi. Iya nuwanuwaku kaliva wanahinekalikaliyedi.
Ka'i mena gahe ana nuwanuwa ma'i wadahalamanena digo, yaku kaliva adi vita keke amanadi keke wadahawavekoyoyedi, au wadahinekalikaliyedi.
Au Iya Tohobu'ela sabati ana to'itave'avina. Kaliva yadi dewa sabati againe Iya gavehivehimeyena.” Au hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu faheya amine gi'ela gina yadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe giluku.

Kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami nimana gifwalele-vagata. Kadu kaliva tufoidi himiyami, nuwanuwadi tamo gavadi koyona Yesu yana dewa againe hinanuhagani-yo hinahawavekoyoyena, fa'ina hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Yada buki-vehimeya kaliva ana siveyawa fa'ina gavaimi givehimeya? Ka'i adafaiweya sabati againe kaliva kanasiveyawana o ka'i keke?”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Tamo hakwadi agaimiya ya sifi kahuya sabati againe ginabe'u, ka'i unana unasilakahina o ka'i keke? Sabati againe nonogana unasilakahina.
Sifi au gaitoma lakahina tu kaliva ma gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena. Hidema fa'ina hai kaliva sabati againe tobohiyana gina'ihagihagiyena, medema sabati ana vehimeya gi'itave'avina.”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahedi tu nimakoyo againe gigahe gigayo, “Nima utune.” Nimana gitunena ada auhe'ama giyamumu nimana fafalina yamumuna amine.
Tu badi Falisi hilowoga be hina buye hivevai be higa Yesu hinaluve'alikana.
Tu Yesu Falisi yadi nuwanuwa gihalamanena againe, mena melala gihegena. Yo'o lakahina hibwa'ulina ada yadi to'aulolo moya'aidi gisiveyawa-'owodi.
Gisiveyawadi tu gihawatadi be Bana'e yadi tosiveyawa keke kaliva agaidiya hinalukahihiyeni.
Gihawatadi be higa Yaubada yana gahe bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya tuwai-mo'ena gigaheye-vagahina ma a ginalakayemu velemo'ena. Bana Yesu fa'ine Yaubada gigahe gigayo,
amanadi, yaku nuwanuwa Bana againe gasena
ada Bana nuwaku gikiveyamumu-mo'ena.
Alu'aluwaku Bana againe ganasena be ginafaiwalavelena,
ada yaku vehimeya tunutunugina yo'o tulidi tulidi ginavehawaledi.
Keke tamo hakwadi Bana agona melaleya ginanogalini,
fa'ina Bana umaumana.
Badi kowakowadiyao isisi'u gi'afilina-ma amine
keke ginakilowedi, au ginavelugadi,
kadu badi matadi adobona lamufa noya'aina gilewalewa-ma amine yawaidi keke ginaluvekwe'uni, au ginavelugadi.
E, yana faisewa againe ginafifaiwala ginafifaiwala tu Yaubada yana vehimeya tunutunugina mali nuwanuwa ginatubuhegena.
Yo'o tulidi tulidi adi kibababala fa'ina Bana'e hinavetumaganena.
Au hidedemi Aiseya gigaheye-vagahina.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami wayafunena fa'ina givematakoyo kadu agona gisebodana. Kaliva tufoidi bana kalivai-nadi Yesu againe hi'aliyena ada gisiveyawana, au awana gita'ala be givebutu gilukahihi kadu matana giyamumu be gi'italele.
Kaliva moya'aidi hiyaulowoga hive'atoliluvaluva higayo, “Ka'i Bana hidevama Devida bwanenena higa Yaubada yana Tovegida?”

Tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamanena ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hai fafali ana melala tulina tulina buye hilulugaviya, medema taudiyao hinavehavaidi. Kadu hai melala o ka'i yo'o ana kaliva tova moya'aina buye hivekwavekwageya, medema hina'abi'ota'ota be melala o ka'i yo'o ana egana ginahavaina.
Meda anafaiweya ka'i Setani tauna yana yo'o higa yafune giwaviwavidi digo, bana tauna yana yo'o ginavehavaidi ada au yana abavehimeya ginahavaina.

Omi wagahe vaita Biyelisibuli yana faiwala againe yafune gadawavidi. Ka'i Iya Biyelisibuli yana faiwala againe gawavidi digo, hakwadi yami kalivamomo faiwala giveledi-yo yafune hiwavidi? Ka'i Biyelisibuli faiwala giveledi? Keke-mo'a. Omi wagahe-kawowo ma taumiyao yami kalivamomo hinavenuwa'atami.
Atu ka'i Iya Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana faiwala againe yafune gawavidi amine o Yaubada yana itave'avina againe wavebutu wamimiyami ase'asemiya givehivehimeya.

Ka'i kaliva manimaninina yana manuweya ginamiyami tu mali kaliva anafaiweya ginaluku kaliva yana lokoloko ginavaina? Keke-mo'a. Nagona kaliva manimaninina ginayogoni-yo yana lokoloko ginavaina. Meda anafaiweya Iya Setani ganayogoni-yo kaliva wayafunedi gana'ihagihagiyedi.

Hai kaliva keke tobohiyaku, medema nibaiku. Kadu hai kaliva tomuliya adi yaudi againe keke gidavelugaku, medema gihuluva vaita kaliva gidawavidi be keke hinamuliyeku. Iya Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala againe yafune gawavidi tu omi wagahe vaita Setani yana faiwala againe gadawavidi.

Medema fa'ina wanogali! Yaubada kaliva yadi dewa koyona tulina tulina ginayawelina, o ka'i yadi gahe-kawowo againe Yaubada hinahawatagona-ma ginavenuwauluyena. Atu hai kaliva yana gahe-kawowo againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginahawatagona, medema yana koyona Yaubada keke ginayawelini, keke-mo'a.

Hai kaliva Iya Tohobu'ela ginahawavekoyoyeku, medema yana koyona Yaubada ginayawelina. Atu hai kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginahawatagona, medema yana koyona tova adamoya kadu tova mulina Yaubada keke ginayawelini, au yana koyonai-nadi ginaduva-vagata.

Kadu'e, ka'i wanagahe vaita ai guwana yamumuna, kadu wanagahe vaita ai-mo'ena yamumuna. O ka'i wanagahe vaita ai guwana koyona kadu wanagahe vaita ai-mo'ena koyona. Fa'ina ai ka'i yamumuna o ka'i koyona ma guwana againe kahalamanena amine, kaliva ka'i yamumuna o koyona yana dewa againe wanahalamanena.
Omi vaita oloto koyodi amine. Omi kaliva koyomi fa'ina keke amifaiweya gahe hagihagina wanalukahihiyeni, keke-mo'a. Gavadi ase'asemiya gidadauda medema awamiya ginalakayemu.
Kaliva yamumuna gidewadewa yamumuna bana nuwana yamumuna fa'ina. Meda anafaiweya kaliva koyona gidewadewa koyona bana nuwana koyona fa'ina. Au nuwada yada dewa givehimeyena.
Tu gagahemi, aimo tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya kaliva yadi gahe-kawowo tulina tulina fa'ina Yaubada againe hinakotu.
Ka'i yami gahe au velemo'ena digo, Yaubada ginahawaveyamumuyemi. Ka'i yami gahe au fwaya amine digo, Yaubada ginahawavekoyoyemi. E, yami gahe fa'ina ginavedewayaugimi.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.

Yesu gigayo, “Omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma kaliva koyomi, keke Yaubada againe wadamiyave'avina, fa'ina nimaku ana iya'iyaya walelelena. Atu keke mena iya'iyaya wana'itani. Au iya'iyaya sa'eyanaga ganavehawalemi, higa iya'iyaya Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yona againe gilakayemu-ma amine.
E, bana Yona igana lakahina kamone aiyeta tohiye kadu bogi tohiye gidauda amine, meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela babi hinagene aiyeta tohiye kadu bogi tohiye ganamiyami.

Aimo tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya miNiniva hinatowamidi be omi hinahawavekoyoyemi. Fa'ina badi miNiniva bana Yona yana laumamala hinogalina againe hivenogalena be hinuwaviladi. Tu omi wanogali! Bana Yona yana laumamala gaitoma lakahina tu tova adamoya yaku laumamala wanogalina-ma gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena tu omi keke wadavenogaleni.

Kadu'e, tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya fafali sa'eyana wabolimaneya ana tokaiwabu kwamayoku hinatowamidi be omi hinahawavekoyoyemi. Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena yuwa lauveya hitauya be miIsileli yada tokaiwabu Solomoni yana vehawala nuwahuyahuyana hinanogalina. Atu tova adamoya yaku vehawala Solomoni yana vehawala gitubuhegena tu omi keke nuwanuwami wananogalini.”

Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i yafune kaliva ginanuyabuyabuna amine, ginanauna ai'aveya abaveyawai ginalelena. Ka'i ginalele-wayoga au ginagayo, Ganana be yaku abamiyami ganuyabuyabuna-ma againe ganayewaku. E, bana yafune ginalakayemu yana manuwa gina'itana mena kakawana, ada manuwa yegayegana vaita tamo hakwadi gida'ihagihagiyeni.

Au kadu ginana tobohiyaneyao yafune seveni ginavega'auledi be badi moya'aidi kaliva hinaluvaiyena. Bana yafune nagona koyona tu yafune seveni koyo-mo'edi. Nagona kaliva yana miyami koyona tu muliya yafune moya'aidi hinaluvaiyena againe yana miyami au ginakoyo-mo'a. Meda anafaiweya omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma yami miyami ginakoyo-mo'a.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kaliva sa'eyana givenuwa'atana gigayo, “Hina kadu taimomo buye wade melaleya himidimidi, nuwanuwadi yadi nuwanuwa hinalukahihiyena.”]
Yesu gigayo, “Hakwa'adi hinaku? Kadu gaveyao tobohiyakweyao?”
Gigahe-yo ana tomuliyamomo givenimatunetuneyedi gigayo, “Hidema hinaku kadu tobohiyakweyao.
Fa'ina hai kaliva o vevine Kamaku lobameya yana nuwanuwa hi'ita'itave'avina, medema tobohiyaku o nouku o hinaku.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu medema aiyetai-nadi Yesu manuweya gihobu gina tobu fafaline givetoga be higa ginavehawala.
Kaliva moya'aidi hiyo'oyo'o ada himidififina fa'ina, waka againe giyage be givetoga tu yo'o taliyeya himidimidi.
Ada nuwanuwa tulina tulina gahetalahobuhobu amine givehawaledi. Gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana witi nafona yana faheya ginauwena be gina'iyauyaulena.
Witi nafona gi'i'iyauyaulena tu tufona edeya gibe'u au manuga hi'ela be hi'ana.
Tufona babi dabodabona againe gibe'u. Medede againe babi yamumuna keke lakahina gidadauda. Ada babi yamumuna keke vewabana fa'ina witi nafona gimadukabu.
Tu kauwana gilaka againe witi tubuvaguna gikabuna be gibou, walamina keke gidavegilili velemo'ena fa'ina.
Kadu tufona aboda againe gibe'u ada au yogo gifaiwala be witi gilufave'alikana.
Atu tufona babi yamumuna againe gibe'u be gitabo yamumuna. Witi guwana ma tufona hanaledi (100) amine, tufona sikisiti (60) amine kadu tufona teti (30) amine.
Omi kaliva watagami, au bonaku wadavenogalena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.
Tu badi tomuliya Yesu againe hi'ela hitoliluvaluva higayo, “Gavana fa'ina yo'o agaidiya gahetalahobuhobu amine uvehawaledi?”

Hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ginogalina be gi'ita'itave'avina, medema againe kadu nuwanuwa moya'aina ginayauna be Yaubada ana halamana bana againe ginatubuga-mo'a. Atu hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa keke gida'ita'itave'avini, medema yana halamana kabi'ona Yaubada ginavaihegena be ginamiya-kawowo.

Yaku nuwanuwa hi'ita'itana tu keke hida'itahalamaneni. Yaku gahe hivanevanenegena tu keke hidavenogaleni o ka'i hidahalamaneni. Keke hidanogali-hagihagiyeni fa'ina, yaku nuwanuwa gahetalahobuhobu amine gavehavehawaledi.
Tova moya'aina bonaku wananoganogalina
tu keke ana nuwanuwa wanahalamaneni.
Kadu wana'ita'itana tu keke wana'itahalamaneni.
Fa'ina hida yo'o taudiyao nuwadi hikivefanina
tagadi hi'ivekuluna matadi hikive'uyuyuna.
Keke hidahawahegedi be matadi ganakivemahalina
o ka'i tagadi ganakifolena o nuwadi ganakiyauna.
Au keke nuwanuwadi Iya agaikuya
hinahagaviladi be ganakiveyamumudi fa'ina.
Au hidedemi Yaubada bana Aiseya awane gigahe.
Tu omi aku tomuliya ma matami sinasinahina, kadu tagami folefolegina fa'ina yami vemwamwala gavatubuga!

Au gagahemi velemo'ena, tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina kadu kaliva yegayegadiyao moya'aidi nuwanuwadi lakahina yaku faisewa omi wa'ita'itana-ma hina'itana, tu keke hida'itani. Kadu nuwanuwadi yaku vehawala omi wanoganogalina-ma hinanogalina, tu keke hidanogalini.”
Kadu Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Au wanogali. Gahetalahobuhobu guwana ana iyauyaula ana nuwanuwa wanahalamanena.

Witi nafona edeya gibe'u-ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Ka'i kaliva laumamala Yaubada yana itave'avina fa'ina ginogalina tu keke ana nuwanuwa gidahalamaneni amine o bana againe kaliva koyona gi'ela be gavadi tolaumamala kaliva ase'asene gifahana-ma gilemana.
Kadu nafona babi dabodabona againe ana nuwanuwa amanadi kaliva Yaubada bonana ginogalina be yana wavemwamwala ase'asene gisena.

Tu bonana keke gidanuwa-nunauyeni ada walamina keke ase'asene gidavegilili fa'ina, tova kabisonaga gi'atuvefa'ila. Ka'i tova vitana bana againe ginalakayemu o ka'i yana hawahega Yaubada againe fa'ina aulolo tagiya kaliva nimadiya ginanuhagana, yana hawahega Yaubada againe au ginamadunuwayewa.

Kadu nafona abodeya ana nuwanuwa amanadi kaliva Yaubada bonana ginogalina tu babi ana gaitoma fa'ina givevenuwanauna, kadu tova moya'aina mani lokoloko nuwadi givaivaina fa'ina mena gaitomai-dina Yaubada bonana gilufave'alikana ada guwana keke.

Atu nafona babi yamumuna againe ana nuwanuwa amanadi kaliva Yaubada bonana ginogalina be ana nuwanuwa gihalamanena, ada au yana dewa againe guwana giseseyemaunena. Kaliva sa'eyana guwana ka'i hanaledi (100) amine, kadu sa'eyana sikisiti (60) amine, kadu sa'eyana teti (30) amine.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu Yesu kadu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi miyami hidede amine. Kaliva sa'eyana witi nafona yamumuna yana faheya gi'iyauyaulena.
Tu bogi sa'eyana moya'aidi hidauda tu kaliva nibaina gi'ela yogo nafona witi ana iviya kadu gi'iyauyaulena au gina.
Himiyami tu witi gitabo a'a-mo'ena gisena au kadu yogo gitabo.
Tu tofaha yana tofaisewa bana againe hi'ela higahe higayo, Kauveya, witi nafona yamumuna ya faha againe ufahana. Gavadi-yo yogo gikabu?
Bana gigayo, Medema nibaiku nimana. Badi tofaisewa hitoliluvaluva higayo, Ka'i ime anana yogo anahabuna?
Bana gigayo, Auwe, fa'ina ka'i yogo wanahabuhabuna amine kadu witi tubuvaguna buye wanahabuna.

Au witi kadu yogo buye ginadauda tu a'a-mo'ena ana aitalaga ana tova ginayemu. Medema tovai-nadi badi to'aitalaga ganavenuwa'atadi be higa vaita yogo hinamidiyaudi ada hina'itavani-yo hinakabuna. Muliya witi hinatalana be yaku kweda againe hinasena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.

Tu Yesu kadu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi tubutubuga hidede amine. Kaliva sa'eyana ai ana egana masitada nafona givaina be yana faha againe gifahana.

Mena masitada nafona ma kabikabi'ona nafona tulina tulina adi loi againe. Kabikabi'ona nonogana ginakabu againe ana tubuga lakahina. E, ginave'aihala be manuga hina'ela laganina againe hinave'uba.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu Yesu gigahe-yo kadu gigahetalahobuhobu-havagi gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi tubutubuga vaita isi amine. Kwamayoku sa'eyadi isi hivaina be falawa wanau'ana tohiye hivilana be falawa hinagene ginauna tu beledi matatabuna gitubuga.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yesu mena gaitomai-dina moya'aina givehawaledi. Ada gahetalahobuhobugaga amine givehawaledi. Keke gahe-mo'ena amine gidavehawaledi, au yana vehawala gahetalahobuhobugaga amine.
Medede amine gihuluva be higa gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Yesu yana vehawala fa'ina gigaheye-vagahi, medema ginalakayemu velemo'ena. Gigayo,
Gahetalahobuhobu amine ganavehawaledi,
gaitoma sevasevauyana babi ana abave'inuba againe
tova adamoya ganalukahihiyena.
Tu Yesu yo'o gihegedi tu manuweya giluku. Ana tomuliya Bana againe hi'ela higahe higayo, “Yogo ana gahetalahobohobu fa'ina unakivetuvetunuma.”
Yesu gigayo, “Bana kaliva witi nafona yamumuna gifahana-ma vaita Iya Tohobu'ela amine.

Faha ma vaita tomiyababi amine, ada nafona yamumuna vaita kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya amanadi amine. Yogo ma vaita badi kaliva Setani yana abavehimeya againe himimiyami-ma amine.
Ada kaliva nibaina yogo gifahana-ma vaita Setani tauna amine. Witi ana aitalaga ma vaita hida tova ana lauyabu amine, ada to'aitalaga ma vaita Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata amine.
Yogo hiyaudi be ai'ala'alata againe hikabuna amine, meda anafaiweya hida tova ana lauyabu againe ginalakayemu.

Iya Tohobu'ela yaku tovenuwa'ata gana'iveninisedi be gaveyao yaku itave'avina againe himimiyami atu tobohiyadiyao koyona againe hivebe'udi kadu gaveyao koyona tulina tulina hififaisewana, medema hinasevehailedi be ai'ala'alata againe hinahegedi. Mena ai'ala'alata againe hinatagitagi lakahina, kumidi hinahobe'uwana nuwadi ginavekubokubo.

Koyodiyao hinasevehailedi tu yegayegadiyao Yaubada Tamadi yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be kauwana give'akinamanamalena amine badi hinakaiwabu. Omi watagami, au bonaku wadavenogalena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Kadu Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi hawahega hidede amine. Tuwai-mo'ena tamo hakwadi mani lokoloko hagihagina bokesiya giseni tu gava babi hinagene yana faheya gisevauyena. Gidauda ma kaliva sa'eyana gifahafaha tu ginuhagana. Ginuhagani-yo givetaubodana au yana wavemwamwala gina yana lokoloko moya'aina gikimonevedamaneni tu giyewana be mena fahai-nadi gikimonena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami yadi hawahega hidede amine. Kaliva sa'eyana ginana odo'odo hagihagina gina'unena.
Gina'une'une tu odo'odo hagihagi-mo'ena fatana lakahina ginanuhagani-yo ginana yana lokoloko matatabuna ginawahi be odo'odo-nadi ginakimonena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu sa'eyana ma gigayo, “Yaubada yana itave'avina ana nuwanuwa vaita alevatu tobuya hihegehobuyena-ma amine. Alevatu hihegehobuyeni-yo igana tulidi tulidi hinabayaumidi.
Alevatu ginamaga againe tobayauma avaleya hinataina au hinavetoga igana yamumudi foga againe hinadododi tu igana koyodi hinahegedi.

Meda anafaiweya hida tova ana lauyabu againe Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata hinahobu'ela kaliva koyodi kaliva yamumudi hinafadiya hinamiyami-ma hinasevehailedi be ai'ala'alata againe hinahegedi. Mena ai'ala'alata againe hinatagitagi lakahina, kumidi hinahobe'uwana nuwadi ginavekubokubo.”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu tu ana tomuliya gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Ka'i mena gahetalahobuhobu moya'aina galukahihiyena-ma ana nuwanuwa wahalamanena?” Badi higayo, “Ika, ahalamanena.”

Au Yesu gigayo, “Wa'ita, hai Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala agaikuya givetomuliya be Bana Yaubada yana itave'avina ana nuwanuwa againe gakivetuvetununa, medema vaita tonimanuwa yana wakikaiwabu amine. Yaubada yana vehawala tuwaina kadu yaku vehawala ivaguna yana foseya gi'i'ihobuna be kaliva givehavehawaledi.”
Ide Bana kalivai-nadi inubana kahalamanena. Bana hida manuwa ana to'aiyogona natuna tu hinana adi egana Meli. Kadu tobohiyaneyao kahalamanedi Yemesa Yosefa Saimoni Yudasi.
Kadu nouneyao buye kamimiyami. E, bana hinafadeya gilakata tu hai yana kaiwabu givaini?”

Au hidedemi miNasaledi yadi wa'ago'uga buye hive'agahegahe tu hikilowena. Atu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hive'amohimohinena, tu tauna yana melala kadu tauna yana yo'o kalivai-dina keke hidave'amohimohineni.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Ada badi yadi vetumagana keke fa'ina, kadu keke aituha fifiwalana moya'aina badi hinafadiya gidafaisewani.
Tu medema tovai-nadi Helodi, fafali ana egana Galili adi tovehimeya, Yesu valeyana ginogalina.

Au yana kalivamomo gigahedi gigayo, “Bana kalivai-nadi valeyana kanogalina-ma au Yoni Tobafitaiso. Gi'alika tu gimididi-havagi. Medema fa'ina abaveyaulowoga valeyana kanogalina-ma anafaiweya gififaisewana.”

Helodi hidedemi gigahe fa'ina boi yana kaliva givehimeyedi be Yoni hikive'avina ada hiyogona be deliya hisena. Helodi tobohiyana Filifi vavinena adi egana Helodiyasi giluhabuyedi fa'ina, bana Yoni Helodi gidakeyena gigayo, “Badi kwamayoku-dina unagidi fa'ina nagi ana vehimeya keke uda'itave'avini.” Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina Helodi Yoni deliya gisena.

Ada Helodi nuwanuwana Yoni ginaluve'alikana, tu yo'o yadi nuwakoyo gimatausena fa'ina badi Yoni hive'amohimohinena higa vaita bana Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina. Hidedemi hinuwanuwa fa'ina Helodi giga-wayoga.

Himiyami tu Helodi yana tubuga ana toveya yana a'a lakahina gitagova be yana yo'o buye hi'a. Hivemwamwala tu Helodiyasi natudi kwamayoku yo'o matadiya givagavaga. Helodi gimatamatawabuwabu tu nuwana giyamumu-mo'a fa'ina kwamayoku againe giwonadabadaba gigayo, “Yaubada matane gagahe velemo'ena be gavadi gavadi fa'ina unave'o'ola, medema ganevele.”

Au ulaulatanina hinana Helodiyasi Yoni yana dakeya hi'ago'ugena fa'ina natudi hihawaveleveleni-yo gigayo, “Udavehimeya be Yoni Tobafitaiso u'una hinanikehegeni-yo nau'a againe hina'aliyena be bana ali'alikana gana'itana.”
Kini Helodi kwamayoku yana ve'o'ola ginogalini-yo nuwana gikabubu tu ana wakawaka moya'aidi matadiya giwonadabadaba fa'ina, givehimeya be Yoni u'una hinavelena.
Au yana kalivamomo gigahedi be hina deliya Yoni u'una hinikehegena, nau'a againe hi'aliyena ulaulatanina hivelena ada au hinana agaidiya ginauwena.
Ma Yoni ana tomuliya hi'ela Yoni wowona hivaini-yo hinauwena be hitauna. Hitauna gihavaina, hina Yesu hivenuwa'atana.

Tu Yesu Yoni yana alika valeyana ginogalini-yo yo'o gihegedi tu gina wakeya giyage, tobuya gidamana be melalagaga sa'eyana againe ginahobu anakaibe ginamiyami. Atu yo'o Yesu ahe gina ma hinogalina againe, yadi melala tulina tulina hihegedi be agediya Yesu himuliyena.
Bana Yesu wakeya ginauna tu gidamana'ela gihobu tu yo'o lakahidi gi'ita-yo gihinekalikaliyedi ada yadi to'aulolo gisiveyawadi.
Tu mala gilavina againe ana tomuliya Yesu againe hi'ela higahe higayo, “Hida melalagaga againe kamimiyami ada mala gibogibogi. Au yo'o una'atuhegedi be melala agaidiya hinana adiga hinakimonena.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Auwe hinamiya. Omi wanave'adi.”
Badi higayo, “Gavaiya'amine ime anave'adi? Beledi kabi'odi faifigaga kadu igana luhei ime agaimeya.”
Yesu gigayo, “Wa'aliyeni we'ai.”

Ada au yo'o givehimeyedi be isisi'u againe hinavetoga. Hivetoga-yo a'a faifi kadu igana luhei givaidi digo lobameya gi'italele Tamana againe givesiule, au a'a gikihinehineni-yo ana tomuliya giveledi ada badi yo'o agaidiya hifolakena.
Ada au moya'aidi hi'a be hi'ahiyauwa, ada tomuliya hina adi tufo kwadakwada hikwakwana feyawa tuwelo hivemagadi.
Badi kaliva a'ai-nadi hi'a-ma adi kilagalaga au 5,000 tu vevine we'owe'o buye'i a gavaiyehi.
Tu tomuliya kwadakwada hikwakwana gihavaina, Yesu gigahedi be wakeya hinayage wai hinanagona be yuwa fafaline hinamididamana tu Bana Tauna gimiya be yo'o gina'atuhegedi.

Ada ahe gi'atuhegedi-yo anakaibe oyeya gilaka be Tamana againe ginave'o'ola. Ada au mala gibogi-mo'a tu anakaibe gimiyami tu badi tomuliya ma wakeya wese gawaneya hinauna, ada bolimana lakahina gimadu be giluluveyeveyewana fa'ina lefo waka giluluvilavilana.
Ada mala kabisona ginalauna tu Yesu badi agaidiya gi'ela'ela ni'u getane ginunudadana.
Badi tomuliya ni'u getane ginunudadana ma hi'ita-yo himatautave'ine hitatawayana higayo, “Iyoi! Mene balauma.”
Atu auhe'ama Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'asevatu. Hima Iya ga'ela'ela, keke wanamatauta.”
Au Fita gigahe gigayo, “Kauveya, ka'i velemo'ena O'eni, au ugahe be ni'u getane O againiya gana'ela.”
Yesu gigayo, “U'ela.” Gigahe-yo Fita wakeya gihobu ni'u getane Yesu amine ginudadana.
Atu matana gidavelowona ma bolimana gi'itana au yana matauta giyemu, ada givebutu gikamokamomola-yo gikova gigayo, “Kauveya unakibababaleku.”
Ada auhe'ama Yesu nimana gitunena digo gisilakahina be gigahena gigayo, “O ya vetumagana kabi'ona ma gavana fa'ina ase'ase gi'amalakibo?”
Ada waka againe hiyemu-yo hiyage tu bolimana gi'atagona.
Au tomuliya wakeya himiyami-ma Yesu hihawadavadavana higayo, “Wona velemo'ena O'eni Yaubada Natuna.”
Tu tobuya hidamana-yo fafali ana egana Genesaleda againe hihobu.
Ada miGenesaleda Yesu hi'itayakahina againe, venuwa'ata medema awa'awana melalina moya'aina agaidiya hi'iveninisena be kaliva yadi to'aulolo Bana againe hi'aliyedi.
Au hihawayafeyafena be to'aulolo adifaiweya ana aikeva bwatanaga hinakibwa'ena. Ada au gaveyao moya'aidi hikibwa'ena-ma hiyamumu.

Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala tufoidi Yelusalema hitauya Yesu againe hi'ela higahe higayo, “Gavadi-yo a tomuliya bwanenedeyao yadi dewa keke hida'itave'avini? Au ana toveya keke nimadi hida'ikolakola-yo hida'au'a, au hi'a'a-kawowo.”
Yesu gigayo, “Kadu omi'iyao ma gavadi-yo taumiyao yami dewa tuwaina wa'ita'itave'avini-yo Yaubada yana vehimeya wayaweyawelini?
Wa'ita, Yaubada givehimeyeda gigayo, Tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi. Kadu vehimeya sa'eyana ma, Gava kaliva tamana o ka'i hinana gina'ihawadamanedi, medema anafaiweya gida'alika.

Tu omi'iyao ma wagahe vaita ka'i kaliva tamana o hinana ginagahedi ginagayo, Gavadi gavadi againe vaita gadavelugami, medema Yaubada againe gahawahegena fa'ina keke omi ganavelugami. Ka'i hidede amine ginagahe digo, ana vehimeya tamana o hinana adi veluga fa'ina gihavaina, au keke yana veluga againe ginave'amohimohinedi. Omi hidedemi wagahe tu yami gahe keke gidalubodani, fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya tamamiyao o hinamiyao adi ve'amohimohina fa'ina wayawelina be higa taumiyao yami vehawala wanakilakahina.
Omi meyami luhei. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya omi fa'imiya gigaheye-vagahina ada au gigahe velemo'ena gigayo,
Hida yo'o miIsileli kebuladiya hive'amohimohineku
tu ase'asedi Iya agaikuya keke hidahawahegeni.
Iya agaikuya hihawadavadava-kawowo.
Yadi vehawala ma taudiyao yadi vehimeya hikilakahina
ada hivewagana Iya Yaubada yaku vehimeya.”
Hidedemi Yaubada Aiseya awane gigahe tu Yesu Aiseya yana gahe giyakahina.
Tu Yesu yo'o gikovadi be Bana liline hi'ela ada gigahedi gigayo, “Wanogali be wanahalamanena.
Gavadi awamiya giluku-ma keke Yaubada matane ginakivekoyomi. Gavadi gavadi koyona awamiya giyemuyemu, medema Yaubada matane gikivekoyomi.”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahe tu ana tomuliya Bana againe hi'ela higayo, “Ka'i uhalamanena mena ya gahe againe Falisi u'ive'ago'ugadi?”
Yesu gigayo, “Ai sa'eyana sa'eyana Kamaku lobameya keke Tauna gidafahani-ma ganahabuna be ginahavaina.

Au badi Falisi fa'idiya keke wananuwanuwa. Badi tokivetuvetunu nonogana hivematakoyo, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa keke hida'itahalamaneni. Ka'i tomatakoyo tomatakoyohiyana edeya ginanagoyena, au adi'iselu awalolo againe hinabe'u.”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahe tu Fita gigahena gigayo, “Mena gahetalahobuhobu ana nuwanuwa fa'ina unakivetuvetunuma.”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “A! Ka'i omi tagami aimo keke gida'afoleni?
Wanogali! A'a gavadi gavadi awamiya giluku, medema kamomi againe gihobu be wala'aiya wahegena.
Atu gavadi gavadi awamiya hiyemuyemu, medema ase'asemiya hiyemuyemu ada medema gaitomai-dina Yaubada matane hikivekoyomi.

Fa'ina gavadi gavadi koyona nuwahinagemiya wanuwenuwedi, medema yami dewa againe aimo wanaseyemaunedi, higa luve'alika kelele udo tulina tulina kai'afu gahe-kawowo kaliva yadi dewa fa'ina kadu veyaina.
Mena gaitomai-dina Yaubada matane hikivekoyomi. Atu ka'i wanimabwanenemi a'a wana'ana, medema keke Yaubada matane ginakivekoyomi.”
Tu Yesu mena melalai-nadi gihegena ana tomuliya buye hina Taiya Saidoni adi fafali againe.
