Mena fafali-nadi gimiyami tu vinemiKenani sa'eyadi yo'o tulidi keke Yuda kwamayokuna Bana againe hi'ela hikova'awafatafata higayo, “Ho Kauveya, O'eni Devida bwanenena ma udahinekalikaliyema. Natuku kwamayoku wayafunena gimimiyami, u'una gikoyo-mo'a.”

Kwamayoku hikovakova tu Yesu give'amasedi. Ana tomuliya Bana againe hi'ela higayo, “Au yadi ve'o'ola unavenogalena be adifaiweya hinana yadi manuweya. Fa'ina himulimuliyeda tu hikovakova'awafatafata be dibuda hivetoyogina.”

Yesu badi mali yo'o kwamayokuna fa'idiya gigayo, “Yaubada keke yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya gida'iveniniseku. Au miIsileli yami yo'o agaimiya gi'iveniniseku, gaveyao vaita sifi nunuhegediyao hi'abi'abinauna amine.”
Gigahe-yo kwamayoku hi'ela Yesu againe hi'ibo'ula-mo'a higayo, “Kauveya, udavelugama.”
Gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i miYuda badi vaita we'owe'o amine adiga ganavaina be yo'o tulidiyao badi vaita galu'eta amine ganahegeve'abidi digo, medema keke gidalubodani.”
Badi higayo, “Ika Kauveya, ugahe velemo'ena. Atu galu'eta nonogana wagadi adiga kwadakwadana babiya gibe'ube'u-ma hi'au'ana.”
Tu Yesu mena fafali-nadi gihegena tu gina Galili ana taliya againe ginudadana. Ginauna tu oyeya gilaka be givetoga.
Ada yo'o lakahidi Bana againe hi'ela yadi to'aulolo moya'aidi hi'aliyedi, tovefela tomatakoyo totubukoyo to'agoseboda Yesu agene hisedi be Yesu gisiveyawadi.

Badi yo'o ma hiyaulowoga. To'agoseboda hilulukahihi totubukoyo hiyamumu tovefela hinunudadana tomatakoyo hi'ita'italele ma hi'itadi-yo hiyaulowoga, ada au miIsileli yadi Yaubada ana egana hikilakahina.
Ana tomuliya higahena higayo, “Melalagaga againe kamimiyami. Ha'againe a'a kanavaini-yo hida yo'o lakahidi kanave'adi?”
Yesu gigayo, “A'a gavaiyehi omi agaimiya gidadauda?” Badi higayo, “We'a a'a seveni kadu igana kabi'odiyao tufoidi.”
Higahe-yo yo'o givenuwa'atadi be babiya hinavetoga.
Hivetoga tu Yesu a'a seveni kadu igana givaidi digo Tamana againe givesiule gikihinehinedi, au ana tomuliya giveledi be yo'o agaidiya hifolakena.
Moya'aidi hi'a be hi'ahiyauwa. Tomuliya hive'adi tu adi tufo kwadakwadana hiyaudi feyawa seveni hivemagana.
Badi kaliva a'ai-nadi hi'a-ma adi kilagalaga 4,000 tu vevine we'owe'o buye'i a gavaiyehi.
Ada au Yesu yo'o gi'atuhegedi gihobu wakeya giyage gina Magidala ana fafali againe gidamana.
Yesu gigayo, “Mala gibobogi omi wagagahe wagagayo, Mala giyabelina fa'ina, bogiyadi mala yamumuna.

Kadu mala gilalaulauna wagagayo, Mala giyabelina tu uyu'uyuyuna fa'ina, wehi ginalugaga. Hidedemi mala ana iya'iyaya wa'itahalamanena, tu Yaubada nimana ana iya'iyaya higa gavadi gavadi hida tova againe ginalakayemu-ma keke wada'itahalamaneni.

Omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma kaliva koyomi, keke Yaubada againe wadamiyave'avina fa'ina nimaku ana iya'iyaya walelelena. Atu keke mena iya'iyaya wana'itani. Au iya'iyaya sa'eyanaga ganavehawalemi, higa iya'iyaya Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yona againe gilakayemu-ma amine, aiyeta tohiye bogi tohiye.” Hidedemi gigahe tu gihegedi be gina.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye tobuya hidamana tu badi tomuliya nuwadi giulu be keke tamo a'a hidanauweni.
Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be Falisi kadu Sadusi yadi isi keke nuwami ginavaini.”
Badi tomuliya hivebutu buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Keke tamo beledi kada'aliyeni fa'ina hidedemi gigahe.”
Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamaneni-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Omi kaliva yami vetumagana gavakabi'o. Gavadi-yo a'a nuwami giulu-ma fa'ina buye wave'agahegahe?
Ka'i tagami aimo keke gida'afoleni? Boi kaliva faifi tausani a'a faifi againe gave'adi-ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Adi tufo wakwakwa feyawa gavaiyehi?
Kadu kaliva fowa tausani a'a seveni againe gave'adi-ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Adi tufo wakwakwa feyawa gavaiyehi? 5,000 o 4,000 gave'adi amine omi kadu akufaiweya ganave'ami.
Gavadi-yo yaku gahe keke wadahalamaneni? Keke a'a-mo'ena fa'ina gadagahe. E, taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be Falisi kadu Sadusi yadi isi keke nuwami ginavaini. Hidedemi gagahetalahobuhobu.”
Gigahe-yo au hihalamanena higa keke vaita isi falawa againe hivilana-ma fa'ina taudiyao hina'itave'avidi. Au Falisi kadu Sadusi yadi vehawala fa'ina givenuwa'atadi.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye hinauna tu Sisaliya-Filifai ana fafaliya hilakayemu-yo gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Iya Tohobu'ela inubaku fa'ina kaliva gavaimi higahe? Iya vaita hakwa'adi?”
Yesu gigayo, “Tu omi'iyao Iya vaita hakwa'adi ma gavaimi wagahe?”

Kadu Iya ganagahe. O'eni Fita, a egana ana kaivila ma kuga. O unave'ogola ada tovetumagana ami yo'o higa yaku manuwa mena kuga give'ogola-ma againe ganakivemididimi. Aba'alika ana tofaiwala koyodiyao nuwanuwadi yaku manuwa hinaluyaweyawelimi tu keke adifaiweya, hinaga-wayoga.

Kadu yaku manuwa ana kihi higa yaku yo'ogaga yadi luku o una'itave'avina. Gava dewa babiya unahawatana, medema kadu lobameya hinahawatana. Ada gava dewa babiya unahawahegena, medema kadu lobameya hinahawahegena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu ana tomuliya gihawatadi be Bana au Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso ma keke tamo hakwadi againe hina'awatalatalaineni.

Ada medema tovai-nadi Yesu givebutu gavadi aimo Bana againe ginalakayemu-ma ana tomuliya gikivetuvetunudi gigahedi gigayo, “Aku vehimeya gavaina higa ganana Yelusalema againe kaliva lakahidiyao ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala nimadiya aulolo tagiya moya'aina gananuhagana. E, nibaikweyao nimadiya hinahegenauweku be badi hinaluve'alikaku tu aiyeta anaveto againe Yaubada ginasivemididiku.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Tu bana Fita Yesu gisi'aliyena ada givebutu gidakeyena gigayo, “Kauveya, keke hidedemi unanuwanuwa. Au Yaubada ginahawatadi. Mena aulolo alika ulukahihiyena-ma keke unanuhagani, keke-mo'a.”

Tu Yesu gihagavilana Fita againe gigahe gigayo, “Setani, o una kwaukuya. Mena ya nuwanuwa ulukahihiyena-ma keke Yaubada yana nuwanuwa fa'ina yaku eda usebodana. Au o unuwanuwa tomiyababi hinuwanuwa amine.” Hidedemi Yesu Fita gidakeyena.

Ada gava kaliva keke nuwanuwana Iya agaikuya ginahawahegeni tu taunaga fa'ina ginanuwanuwa tova moya'aina, medema yawaina ginanuhegena. Atu gava kaliva ginahawahegena be aku vetumagana fa'ina yawaina ginanuhegena, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.

Ka'i kaliva babi ana lokoloko matatabuna ginavai-'owona tu tauna alu'aluwana yana miya hagihagina ginanuhegena digo, keke tamo gavadi yamumuna ginanuhagani. Ka'i alu'aluwana yana miya yamumuna ginanuhegena digo, keke tamo laufata anafaiweya ginaseni-yo yawaina kadu ginanuhagani.
Fa'ina aimo Iya Tohobu'ela Kamaku yana kikaiwabu ganavaini-yo ganahobu'ela-havagi. E, yaku tovenuwa'ata buye anahobu'ela be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana yadi dewa amine badi agaidiya ganalaufata.
Kadu gagahe velemo'ena, tufoimi hidedei wamidimidi-ma aimo keke alika wananuhagani tu nagona Iya Tohobu'ela yaku wa'abavehimeya ganayemu ma wanamidi'itaku.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Aiyeta sikisi himiyami tu Yesu Fita kadu Yemesa watobohiyana Yoni adi'itoto ginauwedi be oya lakahina againe gilakavedi.
Ada medede againe wowona ana ita tulina gilakayemu, magigina kauwana amine give'akinamanamalena ada ana kaleko mahalina amine gikwaya-mo'ena.
Ada auhe'ama Yaubada yana kaliva tuwai-mo'ena himiyami-ma adi egana Mosese kadu Elaiya badi matadiya hihobu'ela Yesu buye hilulukahihi.
Au Fita Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, ime hidedei amimiyami ma gilubodana. Ka'i O nuwanuwa amine o vada tohiye ganayogodi, sa'eyana O fa'iniya sa'eyana Mosese fa'ine kadu sa'eyana Elaiya fa'ine.”
Atu tomuliya hinogalini-yo himatautave'ine babiya hivetala'ubo'ubo.
Tu Yesu badi agaidiya gi'ela gikibwa'edi gigayo, “Wamidi. Au keke wanamatauta.”
Au hi'italele tu Yesu anakaibe hi'itana, badi velugadiyao a hina.

Ada oyeya hitauya hihobuhobu'ela tu Yesu givehimeyedi gigayo, “Tova adamoya yami ita fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi againe wanahawavemogatala. Aimo Yaubada Iya Tohobu'ela alikeya ginasivemididiku againe, au wanahawavemogatalena.”
Yesu gigayo, “Makewa bana Elaiya ginamidiyemu be Kaiwabu yana eda ase'asemiya ginakidewedeweni-yo muliya Yaubada yana Tovegida ginalakayemu. Hidedemi tuwai-mo'ena to'awatalatalaina givenuwa'ata.

Atu Iya gagahemi, bana kaliva vaita Elaiya amine ahe gilakayemu ada kaliva hifaniyena be gavaimi hinuwanuwa amine hikivekoyona. Meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela vita tulina tulina badi nimadiya gananuhagana.”
Ada au ana tomuliya hihalamanena bana Elaiya giyakahina-ma higa vaita Yoni Tobafitaiso fa'ine gidalukahihi.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya adi'itoto buye oyeya hihobu be yo'o agaidiya hihobu'ela-yo kaliva sa'eyana Bana againe gi'ela tugana give'etodonena gigayo,
“Kauveya, natuku kaliva toletolena uda'itanuwakabubuyena, yana aulolo lakahi-mo'ena. Tova moya'aina aiya o ka'i gufeya gibe'ube'u.
A tomuliya agaidiya ga'aliyena tu keke adifaiweya hidasiveyawani.”

Yesu gigayo, “Omi kaliva tova adamoya watubuyemu-ma yami nuwanuwa keke tunutunugina, keke ma'ita wadavetumaganeku. Malamala gavaiyehi omi buye kanamiyami tu yami vetumagana ginayemu? Malamala gavaiyehi omi keke wanavetumaganeku tu gana'atuvefa'ilemi? Au kwamana wa'aliye we'ai.”
Gi'aliyeni tu Yesu yafune gidakeyena be kwamana ginuyabuyabuna, ada auhe'ama giyamumu.
Tu muliya ana tomuliya adikaibe'uyanina Bana buye himiyami tu hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Gavana fa'ina ime keke amafaiweya wada yafune-nadi adawavini?”

Atu mena yafune adi loi ma yadi faiwala lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina keke amifaiweya wanawavi-kawowodi. Au wanave'o'ola-fa'ila kadu au ana tova againe wanamiyami be Yaubada wanave'o'olena amine, amifaiweya wanawavidi.]”

Fita gigayo, “Ika, giseusena.” Gigahe-yo gina giluku manuweya tu takesi fa'ina keke tamo gidagahe. Au Yesu gimidigahe gigayo, “Saimoni, gavaimi unuwanuwa? Babi ana tovehimeya ma gaveyao agaidiya takesi tulina tulina hivivaini? Ka'i natudiyao agaidiya o ka'i mali yo'o agaidiya hivaivaina?”
Fita gigayo, “Mali yo'o agaidiya hivaivaina.” Yesu gigayo, “Ugahe velemo'ena. Fa'ina tovehimeya natudiyao takesi keke hidaseuseni.

Meda anafaiweya gilubodaku be keke takesi Kamaku yana manuwa fa'ina ganaseni. Atu keke nuwanuwada mena toyaudi kana'ive'ago'ugadi fa'ina, unana tobuya unavemaina. Au igana ginamidi'alata-ma unataina ada awana unakila'ana be mani unanuhagana. Mani-nadi unanauwena be yada takesi unasena, medema au ada'iselu adafata.”
Yesu kwamana kabi'ona giyowanina be gi'ela ada ana tomuliya hinafadiya gisena.
Kwamana gimidi tu Yesu gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena ka'i keke wananuwavilami be kwamana keke yana wakikaiwabu amine wananuwanuwa, kadu keke Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wanaluku, keke-mo'a.
Fa'ina hai kaliva ginanuwahobu be hida kwamana keke yana wakikaiwabu amine ginanuwanuwa, medema Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya gikaiwabu-mo'a.
Kadu hai kaliva kwamana kabi'ona bana meneva'ama amine aku eganeya ginasive'auyena, medema vaita Iya ginasive'auyeku.

Atu ka'i kaliva sa'eyana vaita kwamana amine givetumaganeku-ma dewa koyona againe wanavebe'una, au vita lakahina wananuhagana. Ka'i kuga vita-mo'ena odomiya hinaluhifona be lehageya hinahegehobuyemi-yo wana'alika, medema vitana. Atu ka'i matahiwadi Yaubada againe wananuhagana, au medema vita-mo'ena.

Hoiyoi! Tova moya'aina aladibidibi tulina tulina tomiyababi agaidiya gilakalakayemu-yo hibe'ube'u. Wona velemona koyona ana abavebe'u moya'aina ginalakayemu tu badi gaveyao koyona againe kaliva hina'aladibidibiyedi, medema vita lakahina hinanuhagana.

Ka'i nima o age koyona againe ginavebe'u, au unanikehegena. Ka'i nima o age fafalatamo unamiyami tu lobameya unaluku, au medema vita kabi'ona. Atu nima luhei o age luhei unamiyami tu ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe hinahege, au medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.

Kadu ka'i mata koyona againe ginavebe'u, au unamwamwalina be unahegena. Ka'i mata fafalatamo unamiyami tu lobameya unaluku, medema vita kabi'ona. Atu ka'i mata luhei unamiyami tu abaga koyona ai'ala'alata againe hinahege, medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.

Kadu'e, badi vaita yaku we'owe'o amine ma keke tamo wana'awalavedi. Gagahemi Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata yaku we'owe'o adi to'itave'avina fa'ina gisedi, ada tova moya'aina Kamaku matane lobameya himimiyami ada we'owe'o-dina hilulugolegoledi. [
Ada au Iya Tohobu'ela gahobu'ela be badi Yaubada yana eda hifaniyena-ma ganakibababaledi.]

Gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Kaliva sa'eyana yana sifi wani hanaledi (100) hinamiyami tu sifi sa'eyana ginu-kawokawowo. Ka'i yana sifi naeniti-naeni (99) oyalulaube'una againe adiga hilelele-ma ginanuyabuyabudi tu sifi ginu-kawokawowo ma ginalelena o ka'i keke? Au ginalelena.
Ada ka'i ginanuhagana amine, wona velemona bana sifi sa'eyana fa'ine ginavemwamwala-mo'a tu sifi velugadiyao fa'idiya yana vemwamwala keke lakahina.
Meda anafaiweya Tamada lobameya gimimiyami-ma keke nuwanuwana yana kwamana sa'eyanaga ginanuhegeni.

Atu ka'i keke ginavenogale, au kaliva sa'eyana o luhei unanauwedi be gavadi gavadi tobohiya buye wanavekwageyena, medema to'ita luhei o ka'i tohiye hinanogalina be aimo ya gahe fa'ina adifaiweya hina'alakakila.

Kadu ka'i yadi gahe keke ginavenogaleni, au tovetumagana adi yo'o moya'aidi matadiya unalukahihiyena. Ada ka'i kadu yadi kivetuvetunu keke ginavenogaleni, au wanakilowena be bana vaita tomiya-kawokawowo o takesi ana toyaudi koyona amine omi matamiya ginamiyami.
Fa'ina ka'i ami'iselu o ami'itoto aku eganeya wanavaga'auta, au Iya omi buye kanamiyami.” Au hidedemi Yesu givehawala.
Tu Fita Yesu againe gi'ela gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Kauveya, tova gavaiyehi tobohiyaku iya agaikuya ginakivekoyo tu yana koyona ganavenuwauluyeni? Ka'i tova seveni o ka'i gavaiya'amine?”
Yesu gigayo, “Ganagahe. Keke tova sevenigaga, au tova seveniti (70) kadu seveniti a gavaiyehi yana koyona unavenuwauluyena.

Hidedemi kaliva yadi koyona wanavenuwauluyena fa'ina omi Yaubada yana itave'avina againe wamimiyami tu ase'asemiya givehivehimeya-ma yami miyami ganalukahihiyena. Kini sa'eyana gimiyami tu nuwanuwana yana tofaisewa adi buki hinafatana.
Givebutu giyowanidi tu kaliva sa'eyana hivega'aulena ana buki lakahi-mo'ena vaita wani hanaledi tausani kina (K100,000) a gavaiyehi amine.

Au bana tofaisewai-nadi keke anafaiweya ginalaufata fa'ina yana taubada gigahe gigayo, Gavaimi be wakalivana sa'eyana mena kaliva kadu vavinena natudiyao, yadi yomuyomu yadi lokoloko matatabudi ginakimone-'owodi yo yaku mani ganavaina?
Hidedemi givehimeya tu tofaisewai-nadi yana taubada againe gi'ibo'ula-mo'a give'o'ola gigayo, Ho Kauveya, uda'atuvefa'ileku be ya mani tova tova ganalulaufata be ganaluyabuna.
Au tofaisewa yana taubada gihinekalikaliyena, ana buki giyawelini tu gihawahegena be gina.

Gina tu tobohiyana tofaisewa velugana gi'itana bana againe gibuki kabi'ona ma vaita kina hanaledi sa'eyana (K100) amine. Gi'ita-yo odone gikive'avina be givebutu agona gikikibahina gigayo, A buki unamadufatana.
Au tobohiyana bana againe gi'ibo'ula-mo'a gihawayafeyafena gigayo, Tobohiyaku, uda'atuvefa'ileku be ya mani tova tova ganalulaufata.
Tu yana ve'o'ola keke gidavenogaleni. Au gina deliya gihegenauwena be ginamiyami tu ana buki ginalulaufata.
Badi tofaisewa velugadiyao gavadi gilakayemu-ma hi'itana againe, ase'asedi gi'u'aulolo lakahina ada hina yadi taubada tofaisewa koyona yana dewa matatabuna fa'ina hivenuwa'atana.
Au kaliva lakahina yana tofaisewa giyowanina be gi'ela gigahena gigayo, O tofaisewa koyo-mo'e. Uve'o'oleku toyogina fa'ina a buki lakahi-mo'ena au matatabuna gayawelina.
Iya gahinekalikaliye amine, o'eni tobohiya udahinekalikaliyena. Gavadi-yo keke udanuwakabubuyeni?
Au yana taubada ginuwakoyo keke kabi'ona, ada deli ana to'itave'avina manimaninidiyao nimadiya gisena be vita hinavelena. Hidedemi hinanunauwena tu ana buki matatabuna ginalaufata-'owoga.”
Tu Yesu koyona adi aiyawela fa'ina gilukahihi gihavaina, Galili ana fafali gihege tu gina Yudiya ana fafaliya Yolidani yuwa wafafaline gimiyami.
Yo'o lakahidi hibwa'ulina ada medede againe yadi to'aulolo gisiveyawadi.

Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi tufoidi Bana againe hi'ela ana vebau fa'ina. Hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Gavaimi unuwanuwa? Ka'i kaliva nuwanuwana gavadi gavadi fa'ina vavinena ginakilowena ma yada buki-vehimeya gihawahegena o ka'i keke?”
Kadu gigahe gigayo,
Kwamayoku kaliva lulune gabubuna fa'ina, bana kaliva ma hinana tamana ginahegedi tu ginavemanuwa-damana be vavinena againe ginamiyave'avina ada adi'iselu hinavewowotamo'ai.
Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe fa'ina, boi tulina tulina himiyami tu adamoya hivesa'eya. Ada au ka'i Yaubada kaliva kwamayoku give'atutamo'aidi amine o keke tamo hakwadi ginavemiyavehailidi.”

Yesu gigayo, “Omi tagami kuluna fa'ina Mosese yana vehimeya againe gihawahegemi be vavinemiyao wanakilowedi. Atu boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada kaliva vevine gimidibubudi ana toveya, keke kilowa fa'ina gidahawahegemi.
Ada Iya gagahemi, hai kaliva vavinena keke hidakelele tu ginakilowedi-yo kwamayoku velugadi ginanagidi, medema ana egana to'udo.”
Bana gigayo, “Mena gahe higa vaita kaliva keke ginanagi ma keke moya'aidi adifaiweya hinamuliyeni, tu gaveyao agaidiya Yaubada mena vehimeya gisena medema adifaiweya hinamuliyena.

Nuwanuwa tulina tulina fa'ina kaliva tufoidi keke hinanagi. Tufoidi hitubuga-ma tubudamadamadiyao be keke adifaiweya hinanagi. Kadu tufoidi mali kaliva hikivetabovihilidi be keke adifaiweya hinanagi-yo kwamana hina'ivetubugini. Kadu tufoidi Yaubada yana faisewa fa'ina taudiyao nagi hikilowena. Gaveyao mena yaku gahe adifaiweya hinamuliyena, medema hinamuliyena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Himiyami tu we'owe'o Yesu againe hi'aliyedi be nimana badi agaidiya ginase tu ginave'o'oledi. Atu ana tomuliya badi to'aliya hidakeyedi.

Bana Yesu gigayo, “We'owe'o keke wanahawatadi, au Iya agaikuya hina'ela fa'ina gaveyao vaita we'owe'o keke yadi wakikaiwabu amine, medema Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.”
Gigahe-yo nimana we'owe'o agaidiya giseni tu gilowoga be gina.
Tova sa'eyana kwanatubulakahina sa'eyana Yesu againe gi'ela gigayo, “Tovehawala, gavadi yamumuna ganagani-yo yawai-vagahiku gananuhagani?”

Yesu gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina gavadi yamumuna ma Iya agaikuya utoliluvaluva? Kaliva sa'eyana gimimiyami, Bana anakaibe'u-mo'a yamumuna. Ka'i nuwanuwa yawai-vagahi againe unamiyami, au Yaubada yana vehimeya una'ita'itave'avina.”
Tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi, kadu tauni unuwakabubuye amine tobohiyamomo unanuwakabubuyedi.”
Bana kwanatubulakahina gigayo, “Mena vehimeyai-dina matatabudi ga'ita'itave'avidi. Kadu gava dewa aimo keke gadamuliyeni-yo gadayegayega-mo'a?”
Au kwanatubulakahina Yesu yana gahe ginogalini-yo yana wanuwavita gina fa'ina yana lokoloko moya'ai-mo'ena.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena badi wakalivadiyao yadi luku Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya au vita-mo'ena.

Kadu ganagahe. Ka'i yomuyomu lakahina ana egana kameli gaima matane ginaluku, medema vitana. Tu ka'i wakalivana Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaluku be yana itave'avina againe ginamiyami, medema vita-mo'ena.”
Tomuliya mena gahe hinogalini-yo ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana higayo, “Ha! Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya kibababala ginanuhagani.”
Yesu gi'itakwanekwanedi gigayo, “Kaliva keke taudiyao adifaiweya kibababala hinanuhagani, atu Yaubada ma kaliva adi kibababala o ka'i gavadi gavadi moya'aina au ana tagalowalowa.”

Kadu gaveyao moya'aidi yadi manuwa o ka'i noudiyao o tobohiyadiyao o tamadiyao o hinadiyao o natudiyao o yadi babi Iya fa'ikuya hinanuyabuyabudi, medema adi laufata lakahi-mo'ena gavadi gavadi yamumuna hinavaina, kadu yawai-vagahidi hinanuhagana.
Tu badi adamoya vaita wai hidanagoni-ma aimo wai hinamulina, kadu badi vaita wai hidamulini-ma aimo wai hinanagona.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu'e Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku hidede amine. Tonifaha lakahina gimiyami tu mala gilauna gihobu be gina yana faha ana tofaisewa ginaleledi.
Kaliva tufoidi ginuhagadi-yo adi laufata buye hilukahihiyena higa vaita aiyeta sa'eyana fatana ginaveledi, ada au yana faha againe gi'iveninisedi.
Gimiyami tu kauwana gilaka au gina kaliva velugadiyao melaleya himiyamiya-kawowo ma gi'itadi.
Gigahedi gigayo, Kadu omi'iyao ma wanana yaku faheya wanafaisewa be fata hagihagina ganavelemi.
Au badi hina tu kauwana getadeya kadu kauwana giwahivekenana amine gina kaliva givaidi.
Ada mala gilavina amine kadu gihobu kaliva tufoidi melaleya himiyamiya-kawowo gi'itadi-yo gigahedi gigayo, Gavadi-yo wamiyamiya-kawowo tu mala a gilavina?
Badi higayo, Keke tamo hakwadi faisewa gidavelema. Bana gigayo, Au kadu omi wanana yaku faheya wanafaisewa.

Badi hina tu mala a gibogi-yo tonifaha yana tofaisewa adi to'itave'avina gigahena gigayo, Tofaisewa unayowanidi be adi laufata unaveledi. Badi wai himulina-ma unamidiveledi unanunauwena tu badi wai hinagona-ma muliya unaveledi.
Au badi wai himulina-ma hi'ela be aiyeta sa'eyana fatana aiyeta sa'eyana fatana hivaina.
Atu badi wai hinagona-ma hi'ela be yadi mani hinavaina againe, hinuwanuwa vaita adi laufata gina'alalaka tu kadu badi aiyeta sa'eyana fatana hivaina.

Yadi mani hivaini-yo hivebutu tonifaha againe hi'alawoluwolu higayo, Hida hima kaliva wai himulina-ma bai sa'eyanaga hifaisewa tu ime'eyao ma malalaugeya avebutu anunauwena kauwana lakahina gikabuma tu ama laufata badi adi laufata amine.
Tonifaha tofaisewa sa'eyana gigahena gigayo, Tobohiyaku, unogali. Keke o againiya gadakivekoyo. A laufata buye kalukahihiyena tu kagahe vaita aiyeta sa'eyana fatana ganavele.
Au ya mani uvaini be una. Iya nuwanuwaku kaliva wai gimulina-ma aiyeta sa'eyana fatana ya mani amine ganavelena.
Yaku mani gavadi gavadi againe ganaseni-ma iya tauku akufaiweya ganavehimeyena. Gavadi-yo iya gafolafolaka fa'ina o uga'uma'uma?”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu kadu yana gahe giluyabuna gigayo, “Au badi wai hinagona-ma wai hinamulina tu badi wai himulina-ma wai hinanagona.”

Nuwanuwadi alikeya hinahegeku fa'ina yo'o tulidiyao nimadiya hinahegenauweku be badi hinahawavelaigeku kadu hinamunukoyokoyoku ada kelose againe hinatutuvefoseku. Atu tova anaveto againe Yaubada alikeya ginasivemididiku.” Hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Tu medema tovai-nadi Sebedi vavinena wanatudiyao Yesu againe hi'ela hi'ibo'ula-mo'a be higa tamo gavadi fa'ina hinave'o'ola.
Bana gigayo, “Gavadi-yo wa'ela?” Badi higayo, “Udavehimeya be tova mulina unakaiwabu-mo'a againe, hida natukweyao adi'iselu buye wadakaiwabu higa i'ataginiya kadu i'imawaniya hidavetoga.”

Yesu gigayo, “Wona velemona yaku tagiya yaku aulolo ana gowa againe wanayu tu gaveyao i'atagikuya i'imawakuya hinavetoga, medema keke yaku abavehimeya. Au gaveyao fa'idiya Kamaku mena abavetoga kikaiwabuna gikidewedewena, medema hinavaina.”
Tu tomuliya velugadiyao teni Sebedi natuneyao adi'iselu yadi ve'o'ola hinogalina againe hinuwakoyoyedi.

Au Yesu gikovavaga'auhidi gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wahalamanena yo'o tulidiyao yadi tovehimeya yadi wa'agodadaga hi'ita'itave'avidi, kadu yadi tokaiwabu yadi waselakalaka kaliva koyokoyodiyao higahegahedi.
Tu omi'iyao ma keke medede amine wanahuluhuluva. Au gaveyao omi agaimiya nuwanuwami wanakikaiwabu, medema tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wanavetofaisewa.
Kadu gaveyao nuwanuwami wanavetonagona, medema tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wanave'agetoga.

Meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela keke omi tomiyababi agaimiya gada'ela be omi wanavelugaku fa'ina. Au ga'ela be Iya omi ganavelugami ada yawaiku ganahawahegena be mena yaku laufata againe moya'aimi yami koyona fa'ina yogoyogonimiyao wamimiyami-ma ganayaumi.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye melala ana egana Yeliko hilowolowoga tu yo'o lakahidi hivebwa'uliyena.
Tomatakoyo adi'iselu edeya hihiyoto tu Yesu lilidiya ginauna ma hinogalini-yo hivebutu hikovakova higayo, “Kauveya, O Devida bwanenena, uda'itanuwakabubuyema.”
Kaliva yo'oyo'o agaidiya hidakeyedi be higa hinave'amata. Tu badi kadu agodi gilakata-mo'a hikovadona higayo, “Kauveya, O Devida bwanenena, uda'itanuwakabubuyema.”
Au Yesu ginumidi ada giyowanidi be hi'ela ada gigayo, “Gavadi nuwanuwami omi fa'imiya ganagani?”
Badi higayo, “Kauveya, matama gida'italele.”
Au Yesu gihinekalikaliyedi matadi gikibwa'ena ada auhe'ama matadi gi'ita'italele ada Yesu himuliyena.
Yesu ana tomuliya buye Yelusalema againe hinauna tu Bedefegi oya Olive againe hiyemu. Mededei hiyemu tu ana tomuliya adi'iselu gigahedi be wai hinanagona.
Gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wai wananagona yuwa melala againe wanaluku, ada doniki wanatudi ai againe hiluhifodi-ma wanamadu'itadi. Au wanayaudi be Iya agaikuya wana'aliyedi.
Ada ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahe vaita gavadi wanagani, au wanagahedi wanagayo, Yama Kauveya nuwanuwana me'ama. Ada au ginahawahegedi be wana'aliyedi.”
Hidede amine hihuluva be gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina gigaheye-vagahina, medema ginalakayemu velemo'ena. Gigayo,
Wa'ita, yami tokaiwabu omi agaimiya gi'ela'ela,
Bana'e kaliva umaumana doniki kwaune ginanauna.
E, yana wanuwahobu doniki natudi againe giyage be ginanauna.
Hidedemi to'awatalatalaina miYelusalema adi egana velugana miSaiyoni fa'idiya gigahe.
Tu tomuliya adi'iselu hina ada Yesu givehimeyedi amine hidewa.
Doniki wanatudi hi'aliyedi, adi aikeva kwaudiya hiyavelina be Yesu giyage.
Kadu yo'o lakahi-mo'edi hi'ela, tufoidi adi aikeva edeya hiyaveyavelina kadu tufoidi ai laganina hikuyana be edeya hiyaveyavelina.
Ada yo'o tufoidi wai hinagona tufoidi wai himulina, ada Yesu buye hinauna tu hikovakova higayo,
“Hosana, Devida bwanenena O adavadava.
Kaiwabu ana eganeya u'ela'ela-ma au Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.
Kadu tomiyalobama O hinadavadava,
yadi vesiule hinayakahina.”
Hinauna tu hidedemi hikovakova, ada Yesu Yelusalema againe giluku-yo melala kalivai-dina moya'aidi hiyo'oyo'o hilahalahaga higayo, “Bana hima hakwa'adi?”
Badi yo'o Yesu hibwa'ulina-ma higayo, “Bana hidevama Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yesu, kwanaNasaledi Galili ana fafaliya gitauya.”

Tu Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina ana eda'awaneya giluku be badi mene manuwa-tafalolo againe hilukimokimone-ma giwavidi, mani tulina tulina ana tosenisi yadi tolama givetala'afufuna kadu kaliva bunebune abaveyao fa'ina hikimonevedamanedi-ma yadi abavetoga gituwabwatavilana.
Gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe gigayo,
Yaku manuwa hinavewagana abave'ove'o'ola ana manuwa.
Tu omi'iyao ma vaita tokai'afu yadi abaga amine wafaisewana.” Hidedemi Yesu gidakeyedi.
Bana manuwa-tafalolo againe gimiyami tu tomatakoyo kadu tovefela Bana againe hi'ela be gisiveyawadi.

Atu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala abaveyaulowoga Yesu gifaisewadi-ma hi'ita-yo hinuwakoyo. Kadu we'owe'o hi'itadi, manuwa-tafalolo ana eda'awaneya hiluku hikovakova higayo, “Hosana, Devida bwanenena kanadavadavana.” Ada hinogali-yo meda hinuwakoyo.
We'owe'o kadu fwefweya u'alaveleveledi be hinahawadavadava-mo'e.”
Au Yesu ginuyabuyabudi be gina Yelusalema gihegena tu melala ana egana Bedani againe gina ginauda.
Bogi gida tu mala gilauna Yesu gi'enohobu Yelusalema againe ginauna tu mafu gilauna.
Ai ana egana fiki edeya gi'ita-yo gina guwana gilele tu lukuminaga gidauda. Au ai againe gigahe gigayo, “Aimo tova mulina kadu keke unayoyo, keke-mo'a.” Auhe'ama ai gimadu'awa'ulona.
Ana tomuliya hi'ita-yo hiyaulowoga higayo, “Gavaiya'amine fiki gimadu'awa'uloni?”
Ka'i yami wavetumagana Yaubada againe wanave'o'ola, au gavaimi wave'o'ola medema wananuhagana.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.
Yesu gigayo, “Kadu yaku toliluvaluva sa'eyana omi agaimiya ganasena. Ka'i bonaku wanafatana amine o Iya kadu yaku abavehimeya inubana fa'ina ganavenuwa'atami.
Yoni Tobafitaiso yana faisewa ma hakwadi abavehimeya Yoni givele-yo kaliva gikivebafitaisoyedi? Ka'i yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe give'inuba o ka'i kaliva agaidiya?”

Yesu gigahe-yo badi hivebutu buye hivekwageya higayo, “Ka'i kanagahe vaita Yoni yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe gidave'inuba au Bana ginagaheda ginagayo, Ka'i Yaubada againe digo, gavadi-yo Yoni yana gahe keke wadavetumaganeni?
Tu ka'i kanagahe vaita kaliva agaidiya gidave'inuba, au yo'o kamatausedi higa vaita gavaimi hinakivekoyoda, fa'ina moya'aidi hinuwanuwa vaita Yoni Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina.”

Hidedemi tonagona hinuwanuwa fa'ina Yesu yana toliluvaluva hidemi hifatana higayo, “Ka'iwa. Ime keke adahalamaneni.” Bana gigayo, “Omi keke wadagaheku fa'ina, meda anafaiweya Iya keke ganavenuwa'atami hade'againe yaku abavehimeya give'inuba-yo hida gaitoma gafifaisewadi.
Ganagahe tu wanavanenega. Kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami natuneyao kaliva luhei. Gina tomo'ainagona gigahena gigayo, Natuku, adamoya unana yaku faha againe unafaisewa.
Bana gidibutoyoga be gimiyami tu muliya nuwana gi'avilana be gina gifaisewa.
Au kaliva gina kwamaneya meda anafaiweya gigahena vaita ginana faheya. Bana gigayo, Yamumuna, ganana. Tu keke gidana.
Hadema kaliva tamana yana nuwanuwa gi'itave'avini?” Badi higayo, “Bana gimidigahena-ma.”

Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena, badi koyodiyao higa takesi ana toyaudi kadu vevine yamayamadadadiyao omi tonagona tafatafalolomiyao hitubuhegemi be Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya himidiluku.

Wa'ita, Yoni Tobafitaiso omi agaimiya gilakayemu be eda yegayegana ginavehawalemi, tu yana laumamala keke wadavetumaganeni. Atu badi koyodiyao higa takesi ana toyaudi kadu vevine yamayamadadadiyao hivetumaganena. Badi hivetumaganena be omi wa'itadi, tu au ai'adi keke-mo'a wadanuwavilani-yo wadavetumaganeni.” Hidedemi Yesu kaliva lakahidiyao gigahedi.

Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Gahetalahobuhobu kadu sa'eyana wananogalina. Kaliva lakahina ai guwana ana egana kelefi yana babi againe gifahana. Faha gi'alana, kahu giyalana be aimo guwana ana abavagafuwafuwa fa'ina, kadu kweda tunugina faha ana itave'avina fa'ina giyogona. Kelefi ana faha gikidewedewena gihavaina, kaliva tufoidi faha ana to'itave'avina gisedi tu yana melala gihegena gina mali fafaliya ginunudadana.
Himiyami tu kelefi ana aikolu ana tova giyemu againe, tonifaha ana agetoga faha ana to'itave'avina agaidiya gi'iveninisedi be ana guwa hinavaina.
Badi to'itave'avina agetoga hikive'avidi, sa'eyana himunukoyokoyona, sa'eyana hiluve'alikana kadu sa'eyana hitutuve'alikana.
Au kadu agetoga velugadiyao tufona moya'aidi gi'iveninisedi tu to'itave'avina meda anafaiweya hikivekoyodi.
Muliya-mo'ane natuna badi agaidiya gi'iveninisena. Gigahe gigayo, Natuku be hinave'amohimohinena.
Tu to'itave'avina tonifaha natuna hi'ita-yo taudiyao hive'agahegahe higayo, Hida hima bana ana hilafa. Wa'ela be kanaluve'alikana ada yana babi kanavaina.
Au hikive'avina ala kwaune hituwa'atugena be hiluve'alikana.
Wananuwanuwa. Tonifaha ginayewa'ela ana toveya, badi to'itave'avina gavaimi ginahuluvidi?”

Hidedemi Yesu gitoliluvaluva tu badi kaliva lakahidiyao hifatana higayo, “Makewa wadema kaliva koyo-mo'edi ginamunukoyokoyodi tu hina'alika. Ada to'itave'avina velugadiyao ginavegidedi be yana faha hina'itave'avina, ada tova tova guwana ginaboyalina amine ana guwa hinavelevelena.”
Ogola manuwa ana to'aiyogona hikilowena-ma
au holili'abi manuwa hinafane-mo'ane gimidimidi.
Kaiwabu yana vehimeya againe au hidemi gilakayemu,
ada medema gilubode-mo'ena ide matadeya.”

Hidedemi Yesu Yaubada yana gahe Natuna ana kilowa fa'ina giyakahina tu yana gahe giluyabuna gigayo, “Gagahemi Yaubada omi miYuda ginahawatami be yana faha ginalemami. Au yo'o tulidi ginavegidedi be Yaubada yana faha hina'itave'avina, higa badi guwadi yamumuna yadi dewa againe hinaseyemaunena-ma kalivai-dina. [
Gava kaliva mena ogolai-nadi againe ginabe'u, medema luluna gina'adobona, atu gava kaliva ogola gina'alatagona, medema luluna gina'amuhumuhuna.]” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Falisi Yesu yana gahetalahobuhobu hinogalina againe, badi fa'idiya gilulukahihi ma hi'ayaunena.
Au eda hilelena be higa hinakive'avina, tu moya'aidi hinuwanuwa vaita Yesu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina fa'ina yo'o himatausedi, au higa-wayoga keke adifaiweya.
Tu Yesu gahetalahobuhobu amine kadu givehawaledi gigayo, “Kaliva yadi luku Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hidede amine. Tokaiwabu sa'eyana natuna kaliva ginanagi ada ana avemwamwala gikidewedewena.
Gikidewedewena gihavaina, yana tomaduyowayowana gi'iveninisedi be badi boi avemwamwala fa'ina givenuwa'atadi-ma hina'ela tu hidibutoyoga.

Au yana tomaduyowayowana kadu velugadiyao gi'iveninisedi be badi boi avemwamwala againe giyowanidi-ma hinavenuwa'atadi hinagayo, Yaku avemwamwala ahe gakidewedewena. Bulumakau lakahidi kadu bulumakau natudiyao gaveve'ahiyauwadi-ma ahe himunudi be hivekamoga. Gaitoma moya'aina ahe hikidewedewena. Au natuku yana nagi ana avemwamwala againe wana'ela.
Hidedemi hivenuwa'atadi tu yadi gahe keke hidavenogaleni, au yadi faiseweya hi'abinauna. Kaliva sa'eyana gina yana faheya, kadu sa'eyana gina yana sitoweya.
Kadu kaliva tufoidi tokaiwabu ana agetoga hikive'avidi-yo himunukoyokoyodi be hiluve'alikadi.
Bana tokaiwabu valeyadi ginogalini-yo gi'ila'a. Au yana tolugaviya gi'iveninisedi be mena toluve'alika hiluve'alikadi ada yadi melala hikabuna.

Badi tolugaviya hina tu ana agetoga kadu giyowanidi be gigahedi gigayo, Yaku avemwamwala ahe gakidewedewena tu badi gayowanidi-ma hidibutoyoga fa'ina iya kadu gadibutoyogedi, keke adifaiweya hina'ela.
Au eda lakahina melala hinafane wanana be gaveyao moya'aidi wananuhagadi, medema yaku avemwamwala againe wanayowanidi.
Hidedemi gigahedi tu badi tomaduyowayowana hilowoga be eda lakahina againe hina kaliva moya'aidi yamumudiyao kadu koyodiyao hivega'auledi be avemwamwala ana manuwa-abavaga'auta hivemagana.
Atu bana tokaiwabu giluku be yana wakawaka gida'itadi ma kaliva sa'eyana gi'itana nagi ana vaigau keke gida'oseni.
Au gigayo, Tobohiyaku, gavadi-yo nagi ana vaigau keke uda'oseni tu yaku avemwamwala againe uluku? Kaliva meyana gibou.
Kadu Yesu yana gahe giluyabuna gigayo, “Yaubada moya'aidi giyowanidi tu tufoidi moya'aidi keke hidavenogaleni fa'ina tufoidiga giluwafadi be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hinaluku.”
Tu badi Falisi Yesu yana gahe hinogalini-yo hilowoga hina hivevai be yadi toliluvaluva againe hinavebauna be higa tamo gavadi koyona ginagaheyena.

Adi tomuliya kadu Helodi yana yo'o kalivadi tufoidi hi'iveninisedi be Yesu againe hi'ela higayo, “Tovehawala, ime ahalamanena O ya gahe velemo'ena, keke udave'alololo. Yaubada yana eda fa'ina uvehavehawala velemo'ena. Ada keke kaliva udamatausedi fa'ina kaliva yadi kikaiwabu keke udanuwenuweni, au ugahe-mo'edi.
Au anatoliye be ya nuwanuwa sa'eyana anahalamanena. KwanaLoma yada tokaiwabu lakahina Sisa againe takesi kanasena, ka'i medema gilubodana o ka'i keke?”
Tu Yesu yadi ve'alololo ase'asediya gi'ita-yo gigayo, “Omi kaliva meyami luhei, gavadi-yo wanuwanuwa vaita wanavebauku?
Kabala yami takesi fa'ina wanasena-ma wanavehawaleku.” Au kabalai-nadi hivehawalena.
Au gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Hida hakwadi magigina? Kadu hakwadi ana egana mene kabala againe hikilumini?”
Ada au yana bonalaufata hinogalini-yo hiyaulowoga. Au hihegena be hina.

Badi higayo, “Tovehawala, Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe hidede amine gi'etoladi. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana natuna keke tu gina'alika, au tobohiyana yana vayasi anafaiweya gidanagina be tobohiyana ana hilafa fa'ina natuneyao gina'ivetubugidi. Au hidede amine Mosese givehimeya.
Au kaliva tobohiyaneyao adi yo'o seveni ime agaimeya himiyami. Tomo'ainagona ginagi tu gi'alika ada natuna keke fa'ina, taina yana vayasi ginagina.
Meda anafaiweya taina natuna keke tu gi'alika ada hinunauwena hinunauwena tu taina kaliva anaveseveni natuna keke tu gi'alika.
Muliya-mo'ane kwamayoku gi'alika.
Au kaliva adiveseveni kwamayoku sa'eyana hinagina fa'ina, aimo tova mulina kaliva hinamididi-havagi ana toveya bana kwamayoku-nadi ma gava kaliva vavinena?”
Atu Bana Yesu gigayo, “Yaubada bonana ana vehawala kadu Yaubada yana faiwala keke wadahalamaneni fa'ina, omi keke wadanuwanuwa tunutunugina.
Tova mulina to'alika yadi mididi-havagi ana toveya, lobama ana tovenuwa'ata himimiyami amine meda kaliva hinamiyami. Kaliva vevine keke hinanaginagi keke hinavenavenagi.
Tu to'alika yadi mididi-havagi fa'ina ganagahe. Yaubada omi agaimiya gavaimi gigahe ma ma'i wahawahawana o ka'i keke?

Gigayo, Iya'eku Abelahamo yana Yaubada gamimiyami, kadu Aisake yana Yaubada gamimiyami, kadu Yakobu yana Yaubada gamimiyami. Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe. Badi kaliva wavewagadi ali'alikadiyao ma Yaubada yawayawadiyao gi'ita'itadi. Au Bana'e kaliva alu'aluwadi yawayawana yadi Yaubada, keke ali'alikadiyao yadi Yaubada.”
Ada au yo'o hivanevanenega-ma mena yana vehawala hinogalini-yo hiyaulowoga.
Tu Falisi Yesu yana bonalaufata hagihagina againe badi Sadusi yadi gahe givetufagolohina ma hinogalina againe buye hivaga'auta.
Bana Falisi sa'eyana buki-vehimeya ana tonuwahuya ma yana toliluvaluva sa'eyana giyakahina be higa Yesu ginavebauna.
Gigayo, “Tovehawala, yada buki-vehimeya againe hadema vehimeya wai ginago?”
Mena vehimeyai-nadi wai ginagona kadu vehimeya lakahi-mo'ena.
Kadu vehimeya lakahina anavelu ma vehimeya nagona ana nuwanuwa amine, higa tauni unuwakabubuye amine tobohiyamomo unanuwakabubuyedi.
Mena vehimeyai-dina luhei au vehimeya lakahina. Mosese kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi vehawala matatabuna againe vehimeyai-dina matana matana fa'ina hikivetuvetunuda.”

Tu badi Falisi aimo se'eyaine hivaga'auta tu Yesu gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Yaubada yana Tovegida ana egana Keliso fa'ina gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Bana'e hakwadi bwanenena?” Badi higayo, “Bana'e Devida bwanenena.”
Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i Bana'e Devida bwanenena au gavadi-yo tauna bwanenena aimo ginatubuyemu-ma givewagani Kaiwabu? Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana kivetuvetunu againe Devida gigahe gigayo,
Nima i'atagikuya unahiyoto. O unamiyami tu
nibaimomo ageyafayafaniya ganasedi.
Au hidede amine Devida Keliso givewagana yaku Kaiwabu, tu gavaiya'amine yana Kaiwabu kadu bana bwanenena muliya gitubuga amanadi?”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahe tu keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya bonana gidafatani, au hive'amata. Ada medema aiyetai-nadi toliluvaluva kadu keke velugana hidaseni, au himatauta fa'ina hi'ilova.

Tu Yesu yo'oyo'o kadu ana tomuliya agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Badi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi au Mosese ana hilafa, yana vehimeya fa'ina kaliva hikikivetuvetunudi.

Badi Mosese ana hilafa fa'ina gavadi gavadi hivehawala, medema wanavenogalena be wanamuliyena. Atu gavaimi hidewadewa medemi keke wanamuliyeni, fa'ina kebuladiya higahe yamumuna tu ase'asedi tulina fa'ina keke hidadewadewa yamumuna.
Yadi vehawala tulina tulina au vitana, vaita vainuwana lakahina u'umiya hidaseni tu taudiyao mena vehimeya ana itave'avina againe keke ma'ita hidavelugami.
Nuwanuwadi avemwamwala againe kadu manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya abavetoga kikaiwabuna againe hinavetoga.
Kadu nuwanuwadi kaliva abakimokimone againe hinalusiuleyedi kadu yadi wawowomumu hinavewagadi kauveya.
Tu omi'iyao ma moya'aimi yami yo'o sa'eyana ada Iya'eku yami Kaiwabu lakahina fa'ina keke wananuwanuwa be higa vaita hinahawavelakahiyemi.
Kadu Tamami lobameya gimimiyami-ma sa'eyanaga fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi gava babiya wanahawavetamaneni.
Kadu yami tovehawala sa'eyanaga higa Iya'eku Keliso fa'ina keke wananuwanuwa be higa vaita kaliva hinavewagami tovehawala.
Gava kaliva agaimiya kikaiwabu-mo'ena, medema omi agaimiya anafaiweya gidave'agetoga.
Hai kaliva tauna ana egana ginakilakahina, Yaubada mena kaliva ginakivewowomumuna. Hai kaliva tauna ginanuwahobu, medema ana egana Yaubada ginakilakahina.

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina badi nuwanuwadi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hinaluku be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya-ma magigidi wanubodana. Omi taumiyao keke wadaluku kadu badi nuwanuwadi hinaluku-ma wahawatadi. [

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina sikwasikwadiyao yadi lokoloko walemadi ada wave'ove'o'ola-fa'ila be higa kaliva hinahawaveyamumuyemi. Yami koyona ve'o'ola-fa'ila againe wakevana fa'ina ami vita gavatubuga wananuhagana.]

Hoiyoi, Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Yamina avaleya kadu lehageya lauva lakahina wanunauwena be higa vaita kaliva sa'eyanaga wananuhagani-yo omi agaimiya ginavetomuliya ada yami dewa tuwaina gina'ita'itave'avina. Ada ahe wanavehawaleni-yo yana dewa koyona yami dewa koyona ginatubuhegena. Ai'ala'alata againe omi vita lakahina wananuhagana, tu bana ami tomuliya gikoyo-mo'a ma vita lakahi-mo'ena ginanuhagana.

Hoiyoi omi tokivetuvetunu matami uyu'uyuyuna ma vita lakahina wananuhagana! Fa'ina omi wagahe wagayo, Gava kaliva manuwa-tafalolo lakahina ginayakahini-yo ginawonadabadaba, medema gahe-kawowo. Atu gava kaliva manuwa-tafalolo ana vaigau ginayakahini-yo ginawonadabadaba, medema gahe velemo'ena. Au gavaimi giwonadabadaba, medemi gidadewadewa. Hidedemi wagahe.

Omi kaliva natuneyao. Gahe wananogalina kadu matami ginamahalina. Manuwa-tafalolo gaitoma sevesevehailana. Ka'i keke sevesevehailana digo, ana vaigau kadu gaitoma-kawowo. Hadema gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena, ka'i vaigau o ka'i manuwa-mo'ena?

Kadu wagahe wagayo, Gava kaliva manuwa-tafalolo ana atudidiga ginayakahini-yo ginawonadabadaba, medema gahe-kawowo. Atu gava kaliva abaveyao manuwa-tafalolo ana atudidiga againe gidauda-ma ginayakahini-yo ginawonadabadaba, medema gahe velemo'ena. Au gavaimi giwonadabadaba, medemi gidadewadewa. Hidedemi wagahe.

Omi kaliva matami abodana. Manuwa-tafalolo ana atudidiga gaitoma sevesevehailana. Ka'i keke sevesevehailana digo, abaveyao atudidiga againe gidauda-ma kadu gaitoma-kawowo. Hadema gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena, ka'i abaveyao o ka'i atudidiga-mo'ena?

Au wanogali! Gava kaliva yana wonadabadaba againe manuwa-tafalolo ana atudidiga giyakahina, medema atudidiga-mo'ena tu kadu abaveyao atudidigeya gidauda-ma giyakahina. Wonadabadaba luhei tu adi nuwanuwa au sa'eyana.

Ada gava kaliva yana wonadabadaba againe manuwa-tafalolo giyakahina, medema manuwa-tafalolo mo'ena tu kadu Bana'e manuwa-tafalolo againe gimimiyami-ma giyakahina. Wonadabadaba luhei tu adi nuwanuwa au sa'eyana.
Ada gava kaliva yana wonadabadaba againe lobama giyakahina, medema Yaubada yana abamiyami kikaiwabuna tu kadu Yaubada Tauna giyakahina. Wonadabadaba luhei tu ana nuwanuwa au sa'eyana.

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina vehimeya kabi'ona wa'itave'avina, higa gaitoma-kawowo naiya'au'a saikuku mawa gavadi gavadi wamagana ami kevakeva ana kivehivehimala fa'ine wavaivaina be Yaubada yana tufo waseusena, tu vehimeya lakahina keke wada'itave'avini. Omi keke wadanuwanuwa tunutunugina, kaliva keke wada'itanuwakabubuyedi kadu gavaimi gavaimi wagahegahe medema keke wadanuwa-nunauyeni. Mena vehimeyai-dina lakahina, nuwanuwa tunutunugina, itanuwakabubu, gahe ana nuwanunauya wada'itave'avina tu kadu vehimeya kabi'ona wana'itave'avina, higa Yaubada yana tufo wanaseusena.

Omi tokivetuvetunu matami abodana. Dewa kabi'ona wa'ita'itave'avina tu dewa lakahina keke ma'i wadanuwenuweni. Omi keke nuwanuwami kevakeva koyodi wana'ani fa'ina, ka'i namokilikili ami bwaiya ginatowa, au wamaduvaihegena tu ka'i kevakeva ana egana kameli bwaiya ginatowa, kevakeva koyona nonogana watonona. Mena gahetalahobuhobu gayakahina-ma yami dewa gihawavemogatalena.

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina ami gowa ami nau'a kwauna wakolakolana tu hinagena bwanebwanenena gidadauda amine, meda wowomi wa'ihagihagiyena tu nuwahinagemi kai'afu mata'alalaka againe gimaga.
O Falisi mata abodana. Nagona gowa nau'a hinagena unakolana ada au kadu kwauna yegayegana ginayemu.

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananugahana. Fa'ina yami dewa vaita lahi kaliva hivevigauna amine. Getana ana ita yamumuna tu lahi hinagene to'alika luluna kadu magana koyona gidadauda.
Meda anafaiweya omi ami ita vaita yegayegamiyao kaliva matadiya tu nuwahinagemiya ve'alololo dewa koyona tulina tulina gidadauda.

Hoiyoi Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu Falisimomo! Omi meyami luhei ma vita lakahina wananuhagana. Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tuwai-mo'ena hi'alika-ma adi tomohuyahuya wakidewedewena, kadu Yaubada yana kaliva yegayegadiyao adi lahi wavevigauna wagayo, Ka'i ide'eyao bwanenedeyao yadi toveya kadamiyami digo keke badi amine kadahuluva, au keke to'awatalatalaina kadaluve'alikadi.
Hidede amine wagahe fa'ina au taumiyao wahawavemogatala higa vaita omi badi to'awatalatalaina hiluve'alikadi-ma bwanenediyao.
Bwanenemiyao hivebutu Yaubada yana to'awatalatalaina hiluve'alikadi. Au wamadu bwanenemiyao yadi faisewa wavaini be waluyabuni, to'awatalatalaina wanaluve'alika-'owodi.

Hidema fa'ina wanogali! Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina kadu tonuwahuya kadu yaku vehimeya ana tovehawala omi agaimiya gana'iveninisedi. Tufoidi aimo wanaluve'alikadi o ka'i kelose againe wanatutuvefosedi. Tufoidi yami manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya bulava againe wanalaudi, kadu tufoidi melala tulina tulina agaidiya wanavenevenegadi.

Ada au badi Yaubada yana kaliva yegayegadiyao moya'aidi hiluve'alikadi-ma adi matahiwadi omi miYuda agaimiya ginalakayemu. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Keni tobohiyana yana dewa yegayegana ana egana Ebeli giluve'alikana. Bana againe luve'alika give'inuba ada hinunauwena hinunauwena tu omi miYuda Sakalaiya Belekaiya natuna atudidiga liline manuwa-tafalolo ana eda'awaneya waluve'alikana.
Wanogali! Mena luve'alika moya'aina ana laufata omi tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma agaimiya ginalakayemu.” Hidedemi Yesu Falisi gigahedi.
Wa'ita, Yaubada ginanuyabuyabumi be amikaibe wanamiyami ami tolugolagola keke.
Au gagahemi aimo keke-mo'a wana'ita-havagileku. Wanamiyami wananunauwena tu gana'ela-havagi yo wanagahe wanagayo, Bana Kaiwabu ana eganeya gi'ela-ma kanahawadavadavana.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahine gihobu, ada ginauna tu ana tomuliya Bana againe hi'ela be higa manuwa-tafalolo ana aiyogona tulina tulina vewaga hinavehawalena.
Bana gigayo, “Wadema manuwa ana ita vewaga fa'ina ganagahe. Kabala againe hikivetalana tu aimo keke tamo kabala kabalahiyana tabone ginada, au moya'aina hinatutuyauyaulena.”

Tu Yesu gina oya Olive againe gilaka givetoga tu ana tomuliya adikaibe'uyanina Bana againe hi'ela hitoliyena higayo, “Unavenuwa'atama gava tova manuwa-tafalolo ana lauyawela ulukahihiyena-ma ginalakayemu? Ya yewa'ela-havagi kadu hida tova ana lauyabu ginaluveda'ufo againe, gava aituha ana'ita-yo anahalamane-hagihagiyeni?”
Yesu gigayo, “Aituha hidede amine. Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi yana fwaya againe ginanuwa'abiyemi.
Fa'ina aimo kaliva moya'aidi hina'ela aku egana hinayakahina hinagayo, Iya'eku Keliso higa Yaubada yana Tovegida. Hidedemi hinagahe be kaliva moya'aidi yadi fwaya againe hinanuwa'abiyedi.

Kadu aituha sa'eyana ma gaviya moya'aina ginalakayemu ada kaliva yadi ve'amunumunuga butudi wananogalina, kadu hai lauveya hinalulugaviya medema valeyadi wananogalina. Atu wanogali! Keke ase'asemi gina'akolukoluni. Mena gaitomai-dina anafaiweya hidalakayemu tu tova ana lauyabu au aimo muliya-mo'ane ginalakayemu.
Yo'o sa'eyana mali yo'o buye hinave'amunumunuga, kadu fafali sa'eyana mali fafali buye hinalulugaviya. Loka ada li'uli'u lakahina fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hinalakayemu.
Venatuna ana tova ginaluveda'ufo againe, kwamayoku hinavefahedi-yo yadi aulolo ginavebutu. Meda anafaiweya mena gaitomai-dina galukahihiyedi-ma hinalakayemu againe, aulolo tagiya lakahina ginavebutu.
Ada medema tovai-nadi tufoidi moya'aidi yadi vetumagana hinahegena be hinanuwayewa. Ada tobohiyadiyao nibaidiyao agaidiya hinahawavemogataledi kadu hinavenikohiyedi.
Ada falofita fwayafwayadiyao moya'aidi hinalakayemu be kaliva moya'aidi yadi fwaya againe hinanuwa'abiyedi.
Ada koyona tulina tulina ginave'aliyahega fa'ina, tovetumagana tufoidi moya'aidi yadi hawahega tobohiyadiyao fa'idiya ginahavaina.
Atu hai kaliva gina'atuvefa'ila be Yaubada againe ginamiyamiyave'avina tu alika ana maka, medema ganakibababalena.

Ada yaku kaliva hida Venuwa'ata Yamumuna yo'o tulidi tulidi agaidiya hinalumamalena be babi matatabuna hinaluyabuna. E, kaliva hinavenuwa'atadi be higa Yaubada yana itave'avina againe adifaiweya hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya. Hidedemi yo'o moya'aidi hinavenuwa'ata-'owodi tu muliya tova ana lauyabu ginalakayemu.” Hidedemi Yesu tova ana lauyabu fa'ina gilukahihi.
Abakivekoyo koyo-mo'ena abaga tafatafalolona againe wana'itana againe, omi Yudiya ana fafali againe wanamiyami-ma au oyeya wana'ota.
Hai kaliva yana tolameya ginamiyami, medema keke yana manuweya ginaluku be higa yana lokoloko ginavaini. Au ginamadu'ota.
Hai kaliva yana faheya ginamiyami, medema keke melaleya ginayewani be higa ana lifi ginavaina. Au ginamadu'ota.
Hoiyoi vevine wahifugadiyao kadu vevine aimo hivehuvehuhu amanadi! Mena ota ana toveya vita lakahina hinanuhagana.

Yaubada againe wanave'o'ola be higa mena gaitoma koyona keke wehi ana tova o sabati againe ginalakayemu. Naudadana sabati againe hawata gidadauda fa'ina, ka'i sabati o wehi digo gavaimi be oyeya wada'ota?

Kadu medema tovai-nadi vita lakahi-mo'ena ginalakayemu. Mena vitai-nadi ma boi tuwai-mo'ena babi ana abave'inuba againe kadu tova hinafane keke hidanuhagani. Kadu aimo tova mulina keke hidede amine hinanuhagani.

Tu Yaubada mena tova vita-mo'ena galukahihiyena-ma ana aiyeta gidabana be ginakali'uho. Ka'i keke gidadabani digo, kaliva moya'aidi hidabwavi. Atu Tauna yana kaliva giluwafadi be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma adi lugolagola fa'ina mena tovai-nadi ginadabana hinafane be ginakali'uho.

Tu ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahemi ginagayo, Wa'ela hida kalivai-nadi givekeliso-ma wa'ita, o ka'i ginagayo, Wanana yuwa kaliva givekeliso-ma wa'ita. Ka'i hidede amine ginagahe o keke bonana wanavetumaganeni.

Au tova mulina tove'alololo hinalakayemu be hinagahe vaita hidavekeliso o ka'i hidavefalofita. Aituha fifiwaladi ada abaveyaulowoga badi hinafaisewadi be hinagaluvaluva vaita Yaubada yana kaliva ka'i yadi fwaya againe hinanuwa'abiyedi. E, kaliva vevine Yaubada giluwafadi be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma hinagaluvaluvadi vaita hinanuwa'abiyedi.
Wanogali! Tove'alololo yadi dewa fa'ina gavenuwa'ata-vagahimi.

Kadu'e, ka'i tamo hakwadi ginavenuwa'atami ginagayo, Wanana bana yuwava'ama givekeliso be wala'aiya gimimiyami-ma wana'itana, ka'i hidede amine ginagahe o keke wanana wana'itani. O ka'i ginagahe ginagayo, Bana givekeliso-ma mene vetawaneya gimimiyami, au keke bonana wanavetumaganeni.

Keke wanavetumaganeni fa'ina Iya Tohobu'ela nama gisinamana amine ganahobu'ela-havagi. Nama gisinamana be auhe'ama lobama fafalina fafalina gituvemahali-'owona amine, meda Iya kaliva moya'aidi matadiya ganahobu'ela-havagi.
Hai ubula siyona gilakalaka, medede againe manusiyo hinavaga'auta.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata ganavehimeyena be hiulega ginayuvedonena, ada yaku tovenuwa'ata moya'aidi gana'iveninisedi be kaliva vevine Yaubada giluwafadi-yo yana yo'ogaga againe hiluku-ma hinavaga'auhidi. Fafali tulina tulina wabolimaneya wayavalaseya walaube'uya wa'oyeya, lobama inubane kadu ana lauyabu againe hinavaga'auhidi be Iya Tohobu'ela agaikuya hinavega'auledi.
Wa'ita, lalava ana dewa wananuwenuwena be enohega wanavaina. Lalava ginatafa ma ka'ita-yo kagayo, Kauwana yana tova giluvedaveda'ufo.
Meda anafaiweya mena aituhai-dina galukahihiyedi-ma wana'itadi againe, au wanahalamanena yaku yewa'ela giluveda'ufo-mo'a.
Gagahe velemo'ena hida tova ana yo'o keke moya'aidi hina'alika-'owoga tu nagona mena gaitomai-dina moya'aidi hinalakayemu.
Lobama be babi ginayawowola tu bonaku keke ginayawowola, au ginaduva-vagata.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Nowa yana toveya kaliva vevine hidewadewa amine, meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela yaku yewa'ela ana toveya kaliva hinadewadewa.

Fa'ina boi tuwai-mo'ena mala aimo keke gidatuwa-mo'a kaliva vevine himiyami a'a hi'au'a bwai hiyuyu hinaginagi hivenavenagi au yadi havivila tulina tulina hinunauwena tu Nowa waka againe giyage aiyetai-nadi.

Nowa giyage tu gavadi ginalakayemu-ma keke hidanuwenuweni. Au himiyamiya-kawowo tu mala gituwa'afufudi-yo moya'aidi hibwavi-'owoga. Meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela yaku yewa'ela ana toveya kaliva vevine hinadewadewa.
Kaliva luhei faheya hinamiyami tu sa'eyana gananauwena sa'eyana ginamiya.
Vevine luhei gufeya hina'i'ivilavila tu sa'eyadi gananauwedi sa'eyadi hinamiya.
Atu hidede amine wanahalamana. Ka'i tonimanuwa tokai'afu yana ela ana kauwana gidahalamanena digo, keke matana gidalowoni au gidalulauboda be tokai'afu keke anafaiweya gidaluku yana manuweya.

Meda anafaiweya omi taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be wanalulauboda. Fa'ina gava kauwana Iya Tohobu'ela ganayewa'ela ma keke wadahalamaneni. Ka'i wanamiya-kawowo wanagayo, Keke adamoya gina'ela, au medema tovai-nadi ganavefuta'ami.

Tofaisewa kahihina ganalukahihiyena be wananuwenuwena. Gavaimi gidewadewa bana fa'ine higahe higayo, Wada tofaisewa bonabona'abina yana wanuwahuya gifififaisewa? Yana kauveya givegidena be gigahena gigayo, Iya ganana tu o aku agetoga una'itave'avidi, aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana adiga unaveleveledi.
Ka'i gavaimi yana taubada givehimeyena medemi ginadewadewa tu yana taubada ginayewa'ela bonana gi'abi'abina-ma gina'itana, au bana tofaisewai-nadi vemwamwala ginanuhagana.
Gagahe velemo'ena agaimiya kaliva lakahina yana lokoloko matatabuna ana to'itave'avina bana tofaisewai-nadi ginasena.
Atu ka'i bana tofaisewai-nadi au kaliva koyona o nuwahinagene ginagahe ginagayo, Hima yaku taubada givekwalu lakahina. Ka'i keke ginamadu'ela.
Ada au ginavebutu tobohiyaneyao higa tofaisewa velugadiyao ginamunumunudi, ada badi gufa koyona ana toyu-fa'ila buye hina'au'a hinayuyu.
Ka'i hidede amine bana tofaisewai-nadi ginahuluva, au yana taubada yana ela againe ginavefuta'ana. Yana aiyeta o ka'i yana kauwana tofaisewa keke gidahalamaneni tu yana taubada ginayewa'ela.

Au ginamunukoyokoyona ada ginahegenauwena be badi meyadi luhei adi matahiwadi amine bana ginanuhagana. E, bana badi buye hinatagitagi lakahina, kumidi hinahobe'uwana nuwadi ginavekubokubo.” Au hidedemi Yesu yana yewa'ela fa'ina gigahetalahobuhobu.
Vevine faifi kwavakwavadiyao tu faifi nuwanuwahuyadiyao.
Badi kwavakwavadiyao yadi lamufa hinauwena tu keke gufa yadi aba'aihiwaga againe hidanauweni.
Badi nuwanuwahuyadiyao ma yadi lamufa kadu gufa yadi aba'aihiwaga againe hinauwena.
Tonagi givekwalu lakahina fa'ina vevine edeya hibodaboda tu matadi gineganega ada au hi'enonuwaulu.
Hidauda tu bogi nafone kaliva agodi hikovadona higayo, Tonagi giyemuyemu. Wa'ela be wamadubodebodeni.
Au ulaulatana himidi yadi lamufa hikilakahidi.
Badi kwavakwavadiyao tobohiyadiyao nuwanuwahuyadiyao higahedi higayo, Ali ma'i gufa yama lamufa gikwe'ukwe'u.
Badi higayo, Keke. Ka'i hima omi'iyao ime'eyao keke adafata. Au wanana sitowa againe yami gufa wanakimonena.
Badi hinauna yadi gufa hinakimonena tu tonagi a giyemu. Ulaulatana ahe hikidewadewa-ma bana buye hiluku be avemwamwala hina'ana. Ada au wana hifalina.
Tu bana gigayo, Gagahe velemo'ena keke gadahalamanemi.”

Kadu Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi ihuluhuluva ganalukahihiyena. Kaliva lakahina mali fafali againe ginana fa'ina, yana tofaisewa giyowanidi be yana lokoloko nimadiya gisena higa hina'itave'avina.
Kaliva sa'eyana K5,000 amine givelena, kadu sa'eyana K2,000 amine givelena, kadu sa'eyana K1,000 amine givelena. Gavaimi gavaimi adifaiweya hinafaisewa, medemi giveledi. Gifolaka gilowoga be gina.
Gina tu tofaisewa K5,000 givelena-ma gififaisewa gififaisewa tu yana ve'atutamo'ai kadu K5,000 ginuhagana.
Meda anafaiweya tofaisewa anavelu K2,000 givelena-ma yana faisewa againe kadu K2,000 give'atutamo'aina.
Atu tofaisewa K1,000 givelena-ma gina kahu giyalana be yana taubada yana mani gikumulina.
Himiyami lauva tunugina tu mena tofaisewai-dina yadi taubada giyewana ada giyowanidi be yadi faisewa fa'ina hinavenuwa'atana.
Bana kaliva K5,000 givelena-ma kadu yana ve'atutamo'aina buye gi'aliyena K5,000. Gigayo, Kauveya, K5,000 uveleku be ga'itave'avina. U'ita, yaku ve'atutamo'aina kadu K5,000 ganuhagana.
Kadu bana kaliva K2,000 givelena-ma gi'ela gigayo, Kauveya, K2,000 uveleku be ga'itave'avina. U'ita, yaku ve'atutamo'aina kadu K2,000 ganuhagana.
Yana kauveya gigayo, O tofaisewa hagihagi, bonaku gavele-ma u'abina. Gaitoma kabikabi'ona ufaisewa-hagihagiyena fa'ina abavehimeya moya'aina nimaniya ganasena. Agaikuya u'ela buye kanavemwamwala.
Au bana kaliva K1,000 givelena-ma gi'ela gigayo, Kauveya, a gahalamane. O kaliva nuwa koyona. Keke udafahafaha tu u'i'aiyala-kawowo. Keke udafifaisewa tu uyauyaudi-kawowo.
Medema fa'ina gamatauta. Gana ya mani kahuya gasevauyena. U'ita, hidei ya lokoloko.
Au yana taubada gigayo, O tofaisewa koyo, dibu toyogina. O ugahe vaita udahalamaneku. Iya keke gadafahafaha tu ga'i'aiyala-kawowo kadu keke gadafifaisewa tu gayauyaudi-kawowo.
Hidede amine iya fa'ikuya unuwanuwa fa'ina, vaita udana yaku mani banika againe udaseni be higa iya gayewa'ela againe, yaku mani ana ve'atutamo'aina buye gadavaina.
Yaku mani K1,000 gavelena-ma wanavaiyewena be kaliva againe K10,000 gidadauda-ma wanavelena.

Ada au wama kaliva koyona keke gidadibudibumuhiga amanadi, melaleya wanahegehobuyena be umalovaneya ginamiyami. Medede againe kaliva hinatagitagi lakahina kumidi hinahobe'uwana nuwadi ginavekubokubo.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.

Tomiyababi yami yo'o tulina tulina Iya agaikuya wanavaga'auta. Ada yomuyomu adi to'itave'avina yana yomuyomu sifi fafaline kadu manugose fafaline ginasevehailedi amine, meda Iya tomiyababi yo'o luhei amine ganasevehailemi.
Yaku sifi i'atagikuya ganasedi tu badi manugose ma i'imawakuya ganasedi.
Fa'ina mafu gilauku-yo a'a waveleku, agoku gitaina-yo bwai waveleku, Iya gavekwanahawahawala-yo yami manuweya walukuweku.
Aku aikeva keke-yo aikeva waveleku, ga'aulolo-yo wa'itave'aviku, deliya gamiyami-yo wa'ela wamadubodaku.
Hidede amine kaliva yegayegadiyao ganagahedi tu badi hinagayo, Kauveya, gava tova a'ita mafu gilau-yo a'a avele, o ka'i ago gitaina-yo bwai avele?
Gava tova a'ita O uvekwanahawahawala-yo yama manuweya alukuwe, o ka'i a aikeva keke-yo a aikeva avele?
Gava tova a'ita u'aulolo-yo a'itave'avi o ka'i deliya umiyami-yo a'ela amaduboda?
Fa'ina mafu gilauku-yo keke a'a wadaveleku, agoku gitaina-yo keke bwai wadaveleku.
Kadu Iya gavekwanahawahawala-yo keke yami manuweya wadalukuweku, aku aikeva keke-yo aku aikeva keke wadaveleku, ga'aulolo be deliya gamiyami-yo keke wada'itave'aviku.
Hidedemi ganagahedi tu kadu badi hinagayo, Kauveya, gava tova a'ita mafu gilau o ago gitaina o uvekwanahawahawala o a aikeva keke o u'aulolo o ka'i deliya umiyami-yo keke adaveluga?
Ada au Iya ganagahedi ganagayo, Gagahe velemo'ena gavadi gavadi hida kwamana kabi'ona tobohiyakweyao agaidiya keke wadavelugani, medema vaita Iya keke wadavelugaku.
Au badi hinana matahiwadi ana abageya hinamiyamiya-vagata, tu badi yegayegadiyao hinana yawai-vagata ana abageya hinamiyamiya-vagata.” Hidede amine Yesu gigahe.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu yana manuwa againe hivaga'auta. Tokaiwabu ana egana Kaiyafasi.
Hivaga'auta buye hivevai be higa Yesu hinakive'avikauyena be hinaluve'alikana.
Higayo, “Ka'i yo'o hinave'atalalakalaka fa'ina, keke tafalolo lakahina ana toveya kanakive'avini.”
Tu Yesu Bedani melaleya gina Saimoni againe giwakawaka. Bana boi givedawodawowo fa'ina hivewagana tovedawodawowo.

Saimoni yana manuweya himiyami tu kwamayoku sa'eyana Yesu liline gi'ela bunama yamumu-mo'ena fatana lakahina gi'aliyena. Mena bunamai-nadi aba'aihiwaga kugakugana againe gidauda, kuga ana egana alabasita. Ada Yesu gi'enolukekela gi'au'a tu u'una gibunamina.
Tu ana tomuliya hi'ita-yo hinuwakoyo higayo, “Gavadi-yo hidede amine gihiwa-kawowoni?
Ka'i hida bunama gidakimonevedamanena o mani lakahina gidavaina be koyokoyo gidaveledi.”
Tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamanena fa'ina gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo hida kwamayoku wa'ivewowomumuni? Ginuwakabubuyeku fa'ina yana gugai kanahawaveyamumuyena.
Tova moya'aina koyokoyo hinafamiya himimiyami tu Iya keke aimo omi buye tova moya'aina kanamiyami.
Tova kabisona gana'alika fa'ina hida bunamai-nadi wowokuya gihiwana be aku aihuya fa'ina gikidewedewe-vagahiku.
Gagahe velemo'ena fafali ha'amine ha'amine kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hinalulumamalena, meda yana huluva hagihagina Iya agaikuya ma hinalukahihiyena be ana abanuwa'udu'udu fa'ina.”

Yesu gigahe-yo kaliva sa'eyana yo'o tuwelo agaidiya, ana egana Yudasi-Isikaliyota, gina abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i Yesu omi agaimiya ganahege'aliyena o mani gavaiyehi wadaveleku?” Au kabala siliva teti (30) hivelena.
Medema tovai-nadi Yudasi givebutu tova yamumuna gilelele be Yesu nibaineyao agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena.
Au tomuliya Yesu givehimeyedi amine hina be Abamaduviviya a'ana hikidewedewena.
Mala gibogi Yesu ana tomuliya buye hi'enolukekela be hina'a.
Ada hi'au'a tu Bana gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku.”
Au hi'ase'u'aulolo hivebutu sa'eyana sa'eyana hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Kauveya, iya'eku ma ka'i keke?” Hidedemi higahe.

Iya Tohobu'ela gana'alika Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigaheyena amine. Tu hoiyoi kaliva Iya Tohobu'ela nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku amanadi! Bana vita lakahina ginanuhagana. Ka'i bana kalivai-nadi keke gidatubuga, medema gidalubodana fa'ina keke vita gidawahini.”
Au bana tohawavemogatala Yudasi gigayo, “Tovehawala, iya'eku ma ka'i keke?” Yesu gigayo, “Au ugahe amine o'eni.”

Gagahemi hida babi ana oine tova adamoya buye kayuyuna-ma aimo keke ganayu-havagileni tu tova mulina Kamaku yana avemwamwala ginasena ana toveya, oine ivaguna Iya omi buye kanayuna. Mena avemwamwalai-nadi badi yana itave'avina againe himimiyami-ma fa'idiya ginasena.” Hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Ada au kwelidavadava hikweliyena. Hikweliyena gihavaina, hina oya Olive againe hilaka.
Sifi adi to'itave'avina ganamununa
ada sifi adi yo'o hina'abinauna.
Au Fita gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i badi moya'aidi hina'otayabuyabu digo, iya keke gana'otayabuyabu, keke-mo'a.”
Fita gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwadi iya O buye hinaluve'alikada, au keke-mo'a ganavekekeye.” Ada tomuliya moya'aidi kadu hidede amine higahe.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye hina abaga sa'eyana ana egana Gedasemani againe himiyami tu gigahedi gigayo, “Hidedei wanahiyoto tu yuwa ganana ganave'o'ola.”
Ada Fita kadu Sebedi natuneyao luhei buye ginauwedi be hinavebwa'uliyena, au givebutu gi'ase'u'aulolo be givedivediwe.
Gigahedi gigayo, “Ga'ase'u'aulolo lakahina vaita yawaiku gida'alagolohini. Hidedei wanamiyami Iya fa'ikuya wanavanevanenega.”
Ada giyewana ana tomuliya adi'itoto hidauda-ma gihagadi, ada Fita againe gigahe gigayo, “A! Bai sa'eyanaga ka'i keke afaiweya Iya fa'ikuya unavanevanenega?
Au wanavanevanenega wanave'ove'o'ola be keke aladibidibi againe wanaluku. Ase'asemi gihawahegena tu wowomi gifwalele.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Give'o'ola gihavaina, kadu giyewana badi matadi gineganega-mo'a fa'ina hidauda-ma gihagadi.
Au kadu ginuyabuyabu-havagiledi gina give'o'ola tova anaveto ahe give'o'ola amine.
Kadu ana tomuliya agaidiya giyewana gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i aimo wadadauda waveyaveyawai? Wa'ita, tova ahe gilakayemu be Iya Tohobu'ela tokoyona nimadiya kaliva sa'eyana ginahawavemogataleku.
Wamidi be kana. Ake! Wa'ita, kaliva nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku-ma a giyemu.”

Ada aimo gigahegaheni Yudasi giyemu, bana Yesu yana yo'o tuwelo kalivana, kadu yo'o lakahina yadi wafeto yadi wafuluma buye'i, badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao hi'iveninisedi be hi'ela.
Tu tohawavemogatala aituha yo'o boi giveledi gigayo, “Kaliva veyauga againe ganalusiuleyena-ma bana kalivai-nadi wanakive'avina.”
Ada auhe'ama Yesu liline gimaduna gigayo, “Aku Tovehawala siule!” Gigahe-yo giveyaugina.
Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Kusebo, ya nuwanuwa unamadugana.” Gigahe-yo yo'o hi'ela Yesu hikive'avina.
Au kaliva sa'eyana Yesu buye himiyami-ma nimana gitunena, yana feto gisiwakana digo abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana agetoga gilauna be tagana giluyo'ena.
Tu Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Ya feto uvaiyeweni ana foseya useni. Gaveyao moya'aidi feto againe atagidi hiludakana, medema feto againe hina'alika.
Ka'i inubaku aimo keke wadahalamaneni? Ka'i nuwanuwaku digo, akufaiweya Kamaku againe ganave'o'ola be auhe'ama lobama ana tovenuwa'ata tausani a gavaiyehi gina'iveninisedi be hinalugolegoleku.
Tu ka'i meda anafaiweya lugolagola fa'ina gadave'o'ola digo, gavaiya'amine-yo Veyao Tuwaina ana buki yaku alika fa'ina gigaheye-vagahina ma gidalakayemu?”

Ada medema tovai-nadi Yesu yo'oyo'o agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Vaita Iya tomunugakai'afu amine yo aku munuga fa'ina wa'ela wafetomiyao wafulumamiyao. Tova tova manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe gahiyoto gavehavehawala tu keke wadakive'aviku.

Atu hida gaitoma moya'aina giyemu be gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe hi'etoladi, medemi ginalakayemu velemo'ena.” Hidedemi gigahe-yo tomuliya moya'aidi hi'otayabuyabuna.

Tu badi kaliva Yesu hikive'avina-ma abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu againe hinauwena, tokaiwabu ana egana Kaiyafasi. Bana againe buki-vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu kaliva lakahidiyao ahe hivaga'auta.
Bana Fita wai gimulina lauveya au tokaiwabu yana eda'awaneya gi'ela be giluku, tuilala buye hivetoga be gavadi Yesu againe hinagana, medema gina'itana.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu miYuda yadi Koniselo moya'aidi togahe-kawowo hileledi be higa Yesu hinahawavekoyoyena. Au yadi fwaya againe vaita adifaiweya alikeya hinahegena.
Au abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu gitowamidi Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i bonalaufata keke afaiweya? Gavadi-yo hida kaliva yadi hawavekoyo keke udafatani?”
Tu Fita melaleya gihiyoto tu agetoga kwamayoku bana againe gi'ela gigayo, “Kadu o'eni Yesu kwanaGalili buye wamiyami.”
Atu moya'aidi matadiya givekeke gigayo, “Keke gadahalamane gavaimi ugahegahe.”
Au gina abaluku againe tu agetoga kwamayoku velugana gi'itana be tolauboda agaidiya gigayo, “Hidema kaliva Yesu kwanaNasaledi buye himiyami.”
Kadu givekeke-havagi gigayo, “Yaubada! Kaliva iya keke gadahalamaneni.”
Himiya kabisona tu tolauboda Fita againe hi'ela higayo, “Au makewa o sa'eya agaidiya. Meya ana nogala againe ahalamane.”
Au Fita gigayo, “Ka'i keke gadagahe velemo'ena digo, Yaubada gidahawave'aviku. Bana kalivai-nadi keke gadahalamaneni.” Gigahe-yo auhe'ama kamukamu gikwage.
Ada Fita Yesu yana gahe nuwana gi'afolena gigayo, “Kamukamu keke ginakwage tu nagona unamidivekekeyeku tohiye.” Au gina yuwa kabu'avane gitagitagi agona lakahina.
Tu mala gilauna abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao moya'aidi hivaga'auta buye hilulukahihi be higa Yesu alika againe hinahegena.
Ada au hiyogona be hinauwena tovehimeya kwanaLoma ana egana Failato againe hihege'aliyena.

Gigahedi gigayo, “Iya gakoyo, fa'ina kaliva hagihagina ana vita keke ma nimamiya gahawavemogatalena be gina'alika.” Badi higayo, “Gavadi-yo ime agaimeya u'ela? Tauni a vita unawahina.” Hidedemi higahe.
Au kabala siliva manuwa-tafalolo againe gihegelukuweni tu gilowoga be gina tauna odona bulava againe gi'i'ina be gisibahina.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao hina siliva hivaina higayo, “Hida dayaga ana mani fa'ina ka'i velekawowo ana abasewadi manuwa-tafalolo againe kanadodona, medema keke gidalubodani.”
Ada mena mani-nadi fa'ina buye hilukahihi ada yadi nuwanuwa againe hina avaeka ana to'aibubuna yana babi hikimonena be higa hawahawala adi didikula fa'ina.
Mena babi-nadi dayaga ana mani againe hikimonena fa'ina, tuwaina kadu adamoya hivewagana Dayaga ana Babi.
Medema tovai-nadi gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yelemaiya gigaheye-vagahina, medemi gilakayemu velemo'ena gigayo,
MiIsileli kaliva fatana hisena kabala siliva teti. Ada mena silivai-nadi hivaina be hina avaeka ana to'aibubuna yana babi hikimonena, boi Yaubada givehimeyeku amine.
Hidedemi Yelemaiya gigahe.
Tu Yesu hinauwena tovehimeya kwanaLoma matane gimidimidi ada tovehimeya gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Ka'i O'eni miYuda yadi tokaiwabu?” Yesu gigayo, “Au ugahe amine Iya'eku.”
Au Yesu give'amata fa'ina Failato gigahena gigayo, “Yadi hawavekoyo gavadawana O againiya, ka'i keke udanogalini?”
Atu yadi hawavekoyo fa'ina keke tamo bonalaufata kadu gidagaheye. Hidema fa'ina tovehimeya nuwana givegafo'uya'uya lakahina.
Tu tafalolo ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya ana toveya tovehimeya kwanaLoma yana dewa ma yogoyogonina sa'eyana, ka'i hakwadi yo'o hive'ove'o'olena, medema tovehimeya giyauyauna.
Ada medema tovai-nadi yogoyogonina sa'eyana moya'aidi hihalamanena-ma deliya gimiyami, ana egana Balaba.
Au yo'o ahe hivaga'auta-yo Failato gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i hakwadi nuwanuwami ganayauni, ka'i Balaba o ka'i Yesu Bana hivewagana Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida?”
Fa'ina gihalamanena badi yadi ga'uma'uma fa'ina bana againe hihege'aliyena.

Tu Failato vedewayauga ana abavetoga againe gimiyami tu vavinena venuwa'ata hi'iveninisena higayo, “Bogi againe wadema kalivai-nadi a'avayaunena be avedivediwe lakahina. Bana kaliva tunutunugina ana vita keke, fa'ina keke tamo gavadi Bana fa'ine unavehimeye.”
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao yo'o hivagadonedi be Failato hinave'o'olena higa Balaba ginayauna tu Yesu alika againe ginahegena.
Failato gigayo, “Au Yesu againe gavaimi ganaga, Bana hivewagana Yaubada yana Tovegida?” Moya'aidi higayo, “Kelose againe gida'alika.”
Bana gigayo, “A! Gavadi yana koyona?” Tu badi kadu agodi gilakata-mo'a hikovakovadona higayo, “Kelose againe gida'alika.”

Tu Failato gigahe-wayoga ada kaliva hivebutu hive'atalalakalaka ma gi'itana againe, gufa givaina digo yo'o matadiya nimana gikolana gigayo, “Hidema kalivai-nadi ana luve'alika ana vita iya keke ganawahini, au omi taumiyao mena vitai-nadi wanawahina.”
Ada kaliva moya'aidi higayo, “Ana luve'alika ana vita au ime anawahina kadu natumeyao hinawahina.”

Hidedemi higahe-yo Balaba giyauna be badi agaidiya gihawahegena. Tu givehimeya be tolugaviya bulava hakahakaluluna againe Yesu hinalaulauna. Hilauna gihavaina, givehimeyedi be kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.
Ada tolugaviya Yesu hinauwena tovehimeya yana manuwa lakahina ana eda'awaneya hilukuwena, ada yadi yo'o moya'aidi hikovavaga'auhidi be Yesu himidififina.
Ada ana kaleko hivehalilina be aikeva yabeyabelina tovehimeya adi vaigau amine hive'osena.

Ada badau bulava hakahakaluluna againe hi'etowaliwalina be u'une hisena, kadu aiwala nimana i'atagine hive'abina vaita Bana tovehimeya amine. Au Bana magigine tugadi hiveve'etodonena be hihawahawavelaigena higayo, “Hoiyoi, siule siule miYuda yadi tokaiwabu!”
Au hikiwakiwalitagona, yana aiwala hivaina be u'una hilaulauna.
Hihawavelaigena gihavaina, ana aikeva yabeyabelina hivehalilini tu Tauna ana aikeva hive'osena, ada hinauwena be kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.
Hinauna tu kaliva sa'eyana kwanaSailini himaduhagana, ana egana Saimoni. Au bana hikive'avina be higa Yesu ana kelose gina'avalana.
Ada abaga ana egana Goligota againe hi'ela. Goligota ana kaivila bonadeya ma utouto.
Hiyemu tu oine be gufa golagola-mo'ena hivila'atutamo'aina-ma hitunena be ginayuni-yo yana aulolo ma'i gina'atagona. Atu Yesu giyuluvaluvani-yo gikilowena.

Ada kelose againe hitutuvefosena gihavaina, kabala hihegelakahina be iya'iyaya higaheyena higa hakwadi hakwadi ana kaleko hinavaini ma hinahalamanena. Au hidede amine ana kaleko taudiyao agaidiya hifolakena.
Hifolakena gihavaina hihiyoto be himiyamiyatagona.
Tu ana hawavekoyo fefe againe hi'etoladina be u'una getane hisena. Etoladi gigayo, “Hidevama Yesu miYuda yadi tokaiwabu.”
Kadu tomunugakai'afu luhei adi kelose againe hitutuvefosedi, sa'eyana Yesu i'atagine kadu sa'eyana i'imawane.

Meda anafaiweya abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu kaliva lakahidiyao buye hihawavelaigena higayo, “Mali kaliva gikibababaledi tu Tauna keke anafaiweya ginakibababaleni. Vaita Bana'e miIsileli yada tokaiwabu. Ka'i adamoya kelose againe auhe'ama ginahobu digo, ime anadavana.
Yaubada givetuvetumaganena. Ka'i Yaubada nuwanuwana Bana'e, auhe'ama gidakibababalena fa'ina Bana gigayo, Iya Yaubada Natuna.”
Meda anafaiweya tomunugakai'afu Bana buye kelose againe hitutuvefosedi-ma hivebutu hihawaluvetonovena.
Tu umalovana babi matatabuna gi'uyuyubodena, uyadayada givebutuna be ginunauwena mala gilavina againe.
Au mala gilavina Yesu gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Elai Elai lama sabakitani?” “Ho yaku Yaubada yaku Yaubada, gavana fa'ina unuyabuyabuku?” Bonana ana kaivila au hidede amine.
Ada tolauboda tufoidi hinogalini-yo higayo, “Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Elaiya fa'ine gikovakova.”
Auhe'ama kaliva sa'eyana gimadu balou givaina digo oine golagolana againe gi'utuvina ai againe gi'etokwanena gitunena be higa ginayuna.
Tu tufoidi higayo, “Au gimiya. Kanaboda be kana'itana, ka'i Elaiya gina'ela be ginakibababalena o ka'i keke.”
Yesu kadu gikova'awafatafata-yo alu'aluwana gihawahegehegena.
Au tomohuyahuya hihege tu Yesu ahe gimididi-havagi yo Yelusalema againe hina moya'aidi hiyemaunidi.

Tu bana tolugaviya adi togiyomatana be badi Yesu buye hi'ita'itave'avina-ma li'uli'u kadu gaitoma moya'aina gilakayemu-ma hi'itana againe, himatautave'ine higayo, “Wona velemo'ena Bana hidevama Yaubada Natuna.”
Badi vevine agaidiya sa'eyana Meli vineMagidala, sa'eyadi Meli Yemesa Yosefa hinadi, kadu sa'eyadi Sebedi natuneyao hinadi.
Tu mala a gibogi kaliva wavaikuwana gi'ela, kwanaAlimadiya ana egana Yosefa, bana kadu Yesu ana tomuliya.
Bana Failato againe gina Yesu wowona give'o'olena. Au Failato givehimeya be Yesu wowona Yosefa hinavelena.

Ada wowona givaina digo kaleko kwayakwayana ivaguna againe gifafana be tauna yana tomohuyahuya ivaguna kuga hinagene giyalana-ma againe giselukuwena, ada kabala lakahina againe tomohuyahuya ana eda'awana give'enobodani-yo gilowoga be gina.
Meli vineMagidala kadu wagakoyona buye hihiyoto tomohuyahuya magigine hivehagadi.

Kadu gigahe vaita Bana Tauna Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida, ada mena yana fwaya koyona. Atu ka'i tova adamoya ana tomuliya hina'ela wowona hinaki'afuna be hinanauweni tu yo'o hinagahedi vaita Yesu gidamididi-havagi digo, mena fwaya wai ginamulina-ma au koyo-mo'ena. Hidema fa'ina udavehimeya be ya kalivamomo ana tomohuyahuya aiyeta tohiye hina'itave'avi-hagihagiyena be ana tomuliya keke adifaiweya wowona hinaki'afuni.”
Failato gigahedi gigayo, “Tolugaviya gahawahegedi. Au wananauwedi ada gavaimi be tomohuyahuya wana'itave'avi-hagihagiyeni, mededemi wanadewadewa. Ana itave'avina aimo taumiyao.”
Au hilowoga tomohuyahuya ana seboda kabala hisedonena bulava againe hisive'ave'avina, ada tolugaviya higahedi be higa hina'itave'avi-hagihagiyena.
Tu sabati higa Satadei a hihegena mala givebutu gilaulauna tafalolo, Meli vineMagidala wagakoyona buye hina be tomohuyahuya hina'itana.
Ada auhe'ama babi gili'uli'u lakahina, au Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata lobameya gihobu'ela kabala give'awawana be tabone gihiyoto.
Ana ita'ita vaita nama amine, ana vaigau kwayakwaya-mo'ena vaita howahowa amine.
Tolugaviya tomohuyahuya hi'ita'itave'avina-ma tovenuwa'ata fa'ina himatautave'ine hivetatava au hibe'u vaita hida'alika.
Tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata vevine agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Keke wanamatauta. A gahalamanena Yesu hikivekelosena-ma walelelena.
Bana keke hidedei gidamiyami, au gimididi-havagi boi gigaheyena amine. Wa'ela be abaga gidauda-ma wa'ita.
Wana'itani-yo wanamaduna ana tomuliya wanagahedi wanagayo, Yesu alikeya ahe gimididi-havagi ada Galili againe wai ginagona, yuwadedei wana'itana. Wanogali, ahe gavenuwa'atami.”
Au tomohuyehuyeya himadulowoga yadi wamatauta tu kadu yadi wavemwamwala keke kabisona. Himadu be Yesu ana tomuliya hinagahedi.
Hinauna tu auhe'ama Yesu gimaduhagadi be gilusiuleyedi. Au Bana againe hi'ela hi'ibo'ula-mo'a, agena hi'abina be hidavadavana.
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Keke wanamatauta. Wanana be tobohiyakweyao wanagahedi hinana Galili againe hina'itaku.”

Badi vevine hinauna tu tolugaviya tomohuyahuya hi'ita'itave'avina-ma tufoidi hilowoga melala-mo'ena againe hiluku be gaitoma moya'aina gilakayemu-ma abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao agaidiya hilukahihiyena.
Au abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao buye hivaga'auta be hivevai. Buye hive'anuwanuwa-yo mani lakahina tolugaviya hiveledi be higa awadi hinave'ibodana.
Higayo, “Kaliva wanagahedi vaita ana tomuliya bogi againe hida'ela wowona hidaki'afuni aimo omi wadauda-tu.
Tu ka'i tovehimeya kwanaLoma hidedemi ginanogalina be ginanuwakoyoyemi, ime nuwana ana'iveyamumuna be keke vita ginalakayemu agaimiya.”
Au tolugaviya mani hivaina ada hivehimeyedi amine hihuluva. Ada au Yesu wowona ana kai'afu kahihi-nadi miYuda hivebutu hilukahihiyena be hinunauwena tova adamoya.
Tu tomuliya ileveni Galili againe hina oyai-nadi boi Yesu giyakahina-ma againe hilaka.
Hiyemu tu Yesu hi'itana againe hi'ibo'ula-mo'a be hidavadavana tu tufoidi ase'asedi gi'amalakibo.
Au Yesu lilidiya gi'ela gigahedi gigayo, “Abavehimeya moya'aina lobameya kadu babiya Kamaku givele-'owoku.

Abavehimeya hidede amine giveleku fa'ina, wanana yo'o fafali moya'aina agaidiya wanavehawaledi be hinavetomuliya. Wanakivebafitaisoyedi Tamada ana eganeya Natuna ana eganeya Alu'aluwa Mahalina ana eganeya.
Wanavehavehawaledi be vehimeya moya'aina gavelemi-ma hina'itave'avina. Ada wanogali! Tova moya'aina Iya omi buye kanamiyami tova ana lauyabu maka.” Hidede amine Yesu ana tomuliya givenuwa'atadi.
Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yesu Keliso Yaubada Natuna fa'ina hidede amine.
Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya gahe sa'eyana gi'etoladina. Yaubada yana gahe Natuna againe gi'etoladina gigayo,
U'ita, hida yaku tovenuwa'ata.
Bana gana'iveninisena be wai ginanagona,
ya eda kaliva ase'asediya ginakidewedewena.
Kaliva agona hinanogalina
wala'aiya ginakovakovadadana ginagayo,
Kaiwabu yana eda wanavetauna,
yana eda ase'asemiya wana'ihagihagiyena.
Hidedemi Aiseya gigahe.
Kaliva moya'aidi Yudiya ana fafali kadu Yelusalema againe hitauya be hina Yoni yana laumamala hinanogalina. Yadi dewa koyona hiyau-yo gufa ana egana Yolidani againe gikivebafitaisoyedi.

Bana Yoni ma yana miyami kaliva koyokoyo-'avana amine. Aikeva kameli utuutuna againe hiyogona-ma gi'osena ada gaiyona bulumakau kwafiline hiyogona ma goline gihifona. Ada anaga ma koloma kadu ma'awa gufadi amine.

Ada gilulumamala gigayo, “Iya wai ganagona tu kaliva sa'eyana wai ginamulina-ma gifaiwalahegeku. Bana kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu iya kwamana kabisoku fa'ina, keke akufaiweya Bana againe ganave'agetoga be gana'aibo'ula-yo ana ageyafayafa adi aba'aiyauga ganayauni.
Iya gufa againe gakivebafitaisoyemi tu Bana'e ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe ginakivebafitaisoyemi be ginavemagami.” Hidedemi Yoni gilulumamala.
Himiyami tu Yesu Nasaledi Galili ana fafaliya gitauya be Yoni againe gi'ela, ada Yoni Yolidani againe gikivebafitaisoyena.
Ada Yesu gibafitaiso gihavaina, gufeya gi'a'alakahini tu auhe'ama lobama gi'ayavalini-yo Yaubada Alu'aluwana ana ita vaita bunebune amine Bana againe gihobu'ela ma gi'itana.
Ada Yaubada agona lobameya gikova gigayo, “O'eni natu'ase'aseku, nuwaku ukiveyamumu-mo'ena.”
Yesu Yolidani againe gibafitaiso tu auhe'ama Alu'aluwa Mahalina babigaga againe giwavina.
Ada aiyeta foti agaidiya babigaga againe gimiyami tu Setani gi'ala'aladibidibiyena. Ada kevakeva walawala'a hinafadiya gimiyami keke tamo kaliva tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata hi'ela hi'itave'avina.
Tova sa'eyana Yesu tobu ana egana Galili ana taliyeya ginauna tu Saimoni kadu taina Anidulu gi'itadi. Alevatu hisesehobuyeni tu gi'itadi fa'ina badi tobayauma.
Ada Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ela wanamuliyeku be kaliva adi bayauma ganavehawalemi.”
Ada auhe'ama kaliva adi'iselu yadi alevatu hisehobuye-vagahini tu himuliyena.
Kadu ginauna tu matalaviseya Yemesa wataina Yoni Sebedi natuneyao gi'itadi, wakeya hihiyoto yadi alevatu gi'akaninina-ma hikikidewedewena.
Ada auhe'ama gikovadi be hinamuliyena. Au tamadi Sebedi yana tofaisewa buye wakeya himiyami-ma hinuyabuyabudi be Yesu himuliyena.
Hinauna tu Kafeneumi againe hiyemu. Ada sabati againe Yesu manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe giluku givebutu givehawala.
