Ada yo'o yana vehawala fa'ina hiyaulowoga higayo, “Keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala amine gidavehawala, au vaita tovehimeya velemo'ena amine givehavehawala, yana vehawala ase'aseda gi'onana.”

Higahegahe tu kaliva wayafunena yadi sinagogi againe giluku gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Yesu kwanaNasaledi gavadi ime agaimeya unagani-yo u'ela? Ka'i O u'ela be ime yafune ama loi unamunuma-yo anabwavi? O ya inuba gahalamanena. O'eni Yaubada yana Kaliva Mahamahali.”
Tu Yesu yafune gihawatana gigayo, “Gi'alove. Una, kaliva unuyabuyabuni.”
Yafune kaliva gikivefavefanina toyogina gitatawayana-yo ginuyabuyabuna.
Kaliva moya'aidi hi'ita-yo hiyaulowoga-mo'a buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Hida hima gava'ana? Yana vehawala tuli-mo'ena kadu ana wavehimeya. Yafune nonogana hida kaliva gihawatadi-ma bonana hi'abina.”
Ada au Yesu valeyana Galili ana fafali matatabuna againe give'aliyahega.
Tu Yesu manuwa-abavehawala againe gihobu-yo gina Saimoni Anidulu yadi manuweya. Ada Yemesa Yoni badi buye hina manuweya hiluku.
Saimoni lawana adi iviya hidauda wowodi vaita ai, ada badi fa'idiya Yesu himaduvenuwa'atana.
Au gina gi'itadi nimadiya gi'abi be gisivemidididi. Wowodi auhe'ama gituluna ada hivebutu adi wakawaka adiga hikidewedewena.

Melala ana kaliva moya'aidi Saimoni yana eda'awaneya hivaga'auta-'owoga, ada Yesu to'aulolo moya'aidi yadi aulolo tulina tulina ma gisiveyawadi. Kadu yafune moya'aidi kaliva hiluvaiyedi-ma giwavidi, ada yafune Bana inubana hihalamanena fa'ina gihawatadi be keke hinalukahihiyeni.
Saimoni tobohiyaneyao buye hina hilelena ada hinuhagana againe higayo, “Kaliva moya'aidi O hilelele.”
Yesu gigayo, “Wa'ela be kana mali melaleya be kadu badi agaidiya ganalulumamala. Hidema fa'ina gahobu'ela.”
Ada au Galili ana melala moya'aina agaidiya ginunuwaliliuga, yadi manuwa-abavehawala agaidiya gilulumamala, adi yafune giwaviwavidi.
Tu tovedawodawowo sa'eyana gi'ela Yesu againe tugana give'etodonena be gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwa digo, afaiweya unakiveyamumuku.”
Gigahe-yo Yesu gihinekalikaliyena nimana gitunena kaliva gi'abina gigayo, “Iya nuwanuwaku. Au unayamumu.”
Ada auhe'ama ana dawodawowo gihavaina be giyamumu.
Aiyeta gavaiyehi himiyami tu Yesu Kafeneumi againe giyewana ada valeyana ginauna vaita yana manuweya gidamiyami.
Kaliva moya'aidi Bana againe hivaga'auta be manuwa vetawana hibabalina, keke tamo abaga, kadu eda'awana keke tamo abaluku. Hidede amine hiyo'oyo'o tu Yesu badi agaidiya gilulumamala.
Kaliva tufoidi hi'ela kaliva walogina gi'a'uwana-ma hi'aliyena ana towahi kaliva adivefowa.

Yo'o lakahina fa'ina keke adifaiweya tovefela Yesu liline hinaseni. Hidema fa'ina hilaka manuwa getane ada hami Yesu gimiyami amine hifolena. Manuwa getana hi'etovahivahini-yo tovefela wa'ivina hisehobuyena.
Ada Yesu yadi vetumagana gi'ita-yo tovefela againe gigahe gigayo, “Natuku, ya koyona ahe gayawelidi.”
Hidede amine nuwahinagediya hitoliluvaluva tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa ase'asene gimadu'ayaunena ada gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo medede amine ase'asemiya watoliluvaluva?

Gavaimi tovefela againe ganagahe-yo ginalakayemu? Ka'i ganagayo, Ya koyona ahe gayawelina, o ka'i ganagayo, Umidi a ivi u'avalani be unaudadana. Hadema vehimeya vita-mo'ena? Me kaliva ana siveyawa vaita vita-mo'ena fa'ina ka'i ganavehimeya tu keke ginayamumu, au taumiyao amifaiweya wana'itahalamanena kaliva adi siveyawa keke akufaiweya.

Atu hida kaliva ganasiveyawana be wana'itani-yo Iya fa'ikuya wanagahe wanagayo, Velemodi. Bana Tohobu'ela kaliva yadi koyona adi aiyawela au ana tagalowalowa.” Ada au tovefela againe gigahe gigayo, “Ganagahe. Umidi a ivi uwahi be una ya manuweya.”
Tu Yesu kadu gihobu tobu ana egana Galili ana taliyeya gina. Kaliva moya'aidi Bana againe hiyo'oyo'o ada givebutu givehawaledi.

Ginauna tu takesi ana toyaudi sa'eyana gi'itana ana egana Livai, Alifiyo natuna. Bana Livai takesi ana abayaudi againe gihiyoto. Ada gi'ita-yo gigahena gigayo, “Unamuliyeku.” Au bana Livai gimidi be gimuliyena.

Muliya Livai yana manuweya giluku be gina'a. Ada tolameya gi'au'a tu takesi ana toyaudi moya'aidi kadu tokoyona velugadiyao Bana Yesu kadu ana tomuliya buye hi'enolukekela tu hi'au'a. Fa'ina badi kalivai-dina tufoidi moya'aidi himuliyena.

Tu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala, higa Falisi adi loi, Yesu tokoyona kadu takesi ana toyaudi buye hi'au'a ma hi'itadi againe, ana tomuliya higahedi higayo, “Gavai'ona-yo wama kaliva koyodiyao takesi ana toyaudi kadu tokoyona velugadiyao Bana badi buye hi'a'au'a?”

Tova sa'eyana Yoni ana tomuliya kadu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi hilabelabewaviyo. Kaliva tufoidi hi'ela Yesu hitoliyena higayo, “Gavana fa'ina Yoni ana tomuliya kadu Falisi adi tomuliya hilabelabewaviyo be hinave'o'ola fa'ina, tu a tomuliya keke tamo tova hidalabelabewaviyo?”

Tu aimo tonagi hinanauwena lauveya ana toveya, au medema tovai-nadi ana yo'o hinamiya-kawowo, a'a keke hina'ani. Meda anafaiweya Iya yaku kaliva buye amimiyami fa'ina keke hidalabelabewaviyo.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.

Kadu keke tamo hakwadi oine ivaguna manugose kwafilidi tuwaina againe ginahiwani. Ka'i hidede amine gidahiwana digo, oine ivaguna gidatubuga be kwafilidi tuwaina a gikwakwana-ma gida'afolena, ada au oine kadu manugose kwafilidi gidakoyo. Ka'i oine ivaguna digo, kadu kwafilidi ivaguna.” Au hidede amine Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.
Ada Falisi higahena higayo, “U'ita, gavadi-yo a tomuliya sabati ana vehimeya keke hida'itave'avini?”

Au Iya Tohobu'ela aku egana tovehimeya, fa'ina Iya kadu sabati ana to'itave'avina. Yaku kaliva sabati ana hawata hina'itave'avina o ka'i keke hina'itave'avini, medema Iya yaku abavehimeya.” Hidede amine Yesu gigahedi.
Kadu tova sa'eyana Yesu manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe giluku. Medede againe kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, nimana gifwalele-vagata.
Kaliva tufoidi nuwanuwadi Yesu yana dewa hinahawavekoyoyena fa'ina, Bana hi'ita'ita-kwanekwanena be hina'itana ka'i nimakoyo sabati againe ginakiveyamumuna o ka'i keke.
Yesu nimakoyo againe gigahe gigayo, “U'ela we'ai.”

Ada tolauboda agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Yada buki-vehimeya sabati fa'ina gavaimi givehimeyeda? Ka'i kaliva sabati againe kanakiveyamumuna o ka'i kanakivekoyona? Ka'i kanalugolegolena o ka'i kanaluve'alikana?” Hidedemi Yesu gitoliluvaluva tu badi hive'amata.
Badi Falisi hihobu be hina Helodi yana yo'o kalivadi buye hivaga'auta hivevai be higa gavaiya'amine Yesu hinaluve'alikani.

Tu Yesu mena melala gihege tu ana tomuliya buye hina Galili ana tobu liline, ada yo'o lakahi-mo'ena hibwa'ulina. Fafali moya'aina agaidiya hitauya, Galili ana fafali Yudiya ana fafali Yelusalema ana melala Idumiya ana fafali kadu melala moya'aina yuwa Yolidani fafaline, kadu Taiya Saidoni adi melala moya'aina agaidiya hitauya. Gavadi gavadi moya'aina gififaisewana-ma valeyana hinogalina againe hivaga'auta.
Ada yo'o lakahi-mo'edi fa'ina Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Waka kabi'ona wana'ihagihagiyena fa'ina kaliva hiyo'oyo'o be ka'i hinavetuwahegeku, au ganayage.”
Kaliva moya'aidi gisiveyawadi fa'ina to'aulolo adi aulolo tulina tulina hiveve'atuwahega be hinakibwa'eni-yo hinayamumu.
Ada badi wayafunediyao hi'ita-yo agene hibe'u hitatawayana higayo, “Iyoi. O'eni Yaubada Natuna.”
Atu Yesu gihawatadi toyogina be Bana inubana keke hinahawavemogataleni.
Tu Yesu oyeya gilaka ada kaliva gaveyao nuwanuwana, medema giyowanidi be Bana againe hilaka'ela.

Ada kaliva tuwelo givegidedi ada givewagadi afositolo higa bonana ana towahidadana. Givegidedi be higa badi Bana buye hinamiyami kadu gina'iveninisedi be hinalulumamala, ada abavehimeya ginaveledi-yo yafune hinawavidi.
Ada kaliva tuwelo givenuwadadanedi-ma adi egana hidede amine. Saimoni tu ana egana velugana givelena-ma Fita.
Yemesa kadu taina Yoni Sebedi natuneyao tu adi egana velugana giveledi-ma Bowanedisi, higa ana kaivila atala natuneyao fa'ina yadi gahe vaita atala amine.
Kadu Anidulu Filifi Batolomiu Madiu Tomasi Yemesa Alifiyo natuna, kadu Tadiyasi, kadu Saimoni bana yo'o miLoma hivenibainedi-ma kalivana.
Kadu Yudasi-Isikaliyota bana Yesu nibaineyao nimadiya gihawavemogatalena amanadi.
Ma ana unuma hidedemi hinogalina againe, hilowoga be hinavega'aulena fa'ina higahegahe higayo, “Givekabakabaleya.”
Hidede amine higahegahe fa'ina Yesu giyowanidi be hi'ela, gahetalahobuhobu amine gilukahihiyedi gigayo, “Keke Setani tauna ginawavini, keke-mo'a.
Hai fafali ana melala tulina tulina buye hilulugaviya, medema taudiyao hinavehavaidi.
Kadu hai yo'o ana kaliva tova moya'aina buye hivekwavekwageya, medema hina'abi'ota'ota be yo'o ana egana ginahavaina.
Meda anafaiweya ka'i Setani tauna yana yo'o higa yafune ginavekwageyedi be ginawavidi digo, bana tauna yana yo'o ginavehavaidi ada au yana abavehimeya ginahavaina.

Ka'i kaliva manimaninina yana manuweya ginamiyami, au keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginaluku kaliva yana lokoloko ginavaini. Nagona kaliva manimaninina ginayogoni-yo yana lokoloko ginavaina. Meda anafaiweya Iya Setani ganayogoni-yo kaliva wayafunedi gana'ihagihagiyedi.
Atu hai kaliva yana gahe-kawowo againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginahawatagona, medema yana koyona Yaubada keke ginayawelini, keke-mo'a. Au yana hawatagona ana vita ginawahi-vagahina.”
Yesu hidede amine gigahe, fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala againe yafune giwaviwavidi tu badi kaliva higahe vaita yafune Yesu gidaluvaiyeni.
Yo'o hitogafifina ada higahena higayo, “Hina kadu tobohiyamomo melaleya himimiyami, nuwanuwadi hina'ita.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Hakwa'adi hinaku? Kadu gaveyao tobohiyakweyao?”
Ada badi hitogafifina-ma gilumataviledi-yo gigahe gigayo, “Hidema hinaku kadu tobohiyakweyao.
Fa'ina hai kaliva o vevine Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hi'ita'itave'avina, medema tobohiyaku o nouku o hinaku.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu'e tova sa'eyana Yesu givebutu Galili ana tobu ana taliyeya givehawala. Kaliva moya'aidi hiyo'oyo'o ada himidififina fa'ina, tobuya waka againe giyage tu yo'o avaleya himidimidi.
Ada nuwanuwa tulina tulina gahetalahobuhobu amine givehawaledi, ada yana vehawala againe gigahedi gigayo,
“Wanogali. Kaliva sa'eyana witi nafona yana faheya ginauwena be gina'iyauyaulena.
Witi nafona gi'i'iyauyaulena tu tufona edeya gibe'u au manuga hi'ela be hi'ana.
Tufona babi dabodabona againe gibe'u. Medede againe babi yamumuna keke lakahina gidadauda. Ada babi yamumuna keke vewabana fa'ina, witi nafona gimadukabu.
Ada kauwana gilaka againe witi tubuvaguna gikabuna be gibou, walamina keke gidavegilili velemo'ena fa'ina.
Kadu tufona aboda againe gibe'u ada au yogo gifaiwala be witi gilufave'alikana, keke tamo guwana.

Kadu tufona babi yamumuna againe gibe'u be gitabo yamumuna. Gitabotabo tu giboyalina ada witi guwana tufona teti (30) amine, tufona sikisiti (60) amine kadu tufona hanaledi (100) amine.” Yesu hidedemi gigahetalahobuhobu.
Kadu gigayo, “Omi kaliva watagami, au bonaku wadavenogalena.”
Ada muliya yo'o a hina tu Yesu anakaibe gimiyami tu yana yo'o tuwelo kadu tomuliya velugadiyao tufoidi Bana buye himiyami-ma yana gahetalahobuhobu fa'ina hitoliluveluvena.
Gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada yana itave'avina ana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana omi agaimiya giyauna, tu badi kaliva-kawowo keke Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya hidaluku-ma gahetalahobuhobu amine hinogalina.
Gahetalahobuhobugaga hinoganogalina, tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe amine gigayo,
Tova moya'aina bonaku hina'ita'itana
tu keke hina'itahalamaneni.
Kadu hinanoganogalina
tu keke ana nuwanuwa hinahalamaneni.
Ka'i hidahalamanena digo,
Iya agaikuya hidahagaviladi
be yadi koyona gadavenuwauluyena.”

Tu Yesu Veyao Tuwaina ana gahe giyakahini-yo au gigahedi gigayo, “Mena gahetalahobuhobu adamoya galukahihiyena-ma ana nuwanuwa ma'i wahalamanena o ka'i keke? Gavaimi be gahetalahobuhobu velugana aimo ganalukahihiyena-ma wadahalamaneni? Yami halamana givekwalu. Mena gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana fa'ina ganakivetuvetunumi.
Guwana ana to'iyauyaula ma vaita Yaubada bonana kaliva ase'asediya gida'iyauyauleni.
Kaliva tufoidi vaita witi nafona edeya gibe'u-ma amine. Yaubada bonana hinogalina tu Setani gi'ela be gava nuwanuwa tolaumamala kaliva ase'asediya gifahana-ma givaina.
Kadu meda anafaiweya kaliva tufoidi vaita nafona babi dabodabona againe gibe'u-ma amine. Yaubada bonana hinogalina be yadi wavemwamwala ase'asediya himadusena.

Atu bonana keke hidanuwa-nunauyeni walamina keke ase'asediya gidavegilili fa'ina, tova kabisonaga hi'atuvefa'ila. Ka'i tova vitana badi agaidiya ginalakayemu o ka'i yadi hawahega Yaubada againe fa'ina aulolo tagiya kaliva nimadiya hinanuhagana, au hinamadunuwayewa.

Kadu tufoidi vaita nafona abodeya gibe'u-ma amine. Yaubada bonana hinogalina tu babi ana gaitoma fa'ina hivenuwanauna, kadu tova moya'aina mani lokoloko nuwadi givaivaina ada gavadi tulina tulina hi'ita'italuvadigena fa'ina nuwadi giulu. Au mena gaitomai-dina Yaubada bonana gilufave'alikana ada guwadi keke.

Atu tufoidi vaita nafona babi yamumuna againe gibe'u-ma amine. Yaubada bonana hinogalina be ase'asediya hisena, ada au yadi dewa againe guwadi hiseseyemaunena ka'i 30 o 60 o 100 amine.” Hidede amine Yesu gigahe.
Kadu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Keke tamo hakwadi lamufa ginakabuni-yo avaeka hinagene o ka'i ivi dibune ginaseni, keke-mo'a. Au ana abasewadi againe ginasena.
Gavadi gavadi moya'aina tova adamoya keke i'ivemogatalina medema aimo tova mulina kabu'avane ginalakayemu, kadu gavadi gavadi sevasevauyana medema aimo moya'aidi hinahalamanena.
Hai kaliva taga afolegina, medema bonaku udavenogalena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Fa'ina hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ginogalina be gi'ita'itave'avina, medema againe kadu nuwanuwa moya'aina ginayauna. Atu hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa keke gida'ita'itave'avini, medema yana halamana kabi'ona Yaubada ginavaihegena be ginamiya-kawowo.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Kadu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana Yesu gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi miyami hidede amine. Kaliva sa'eyana yana faha againe nafona gi'iyauyaulena.
Bogi gidada uyadayada gimimiya tu nafona gitabotabo be gilakalaka. Atu gavaiya'amine yana faha gitabo ma keke gidahalamaneni.
Au babi tauna faha gikivetabona, nagona gikabu hinafane gitabo muliya a'a-mo'ena gisena.
A'a-mo'ena ginaboyalina againe, ilama tubu'oduna againe ginayaudi fa'ina a'a ana yaudi ana tova a gilakayemu.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi tubutubuga gavaiya'amine kanalukahihiyeni? Gava gahetalahobuhobu amine kanakivetuvetunu?

Masitada yana tabo amine kanalukahihiyena. Nafona tulina tulina adi loi againe masitada nafona kabikabi'ona. Kaliva givaina be gifahana. Babiya gidauda tu gikabu, ada nafona kabikabi'ona nonogana gikabu againe give'aihala. E, laganina lakahina gisena be manuga hi'ela aiwa'une hive'uba.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Ada au Yesu gahetalahobuhobu moya'aina hidede amine kaliva agaidiya gilumamalena. Yadi halamana gavaiya'amine medemi givehawaledi.
Yo'o agaidiya gahetalahobuhobugaga amine givehawaledi, keke gidagahe-mo'edi. Tu Tauna ana tomuliya adikaibe'uyanina buye himiyami ana toveya, gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina gikivetuvetunudi.
Tu medema aiyetai-nadi mala gisilavina Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ela be yuwa kanadamana tobu fafaline.”
Yesu wakeya gimiyami tu ana tomuliya yo'o hihegedi-yo hiyage be hiwoiyedamanena. Kadu waka velugadiyao buye hilowoga.
Hinauna tu bolimana lakahina gimadu ada lefo waka againe gibifuwafuwana be gufa gilukuluku.
Tu Yesu ma waka muline ana fila againe gi'enonuwaulu be gidauda. Badi tomuliya hiluvaguna higayo, “Tovehawala, gavana anada? Ka'i keke udanuwanuwa kabisona kana'alika?”
Au gimidi bolimana gihawatana, gigayo, “Mala auwe.” Kadu lefo gigahedi gigayo, “Au gi'atago.” Ada auhe'ama bolimana gi'atagona ada niwalova-'utuutu gisena.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye Galili ana tobu yuwa fafaline hidamana be miGadala yadi fafaliya hiyemu.
Yesu wakeya gihobu tu kaliva sa'eyana wayafunena aibo'uveya gitauya be Bana amine gi'ela.

Bana kalivai-nadi aibo'uveya give'abaga ada keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya bulava againe ginayogoni, higa-wayoga. Fa'ina bulava kainumula nonogana gidobona. E, nimana kadu agena bulava kainumula againe hiyogoyogona tova a gavaiyehi tu gififaiwala be bulava nimane gi'atudobodobona, kadu bulava agene gi'utudobodobona. Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginahawatani, au kaliva moya'aidi gifaiwalahegedi.
Bogi uyadayada aibo'uveya kadu oyeya ginunudadana gikovakova'awafatafata, kuga againe tauna gitalatalana.
Hidede amine gigahe fa'ina Yesu yafune gimidigahena gigayo, “O yafune hida kaliva unanuyabuyabuna.”
Bana kaliva gigahe-yo, Yesu gitoliyena gigayo, “Gavaimi a egana?” Bana gigayo, “Aku egana Yo'o, fa'ina ime yafune moya'aima kaliva aluvaiyena.”
Ada Yesu againe give'o'oladona gigayo, “Yafune keke unawavidi be hida fafali hinanuyabuyabuni.”
Tu yuwa oya fafaline bawe adi yo'o lakahina adiga hilelele fa'ina yafune hihawayafeyafena higayo, “Udavehimeyema be yuwa bawe agaidiya unawavima-yo analuvaiyedi.”
Au gihawahegedi ada yafune kaliva hinuyabuyabuni-yo bawe hiluvaiyedi, au bawe adi yo'o luhei tausani (2,000) amine ma awaloloya hi'otahobu, tobu againe hitowa'alika.
Tu bawe adi tolufolofologahi hi'ota be hina melala-mo'ena kadu awa'awanine mena gaitomai-dina hilukahihiyedi. Ada kaliva vevine hitauya be gavadi gilakayemu-ma hina'itana.

Ada Yesu againe hi'ela kaliva wayafunena hi'itana, medede againe gihiyoto u'una a giyamumu be ana kaleko gi'osena, boi yafune moya'aidi adi egana Yo'o hiluvaiyena-ma kalivai-nadi. Hi'ita-yo himatautave'ine.
Ada badi to'ita gavadi kaliva boi wayafunena kadu bawe agaidiya gilakayemu-ma hilukahihiyena.
Ada au hivebutu Yesu higaheya'aya'alina be higa yadi fafali ginanuyabuyabuna.
Yesu gina wakeya giyageyage tu kaliva boi wayafunena gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Iya O buye kadana.”
Atu Yesu gihawatana gigayo, “Una ya melaleya be a unuma agaidiya unalukahihi. Gavadi lakahina Kaiwabu o fa'iniya gigugaiyeni kadu gavaiya'amine gi'itanuwakabubuye ma unalukahihiyedi.”
Ada au kaliva gina be givebutu gavadi lakahina bana fa'ine Yesu gigugaiyena-ma melala teni adi fafali ana egana Dekafolisi agaidiya gilukahihiyena. Ada kaliva moya'aidi hinogalini-yo hiyaulowoga.
Yesu wakeya giyage-yo kadu tobuya gidamana ada yuwa fafaline giyemu-yo yo'o lakahi-mo'ena taliyeya himadu Bana againe hivaga'auta.

Taliyeya gimiyami tu manuwa-abavehawala ana tonagona sa'eyana gi'ela, ana egana Yailo. Ada bana tonagona Yesu gi'ita-yo agene gi'ibo'ula-mo'a gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Natuku kwamayoku kabi'ona gi'aulolo lakahina ka'i gina'alika. Uda'ela nima bana againe udasena be gidabwaina, gidamiyami hagihagina.”
Au Yesu gilowoga be tonagona buye hina. Ada yo'o lakahina hibwa'ulina hinauna tu Yesu liline hiveve'atuwahega.
Tu kwamayoku sa'eyana yo'o agaidiya ginauna, bana yana vaikohi be dayagina tova moya'aina gimadu-vagata. Tuwaina givebutu gi'u'aulolo ada ginunauwena malamala tuwelo.

Doketa moya'aidi agaidiya ginauna ada yadi lumulamula againe aulolo lakahina ginuhagana. Yana mani matatabuna badi agaidiya gihavaina. Gilulumulamula tu doketa keke adifaiweya, au yana aulolo gitubuga-mo'a.
Yesu valeyana ahe ginogalina fa'ina yo'o hinafadiya Bana wamuline gi'ela be ana kaleko bwatana gikibwa'ena.
Fa'ina nuwahinagene gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i ana kalekogaga ganakibwa'ena, au ganayamumu.”
Gikibwa'eni-yo auhe'ama dayagina gi'agolohina, ada gava wowone gi'ayaunena yana aulolo a gihavaina.
Ada ana tomuliya higahena higayo, “Yo'o hiveve'atuwahega-ma u'itadi. Gavadi-yo ugahe ugayo, Hakwa'adi aku kaleko gisibutuni?”
Tu Yesu aimo gi'ita'italele be hakwa'adi gikibwa'eni-ma gina'itana.
Au kwamayoku gavadi bana againe gilakayemu-ma gihalamaneni-yo yana wamatauta yana wavetatava gi'ela, Bana agene gi'ibo'ula-mo'a be tauna kahihina matatabuna gilukahihiyena.
Gilukahihi gihavaina Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Natuku, uvetumaganeku fa'ina ubwaina. Ya wanuwayamumu unana ya aulolo gihavai-mo'ena.”
Yesu aimo gilulukahihi tu kaliva tufoidi Yailo yana manuweya hitauya-ma hiyemu be higahena higayo, “Natu kwamayoku yawaina gihavaina. Au keke Tovehawala unaluve'avaleni-yo una'aliye-kawowoni.”
Yesu bonadi keke gidavenogaleni, au manuwa-abavehawala ana tonagona againe gigahe gigayo, “Keke unamatauta, au unavetumaganeku.”
Ada kaliva moya'aidi gihawatadi be keke hinabwa'ulini. Fita ada Yemesa wataina Yoni adi'itotogaga ginauwedi.
Bana manuwa-abavehawala ana tonagona yana manuweya hiyemu-yo Yesu alika ana butubutu ginogalina, tagiya ve'alulaukuhi.
Au manuweya giluku gigahedi gigayo, “Gavai'ona-yo alika ana butubutu ganogalini? Gavadi-yo wave'alulaukuhi? Kwamana keke gida'alika, au gi'enonuwaulu.”
Ada badi hihawavelaigena. Atu Yesu moya'aidi giwavidi be melaleya hihobu au kwamana tamana hinana kadu tomuliya adi'itoto Bana buye hi'ela-ma vetawana kwamana gidauda-ma againe gilukuwedi.
Nimana gi'abina ada gigahena gigayo, “Talida kumi.” Mena gahe ana kaivila bonadeya ma “Natuku, Iya gagahe umidi.”
Ada auhe'ama kwamana kwamayoku gimidi ginudadana. Ana malamala ma tuwelo. Hi'ita-yo ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana.
Atu Yesu gihawatadi gigayo, “Keke gaveyao wanavenuwa'atadi, au gahawatami.” Kadu gigayo, “Tamo a'a kwamana wavele be gi'ani.”
Yesu Yailo yana fafali gihege tu gina Tauna yana melaleya. Ada ana tomuliya hivebwa'uliyena.

Ada sabati againe givebutu manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe givehawala. Ada tufoidi moya'aidi yana vehawala hinogalini-yo hiyaulowoga higayo, “Hida hima kaliva-kawowo nonogana givehavehawala. Hida nuwahuya givaina-ma gavana ana inuba? Hai faiwala givaini-yo abaveyaulowoga gififaisewani?

Ide bana kalivai-nadi inubana kahalamanena. Bana Meli natudi, manuwa ana to'aiyogona, Yemesa Yosese Yudasi Saimoni tawadi. Kadu nouneyao buye kamimiyami.” Au hidedemi miNasaledi yadi wa'ago'uga buye hive'agahegahe tu hikilowena.
Ada Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hive'amohimohinena tu tauna yana melala tauna yana yo'o tauna ana unuma kalivai-dina keke hidave'amohimohineni.”
Ada medede againe keke tamo aituha fifiwalana anafaiweya gidafaisewani. Au to'aulolo tufoidiga agaidiya nimana gisena be gisiveyawadi.
Ada yana yo'o yadi vetumagana keke fa'ina, giyaulowoga. Ada au melala tulina tulina agaidiya ginunuwaliliuga tu givehavehawala.
Ageyafayafa wana'osena kadu ami aikeva sa'eyanaga wana'osena.
Hai tonimanuwa yana manuweya ginalukuwemi, medede againe wanamiyami tu wanalowoga-havagi ana toveya.

Ka'i melala sa'eyana againe wanayemu tu kaliva keke hinavetobohiyanemi ada yami laumamala keke hinavenogaleni digo, mena melalai-nadi wanahegena againe fwayafwaya agemiya wanavagahegehegena, higa Yaubada yana ila'a badi agaidiya ana iya'iyaya.” Hidedemi Yesu ana tomuliya givenuwa'atadi.
Ada au hilowoga be hina kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya hilulumamala be higa yadi dewa koyona hinavenikohiyeni-yo Yaubada againe hinahagaviladi.
Yafune moya'aidi hiwavidi ada to'aulolo moya'aidi hibunamidi be higa hisiveyawadi.
Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Bana hima to'awatalatalaina tuwaina ana egana Elaiya.” Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Hida hima Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina badi to'awatalatalaina tuwaidiyao amine.”
Atu Helodi yadi ve'agahegahe ginogalina againe, gigahe gigayo, “Bana au velemodi Yoni Tobafitaiso. Iya gavehimeya be u'una hinikehegena-ma kalivai-nadi gimididi-havagi.”

Helodi hidedemi gigahe fa'ina boi tobohiyana vavinena adi egana Helodiyasi givaidi ada bana Yoni Helodi gidakeyena gigayo, “Tobohiya Filifi vavinena uluhabuyedi fa'ina, nagi ana vehimeya keke uda'itave'avini.” Hidedemi Yoni gigahe fa'ina Helodi yana kaliva gi'iveninisedi be Yoni hikive'avina ada hiyogona be deliya hisena.

Badi Helodiyasi yadi nuwakoyo Yoni againe hilulu'uyena ada higahegahe vaita kaliva hinaluve'alikana tu higa-wayoga, fa'ina Helodi Yoni give'amohimohinena. Bana Yoni kaliva mahamahalina yana dewa yegayegana ma gihalamanena fa'ina, gilugolegolena. Nuwanuwana Yoni yana laumamala ginanogalina tu ana nogala againe nuwana givegafo'uya'uya.

Helodiyasi himiyami himiyami tu yadi tova hagihagina gilakayemu. Helodi yana tubuga ana toveya yana a'a lakahina gitagova be yana yo'o buye hi'a. Ana toveluga kikaiwabudiyao kadu yana togiyomatana kadu Galili ana kaliva lakahidiyao giyowanidi be hi'ela.

Hivemwavemwamwala tu Helodiyasi natudi kwamayoku giluku yo'o matadiya givagavaga. Helodi ana wakawaka buye himatamatawabuwabu tu nuwadi gikiveyamumu-mo'ena. Au kini kwamayoku gigahena gigayo, “Gavadi gavadi fa'ina unave'o'ola, medema ganavele.”
Kadu kwamayoku againe giwonadabadaba gigayo, “Yaubada matane gagahe velemo'ena be gavadi gavadi fa'ina unave'o'ola au yaku abavehimeya hafuna amine ganavele.”
Ada ulaulatanina gihobu be gina hinana agaidiya gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Gavadi fa'ina ganave'o'ola?” Badi higayo, “Yoni Tobafitaiso u'una ana ainike fa'ina.”
Ada auhe'ama gimaduna Helodi againe giluku give'o'olena gigayo, “Tova adamoya udavehimeya be Yoni Tobafitaiso u'una hinanikehegeni tu nau'a againe hina'aliyena be bana ali'alikana gana'itana.”
Kini Helodi kwamayoku yana ve'o'ola ginogalini-yo nuwana gikabubu-mo'a tu ana wakawaka moya'aidi matadiya giwonadabadaba fa'ina, keke nuwanuwana yana wonadabadaba bana againe ginayawelini.

Au yana tolugaviya sa'eyana gimadu'iveninisena be higa Yoni u'una ginanikena be gina'aliyena. Au gina deliya Yoni u'una ginikena ada nau'a againe gi'aliyena be ulaulatanina givelena. Ada ulaulatanina gina hinana giveledi.
Ada au Yoni ana tomuliya valeyana hinogalini-yo hi'ela wowona hivaina be hinauwena tomohuyehuyeya hihuyana.
Ada kaliva nau ela keke yawaidi fa'ina, Yesu ana tomuliya buye keke adifaiweya hinaveyawai-yo hina'a. Hidema fa'ina Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Ide'eyaogaga wa'ela be kana melalagaga againe kanaveyawai.”
Au wakeya hiyage melalagaga againe hina adikaibe himiyami.
Tu tufoidi moya'aidi yadina hi'itana-ma hi'itayakahidi, ada melala moya'aina agaidiya hitauya agediya himaduna be Yesu ana tomuliya buye magigidi himadubodana.
Yesu wakeya gihobu ada yo'o lakahina gi'itadi-yo gi'itanuwakabubuyedi, fa'ina yadi miyami ana ita'ita vaita sifi adi to'itave'avina keke ma amine. Au givebutu gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina gikivetuvetunu.
Yo'o una'atuhegedi be melala eda'ufoya kadu awa'awanidi agaidiya hinana adiga hinakimonena.”

Tu Bana gigayo, “Auwe, omi wanave'adi.” Badi higayo, “Hima yo'o lakahina. Hai mani anavaini-yo anana a'a anakimoneni adifata amine? Fa'ina a'a fatana vaita kaliva sa'eyana yana faisewa vaikohi eita fatana amine.”
Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “A'a gavaiyehi omi agaimiya? Wana wa'ita.” Ada hina hi'itana againe Yesu hivenuwa'atana higayo, “Beledi kabi'odi faifi kadu igana luhei.”
Hidede amine hivenuwa'ata-yo Yesu gigahedi be yo'o hinavehimeyedi be higa unuma unuma amine isisi'u againe hinavetoga.
Au unuma unuma hanaledi o ka'i fifiti amine hivetoga.

Hivetoga-yo a'a faifi kadu igana luhei givaidi digo lobameya gi'italele Tamana againe givesiule, au a'a gikihinehineni-yo ana tomuliya giveledi be higa badi yo'o agaidiya hinafolakena. Kadu igana luhei gikihinehinena be moya'aidi agaidiya hifolakena.
Ada au moya'aidi hi'a be hi'ahiyauwa.
Ada tomuliya hina a'a kadu igana ana tufo kwadakwada hikwakwana againe feyawa tuwelo hivemagadi.
Badi kaliva a'ai-nadi hi'a-ma adi kilagalaga au 5,000.

Tu tomuliya kwadakwada hikwakwana gihavaina, auhe'ama Yesu gigahedi be wakeya hinayage wai hinanagona be yuwa fafaline melala ana egana Bedasaida againe hinamididamana tu Bana Tauna ginamiya be yo'o gina'atuhegedi.
Ada ahe gilukafoiyedi-yo oyeya gilaka be Tamana againe ginave'o'ola.
Ada au mala gibogi-mo'a tu badi tomuliya wakeya wese gawaneya hinauna tu Bana'e ma anakaibe avaleya gimiyami.

Bolimana lakahina gimadu be waka giluluveyeveyewana fa'ina tomuliya hiwoifaiwala-wayoga ma Yesu gi'itadi. Ada mala kabisona ginalauna tu Yesu badi agaidiya gi'ela'ela, ni'u getane ginunudadana tu au ginanu'atuvagavaga.
Tu Yesu ni'u getane ginunudadana ma hi'ita-yo hitatawayana hivaitana balauma hida'itani.
Fa'ina tomuliya moya'aidi hi'itana be himatautave'ine. Auhe'ama gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'asevatu. Hima Iya ga'ela'ela, keke wanamatauta.”
Tu tobuya hidamana'ela-yo fafali ana egana Genesaleda againe hihobu waka hiluhifona.

Wakeya hidahobu ma kaliva Yesu hi'itayakahina ada medema awa'awana melalina moya'aina agaidiya himaduna, hivebutu to'aulolo adi wa'ivi hiwahidi ada hai Yesu gimiyami valeyana hinogalina, medede againe hi'aliyedi.

Ada au hai Yesu gi'ela'ela ka'i melala kabi'ona o lakahina o ka'i awa'awanine, medede againe to'aulolo hi'aliyedi be melala hinafane hisedi ada hihawayafeyafena be higa to'aulolo ginahawahegedi be ana kaleko bwatanaga hinakibwa'ena. Ada gaveyao moya'aidi hikibwa'ena, medema hiyamumu.
Tova sa'eyana tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Yelusalema againe hitauya-ma Yesu againe hivaga'auta.
Himiyami tu ana tomuliya tufoidi hi'itadi adiga hi'au'a wanimabwanenedi, higa nimadi keke hidakolani Falisi yadi tafalolo-vehimeya amine.
Fa'ina badi Falisi kadu miYuda moya'aidi bwanenediyao yadi dewa himulimuliyena. Keke hidamidi'a tu nagona nimadi hikolana tafalolo-vehimeya amine.

Ka'i abakimokimone amine hinatauya keke hinamidi'a tu nagona adi kivebuta hinafaisewana. Ada kadu dewa tuwaina moya'aina hi'ita'itave'avina, higa gowa aba'aihiwaga nau'a kainumula ana ikolakola tafalolo-vehimeya amine.
Au Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Yesu hitoliyena higayo, “Gavadi-yo a tomuliya bwanenedeyao yadi dewa amine keke hidahuluhuluva? Fa'ina wanimabwanenedi hi'au'a.”
Hida yo'o miIsileli kebuladiya hive'amohimohineku
tu ase'asedi Iya agaikuya keke hidahawahegeni.
Iya agaikuya hihawadavadava-kawowo.
Yadi vehawala ma taudiyao yadi vehimeya hikilakahina,
ada hivewagana Iya Yaubada yaku vehimeya.”
Hidedemi Yaubada Aiseya awane gigahe tu Yesu Aiseya yana gahe giyakahina.
Kadu gigayo, “Omi Yaubada yana vehimeya wadibudibutoyogena tu kaliva yadi dewa tuwaina againe wamiyave'avina.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu'e gigayo, “Wavaitana omi nuwahuyahuyamiyao be'ena taumiyao yami dewa tuwaina wa'ita'itave'avina ada au Yaubada yana vehimeya wasehegena.
Yaubada bana Mosese awane givehimeyeda gigayo, Tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi. Kadu vehimeya sa'eyana ma, Gava kaliva tamana o ka'i hinana gina'ihawadamanedi, medema anafaiweya gida'alika.

Tu omi'iyao ma wagahe vaita ka'i kaliva tamana o hinana ginagahedi ginagayo, Gavadi gavadi againe vaita gadavelugami, medema Yaubada againe gahawahegena. Ka'i hidede amine ginagahe digo, omi wahawatana be keke tamo lokoloko, a'a o ka'i gava'adi againe tamana hinana ginavelugadi. Au mena yami hawata fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya tamamiyao o hinamiyao adi ve'amohimohina fa'ina wayawelina be higa taumiyao yami vehawala wanakilakahina. Kadu kaliva moya'aidi hidede amine wahawaveleveledi. Mena yami vehawala sa'eyana gayakahina tu vehawala moya'aina againe meda anafaiweya Yaubada yana vehimeya wayawelina-ma keke gadayakahini.”
Tu Yesu yo'o gikova-havagiledi be Bana liline hi'ela ada gigahedi gigayo, “Moya'aimi bonaku wananogalina be wanahalamanena.
Keke gavadi kabu'avane gidadauda-ma kaliva awane ginaluku-yo Yaubada matane ginakivekoyoni. Atu gavadi kaliva hinagene gidadauda tu kabu'avane ginayemu, medema Yaubada matane ginakivekoyona. [
Hai kaliva taga afolegina, medema bonaku udavenogalena.]”
Hidede amine Yesu gigahe tu yo'o gihegedi be giluku manuweya, au ana tomuliya yana gahetalahobuhobu fa'ina hitoliluveluvena.

Ada gigahedi gigayo, “A! Omi kadu tagami keke gida'afoleni. Wanogali! Gavadi kabu'avane gidadauda-ma kaliva awane ginaluku, medema keke Yaubada matane ginakivekoyoni, fa'ina keke ase'asene gidaluku, au kamone gihobu be wala'aiya gihegena.” Mena yana gahe againe Yesu givehawaleda keke tamo a'a hawahawatana, au a'a moya'aina hagihagina.
Kadu gigayo, “Gavadi gavadi kaliva againe hiyemuyemu, medema gaitomai-dina Yaubada matane hikivekoyona.

Fa'ina gavadi kaliva nuwahinagene gidadauda, higa gavadi gavadi koyona ase'asene ginuwenuwedi, medema yana dewa againe giseyemaunedi, nuwanuwa koyona, udo tulina tulina, kai'afu luve'alika kelele italuvadiga, dewa koyo-mo'ena, fwaya vehimeya ana ivehawavelaiga, ga'uma'uma veyaina selakalaka, dewa kwavakwavana.
Mena dewai-dina koyodi moya'aidi kaliva nuwahinagene hidadauda-yo yana dewa againe giseyemaunedi be Yaubada matane hikivekoyona.” Hidedemi Yesu gikivetunudi.

Tu Yesu mena melalai-nadi gihegena ana tomuliya buye hina Taiya Saidoni adi fafali againe. Manuwa sa'eyana againe giluku, ada Bana medede againe gimiyami-ma keke nuwanuwana tamo hakwadi ginahalamaneni, tu keke anafaiweya sevasevauyana ginamiyami.
Au kwamayoku sa'eyadi himiyami natudi kwamayoku kabi'ona yafune giluvaiyena, ada Yesu valeyana hinogalini-yo Bana againe himaduna agene hi'ibo'ula-mo'a.
Badi kwamayoku ma hawahawala keke vinemiYuda, melala ana egana Finisiya, Siliya ana fafali againe hitubuga. Ada Yesu hihawayafeyafena be yafune natudi giluvaiyena-ma ginawavina.

Bana gigahedi gigayo, “MiYuda badi vaita we'owe'o amine ganamidive'adi, fa'ina ka'i we'owe'o adiga ganavaina be yo'o tulidiyao badi vaita galu'eta amine ganahegeve'abidi digo, medema keke gidalubodani.”
Badi higayo, “Ika Kauveya, ugahe velemo'ena. Atu galu'eta tolama dibune we'owe'o adiga kwadakwadana gibe'ube'u-ma hi'au'ana.”
Ada au hina yadi manuweya ada kwamana iviya gidauda-ma hinuhagana tu yafune a gina.
Tu Yesu Taiya ana fafali gihegena ada gina Saidoni hinafane ginauna tu melala teni adi egana Dekafolisi amidiya ginuwaliliuga be Galili ana tobuya gihobu.
Medede againe kaliva sa'eyana Bana againe hi'aliyena tagana abodana kadu meyana daluna. Ada hihawayafeyafena be nimana bana againe ginasena.

Au Yesu kaliva gisi'aliyeni tu yo'o himiyavehaila, ada nimalagolagona kaliva tagane gisena, kadu gikiwala be kaliva meyana gikibwa'ena digo lobameya gi'italele au giyawai'ohi lakahina tu gigahena gigayo, “Efafada.” Ana kaivila bonadeya ma “Gi'ayau.”
Gigahe-yo auhe'ama kaliva tagana gi'afolena, meyana gi'ayagilina ada gilukahihi yamumuna.
Au Yesu yo'o gihawatadi be keke tamo hakwadi againe hinalukahihiyeni. Gihawatadi a gavaiyehi tu badi tova moya'aina hilulukahihiyena.
Ada au hiyaulowogahega-mo'a higayo, “Gaitoma moya'aina gififaisewana yamumuna. Kaliva tagadi abodana meyadi daluna nonogana anafaiweya gikiveyamumudi.”

Kadu tova sa'eyana yo'o lakahina hivaga'auta be Yesu yana vehawala hinanogalina. Himiyami tu adiga gihavaina fa'ina, Yesu ana tomuliya giyowanidi be hi'ela yana hinekalikali yo'o agaidiya giyemaunena gigayo, “Hida kaliva vevine hagihagidiyao. Aiyeta tohiye badi Iya buye amimiyami tu adamoya adiga keke. Ada ka'i mafu gilaudi tu gana'atuhegedi be hinana yadi melaleya, au edeya matadi ginaluwaliwaliliuga be hinabe'u, fa'ina tufoidi lauveya hi'ela.”
Ana tomuliya higayo, “Melalagaga againe kamimiyami. Ha'againe a'a kanavaini-yo hida yo'o lakahidi kanave'adi?”
Yesu gigayo, “A'a gavaiyehi omi agaimiya gidadauda?” Badi higayo, “We'a beledi kabi'odi seveni.”

Higahe-yo yo'o givenuwa'atadi be babiya hinavetoga. Hivetoga tu Yesu a'a seveni givaidi digo Tamana againe givesiule gikihinehinedi, au ana tomuliya giveledi be yo'o agaidiya hinafolakena. Ada au hifolakena.
Kadu igana kabi'odi tufoidi badi agaidiya gidauda. Ada Yesu givaidi be kadu Tamana againe givesiule-yo ana tomuliya givehimeyedi be yo'o agaidiya hinafolakena.
Au badi hi'a be hi'ahiyauwa. Ada tomuliya hive'adi tu adi tufo kwadakwadana feyawa seveni hivemagana.
Ada badi kaliva hi'a-ma adi kilagalaga 4,000. Ada Yesu gi'atuhegedi-yo ana tomuliya buye wakeya hiyage be hina Dalimanuda ana fafali againe.

Ada Yesu nuwahinagene giyawai'ohi tu gigahe gigayo, “Gavadi-yo omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma nimaku ana iya'iyaya waleleleni? Gagahe velemo'ena keke tamo iya'iyaya ganafaisewani-yo higa medede againe inubaku wanahalamaneni.”
Ada hidedemi gigahedi-yo gihegedi be kadu ana tomuliya buye wakeya hiyage-havagi, hivebutu yuwa fafaline hidamana.
Hiyage tu ana tomuliya nuwadi giulu be keke tamo a'a hidanauweni, au beledi kabi'ona sa'eyanaga wakeya gidauda.
Au Yesu givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be Falisi kadu Helodi yana yo'o kalivadi yadi isi keke nuwami ginavaini.”
Ada badi tomuliya hivebutu buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Keke tamo a'a agaideya fa'ina hidedemi gigahe.”
Omi wamatami tu keke wada'itahalamaneni. Omi watagami tu keke wadanogalini. Vaita yo'o-hala luhei adi ve'a nuwami gida'afoleni.
A'a faifi kaliva faifi tausani fa'idiya gakihinehinena ana toveya, adi tufo wakwakwa feyawa gavaiyehi?” Badi higayo, “Feyawa tuwelo.”
Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo halamana aimo keke wadavaini? 5,000 o 4,000 gave'adi amine, omi kadu akufaiweya ganave'ami.”
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye Bedasaida againe hiyemu tu kaliva tufoidi tomatakoyo sa'eyana Yesu againe hi'aliyena ada hihawayafeyafena be ginakibwa'ena.
Au Yesu tomatakoyo nimane gi'abina be ginauwena melala kwaune. Kaliva matane gikiwala ada nimana bana againe giseni-yo gitoliyena gigayo, “Ka'i mene tamo gavadi afaiweya una'itana?”
Kaliva gi'italele gigayo, “Ehe, kaliva ga'itadi tu adi ita vaita ai hidanunaudadana.”
Kadu Yesu nimana kaliva matane gise-havagilena ada kaliva gi'itadona, ada au giyamumu be gaitoma moya'aina gi'ita-hagihagiyena.
Ada Yesu gi'atuhegena gigayo, “Unana ya manuweya. Keke Bedasaida melaleya unaluku.”
Tu Yesu gilowoga be Sisaliya-Filifai melalina amine ana tomuliya buye hina. Edeya hinauna tu gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Iya inubaku fa'ina kaliva gavaimi higahe? Iya vaita hakwa'adi?”

Ada badi higayo, “Tufoidi higahe vaita O Yoni Tobafitaiso. Kadu tufoidi higahe vaita O Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Elaiya. Kadu tufoidi higahe vaita O Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina kadu sa'eyana.”
Fita gigahena gigayo, “O'eni Yaubada yana Tovegida higa Keliso.”
Au gihawatadi be Bana inubana fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi againe hina'awatalatalaina.

Medema tovai-nadi Yesu givebutu ana tomuliya givehawaledi gigayo, “Iya Tohobu'ela aku vehimeya gavaina, higa aulolo moya'aina kaliva nimadiya gananuhagana. Badi kaliva lakahidiyao kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala hinakiloweku. Au kaliva hinaluve'alikaku tu aiyeta tohiye kanahegeni-yo au ganamididi-havagi.”

Ada mena yana aulolo yana alika fa'ina gigahemata'atadi. Au Fita gisi'aliyeni-yo givebutu gidakeyena tu Yesu gihagavilana ana tomuliya gi'itadi tu Fita gidakeyena gigayo, “Setani o una kwaukuya. Mena ya nuwanuwa ulukahihiyena-ma keke Yaubada yana nuwanuwa. Au ya nuwanuwa tomiyababi yadi nuwanuwa amine.” Hidedemi Yesu Fita gidakeyena.

Ada yo'oyo'o kadu ana tomuliya buye giyowanidi be Bana againe hi'ela gigahedi gigayo, “Gava kaliva nuwanuwana tavagiku ginamafuna, medema gilubodana be tauna yana nuwanuwa gidavenuwauluyena ada Iya agaikuya gidavetomuliya-yo gidahawahegena be vita tulina tulina gidanuhagana.

Ada gava kaliva keke nuwanuwana Iya agaikuya ginahawahegeni tu taunaga fa'ine tova moya'aina ginuwanuwa, medema yawaina ginanuhegena. Atu gava kaliva Iya givetumaganeku be yaku Venuwa'ata Yamumuna gilumamalena fa'ina yawaina ginanuhegena, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.
Ka'i kaliva babi ana lokoloko matatabuna ginavai-'owona tu tauna alu'aluwana yana miya hagihagina ginanuhegena digo, keke tamo gavadi hagihagina ginanuhagani.
Ka'i alu'aluwana yana miya hagihagina ginanuhegena digo, keke tamo laufata anafaiweya ginaseni-yo yawaina kadu ginanuhagani.

Kaliva vevine tova adamoya babiya hitubuyemu-ma kaliva koyodi, keke Yaubada againe hidamiyave'avina. Hai kaliva o yaku kaliva be bonaku uvetumaganena ma keke nuwanuwa badi yo'o matadiya unahawavemogataleni yadi hawavelaiga umatausena fa'ina, medema fa'iniya aimo tova mulina Iya keke ganagahe vaita o yaku kaliva. E, Iya Tohobu'ela Kamaku yana wakikaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata mahamahalidiyao buye anayewa'ela ana toveya, o fa'iniya keke ganagahe vaita o yaku kaliva.” Hidemi Yesu yo'o kadu ana tomuliya gigahedi.
Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena, tufoimi hidedei wamidimidi-ma aimo keke alika wananuhagani tu nagona Yaubada givebutu yana yo'o ase'asediya yana wafaiwala givehivehimeya ma wana'itana.”
Au ana kaleko give'akinamanamalena kadu gikwaya-mo'ena, vaita keke tamo hakwadi babiya gimimiyami-ma anafaiweya gidakolani.
Ada Yaubada yana kaliva tuwai-mo'ena himiyami-ma adi egana Mosese kadu Elaiya badi matadiya hihobu'ela Yesu buye hilulukahihi.
Ada Fita Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Yaku Tovehawala, ime hidedei amimiyami ma gilubodana. Vada tohiye anayogodi, sa'eyana O fa'iniya, sa'eyana Mosese fa'ine kadu sa'eyana Elaiya fa'ine.”
Hidede amine gigahe fa'ina vaita gavaimi ginagahe keke gidahalamaneni fa'ina bana'e tobohiyaneyao buye himatautave'ine.
Ada auhe'ama hi'italele ada keke tamo hakwadi hida'itani. Au Mosese Elaiya hina tu Yesu anakaibe badi buye himiyami.

Ada oyeya hitauya hihobuhobu'ela tu Yesu gihawatadi gigayo, “Tova adamoya yami ita fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi againe wanahawavemogatala. Aimo Yaubada Iya Tohobu'ela alikeya ginasivemididiku againe, au wanahawavemogatalena.”
Yadi ita keke tamo hakwadi againe hidalukahihiyeni tu taudiyaogaga buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Alikeya ginamididi-havagi ma gavaimi ana nuwanuwa?”
Ada Yesu hitoliyena higayo, “Gahe anogalina higa vaita Elaiya ginamidilakayemu tu muliya Yaubada yana Tovegida ginayemu. Gavana fa'ina Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala hidede amine higahegahe?”

Ada Iya gagahemi, bana kaliva vaita Elaiya amine ahe gilakayemu ada kaliva gavaimi hinuwanuwa amine hikivekoyona, Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina tuwai-mo'ena Elaiya fa'ine gigahe amine.” Hidedemi Yesu gikivetuvetunudi.

Tu Yesu ana tomuliya adi'itoto buye oyeya hihobu tomuliya velugadiyao agaidiya hihobu'ela-yo yo'o lakahina himidififidi-ma hi'itadi, kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala buye hivekwavekwageya-ma hi'itadi.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi Yesu hi'ita-yo hiyaulowoga-mo'a, ada Bana againe himadu be hinalusiuleyena.
Ada Yesu ana tomuliya gitoliyedi gigayo, “Gavadi fa'ina wavekwageyedi?”
Ada kaliva sa'eyana yo'o agaidiya gigahena gigayo, “Tovehawala, natuku kaliva O againiya ga'aliyena fa'ina yafune giluvaiyeni-yo agona gisebodana.

Yafune gi'abi'abina ana toveya, babiya gibaibaina ada awabugo gi'ala'ala-hiwahiwagena gadona giveve'atalaweno luluna gitoyotoyoga. Ada a tomuliyamomo gave'o'oledi be yafune hinawavidi tu keke adifaiweya.”

Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Omi kaliva tova adamoya watubuyemu-ma keke ma'ita wadavetumaganeku. Malamala gavaiyehi omi buye kanamiyami tu yami vetumagana ginayemu? Malamala gavaiyehi keke wanavetumaganeku tu gana'atuvefa'ilemi? Au kwamana wa'aliye we'ai.”
Au kwamana Bana againe hi'aliyena. Ada yafune Yesu gi'ita-yo auhe'ama kwamana gikivefavefanina. Au babiya gibe'u gi'eno'eno-bwatabwatavilani tu awabugo giwahitoyogena.
Ada Yesu kwamana tamana gitoliyena gigayo, “Gava tova givebutu hidede amine gihuluhuluva?” Bana gigayo, “Tuwaina kabi'one givebutu.
Ada tova moya'aina yafune aiya o ka'i gufeya givebevebe'una be ginaluve'alikana. Atu ka'i afaiweya digo, unahinekalikaliyema be unavelugama.”

Yesu yo'o hi'abiyemuyemu-ma gi'itadi againe yafune gidakeyena gigayo, “O yafune kwamana tagana u'ive'abodana agona usebodana-ma gavehimeye be kwamana unanuyabuyabuna. Keke-mo'a unaluvaiye-havagileni.”
Gigahe-yo yafune gitatawayana kwamana gikivefavefanidoneni tu ginuyabuyabuna. Ada kwamana ana bela vaita alika amine fa'ina moya'aidi higayo, “Kwamana a gi'alika.”
Atu Yesu nimane gisilakahina be gimidi.
Ada muliya Yesu manuweya giluku-yo ana tomuliya adikaibe'uyanina Bana buye himiyami tu hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Gavana fa'ina ime keke amafaiweya wada yafune-nadi adawavini?”

Yesu gigayo, “Mena yafune adi loi yadi faiwala lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina keke amifaiweya wanawavi-kawowodi. Au wanave'o'ola-fa'ila kadu au ana tova againe wanamiyami be Yaubada wanave'o'olena amine, amifaiweya wanawavidi.” Au hidede amine Yesu gikivetuvetunudi.
Medema melalai-nadi hihege tu Galili ana fafali hinafane hinauna, ada Yesu keke nuwanuwana hai gimiyami-ma kaliva hinahalamaneni.

Keke nuwanuwana hinahalamaneni fa'ina ana tomuliya givehavehawaledi gigayo, “Iya Tohobu'ela makewa kaliva nimadiya hinahegenauweku be hinaluve'alikaku. Atu aiyeta anaveto againe Yaubada alikeya ginakivemididiku.”
Hidede amine Yesu gigahe tu ana tomuliya mena yana gahe ana nuwanuwa hifaniyena, ada himatauta fa'ina keke hidave'o'ola be higa ginakivetuvetunudi.
Hinauna tu Kafeneumi againe hiyemu. Ada manuweya hiluku-yo Yesu ana tomuliya gitoliyedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo edeya buye wavekwavekwageya?”
Tu badi hive'amata. Fa'ina edeya hinauna tu hakwadi badi agaidiya kaiwabu againe wai ginago-mo'ena ma buye hivekwavekwageyena.
Atu Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Keke wanahawatani, fa'ina hai kaliva aituha fifiwalana aku eganeya gifaisewana, medema aimo keke anafaiweya ginamadu-hawavekoyoyeku.
Au gava kaliva keke ada nibaina, medema tobohiyada.
Gagahe velemo'ena gava kaliva omi Iya Keliso yaku kaliva fa'ina ginanuwakabubuyemi be gufa-abayuyu ginavelemi, medema wona velemona ana laufata ginavaina.

Tu ka'i kaliva sa'eyana vaita kwamana amine givetumaganeku-ma dewa koyona againe wanavebe'una, au vita lakahina wananuhagana. Ka'i kuga vita-mo'ena odomiya hinaluhifona be lehageya hinahegehobuyemi-yo wana'alika, medema vitana. Atu ka'i matahiwadi Yaubada againe ginanuhagana, au medema vita-mo'ena.

Ka'i nima koyona againe ginavebe'u, au unanikehegena. Ka'i nima fafalatamo unamiyami tu lobameya unaluku, au medema vita kabi'ona. Atu nima luhei unamiyami tu abaga koyona againe unaluku, au medema vita lakahi-mo'ena. Kadu ka'i age koyona againe ginavebe'u, au unanikehegena. Ka'i age fafalatamo unamiyami tu lobameya unaluku, au medema vita kabi'ona. Atu age luhei unamiyami tu abaga koyona againe unaluku, au medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.

Ka'i mata koyona againe ginavebe'u, au unamwamwalina. Ka'i mata fafalatamo unamiyami tu Yaubada yana yo'o lobameya unaluku, au medema vita kabi'ona. Atu mata luhei unamiyami tu abaga koyona againe unaluku, au medema vita lakahi-mo'ena.
Abaga koyona againe nawabuluma tokoyona wowodi hina'au'ana tova inaga inaga, ada ai gi'alata-vagata fa'ina yadi aulolo keke ginahavaini.
Aulolo tulina tulina vaita ai ala'alata amine omi kaliva moya'aimi gina'alahi-luvaluvami be yami dewa vaita lehaga yamumuna amine giludigadigaga o ka'i keke ma ginaseyemaunena.
Tu Yesu Kafeneumi gihege tu Yudiya ana fafaliya gina be yuwa Yolidani fafaline gidamana, ada kaliva Bana againe kadu hiyo'oyo'o. Ada yana dewa tova moya'aina amine kadu givehavehawaledi.

Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi tufoidi Bana againe hi'ela. Nuwanuwadi hinavebauna fa'ina hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Gavaimi unuwanuwa? Ka'i kaliva nuwanuwana vavinena ginakilowena, yada buki-vehimeya gihawahegena o ka'i keke?”
Yesu gigayo, “Tuwai-mo'ena Mosese gavaimi givehimeyemi?”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Omi tagami kuluna fa'ina Mosese mena vehimeya vevine adi kilowa fa'ina givelemi.
Atu boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada babi gimidibubuna ana toveya, kaliva adi aibubuna fa'ina kahawana higa Yaubada kaliva gimidibubuna tu kwamayoku kaliva lulune gibubuna.
Kadu gigahe gigayo,
Kwamayoku lulune gabubuna fa'ina, bana kaliva ma tamana hinana ginahegedi tu ginavemanuwa-damana be vavinena againe ginamiyave'avina ada adi'iselu hinavewowotamo'ai.
Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe fa'ina, boi tulina tulina himiyami tu adamoya hivesa'eya.
Ada au ka'i Yaubada kaliva kwamayoku give'atutamo'aidi amine o keke tamo hakwadi ginavemiyavehailidi.” Hidede amine Yesu Falisi bonadi gifatana.
Muliya Yesu ana tomuliya buye manuweya himiyami tu vevine adi kilowa fa'ina kadu hitoliluveluvena.
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hai kaliva vavinena ginakilowedi-yo kwamayoku velugadi ginanagidi, medema ana egana to'udo fa'ina vavinena givagavekoyodi.
Kadu meda anafaiweya hai kwamayoku moganedi hinaviholiliyeni-yo mali kaliva hinanagina, medema adi egana to'udo.”
Himiyami tu we'owe'o Yesu againe hi'ali'aliyedi be ginakibwa'edi higa ginagahenuwakabubuyedi, atu ana tomuliya to'aliya hidakeyedi.

Yesu ginogalidi-yo ginuwakoyo gigahedi gigayo, “We'owe'o keke wanahawatadi, au Iya agaikuya hina'ela fa'ina gaveyao vaita we'owe'o keke yadi wakikaiwabu amine, medema Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.

Gagahe velemo'ena gava kaliva Yaubada matane keke ginanuwahobu be kwamana kabi'ona amine ginanuwanuwa, medema keke Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaluku-yo be yana itave'avina againe ginamiyami, keke-mo'a.”
Ada au we'owe'o sa'eyana sa'eyana gifewadi be giwahidi, nimana badi agaidiya gisena au gigahe gigayo, “Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.”
Tu Yesu yanana Yelusalema againe gidalowoga ma kaliva sa'eyana Bana againe gimadu gi'ibo'ula-mo'a be gitoliyena gigayo, “Tovehawala yamumu, gavaimi ganadewa-yo yawai-vagahiku gananuhagani?”
Ada Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina Iya uhawaveyamumuyeku? Keke tamo hakwadi yamumuna, au Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a yamumuna.

Yaubada yana vehimeya ahe uhalamanena higa keke unaluve'alika keke unakelele keke unakai'afu, tobohiya yana dewa fa'ina keke unagahe-kawowo, keke unave'alololo yo tobohiya yana gaitoma ginavele tu aimo keke unafatani. Kadu sa'eyana ma tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi.”
Bana kaliva gigayo, “Tovehawala, mena vehimeyai-dina aimo kabi'okuya gavebutu ga'ita'itave'avina be ganunauwena tova adamoya.”
Bana kaliva Yesu yana gahe ginogalini-yo gilumagibou ada yana wanuwavita gina, fa'ina yana lokoloko moya'ai-mo'ena.
Au Yesu ana tomuliya gilumataviledi gigahedi gigayo, “Badi wakalivadiyao yadi luku Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya au vita-mo'ena.”
Ana tomuliya yana gahe fa'ina hiyaulowoga. Atu Yesu gigahe-havagiledi gigayo, “Natukweyao, badi wakalivadiyao yadi luku Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya au vita-mo'ena.
Ka'i yomuyomu lakahina ana egana kameli gaima matane ginaluku, medema vitana. Atu ka'i wakalivana Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya ginaluku be yana itave'avina againe ginamiyami, medema vita-mo'ena.”
Tomuliya mena yana gahe hinogalini-yo hiyaulowogahega-mo'a ada higahe higayo, “Ha! Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya kibababala ginanuhagani.”

Yesu gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena, gava kaliva yana manuwa gihegena o ka'i tobohiyaneyao o nouneyao o hinana o tamana o natuneyao o yana babi Iya fa'ikuya kadu yaku Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ginalumamalena fa'ina ginuyabuyabudi, medema tova adamoya ana laufata lakahi-mo'ena gavadi gavadi hagihagina wona velemona ginavaina, manuwa tobohiyaneyao nouneyao hinaneyao natuneyao ada babi ginanuhagadi. Kadu bana yaku kaliva fa'ina aulolo tulina tulina kaliva nimadiya ginanuhagana. Tova adamoya au hidede amine ginanuhagana, ada kadu tova mulina yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.
Tu badi adamoya vaita wai hidanagoni-ma aimo wai hinamulina, kadu badi adamoya vaita wai hidamulini-ma aimo wai hinanagona.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ita, Yelusalema againe kananauna ada Iya Tohobu'ela badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala nimadiya hinahegenauweku, be badi alikeya hinahegeku. Au yo'o tulidi keke miYuda nimadiya hinahegenauweku ada badi hinahawavelaigeku, hinakiwaliku hinamunukoyokoyoku tu hinaluve'alikaku. Atu tova anaveto againe ganamididi-havagi.” Hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Tu medema tovai-nadi Yemesa Yoni Sebedi natuneyao Yesu againe hi'ela higayo, “Tovehawala, yama nuwanuwa sa'eyana analukahihiyena be udanuwakabubuyema.”
Bana Yesu gitoliyedi gigayo, “Gavadi nuwanuwami omi fa'imiya ganagani?”
Badi higayo, “Udahawahegema be aimo tova mulina unakaiwabu-mo'a againe ime ama'iselu buye adakaiwabu, higa i'ataginiya kadu i'imawaniya adavetoga.”
Atu gaveyao i'atagikuya i'imawakuya hinavetoga, medema keke yaku abavehimeya. Au gaveyao fa'idiya Yaubada mena abavetoga kikaiwabuna gikidewedewena, medema hinavaina.”
Tu tomuliya velugadiyao teni, tobohiyadiyao Yemesa Yoni yadi ve'o'ola hinogalina againe, hivebutu hinuwakoyoyedi.

Au Yesu gikovavaga'auhidi gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wahalamanena gaveyao yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya hivewagadi tovehimeya, medema yadi wa'agodadaga yadi yo'o hi'ita'itave'avidi, kadu yadi tokikaiwabu yadi waselakalaka kaliva koyokoyodiyao higahegahedi.
Tu omi'iyao ma keke medede amine wanahuluhuluva. Au gaveyao omi agaimeya nuwanuwami wanakikaiwabu, au gilubodami be tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wanavetofaisewa.
Kadu gaveyao nuwanuwami wanavetonagona, medema tobohiyamiyao moya'aidi agaidiya wanave'agetoga.

Meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela keke omi tomiyababi agaimiya gada'ela be omi wanavelugaku fa'ina. Au ga'ela be Iya omi ganavelugami ada yawaiku ganahawahegena be mena yaku laufata againe moya'aimi yami koyona fa'ina yogoyogonimiyao wamimiyami-ma ganayaumi.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye hinauna tu melala ana egana Yeliko againe hiyemu. Himiyami tu kadu hilowoga. Yo'o lakahina badi buye hilowolowoga tu tomatakoyo sa'eyana ana egana Batimiyo, bana higa Timiyo natuna, edeya gihiyoto be tonaudadana agaidiya mani give'ove'o'ola.
Ada Yesu kwanaNasaledi ginauna ma ginogalini-yo givebutu gikovakova gigayo, “Yesu, O Devida bwanenena, uda'itanuwakabubuyeku.”
Kaliva moya'aidi hidakeyena be higa ginave'amata. Atu bana kadu agona gilakata-mo'a gikovadona gigayo, “O Devida bwanenena uda'itanuwakabubuyeku.”
Au Yesu ginumidi gigayo, “Wayowanini be gi'ela.” Ada tomatakoyo hiyowanina higayo, “U'asevatu be umidi fa'ina Bana giyowani.”
Au ana aikeva givehalilina digo gitowamidi be Yesu againe gi'ela.
Au Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Gavadi nuwanuwa o fa'iniya ganagani?” Ada tomatakoyo gigayo, “Tovehawala, nuwanuwaku gada'italele.”
Yesu ana tomuliya buye Yelusalema hi'iveda'ufona tu melala luhei Bedefegi kadu Bedani oya Olive againe hiyemu. Medede againe hiyemu tu ana tomuliya adi'iselu gigahedi be wai hinanagona.

Gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wai wananagona yuwa melala againe wanaluku, ada wanalukuluku tu doniki natudi ai againe hiluhifona-ma wanamadu'itana. Mena doniki kwaune keke tamo hakwadi boi gidayage. Au wanayauna be wana'aliyena.
Ada ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, Gavana fa'ina wayauyauni? au wanagahena wanagayo, Yama Kaiwabu nuwanuwana me'ama ada aimo tova kabi'ona ginaveleyewemi.
Au tomuliya adi'iselu hina doniki natudi manuwa eda'awaneya gava melaleya hiluhifona-ma hinuhagana, ada au hiyauna.
Ada badi tolauboda medede againe himidimidi-ma higahedi higayo, Gavadi wagagauga? Gavana fa'ina doniki natudi wayauyauni?”
Ada Yesu gigahe amine higahedi, ada au hihawahegedi be hina.
Au doniki natudi Yesu againe hi'aliyena, adi aikeva kwaune hiyavelina be Bana giyage.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi yo'o agaidiya adi aikeva edeya hiyaveyavelina, kadu tufoidi ai laganina walukulukumina faheya hikuyana-ma edeya hiyaveyavelina.
Ada kaliva tufoidi wai hinagona tufoidi wai himulina, ada Yesu buye hinauna tu hikovakova higayo,
“Hosana, O adavadava.
Kaiwabu ana eganeya u'ela'ela-ma au Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.
Tuwai-mo'ena bwaneneda Devida yo'o moya'aidi givehimeyedi amine,
O'eni Devida bwanenena unavehimeyema.
Yaubada ya abavehimeya ginanuwakabubuyena,
kadu tomiyalobama o hinadavadava
yadi hosana hinayakahina.”

Ada Yesu Yelusalema againe gilakayemu gina manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe giluku ada gaitoma moya'aina gilumatavilena. Kadu gihobu ada mala ahe gilavina fa'ina yana yo'o tuwelo buye Bedani againe hina.
Bogi hida mala gilauna Bedani againe hitauya Yelusalema againe hinauna tu Yesu mafu gilauna.
Yuwa lauveya ai ana egana fiki walukulukumina gi'ita-yo gina be ka'i tamo guwana gisena-ma gina'itana. Gida'ita ma lukuminaga gidauda, fa'ina medema keke fiki yana tova yoyo.
Au ai againe gigahe gigayo, “Aimo tova mulina kadu keke unayoyo be kaliva guwa gina'ani, keke-mo'a.” Hidedemi Yesu ai gi'alatabutabuyena tu tomuliya hinogalina.

Hinauna tu Yelusalema againe hilakayemu, au Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina ana eda'awaneya giluku givebutu badi mene manuwa-tafalolo againe hilukimokimone-ma giwavidi, mani tulina tulina ana tosenisi yadi tolama givetala'afufuna kadu kaliva bunebune abaveyao fa'ina hikimonevedamanedi-ma yadi abavetoga gituwabwatavilana.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi gihawatadi be keke tamo lokoloko kimone fa'ina manuwa-tafalolo ana eda'awaneya hinaselukuweni.
Yaku manuwa hinavewagana abave'ove'o'ola ana manuwa yo'o tulina tulina fa'idiya.
Tu omi'iyao ma vaita tokai'afu yadi abaga amine wafaisewana.” Hidede amine Yesu gidakeyedi.
Ada au mala gisilavina Yesu ana tomuliya buye hilowoga be Yelusalema hihegena.
Fita nuwana gi'afolena ada Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Tovehawala u'ita. Fiki u'alatabutabuyena-ma a gi'awa'ulona.”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Yami vetumagana Yaubada againe wanasena.

Gagahe velemo'ena hai kaliva ginavetumaganadona, medema hida oya againe anafaiweya ginagahe ginagayo, Una lehageya utowa. Ka'i ase'asena keke gina'amalakibo tu ginavetumagana vaita gavaimi gigahe amine ginalakayemu velemo'ena, au givetumagana amine ginanuhagana.
Yami vetumagana amine wananuhagana fa'ina kadu ganagahe. Gavadi gavadi fa'ina wave'o'ola, wanavetumagana be higa vaita medema ahe wavaina, ada au gavadi fa'ina wave'o'ola-ma wananuhagana.
Wave'o'ola tova, ka'i tamo hakwadi omi agaimiya gikoyo, au yana koyona wanavenuwauluyena be higa Tamami lobameya gimimiyami-ma kadu yami koyona ginavenuwauluyena. [
Atu ka'i omi tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona keke wanavenuwauluyeni, kadu keke Tamami lobameya gimimiyami-ma yami koyona ginavenuwauluyeni.]”

Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye Yelusalema againe kadu hilakayemu. Ada Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina ana eda'awaneya ginunudadana tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu kaliva lakahidiyao Bana againe hi'ela.

Ada hitoliluveluvena higayo, “O ugahema, ha'againe ya abavehimeya uvaini-yo mena gaitoma tulina tulina boiyesedi hidei manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe ufifaisewadi? Hakwa'adi mena abavehimeya givele-yo hidedemi uhuluva?”
Yesu gigayo, “Yaku toliluvaluva sa'eyana omi agaimiya ganasena. Ka'i bonaku wanafatana amine o yaku abavehimeya inubana fa'ina ganavenuwa'atami.
Hakwa'adi abavehimeya Yoni Tobafitaiso givele-yo kaliva gikivebafitaisoyedi? Ka'i yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe give'inuba o ka'i kaliva agaidiya? Bonaku wafata.”

Yesu gigahe-yo badi hivebutu buye hivekwageya higayo, “Ka'i kanagahe vaita Yoni yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe gidave'inuba au Bana ginagahe ginagayo, Ka'i Yaubada againe digo, gavadi-yo Yoni yana gahe keke wadavetumaganeni?
Tu ka'i kanagahe vaita kaliva agaidiya gidave'inuba....” A! Mema yo'o himatausedi higa vaita gavaimi hinakivekoyodi, fa'ina moya'aidi hinuwanuwa vaita Yoni Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina.
Hidedemi tonagona hinuwanuwa fa'ina Yesu yana toliluvaluva hidede amine hifatana higayo, “Ka'iwa. Ime keke adahalamaneni.”

Ada Yesu gigayo, “Omi keke wadagaheku fa'ina, meda anafaiweya Iya keke ganavenuwa'atami hade'againe yaku abavehimeya give'inuba-yo hida gaitoma gafifaisewani.” Hidede amine Yesu miYuda adi tonagona agaidiya gigahe.

Tu Yesu givebutu badi miYuda adi tonagona agaidiya gahetalahobuhobu amine gilukahihiyedi. Gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana ai guwana ana egana kelefi yana babi againe gifahana. Faha gi'alana, kahu giyalana be aimo guwana ana abavagafuwafuwa fa'ina, kadu kweda tunugina faha ana itave'avina fa'ina giyogona. Kelefi ana faha gikidewedewena gihavaina, kaliva tufoidi faha ana to'itave'avina gisedi tu yana melala gihegena gina mali fafaliya ginunudadana.
Himiyami tu kelefi ana aikolu ana tova giyemu againe, tonifaha ana agetoga faha ana to'itave'avina agaidiya gi'iveninisena be yana faha againe ana guwa ginavaina.
Badi to'itave'avina ana agetogai-nadi hikive'avina digo himunukoyokoyona be makagekagena hiwavina.
Au kadu agetoga velugana gi'iveninisena tu to'itave'avina agetoga u'une hilaulauna ada hikivekoyo-mo'ena.
Kadu agetoga sa'eyana gi'iveninisena tu to'itave'avina hiluve'alikana. Meda anafaiweya agetoga kadu moya'aidi hikivekoyodi. Tufoidi himunukoyokoyodi, tufoidi hiluve'alikadi.
Tu kaliva sa'eya-mo'ena gimiyami, higa tonifaha natuna natu'ase'asena. Muliya-mo'ane bana'e badi to'itave'avina agaidiya gi'iveninisena ada gigahe gigayo, Natuku be hinave'amohimohinena.
Giyemu-yo wama to'itave'avina taudiyao hive'agahegahe higayo, Hida hima bana ana hilafa. Wa'ela be kanaluve'alikana ada yana babi taudeyao kanavaina.
Au hikive'avina digo hiluve'alikana be ala kwaune hihegevihilena.
Tonifaha gavaimi ginaga? Au ginayewa'ela be badi to'itave'avina ginaluve'alikadi ada yana faha to'itave'avina velugadiyao nimadiya ginasena.
Tu gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya ma'i wahawahawa o ka'i keke? Gigayo,
Ogola manuwa ana to'aiyogona hikilowena-ma
au holili'abi manuwa hinafane-mo'ane gimidimidi.
Kaiwabu yana vehimeya againe au hidemi gilakayemu,
ada medema giluboda-mo'ena ide matadeya.”
Hidedemi Yesu Yaubada yana gahe Natuna ana kilowa fa'ina giyakahina.

Au miYuda adi tonagona Yesu badi fa'idiya mena gahetalahobuhobu gilukahihiyena ma hi'ayaunena fa'ina, hivebutu eda hilelelena be higa hinakive'avina. Atu yo'o himatausedi fa'ina hinuyabuyabuna be hina.
Muliya miYuda adi tonagona yadi kalivamomo higa Falisi tufoidi kadu Helodi yana yo'o kalivadi tufoidi hi'iveninisedi be yadi toliluvaluva againe hinavebauna be higa tamo gavadi koyona ginagaheyena.

Hiyemu-yo higahena higayo, “Tovehawala, ime ahalamanena O ya gahe velemo'ena, keke udave'alololo. Ada kaliva ya vehawala fa'ina gavaimi hinagahe ma keke udamatauseni. Kadu kaliva yadi kikaiwabu keke udanuwenuweni, au ugahe-mo'edi be Yaubada yana eda fa'ina uvehavehawala velemo'ena. Au anatoliye, kwanaLoma yada tokaiwabu lakahina Sisa againe takesi kanasena, ka'i medema gilubodana o ka'i keke? Ka'i mena takesi kadasena o ka'i keke?”
Hidedemi hitoliluvaluva tu Yesu yadi ve'alololo ase'asediya gi'ita-yo gigayo, “Gavadi-yo wanuwanuwa vaita wanavebauku? Mani kabala wa'aliye be gana'itana.”
Au kabala hi'aliyena. Bana gitoliyedi gigayo, “Hida hakwadi magigina? Kadu hakwadi ana egana mene kabala againe hikilumini?” Badi higayo, “Bana Sisa.”

Badi higayo, “Tovehawala, Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe hidede amine gi'etoladi. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana kwamayoku ginanagina ada natudi keke tu gina'alika, au kaliva tobohiyana yana vayasi anafaiweya gidanagina be tobohiyana ana hilafa fa'ina natuneyao gina'ivetubugidi. Au hidede amine Mosese givehimeya.
Au kaliva tobohiyaneyao adi yo'o seveni himiyami tu tomo'ainagona kwamayoku ginagina ada natudi keke tu gi'alika.

Ada taina yana vayasi ginagina ada natudi keke tu gi'alika. Meda anafaiweya kaliva anaveto ginagina ada natudi keke tu gi'alika, ada hinunauwena hinunauwena tu taina kaliva anaveseveni natuna keke tu gi'alika. Muliya-mo'ane kwamayoku gi'alika.
Au aimo tova mulina kaliva hinamididi-havagi ana toveya bana kwamayoku-nadi ma gava kaliva vavinena? Fa'ina kaliva adiveseveni kwamayoku sa'eyana hinagina.”
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Yaubada bonana ana vehawala kadu Yaubada yana faiwala ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Keke wadahalamaneni fa'ina, omi keke wadanuwanuwa tunutunugina.
Tova mulina to'alika hinamididi-havagi ana toveya, lobama ana tovenuwa'ata himimiyami amine meda kaliva hinamiyami. Kaliva vevine keke hinanaginagi keke hinavenavenagi.

Tu to'alika yadi mididi-havagi fa'ina ganagahe. Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana Mosese yana buki againe ma'i wahawahawana o ka'i keke? Ai giyabelina tu keke gida'alahini-ma kahihina againe Yaubada Mosese gigahena gigayo, Iya Abelahamo yana Yaubada gamimiyami, kadu Aisake yana Yaubada gamimiyami, kadu Yakobu yana Yaubada gamimiyami. Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe.

Badi kaliva wavewagadi ali'alikadiyao ma Yaubada yawayawadiyao gi'ita'itadi. Au Bana'e kaliva alu'aluwadi yawayawana yadi Yaubada, keke ali'alikadiyao yadi Yaubada. Gavadi-yo wagahe vaita kaliva alu'aluwadi wowodi buye gida'alika? Keke wadanuwanuwa tunutunugina, keke-mo'a.” Hidemi Yesu Sadusi gigahedi.

Tu badi Sadusi Yesu buye hivekwavekwageya tu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala sa'eyana givanevanenega. Yesu Sadusi bonadi gifatana hagihagina ma ginogalini-yo kadu bana gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Ada vehimeya moya'aina Yaubada gisena-ma hadema vehimeya lakahi-mo'ena?”
Ase'ase matatabuna kadu alu'aluwa matatabuna kadu nuwa matatabuna kadu ya faiwala matatabuna Yaubada ya Kaiwabu againe unahawahege-'owona be Bana againe unanuwanuwa lakahina.
Kadu vehimeya anavelu ma hidede amine. Tauni unuwakabubuye amine, tobohiyamomo unanuwakabubuyedi. Au mena vehimeyai-dina luhei vehimeya lakahi-mo'edi. Kadu keke tamo vehimeya gidakaiwabuhegedi.”
Bana Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Tovehawala, ugahe yamumuna. Wona velemona Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a kadu keke tamo Yaubada velugana O ugahe amine.

Ka'i ase'aseda matatabuna, kadu nuwada matatabuna kadu yada faiwala matatabuna Yaubada againe kanase-'owona be Bana fa'ine kananuwanuwa lakahina, kadu taudeyao kananuwakabubuyeda amine tobohiyadeyao kananuwakabubuyedi, au medema giluboda-mo'ena. Ka'i kevakeva abaveyao fa'ina kanakabukabuna o yada yomuyomu yada faha Yaubada againe kanahawahegena, medema gilubodana. Atu ka'i mena vehimeyai-dina luhei kayakahina-ma kana'ita'itave'avina medema giluboda-mo'ena.”

Ada Yesu mena tovehawala yana bonalaufata au nuwahuyahuyana ma ginogalina againe, gigahena gigayo, “Vaita tova kabi'ona Yaubada againe unahawahege be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya unaluku-yo Bana'e ase'aseniya ginavehivehimeya.” Hidedemi Yesu tovehawala bonana gifatana yamumuna yo kaliva velugadiyao himatauta be toliluvaluva kadu keke velugana Bana againe hidaseni.
Muliya Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe givehavehawala tu gigahe gigayo, “Gavadi-yo Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala higahe vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida ana egana Keliso Devida bwanenena?
Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Alu'aluwa Mahalina Devida gikivetuvetununi-yo bana tauna gigahe gigayo,
Bana Yaubada Kaiwabu iya yaku Kaiwabu gigahena gigayo,
Nima i'atagikuya unahiyoto, O unamiyami tu
nibaimomo ageyafayafaniya ganasedi.

Au hidede amine Devida tauna Keliso givewagana yaku Kaiwabu, tu gavaiya'amine yana Kaiwabu kadu bana bwanenena muliya gitubuga amanadi?” Hidede amine Yesu givehawala ada kaliva hiyo'oyo'o-ma yadi wavemwamwala bonana hinogalina.

Tu Yesu yana vehawala againe kadu gigahe gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala yadi dewa keke nuwami gina'abini. Nuwanuwadi aikeva tunugina hina'oseni-yo abakimokimone againe hinanunudadana be kaliva hinalusiuleyedi kadu hinagayo, Velemodi.
Nuwanuwadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya kadu avemwamwala againe abavetoga kikaiwabuna againe hinavetoga.

Ada sikwasikwadiyao yadi lokoloko hilemadi, ada hive'ove'o'ola-fa'ila be higa kaliva hinahawaveyamumuyedi. Yadi koyona ve'o'ola-fa'ila againe hikevana fa'ina adi vita gavatubuga hinanuhagana.” Hidedemi Yesu tovehawala tovehawalai-dina yadi dewa fa'ina givenuwa'ata.
Ada Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe givetoga ada velekawowo ana abavedodoga gihagana. Yo'o yadi velekawowo hidododona-ma gilubodedi. Wakalivadiyao moya'aidi hi'ela mani lakahina hidodona.
Tu sikwa koyokoyodi hi'ela kabala kukwauhina luhei hidodona, fatana vaita toea sa'eyana amine.

Fa'ina badi wakalivadiyao yadi mani tufonaga hidodona ada yadi tufo lakahina aimo gidadauda, tu badi sikwa koyokoyodi yadi mani matatabuna hidodo-'owona, au gavadi againe adiga o adi kaleko hidakimonena mani-nadi Yaubada againe hihege-'owona.”
Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahine gihobuhobu tu ana tomuliya sa'eyana manuwa giyofena gigayo, “Tovehawala u'ita. Manuwa ana kabala gavatubuga! Aiyoi, hima ana aiyogona tulina tulina manuwa vewaga!”
Tu Yesu gina oya Olive againe gilaka givetoga ada manuwa-tafalolo lakahina gihagana. Au badi Fita Yemesa Yoni Anidulu adikaibe'uyanina Bana againe hi'ela hitoliyena higayo,
“Unavenuwa'atama, gava tova manuwa-tafalolo ana lauyawela ulukahihiyena-ma ginalakayemu? Mena gaitomai-dina gavadi gavadi hinalakayemu ma gava aituha ana'ita-yo anahalamane-hagihagiyeni?”
Au Yesu givebutu aituha fa'ina givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi yana fwaya againe ginanuwa'abiyemi.
Fa'ina aimo tufoidi moya'aidi hina'ela aku egana hinayakahina hinagayo, Kaliva Yaubada givegidena-ma iya kaliva-mo'eku. Hidedemi hinagahe be kaliva moya'aidi yadi fwaya againe hinanuwa'abiyedi.

Kadu aituha sa'eyana ma gaviya moya'aina ginalakayemu ada kaliva yadi ve'amunumunuga butudi wananogalina, kadu hai lauveya hinalulugaviya medema valeyadi wananogalina. Hidedemi wananogalina amine keke ase'asemi gina'akolukoluni. Mena gaitomai-dina anafaiweya hidalakayemu tu tova ana lauyabu au aimo muliya-mo'ane ginalakayemu.

Yo'o sa'eyana mali yo'o buye hinave'amunumunuga, kadu fafali sa'eyana mali fafali buye hinalulugaviya. Li'uli'u lakahina fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hinalakayemu, kadu meda anafaiweya loka moya'aina. Venatuna ana tova ginaluveda'ufo againe kwamayoku hinavefahedi-yo yadi aulolo ginavebutu amine, meda anafaiweya mena gaitomai-dina galukahihiyedi-ma hinalakayemu againe aulolo tagiya lakahina ginavebutu.

Ada yaku kaliva Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna yo'o tulidi tulidi agaidiya hinalumamalena be babi matatabuna hinaluyabuna. Hidedemi yo'o moya'aidi hinavenuwa'atadi tu muliya tova ana lauyabu ginalakayemu.

Tu hinakive'avimi be hinavekotumi ana toveya, keke yami wamatauta wanavenuwanauna-vagata vaita ka'i gavaimi wanagahe. Au medema tovai-nadi gavaimi Yaubada gina'alavelevelemi, medema wanagaheyena. Fa'ina hifufu wanagaheyena-ma keke taumiyao yami nuwanuwa againe ginalakayemu, au Alu'aluwa Mahalina awamiya ginalukahihi.

Ada kaliva sa'eyana tauna tobohiyana kaliva nimadiya ginahawavemogatalena be hinaluve'alikana fa'ina, kadu anafaiweya kwamana tamana natuna ginahawavemogatalena be hinaluve'alikana. Ada we'owe'o badi tamadiyao agaidiya hinavenibaina be tamadiyao hinadiyao alika hinanuhagana fa'ina.
Ada omi aku tomuliya fa'ina kaliva moya'aidi omi agaimiya hinanuwanuwakoyo, tu gaveyao wana'atuvefa'ila be Yaubada againe wanamiyamiyave'avina tu alika ana maka, medema ginakibababalemi.
Hai kaliva yana tolameya ginamiyami, medema keke yana manuweya ginaluku be higa yana lokoloko ginavaini. Au ginamadu'ota.
Hai kaliva yana faheya ginamiyami, medema keke melaleya ginayewani be higa ana lifi ginavaini. Au ginamadu'ota.
Hoiyoi vevine wahifugadiyao kadu vevine aimo hivehuvehuhu amanadi! Mena ota ana toveya vita lakahina hinanuhagana.
Yaubada againe wanave'o'ola be higa mena gaitoma koyona keke wehi ana toveya ginalakayemu. Ka'i wehi digo gavaimi be oyeya wada'ota?

Fa'ina medema aiyetai-dina agaidiya vita lakahi-mo'ena ginalakayemu. Mena vitai-nadi ma boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada babi gimidibubuna ana toveya kadu tova hinafane keke hidanuhagani. Kadu aimo tova mulina keke hidede amine hinanuhagani.

Tu Kaiwabu mena tova vita-mo'ena galukahihiyena-ma ana aiyeta yana nuwanuwa againe ahe gidabana be ginakali'uho. Ka'i keke gidadabani digo, kaliva moya'aidi hidabwavi. Atu Tauna yana kaliva giluwafadi be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma adi lugolagola fa'ina mena tovai-nadi hinafane ginadabana be ginakali'uho.

Tu ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahemi ginagayo, Wa'ela hida kalivai-nadi givekeliso-ma wana'itana, o ka'i ginagayo, Wanana yuwa kaliva givekeliso-ma wana'itana. Ka'i hidede amine ginagahe o keke bonana wanavetumaganeni.

Au tova mulina tove'alololo hinalakayemu be hinagahe vaita hidavekeliso o ka'i hidavefalofita higa Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina. Aituha fifiwaladi ada abaveyaulowoga badi hinafaisewadi be hinagaluvaluva ka'i yadi fwaya againe Yaubada yana kaliva hinanuwa'abiyedi. E, kaliva vevine Yaubada giluwafadi be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma hinagaluvaluvadi vaita hinanuwa'abiyedi.
Au taumiyao wana'itave'avimi. Tove'alololo yadi dewa fa'ina gavenuwa'ata-vagahimi.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Ibadibadi lobameya gina'akolukoludi be hinabe'u, ada lobama ana gaitoma fifiwaladiyao adi iviya gina'atuliyeliyedi.

Au yaku tovenuwa'ata gana'iveninisedi be kaliva vevine Yaubada giluwafadi-yo yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma hinavaga'auhidi. Fafali tulina tulina wabolimaneya wayavalaseya walaube'uya wa'oyeya, ka'i hai yuwa babi analauyabu o wese lobameya hinamiyami-ma hinavaga'auhidi be Iya Tohobu'ela agaikuya hinavega'auledi.
Wa'ita, lalava ana dewa wananuwenuwena be enohega wanavaina. Lalava ginatafa ma ka'ita-yo kagayo, Kauwana yana tova giluvedaveda'ufo.
Meda anafaiweya mena aituhai-dina hinalakayemu ma wana'itana againe, au wanahalamanena yaku yewa'ela giluveda'ufo-mo'a.
Gagahe velemo'ena hida tova ana yo'o keke moya'aidi hina'alika-'owoga tu nagona mena gaitomai-dina moya'aina hinalakayemu.
Lobama be babi ginayawowola tu bonaku keke ginayawowola, au ginaduva-vagata.
Yaku yewa'ela tova keke wadahalamaneni fa'ina, ase'asemi wanakidewedewena be wanalulauboda.

Yaku yewa'ela ana dewa ganalukahihiyena. Vaita kaliva lakahina mali fafaliya ginana amine Iya'eku. Ana agetoga givehimeyedi be yana manuwa kadu yana faha hina'itave'avina. Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana yadi faisewa giveledi, ada eda'awana ana to'itave'avina againe gigahe gigayo, Keke unadauda au unalulauboda.
Ada gavaimi omi agaimiya gagahe amine, meda kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya gagahe be wanalulauboda.” Hidedemi Yesu ana tomuliya givenuwa'atadi.
Ana kive'avina fa'ina hinuwanuwa higayo, “Ka'i yo'o hinave'atalalakalaka fa'ina, keke tafalolo lakahina ana toveya kanakive'avini.”

Tu Yesu Bedani melaleya gina Saimoni againe giwakawaka. Bana boi givedawodawowo fa'ina hivewagana tovedawodawowo. Au Yesu Saimoni yana manuweya gi'enolukekela gi'au'a tu kwamayoku sa'eyana gi'ela, bunama yamumu-mo'ena ana egana nado gi'aliyena fatana lakahina. Mena bunamai-nadi aba'aihiwaga kugakugana againe gidauda, kuga ana egana alabasita. Ada kwamayoku aba'aihiwaga gikidobona digo Yesu u'una gibunamina.
Atu kaliva tufoidi hi'ita-yo hinuwakoyo higayo, “Gavadi-yo hida bunama hidede amine gihiwa-kawowoni?
Ka'i hida bunama gidakimonevedamanena o mani lakahina vaita kaliva sa'eyana yana faisewa malamala sa'eyana fatana amine gidavaina be koyokoyo gidaveledi.” Au kwamayoku higolahegehegena.
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Au gimiya. Gavadi-yo hida kwamayoku wa'ivewowomumuni? Ginuwakabubuyeku fa'ina yana gugai kanahawaveyamumuyena.
Tova moya'aina koyokoyo hinafamiya himimiyami ada gava tova nuwanuwami wananuwakabubuyedi, au amifaiweya wananuwakabubuyedi. Tu Iya'eku ma aimo keke buye kanamiyami tova moya'aina.
Bana'e ma gavadi anafaiweya, medema gigugaiyena. Hida bunamai-nadi wowoku againe gihiwa-vagahina be aku aihuya fa'ina gikidewedeweku.
Gagahe velemo'ena fafali ha'amine ha'amine kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hinalulumamalena, meda yana huluva yamumuna Iya agaikuya ma hinalukahihiyena be ana abanuwa'udu'udu fa'ina.”
Yesu gigahe-yo Yudasi-Isikaliyota yo'o tuwelo kalivana gina abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao agaidiya be higa badi nimadiya ginahawavemogatalena.
Badi yana nuwanuwa hinogalina againe hivemwamwala, ada higahena vaita mani hinavelena. Au Yudasi givebutu tova hagihagina gilelena be Yesu nibaineyao agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena.

Au Yesu ana tomuliya adi'iselu gi'iveninisedi gigahedi gigayo, “Wanana Yelusalema ana melaleya ada kaliva gufa watuwavina gi'avalana-ma ginamaduhagami. Wanamuliyena be gava manuwa againe ginaluku, medede againe tonimanuwa wanagahena wanagayo, Tovehawala gigahe gigayo, Hadema vetawana Iya fa'ikuya uhawahegeni be Abamaduviviya a'ana aku tomuliya buye ana'ani?
Hidede amine wanagahe tu vetawana lakahina manuwa getane ivi ahe hi'iyaveyavela-ma bana ginavehawalemi. Medede againe a'a wanakidewedewena ide fa'ideya.”
Ada au tomuliya adi'iselu hilowoga be Yelusalema againe hina, ada Yesu gilukahihiyena amine hinuhagana. Au Abamaduviviya a'ana hikidewedewena.
Mala gibogi Yesu yana yo'o tuwelo buye hiluku manuweya.
Ada hi'enolukekela hi'au'a tu Bana gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena mene kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya badi nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku, bana buye ka'a'au'a-ma kalivai-nadi.”
Au hi'ase'u'aulolo hivebutu sa'eyana sa'eyana hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Iya'eku ma ka'i keke?” Hidemi higahe.
Yesu gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana omi yo'o tuwelo agaimiya bana a'a nau'a againe Iya buye a'utuvina kalivai-nadi.

Fa'ina Iya Tohobu'ela gana'alika Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigaheyena amine. Tu hoiyoi kaliva Iya Tohobu'ela nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku amanadi! Bana vita lakahina ginanuhagana. Ka'i bana kalivai-nadi keke gidatubuga, medema gidalubodana fa'ina keke vita gidawahini.”
Tu au ana toveya Yesu a'a givaina digo Yaubada againe givesiule gikihinena au ana tomuliya giveledi gigayo, “Hida wowoku, au wavaini.”
Ada gowa givaina digo givesiule giveledi be moya'aidi hiyuyena.
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hida dayagiku gimadumadu-ma moya'aidi fa'idiya, higa Yaubada yana veyao omi agaimiya gisena-ma ana iya'iyaya.

Gagahe velemo'ena agaimiya hida babi ana oine aimo keke ganayu-havagileni tu tova mulina Yaubada yana avemwamwala ginasena ana toveya, oine ivaguna ganayuna. Mena abavemwamwalai-nadi badi yana itave'avina againe himimiyami-ma fa'idiya ginasena.” Hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Ada au kwelidavadava hikweliyena. Hikweliyena gihavaina, hina oya Olive againe hilaka.
Sifi adi to'itave'avina ganamununa
ada sifi hina'abinauna.
Au Fita gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i badi moya'aidi hina'otayabuyabu digo, iya keke gana'otayabuyabu.”
Atu Fita gigahe toyogina gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwadi iya O buye hinaluve'alikada, au keke-mo'a ganavekekeye.” Ada tomuliya moya'aidi kadu hidede amine higahe.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye hina abaga sa'eyana ana egana Gedasemani againe himiyami tu gigahedi gigayo, “Hidedei unahiyoto tu ganana ganave'o'ola.”
Ada Fita Yemesa Yoni buye ginauwedi be hinavebwa'uliyena, au givebutu gi'ase'u'aulolo lakahina be givedivediwe.
Gigahedi gigayo, “Ga'ase'u'aulolo lakahina vaita yawaiku gida'alagolohini. Hidedei wanamiyami wanavanevanenega.”
Au gina matalaviseya babiya gi'oduve'uve'umagigi, givebutu give'o'ola vaita ka'i ihayana be aulolo ana aituha keke gina'ayauneni.
Kadu gigayo, “Kama'ase'aseku, gaitoma moya'aina a tagalowalowa. Ka'i hida aulolo ana gowa udavaihegeni, tu keke yaku nuwanuwa au O'eni ya nuwanuwa amine unahuluva.”
Ada giyewana ana tomuliya adi'itoto hidauda-ma gihagadi, ada Fita againe gigahe gigayo, “Saimoni, ka'i o udadauda? Bai sa'eyanaga ka'i keke afaiweya unavanevanenega?
Au wanavanevanenega wanave'ove'o'ola be keke aladibidibi againe wanaluku. Ase'asemi gihawahegena tu wowomi gifwalele.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu tova anavelu gina give'o'ola-havagi yana ve'o'ola nagona amine.
Give'o'ola gihavaina, kadu giyewana badi hidauda-ma gihagadi matadi gineganega-mo'a fa'ina. Giluvagudi tu hiwowomumu fa'ina keke tamo gavadi hidagaheye.
Kadu gina give'o'ola tova anaveto ada giyewana gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i aimo wadadauda waveyaveyawai? Auwe'i. Tova a gilakayemu be Iya Tohobu'ela tokoyona nimadiya kaliva sa'eyana ginahawavemogataleku.
Wamidi be kana. Ake! Wa'ita, kaliva nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku-ma a giyemu.”

Ada aimo gigahegaheni Yudasi giyemu, bana Yesu ana yo'o tuwelo kalivana, kadu yo'o yadi wafeto yadi wafuluma buye'i, badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao hi'iveninisedi be hi'ela.
Tu tohawavemogatala aituha yo'o boi giveledi gigayo, “Kaliva veyauga againe ganalusiuleyena-ma bana kalivai-nadi wanakive'avina be wananauwe-hagihagiyena.”
Yudasi giyemu-yo auhe'ama Yesu againe gina veyaugeya gilusiuleyena gigayo, “Aku Tovehawala siule.”
Gigahe-yo yo'o Yesu hikive'avina.
Tu kaliva sa'eyana Yesu liline gimidimidi-ma yana feto lakahina gisiwakana digo abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana agetoga gilauna tagana giluyo'ena.

Tova tova manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe Iya omi buye kamiyami gavehavehawala tu keke wadakive'aviku. Atu gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Veyao Tuwaina ana buki Iya fa'ikuya gigahe, medema gidalakayemu velemo'ena.”
Yesu hidede amine gigahe-yo ana tomuliya moya'aidi hi'otayabuyabuna.

Tu kwanatubulakahina sa'eyana Yesu gibwa'ubwa'ulina, ana vaigau kaleko kwayakwayana sa'eyanaga gi'osena. Ada kaliva tufoidi hikive'avina againe, ana kaleko kwayakwayana gimadulovena be konekonena gi'ota.

Tu badi kaliva Yesu hikive'avina-ma abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu againe hinauwena. Ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao moya'aidi kadu kaliva lakahidiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala ahe hivaga'auta.
Bana Fita wai gimulina lauveya gi'ela, tokaiwabu yana eda'awana-mo'ena againe giluku. Ada tuilala buye ali'auya hivetoga be ai givevevala.

Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu miYuda yadi Koniselo moya'aidi togahe hileledi be higa Yesu hinahawavekoyoyeni-yo adifaiweya alikeya hinahegena. Togahe-kawowo moya'aidi hihawavekoyoyena tu yadi gahe tulina tulina. Au keke tamo hakwadi to'ita velemo'ena hidahagani.
