Atu kadu badi'iyao yadi gahe tulina tulina, keke gahe sa'eyanaga hidagaheyeni.
Au abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu tovedewayauga hinafadiya gitowamidi Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i bonalaufata keke afaiweya? Gavadi-yo hida kaliva yadi hawavekoyo keke udafatani?”

Tu Yesu give'amata, keke tamo bonalaufata gidayakahini. Au tokaiwabu kadu gitoliyena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena O Keliso Bana'e kadavadavana-ma Natuna, higa kaliva Yaubada givegidena be yada yo'o ginanagoyeda kalivai-nadi o ka'i keke?”

Au tufoidi hivebutu Bana againe hikiwakiwala, ada magigina hikevana au hitutu'atugeni tu hihawavelaigena higayo, “Yoi! Hakwadi gimunumunu-ma mene u'ayauneni?” Ada tuilala hinauwedi be himunukoyokoyona.

Tu Fita gava melaleya gihiyoto tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana agetoga kwamayoku sa'eyana gi'ela, ada Fita ai againe givevevala-ma gi'ita-yo gi'itakwanekwanena gigahena gigayo, “Kadu o'eni Yesu kwanaNasaledi buye wamiyami.”
Atu bana givekeke gigayo, “Iya keke. Keke gadahalamane gavadi ugahegaheye.” Au gina yuwa abanauna againe ada kamukamu gikwage.
Abanauna againe gimiyami tu bana agetogai-nadi gi'ita-yo au givebutu tolauboda agaidiya gigahe-havagi gigayo, “Hida hima kaliva au Yesu yana yo'o kalivana.”
Atu Fita givekeke-havagi. Himiya kabisona tu badi tolauboda bana againe kadu higahe higayo, “Au makewa o'eni sa'eya agaidiya, fa'ina o kadu kwanaGalili.”
Au Fita gigayo, “Ka'i keke gadagahe velemo'ena digo, Yaubada gidahawave'aviku. Bana kalivai-nadi wagaheyena-ma keke gadahalamaneni.”

Tu mala gilauna abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao badi kaliva lakahidiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu miYuda yadi Koniselo velugadiyao hikovavaga'auhidi be buye hivevai. Ada au Yesu hiyogona be hinauwena tovehimeya kwanaLoma ana egana Failato againe hihege'aliyena.
Ada Failato Yesu gitoliyena gigayo, “Ka'i miYuda yadi tokaiwabu O'eni?” Yesu gigayo, “Au ugahe amine Iya'eku.”
Ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina hihawavekoyoyena.
Ada Failato gitoliluvaluva-havagi gigayo, “Ka'i keke tamo bonalaufata unagaheye? U'ita, yadi hawavekoyo gavadawana O againiya.”
Tu tafalolo ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya ana toveya, Failato yana dewa ma yogoyogonina sa'eyana, ka'i hakwadi yo'o hive'ove'o'olena, medema giyauyauna.
Ada medema tovai-nadi tovekwageya himiyami, boi tova sa'eyana hive'atalalakalaka be kaliva hiluve'alikadi. Ada tovekwageyai-dina agaidiya kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Balaba.
Au yo'o Failato againe hivaga'auta hivebutu hive'o'olena higayo, “Abamaduviviya ana toveya kaliva uyauyaudi amine, tova adamoya kaliva sa'eyana unayauna.”
Bana gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwami omi miYuda yami tokaiwabu ganayauna be agaimiya ganahawahegena?”
Fa'ina gihalamanena badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao yadi ga'uma'uma fa'ina bana againe hihege'aliyena.
Atu abaveyao ana tofaisewa yo'o hivagadonedi be Failato hinave'o'olena higa keke Yesu tu Balaba ginayauna.
Au Failato gigahe-havagiledi gigayo, “Au Yesu againe gavaimi ganaga, Bana wavewagana ide miYuda yada tokaiwabu?”
Badi kadu hikova-havagi higayo, “Kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.”
Bana gigayo, “A! Gavadi yana koyona?” Tu badi kadu agodi gilakata-mo'a hikovakovadona higayo, “Kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.”

Au Failato nuwanuwana yo'o nuwadi ginakiveyamumuna fa'ina, Balaba giyauna be agaidiya gihawahegena. Tu givehimeya be tolugaviya bulava hakahakaluluna againe Yesu hinalaulauna. Hilauna gihavaina, givehimeyedi be kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.
Ada tolugaviya Yesu hinauwena tovehimeya yana manuwa lakahina ana eda'awaneya hilukuwena, ada yadi yo'o moya'aidi hikovavaga'auhidi.
Ada aikeva likelikena tovehimeya adi vaigau amine hive'osena, ada badau bulava hakahakaluluna againe hi'etowaliwalina be u'une hisena.
Ada hivebutu hilusiuleyena higayo, “Siule siule miYuda yadi tokaiwabu.”
Ada aiwala hivaina be u'una hilaulauna, kadu hikiwakiwalitagona kadu Bana magigine tugadi hiveve'etodonena be higa vaita hinadavadavana.
Hihawavelaigena gihavaina, ana aikeva likelikena hivehalilina digo Tauna ana aikeva hive'osena ada hinauwena be kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.

Edeya hinauna tu kwanaSailini himaduhagana, ana egana Saimoni. Bana Alekisanida be Lufasi tamadi, ada wala'aiya gitauya be Yelusalema againe ginauna. Au bana hikive'avina be higa Yesu ana kelose gina'avalana.
Ada abaga ana egana Goligota againe hi'aliyena. Goligota ana kaivila bonadeya ma utouto.
Hiyemu-yo oine mulamula ana egana mulo buye hivila'atutamo'aina-ma hitunena be ginayuni-yo yana aulolo ma'i gina'atagona. Atu Yesu gikilowena.
Ada kelose againe hitutuvefosena au kabala hihegelakahina be iya'iyaya higaheyena higa hakwadi hakwadi ana kaleko hinavaini ma hinahalamanena.
Kauwana a givekuve'ine againe hikivekelosena.
Tu ana hawavekoyo ana fefe hi'etoladina be hisena. Etoladi gigayo, “Hidevama miYuda yadi tokaiwabu.”
Kadu tomunugakai'afu luhei adi kelose againe hitutuvefosedi, sa'eyana Yesu i'atagine kadu sa'eyana i'imawane.
Tomunugakai'afu Yesu buye hikivekelosedi fa'ina gavaimi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tuwai-mo'ena gigaheye-vagahina, medema a gilakayemu velemo'ena gigayo,
Hinuwanuwa vaita Bana'e tokoyona adi loi kalivana.]

Meda anafaiweya abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala hihawavelaigena buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Mali kaliva gikibababaledi tu Tauna keke anafaiweya ginakibababaleni. Ka'i O'eni velemo'ena Yaubada yana Tovegida ide miYuda yada tokaiwabu amanadi, au adamoya kelose againe auhe'ama udahobu be ime ana'ita-yo anadava.” Hidedemi miYuda adi tonagona hihawavelaigena, ada kadu badi Bana buye kelose againe hitutuvefosedi-ma hivebutu hihawaluvetonovena.
Kauwana getadiya tu umalovana babi matatabuna gi'uyuyubodena be ginunauwena mala gilavina againe.
Au mala gilavina Yesu gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Elai Elai lama sabakitani?” “Ho yaku Yaubada yaku Yaubada, gavana fa'ina unuyabuyabuku?” Bonana ana kaivila au hidede amine.
Ada tolauboda tufoidi hinogalini-yo higayo, “Wanogali, Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Elaiya fa'ine gikovakova.”

Ada kaliva sa'eyana gimadu balou givaina digo oine golagolana againe gi'utuvina ai againe gi'etokwanena ada gitunena be higa ginayuna, ada gigayo, “Kanaboda be kana'itana, ka'i Elaiya gina'ela be gina'etoyauna o ka'i keke.”
Tu Yesu gikova'awafatafata-yo yawaina gihavaina.
Gi'alika-yo manuwa-tafalolo vetawana-tabu ana abaseboda kaleko gi'ahailugana be higa vaita abaluku Yaubada againe gi'ayauna.
Tu tolugaviya adi togiyomatana Yesu magigine gihaga-ma yana kova ginogalina ada gavaiya'amine gi'alika ma gi'itana againe, gigahe gigayo, “Wona velemona hida hima kaliva Yaubada Natuna.”

Boi Yesu Galili ana fafaliya gimiyami ana toveya badi vevine-dina hibwa'ulina be tova moya'aina hi'ita'itave'avina. Kadu vevine velugadiyao moya'aidi Yelusalema againe Bana buye hi'ela-ma kadu hilulauboda.

Mala gisilavina tu Yosefa kwanaAlamadiya giyemu. Bana kaliva kikaiwabuna miYuda yadi Koniselo agaidiya, ada kadu bana tauna Yaubada yana aituha ginalakayemu fa'ina gilulauboda, higa kaliva yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya. Ada medema tovai-nadi Abamaduviviya ana kidewadewa ana tova higa bogiyadi sabati. Hidema fa'ina Yosefa gi'asevatu be gina Failato againe giluku Yesu wowona fa'ina give'o'ola.
Ada Failato Yesu ahe gi'alika ma ginogalina againe nuwana givegafo'uya'uya. Au tolugaviya adi togiyomatana giyowanina be gi'ela gitoliyena ka'i Yesu ahe gi'alika o ka'i keke.
Bana tonagona givenuwa'atana higa vaita a gi'alika, au Yesu wowona Yosefa againe gihawahegena.

Au Yosefa gina kaleko kwayakwayana gikimoneni-yo gina wowona gikakilina, kalekoya gifafana be tomohuyahuya kuga hinagene giyalana-ma againe giselukuwena. Ada au kabala lakahina againe tomohuyahuya ana eda'awana give'enobodana.
Meli vineMagidala kadu Meli Yosese hinana hai wowona gihuyana-ma hi'itana.
Tu sabati, higa Satadei, a hihegena tu Meli vineMagidala kadu Meli Yemesa hinana kadu Salome hina vanedimodimo hikimonena be hinana Yesu wowona hinabunamina.
Au tafaloloya kauwana giyemuna-mo'a ma hilowoga be hina tomohuyehuyeya.
Edeya hinauna tu buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Hakwadi kabala tomohuyahuya ana eda'awana gi'enobodana-ma ginave'awawani ide fa'ideya?”
Mena kabalai-nadi ma lakahi-mo'ena. Tu hi'italele againe, tamo hakwadi kabala give'awawana ma hi'itana.
Au tomohuyehuyeya hiluku-yo kwanatubulakahina sa'eyana hi'itana, vaigau kwayakwayana gi'osena ada tomohuyahuya i'atagine gihiyoto. Hi'ita-yo ase'asedi gi'akolukoluna.
Bana gigahedi gigayo, “Keke wanamatauta. A gahalamanena Yesu kwanaNasaledi hikivekelosena-ma walelelena. Keke hidede againe gidamiyami, au gimididi-havagi. Wa'ela be abaga hisena-ma wa'ita.
Wana'ita-yo au wanamaduna ana tomuliya Fita buye wanagahedi wanagayo, Yesu Galili againe wai ginagona yuwadedei wana'itana boi gigaheyena amine.”
Au vevine himadulowoga tomohuyahuya hi'otayabuyabuna, fa'ina ase'asedi gi'akolukoluna kadu hivetatava. Ada himatauta fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi hidavenuwa'atani.
Tu mala gilauna tafaloloya Yesu ahe gimididi-havagi yo Meli vineMagidala againe Tauna gimidi'ivemogatalina. Bana Meli-nadi boi yafune seveni hiluvaiyena tu Yesu giwavidi.

Au Meli gina be badi boi Yesu buye himiyami-ma givenuwa'atadi. Badi yadi wanuwavita hitagitagi tu givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Yesu yawayawana gimimiyami. Iya tauku ga'itana.” Tu yana gahe keke hidavetumaganeni.
Muliya Yesu ana ita tulina amine tomuliya adi'iselu agaidiya giyemu. Badi melala kabi'ona wala'aiya hinauna tu Yesu badi agaidiya Tauna gi'ivemogatalina.
Au Yelusalema againe hiyewadi be tomuliya velugadiyao hivenuwa'atadi tu badi yadi gahe keke hidavetumaganeni.

Muliya-mo'ane yana yo'o ileveni hi'au'a tu badi agaidiya Tauna gi'ivemogatalina. Ada gidakeyedi yadi vetumagana keke kadu tagadi gikulu fa'ina, badi ahe gimididi-havagi yo hi'itana-ma yadi gahe keke hidavetumaganeni. Hidema fa'ina gidakeyedi.
Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Fafali moya'aina agaidiya wanana be kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya wanalulumamalena.
Gava kaliva ginavetumaganeku-yo ginabafitaiso, medema kibababala ginanuhagana. Atu gava kaliva keke ginavetumaganeku, medema aimo matahiwadi ginanuhagana.

Ada badi hivetumaganeku-ma faiwala ana iya'iyaya hidede amine hinaseyemaunena. Aku eganeya yafune hinawaviwavidi, meya tulina tulina agaidiya hinalulukahihi. Ka'i oloto hinasilakahina o ka'i gufa laulaugina hinayuna digo, keke hinabwavi. Nimadi to'aulolo agaidiya hinaseni-yo hinayamumu. Vetumagana ana iya'iyaya au hidede amine.”

Badi tomuliya ma hitauya fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hilumamala, ada Kaiwabu gifaiwalaveledi be aituha fifiwalana hififaisewani-yo kaliva yadi laumamala fa'ina higahe higayo, “Velemodi.” Au hidede amine.]

Yo siule Kauveya Tiyofilo. Keke gavana fa'ina tu vaita gidalubodaku be Yesu kahihina matana matana amine o fa'iniya gada'etoladina be higa ana nuwanuwa kaliva yadi vehawala againe ahe unogalidi-ma nuwanuwai-dina au velemo'ena ma unahalamanena. Boi badi kaliva Yesu yana gugai give'inubena be ginauwena ana abalauyabu ma taudiyao matadiya hi'itana ada yana venuwa'ata hilumamalena au gaitomai-dina hihawavelevelema. Kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi hivegalena be gavadi gavadi hinafameya hilakayemu, medema kahihidi hi'etoladina, badi to'itai-dina hihawavelevelema amine. Siule Kauveya, badi hi'etoladina tu iya tauku kahihi matatabuna matana matana ana abave'inuba be gina ana abalauyabu yaku wa'idibumuhiga galele-hagihagiyena, fa'ina vaita gidalubodaku be kadu iya kahihi-nadi o fa'iniya gana'etoladina.

Kahihi-nadi hidede amine. Helodi Yudiya ana fafali givehimeyena ana toveya abaveyao ana tofaisewa sa'eyana gimiyami ana egana Sakalaiya. Tofaisewai-dina yadi yo'o tulina tulina ada bana Sakalaiya Abaiya yana yo'o kalivana. Meda vavinena Elisabeti abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi yo'o kwamayokuna higa bana Eloni bwanenena.
Ada adi'iseluga yadi dewa yegayegana Yaubada matane. Kaiwabu yana vehimeya yana hawata moya'aina hi'ita'itave'avina, keke tamo adi wavita.
Tu Elisabeti kakalina fa'ina natudi keke, ada adi'iseluga hivesilakai-mo'a.
Giluku be inisenisi gikabukabuni tu kaliva moya'aidi melaleya hivaga'auta amanadi Yaubada hihawahawadavadavana.
Au Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata Sakalaiya againe auhe'ama gilakayemu, inisenisi ana aba'akabu i'atagine gimidi.
Ada Sakalaiya gi'ita-yo ase'asena gi'akolukoluna kadu gimatautave'ine.
Tu tovenuwa'ata gigahena gigayo, “Sakalaiya, keke unamatauta. Ya ve'o'ola Yaubada ahe ginogalina. Tu vavine Elisabeti natu kaliva ginavenatunena ada unavewagana Yoni.
Bana kwamana aimo ya abavemwamwala be ya abagakahikahi, kadu kaliva moya'aidi yana tubuga fa'ina hinavemwamwala.
Fa'ina bana'e aimo ginakaiwabu Yaubada matane. Ana hawata ma oine kadu mali gufa laulaugina keke ginayuni. Hinana hinavenatunena ana toveya Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginaluvaiye-vagahina.
Bana natu-nadi miIsileli tufoidi moya'aidi Yaubada yadi Kaiwabu againe ase'asedi ginakiviviyena.

Bana wai ginanagoni tu Kaiwabu wai ginamulina. Yana wafaiwala kadu yana wanuwanuwa tuwai-mo'ena Elaiya Yaubada bonana gi'awatalatalainena amine, meda bana ginafifaisewa. Yana laumamala againe kaliva ase'asedi natudiyao agaidiya ginakiviviyena be hinaveyao. Kadu todibutoyoga nuwadi ginakiviviyena be yadi dewa koyona hinahegeni-yo hinanuwanuwa-hagihagi. Au hidedemi Kaiwabu yana ela fa'ina kaliva ase'asedi ginakidewedewena.” Tovenuwa'ata yana gahe au hidede amine.
Tu bana Sakalaiya tovenuwa'ata gitoliyena gigayo, “Gavaiya'amine ganahalamaneni ya gahe velemo'ena o ka'i keke? Fa'ina hima gavekaliva kadu vavineku givekwamayoku.”
Au tovenuwa'ata gigayo, “Iya Gabeliyela. Yaubada matane gamidimidi ma Bana loseyanina gi'iveniniseku be againiya ga'ela higa hida valeya hagihagina gadalukahihiyena.

Tu unogali! Yaku gahe keke udavetumaganeni fa'ina, ago ginasebodana. Lukahihi unafaniyena unanunauwena tu gaitomai-nadi gagaheyena-ma tova gilubodana againe ginalakayemu-yo agoseboda ginahavaina.” Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigahe.
Tu gava melaleya kaliva Sakalaiya hibodabodana, ada yana miyafa'ila manuwa-tafalolo hinagene fa'ina aimo nuwadi ginauna.

Hibodaboda tu gilakayemu againe gahe keke anafaiweya. Au kaliva buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ka'i hima manuwa-tafalolo againe gi'eno'ita fa'ina agona gisebodana.” Gahe keke anafaiweya fa'ina u'une gilukahihi.
Ada ahe yana faisewa ana aituha giluyabuna, au giyewana yana manuweya.
Himiyami tu vavinena Elisabeti givehifuga ada vaikohi faifi agaidiya keke yo'oya gidanunaudadana au gimiyami yana manuweya.

Gigahe gigayo, “Ho Kaiwabu! Wona velemona Bana Tonuwakabubu! Boi kakaliku fa'ina yaku wawowomumu tu tova hidevama Kaiwabu gifaiwalaveleku-yo natuku ganuhagana, fa'ina yaku wowomumu yo'o matadiya givaihegena.” Au hidedemi Elisabeti gigahe.
Tu Elisabeti ahe vaikohi sikisi gihegedi againe, Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata ana egana Gabeliyela Galili ana melala sa'eyana againe gi'iveninisena, melala ana egana Nasaledi.
Ulaulatanina sa'eyana againe gi'iveninisena, kwamayoku-nadi kaliva ana egana Yosefa gisetagona. Bana Yosefa Devida bwanenena ada ulaulatanina ana egana Meli.
Tovenuwa'ata kwamayoku againe gi'ela gigayo. “Siule Meli, O Yaubada ginuwadoge-mo'e! Bana Kaiwabu a Toveluga.”
Tu bana Meli tovenuwa'ata yana gahe fa'ina ase'asena gi'akolukoluna lakahina ada nuwana givegafo'uya'uya gigayo, “Gavadi-yo hidedemi givesiuleyeku?”
Au tovenuwa'ata gigahena gigayo, “Meli, keke unamatauta, fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwadoga againiya givetalaiyena.
Aimo unavehifuga be natu kaliva unavenatunena ada unavewagana Yesu.
Au tovenuwa'ata gigayo, “Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginaluvaiye be Tomiyagetane-mo'ane yana faiwaleya o ginayava. Hidema fa'ina kwamana unavenatunena ma Mahalina ana kwamana ada hinavewagana Yaubada Natuna.
Wa'ita, o hina Elisabeti givekauve'a-mo'a tu givehifuga. E, bana kwamayoku hihawavekakalena-ma ahe yana vaikohi sikisi gihegedi.
Au mema gaitoma moya'aidi vitadi au Yaubada ana tagalowalowa.”
Hidedemi gigahe-yo Meli gigayo, “Yamumuna. Iya Kaiwabu ana agetoga. Gavaimi ugaheyena medemi agaikuya gidalakayemu.”

Gimiyami tu Meli gikidewadewa be gilowoga, Yudiya ana avala'oya againe gimaduna ana melala sa'eyana againe gihobudamana be higa Elisabeti gina'itana. Sakalaiya yana manuweya giluku-yo Elisabeti gilusiuleyena.

Ada Elisabeti Meli yana lusiule ginogalina againe kwamana kamone gikolekole lakahina au Alu'aluwa Mahalina Elisabeti giluvaiye-mo'ena be gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “O'eni ma Yaubada ahe ginuwakabubuye-mo'e. Ya vemwamwala mali vevine moya'aidi yadi vemwamwala gitubuhegena kadu kwamana unavenatunena-ma Yaubada yana nuwakabubu lakahina ginanuhagana.
Gavadi-yo hida nuwakabubu lakahina iya ganuhagani, higa o yaku Kaiwabu hinana u'ela agaikuya uwakawaka?
U'ita, ya lusiule ago ganogalina againe kwamana kamokuya vemwamwala gi'ayauneni-yo gikolekole lakahina.
Gavadi unanuhagana Kaiwabu gigaheyena-ma uvetumaganena fa'ina, ya vemwamwala gavatubuga!”
Ase'asekuya Kaiwabu gadavadavana,
kadu Yaubada aku Tokibababala againe
alu'aluwaku givemwamwala lakahina
gi'itanuwakabubuyeku.
Adamoya be aimo hinanunauwena
kaliva adi hewahewa moya'aidi
yaku vemwamwala gavatubuga
medema hinayakayakahina.
Fa'ina Bana Tofaiwala-mo'a
abayaulowoga iya fa'ikuya gifaisewana,
Bana ana egana mahamahalina.
medema agaidiya yana hinekalikali,
adi hewahewa adi hewahewa.
Nimana yana faiwala ahe ginaseyemaunena.
Gaveyao nuwahinagediya hiseselakalaka
medema ahe ginaluyauyauledi.
be yadi didiga'u'u hinahegena,
tu tonuwahobu ginakilakahidi.
tomafulauga ahe ginave'ahiyauwadi,
tu wakalivadiyao makagekagediyao
ginawavidi be hinana.
yana veluga fa'ina giwonadabadaba,
Abelahamo ana unumamomo buye'i.
Mena yana gahe keke havahavaina
au yana hinekalikali againe
nuwana ahe ginanunauyena,
kadu yana wonadabadaba amine
ide miIsileli ana agetogamomo
ahe ginakive'avida ada veluga fa'ina.
Au hidedemi Meli yana kwelidavadava.
Ada auwe vaikohi tohiye amine Meli Elisabeti buye himiyami tu muliya giyewana yana melaleya.
Meli gina tu Elisabeti yana venatuna ana tova giyemu be kaliva givenatunena.
Tobohiyadiyao kadu yadi yo'o kalivadi valeyadi hinogalina higa Kaiwabu gihinekalikaliyedi lakahina, ada badi'e buye hivemwamwala.
Badi higayo, “Hima gavana-yo hida egana keke tamo ami yo'o agaidiya gidawahini tu hida kwamana ginawahini?”
Au tamana againe u'udi hilewalewana be higa hinahalamanena gava egana ginaluwatuyeni.
Au aba'etoladi give'o'ola be gi'etoladina, “Ana egana Yoni.” Ada moya'aidi hiyaulowoga.
Ada auhe'ama awana gita'ala be agona gi'afolena ada givebutu gigahegahe Yaubada gidavadavana.
Au yadi yo'o buye himiyami-ma himatautave'ine. Ada Yudiya ana avala'oya melalidi tulina tulina agaidiya gaitomai-dina moya'aidi hilakayemu-ma fa'idiya hilulukahihi.
Ada moya'aidi valeyai-nadi againe nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya higayo, “Hida kwamana aimo gavadi ginagani?” Au hidedemi higahe fa'ina Kaiwabu gifaiwalavelena ma hi'itana.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina Yoni tamana Sakalaiya giluvaiyena be Yaubada yana venuwa'ata gigaheye-vagahina gigayo,
Kaiwabu miIsileli yada Yaubada
kanadavadavana fa'ina
yana yo'o ahe gina'itanuwakabubuyeda,
ada vita agaidiya ginatutuvehobuda.
Ada Tokibababala fifiwalana
yana tofaisewa Devida bwanenena ma
ide fa'ideya gina'iveyemaunina.
Tuwai-mo'ena falofita mahamahalidiyao
Yaubada bonana hi'awatalatalainena
ada yana wonadabadaba hidede amine.
kadu gaveyao moya'aidi hivenikohiyeda
medema agaidiya ginalugolegoleda.
ada yana veyao mahamahalina
kadu yana wonadabadaba buye
bwaneneda Abelahamo againe gisena,
medema againe nuwana ginanunauyena.
Gigahe vaita ide miIsileli
nibaideyao nimadiya ginalugolegoleda
be Bana againe adafaiweya kanafaisewa
kanadavadavana keke yada wamatauta.
Kadu yada dewa mahamahalina
be yada nuwanuwa yegayegana
Bana matane adafaiweya kanamiyami
yawaida ana aituheya.
Au hidedemi Yaubada yana kibababala fa'ina Sakalaiya gigahe.
Kadu Sakalaiya natuna fa'ine gigaheye-vagahina yana gahe gi'alavekwelina gigayo,
O natuku, Tomiyagetane-mo'ane
bonana ana to'awatalatalaina
amine kaliva o hinavewaga.
O wai unanagona be Kaiwabu
yana eda unakidewedewena.
Kaiwabu yana yo'o unavenuwa'atadi
yadi dewa koyodi hinahegedi-yo
Kaiwabu yadi koyona ginayawelina
be hidedemi adi kibababala hinavaina.
fa'ina yada Yaubada Tohinekalikali-mo'a.
Kauwana gilaka be gituvemahalida amine,
ada Tokibababala nuwada ginakivemahalina.
Kadu badi uyuyuya be alika liline
himimiyami-ma ginakivemahalidi,
ada aseniwalova ana eda againe
moya'aida ginasiviviyeda.
Au hidedemi Sakalaiya natuna yana faisewa fa'ina gigaheye-vagahina.
Ada bana kwamana gilakalakata tu yana nuwanuwa againe gi'ase'asevatu, ada babigaga againe gimiyami ginunauwena tu yana iveyemu ana tova miIsileli yadi yo'o matadiya.

Tu Yoni kabi'one miLoma badi miYuda yadi fafaliya hivehivehimeya. Medema tovai-nadi Loma Tokaiwabu ana egana Sisa-Ogosito gimiyami. Bana givehimeya be fafali tulina tulina kalivadi adi egana hida'etoladi be higa yana yo'o adi kilagalaga ginahalamanena.
Mena eganayaudi-nadi yaudi nagona ada bana Kwiliniyo Siliya ana fafali againe givehivehimeya ana toveya gilakayemu.
Au moya'aidi eganayaudi fa'ina sa'eyana sa'eyana taudiyao yadi melaleya hina.
Bedelihema againe Meli buye hina eganayaudi fa'ina. Tu bana kwamayoku gisetago-mo'ena aimo keke buye hidamiyami tu givehifuga.
Yuwadedei himiyami tu yana venatuna ana tova a giyemu.
Au yana tomo'ainagona givenatunena, kaleko vaita fai amine medema againe hifafana au yomuyomu adi kwame againe hive'enobalina fa'ina wakawaka-manuwa gimaga-mo'a be yadi abaga keke.
Tu Bedelihema awa'awanine to'itave'avina sifi yadi sifi ubuleya himiyamiyatago-malalaugedi.
Himiyami tu Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana giyemaunidi ada Kaiwabu yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gituvemahali-'owodi yo himatautave'ine.
Tu tovenuwa'ata gigahedi gigayo, “Keke wanamatauta, au wanogali! Valeya hagihagina agaimiya ga'aliyena be valeyai-nadi againe omi miIsileli ami yo'o vemwamwala lakahina wananuhagana.
Adamo'uya-mo'a Devida yana melala againe Tokibababala omi fa'imiya gitubuga, Bana'e Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso Kaiwabu.
Yaku gahe au velemo'ena ma ana iya'iyaya hidede amine. Fwefweya kaleko vaita fai amine againe hifafana-ma wananuhagana, fwefweyai-nadi yomuyomu adi kwame againe gidadauda.”
Gigahe-yo auhe'ama lobama ana tolugaviya adi yo'o lakahi-mo'ena bana tovenuwa'ata buye himiyami, Yaubada hidavadavana higayo,
“Yaubada getane-mo'ane kanakivekaiwabuna,
gava babiya kaliva gaveyao
Yaubada yana nuwakabubu hinuhagana,
medema agaidiya kukuya ginayemu.”

Au hidede amine lobama ana tovenuwa'ata Yaubada hikwelidavadavani tu hinuyabuyabudi be lobameya hiyewadi. Hina-yo to'itave'avina sifi buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Wa'ela be kanana Bedelihema againe kanahobu gaitoma ahe gilakayemu be Yaubada ide agaideya gigaheyena-ma kana'itana.”
Au himaduna be hilele Meli Yosefa hinuhagadi kadu fwefweya buye'i, Bana yomuyomu adi kwame againe gidauda.
Ada ahe hi'ita-yo au kwamana kahihina gavaimi tovenuwa'ata givenuwa'atadi medemi hi'awatalatalaina, ada gaveyao moya'aidi to'itave'avina sifi yadi gahe hinogalina, medema hiyaulowoga.
Tu mena gaitomai-dina agaidiya Meli nuwadi ginunauyena be tova moya'aina hinuwanuwadadana.
Badi to'itave'avina sifi ma hiyewadi Yaubada ana egana hikikilakahina, gaitoma moya'aidi ahe hinogalidi be hi'itadi fa'idiya hidavadavana. Yadi ita meda tovenuwa'ata yana gahe amine.
Tu kwamana ana aiyeta eita givaidi-yo Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowone hinatomogolohina ana toveya hivewagana Yesu, eganai-nadi aimo hinana keke hidavehifuga tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata giyakahina.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana Yelusalema againe gimiyami ana egana Simiyoni. Bana kaliva yegayegana Yaubada gimatamatausena kadu Yaubada yana Tovegida miIsileli ginakibababaledi-ma yana yemu fa'ina gilulauboda. Ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina bana againe gimiyami.
Ada boi Alu'aluwa Mahalina bana againe gihawavemogatala higa vaita keke ginamadu'alika tu nagona Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso gina'itana. Gina'itani-yo gina'alika.

Au kwamana hi'aliyena-ma tovai-nadi Alu'aluwa Mahalina Simiyoni gigahena be manuwa-tafalolo againe giluku. Yosefa Meli kwamana Yesu hi'aliyena be hinahuluvina buki-vehimeya gigahe amine ma Simiyoni kwamana gifewana be Yaubada gidavadavana.
Yana kwelidavadava hidede amine.
Kaiwabu-yo, adamoya iya ya tofaisewa
yaku wanuwayamumu unavega'auleku.
tauku matakuya ahe ga'itana.
Kibababalai-nadi ana eda ukidewedewena
yo'o tulina tulina matadiya
kadu Bana fa'ine ya yo'o miIsileli
kaiwabu lakahina ananuhagana.
Au hidedemi Simiyoni yana kwelidavadava.
Tu kwamana tamana hinana Simiyoni yana gahe Yesu fa'ine hiyaulowogena.

Au Simiyoni give'o'oledi be Yaubada ginanuwakabubuyedi tu hinana Meli gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ita, hida kwamana Yaubada givegidena be miIsileli tufoidi moya'aidi hinavenikohiyena-ma adi agolaufofola hinanuhagana tu tufoidi moya'aidi Bana againe hinahawahegedi-ma adi kibababala hinanuhagana. Kadu Yaubada Bana ginasena iya'iyaya fa'ina, higa kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi hinahawavekoyoyeni-yo yadi nuwahinage kabu'avane ginayemu. Ada kadu omi ase'asemi gina'u'aulolo vaita giyo gida'onani.”

Ada Meli Yosefa manuwa-tafalolo againe kwamana Yaubada matane hisena ma bai-nadi againe Ana giyemu, lilidiya gimidi be Yaubada givesiuleyena, kadu miYelusalema agaidiya kwamana fa'ine gigahegahe gigayo, “Hida kwamana ada Tokibababala, Bana'e fa'ine kalulauboda amanadi.”
Ada kwamana gilakalakata tu nuwane gififaiwala kadu nuwana gi'ayauyauga-mo'a. E, Yaubada yana nuwadogeya gimiyami.
Bana Yesu ana malamala tuwelo givaidi againe badi buye hina tafalolo againe yadi dewa amine.
Ada tafalolo ahe gihavaini-yo hinana tamana hiyewadi tu kwamana Yesu Yelusalema againe gimiya, keke hidahalamaneni.
Tu badi hivaitana yo'o hinagediya buye hidanauna fa'ina, aiyeta sa'eyana hinauna tu tobohiyadiyao kadu yadi yo'o agaidiya hivebutu hilelena.
Ada hi'i'avani-yo hiyewadi Yelusalema againe hilelena.
Hilelele tu aiyeta anaveto againe manuwa-tafalolo hinagene hinuhagana, tovehawala hinafadiya givetogani tu badi givanevanenegedi kadu gitotoliluveluvedi.
Au moya'aidi yana nuwahuya yana bonalaufata hinogalini-yo ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana.
Tu hinana tamana hi'itana againe hiyaulowoga. Badi hinana higahena higayo, “Natuku, gavadi-yo hidedemi uhuluvima? Tama be ima'e yama wanuwavita o alelele.”
Bana gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo waleleleku? Vaita omi wadahalamaneni gilubodaku be Kamaku yana manuweya gadamiyami.”
Tu yana gahe hilukayokayoyena.
Au Bana badi buye hina Nasaledi againe hiyewadi, ada buye himiyami tu bonadi gi'abi'abina. Badi hinana ma gaitomai-dina moya'aina agaidiya nuwadi ginunauyena.
Tu Yesu yana wanuwahuya gilakata ada Bana againe Yaubada be kaliva nuwadi giyamumu.

Loma Tokaiwabu ana egana Sisa-Taibiliyo malamala fifitini givehivehimeya tu Yaubada bonana Yoni Sakalaiya natuna againe gilakayemu, bana babigaga againe gimiyami-tu. Medema tovai-nadi Fonitiyo-Failato Yudiya ana fafali givehivehimeyena, bana Helodi Galili ana fafali givehivehimeyena ada tobohiyana Filifi Ituliya be Tilakonaidi adi fafali givehivehimeyedi, kadu bana Laisaniya Abilene ana fafali givehivehimeyena. Au hidedemi tovehimeya adi loi, tu tovai-nadi againe Anasi be Kaiyafasi abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu.

Au Yaubada Yoni againe gigahe-yo Yoni gufa ana egana Yolidani awa'awanina moya'aina agaidiya ginunudadana tu gilulumamala gigayo, “Yami dewa koyona wanavenikohiyena be wanabafitaiso. Wananuwavilana be Yaubada yami koyona ginayawelina.”
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya yana buki againe gi'etoladina amine, meda Yoni gihuluva. Aiseya gigayo,
Kaliva agona hinogalina wala'aiya gikovakovadadana
gigayo, Kaiwabu yana eda wanavetauna
yana eda ase'asemiya wanakidewedewena.
Nu'awa'awahagana wanavetauna,
oya lakahidi kabi'odi wanayalamoidi,
eda nubalabaladi wanakivetuvetunudi,
kadu eda dabodabodi wanalu'ukeukedi.
Wana'ihagihagi be kaliva moya'aidi
Yaubada yana kibababala hina'itana.
Au hidedemi Aiseya yana gahe.

Tu Yoni kaliva moya'aidi bana againe hiyo'oyo'o be ginakivebafitaisoyedi-ma agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Omi vaita oloto koyona ana egana vaiba natuneyao amine. Hakwadi givenuwa'atami-yo, vaita Yaubada yana ila'a omi agaimiya wada'oseni? Keke amifaiweya Yaubada wana'oseni.

Omi wagahe vaita yami koyona wadahegeni-yo wadahagavilami. Au dewa yamumuna wanafaisewani-yo yami hagavila au velemo'ena ma anahalamanena. Kadu keke wanavebutu taumiyao agaimiya wanagahe wanagayo, Ide Abelahamo bwaneneneyao fa'ina kadu ide Yaubada natuneyao. Au gagahemi Yaubada anafaiweya ginakilowemi tu hida kabala agaidiya kaliva ginabubudi be Abelahamo ana yo'oya ginasedi.
Kadu'e adamoya tamuyoko ahe hiyadalina be ai hinalu'inubadi, ada ai sa'eyana sa'eyana guwadi keke yamumuna ma hinataladi be ai'ala'alata againe hinahegedi. Ai-dina amine omi'iyao.”
Au hidedemi Yoni gigahegahe tu yo'oyo'o higahena higayo, “Au gavadi anagani?”
Bana gigayo, “Hai kaliva ana aikeva luhei, medema gilubodana be kaliva ana aikeva keke ma gidavelena. Meda anafaiweya a'a gidafolakena.”
Yoni gigahedi gigayo, “Takesi ana manigaga wanayaudi, keke taumiyao fa'imiya wanavai-kawowoni.”

Tu kadu tolugaviya tufoidi hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Kadu ime gavadi anagani?” Bana gigayo. “Keke kaliva yadi lokoloko wanalemadi kadu keke kaliva wanakiholiholidi. Fatami fa'ina wanavenuwakibokibo.” Au hidedemi Yoni gigahedi.

Yoni yadi nuwahinage gibonalaufata gigayo, “Iya'eku ma gufa againe gakivebafitaisoyemi tu kaliva sa'eyana gifaiwalahegeku-ma gi'ela'ela. Bana kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu iya kwamana kabisoku fa'ina keke akufaiweya Bana againe ganave'agetoga-yo ana ageyafayafa adi aba'aiyauga ganayauni. Bana'e ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe tufoimi ginakivebafitaisoyemi be ginavemagami, tu tufoimi ai'ala'alata againe ginakivebafitaisoyemi mema higa vaita ginavematahiwadiyemi.

E, aimo gina'ela ada yana abasaibutu ana gi'e lakahina gina'abina be witi ana abavagakolukolu againe ginasibutuna. A'a-mo'ena yana kweda againe gina'ive'ave'ahina tu yogona ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe ginaluve'alahina.”
Au hidedemi Yoni gilumamaledi kadu enohega tulina tulina amine Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina gilu'ageyedi.
Helodi koyona moya'aina gifaisewadi tu koyona sa'eyana buye give'atutamo'aina higa Yoni deliya gisena.
Tu Yesu tauna ma ana malamala teti givaidi-yo yana faisewa givebutuna. Kaliva hivaitana Yesu tamana Yosefa tu Yosefa tamana Heli,
Heli tamana Matata, Matata tamana Livai,
Livai tamana Meliki, Meliki tamana Yanai,
Yanai tamana Yosefa,
Yosefa tamana Matatiya,
Matatiya tamana Emosi, Emosi tamana Nahumi,
Nahumi tamana Esilai, Esilai tamana Nagai,
Nagai tamana Madi, Madi tamana Matatiya,
Matatiya tamana Semeini, Semeini tamana Yoseki,
Yoseki tamana Yoda,
Yoda tamana Yowanani,
Yowanani tamana Lesa, Lesa tamana Selubabela,
Selubabela tamana Saladiyeli, Saladiyeli tamana Neli,
Neli tamana Meliki, Meliki tamana Adi,
Adi tamana Kosami, Kosami tamana Elimadamu,
Elimadamu tamana Eli,
Eli tamana Yosuwa,
Yosuwa tamana Eliyesa, Eliyesa tamana Yolima,
Yolima tamana Matata, Matata tamana Livai,
Livai tamana Simiyoni, Simiyoni tamana Yuda,
Yuda tamana Yosefa, Yosefa tamana Yonama,
Yonama tamana Elayakimu,
Elayakimu tamana Meleya,
Meleya tamana Mena, Mena tamana Matata,
Matata tamana Nadani, Nadani tamana Devida,
Devida tamana Yese, Yese tamana Obedi,
Obedi tamana Bowasi, Bowasi tamana Salamoni,
Salamoni tamana Nasoni,
Nasoni tamana Aminadabu,
Aminadabu tamana Adimina, Adimina tamana Ani,
Ani tamana Hesiloni, Hesiloni tamana Felesi,
Felesi tamana Yuda,
Yuda tamana Yakobu,
Yakobu tamana Aisake, Aisake tamana Abelahamo,
Abelahamo tamana Tela, Tela tamana Naho,
Naho tamana Seluke, Seluke tamana Leu,
Leu tamana Feleke, Feleke tamana Iba,
Iba tamana Sila,
Sila tamana Kenani,
Kenani tamana Afakesedi, Afakesedi tamana Semi,
Semi tamana Nowa, Nowa tamana Lemeki,
Lemeki tamana Metusela, Metusela tamana Inoki,
Inoki tamana Yaledi, Yaledi tamana Mahalalila,
Mahalalila tamana Kenani,
Kenani tamana Inosi,
Inosi tamana Seti, Seti tamana Adama,
Adama tamana Yaubada.

Tu Yesu Yolidani againe gibafitaiso gihavaina, Alu'aluwa Mahalina ahe giluvaiye-mo'eni yo givehimeyena be babigaga againe gina aiyeta foti agaidiya gimiyamiyanana tu Setani gi'ala'aladibidibiyena. Ada aiyetai-dina agaidiya keke tamo a'a gida'u'ani fa'ina mafu gilauna.
Au Setani gi'ela gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena O'eni Yaubada Natuna, hida kabala unavehimeyena be ginave'a'a.”
Keke a'a-mo'a gagana againe kaliva yawaimi wanavivaini.”
Ka'i O'eni agaikuya unadavadava, abavehimeyai-dina matatabudi ganavele.”
Yaubada yami Kaiwabu againe wana'odu'odu,
Bana anakaibe wanahawadavadavana.”
Iya Yaubada yaku tovenuwa'ata ganavehimeyedi
be hina'itave'avi, ada nimadiya
o hinakamohi be age keke kuga ginatalani.”
Au hidedemi Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana Setani giyakahina.
Ka'i o tauni vita againe unavetalaiye digo,
keke Yaubada ya Kaiwabu yana leme ana
ve'o'ola againe unagaluvaluvani.”
Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala Yesu againe gimiyami tu Galili ana fafaliya kadu giyewana, ada medema awa'awanina moya'aina agaidiya ana valeya give'aliyahega.
Yadi manuwa-abavehawala adi egana sinagogi agaidiya givehavehawala, ada moya'aidi hidavadavana.
Tu Nasaledi againe Yesu giyemu, medema melalai-nadi againe gilakata. Ada sabati againe manuwa-abavehawala againe giluku yana dewa amine. Au gitowamidi be Yaubada bonana ginahawana.
Ada kaliva sa'eyana buki tuwai-mo'ena Aiseya gi'etoladina-ma givelena. Yesu buki givaina digo giluyagilina ada yana maita ginuhagana be gihawana-ma hidedemi gigahe.
givegideku be koyokoyo agaidiya
valeya yamumuna ganalumamalena.
Hida venuwa'ata fa'ina gi'iveniniseku,
yogoyogonidiyao adi aiyauga hinavaina
tomatakoyo hina'ita-havagi.
Kadu gi'iveniniseku be
tonuwavita nuwadi ganakiveyamumuna.
Givegideku be kaliva ganavenuwa'atadi
Yaubada yana nuwadoga ana tova a giyemu.
Au hidedemi Aiseya yana gahe Yesu gihawana.
Tu Yesu gihawa gihavaina, buki gi'uwana digo toleme giveleyeweni tu gihiyoto. Ada moya'aidi manuwa-abavehawala againe himiyami-ma hi'itakwanekwanena.
Au Yesu givebutu gigahedi gigayo, “Adamoya mena Yaubada yana gahe wanogalina-ma gilakayemu velemo'ena.”
Ada kaliva moya'aidi hihawaveyamumuyena ada gahe nuwa'abi'abina amine gilukahihi fa'ina nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya higayo, “Bana hidevama Yosefa natuna tu yana gahe ana nogala vaita kaliva sa'eyana.”

Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gavaita yada gahegahe sa'eyana agaikuya wanayakahina. Hidedemi wanagayo, O doketa fa'ina tauni unasiveyawa. Kafeneumi againe aituha fifiwalana ufaisewana be valeyana anogalina amine, meda hidei tauni ya melala againe unafaisewana.
Au hidedemi omi wanagaheku tu iya gagahemi velemo'ena, ka'i falofita Yaubada bonana tauna yana yo'o agaidiya gina'awatalatalainena, keke hinavenogaleni. Meda omi yaku yo'o wanahuluviku.

Wanogali! Omi wahalamanena tuwai-mo'ena Elaiya yana toveya keke ma'ita wehi gidalugaga ginunauwena malamala tohiye kadu hafuna, ada melala moya'aina agaidiya loka lakahina gilakayemu. Medema tovai-nadi sikwa moya'aidi Isileli ana fafaliya himiyami tu Elaiya yana yo'o miIsileli hikilowena fa'ina, Yaubada keke badi yadi sikwa agaidiya Elaiya gida'iveniniseni be ginavelugadi. Au vinemiSalefadi sikwasikwadi adikaibe agaidiya gi'iveninisena. Badi yadi melala keke Isileli ana fafaliya, au Saidoni ana fafaliya.

Meda anafaiweya tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Elaisa yana toveya, tovedawodawowo moya'aidi Isileli ana fafaliya himiyami tu keke tamo badi agaidiya gidasiveyawani, au Neyamani anakaibe gisiveyawana ada bana keke kwanamiIsileli au kwanamiSiliya.” Au hidedemi Yesu miNasaledi gigahedi.
Tu kaliva moya'aidi manuwa-abavehawala againe himiyami tu Yesu yana gahe miIsileli keke yadi wavetumagana ma fa'idiya hinogalini-yo hinuwakoyove'ine.
Au hitowamidi Yesu hiwavina be melala gihegena. Yadi melala oya fafaline hive'alahina fa'ina kabune hinauwena higa sefa againe hidatuwavelowona.
Tu Yesu yo'oyo'o hinafadiya ginu-mo'a be gina.
Yesu gina tu Kafeneumi Galili ana fafali againe gihobu'ela, ada sabati againe givebutu kaliva givehawaledi.
Ada yo'o yana vehawala fa'ina hiyaulowoga, fa'ina yana gahe ase'ase'i'onagina vaita tovehimeya velemo'ena amine.
Yesu yafune gihawatana gigayo, “Gi'alove. Una kaliva unuyabuyabuni.” Yesu gigahe-yo yafune yo'o hinafadiya kaliva gibaina be ginuyabuyabuna tu kaliva keke tamo vita gidanuhagani.
Kaliva moya'aidi hi'ita-yo hiyaulowoga-mo'a buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Hima hida gava gahe yo yana wafaiwala kadu yana wa'abavehimeya yafune givehimeyedi be kaliva hinunuyabuyabudi?”
Ada Yesu valeyana melala moya'aina Kafeneumi awa'awanine give'aliyahega.
Tu Yesu gimidi manuwa-abavehawala againe gihobu tu Saimoni yana manuweya giluku. Tu Saimoni lawana hi'aulolo lakahina wowodi vaita ai, ada badi fa'idiya Yesu hive'o'olena be ginavelugadi.
Au Yesu gina gi'odutagodi au wowodi ana lukalalava gihawatana be gituluna. Ada auhe'ama himidi be hivebutu adi wakawaka adiga hikidewedewena.
Kauwana giholuholu tu gaveyao moya'aidi agaidiya to'aulolo yadi aulolo tulina tulina himiyami, medema Yesu againe hi'aliyedi ada nimana badi agaidiya gisena be moya'aidi gisiveyawa-'owodi.
Kadu yafune kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi hiluvaiyedi-ma hinulovelovedi hikova higayo, “O'eni Yaubada Natuna.” Tu Yesu gihawatadi be keke hinagahe, fa'ina Bana Yaubada yana Tovegida ma hihalamanena.

Hida mala gilauna Yesu gilowoga be gina melalagaga againe be anakaibe ginamiyami fa'ina. Tu yo'o hivemulitawaina be Bana againe hi'ela vaita hinasiveyewana tu gigahedi gigayo, “Gilubodaku be Yaubada yana abavehimeya ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna kadu mali melala agaidiya gadalumamalena. Hidema ana inuba fa'ina Yaubada givegideku be gahobu'ela.”
Ada au manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi Yudiya melalidi agaidiya gilulumamala.
Tova sa'eyana Yesu tobu ana taliyeya gimidi gilulumamala tu yo'oyo'o hiveve'atuwahega be Bana liline hinayemu Yaubada bonana hinanogalina. Mena tobu ma ana egana Genesaleda yo Galili.
Ada waka luhei avaleya hibilakahidi-ma gi'itadi. Tobayauma ahe hihobu yadi alevatu hi'ikolakola.
Au waka sa'eyana Saimoni yana waka medema againe giyage, ada give'o'olena be ma'i ginatalalaka. Au wakeya gihiyoto yo'o givehawaledi.
Tu Saimoni gigayo, “Kauveya, bogi againe anaudadana-wayoga mala gilauna keke tamo igana adave'onadi. Tu O ya vehimeya againe kadu alevatu ganasehobuyena.”
Saimoni tobohiyana buye alevatu hidasehobuyena ma igana keke sa'eyadi hiyo'oyo'o ada moya'ai-mo'edi hive'onadi, iganeya yadi alevatu hivekaninina.
Au tobohiyadiyao waka velugana againe hiluwahiyedi be hina'ela hinavelugadi. Hi'ela tu waka luhei iganeya hivemagadi ada yadi waka kabisona hidaboluna.
Tu Saimoni-Fita gi'itana againe tugana give'etodonena Yesu againe gi'ibo'ula gigayo, “Ho Kaiwabu, yaku dewa koyona fa'ina unanuyabuyabuku.”
Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina igana moya'ai-mo'edi hive'onadi againe ase'asena gi'alilihiwana kadu tobohiyaneyao buye'i.

Meda anafaiweya Yemesa Yoni, Sebedi natuneyao, ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana Saimoni ahenao buye bayaumeya hififaisewa amanadi. Tu Yesu Saimoni gigahena gigayo, “Keke unamatauta. Tova adamoya be tova gi'ela'ela againe keke igana tu kaliva unave'onadi be hinamuliyeku.”
Ada yadi waka avaleya hibilakahidi au gaitoma moya'aidi hidibutoyogedi be Yesu againe hivetomuliya.

Tova sa'eyana Yesu melala sa'eyana againe gimiyami tu tovedawodawowo-mo'a Bana againe gi'ela. Kaliva Yesu gi'ita-yo gi'ibo'ula-mo'a be gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Kauveya, ka'i O nuwanuwa amine o afaiweya yaku aulolo unakolana.”
Gigahe-yo Yesu nimana gitunena be gikibwa'ena ada gigahena gigayo, “Ika, Iya nuwanuwaku. Unayamumu.” Ada auhe'ama ana dawodawowo gihavaina.
Tu Yesu valeyana give'aliyahega-mo'a ada yo'oyo'o hivagavaga'auta be bonana hinanogalina kadu yadi aulolo againe hinabwaina.
Atu Yesu yo'o ginunuyabuyabudi be ginauna melalagaga agaidiya give'ove'o'ola.

Tova sa'eyana Yesu givehavehawala tu badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Bana liline hihiyoto, badi Galili be Yudiya melalidi moya'aina agaidiya kadu Yelusalema againe hitauya be hi'ela amanadi. Ada Yaubada yana faiwala kaliva adi siveyawa fa'ina Yesu againe gimiyami.
Mededei kaliva sa'eyana walogina gi'a'uwana-ma gimiyami. Ada kaliva tufoidi bana kaliva ana iviya gidauda-ma hiwahina be higa hinalukuwena Yesu matane.
Tu yo'o lakahina fa'ina hilukuwe-wayoge keke adifaiweya. Au manuwa getane hilakavena be manuwa getana hikakina, ada tovefela wa'ivina kaliva hinafadiya hisehobuyena Yesu matane.

Tu vehimeya ana tovehawala be Falisi hivebutu nuwahinagediya higahegahe higayo, “Ha! Hida kaliva gigahe vaita Bana koyona adi to'aiyawela. Bana vaita hakwadi-yo Yaubada gihawatagoni, fa'ina Yaubada anakaibe koyona adi to'aiyawela?”
Hidede amine nuwahinagediya hitoliluvaluva tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gi'ayauneni-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo ase'asemiya watoliluvaluva?

Gavaimi tovefela againe ganagahe-yo ginalakayemu? Ka'i ganagayo, Ya koyona ahe gayawelidi, o ka'i ganagayo, Umidi be unaudadana. Hadema vehimeya vita-mo'ena? Me kaliva ana siveyawa vaita vita-mo'ena, fa'ina ka'i ganavehimeya tu keke ginayamumu, au taumiyao amifaiweya wana'itahalamanena kaliva adi siveyawa keke akufaiweya.

Tu hida kaliva ganasiveyawana be wana'itani-yo Iya fa'ikuya wanagahe wanagayo, Velemodi. Bana Tohobu'ela kaliva yadi koyona adi aiyawela ana tagalowalowa.” Ada au tovefela againe gigahe gigayo, “Againiya gagahe. Umidi, a ivi uwahi be una ya manuweya.”
Auhe'ama tovefela moya'aidi matadiya gimidi, ivi gidudauvena-ma gi'uwana ada giwahina be gina yana manuweya. Ginauna tu Yaubada ana egana gikikilakahina.
Au moya'aidi hi'ita-yo ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana be Yaubada ana egana hikilakahina kadu himatautave'ine higayo, “Keke kanawona! Adamoya iya'iyaya ka'itayauyogena.”
Muliya Yesu gilowoga ginauna tu takesi ana toyaudi sa'eyana gi'itana, ana egana Livai. Bana takesi ana abayaudi againe gihiyoto. Ada gigahena gigayo, “Unamuliyeku.”
Au gitowamidi gaitoma moya'aidi gidibutoyogedi tu Yesu againe givetomuliya.
Tu muliya bana Livai yana manuweya avemwamwala lakahina Yesu fa'ine gisena, ada takesi ana toyaudi adi yo'o lakahina kadu mali kaliva badi buye hi'enolukekela be hi'au'a.
Tu Falisi be vehimeya ana tovehawala badi Falisi ahenao ma Yesu ana tomuliya agaidiya hi'alawoluwolu higayo, “Gavai'ona-yo wama takesi ana toyaudi be tokoyona velugadiyao buye wa'a'au'a?”
Ada Yesu yadi gahe ginogalini-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Badi yadi aulolo keke ma keke doketa againe hinana, tu to'aulolo ma nuwanuwadi doketa yana leme.

Ada toyamumu keke doketa yana leme hinaleleni amine, meda anafaiweya Iya gahobu'ela be keke toyamumu vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina-ma ganakovadi. Au gahobu'ela tokoyona ganakovadi be yaku leme againe hinahagaviladi fa'ina.”

Tu Falisi Yesu higahena higayo, “Tova moya'aina Yoni ana tomuliya hilabelabewaviyo tu hive'ove'o'ola kadu meda ime Falisi ama tomuliya hihuluhuluva, tu a tomuliya ma tova moya'aina a'a hi'au'a bwai hiyuyu.”
Yesu gigayo, “Tonagi aimo ana yo'o buye hinamiyami ana toveya, keke amifaiweya ana yo'o kalivadi wanavehimeyedi vaita nagi ana avemwamwala againe hinamiya-kawowo be a'a keke hina'ani.

Tu aimo tonagi hinanauwena lauveya ana toveya, au medema tovai-nadi ana yo'o hinamiya-kawowo, a'a keke hina'ani. Meda anafaiweya Iya yaku kaliva buye amimiyami fa'ina keke hidalabelabewaviyo.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.

Kadu'e Yesu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana badi agaidiya gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Ka'i kaliva nuwanuwana aikeva gikoyo-ma ginabwadina digo, keke kaleko ivaguna againe kasimina ginasikaninini bwadi fa'ina. Ka'i hidede amine gidahuluva, au kaleko ivaguna gisikaninina-ma gidakivekoyona, kadu bwadi kaleko ivaguna keke aikeva tuwaina gidalubodani fa'ina ana ita tulina.

Kadu keke tamo hakwadi oine ivaguna manugose kwafilidi tuwaina againe ginahiwani. Ka'i hidede amine gidahiwana digo, oine ivaguna gidatubuga be kwafilidi tuwaina ahe gikwakwana-ma gida'afolena ada au oine babiya gidamadu-'owoga kadu kwafilidi gidakoyo.
Au gilubodana be oine ivaguna kwafilidi ivaguna agaidiya hidahiwana.

Kadu keke tamo hakwadi oine tuwaina hinayuni-yo muliya nuwanuwana oine ivaguna ginayuni. Au ginagahe ginagayo, Oine tuwaina anayu hagihagi-mo'ena.” Au hidedemi Yesu kaliva yadi dewa tuwaina nuwadi gi'abina-ma gigahetalahobuhobuyedi.
Tu badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi hi'itadi-yo higayo, “Gavadiyo sabati ana vehimeya keke wada'itave'avini?”
Au hidedemi gigahedi kadu gigayo, “Iya Tohobu'ela sabati ana to'itave'avina. Kaliva yadi dewa sabati againe Iya gavehivehimeyena.”
Kadu sabati sa'eyana againe manuwa-abavehawala againe giluku be givehavehawala, ada kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami nimana i'atagina gifwalele-vagata.

Tu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu badi Falisi nuwanuwadi gaitoma sa'eyana hinanuhagani-yo Yesu hinahawavekoyoyena fa'ina, hi'ita'ita-kwanekwanena be hina'itana ka'i nimakoyo sabati againe ginakiveyamumuna o ka'i keke.
Tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamaneni-yo au nimakoyo againe gigahe gigayo, “Umidi be u'ela we'ai.” Au gitowamidi be gina Yesu liline.
Ada moya'aidi gilumataviledi tu nimakoyo againe gigahe gigayo, “Nima utune.” Au nimana gitunena ada auhe'ama giyamumu.
Tu vehimeya ana tovehawala be Falisi hinuwakoyove'ine, hivebutu hive'agahegahe vaita gavaimi hinaga-yo Yesu hinaluve'alikani.
Himiyami tu Yesu gina gilaka oyeya be ginave'o'ola, ada Yaubada againe give'o'ola-malalau.
Mala gilauna ana tomuliyamomo gikovadi be hi'ela ada kaliva tuwelo agaidiya givenuwadadana be givewagadi afositolo higa bonana ana towahidadana.

Adi egana hidede amine. Saimoni tu Yesu givewagana Fita, taina Anidulu, Yemesa be Yoni, Filifi, Batolomiu, Madiu, Tomasi, Yemesa Alifiyo natuna, Saimoni bana hivewagana yo'o miLoma hivenibainedi-ma kalivana, Yudasi Yemesa natuna kadu Yudasi-Isikaliyota bana Yesu nibaineyao nimadiya gihawavemogatalena amanadi.

Tu Yesu ana yo'o tuwelo givenuwadadanedi gihavaina, buye hihobu babi lulube'une himidi. Medede againe ana tomuliyamomo adi yo'o lakahina hivaga'auta kadu yo'oyo'o mali kaliva badi buye himiyami, Yelusalema be Yudiya melalidi moya'aina agaidiya hitauya kadu Taiya be Saidoni adi fafaliya taliyeya hitauya amanadi. Badi hi'ela be Yesu bonana hinanogalina kadu yadi aulolo againe ginasiveyawadi.
Badi wayafunediyao fa'ina vita hinuhagana-ma kalivai-dina Yesu gikiveyamumudi.
Ada moya'aidi higaluvaluva vaita hinakibwa'ena, fa'ina yadi kaibwa'e againe faiwala Yesu againe giyemu be medema againe adi siveyawa hivaina.
“Omi gaveyao venuwahobu ana koyokoyo, yami vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Gavadi-yo? Aimo Yaubada yana itave'avina againe wamimiyami, ase'asemiya givehivehimeya.
Gavadi-yo? Aimo Yaubada ginave'ahiyauwami.
Omi gaveyao adamoya watagitagi, yami vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Gavadi-yo? Aimo wanavelavelaiga.

E, hidedemi hinahuluvimi ana toveya wanavemwamwala wanagakahikahi, fa'ina ami laufata lakahina aimo lobameya gidadauda. Wa'ita, omi hihuluvimi amine, meda bwanenediyao Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hihuluvidi.
Gavadi-yo? Yami abavemwamwala ahe babiya wanuhagana.
Hoiyoi omi gaveyao adamoya wa'ahiyauwa!
Gavadi-yo? Aimo mafu ginalaulaumi.
Hoiyoi omi yami waselakalaka wavelavelaiga!
Gavadi-yo? Aimo wana'ase'u'aulolo kadu wanatagitagi.
Hoiyoi omi kaliva moya'aidi hinahawaveyamumuyemi-ma kalivai-mina!
Wa'ita, bwanenediyao falofita fwayafwayadiyao hihawaveyamumuyedi, ada badi hihuluvidi amine meda omi hihuluvimi.
Badi hi'alatabutabuyemi-ma fa'idiya wanave'o'ola be higa Yaubada ginanuwakabubuyedi. Badi hikivekoyomi-ma fa'idiya wanave'o'ola.
Ka'i tamo hakwadi navanavami ginatafina au fafalina wanahawahegena be ginatafina. Kadu ka'i tamo hakwadi ami aikeva vewabana ginalemami, au ami seti keke wananuwaloloneni.
Gaveyao moya'aidi tamo gavadi fa'ina hinave'o'olemi, au wanaveledi. Ka'i tamo hakwadi yami lokoloko ginavaina, au keke yaudiyewa fa'ina bana againe wanagahe.
Gavaiya'amine nuwanuwami kaliva omi hinahuluvimi, au medede amine kadu badi wanahuluvidi.

Ka'i tonuwakabubugaga wananuwakabubuyedi tu keke tonuwalolona wananuwakabubuyedi, medema huluvai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada keke ginahawaveyamumuyemi. Wa'ita, tokoyona badi hinuwakabubuyedi-ma kadu agaidiya hinuwakabubu.

Kadu ka'i kaliva tufoidi agaimiya hina'igibagiba hagihagina ada badi'iyaogaga agaidiya meda omi wana'igibagiba hagihagina, au medema huluvai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada keke ginahawaveyamumuyemi. Wa'ita, tokoyona to'igibagiba yamumuna agaidiya meda hi'igibagiba yamumuna.

Kadu ka'i yami mani o lokoloko badi kaliva adifaiweya hinaveleyewemi-ma wanaveledi tu badi keke adifaiweya hinaveleyewemi-ma agaidiya wananuwalolonena, au medema huluvai-nadi fa'ina Bana Yaubada keke ginahawaveyamumuyemi. Wa'ita, tokoyona mali tokoyona agaidiya hifolafolaka be higa aimo yadi folaka ana kiveyewa hinanuhagana.

Tu omi keke badi amine wanahuluva. Nibaimiyao wananuwakabubuyedi, agaidiya wana'igibagiba yamumuna kadu wanafolafolaka tu yami folaka ana kiveyewa keke wananuwenuweni. Ka'i hidedemi wanahuluva, au aimo ami laufata lakahina wananuhagana kadu ami ita vaita Tomiyagetane-mo'ane natuneyao amine. Fa'ina Bana'e badi tonuwalolona kadu badi yana nuwakabubu keke hidavesiuleyeni-ma ginuwakabubuyedi.
Tamami lobameya gihinekalikaliyemi amine, meda omi kaliva wanahinekalikaliyedi.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Wanafolafolaka be Yaubada kadu agaimiya ginafolafolaka. Yana folaka hidede amine. Kaliva nau'a againe a'a ginadodona gina'atudonedonena kadu ana tufo ginadodo-havagilena tu gina'ahiwahiwana au yami vainuwana againe ginabihiwana amine, meda Yaubada yana folaka lakahi-mo'ena agaimiya. Ka'i omi lakahina amine wanafolaka, au Yaubada lakahina amine agaimiya ginafolaka. Ka'i kabi'ona amine, kadu kabi'ona.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu Yesu hidedemi gigahetalahobuhobuyedi gigayo, “Gavaimi be tomatakoyo tomatakoyohiyana edeya ginanagoyeni? Keke adifaiweya fa'ina adi'iselu awalolo againe hinabe'u.
Tosikulu keke yana tovehawala yana nuwahuya gidatubuhegeni, tu tosikulu hinasikulu-'owoga yo yadi halamana yadi tovehawala yana halamana amine.
Gavadi-yo ai ulana vaita koyona kabi'ona amine tobohiya matane u'ita'itani tu ai-mo'ena vaita koyona lakahina amine tauni mataniya keke udanuwenuweni?

Ka'i ai-mo'ena o mataniya gidadauda-ma keke uda'ita'itani, au keke-mo'a afaiweya tobohiya unagaheni unagayo, Tobohiyaku, ai ulana mata againe ganavaihegena. O meya luhei. Nagona ai-mo'ena tauni mataniya unavaihegena, higa ya dewa koyo-mo'ena unahegena, ada au afaiweya una'ita-hagihagiyena be ai ulana tobohiya matane unavaihegena, higa yana dewa koyona fa'ina unakivetuvetununa.
Wa'ita, keke tamo ai yamumuna guwana koyona gidaveguweni. Meda anafaiweya ai koyona keke guwana yamumuna gidaveguweni.
Ai sa'eyana sa'eyana guwadi againe kahalamanena. Fa'ina fiki keke ai-kawowo againe kadakoluni, kadu kelefi keke aboda againe kadakoluni.

Meda kaliva yamumuna ase'asena yamumuna fa'ina dewa yamumuna amine gihuluhuluva, kadu kaliva koyona ase'asena koyona fa'ina dewa koyona amine gihuluhuluva. Gava nuwanuwa kaliva ase'asena givemagana au medede amine gigahegahe.
Gaveyao agaikuya hi'ela'ela bonaku hinoganogalina be hi'abi'abina, medema manuwa ana to'aiyogona againe ganaluvefosena.

Bana'e ma anafaiweya kaliva manuwa giyogona. Nagona babi giyalana tunugina ogola givehobuna be kuga againe gibakina. Muliya gufa gihobu vaita manuwa gida'alugeni tu kaliva giyogo-hagihagiyena fa'ina gidauda yamumuna.

Atu gaveyao bonaku hinoganogalina tu keke hida'abi'abini, medema kaliva yana manuwa makameya giyogona, keke ogola gida'aiyala. Tu muliya gufa gihobu againe manuwa auhe'ama gimadube'u ada au gi'ayaweli-'owona.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu yana vehawala moya'aina yo'o matadiya gilukahihiyena gihavaina, gina Kafeneumi againe.
Medede againe Loma togiyomatana sa'eyana gimiyami, ada ana agetoga gi'aulolo lakahina, kabisona gida'alika. Ada togiyomatana nuwanuwana lakahina agetogai-nadi.
Ada Yesu valeyana ginogalini-yo miYuda adi tonagona tufoidi Bana againe gi'iveninisedi be hinayowanina, togiyomatana ana agetoga ginasiveyawana fa'ina.

Yesu againe hiyemu-yo hive'o'oladona higayo, “Hida togiyomatana kaliva hagihagina. Gilubodana be yana ve'o'ola udavenogalena, fa'ina nuwanuwana yada yo'o kadu tauna yana maniya yama manuwa-abavehawala Kafeneumi againe gikivemididina.”

Au Yesu badi buye hina. Hinauna tu manuwa hi'ivedaveda'ufona au togiyomatana tobohiyaneyao gi'iveninisedi be bonana Yesu againe hinayakahina vaita tauna gidagayo, “Kauveya, keke Tauni una'ivewowologilogi, fa'ina iya keke kaliva yamumuku yo yaku manuweya afaiweya unaluku. Medema fa'ina keke tauku gadakilakahiku-yo againiya gada'ela. Au mededei unamiya tu unavehimeya be O bonaniga aku agetoga ginasiveyawana.

Hidede amine afaiweya unavehimeya ma a gahalamanena, fa'ina iya kadu abavehimeya gavaina. Yaku tonagona yana vehimeya dibune gamimiyami, kadu yaku tolugaviyamomo yaku vehimeya dibune himimiyami. Yaku tolugaviya sa'eyana gavehimeyena gagayo, Una, ada au gitowamidi be gina. Kadu velugana gagahena gagayo, U'ela we'ai, ada au gi'ela. Kadu aku agetoga againe gagahe gagayo, Hidedemi unafaisewa, ada au yaku vehimeya amine gifaisewa.”

Ada Yesu togiyomatana bonana ginogalini-yo bana fa'ine giyaulowoga au gihagavilana yo'oyo'o himuliyena-ma agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Biyao! Wona velemona keke-mo'a tamo kwanaIsileli yana wavetumagana gadanuhagani hida kwanaLoma yana vetumagana amine.”
Ada au kaliva togiyomatana gi'iveninisedi-ma hiyewadi manuweya hiluku-yo agetoga ahe gibwaina-ma hinuhagana.
Tu Yesu gimiyami tu gina melala ana egana Neini againe. Ana tomuliya kadu yo'o lakahina hivebwa'uliyena.
Melala tufone giyemuyemu tu to'alika hiwahiwahinauwena be hinahuyana. Bana to'alika sikwa natudi kwanatubu'eya ada yo'o lakahina sikwa hivebwa'uliyedi.
Ada Kaiwabu gi'itadi-yo gihinekalikaliyedi gigahedi gigayo, “Keke wanatagiya.”
Au gina vaya gikibwa'ena ada towahi himididi-vagata. Yesu to'alika gigahena gigayo, “Kwamana, umidi!”

Au moya'aidi himatautave'ine be Yaubada ana egana hikilakahina higayo, “Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina lakahina agaideya gilakayemu.” Kadu higayo, “Yaubada gi'ela be ide yana yo'o gina'itanuwakabubuyeda.”
Ada au valeyai-nadi Yudiya melalina moya'aina kadu awa'awanina moya'aina gina giluyabuna.
Tu mena Yesu yana gugai moya'aina fa'ina Yoni ana tomuliya hivenuwa'atana, bana Yoni aimo deliya gimiyami-tu.

Au Yoni ana tomuliya adi'iselu giyowanidi be Kaiwabu againe gi'iveninisedi higa hinatoliluveluvena hinagayo, “Yaubada yana Tovegida gina'ela-ma ime abodabodana. Ka'i O'eni bana kalivai-nina o ka'i kaliva sa'eyana aimo anabodana?”

Ada badi kaliva adi'iselu ahe Yesu againe hiyemu-yo higahena higayo, “Yoni Tobafitaiso againiya gi'iveninisema ada nuwanuwana ginahalamanena ka'i O'eni Yaubada yana Tovegida aimo gina'ela-ma kalivai-nina o ka'i kaliva sa'eyana aimo anabodana.”
Ada medema tovai-nadi Yesu kaliva moya'aidi yadi aulolo tulina tulina agaidiya gisiveyawadi. Badi wayafunediyao gikiveyamumudi kadu tomatakoyo tufoidi moya'aidi matadi gikiveyamumuna.

Au Yesu Yoni yana kaliva gigahedi gigayo, “Wanana ada gavaimi wanogalina kadu wa'itana-ma Yoni wanavenuwa'atana, higa tomatakoyo matadi gimahalina, tovefela hinunudadana, tovedawodawowo yadi aulolo gihavaina, totagakweu tagadi gi'afolena, to'alika himididi-havagi, kadu koyokoyo Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yaubada yana kibababala fa'ina hi'ela'ela hinoganogalina.
Kadu Yoni yana toliluvaluva inubaku fa'ina ma wanagahena hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya keke gidanuwaluga medema yana vemwamwala gavatubuga!” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.

Badi Yoni ana tovenuwa'ata ahe hina tu Yesu yo'oyo'o agaidiya givebutu Yoni fa'ine gilukahihi gigayo, “Boi omi'iyao Yoni wa'itana yamina babigaga againe ana toveya, wanuwanuwa ma vaita gavadi wada'itani? Isisi'u bolimana againe gilewalewa amine, ka'i wana vaita kaliva kowakowana wada'itani?

Keke hidede amine wada'itani tu wana be ka'i gavadi wana'itani? Ka'i kaliva ana wavaigau vaita wada'itani? Keke, fa'ina kaliva adi vaigau kikaiwabuna kadu yadi walokoloko himimiyami-ma tokikaiwabu yadi manuwa lakahina againe himimiyami.

Au wanagaheku, omi wana ka'i gavadi wana'itani? Ka'i wavaitana Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina wana'itani? E, wona velemona to'awatalatalaina wa'itana tu bana Yoni ma to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi gikaiwabuhegedi.
Tuwai-mo'ena bana Yoni fa'ine Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe higa vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida againe gidagahe gidagayo,
U'ita! Yaku tovenuwa'ata gana'iveninisena
be bana wai ginanagona,
ya eda kaliva ase'asediya ginakidewedewena.

Gagahemi bana Yoni kaliva moya'aidi babiya hitubuyemu-ma gikaiwabuhegedi, tu gava kaliva ana egana kabisona Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya tu givetumagane-mo'eku, medema Yoni ana egana ginakaiwabuhegena.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi be Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Yoni yana bafitaiso hidibutoyogena, ada medema againe Yaubada yana inuba badi fa'idiya hikilowena.
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Tu omi kaliva hida tovai-nadi babiya watubuyemu-ma gavadi amine yo ganahawaluveluvemi? Yami huluva gava dewa againe ganaluvefoseni?
Au omi we'owe'o amidiya, melaleya hihiyoto tu hivetavetaunega. Yo'o sa'eyana yo'o velugadi agaidiya hikovakova higayo,
Modawa akalikalina tu omi keke wadavagavaga wadayeluyelu.
Alulaukuhi vaita alika ana tova amine tu
omi keke wadatagitagiya.
Gavaimi anaga-yo nuwami anakiveyamumuni?
Meda anafaiweya Yoni gi'ela ada keke a'a yamumuna gida'u'ani kadu keke oine gidayuyuni, ada au omi wahawavekoyoyena vaita bana wayafunena.

Tu Iya Tohobu'ela ga'ela ada a'a yamumuna ga'au'ana oine gayuyuna, ada au kadu Iya wahawavekoyoyeku wagayo, Wa'ita, Bana hima to'a-fa'ila oine ana toyu-fa'ila, kadu takesi ana toyaudi kadu tokoyona velugadiyao givevetobohiyanedi. Hidedemi wagahe tu gavaimi anahuluva-yo nuwami anakiveyamumuni?
Tu Yoni kadu Iya'eku ama'iselu Yaubada yana nuwahuya againe ka'i velemo'ena afifaisewa ma yama faisewa guwana againe wanahalamanena.” Au hidedemi Yesu yo'o agaidiya gigahe.
Tova sa'eyana tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kalivana Yesu giyowanina be buye hina'a. Yesu giyemu-yo giluku Falisi yana manuweya gi'enolukekela be gina'a.

Mena melala againe kwamayoku sa'eyadi himiyami yadi dewa udo'udona. Yesu Falisi yana manuweya gi'au'a-ma valeyana hinogali-yo bunama hiwahina be hi'ela, bunamai-nadi aba'aihiwaga kugakugana againe gidauda, kuga ana egana alabasita.

Au kwamayoku Yesu wakwaune hi'ela Bana agene himidi hitagitagi tu hivebutu matailudi againe agena hivebutana, ada u'udi tunugina againe hiluvehavehayana. Kadu yadi wave'amohimohina agena hiveyaugina bunama againe hibunamina.

Tu bana Falisi Yesu giyowanina-ma gi'itadi-yo nuwahinagene gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i hida kaliva Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina velemona digo, gava kwamayoku hikibwa'eni ma gidahalamanena higa kwamayoku koyodi.”
Ada Yesu Falisi yana nuwahinage gihalamaneni-yo gigahena gigayo, “Saimoni, yaku nuwanuwa sa'eyana againiya ganagaheyena.” Bana gigayo, “Tovehawala, au ugahe.”
Yesu givebutu gigahetalahobuhobuyena gigayo, “Wakalivana sa'eyana kaliva luhei agaidiya mani givetalaiyena be aimo hinaveleyewena. Kaliva sa'eyana K5,000 amine gibuki, kadu sa'eyana K500 gibuki.
Keke adifaiweya adi buki hinafatani againe, au adi'iselu adi buki giyawelina. Au unagaheku, kaliva adi'iselu adi tonuwakabubu againe hinuwanuwa tu hadema kaliva yana nuwanuwa lakahi-mo'ena?”
Saimoni gigayo, “Iya gavaita bana ana buki lakahi-mo'ena tu giyawelina-ma kalivai-nadi bana againe ginuwanuwa lakahi-mo'ena.” Yesu gigayo, “Ika, ugahe velemo'ena.”
Veyauga againe keke udalusiuleyeku tu tova galuku againe badi hivebutu ageku hiveyaugi-fa'ilina.
U'uku bunama againe keke udabunamini tu badi ageku bunama wamagana againe hibunamina.

Hidema fa'ina againiya gagahe, kwamayoku yadi koyona moya'aina tu Yaubada ahe giyawelidi fa'ina yadi nuwanuwa lakahina agaikuya hiseyemaunena. Tu gava kaliva yana koyona keke moya'aina tu Yaubada giyawelina, medema yana nuwanuwa Yaubada againe kabi'ona.” Au hidedemi Yesu Saimoni gigahena.
Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina wakawaka velugadiyao Bana buye hi'au'a-ma hivebutu hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ha! Bana hima hida gava kaliva yo koyona giyawelidi?”
Tu Yesu kwamayoku gigahedi gigayo, “Wavetumaganeku fa'ina yami koyona adi aiyawela wanuhagana. Yami wanuwayamumu wanana.”
Tu kaliva moya'aidi melala tulina tulina agaidiya hitauya be Yesu againe hiyo'oyo'o, ada hida gahetalahobuhobu gilukahihiyena.
Gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana yana otova witi nafona yana faheya ginauwena be gina'iyauyaulena. Witi nafona gi'i'iyauyaulena tu tufona edeya gibe'u be kaliva hivagavebabidi ada manuga hi'ela be hi'ana.
Kadu tufona babi dabodabona againe gibe'u. Ada babi keke dubadubana fa'ina gikabukabu tu gi'awa'ulodi.
Kadu tufona aboda againe gibe'u be aboda hinagene gikabu ada au yogo gifaiwala be witi gilufave'alikana.

Atu tufona babi yamumuna againe gibe'u be gikabu ma gitabo yamumuna guwana hanaledi hanaledi amine.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu tu gikovadona gigayo, “Omi kaliva watagami, au bonaku wadavenogalena.”
Muliya ana tomuliya gahetalahobuhobu-nadi ana kaivila fa'ina Yesu hitoliluveluvena.

Yesu gigayo, “Yaubada yana itave'avina ana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana omi agaimiya giyauna tu mali kaliva agaidiya gahetalahobuhobugaga amine galukahihiyedi. Gagahetalahobuhobuyedi be higa hina'ita'ita tu keke hina'itahalamaneni, kadu hinanoganogala tu keke hinahalamaneni.

Witi nafona edeya gibe'u-ma anafaiweya kaliva Yaubada bonana hinogalina tu muliya Setani gilakayemu be bona ase'asediya givaihegena be higa Yaubada keke hinavetumaganeni-yo adi kibababala hinanuhagani.

Witi nafona babi dabodabona againe gibe'u-ma anafaiweya kaliva Yaubada bonana hinogalina be yadi wavemwamwala ase'asediya hisena. Tu bonana keke hidanuwa-nunauyeni ada walamina keke ase'asediya gidavegilili fa'ina tova kabisonaga hivetumagana. Tu aladibidibi giyemaunidi ana toveya hinuwayewa.

Witi nafona abodeya ana nuwanuwa amanadi kaliva Yaubada bonana hinogalina tu tova hinunauwena againe hida babi ana vita ana kikaiwabu ana gakahikahi nuwadi givaina fa'ina, gaitomai-dina yadi vetumagana hilufave'alikana, keke gidatabo.

Atu witi nafona babi yamumuna againe ana nuwanuwa amanadi kaliva Yaubada bonana hinogalina be yadi wanuwanuwa tunutunugina kadu yadi wa'idibumuhiga hikidonena, ada yadi wa'atuvefa'ila guwadi hiseseyemaunena. Gahetalahobuhobu ana nuwanuwa au hidede amine.”
Kadu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Keke tamo hakwadi lamufa ginakabuni-yo avaeka hinagene o ka'i ivi dibune ginaseni. Au ana abasewadi againe ginasena be higa badi manuweya hiluku-ma matadi ginamahalina.

Gavadi gavadi moya'aina tova adamoya keke i'ivemogatalina medema aimo tova mulina kabu'avane ginalakayemu, kadu gavadi gavadi sevasevauyana medema aimo mahalina gina'iveyemaunina be moya'aidi hinahalamanena.

Hidema fa'ina Yaubada bonana wananogalina againe, wananogali-hagihagiyena. Fa'ina hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ginogalina be gi'ita'itave'avina, medema againe kadu nuwanuwa moya'aina ginayauna. Atu hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa keke gida'ita'itave'avini, medema yana halamana kabi'ona Yaubada ginavaihegena be ginamiya-kawowo.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu hinana kadu taineyao hi'ela hina'itana tu yo'o lakahina fa'ina keke adifaiweya hida'ela Yesu liline.
Au tamo kaliva givenuwa'atana gigayo, “Hina be taimomo eda'awaneya himidimidi, nuwanuwadi O hina'ita.”
Tova sa'eyana Yesu ana tomuliya buye wakeya hiyage ada gigahedi gigayo, “Tobu yuwa fafaline kanadamana.” Au hilowoga.
Hinauna tu Yesu gi'enonuwaulu. Auhe'ama bolimana lakahina oyeya gihobu'ela be mala koyona tobu againe gilakayemu. Gufa waka hinagene gilukuluku ada abagilagi lakahina hinuhagana.
Badi tomuliya hina hiluvaguna higahena higayo, “Kauveya, Kauveya, kabisona kana'alika!” Au Yesu gimidi bolimana lefo lakahidi gihawatadi, auhe'ama mala gi'atagona bolimana gi'alovena.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya buye miGadala yadi fafali againe hilakayemu, medema Galili ana fafali wamagigine.

Avaleya gihobu au kaliva sa'eyana melaleya gitauya-ma gimaduhagana. Bana kaliva ma yafune hiluvaiyena ada lauva tunugina konekonena gimiyami. Kadu keke manuweya gidamiyami au tomohuyahuya agaidiya givemanuwa.

Tova moya'aina yafune kaliva giluluvaiyena ada bulava kainumula againe nimana agena hiyogoyogona be hi'ita'itave'avina tu au ai'adi bulava gigologolohina ada yafune kaliva giwavina be melalagaga agaidiya gimiyami. Tu Yesu giyemu-yo yafune givehimeyena be kaliva ginanuyabuyabuna. Kaliva Yesu gi'itana againe, givebutu gikovakova Yesu agene gi'awawa gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “O'eni Yesu Yaubada Tomiyagetane-mo'ane Natuna. Gavadi iya agaikuya unagani-yo u'ela? Againiya gahawayafayafa keke unakivetavetagigiku.”
Au Yesu gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Gavaimi a egana?” Bana gigayo, “Aku egana Yo'o.” Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina yafune moya'aidi hiluvaiyena.
Au yafune Yesu hihawayafeyafena be keke kahu tunugi-vadavada'aina againe ginawavidi.
Tu yuwa oya fafaline bawe adi yo'o lakahina adiga hilelele, ada yafune hihawayafeyafena be ginahawahegedi bawe hinaluvaiyedi. Au gihawahegedi.
Gihawahegedi-yo yafune kaliva hinuyabuyabuna be bawe hiluvaiyedi, ada bawe adi yo'o matatabudi awaloloya hi'otahobu be tobu againe hitowa'alika.
Tu bawe adi tolufolofologahi hida gaitoma hi'ita-yo hi'ota be hina, melala-mo'ena kadu awa'awanine mena gaitomai-dina hilukahihiyedi.

Kaliva hinogalini-yo hitauya be gavadi gilakayemu-ma hina'itana. Ada Yesu againe hiyemu kaliva yafune hinuyabuyabuna-ma hinuhagana, bana Yesu agene gihiyoto u'una a giyamumu be ana kaleko gi'osena. Hi'ita-yo himatauta.
Ada badi to'ita kaliva wayafunena gavaiya'amine yana yamumu ginuhagani ma tomiyami agaidiya hilukahihiyena.
Hilukahihi gihavaina Gadala ana fafali kalivai-dina moya'aidi Yesu hive'o'olena be ginanuyabuyabudi, fa'ina himatautave'ine. Au wakeya giyage be giyewana.

Tu kaliva yafune hinuyabuyabuna-ma Yesu gihawayafeyafena gigayo, “Iya O buye kadana.” Tu Yesu gi'atuveyewana gigayo, “Uyewa ya melaleya be gavadi lakahina Yaubada o fa'iniya gigugaiyeni-ma kaliva agaidiya unalukahihiyena.” Ada au kaliva gina gavadi lakahina bana fa'ine Yesu gigugaiyena-ma kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya gilukahihiyena, gina melala giluyabuna.
Tu Yesu tobu fafaline giyewana againe, yo'o yuwadedei yadi wavemwamwala hilusiuleyena fa'ina moya'aidi hiyo'o be hibodabodana.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana gi'ela ana egana Yailo, bana manuwa-abavehawala ana tonagona sa'eyana. Au Yesu againe gi'ibo'ula-mo'a gihawayafeyafena higa yana manuweya gida'ela, fa'ina natuna vinetubu'eya ana malamala tuwelo gi'ali'alika. Ada au Yesu ginauna tu yo'o hiveve'atuwahega tu himidififina.

Yesu yo'o hinagediya ginauna tu kwamayoku sa'eyana buye hinauna, bana yana vaikohi be dayagina tova moya'aina gimadu-vagata. Tuwaina givebutu gi'u'aulolo be ginunauwena malamala tuwelo, doketa agaidiya yana lokoloko moya'aina givehavaina tu keke adifaiweya.
Kwamayoku Yesu wamuline gi'ela be ana kaleko bwatana gikibwa'ena, ada auhe'amanadi dayagina gihayahaya.
Au Yesu gigayo, “Hakwa'adi gikibwa'eku?” Moya'aidi hivekeke ada Fita gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, yo'oyo'o himidififi be hiveve'atuwahega.”

Au kwamayoku Yesu ahe gihalamanena ma gi'itana againe, yana wavetatava gi'ela Yesu agene gi'ibo'ula-mo'a, ada kaliva moya'aidi matadiya yana kaibwa'e inubana gihawavemogatalena kadu yana maduyamumu fa'ina gilukahihi.
Au Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Natuku, uvetumaganeku fa'ina ubwaina. Ya wanuwayamumu unana.”

Yesu aimo gilulukahihi tu kaliva sa'eyana manuwa-abavehawala ana tonagona ana egana Yailo yana manuweya gitauya-ma giyemu Yailo gigahena gigayo, “Natu kwamayoku yawaina gihavaina. Keke Tovehawala unaluve'avaleni-yo una'aliye-kawowoni.”
Tu Yesu kwamana valeyana ginogalini-yo Yailo gigahena gigayo, “Keke unamatauta, au unavetumaganeku be natu ginayamumu.”
Ada manuweya giyemu-yo yo'o moya'aidi luku fa'ina gihawatadi tu Fita Yoni Yemesa kadu kwamana tamana hinana badi'iyaogaga Bana buye hiluku.
Ada moya'aidi hitagitagigina hitagitagilauhawa, tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Auwe tagiya, kwamana keke gida'alika au gi'enonuwaulu.”
Kwamana velemo'ena gi'alika ma hihalamanena fa'ina moya'aidi Yesu hihawavelaigena.
Tu Yesu kwamana nimana gi'abina gikova gigayo, “Vinewe'owe'o, umidi.”
Au alu'aluwana kwamana againe giyewana ada auhe'ama gimidi. Ada Yesu givehimeya gigayo, “Tamo a'a kwamana wavele be gi'ani.”
Tu tamana hinana hiyaulowoga tu gihawatadi be gavadi gilakayemu-ma keke tamo hakwadi againe hinalukahihiyeni.
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya tuwelo gikovavaga'auhidi ada faiwala kadu abavehimeya giveledi be adifaiweya yafune moya'aidi hinawavidi kadu kaliva auloloya hinasiveyawadi.
Au gi'atuhegedi be Yaubada yana itave'avina fa'ina hinalumamala kadu to'aulolo hinakiveyamumudi.
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Keke tamo gavadi yamina againe wananauweni, keke aiwala keke fose keke a'a keke mani wanawahini. Kadu keke aikeva luhei wananauweni.
Gava manuwa againe wanamidiluku, medede againe wanamiyami be wanalowoga.

Kadu gava melala againe wanayemu tu keke hinavetobohiyanemi, medema melalai-nadi wanahegena againe fwayafwaya agemiya wanavagahegehegena, higa Yaubada yana nuwakoyo badi agaidiya ana iya'iyaya.” Au hidedemi Yesu ana tomuliya givenuwa'atadi.
Au hilowoga melala tulina tulina agaidiya hinuwaliliuga, Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hilumamalena, melala moya'aina agaidiya kaliva hisiveyawadi.
Bana Helodi gigahe gigayo, “Iya gavehimeya be Yoni u'una hinikehegena tu hida hima hakwa'adi-yo valeyana tulina tulina ganoganogalini?” Ada au tova gilelelena be higa Yesu gina'itana.
Tu afositolo hiyewadi-yo gavadi gavadi moya'aina higugaiyena-ma Yesu hivenuwa'atana. Au ginauwedi be melala ana egana Bedasaida againe hitogavehaila be hinaveyawai.

Tu yo'oyo'o Yesu ana tomuliya buye hami hina ma hinogalina againe, himuliyedi. Hiyemu-yo Yesu gilusiuleyedi, ada Yaubada yana itave'avina fa'ina gilukahihiyedi kadu gaveyao yadi wa'aulolo medema gisiveyawadi.

Tu mala givebutu gisilavina tomuliya tuwelo Yesu againe hi'ela higayo, “Yo'o una'atuhegedi be melala eda'uoya kadu awa'awanidi agaidiya hinana adiga hinakimonena abadauda hinalelena. Fa'ina hida melalagaga againe kamimiyami.”
Tu Bana gigahedi gigayo, “Auwe, omi wanave'adi.” Badi higayo, “Beledi kabi'odi faifigaga kadu igana luhei ime agaimeya gidadauda. Hima gavana-yo hida yo'ohala adiga anana anakimoneni?”
Hidedemi higahe fa'ina kaliva adi yo'o 5,000 amine. Tu Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Wanagahedi be hinahiyoto adi loi fifiti fifiti amine.”
Au hidedemi tomuliya hihuluva. Yo'o higahedi be moya'aidi hihiyoto.
Hihiyoto-yo Yesu a'a faifi kadu igana luhei givaidi digo lobameya gi'italele Tamana againe givesiule, au a'a gikihinehineni-yo ana tomuliya giveledi be higa yo'o agaidiya hinafolakena.
Ada au moya'aidi hi'a be hi'ahiyauwa, ada adi tufo tomuliya hikwakwana feyawa tuwelo kwadakwada againe hivemagadi.
Tova sa'eyana Yesu anakaibe gimiyami tu give'ove'o'ola ada ana tomuliya Bana liline himiyami. Au gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Iya inubaku fa'ina kaliva gavaimi higahe?”
Fita Yesu inubana fa'ina hidedemi gigahe-yo Yesu ana tomuliya gihawatadi be Bana Yaubada yana Tovegida ma keke tamo hakwadi againe hinahawavemogataleni.

Kadu gigayo, “Iya Tohobu'ela aku vehimeya gavaina higa aulolo moya'aina kaliva nimadiya gananuhagana. Kaliva lakahidiyao ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala hinakiloweku. Au kaliva hinaluve'alikaku tu aiyeta anaveto againe Yaubada ginasivemididiku.”

Ada gava kaliva keke nuwanuwana Iya agaikuya ginahawahegeni tu taunaga fa'ina ginanuwanuwa tova moya'aina, medema yawaina ginanuhegena. Atu gava kaliva ginahawahegena be aku vetumagana fa'ina yawaina ginanuhegena, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.
Ka'i kaliva babi ana lokoloko matatabuna ginavai-'owona tu tauna yawaina o ka'i alu'aluwana yana miya hagihagina ginanuhegena digo, keke tamo gavadi yamumuna ginanuhagani.

Fa'ina hai kaliva keke nuwanuwana bana yaku kaliva be bonaku givetumaganena ma yo'o matadiya ginahawavemogataleni yadi hawavelaiga gimatausena fa'ina, medema fa'ine aimo tova mulina Iya keke ganagahe vaita bana yaku kaliva. E, Iya Tohobu'ela Tauku yaku wakikaiwabu Kamaku yana wakikaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata mahamahalidiyao yadi wakikaiwabu buye ganayewa'ela ana toveya, bana fa'ine keke ganagahe vaita yaku kaliva.
Gagahe velemo'ena agaimiya tufoimi hidedei wamidimidi-ma aimo keke alika wananuhagani tu nagona Yaubada yana abavehimeya yana yemu wanamidi'itana.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Give'ove'o'ola tu magigina ana ita tulina gilakayemu ada ana vaigau gikwayanuwanuwa.

Ada auhe'ama Yaubada yana kaliva luhei tuwai-mo'ena himiyami-ma adi egana Mosese kadu Elaiya yadi wamahalina ve'akinamanamalina lobameya hihobu'ela Yesu buye hilulukahihi. Yadi ve'agahegahe againe Yesu Yelusalema againe gina'alika be gavaiya'amine Yaubada yana nuwanuwa alikai-nadi againe ginalakayemu velemo'ena ma hilukahihiyena.
Tu Fita tobohiyaneyao buye hidauda fa'ina wowodi gifwalele, ada hi'enoviladi againe Yesu yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina hi'itana, kadu kaliva adi'iselu Bana buye himidimidi-ma hi'itadi.

Ada Mosese Elaiya hivebutu Yesu hinuyabuyabuni tu Fita Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, ime O buye kamimiyami ma gilubodana. Vada tohiye anayogodi, sa'eyana O fa'iniya, sa'eyana Mosese fa'ine, kadu sa'eyana Elaiya fa'ine.” Tu gavaimi gigahegahe ma keke gidahalamaneni.
Aimo gigahegaheni tu buhibuhi gihobu tomuliya adi'itoto giwa'utagodi. Ada buhibuhi gikevadi againe himatauta.
Ada buhibuhi hinagene ago'ago sa'eyana hinogalina gigayo, “Bana hidevama Natuku Bana galuwafana amanadi. Au bonana wanavenogalena.”
Ada ago'ago gi'agolohini-yo Yesu anakaibe gimiyami ma hi'itana. Ada hive'awa'ibodena medema aiyetai-dina gavadi tamo hi'itana-ma keke tamo hakwadi againe hidalukahihiyeni.
Bogi hida mala gilauna oyeya hihobu'ela-yo yo'o lakahina Yesu himaduhagana.
Ada auhe'ama kaliva sa'eyana yo'o agaidiya gikova gigayo, “Tovehawala, gahawayafeyafe be natuku uda'itanuwakabubuyena fa'ina bana kwanatubu'eyana.

Bana wayafunena ada yafune gikive'avini-yo auhe'ama gikova'awafatafata, ada yafune gikivefavefanina au awabugo gi'ala'ala-hiwahiwagena. Yafune gififaiwala gi'i'iveki'onina ginunauwena keke gidamadunuyabuyabuni.
Ada a tomuliya gahawayafeyafedi be hinawavina tu keke adifaiweya.”

Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Omi kaliva tova adamoya watubuyemu-ma yami nuwanuwa keke tunutunugina, keke ma'ita wadavetumaganeku. Malamala gavaiyehi omi buye kanamiyami be gana'atuvefa'ilemi tu yami vetumagana ginayemu? Au natu u'aliye we'ai.”
Kwamana aimo gi'ela'ela tu yafune gi'atagifatafata babiya gibaini-yo gikivefavefanina. Tu Yesu yafune gihawatana kwamana gikiveyamumuna be tamana giveleyewena.
Ada Yaubada yana faiwala lakahina fa'ina kaliva moya'aidi hiyaulowoga.
Tu mena yana gahe ana nuwanuwa hifaniyena. Yaubada nuwanuwai-nadi badi agaidiya gisevauyena be keke adifaiweya hinahalamaneni. Ada gahe-nadi ana toliluvaluva fa'ina himatauta.

Yesu yadi nuwahinage gi'ayauneni-yo kwamana kabi'ona gi'abina be liline gisi'aliyena ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hai kaliva hida kwamana aku eganeya ginasive'auyena, medema vaita Iya ginasive'auyeku. Ada hai kaliva Iya ginasive'auyeku, medema vaita Bana'e gi'iveniniseku-ma ginasive'auyena. Fa'ina gava kaliva moya'aimi agaimiya ana egana kabi'o-mo'ena, medema makewa'e kikaiwabu-mo'ena.”
Yesu gigahe-yo Yoni gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, kaliva sa'eyana a'itana, bana yafune a eganeya giwaviwavidi tu ahawatana, fa'ina bana keke ime tomuliya ama yo'o kalivana.”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Keke wanahawatani. Wa'ita, gava kaliva keke ami nibaina, medema tobohiyami.”
Ada tomaduyowayowana gi'iveninisedi be wai hinagona, miSameliya yadi melala sa'eyana againe hiluku be higa Bana yana yemu fa'ina hinakidewadewa.
Tu miSameliya miYuda keke hidavetobohiyana, ada miSameliya hihalamanena Yesu yana nuwanuwa againe Yelusalema ana fou gitutuna be ginana fa'ina keke yadi melaleya hidavega'auleni.
Ada ana tomuliya Yemesa be Yoni miSameliya yadi kilowa hinogalini-yo higayo, “Kauveya, gavaimi unuwanuwa? Ka'i anavehimeya be ai'ala'alata lobameya ginahobu'ela gina'alayaweyawelidi?”
Tu Yesu gihagavilana be gidakeyedi.
Ada au mali melala againe hina.
Edeya hinauna tu kaliva sa'eyana Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Gahawahegeku be ha'amine ha'amine unana, iya kadu O buye kanana.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Galu'eta-walawala'a adi wagou kadu manuga adi wa'uba tu Iya Tohobu'ela yaku abamiya keke, kadu yaku abaveyawai keke. Au aku muliya vitana.”
Tu Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Badi yawaidi ivaguna keke amanadi, yadi to'alika hinatauna. O'eni ma unana Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina unalumamala.”
Kadu kaliva velugana gigayo, “Kauveya, iya ganamuliye tu udahawahegeku be nagona aku unuma gadalukafoiyedi.”

Gigahedi gigayo, “A'a moya'aina give'afa amine kaliva moya'aidi himimiyami nuwadi ahe giludigadigaga be hinavetumaganeku, tu bonaku ana tolaumamala vaita faha ana toyaudi amine ma keke moya'aidi. Medema fa'ina Tonifaha againe wanave'o'ola be yana tolaumamala gina'iveninisedi be yana faha hinahege'au'auta.
Au wanana be kaliva wanalumamaledi. Tufoidi hinavenibainemi fa'ina, omi vaita sifi kabi'odiyao amine tu badi galu'eta manimaninidiyao adi egana wolivi amine hinafadiya wanana.
Keke mani ana abasewadi keke fose keke ageyafayafa wananauweni, kadu keke edeya wananumidimidi kaliva buye wanalulukahihina.
Gava manuweya wanaluku againe yami gahe wanamidisena wanagayo, Siule, Yaubada yana nuwakabubu againe wanamiyami.
Ka'i tonimanuwa nuwanuwana vetobohiyana, au yami gahenuwakabubu bana againe wasena-ma ginaduva-vagata. Tu ka'i keke amine, kadu yami lusiule wanavaiyewena be yadi vemwamwala keke.

Manuwa sa'eyanaga againe wanamiyami, gava a'a gava bwai matamiya hinasena, medema wana'ana wanayuna. Fa'ina yaku tofaisewa gilubodadi be adi laufata hinavaina. E, keke mali manuweya wana'abimiyamiyanana.
Gava melala againe wanaluku be hinavega'aulemi be gavadi matamiya hinasena, medema wana'ana.
Kadu mena melalai-nadi againe to'aulolo wanasiveyawadi ada wanagahedi wanagayo, Yaubada lilimiya gi'ela, nuwanuwana yana itave'avina againe wanamiyami be ase'asemiya ginavehivehimeya.

Tu gava melala againe wanaluku be hinadibutoyogemi, medema yadi eda'awaneya wanahobu wanagayo, Yami melala ana fwayafwaya agemeya gifotafotana-ma agaimiya avagavagahegehegena, higa Yaubada yana ila'a agaimiya ginayemu-ma ana iya'iyaya. Tu hidedemi wanahalamanena higa Yaubada lilimiya gi'ela, nuwanuwana yana itave'avina againe wanamiyami be ase'asemiya ginavehivehimeya. Au hidedemi wanagahedi.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena miSodoma dewa koyo-mo'ena hififaisewana. Tu gagahemi badi kalivai-dina omi yaku kaliva hinakilowemi fa'ina, adi matahiwadi miSodoma adi matahiwadi ginatubuhegena aimo vedewayauga ana toveya.”
Tu aimo vedewayauga ana toveya omi miKolasini kadu miBedasaida ami matahiwadi miTaiya miSaidoni adi matahiwadi ginatubuhegena, fa'ina yaku aituha fifiwaladi wa'itadi tu keke wadavetumaganeku.
Ada omi miKafeneumi ma nuwanuwami taumiyao ami egana wanakilakahina vaita lobameya wadalaka tu abaga koyona againe hinahegehobuyemi.”

Tu badi tomuliya 72 boi Yesu gi'iveninisedi be yadi faisewa hiluyabuna-ma yadi wavemwamwala hiyewadi. Yesu againe higahe higayo, “Kauveya, badi yafune nonogana a eganeya avehimeyedi-ma bonama hi'abina.”

Wanogali! Yaku faiwala ahe gavelemi higa vaita oloto atagikwamana wanavagadi tu keke hinayovami. Hida yaku faiwala againe Setani yana faiwala wanavagatagona, ada keke tamo gavadi anafaiweya ginakivekoyomi.
Tu balauma koyodiyao wavehimeyedi be bonami hi'abina fa'ina, keke wanavemwamwala. Au ami egana lobameya Yaubada yana buki againe gi'etoladina, hidema fa'ina wanavemwamwala.”
Yesu hidedemi gigahe-yo ana tomuliya agaidiya gihagavilana badi'iyaogaga gigahedi gigayo, “Hida yaku gugai fifiwalana wa'itahalamanena fa'ina yami vemwamwala gavatubuga!

Fa'ina agaimiya gagahe Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina kadu tokikaiwabu moya'aidi nuwanuwadi yaku faisewa omi wa'ita'itana-ma hina'itana, tu keke hida'itani. Kadu nuwanuwadi yaku vehawala omi wanoganogalina-ma hinanogalina, tu keke hidanogalini.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe gavaimi gi'etoladini? Gavaimi uhawa?”
Tu vehimeya ana tonuwahuya nuwanuwana tauna wowona ginahawalakalakahina fa'ina Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Hakwa'adi tobohiyaku?”

Yesu gigahetalahobuhobuyena gigayo, “KwanmiYuda sa'eyana Yelusalema againe gitauya be Yeliko againe gihobuhobu tu tomunugakai'afu hi'ela, ana vaigau hivehalilina be himunukoyokoyona vaita hidaluve'alikani tu hinuyabuyabuna.
