Gimiyami tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa sa'eyana mena edai-nadi againe ginauna ada kaliva gi'ita-yo ginuvekemena.
Meda anafaiweya manuwa-tafalolo ana tofaisewa sa'eyana abagai-nadi againe giyemu ada kaliva gi'ita-yo kadu ginuvekemena.
Tu muliya kwanaSameliya miYuda adi nibaina ma mena edai-nadi amine ginauna tu kaliva gidauda-ma againe giyemu ada gi'ita-yo gihinekalikaliyena.
Kaliva againe gina ana koliya bunama kadu oine againe gilumulamulani-yo gifafana. Gifafana gihavaina yana yomuyomu againe gidodona digo wakawaka-manuwa againe gi'aliyena be gi'itave'avina.

Bogi hida mala gilauna kabala luhei ana foseya gi'ihobuna tonimanuwa givele tu gigahena gigayo, Kaliva una'itave'avina ada mani gavaiyehi bana fa'ine unahegena, medema aimo ganayewa'ela againe unagaheyena-ma ganafatana.”

Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu gihavaina vehimeya ana tonuwahuya gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Gavaiyami? Kaliva adi'itoto agaidiya gava kaliva bana kaliva tomunugakai'afu himununa-ma givetobohiyaneni velemo'ena?”
Vehimeya ana tonuwahuya gigayo, “Bana'e ana tohinekalikali amanadi.” Yesu gigayo, “Kadu o unana meda unahuluva.”
Kadu taina gimiyami ana egana Meli ada bana Kaiwabu agene gihiyoto yana vehawala givanevanenegena.

Tu Mata a'a ana kidewadewa againe gi'idamodamo fa'ina Meli againe gi'ago'uga. Au gi'ela Yesu againe gigahe, “Kauveya, u'ita. Keke iya fa'ikuya udanuwanuwa tu kaiku nonogana gihiyoto be gimimiyami tu akukaibe gafififaisewa. Au udagahena be iya gidavelugaku.”
Au gaitoma sa'eyanaga giluboda. Meli gavadi gilubodana-ma againe gihawahegena. Yaku gahe ana vanenega againe gihawahegena fa'ina keke ganahawatani.”
Tova sa'eyana Yesu give'ove'o'ola. Give'o'ola gihavaina ana tomuliya sa'eyana gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, bana Yoni ana tomuliya ve'o'ola givehawaledi amine, meda ime udavehawalema.”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Wanave'o'ola againe hidede amine wanagahe wanagayo,
Tamama, a egana mahamahalina anave'amohimohinena.
Ya abavehimeya ana tova gidalakayemu ase'asemeya.
Aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana amaga udavelevelema.
Yama koyona O udavenuwauluyena, fa'ina gaveyao moya'aidi agaimeya hikoyo
medema yadi koyona kadu ime avenuwauluyena.
Kadu keke aladibidibi againe unahawahegema.”
Ve'o'ola fa'ina hidedemi Yesu givehawala.

Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i agaimiya kaliva sa'eya uda'enonuwaulu tu bogi nafone tobohiya sa'eyana againiya gidalakayemu ada keke tamo a'a againiya gidadauda, au tobohiya velugana yana manuweya udana udagahena udagayo, Kusebo, tobohiyaku sa'eyana yanana againe agaikuya gilakayemu, ada keke tamo a'a agaikuya gidadauda-yo bana fa'ine ganakidewadewa, fa'ina a'a tohiye udaveleku.
Tu ka'i tobohiya vetawaneya gidagahe gidagayo, Keke unakive'ive'itaku. Wana ahe gafalina natukweyao buye a'enobala. Au keke akufaiweya ganamidi tamo gavadi ganavele.
E gavaiyami? Keke-mo'a ginamidi a'a ginavele bana tobohiya fa'ine tu ya ve'o'ola againe u'atuvefa'ila be bana keke nuwanuwana wowomumu ginanuhagani fa'ina, ginamidi be gavadi nuwanuwa ma ginavele.
Wa'ita, gaveyao hive'ove'o'ola medema Yaubada nimane hinavaina, kadu gaveyao hilelele medema hinanuhagana, ada gaveyao hikikifisifisi'a medema agaidiya Yaubada wana ginayauna.
Omi kaliva wanogali! Ka'i natumiyao hida'ela hidagayo, Kamaku, tamo igana gada'ana, ma ka'i keke igana tu oloto wadaveledi? Keke.
O ka'i hidave'o'ola hidagayo, Kamaku, tamo kamukamu foudi gada'ana, ma ka'i atagikwamana wadaveledi? Keke.
Omi tokoyona tu nuwakabubu hagihagina natumiyao waveleveledi. Atu ka'i Tamada lobameya wanave'ove'o'olena amine, Bana'e Alu'aluwa Mahalina agaimiya ginahawahegena ginahawahege-mo'ena.”
Tu tufoidi higayo, “Biyelisibuli Yesu gifaiwalaveleni-yo yafune giwaviwavidi, bana yafune adi tokaiwabu higa Setani.”
Kadu tufoidi nuwanuwadi hinavebauna fa'ina, higahena higayo, “Aituha fifiwalana unafaisewani-yo O ya inuba velemo'ena Yaubada againe ma anahalamanena.”

Tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamanena ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hai fafali ana melala tulina tulina buye hilulugaviya, medema taudiyao hinavehavaidi. Kadu hai yo'o ana kaliva tova moya'aina buye hivekwavekwageya, medema hina'abi'ota'ota be taudiyao hinavehavaidi.

Meda anafaiweya ka'i Setani tauna yana yo'o ginavenibainedi, bana tauna yana yo'o ginavehavaidi ada au yana abavehimeya ginahavaina. Omi wagahe vaita Biyelisibuli higa Setani gidafaiwalaveleku-yo yafune gadawaviwavidi. Ka'i Setani hidedemi gidafaiwalaveleku digo, ana nuwanuwa vaita tauna yana yo'o gidawaviwavidi. Hima keke hidedemi.

Hida wagahe vaita Biyelisibuli yana faiwala againe yafune gadawavidi. Ka'i Iya Biyelisibuli yana faiwala againe gawavidi digo, hakwadi yami kalivamomo faiwala giveledi-yo yafune hiwavidi? Ka'i Biyelisibuli faiwala giveledi? Keke-mo'a. Omi wagahe-kawowo ma taumiyao yami kaliva hinavenuwa'atami.
Atu ka'i Iya Yaubada yana faiwala againe yafune gawavidi amine o Yaubada yana itave'avina againe wavebutu wamimiyami ase'asemiya givehivehimeya.
Ka'i kaliva fifiwalana yana wafuluma yana wagiyo yana manuwa gi'ita'itave'avina, au yana lokoloko moya'aina ginada yamumuna.
Tu ka'i kaliva sa'eyana gifaiwalahegena-ma gina'ela ginamununa be ginafaiwalahegehegena, au yana fuluma yana giyo givetumaganena-ma ginanauwena ada yana yabwana ginafolakena.
Hai kaliva keke tobohiyaku, medema nibaiku kadu hai kaliva tomuliya adi yaudi againe keke gidavelugaku, medema gihuluva vaita kaliva gidawavidi be keke hinamuliyeku.”
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i yafune kaliva ginanuyabuyabuna amine, ginanauna ai'aveya abaveyawai ginalelena. Ka'i ginalele-wayoga au ginagayo, Ganana be yaku abamiyami ganuyabuyabuna-ma againe ganayewaku.
E, bana yafune ginalakayemu yana manuwa yegayegana ma ginanuhagana vaita tamo hakwadi gida'ihagihagiyeni.

Au kadu ginana tobohiyaneyao yafune seveni ginavega'auledi be badi moya'aidi kaliva hinaluvaiyena. Bana yafune nagona koyona tu yafune seveni koyo-mo'edi. Nagona kaliva yana miyami koyona tu muliya yafune moya'aidi hinaluvaiyena againe yana miyami ginakoyo-mo'a.”
Yesu hidedemi gigahegahe tu kwamayoku sa'eyadi yo'o agaidiya Bana againe hikova higayo, “Badi kwamayoku O hivenatune be hivehuhu amanadi yadi wavemwamwala.”

Kaliva hiyo'oyo'o tu Yesu givebutu gigayo, “Omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu amanadi yami nuwanuwa koyo-mo'ena. Nimaku ana iya'iyaya walelelena. Atu keke mena iya'iyaya wana'itani. Au iya'iyaya sa'eyanaga ganavehawalemi, higa iya'iyaya Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yona againe gilakayemu-ma amine.
Fa'ina gava iya'iyaya tuwai-mo'ena Yona giyemaunena medema miNiniva fa'idiya amine, meda Iya Tohobu'ela iya'iyaya omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu amanadi fa'imiya.

Aimo tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya fafali sa'eyana wabolimaneya ana tokaiwabu kwamayoku hinatowamidi be omi hinahawavekoyoyemi. Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena yuwa lauveya hitauya be miIsileli yada tokaiwabu Solomoni yana vehawala nuwahuyahuyana hinanogalina. Atu tova adamoya yaku vehawala Solomoni yana vehawala gitubuhegena tu omi keke nuwanuwami wananogalini.

Kadu'e tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya miNiniva hinatowamidi be omi hinahawavekoyoyemi. Fa'ina badi miNiniva bana Yona yana laumamala hinogalina againe hivenogalena be hinuwaviladi. Tu omi wanogali! Bana Yona yana laumamala gaitoma lakahina, tu tova adamoya yaku laumamala wanogalina-ma gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena tu omi keke wadavenogaleni.” Au hidedemi Yesu yo'o gigahedi.

Matami vaita nuwami ana lamufa amine. Ka'i matami ita'ita'eyana amine nuwami matatabuna mahamahalina. Tu ka'i matami ita'italugana amine, nuwami matatabuna uyu'uyuyuna, nuwanuwaluga againe wamimiyami.
Medema fa'ina wana'itave'avimi nuwami vaita mahamahalina tu velemo'ena uyu'uyuyuna.
Au ka'i nuwami matatabuna mahamahalina tu keke tamo uyuyu gidadauda, au omi velemona mahamahalimiga lamufa yana mahalina gituvemahalimi amine.”
Yesu keke gidavenimakola tu gi'au'a. Bana Falisi gi'ita-yo giyaulowoga.

Au Kaiwabu gigahena gigayo, “Omi Falisi wa'itami, ami gowa ami nau'a kwauna wakolakolana tu hinagena bwanebwanenena gidadauda amine, meda wowomi wa'ihagihagiyena tu nuwahinagemi kai'afu nuwanuwa koyo-mo'ena againe gimaga.
Omi kwavakwavamiyao! Yaubada keke wowomiga gidabubuni. Au kadu nuwahinagemi gibubuna fa'ina luhei wana'ihagihagiyedi.
Gavadi gavadi ami foseya gidadauda, medema koyokoyo agaidiya wanafolakena be yami yegayega velemo'ena ma moya'aidi matadiya wanaseyemaunena.

Atu hoiyoi omi Falisimomo! Aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina vehimeya kabi'ona wa'itave'avina, higa gaitoma-kawowo naiya'au'a saikuku mawa gavadi gavadi wamagana ami kevakeva ana kivehivehimala fa'ina wavaivaina be Yaubada yana tufo waseusena, tu vehimeya lakahina keke wada'itave'avini. Omi keke wadanuwanuwa tunutunugina kadu yami nuwanuwa keke Yaubada againe wadaseuseni. Mena vehimeya lakahina nuwanuwa tunutunugina Yaubada ana nuwanuwa wada'itave'avina tu kadu vehimeya kabi'ona wana'itave'avina, higa Yaubada yana tufo wanaseusena.

Hoiyoi omi Falisimomo! Aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina nuwanuwami manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya abavetoga kikaiwabuna againe wanavetoga, kadu kaliva abakimokimone againe yadi wave'amohimohina hinalusiuleyemi.

Hoiyoi omi Falisimomo! Aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana. Fa'ina omi vaita lahi keke ana tutu'ala be kaliva hivagavagana vaita babi-kawowo, tu hinagena gilada. Meda kaliva wowomi hi'ita'itana vaita hagihagimiyao tu ase'asemiya bwanene gidadauda.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu vehimeya ana tonuwahuya sa'eyana gigahena gigayo, “Tovehawala, mena ya gahe againe vaita udagahe kadu ime kaliva koyomeyao.”

Yesu gigayo, “Meda hoiyoi omi vehimeya ana tonuwahuya! Kadu omi aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana. Yami vehawala tulina tulina au vitana, vaita vainuwana lakahina kaliva wadave'avalani tu taumiyao mena vehimeya ana itave'avina againe keke ma'ita wadavelugadi.
Hoiyoi omi'iyao, aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana! Fa'ina Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tuwai-mo'ena bwanenemiyao hiluve'alikadi-ma adi tomohuyahuya wakidewedewena.

Hidedemi wakidewedewena fa'ina bwanenemiyao yadi luve'alika omi wahalamanena ma waseyemaunena, kadu mena yadi dewa koyona wahawaveyamumuyena. Badi Yaubada yana kaliva hiluve'alikadi tu omi adi tomohuyahuya wakidewedewena.

Au hidedemi wahuluva fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Tonuwahuya-mo'a gigahe gigayo, Bonaku ana to'awatalatalaina kadu ana towahidadana agaidiya gana'iveninisedi. Tufoidi hinakivekoyodi tufoidi hinaluve'alikadi.

Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada babi gimidibubuna ana toveya be hinunauwena tova adamoya badi bwanenemiyao Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi hiluluve'alikadi. Ebeli ana luve'alika againe hivebutu be Sakalaiya againe hinunauwena, bana atudidiga liline manuwa-tafalolo ana eda'awaneya hiluve'alikana amanadi. Taumadi gagahemi omi kaliva tova adamoya babiya watubuyemu-ma bwanenemiyao yadi luve'alika ana laufata omi wanawahina.

Hoiyoi omi vehimeya ana tonuwahuya! Aimo vita lakahina wananuhagana. Yaubada ana halamana ana kihi wa'abina. Kaliva nuwanuwadi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hinahalamanena tu omi badi agaidiya keke wadayauni. Omi keke Yaubada ana halamana againe wadahawahegemi, ada badi nuwanuwadi hinahalamanena-ma wahawatadi.” Au hidedemi Yesu vehimeya ana tonuwahuya gidakeyedi.
Yadi nuwaluga keke adifaiweya hinasevauye-vagahini. Gavadi gavadi adamoya sevesevauyana, au medema aimo kabu'avane ginayemu. Kadu kaliva yadi nuwahinage aimo kaliva moya'aidi hinahalamanena.
Medema fa'ina gavadi uyuyuya wagahekauyena, medema aimo kaliva yo'oya hinanogalina. Kadu gava bona vetawaneya wa'alakululuyena, medema aimo kabu'avane didigeya kaliva agodi lakahina hinalukahihiyena.
Tobohiyakweyao ganagahe agaimiya. Badi wowomi hinakivekoyona be wana'alika amanadi keke wanamatausedi, tu muliya kadu keke tamo adifaiweya agaimiya gavadi hinagani.

Hakwa'adi wanamatausena-ma ganavehawalemi. E, Bana Yaubada wanamatausena, fa'ina wowomi hinaluve'alikani-yo Bana anafaiweya ginavehimeya be alu'aluwami abaga koyona againe ginahegena. Ika, gagahemi Bana'e wanamatausena.
Manuga mukumukudiyao faifi yabune amine fatadi toea luhei amine tu keke tamo manuga sa'eyana Yaubada gidavenuwauluyeni.
Tu wanogali! Utuutu u'umiya ana kilagalaga Tamami gihalamanena. Au keke wanamatauta fa'ina Yaubada matane omi manuga wakaiwabuhegedi.”

“Kadu gagahemi hai kaliva keke ginamatauta tu yo'o matadiya ginagahe ginagayo, Iya Yesu yana kaliva, medema fa'ine Iya Tohobu'ela Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata matadiya ganagahe ganagayo, Bana'e yaku kaliva.
Tu hai kaliva ginamatauta be yo'o matadiya ginavekekeyeku ginagayo, Iya keke Yesu yana kaliva, medema fa'ine Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata matadiya ganamidi ganagahe ganagayo, Bana'e keke yaku kaliva.
Fa'ina medema bai-nadi againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina gavaimi wanagahe ma gina'alavelevelemi.”
Yesu gilulukahihi tu kaliva sa'eyana yo'o agaidiya gigahena gigayo, “Tovehawala, kawaku unagahena be tamama la'ovina ginafolake-hagihagiyena, bana tufona iya tufona.”
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Kaliva unogali! Hakwa'adi aku vehimeya giseni-yo kaliva la'ovina ganafolakeni?”

Au moya'aidi agaidiya Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be italuvadiga tulina tulina keke nuwami ginavaini. Kaliva yawaina velemo'ena keke lokoloko kikaiwabuna moya'aina againe gidave'inuba.”
Au nuwahinagene ginuwanuwa gigayo, O hima yaku faha lakahina be yaku bolu gimaga-mo'a. Gavaimi ganagani?
Au tauna yana nuwahinage gifatana gigayo, O bolu kabi'ona ganayawelini tu velugana lakahina ganayogona be medema againe yaku faha yaku lokoloko moya'aina gana'ive'ave'ahina.

Ada agaikuya ganagahe ganagayo, Keke fwaya! Yaku faha yaku lokoloko lakahina kadu moya'ai-mo'ena, malamala moya'aina akufata. Yaku wagakahikahi yaku wavemwamwala ganamiyami, gana'a'a-mo'a ganayuyu-mo'a. Au hidedemi gigahe.
Tu wakalivana yana nuwahinage Yaubada gifatana gigayo, O kwavakwava! Adamo'uya-mo'a ya tova ginahavaina be mene gaitoma moya'aina tauni fa'iniya ukidewedewena-ma ginavela'ova.”
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “Hidema fa'ina gagahemi, yami miyami fa'ina keke wanavenuwanauna vaita gavadi wana'u'ani. Kadu kaleko fa'ina keke wanavenuwanauna vaita gavadi againe wanavelifi.
Au yawaimi gaitoma lakahina tu a'a gaitoma kabi'ona, kadu wowomi gaitoma lakahina tu kaleko gaitoma kabi'ona.

Bwayobwayo yadi dewa wananuwenuwena. Keke hidafahafaha, keke hidayauyaudi kadu keke kweda hidayogoyogoni-yo a'a hidasewasewadi tu au ai'adi Yaubada adiga giveleveledi. Ada Yaubada yana itave'avina omi'iyao be manuga agaidiya. Tu omi ami itave'avina manuga adi itave'avina gitubuhegena.
Kadu hakwadi agaimiya unavenuwanauna-yo afaiweya yawaini ana etowava babiya unakivetubugini? Keke-mo'a afaiweya.
Ka'i mena gaitoma kabisona keke afaiweya gavadi-yo uvenuwanauna mali gaitoma fa'idiya?

E, Yaubada isisi'u givevigauna, medema tova adamoya wala'aiya gikabu tu bogiyadi hinatuna be gina'alahina. Yaubada isisi'u givevigauna tu medema gaitoma kabi'ona. Tu omi'iyao ma gaitoma lakahi-mo'emi fa'ina, gina'itave'avi-mo'emi ami vaigau ginavelemi. Wona velemona yami vetumagana kabi'ona.
Amiga fa'ina keke wananuwanuwa vaita ka'i gavadi wana'ani o gava bwai wanayuni, kadu gaitoma moya'aina againe keke nuwami ginanauna.

Au fafali tulina tulina kalivai-dina Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma hida gaitoma fa'ina hinuwanuwa lakahina, kadu tova moya'aina hilelelena. Tu omi'iyao ma nuwanuwami hida gaitoma yami miya hagihagina fa'ina Tamami a gihalamanena.
Ka'i Yaubada yana abavehimeya ana nuwanuwa fa'ina wanamidihawahegemi, au Bana'e gina'ita'itave'avimi amiga ami bwai ami vaigau ginavelevelemi be wanamiyami yamumuna.

Taumiyao yami lokoloko wanakimonevedamanena be fatana koyokoyo agaidiya wanafolakena. Au ami laufata lobama ana lokoloko wanavaina, lokoloko-nadi miyamiya-vagahina. Wesede againe tokai'afu keke ginaki'afuni kadu tumotumo keke hina'onani, au fose vewabana againe ginadauda higa aimo keke ginakoyo.
Ada au ha'againe yami lokolokofou ginadauda, au medede againe nuwami ginanunauyena tova moya'aina.

Tofaisewa gaveyao matadi keke gidaneganega au hivanevanenega tu yadi kauveya gilakayemu, medema yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga! Wona velemona gagahemi yadi kauveya tauna ana kaleko ginaluhivigena, adi ivi ginayavelina, adiga ginakidewedewena be hina'a.
Ka'i yadi kauveya yana ela bogi nafone o ka'i kamukamu ginakwage ada medema bai-nadi yana tofaisewa aimo hilulauboda, au yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Atu hidedemi wanahalamanena. Ka'i tonimanuwa tokai'afu yana ela ana kauwana gidahalamanena digo, keke matana gidalowoni au gidalulauboda be tokai'afu keke anafaiweya gidaluku yana manuweya.

Meda anafaiweya omi taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be wanalulauboda. Fa'ina gava kauwana Iya Tohobu'ela ganayewa'ela ma keke wadahalamaneni. Ka'i wanamiya-kawowo wanagayo, Keke adamoya gina'ela, au medema tovai-nadi ganavefuta'ami.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Ada Fita gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Kauveya, mena gahetalahobuhobu ulukahihiyena-ma gaveyao fa'idiya? Ka'i ime tomuliyagaga fa'imeya o ka'i kaliva moya'aima fa'imeya?”
Ka'i gavaimi yana taubada givehimeyena medemi ginadewadewa tu yana taubada ginayewa'ela bonana bana gi'abi'abina-ma gina'itana, au bana tofaisewai-nadi vemwamwala ginanuhagana.
Gagahe velemo'ena agaimiya kaliva lakahina yana lokoloko matatabuna ana to'itave'avina bana tofaisewai-nadi ginasena.

Tu ka'i bana tofaisewai-nadi nuwahingene ginagahe ginagayo, Hima yaku taubada givekwalu lakahina, ka'i keke ginamadu'ela, au ginavebutu agetoga kaliva vevine ginamunukoyokoyodi kadu gina'a'a-fa'ila gufa laulaugina ginayuyu-fa'ila yo u'una ginavekwavakwava.

E, ka'i tofaisewa hidede amine ginahuluva, au yana taubada yana ela againe ginavefuta'ana. Yana aiyeta o ka'i yana kauwana tofaisewa keke gidahalamaneni tu yana taubada ginayewa'ela, ada au ginamunukoyokoyona ada ginahegenauwena be badi to'idibutoyoga adi matahiwadi amine bana ginanuhagana.

Tu gava tofaisewa yana taubada yana nuwanuwa keke gidahalamaneni ada tamo koyona gifaisewana, medema ginamununa kabi'ona. Gaveyao moya'aidi agaidiya Yaubada abavehimeya lakahina ginasena, medema gilubodana be yadi faisewa yamumu-mo'ena hinaseyemaunena. Kadu gava kaliva againe Yaubada faisewa lakahina amine ginavelena, medema yana faisewa guwana lakahina amine ginaveleyewena.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Gahobu'ela be higa ai'ala'alata babiya gana'aliyeni-yo tomiyababi matahiwadi hinanuhagana. Nuwanuwaku lakahina mena aku vehimeya ganamaduluyabuna.
Bafitaiso sa'eyana gananuhagana higa tagiya aulolo againe hina'utuviku. Yaku ase'u'aulolo gavatubuga gananunauwena bafitaiso-nadi ginahavaina ana maka.
Ka'i mene wanuwanuwa vaita gadahobu'ela-yo niwalova babiya gadaseni? Keke niwalova ganaseni fa'ina gada'ela, keke. Au Iya gahobu'ela be venibaina ginalakayemu fa'ina.
Adamoya be ginanunauwena tova mulina ka'i manuwa sa'eyana hinagene kaliva faifi hinamiyami, kaliva adi'iselu adi'itoto buye hinavekwageya, kadu kaliva adi'itoto adi'iselu hinavenibainedi.

Yadi venibaina hidede amine. Kaliva natuna kaliva againe ginavenibaina, meda natuna tamana againe ginavenibaina. Kadu kwamayoku natudi kwamayoku againe hinavenibaina, meda natudi hinana agaidiya ginavenibaina. Kadu kwamayoku be lawadi buye hinave'avenivenibaina. E, aku vetumagana fa'ina hidedemi hinavenibaina.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Kadu yo'oyo'o agaidiya Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Buhibuhi oya gikevana ma wa'itana againe wagayo, Hima wehi ginalugaga. Ada au gilugaga.
Ada bolimana gimadu ma wa'ayaunena againe wagayo, Hima kauwana lakahina ginakabuna. Ada au gikabuna.
Omi meyami lagalaganina! Wehi be kauwana adi iya'iyaya wahalamanena. Tu gavadi-yo vita lakahina hida tovai-nadi ginalakayemu-ma ana iya'iyaya keke wada'itahalamanedi?
Kadu'e gavadi-yo dewa tunutunugina keke taumiyao wadanuwenuweni-yo medede amine wadahuluva?

Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana ginasimane be tovedewayauga againe buye wanana, au edeya wananauna tu unagaluvaluva be wanaveyao. Ka'i keke wanamaduveyao, tovedewayauga againe ginasimadumaduge ada tovedewayauga filisimani nimadiya ginaseni be deliya hinanauwe.
Gagahe againiya, keke hinamaduyau. Tu nagona a laufata unase-'owona muliya hinayau.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu medema tovai-nadi kaliva tufoidi hi'ela miGalili fa'idiya Yesu hivenuwa'atana, higa yomuyomu yadi abaveyao fa'ina Yaubada matane hiseusena tu Failato yana vehimeya againe tolugaviya hiluve'alikadi, ada badi dayagidi kadu yomuyomu dayagidi hive'atutamo'aina.
Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Ka'i badi hidevama miGalili tolugaviya hiluve'alikadi-ma fa'ina omi wavaita miGalili velugadiyao moya'aidi dewa koyona againe hidatubuhegedi?
Gagahemi keke medede amine. Atu ka'i omi keke wananuwavilani, kadu omi moya'aimi wana'alika.

Kadu kaliva eitini valeyadi wanogalina, higa manuwa tunugi-vadavada'aina Sailomu againe gibe'u be gi'alatagodi ada hi'alika-'owoga. Gavaiyami? Badi kalivai-dina hidede amine hi'alika fa'ina, ka'i omi wavaita miYelusalema velugadiyao moya'aidi dewa koyona againe hitubuhegedi?
Gagahemi keke medede amine. Atu ka'i omi keke wananuwavilami, kadu omi moya'aimi wana'alika.”

Kadu gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana badi agaidiya Yesu gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana ai veguveguwana ana iviya fiki gifahana be gitabo. Tova moya'aina ginauna guwana gilelelena tu keke tamo gidaseni.
Medema fa'ina faha ana to'itave'avina againe gigahe gigayo, U'ita, malamala tohiye ga'elayewayewaku tu fiki guwana hida ai againe galele-wayoga. Au unatalana. Babi yamumuna gi'a'a-kawowona.
Tu to'itave'avina gigayo, Kauveya, gimiya malamala sa'eya-mo'ena be'ena ai inubana bulumakau uledi buye ganatalavetauna.
Ka'i malamala yuwa gi'ela'ela againe ginayoyo digo, au yamumuna. Tu keke digo, au kanatalana.” Gahetalahobuhobu au hidede amine.
Yesu kwamayoku gi'ita-yo gikovana be gi'ela ada gigahena gigayo, “Kwamayoku, ya aulolo a gihavaina.”
Gigahe-yo nimana bana againe gisena ada auhe'ama gimididi-mo'a be Yaubada gihawadavadavana.

Tu manuwa-abavehawala ana tovehimeya ginuwakoyo, fa'ina sabati againe Yesu kwamayoku gisiveyawana. Au yo'o gigahedi gigayo, “Faisewa ana aiyeta sikisi hidadauda. Medema aiyetai-dina agaidiya siveyawa fa'ina wana'ela. Keke sabati againe wana'ela.”
Kaiwabu gibonalaufata gigayo, “Omi meyami luhei. Wa'ita, moya'aimi sabati againe yami yomuyomu wayaudi-yo wasehobuyedi be gufa wanaveyudi fa'ina.

Au hidedemi yami yomuyomu wahuluhuluvidi tu gavaiyami? Hida kwamayoku Abelahamo bwanenena ma Setani giyogona be ginunauwena malamala eitini. Ka'i gilubodana be yana aulolo giyogona-ma sabati againe kanayauna o ka'i keke? Makewa'e gilubodana.”
Yesu au hidedemi gigahe-yo nibaineyao moya'aidi hiwowomumu tu yo'oyo'o yana gugai yauyaulowogidi fa'idiya hivemwamwala.
Kadu Yesu gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma yadi tubutubuga gavaiya'amine? Gavadi ana tubutubuga amine ganahawaluveluveni?

Me masitada yana tabo amine kanalukahihiyena. Masitada nafona kabikabi'ona tu kaliva givaina ada yana faheya gifahana be gikabu. Gikabukabu tu give'aihala ada laganina againe manuga adi uba hiyogona.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.
Kadu gigahe-havagi gigayo, “Kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe himimiyami be ase'asediya givehivehimeya-ma gavadi ana tubutubuga amine ganahawaluveluvedi?
Me yadi tubutubuga vaita isi amine. Kwamayoku sa'eyadi isi hivaina be falawa wanau'ana tohiye hivilana be falawa hinagene ginauna tu beledi matatabuna gitubuga.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yesu ginauna Yelusalema tu melala lakahidi be kabi'odi agaidiya givehavehawalana.
Ada kaliva sa'eyana gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Kauveya, ka'i Yaubada kaliva tufoidiga ginakibababaledi o ka'i moya'aida?”
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Wanavedivediwe be lobama ana eda'awana kabi'ona againe wanaluku. Wa'ita, gagahemi kaliva moya'aidi hinagaluvaluva be hinaluku tu hinamadu'ava.

Fa'ina lobama ana tovehimeya ginatowamidi be wana ahe ginafalini-yo au wana kwaune wanamidi wanakifisifisi'a wanagayo, Kauveya, wanafali uyau be aluku. Tu bana ginabonalaufata ginagayo, Omi kaliva gaveyao ma keke gadahalamanemi?
Au omi wanavebutu wanagayo, O buye ka'au'a kayuyu ada yama melala againe uvehavehawala ma kalivai-mana.
Tu Bana ginagayo, Gagahemi omi kaliva gaveyao ma keke gadahalamanemi. Au wana, omi moya'aimi tokoyona.
Ada kaliva walaube'uya wa'oyeya wabolimaneya wayavalaseya hina'ela, Yaubada yana abageya hinaluku be yana tolameya hinavetoga yana avemwamwala hina'ana.
Ika, fanifanidiyao vaita wai hidamulini-ma wai hinanagona tu kikaiwabudiyao vaita wai hidanagoni-ma wai hinamulina.”
Yesu hidedemi gigahe-yo medema bai-nadi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi tufoidi Bana againe hi'ela higayo, “Helodi nuwanuwana O ginluve'alika fa'ina unana mali fafaliya.”

Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Adamoya kadu bogiyadi yafune gawaviwavidi to'aulolo gasisiveyawadi tu tova anaveto yaku faisewa ganavehavaina. Au wanana hida yaku gahe wadema to'aikau vaita galu'eta ana egana fokesi amine wanalukahihiyena.

Hidedemi wanagahena tu iya'eku ma gilubodaku be adamoya bogiyadi kadu aiyeta anaveto yakuna Yelusalema againe gananunauwena. Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi Yelusalema againe hiluve'alikadi ada kadu Iya gilubodaku be medede againe gana'alika.

Wa'ita, Yaubada ginanuyabuyabumi be ami tolugolagola keke amine wanamiyami. Au gagahemi aimo keke wana'itaku wanamiyami wananunauwena tu gana'ela-havagi yo wanagahe wanagayo, Bana Kaiwabu ana eganeya gi'ela-ma kanahawadavadavana.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu sabati sa'eyana Yesu gina tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi adi yo'o kalivana kikaiwabuna againe be gina'a, ada kaliva hi'itakwanekwanena.
Ada medema manuwai-nadi againe kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, wowona gitubukoyo.
Au Yesu badi Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tonuwahuya gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Ka'i yada buki-vehimeya gihawahegeda be sabati againe kaliva kanasiveyawana o ka'i keke?”
Tu hive'amata. Au Yesu kaliva gi'abina be gisiveyawana ada gigahena gigayo, “Au unana.”

Kadu gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya sabati againe natu o ka'i ya yomuyomu folufolu againe ginabe'u, sabati nonogana auhe'amanadi unasilakahina o ka'i keke? Makewa'e unasilakahina.”
Au hidedemi gigahe tu keke tamo bonalaufata adifaiweya.

Gigayo, “Ka'i tamo hakwadi kwamayoku kedukeduna ginatagovena againe ginayowani digo, keke didiga'u'uya unahiyoto. Ka'i mededei unahiyoto tu ka'i kaliva velugana gikaiwabuhege-ma muliya ginalakayemu, ada toni'inuba ami'iselu giyowanimi-ma againiya gina'ela ginagayo, Hei uhobu, didiga'u'u kaliva lakahina ana ivi. Ka'i gidawavi, o udawowomumu udana didiga kumine udahiyoto.

Atu tamo hakwadi ginayowani againe, didiga kumine unahiyoto be higa aimo toni'inuba againiya gina'ela ginagayo, Kusebo, u'ela didiga'u'u againe unahiyoto. Ada au hidede amine wakawaka velugadiyao moya'aidi matadiya kaiwabu unanuhagana.
Fa'ina hai kaliva tauna ana egana ginakilakahina, Yaubada mena kaliva ginakivewowomumuna. Hai kaliva tauna ginanuwahobu, medema ana egana Yaubada ginakilakahina.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.
Atu avemwamwala unasena ana toveya, koyokoyo felafela tonube'ube'u tomatakoyo unayowanidi.

Badi keke adifaiweya ya nuwakabubu hinafatani fa'ina, vemwamwala gavatubuga ma unanuhagana. Aimo tova mulina Yaubada badi yegayegadiyao alikeya ginasivemidididi ana toveya, a laufata ginavele.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yesu gahetalahobuhobu amine gigahena gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana avemwamwala lakahina gisena ada kaliva moya'aidi giyowanidi.
Avemwamwala ana tova gilakayemu againe, yana tomaduyowayowana gi'iveninisena be kaliva avemwamwala againe giyowanidi-ma ginagahenauwedi ginagayo, Kidewadewa ahe gihavaina, au wana'ela.

Atu moya'aidi hivebutu gavadi gavadi yadi nuwanuwa gisebodana fa'ina hiyakayakahina, yadi gahe leleleya. Kaliva nagona gigahe gigayo, Adamoya babi sa'eyana gakimonena ada gilubodaku be ganana gana'itana fa'ina siule lakahina keke akufaiweya gana'ela.

Kadu kaliva anavelu gigayo, Adamoya okesi luhei luhei adi yo'o matatabuna teni gakimonedi be gananauna ganagaluveluvedi abakeyova hinatai-hagihagiyena o ka'i keke. Fa'ina siule lakahina, keke akufaiweya gana'ela.

Ada tomaduyowayowana yana kauveya againe giyewana kaliva bonadi gilukahihiyena. Au toni'inuba yana wanuwakoyo ana agetoga gigahena gigayo, Unamaduna melala kadu eda agaidiya be koyokoyo felafela tonube'ube'u tomatakoyo unavega'auledi be hinaluku yaku manuweya.
Ada tomaduyowayowana gina be giyewana yana kauveya gigahena gigayo, O uvehimeya amine kaliva ahe gavega'auledi tu yo'o aimo kabi'ona.
Au kauveya ana agetoga gigahena gigayo, Kadu unana eda lakahina againe ada eda kabi'ona wala'aiya kaliva unasive'auyedi be hina'ela yaku manuwa hinavemagana.
Wona velemona gagahe badi kalivai-dina gamidiyowanidi-ma agaidiya keke tamo hakwadi yaku avemwamwala a'ana kasimina ginavaini.” Au hidedemi Yesu yana gahetalahobuhobu.
Kadu hai kaliva keke nuwanuwana tavagikuya ginanunaudadana kadu Iya fa'ikuya alika againe ginahawahegeni, medema keke anafaiweya Iya agaikuya ginavetomuliya.

Ka'i nuwanuwami vetomuliya digo, nagona wananuwanuwa-hagihagi ka'i amifaiweya o ka'i keke. Wa'ita, ka'i kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya nuwanuwana manuwa tunugi-vadavada'aina ginakivemididina, gavaimi ginaga? Nagona yana mani ginahawana be ginahalamanena ka'i mani manuwa anafata o ka'i keke.

Ka'i yana mani fa'ina keke ginanuwanuwa-hagihagi, tu yana manuwa ginayalalakahina, au yana mani ginahavaina fa'ina fa'isewa gina'ilovena. Ada au gaveyao moya'aidi hina'ita-yo hinahawavelaigena hinagayo, Wa'ita, wama kaliva givebutu manuwa gidayogona tu gimaduhegena.

Kadu'e, ka'i tokaiwabu sa'eyana mali tokaiwabu yana yo'o 20,000 buye gaviya fa'ina hi'ela'ela ma valeyadi ginanogalina, gavaimi ginaga? Nagona ginanuwanuwa ka'i yana yo'o 10,000 anafaiweya yo'o 20,000 hinalugaviyadi o ka'i keke.
Ka'i keke adifaiweya digo, tomaduyowayowana gina'iveninisedi hinana mali tokaiwabu hinamidilauveni tu hinakova hinagayo, Ama tokaiwabu nuwanuwana veyao.
Meda anafaiweya ka'i keke wanahawahega be yami gaitoma moya'aidi Iya fa'ikuya wanavekwaulaugedi, kadu keke amifaiweya Iya agaikuya wanavetomuliya.
Lehaga gaitoma hagihagina. Tu ka'i lehaga yana digadigaga gidahavaina digo, keke adafaiweya kadakivedigagi-havagileni, au keke-mo'a.
Ka'i lehaga ana digadigaga keke, a'a o kevakeva ana iveyamumu fa'ina yana faisewa keke. Au kadahegena. Omi watagami bonaku wadavenogalena.” Au hidedemi Yesu givehawala.
Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala hivebutu hi'alawoluwolu higayo, “Medema kaliva tokoyona givevetobohiyanedi buye hi'au'a.”

Au hidede amine higahe fa'ina Yesu hida gahetalahobuhobu agaidiya gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya yana sifi 100 tu sa'eyana gidanuhegena, gavaimi gidagani? Au sifi 99 ubuleya gidanuyabuyabudi tu sifi ginuhegena-ma gidalelena. Gidalelelena gidanunauwena tu gidanuhagana.
Ada ahe gidanuhagana againe, gida'avalana be yana wavemwamwala gidanauwena yana manuweya.
Ada ahe gidayemu-yo tobohiyaneyao be yana yo'o gidakovavaga'auhidi gidagahedi gidagayo, Omi buye kanavemwamwala, fa'ina yaku sifi ganuhegena-ma ahe ganuhagana.

Gagahemi meda anafaiweya tokoyona sa'eyana yana nuwavilana fa'ina vemwamwala lakahi-mo'ena lobameya ginalakayemu, tu yamumudiyao 99 au yegayegadiyao fa'ina keke hidanuwavilani-ma badi fa'idiya vemwamwala ma'ita.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu.

Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i kwamayoku yadi siliva teni tu sa'eyana hidanuhegena digo, gavaimi hidagani? Lamufa hidakabuna manuwa matatabuna hidagili-'owona be hidalelena. Hidalele-hagihagiyena hidanunauwena tu hidanuhagana.
Ada ahe hidanuhagana againe tobohiyadiyao be yadi yo'o hidakovavaga'auhidi hidagayo, Omi buye kanavemwamwala fa'ina yama mani siliva anuhegena-ma ahe anuhagana.
Gagahemi meda anafaiweya tokoyona sa'eyana yana nuwavilana fa'ina Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata hivemwamwala.”
Kadu gahetalahobuhobu anaveto Yesu gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana natuneyao luhei.
Ada kwamaneya tamana againe gigahe gigayo, Kamaku, lokoloko aku du'u ma udaveleku. Au yana lokoloko natuneyao agaidiya gifolakena.
Tu ahe yana mani givehavaidi-yo mena fafali-nadi againe lokabudubudula gilakayemu, au givebutu mafu gilaulauna anaga keke.
Au gina melalai-nadi ana kaliva-lakata sa'eyana againe give'agetoga. Ada givegidena be ginana yana babi sa'eyana againe yana bawe gina'itave'avidi.
Ada nuwanuwana lakahina bawe adi bini a'a fwayafwayana againe gina'ahiyauwa tu keke tamo hakwadi ma'i a'a gidaveleni.
Gimiyami tu nuwanuwa ayaugina a givaina be gi'ayaunena againe gigayo, Kwavakwavaku. Kamaku yana tofaisewa yuwa adi waga tu iya'eku ma hidedei mafulaugeya gana'alika.
Ganamidi be kamaku againe ganana ada bana againe ganagahe ganagayo, Kamaku ahe gakoyo Yaubada matane kadu o mataniya.
Keke gidalubodaku be unahawavenatuneku. Au unavehimeyeku be ya tofaisewa amine ganamiyami. Au hidedemi tauna nuwahinage gigahe.
Au gitowamidi be gilowoga tamana againe.
Aimo lauveya gi'ela'ela tu tamana gi'itana be gihinekalikaliyena. Au gimadu gi'atulauhina giveyaugina.
Au kwamana gigahe gigayo, Kamaku, Yaubada matane kadu o mataniya ahe gakoyo ada keke gidalubodaku be unahawavenatuneku.
Au hidedemi gigahe tu tamana ana agetoga gigahedi gigayo, Wamadu, vaigau yamumu-mo'ena wa'aliye be wave'oseni, kadu nimalukabubu nimane wahifo, ageyafayafa agene waseni.
Bulumakau natudi veve'ahiyauwana wa'aliyeni be wamunu. Avemwamwala againe kanavemwamwala-mo'a.
Fa'ina natuku vaita gida'alika tu ahe giyemu-havagi, kadu vaita gadanuhegeni tu ahe ganuhagana. Au hivebutu hikidewadewa be hivemwamwala.
Badi yadi wavemwamwala hi'au'a tu tomo'ainagona faheya gimiyami be giyewayewana melaleya. Manuwa liline giyemu tu alata kadu vaga ginogalina.
Au agetoga sa'eyana giyowanina be gi'ela ada gitoliluveluvena gigayo, Wada gavaimi-yo modawa butuna ganogalini?
Ma agetoga gigayo, Me o taini a gi'ela ada tama gigahe be bulumakau veve'ahiyauwana ahe amununa, higa natuna wayawaina ginuhagana fa'ina.

Tu tamana againe gibonalaufata gigayo, U'ita, hida malamala moya'aina againiya gaveve'agetoga. Ya vehimeya keke tamo gadadibutoyogeni tu keke tamo udaveleku, keke-mo'a. Keke tamo kevakeva kabi'ona manugose natudi amine udaveleku-yo tobohiyakweyao buye adavemwamwala.
Tu wama natu ya lokoloko vevine yamayamadadadiyao agaidiya gihebana amanadi bana fa'ine bulumakau veve'ahiyauwana umununa.
Tamana gigahena gigayo, Ho natuku, tova moya'aina o iya buye kamimiyami. Yaku gaitoma moya'aina kadu ya gaitoma.
Au gilubodada be kana'avemwamwala, fa'ina taini vaita gida'alika tu giyemu-havagi, kadu vaita kadanuhegeni tu ahe kanuhagana.” Au hidedemi Yesu yana gahetalahobuhobu.

Kadu'e Yesu ana tomuliya agaidiya gigahetalahobuhobu gigayo, “Wakalivana sa'eyana gimiyami, yana giba ana to'itave'avina valeyana ginogalina higa kaliva tufoidi hi'awatalatalainena vaita yana giba gihebahebana.

Au gikovana be gi'ela-yo gitoliluveluvena gigayo, Higa tamo gavadi ugana-ma ganogalina? Ya faisewa ana valeya una'ihagihagiyena be yaku giba ana itave'avina againe ya vemadu ganahalamanena. Valeya koyona ganogalina fa'ina ya faisewa ganadabana.

Wakalivana hidedemi gigahe-yo yana giba ana to'itave'avina nuwahinage gigahe gigayo, Yaku taubada yaku faisewa ginalemaku. Gavaimi ganaga? Fa'ina iya hima faha againe keke fifiwalaku, kadu a'a lokoloko ana ve'o'ola againe wowomumu gananuhagana.
Oo! Nuwaku gi'afolena. Hidemi hidemi ganahuluva be yaku faisewa yaku taubada ginadabani-yo kaliva hinavetobohiyaneku be agaidiya ganamiyami.

Au hidedemi gigahe-yo kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana yana taubada againe hibuki-ma giyowanidi. Kaliva nagona gi'ela gigahena gigayo, Yaku taubada againe a buki gavaiyehi? Bana gigayo, Olive gufana dolomu 100. To'itave'avina gigayo, A buki ana fefe uvaini uhiyoto be 100 unayawelina be 50 unamadu'etoladina.

Kadu kaliva anavelu gitoliyena gigayo, Kadu o'eni a buki gavaiyehi? Bana gigayo, Witi wabaikina 100. Kadu to'itave'avina gigayo, A buki ana fefe uvaini be 100 uyawelini tu 80 u'etoladini. Au hidedemi to'itave'avina gihuluva.

Tu yana taubada mena valeyana ginogalina againe gigahe gigayo, Yana dewa koyona tu kaliva adi buki gikivekabi'ona fa'ina yana wanuwanuwa gihuluva.” Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Wa'ita, badi babi ana kikaiwabugaga hinuwenuwena-ma yadi wanuwanuwa tobohiyadiyao nuwadi hikivedivedigagina be aimo tova mulina fa'ina hinakidewadewa. Tu badi mahalina ana kaliva ma keke hidanuwanuwa lakahina higa vaita tobohiyadiyao nuwadi ana kivedivedigaga guwana hinanuhagani.

Gagahemi babi ana kikaiwabu wanafolafolakena be medema againe kaliva wanavetobohiyanedi. Ada au aimo kikaiwabu-nadi ginahavaina ana toveya, abaga miyamiya-vagahina againe wanaluku be wanamiyami.” Au hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Au ka'i babi ana kikaiwabu keke yami wa'idibumuhiga wada'itave'avini, hakwa'adi lobama ana kikaiwabu ginavelemi-yo wana'itave'avini? Au keke tamo.
Kadu ka'i gava kaliva yana giba keke yami wa'idibumuhiga wana'itave'avini, hakwa'adi giba taumiyao fa'imiya ginavelemi-yo wana'itave'avini? Au keke tamo.

Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wafolafolaka be higa mali kaliva hinagayo, Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao, tu Yaubada ase'asemi gihalamanena. Gavadi agaimiya kaliva hihawaveyamumuyedi, medema vaita iyohoyoho Yaubada matane.”

Kadu Yesu Falisi agaidiya gigayo, “Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese givelena kadu yana nuwanuwa bonana ana to'awatalatalaina giveledi be hidedemi ginauna Yoni Tobafitaiso yana toveya. Yoni gilakayemu-yo Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina yana kaliva hilulumamala, ada kaliva moya'aidi hififaiwala alu'aluwadi givedivediwe be higa hinaluku.
Ihayana be lobama babi anafaiweya ginahavaidi tu keke tamo Yaubada yana vehimeya gina'awowolini.

Kadu Yesu gigahetalahobuhobu gigayo, “Wakalivana sa'eyana gimiyami, kaiwabu adi vaigau yabeyabelina be kwayakwaya-mo'ena againe givivaigau kadu aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana a'a kevakeva bunabunavina gi'au'ana.
Yana miyami yamumunaga tu koyokoyo sa'eyana ana egana Lasalo wowona kolikoliyana gimiyami, tova be tova tobohiyaneyao wakalivana yana eda'awaneya hi'ali'aliyena.
Ada nuwanuwana wakalivana ana awamukumuku gibe'ube'u-ma gina'au'a. Ada galu'eta hi'ela'ela ana koliya hiyamoyamona.
Himiyami tu bana koyokoyo gi'alika be aluwana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata hinauwena be Abelahamo liline hisena. Tu muliya kadu wakalivana gi'alika be hitauna.
Ada bana abaga koyona againe givedivediwe tu gida'italele ma yuwa lauveya Lasalo Abelahamo buye hivetogalugedi-ma gi'itadi.

Au gikova gigayo, Ho kamaku Abelahamo, udahinekalikaliyeku be Lasalo uda'iveninisena ada nimatabona gufa againe gida'utuvini-yo meyaku gidakiveduvedubana be gidatuluna, fa'ina ai'ala'alata againe gavedivediwe lakahina.

Tu Abelahamo gigayo, Boi babiya ya walokoloko umiyami tu bana Lasalo yana miyami keke yamumuna medema tovai-nadi unanuwenuwena. Tu adamoya bana yana wanuwayamumu gimimiyami tu o ya wa'ase'u'aulolo umimiyami.
Kadu'e hahavi lakahina gilugolohina fa'ina gaveyao nuwanuwadi omi agaimiya hinadamana-ma keke adifaiweya. Meda keke tamo hakwadi ime agaimeya ginadamana.

Ada wakalivana gigayo, Auwe tu kamaku, gahawayafeyafe gavaimi udagahe be Lasalo uda'iveninisena kamaku yana yo'o agaidiya, fa'ina tobohiyakweyao faifi himimiyami-ma gida'ago'abiyedi be hida hima aulolo lakahina ana abageya keke hina'ela.
Tu Abelahamo gigayo, Auwe, Mosese yana buki-vehimeya be Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi buki tobohiyamomo agaidiya hidadauda. Gilubodadi be bonai-dina hidavenogaledi.
Tu kadu bana gigayo, Keke kamaku Abelahamo, ka'i keke hinavenogaledi. Atu tamo hakwadi alikeya gidamididi-havagi be gidana agaidiya, au makewa hidanuwavilana.
Kadu'e Yesu ana tomuliya agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Makewa'e koyona ana abavebe'u moya'aina ginalakayemu tu hoiyoi bana kaliva koyona againe gina'aladibidibiyedi-ma vita lakahina ginanuhagana!

Ka'i kuga vita-mo'ena bana odone hidaluhifona be lehageya hidahegehobuyeni-yo gida'alika, au gidalubodana be gidamadu'alika-yo keke anafaiweya tamo kaliva kowakowana koyona againe ginavebe'uni-yo matahiwadi lakahina Yaubada nimane ginanuhagani.
Medema fa'ina taumiyao wana'itave'avimi. Ada ka'i tobohiyami ginahuluva koyona, au wanadakeyena be ka'i nuwana gina'avilana, au kadu yana koyona wanavenuwauluyena.

Ada ka'i aiyeta sa'eyana againe yana koyona seveni agaimiya ada kadu tova seveni agaimiya, gina'elayewayewa ginagahegahe higa vaita yana koyona wadavenuwauluyena, au gilubodami be yana koyona wadavenuwauluyena.”

Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya ana agetoga gidavehimeyena be yana faheya gidafifaisewa o ka'i yana sifi gida'ita'itave'avidi ma gidayewana melaleya againe, bana againe gavaimi gidagahe? Ka'i gidagayo, Auhe'ama u'ela uhiyoto be u'a? Keke-mo'a hidede amine gidagahe. Au gidagayo, Akuga ukidewadewa be unavaigau-yo unahaulili, aku bwai unahiwana be gana'a ganayu. Tu muliya-yo o unana una'a. Au hidedemi gidagahe.
Kadu agetoga yana kauveya givehimeyena amine gihuluva fa'ina, ka'i yana kauveya bana againe ginavesiule? Keke-mo'a.

Meda anafaiweya omi'iyao. Ka'i ami vehimeya matatabuna ganavelemi-ma wanafaisewa-'owodi amine gilubodami be wanagayo, Ime agetoga hawaveyamumu keke ama lauboda, fa'ina ama vehimeyagaga amine afaisewa.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yesu Yelusalema againe ginauna tu Sameliya Galili ana fafali hinafadiya amine ginauna.
Ada melala sa'eyana againe giyemuyemu tu tovedawodawowo teni himadubodebodena. Yuwa himidilauva tu hikova'awafatafata higayo, “Yesu Kauveya, udahinekalikaliyema.”
Tu kaliva sa'eyana agaidiya yana yamumu gi'ita-yo au Yesu againe giyewana, agona lakahina Yaubada gihawadavadavana.
Au Yesu agene gi'ibo'ula-mo'a be givesiuleyena. Hida kaliva au kwanamiSameliya badi miYuda hivenibainedi amanadi.
Bana Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Tovedawodawowo teni matatabudi gasiveyawadi. Tu hai kaliva naeni himimiyami? Gavadi-yo bana hida keke kwanamiIsileli anakaibe giyewa-yo Yaubada gihawadavadavani?”
Ada kaliva againe gigahe gigayo, “Au umidi be unana. Uvetumaganeku fa'ina ubwaina.”
Kadu keke kaliva hinagahe hinagayo, Hidede againe Yaubada yana abavehimeya giyemu, o ka'i hinagayo, Wadedei giyemu. Fa'ina Yaubada kaliva ase'asediya ahe givebutu givehivehimeya.”
Ada muliya valeya wananogalina vaita ahe gada'ivemogataliku ada kaliva hinagayo, Bana yuwa gi'ela, o ka'i hinagayo, Wa'ita hidei gi'ela. Yadi gahe keke wanamuliyeni.
Fa'ina nama gisinamana be auhe'ama lobama fafalina kadu fafalina gituvemahali-'owona amine, meda kaliva moya'aidi hinamadu'itaku Iya Tohobu'ela yaku yewa'ela ana tova.
Tu aku vehimeya gavaina higa kaliva tova adamoya himimiyami-ma hinakiloweku be aulolo moya'aina badi nimadiya gananuhagana.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena Nowa yana toveya kaliva vevine himiyamiyabaubau, a'a hi'au'a bwai hiyuyu hinaginagi hivenavenagi, au yadi havivila tulina tulina hinunauwena tu Nowa waka againe giyage aiyetai-nadi. Giyage tu mala gituwa be moya'aidi gituwa'afufudi. Meda anafaiweya Iya Tohobu'ela yaku yewa'ela ana toveya kaliva vevine hinadewadewa.

Meda boi tuwai-mo'ena Lota yana toveya kaliva himiyamiyabaubau, hi'au'a hiyuyu hilulukimokimone hifahafaha himanumanuwaiyogona, tu auhe'ama Lota gimidi Sodoma gihege-yo ai'ala'alata kadu gaitoma yagoyagona alamatafifailina lobameya gi'ililihiwana be moya'aidi give'alayauyaule-'owodi.
Meda anafaiweya kaliva agaidiya ginalakayemu Iya Tohobu'ela gana'ivemogataliku ana toveya.
Lota vavinena agaidiya nuwami ginanunauyena. Badi hi'ota'ota tu hihagaviladi fa'ina hi'alika.

Gava kaliva keke Iya agaikuya ginahawahegeni tu taunaga yana miyami babiya ginanuwenuwena, medema yawaina ginanuhegena. Atu gava kaliva yawaina alikeya gihawahegena, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.
Gagahemi bogi-nadi againe kaliva luhei ivi sa'eyana againe hinadauda tu sa'eyana gananauwena sa'eyana ginamiya.
Vevine luhei gufeya hina'i'ivilavila tu sa'eyadi gananauwedi sa'eyadi hinamiya. [
Kaliva luhei faheya hinamiyami tu sa'eyana gananauwena sa'eyana ginamiya.]”

Hidedemi Yesu gigahe-yo ana tomuliya hitoliyena higayo, “Kauveya, hida gaitomai-dina ha'againe hinalakayemu?” Bana gigayo, “Hai ubula siyona gilakalaka, medede againe manusiyo hinavaga'auta.” Hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Gigayo, “Melala sa'eyana againe tovedewayauga sa'eyana gimiyami, ada Yaubada keke gidamatauseni kadu kaliva keke gidanuwenuwedi.

Kadu mena melalai-nadi againe sikwa sa'eyadi himiyami, ada tova moya'aina tovedewayauga againe hi'ela'elayewayewa higahegahe higayo, Kaliva sa'eyana agaimeya gidewa koyona ada kotu againe o udavehimeya be agaimeya gidalaufata.
Kadu Kaiwabu gigayo, “Tovedewayauga koyona yana gahe wananuwenuwena.

Bana tovedewayauga koyona nonogana kwamayoku givelugadi. Bana Yaubada kaliva hagihagi-mo'ena ma ka'i yana kaliva luluwafadiyao bogi uyadayada Bana againe hitagitagi-fa'ila ma ka'i ginavelugadi o ka'i keke? Ka'i yana veluga againe ginavekwalu? Keke-mo'a, au gagahemi adi veluga fa'ina ginavehimeya, e ginamaduvehimeya. Atu Iya Tohobu'ela babiya ganayewa'ela ana toveya, ka'i kaliva yadi wavetumagana hive'ove'o'ola-ma gananuhagadi o ka'i keke?” Au hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Gigayo, “Kaliva adi'iselu manuwa-tafalolo againe hiluku be hinave'o'ola. Sa'eyana tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi yadi yo'o kalivana tu sa'eyana takesi ana toyaudi.

Falisi gimidi tauna fa'ine give'o'ola gigayo, Yaubada yo, againiya gavesiule fa'ina yaku dewa keke mali kaliva moya'aidi yadi dewa amine. Badi to'alasebaseba, vehimeya ana todibutoyoga, to'udo. Kadu gavesiule fa'ina iya keke wada takesi ana toyaudi kiki'afuna amine.

Wiki sa'eyana sa'eyana hinagene aiyeta luhei galabelabewaviyo be higa ganave'o'ola fa'ina. Gava lokoloko o ka'i mani gavaivaina-ma gadakadi adi yo'o teni tu sa'eyana O Yaubada gavelevele. Au hidedemi Falisi gigahe.

Tu takesi ana toyaudi yuwa ma'i lauveya gimidi, yana wawowomumu fa'ina keke lobameya gida'itavedadaga au odona gi'aweweni tu gigahe gigayo, Ho Yaubada, iya tokoyona tu udahinekalikaliyeku. Hidedemi gigahe.

Gagahemi hida kalivai-nadi Yaubada matane gisena yegayegana tu gina yana manuweya, tu bana Falisi ma keke. Fa'ina hai kaliva tauna ana egana ginakilakahina, Yaubada mena kaliva ginakivewowomumuna. Atu hai kaliva tauna ginanuwahobu, medema ana egana Yaubada ginakilakahina.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.
Himiyami tu fwefweya nonogana Yesu againe hi'ali'aliyedi be ginakibwa'edi higa ginagahenuwakabubuyedi, atu ana tomuliya hi'itadi-yo to'aliya hidakeyedi.

Tu Yesu we'owe'o gikovadi be Bana againe hina'ela ada ana tomuliya gigahedi gigayo, “We'owe'o keke wanahawatadi au Iya agaikuya hina'ela fa'ina gaveyao vaita we'owe'o keke yadi wakikaiwabu amine, medema Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.

Gagahe velemo'ena gava kaliva Yaubada matane keke ginanuwahobu be kwamana kabi'ona amine ginanuwanuwa, medema keke Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaluku be yana itave'avina againe ginamiyami, keke-mo'a.”
Ada tonagona sa'eyana Yesu gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Tovehawala yamumu, gavaimi ganadewa-yo yawai-vagahiku gananuhagani?”
Ada Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina Iya uhawaveyamumuyeku? Keke tamo hakwadi yamumuna, au Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a yamumuna.
Yaubada yana vehimeya ahe uhalamanena higa keke unakelele keke unaluve'alika keke unakai'afu, tobohiya yana dewa fa'ina keke unagahe-kawowo. Kadu sa'eyana tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi.”
Bana kaliva gigayo, “Mena vehimeyai-dina aimo kabi'okuya gavebutu ga'ita'itave'avina be ganunauwena tova adamoya.”
Bana kaliva Yesu yana gahe ginogalini-yo nuwana givita-mo'a, fa'ina bana yana walokoloko.
Yesu yana nuwavita gi'ita-yo gigahe gigayo, “Badi wakalivadiyao yadi luku Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya au vita-mo'ena.
Ka'i yomuyomu lakahina ana egana kameli gaima matane ginaluku, medema vitana. Atu ka'i wakalivana Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya ginaluku be yana itave'avina againe ginamiyami, medema vita-mo'ena.”
Badi gahe-nadi hinogalini-yo higahena higayo, “Ha! Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya kibababala ginanuhagani.”
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Kaliva adi kibababala keke taudiyao adifaiweya, atu medema Yaubada ana tagalowalowa.”
Au Fita gigayo, “U'ita, ime yama melala ahegedi be O againiya avetomuliya.”

Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena gava kaliva yana melala gihegena o vavinena o tobohiyaneyao o tamaneyao o hinaneyao o natuneyao ginuyabuyabudi be higa Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina kaliva ginavenuwa'atadi, medema tova adamoya ana laufata lakahina, lakahi-mo'ena gavadi gavadi yamumuna ginavaina, ada kadu tova mulina yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.”

Tu Yesu vetomuliya ana laufata fa'ina hidedemi gigahe-yo yana yo'o tuwelo gisi'aliyedi be gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ita, Yelusalema againe kananauna ada gavadi gavadi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Iya Tohobu'ela fa'ikuya hi'etoladina, medema matatabuna ginalakayemu.
Au yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya hinahegenauweku be hinahawavelaigeku ada hina'ihawadamaneku hinakiwaliku hinamunukoyokoyoku tu hinaluve'alikaku. Atu tova anaveto againe ganamididi-havagi.”
Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi tu tomuliya yana gahe matatabuna hifaniyena. E, bonai-nadi ana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana badi agaidiya, ada gavaimi Yesu gigaheyena-ma keke hidahalamaneni.
Tu Yesu Yeliko liline giyemuyemu tu tomatakoyo edeya gihiyoto leme fa'ina give'ove'o'ola.
Au yo'o hinauna-ma butudi ginogalini-yo gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Omi gaveyao?”
Kaliva higahena higayo, “Yesu kwanaNasaledi ginanauna.”
Kaliva wai hinagona-ma hidakeyena be higa ginave'amata, tu bana kadu agona gilakata-mo'a gikovadona gigayo, “O Devida bwanenena gavaimi uda'itanuwakabubuyeku.”

Au Yesu ginumidi givehimeya be tomatakoyo Bana againe hinavega'aulena. Ada ahe Yesu liline gi'ela-yo gitoliyena gigayo, “Gavadi nuwanuwa o fa'iniya ganagani?” Bana gigayo, “Kauveya, nuwanuwaku gada'italele.”
Au Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Mata gina'italele. Uvetumaganeku fa'ina ubwaina.”
Auhe'ama matana gi'ita'italele ada Yesu gimulimuliyena tu Yaubada ana egana gikikilakahina. Ada kaliva moya'aidi hi'ita-yo kadu badi Yaubada hihawadavadavana.
Tu Yesu Yeliko melala againe giluku be ginanauna.
Medede againe kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami ana egana Sakiusa, ada bana takesi ana toyaudi kikaiwabuna yana walokoloko.
Ada nuwanuwana gavaimi Yesu ana ita'ita ma gina'itana, tu bana kaliva kali'uhona ada kaliva hiyo'oyo'o fa'ina keke anafaiweya gida'itani.
Au wai gimadunagona aihala ana egana sikomoli againe gilaka be gina'itana, fa'ina edai-nadi againe Yesu gi'ela'ela.
Yesu ai-nadi inubane giyemu-yo givedadaga gigahena gigayo, “Sakiusa, umaduhobu fa'ina adamoya gilubodaku be ya manuweya buye kanamiyami.”
Auhe'ama gimaduhobu yana wavemwamwala givega'aulena be hina yana manuweya.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi hi'itana againe hivebutu hi'alawoluwolu higayo, “Bana kaliva koyona nonogana againe giluku giwakawaka.”
Wa'ita, Iya Tohobu'ela gahobu'ela be badi Yaubada yana eda hifaniyena-ma ganaleledi kadu ganakibababaledi.”

Yesu yana yo'o buye kabisona Yelusalema againe hinayemu ada yo'oyo'o hinuwanuwa vaita Yaubada yana abavehimeya kaliva agaidiya auhe'ama gina'ivemogatalina. Medema fa'ina Yesu yana gahe aimo hinuwenuwena tu givebutu gahetalahobuhobu gilukahihiyena.
Gigayo, “Kaliva kikaiwabuna sa'eyana fafali lauveya ginana be tokaiwabu adi maka ginavaina be ginayewana.
Ginana fa'ina yana tofaisewa teni gikovadi be sa'eyana sa'eyana K100 giveledi ada gigahedi gigayo, Hida mani lukimokimone againe wanakivetubugina be wananunauwena yaku yewa'ela ana toveya.
Gina tu yana melala kalivadi hivenikohiyena ada tovenuwa'ata hi'iveninisedi be hivemulitawaina higa tokaiwabu lakahina hinagahena hinagayo, Keke nuwanuwama hida kaliva agaimeya ginavetokaiwabu.

Hidedemi higahe tu au ai'adi tokaiwabu adi maka givaina be giyewana yana melaleya. Giyemu-yo yana tofaisewa mani giveledi-ma giyowanidi be higa gavaiyehi yadi lukimokimoneya ana tufo buye hivaini-ma ginahalamanena.
Au tofaisewa nagona gi'ela gigayo, Kauveya, ya mani K100 gave'atutamo'aina be K1,000 gilakayemu.
Tofaisewa anavelu gi'ela gigayo, Kauveya, ya mani K100 gave'atutamo'aina be K500 gilakayemu.
Yana tovehimeya gigahena gigayo, Kadu o'eni abavehimeya melala faifi agaidiya unavaina.

Muliya kadu tofaisewa sa'eyana gi'ela gigayo, Kauveya, hidei ya mani, kalekoya gakevana be gidauda. O kaliva nuwa koyona fa'ina gamatause. Mali kaliva gififaisewa tu o fata uvaivaina, kadu mali kaliva gifahafaha tu o a'a uyauyaudi-kawowo.

Yana tovehimeya gigahena gigayo, O tofaisewa koyo. Tauni ya gahe amine ganavedewayaugi. O ugahe va ita udahalamaneku iya kaliva nuwaku koyona. Mali kaliva gififaisewa tu iya fata gavaivaina, kadu mali kaliva gifahafaha tu iya a'a gayauyaudi-kawowo. Hidedemi o ugahe tu gavadi-yo yaku mani banika againe keke udaseni? Ka'i udasena digo, yaku mani ana ve'atutamo'ai gadavaina yaku yewa'ela ana toveya.
Au ana agetoga liline himidimidi-ma agaidiya gigahe gigayo, Yana mani K100 wanalemana be bana K1,000 gi'abina-ma wanavelena.
Badi higayo, Kauveya, yana mani ahe lakahina K1,000.

Tu bana gigayo, Gagahemi hai kaliva yana halamana o ka'i yana faisewa Yaubada givelena-ma gi'ita'itave'avina, medema yana halamana o yana abavehimeya ginakivetubugina. Atu hai kaliva yana gava'adi Yaubada givelena-ma keke gina'itave'avini, medema yana halamana kabi'ona Yaubada ginavaihegena be ginamiya-kawowo.
Ma hida nibaikweyao keke nuwanuwadi badi agaidiya ganavetokaiwabu-ma wanakive'avidi be wana'aliyedi matakuya wanaluve'alikadi.” Gahetalahobuhobu au hidede amine.
Yesu gilukahihi gihavaina, ana tomuliya edeya ginagoyedi Yelusalema againe hinauna-tu.
Melala luhei Bedefegi kadu Bedani oya ana egana Olive againe hi'iveda'ufodi tu ana tomuliya adi'iselu gigahedi be wai hinanagona.

Gigahedi gigayo, “Omi wai wananagona yuwa melala againe wanaluku, ada wanalukuluku tu doniki natudi ai againe hiluhifona-ma wana'itana. Mena doniki kwaune keke tamo hakwadi boi gidayage. Au wanayauna be wana'aliyena.
Ada ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, Gavana fa'ina wayauyauni? au wanagahena wanagayo, Yama Kaiwabu nuwanuwana me'ama.”
Au tomuliya adi'iselu gi'iveninisedi-ma hilowoga be hina, ada Yesu gigaheyena amine hinuhagana.
Ada doniki natudi hiyauyauni waganeyao higahedi higayo, “Gavana fa'ina doniki wayauyauni?”
Badi higayo, “Yama Kaiwabu nuwanuwana fa'ina.”
Au doniki natudi Yesu againe hi'aliyena ada adi aikeva kwaune hiyavelini-yo Bana giyage.
Ada ginauna tu kaliva adi aikeva edeya hiyaveyavelina.

Ada Yelusalema liline oya Olive ana eda gihobu againe giyemu-yo ana tomuliya yadi yo'o lakahina hivebutu yadi wavemwamwala Yaubada hihawadavadavana agodi lakahina, Yesu yana gugai fifiwalana tulina tulina hi'itana-ma fa'ina hivesivesiule higayo,
au Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.
Kukuya ana toni'inuba lobameya kanadavadavana,
Tomiyagetane-mo'ane kanakivekaiwabuna.”
Bana gigayo, “Gagahemi ka'i badi hidave'awa'ibodeku digo, kuga aku davadava fa'ina auhe'ama hidakovakova.”
Gigayo, “Hoiyoi miYelusalema! Vaita adamoya kukuya ana eda wadahalamaneni tu tova hidevama matami gi'itahowahowa eda wafaniyena.

Aimo tova vitana agaimiya ginayemu, nibaimiyao boda hinadudauvina be hinabodabodafifimi-yo melala hinaluyaweyawelina, omi'iyao kadu natumiyao melala ana alahinageya hinaluyaweyaweli-'owomi. Keke tamo kabala hikivetalana-ma aimo kabalahiyana tabone ginada, au moya'aina hinatutuyauyaulena. Au hidedemi hinahuluvimi, fa'ina Yaubada gi'ela be ginakibababalemi-ma ana tova wafaniyena.”
Yesu miYelusalema gitagi'uvadi gihavaina, manuwa-tafalolo lakahina ana eda'awaneya giluku be givebutu tolukimokimone giwavidi gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe gigayo,
Yaku manuwa hinavewagana abave'ove'o'ola ana manuwa.
Hidedemi gigahe tu omi'iyao ma vaita tokai'afu yadi abaga amine wafaisewana.” Hidedemi Yesu gidakeyedi.

Ada au aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya manuwa-tafalolo againe givehavehawala. Atu badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu yo'o adi tonagona eda hilelena be higa hinaluve'alikana.
Tu eda hilele-wayoga keke adifaiweya, fa'ina yo'o moya'aidi Yesu bonana hivenovenogalena keke nuwanuwadi tamo gahe hinanogalibabuni.

Tova sa'eyana Yesu manuwa-tafalolo againe kaliva givehavehawaledi kadu Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina gilulumamaledi tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao be Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu kaliva lakahidiyao buye Bana againe hi'ela higayo, “O ugahema, ha'againe ya abavehimeya uvaini-yo boiyesedi mena gaitoma tulina tulina ufifaisewadi? Hakwa'adi mena abavehimeya givele-yo hidedemi uhuluva?”

Yesu gigayo, “Kadu toliluvaluva sa'eyana agaimiya ganasena. Au omi wanagaheku, hakwa'adi abavehimeya Yoni Tobafitaiso givele-yo kaliva gikivebafitaisoyedi? Ka'i yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe give'inuba o ka'i kaliva agaidiya?”

Yesu gigahe-yo badi buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ka'i kanagahe vaita Yoni yana abavehimeya Yaubada againe gidave'inuba au Bana ginagayo, Ka'i Yaubada againe digo, gavadi-yo Yoni yana gahe keke wadavetumaganeni?
Tu ka'i kanagahe vaita kaliva agaidiya gidave'inuba, kaliva moya'aidi hinatutuve'alikada, fa'ina badi hinuwave'avina vaita Yoni Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina.”
Hidedemi hinuwanuwa fa'ina Yesu yana toliluvaluva hidemi hifatana higayo, “Ka'iwa. Ime keke adahalamaneni.”
Au Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Omi keke wadagaheku fa'ina, meda anafaiweya Iya keke ganavenuwa'atami hade'againe yaku abavehimeya give'inuba-yo hida gaitoma gafifaisewadi.” Au hidemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu Yesu badi tonagona bonadi gifata-yo yo'o agaidiya gahetalahobuhobu hidede amine gilukahihiyena gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana ai guwana ana egana kelefi yana babi againe gifahana, ada kaliva tufoidi faha ana to'itave'avina gisedi tu yana melala gihegena gina mali fafaliya gimiyami lauva tunugina.

Himiyami tu kelefi ana aikolu ana tova giyemu againe, tonifaha ana agetoga faha ana to'itave'avina agaidiya gi'iveninisena be yana faha guwana tufona hinavelena fa'ina. Atu to'itave'avina agetoga himununa be makagekagena hiwavina.
Au kadu agetoga velugana gi'iveninisena tu to'itave'avina himununa be hikivekoyo-mo'ena au makagekagena hiwavina.
Kadu agetoga anaveto gi'iveninisena ada hida kalivai-nadi hi'iveki'onina be ala kwaune hihegevihilena.
Au tonifaha gigahe gigayo, Gavadi ganagani? Natuku natu'ase'aseku gana'iveninisena. Ka'i bana'e hinave'amohimohinena. Hidemi gigahe.
Tu to'itave'avina hi'ita-yo taudiyao hive'agahegahe higayo, Hida hima bana ana hilafa. Kanaluve'alikana be higa yana babi taudeyao kanavaina.
Au ala kwaune hituwa'atugena be hiluve'alikana.”
Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe tu gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Wananuwanuwa. Tonifaha badi to'itave'avina agaidiya gavaimi ginaga?
Au ginayewa'ela be ginaluve'alikadi ada yana faha to'itave'avina velugadiyao nimadiya ginasena.” Tovanenega hinogalini-yo higahe higayo, “Au keke, keke-mo'a.”
Ogola manuwa ana to'aiyogona hikilowena-ma
au holili'abi manuwa hinafane-mo'ane gimidimidi.

Tu badi miYuda adi tonagona keke adifaiweya Yesu hinamadukive'avini fa'ina, aimo hilulubodena ada yadi kaliva tufoidi hivegidedi be yo'o hinafadiya hinanaukau tu vaita kaliva velemodi amine hinahuluva. Nuwanuwadi Yesu tamo yana bonalaufata againe hinavebauna be higa adifaiweya kabemani yana wafaiwala ma yana abavehimeya againe hinahegenauwena.
Au tonaukau hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Tovehawala, ime ahalamanena ya gahe ya vehawala au tunutunugina, kadu kaliva moya'aidi u'itadi leleleya tu Yaubada yana eda fa'ina uvehavehawala velemo'ena.
Au anatoliye, kwanaLoma yada tokaiwabu lakahina Sisa againe takesi kanasena, ka'i medema gilubodana o ka'i keke?”

Hidedemi hitoliluvaluva tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwakau gi'ayaunena ada gigahedi gigayo, “Mani kabala wanavehawaleku. Hida hakwadi magigina? Kadu hakwadi ana egana mene kabala againe hikilumini?” Badi higayo, “Bana Sisa.”
Bana gigahedi gigayo, “Au hadema Sisa yana lokoloko, medema Sisa againe wanasena. Kadu hadema Yaubada yana lokoloko, medema Yaubada againe wanasena.”
Au keke adifaiweya Yesu yana bonalaufata againe hinavebauni-yo ginakoyo kaliva matadiya. Ada yana bonalaufata fa'ina hiyaulowoga ada au hive'amata.
Tu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Sadusi tufoidi Yesu againe hi'ela be hinatoliluveluvena. Badi'iyao ma higahe vaita aimo tova mulina to'alika keke hinamididi-havagi.

Badi higayo, “Tovehawala, Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe hidede amine gi'etoladi. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana kwamayoku ginanagina ada natudi keke tu gina'alika, au kaliva tobohiyana yana vayasi anafaiweya gidanagina be tobohiyana ana hilafa fa'ina natuneyao gina'ivetubugidi. Au vehimeya hidede amine Mosese giveleda.
Au kaliva tobohiyaneyao seveni himiyami tu tomo'ainagona kwamayoku ginagina ada natudi keke tu gi'alika.
Ada taina yana vayasi ginagina ada natudi keke tu gi'alika. Meda anafaiweya kaliva anaveto be hinunauwena tu taina kaliva anaveseveni natuna keke tu gi'alika.
Muliya-mo'ane kadu kwamayoku gi'alika.
Au kaliva adiveseveni kwamayoku sa'eyana hinagina fa'ina, aimo tova mulina kaliva hinamididi-havagi ana toveya bana kwamayoku-nadi ma gava kaliva vavinena?”
Tu Yesu bonadi gifatana gigayo, “Badi kaliva vevine hida aituhai-nadi babiya himimiyami-ma hinaginagi hivenavenagi.

Atu badi gaveyao Yaubada givehawadi vaita gilubodadi be alikeya hinamididi-havagi be aimo tova mulina aituhai-nadi againe hinamiyami, medema keke hinanagi, kadu keke hina'alika-havagi fa'ina yadi miyami badi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yadi miyami amine. Kadu Yaubada alikeya ginasivemidididi fa'ina, badi Yaubada natuneyao.

Omi wagahegahe vaita to'alika keke hinamididi-havagi tu kaliva velemona hinamididi-havagi ma Mosese tauna yana buki againe givehawaleda. Wa'ita, ai giyabelina tu keke gida'alahini ma kahihina againe Mosese Kaiwabu givewagana Abelahamo yana Yaubada kadu Aisake yana Yaubada kadu Yakobu yana Yaubada, badi kalivai-dina alu'aluwadi yawayawadi himimiyami amanadi.
Bana Yaubada ma keke ali'alikadiyao yadi Yaubada, au kaliva alu'aluwadi yawayawana yadi Yaubada, fa'ina badi kalivai-dina tuwai-mo'ena hi'alika-ma adamoya wayawaidi Yaubada matane himimiyami.”
Hidedemi Yesu gigahe-yo Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala tufoidi higahe higayo, “Tovehawala, ubonalaufata yamumuna.”
Yesu bonadi gifatana yamumuna fa'ina badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao toliluvaluva kadu keke velugana hidaseni, au himatauta fa'ina hi'ilova.
Tu Yesu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao agaidiya toliluvaluva gisena gigayo, “Gavadi-yo tovehawala higahe vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida ana egana Keliso Devida bwanenena?
Bana Devida tauna Same ana buki againe gigahe gigayo,
Bana Yaubada Kaiwabu iya yaku Kaiwabu gigahena gigayo,
Nima i'atagikuya unahiyoto. O unamiyami tu
nibaimomo ageyafayafaniya ganasedi.
Au hidede amine Devida Keliso givewagana yaku Kaiwabu, tu gavaiya'amine yana Kaiwabu kadu bana bwanenena muliya gitubuga amanadi?”

Yesu au hidemi givehawala ada kaliva moya'aidi aimo hivanevanenega tu ana tomuliya givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala yadi dewa keke nuwami gina'abini. Nuwanuwadi aikeva tunugina hina'oseni-yo abakimokimone againe hinanunudadana be kaliva hinalusiuleyedi kadu hinagayo, Velemodi. Nuwanuwadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi agaidiya kadu avemwamwala againe abavetoga kikaiwabuna againe hinavetoga.

Ada sikwasikwadiyao yadi lokoloko hilemadi ada hive'ove'o'ola-fa'ila be higa kaliva hinahawaveyamumuyedi. Yadi koyona ve'o'ola-fa'ila againe hikevana fa'ina adi vita gavatubuga hinanuhagana.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'ata.
Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe givetoga ada gi'italele be wakalivadiyao yadi velekawowo abavedodoga againe hiseusena-ma gi'itadi.
Kadu sikwa koyokoyodi gi'itadi, hi'ela kabala kukwauhina luhei hidodona.
Au gigahe gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena wakalivadiyao yadi velekawowo mani lakahina hidodona tu hida sikwa koyokoyodi yadi velekawowo kabi'ona againe hitubuhegedi.

Fa'ina badi wakalivadiyao yadi mani tufonaga hidodona ada yadi tufo lakahina aimo gidadauda, tu badi sikwa koyokoyodi gavadi againe adiga o adi kaleko hidakimonena-ma mani-nadi matatabuna hidodo-'owona.”
Tu Yesu ana tomuliya tufoidi manuwa-tafalolo lakahina hiyofeyofena higayo, “U'ita, manuwa ana kabala gavavewaga! Kaliva yadi abahawahega againe manuwa hivevigauna.”

Bana Yesu bonadi ginogalini-yo gigahe gigayo, “Hida manuwa wa'ita'itana-ma tova gi'ela'ela be badi nibaimiyao hinaluyaweyaweli-'owona. Kabala againe hikivetalana tu aimo keke tamo kabala kabalahiyana tabone ginada, au moya'aina hinatutuyauyaulena.”
Badi higayo, “Tovehawala, gava tova hidedemi ginalakayemu? Gava aituha ana'ita-yo anahalamaneni mena gaitomai-dina ulukahihiyedi-ma kabisona hinalakayemu?”

Yesu gigayo, “Aituha hidede amine. Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi yana fwaya againe ginanuwa'abiyemi. Fa'ina aimo kaliva moya'aidi hina'ela aku egana hinayakahina hinagayo, Kaliva Yaubada givegidena-ma iya kaliva-mo'eku. Kadu hinagayo, Keliso yana yewa'ela ana tova giluveda'ufo-mo'a. Tu bonadi keke wanavenogaleni.

Kadu aituha sa'eyana ma gaviya kadu vekwageya moya'aina valeyadi wananogalina againe keke ase'asemi gina'akolukoluni lakahina. Mena gaitoma anafaiweya gidalakayemu tu tova ana lauyabu keke auhe'ama ginamadulakayemu.” Au hidemi Yesu givenuwa'atadi.
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Yo'o sa'eyana mali yo'o buye hinave'amunumunuga, kadu fafali sa'eyana mali fafali buye hinalulugaviya.
Fafali tulina tulina agaidiya li'uli'u lakahina kadu lokabudubudula kadu aulolo koyona nudamadamanina hinalakayemu. Ada abamatauta kadu iya'iyaya ase'asekolukoludi lobameya hinalakayemu.
Au higa tova yamumuna be Iya fa'ikuya wana'awatalatalaina.

Kadu yami bonalaufata aimo kotu againe fa'ina keke wanavenuwanauna, fa'ina kotu againe wanamidi ana toveya gana'alavelevelemi kadu gananuwahuyavelemi be nibaimiyao agaidiya keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya yami gahe ginamadubodani o ka'i ginavele'atuyewemi.
Ada tamamiyao hinamiyao o tobohiyamiyao o tubudelideli o ami kusebo nonogana tovehimeya agaidiya hinahegenauwemi, ada hinavehimeya be tufoimi hinaluve'alikami.
E, omi yaku kaliva fa'ina moya'aidi hinavenikohiyemi.
Atu u'umi keke tamo gina'agologolohi, au yamumumiyao wanamiyami.
Ada yami atuvefa'ila againe yawai-vagahimi wananuhagana.
Medema tovai-nadi omi Yudiya ana fafaliya wanamiyami-ma au oyeya wana'ota, kadu omi melala hinagene wanamiyami-ma melala wananuyabuyabuna, ada omi wala'aiya wanamiyami-ma keke wanayewami melaleya.
Fa'ina hida aiyetai-dina agaidiya Yaubada miYuda ginavematahiwadiyemi be higa gavaimi Bana bonana eto'etoladina gigaheye-vagahini, medema ginalakayemu velemo'ena.
Hoiyoi vevine wahifugadi kadu vevine natudiyao aimo hivehuvehuhudi amanadi! Fa'ina medema tovai-nadi mulolova lakahina omi miYuda yami fafali againe ginalakayemu, ada Yaubada yana ila'a wananuhagana.

Nibaimiyao feto againe tufoimi hinaluve'alikami, tufoimi hinakive'avimi be fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hinanauwemi. Ada yo'o tulidiyao Yelusalema hinavagatagona be hinanunauwena tu yo'o tulidiyao yadi abavehimeya ana tova Yaubada gisena-ma ginahavaina ana maka.

Kaliva yadi matauta fa'ina hina'enota'u, kodulele babiya ginalakayemu-ma fa'ina asekolukolu againe keke ma'ita hina'ilova. Hinamatauta fa'ina lobama ana gaitoma fifiwaladiyao adi iviya gina'atuliyeliyedi.
Hidedemi lobama ana loi hinahuluva tu Iya Tohobu'ela buhibuhi tabone gayewayewa'ela-ma hina'itaku. Yaku wafaiwala kadu yaku wamahalina ve'akinamanamalina gayewayewa'ela-ma hina'itaku.
Hida gaitomai-dina hinavebutu hinalakayemu wanamididi-mo'a wanavedadaga, fa'ina ami tutuvehobu tova kabi'ona wananuhagana.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'ata.
Kadu Yesu badi agaidiya gigahetalahobuhobu gigayo, “Lalava kadu ai moya'aina adi dewa wananuwenuwena.
Ai hinatafa ma taumiyao nuwamiya wa'itahalamanena wagayo, Kauwana yana tova giluvedaveda'ufo.
Meda anafaiweya mena aituhai-dina hinalakayemu ma wana'itadi againe, au wanahalamanena tova kabisona kaliva Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami be ase'asediya ginavehivehimeya.
Gagahe velemo'ena hida tova ana yo'o keke moya'aidi hina'alika-'owoga tu nagona mena gaitomai-dina moya'aina hinalakayemu.
Lobama be babi ginayawowola tu bonaku keke ginayawowola, au ginaduva-vagata.
Fa'ina tovai-nadi tomiyababi moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya ginavefuta'adi.

Tova moya'aina wanavanevanenega kadu wanave'ove'o'ola be higa Yaubada ginafaiwalavelemi-yo mena vitai-dina hinalakayemu-ma agaidiya wana'atuvefa'ila, kadu Iya Tohobu'ela matakuya amifaiweya wanamidi.” Au hidedemi Yesu givenuwa'ata.
Tu aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya Yesu manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe givehavehawala, ada mala gibobogi gilolowoga ginana oya Olive ginunauda.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi manuwa-tafalolo againe hi'eno'enohobu be bonana hinanogalina.
Ada badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala eda hilelelena be gavaimi Yesu hinaluve'alikani, tu yo'o himatausedi.
Hidemi hinuwanuwa tu Yudasi-Isikaliyota ase'asene Setani giluku, bana Yesu yana yo'o tuwelo kalivana.
Au gina abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu tuilala adi tonagona buye hilulukahihi be gavaimi Yesu badi agaidiya ginahawavemogataleni.
Au badi nuwadi giyamumu ada higahe higa vaita mani hinavelena.
Ada bana gigayo, “Au yamumuna.” Au gina tu tova yamumuna gilelena be badi agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena yo'o keke hinavaga'auta againe.
Himiyami tu tafalolo ana egana Beledi keke Wa'isina ana tova giyemu, medema tovai-nadi Abamaduviviya ana sifi kabi'odiyao himunumunudi.
Au Yesu Fita be Yoni gi'iveninisedi gigahedi gigayo, “Wana Abamaduviviya a'ana wakidewedeweni be buye kana'a.”
Higahena higayo, “Ha'againe nuwanuwa anakidewedeweni?”
Bana gigayo, “Wanogali! Melala againe ahe wanayemu-yo kaliva gufa watuwavina gi'avalana-ma ginamaduhagami. Au wanamuliyena be gava manuwa againe ginaluku mededei buye wanaluku.
Au tonimanuwa wanagahena wanagayo, Tovehawala gigahe gigayo, Hadema vetawana Iya fa'ikuya uhawahegeni be Abamaduviviya a'ana aku tomuliya buye ana'ani?
Ada vetawana lakahina manuwa getane ivi ahe hi'iyaveyavela-ma ginavehawalemi. Mededei wanakidewadewa.”
Au tomuliya adi'iselu hina ada Yesu gilukahihiyena amine hinuhagana. Au Abamaduviviya a'ana hikidewedewena.
Tu au ana tova ahe gilakayemu againe, Yesu gi'enolukekela ada badi afositolo Bana buye hi'enolukekela.
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Iya nuwanuwaku lakahina hida Abamaduviviya a'ana omi buye kana'ana. Nagona kana'a, muliya yaku tagiya ginalakayemu.

E, gagahemi Abamaduviviya a'ana keke-mo'a kadu gana'a-havagileni tu tova mulina hida a'a ana nuwanuwa badi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hinaluku-ma nuwahinagediya ginalakayemu velemo'ena yo gana'ana.”
Gigahe-yo au gowa givaina digo Yaubada againe givesiule gitunena gigayo, “Hida wavaini be agaimiya wanafolaka.

E, gagahemi aimo keke tamo oine ganayu-havagileni tu tova mulina Yaubada yana avemwamwala ana tova ginalakayemu, kadu oine ganayuna. Mena avemwamwalai-nadi badi yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hiluku-ma fa'idiya gisena.”
Au a'a givaina digo givesiule gikihinena au ana tomuliya giveledi gigayo, “Hida wowoku gahawahegena-ma omi fa'imiya. Hidede amine tova moya'aina wananuwa-nunauyeku.”
Tu wa'ita, bana'e nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku-ma, we'a buye atogaluga be a'a'au'a.
Au Iya Tohobu'ela gana'alika tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada givehimeya amine, tu hoiyoi bana kaliva nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku amanadi! Bana'e vita lakahina ginanuhagana.”
Au hivebutu hive'atolitoli higa vaita hakwadi badi agaidiya medede amine ginahuluva.
Kadu'e, ana tomuliya kaiwabu hivekwageyena ka'i hakwadi badi agaidiya kaiwabu againe wai ginago-mo'eni kaliva matadiya.
Ada Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Yo'o tulidiyao adi tokikaiwabu yadi wa'agodadaga hi'ita'itave'avidi, kadu yadi tovehimeya taudiyao hivewagadi tonuwakabubu.
Tu omi'iyao ma keke medede amine wanahuluhuluva. Hai kaliva kikaiwabu-mo'ena, medema ginavekwana-we'owe'o. Kadu hai tonagona, medema tobohiyaneyao agaidiya ginave'agetoga.
Fa'ina hakwadi kikaiwabu-mo'ena? Ka'i bana'e givetoga be gi'au'a amanadi o ka'i bana'e give'agetoga amanadi? Au bana'e givetoga gi'au'a amanadi, tu Iya'eku agetoga amine hinafamiya gamimiyami.
Tu omi'iyao vita tulina tulina ganuhagana-ma agaidiya lilikuya wamidi be wavelugaku kalivai-mina.
Ada Kamaku abavehimeya giveleku amine, meda abavehimeya omi ganavelemi.
Tova mulina yaku wa'abavehimeya ganamiyami ana toveya, yaku tolameya wana'au'a wanayuyu kadu didiga'u'uya wanavetoga miIsileli ami yo'o tuwelo kalivai-dina wanavedewayaugidi.”
Tu o fa'iniya gave'o'ola be ya vetumagana Yaubada againe keke ginahavaini. Ada aimo Iya agaikuya ahe unahagavila againe tobohiyamomo ase'asedi unakivevatuna.”
Tu Fita gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, iya gahawahegeku be O unaluku deliya kadu iya buye kanaluku. Ka'i O una'alika kadu iya buye kana'alika.”
Yesu gigayo, “Fita o ganagahe. Tova adamoya kamukamu keke ginakwage tu nagona unamidivekekeyeku tohiye vaita keke udahalamaneku.”
Au Bana gigayo, “Tova adamoya hakwadi yana wamani, au gidavaina be gidanauwena, meda anafaiweya vainuwana. Kadu hakwadi yana feto keke, au ana aikeva gidatunedamanena be yana feto gidakimonena.
Fa'ina agaimiya ganagahe, gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Veyao Tuwaina ana buki Iya fa'ikuya gigaheye-vagahina, anafaiweya medemi gidalakayemu velemo'ena gigayo,
Hivaita bana'e tokoyona adi yo'o kalivana.
E, gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena Aiseya Iya fa'ikuya gi'etoladina, medemi adamoya gilakalakayemu.”
Yesu gigahe-yo badi higayo, “Kauveya u'ita, hide'i feto luhei.” Bana gigayo, “Au adafata.”
Tu Yesu Yelusalema gihegena be gina oya Olive againe yana huluva tova moya'aina amine. Ada ana tomuliya hivebwa'uliyena.
Ada ahe hiyemu-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Wanave'ove'o'ola be keke aladibidibi againe wanaluku.”

Au gina kabala ka'atugena ana lauva amine be tugana give'etodonena give'ove'o'ola gigayo, “Kamaku, ka'i ya nuwanuwa amine digo, hida aulolo ana gowa udavaihegena tu keke yaku nuwanuwa amine, au ya nuwanuwa amine unahuluva.”
Hidede amine give'o'ola-yo lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana giyemu gilemena.
Tu ase'asena gi'aulolove'ine fa'ina, yana ve'o'ola againe gifaiwala-mo'a au gihitana ana hitana vaita dayaga babiya gidahelohelolo amine.

Ada give'o'ola gihavaina, gimidi ana tomuliya agaidiya giyewana, badi yadi wanuwavita fa'ina hidauda-ma gigahedi gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina wadadauda? Wamidi wanave'ove'o'ola be keke aladibidibi againe wanaluku.”
Gigahegaheni yo'o hilakayemu, ada kaliva ana egana Yudasi ginagoyedi, bana Yesu yana yo'o tuwelo kalivana. Au Yesu liline gi'ela be higa ginaveyaugina.
Tu Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Yudasi, ka'i hima veyauga againe Iya Tohobu'ela nibaikweyao agaidiya unahawavemogataleku?”
Au Yesu ana tomuliya gavadi ginalakayemu ma hi'ita-yo higayo, “Kauveya, ka'i feto againe kanamunudi?”
Ada tomuliya sa'eyana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana agetoga gilauna tagana wa'i'atagine giluyo'ena.
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Auwe gimiya.” Au tagana gikivefosena be gisiveyawana.

Ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu tuilala kadu kaliva lakahidiyao hi'ela vaita hidakive'avina be hidanauwena-ma agaidiya Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Vaita Iya tomunugakai'afu amine yo wa'ela wafetomiyao wafulumamiyao.
Tova tova manuwa-tafalolo againe omi buye kamiyami tu keke wadakive'aviku. Atu tova adamoya ma yami tova higa umalovana yana abavehimeya giyemu.”
Yesu gigahe-yo au hikive'avina be hinauwena abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu yana manuweya. Bana Fita wai gimulina lauveya.
Atu ahe hiyemu be manuwa eda'awana hinafane ai hikulina digo buye hihiyoto-ma againe, Fita gi'ela badi buye hihiyoto.
Gihiyoto tu agetoga kwamayoku sa'eyana ai mahaline Fita gi'itana, ada gi'itadonedonena gigayo, “Hei! Hidema kalivai-nadi kadu Bana'e buye himiyami.”
Tu gihawavekema gigayo, “Kwamayoku, Bana kalivai-nadi iya keke gadahalamaneni.”
Himiyami tu kadu kaliva sa'eyana Fita gi'itana gigahe gigayo, “Kadu o'eni sa'eya agaidiya.” Fita gigayo, “Kaliva iya keke.”
Bai sa'eyana himiyami tu kadu kaliva velugana gigahedona gigayo, “Au makewa hidema kalivai-nadi Bana'e buye himiyami, fa'ina bana kadu kwanaGalili!”
Tu Fita gigayo, “Kaliva, gavaimi ugahegahe ma iya keke gadahalamane.” Ada auhe'ama aimo gigahegaheni kamukamu gikwage.
Ada Kaiwabu gihagavilana be Fita gi'itadonena. Au Fita Kaiwabu yana gahe nuwana gi'afolena gigahena gigayo, Kamukamu keke ginakwage tu nagona unamidivekekeyeku tohiye.
Ada gina yuwa kabu'avane gitagitagi agona lakahina.
Tu badi kalivai-dina Yesu hikive'avina-ma hivebutu hihawahawavelaigena himunumununa.
Kadu matana kalekoya hisebodana au hitoliluvaluva higayo, “Hakwadi gimunumunu-ma mene u'ayauneni?”
Kadu wonakoyokoyo moya'aina againe hi'ihawadamanena.
Tu mala gilauna abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala higa miYuda yadi Koniselo hivaga'auta, ada Yesu hinauwena yadi vaga'auta againe.
Tu gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i ganahawavemogatala, keke-mo'a wanavetumaganeku.
Kadu ka'i agaimiya ganatoliluvaluva, keke bonaku wanalaufata.
Tu tova adamoya Iya Tohobu'ela abavetoga kikaiwabuna Yaubada Tofaiwala-mo'a i'atagine ganahiyoto be ganamiyami.”
Au moya'aidi hitoliyena higayo, “Ka'i O'eni Yaubada Natuna?” Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Wagahe amine Iya'eku.”
Au higayo, “Kadu kaliva velugadiyao yana hawatagona Yaubada againe hinahawavemogatalena-ma keke kanalele. Au taudeyao Bana Tauna awane ahe kanogalina.”
Tu badi miYuda yadi Koniselo moya'aidi hitowamidi be Yesu Failato againe hinauwena.

Ada hivebutu hihawavekoyoyena higayo, “Hidema kalivai-nadi anuhagana, Bana ime miYuda yama yo'o ginuwa'abiyedi be omi miLoma hinavekwageyemi. Gihawatama higa vaita Loma Tokaiwabu lakahina Sisa againe keke takesi anaseni. Kadu gigahe vaita Tauna Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso, higa vaita Bana'e tokaiwabu lakahina.”
Au Failato gitoliyena gigayo, “Ka'i O'eni miYuda adi Tokaiwabu?” Yesu gigayo, “Au ugahe amine Iya'eku.”
Tu Failato abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao be yo'oyo'o agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Keke tamo koyona hida kalivai-nadi againe gadanuhagani.”
Tu badi kaliva hikwagekwageye-mo'ena higayo, “Yana vehawala againe yo'o nuwadi gisigadagadalina. Galili againe givebutu tu ginauwena Yudiya ana fafali matatabuna agaidiya au gi'ela hidedei.”
Tu Failato hidedemi ginogalina againe, gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Ka'i hida kalivai-nadi kwanaGalili?”
Galili ma Helodi yana abavehimeya againe gidauda, ada ahe gihalamanena bana kwanaGalili au Helodi againe gi'iveninisena, medema tovai-nadi bana tauna Yelusalema againe gimiyami.
Au toliluvaluva moya'aina Yesu againe giyakahina, tu keke gidabonalaufata.
Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala himidimidi, yadi wa'ago'uga hihawahawavekoyoyena.
Ada Helodi yana tolugaviya buye hihawave'iyoyohoyena kadu hihawavelaigena. Au vaigau yamumu-mo'ena hive'oseni-yo Failato againe giveyewana.
Ada medema aiyetai-nadi Helodi Failato buye hiveyao, tuwaina ma hive'avenivenibaina.
Tu Helodi Yesu Failato againe giveyewana tu Failato abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao be miYuda adi tonagona velugadiyao kadu yo'o buye gikovavaga'auhidi.

Au gigahedi gigayo, “Hidema kalivai-nadi iya agaikuya wahege'aliyena, vaita yo'oyo'o nuwadi gidasigadagadalini tu wa'ita, matamiya gatoliluveluvena ma keke tamo vita yami hawavekoyo amine Bana againe gadanuhagani.
Meda anafaiweya Helodi yana koyona gilele-wayoge, au ime agaimeya giveyewana. Keke tamo gavadi koyona gidafaisewani tu gadamiyaluve'alikana.
Fa'ina ganavehimeya be tolugaviya bulava againe hinalauni-yo ganayauna.”
Tu miLoma adi vehimeya sa'eyana ma tafalolo ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya againe yogoyogonina sa'eyana gidayauyauna be miYuda agaidiya gidahawahawahegena.]
Au moya'aidi tamotamo'aine hikova higayo, “Wadema kalivai-nadi uluve'alikani tu Balaba uyau.”
Bana Balaba ma tobohiyaneyao buye Yelusalema againe hive'atalalakalaka be kaliva hiluve'alikadi, ada medema fa'ina Balaba deliya hisena.
Failato nuwanuwana Yesu ginayauna fa'ina yo'oyo'o gigahe-havagiledi.
Tu hihawahawaya'ala higayo, “Wanakivekelosena, wanakivekelosena.”
Au tova anaveto gigahedi gigayo, “A! Gavadi yana koyona? Keke tamo gadanuhagani tu gadamiyaluve'alikana. Au ganavehimeya be hinalauni-yo ganayauna.”
Tu higahegaheya'aya'ala agodi lakahina againe hikovakova higa vaita kelose againe gina'alika. Au yadi kovadona-luya'aya'ala againe Failato bonadi gi'abina.
Au gihawahegedi be yadi ve'o'ola amine givehimeya.
Kaliva vekwageya luve'alika fa'ina deliya hisena-ma giyauna, bana'e hive'o'olena kalivai-nadi, tu Yesu givetalaiyena be gavaimi hinuwanuwa amine hinahuluvina.

Tu Yesu hinauwena. Hinauna tu kaliva sa'eyana, kwanaSailini ana egana Saimoni himaduhagana. Bana wala'aiya gitauya be Yelusalema againe ginauna. Au hikive'avina digo kelose hive'avalani tu higayo, “Ulau'avala be Yesu muline una.”
