Ada yo'o lakahina hivebwa'uliyena, vevine buye'i. Ada badi vevine ase'asedi hi'atu'atutagona tu Yesu fa'ine hitagitagi'awafatafata.
Yesu badi agaidiya gihagavilana gigayo, “MiYelusalema vevine, keke Iya fa'ikuya wanatagiya. Au taumiyao fa'imiya wanatagi, kadu natumiyao fa'idiya wanatagi.
Wanogali! Aimo tova vitana ginayemu be wanagahe wanagayo, Badi kakalidiyao ma hagihagidiyao! Vevine keke hidavenatuna keke hidavehuvehuhu-ma hagihagidiyao!
Au hinavebutu oya agaidiya hinagahe hinagayo, Ho oya, wadadobomi be wadavetalabodama. Kadu oya kabi'odi agaidiya hinagayo, Wadasevauyema.
Ka'i Iya vaita ai mahi'ina amine aku vita keke ma hidedemi hinahuluviku, aimo miYelusalema vaita ai bouna amine adi vita lakahina ma hinakivekoyo-mo'edi.”
Kadu kaliva adi'iselu tokoyona-mo'a ma buye hinauwedi be hinaluve'alikadi.
Ada ahe oya ana egana Utouto againe hiyemu-yo Yesu hikivekelosena, kadu tokoyona-mo'a buye'i, sa'eyana wa'i'atagine, sa'eyana wa'i'imawane.

Ada Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Kamaku, yadi koyona keke unalaufata, badi hima fanifanidiyao.” Au kabala hihegelakahina be gava iya'iyaya higaheyena-ma ginalakayemu, medema kalivai-dina Yesu ana kaleko hinavaina.
Kadu Bana u'una getane hida hifufu hi'etoladina, “Hidevama miYuda adi Tokaiwabu.”
Tokoyona sa'eyana kelose againe hitutuvefosena-ma, givebutu gihawaluvetonovena gigayo, “Vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida O'eni. Au Tauni unakibababale, kadu ama'iselu buye'i!”
Tu bana velugana tobohiyana gidakeyena gigayo, “Ka'i keke Yaubada udamatauseni? Moya'aida kelose againe kanagilagi.
Ada'iselu ma yada dewa ana vita kawahiwahina tu hidema kalivai-nadi keke tamo gavadi koyona gidagani.”
Au Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Ho Yesu, tovai-nadi ya wakikaiwabu unayemu, udanuwa-nunauyeku.”
Yesu gigayo, “Gagahe velemo'ena againiya, adamoya o'eni Iya buye Yaubada yana abamiyami Faladaisi againe kanamiyami.”
Ada manuwa-tafalolo vetawana-tabu ana abaseboda kaleko gi'ahailugana be higa vaita abaluku Yaubada againe gi'ayauna.
Au Yesu gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Kamaku, alu'aluwaku nimaniya ganasena.” Gigahe-yo yawaina gihavaina.
Tu togiyomatana gavadi gilakayemu-ma gi'itana againe, givebutu Yaubada gihawadavadavana gigayo, “Wona velemona hidema kalivai-nadi yegayegana.”
Kadu yo'oyo'o moya'aidi medede againe matawabuwabu fa'ina hivaga'auta-ma huluvai-nadi hi'itana againe, hiyewayewadi ase'asedi hi'atu'atutagona.
Ada Yesu tobohiyaneyao moya'aidi kadu vevine Galili againe hitauya be hivebwa'uliyena-ma, himidilauva gaitomai-dina hilakayemu-ma hi'itadi.
Tu kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Yosefa gimiyami kwanaAlimadiya, medema Yudiya melalina. Ada bana miYuda yadi Koniselo kalivana tu bana kaliva hagihagina yana dewa tunutunugina.
Tu Koniselo yadi vevai be yadi dewa Yesu yana alika fa'ina keke gidavenogaleni. Au Yaubada yana Tovegida Tauna yana ela fa'ina gibodaboda.
Bana kalivai-nadi gina Failato againe Yesu wowona give'o'olena.
Au gikakilina digo kaleko kwayakwayana againe gifafana au tomohuyahuya boi kuga hinagene hiyalana-ma againe gisena, medede againe keke tamo to'alika boi hidaseni.
Tafalolo ana abakidewadewa ana aiyeta gihavahavaina tu sabati kabisona ginavebutu.
Au Yosefa Yesu wowona gihuyana againe vevine hivebwa'uliyena, badi boi Galili againe Yesu buye hitauya. Tomohuyahuya hi'itana kadu gavaiya'amine Yesu wowona gisena-ma hi'itana.
Hi'ita-yo au hiyewadi manuweya, vanedimodimo bunama buye hikidewedewena. Tu sabati againe hiveyawai, Yaubada yana vehimeya amine.
Tu sabati higa Satadei hihege tu tafaloloya mala giwedala vevine vanedimodimo hi'ihagihagiyena-ma hivaina be hina tomohuyehuyeya.
Hiyemu-yo kabala tomohuyehuyeya tamo hakwadi ahe give'awawana-ma hi'itana.
Tu hiluku againe Kaiwabu Yesu wowona hi'i'avana.
Ada mema nuwadi givevegafo'uya'uya tu kaliva adi'iselu gilu'afuneunedi lilidiya himidi, adi vaigau ve'akinamanamalidi.
Au vevine himatauta be babiya hi'ibo'ula-mo'a tu kaliva higahedi higayo, “Gavana fa'ina yawayawana waleleleni to'alika yadi abageya?
Bana'e keke hidedei gidamiyami, au gimididi-havagi. Yana gahe agaimiya boi Galili againe aimo gimiyami tu gigahemi, medema nuwami ginanunauyena.
Gigayo, Iya Tohobu'ela kaliva koyodiyao nimadiya hinahegenauweku ada kelose againe hinatutuvefoseku, ada aiyeta anaveto ganamididi-havagi. Hidedemi gigahe.”
Au yana gahe againe vevine nuwadi ginauna.
Ada tomohuyehuyeya hitauya be hiyewadi melaleya, hida gaitoma moya'aina tomuliya ileveni kadu kaliva velugadiyao moya'aidi agaidiya hilukahihiyena.
Vevine ma Meli vineMagidala, Yowana, Meli Yemesa hinana kadu mali vevine hibwa'ulidi-ma gaitoma hidevama afositolo agaidiya hilukahihiyena.
Tu afositolo hivaita badi vevine hidagahe-kawowo fa'ina yadi gahe keke hidavetumaganeni.

Atu Fita gitowamidi be gimadu tomohuyehuyeya. Giyemu-yo gi'ibo'ula be gilukenala againe, to'alika yana lifigaga gi'itana. Au ginauna manuweya tu nuwana givevegafo'uya'uya gaitomai-nadi ahe giyemu-ma fa'ina.
Tu medema aiyetai-nadi tomuliya luhei agaidiya melala ana egana Emeusa hinauna, Yelusalema ana lauva kilomita ileveni.
Ada hida gaitoma moya'aina ahe gilakayemu-ma fa'ina buye hilukahihi.
Buye hilulukahihi hiveve'atolitoli tu Yesu Tauna lilidiya giyemu be buye hinauna.
Tu matadi giluhowahowa be hifaniyena.
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Medema gavaimi waveve'agahegahe tu wananauna?” Au walumagiboudiyao himidi-vagata.
Kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Kaliyofasi gigahena gigayo, “O'eni, wakawaka Yelusalema againe umimiyami tu gaitomai-dina tova hidevama hiyemu-ma ka'i O akaibe keke udahalamanedi?”
Badi higayo, “Yesu kwanaNasaledi fa'ine, Bana'e ma Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina, gugai be gahe againe gifaiwala Yaubada matane kadu kaliva moya'aima matameya.
Kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu ama tonagona badi miLoma agaidiya hihegenauwena be alika againe hinahegena, ada au hikivekelosena.
Tu ime anuwave'avina vaita Bana'e miIsileli nibaideyao agaidiya ginakibababaleda. Kadu'e Yesu a gi'alika tu aiyeta tohiye ahe kahegedi.

Ada vevine tufoidi yama yo'o agaidiya yadi gahe againe ase'asema gi'alilihiwana. Badi hi'enohobu be hina tomohuyehuyeya tu wowona hi'i'avana au hi'ela higayo, Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata a'itadi, badi higahema Yesu yawayawana gimimiyami.
Kadu tufoidi ime buye amiyami-ma hilowoga be hina. Ada vevine higaheyena amine hi'itana tu Bana'e keke hida'itani.”
Hidedemi kaliva higahe-yo Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Kwavakwavamiyao! Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi gahe moya'aina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gidadauda-ma ase'asemi givenogale-'abobowena.
Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida ana vehimeya ma aulolo kaliva nimadiya ginanuhagana, ada muliya yana wakikaiwabu ginamiyami. Mena to'awatalatalaina yadi gahe ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke?”

Ada Yesu givebutu gahe moya'aina Tauna fa'ine Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda-ma gahe-nadi fa'ina gikivetuvetunudi. Givebutu Mosese yana buki agaidiya kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi etoladi agaidiya be ginunauwena buki moya'aina giluyabuna.
Tu melala againe hinauna-ma liline hiyemu-yo Yesu gihuluva vaita ginanulovedi.
Tu yadi gaheya hisiveyewana higayo, “Mala a gilavina kabi'ona ginabogi fa'ina au buye kanamiyami.” Au giluku buye himiyami.
Ada hi'enolukekela hi'au'a tu Yesu a'a givaina digo Yaubada againe givesiule gikihinena ada giveledi.
Au matadi gimahalina be hihalamane-mo'ena, auhe'ama gilu'amuvedamana.
Ada buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Wona velemo'ena ada ayauna giyamuyamumu edeya kanauna tu Bana ide buye kalulukahihi be Yaubada bonana fa'ina gikivetuvetunuda.”

Auhe'ama adi'iselu hitowamidi Yelusalema againe hiyewadi, yo'o ileveni hinuhagadi kaliva velugadiyao buye hivaga'auta higahegahe higayo, “Makewa Kaiwabu ahe gimididi-havagi ada Saimoni againe gilakayemu.”
Au kaliva adi'iselu gaitoma edeya gilakayemu-ma hilukahihiyena, kadu higayo, “A'a gikihinena againe ahalamanena.”
Aimo hilulukahihi tu Yesu Tauna gilu'afuneunena hinafadiya gimidi gigahedi gigayo, “Ase'asemi gina'ilova.”
Tu ase'asedi gi'akolukoluna ada himatautave'ine, hivaita balauma hida'ita'itani.
Tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo wa'ase'u'aulolo? Gavana fa'ina ase'asemi gi'amalakibo?
Nimaku ageku wana'itana. Hima Iya Tauku. Wanakidadaniku be wana'itaku. Balauma keke wawowona keke waluluna tu we'a wawowoku waluluku.”
Gigahe-yo nimana agena givehawaledi.
Tu badi hivemwamwala lakahina kadu nuwadi giyaulowoga fa'ina, aimo keke hidavetumagane-mo'eni tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i mene tamo a'a?”
Au igana kabukabunina hivelena ada givaina be matadiya gi'ana.

Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Boi aimo buye kamiyami tu gavenuwa'atami-ma hidede amine. Gilubodana be gavadi moya'aina boi tuwai-mo'ena Iya fa'ikuya Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina, medema gidalakayemu velemo'ena. Gahe-nadi Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe gi'etoladina, kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hi'etoladina, kadu Yaubada yana kaliva Same againe hi'etoladina.”
Ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hidede amine hi'etoladi higa Iya Keliso ganatagi tu aiyeta anaveto againe alikeya ganamididi-havagi.
Kadu yaku kaliva nuwavilana be koyona ana aba'aiyawela aku eganeya hinalulumamalena. Hinavebutu Yelusalema againe hina'avalalakahina be hinanunauwena fafali moya'aina agaidiya.
Gaitoma hidevama ana tohawavemogatala omi'iyao.
Ada wanogali! Abahawahega Kamaku giwonadabedabemi-ma gana'iveninisena higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina, tu hidei melaleya wanabodaboda tu lobama yana faiwala againe ginave'osemi.”
Tu Yelusalema hitauya be Bedani tufone givega'auledi, ada nimana gikilakahina be gigahenuwakabubuyedi.
Gigahegaheyeni Yaubada lobameya gisilakahina be ginuyabuyabudi.
Au hihawadavadavana be yadi wavemwamwala Yelusalema againe hiyewadi.
Ada tova moya'aina manuwa-tafalolo againe himiyami be Yaubada hihawadavadavana.
(Yesu kahihina iya Luke ga'etoladina-ma au hidede amine.)
Ada au babi ana abave'inuba againe Bana Bona Yaubada buye himimiyami.
Ada Bana Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Bana Bona givelena be Bana Bona gaitoma moya'aidi gibubudi, ada Bana anakaibe babi ana gaitoma sa'eyana sa'eyana gibubudi, au keke tamo hakwadi velugana gida'aibubuna.
Bana'e againe gaitoma moya'aidi wayawaidiyao yawaidi hinuhagana, ada Bana'e kaliva yawaida giveleda-ma kadu nuwada gikivemahalina.
Ada Bana'e kaliva nuwada gikivemahalina-ma ana egana Tomahala, fa'ina ide uyuyu againe kamimiyami-ma gitutuvemahalida, tu badi to'uyuyu ma Tomahala yana mahalina keke adifaiweya hidaluvekwe'uni.
Tu kaliva sa'eyana gilakayemu ana egana Yoni. Bana Yaubada gi'iveninisena be gi'ela.
Bana kalivai-nadi gi'ela be kaliva agaidiya mahalina fa'ina ginahawavemogatala, ada yana gahe hinanogalini-yo moya'aidi Tomahala hinavetumaganena.
Tu bana Yoni tauna keke Tomahalai-nadi. Bana gi'ela be higa Tomahala fa'ine ginahawavemogatala.
Tu Bana Bona mahala velemo'ena ada babiya gihobu'ela be kaliva moya'aida nuwada gi'i'ivemahalina.
Ada au Bana Bona babiya gihobu'ela be gimiyami. Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe Bana Bona Tauna babi ana To'aibubuna nonogana tomiyababi hifaniyena.
Tauna yana babi againe gihobu'ela tu yana yo'o hikilowena.
Tu tufoidi keke hidakiloweni, au ase'asediya hivega'aulena be hivetumaganena, fa'ina badi tovetumagana gihawahegedi be Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya hitubuyemu.

Badi tovetumagana Yaubada natuneyao hitubuvagu, ada yadi tubuvagu inubana keke kaliva dayagine, keke kaliva be kwamayoku yadi enoluga againe, kadu keke kaliva yana nuwanuwa againe. Au Yaubada Tauna yana vehimeya againe badi tovetumagana au Yaubada natuneyao hitubuvagu.

Kadu Yoni Bana fa'ine gilukahihi, gikovalumamala gigayo, “Hida kalivai-nadi fa'ine boi galukahihi gagayo, Iya wai ganagona tu Bana mulikuya gina'ela-ma gikaiwabuhegeku, fa'ina iya aimo keke gadatubuga tu Bana tuwaina gimiyamiya-vagata.” Hidemi Yoni gigahe.
Ada Bana'e nuwadoga againe gidodobodabodana ada moya'aida agaideya yana nuwadoga gifolafolakena tova moya'aina, keke tamo gida'ilova.

Boi tuwaina Mosese Yaubada yana vehimeya ime miYuda bwanenemeyao givehawaledi, tu tova adamoya Yesu Keliso Tamana Yaubada yana huluva amine gihuluva fa'ina, Yaubada yana nuwadoga kadu yana gahe velemona kahalamanena.
Keke tamo hakwadi Yaubada gida'itani, keke. Tu Bana'e Natuna anakaibe'u-mo'a Tamana tova moya'aina giveve'alunena, Yaubada yana huluva ide agaideya givehawala.

Tu tova sa'eyana miYuda yama tovehimeya Yelusalema againe abaveyao ana tofaisewa tufoidi kadu manuwa-tafalolo ana toveluga buye'i hi'iveninisedi be Yoni againe hi'ela, higa hinatoliluveluvena. Au higayo, “O hakwa'adi? Ka'i o'eni kalivai-nina Yaubada givegide be yada yo'o unanagoyeda?”
Ada Yoni keke gidave'amata, au moya'aidi matadiya gihawavemogatala gigayo, “Iya keke Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida.”
Kadu hitoliluvaluva-havagi higayo, “Ka'i o'eni to'awatalatalaina boi Mosese gilukahihiyena, higa tova mulina gina'ela-ma?” Kadu bana Yoni givekeke.
Bana givekeke-yo badi kadu higayo, “O udavenuwa'ata be adanogalina. Badi hi'iveninisema-ma aimo o fa'iniya gavaimi anagahedi? Gavadi o inuba?”
Iya tokova, wala'aiya gakovakovadadana gagayo,
Kaiwabu yana eda ase'asemiya wanakidewedewena.”
Hidedemi Yoni Aiseya bonana giyakahina.
Tu badi totoliluvaluva medema tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi adi yo'o kalivai-dina. Badi Falisi hi'iveninisedi be hi'ela.

Ada au Yoni againe hitoliluvaluva-havagi higayo, “O'eni keke Keliso, o'eni keke Elaiya kadu o keke tokivetuvetunu Mosese gilukahihiyena-ma, tu o hakwadi vehimeya givele-yo kaliva ukikivebafitaisoyedi?”

Bana mulikuya gina'ela tu gikaiwabuhegeku. Bana kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu iya kwamana kabisoku fa'ina, keke akufaiweya Bana againe ganave'agetoga-yo ana ageyafayafa adi aba'aiyauga ganayauni.” Hidemi Yoni gigahe.
Ada hida lukahihi melala ana egana Bedani againe gilakayemu, melalai-nadi Yolidani yuwa fafaline. Medede againe Yoni kaliva gikikivebafitaisoyedi.

Wada kalivai-nadi fa'ine boi galukahihiyena gagayo, Iya wai ganagona tu Bana mulikuya gina'ela-ma kikaiwabu againe gitubuhegeku, fa'ina iya aimo keke gadatubuga tu Bana tuwaina gimiyamiya-vagata. Hidemi gagahe, ada wadema kaliva-mo'ena.
Ada nagona iya gafaniyena gavaita hakwa'adi, tu omi miIsileli agaimiya Bana inubana ganakivemogatalina fa'ina, Yaubada gi'iveniniseku be ga'ela gufa againe gakikivebafitaisoyemi.”
Ada au iya ga'itana, ada moya'aimi matamiya gahawavemogatala hida kalivai-nadi Yaubada Natuna.” Hidedemi Yoni gigahe.
Tu kadu aiyeta anaveto againe Yoni gimidimidi ana tomuliya adi'iselu buye'i.
Himidimidi tu Yesu gi'ela be ginauna. Yesu ginauna tu Yoni gi'ita-yo gigayo, “Mene wa'ita, Bana Yaubada yana Sifi Kabi'ona.”
Ada tomuliya adi'iselu Yoni bonana hinogalini-yo, hilowoga Yesu muline hina.
Hinauna tu Yesu gihagavilana gida'ita ma himuliyena, au gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Gavadi-yo wa'ela?” Ada tomuliya sa'eyana gigayo, “Labai, gava manuwa againe umiyami?” (Hifufu
Au Yesu gigayo, “Wa'ela be kana ganavehawalemi.” Ada au hina be manuwa againe gimiyami-ma hi'itana. Ada kauwana giwahivekenana fa'ina, badi Bana againe buye himiyami tu mala a gibogi.
Ada kaliva adi'iselu Yoni yana gahe Bana Yesu fa'ine hinogalina-ma sa'eyana Anidulu, bana Saimoni-Fita taina.

Ada auhe'ama Anidulu gimadulowoga be gina tawagana Saimoni gilelena. Ginuhagani-yo gigahena gigayo, “Bana Mesaiya higa Yaubada yana Tovegida yada yo'o ginanagoyeda-ma ahe anuhagana.” (Tu bona Gilika againe Tovegida hivewagana Keliso.)

Ada au Anidulu tawagana givega'aulena Yesu againe. Ada Yesu gi'itadonedonena gigahena gigayo, “O'eni Saimoni Yoni natuna tu Iya ganaluwatuye Sifasi.” (MiYuda bonadiya bana ana egana Sifasi, bona Gilika ana egana Fita, ada egana ana kaivila kabala.)
Tu aiyeta anavefowa againe Yesu ginuwanuwa vaita ginana Galili ana fafali againe, ada Filifi ginuhagana gigahena be higa ginamuliyena.
Ma bana Filifi kwanamiBedasaida, medema kadu Anidulu be Fita yadi melala.

Au Filifi gina Nataniyela gilelena. Ginuhagani-yo gigahena gigayo, “Kaliva anuhagana, bana fa'ine boi Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe gi'etoladina, kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hi'etoladina-ma Bana kalivai-nadi anuhagana. Ana egana Yesu, Yosefa natuna, kwanamiNasaledi.”
Ada Yesu gida'ita ma Nataniyela gi'ela'ela, ada bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, “Wa'ita, bana kwanamiIsileli velemo'ena. Yana dewa velemo'ena fa'ina keke tamo ve'alololo bana againe gidadauda.”
Nataniyela gigahena gigayo, “Ha'againe u'itaku-yo uhalamaneku?” Yesu gigayo, “Bana Filifi aimo keke gida'ela gidavega'aule tu iya ga'ita be gahalamane, fiki aiwa'une umiyami ana toveya.”
Yesu gigayo, “O againiya Iya gagahe fiki aiwa'une ga'ita. Hida yaku gahe fa'ina uvetumaganeku. Yaku gahe o fa'iniya medema gaitoma kabi'ona, tu aimo gaitoma lakahina una'itana.”
Kadu gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Lobama gina'ayauna be Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata Iya Tohobu'ela agaikuya hinatauya be hinalakalaka hinahobuhobu ma o una'itadi.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu aiyeta luhei hihegedi tu kaliva sa'eyana kwamayoku ginagina melala ana egana Kena againe. Kena medema Galili ana fafaliya ada melalai-nadi againe moya'aidi hivaga'auta nagi ana avemwamwala fa'ina, ada Yesu hinana ahe hilakayemu.
Kadu Yesu hiyowanina ana tomuliya buye'i nagi ana avemwamwala fa'ina.
Au hivaga'auta hivebutu hi'au'a tu bwai ana egana oine hiyu-'owoni-yo Yesu hinana Bana Yesu againe higahe higayo, “Yadi oine a gihavaina.”
Tu Yesu hinana agetoga agaidiya higahe higayo, “Gavaiya'amine Bana ginagahe, au medede amine wanahuluva.”

Ada au aba'aihiwaga kugakugana sikisi gidauda, medema nima ana aba'ikolakola fa'ina miYuda yama dewa tafatafalolona amine. Ada aba'aihiwaga sa'eyana sa'eyana ana laga vaita dolomu kabi'ona faifi o kai seveni amine ana laga.
Tu Yesu agetoga gigahedi gigayo, “Aba'aihiwaga gufa-mo'a againe wanavemagana.” Ada au hihiwalakahina.
Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Au wahiwa be avemwamwala ana tovehimeya againe wanauwe.” Ada au hihiwana be kaliva-nadi againe hinauwena.

Tu gufa-mo'a a give'oine ada bana tovehimeya giyuluvaluva tu hade'againe oine-nadi hivaini-ma keke gidahalamaneni. Au badi agetoga hihalamanena, taudiyao gufa-mo'a againe hihiwana fa'ina. Ada bana tovehimeya giyuni-yo, tonagi gikovana be gigahena gigayo, “Kaliva yadi oine yamumu-mo'ena himidihiwana, ada wakawaka hinayu'ahiyauwa-yo muliya oine-kawowo hinahiwana. Hidedemi kaliva moya'aidi yadi dewa tu o'eni ma oine yamumu-mo'ena usevauyena be adamo'uya useyemaunena.” Hidedemi gigahe.
Tu muliya Yesu Kafeneumi melala againe gihobu, kadu badi hinana, tobohiyaneyao kadu ana tomuliya buye hihobu'ela ada medede againe hinumiya.
Ada manuwa-tafalolo againe giluku tolukimokimone ginuhagadi, bulumakau sifi bunebune hikimonayedi abaveyao fa'ina. Kadu'e mani tulina tulina ana tosenisi yadi tolameya hivetoga-ma gi'itadi.
Gi'itadi-yo yana fuluma bulava Tauna gimetana be moya'aidi gitafidi au giwavidi, kaliva yadi yomuyomu buye'i. Kadu'e tosenisi yadi mani gi'iyauyaulena, ada yadi tolama givetala'afufuna.
Kadu badi bunebune hikimonayedi-ma gigahedi gigayo, “Hida lokoloko au wanauwe. Keke Kamaku yana manuwa againe wanakimokimone vaita maketi amine.” Au giwavidi be hihobu.
Ho Yaubada, ya manuwa fa'ina iya gavedivediwe be vita ganuhagana.

Tu Yesu tolukimokimone giwavidi fa'ina, miYuda tufoidi higahena higayo, “Hakwadi vehimeya givele-yo kaliva uwavidi? Aituha fifiwalana tamo unafaisewana be ya abavehimeya anahalamanena, ka'i velemo'ena Yaubada givele o ka'i fwaya.”
MiYuda higayo, “Hida manuwa-tafalolo ana aiyogona kaliva hinunauwena malamala foti-sikisi (46) agaidiya, tu O ugahe vaita aiyeta tohiyegaga againe afaiweya unavemididini.”
Tu Yesu keke manuwa-tafalolo-mo'ena fa'ine gidalukahihi, au tauna wowona fa'ine gilukahihi.
Ada muliya Yesu ahe gimididi-havagi ana toveya, bonai-nadi ime ana tomuliya nuwama gi'afolena ada au Yaubada bonana tuwai-mo'ena hi'etoladina-ma adavadavana kadu Yesu bonana avetumaganena.

Atu Yesu tafalolo lakahina, ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya fa'ina Yelusalema againe gimiyami, ada medema tovai-nadi nimana ana iya'iyaya hi'itana fa'ina, moya'aidi Yesu ana egana hivetumaganena.
Tu Bana Yesu ma ase'asedi gihalamanena, fa'ina keke gidavetumaganedi.
Bana'e kaliva moya'aida ase'aseda gihalamane-'owona, ada yada dewa fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi againe ginatoliluvaluva, au gihalamane-mo'eda.

Ada bogi sa'eyana againe hida kalivai-nadi Yesu againe gi'ela gigahena gigayo, “Tovehawala lakahi, ime ahalamane Yaubada gi'iveninise be bonana unavehawalema, fa'ina tova moya'aina nima ana iya'iyaya ufifaisewana. Ka'i Yaubada keke O buye wadamiyami o, iya'iyaya-nadi keke afaiweya.”
Bana Nikodimo gigayo, “Gavaiya'amine kaliva lakahina kwamana amine ginatubuvagu? Bana keke anafaiweya hinana kamodiya ginaluku-yo kadu ginatubuga-havagi, keke.”
Bana'e amanadi kaliva dayagine ginatubuga, au kaliva wowona luluna ginavaina tu bana'e ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina yawaine ginatubuga, au Alu'aluwa yawaina ginavaina.
Iya gagahe gagayo, Omi wanatubuga-havagi. Hida yaku gahe againe keke nuwami ginavegafo'uya'uya.

Kaliva yana tubuga Alu'aluwa Mahalina yawaina againe medema vaita bolimana amine. Bolimana ginauna tauna givehimeyena amine. Butuna wanogalina higa ana aituha, tu inubana kadu ana lauyabu keke wadahalamaneni. Meda anafaiweya Alu'aluwa Mahalina yawaina inubana kadu ana lauyabu keke wadahalamaneni, tu hai kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina yawaina againe ginatubuga, medema yawaina ivaguna ana aituha yana huluva againe wa'itana.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Nikodimo gigahena gigayo, “Kaliva yana tubuga-havagi gavaiya'amine? Iya keke gadahalamaneni.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Gavadi-yo o tovehawala lakahi miIsileli agaideya tu hida gaitoma galukahihiyena-ma ufaniyeni.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Ime bona ahalamane-mo'ena ma alukahihiyena ada gavadi a'ita-mo'ena ma ahawavemogatalena tu omi tovehawala ma bonama keke wadavenogaleni.
Babi ana miya fa'ina omi agaimiya galukahihiyena tu keke wadavetumaganeku. Ka'i lobama ana miya fa'ina ganalukahihi, keke-mo'a wanavetumaganeku.
Ada keke tamo hakwadi lobameya gidalaka-yo gidahobu'ela tu Iya Tohobu'ela akukaibe. Au lobameya gamiyami be gahobu'ela.
Gavana fa'ina-yo hinakivemididiku? Hinakivemididiku be higa gava kaliva Iya ginavetumaganeku, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Yaubada Natuna babiya gi'iveninisena keke vaita tomiyababi matahiwadi ginaveledi, keke-mo'a. Au gi'iveninisena be kaliva ginakibababaledi fa'ina.

Gava kaliva Yaubada Natuna againe ginavetumagana au medema Yaubada keke matahiwadi ginaveleni, tu gava kaliva gidibutoyoga be keke ginavetumaganeni au ahe'i, ana wamatahiwadi Yaubada matane ahe gimimiyami, fa'ina Natuna anakaibe'u-mo'a ana egana keke gidavetumaganeni.

Yaubada yana matahiwadi gavana ana inuba? Tomahala babiya gihobu'ela nonogana, kaliva nuwanuwadi uyu'uyuyune hinamiyami be dewa koyona hinafaisewana fa'ina. Yadi dewa koyona fa'ina keke nuwanuwadi mahalina againe hinamiyami. Hidema fa'ina Yaubada matahiwadi ginaveledi.
Tokoyona keke nuwanuwadi mahalina. Au hivenikohiyena, fa'ina mahalina yadi dewa koyona gi'iveyemaunina, ada au keke nuwanuwadi mahalina againe hinayemu.
Tu badi kaliva dewa tunutunugina hififaisewana-ma nuwanuwadi mahalina againe hinamiyami be moya'aidi hinahalamanena Yaubada yana faiwala againe yadi dewa tunutunugina hififaisewana.
Tu Yesu gilukahihi gihavaina, Yelusalema gihegena ana tomuliya buye hina Yudiya awa'awanine buye himiyami ada kaliva Yesu yana vehimeya againe hibafibafitaiso.

Ada kadu Yoni melala ana egana Ainoni againe, medema Salimu liline, kaliva gikikivebafitaisoyedi melalai-nadi againe gufa lakahina gidauda fa'ina. Ada kaliva vevine bana againe hinauna hibafibafitaiso.
Medema tovai-nadi Yoni deliya aimo keke hidaseni.
Tu Yoni ana tomuliya tufoidi kwanamiYuda sa'eyana buye hivekwageya. Bwanene ana aba'ikolakola tafatafalolona fa'ina hivekwageya.

Au Yoni ana tomuliya bana againe hi'ela hi'awatalatalaina higayo, “Tovehawala, Bana boi yuwa Yolidani buye wamiyami ada Bana fa'ine ulumamala-ma, Bana kalivai-nadi againe adamoya kaliva moya'aidi hinauna hibafibafitaiso. Vaita o againiya hida'ela tu Bana againe hinauna.”

Omi taumiyao boi iya gagahe yaku gahe wanogalina gagayo, Iya keke Keliso, Bana'e Yaubada givegidena be yada yo'o ginanagoyeda amanadi, tu Yaubada gi'iveniniseku be wai ganagona yana eda ganakidewedewena fa'ina. Hidemi gagahemi.

Wa'ita, ka'i kaliva ginanagi, kwamayoku bana againe gina'ela buye hinalukahihi ada kaliva tobohiyana badi lilidiya ginamiyami-ma, tonagi agona yana wavemwamwala ginanogalina. Ginanogalini-yo bana kadu ginavemwamwala. Ada iya vaita kaliva toubohiyana amine. Meda anafaiweya moya'aidi Yesu againe hi'ela'ela fa'ina, iya Yesu tobohiyana gavemwamwala-mo'a.
Ada aku vehimeya gavaina higa Bana yana kikaiwabu ginalakata tu iya yaku kikaiwabu ginakabi'o be ganamiya-kawowo.” Yoni au hidemi gigahe.
Ada gavadi lobameya gi'itana be ginogalina, medema fa'ina gilukahihiyena tu keke tamo hakwadi Bana bonana gidavenogaleni.
Tu gava kaliva Bana bonana ginavenogalena, medema gina'alakakila ginagayo, Yaubada Bana velemona.
Bana'e Yaubada gi'iveninisena-ma Yaubada bonana gilukahihiyena, fa'ina Yaubada Bana againe Alu'aluwana keke ma'ita gidanuwaloloneni, au gidodobodabodana.
Tamada nuwanuwana Natuna ada abavehimeya gaitoma moya'aidi agaidiya Bana nimane gisedi.

Gava kaliva Yaubada Natuna givetumaganena medema yawai-vagahina ginuhagana, tu gava kaliva Yaubada Natuna ginadibutoyogena be keke ginavetumaganeni medema yawai-vagahina keke-mo'a ginanuhagani, au Yaubada yana ila'a bana kalivai-nadi againe ginaduva-vagata. Au hidede amine.

Tu Yesu ana tomuliya himoya'ai. Kaliva tufoidi Yoni himuliyena tu kaliva moya'ai-mo'edi Yesu himulimuliyena be gikikivebafitaisoyedi, ada tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi Yesu ana tomuliya valeyadi hinogalina.
Tu Yesu Tauna keke gidakivebafitaisoyedi, au ime ana tomuliya kaliva akivebafitaisoyedi.
Ada au Falisi Yesu yo'o givaidi ma valeyana hinogalina ada Yesu gihalamanena againe, Yudiya ana fafali ginuyabuyabuni tu Galili ana fafali againe giyewayewana.
Ada Galili ana eda Sameliya hinafane ginauna fa'ina, Yesu Sameliya ana fafali againe ginauna.
Kadu folufolu Yakobu tuwaina giyalana-ma medede againe gidauda. Ada au Yesu folufolu liline givetoga, fa'ina yanana lauva tunugina ginunauwena tu wowona gilogilogi. Ada kauwana getadeya gilaka.

Ime ana tomuliya melala-mo'ena againe ana be a'a anakimonena tu Yesu anakaibe gimiyami. Folufolu liline givetoga tu kwamayoku sa'eyadi, vinemiSameliya, hiyemu be higa gufa hinaboluna. Ada Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Ma'i gufa wabolu be gayuni.”

Tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada yana abahawahega agaimiya keke wadahalamaneni kadu Iya inubaku keke wadahalamaneni. Gufa fa'ina gave'o'olemi tu ka'i Iya inubaku wadahalamaneku digo, omi agaikuya wadagahe wadagayo, Ma'i gufa be ayuni. Wadave'o'ola be gufa miyamiya-vagahina gadavelemi.”

Bwaneneda Yakobu hida folufolu giyalana-ma ime miSameliya givelema, ada hida gufa againe bana giyuyu kadu natuneyao buye hiyuyu, ada yadi yomuyomu hiveyuveyudi. Ka'i O'eni Yakobu ukaiwabuhegena? Ka'i keke.”
Au Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gufa hida folufolu againe giguwaguwalena-ma moya'aimi wanayuna tu aimo kabisona agomi ginataina-havagi.
Tu yaku gufa ka'i ganavelemi be wanayuna, au agomi keke ginataina-havagi, ada gufai-nadi ganavelemi medema ginaveguya ase'asemiya be ginaguwaguwalena, ada ana egana yawai-vagahimi.”
Hidemi Yesu gigahedi tu kwamayoku higayo, “Kauveya, hida gufa unavelema be anayuni-yo agoma keke ginataina, kadu keke tova moya'aina ana'ela'ela gufa-kaiboluya.”
Yesu gigayo, “Wanana moganemi wanavega'aulena be wanayewami.”
Badi kwamayoku higayo, “Ima moganema keke.” Yesu gigayo, “Au wagahe velemo'ena.
Keke wamoganemi, fa'ina kaliva faifi wanagidi be waviholiliyedi, ada bana kaliva adamoya buye wamimiyami-ma keke moganemi velemo'ena. Hidema fa'ina wagahe velemo'ena higa keke wamoganemi.”
Ada au badi kwamayoku higayo, “Kauveya, makewa O'eni Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina, fa'ina yama huluva uhalamane-mo'ena.
Ime miSameliya bwanenemeyao hida oya againe Yaubada againe hihawadavadava, tu omi miYuda wagahe higa vaita Yelusalema gagana againe kaliva Yaubada againe hinahawadavadava.”

Bana Yesu kwamayoku gigahedi gigayo, “Iya ganagahe be yaku gahe wanavenogalena. Mali tova giluveda'ufo. Medema tovai-nadi omi tohawadavadava keke hida oya gagana againe kadu keke Yelusalema gagana againe Tamada wanahawadavadavani. Au alu'aluwami againe fafali moya'aina agaidiya wanahawadavadavana.

Omi miSameliya yami Yaubada againe wahawadavadava nonogana Bana'e keke wadahalamaneni, tu ime miYuda ma yama Yaubada ahawadavadavana-ma ahalamane-mo'ena, fa'ina miYuda agaimeya tokibababala ginatubuyemu.

Yaubada Bana yawai-vagata miyamiyanina ana Tovetala, ada ana tohawadavadava gilubodadi be Bana Alu'aluwana againe wayawai-vagahidi hinatubuvagu-yo hinahawadavadavana velemo'ena.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Au badi kwamayoku higahena higayo, “Ahalamanena Yaubada yana Tovegida ginalakayemu, Bana ana egana Keliso. Ada Bana ginalakayemu ana toveya, gaitoma moya'aidi fa'ina ginakivetuvetunuma.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Iya omi'e agaimiya galulukahihi-ma Iya'eku kalivai-kuna.”

Tu Yesu gigahe-yo au ime ana tomuliya ana kimoneya ma ayemu. Ada Bana Yesu kwamayoku buye hilukahihi fa'ina nuwama givegafo'uya'uya tu keke tamo hakwadi agaimeya gidatoliluveluvedi gidagayo, “Gavadi fa'ina walukahihi?” O ka'i Yesu againe gidagahe gidagayo, “Gavana fa'ina kwamayoku buye walukahihi?” Adagahe tu awowomumu fa'ina ave'amata.
Ada au kwamayoku yadi aba'aihiwaga hise-vagahini tu hilowoga, melala againe hina kaliva hinuhagadi higahedi higayo,
“Wa'ela be kana kaliva wa'ita. Bana boi keke gida'itama tu gaitoma moya'aina ahuluvina-ma giyauna. Ima anuwanuwa ka'i Bana Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso o ka'i keke?”
Higahedi-yo moya'aidi hilowoga Yesu againe hina.
Badi kaliva aimo hi'ela'ela tu ime Yesu ana tomuliya aluya'aya'alina agayo, “Tovehawala, ma'i a'a u'ani.”
Tu Bana gigayo, “We'a akuga, medema mali a'a omi keke wadahalamaneni.”
Au avebutu ave'agahegahe agayo, “Ka'i tamo hakwadi anaga a givelena?”

Au omi wagagahe wagagayo, Vaikohi fowa kanaluyabuni-yo a'a kana'aiyala. Tu Iya gagahe, Wa'ita, matami wahege be kaliva moya'aidi Iya agaikuya hi'ela'ela-ma wa'itadi. Badi nuwadi ahe giludigadigaga be hinavetumaganeku.

Badi bonaku ana tovehawala vaita tofaha kadu toyaudi amine. Badi tofaha ma bonaku kaliva ase'asediya himidifahana, atu badi toyaudi ma yadi kivetuvetunu hive'atutamo'aina againe, kaliva hivetumaganeku, au yaku kaliva hiyaudi. Hivetumaganeku-yo yawai-vagahidi hinuhagana. Ada au yaku tovehawala yadi laufata hivaivaina, higa tofaha kadu toyaudi kaliva yadi vetumagana fa'ina buye hivemwamwala.
Ada kaliva higagahe higagayo, Kaliva sa'eyana a'a gifahana tu mali kaliva yaudi againe givelugana. Hida gahe keke fwaya.

Iya ga'iveninisemi be faha againe keke wadafaisewa-ma wanayaudi. Mali kaliva hifaisewa tu omi yadi faha wanayaudi, au higa mali kaliva bonaku kaliva ase'asediya himidifahana tu omi'iyao ma yami kivetuvetunu againe kaliva hivetumaganeku.” Hidede amine Yesu ana tomuliya agaimeya gigahe.
Ada au kwamayoku yadi melala againe miSameliya moya'aidi agaidiya higahe higayo, “Bana gaitoma moya'aina ahuluvina-ma giyauna.” Ada yadi gahe fa'ina moya'aidi Yesu hivetumaganena.
Ada badi miSameliya Yesu againe hi'ela higahe higayo, “Una'ela yama melaleya buye kanamiya.” Ada au Yesu gina badi agaidiya gimiya aiyeta luhei.
Ada Yesu Tauna yana gahe fa'ina kadu kaliva moya'aidi hivetumaganena.

Ada kwamayoku agaidiya higahe higayo, “Keke yami gahegaga fa'ina adavetumaganeni, au taumeyao Bana bonana anogalina fa'ina avetumaganena, kadu ahalamanena Bana makewa tomiyababi ada Tokibababala.” Hidemi higahe.
Tu aiyeta luhei gihavaini-yo Yesu Sameliya ana fafali againe kadu gilowoga gina Galili ana fafali againe.
Ma boi Yesu Tauna gigahe gigayo, “Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tauna yana yo'o keke hidawowomumuyeni.”

Tu Tauna yana fafali Galili againe gilakayemu ana toveya, miGalili yadi wavemwamwala hilusiuleyena. Badi tafalolo lakahina fa'ina Yelusalema againe Yesu buye hina, ada yuwadede againe nimana ana iya'iyaya moya'aina hi'itana fa'ina Yesu nuwadi givaina.

Ada Yesu Yudiya ana fafali ginuyabuyabuna be Galili againe giyewana ma bana tovehimeya ginogalini-yo, au gilowoga Yesu againe gi'ela, give'o'olena be ginahobu'ela Kafeneumi againe natuna ginasiveyawana, natuna gi'aulolo vaita gida'alika fa'ina.
Au tovehimeya lakahina gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, udamadu'ela natuku uda'itana, kabisona gina'alika.”
Ginauna tu ana agetoga buye hive'anauhaga higahena higayo, “Au natu giyamumu.”
Ada bana tovehimeya gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Gava kauwana natuku givebutu giyamumu?” Badi higayo, “Boiyesedi kauwana getadeya wowona gituluna.”
Himiyami tu miYuda yama tafalolo sa'eyana gilakayemu, ada tafalolo fa'ina Yesu Yelusalema againe gina.
Tu Yelusalema melala kuga againe hi'alana ada sifi yadi abaluku liline ni'u abatowa gidadauda, bona Hibeliu againe ana egana Bedesida. Ada ni'u afa'aine abamiyami faifi hiyogona.
Ada abamiyami againe to'aulolo moya'aidi hidauda, tomatakoyo tovefela kadu kaliva wowodi gifwalele-vagata. [Badi gufa yana lu'awabolubolu fa'ina hibodaboda.

Higa tamo tova Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata ni'uya gidahobu'ela gufa gidalu'awabolubolu ada againe gava kaliva gidamadu gufeya gidamiditowa, medema kalivai-nadi gidayamumu. Gavadi yana aulolo, au gidahavaina.]
Ada to'aulolo agaidiya kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, gi'u'aulolo malamala teti-eita.
Ada Yesu to'aulolo-nadi gidauda-ma gi'itana, ada bana gi'u'aulolo lauva tunugina ma gihalamanena. Gi'ita-yo gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwa unabwaina?”

Bana to'aulolo gigayo, “Kauveya, aku toveluga keke. Gufa yana lu'awabolubolu againe, keke tamo hakwadi gidamiyami-yo gufeya gidanauweku. Aimo gahobuhobu tu mali kaliva auhe'ama gimamadutowa, ada au yana yamumu givaina.”
Ada auhe'ama kaliva giyamumu, ana ivi giwahina givebutu ginunudadana.
Tu aiyeta Yesu kaliva gisiveyawana, medema sabati miYuda yama veyawai.
Sabati againe gisiveyawana fa'ina miYuda yama tonagona kaliva giyamumu-ma higahena higayo, “Adamoya sabati. Ide yada vehimeya ivi ana wahi sabati againe gihawatana.”
Tu bana kaliva gigahedi gigayo, “Bana gikiveyamumuku-ma gigaheku gigayo, A ivi uwahi be unanaudadana.”
Ada badi hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Bana kaliva gigahe higa vaita a ivi unawahina be unanudadana-ma, bana hakwa'adi?”
Tu hakwadi gisiveyawana-ma Bana kaliva keke gidahalamaneni, fa'ina yo'o lakahina himiyami ada Yesu a ginanauna.
Yesu hidemi gigahe tu kaliva gilowoga, gina miYuda agaidiya gi'awatalatalaina gigayo, “Bana kaliva gisiveyawaku-ma ana egana Yesu.”
Ada au Bana Yesu sabati veyawai ana tova againe kaliva gisisiveyawadi fa'ina, miYuda yama tonagona nuwanuwadi Yesu hinamununa.
Tu hidedemi hinuwanuwa fa'ina, Yesu gigayo, “Kamaku aiyeta moya'aina aimo gifififaisewa, ada hidema fa'ina kadu Iya aiyeta moya'aina gafififaisewa.”

Ada au hida yana gahe fa'ina miYuda hinuwakoyo-mo'a, ada nuwanuwadi lakahina hinaluve'alikana. Bana sabati ana vehimeya vaita keke gida'abi'abini fa'ina himidinuwakoyo, tu muliya vaita yana koyona gidave'atutamo'aini higa Yaubada gihawavetamanena vaita bana tauna Yaubada amine, au gilagatamo'aina. Hidema fa'ina hinuwakoyo-mo'a.
Fa'ina Kamaku nuwanuwana Iya'eku Natuna, ada gaitoma moya'aina Bana gigugaiyena-ma givehavehawaleku. Ada gugai fifiwala-mo'ena aimo ginavehawaleku be ganafaisewana, ada medema againe wanayaulowoga.
Fa'ina Kamaku kaliva alikeya gisivemidididi ada yawaidi giveledi amine, meda anafaiweya Iya Natuna ganahuluva. Gaveyao nuwanuwaku yawaidi ganaveledi, medema au ganaveledi.
Au Kamaku keke tamo kaliva gidavedewayaugini tu vedewayauga ana vehimeya Iya Natuna giveleku.
A giveleku be kaliva moya'aidi hinawowomumuyeku, Kamaku hiwowomumuyena amine. Badi kaliva Iya Yaubada Natuna keke hidawowomumuyeku-ma, kadu keke Kamaku hidawowomumuyeni, fa'ina Bana gi'iveniniseku.

Kadu Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, tova giluveda'ufo ada au gilakayemu. Adamoya kaliva yawaidi ivaguna keke hidavaini-ma badi vaita ali'alikadiyao amine, ada badi ali'alikadiyao Iya Yaubada Natuna bonaku hinanogalina ada ka'i hinavenogalena amine o, yawaidi ivaguna hinanuhagana.
Fa'ina Kamaku kaliva yawaidi ivaguna inubana ada givewahivedamaku be kadu kaliva yawaidi ivaguna inubana Iya Natuna agaikuya.
Ada babiya gahobu'ela be gavekaliva fa'ina, Kamaku kadu abavehimeya velugana giveleku be kaliva moya'aidi yadi dewa fa'ina ganavedewayaugidi.
Yaku gahe fa'ina keke nuwami ginavegafo'uya'uya, fa'ina aimo tova mulina kaliva moya'aidi lahi againe hidadauda-ma agoku hinanogalina be hinayemu.
Badi yadi dewa hagihagina ma hinamididi-havagi be Yaubada buye hinamiyamiya-vagata, tu badi yadi dewa koyona ma hinamididi-havagi be matahiwadi ganaveledi.

Keke Iya akukaibe gadavehimeya au gavaimi Kamaku gigaheku amine gavehivehimeya. Ada keke yaku nuwanuwa amine gadavehimeya, au Bana gi'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela yana nuwanuwa amine gavehivehimeya. Hidema fa'ina yaku vedewayauga tunutunugina.
Ka'i Iya akukaibe Tauku fa'ikuya ganahawavemogatala be Tauku ganakilakahiku, omi wananuwanuwa vaita yaku gahe fwaya.
Tu tohawavemogatala sa'eyana gimimiyami, Bana Kamaku. Ada Bana inubaku fa'ina gihawavemogatala ada Iya gahalamanena Bana yana gahe Iya fa'ikuya keke fwaya.
Tu tomiyababi Iya fa'ikuya gavaimi higahe-ma keke gadanuwenuweni. Bana Yoni tomiyababi tu yana gahe fa'ina nuwami gatalafolena be wanavetumaganeku-yo kibababala wananuhagana.
Bana Yoni vaita lamufa gi'ala'alata be kaliva gituvemahalidi-ma amine, ada eda mahamahalina givehawalemi fa'ina tova kali'uhona wavemwamwala.
Kadu Bana Kamaku gi'iveniniseku-ma Iya fa'ikuya gihawavemogatala tu keke tamo tova Bana agona wadanogalini o magigina wada'itani.
Kadu Kamaku bonana keke ase'asemiya gidadauda, fa'ina Iya gi'iveniniseku-ma keke wadavetumaganeku.

Yaubada bonana Veyao Tuwaina againe gidadauda-ma wahawa-hagihagiyena, fa'ina wanuwanuwa vaita bonai-nadi againe yawai-vagahimi wananuhagana. Tu kadu hida bonai-nadi Iya fa'ikuya gilukahihi, tu wafaniyeku.
Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gilukahihiyeku nonogana, keke Iya agaikuya wada'ela-yo yawai-vagahimi wadanuhagani, au wakiloweku.
Tu kikaiwabu keke kaliva agaidiya gadalele, au Kamaku againe kikaiwabu gavaina.
Au ase'asemi gahalamanena, keke nuwanuwami Yaubada.
Iya'eku ma Kamaku ana eganeya gahobu'ela tu wakiloweku. Ka'i tamo hakwadi tauna ana eganeya gina'ela, makewa bana wanavetumaganena.

Keke amifaiweya wanavetumaganeku, fa'ina nuwanuwami lakahina kaliva matadiya wanakaiwabu, tu Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a matane wanakaiwabu fa'ina keke wadanuwanuwa. Hidema fa'ina keke amifaiweya wanavetumaganeku.

Kadu keke wananuwanuwa vaita Kamaku againe ganavekotumi. Iya keke ganavekotumi. Au bana Mosese ginavekotumi. Omi miYuda moya'aimi Mosese againe wanuwave'avina be vaita ginakibababalemi, tu bana bonana keke wada'abini fa'ina, bana ginavekotumi.
Ka'i Mosese wadavetumaganena digo, kadu Iya wadavetumaganeku, fa'ina Mosese Iya fa'ikuya gi'etoladi.
Tu Mosese yana etoladi keke wadavetumaganeni fa'ina, kadu keke amifaiweya yaku gahe wanavetumaganeni.” Yesu yana kahihi miYuda yama tonagona agaidiya au hidede amine.
Tu muliya Yesu tobu ana egana Galili yuwa fafaline gidamana. Tobu ana egana kadu Taibiliya.
Ada Yesu nimana ana iya'iyaya to'aulolo agaidiya gififaisewadi fa'ina, yo'o lakahina himulimuliyena.
Au Yesu gilaka oya fafaline givetoga, ada ime ana tomuliya buye'i.
Ada medema tovai-nadi miYuda yama tafalolo lakahina giluveda'ufo, tafalolo ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya.
Ada au Yesu givetogana, matana gidahegena ma yo'o lakahina Bana againe hi'ela'ela-ma gi'itadi. Gi'itadi-yo Filifi againe gigahe gigayo, “Ha'againe beledi kanakimoneni-yo hida yo'o hina'a?”
Ma Yesu hidede amine Filifi gigaluvaluvana be gavaimi ginagahe ma gina'itana. Tu Yesu ahe gihalamanena aimo Tauna gavaimi ginaga.
Ada Filifi gigayo, “Ka'i mani lakahina kaliva yana faisewa fatana vaikohi eita amine kadaseni-yo beledi kadakimonena digo, keke adifata kasimina kasimina hinavaini.”

Tu ana tomuliya sa'eyana ana egana Anidulu, Saimoni-Fita taina, bana gigahena gigayo, “Kwamana sa'eyana gimimiyami, ana alaka giwahina beledi kabi'ona a'a ana egana bali againe hibubuna-ma faifi, kadu igana kabi'odi luhei. Tu hida a'a hima kasimina keke lakahina, au yo'o keke-mo'a adifata.”

Au Bana Yesu gigayo, “Kaliva vevine wanagahedi be hinavetoga.” Ada au agahedi be hivetoga, babi unaunagina kadu isisi'u yamumuna fa'ina. Ada kaliva gagana akilagalagadi adi yo'o 5,000 tu vevine we'owe'o buye'i a gavaiyehi.

Hivetoga-yo Yesu beledi faifi givaidi digo Yaubada againe givesiule gikihinehinena ime ana tomuliya givelema be yo'o agaidiya afolakena. Kadu anafaiweya igana gikihinehinena be afolakena, ada moya'aidi adifata amine hi'a.
Ada hi'ahiyauwa-yo Yesu gigahema gigayo, “Adi tufo wanakwakwana be keke tamo kanahegeni fa'ina.”
Ada au akwakwa, adi tufo beledi faifi kwadakwadana againe feyawa tuwelo avemagadi.

Higahegahe tu Yesu yadi nuwanuwa gihalamanena, higa vaita hidakive'avini-yo yadi tokaiwabu hidaseni. Tu Yesu keke nuwanuwana hidede amine hinahuluvini fa'ina, ginuyabuyabudi be anakaibe gina gilaka oyeya.
Awoiwo tu mala koyona gilakayemu bolimana lakahina gimadu.
Kadu awoiwo awoiwo anunauwena tu ana lauva kilomita ka'i faifi awoihegena, tobu hinafane ayemu tu Yesu a'itana, waka amine ni'u getane agene gi'ela'ela, ada ime amatautave'ine.
Tu Yesu gigahema gigayo, “Keke wanamatauta, hima Iya ga'ela'ela.”
Agona anogalini-yo avemwamwala agayo, “U'ela uyage.” Au gi'ela giyage ada auhe'ama avaleya ayemu Kafeneumi liline.

Bogi ada tu yo'o yuwa tobu fafaline himiya. Mala gilauna hive'agahegahe higayo, “Boiyesedi waka sa'eyanaga a'itana, ada Yesu ana tomuliya hiyage tu Yesu Tauna keke gidayage. Badi hina tu Bana hami gina?”
Ada waka kabi'ona kadu velugadi Taibiliya hilowoga be hi'ela ada abaga liline hiyemu, abagai-nadi againe Yesu a'a givesiuleyeni-yo yo'o hi'ana.
Ada yo'o Yesu ime ana tomuliya buye hilele-wayogema yo au kabi'odi wakai-dina agaidiya hiyage, Kafeneumi againe hidamana'ela be Yesu hinalelena.
Tu Yesu tobu fafaline gidamana-ma hinuhagana higahena higayo, “Tovehawala, gava tova udamana'ela?”

Bana Yesu givebutu gilukahihi gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. A'a gavelemi wa'ana be wa'ahiyauwa-yo waleleleku. Keke nimaku ana iya'iyaya wada'itani-yo wadanuwenuweni fa'ina wadaleleku, keke.

Keke babi ana a'a fa'ina wanavedivediwe, fa'ina a'ai-nadi keke ginaduva-vagata. Au a'a miyamiya-vagahina Iya Tohobu'ela ganavelemi-ma wanalele-mo'ena, fa'ina Yaubada Kamaku abavehimeya giveleku be hida a'a ganavelemi.”
Au badi hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Ka'i Yaubada yana faisewa nuwanuwama ana'abina, gavadi anagani?”
Badi higayo, “Gava iya'iyaya au unafaisewana be ana'itani-yo anavetumagane? Gavadi fifiwalana unafaisewana be ya faiwala ana'itani-yo anahalamanena Yaubada gi'iveninise be u'ela?
Bwanenedeyao lobama ana a'a, ana egana mana, wala'aiya hi'au'ana. Meda Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina sa'eyana gigahe gigayo,
A'a giveledi medema lobameya gihobuhobu.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. A'a lobameya gihobuhobu-ma keke Mosese gidavelemi, keke. Au Iya Kamaku a'a velemo'ena lobameya giyemu-ma tova moya'aina givelevelemi.
Fa'ina a'a Yaubada givetavetala, medema kaliva lobameya gi'iveninisena be gihobu'ela, ada Kalivai-nadi againe tomiyababi yawaidi ivaguna hinavaina.”
Badi higahena higayo, “Kauveya, hida a'a ugaheyena-ma udavelevelema tova moya'aina.”
Tu ahe gagahemi higa ahe wa'itaku yaku iya'iyaya wa'itana nonogana keke wadavetumaganeku.
Gaveyao Iya agaikuya Kamaku ginahawahegedi, medema moya'aidi hinamuliyeku. Ada badi hinamuliyeku-ma, keke-mo'a ganakilowedi.
Keke vaita yaku nuwanuwa fa'ina lobama gadahegeni tu gadahobu'ela babiya, keke. Au Kamaku gi'iveniniseku be yana nuwanuwa ganafaisewa fa'ina gahobu'ela.

Ada Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma yaku kaliva giveleku. Keke nuwanuwana tamo hakwadi badi agaidiya gananuhegeni-yo gina'alika-vagata. Au nuwanuwana yaku kaliva moya'aidi alikeya ganasivemidididi tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya.

Ada au Kamaku nuwanuwana moya'aidi Iya Bana Natuna agaikuya hina'ita be hinavetumaganeku amanadi yawai-vagahidi hinanuhagana, ada Iya Tauku alikeya ganasivemidididi tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya. Kamaku yana vehimeya au hidede amine.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu miYuda yana gahe hinogalini-yo Bana againe hivebutu hi'alawoluwolu. Bana Yesu a gigahe a'a lobameya gidauda be gihobu amanadi Iya'eku. Hidemi yana gahe fa'ina hi'alawoluwolu.

Kadu hive'agahegahe higayo, “Hida kaliva ana egana Yesu Yosefa natuna, ada au hinana tamana ide kahalamanedi. Gavadi-yo gigahe gigayo, Lobameya gamiyami be gahobu'ela? Bana give'alololo.” Hidemi higahe.
Tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Auwe, keke wanave'agahegahe wana'alawoluwolu.

Kaliva tauna yana nuwanuwa againe keke anafaiweya Iya ginamuliyeku, tu ka'i ase'asena Kamaku gina'onana be nuwana gina'abina o ginamuliyeku, ada alikeya ganasivemididina tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya.
Gahe sa'eyana Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Yaubada Tauna yana kaliva moya'aidi ginavehawaledi.
Ada hai kaliva Kamaku bonana hinogalina be hi'abi'abina, medema Iya agaikuya hinavetomuliya.
Keke tamo hakwadi Yaubada Kamaku gida'itani, keke. Au Iya akukaibe ga'itana, fa'ina Kamaku buye amiyami be gahobu'ela.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, hai kaliva tova moya'aina uvetuvetumaganeku, medema yawai-vagahi ahe unuhagana.
Iya'eku yawaimi ivaguna ana a'a.
Bwanenemiyao wala'a againe a'a ana egana mana hi'au'ana tu keke hidamiya-vagata, au hi'alika.
Tu a'a Iya gagaheyena-ma lobameya gihobu'ela, ada hai kaliva a'ai-nadi una'ana, medema keke una'alika-vagata. Ada au a'ai-nadi Iya'eku.

Iya'eku a'a miyamiya-vagahina, lobameya gahobu'ela. Hai kaliva hida a'ai-nadi una'ana, medema unamiyamiya-vagata. Ada hida a'a kaliva moya'aidi fa'idiya ganahawahegena amanadi Iya wowoku. E, wowoku ganaveledi be kaliva yawaidi ivaguna hinavaina fa'ina.” Hidedemi Yesu gilukahihi.
Tu Yesu yana gahe ana nuwanuwa fa'ina miYuda hivebutu yadi wa'agodadaga buye hivekwageya higayo, “Gavadi-yo hida kaliva gigahe vaita wowona ginaveleda-yo kana'ani?”
Ma Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Ka'i keke Iya Tohobu'ela wowoku wana'ani dayagiku wanayuni, kadu wayawaimi ivaguna keke.
Hai kaliva wowoku u'au'ana kadu dayagiku uyuyuna, medema yawai-vagahi ahe unuhagana, ada alikeya ganasivemididi tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya.
Fa'ina wowoku vaita a'a velemo'ena amine, kadu dayagiku vaita bwai velemo'ena amine, au yawaimi yana faiwala inubana.
Bana kaliva wowoku gi'au'ana kadu dayagiku giyuyuna, medema Iya agaikuya gimiyamiyave'avina kadu Iya bana againe gamiyamiyave'avina, au yawaima sa'eyana.

Bana Kamaku gi'iveniniseku-ma gimiyamiya-vagata, ada Bana yawaiku inubana fa'ina Iya kadu gamiyamiya-vagata. Meda anafaiweya bana kaliva Iya gina'au'aku, medema kadu ginamiyamiya-vagata, yawai-vagahiku givaivaina fa'ina.

Ada au hida a'ai-nadi lobameya gihobu'ela, higa Iya wowoku, ada hidema keke a'a ana egana mana bwanenemiyao hi'au'ana-ma amine. Mana lobameya gihobu be hi'ana tu keke yawai-vagahidi hidavaini, au hi'alika. Tu a'a Iya gagaheyena-ma mema tulina. Gava kaliva hida a'a higa wowoku una'au'ana, medema unamiyamiya-vagata.”
Au hidede amine Yesu gilumamala miYuda yadi manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi Kafeneumi melala againe.

Tu kaliva vevine moya'aidi Yesu bonana hinoganogalina be himulimuliyena. Hida yana laumamala manuwa abavehawala Kafeneumi againe hinogalini-yo higayo, “Hida hima vehawala vita-mo'ena. Keke adafaiweya kanamuliyeni.”
Tu Bana Yesu Tauna ase'asene gihalamanena badi ana tomuliyamomo yana laumamala hi'alawoluwoluyena, fa'ina gigahedi gigayo, “Yaku vehawala vitana fa'ina, ka'i omi wanuwakoyo?
Au Iya Tohobu'ela lobameya ganalaka, boi gamiyami-ma againe ganayewaku. Adamoya yaku laumamala wanuwenuwena vaita vita-mo'ena, tu ka'i aimo yaku laka-havagi wana'itana, gavaimi wananuwanuwa?

Yawai-vagahimi inubana keke omi kaliva agaimiya, au yawai-vagahimi inubana Yaubada Alu'aluwana againe. Yaku gahe adamoya agaimiya galukahihiyena, medema alu'aluwami fa'ina, higa yawai-vagahimi wananuhagana.

Tu tufoimi keke wadavetumaganeku.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe fa'ina boi nagona gaveyao keke hidavetumaganeni-ma gihalamanedi. Kadu'e bana kaliva nibaineyao agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena-ma tuwaina gihalamane-vagahina.

Kadu'e yana gahe giluyabuna gigayo, “Hida yaku laumamala omi wavaitana vita-mo'ena. Hidema fa'ina ahe gagehemi gagayo, Kaliva tauna yana nuwanuwa againe keke anafaiweya Iya ginamuliyeku tu ka'i ase'asena Kamaku gina'onana be nuwana gina'abina o, ginamuliyeku.”
Tu au hidede amine Yesu gilukahihi fa'ina, ana tomuliyamomo tufoidi moya'aidi hinuwayewa, be aimo keke hidamulimuliyeni.
Badi hinuwayewa fa'ina, Yesu ana yo'o tuwelo gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Ka'i omi kadu wananuyabuyabuku, ka'i keke?”
Au Saimoni-Fita Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Kauveya, keke tamo hakwadi velugana gidamiyami-yo anamuliyeni. O'eni yawai-vagahima ana eda uvehavehawalema.
Ada ime avetumagane kadu ahalamane-mo'ena O'eni Yaubada yana Tovegida, Kaliva Mahamahali-mo'e.” Hidemi Fita gigahe.
Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Iya Tauku gavenuwadadanemi ami yo'o tuwelo, tu kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya Setani yana kaliva.”
Au bana Yudasi fa'ina Yesu gigahe, bana Saimoni-Isikaliyota natuna, fa'ina bana Yudasi yo'o tuwelo kalivana aimo Yesu nibaineyao agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena.
Tu miYuda yama tafalolo sa'eyana giluve'eda'ufo, ana egana A'a-'aiyala ana vesiule.
Ada Yesu taineyao higahena higayo, “Hida Galili ana fafali unahegeni tu unana Yudiya ana fafaliya be kadu badi ya kalivamomo wesede againe ya aituha fifiwalana ufifaisewadi-ma hina'itadi.
Ka'i kaliva nuwanuwana moya'aidi tauna hinahalamanena be hinavetumaganena, au keke ginafaisewakau, fa'ina Tauni una'ivemogatale yo'o matadiya.”
Hidemi higahe fa'ina badi taineyao nonogana keke hidavetumaganeni.
Badi higahe tu Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Yaku ivemogatala ana tova aimo keke gidalakayemu tu omi'iyao ma gava tova nuwanuwami wanana, au wanana. Keke tamo gavadi fa'ina wadabodaboda.
Tomiyababi keke omi agaimiya hinanuwakoyo tu Iya'eku ma yadi dewa koyona gahawavemogatalena fa'ina, Iya agaikuya hinuwanuwakoyo.
Au tafalolo Yelusalema againe omi wanana tu yaku ivemogatala ana tova aimo keke gidalakayemu fa'ina, adamoya hida tafalolo againe Iya keke ganana.”
Ada au hidede amine gigahedi-yo au Galili againe gimiya.
Tu Yesu taineyao tafalolo againe ahe hilowoga be hina, tu muliya Bana Tauna kadu gina. Au keke yo'o buye hidana, anakaibe gina.
Ada au miYuda yama tonagona yo'o agaidiya Yesu hilelelena kaliva hitoliluveluvedi higayo, “Yesu hai gimimiyami?”

Ada moya'aidi yo'o sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya Bana Yesu fa'ine hi'alawoluwolu. Tufoidi higayo, “Bana kaliva hagihagina.” Tu tufoidi higayo, “Keke, Bana keke kaliva yamumuna fa'ina yo'o ginuwa'abiyedi, gigahe vaita Tauna kaliva kikaiwabuna.”
Hidemi hive'agahegahe tu miYuda yama tonagona himatausedi fa'ina, keke yo'o matadiya hidalukahihiyeni.
Tu tafalolo ana tova hinafane Yesu manuwa-tafalolo againe giluku givebutu givehawala.
Ada badi miYuda hinogalini-yo nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya higayo, “Gavadi-yo hida kaliva tonagona yadi sikulu againe keke gidasikulu tu ginuwahuya?”
Gava kaliva nuwanuwana velemona Yaubada yana vehimeya gina'itave'avina, medema ginahalamane-mo'ena ka'i Bana Yaubada yana nuwanuwa gavehavehawala, o ka'i au Tauku yaku nuwanuwagaga gavehavehawala.

Bana kaliva ka'i tauna yana nuwanuwa ginalukahihiyena digo, au nuwanuwana tauna ginakilakahina, tu Iya nuwanuwaku Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma ganakilakahina, fa'ina keke tamo gadafwaya, au yaku gahe velemo'ena.
Mosese Yaubada yana vehimeya givehawalemi tu keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya vehimeyai-nadi gida'itave'avini. Au gavana fa'ina nuwanuwami wanaluve'alikaku?”
Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gugai fifiwalana sa'eyanaga sabati againe gafaisewana fa'ina, omi moya'aimi nuwami givegafo'uya'uya.

Boi Mosese givehimeya be fwefweya kaliva moya'aidi wowodiya Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wanatomogolohina, tu hida dewa inubana keke Mosese againe, au tuwai-mo'ena bwanenemiyao hidedemi hihuluva. Ada au Mosese givehimeya fa'ina, ka'i fwefweya kaliva ana aiyeta eita sabati againe ginaluvefosena, au sabati nonogana wowone iya'iyaya wanatomogolohina.

Ada sabati nonogana mena iya'iyaya ana tomogolota againe wafaisewa be Mosese yana vehimeya wana'itave'avina fa'ina. Ka'i sabati againe hidede amine omi wafaisewa digo, gavadi-yo Iya agaikuya wanuwakoyo sabati againe gafaisewa yamumuna be kaliva yana aulolo matatabuna gavaihegena fa'ina?
Keke kiholiholi amine kaliva wanahawavekoyoyeni. Nagona wanalele wananuwanuwa, ka'i velemo'ena bana gihuluva koyona o ka'i keke. Wanahalamane-hagihagiyena, au wanagahe.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Yesu yo'o agaidiya hidedemi gigahe-yo au miYelusalema tufoidi hive'atolitoli higayo, “Bana miYuda yama tonagona nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikana-ma ka'i hidevama Bana'e?
Atu wa'ita, kaliva moya'aidi matadiya gilulukahihi tu yada tonagona hive'amata, keke tamo bana againe hidagahe. Ka'i velemona hinuwanuwa vaita hida kaliva Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso?
Atu aimo Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso ginalakayemu ana toveya, keke tamo hakwadi yana tauya ginahalamaneni tu hida kalivai-nadi ma yana melala moya'aida kahalamanena.” Hidemi miYelusalema higahe.
Au Bana'e Iya gahalamanena, fa'ina Bana buye amiyami ada gi'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela.”

Tu moya'aidi yo'o agaidiya hivetumaganena ada hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ide kahalamanena Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso ginalakayemu againe, nimana ana iya'iyaya ginafifaisewana. Hida hima Yesu au makewa Yaubada yana Tovegida, fa'ina Yesu nimana ana iya'iyaya moya'aina gififaisewana, ada bana vaita aimo ginalakayemu-ma keke-mo'a hida kaliva anafaiweya ginafaiwalahegeni.”

Atu Falisi yo'oyo'o yadi ve'agahegahe vaita Yesu Bana Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida ma hinogalina. Hinogalini-yo badi'iyao kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao badi tuilala hi'iveninisedi be hinakive'avina.
Au Yesu gigahe gigayo, “Aimo tova kabisonaga Iya omi buye kanamiyami. Kanamiya kabisona tu Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma againe ganayewaku.
Aimo wanaleleku tu keke wananuhagaku, ada Iya ganana againe omi keke amifaiweya wana'ela.”

Yesu hidedemi gigahe ada miYuda hinogalini-yo hive'agahegahe higayo, “Bana hima kaliva hai ginana-yo keke adafaiweya kanahagani? Ka'i yada yo'o miGilika hi'abinauna-ma agaidiya ginana be miGilika ginavehawaledi, ka'i keke?
Gavadi-yo gigahe gigayo, Aimo wanaleleku tu keke wananuhagaku, ada Iya ganana againe keke amifaiweya wana'ela? Hidema gavaimi ana nuwanuwa?” Hidemi hive'agahegahe.
Ka'i unavetumaganeku, gufa miyamiya-vagahina gava nuwahinageniya ginaguwaguwalena be ginanauna. Hidede amine Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe.”

Yesu hidedemi gigahe higa badi hinavetumaganena-ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina ase'asediya ginaluku. Tu Yesu aimo keke gida'alika-yo yana wakaiwabu gidalaka lobameya fa'ina, kadu Yaubada Alu'aluwana kaliva ase'asediya aimo keke gida'iveniniseni.
Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Bana makewa Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso, yada yo'o ginanagoyeda.”
Tu kaliva tufoidi higayo, “Yaubada yana Tovegida keke-mo'a Galili againe ginatubuyemu, tu Bana Yesu ma kwanaGalili.
Fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida bana Devida ana yo'o kalivana. Bedelihema againe ginatubuyemu, medema Devida yana melala.”
Ada kaliva tufoidi nuwanuwadi hinakive'avina tu ana kive'avina higa-wayoga.
Ma badi Falisi hihawavelaigedi higayo, “Ha! Kadu omi'iyao ma yana ve'alololo nuwami gi'abina.
Keke tamo hakwadi yami tovehimeya agaidiya kadu ime Falisi agaimeya Bana againe gidavetumagana, keke-mo'a.
Tu hida hima yo'oyo'o kaliva-kawowo Bana himuliyena amanadi, Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese givelena-ma keke hidahalamaneni fa'ina au Yaubada yana alatabutabu dibune himimiyami.”

Au badi Falisi higahena higayo, “Ha! Ka'i o kadu kwanaGalili Yesu amine? Au Yaubada bonana againe unalele be halamana unavaina. Keke tamo Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Galili againe ginatubuyemu, keke-mo'a.” [
Ada au higahe-yo moya'aidi hi'abinauna yadi manuweya.
Tu Yesu gina oya Olive againe gilaka, ada bogi gida malalauga gi'enohobu manuwa-tafalolo againe giluku ada kaliva moya'aidi Bana againe hiyo'oyo'o, ada au givetogana givebutu givehawaledi.

Givehavehawala tu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala kadu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi, kwamayoku Yesu againe hisimadumadugedi, badi mali kaliva buye hidauda tu hinuhagadi. Ada yo'o hinafadiya Yesu matane kwamayoku hivemidididi.
Hivemidididi tu Yesu againe higahe higayo, “Tovehawala, badi hida hima kwamayoku mali kaliva buye hidauda-ma anuhagadi, au a'ita-mo'edi.
Atu Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe givehimeya be vevine to'udo kuga againe kanatutuve'alikadi. Tu O'eni ma badi fa'idiya ka'i gavaimi unagahe?”
Au hidemi higahe be Yesu hinavebauna fa'ina. Hinuwanuwa ka'i yana bonalaufata againe tamo gavadi keke gidalubodani-ma ginagaheyena digo, adifaiweya hinahawavekoyoyena.
Tu Yesu gi'ibo'ula givebutu nimalagolagone babiya gi'eto'etoladi.
Bana keke gavaimi gidagahegahe tu badi higaheluya'aya'ala fa'ina, gimididi-mo'a gigahedi gigayo, “Hai kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya keke tamo gidakoyo, medema kuga againe kwamayoku ginamidifihadi.”
Yesu hidedemi gigahe-yo au gi'ibo'ula-havagi babiya gi'eto'etoladi.

Ada au yana gahe hinogalini-yo yadi koyona nuwadi gi'afolena fa'ina hivebutu anakaibe anakaibe hilowolowoga. Au lakahidiyao himidilowoga tu kabi'odiyao wai himulina, ada au moya'aidi hinu-'owoga tu Yesu anakaibe gimiyami, kwamayoku buye'i aimo himidimidi.
Kadu Yesu gimididi-mo'a kwamayoku gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva hami hina? Ka'i keke tamo hakwadi nuwanuwana kuga againe ginafihami?”
Ada Bana Yesu gigayo, “Kadu Iya keke matahiwadi ganavelemi. Au wanana tu yami dewa koyona wanahege-vagahina.”]
Au badi Falisi higahena higayo, “O'eni Tauni fa'iniya ulukahihi uhawavemogatala fa'ina ya hawavemogatala keke velemo'ena.”

Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “E, Tauku fa'ikuya galukahihi gahawavemogatala tu hai gatauya kadu hami ganana ma gahalamanena fa'ina, yaku hawavemogatala Tauku fa'ikuya keke fwaya, au gagahe velemo'ena. Tu hai gatauya kadu hami ganana ma omi keke wadahalamaneni.
Omi'iyao ma itagaga againe wagahe-kawowo be wahawavekoyoyeku tu, Iya'eku ma keke tamo hakwadi fa'ine nuwaku gidafaisewa-yo gadahawavekoyoyeni.

Tu ka'i tamo kaliva fa'ine nuwaku gidafaisewa be gadahawavekoyoyena digo, yaku vehimeya au velemo'ena, fa'ina keke akukaibe gadavehimeya, au Bana Kamaku buye avehimeya, Bana'e amanadi gi'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela.
Kadu yami buki-vehimeya againe hi'etoladi vaita tohawavemogatala luhei ka'i yadi gahe sa'eyana, au kanahalamanena yadi gahe velemo'ena.
Ada au Iya Tauku fa'ikuya gahawavemogatala kadu Bana Kamaku gi'iveniniseku-ma Iya fa'ikuya gihawavemogatala au Ime tohawavemogatala luhei.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.

Ada au Yesu manuwa-tafalolo againe givehavehawala tu hidede amine gilulukahihi. Velekawowo ana abavedodoga liline gimidimidi tu givehavehawala. Ada yana tova aimo keke gidalakayemu fa'ina ana kive'avina higa-wayoga.
Hidedemi Yesu gigahedi fa'ina, miYuda yama tonagona hive'agahegahe higayo, “Gavadi-yo gigahe gigayo, Iya ganana againe omi keke amifaiweya wana'ela? Ka'i Tauna ginaluve'alikana, ka'i keke?”
Au Bana Yesu gigayo, “Omi'iyao ma babiya walakayemu tu Iya'eku ma lobameya gamiyami be gahobu'ela. Omi babi ana kaliva tu Iya lobama ana kaliva.
Hidema fa'ina ahe gagahemi yami wakoyona wana'alika, fa'ina ka'i yaku gahe Tauku inubaku fa'ina keke wanavetumaganeni digo, yami wakoyona wana'alika.”
Au badi higayo, “O hakwa'adi?” Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Iya'eku boi yaku vehawala ana abave'inuba againe gavenuwa'atami amine.

Ada yaku gahe moya'aina yami koyona fa'ina we'a gidadauda be aimo ganalukahihiyena ada ganahawavekoyoyemi. Ada au Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma bonana velemo'ena ada gavaimi Bana againe ganogalina amanadi, omi tomiyababi agaimiya galulukahihi.”
Au hidedemi Yesu gigahe tu badi miYuda yana nuwanuwa hifaniyena, keke hidahalamaneni Tamana Yaubada fa'ine gilukahihi.

Ma Yesu kadu gigayo, “Aimo Iya Tohobu'ela ai againe wanakivemididiku ana toveya, au medema tovai-nadi halamana wanavaina inubaku wanahalamanena. Kadu wanahalamanena keke tamo Tauku yaku nuwanuwa againe gadagugaiyeni, tu hida yaku gahe Kamaku givehawaleku amine Iya gagahe.
Ada Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma Iya buye amimiyami. Keke gidanuyabuyabuku-yo akukaibe gadamiyami. Tova moya'aina Bana bonana ga'abi'abina fa'ina nuwana gakiveyamumuna.”
Ada au hida Yesu yana lukahihi againe moya'aidi hivebutu hivetumaganena.
Tu Yesu miYuda Bana bonana hivetumaganena amanadi gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i yaku vehawala againe wanaluluve'avina amine o, aku tomuliya velemo'ena omi'iyao.
Omi yogoyogonimiyao vaita tove'agetoga amine. Yaku vehawala ahe wanogalina ada ka'i bonaku wana'ita'itave'avina, bonaku au velemo'ena ma wanahalamanena be yami ve'agetoga ginahavaina.”
Tu badi miYuda Yesu againe higahe higayo, “Ime Abelahamo ana unumamomo ada keke tamo hakwadi againe adave'agetoga. Gavadi-yo ugahe vaita yama ve'agetoga ginahavaini?”
Bana kauve'a natuna velemo'ena ma tamana ana unuma agaidiya ginamiya-vagata be yana lokolokofou ginavaina. Atu bana agetoga ma keke yana kauve'a againe ginamiya-vagata higa vaita ana du'u ginavaini.

Omi yogoyogonimiyao wamimiyami higa vaita koyona againe wadave'agetoga. Ka'i Iya Yaubada Natuna yami ve'agetoga ganadabana amine o koyona keke ginavehimeyemi, au Yaubada ana unuma agaidiya wanaluku be wanamiya-vagata.
Iya gahalamanemi omi'iyao Abelahamo ana unumamomo. Omi Abelahamo bwaneneneyao nonogana nuwanuwami wanaluve'alikaku, fa'ina bonaku keke ase'asemiya gidaluku-yo gidadauda.

Gavadi Bana Kamaku againe ahe ga'itana, medema omi agaimiya galulukahihiyena, tu omi meda anafaiweya ka'i gavadi kaliva sa'eyana higa omi tamami againe wanogalina, mededemi wahuluhuluvina.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Badi miYuda higahena higayo, “Abelahamo ime tamama.” Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena omi Abelahamo ana unumamomo, Abelahamo nimana wadavaina tu keke wadavaini.

Omi wanuwanuwa amine Abelahamo keke gidanuwanuwa. Iya bona velemo'ena omi agaimiya galukahihiyena, bonai-nadi Yaubada againe ganogalina. Bonaku velemo'ena galukahihiyena fa'ina omi nuwanuwami wanaluve'alikaku.
Omi'iyao ma kaliva sa'eyana higa omi tamami amine wahuluhuluva.”
Yesu hidedemi gigahe-yo badi higayo, “Ime keke eda natuneyao. Ime tamama au sa'eyana, anafaiweya Bana Yaubada.”
Gavana fa'ina-yo yaku nuwanuwa galukahihiyena-ma wafaniyeni? Omi bonaku keke nuwanuwami fa'ina keke yaku nuwanuwa wadahalamaneni.

Omi'iyao ma tamami au Setani, ada tamami yana nuwanuwa amine omi nuwanuwami wanahuluva. Boi tuwaina babi ana abave'inuba againe bana Setani yana dewa luve'alika, ada hidede amine ginunauwena tova adamoya. Keke-mo'a nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe gidamiyami, fa'ina keke tamo nuwanuwa tunutunugina bana ase'asene gidadauda, keke. Nuwanuwa ve'afwayafwayana bana ase'asene gidadauda fa'ina, yana gahe tova moya'aina fwaya, fa'ina bana ana egana tofwaya. Ada au fwaya matatabuna inubana bana againe.
Tu iya'eku ma yaku gahe velemo'ena fa'ina, keke wadavetumaganeku tu omi tamami ma tofwaya amine wanuwanuwa.
Keke tamo hakwadi afaiweya Iya agaikuya koyona unanuhagani. Ka'i yaku gahe velemo'ena, gavana fa'ina-yo keke wadavetumaganeku?
Kaliva gaveyao Yaubada natuneyao, medema Yaubada bonana hivenogalena. Omi'iyao ma keke Yaubada natuneyao. Hidema fa'ina Bana'e bonana keke wadavenogaleni.” Au hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Iya keke wayafuneku. Tu au Bana Kamaku Iya gakilakahina tu omi keke wadakilakahiku, au wahawavekoyoyeku.
Ma keke Tauku ganakilakahiku. Au Kaliva sa'eyana gimimiyami, Bana ginakilakahiku ada Bana'e kaiwabu ana tovetala.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Gava kaliva bonaku gi'abi'abina, medema keke gina'alika.”

Au badi miYuda higayo, “Au ahalamane-mo'e O'eni wayafune. Abelahamo gi'alika kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tuwaina hi'alika. Gavadi-yo ugahe vaita ka'i kaliva O bona gina'abina, medema keke-mo'a gina'alika?

Ime bwanenema Abelahamo, kaliva kikaiwabuna, tuwai-mo'ena gi'alika. Keke-mo'a Abelahamo kaiwabu againe O udatubuhegeni. Kadu badi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hi'alika-'owoga. O vaita hakwa'adi tu O ugagakahikahi?”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i Tauku ganakilakahiku, yaku kaiwabu vaita iyohoyoho, vaita gadagahe-kawowo. Atu Bana Kamaku gikilakahiku ada Bana'e omi wahawaveyaubadayena.

Tu omi Bana'e keke wadahalamane-mo'eni tu Iya velemona gahalamanena. Ka'i Iya gadagahe gadagayo, Yaubada keke gadahalamaneni, ka'i hidede amine gadagahe digo, Iya gadafwaya omi wafwaya amine. Tu Iya Bana'e gahalamane-mo'ena, kadu bonana ga'abi'abina.
Ada omi bwanenemi Abelahamo Iya yaku hobu'ela babiya ma tuwai-mo'ena gimidihalamanena. Hidema fa'ina givemwamwala, ada au yaku tova ahe gi'itana ada givemwamwala.”
Au badi miYuda higahena higayo, “O'eni keke Abelahamo uda'itani fa'ina O keke kaliva lakahi, a malamala aimo keke fifiti (50) udavaidi. Au ugahe-kawowo.”
Tova sa'eyana ime Yesu ana tomuliya Bana buye anunudadana tu tomatakoyo sa'eyana a'itana, yana tubuga againe givematakoyo.
Ada Yesu atoliluveluvena agayo, “Tovehawala, gavana fa'ina hida kaliva yana tubuga againe givematakoyo? Ka'i bana tauna yana koyona fa'ina, o ka'i tamana hinana yadi koyona fa'ina givematakoyo?”
Au aimo uyadayada againe gilubodada be Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma yana faisewa kanafaisewa. Uyuyu giyemuyemu ada uyuyu againe kaliva keke anafaiweya ginafaisewa.
Iya aimo babiya gamimiyami ana toveya, Iya omi tomiyababi yami mahala, nuwami gakikivemahalina.”

Au hidede amine gigahe-yo babiya gikiwala, kiwalina againe babi giki'amo'amona maikawa amine, au tomatakoyo matana againe babi fwalelena giseni tu gigahena gigayo, “Unana ni'u ana egana Sailomu againe mata unakolana.” Ime bonameya Sailomu ana kaivila ma ive'iveninitana. Ada au kaliva gilowoga matana gikolana giyewana matana gi'ita'italele.
Tu yana yo'o kadu badi boi yana vematakoyo tova moya'aina hi'ita'itana, medema higahegahe higayo, “Hida ka'i kaliva edeya gihiyoto be mani fa'ina give'ove'o'ola-ma, o ka'i mali kaliva?”
Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Makewa bana hida kalivai-nadi.” Ada kadu tufoidi higayo, “Au keke bana'e tu ana bela tomatakoyo ana bela amine.”
Tu bana kaliva tauna gigahegahe gigayo, “Velemo'ena iya kalivai-kuna.”
Au badi higahe-fa'ila higayo, “Gavaiya'amine uyamumu-yo mata gi'ita'italele?”

Bana kaliva gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana, ana egana Yesu, babi giki'amo'amona be matakuya giseni tu gigaheku gigayo, Unana Sailomu ni'u againe mata unakolana. Ada au gana gakola-yo gayamumu, mataku givebutu gi'italele.”
Ada badi higayo, “Bana kalivai-nadi hami gina?”
Bana gigayo, “Iya keke gadahalamaneni.”
Tu tomatakoyo giyamumu-ma, Falisi agaidiya hinauwena.
Fa'ina sabati againe veyawai ana tova tu Yesu babi giki'amo'amona be kaliva matane giseni-yo, au gikiyauna.
Au Falisi kaliva againe kadu hitoliluvaluva higayo, “Gavaiya'amine uyamumu? Gavai'ona-yo mata gi'ita'italele?”
Bana kaliva gigayo, “Babi fwalelena matakuya giseni tu gakolana, ada au mataku gi'ita'italele.”

Tu kadu tufoidi higahegahe higayo, “Ka'i hida kaliva velemo'ena tokoyona digo, hida iya'iyaya fifiwalana tomatakoyo againe keke anafaiweya gidafaisewani.” Ada au Falisi buye hive'atolitoli, yadi nuwanuwa tulina tulina.
Kadu tomatakoyo againe hitoliluvaluva-havagi higayo, “O ugahe vaita hida kaliva mata gidakiyauni. Au bana fa'ine gavaimi unuwanuwa?”
Ada bana tomatakoyo gigayo, “Au Bana Yaubada yana kaliva.”
Tu badi miYuda hivaita kaliva matana keke velemo'ena gidakoyo-yo gidayamumu, fa'ina kaliva tamana hinana hiyowanidi be hi'ela.

Hi'ela-yo hitoliluveluvedi higayo, “Ka'i bana hidevama omi natumi? Omi wagahe vaita yana tubuga againe gidavematakoyo. Ka'i tuwaina matana keke gida'ita'italele tu gavadi-yo adamoya matana gi'italele?”
Au kaliva tamana hinana higahedi higayo, “Bana hidevama ime natuma amanadi ahalamane-mo'ena. Kadu'e gitubuga againe makewa matana keke gida'ita'italele.

Atu gavadi-yo matana adamoya giyamumu ma keke adahalamaneni, o ka'i hakwadi matana gikiyauna be gi'ita'italele keke adahalamaneni. Au bana tauna againe wanatoliluvaluva. Bana a givekaliva-lakata fa'ina, tauna fa'ine anafaiweya ginahawavemogatala.”

Kaliva tamana hinana miYuda yama tonagona higa himatausedi be hidede amine higahe. Fa'ina miYuda ahe hivehimeya, ka'i tamo hakwadi Yesu fa'ine ginagahe vaita Bana Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso digo, bana kalivai-nadi ana egana hinayawelina be keke anafaiweya manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi againe ginaluku-yo ginatafalolo.
Hida vehimeya fa'ina tomatakoyo tamana hinana higahe higayo, “Bana againe wanatoliluvaluva, ahe givekaliva-lakata fa'ina.”

Au tova anavelu tomatakoyo giyamumu-ma hiyowanina, higahena higayo, “Ya yamumu fa'ina Yaubada ana egana unakilakahina. Wadema kalivai-nadi ahalamanena Bana wadevama tokoyona fa'ina keke unahawadavadavani.”
Tu tomatakoyo gigahedi gigayo, “Iya keke gadahalamaneni ka'i Bana tokoyona o ka'i keke. Tu gaitoma sa'eyana iya gahalamane-mo'ena, higa boi mataku gikoyo-vagata tu adamoya mataku gi'ita'italele.”
Ada au badi higayo, “Gavadi o againiya gigani? Gavaiya'amine mata gikiyauni?”
Bana gigayo, “Ahe gagahemi tu keke wadavenogaleku. Gavana fa'ina nuwanuwami ganagaheye-havagileni? Ka'i omi nuwanuwami Bana againe kadu wanavetomuliya, ka'i keke?”
Gigahe-yo au hifainena higayo, “O'eni wada kaliva ana tomuliya tu ime'eyao ma Mosese yana vehawala amulimuliyena.
Yaubada Mosese againe gilukahihi ma ahalamanena tu wama kaliva ma inubana keke adahalamaneni.”
Tu bana tomatakoyo gihawavelaigedi gigayo, “A! Keke fwaya. Mataku gikiyauna fa'ina, vaita inubana wadahalamaneni.
Ide moya'aida kahalamanena Yaubada tokoyona keke gidavelugadi tu hai kaliva sa'eyana Yaubada gimatausena bonana gi'abi'abina, medema Yaubada givelugana be gugai fifiwalana anafaiweya ginafaisewana.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena kadu adamoya keke tamo hakwadi valeyana kadanogalini, vaita kaliva yana tubuga againe givematakoyo amanadi gidakiveyamumuni.
Ka'i hida kaliva wavekwageyena-ma keke Yaubada gida'iveniniseni, kadu keke anafaiweya gugai fifiwalana gidafaisewani.” Hidemi tomatakoyo gigahe.
Au badi miYuda higayo, “O tokoyona, ya koyona fa'ina utubukoyo, mata keke gida'italele. O tokoyona nonogana, uhuluva vaita halamana unavehawalema.” Ada au hiwavina be gina.
Tu badi hiwavina ma Yesu ginogalina. Ginogalini-yo gina gilelena ginuhagana, ada gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Ka'i Bana Tohobu'ela uvetumaganena?”
Bana kaliva tomatakoyo gigayo, “Kauveya, Bana Tohobu'ela hakwa'adi? Unahawavetuvetunuku be ganavetumaganena fa'ina.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Ahe u'itana. Iya kaliva buye kalulukahihi-ma Kalivai-kuna.”
Ada bana tomatakoyo gigayo, “Kauveya iya gavetumagane.” Ada au Yesu againe gi'odu ada gidavadavana.
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i omi fanifanimiyao digo, keke ami wavita. Tu omi wagahe vaita matami mahamahalina fa'ina, ami wavita wamimiyami.” Hidemi Yesu Falisi gigahedi.

Kadu'e Yesu Falisi agaidiya aimo gilulukahihi gigayo, “Yaku gahe velemona wananogalina. Sifi adi ala fa'ina ganalukahihi. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana gina'ela vaita sifi adi ala hinagene gidaluku tu keke abaluku-mo'ena againe ginaluku, au ka'i ala fafaline ginalakalowoga, bana kalivai-nadi tokai'afu, vaita mali kaliva yana yomuyomu ginalemana.
Tu sifi adi to'itave'avina velemo'ena abaluku againe ginalukuluku.

Ada sifi adi to'itave'avina ginayemu againe, abaluku ana tovehimeya wanafali ginayauna be bana ginaluku. Au sifi adi to'itave'avina agona hinanogalina, ada tauna yana sifi adi egana sa'eyana sa'eyana againe ginaluwatuyedi be ginasehobuyedi.
E, ginalauwatu-'owoga yo bana wai ginanagona be yana sifi hinamulimuliyena, fa'ina adi to'itave'avina agona hihalamanena.
Keke-mo'a mali kaliva hinamuliyeni, keke. Ka'i agona hinanogalina, au hina'ota, kaliva-kawowo agodi keke hidahalamaneni fa'ina.”
Au hida gahetalahobuhobu Yesu badi Falisi miYuda yama tonagona agaidiya gilukahihiyena tu badi yana nuwanuwa hifaniyena.
Hifaniyena fa'ina Yesu gigahe-havagiledi gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, Iya'eku eda'awana sifi fa'idiya.
Badi boi himidi'ela higahe vaita Yaubada gida'iveninisedi, mema tove'alololo, adi egana tokai'afu o ka'i to'ailema. Tu yaku sifi badi kalivai-dina keke hidavenogaledi.

Iya'eku eda'awana sifi fa'idiya. Gava kaliva Iya agaikuya unaluku, medema kibababala unavaina. Ada sifi hihobuhobu adiga hilelele be hi'a'ahiyauwa-yo ala hinagene hilukuluku, kadu adi to'itave'avina hilugolegoledi amine, meda anafaiweya o'eni yaku sifi galugolegole.

Tokai'afu keke gida'ela-kawowo. Au bana gi'ela be sifi ginaki'afudi ginaluve'alikadi ginaluvehawaliyedi fa'ina. Tu Iya gahobu'ela be yawaidi ivaguna hinavaina, e yadi wavemwamwala hinamiyamiya-vagata.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana sifi gi'ita'itave'avidi ada fatana givaivaina. Bana keke sifi wagadi, au fata fa'ina gififaisewa. Ada ka'i tova sa'eyana gida'ita ma galu'eta manimaninina ana egana wolivi gi'ela'ela, au sifi gina'otayabuyabudi. Ada au galu'eta manimaninina sifi tufoidi ginayovadi, tufoidi ginavemaduyauyauledi.
Bana kaliva gina'ota, fa'ina bana tofaisewa wafatana. Sifi keke gidanuwenuwedi fa'ina, gina'otayabuyabudi.

Kadu yaku sifi velugadiyao himimiyami tu keke hida ala againe hidamiyami. Au mali yo'o agaidiya himimiyami, ada badi kadu akufaiweya gadakovadi be hida'ela, agoku hidavenogalena. Ada au yaku sifi moya'aidi ganave'atutamo'aidi be se'eyaine hinamiyami, adi yo'o sa'eyana adi To'itave'avina sa'eyana.
Ada yaku sifi fa'idiya yawaiku ganahawahegena ada muliya ganamididi-havagi. Yawaiku ganahawahegena fa'ina, Kamaku nuwanuwana lakahina Iya'eku.

Ka'i Iya ganahawahegeku digo, kaliva adifaiweya hinaluve'alikaku. Ka'i keke ganahawahegeku digo, kadu keke kaliva adifaiweya hinaluve'alikaku. Au Tauku yaku nuwanuwa againe alikeya ganahawahegeku. Akufaiweya gana'alika, kadu akufaiweya ganamididi-havagi. Hida vehimeya higa alika mididi-havagi fa'ina Kamaku giveleku.”
Tu Yesu hidede amine gilukahihi fa'ina, miYuda yama tonagona buye hive'anuwanuwa, yadi nuwanuwa tulina tulina.
Tufoidi moya'aidi higahegahe higayo, “Yafune Bana againe giluku be givekabaleya, fa'ina gigahegahe-kawowo. Gavana fa'ina Bana bonana aimo wavanevanenegeni?”
Tu tufoidi higayo, “Bana yana lukahihi keke kaliva wayafunena amine. Kaliva wayafunena keke anafaiweya tomatakoyo matana ginakiyauni.” Au hidede amine hive'agahegahe.

Atu tafalolo sa'eyana ana tova gilakayemu, ada au Yelusalema againe kaliva hivaga'auta. Boi tuwaina nibaimeyao manuwa-tafalolo hiyawelina tu muliya bwanenemeyao ivaguna hiyogona. Ada hida tafalolo-nadi againe manuwa-tafalolo ivaguna ana aiyogona anuwenuwena.
Ada medema tovai-nadi kwadudu ana tova, ada Yesu manuwa-tafalolo ana eda'awaneya ginunudadana, eda'awanai-nadi hivewagana Solomoni yana abaga.

Ada miYuda yama tonagona Yesu againe hivaga'auta higahena higayo, “Gavana fa'ina ime O inuba fa'ina aimo aleleleni tu O keke udahawavemogatala ime agaimeya? Ka'i velemo'ena O'eni Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso yada yo'o unanagoyeda amanadi, o ka'i keke? Keke unasevauyeni, au unagahe be ananogalina.”
Iya ahe gagehemi tu omi keke yaku sifi fa'ina, keke wadavetumaganeku.
Yaku sifi agoku hivenogalena ada Iya gahalamanedi. Badi himuliyeku be yawai-vagahidi gaveledi, ada au keke-mo'a hina'alika-vagata. Kadu keke tamo hakwadi yaku sifi nimakuya ginalemaku.
Kamaku yaku sifi giveleku, ada Bana anakaibe fifiwala-mo'ena fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya Kamaku nimane badi ginalemaku.
Iya'eku kadu Kamaku inubama sa'eyana, nuwama sa'eyana.” Au hidede amine Yesu miYuda yama tonagona agaidiya gilukahihi.
Tu badi hinogalini-yo kuga hivaina be hinatutuve'alikana fa'ina.
Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Gugai hagihagina moya'aina Tamada yana faiwala againe omi matamiya gafaisewana. Gava gugai fifiwalana fa'ina adamoya wanatutuve'alikaku?”
Badi miYuda higayo, “Keke gugai hagihagina fa'ina anatutuve'alika, au Yaubada uhawatagona fa'ina anatutuve'alika. Fa'ina O'eni kaliva nonogana ugahe vaita O Tauni Yaubada.”
Omi kaliva amanadi omi yaubada.
E, Yaubada bonana tovehimeya agaidiya giyemu, ada badi kalivai-dina Yaubada Tauna gihawaveyaubadayedi. Ada Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina keke kaliva adifaiweya hinayawelini, au duduva-vagahina.

E, tovehimeya agaidiya Yaubada bonana giyemu-ma badi tomiyababi, tu Iya'eku ma Yaubada Kamaku givegideku be babiya gi'iveniniseku bonana ganalukahihiyena fa'ina. Ada Iya gagahe gagayo, Iya'eku Yaubada Natuna. Au gavadi-yo hida yaku gahe fa'ina omi wagaheku vaita Yaubada gadahawatagoni?
Ka'i Iya keke gadafifaisewa Kamaku gififaisewa amine digo, au keke wanavetumaganeku.

Tu ka'i Iya gafififaisewa Kamaku gififaisewa amine be yaku gugai fifiwalana wa'ita'itana, au yaku gugai wanavetumaganena. Ka'i keke amifaiweya Iya Tauku wanavetumaganeku, au yaku gugai fifiwaladi wa'itadi-ma wanavetumaganedi be halamana wanavaina. E, wanahalamanena Kamaku Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami, kadu Iya Tauku Kamaku nuwahinagene gamimiyami, au Ime sa'eyama.”
Ada au Yesu hidede amine gigahe fa'ina, kadu higaluvaluva-havagi be hinakive'avina tu Yesu gihamwakau.
Tu Yesu Yolidani yuwa fafaline ginu-havagi, Yoni boi kaliva gimidikivebafitaisoyedi againe gina gimiyami.

Ada kaliva moya'aidi Bana againe hi'ela ada hive'agahegahe higayo, “Bana Yoni keke Yaubada nimana ana iya'iyaya gidafaisewani tu gahe moya'aina hida kalivai-nadi fa'ine Yoni gilukahihiyena amanadi keke fwaya, au gigahe velemo'ena.”
Hidedemi higahe ada tufoidi moya'aidi medede againe Yesu hivetumaganena.
Bana Meli higa muliya Kaiwabu agena bunama againe gibunamina ada agena u'una tunugina againe giluvehavehayana, au bana kwamayoku-nadi nouna Lasalo gi'aulolo.
Gi'aulolo tu vevine adi'iselu venuwa'ata Yesu againe hi'iveninisena higayo, “Kauveya, tobohiya bana'e nuwanuwa lakahina amanadi gi'aulolo lakahina.”
Au higa Yesu nuwanuwana Mata kadu tobohiyana be noudi Lasalo buye'i, nuwanuwana badi'iyao.
Ada au Lasalo gi'aulolo ma ginogalini-yo kadu aimo yuwa Yolidani fafaline gimiyami aiyeta luhei, keke gidamadulowoga.
Aiyeta luhei gimiyami tu ime ana tomuliya gigahema gigayo, “Wa'ela be kana Yudiya ana fafali againe kanayewada.”

Bana Yesu gigayo, “Wa'ita, aiyeta sa'eyana againe kauwana yana mahalina bai tuwelo ginunauwena. Ada au ka'i hakwadi uyadeyadeya ginanunudadana amine o bana keke ginatutumadumadu, fa'ina babi ana mahalina kauwana yana eda gituvemahalina.
Tu ka'i kaliva uyuyuya ginanunudadana amine o bana ginatutumadumadu, fa'ina yana mahalina keke.”
Au ime ana tomuliya agahena agayo, “Kauveya, ka'i gi'enonuwaulu, au enonuwaulu againe ginabwaina.” Hidedemi agahe.
Tu Yesu Lasalo yana alika fa'ina gilukahihi tu ime avaita dauva-mo'a fa'ina gidalukahihi.

Ime afaniyena fa'ina, Yesu gigahe-mo'ema gigayo, “Lasalo a gi'alika, ada tova gilubodana be omi wanavetumaganeku. Medema fa'ina bana gi'alika againe Iya bana buye keke adamiyami fa'ina gavemwamwala be higa tova adamoya wanavetumagane-mo'eku. Au kanana kana'itana.”
Tu Lasalo ahe hitau-yo aiyeta fowa ahegedi tu muliya Yesu gilakayemu Bedani melala againe.
Ma Bedani medema Yelusalema liline, ana lauva ka'i kilomita tohiye amine.
Ada au miYuda moya'aidi Mata be Meli agaidiya hiyemu be noudi yana alika fa'ina hina'ivemoluvidi.
Ada bana Mata Yesu gi'ela'ela-ma valeyana ginogalini-yo au gilowoga be ginamadubodebodena, tu bana Meli ma gimiya manuweya.
Tu ahe nouku gi'alika, atu gahalamanena ka'i gavadi Yaubada againe unave'o'olena, medema Bana'e ginavele.”
Au Yesu gigayo, “Nou ginamididi-havagi.”

Bana Yesu gigayo, “Iya'eku mididi-havagi inubana, kadu Iya'eku kaliva yawaimi ivaguna inubana. Gava kaliva ginavetuvetumaganeku, medema keke gina'alika au wayawaina ivaguna ginamiyamiya-vagata. Ka'i bana kalivai-nadi wowona gina'alika, tu tauna ginamiyamiya-vagata.
Ada gaveyao wayawaidi himimiyami kadu Iya hivetuvetumaganeku, medema keke-mo'a hina'alika-vagata. Ka'i hida yaku gahe uvetumaganena?”
Ada au Mata hidedemi gigahe-yo gilowoga tobohiyana Meli againe giyewana, giluwahiyena be gi'alakululuyena gigayo, “Bana yada Tovehawala a gi'ela, nuwanuwana o unana be gina'ita.”
Ada Meli tobohiyana yana gahe ginogalini-yo au gitowamidi Yesu againe gimaduna.
Meli ginauna tu Yesu aimo keke gidayemu melaleya, au edeya Mata ginuhagana againe aimo gimiyami.
Ada miYuda ahe hi'ela, bana Meli buye manuweya himiyami hihawavemoluvina. Au Meli gitowamidi manuweya gimaduhobu ma hi'ita-yo au himuliyena, hivaita bana gidanauna tomohuyehuyeya gidatagiya.
Badi himuliyena tu bana Meli Yesu againe gilakayemu, gi'ita tu agene gi'ibo'ula-mo'a gigahena gigayo, “Ho Kauveya, ka'i O hidedei udamiyami digo, nouku keke gida'alika.”
