Ada bana Meli gitagitagi-lulaukuhi, kadu miYuda bana hibwa'ulina-ma kadu buye hive'alulaukuhi. Ada au Yesu yadi tagiya gi'ita-yo alika fa'ina gi'ila'a kadu nuwana gikabubu.
Au gigayo, “Hai watau?”
Badi higayo, “Kauveya, u'ela be kana u'ita.”
Ada bana Yesu gitagitagi fa'ina, badi miYuda higayo, “Wa'ita. Wona velemona nuwanuwana lakahina bana'e.”
Tu Yesu alika fa'ina kadu gi'ila'a, au gilowoga aba'aitauna againe gina. Aba'aitauna higa tomohuyahuya, ada kabala lakahina abaluku gisebodana.
Au Yesu gigayo, “Kabala wavaini.”
Tu bana Mata to'alika nouna gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, bana hima gilada, fa'ina hitau-yo aiyeta fowa kahegena.”
Ada au kabala hivaina digo Yesu gi'italele gigayo, “Kamaku, gavesiule againiya ahe uvenogaleku fa'ina.

Ada a gahalamanena uvenovenogaleku tova moya'aina, tu O againiya gavesiule be badi lilikuya himidimidi-ma hinanogalina. Hinanogali-yo au hinahalamane-mo'ena O Tauni u'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela.” Hidedemi Yesu Tamana againe gigahe.
Ada au give'o'ola gihavaina, gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Lasalo-yo, uyemu.”

Yesu gigahe-yo bana to'alika giyemu, nimana agena kaleko againe boi miYuda yama dewa amine hifafana-ma aimo gidauda. Kadu'e kaleko u'une hifafana-ma aimo gidauda. Au Yesu kaliva gigahedi gigayo, “Wanayauna be ginana.”
Tu tufoidi badi tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi agaidiya hina Yesu yana gugai fa'ina hi'awatalatalaina.

Hi'awatalatalaina gihavaina, badi Falisi kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao venuwa'ata hi'iveninisena be koniselo yadi vaga'auta hisena. Ada hivaga'auta-yo hive'agahegahe higayo, “Gavaimi kanagani? Bana wadema kalivai-nadi nimana ana iya'iyaya moya'ai-mo'ena gififaisewana.

Ka'i keke kanahawatani digo, kaliva matatabudi hinavetumagana-'owoga ada badi yada tovehimeya miLoma yadi tolugaviya hina'iveninisedi be yada manuwa-tafalolo hinayawelina, kadu ide miYuda moya'aida yada kaiwabu hinavaihegena.” Hidede amine hive'agahegahe.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana badi agaidiya gimiyami, ana egana Kaiyafasi, bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu hisena medema malamalai-nadi againe. Au bana Kaiyafasi gigahedi gigayo, “Omi kwavakwavamiyao. Gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyanaga gina'alika ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Ka'i ide miYuda moya'aida miLoma nimadiya kana'alika-'owoga kadu yada yo'o hinakwaha, medema keke gidalubodani.”

Ma bana Kaiyafasi keke tauna yana nuwanuwa againe hidede amine gidagahe, au bana medema malamalai-nadi againe abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana maka givaina fa'ina, Yaubada nuwanuwa givelena be gavadi aimo ginalakayemu ma gilukahihiyena, higa Yesu miYuda yana yo'o fa'imeya gina'alika.

Kadu keke vaita yana yo'o gagana fa'imeya gina'alika, tu kadu badi Yaubada natuneyao moya'aidi fa'idiya gina'alika be badi kalivai-dina fafali tulina tulina agaidiya himiyamiyavehaila amanadi Yaubada yana yo'o sa'eyana againe hinavetobohiyana fa'ina.
Ada au medema aiyetai-nadi hivebutu hivevai, tova moya'aina hinuwanuwa be Yesu hinaluve'alikana fa'ina.
Ada Yesu hilelelena, manuwa-tafalolo againe himidimidi tu hive'agahegahe higayo, “Gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Ka'i Yesu hida tafalolo againe gina'ela o ka'i keke?”
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu Falisi vehimeya ahe hisena higa ka'i tamo kaliva ha'againe Yesu gimiyami-ma ginahalamanena o, ginahawavemogatala badi agaidiya be hinakive'avina fa'ina.
Au Yesu Bedani againe gi'ela ada Bana fa'ine avemwamwala hisena. Ada bana Mata a'a ana haulili gi'ita'itave'avina tu bana Lasalo badi to'a kadu Yesu buye tolameya hi'enolukekela be hi'au'a.

Hi'au'a tu bana Meli bunama aba'aihiwaga botolu lakahina amine gi'aliyena, ana egana nado, ai kabuna, medema keke tamo gavadi buye hidave'atutamo'aini, ada fatana keke kabi'ona. Au Meli Yesu agena gibunamina tu u'una tunugina againe agena giluvehavehayana, ada bunama magana yamumuna manuwa gilelevilana.

Au hidede amine gigahe tu keke vaita velemo'ena koyokoyo gida'itanuwakabubuyedi fa'ina, keke. Au bana tokai'afu fa'ina hidede amine gigahe, ada ime tomuliya yama mani ana abavedodoga gi'ita'itave'avina fa'ina, bana tauna mani givaivaina.
Koyokoyo ma amifaiweya wananuwakabubuyedi tova tunugi-vagahina tu Iya'eku ma keke buye kanamiyami tova tunugina, fa'ina kabisona au ganahegemi.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao ma buye hivevai be kadu Lasalo Yesu buye hinaluve'alikadi.

Au Yesu Lasalo gisivemididina fa'ina, miYuda moya'aidi abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi yo'o hikilowedi be hina Yesu againe hivetuvetumagana. Hidema fa'ina abaveyao ana tofaisewa nuwanuwadi Lasalo buye'i hinaluve'alikana.
Aiyeta anavelu againe yo'o lakahina tafalolo ana egana Abamaduviviya fa'ina hivaga'auta amanadi, Yesu valeyana hinogalina vaita Yelusalema againe ginalaka'ela.
Hinogali-yo au ai lukumina bodaboda amine hivaina digo hilowoga Yesu hinavega'aulena, ada au hivebutu hikovakovadavadava higayo,
“Hosana yama tokibababala.
O'eni Kauveya ana eganeya u'ela'ela-ma
Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.
E, O'eni miIsileli yama tokaiwabu Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.”
Au hidede amine Yesu hihawadavadavana.
Gigayo,
Omi miSaiyoni, keke wanamatauta.
Au wa'ita, yami tokaiwabu gi'ela'ela
doniki natudi againe giyage be ginanauna.
Hidede amine to'awatalatalaina miYelusalema adi egana velugana miSaiyoni fa'idiya gigahe.

Tu Yesu doniki kwaune giyage ana toveya, ime ana tomuliya keke adahalamaneni Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe amine Yesu gihuluva. Au tova mulina Yesu gimididi-havagi be yana wakikaiwabu Tamana againe gilaka ana toveya, gavaimi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina Bana fa'ine gi'etoladina ada badi miYuda Yesu againe hihuluva, medema anuwa'afolegena.
Ada au yo'oyo'o boi Yesu buye himiyami tu Lasalo gikovana be tomohuyehuyeya giyemu ada alikeya gisivemididina amanadi, Yesu yana gugai kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya hilukahihiyena.
Au hida nimana ana iya'iyaya gifaisewana-ma yo'o hinogalina fa'ina, hina edeya hivega'aulena.
Hidema fa'ina tonagona adi egana Falisi hive'agahegahe higayo, “Wa'ita, kaliva moya'aidi Bana againe hivetomuliya-'owoga, ada keke adafaiweya kanahawatadi.”
Badi hive'agahegahe tu miGilika tufoidi yo'o hinafadiya himiyami, yo'o-dina Yelusalema againe hinauna tafalolo lakahina fa'ina hivagavaga'auta.
Au badi miGilika Filifi againe hi'ela, bana kwanamiBedasaida, melalai-nadi Galili ana fafali againe. Badi bana againe hi'ela higayo, “Kauveya, nuwanuwama Yesu ana'itana.”
Ada Filifi gina Anidulu givenuwa'atana, ada au adi'iselu hina Yesu hivenuwa'atana.

Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Aimo kabi'ona gavadi Iya agaikuya ginalakayemu fa'ina ganalukahihiyena. Ka'i otova keke babiya kanafahani, kadu keke ginamoya'ai a'a-mo'ena keke kananuhagani, au sa'eyanaga ginadauda. Tu ka'i babiya kanafahana be tubuna gina'afuwana, au ginatabo be a'a moya'aina kananuhagana. Meda anafaiweya gana'alika-yo babiya hinatauku tu keke akukaibe ganamiyami, au aimo yaku yo'o hinamoya'ai.

Kadu gava kaliva tauni ya miyami babiyagaga fa'ina unuwanuwa, medema yawaini unanuhegena, tu gava kaliva ya miyami ana nuwanuwa hida babi againe unavenikohiyena, medema yawai-vagahi wese lobameya unanuhagana.

Ka'i hakwadi o nuwanuwa Iya fa'ikuya unafaisewa, giluboda be Iya agaikuya udavetomuliya, ada hai Iya ganamiyami kadu medede againe o'eni yaku tofaisewa buye kanamiyami. Ada hakwadi Iya fa'ikuya unafaisewa, au o'eni Kamaku ginakilakahi.
Au hidede amine ganave'o'ola, Kamaku, a egana lakahina una'ivemogatalina be kaliva hinakilakahina.”
Hidede amine give'o'ola-yo Yaubada agona lobameya giyemu gigayo, “Aku egana lakahina ahe ga'ivemogatalina kadu gana'ivemogatali-havagilena be kaliva hinakilakahiku.”
Tu yo'o himidimidi-ma hinogalina. Tufoidi higahe higayo, “Atala gihegena.” Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana Bana againe gilukahihi.”
Bana Yesu gigahedi gigayo, “Keke vaita Iya fa'ikuya hida ago'ago gidayemu-yo wadanogalini, keke. Au omi fa'imiya gigahe.
Tomiyababi koyodiyao adi vematahiwadi ana tova-mo'ena adamoya gilakayemu. E, tova adamoya bana Setani tomiyababi yadi tovehimeya ganawavina be ginana.
Ada Iya'eku ma ai againe hinakivemididiku ana toveya, kaliva moya'aidi ganakovadi be nuwadi Iya agaikuya gina'ela.”
Hidede amine gigahe be gavaiya'amine gina'alika ma kaliva hinahalamanena.

Iya Tomahala aimo omi agaimiya gamimiyami tu wanavetumaganeku be mahalina ana kaliva wanatubuyemu.” Ada au Yesu hidedemi gilukahihi gihavaina, yo'o ginuyabuyabudi gina Tauna gisevauyena be keke hina'itani.
Tu Yesu nimana ana iya'iyaya keke sa'eyadi gifaisewadi miYuda matadiya nonogana hidibudibutoyoga keke hidavetumaganeni.
Hidede amine hihuluva be Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya yana gahe tuwaina amine velemo'ena ginalakayemu. Bana gigaheye-vagahina,
Kaiwabu-yo, keke tamo hakwadi yada venuwa'ata gidavenogaleni.
Kadu keke tamo hakwadi O Kaiwabu ya faiwala
nima ana iya'iyaya againe gida'itahalamaneni.
Badi Yesu nimana ana iya'iyaya keke hida'itahalamaneni fa'ina keke adifaiweya yadi vetumagana Bana againe hidaseuseni, fa'ina Aiseya kadu Yaubada yana gahe giyakahina gigayo,
Nuwadi gakivefanina be keke hinahalamaneni,
ada au keke adifaiweya Iya agaikuya hinahagaviladi-yo
ganakiveyamumudi fa'ina.
Badi kalivai-dina nuwanuwadi lakahina kaliva hinahawaveyamumuyedi tu Yaubada yana hawaveyamumu keke hidanuwenuweni.
Tu tova sa'eyana Yesu gikovadona gigayo, “Gava kaliva Iya uvetumaganeku, medema Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma buye uvetumaganema.
Ada gava kaliva Iya u'itaku, medema Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma buye u'itama.
Babiya gahobu'ela be nuwami gana'ivemahalina fa'ina. Gahobu'ela be gaveyao moya'aimi Iya wanavetumaganeku, medema keke uyuyu againe wanamiyami.

Tu tovematahiwadi sa'eyana gimimiyami, ana egana bonaku. Gava kaliva unakiloweku kadu yaku laumamala keke unadibumuhigeni, au bonaku ahe babiya galukahihiyena tu udibutoyogena-ma ana matahiwadi unanuhagana, aimo tova mulina vedewayauga ana toveya.
Ada keke Tauku yaku nuwanuwa againe gadalukahihi, au Bana Kamaku gi'iveniniseku-ma givehimeyeku. Gavaimi ganagahe o ka'i ganalaumamala, Bana givehimeyeku.

Ada Iya gahalamanena ka'i kaliva Bana yana vehimeya hinadibumuhigena amine o, yawai-vagahidi hinanuhagana. Hidema fa'ina gavaimi Kamaku givehimeyeku be ganagahe, au medede amine gagahegahe.” Hidedemi Yesu yo'oyo'o gigahedi.

Hidedemi gihalamanena tu tolama againe a'au'a-ma gitowamidi, ana aikeva givehalilina digo sawelo dobone gihifo tu nau'a againe gufa gihiwana, au givebutu vaita agetoga amine ime ana tomuliyamomo agema gikolana digo sawelo dobone gihifona-ma againe giluvehavehayana.
Gi'ikolakola tu gi'ela higa vaita Saimoni-Fita agena gidakolana ma Fita gigahena gigayo, “Ho Kauveya! Ka'i iya ageku unakolana, ka'i keke?”
Yesu gigayo, “Adamoya hida yaku huluva ana nuwanuwa keke udahalamaneni tu aimo tova mulina nuwa ginamahalina againe unahalamanena.”
Tu bana Fita gigayo, “Keke-mo'a iya ageku unakolani.”
Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i age keke ganakolani, au keke yaku kaliva o'eni.”
Hidedemi gigahe-yo Fita gigayo, “Kauveya, au keke agekuga unakolani tu nimaku u'uku buye'i.”
Au Yesu gigayo, “Ahe utowa be matatabuna au yegayega tu giluboda be ageniga ganakolana. Ada omi moya'aimi yegayegamiyao tu kaliva sa'eyanaga keke yegayegana.”
Fa'ina Yesu a gihalamanena gava kaliva nibaineyao agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena. Hidema fa'ina ahe gigahe moya'aimi yegayegamiyao tu kaliva sa'eyanaga keke yegayegana.
Tu au agema gikolana gihavaina, ana aikeva gi'osena digo tolameya gi'enolukekela-havagi be gigahema gigayo, “Ka'i yaku huluva omi agaimiya mene wahalamanena?
Omi wavewagaku Tovehawala kadu Kauveya. Au wagahe yamumuna, fa'ina wona velemona yami Kaiwabu Iya'eku.
Ada Iya'eku yami Tovehawala yami Kaiwabu agemi gakolana vaita agetoga amine fa'ina, meda omi amifaiweya wadahuluva, agemi wadave'a'ikolakola.
Au dewa hagihagina gavehawalemi be omi taumiyao hidede amine wanahuluva fa'ina. Omi agaimiya Iya gahuluva amine, kadu omi wanahuluva.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, agetoga yana tovehimeya keke gidakaiwabuhegeni, kadu tovenuwa'ata bana gi'iveninisena-ma keke gidakaiwabuhegeni.
Au hida yaku dewa ana nuwanuwa ahe wahalamanena. Ka'i hida nuwanuwa wanadibumuhigena digo, yami vemwamwala gavatubuga wananuhagana.” Au hidemi ve'agetoga fa'ina Yesu gigahe.
Kaliva yaku tolameya buye a'au'a-ma givenibaineku.
Ada au bana kalivai-nadi hidede amine ginahuluva be Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina velemo'ena ginalakayemu fa'ina.

Gagahe velemo'ena agaimiya, kaliva gana'iveninisena-ma hakwa'adi ginavetobohiyanena, au vaita kadu Iya ginavetobohiyaneku ada hakwa'adi ginavetobohiyaneku, au vaita kadu Bana'e gi'iveniniseku-ma ginavetobohiyanena.”

Tu Yesu hidede amine gilukahihi gihavaina, gi'ase'u'aulolo ada ime ana tomuliya agaimeya gigaheye-mo'ena gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya nibaikweyao agaidiya ginahawavemogataleku.”
Yesu gigahe-yo au ime ana tomuliya ave'a'ita'ita, anuwanuwa ka'i hakwadi fa'ine gilukahihi.
Tu iya Yesu ana tomuliya nuwanuwana lakahina iya'eku amanadi, Bana liline ga'enolukekela tu ga'au'a.
Au bana Saimoni-Fita giveguwautuleku gigayo, “Hakwadi fa'ina gilukahihi-ma unatoliluvaluva be kanahalamanena.”
Giveguwautuleku-yo au ga'alaliya Yesu tagane gagayo, “Kauveya, hakwadi fa'ina ulukahihi?”
Yesu gigayo, “Hida a'a bwai againe gana'utuvina ada bana ganavelena-ma kalivai-nadi.” Gigahe-yo au a'a gi'utuvina Yudasi-Isikaliyota givelena, bana Saimoni natuna.
Ada Yudasi a'a gi'abina tovai-nadi Setani bana ase'asene giluku, ada Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Ya faisewa unamaduvehavaina.”
Tu keke tamo ime agaimeya buye a'au'a-ma gidahalamaneni, ka'i gavana fa'ina Yesu Yudasi againe hidede amine gigahe.
Tufoima anuwanuwa higa Yudasi mani ana abavedodoga gi'ita'itave'avina fa'ina, Yesu gigahena vaita tafalolo ana a'a bana gidakimoneni, o ka'i koyokoyo agaidiya tamo nuwakabubu gidaveledi.
Ada au Yudasi a'a Yesu givelena-ma gi'a gihavaina, auhe'ama gimaduhobu be gina. Ada mala a gibogi.
Yudasi a gina tu Yesu gigayo, “Au adamoya Yaubada Iya Tohobu'ela gikivekikaiwabuku, kadu Yaubada yana kikaiwabu Iya Bana Natuna agaikuya kaliva hi'itadavadavana.
Ka'i Yaubada yana kikaiwabu Iya agaikuya kaliva hina'itadavadavana amine, au kadu Yaubada Tauna yana kikaiwabu ginaveleku be ganakaiwabu-mo'a. E, hidede amine ginamadu-kivekikaiwabuku.
Ka'i taumiyao agaimiya wanave'ahawahawahega, au huluvai-nadi againe kaliva moya'aidi hinahalamanena hinagayo, Wona velemona badi Yesu ana tomuliya.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahe.
Tu Saimoni-Fita gigayo, “Kauveya, hami unana?”
Yesu gigayo, “Iya ganana againe, adamoya keke afaiweya unamuliyeku tu tova mulina unamuliyeku.”
Fita gigayo, “Kauveya, gavana fa'ina adamoya keke akufaiweya ganamuliye? Au gahawahegeku be O fa'iniya gana'alika.”
Yesu gigayo, “Ugahe vaita Iya fa'ikuya una'alika tu gagahe velemo'ena againiya, kamukamu keke ginakwage tu nagona unamidivekekeyeku tova tohiye.”

Abamiya moya'aina Kamaku yana manuweya gidadauda ada Iya ganana be yami abaga ganakidewedewena fa'ina. Ka'i keke abamiya moya'aina gidadauda, kadu keke vaita gadagahe ganana yami abamiya gana'ihagihagiyena.
Ada Iya ganana yami abaga ganakidewedeweni-yo au ganayewaku ganavega'aulemi be Iya ganamiyami againe, kadu omi wana'ela buye kanamiyami.
Ada yaku abamiya againe ganana-ma ana eda omi wahalamanena.”
Tu Tomasi gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, hami unana ma keke adahalamaneni, fa'ina gavaimi eda anahalamaneni?”
Ka'i wadahalamane-hagihagiyeku digo, kadu Kamaku wadahalamanena. Ada au tova adamoya be ginanunauwena Bana'e wahalamanena, kadu ahe wa'itana.”
Tu Filifi gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, Tama kaliva-mo'ena unavehawalema be auwe hidedemi amafaiweya anahalamanena.”

Iya Tauku Kamaku nuwahinagene gamimiyami kadu Bana Kamaku Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami, au Ime sa'eyama. Vaita hida gahe udavetumaganeni. Ada keke Tauku yaku nuwanuwa againe gadalulukahihi, au Kamaku Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami be yana faisewa Tauna gifififaisewa.

Au yaku gahe wanavetumaganena. Iya Tauku Kamaku nuwahinagene gamimiyami, kadu Bana Kamaku Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami, au Ime sa'eyama. Ka'i keke amifaiweya yaku gahe wanavetumaganeni, au yaku gugai fifiwalana fa'ina wanavetumaganeku.

Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, ka'i gava kaliva o unavetuvetumaganeku, gugai fifiwalana Iya gafaisewana amine, kadu o unafaisewana. Yaku gugai fifiwalana moya'aina tu ya gugai fifiwalana aimo unafaisewana-ma moya'ai-mo'ena, fa'ina Iya Kamaku againe ganayewaku be Alu'aluwa Mahalina omi nuwamiya gana'iveninisena.
Ada gavadi gavadi aku eganeya wanave'o'olena, medema ganafaisewana be higa kaliva Kamaku yana kikaiwabu Iya Bana Natuna yaku faisewa againe hina'itadavadavana.
Ka'i gavadi gavadi aku eganeya wanave'o'olena, medema ganafaisewana.
Ada Kamaku ganave'o'olena, ami Toveluga velugana ginahawahegena be omi agaimiya gina'ela ginamiyamiya-vagata fa'ina. Bana'e au Yaubada Alu'aluwana, nuwanuwa velemo'ena inubana.

Tu tomiyababi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma keke adifaiweya hina'ayauneni. Badi keke Alu'aluwa Mahalina hida'itahalamaneni, au hifaniyena fa'ina keke adifaiweya hina'ayauneni. Tu omi'iyao ma Bana'e wahalamanena, fa'ina omi agaimiya gimimiyami ada aimo Tauna nuwahinagemiya ginamiyami.
Ada keke vaita natu'aeda amine Iya gananuyabuyabumi, au omi agaimiya ganayewaku.
Aimo tova kabisona Iya ganana be kaliva gaveyao keke hidavetumaganeku, medema keke kadu hina'itaku, tu omi'iyao ma wana'ita'itaku. Ada Iya gamiyamiya-vagata fa'ina, kadu omi wanamiyamiya-vagata.

Ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'ela ana toveya, ginakivetuvetunumi be omi wanahalamanena Iya Tauku Kamaku nuwahinagene gamimiyami, kadu omi taumiyao Iya nuwahinagekuya wamimiyami, kadu Iya Tauku nuwahinagemiya gamimiyami.

Hakwa'adi o yaku vehimeya uhalamanena udibumuhigena, o'eni velemo'ena nuwanuwa Iya'eku, ada o'eni nuwanuwa Iya'eku amanadi Bana Kamaku yana nuwanuwa ginasena o againiya, kadu yaku nuwanuwa ganasena o againiya ada Tauku gana'ivemogataliku be wanahalamane-hagihagiyeku fa'ina.” Hidedemi Yesu gilukahihi.

Tu tomuliya sa'eyana ana egana Yudasi, keke Yudasi-Isikaliyota au wagakoyona, Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Kauveya, gavadi-yo ime agaimeya Tauni una'ivemogatali-yo anahalamane, tu keke tomiyababi moya'aidi agaidiya una'ivemogatali?”
Tu ka'i kaliva keke nuwanuwana Iya'eku, bana bonaku keke gida'abini. Ada hida gahe wanoganogalina-ma keke Tauku bonaku, au Kamaku gi'iveniniseku-ma Bana bonana.
Iya omi aimo buye kamimiyami tu hida gaitoma omi agaimiya galukahihiyena.

Tu Toveluga, ana egana Alu'aluwa Mahalina, Bana Kamaku gina'iveninisena be yaku kabu ginavaina amanadi, gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina ginakivetuvetunumi, kadu yaku vehawala omi agaimiya fa'ina nuwami ginatalafolena.
Ada yaku tauya fa'ina gavenuwa'ata-vagahimi aimo buye kamiyami-tu. Ahe gavenuwa'atami be aimo ganana againe, wanavetumaganeku.

Keke aimo buye kanalulukahihi lauva tunugina, fa'ina Setani gi'ela'ela. Bana Setani badi tomiyababi keke hidavetumaganeku-ma yadi tovehimeya. E, bana gi'ela'ela be vaita gina'ivehamumuku, tu bana keke-mo'a gidavehimeyeku.
Tu tomiyababi gilubodadi be hidahalamanena Iya nuwanuwaku Kamaku, kadu gavaimi Kamaku givehimeyeku medede amine gahuluhuluva.”
Ada au Yesu hidede amine gilukahihi gihavaina, gigahema gigayo, “Wa'ela be kana.”
Kadu Yesu gilukahihi gigayo, “Iya'eku ai veguveguwaku velemo'ena, ada Bana Kamaku ai ana to'itave'avina.

Kaliva hivetuvetumaganeku-ma badi laganiku. Hai kaliva keke yaku nuwanuwa amine hinahuluva, medema vaita laganiku keke gidayoyo, ada au medema Kamaku ginakuyadi be ginahegedi. Tu hai kaliva yaku nuwanuwa amine hihuluhuluva, medema vaita laganiku yoyoyona, ada au Kamaku yogo badi agaidiya ginavaihegena be hinayoyo guwadi moya'aina.
Tu omi'iyao ma bonaku galumamalena-ma ahe wavetumaganena fa'ina, ahe wayegayega yogomi keke.

Au Iya agaikuya wanamiyamiyave'avina, kadu omi agaimiya ganamiyave'avina. Ka'i aiguwa laganina keke ai-mo'ena againe ginamiyave'avina digo, keke anafaiweya ginayoyo. Meda anafaiweya omi'iyao, ka'i keke Iya agaikuya wanamiyave'avina, kadu keke amifaiweya yaku nuwanuwa amine wanahuluva.

Ka'i hakwadi o Iya agaikuya keke unamiyave'avina, aiguwa laganina koyona hihegena be gibou amine, meda Kamaku o ginahege. Ada au laganina koyona hihegena tu tamo hakwadi yana ai fa'ina gikwakwana ada gi'alahina.
Tu ka'i omi Iya agaikuya wanamiyave'avina ada bonaku ase'asemiya ginadauda tova moya'aina amine o, gavadi fa'ina nuwanuwami wanave'o'ola, au wanave'o'ola be velemo'ena wananuhagana.

Ka'i wanayoyo lakahina higa Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine wanahuluhuluva tova moya'aina, au kaliva Kamaku ana egana hinakilakahina kadu hina'itami hinagayo, Wa'ita, wona velemona badi'iyao Yesu ana tomuliya.
Tu Kamaku nuwanuwana Iya'eku amine, meda Iya nuwanuwaku omi'iyao. Iya agaikuya wanamiyamiyave'avina be yaku nuwanuwa omi agaimiya gaseusena-ma wana'aya'ayaunena tova moya'aina.

Kamaku yana vehimeya gadibudibumuhigena, ada au yana nuwanuwa Iya agaikuya ga'aya'ayaunena tova moya'aina. Meda anafaiweya ka'i yaku vehimeya omi wanadibudibumuhigena amine o, yaku nuwanuwa omi agaimiya wana'aya'ayaunena tova moya'aina.
Au hidede amine gagahemi be Iya gavemwamwala amine, meda omi wanavemwamwala, higa wanavemwamwala-mo'a.
Ada Iya omi fa'imiya gahawahegeku amine, kadu omi taumiyao agaimiya wanave'ahawahawahega. Au hidede amine Iya gavehimeyemi.
Ka'i kaliva tobohiyaneyao fa'idiya yawaina tauna ginanuhegena digo, bana velemo'ena nuwanuwana badi'iyao, au yana hawahega lakahi-mo'ena.
Ada omi'iyao ma ka'i yaku vehimeya wanadibudibumuhigena digo, omi Iya tobohiyakweyao.

Au wa'ita, bana agetoga gavaimi yana tovehimeya ginuwanuwa ma keke gidahalamaneni, fa'ina bana againe keke gidahawavemogataleni. Boi gavewagami agetoga tu tova adamoya gahawavetobohiyanemi, fa'ina nuwanuwa moya'aina Kamaku againe ganogalina-ma omi agaimiya gahawavemogatalena.
Omi keke wadavenuwadadaneku, keke. Au Iya gavenuwadadanemi gavegidemi be wanana wanayoyo be guwami ginaduva-vagata. Ada au gavadi aku eganeya Kamaku wanave'o'olena, medema ginavelemi.
Gavehimeyemi hidede amine. Omi taumiyao agaimiya wanave'ahawahawahega.

Ka'i omi tokilowa yadi yo'o kalivai-dina digo, badi taudiyao hive'anuwakabubu amine, kadu omi hidanuwakabubuyemi. Tu Iya gavenuwadadanemi be yaku yo'o agaidiya waluku fa'ina, omi keke badi tokilowa yadi yo'o kalivai-dina. Ada tokilowa hivenibainemi, fa'ina keke yadi yo'o agaidiya wadamiyami.

Yaku gahe wananuwa-nunauyena gagayo, Agetoga yana tovehimeya keke gidakaiwabuhegeni. Iya yami tovehimeya hivekwageyeku fa'ina, kadu omi aku agetoga hinavekwageyemi. Ka'i yaku laumamala hidadibumuhigena digo, kadu yami laumamala hidadibumuhigena.
Tu omi aku egana wavetumaganena fa'ina, hinakivekoyomi Iya galukahihiyena amine. Bana'e gi'iveniniseku-ma keke hidahalamaneni fa'ina, au hidedemi hinahuluvimi.

Ka'i Iya keke gadahobu'ela tokilowa gadakivetuvetunudi digo, keke vita hidawahini. Au ahe gakivetuvetunudi tu bonaku keke hida'abini fa'ina adi wavita, keke adifaiweya hinagahe vaita badi fanifanidiyao.
Gava kaliva Iya givenibaineku, medema kadu Kamaku givenibainena.

Gugai fifiwaladi boi keke tamo hakwadi gidafaisewani-ma Iya badi matadiya gafaisewadi. Ka'i keke gugai-dina gadafaisewadi digo, kadu keke vita hidawahini, tu yaku gugai ahe hi'itana nonogana Iya hivenibaineku Kamaku buye'i, fa'ina badi adi wavita.
Au hidede amine hivenibaineku be gahe sa'eyana yadi buki-vehimeya againe tuwaina gidadauda-ma velemo'ena ginalakayemu fa'ina gigayo,
Keke tamo yaku ihi tu hivenibaineku.
Kadu omi'iyao ma Iya fa'ikuya wana'awatalatalaina, fa'ina yaku faisewa ana abave'inuba againe buye kamimiyami be kanunauwena tova adamoya.” Au hidemi Yesu gigahe.
Kadu Yesu ana tomuliya agaidiya gilukahihi gigayo, “Hida tokilowa yadi huluva fa'ina gagahe-vagahimi be aimo yami vetumagana keke ginahavaini fa'ina.

Aimo ka'i nuwanuwami manuwa-abavehawala againe wanaluku wanatafalolo, au hinahawatami. Ada tova ginalakayemu be kaliva hinaluve'alikami ada hinagayo, Au Yaubada nuwanuwana hina'alika fa'ina aluve'alikadi.
Au hidede amine hinakivekoyomi, keke Kamaku hidahalamaneni fa'ina, kadu keke Iya hidahalamaneku fa'ina.
Tu omi aku tomuliya gavenuwa'ata-vagahimi be aimo huluvai-nadi ana tova ginayemu-yo yaku venuwa'ata badi fa'idiya nuwami gina'afolena.

Boi nagona agaikuya wamidivetomuliya againe, kaliva mena yadi huluva fa'ina keke gadagahemi, buye kamiyami fa'ina. Tu tova adamoya Bana gi'iveniniseku-ma againe ganayewaku, ada vaita tamo hakwadi agaimiya udatoliluvaluva udagayo, Hami unana? Tu keke yakuna fa'ina wadatoliluvaluva.
Ada yakuna galukahihiyena fa'ina, ase'asemi gi'u'aulolo.

Tu gagahe velemo'ena gananuyabuyabumi be omi yamumu wananuhagana fa'ina. Ka'i Iya keke ganana digo, ami Toveluga agaimiya keke gina'ela. Tu ka'i ganana digo, Bana'e gana'iveninisena be omi agaimiya ginahobu'ela.

E, Bana'e gina'ela tomiyababi yadi nuwanuwa kali'uhona ginakivetuvetunugina be yadi dewa koyona hinahalamane-hagihagiyena, kadu gaveyao yegayegadiyao Yaubada matane ma hinahalamanena. Kadu'e Yaubada yana matahiwadi fa'ina ginakivetuvetunudi be hinahalamanena.
Keke hidavetumaganeku fa'ina, Alu'aluwa Mahalina hida yadi dewa koyona fa'ina ginakivetuvetunudi.

Kamaku againe ganayewaku ada omi aimo keke wana'ita'itaku. Kamaku againe ganayewaku fa'ina, badi tomiyababi hinahalamanena Iya yegayegaku Yaubada matane. Hidedemi Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginakivetuvetunudi.
Kadu yana kivetuvetunu sa'eyana ma Yaubada ahe givehimeya be Setani hida babi ana tovehimeya koyona matahiwadi-vagata ginanuhagana.
Tu yaku nuwanuwa keke gadalukahihiye-'owoni agaimiya, au tufona moya'aina gidadauda tu tova adamoya keke amifaiweya wananogalini, fa'ina nuwami ginakoyo-mo'a.

Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina, Bana nuwanuwa velemo'ena inubana amanadi, gina'ela ana toveya, nuwanuwa velemo'ena matatabuna fa'ina ginakivetuvetunumi. Keke Tauna yana nuwanuwa amine ginalukahihi, au gavadi Kamaku againe ginanogalina medema ginalukahihiyena, kadu gavadi aimo tova mulina ginalakayemu-ma omi agaimiya ginahawavemogatalena.
Yaku nuwanuwa ginavaina be ginavehawalemi, ada au hidede amine aku egana ginakilakahina.

Kamaku yana nuwanuwa moya'aina, medema kadu Iya yaku nuwanuwa. Hidema fa'ina gagahe vaita yaku nuwanuwa Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginavaina be ginavehawalemi.” Au hidedemi Alu'aluwa Mahalina fa'ina Yesu gilukahihi.
Kadu Yesu gigayo, “Tova kabi'ona aimo keke wana'itaku, kadu tova kabi'ona kanahegeni-yo wana'ita-havagileku.”

Au ime ana tomuliya buye ave'agahegahe agayo, “Gavadi-yo gigahe gigayo, Tova kabi'ona aimo keke wana'itaku, kadu tova kabi'ona kanahegeni-yo wana'ita-havagileku. Kadu gavana fa'ina-yo gigahe gigayo, Kamaku againe ganayewaku fa'ina?
Ada au buye ave'atolitoli agayo, Yana gahe, higa tova kabi'ona, ana nuwanuwa gavaiya'amine? Hida yana gahe kafaniyena.”

Tu Yesu gihalamanena ime nuwanuwama anatoliluveluvena fa'ina gigahema gigayo, “Iya gagahemi gagayo, Tova kabi'ona aimo keke wana'itaku, kadu tova kabi'ona kanahegeni-yo wana'ita-havagileku. Ka'i hida yaku gahe fa'ina buye wave'agahegahe?

Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, omi yaku alika fa'ina wanatagitagi wanave'alulaukuhi tu badi tomiyababi hikiloweku-ma hinavemwamwala. Nagona omi wana'ase'u'aulolo tu muliya vemwamwala yami ase'u'aulolo ginatogahegena.
Ka'i kwamayoku hinavefahedi againe, aulolo hinavaina yadi venatuna ana tova gilakayemu fa'ina, tu ahe hinavenatuna againe yadi aulolo nuwadi ginaulu tu hinavemwamwala natudi hivenatunena fa'ina.
Meda anafaiweya omi'iyao. Adamoya ase'asemi gi'u'aulolo, tu aimo gana'ita-havagilemi ada au ase'asemi ginavatu, ada keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya yami vemwamwala ginayawelini.
Ada aimo yami wavemwamwala ana toveya keke tamo gavadi fa'ina wanatoliluveluveku. Gagahemi velemo'ena gavadi gavadi aku eganeya Kamaku wanave'o'olena, medema ginavelemi.
Boi keke tamo gavadi fa'ina aku eganeya wadave'o'oleni. Au adamoya wanave'o'ola be wananuhagana be higa wanavemwamwala-mo'a fa'ina.
Adamoya gahetalahobuhobu amine omi agaimiya galulukahihi tu aituha gi'ela'ela be keke gahetalahobuhobu amine ganalukahihi, au Kamaku fa'ina ganagahe-mo'emi.
Ada medema tovai-nadi Kamaku againe aku eganeya wanave'o'ola, ada keke ganagahe vaita omi fa'imiya Bana againe Iya ganave'o'ola. Au taumiyao wanave'o'ola-mo'a.

Keke omi fa'imiya ganave'o'ola, fa'ina Kamaku Tauna nuwanuwana omi'iyao. Omi nuwanuwami Iya'eku, kadu yaku gahe wavetumaganena gagayo, Yaubada againe gatauya be gahobu'ela. Hidema fa'ina Kamaku nuwanuwana omi'iyao.
E, Kamaku againe gatauya be babiya gahobu'ela. Au tova adamoya babi gananuyabuyabuna be Kamaku againe ganayewaku.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahema.
Tu ime ana tomuliya agahena agayo, “Ehe, adamoya keke gahetalahobuhobu amine udalukahihi, au ime agaimeya ugahe-mo'a be ahalamanena.

Kadu adamoya ahalamanena gaitoma moya'aina O uhalamane-'owona, ada keke vaita tamo hakwadi O againiya anafaiweya gidatoliluvaluva-yo yana nuwanuwa unahalamanena, fa'ina kaliva yama nuwanuwa uhalamane-mo'ena. Hidema fa'ina avetumagane, Yaubada againe velemo'ena utauya be uhobu'ela.” Hidemi agahe.
Au Yesu gigahema gigayo, “Ka'i hida au velemona adamoya againe wavetumaganeku?

Tu aituha gi'ela'ela, ka'i ahe gilakayemu be wana'oseku-yo kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana wana'abinauna yami manuweya, ada keke tamo hakwadi Iya buye anamiya. Tu keke velemona akukaibe, fa'ina Kamaku Iya agaikuya gimimiyami.
Tu Yesu ime ana tomuliya agaimeya gilukahihi gihavaina, lobameya gi'itavedadaga givebutu give'o'ola gigayo,
“Kamaku, yaku tova a gilakayemu. Iya O Natu aku egana unakilakahina be Iya O a egana ganakilakahina kaliva matadiya fa'ina.
Au abavehimeya kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya uveleku be yaku kaliva O uveleku-ma moya'aidi yawai-vagahidi ganaveledi fa'ina.

Yawai-vagahidi ana nuwanuwa gavaiya'amine? Badi O Yaubada velemo'ena akaibe'u-mo'a ma hihalamane kadu Iya Yesu Keliso O u'iveniniseku-ma hihalamaneku. Au hidedemi hihalamanema fa'ina, ahe hivebutu himiyamiya-vagata.
Ada ya faisewa uveleku be babiya ganafaisewana-ma au gafaisewa-'owona fa'ina, ya kikaiwabu tomiyababi agaidiya ahe ga'ivemogatalina.

Kamaku, boi tuwai-lokalokana babi aimo keke kadabubuni ana toveya, Iya O'eni buye kamiyami ada Iya wakikaiwabuku. Au tova adamoya O unavehimeya be tuwaina Iya gakaiwabu-mo'a amine, meda adamoya mene umimiyami-ma againe ganakaiwabu-mo'a.
Tu badi tomiyababi uvenuwadadanedi be uveleku-ma ya nuwanuwa agaidiya ahe gahawavemogatalena. Nagona badi'iyao O ya kaliva tu Iya agaikuya uhawahegedi, ada O bona ahe hi'abina.
Ada tova adamoya ahe hihalamanena yaku gahe yaku gugai moya'aina inubana au O againiya.

Vehawala O uveleku-ma kadu badi gavehawaledi ada ase'asedi gi'onana. O againiya gatauya be gahobu'ela ma hihalamane-hagihagiyena, kadu Iya fa'ikuya higahe higayo, Wona velemona Bana Yaubada gi'iveninisena.
Au badi fa'idiya gave'o'ola. Keke tomiyababi moya'aidi fa'idiya gadave'o'ola, au badi gaveyao Iya agaikuya uhawahegedi-ma fa'idiya gave'o'ola, fa'ina badi'iyao ya kalivamomo.
Gaveyao moya'aidi yaku kalivamomo, medema kadu ya kalivamomo. Meda anafaiweya gaveyao moya'aidi ya kalivamomo, medema kadu badi yaku kalivamomo. Ada badi yaku kaiwabu hi'ivemogatalina.

Ada tova adamoya O againiya ganayewaku. Iya keke babiya ganamiyami tu badi babiya hinamiyami. Ho Kamaku mahamahali, a egana fifiwalana againe unayavayavadi, eganai-nadi uveleku amanadi. Ada egana sa'eyana, kadu yada nuwanuwa au sa'eyana. Badi yada kalivamomo unayavayavadi be ide nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe kamimiyami amine, kadu badi nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe buye hinamiyami.

Aimo badi buye amiyami ana toveya, mena a egana fifiwalana uveleku-ma againe gayavadi. Tova moya'aina galugolegoledi ada keke tamo hakwadi gidabwavi tu kaliva sa'eyanaga gibwavi, bana abaga koyona ana kaliva. Bana gibwavi higa vaita O bona eto'etoladina velemo'ena ginalakayemu fa'ina.

O bona badi agaidiya gahawavemogatalena, ada medema fa'ina badi tomiyababi O hikilowe-ma hivenibainedi. Iya keke tokilowa amine gadanuwanuwa, kadu anafaiweya yaku kaliva keke tokilowa amine hidanuwanuwa. Keke badi amine yaku kaliva hidanuwanuwa fa'ina, au yaku kaliva agaidiya hivenibaina.
Keke vaita gadave'o'ole be hida babi againe unavaihegedi, keke. Tu au gave'o'ole be kaliva koyona Setani againe unayavadi.
Iya keke tomiyababi O hikilowe-ma amine gadanuwanuwa, kadu anafaiweya yaku kaliva keke badi tokilowa amine hidanuwanuwa.
Nuwanuwa velemo'ena ase'asediya unafahana be mahamahalidiyao O fa'iniya unasevehailedi. O bona, medema nuwanuwa velemo'ena.
Tomiyababi agaidiya u'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela amine, meda anafaiweya tomiyababi agaidiya badi gana'iveninisedi be O bona hinalumamalena.
Ada badi fa'idiya Iya gahawahegeku O againiya be badi O againiya hinahawahegedi velemo'ena fa'ina.
Tu keke hida yaku kalivagaga fa'idiya gadave'o'ola, au kadu badi aimo yadi laumamala hinanogalina be hinavetumaganeku amanadi fa'idiya gave'o'ola.

Gave'o'ole be nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe hinamiyami. Kamaku, O Tauni nuwahinagekuya umimiyami, kadu Iya Tauku nuwahinageniya gamimiyami. Meda anafaiweya nuwanuwaku badi taudiyao nuwahinagedeya hinamiyami be tomiyababi moya'aidi hinagahe hinagayo, Wona velemona Yaubada gi'iveninisena be gihobu'ela.
Ada kikaiwabu uveleku-ma kadu badi gaveledi be ide nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe kamimiyami amine, meda anafaiweya badi nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe hinamiyami fa'ina.

E, Iya Tauku badi nuwahinagediya gamimiyami kadu O Tauni nuwahinagekuya umimiyami be higa yadi nuwanuwa leleleya-mo'a hinamiyami. Nuwanuwaku nuwanuwa leleleya-mo'a hinamiyami be hida iya'iyaya againe tomiyababi moya'aidi hinahalamanena O u'iveniniseku be gahobu'ela. Kadu hinahalamanena ya nuwanuwa Iya agaikuya usena amine, meda badi agaidiya ya nuwanuwa ahe usena.
Ho Kamaku yegayega, tomiyababi keke hidahalamane nonogana Iya gahalamane, kadu hida yaku kaliva O u'iveniniseku ma hihalamanena.

Ada O'eni badi agaidiya gahawavemogatale, kadu tova moya'aina ganahawahawavemogatale be ya nuwanuwa lakahina Iya agaikuya useusena-ma badi taudiyao nuwahinagediya hina'aya'ayaunena, kadu Iya Tauku nuwahinagediya ganamiyami fa'ina.”
Au hidedemi Yesu yana ve'o'ola Tamana againe.
Tu bana Yudasi Yesu gihawavemogatalena-ma, abagai-nadi gihalamanena, fa'ina medede againe tova moya'aina Yesu ime ana tomuliya buye avagavaga'auta.

Au abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao be tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Falisi, badi tolugaviya adi yo'o sa'eyana kadu tuilala tufoidi hi'iveninisedi be walamufadiyao wadakidiyao wagiyodiyao Yudasi gi'aliyedi ime Yesu buye amiyami-ma abagai-nadi againe.

Hiyemu tu Yudasi Yesu ana tohawavemogatala badi buye himidimidi. Au Yesu gaitoma moya'aina Bana againe ginalakayemu-ma gihalamanena fa'ina givaga'ela badi agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Hakwadi waleleleni?”
Badi higayo, “Yesu kwanaNasaledi.”
Bana Yesu gigayo, “Au Iya Kaliva-mo'eku.”
Ada Yesu Tauna gigahe Iya Kaliva-mo'eku againe, au hinuvagatugu yadi wamatauta babiya hibe'u.
Kadu gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Hakwadi waleleleni?”
Kadu badi higayo, “Yesu kwanaNasaledi.”
Yesu gigayo, “Ahe gagahemi Iya Kaliva-mo'eku. Ka'i Iya waleleleku digo, hida yaku kalivamomo ma waki'ilovedi be hinana.”
Hidedemi gigahe be bonana yana ve'o'ola Tamana againe ahe gigaheyena-ma velemo'ena gidalakayemu. Boi hidemi gigahe, “Uveleku kalivai-dina ma keke tamo gadanuhegeni-yo gidabwavi.”
Tu Saimoni-Fita yana feto giwahina-ma gisiwakana digo kaliva sa'eyana gilauna be tagana wa'i'atagine giluyo'ena. Bana kalivai-nadi abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana agetoga, ana egana Maleko.
Fita bana tagana giluyo'eni-yo Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Ya feto ana foseya useni. Makewa'e aulolo ana gowa Kamaku giveleku-ma ganayuyena, keke ganakiloweni.”

Tu Yesu gigahe-yo badi tolugaviya adi tonagona buye, kadu miYuda yadi tuilala au Yesu hikive'avina be hiyogo-yo Anasi againe himidinauwena, bana Kaiyafasi lawana ada medema malamalai-nadi againe bana Kaiyafasi abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu.
Kadu Kaiyafasi ma boi miYuda givehimeyedi gigayo, “Gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyanaga miYuda moya'aida fa'ideya gida'alika.”

Tu Saimoni-Fita Yesu gibwa'ulina kadu iya'eku buye, iya kadu Yesu ana tomuliya. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu gihalamane-hagihagiyeku, fa'ina yana manuwa ana eda'awaneya iya Yesu buye aluku tu bana Fita kabu'avane wana liline gimidimidi. Au iya gahobu agetoga kwamayoku wana gi'ita'itave'avina-ma againe gagahe ada wana giyauna be Fita giluku.
Tu tokaiwabu ana agetoga be badi tuilala ai hikulina kwadudu fa'ina, ada himidimidi tu ai hivevevala. Ma kadu bana Fita badi agaidiya gina gimidimidi tu ai givevevala.
Tu bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu Yesu gitoliluveluvena. Ime ana tomuliya fa'imeya kadu yana vehawala fa'ina gitoliluvaluva.

Bana Yesu gigayo, “Tova moya'aina kaliva moya'aidi matadiya gagahegahe. E, manuwa-abavehawala agaidiya be manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe miYuda moya'aida kavagavaga'auta-ma, gavehavehawala tova moya'aina. Keke tamo gavadi gadagahekauyeni.
Tu gavana fa'ina-yo Iya utoliluveluveku? Badi bonaku ahe hinogalina-ma unatoliluveluvedi. Gavaimi gagahegaheye ma hihalamanena.”
Hidemi gigahe tu tuilala sa'eyana liline gimidimidi-ma Yesu gilu'atugena gigayo, “Gavadi-yo tokaiwabu lakahina u'ihawadamane?”
Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i gagahe koyona digo, gavadi yaku koyona au unahawavemogatala kaliva matadiya. Tu ka'i gagahe yamumuna amine, gavadi-yo ulu'atugeku?”
Au Anasi Bana Yesu nimana aimo yogoyogonina Kaiyafasi againe gi'iveninisena, bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu.
Tu Saimoni-Fita gimidimidi tu ai givevevala. Badi kaliva buye himidimidi-ma higahena higayo, “O'eni kadu sa'eya ana tomuliya agaidiya, ka'i ayoma?” Tu kadu givekeke gigayo, “Iya keke.”
Kadu Fita givekeke-havagi. Tu auhe'ama kamukamu gikwage.

Tu miYuda Kaiyafasi yana manuweya hihobu be Yesu hinauwena kwanaLoma yama tovehimeya yana manuwa lakahina againe. Bana tovehimeya ana egana Failato. Aimo mala gilaulauna. MiYuda taudiyao manuwa lakahina againe keke hidaluku. Ka'i hidaluku digo, adi hawata hidayawelina vaita ase'asedi hidakivebwanenena. Ka'i hidayawelina digo, tafalolo lakahina a'ana keke adifaiweya hina'ani, tafalolo ana egana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya. Hidede amine yadi vehimeya gisena.
MiYuda adi hawata fa'ina Failato gihobu kabu'avane badi agaidiya be gigayo, “Hida kaliva gavaimi wahawavekoyoyeni?”
Badi higayo, “Ka'i hida kalivai-nadi keke tokoyona, kadu keke ada'aliye o againiya.”
Tu miYuda higayo, “Omi miLoma wahawatama fa'ina, keke amafaiweya anavehimeya be kaliva alika againe anahegeni tu nuwanuwama omi wanakivekelosena.”
Hidede amine hihuluva be gavaimi Yesu yana alika keloseya fa'ina boi gigaheyena, medema velemo'ena gidalakayemu.
Tu miYuda higahe-yo Failato giluku-havagi manuweya ada Yesu giyowanina be gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena O'eni miYuda adi tokaiwabu?”
Yesu gigayo, “Ka'i tauni ya nuwanuwa againe hidemi ugahe, o ka'i mali kaliva Iya fa'ikuya o againiya higahe ma unogalina fa'ina ugahe?”
Failato gigayo, “Ka'i o uvaita iya kwanamiYuda? Iya hima tuliku. O Tauni ya yo'o be kadu yami abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao iya agaikuya hi'aliye. Gavadi tamo koyona ufaisewani-yo?”

Yesu gigayo, “Iya'eku tokaiwabu tu keke hida babi againe gadavehimeya. Ka'i hida babi againe gadavehimeya digo, yaku yo'o boiyesedi hidalugaviya be keke miYuda hidakive'aviku fa'ina. Tu yaku abavehimeya inubana tulina.”

Yesu gigayo, “Ika, ugahe amine tokaiwabu Iya'eku. Nuwanuwa velemo'ena fa'ina kaliva agaidiya ga'awatalatalaina. Hidema fa'ina Iya gatubuga kadu hidema fa'ina gahobu'ela babiya. Gaveyao nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana kaliva, medema bonaku hivenogalena.”
Failato gigayo, “Nuwanuwa velemo'ena gava'adi?” Gigahe-yo gihobu-havagi kabu'avane miYuda agaidiya, ada gigahedi gigayo, “Keke tamo gavadi koyona Bana againe gadanuhagani.

Tu tafalolo lakahina ana egana Abamaduviviya ana toveya yami dewa sa'eyana amine ganahuluva. Kaliva sa'eyana yogoyogonina ganayauna be ginahobu. Ka'i nuwanuwami hida kaliva miYuda ami tokaiwabu ganayauna?”
Au badi miYuda hikovadona higayo, “Keke Bana'e. Ime nuwanuwama Balaba.” Tu Balaba bana tomunugakai'afu.
Tu Failato badi miYuda yadi nuwanuwa ginogalini-yo au givehimeya be tolugaviya bulava againe Yesu hilaulauna.
Kadu badau bulava hakahakaluluna againe hi'etowalini-yo u'une hisena, kaleko likelikena hive'osena, medema tokaiwabu ana vaigau.
Ada Bana againe hi'ela'ela hihawahawavelaiga higayo, “Siule, siule miYuda adi tokaiwabu.” Ada au wamagigine hilulu'atugena.

Kadu Failato gihobu-havagi yo'o gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ita, Bana gavedewayaugina tu we'a galele-wayoge, au hidedei ganavega'aulena omi matamiya be wanahalamanena keke tamo Bana againe gavadi koyona gadanuhagani.”
Au Yesu badau hakahakaluluna vaigau likelikena hive'osena-ma gihobu kabu'avane. Bana Failato gigahedi gigayo, “Wa'ita, hide'i kaliva-mo'ena.”
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao be tuilala hi'ita-yo au hivebutu hikovakova higayo, “Kelose againe wanatutuvefosena, au kelose againe wanatutuvefosena.”
Ma Failato gigahedi gigayo, “Taumiyao wananauwena be wanakivekelosena. Iya'eku ma keke tamo Bana againe gavadi koyona gadanuhagani.”
Tu Failato miYuda yadi gahe ginogalina againe, Yesu bonana fa'ina kadu gimatauta keke kabi'ona.
Au manuwa lakahina againe giluku-havagi Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “O gava kaliva?” Tu Yesu keke tamo bonalaufata gidagaheye.

Bonana keke gidafatani fa'ina, Failato gigahena gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina keke tamo agaikuya udagahe? Au unahalamanena iya ganavehimeya be hinayau, o ka'i iya ganavehimeya be kelose againe hinatutuvefose, au iya O yaku abavehimeya.”

Failato hida hifufu ginogali-yo gihobu kabu'avane abavedewayauga ana didiga'u'u againe gihiyoto tu Yesu giyowanina be gi'ela abagai-nadi againe. Ime miYuda bonameya abaga avewagana Gabata, au didiga yamumuna amine.

Tu medema aiyeta againe tafalolo lakahina fa'ina hikidewadewa, tafalolo ana egana Abamaduviviya. Mala ginalauna tova-mo'ena ginayemu. Tu kidewadewa ana tova kauwana getadeya Failato miYuda agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Wa'ita, hide'i ami tokaiwabu.”
Gigahe-yo hikovakova higayo, “Gida'alika, gida'alika, keloseya hidatutuvefosena.”
Failato gigahedi gigayo, “A! Ka'i nuwanuwami ganavehimeya be kelose againe hinatutuvefosena, Bana ami tokaiwabu?”
Amanadi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao hikova higayo, “Sisa anakaibe ama tokaiwabu.”
Failato agodi ginogali-yo Yesu badi agaidiya gihawahegena be tolugaviya kelose againe hinatutuvefosena.
Au tolugaviya Yesu hinauwena be kelose hive'avalana, hina abaga ana egana Utouto againe. Tu miYuda bonameya abaga ana egana Goligota.
Yuwadede againe hinauwena kelose againe hitutuvefosena, kadu kaliva-kawowo adi'iselu buye hitutuvefosedi, sa'eyana fafaline kadu sa'eyana fafaline tu Yesu hinafadiya.
Kadu valeyana Failato gi'etoladina, givehimeya be kelose tabone hisena. Gi'etoladi gigayo,
Etoladi-mo'ena au hidede amine.

Abagai-nadi Yesu hikivekelosena-ma au melala liline, fa'ina miYuda moya'aidi valeyana hihawana. Ada valeyana hi'etoladina bona tohiye againe, bona Hibeliu medema miYuda bonadi, bona Loma kadu bona Gilika.

Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao Failato againe higahe higayo, “Keke una'etoladini, miYuda adi tokaiwabu. Tu unagayo, hida kaliva gigahe vaita Bana miYuda adi tokaiwabu. Au hidede amine una'etoladi.”
Failato gigayo, “Auwe. A ga'etoladina au gimiya.”

Tu tolugaviya Yesu hikivekelosena amanadi adi yo'o fowa. Ada au kelose againe hitutuvefosena gihavaina, Yesu ana kaleko hivaina bo'u fowa hisena, tolugaviya sa'eyana sa'eyana bo'u sa'eyana sa'eyana. Kadu ana aikeva hivaina tu medema aikevai-nadi againe keke tamo ana havi, au tunugina hiyogona.

Hidema fa'ina tolugaviya hive'agahegahe higayo, “Keke abafolaka fa'ina kanahaini tu kabala kanahegelakahina iya'iyaya kanagaheyena be kanahalamanena hakwadi aikevai-nadi ginavaini.” Au hidedemi hihuluva be Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina velemo'ena ginalakayemu fa'ina gigayo,
Aku kaleko taudiyao agaidiya hifolakena,
aku aikeva fa'ina kabala hihegelakahina
iya'iyaya higaheyena be hakwadi hakwadi
hinavaina ma hinahalamanena.
Au tolugaviya hidede amine hihuluva.
Tu Yesu ana kelose liline vevine tufoidi himidimidi, hinana kadu hinana tobohiyadi, ada Meli Kelofasi vavinena kadu Meli vineMagidala, badi adivefowa himidimidi.

Kadu iya gamidiveda'ufo, iya Yesu ana tomuliya nuwanuwana lakahina iya'eku amanadi, ada Yesu hinana be iya'eku gi'itama againe, hinana agaidiya hidedemi gigahe gigayo, “Hinaku, adamoya bana Yoni wanahawavenatunena.”
Au iya agaikuya gigayo, “Adamoya hinaku unavehinanedi.” Ada au Yesu gimidi'alika tu muliya ganauwedi be yaku manuweya himiyami.
Tu oine golagolana wanau'ana gidauda. Au balou oine againe hilu'utuvina be gimaga, ai ana egana hisofa againe hikwanena be hitunena Bana awane.
Yesu oine giyuna gihavaina gigayo, “Yaku faisewa a galauyabu.” Gigahe-yo gi'odu, alu'aluwana Yaubada againe giveleyewena.
Au tolugaviya hina kaliva sa'eyana agena hidobona, kadu velugana agena hidobona, adi'iselu Yesu buye hikivekelosedi-ma kalivai-dina.
Tu Yesu againe hi'ela hida'itana ma ahe gi'alika, fa'ina Bana agena keke hidadoboni.
Tu tolugaviya sa'eyana bahimina giyo againe gi'onana ma auhe'ama dayagina gufagufa buye gimadutamo'ai.

Iya tauku ga'itana ada gaitoma gilakayemu-ma iya tauku galukahihiyena. Tauku ga'itana fa'ina yaku kahihi au velemo'ena, keke gadave'alololo. Ada au iya galukahihiyena be higa omi wanavetumagana fa'ina.
Ada tolugaviya hidede amine hihuluva be Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina velemo'ena ginalakayemu fa'ina. Bonai-nadi gigayo,
Bana luluna keke tamo hinadoboni.
Bana hi'onana-ma hina'itana.

Kadu Nikodimo Yosefa buye hina, ada bana Nikodimo vanedimodimo lakahina ana vita foti-faifi (45) kilo amine gi'aliyena, vane ana egana mulo be alo. Bana Nikodimo boi bogi sa'eyana gina Yesu buye hilukahihi-ma kalivai-nadi.
Ada au badi adi'iselu Yesu wowona hivaina, ada kaleko kwayakwayana againe vanedimodimo buye hifafana. To'alika ana aba'aihuya fa'ina miYuda yama dewa au hidede amine.
Tu abaga Yesu hikivekelosena-ma liline faha gidauda, kadu faha againe tomohuyahuya ivaguna gidauda, ada medede againe boi keke tamo to'alika hidahuyani.
Au medede againe Yesu hihuyana, fa'ina medema aiyeta againe tafalolo lakahina higa Abamaduviviya ana sabati fa'ina hikidewadewa, kadu tomohuyahuyai-nadi eda'ufoya fa'ina.
Tu sabati hihegena tafaloloya mala aimo keke gidalauni tu Meli vineMagidala gi'enohobu tomohuyehuyeya, ada kabala tomohuyahuya ana eda'awaneya tamo hakwadi give'awawana-ma gi'itana.

Au gimadu be gi'ela Saimoni-Fita be iya'eku agaimeya, iya tomuliyai-kuna Yesu nuwanuwana lakahina amanadi, ada gigahema gigayo, “Kauveya wowona tomohuyehuyeya hivaina be hinauwena tu hai hiseni ma keke gadahalamaneni.”
Gigahe-yo Fita iya'eku alowoga be ana tomohuyehuyeya.
Ama'iselu amadu tu iya gamaduga-mo'a be tomohuyehuyeya gamadu'ela.
E, gayemu ga'ibo'ula galukenala, kaleko kwayakwayana hifafana mededemagaga gidauda-ma ga'itana.

Tu Saimoni-Fita wai gimulina. Giyemu tomohuyehuyeya giluku au kaleko kwayakwayana gidauda-ma gi'itana, kadu kaleko Yesu u'una ana lifi gi'itana medema keke kaleko kwayakwayana buye se'eyaine gidadauda, au uwa'uwana tulina gidauda.
Tu iya'eku ma tomohuyehuyeya wai ganagona-ma au galuku ga'ita-yo nuwahinagekuya gavetumagana gagayo, “Wona velemona gimididi-havagi.”
Tu medema tovai-nadi Yaubada bonana higa Yesu yana mididi-havagi fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena hi'etoladina amanadi, aimo keke adahalamane-hagihagiyeni.
Ada au ama'iselu alowoga ana yama manuweya.

Tu Meli a giyewana tomohuyehuyeya, ada kabu'avane gimidimidi tu gitagitagi. Ada aimo gitagitagi tu gina gi'ibo'ula tomohuyehuyeya be gilukenala, au lobama ana tovenuwa'ata luhei gi'itadi adi vaigau kwayakwayana, ada Yesu wowona boi gidauda-ma againe hihiyoto. Sa'eyana Yesu wa'u'une gihiyoto, sa'eyana wa'agene gihiyoto.
Ada tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana Meli gigahena gigayo, “Kwamayoku, gavadi-yo utatagitagiya?”
Bana gigayo, “Yaku Kaiwabu wowona hinauwena tu hai hiseni ma keke gadahalamaneni.”
Tu Yesu gigayo, “Kwamayoku, gavana fa'ina utagitagiya? Hakwadi uleleleni?”
Au Meli gigayo, “Kauveya, ka'i yaku Kaiwabu wowona O unauwena, hai useni ma unahawavemogatalena be ganana ganavaina ada gananauwena.”
Au Yesu bana ana egana giyakahina gigayo, “Meli.”
Ada gihagavilana Hibeliu meyameya gigahena gigayo, “Laboni.” Hifufu ana kaivila ma “Aku Tovehawala.”
Au Meli vineMagidala gi'ela ime tomuliya agaimeya gigahe gigayo, “Kaiwabu a ga'itana.” Kadu Yesu yana gahe matatabuna gi'awatalatalainena ime agaimeya.

Tu medema aiyetai-nadi tafaloloya, ada mala a gibogi tu ime Yesu ana tomuliya avaga'auta be wana ahe a'aifalidona, miYuda yama tonagona amatausedi fa'ina. Amiyami tu auhe'ama Yesu gilu'afuneunena hinafameya gimidi gigahema gigayo, “Ase'asemi gina'ilova.”
Gigahe-yo nimana bahimina givehawalema. Au yama Kaiwabu a'itana fa'ina, vemwamwala givemagama.
Gigahe-yo yawaina giya'avedamana ime agaimeya au gigahema gigayo, “Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginaluku ase'asemiya.

Alu'aluwa Mahalina ase'asemiya ginamiyami amine, au ka'i gaveyao yadi koyona omi wanayawelina, au yadi koyona kadu Yaubada ginayawelina ginagayo, Keke adi vita. Kadu ka'i gaveyao yadi koyona keke wanayawelini, au yadi koyona kadu Yaubada keke ginayawelini, we'a adi vita.”

Au agahena agayo, “Kaiwabu ahe a'itana.” Tomasi gigayo, “Yana mididi-havagi fa'ina iya keke ganavetumagana tu nagona neli yana ki'ona gana'itana, kadu nimalagolagoku againe neli nigo'awa'ivina ganakidadanina, kadu giyo nigo'awa'ivina bahimina againe nimaku ginaluku, au muliya ganavetumagana.”
Ada aiyeta eita ahege tu kadu avaga'auta-havagi manuweya, au medema Tomasi buye amiyami. Kadu'e wana a'aifalidona tu Yesu gilu'afuneunena hinafameya gimidi gigayo, “Ase'asemi gina'ilova.”

Au Tomasi againe gigahe gigayo, “Neli nimakuya giluku-ma againe nimalagolago useni, nimaku u'ita kadu nima utune be giyo nigo'awa'ivina againe useni. Auwe amalakibo, tu unavetumaganeku Iya yawayawaku gamimiyami.”
Tomasi gigayo, “Yaku Kaiwabu kadu yaku Yaubada O'eni.”

Atu tufona ahe ga'etoladina be omi Yesu wanavetumaganena fa'ina, Bana'e velemona Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso kadu Bana'e Yaubada Natuna. Ka'i Yesu ana eganeya wanavetumagana, yawaimi ivaguna wanavaina.
Tu aiyeta gavaiyehi ahegedi tu tova sa'eyana ime tomuliya Galili tobuya amiyami tu Yesu agaimeya gilakayemuna-havagi, tobu kadu ana egana Taibiliya, ada yana ivemogatala hidede amine.

Ime Sebedi natuneyao ama'iselu amiyami, kadu Saimoni-Fita, Tomasi bana hivewagana Natuluga, Nataniyela bana kwanamiKena medema Galili ana fafali againe, kadu ana tomuliya adi'iselu, au ama yo'o seveni amine amiyami.
Tu bana Saimoni-Fita gigahema gigayo, “Iya ganana bayaumeya.” Ime agayo, “Ime buye kanana.” Au avevai. Ahobu wakeya ayage tu medema bogi-nadi keke tamo igana adave'onani.
Ada auwe mala gilaulauna Yesu avaleya gimidimidi tu ime afaniyena, keke adahalamaneni Bana Yesu.
Au gikovama gigayo, “Natukweyao, ka'i igana tufona wave'onadi?”
Ime agayo, “Anudadana-wayoga.”

Ada iya Yesu ana tomuliya nuwanuwana lakahina iya'eku amanadi, Fita againe gagahe gagayo, “Wadema yada Kaiwabu.” Bana Saimoni-Fita yaku gahe Kaiwabu fa'ine ginogalini-yo, au ana aikeva faisewa fa'ina givehalilina-ma gi'ose tu lehageya gi'auhifu wa'avaleya gikayolaka.
Tu ime'eyao ma waka againe a'ela'ela igana wa'alevatudi ataitaidi, avala eda'ufo fa'ina, ana lauva nimada ana wava wani hanaledi (100) amine.
Ada auwe avala avaina be ahobu, ai nolana a'itana igana wa'a'ana gitagotagova.
Yesu gigahema gigayo, “Igana adamoya wave'onadi-ma tamo wa'aliye.”

Au Saimoni-Fita gihobu wakeya gilaka alevatu wa'avaleya amine gilautaina, igana lakahidiyao himaga adi kilagalaga hanaledi fifiti teli (153), ada igana moya'ai-mo'edi nonogana alevatu keke hidakaninini.

Ada au Yesu gigahema gigayo, “Wa'ela be kanave'awaboge.” Tu keke tamo hakwadi agaimeya gidatoliluveluveni gidagayo, “O hakwa'adi?” Adagahe tu awowomumu fa'ina ave'amata. Tu ahalamanena Bana'e yama Kaiwabu.
Au Yesu ali'auya gina a'a givaina digo givelema, kadu igana anafaiweya.
Ada au Yaubada Yesu alikeya gisivemididini-yo Bana tova tohiye ime ana tomuliya agaimeya gilakayemu, ada hidema tovai-nadi yana ivemogatala anaveto.
Bana Fita gigayo, “Ika Kaiwabu, ide kavetobohiyana ma makewa O uhalamanena.”
Yesu gigayo, “Yaku sifi kabi'odiyao unave'adi.”
Bana gigayo, “Ika Kaiwabu, kavetobohiyana ma ahe uhalamanena.”
Yesu gigayo, “Yaku sifi una'itave'avidi.”
Kadu tova anaveto gigahe-havagilena gigayo, “Saimoni, o Yoni natuna, ka'i velemo'ena kavetobohiyana?”

Au Fita nuwana gikabubu, fa'ina Yesu gitoliluveluvena tohiye gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwa Iya'eku?” Ada gigahena gigayo, “Kaiwabu, gaitoma moya'aina uhalamane-'owona, kadu iya nuwanuwaku O'eni ma ahe uhalamanena.”
Yesu gigayo, “Yaku sifi unave'adi.

Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, boi o kabi'oniya tauni a gaiyona uhifona, kadu ha'againe nuwanuwa unana au una, tu aimo unavekauve'a ana toveya, nima unatunena mali kaliva a gaiyona ginavehifo ada keke nuwanuwa unana againe, mededei au ginanauwe.”

Hidedemi gigahe be higa ginahawavemogatala aimo kaliva Fita hinayogoni-yo hinaluve'alikana be kaliva bana againe Yaubada yana kikaiwabu hina'itadavadavana. Au kadu Yesu gigahena gigayo, “O unamuliyeku.”
Au iya gamuliyedi be Fita gi'itaku-yo Yesu againe gigahe gigayo, “Kaiwabu, hida kalivai-nadi gavaiyami?”
Yesu gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwaku bana ginamiyami tu Iya ganayewa'ela ana toveya digo, au ginamiyami tu bana o keke ya gaitoma. Au o'eni unamuliyeku.”

Yesu hidede amine gigahe fa'ina, tomuliyai-nadi vaita keke gina'alika ma valeyana give'aliyahega Yesu yana kalivamomo agaidiya. Tu Yesu keke gidagahe vaita bana keke gina'alika. Au gigayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwaku bana ginamiyami tu Iya ganahobu'ela-havagi ana toveya digo, au ginamiyami tu bana o keke ya gaitoma.” Au hidedemi gigahe.
Tu Yesu yana gugai kadu moya'aina moya'ai-mo'ena. Ka'i kaliva hina'etoladi-'owona digo, gavaita buki moya'ai-mo'ena againe babi ginamaga, keke anafata.

Yana faisewa ana abave'inuba againe gavebutu ga'etoladina, ada yana laka lobameya ana toveya Bana kahihina ganunauwena. Tu aimo keke gidalaka lobameya tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana kivetuvetunu againe badi kaliva yana kabu hivaini-yo hive'afositolo-ma vehimeya giveledi.

E, Bana gi'alika ada gimididi-havagi yo badi kalivai-dina agaidiya Tauna gi'i'ivemogatalina, ada Bana wayawaina velemo'ena ma giseyemaune-mo'ena be keke adifaiweya yana mididi-havagi fa'ina hinavenuwanauna. Au tova keke sa'eyadi Tauna gi'i'ivemogatalina be badi hi'ita'itana, ada Yaubada yana itave'avina fa'ina higa ide yana yo'ogaga givehivehimeyeda ma gilukahihiyedi. Ada hidede amine ginunauwena aiyeta foti (40) agaidiya.

Ada tova sa'eyana badi Bana buye aimo himiyami hi'au'a tu hida vehimeya giveledi gigayo, “Keke Yelusalema wananuyabuyabuni, au wanamiyami be abahawahega Kamaku giwonadabedabena-ma wanabodana, abahawahegai-nadi fa'ina Iya boi gavenuwa'atami be wanogalina, higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina.

Boi tuwaina bana Yoni gufa againe gikivebafitaisoyemi tu aiyeta keke moya'aina kanahegedi-yo Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe ginakivebafitaisoyemi higa alu'aluwami gina'utuvina.” Hidedemi Yesu gigahedi.

Tu badi afositolo Yesu buye hivaga'auta ana toveya, badi hitoliluveluvena higayo, “Kaiwabu, ka'i adamoya hida tovai-nadi miLoma yadi abavehimeya unayawelina be ide miIsileli kanafaiwala-havagi be yo'o moya'aidi kanavehimeyedi?”

Tu gaitoma sa'eyana amifaiweya wanahalamanena, higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginaluvaiyemi-yo yana faiwala againe ginavemagami be Iya fa'ikuya wana'awatalatalaina fa'ina. E, Yelusalema againe Iya fa'ikuya wana'awatalatalaina, kadu Yudiya ada Sameliya ana fafali agaidiya ada hida babi ana fafali moya'aina lauveya wana'awatalatalaineku.”
Ada hidedemi gigahe-yo Yaubada lobameya gisilakahina. Bana gilakalaka tu badi afositolo hilulauboda, ada au buhibuhi gisevauyena be keke adifaiweya hina'itani.
Bana gilakalaka ada badi lobameya aimo hi'ita'itadona tu auhe'ama kaliva adi'iselu adi vaigau ve'akinamanamalina gilu'afuneunedi be lilidiya himidi.

Ada higayo, “Omi miGalili, gavana fa'ina mededei wamidimidi tu lobameya wavedavedadaga? Bana hidevama Yesu Yaubada lobameya gisilakahina be ginuyabuyabumi amanadi, aimo tova mulina ginahobu'ela-havagi. E, Bana lobameya gilaka amine, kadu lobameya ginahobu'ela.”
Tu kaliva adi'iselu hidedemi higahe-yo badi afositolo oya Olive againe hitauya be Yelusalema againe hiyewadi, melalai-nadi ana lauva eda'ufo vaita kilomita sa'eyana amine.

Ada au Yelusalema againe hiyemu tu manuwa hinagene himiyami-ma hiluku ada yadi abamiyami manuwa getana againe hilaka. Ada badi himiyami-ma adi egana Fita Yoni Yemesa Anidulu, kadu Filifi ada Tomasi, kadu Batolomiu ada Madiu, kadu Yemesa bana Alifiyo natuna, Saimoni bana yo'o miLoma hivenibainedi-ma kalivana, ada Yudasi bana Yemesa natuna. Au afositolo adi yo'o hidede amine.
Ada tova moya'aina buye hivagavaga'auta, badi'iyao kadu vevine, ada Meli Yesu hinana kadu Yesu taineyao. Au moya'aidi se'eyaine hivagavaga'auta be hive'ove'o'ola.
Bana Yudasi ma boi ime afositolo yama yo'o kalivana, fa'ina Yesu bana ime buye hida faisewa fa'ina givegidema.” Hidedemi Fita givebutu gilukahihi.
Ada miYelusalema moya'aidi hida Yudasi valeyana hinogalina, ada hidema fa'ina yana babi taudiyao bonadiya hivewagana Akelidama. Egana ana kaivila ma babi dayadayagina.
Gilubodadi be kaliva moya'aidi yana manuwa hidanuyabuyabuna,
e keke tamo hakwadi medede againe gidavemanuwa.
Kadu Yaubada bonana sa'eyana gigayo,
Kadu tamo hakwadi velugana yana faisewa gidavaina.

Yaubada bonana hidedemi gigahe fa'ina, kaliva sa'eyana bana ana hilafa fa'ina adafaiweya kadavenuwadadanena, be Yesu Keliso yana mididi-havagi fa'ina bana ime afositolo buye kaliva agaidiya ana'awatalatalaina. Ada bana kalivai-nadi yada yo'o agaideya kanavaina. E, tamo hakwadi ide boi kavebutu Kaiwabu Yesu buye kamiyami kanunudadana tuwaina Yoni gilumamala be kaliva gikivebafitaisoyedi ana toveya ada kanunauwena Yaubada Yesu lobameya gisilakahina be ginuyabuyabuda, au medema Yudasi ana hilafa kanasena.”
Tu Fita hidedemi gigahe fa'ina, kaliva luhei adi egana hiyakahina. Sa'eyana ma Yosefa kadu hivewagana Basabasi, ada ana egana anaveto Yasito. Kadu kaliva anavelu ma Mataiyasi.

Adi egana hiyakahini tu hive'o'ola higayo, “Kaiwabu-yo, kaliva moya'aima ase'asema uhalamanena fa'ina O unavehawalema. Hida kaliva adi'iselu amanadi hadema O uvenuwadadanedi be afositolo yadi faisewa gina'abina, higa faisewai-nadi Yudasi gidibutoyogena be koyona ana laufata ana abageya gina.”

Hive'o'ola gihavaina, kaliva adi'iselu adi egana kabala kabi'ona againe hi'etoladina be gowa againe hidodona, ada au hibihiwana againe Mataiyasi ana egana gimidibe'u, fa'ina afositolo adive'ileveni agaidiya giluku.
Ahe hivaga'auta tu auhe'ama butuna lobameya hinogalina, ana nogala vaita bolimanakouko gidamadumadu, ada manuwai-nadi againe hivetogadi-ma butuna gilelevilana.
Butuna hinogalini-yo iya'iyaya hi'itana, ana ita ma vaita ai noya'aina amine, ada gi'alavedavedama be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana getadiya gina gihiyoto.
Au Alu'aluwa Mahalina moya'aidi nuwahinagediya giluku be givemagadi, ada hivebutu meya tulina tulina agaidiya hilulukahihi Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alaveleveledi amine.
Tu mededei Yelusalema againe miYuda tufoidiyao himiyami, boi fafali moya'aina agaidiya hitauya be hina Yelusalema himiyami, ada badi Yaubada hihawadavadavana velemo'ena.

Ada au badi kalivai-dina kaliva yadi lukahihi meya tulina tulina ma butuna hinogalini-yo, au moya'aidi hiyo'o ada ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana, fa'ina taudiyao bonadi tulina tulina badi tovetumagana hilulukahihiyena amanadi hinogalina.

Au nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya kadu hiyaulowoga, ada buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Badi hidevama kalivai-dina meya tulina tulina agaidiya hilulukahihi-ma au badi moya'aidi miGalili, keke fafali tulina tulina kalivadi.
Bona Galiligaga hihalamanena nonogana gavadi-yo moya'aida kanogalina taudeyao bonada tulina tulina agaidiya hilulukahihi?
Ide yada fafali ma Fadiya Midiya Elamu kadu Mesofotemiya, Yudiya Kafadosiya ada Fonitasi be Esiya.
Kadu tufoida miFilidiya miFamifiliya miIdifita ada tufoida Libiya ana fafali melala ana egana Sailini liline katauya. Kadu tufoida miLoma tu Yelusalema againe kawakawaka.

Ada higa tufoida miYuda-mo'a, kadu tufoida yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dana tu miYuda yadi tafalolo againe kahawahegeda be kavemiYuda. E, kadu tufoida miKelita ada miAlebiya. Au yada fafali moya'aina tu Yaubada yana gugai fifiwalana taudeyao bonada tulina tulina agaidiya badi hilulukahihiyena-ma ide kanogalina.”
Ada hidedemi moya'aidi hiyaulowoga kadu nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya fa'ina buye hive'atoliluvaluva higayo, “Taumadi! Hida gavana ana inuba?”
Tu tufoidi tovetumagana hihawavelaigedi higayo, “Hida kaliva gufa koyona hiyuni-yo u'udi gikoyo.”

Tu bana Fita badi afositolo ileveni buye himiyami amanadi gitowamidi givebutu yo'o agaidiya gilumamala agona lakahina gigayo, “Omi miYelusalema kadu ide miYuda moya'aimiyao ganakivetuvetunumi be wananogali-hagihagiyena.

Ime kaliva keke gufa koyona againe u'uma gidakoyo omi wanuwanuwa amine. Ide yada dewa ma kaliva gufa koyona keke malalaugeya hidayuyu, au lavilaviya hiyuyu be u'udi gikoyokoyo. Ada adamoya kauwana ana ita bai naeni amine fa'ina u'uma keke gufa koyona againe gidakoyo, keke.
Au hidevama wanogalina-ma Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Yoweli boi tuwai-mo'ena gilukahihiyena gigayo,
Yaubada hidede amine gigahe gigayo,
Tomiyababi moya'aidi Alu'aluwakuya ganavemaga-mo'edi.
Natumiyao kaliva vevine yaku venuwa'ata
ganahawaveleveledi-yo hina'awatalatalainena.
Yami tubulakata yaku nuwanuwa hina'eno'itayena
kadu kaliva lakahidiyao yaku vehimeya hina'avayaunena.
E, mena aituheya kadu aku agetoga
kaliva be vevine Alu'aluwakuya ganavemaga-mo'edi.
Abaveyaulowoga wese lobameya ganafaisewana,
kauwana ginakweu vaikohi ginavedayaga.
Iya'iyaya gava babiya ganaseyemaunena,
dayaga ai'ala'alata siyo luvilovilona.
tu muliya Kaiwabu yana tova ginalakayemu,
higa vedewayauga ana tova matamatauhina.
Tu gaveyao moya'aidi Kaiwabu againe hinakova,
medema adi kibababala hinanuhagana.”
Au hida Yaubada yana gahe bana Yoweli gi'etoladina-ma bana Fita giyakahina.

Au hida kalivai-nadi waluve'alikana, fa'ina kaliva koyodiyao nimadiya wahegenauwena be kelose againe hitutuvefosena. Au hidedemi omi wahuluva tu boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Tauna givehimeya be Yesu omi nimamiya gihawahegena ada wanaluve'alikana fa'ina. E, hidedemi Yaubada givehimeye-vagahina, kadu tuwai-mo'ena vehimeyai-nadi aimo keke wadafaisewani-ma au gihalamane-vagahina.
Omi waluve'alikana tu Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina. E, alika ana bulava aulo'aulolona giyogona tu Yaubada giyauna, fa'ina alika yana faiwala giyawelina be keke anafaiweya ginakive'avi-vagahini.
Alika Yesu keke anafaiweya ginakive'avi-vagahini fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Devida Yesu yana gahe gigaheye-vagahina vaita Yaubada fa'ine gidalukahihi gidagayo,
Iya gahalamanena tova moya'aina
Kaiwabu agaikuya ginamiyami.
Bana'e lilikuya gimimiyami fa'ina,
ase'aseku keke gina'akolukoluni.
Hidema fa'ina nuwaku giyamumu,
kadu yaku wavemwamwala galulukahihi.
Aimo wowoku lahiya ginadauda
tu yaku walulauboda ganamiyami,
fa'ina a gahalamanena alu'aluwaku
keke to'alika yadi abageya unahege-vagahini.
E, Iya ya Kaliva Mahamahaliku
keke-mo'a wowoku unahawahegeni-yo
babiya gina'alilini.
Yawai-vagata ana eda ahe uvehawaleku.
Iya o buye kanamiyami fa'ina,
ganavemwamwala, ganavemwamwala-mo'a.
Au hidedemi Devida Yesu fa'ine gigaheye-vagahina.

Tu yana gahe gayakahina-ma keke tauna fa'ina, au aimo gavadi ginalakayemu fa'ina gigaheye-vagahina, ada Yaubada gavaimi bana againe giwonadabadaba-ma ahe gihalamanena, higa bwanenena sa'eyana tokaiwabu lakahina bana Devida amine ginasena.

Ada gavadi Yaubada ginagani-ma Devida gi'ita-vagahina, ada au Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso yana mididi-havagi fa'ina gigaheye-vagahina, gahe-nadi iya gayakahina amanadi higa Yaubada to'alika yadi abageya keke gidahege-vagahini, kadu wowona keke gida'alilini.
Hidedemi Devida gigahe ada Yaubada hida kaliva Yesu makewa alikeya gisivemididina, ada ime moya'aimeyao to'ita, au yana mididi-havagi fa'ina a'awatalatalaina.

E, Yaubada gisivemididina be i'atagine gisena. Kadu Tamana Alu'aluwa Mahalina givelena boi giwonadabadaba amine. Ada adamoya Yesu Alu'aluwa Mahalina ime agaimeya gi'iveninisena be givemagama, fa'ina meya tulina tulina agaidiya alulukahihi be omi wa'itana kadu wanogalina.
Bana Yaubada Kaiwabu iya yaku Kaiwabu gigahena
gigayo, I'atagikuya unahiyoto. Unamiyami tu
nibaimomo ageyafayafaniya ganasedi.
Au hidedemi Devida gigahe vaita Yaubada Kaiwabu Yesu againe gidalukahihi.
Au ide miIsileli moya'aimiyao wanahalamane-hagihagiyena. Bana hidevama Yesu omi kelose againe watutuvefosena tu Yaubada gisena Kaiwabu kadu yana Tovegida Keliso.” Au hidedemi Fita gilumamala.

Fita gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva moya'aimi sa'eya sa'eya yami dewa koyona wanahegena be wanahagavilami, ada Yesu Keliso ana eganeya wanabafitaiso be Yaubada yami koyona ginayawelina fa'ina. Ada au Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina omi agaimiya ginahawahegena be ginavemagami.

Fa'ina Yaubada boi giwonadabadaba be Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginahawahegena omi agaimiya, kadu ami unumamomo agaidiya, kadu moya'aidi lauveya himimiyami-ma agaidiya. E, Yaubada yada Kaiwabu gaveyao moya'aidi ginakovadi be Bana againe hina'ela, medema agaidiya ginahawahegena.”

Au hidedemi Fita gikivetuvetunudi kadu hifufu keke sa'eyadi againe gigaheya'aya'alidi be higa taudiyao hinalugolegoledi. Gigahedi gigayo, “Taumiyao wanalugolegolemi be hida yo'o koyodiyao Yesu hiluve'alikana-ma yadi koyona ana laufata omi keke buye wananuhagani.” Hidedemi Fita gigahe-fa'ilidi.
Ada au tufoidi moya'aidi yana gahe hivetumaganena ada hibafitaiso. Ada medema aiyetai-nadi kaliva moya'ai-mo'edi adi kilagalaga tohiye tausani (3,000) tovetumagana yadi yo'o agaidiya hiluku.

Tu badi tovetumagana hihawahegedi be tova moya'aina badi afositolo yadi vehawala hinoganogalina, kadu yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana buye himiyami hilulukahihi. Kadu hivagavaga'auta be buye hi'au'a, a'a oine higa Yesu ana anuwa'udu'udu hivaivaina, kadu buye hive'ove'o'ola. Tova moya'aina yadi miyami kadu yadi dewa au hidede amine.
Kadu'e, tova moya'aina afositolo aituha fifiwalana ada abaveyaulowoga hififaisewana fa'ina moya'aidi hiwowomumuyedi.
Kadu tovetumagana moya'aidi buye himiyami yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana, ada yadi lokoloko taudiyao agaidiya hifolafolakena.
Higa yadi babi ada yadi lokoloko tova tova hikimokimonevedamanena be gaveyao adiga o ka'i yadi lokoloko keke amanadi, badi agaidiya mani hivaivaina-ma hivetavetalaiyena.

Kadu aiyeta moya'aina manuwa tafalolo lakahina againe se'eyaine hivavaga'auta, kadu taudiyao yadi manuweya buye hi'au'a be a'a hikikihinena Yesu ana anuwa'udu'udu fa'ina. E, yadi wavemwamwala kadu yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana buye hi'au'a.
Ada au tova moya'aina Yaubada hihawahawadavadavana, kadu kaliva moya'aidi hive'amohimohinedi. Ada tova sa'eyana sa'eyana Kaiwabu kaliva gikikibababaledi be tovetumagana yadi yo'o give'atutamo'aidi.
Tova sa'eyana Fita be Yoni manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe hina, ada kauwana giwahivekenana ana ita bai tohiye amine higa ve'o'ola ana tova.

Ada badi hiyemuyemu tu kaliva sa'eyana yana tubuga againe givefela-ma manuwa-tafalolo ana abaluku againe hiwahiwahina, abaluku-nadi ana egana Abaluku Vewaga. Ada aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana tovefela hiwahiwahina, ada hidede againe hisesehobuyena be badi manuwa-tafalolo ana toluku agaidiya mani fa'ina give'ove'o'ola.
Ada Fita be Yoni hidaluku ma gi'itadi, ada badi agaidiya mani fa'ina give'o'ola.
Tu Fita kadu Yoni buye'i hi'itakwanekwanena. Au Fita gigahena gigayo, “U'itama-yo.”
Fita gigahe-yo kaliva badi agaidiya gi'italele tu ginuwanuwa vaita tamo gavadi hidaveleni.
Au nimana i'atagine gi'abina be gisilakahina, ada auhe'ama kaliva agena kadu agemata'ihina gifaiwala.
Au gimadutowamidi ada givebutu ginunudadana. Au badi buye manuwa-tafalolo againe hiluku tu bana ginunudadana gihegehegelakalakahina, Yaubada gihawahawadavadavana.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi bana ginunudadana tu Yaubada againe givesivesiule-ma hi'itana.
Au hiyakovina higa bana tova moya'aina manuwa-tafalolo ana Abaluku Vewaga againe gihiyoto be mani fa'ina give'ove'o'ola, ada au moya'aidi ase'asedi gi'alilihiwana ada yana yamumu fa'ina hiyaulowoga.

Tu manuwa-tafalolo againe abamiyami sa'eyana eda'awaneya gidauda, ana egana Solomoni yana Abamiyami, ada medede againe Fita Yoni himiyami kaliva giyamumu-ma buye'i. Bana nimadi gi'abi'abina tu kaliva moya'aidi yadi wayaulowoga badi agaidiya himadu.

Bana Fita gi'itadi-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Omi ide miIsileli, gavana fa'ina hidevama giveyaulowogimi? Gavadi-yo wa'itakwanekwanema vaita taumeyao yama faiwala o ka'i yama tafalolo toyogina fa'ina hida kaliva adasiveyawani be gidanunaudadana? Keke hidedemi wananuwanuwa.

Au bwanenedeyao yadi Yaubada, badi Abelahamo Aisake Yakobu yadi Yaubada yana kikaiwabu lakahina yana Tofaisewa Yesu givelena. Tuwaina Bana'e Failato againe wahegenauwena be alikeya ginahegena. Bana Failato nuwanuwana ginayauna tu omi bana matane wakilowena.
Au omi Kaliva Mahamahalina kadu Yegayegana wakilowena tu wave'o'olena toyogina be toluve'alika ginayauna.
Ada hidedemi yawaida inubana waluve'alikana tu Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina, au yana mididi-havagi ime ana to'ita.

Ada au Yesu ana egana fa'ina, higa Bana ana eganeya avetumagana fa'ina, hida kaliva gifaiwala ada omi wa'itana kadu wahalamanena. E, yana yamumu moya'aimi matamiya inubana ma vetumagana Yesu ana eganeya.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada badi bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi awadiya gigaheye-vagahina vaita yana Tovegida Keliso aulolo tagiya gidanuhagana. Ada Bana givehimeyena amine, a gilakayemu.
Au yami dewa koyona wanahegena be Yaubada againe wanahagavilami be yami koyona ginayawelina fa'ina.

E, wananuwavilana be kaliva gufaleda againe meyana gi'ivebikana amine, Yaubada Tauna ase'asemi gina'ivebikana be faiwala wananuhagana, kadu Yesu Keliso gina'iveninisena be ginahobu'ela-havagi, Bana ahe givegidena be omi ginanagoyemi fa'ina.

Ada Yaubada boi tuwai-mo'ena bonana ana to'awatalatalaina mahamahalidiyao awadiya gigaheye-vagahina amine, aimo tova mulina gaitoma moya'aidi babiya ginaluve'ivagudi, ada hida tovai-nadi fa'ina Bana Yesu lobameya gibodaboda. Tovai-nadi ginalakayemu, au ginahobu'ela-havagi.
E, to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana Mosese boi tuwai-mo'ena gigahe gigayo,

Yaubada yami Kaiwabu aimo tova mulina bonana ana to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana omi yami yo'o hinafamiya ginakivemididina. Iya gakivetuvetunumi amine, kadu bana ginakivetuvetunumi. Ada au gaitoma moya'aina ginavehimeyemi-ma wanadibumuhigena. Hai kaliva bana yana vehimeya keke ginadibumuhigeni, medema Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya ginalu'atugena be ginaluyaweyawelina.
Hidedemi Mosese gigahe.

Kadu anafaiweya Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi gavadi tova adamoya ginalakayemu-ma tuwai-mo'ena higaheye-vagahina. E, gaveyao Yaubada yana venuwa'ata giveledi, medema tova adamoya fa'ina higaheye-vagahina. Bana to'awatalatalaina Samuwela hidedemi gigaheye-vagahina, kadu anafaiweya to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi wai himulina amanadi tova adamoya fa'ina higaheye-vagahina.

Au Yaubada yana to'awatalatalaina awadiya omi fa'imiya giwonadabadaba, ada Yaubada boi tuwaina bwanenemiyao agaidiya yana veyao gisena-ma kadu omi fa'imiya gisena. E, Abelahamo againe gigahe gigayo, ‘A unumamomo agaidiya tonuwakabubu ginatubuyemu be fafali tulina tulina adi yo'o moya'aidi ginanuwakabubuyedi.’ Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe.

Ada au Yaubada yana Tofaisewa Yesu gisivemididini-yo omi agaimiya gimidi'iveninisena be ginanuwakabubuyemi. Bana'e omi moya'aimiyao ase'asemi ginakiviviyena be eda koyona wanahegena fa'ina. Au hidedemi ginanuwakabubuyemi.”
Tu Fita Yoni yo'o agaidiya aimo hilulukahihi tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kadu tuilala adi tonagona, kadu tonagona tafatafalolodiyao adi egana Sadusi, badi agaidiya hiyemu.

Badi afositolo adi'iselu yo'o hivehavehawaledi be higa hinahalamanena Yesu alikeya gimididi-havagi. Kadu higahegahedi vaita Yesu gimididi-havagi fa'ina kadu kaliva velugadeyao kanamididi-havagi. Hidedemi hivehawala fa'ina, badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa ahenao buye hi'ila'a.
Au Fita Yoni hikive'avidi tu mala a gibogibogi fa'ina, deliya hisedi be mala ginalauni-yo hinavekotudi.
Tu moya'aidi yo'o agaidiya yadi laumamala hivetumaganena, ada tovetumagana yadi yo'o himoya'ai, adi kilagalaga faifi tausani (5,000) amine.
Bogi hida mala gilauna miYuda yadi tovehimeya ada kaliva lakahidiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala Yelusalema againe hivaga'auta.
Bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana egana Anasi buye hivevai, kadu Kaiyafasi, Yoni, Alekisanida, kadu tokaiwabu-nadi ana yo'o kalivai-dina velugadiyao buye'i.

Au hivehimeya be afositolo adi'iselu badi matadiya hinamidi. Hi'ela-yo hitoliluveluvedi higayo, “Omi ami'iselu ma hakwadi yana faiwala againe hidevama wafaisewani? Hakwadi ana egana wayakahini-yo kaliva wasiveyawani?”
Hidedemi higahedi tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina Fita givemagana ada au givebutu gilumamaledi gigayo, “Omi yada yo'o adi tovehimeya kadu kaliva lakahimiyao.
Adamoya ime tovefela avelugana nonogana wavedewayaugima. Gavaiya'amine giyamumu-ma watoliluveluvema.

Au moya'aimiyao kadu miIsileli moya'aidi ganakivetuvetunumi be wanahalamanena. Bana Yesu Keliso kwanaNasaledi ana egana fifiwala-mo'ena fa'ina hida kaliva ahe giyamumu be omi matamiya gimidimidi. Bana Yesu omi wakivekelosena tu Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina.
Bana fa'ine gahetalahobuhobu sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Ogola omi manuwa ana to'aiyogona wakilowena
medema giveholili'abi.

Tu badi miYuda yadi Koniselo Fita Yoni yadi asevatu hi'itana againe, nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya, kadu badi afositolo kaliva-kawowo keke hidasikulu-ma hi'ayaunedi againe, nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya. Ada au badi boi Yesu hiveve'alunena ma nuwadi gi'afolena.
Tu kaliva a giyamumu-ma medede againe Fita Yoni buye himidimidi. Koniselo kaliva a giyamumu-ma hi'ita'itana fa'ina keke adifaiweya tamo gavadi hinagaheyeni.

Au hivehimeyedi be abavedewayauga againe hinahobu. Badi kaliva hihobu-yo badi Koniselo hivebutu hive'anuwanuwa kadu hive'agehegahe higayo, “Hida kaliva fa'idiya gavaimi kanaga? Kaliva moya'aidi Yelusalema againe hida aituha fifiwala-mo'ena hifaisewana-ma hihalamanena, ada ide keke adafaiweya kanagahe kanagayo, Badi keke hidasiveyawani.

Tu hida kalivai-dina kadahawatadi kadagayo, Keke tamo hakwadi velugana againe Yesu ana egana fa'ina wanagaheni. E, keke tamo tova hidede amine wanahuluva-havagi. Hidedemi kadahawatadi be kadu keke Yesu valeyana ginanauna kaliva agaidiya fa'ina.”
Tu hive'agahegahe gihavaina, kaliva hikovadi be hinaluku-havagi. Hiluku-yo hivehimeyedi higayo, “Keke-mo'a Yesu ana eganeya wanalulaumamala. Keke tamo tova Bana ana egana fa'ina wanavehawala.”
Hidedemi hivehimeyedi tu badi Fita Yoni higahedi higayo, “Omi taumiyao wananuwanuwa. Hadema hagihagina Yaubada matane, ka'i omi bonami ana'abina o ka'i Yaubada bonana ana'abina?
Tu ime keke amafaiweya ana'ilova. Au tova moya'aina gaitoma fifiwalana taumeyao a'itana kadu anogalina-ma analulukahihiyena.”

Hidedemi Fita Yoni higahe tu badi Koniselo kadu hihawatadonedi ada hihawahegedi be hina. Gavaiya'amine matahiwadi hinaveledi ma hinuwenuwe-wayoge. Keke adifaiweya, yo'o himatausedi fa'ina. Au tovefela giyamumu fa'ina, kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada hihawahawadavadavana.
Tovefela aituha fifiwalana againe yana yamumu givaina-ma bana kaliva lakahina, ana malamala foti (40) kadu gavaiyehi.
Tu Fita Yoni Koniselo hihegedi tu yadi yo'o agaidiya hiyewadi, ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao gavaimi higahe ma hilukahihiyena.

Ada badi tovetumagana hinogali-yo au moya'aidi Yaubada againe tamotamo'aine hive'o'ola higayo, “Kaiwabu lakahi, O'eni To'aibubuna, lobama babi lehaga O ububuna, kadu gaitoma moya'aidi lobameya babiya lehageya himimiyami-ma O ububudi.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Alu'aluwa Mahalina O bona bwanenema lakahina Devida awane gise-vagahina, ada au ya tofaisewa Devida gigahe gigayo,
Gavadi-yo yo'o tulidiyao himidi-yo hi'ila'a?
Gavai'ona-yo manuwafo koyona hivevaiye-wayoge?
Babi ana kini moya'aidi hikidewadewa
ada tovehimeya buye hivaga'auta be
Kaiwabu kadu yana Tovegida hinalugaviyadi.
Hidedemi tuwai-mo'ena Alu'aluwa Mahalina Devida awane gigaheye-vagahina.

Au tovehimeya yadi nuwakoyo fa'ina tuwaina gigahe amine tova adamoya velemo'ena gilakayemu, fa'ina badi kini Helodi kadu Fonitiyo-Failato badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina kadu miIsileli buye hivaga'auta, ada hivevai be Yesu hinaluve'alikana, Bana'e ya Tofaisewa Mahamahalina O uvegidena be ime miIsileli ginanagoyema amanadi.
O Tofaiwala kadu O Tovehimeya fa'ina gavaimi tuwai-mo'ena ya Tofaisewa Yesu fa'ine O uvehimeyena be ginalakayemu, au hidedemi badi higugaiyena be ahe velemo'ena gilakayemu.
Ime analulumamala tu O nima utune be to'aulolo hinayamumu, ada abaveyaulowoga kadu aituha fifiwalana ya Tofaisewa Mahamahalina Yesu ana eganeya anafaisewana.” Hidedemi hive'o'ola.
Badi afositolo hifaiwala be Kaiwabu Yesu yana mididi-havagi fa'ina hi'awatalatalaina toyogina, ada Yaubada moya'aidi ginuwakabubuyedi lakahina.

Keke tamo hakwadi koyokoyo badi agaidiya gidamiyami. Tova be tova badi tonibabi o ka'i tonimanuwa medema yadi babi o ka'i yadi manuwa hikimokimonevedamanena, ada mani hivaivaina-ma afositolo agaidiya hi'ali'aliyena. Ada badi afositolo mani-nadi hifolafolakena. Gaveyao adiga o ka'i yadi lokoloko keke, medema agaidiya hifolafolakena.
Bana Banabasi yana babi sa'eyana gikimonevedamanena, ada babi fatana gi'aliyena be afositolo giveledi.
Tu kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami ana egana Ananaiyasi ada vavinena adi egana Safaila. Bana'e yadi babi sa'eyana gikimonevedamanena.
Ada babi fatana tufona tauna fa'ine gisena kadu tufona afositolo agaidiya gi'aliyeni tu gigahedi vaita mani matatabuna gida'aliyeni. Tu tufona ginuwalolonena ma badi vavinena hihalamanena.

Aimo babi keke udakimonevedamaneni againe, medema tauni ya babi, tu ahe ukimonevedamanena againe, babi fatana uvaina-ma kadu o uvehimeyena. Gavana fa'ina nuwahinageniya fwaya ufaisewani-yo ugahe vaita mani matatabuna udavele-'owoma? Keke kalivagaga agaimeya udafwaya, au kadu Yaubada againe ufwaya.”

Tu Ananaiyasi Fita yana gahe ginogalini-yo babiya auhe'ama gibe'u be gi'alika. Au tubulakata hitowamidi, wowona hilifina digo hinauwena be hitauna. Ada gaveyao valeyana hinogalina medema himatauta-ve'ine.
Himiyami bai tohiye kadu vavinena hi'ela tu gavadi moganedi againe gilakayemu-ma keke hidahalamaneni.
Bana Fita gigahedi gigayo, “Wanavenuwa'ataku. Yami babi fatana ana tubuga ka'i hidede amine?” Ada badi higayo, “Ika, babi fatana medede amine.”

Au Fita gigahedi gigayo, “Gavana fa'ina omi'e kadu moganemi buye wanuwanuwa vaita Kaiwabu Alu'aluwana againe wanafwaya be wana'itana ka'i fwaya fatana wananuhagana o ka'i keke? Wa'ita, badi kaliva moganemi hitauna-ma eda'awaneya hiyemu, ada omi kadu hinanauwemi.”
Ada auhe'ama Fita agene hibe'u be hi'alika. Ada tubulakata hiluku be kwamayoku ahe hi'alika-ma hi'itadi, au hiwahidi be hinauwedi moganedi liline hitaudi.
Ada au tovetumagana moya'aidi himatautave'ine, ada gaveyao moya'aidi valeyadi hinogalina-ma kadu himatautave'ine.
Badi manuwafo hihawaveyamumuyedi ada badi keke hidavetumagana-ma himatauta be keke badi tovetumagana buye hidavaga'auta.
Himatauta tu tova tova kaliva vevine keke sa'eyadi Kaiwabu againe hivebutu hivetuvetumagana amanadi tovetumagana yadi yo'o agaidiya hiluku.

Ada afositolo yadi aituha fifiwalana fa'ina, kaliva yadi to'aulolo melaleya hisehobuyedi be vaya o sita againe hisedi. Hisehobuyedi be Fita ginabala againe, higa anununa to'aulolo tufoidi ginakibwa'edi be hinayamumu.
Kadu yo'o moya'aidi melala Yelusalema awa'awanina agaidiya hitauya, yadi to'aulolo kadu badi wayafunediyao hi'aliyedi. Ada moya'aidi hiyamumu-'owoga.
Ada au hitowamidi hina afositolo hikive'avidi be deli lakahina againe hisedi.

Deliya hisedi tu bogi nafone Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata deli ana wanafali giyauna be afositolo gisehobuyedi, ada gigahedi gigayo, “Wanana manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe wanamidi be hida eda ivaguna, higa yawai-vagata ana eda fa'ina kaliva agaidiya wanagaheye-'owona.”
Au tovenuwa'ata givehimeyedi amine hina, ada mala gilaulauni manuwa-tafalolo againe hiluku hivebutu hivehawala.

Tu bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ahenao badi miYuda yadi Koniselo hikovavaga'auhidi, be higa miYuda adi tonagona moya'aidi hivaga'auta-'owoga. Ahe hivaga'auta-yo yadi tuilala deliya hi'iveninisedi be afositolo hina'aliyedi.
