Tu yadi tuilala hiyemu againe, afositolo deliya hi'i'avadi, ada au Koniselo agaidiya hiyewadi ada hivenuwa'atadi higayo, “Deliya ayemu againe, wana hi'aifalidona-ma a'itana, kadu to'itave'avina abaluku againe hi'ita'ita. Tu wana ayauna againe, keke tamo hakwadi deli hinagene gidamiyami.”
Ada tuilala adi tonagona kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao tuilala yadi gahe hinogalini-yo nuwadi gifani, be hinuwanuwa vaita gavaimi gidalakayemu.
Hinuwanuwa tu kaliva sa'eyana gi'ela gigahedi gigayo, “Wanogali! Badi kaliva deliya wasedi-ma manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe himidimidi yo'o hivehavehawaledi.”
Au tuilala adi tonagona yana kalivamomo buye hina afositolo hivega'auledi tu keke hidamunudi, fa'ina himatauta ka'i yo'o kuga againe hinafihafihadi.
Hiyemu-yo afositolo hilukuwedi, Koniselo agaidiya hikivemidididi be abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ginavedewayaugidi.

Bana gigahedi gigayo, “Ime hawata lakahina agaimiya asena, higa hida kaliva ana eganeya keke-mo'a wanavehawala tu hida gavaimi waga? Au yami vehawala wanunauwena be gina Yelusalema giluyabuna. Ada nuwanuwami hida kaliva yana alika ana vita ime agaimeya wanasena.”
Tu Fita kadu afositolo velugadiyao higahedi higayo, “Ime keke kaliva bonana ana'abini, au nagona Yaubada bonana ana'abina. Hidedemi ama vehimeya.
Bana Yaubada, bwanenedeyao yadi Yaubada, Yesu alikeya gisivemididina, Bana omi ai againe watutuvefosena be hidedemi waluve'alikana.

E, Yaubada gisivemididina be i'atagine gikilakahina, ada Bana'e yada Tovehimeya Lakahina kadu ada Tokibababala gisena. Tokibababala gisena be Bana'e omi miIsileli ginavelugami be amifaiweya wananuwavilana, ada yami koyona ana aiyawela wananuhagana.

Ada ime hida gaitoma fa'ina a'awatalatalaina, ime'eyao kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina buye a'awatalatalaina, Bana'e ma badi gaveyao Yaubada bonana hi'abi'abina, medema agaidiya gihawahegena.” Hidedemi afositolo higahe.
Tu badi Koniselo hida gahe hinogalini-yo hi'ila'a-mo'a be nuwanuwadi afositolo hinaluve'alikadi.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana Koniselo agaidiya ana egana Gameliyela, badi Falisi yadi yo'o kalivana, Koniselo hinafadiya gitowamidi. Bana Gameliyela higa Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala, ada kaliva moya'aidi hive'amohimohinena. E, bana gitowamidi givehimeya be afositolo kabu'avane hinasehobuyedi.
Badi hihobu tu bana Koniselo agaidiya givebutu gilukahihi gigayo, “Omi ide miIsileli, hida kaliva fa'idiya wananuwanuwa-hagihagi. Ka'i wanaluve'alika-kawowodi digo, medema keke ginalubodani.

Malamala gavaiyehi kahegedi againe, kaliva sa'eyana gilakayemu, ana egana Tiudasi, ada gigahe vaita bana tonagona lakahina, ada kaliva adi yo'o fowa hanaledi (400) amine himuliyena. Tu muliya badi gaveyao hiluve'alikana, ada ana tomuliyamomo hi'abinauna be yana vehimeya gihavaina.

Kadu muliya kabemani adi eganayaudi ana toveya kaliva sa'eyana gilakayemu, ana egana Yudasi kwanaGalili, ada kadu kaliva moya'aidi ginuwa'abiyedi. Kadu meda anafaiweya badi gaveyao hiluve'alikana, ada ana tomuliyamomo hi'abinauna be gihavaina.

Ada adamoya kadu hida kalivai-dina fa'idiya ganagahe. Au wanaki'ilovedi be hinana. Bana Yesu medema yadi tonagona gi'alika-ma fa'ine hivehavehawala. Ka'i yadi vehawala yadi faisewa inubana kaliva agaidiya, au ginahavaina.
Tu ka'i inubana Yaubada againe, au keke amifaiweya wanahawatadi. Aimo wanahalamanena Yaubada againe walulugaviya.” Hidedemi Gameliyela gigahe be badi Koniselo bonana hivenogalena.
Au afositolo hikovadi be hiluku'ela, ada tuilala hivehimeyedi be hilaudi. Hilaudi gihavaina kadu hihawatadi higayo, “Au wanana tu keke-mo'a Yesu ana eganeya wanalaumamala-havagi.”

Ada au aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yesu Keliso fa'ine hilulumamala kadu hivehavehawala. Manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe kadu kaliva yadi manuweya hidedemi hinunauwena, keke hida'ilova.

Himiyami tu tova moya'aina Yesu ana tomuliya higa tovetumagana himoyamoya'ai. Himoya'ai tu vekwageya gilakayemu. Sikwasikwa adiga fa'ina hivekwageya. Badi miYuda tovetumagana bona Gilika againe hilulukahihi amanadi badi kadu tovetumagana bona Hibeliu againe hilulukahihi-ma hi'alawoluwoluyedi, higahegahe vaita malalauga sa'eyana sa'eyana a'a ana folaka againe badi bonadi Gilika ma yadi sikwasikwa kabi'ona amine hivaivaina, tu badi bonadi Hibeliu ma yadi sikwasikwa lakahina amine hivaivaina.

Hidedemi hi'alawoluwolu fa'ina afositolo adivetuwelo tovetumagana moya'aidi hikovavaga'auhidi ada higahedi higayo, “Ka'i ime a'a ana folaka ana'itave'avina be Yaubada bonana ana laumamala anahegena digo, medema keke gidalubodani.

Au tobohiyameyao kaliva adiveseveni wanavegidedi, valeyadi ma au hagihagina higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina givemagadi kadu tonuwahuya velemo'ena. E, wanavegidedi be hida abavehimeya a'a ana folaka anaveledi.
Tu ime'eyao ma ve'o'ola kadu laumamala ana faisewa tova moya'aina ana'ita'itave'avina.”

Au tovetumagana yadi yo'o matatabudi afositolo yadi gahe fa'ina nuwadi giyamumu, ada kaliva hivegidedi. Kaliva sa'eyana hivegidena-ma ana egana Sitiveni, bana yana vetumagana toyogina kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gimaga-mo'a. Kadu kaliva velugadiyao hivegidedi-ma adi egana Filifi, Felokolo, Naikena, Timoni, Famenasi, kadu Nikolesi bana kwanaAnidiyoka yo'o tulidiyao kalivana tu miYuda yadi tafalolo againe gidamana be givekwanamiYuda.
Au hida kalivai-dina afositolo matadiya hisedi be hive'o'oledi, ada nimadi badi agaidiya hisena be faisewai-nadi fa'ina hisevehailedi.

Tu bana Sitiveni ase'asena Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe gimaga, kadu tova moya'aina Yaubada yana faiwala againe gimiyami fa'ina aituha fifiwalana kadu abaveyaulowoga lakahina kaliva hinafadiya gififaisewadi.

Tu kaliva tufoidi hivekwageyena, miYuda adi yo'o sa'eyana kalivai-dina. Manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe badi hivavaga'auta, ada manuwai-nadi hivewagana Libetini yadi sinagogi. Ada badi miYudai-dina melala adi egana Sailini kadu Alekisanidiya kaliva. Badi'iyao kadu miYuda Silisiya ada Esiya ana fafali kalivai-dina hivebutu Sitiveni buye hivekwavekwageya.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwahuya lakahi-mo'ena Sitiveni givelena fa'ina yana laumamala againe hive'amata, keke adifaiweya hinabonalaufata.

Au hidede amine badi miYudai-dina badi yo'o hi'ive'ago'ugadi, ada kaliva lakahidiyao kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala buye hi'ive'ago'ugadi, ada au hina Sitiveni hikive'avina be miYuda yadi Koniselo agaidiya hinauwena.

Sitiveni Koniselo agaidiya hilukuwena, kadu togahe-kawowo buye hilukuwedi be bana fa'ine hifwaya higayo, “Bana hida kaliva tova moya'aina yada manuwa-tafalolo lakahina kadu Mosese yana vehimeya gihawahawavekoyoyena.

Ime bonana anogalina, gigahe vaita hida Yesu kwanaNasaledi manuwa-tafalolo lakahina gidayawelina, ada vehimeya moya'aina Mosese yada yo'o tuwaina giveleda-ma gidahawatani be vehimeya velugana againe kanamiyami.” Hidedemi togahe-kawowo higahe.
Ada kaliva moya'aidi samuba hinagene bana Sitiveni hi'itakwanekwanena, ada magigina mahamahali-mo'ena hi'itana vaita lobama ana tovenuwa'ata ana bela amine.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu Sitiveni againe gitoliluvaluva gigayo, “Ka'i badi tohawavemogatala higahe amine uhuluva?”
E, Yaubada bana againe gilakayemu gigahena gigayo, A yo'o kadu ya babi unanuyabuyabudi, ada babi sa'eyana aimo ganahawavemogatalena amanadi againe unana.

Ada Yaubada hidedemi gigahe-yo Abelahamo gilowoga fafali ana egana Kalidiya gihegena, ada bana tamana buye hina Helani againe himiyami. Himiyami tu tamana gi'alika, ada muliya Yaubada hida babi kamimiyami againe gi'iveninisena be gi'ela.

Hida babi againe gi'ela tu keke babi ma'ita gidaveleni be vaita gidagahe gidagayo, Hidevama yaku babi, keke-mo'a. Keke gidaveleni tu giwonadabedabena gigayo, Hida babi Iya ganavele, o'eni kadu tova mulina a unumamomo hinatubuyemu amanadi ganaveledi. Ada hidedemi Yaubada giwonadabadaba ana toveya Abelahamo natuna keke.

Kadu Yaubada gigahena gigayo, Aimo tova mulina a unumamomo babi tulina yuwa lauveya hinamiyami, ada medede againe yadi tovehimeya agaidiya hinave'agetoga be hinaluluya'aya'alidi, ada hidedemi hinanunauwena malamala fowa hanaledi (400).

Tu badi yo'o hinave'agetogedi be hinakivekoyodi-ma matahiwadi Iya nimakuya hinavaina, ada tova mulina a yo'o meda babi-nadi hinanuyabuyabuna, ada hida babi againe hina'ela be hinahawadavadavaku. Hidedemi Yaubada Abelahamo againe gigahe.

Ada muliya Yaubada yana veyao Abelahamo againe gisena, ada givehimeyena be bana'e kadu ana unumamomo iya'iyaya wowodiya hinatomogolohina, higa yana veyao ana iya'iyaya. Ada Abelahamo Aisake gi'ivetubugina, ada ana aiyeta eita givaidi-yo iya'iyayai-nadi wowone gitomogolohina. Meda anafaiweya Aisake natuna Yakobu wowone gitomogolohina, kadu Yakobu natuneyao kaliva tuwelo wowodiya gitomogolohina, badi bwanenedeyao kikaiwabudiyao.
Himiyami tu Yakobu a'a Idifita againe gidauda-ma valeyana ginogalini-yo, natuneyao higa bwanenedeyao medede againe gi'iveninisedi, ada hidevama yadina nagona againe taidi hifaniyena.
Ada muliya yadina anavelu againe bana Yosefa tobohiyaneyao agaidiya gi'ivemogatalina higa bana tobohiyadi, ada bana Felo Yosefa ana unuma valeyadi ginogalina.
Au Yosefa tamana Yakobu againe venuwa'ata gi'iveninisena be higa bana'e kadu ana unuma matatabudi Idifita againe hina'ela hinamiyavehaila. Ada ana unuma adi kilagalaga seveniti-faifi (75).
Ada au Yakobu Idifita againe gina gimiyavehaila ana unuma buye'i, ada medede againe bana'e kadu natuneyao higa bwanenedeyao hi'alika.
Ma wowodi yadi melala ana egana Sekemu againe hiyewedi ada tomohuyehuyeya hihuyadi, tomohuyahuyai-nadi ma tuwai-mo'ena Abelahamo yo'o adi egana Hemo agaidiya mani againe gikimonena.
Himoyamoya'ai himoyamoya'ai hinunauwena tu kini velugana Idifita againe givebutu givehimeya, tu Yosefa tuwaina gi'alika-ma keke gidahalamaneni.
Bana yada yo'o gilololodi lakahina, ada bwanenedeyao giluya'aya'alidi. Givehimeyedi be yadi fwefweya ivagudiyao kabu'avane hinahegedi ada hina'alika fa'ina.
Vaikohi tohiye gihavaidi-yo hisehobuyena be kabu'avane hiseni tu Felo natuna kwamayoku ginuhagana be gisilakahina, ada gifayayena be vaita tauna natuna amine.
Ada miIdifita yadi nuwahuya moya'aina gisikuluye-'owona, ada yana gahe againe kadu yana gugai againe givekalivalakata.
Au badi agaidiya gihobu ada kwanaIdifita sa'eyana gi'itana kwanaIsileli gimunumununa. Au gimadu gilugolegolena, ada kwanaIdifita nimana gifatana, ada gimunumunukoyokoyona tu gi'alika.
Bana Mosese higa ginuwanuwa vaita tauna yana yo'o hidahalamaneni Yaubada bana Mosese nimane gidalugolegoledi, tu badi keke hidahalamaneni.

Au tova anavelu miIsileli adi'iselu buye hive'afwaiki-ma gi'itadi, ada nuwanuwana hina'ilova be hinaveyao fa'ina gigahedi gigayo, Omi kaliva wanogali! Omi watobohiyamiyao. Gavadi-yo taumiyao wave'akivekoyo?
Tu bana kaliva sa'eyana tobohiyana gikikivekoyona-ma Mosese gi'atuhegena gigahena gigayo, O hakwadi giseni-yo higa vaita unavehimeyema unavedewayaugima?
Ka'i o nuwanuwa iya unaluve'alikaku, boiyesedi kwanaIdifita uluve'alikana amine?
Ada Mosese kwanaIsileli yana gahe ginogalini-yo Idifita gi'otayabuyabuna, ada gina babi ana egana Midiyani againe givekwanahawahawala. Ada medede againe ginagi be kaliva luhei gi'ivetubugidi.

Ada Mosese hida aituha gi'itana againe nuwana givegafo'uya'uya, au gina ai kabi'ona giyabela-vagata gida'ita-hagihagiyena ma Kaiwabu agona ginogalina gigayo, Iya'eku bwanenemomo Abelahamo Aisake Yakobu yadi Yaubada. Au gigahe-yo Mosese givebutu givetavetatava gimatautave'ine fa'ina keke anafaiweya gida'ita-mo'eni.
Bana Kaiwabu gigahena gigayo, Iya hidedei gamimiyami fa'ina abageya umidimidi-ma babi hawahawatana. Au a ageyafayafa uyau be useni. Hida babi hawahawatana, keke unakivebwaneneni.

MiIdifita yaku yo'o kalivai-dina himunumunukoyokoyodi-ma Iya makewa ga'itana. MiIsileli yadi tagiya a ganogalina ada gahobu'ela be ganalugolegoledi fa'ina. Au umidi, Idifita againe gana'iveninise be unana.” Hidedemi Kaiwabu gigahe ada bana Sitiveni giyakahina.

Kadu Sitiveni yana laumamala ginauwena gigayo, “Tu bana hidevama Mosese ma badi miIsileli hikilowena fa'ina higahena higayo, O hakwadi giseni-yo higa vaita unavehimeyema unavedewayaugima? E, bana'e ma Yaubada Tauna gi'iveninisena be ginavehimeyedi ada ginalugolegoledi. Au lobama ana tovenuwa'ata awane givegidena, bana ai giyabela-vagata hinagene Mosese againe gilakayemu amanadi.

Ada au bana'e miIsileli Idifita againe givega'auledi. Aituha fifiwalana kadu abaveyaulowoga Idifita againe ada Lehaga Yabeyabelina againe gifaisewadi be givega'auledi, ada babigaga againe hinunudadana-ma yana aituha fifiwalana ginunauwena malamala foti (40) agaidiya.

Kadu bana Mosese ma babigaga againe miIsileli buye hivaga'auta. E, bana'e bwanenedeyao buye himiyami, ada oya Sainai againe gilaka lobama ana tovenuwa'ata buye hilukahihi, ada Yaubada bonana miyamiya-vagahina ginogalina be ide agaideya ginasedamanena fa'ina.

Hidedemi hinuwanuwa fa'ina Mosese tobohiyana Eloni againe higahe higayo, Kilumina yada viviluwa unabubudi be hinanagoyeda. Bana hidevama kaliva Mosese ma Idifita againe givega'auleda amanadi bana hami gina? Keke kadahalamaneni.

Hidedemi bwanenedeyao higahe tu kilumina ana ita vaita bulumakau natudi amine hibubuna, ada kevakeva yadi abaveyao fa'ina hikabudi be kilumina hihawadavadavana. Kadu avemwamwala lakahina hisena be nimadi yana aibubuna hinahawaveyamumuyena fa'ina.
Tu Yaubada givekwaulaugedi ada gihegedi be ibadibadi lobameya hinahawadavadavadi. Ada au hihuluva Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi buki againe to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana gigahe amine gigayo,
Omi miIsileli, malamala foti (40) babigaga againe wamiyami ana toveya, keke Iya fa'ikuya kevakeva wadamunudi, keke abaveyao wadakabuni be wanahawadavadavaku fa'ina, keke-mo'a.

Au omi mene kilumina wabubudi be higa wanahawadavadavadi. Viviluwa sa'eyana ana egana Moloki, keke Iya fa'ikuya tu bana fa'ine falai wa'ava'avaladadanena. Kadu ikilukiluma vaita badibadi amine wakilakahina, medema yami viviluwa ana egana Lefani yana gaitoma. Au yami ikilukiluma wahawadavadavadi fa'ina, ganawavimi be yuwa wanana lauveya, melala Babiloni yuwa fafaline wanavehawahawala.”
Au hidedemi Yaubada yana to'awatalatalaina awane miIsileli agaidiya gigahe ma Sitiveni giyakahina.

Himiyami tu muliya bwanenedeyao falai-nadi Yaubada yana abamiyami natudiyao agaidiya hisedamanena. Ada Mosese ana hilafa bana Yosuwa bwanenedeyao ginagoyedi be hida babi yo'o tulidiyao nimadiya hilemadi. E, Yaubada yo'o tulidiyao givenegadi be miIsileli yadi babi hilemadi, ada hina hiluku ana toveya falai-nadi kadu hinauwena be hida babi againe hikivemididina, ada au gidauda gidauda ginunauwena tokaiwabu Devida yana toveya.

Bana Devida ase'asena yamumuna Yaubada matane fa'ina Yaubada gihawaveyamumuyena, ada bana Devida give'o'ola gigayo, O'eni Yakobu bwanenema lakahina yana Yaubada. Iya nuwanuwaku ya abamiyami ganayogona fa'ina udahawahegeku be gadayogona.
Hidedemi Devida gigahe tu bana keke gidayogoni, au natuna Solomoni Yaubada yana manuwa giyogona.
Iya'eku Yaubada Kaiwabu.
Lobama yaku didiga'u'u, babi ageku ana abasewadi,
au lobameya kadu babiya gavehivehimeya.
Gavaiya'amine manuwa Iya fa'ikuya wanayogoni?
Gava abamiyami wanabubuni-ma akufata?
Au keke amifaiweya, fa'ina hida lobama be babi ana gaitoma moya'aina Iya Tauku nimakuya gabubuna.”
Hidedemi Yaubada yana to'awatalatalaina awane gigahe, ada bana Sitiveni giyakahina.

Bwanenemiyao Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi hikivekoyo-'owodi, keke tamo hakwadi againe hidahuluva hagihagina. Au badi to'awatalatalaina Yaubada yana Kaliva Mahamahalina yana hobu'ela fa'ina higaheye-vagahina amanadi hiluve'alikadi, ada tova adamoya ahe gihobu'ela-yo nibaineyao agaidiya wahawavemogatalena be au waluve'alikana.

Tuwai-mo'ena omi yami yo'o agaimiya Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata gi'iveninisedi be hihobu'ela, yana vehimeya bwanenemiyao giveledi ada omi agaimiya hisedamanena. Omi vehimeyai-nadi wavaina tu keke wada'itave'avini.” Au hidedei Sitiveni yana laumamala giluyabuna.
Tu badi Koniselo Sitiveni hida yana gahe hinogalini-yo hi'ila'a-manimanini gadodi hi'alamuhumuhuna.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina bana Sitiveni giluvaiyena ada lobameya gi'italele, au Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gi'itana, kadu Yesu Yaubada i'atagine gimidimidi-ma gi'itana.
Au gigahe gigayo, “Wa'ita! Lobama gi'ayavalina-ma ga'itana, kadu Bana Tohobu'ela Yaubada i'atagine gimidimidi-ma ga'itana.”

Hidedemi gigahe-yo tugana give'etodonena ada gikova agona lakahina gigayo, “Kaiwabu, hida yadi koyona fa'ina keke badi agaidiya unalaufata.” Hidedemi gigahe-yo yawaina gihavaina. Ada au bana Saulo badi Sitiveni hitutuve'alikana-ma gihawaveyamumuyedi.
Tu kaliva tufoidi tafatafalolodiyao Sitiveni hitauna, ada bana fa'ine hive'alulaukuhi lakahina.
Tu bana Saulo givebutu tovetumagana adi yo'o giluyaweyawelidi. Au manuwa sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya ginunuwaliliuga, tovetumagana kaliva vevine gitaitaidi be ginunauwedi deliya giseusedi.
Tu badi tovetumagana hi'abinauna-ma gava fafali moya'aina agaidiya hina, medede againe Yesu Keliso bonana hilumamalena.
Bana Filifi melala ana egana Sameliya againe gina, ada miSameliya agaidiya Keliso fa'ine gilumamala.
Ada yo'o lakahina yana laumamala hinogalina kadu yana aituha fifiwaladi gifaisewadi-ma hi'itana, ada au moya'aidi bonana hinogali-hagihagiyena.
Moya'aidi wayafunediyao hiyamumu. Yafune hikova'awafatafata tu hiyemu. Kadu tovefela moya'aidi kadu badi walogidi gi'a'uwa-vagahina amanadi hiyamumu.
Hidedemi moya'aidi hiyamumu fa'ina, miSameliya hivemwamwala lakahina.

Tu medema melalai-nadi againe kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Saimoni, ada boi tuwaina givebutu tokwelikweli yadi faisewa gi'abi'abina, ada au hida yana faisewa againe miSameliya moya'aidi gi'iveyaulowogidi. Gigahe vaita bana kaliva kikaiwabuna, ada kaliva moya'aidi, lakahidiyao kadu kabi'odiyao, yana gahe hinogali-hagihagiyena. E, higahe higayo, “Bana hida kalivai-nadi vaita Yaubada amine, higa ana egana Tofaiwala-mo'a.”
Ada aituha fifiwalana yana kwelikweli againe gififaisewana be gi'iveyaulowogidi, ada hidedemi ahe ginunauwena lauva tunugina fa'ina moya'aidi ginuwa'abiyedi.

Tu Filifi Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yaubada yana yo'o ana luku fa'ina gilukahihiyena, kadu Yesu Keliso ana egana fa'ina badi agaidiya gilumamalena, ada yana laumamala hivetumaganena. Hivetumaganeni-yo hibafitaiso, kaliva kadu vevine.

Kadu bana Saimoni tauna Yesu againe givetumagana ada gibafitaiso. Gibafitaiso-yo Filifi buye buye tu ginunauwena tova moya'aina, ada yana aituha fifiwalana kadu yana abaveyaulowoga lakahina gi'itadi againe, bana kadu nuwana givegafo'uya'uya.
Tu afositolo Yelusalema againe miSameliya valeyadi hinogalina, higa Yaubada bonana hi'idibumuhigena. Hinogalini-yo Fita Yoni badi agaidiya hi'iveninisedi.
Ada ahe hiyemu againe tovetumagana fa'idiya hive'o'ola be higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina badi hinavaina.
Bana Alu'aluwa Mahalina higa aimo keke tamo hakwadi badi agaidiya gidaluvaiyeni. Au Yesu ana eganeya ahe hibafitaiso tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina aimo keke badi agaidiya gidahobu.
Ada Fita Yoni hiyemu againe, nimadi badi tovetumagana agaidiya hisena, au Alu'aluwa Mahalina giluvaiyedi.

Tu bana Saimoni gilulauboda. Afositolo nimadi badi tovetumagana agaidiya hiseni-yo Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina badi agaidiya gihawahegena. Hidedemi Saimoni gi'itana againe, mani gitunena Fita Yoni agaidiya ada gigahedi gigayo, “Hida faiwala iya kadu unaveleku be badi gaveyao agaidiya nimaku ganasena, medema Alu'aluwa Mahalina hinavaina.”
Tu Fita gigahena gigayo, “Taumadi! Makewa o unuwanuwa vaita Yaubada yana abahawahega mani againe afaiweya unakimonena fa'ina Yaubada o ginaluyaweli, kadu ya mani buye ginaluyawelina.
Ya nuwanuwa keke tunutunugina Yaubada matane fa'ina, keke afaiweya hida Yaubada yana faisewa ime buye kanafaisewa.
Au unanuwavilana be hida ya nuwanuwa higa koyona lakahina unavenikohiyena, ada Kaiwabu againe unave'o'ola be ka'i ya nuwanuwa koyo-mo'ena ginayawelina.
Au ya nuwahinage ahe gahalamanena. Ase'ase italauvadiga againe gimaga ada nuwanuwai-nadi ase'ase gikivekoyona. Ya nuwanuwa koyona gikive'avi be yogoyogoni umimiyami.” Hidedemi Fita gigahe.
Ada bana Saimoni badi Fita Yoni agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Omi Kaiwabu againe iya fa'ikuya wadave'o'ola be hida gaitoma koyona wagaheyena-ma keke agaikuya ginalakayemu.”

Tu Fita Yoni Kaiwabu bonana ahe hilumamalena kadu gavadi gavadi taudiyao agaidiya hi'ayaunena-ma ahe hi'awatalatalaineni-yo au Yelusalema againe hiyewadi. Ada yadina againe melala moya'aina Sameliya ana fafaliya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hilumamalenauwena.

Badi hina tu Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana Filifi againe gi'ela gigahena gigayo, “Unakidewadewa be unalowoga. Gava unahobu eda Yelusalema Gasa hinafane ginauna-ma amine unana. Higa hida eda tuwaina babigaga hinafane ginauna.”

Au Filifi gikidewadewa be gilowoga. Ginauna tu kaliva lakahina sa'eyana edeya gimaduhagana, kwanaIdiyofiya, ada bana tovehimeya lakahina, badi Kanidesi miIdiyofiya yadi kwini yadi mani matatabuna gi'ita'itave'avina. Ada hida kalivai-nadi Yelusalema againe a gina be Yaubada ginahawadavadavana fa'ina.
Gina be giyewayewana tu yana waka abalautaina againe gihiyoto tu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Aiseya yana buki againe gihawahawa.
Bana ginauna tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina Filifi againe gigahe gigayo, “Unana yuwa waka abalautaina liline unanudadana.”
Au Filifi waka againe gimaduna ada kaliva agona ginogalina, to'awatalatalaina Aiseya yana buki againe gihawahawa. Au gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Medema uhawahawana-ma ka'i ana nuwanuwa uhalamanena?”
Bana kwanaIdiyofiya gigayo, “Gavaiya'amine akufaiweya ganahalamaneni, fa'ina aku tokivetuvetunu keke.” Ada au Filifi againe gigahe gigayo, “Ulaka'ela be wakeya buye kanana.” Ada au giyage.
Sifi hinauwena be hinayogona amine, bana'e hinauwena.
Sifi kabi'ona ana to'aikeya matane keke ginakwage amine,
meda bana keke tamo bonalaufata gidagaheye.
Hikivewowomumuna ada keke tamo gavadi koyona
gidafaisewani tu, au ai'adi hiluve'alikana.
Yana miyami babiya himadudabana fa'ina,
keke tamo hakwadi ana unumamomo fa'idiya ginalukahihi,
fa'ina ana unumamomo keke.
Au hidedemi Aiseya gigahe-ma kwanaIdiyofiya gihawahawa.
Tu kwanaIdiyofiya Filifi againe gigahe gigayo, “Au unakivetuvetunuku. Hakwadi fa'ine to'awatalatalaina hidedemi gilukahihi, ka'i tauna fa'ine o ka'i mali kaliva fa'ine?”
Ada bana Filifi givebutu medema Yaubada bonanai-nadi gihawana-ma fa'ina gikivetuvetununa, ada higa Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yesu fa'ine bana againe gilukahihiyena.

Ada edeya hinauna tu ni'u sa'eyana againe hiyemu, ada bana kwanaIdiyofiya gigahe gigayo, “Mene u'ita ni'u gidadauda. Nuwanuwaku ganabafitaiso. Ka'i tamo gavadi fa'ina unahawataku be keke akufaiweya ganabafitaiso?” [
Filifi gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena uhawahege be Yesu Keliso againe uvetumagana, au afaiweya unabafitaiso.” Ada bana gigayo, “Yesu Keliso velemo'ena Yaubada Natuna ma gavetumaganena.”]
Ada au yana waka ana tovemadu givehimeyena be ginave'ilovena. Give'iloveni-yo badi adi'iselu Filifi kadu kwanaIdiyofiya ni'u againe hihobu be Filifi gikivebafitaisoyena.

Gikivebafitaisoyena gihavaina hilaka avaleya, ada auhe'ama Kaiwabu Alu'aluwana Filifi mali fafaliya gimaduvedamanena. Tu bana kwanaIdiyofiya Filifi keke gida'ita-havagileni tu yana wavemwamwala a ginanauna.

Ada au Kaiwabu Alu'aluwana Filifi ginuvedamanena ada auhe'ama melala ana egana Asodo againe gilakayemu. Medede againe givebutu melala moya'aina agaidiya ginauna, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna gilulumamalena ginunauwena tu Sisaliya againe giyemu.
Au gilowoga Damasiko againe ginauna tu melala-mo'ena liline gidayemu ma auhe'ama mahalina lobameya give'akinamanamalena, Saulo ginauna againe gituvemahali-'owona.
Ada bana babiya gibe'u tu tamo hakwadi agona ginogalina gigahena gigayo, “Saulo, Saulo! Gavana fa'ina ukikivekoyoku?”
Kadu agona ginogalina gigayo, “Iya'eku Yesu, ada Iya ukikivekoyoku.
Au umidi melala againe unaluku, ada mededei tamo hakwadi gavadi unagani ma ginavenuwa'ata.”
Tu badi kaliva Saulo hibwa'ulina-ma himididi-vagata, meyadi gibou. Agona hinogalina tu keke tamo hakwadi hida'itani.
Ada au Saulo gimidi matana gi'aleleyena tu keke tamo gavadi anafaiweya gida'itani, au matana gikoyo-mo'a. Au nimane hi'abina be Damasiko againe hinauwena.
Ada aiyeta tohiye agaidiya givematakoyo, ada keke tamo gavadi gida'u'ani o ka'i gidayuyuni.
Tu tovetumagana sa'eyana Damasiko againe gimiyami, ana egana Ananaiyasi. Bana gi'eno'ita ada yana ita againe Kaiwabu bana ana egana gikovana gigayo, “Ananaiyasi.”
Ada bana gigayo, “Kaiwabu, we'a.”

Au Kaiwabu gigahena gigayo, “Umidi be eda ana egana Eda Tunutunugina againe unana kaliva sa'eyana unalelena, ana egana Saulo kwanaTasasi. Au bana Yudasi yana manuweya gimimiyami, ada tova adamoya give'ove'o'ola.
Ada yana eno'ita againe kaliva sa'eyana gi'itana, ana egana Ananaiyasi, higa vaita bana againe uda'ela nima udasena be matana ginayamumu fa'ina.”
Bana Ananaiyasi gigayo, “Kaiwabu, hida kaliva fa'ine moya'aidi hivenuwa'ataku higa ya kalivamomo Yelusalema againe gikivekoyodi keke kabi'ona.
Ada bana hide'i Damasiko againe gi'ela fa'ina abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao ana vehimeya hivelena be moya'aima a egana ayakayakahina-ma ginakive'avima be ginanauwema.”
Kadu aku egana ginakilakahina fa'ina, vita lakahina ginanuhagana ma Iya Tauku ganavehawalena.”

Au Kaiwabu hidedemi gigahe fa'ina, Ananaiyasi gina Saulo gimiyami manuwai-nadi againe giluku ada nimana Saulo againe gisena gigayo, “Tobohiyaku Saulo, Kaiwabu Yesu boi edeya unauna tu Tauna o againiya gi'ivemogatalina-ma Kalivai-nadi gi'iveniniseku be mata gina'italele ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina o ginaluvaiye fa'ina.”
Gigahe-yo auhe'ama gaitoma sa'eyana vaita igana kwanavina amine Saulo matane gibe'u, ada anafaiweya gi'ita'italele. Au gitowamidi ada gibafitaiso.
Ada a'a gi'ani-yo yana faiwala kadu giyemu.
Tu tovetumagana Damasiko againe badi agaidiya Saulo gimiyami aiyeta tufona. Ada sinagogi agaidiya gimaduluku givebutu Yesu fa'ine gilulumamala, au gigahedi gigayo, “Bana Yesu ma Yaubada Natuna.”

Ada gaveyao moya'aidi yana laumamala hinogalina-ma hiyaulowoga, au hivebutu buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Taumadi! Bana hidema kalivai-nadi badi gaveyao Yesu ana egana hiyakayakahina-ma Yelusalema againe gikikivekoyodi keke kabi'ona. Kadu meda anafaiweya yana inubai-nadi fa'ina hidedei gi'ela, higa Yesu yana kaliva ide agaideya ginakive'avidi be abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao agaidiya ginanauwedi. Au makewa hidedemi yana inuba.”

Badi higahegahe tu Saulo yana laumamala againe gifaiwala, gifaiwala-mo'a. Ada miYuda Damasiko againe himiyami-ma gihawavetuvetunudi, higa Yesu velemo'ena Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso, ada au yana hawavetuvetunu againe gifaiwalahegedi be keke adifaiweya bonana hinafatani, au hive'awavitavita.
Uyadayada be bogi melala ana abaluku hibodabodafifina be hinaluve'alikana fa'ina. Tu tamo hakwadi yadi nuwanuwa bana againe gi'awatalatalainena.
Au bogi sa'eyana ana tomuliya hivega'aulena, ada feyawa againe hidodona digo hisehobuyena melala ana sifa kugakugana tabone hitunevelowona.

Tu Saulo Yelusalema againe giyewana ada giyemu againe, gina higa tovetumagana adi yo'o agaidiya gidaluku tu badi moya'aidi himatausena, fa'ina hinuwanuwa vaita keke velemo'ena Yesu againe gidavetumagana.

Giga-wayoga fa'ina tovetumagana sa'eyana ana egana Banabasi givelugana, ada afositolo agaidiya ginauwena be gina'itadi fa'ina. Au Banabasi Saulo fa'ine gikivetuvetunudi, Kaiwabu edeya gi'itana kadu agona ginogalina ma gilukahihiyena. Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Bana Saulo ase'asena bouna Yesu ana eganeya Damasiko againe gilumamala.”
Au hidedemi Banabasi ahe gigahe-yo Saulo badi afositolo agaidiya giluku buye himiyami, Yelusalema againe hinunudadana, ase'asena bouna Yesu ana eganeya gilulumamala.
Kadu miYuda bona Gilika againe hilulukahihi-ma agaidiya gina giluluhifufu be buye hivekwavekwageya, tu au hivevai be hinaluve'alikana fa'ina.
Tu tobohiyaneyao badi tovetumagana amanadi miYuda yadi nuwanuwa hihalamanena againe, Saulo Sisaliya againe hinauwena ada wakeya hiveyagena be Tasasi againe ginana.

Ada au tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina Yudiya Galili kadu Sameliya adi fafali agaidiya himiyami hagihagina, fa'ina kaliva boi hikikivekoyodi-ma hi'ilova. Ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana veluga againe yadi vetumagana gitubuga kadu himoya'ai, ada yadi dewa againe tova moya'aina Kaiwabu ana egana hikikilakahina.
Himiyami tu bana Fita melala tulina tulina agaidiya ginunudadana, ada tova sa'eyana Yaubada yana kaliva melala ana egana Lida againe himiyami-ma agaidiya gina giwakawaka.
Medede againe kaliva sa'eyana ginuhagana, ana egana Iniya, ada bana givefela be ana ivi againe gidauda ada ginunauwena malamala eita.
Au Fita bana againe gigahe gigayo, “Iniya, adamoya Yesu Keliso ginasiveyawa. Au umidi be a ivi una'uwani.” Ada auhe'ama Iniya gimidi.
Ada miLida moya'aidi hi'itana, kadu kaliva moya'aidi laube'u ana egana Seloni againe himiyami-ma hi'itana, ada yadi nuwanuwa uyu'uyuyuna hihegena be Kaiwabu Yesu againe hivetumagana.

Tu kwamayoku sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Tabita vineYofa, ada bana tovetumagana. Bona Gilika againe ana egana Dokasa, ada egana ana kaivila kevakeva ana egana diya. Ada bana kwamayoku-nadi tova moya'aina ginuwanuwakabubu, koyokoyo giveluvelugadi.
Ada Fita Lida againe gi'ela ana toveya, kwamayoku gi'aulolo lakahina be gi'alika. Au wowona hikolana ada manuwa ana vetawana wese getane hisena.
Tu Yofa ma Lida liline, ada Fita Lida againe gi'ela ma tovetumagana Yofa againe hinogalini-yo au kaliva adi'iselu hi'iveninisedi be Fita hinayowanina hinagayo, “Ime agaimeya udamadu'ela.”

Au Fita moya'aidi giwavidi be melaleya hihobu, ada bana tugana give'etodonena be give'o'ola. Give'o'ola gihavaina kwamayoku wowona againe gihagavilana gigayo, “Tabita, umidi!” Au matana gi'aleleyena ada Fita gi'ita-yo gimidi.
Au Fita nimane gi'abina be gisivemididina, ada au sikwasikwa kadu tovetumagana velugadiyao gikovadi-yo kwamayoku yawayawana giseyemaunena.
Ada au kwamayoku valeyana give'aliyahega be miYofa moya'aidi hinogalina, ada tufoidi moya'aidi Kaiwabu againe hivetumagana.
Tu Fita ma aiyeta a gavaiyehi Yofa againe gimiyami. Kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Saimoni againe gimiyami, bana yana faisewa ma bulumakau kwafilidi againe lokoloko gibubuna.
Tu kaliva sa'eyana Sisaliya againe gimiyami, ana egana Koniliyo, ada bana togiyomatana miLoma yadi ame adi yo'o sa'eyana agaidiya, yo'o-nadi fafali ana egana Itali againe hiyemu.

Ada bana totafalolo, bana'e kadu yana manuwa hinagena moya'aidi buye tova moya'aina Yaubada againe hihawadavadava. Kadu tova moya'aina miYuda yadi koyokoyo agaidiya nuwakabubu gifolafolakena, ada aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana Yaubada againe give'ove'o'ola.
Tova sa'eyana kauwana giwahivekenana againe give'ove'o'ola tu gi'eno'ita, ada Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana gi'itana bana againe gi'ela ana egana giyakahina gigayo, “Koniliyo.”
Bana tovenuwa'ata gigayo, “Yaubada ya ve'o'ola moya'aina a ginogalina, kadu ya nuwakabubu koyokoyo agaidiya ufolafolakena-ma a gi'itana, ada medema againe nuwana ginauna.
Au kaliva tufoidi Yofa againe una'iveninisedi be kaliva sa'eyana hinayowanina, ana egana Saimoni, kadu ana egana velugana Fita.
Ada adamoya wagakoyona Saimoni againe giwakawaka bana wagakoyona yana faisewa ma bulumakau kwafilidiya lokoloko gibubuna. Ada yana manuwa taliya liline gidadauda.”

Hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigahe be gina, tu Koniliyo ana agetoga adi'iselu kadu yana tolugaviya sa'eyana giyowanidi be hi'ela. Bana tolugaviya higa Koniliyo ana toveluga, ada bana kadu Yaubada gimatamatausena.
Au badi hi'ela be tovenuwa'ata yana gahe fa'ina gilukahihiyena, ada Yofa againe gi'atuhegedi.
Tova anavelu badi aimo hinauna ada Yofa eda'ufo hiyemuyemu tu bana Fita manuwa getane gilaka be ginave'o'ola fa'ina, ada kauwana getadiya gilaka.
Ada Fita mafu gilauna ada nuwanuwana a'a gina'ana. Au anaga aimo gitagotagova tu gimiyami ada gi'eno'ita.
Ada yana ita againe lobama gi'ayavalina be gaitoma sa'eyana vaita lifi lakahina amine gihobuhobu, vaita gaveyao hukuna fowa hida'abi'abini-yo babiya hidatunevelowoni.
Ada lifi hinagene kevakeva moya'aidi himiyami madumadugidiyao gayagayagidiyao yaveyavegidiyao, waumidi tulidi tulidi.
Ada ago'ago sa'eyana ginogalina gigayo, “Fita, umidi. Au tamo kevakeva umunu be u'a.”
Tu agona ginogali-havagilena gigayo, “Gavadi moya'aina Yaubada gikiveyamumuna-ma o keke unahawavekoyoyeni.”
Ada au hidede amine gigahena tohiye, au lifi lobameya tamo hakwadi gisilakahina.

Tu Fita yana ita ana nuwanuwa aimo ginuwanuwadadaneni tu kaliva Koniliyo gi'iveninisedi-ma hitolitoliluvaluva be higa ha'againe Saimoni yana manuwa gidauda-ma hinahalamanena. Au hinuhagani-yo yana eda'awaneya himidi ada hilautoli higayo, “Ka'i mene Saimoni-Fita gimimiyami?”
Au umidi be unamaduhobu ada omi miYuda ami hawata fa'ina keke unanuwanuwa, au badi buye wanana fa'ina Iya ga'iveninisedi be hi'ela.”
Au Fita kaliva agaidiya gihobu be gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva walelena-ma iya'eku. Gavadi-yo wa'ela?”

Badi higayo, “Yama togiyomatana, ana egana Koniliyo, gi'iveninisema be a'ela. Bana kaliva hagihagina, tova moya'aina Yaubada gihawadavadavana ada miYuda moya'aidi hiwowomumuyena lakahina. Ada Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana bana againe gi'ela givehimeyena ada o ginayowani be yana manuweya una'ela, higa gavaimi o unagahe-ma ginanogalina.”
Au Fita yadi gahe ginogalini-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Au walaka'ela hidei kanada tu bogiyadi-yo kanana.”
Bogi hida mala gilauna Fita gikidewadewa be kaliva buye hilowoga, kadu tovetumagana tufoidi, badi miYofa, bana hivebwa'uliyena.
Hinauna tu tova anavelu Sisaliya againe hiyemu, ada au Koniliyo gibodebodedi. Tobohiyaneyao kadu yana yo'o buye gikovavaga'auhidi ada hibodaboda.
Au bana Fita gidaluku ma Koniliyo bana againe gi'ela gi'ibo'ula-mo'a be ginahawadavadavana.
Tu Fita gisivemididina gigahena gigayo, “Au umidi! Iya keke Yaubada, iya tomiyababi.”
Au Fita Koniliyo againe gilulukahihi tu manuweya gilukuluku, yo'o lakahina ahe hivaga'auta-ma ginuhagadi.

Au gigahedi gigayo, “Ime miYuda ama hawata sa'eyana omi wahalamane-hagihagiyena, higa kwanamiYuda yo'o tulidi kalivana againe keke anafaiweya ginawakawaka o ka'i buye hinanunaudadana. Tu Yaubada halamana giveleku be higa keke tamo kaliva fa'ina ganagahe ganagayo, Wadema kaliva bwanebwanenena o ka'i keke yegayegana. Hidema fa'ina keke akufaiweya yo'o tulimi kalivana ganakiloweni.
Ada hidema fa'ina o uyowaniku againe, keke gadadibutoyoga au gamadu'ela, tu iya nuwanuwaku ganahalamanena gavadi-yo uyowaniku.”

Tu bana Koniliyo gigahena gigayo, “Aiyeta tohiye kahegedi againe yaku manuweya gamiyami gave'ove'o'ola, ada kauwana tova adamoya amine meda giwahivekenana. Gave'ove'o'ola tu auhe'ama kaliva sa'eyana wamagigikuya gi'ela gimidi ana vaigau ve'akinamanamalina.
Ada gigayo, Koniliyo, Yaubada ya ve'o'ola ahe ginogalina, ada ya nuwakabubu koyokoyo agaidiya ginuwa-nunauyena.

Au tamo hakwadi Yofa againe una'iveninisena be kaliva sa'eyana ginayowanina ana egana Saimoni Fita. Ada adamoya wagakoyona Saimoni againe giwakawaka, bana wagakoyona yana faisewa ma bulumakau kwafilidiya lokoloko gibubuna. Ada yana manuwa taliya liline gidadauda.
Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina gamaduyowani ada o unuwakabubuyeku be u'ela. Ada au moya'aima hidei Yaubada matane avaga'auta be gavaimi Kaiwabu givehimeya ime agaimeya ma unagaheyena be ananogalina.”
Au gaveyao himatamatausena kadu hihuluhuluva tunutunugina, medema gi'itanuwakabubuyedi, ka'i kwanaYuda o ka'i yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina.

Venuwa'ata miIsileli agaimeya gi'iveninisena-ma au wahalamanena. E, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna gihawavemogatalena higa Yesu Keliso yana alika fa'ina ime Yaubada buye aveyao, ada Bana Yesu kaliva moya'aidi adi Tovehimeya.

Kadu gaitoma lakahina Yudiya ana fafaliya gilakayemu-ma wahalamanena, higa Yesu kwanaNasaledi fa'ine. Yaubada Bana givegidena be Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe givemagana kadu gifaiwalavelena. Yoni gimidilumamala be kaliva gikivebafitaisoyedi tu muliya Bana Yesu yana faisewa Galili ana fafaliya givebutuna. Ada Yaubada Bana buye himiyami fa'ina, fafali moya'aina agaidiya ginunudadana kaliva giveluvelugadi, ada gaveyao moya'aidi Setani yana vehimeya againe himiyami-ma gisiveyawadi. Au hidedemi wahalamanena.

Keke kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya gidakiveyemaunini be hida'itani, au ime'eyaogaga a'itana, ime Yaubada boi ahe givegidema be yana mididi-havagi fa'ina anahawavemogatala. Ada ahe alikeya gimididi-havagi againe, Bana buye a'au'a ayuyu.

Ada givehimeyema be kaliva agaidiya Bana fa'ine analumamala ada anahawavemogatala higa Yaubada givegidena be kaliva moya'aidi, yawayawadiyao kadu ali'alikadiyao, ginavedewayaugidi be laufata hinavaina.

Ada tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi Bana fa'ine hihawavemogatala, yadi buki againe higahe vaita gaveyao moya'aidi Bana againe hinavetumagana, medema yadi koyona ana aiyawela Yesu againe hinanuhagana.”
Bana Fita aimo hidedemi gilulukahihi tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina tovanenega moya'aidi giluvaiyedi.
Ada badi miYuda tovetumagana Fita buye Yofa againe hitauya-ma nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya, fa'ina Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya kadu gihawahegena.
Au agodi hinogalina, meya tulina tulina againe hilulukahihi Yaubada ana egana hikikilakahina.

Hidedemi hilulukahihi tu bana Fita gigahe gigayo, “Keke tamo hakwadi hida kaliva anafaiweya ginahawatadi be gufa againe hinabafitaiso, fa'ina ime Alu'aluwa Mahalina anuhagana amine, kadu badi hinuhagana.”
Au givehimeyedi be Yesu Keliso ana eganeya hinabafitaiso. Hibafitaiso gihavaina hive'o'olena be aiyeta tufona badi agaidiya ginamiyami.
Tu afositolo ada tovetumagana Yudiya againe himiyami-ma yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina valeyadi hinogalina, higa Yaubada bonana badi kadu hi'idibumuhigena.

Tu miYuda tovetumagana tufoidi hinuwanuwa vaita yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina hinamidivetumagana againe gilubodadi be Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowodiya hidatomogolohina Yaubada miYuda fa'idiya givehimeya amine. Hidema fa'ina Fita Yelusalema againe gilaka'ela ana toveya badi miYuda tovetumaganai-dina Fita hi'awalavena higayo, “O'eni yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya una uwakawaka, badi wowodiya iya'iyaya keke hidatomogolohini, kadu taumadi badi buye wa'a.” Hidedemi higahe.
Au Fita gaitoma moya'aina gilakayemu-ma badi agaidiya gilukahihiye-'owona.

Inubane givebutu gilukahihi gigayo, “Melala ana egana Yofa againe gamiyami ada gave'ove'o'ola tu ga'eno'ita. Gaitoma sa'eyana vaita lifi lakahina amine ga'itana, ada vaita gaveyao hukuna fowa hida'abi'abini be lobameya hidatunevelowoni-yo iya lilikuya gihobu.
Au galukenala be gana'ita-hagihagiyena ada kevakeva tulidi tulidi ga'itadi, madumadugidiyao gayagayagidiyao yaveyavegidiyao.
Ga'ita'ita tu ago'ago sa'eyana ganogalina gigayo, Fita, umidi. Au tamo kevakeva umunu be u'a.
Tu iya gagayo, Kaiwabu, keke-mo'a! Mema kevakeva koyodiyao, boi keke tamo iya awakuya gadaseni.
Kadu agona lobameya ganogali-havagilena gigayo, Gavadi moya'aina Yaubada gikiveyamumuyedi-ma o keke unahawavekoyoyeni.
Ada au hidede amine gigahe tohiye au lifi matatabuna lobameya tamo hakwadi gisilakahina.
Lobameya lifi gilakalaka tu medema tovai-nadi kaliva adi'itoto iya gamiyami manuwai-nadi againe hiyemu. KwanaSisaliya gi'iveninisedi be iya hinaleleku.

Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina gigaheku gigayo, Omi miYuda ami hawata fa'ina keke unanuwanuwa, au badi buye wanana. Hidemi gigahe. Kadu hida tovetumagana adivesikisi buye kamimiyami-ma iya buye ana Sisaliya againe, ada moya'aima Koniliyo yana manuweya aluku.

Ada bana kahihina ime agaimeya gilukahihiyena, gigahe vaita Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana gida'ela yana manuweya gidamidi-yo gidagaheni gidagayo, Tamo hakwadi Yofa againe una'iveninisena be kaliva sa'eyana ginayowanina, ana egana Saimoni-Fita.
Ada bana venuwa'ata ginalukahihiyena be o'eni ya yo'o buye'i Yaubada yana kibababala wananuhagana fa'ina. Hidedemi givenuwa'ataku.
Au Kaiwabu bonana nuwaku gi'afolena gigayo, Yoni gufa againe gikivebafitaisoyemi tu Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe ginakivebafitaisoyemi higa alu'aluwami gina'utuvina.

Au ide miYuda Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso againe kavetumagana ana toveya, Yaubada Alu'aluwana ide agaideya gihawahegena amine, meda anafaiweya yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya Alu'aluwa Mahalina gihawahegena. Ada au iya vaita hakwa'adi amine-yo Yaubada gadahawatani be keke badi agaidiya ginahawahegeni?” Au hidedemi Fita gilukahihi.

Tu Sitiveni miYuda hitutuve'alikana ana toveya, kadu hivebutu tovetumagana moya'aidi hiveve'umagigiyedi ada au fafali tulidi tulidi agaidiya hi'ota. Tufoidi hina ma'i lauveya fafali ana egana Finisiya againe, kadu himula ana egana Saifilasi againe, kadu melala ana egana Anidiyoka againe. Ada Yesu bonana hilumamalena tu miYuda gagana agaidiya hilumamala.
Tu tovetumagana tufoidi, miSaifilasi kadu miSailini Anidiyoka againe hina be kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya hilumamala, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Kaiwabu Yesu fa'ine hilukahihiyena.
Ada Kaiwabu yadi laumamala againe gifaiwalaveledi-yo yo'o lakahina Kaiwabu Yesu againe hihagaviladi be hivetumagana.

Ada bana ahe giyemu be Yaubada yana nuwadoga miAnidiyoka agaidiya givetalaiyena-ma gi'itana againe, au givemwamwala, ada gilu'ageyedi be keke hinanuwayewa, au Kaiwabu againe hinamiyamiyave'avina tova moya'aina.
Bana Banabasi ma kaliva hagihagina, Alu'aluwa Mahalina ahe giluvaiyena kadu yana vetumagana toyogina. Ada au kaliva keke sa'eyadi hivebutu Kaiwabu againe hivetumagana.
Banabasi gimiyami tu tova sa'eyana gina Tasasi melala againe be Saulo ginavega'aulena fa'ina.

Ginuhagana againe Anidiyoka melala againe gi'aliyena. Ada badi adi'iselu tovetumagana adi yo'o buye hivagavaga'auta ada kaliva moya'aidi hivehavehawaledi. Hidedemi hinunauwena malamala sa'eyana, ada Anidiyoka againe kaliva-kawowo tovetumagana himidivewagadi Kelisitiyani, badi higa Keliso yana kaliva.
Tu medema tovai-nadi kaliva gavadi aimo ginayemu-ma ana to'awatalatalaina tufoidi Yelusalema againe hitauya be Anidiyoka againe hiyemu.

Kaliva sa'eyana agaidiya, ana egana Agabasi, gitowamidi be Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana hawavemogatala againe loka lakahina fa'ina givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Aimo loka lakahina fafali moya'aina agaidiya ginalakayemu.” Ada lokai-nadi gilakayemu Loma Tokaiwabu lakahina ana egana Kelodiyo yana toveya.

Au tovetumagana Anidiyoka againe loka valeyana hinogalina fa'ina, hivevai be yadi velekawowo hinasena, ada tobohiyadiyao tovetumagana Yudiya againe himiyami-ma hinavelugadi fa'ina. Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gavadi adifaiweya, medema hinasena.
Ada au moya'aidi yadi velekawowo hisena, ada Banabasi Saulo mani-nadi Yelusalema againe hinauwena be tovetumagana adi tonagona hiveledi.
Himiyami tu kini Helodi givebutu tovetumagana adi yo'o kalivadi tufoidi gikikivekoyodi.
Au givehimeya be Yemesa Yoni tobohiyana ilama againe u'una hinikehegena.

Yemesa giluve'alikana fa'ina, badi miYuda yadi tonagona nuwadi gikiveyamumuna. Yadi nuwayamumu gi'ita-yo au givehimeya be Fita hikive'avina. Ada tafalolo ana egana Beledi keke Wa'isina againe hida gaitoma gilakayemu.

Ada au Fita hikive'avini-yo deliya hiselukuwena, ada Helodi givehimeya be tolugaviya adi bo'u fowa amine hina'ita'itave'avina, kadu kaliva-mo'edi fowa fowa amine. Kadu givevai be tafalolo lakahina Abamaduviviya ana tova ginahavaini-yo kaliva moya'aidi matadiya ginavedewayaugina.
Ada au tolugaviya Fita deliya hi'ita'itave'avina tu badi tovetumagana Yaubada againe bana fa'ine hive'o'ola'ima'ima-mo'a.

Tu bogi gihobu ana uyadeyadeya Helodi kaliva matadiya ginavedewayaugina, bogi-nadi againe Fita ana to'itave'avina adi'iselu hinafadiya gidauda, ada bulava kainumula againe nimana fafalina fafalina tolugaviya adi'iselu agaidiya hiyogovefosena. Kadu tolugaviya deli ana eda'awana hi'ita'itave'avina.

Fita gidauda tu auhe'ama Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata gilu'afuneunena be mahaline abamiyami gituvemahalina. Au tovenuwa'ata Fita yalona gitafina higa giluvaguna gigayo, “Umadumidi.” Auhe'ama bulava kainumula Fita nimane gi'agologolota tu gimidi.
Gi'agolohini tu tovenuwa'ata gigahena gigayo, “Beleta usidoneni, ageyafayafa uhifo.” Au Fita gisidoneni gihifo-yo tovenuwa'ata gigayo, “A aikeva u'ose be u'ela kana.”
Au Fita tovenuwa'ata gimuliyena ada deliya hihobu, tu keke gidahalamaneni ka'i velemo'ena tovenuwa'ata giluvaguna be gihobuyena o ka'i gi'avayauna.

Au tolugaviya adi yo'o sa'eyana hihegedi kadu anavelu hihegedi, hinauna tu melala ana eda'awana againe hiyemu, eda'awanai-nadi againe wanafali kainumula gidauda. Au wanafali tauna gi'ayauna be melala hinagene hinauna. Eda sa'eyana againe hinauna tu hihegena, au tovenuwa'ata gilu'amuvedamana be ginuyabuyabuna.

Ginuyabuyabuni tu Fita gavadi bana againe gilakayemu-ma gi'ayaunena gigayo, “Au adamoya ahe gahalamanena, velemo'ena Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata gi'iveninisena be Helodi nimane gilugolegoleku, kadu miYuda agaidiya gilugolegoleku be gavaimi hinuwanuwa iya gananuhagana-ma keke ginalakayemu.”
Hidedemi Fita gi'ayauneni-yo Meli yadi manuweya gina, badi Yoni-Maki hinana. Medede againe kaliva moya'aidi ahe hivaga'auta be Fita fa'ine hive'ove'o'ola.
Au Fita giyemu wanafali gava kwaune gikifisifisi'a ada agetoga kwamayoku sa'eyana, ana egana Loda, gi'ela be wana ginayauna.
Fita gikovakova ma agona ana nogala gihalamanena, au nuwana gi'ayauyauna lakahina fa'ina wana keke gidayauni, tu gimaduluku vetawaneya givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Hei! Fita giyemu.”
Badi higayo, “O kwavakwava.” Tu bana kwamayoku yana gahe giseseve'ave'ahina gigayo, “Au velemona.” Yana gahe giseve'ave'ahina fa'ina, badi higayo, “Mema aluwana.”
Badi buye hilulukahihi tu Fita aimo gikikifisifisi'a, fa'ina hina wana hidayauna ma hi'ita-yo au nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya.

Tu bana nimane giluhawatadi tu gavaiya'amine Kaiwabu deliya gisehobuyena ma agaidiya gi'awatalatalainena. Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Yemesa tobohiyaneyao buye wanavenuwa'atadi.” Gilukahihi gihavaina au gina mali melaleya.
Tu mala gilauna tolugaviya hi'enoviladi againe, Fita fa'ine yaudi gilowona hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ha! Fita hami gina?”
Bana Helodi givehimeya be hinalelena tu hilele-wayoga. Au tolugaviya gitoliluveluve-fa'ilidi, ada au givehimeya be hinaluve'alikadi.
Tu muliya Helodi Yudiya ginuyabuyabuna be gina Sisaliya againe gimiyami.

Ada bana Helodi miTaiya miSaidoni givekwavekwageyedi toyogina fa'ina hivaga'auta be hina Helodi hina'itana. Nagona hina kaliva sa'eyana himidivetobohiyanena, ana egana Bilasito, bana kalivai-nadi Helodi yana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna. Hivetobohiyanena be ginana Helodi nuwana ginakiveyamumuna fa'ina. Hivetobohiyaneni-yo au Helodi againe taudiyao hina higayo, “Ime nuwanuwama veyao.” Badi adiga bana yana fafali againe giyemuyemu fa'ina nuwanuwadi hinaveyao.
Ada Bilasito Helodi againe gigahe-yo au tova gisena, ada kini ana vaigau kikaiwabuna gi'ose-yo yana didiga'u'uya gihiyoto au yo'o agaidiya gilumamala.
Gilumamala gihavaina badi hikovakova higayo, “Wama keke kaliva agona, au Yaubada ago-mo'ena kanogalina.”
Badi yo'o hikovakova tu bana keke Yaubada ana egana gidakilakahini fa'ina, auhe'ama Kaiwabu yana tovenuwa'ata aulolo givelena. Au oloto kamona hi'au'ana be gi'alika.

Tu Banabasi ada Saulo tovetumagana adi tonagona agaidiya mani hinauwena-ma faisewai-nadi hiluyabuna, au Yelusalema hitauya Anidiyoka againe hiyewadi, ada kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Yoni-Maki hivega'aulena be buye hina.

Tu Anidiyoka againe tovetumagana adi yo'o agaidiya Yaubada bonana ana tolaumamala kadu ana tovehawala himiyami, adi egana Banabasi, Simiyoni kadu ana egana velugana Kwaukwauha, Lusiyo kwanaSailini, Maneyeni bana Helodi Galili ana tovehimeya buye hive'alakalakata, kadu Saulo.

Tova sa'eyana Kaiwabu hihawahawadavadavana kadu hilabelabewaviyo tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina gigahedi gigayo, “Faisewa sa'eyana fa'ina Banabasi ada Saulo gavegidedi. Au Iya agaikuya adi'iselu wanasevehailedi.”
Ada au hilabewaviyo hive'o'ola gihavaina, nimadi badi agaidiya hisena be hi'atuhegedi.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina Banabasi ada Saulo gi'iveninisedi be hilowoga, taliya ana melala againe hihobu ana egana Selusiya, ada wakeya hiyage hina himula sa'eyana ana egana Saifilasi againe.
Ada melala sa'eyana againe hiyemu, ana egana Salamisi. Mededei miYuda yadi manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi agaidiya Yaubada bonana hilumamalena. Yoni-Maki bana buye hi'ela adi toveluga fa'ina.

Au himula inubane hilowoga hina tabone hiluyabuni-yo Fafosi melala againe hiyemu. Medede againe tokwelikweli sa'eyana hinuhagana, ana egana Ba-Yesu kwanaYuda, ada bana gigahe vaita tauna Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tu give'alololo.

Bana himula ana kabemani buye himiyami, tovehimeyai-nadi ana egana Sediyo-Folo, bana kaliva halamanina. Ada tovehimeya Banabasi be Saulo giyowanidi be bana againe hina'ela, fa'ina nuwanuwana Yaubada bonana ginanogalina.
Tu tokwelikweli, ana egana velugana bona Gilika againe ma Elimasi, badi Banabasi be Saulo bonadi gihawatagona, fa'ina keke nuwanuwana tovehimeya Yesu ginavetumaganeni.

Hidedemi gihuluva fa'ina Saulo, kadu ana egana velugana Folo, Alu'aluwa Mahalina bana giluvaiyeni-yo tokwelikweli againe gi'itadonadona gigayo, “O'eni ma Setani natuna. Gaitoma moya'aina hagihagina udibutoyoge-'owona. O tove'alololo kadu kaliva koyo, koyo-mo'e. Tova moya'aina Kaiwabu yana eda tunutunugina ukikivebavebalana.

Au unogali! Adamoya Kaiwabu nimane ginamunu, ada mata ginakoyo be kauwana yana mahalina keke una'itani, unanunauwena ana tova Yaubada ginavehimeya.” Gigahe be awana gi'agolohina, auhe'ama Elimasi matana giluhowahowa be gi'uyuyuna, ada au gikifihafihaga be tamo hakwadi nimane gina'abina be ginanunudadana.
Ada tovehimeya gavadi gilakayemu-ma gi'ita-yo givetumagana, yadi vehawala Kaiwabu fa'ina ginogalini-yo nuwana givegafo'uya'uya.

Tu Folo tobohiyaneyao buye wakeya hiyage, Fafosi hinuyabuyabuni tu lehageya hinauna hinauna ma'i lauva tunugina-yo fafali ana egana Famifiliya againe hidamana'ela, au hilaka melala ana egana Fega againe. Hiyemu tu Yoni-Maki ginuyabuyabudi be giyewana Yelusalema againe.
Au Fega hihege tu Anidiyoka againe hiyemu, melalai-nadi Fisidiya againe. Ada au sabati againe manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi againe hiluku hihiyoto.

Ada tamo hakwadi Yaubada bonana gihawa, Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi etoladi againe. Gihawa gihavaina sinagogi ana tonagona venuwa'ata hi'iveninisena higayo, “Tobohiyameyao, ka'i nuwanuwa sa'eyana ase'asemiya gidadauda-ma yo'o wanalu'ageyedi, au wanalumamala.”
Au Folo gitowamidi nimane giluhawatadi digo givebutu gilumamala gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, ide omi miIsileli kadu omi kaliva tulimiyao tu Yaubada wahawadavadavana amanadi, yaku hifufu wananogalina.

Ime miIsileli yama Yaubada bwanenemeyao giluwafadi. Boi tuwai-mo'ena aimo Idifita againe hawahawala amine himiyami ana toveya, Yaubada gifaiwalaveledi be adi yo'o himoya'ai. Muliya Yaubada yana faiwala lakahina gi'iveyemaunina be givega'auledi ada Idifita hinuyabuyabuna.
Ada au babigaga againe himiyami ana toveya, yadi ga'ila'ila'a malamala foti (40) agaidiya tu au Yaubada gi'atuvefa'iledi.
Ada Kenani againe hilakayemu tu Yaubada gifaiwalaveledi be yo'o lakahidi seveni medede againe hiluyaweyawelidi, tu yadi babi ma yana yo'o giveledi be taudiyao yadi babi fa'ina.

Ada hida gaitoma galukahihiyena-ma ime miIsileli bwanenemeyao hinunauwena malamala fowa hanaledi fifiti (450) agaidiya. Muliya Yaubada yadi tonagona gisedi be hinunauwena Samuwela yana toveya, bana Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina.

Au medema tovai-nadi kini fa'ina Samuwela againe hive'o'ola, ada Yaubada Saulo gisena yadi kini fa'ina. Bana Saulo Kisi natuna, Beniyamina yana yo'o kalivana. Ada au malamala foti agaidiya bana givehivehimeyedi.
Malamala foti gihavaina, Yaubada Saulo yana abavehimeya gidabana, ada Devida gisena yadi kini fa'ina. Ada bana fa'ine tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Devida Yese natuna yana huluva yaku nuwanuwa amine fa'ina au nuwaku gi'abina. Gavadi Iya nuwanuwaku ginafaisewa, au ginafaisewa.
Au hidede amine Yaubada gigahe.
Ada Yesu aimo yana faisewa keke gidavebutu againe, Yoni miIsileli moya'aidi agaidiya gimidilumamala, higa vaita yadi dewa koyona againe hidavenikohi be hidabafitaiso.

Ada Yoni yana faisewa gidaluyabuna ma kaliva gigahedi gigayo, Omi wanuwanuwa iya vaita hakwa'adi. Iya keke Bana'e wabodabodana amanadi, tu wanogali! Iya wai ganagona tu Bana mulikuya gina'ela-ma keke akufaiweya ana ageyafayafa ganayauni, fa'ina Bana kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu iya kwamana kabisoku.
Tobohiyakweyao, omi Abelahamo bwaneneneyao kadu kaliva tulimiyao tu Yaubada wahawadavadavana amanadi, au ide agaideya hida venuwa'ata Yaubada yana kibababala fa'ina gi'iveninisena.

Tu miYelusalema adi tonagona buye Yesu hifaniyena, keke hidahalamaneni Bana'e adi Tokibababala, kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi gahe hifaniyena, gahe-nadi sabati moya'aina agaidiya kaliva hihawahawana. Tu Yesu alikeya hihegenauwena fa'ina, to'awatalatalaina tuwai-mo'ena yadi gahe badi yadi huluva fa'ina velemo'ena gilakayemu.
Ada keke tamo gavadi koyona Bana againe hidanuhagani-yo alika againe hidahegenauweni, tu au ai'adi Failato againe hive'o'ola higa ginavehimeya be hinaluve'alikana.

Ada Yaubada bonana tuwai-mo'ena Bana fa'ine Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina amine, badi miYelusalema hifaisewa-'owoni yo au ana tomuliya wowona kelose againe hikakina be tomohuyehuyeya hihuyana.

Tu Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina, ada badi hibwa'ulina Galili againe hitauya be hinauna Yelusalema yo'oi-dina agaidiya Tauna gi'i'ivemogatalina aiyeta moya'aina, ada au adamoya miIsileli agaimeya Bana fa'ine hi'awa'awatalatalaina.
O'eni Natuku, adamoya gahawavenatune.
Iya Devida againe gawonadabadaba be higa gananuwakabubuyena amine, au gananuwakabubuye-mo'emi,
mahalina ana gaitoma ganavelemi.
Au hida hifufu againe Yaubada givenuwa'atada Yesu alikeya ginasivemididina be keke gina'alika-havagi yo wowona gina'alilini.
Iya gahalamanena keke ya kaliva alikeya unahawahegeku be wowoku gina'alilini,
iya'eku ya kaliva mahamahaliku.
Tu Bana kaliva Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina amanadi keke gida'alika-havagi yo wowona gida'alilini.

Kadu wanahalamanena ka'i Mosese yana vehimeya wanavetumaganena o, keke amifaiweya yami yegayega Yaubada matane wanavaini, tu ka'i gaveyao moya'aimi Yesu wanavetumaganena, au Yaubada yami koyona matatabuna ginavenuwauluyena be yami yegayegana wanavaina.
Au wana'itave'avimi be gava vita Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tuwai-mo'ena higaheyena-ma keke omi agaimiya ginalakayemu.
Badi higayo,

Omi to'ihawadamana wanogali! Wanayaulowoga be wanakwaha, fa'ina babiya wamimiyami ana toveya gugai sa'eyana ganafaisewana. Ka'i tamo hakwadi gugai-nadi omi agaimiya gina'awatalatalainena, au keke-mo'a wanavetumaganeni.”
Au hidedemi Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya tuwai-mo'ena gigahe ada Folo yana laumamala againe gahe-nadi giyakahina.
Tu Folo gilumamala gihavaina, sinagogi againe Banabasi buye hidahobu ma kaliva hive'o'oledi be yuwa ana sabati againe kadu hinayewadi, nuwanuwa hilukahihiyena-ma kadu hinalumamalena.

Ada moya'aidi sinagogi againe hihobu-'owoga yo, au miYuda tufoidi moya'aidi Folo Banabasi agaidiya hivaga'auta. Kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina miYuda yadi yo'o agaidiya hiluku be hivemiYuda-ma badi buye hivaga'auta. Au Folo Banabasi buye hilukahihi ada badi afositolo-dina higaheya'aya'alidi be Yaubada againe hinamiyamiyave'avina yana nuwadoga hinavetuvetumaganena.
Wiki sa'eyana hihege tu sabati againe kaliva medema melala againe himiyami-ma moya'ai-mo'edi hivaga'auta be Kaiwabu bonana hinanogalina.
Tu miYuda yo'o lakahina hi'ita-yo higa'uma'uma-mo'a, au Folo hi'ihawadamanena kadu yana gahe himadubodana.
Au Kaiwabu hida vehimeya givelema, gahe-nadi Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
O'eni gavegide be yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya mahalina
unanauwena, kadu tomiyababi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya yaku kibababala fa'ina unakivetuvetunudi.
Au hidede amine Kaiwabu givehimeyema.”

Tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina yadi gahe hinogalini-yo hivemwamwala higayo, “Kaiwabu bonana au yamumuna, yamumu-mo'ena.” Ada gaveyao Yaubada givegidedi be yawai-vagahidi hinavaina, medema hivebutu hivetuvetumagana.
Ada au medema fafali againe kaliva moya'aidi Kaiwabu bonana hinogalina, valeyana give'aliyahega.
Tu miYuda badi Anidiyoka melala ana kaliva lakahidiyao kadu vevine tohawadavadava wakwamayokudiyao nuwadi hisigadagadalina be Folo Banabasi hivekwageyedi, ada yadi fafali againe hiwavidi.
Au hilowoga fwayafwaya agediya hivagahegehegena higa Yaubada yana matahiwadi ana iya'iyaya fa'ina, ada hina Aikoniumi againe.
Tu tovetumagana Anidiyoka againe ma hivemwamwala-mo'a ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina givemagadi.

Tu Folo Banabasi Aikoniumi melala againe hiyemu tu yadi huluvai-nadi meda au sa'eyana. MiYuda yadi manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi againe hiluku ada hilumamala, yadi laumamala kaliva ase'asedi gi'onana be miYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina tufoidi moya'aidi Yesu againe hivebutu hivetumagana.
Tu miYuda tufoidi yadi laumamala hidibutoyogena, ada yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina nuwadi hisigadagadalina be tolaumamala adi'iselu agaidiya hinuwakoyo.

Tu au ai'adi medede againe adi'iselu himiyami ma'ita lauva tunugina. Kaiwabu fa'ine ase'asedi bouna hilumamala, ada Bana gifaiwalaveledi be aituha fifiwalana kadu abaveyaulowoga hifaisewadi. Hidede amine gifaiwalaveledi be kaliva hinahalamanena yadi laumamala yana nuwadoga fa'ina au velemona.
Tu melala kalivana yadi nuwanuwa luhei. Tufoidi miYuda himuliyedi, tufoidi afositolo adi'iselu himuliyedi.
Au yo'o tulidiyao kalivadi kadu miYuda hivevai adi tonagona buye'i vaita hinamunudi ada hinatutuve'alikadi.

Ada au yadi nuwanuwa afositolo hinogalini-yo au fafali ana egana Likoniya againe hi'otayabuyabudi, melala luhei Lisidila kadu Debi agaidiya hiluku ada medema fafali-dina agaidiya hinudadana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hilumamalena.
Ada Folo gilulumamala tu bana tovefela givetoga-yo givanevanenega. Au Folo bana againe gi'itadona, yana vetumagana gi'ayaunena higa vaita Yaubada anafaiweya ginakiveyamumuna.
Hidedemi gi'ayauneni-yo gikova'awafatafata gigayo “Umidi, umididi-mo'a.” Auhe'ama kaliva gimadutowamidi givetubu ginunudadana.
Tu yo'o kaliva againe Folo gavadi gigana-ma hi'ita-yo, hivebutu taudiyao meyadiya bona Likoniya againe hikovakova higayo, “Viviluwa hivekaliva be ide agaideya hihobu'ela.”

Au Banabasi hivewagana Seusi, bana yadi viviluwa adi tonagona, ada Folo hivewagana Hemesa, bana yadi viviluwa yadi tovenuwa'ata. Bana Folo gilumamala fa'ina hivaita gidaveHemesa, higa vaita tovenuwa'ata amine gihuluva fa'ina.

Ada yadi melala tufone manuwa-tafalolo gimidimidi, mededei Seusi againe hitafatafalolo. Ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa Seusi yana kaliva, bulumakau hala adi wa'odo'odo falafalawasi gi'aliyedi melala ana abaluku againe. Bana'e kadu yo'o buye'i nuwanuwadi yomuyomu hinamunudi be higa vaita afositolo hinahawadavadavadi.
Boi yo'o tulina tulina gavaimi taudiyao hinuwanuwa amine, au hihuluvina ada Yaubada keke gidahawatadi.

Tu yana iya'iyaya we'a gidadauda. Yana nuwakabubu tova moya'aina givetavetala fa'ina wahalamanena we'a Yaubada gimimiyami. Bana wehi givehimeyena be lobameya gihobuhobu, kadu a'a givehimeyena be gitubutubuga. Adaga giveleveleda ada nuwada gikiveyamumuna be kavemwamwala-mo'a.”
Hidedemi afositolo adi'iselu hilukahihi nonogana keke ihayadi yo'o hidahawatadi be yomuyomu hinamununi-yo hinahawadavadavadi.
Tu muliya tovetumagana hi'ela himidififina againe, au gimidi melaleya giyewana. Bogi sa'eyana hida mala gilauna bana'e Banabasi buye hilowoga hina Debi melala againe.

Au hida melalai-dina agaidiya tovetumagana hihawadonedi be yadi vetumagana againe hina'atuvefa'ila, ada hilu'ageyedi be tova moya'aina Yesu hinavetuvetumaganena kadu hivenuwa'atadi higayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwada tova mulina Yaubada yana abavehimeya againe kanaluku au vita moya'aina adafaiweya kadanuhagana.” Au hidedemi hivenuwa'atadi.

Ada badi tovetumagana adi yo'o sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya adi tonagona hisedi, ada hilabewaviyo tovetumagana fa'idiya hive'ove'o'ola higayo, “Kaiwabu, hida kaliva vevine O againiya ahe hivetumagana. Au O nimaniya anasedi be una'ita'itave'avidi.”
Hidedemi Folo Banabasi hive'o'ola tu hilowoga, Fisidiya ana fafali againe hinauna tu Famifiliya ana fafaliya hiyemu.
Au miFega agaidiya Yaubada bonana hilumamaleni tu Ataliya againe hihobu, medema taliyeya.

Mededei wakeya hiyage be Anidiyoka hiyewadi, melalai-nadi againe yadi lowoga hive'inubena. Boi tuwaina hilowoga ana toveya, tovetumagana Yaubada nimane hisedi be yadi faisewa againe ginanuwadogedi. Ada au Folo Banabasi hida faisewa ahe hiluyabuna.
Ada au Anidiyoka againe tovetumagana agaidiya himiyami lauva tunugina.

Au yadi vehawala fa'ina Folo Banabasi hidakeyedi, ada yadi wanuwakoyo buye hivekwavekwageya. Yadi vekwageya hinunauwena fa'ina, vehimeya hisena vaita Folo Banabasi kadu Anidiyoka tovetumagana tufoidi Yelusalema againe hinana, be afositolo kadu tovetumagana adi tonagona buye hinalukahihi ka'i yo'o tulidiyao tovetumagana iya'iyaya wowodiya hinatomogolohina o ka'i keke.

Ada au tovetumagana adi yo'o hivagahegedi, ada fafali adi egana Finisiya kadu Sameliya adihinafeya hinauna tu tovetumagana medede againe hivenuwa'atadi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Kaiwabu againe ahe hihagaviladi be hivetumagana. Ada miFinisiya miSameliya tovetumagana hida valeyadi hinogalina againe, hivemwamwala lakahina.

Ada Yelusalema hiyemu againe, tovetumagana adi yo'o hilusiuleyedi, badi afositolo kadu tovetumagana adi tonagona buye'i, ada gavadi Yaubada yadi faisewa againe gigugaiyena-ma badi agaidiya matatabuna hi'awatalatalainena.

Tu tovetumagana tufoidi ma, badi Falisi adi yo'o kalivai-dina, hitowamidi higayo, “Badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina wanagahedi be iya'iyaya wowodiya hinatomogolohina, kadu wanavehimeyedi be Mosese yana vehimeya matatabuna hina'itave'avina.”
Au afositolo kadu tovetumagana adi tonagona buye hivaga'auta be hida gaitoma hinanuwenuwena fa'ina.

Ada buye hive'agahegahe lauva tunugina-yo Fita gitowamidi gigahedi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, omi wahalamanena boi nagona Yaubada ide agaideya iya givegideku be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya ganalumamalena, ada badi adifaiweya hinanogalina be Kaiwabu againe hinavetumagana fa'ina.

Ada Yaubada, Bana'e kaliva ase'aseda gihalamanena amanadi, Alu'aluwa Mahalina ide agaideya gihawahegena amine, meda badi agaidiya gihawahegena, ada hida yana hawahega againe Bana yana nuwanuwa yamumuna badi yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya gikiveyemaunina.
Au ide keke miYuda gagana gida'ita'itada, au badi yo'o tulidiyao kadu gi'ita'itadi. Ada au badi Yesu hivetumaganena fa'ina, ase'asedi gikiveyeveyegana.

Hidema fa'ina gavadi-yo wahuluva vaita Yaubada wada'ive'ago'ugani? Nuwanuwami yo'o tulidiyao tovetumagana Mosese yana vehimeya matatabuna hina'itave'avina tu ide bwanenedeyao buye keke adafaiweya vehimeyai-nadi kada'itave'avini. Ka'i omi wanavehimeyedi be Mosese yana vehimeya matatabuna hina'itave'avina, au vita lakahina wanaveledi be Yaubada wana'ive'ago'ugana.

Keke-mo'a hidedemi wanahuluvini. Keke Mosese yana vehimeya fa'ina kibababala kadanuhagani, au Kaiwabu Yesu yana nuwadoga fa'ina kibababala kanuhagana. Yada vetumagana againe kibababala kanuhagana, kadu badi anafaiweya yadi vetumagana againe kibababala hinuhagana.”

Tu yo'o matatabudi Fita yana gahe hinogalini-yo hive'amata, ada Banabasi Folo hilukahihi-ma badi hivanenegedi. Higahedi vaita Yaubada gidafaiwalaveledi be aituha fifiwalana kadu abaveyaulowoga yo'o tulidiyao hinafadiya hidafaisewadi.
Badi hilukahihi gihavaina, bana Yemesa gitowamidi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, yaku gahe wananogalina.

Bana Saimoni ahe gikivetuvetunuda be higa gavaiya'amine boi nagona Yaubada yo'o tulidiyao gi'itanuwakabubuyedi be Alu'aluwa Mahalina kadu badi agaidiya gihawahegena. Kadu gaveyao nuwanuwana yana kaliva fa'ina badi agaidiya, medema Tauna fa'ine gisevehailedi.
Ada iya gagahe amine meda anafaiweya tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina higahe. Au Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya tuwai-mo'ena gigahe gigayo,
Devida bwaneneneyao kadu gana'itanuwakabubuyedi.
Bana melalina hikoyo higa yadi abavehimeya
gihavaina tu Iya ganave'etolakahidi.
Boi bana melalina hivetovehimeya amine,
meda adamoya bwanenena sa'eyana ginavetovehimeya.
Ginavetovehimeya be yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya
gaveyao galuwafadi medema hinamuliyeku.
E, medema moya'aidi Iya Kaiwabu hinaleleku.
Au hidedemi Iya Yaubada Kaiwabu gagahe,
tuwai-mo'ena gaitomai-nadi gagaheye-vagahina.”
Au hidedemi Yemesa Yaubada yana gahe giyakahina.
Kadu gigayo, “Yaku nuwanuwa hidede amine. Yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada againe hihagaviladi-ma keke vehimeya moya'aina vitana kanaveledi.

Au yadi leta kana'etoladina be kanagahedi higa kevakeva kilumina agaidiya mali kaliva hihawadavadavayedi-ma keke hina'u'ani, mema kevakeva koyona. Kadu kaliva keke mali vevine buye hinadauda, meda anafaiweya vevine keke mali kaliva buye hinadauda. Kadu kevakeva kikibahidiyao dayagidi keke gidamadu-ma keke hina'u'ani. Kadu keke kevakeva dayagidi hinayuni. Au kanagahedi be hida Mosese yana vehimeya ana hawatai-dina hina'itave'avidi.

Mosese yana vehimeya kaliva moya'aidiyao hihalamanena, fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena be hinunauwena adamoya melala moya'aina agaidiya kaliva Mosese yana gahe fa'ina hilulumamala, kadu sabati sa'eyana sa'eyana yana buki-vehimeya sinagogi agaidiya hihawahawana.” Au hidedemi Yemesa yana gahe.

Tu afositolo ada tovetumagana adi tonagona, kadu tovetumagana adi yo'o matatabudi yadi lukahihi hiluyabuna, au hivehimeya be kaliva tufoidi yadi yo'o agaidiya hinavenuwadadanedi, ada hina'iveninisedi be Folo Banabasi Anidiyoka againe buye hinana. Au kaliva adi'iselu hivenuwadadanedi, adi egana Yudasi kadu hivewagana Basabasa, ada Sailosi. Au badi kaliva yamumudiyao tovetumagana matadiya.
Ada leta hiveledi be hinanauwena. Leta againe hidede amine hi'etoladi higayo,

“Yo siule tobohiyameyao, omi yo'o tulimiyao tovetumagana Anidiyoka, Siliya kadu Silisiya agaidiya wamimiyami amanadi. Ime tobohiyamiyao afositolo ada tovetumagana adi tonagona yami leta a'etoladina be wana'itana.
Hidema fa'ina moya'aima nuwama sa'eyana avehimeya be yama kaliva tufoidi avenuwadadanedi ada omi agaimiya ana'iveninisedi. Au tobohiya'ase'asemeyao Banabasi Folo badi yama kaliva buye hina'ela.
Banabasi Folo ma yawaidi hihawahegena be Keliso yana faiseweya kabisona hina'alika.
Tu au yama kaliva adi'iselu a'iveninisedi, adi egana Yudasi kadu Sailosi. Ime hida leta againe avenuwa'atami amine, meda badi awadiya hina'alakakila.
Au Alu'aluwa Mahalina matane kadu ime matameya gilubodana be keke vehimeya moya'aina omi agaimiya anaseni, au hida vehimeya lakahinaga anasena.

Higa keke kevakeva kilumina agaidiya mali kaliva hinauwedi be hihawadavadavayedi-ma wana'u'ani. Kadu keke kevakeva dayagidi wanayuni, kadu kevakeva kikibahidiyao dayagidi keke gidamadu-ma keke wana'u'ani. Kadu kaliva keke mali vevine buye hinadauda, meda anafaiweya vevine keke mali kaliva buye hinadauda. Ka'i hida hawata wana'itave'avidi amine, wanamiyami hagihagina. Kafoi.”
Tu leta hi'etoladina gihavaina, yadi kaliva hi'atuhegedi be hina Anidiyoka. Medede againe tovetumagana moya'aidi hikovavaga'auhi-'owodi be leta hiveledi.
Au leta ana hawa hinogalina againe, hivemwamwala fa'ina yadi venuwa'ata yamumuna againe nuwadi hikivetoyogina.
Ada badi Yudasi Sailosi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina, ada hilumamala lauva tunugina be tovetumagana hilu'ageyedi nuwadi hikivetoyogina.
Au medede againe himiyami lauva tunugina yo hikidewadewa be hinayewadi. Badi tovetumagana hi'atuhegedi higayo, “Yaubada buye wanana.” Ada au badi hi'iveninisedi-ma agaidiya hiyewadi. [
Tu bana Sailosi ma nuwanuwana ginamiya fa'ina keke gidana.]
Tu Folo Banabasi Anidiyoka againe himiyami ma'i lauva tunugina, ada badi'iyao kadu kaliva velugadiyao buye hivehavehawala, Kaiwabu bonana hilulumamalena.

Himiyami tu Folo Banabasi gigahena gigayo, “Kanana tovetumagana melala moya'aina agaidiya boi kana Kaiwabu bonana kalumamalena-ma kana'itadi, be kanahalamanena ka'i yadi vetumagana gitubuga o ka'i keke.”

Bana Banabasi ma nuwanuwana Yoni-Maki buye hinanauwena tu Banabasi yana nuwanuwa Folo matane keke hagihagina, fa'ina boi yadi naudadana Famifiliya againe ginuyabuyabudi be giyewana, au keke yadi faisewa ana lauyabu againe buye hidamiyami.
Hidema fa'ina yadi wanuwakoyo tu buye hivekwageya ada hinuvehaila. Banabasi Maki ginauwena ada wakeya hiyage be himula ana egana Saifilasi againe hina.
Tu bana Folo ma Sailosi givenuwadadanena be buye ginanauwena. Ada tovetumagana badi Kaiwabu nimane gisedi be yadi faisewa againe ginanuwadogedi, ada au hilowoga.
Ada fafali adi egana Siliya kadu Silisiya agaidiya hinumiyamiyanana, tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina hilulu'ageyedi be yadi vetumagana ginatubuga fa'ina.
Ada tovetumagana moya'aidi Lisidila againe kadu Aikoniumi againe Timoti hihawaveyamumuyena.

Au Folo nuwanuwana Timoti bana ginabwa'ulina, ada melala tulina tulina hinanudadanidi-ma agaidiya miYuda himiyami be moya'aidi hihalamanena Timoti tamana kwanaGilika, fa'ina Folo Timoti wowone Yaubada yana iya'iyaya gitomogolohina be miYuda keke hinakiloweni.

Ada melala tulina tulina agaidiya hinunumiyamiyanana tu afositolo kadu tovetumagana adi tonagona Yelusalema againe gavaimi hivehimeya-ma badi tovetumagana hivenuwa'atadi be higa vehimeyai-dina hina'itave'avidi.
Ada au tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina yadi vetumagana gitubutubuga kadu aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana himoyamoya'ai.
Ada fafali ana egana Maisiya tufone hiyemu againe, hinuwanuwa vaita fafali ana egana Bidiniya againe hidana, tu Yesu Alu'aluwana kadu gihawatadi.
Hidema fa'ina Maisiya hinafane hinauna hinauna tu melala sa'eyana ana egana Talowasi againe hihobu.
Ada bogi againe Folo gi'eno'ita ada yana ita againe kwanaMasedoniya gi'itana, gimidimidi tu give'ove'o'olena toyogina gigayo, “Masedoniya agaimeya uda'ela udavelugama.”

Ada Folo hidede amine gi'eno'ita fa'ina, (iya Luke badi buye) akidewadewa be Masedoniya againe anamaduna. Au anuwanuwa higa vaita Yaubada givehimeyema be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna miMasedoniya agaidiya analumamalena.
Akidewadewa ada wakeya ayage digo Talowasi ahege tu himula ana egana Samodelesi againe adamana. Bogi ada mala gilauna kadu adamana, melala ana egana Niyafolisi againe ayemu.

Ada medede againe ahobu, au ana melala ana egana Filifai againe. Filifai Masedoniya ana fafaliya gidauda ada medema fafali-nadi againe Filifai melala lakahina. Ada melala-mo'ena miLoma hive'alahina. Ada au medede againe aiyeta tufona amiyami.

Ada sabati againe melala tufone ana gufeya ahobu. Avaita gufa afa'aine miYuda ve'ove'o'ola fa'ina tova moya'aina hidavagavaga'auta. Au ayemu ada ahiyoto be vevine ahe hivaga'auta-ma agaidiya avebutu alumamala.

Ada tovanenega agaidiya kwamayoku sa'eyadi himiyami, adi egana Lidiya badi vineTaiyataila. Yadi faisewa ma kaleko likelikena fatana lakahina ana kimonevedamana. Ada badi Yaubada hihawadavadavana. Au Folo gilumamala againe, Kaiwabu nuwadi gikiyauna be yana laumamala hivenogalena.

Hivetumaganeni-yo hibafitaiso, badi'e kadu yadi manuwa hinagena ana yo'o buye'i. Hibafitaiso gihavaina, hive'o'olema toyogina higayo, “Ka'i omi wanuwanuwa vaita ima Kaiwabu adavetumagane-mo'eni, au wa'ela be yama manuweya wanamiyami.” Ada au hisive'auyema.

Tova sa'eyana ve'ove'o'ola ana abavaga'auta againe anauna tu agetoga kwamayoku edeya amaduhagana, kwamayoku-nadi balauma giluvaiyena. Bana balauma halamana givelevelena be gavadi gavadi aimo ginalakayemu-ma, bana kwamayoku gihawahawavemogatalena. Ada kaliva vevine moya'aidi agetoga ana tovehimeya mani hiveleveledi be aimo gavadi badi agaidiya ginalakayemu-ma kwamayoku ginahawavemogatalena fa'ina. Ada au bana yana hawavemogatala againe ana tovehimeya yadi mani lakahina hivaivaina.
Au kwamayoku Folo kadu ime buye gimulimuliyema, gikovakovadona gigayo, “Hida kalivai-dina Yaubada Getane-mo'ane yana tofaisewa. Kibababala ana eda fa'ina omi agaimiya hilulumamalena.”

Au hidede amine ginunauwena aiyeta a gavaiyehi tu Folo dibuna gitoyoga, fa'ina gihagavilana yafune againe gigahe gigayo, “Yesu ana eganeya gavehimeye be kwamayoku unanuyabuyabuna.” Ada auhe'ama yafune gimadunuyabuyabuna.

Tu agetoga ana tovehimeya yadi mani inubana kwamayoku yana hawavemogatala againe a gihavaina-ma hi'ayaunena. Hidedemi hi'ayaunena fa'ina, Folo Sailosi himadukive'avidi digo abavedewayauga melala hinafane hitaidi be melala ana tonagona matadiya hisedi.
Au tonagona, badi miLoma, matadiya hisedi tu higahe higayo, “Hida hima kalivai-dina miYuda, ada badi fa'idiya vekwageya lakahina yada melaleya gilakayemu.
Dewa tulina hivehavehawalayena ada dewai-nadi againe ide Loma kaliva yada vehimeya hihawatana. Au ide Loma kaliva fa'ina keke adafaiweya yadi vehawala kana'abini o ka'i kanadibumuhigeni.”
Badi agetoga ana tovehimeya hidedemi higahe tu kadu yo'o hivebutu Folo Sailosi himunumunudi. Au melala ana tonagona hivehimeya be tolugaviya adi kaleko hinavehalilini-yo hinalaulaudi.
Ada ahe himunukoyokoyodi-yo deliya hihegenauwedi, ada deli ana to'itave'avina hivehimeyena be gina'itave'avi-hagihagiyedi.
Au to'itave'avina hida vehimeya ginogalini-yo abamiyami hinagene-mo'ane gisedi, ada agedi yowana folefolegina againe hihuya-yo hilokana.
Hikwelikweli tu auhe'ama li'uli'u lakahina gilakayemu ada deli ana manuwa gili'uli'u. Kadu auhe'ama wanafali moya'aina gi'ayauyau-'owona, ada filisina moya'aidi adi bulava kainumula gi'agologolohina.

Au deli ana to'itave'avina gi'enohabalutuga, ada deli ana wanafali gi'ayauna-ma gi'itana againe, ginuwanuwa vaita filisina moya'aidi ahe hida'ota fa'ina yana ilama gisiwakana be tauna ginaluve'alikana.
Tauna gidaluve'alikana ma Folo gikovadona gigayo, “Umiya, keke tauni unaluve'alika! Au we'a moya'aima amimiyami.”
Au to'itave'avina mahala fa'ina gikova. Givaini-yo gimaduluku ada Folo Sailosi agediya gi'ibo'ula-mo'a tu yana wamatauta givetavetatava.
Ada au deliya gisehobuyedi digo gitoliluveluvedi gigayo, “Kaliva, gavadi ganagani-yo Yaubada yana kibababala gananuhagani?”
Badi higayo, “Kaiwabu Yesu againe unavetumagana be kibababala unanuhagana, o'eni kadu ya manuwa hinagena yo'oi-dina buye'i.”
Kadu Kaiwabu bonana bana againe kadu yana manuwa hinagena moya'aidi agaidiya hilumamalena.
Ada bogi nafona nonogana to'itave'avina ginauwedi be adi koliya gikolana. Ada keke gidaboda, auhe'ama bana'e kadu yana manuwa hinagena moya'aidi hibafitaiso.

Hibafitaiso gihavaina, to'itave'avina Folo Sailosi yana manuweya givega'auledi be adiga gikidewedewena. Ada au bana'e yana manuwa hinagena buye hivemwamwala-mo'a, Yaubada againe hivetuvetumagana fa'ina.
Tu mala gilauna miLoma tonagona yadi filisimani hi'iveninisedi, vehimeya hiveledi be deli ana to'itave'avina hinagahena hinagayo, “Wadema kaliva adi'iselu unayaudi be hinana.”

Au yadi vehimeya to'itave'avina ginogalini-yo Folo givenuwa'atana gigayo, “Tonagona yadi vehimeya hisena be o'eni Sailosi buye ganayaumi be wanana. Au wanana tu yami lowoga keke kaliva moya'aidi matadiya.”
Au filisimani Loma tonagona agaidiya hida gahe hi'awatalatalainena, ada Folo Sailosi higayo, Ime Loma kaliva, ma badi hinogalini-yo au himatautave'ine.
Au hina badi agaidiya higahe higayo, “Ime akoyo fa'ina keke adavedewayaugimi miLoma yada vehimeya gigahe amine. Au nuwanuwama wanahobu be yama melala wananuyabuyabuna.”
Ada au Folo Sailosi deliya hihobu be Lidiya yadi manuweya hina. Ada medede againe tovetumagana buye hivaga'auta be hilu'ageyedi. Hilukahihi gihavaina, au hilowoga.
Ada Folo yana dewa tova moya'aina amine sinagogi againe ginauna, ada sabati tohiye Yaubada bonana tuwai-mo'ena Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina-ma againe gilumamaledi.

Au bonai-nadi giyauyauna, Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso fa'ine gikivetuvetunudi. Gigahedi gigayo, “Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina gigahe vaita Keliso aulolo kaliva nimadiya anafaiweya gidavaina, kadu gida'alika be gidamididi-havagi. Ada Yaubada yana gahe keke ginabe'u fa'ina, au hida gaitoma yana Tovegida Keliso againe ahe gilakayemu. Ada Bana hida kalivai-nadi ana egana Yesu tova adamoya omi agaimiya galulukahihiyena, medema Yaubada yana Tovegidai-nadi.”

Ada miYuda tufoidi Folo yana gahe hivetumaganena, ada Folo Sailosi hivetobohiyanedi. Meda anafaiweya yo'o tulidiyao kavewagadi miGilika tufoidi moya'aidi Yaubada tova moya'aina hihawadavadavana-ma hivebutu Yesu againe hivetumagana. Kadu wakwamayokudiyao moya'aidi hivetumagana.

Tu miYuda ma higa'uma'uma, fa'ina melala ana kaliva koyodiyao hinunu-kawowo ma hivaga'auhidi be hisiveyo'odi-yo hivebutu hi'ago'agodadaga, ada au kaliva moya'aidi hive'atalalakalaka. Ada bana kaliva ana egana Yesoni yana wamanuweya amine himaduna, yana wanafali hidobona, higa vaita Folo Sailosi hidanuhagadi be yo'o agaidiya hidasehobuyedi.

Tu hilele-wayogedi fa'ina, bana Yesoni kadu tovetumagana velugadiyao buye hikive'avidi be melala ana tonagona agaidiya hitaidi. Hiyemuyemu tu hikovakova higayo, “Hida hima kalivai-dina fafali tulina tulina agaidiya vekwageya hiseyemayemaunena, ada adamoya yada melala againe kadu hivebutu.
Ada bana Yesoni yana manuweya giselukuwedi. Au badi moya'aidi yada Tokaiwabu lakahina Sisa yana vehimeya hiyawelina, fa'ina higahe vaita yadi tokaiwabu kaliva tulina, ana egana Yesu.”
Ada yadi gahe yo'o kadu melala ana tonagona hinogalini-yo au hive'atalalakalaka.
Au tonagona hivehimeya be Yesoni tobohiyaneyao tovetumagana buye mani againe hinalaufata be higa keke kadu vekwageya hinaseyemauneni. Ada hilaufata-yo au hiyaudi be hina yadi manuweya.
Tu mala ahe gibogi Tesalonaika tovetumagana Folo Sailosi hi'atuhegedi be melala ana egana Beliya againe hinana. Ada ahe hiyemu au miYuda yadi sinagogi againe hina.

Ada badi miYuda Beliya againe keke miTesalonaika nuwadi abodana amine, au miBeliya nuwadi yauyaugina. Nuwanuwadi lakahina Folo yana laumamala hinanogalina, ada aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana Yaubada bonana tuwai-mo'ena hi'etoladina-ma hi'ita'itanuwenuwena be hinahalamanena ka'i Folo yana laumamala velemo'ena o ka'i fwaya.
Ada au miYuda tufoidi moya'aidi hivetumagana, kadu Gilika vevine wakwamayokudiyao moya'aidi ada Gilika kaliva moya'aidi hivetumagana.
Yo'o hinuwanuwakoyo fa'ina, tovetumagana auhe'ama bana Folo melala taliya againe hivagahegena be ginayage, tu badi Sailosi Timoti Beliya againe himiya.

Ada badi kaliva Folo hivebwa'uliyena-ma melala ana egana Adenisi againe hivegaloveni tu Beliya againe hiyewadi. Nagona Folo venuwa'ata Sailosi Timoti fa'idiya giveledi gigayo, “Wanagahedi be iya agaikuya hinamadu'ela.” Gigahedi-yo badi hilowoga.
Tu Folo Adenisi againe Sailosi Timoti fa'idiya gibodaboda tu ase'asena gi'u'aulolo, fa'ina kilumina keke sa'eyadi melalai-nadi againe hidauda-ma gi'itadi.

Kilumina moya'aidi gi'itadi fa'ina, aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana Yaubada bonana gilulumamalena. Badi miYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada hihawadavadavana-ma sinagogi againe bana buye hive'agahegahe, kadu gaveyao melala hinafane hinunudadana-ma badi agaidiya gilulumamala.

Kadu tonuwahuya tufoidi bana Folo buye hive'agahegahe adi yo'o luhei, sa'eyana adi egana Efikuliyani, kadu sa'eyana adi egana Sitoika. Tufoidi higayo, “Hida hima togakahikahi kwavakwavana vaita gavaimi gidalukahihiyeni?” Kadu tufoidi higayo, “Ka'i viviluwa tulidi fa'idiya gilulumamala.” Hidedemi higahe higa Folo Yesu Tauna kadu yana mididi-havagi gilumamalena fa'ina.

Tova moya'aina gilulumamala fa'ina, hiyowanina be Koniselo yadi vaga'auta againe hivega'aulena, abavaga'auta ana egana Aliyofago. Ada ahe hivaga'auta-yo higahe higayo, “Nuwanuwama hida eda ivaguna o ululukahihiyena-ma anahalamanena. Gavaimi uvehawala?
Nuwanuwa tufona ulumamalena-ma boi keke tamo hidede amine adanogalini, ada nuwanuwama ana kaivila anahalamanena.”
Tu miAdenisi kadu hawahawala melalai-nadi againe himiyami-ma, higa keke tamo gavadi hidagani tu tova moya'aina nuwanuwa ivaguna tulina tulina hilulukahihiyena o ka'i hivanevanenegena.
Badi higahe tu bana Folo gitowamidi Koniselo yadi vaga'auta Aliyofago againe givebutu gilukahihi, gigayo, “MiAdenisi-yo! Omi'iyao viviluwa tulina tulina wahawadavadavadi ma a ga'itana.
Yami melala hinafane ahe ganudadana yami abahawadavadava ga'ita'itana tu atudidiga sa'eyana ganuhagana-ma againe etoladi gidadauda gigayo,
Viviluwa sa'eyana ana egana
keke kadahalamaneni-ma ana abahawadavadava.
Bana keke wadahalamaneni tu au ai'adi wahawadavadavana-ma, adamoya iya ga'ela be Bana fa'ine ganahawavemogatala.

Bana ana egana Yaubada, babi gibubuna kadu gaitoma moya'aina babiya himimiyami-ma gibubudi, ada Bana Yaubadai-nadi lobama kadu babi ana Kaiwabu, tu keke manuwa-tafalolo tomiyababi hikivemididina-ma agaidiya gidamiyami.
