Kadu keke tomiyababi nimada gidavetumaganeni vaita Bana fa'ine tamo gavadi kadafaisewani, keke. Au Bana Tauna tomiyababi moya'aida yawaida inubana, kadu gaitoma moya'aina giveleda.

Ada nagona kaliva sa'eyana gibubuna ada bana kalivai-nadi againe yo'o tulidi tulidi hitubuyemu, ada givehimeyedi be hinave'aliyahega babi matatabuna hinavemagana. Ada Bana anakaibe yo'o tulidi tulidi yadi tova gisena, yadi tubuyemu kadu yadi lauyabu givehimeyena, ada gava fafali gava fafali agaidiya hinamiyami-ma kadu givehimeyena.

Ada Yaubada hidedemi gibubudi be kaliva Bana'e hinalelena fa'ina. Nuwadi uyu'uyuyuna fa'ina hinalelena ada ka'i hinakidadanina be hinanuhagana. Tu Bana Yaubada keke lauveya gidamiyami, au moya'aida lilideya gimimiyami.

E, tamo hakwadi gigahe gigayo, Bana'e yawaida inubana, kadu yada naudadana inubana, kadu yada miyami inubana. Kadu anafaiweya yami tonuwahuya tufoidi ahe higahe higayo, Kadu ide moya'aida Bana natuneyao.

Au kaliva kilumina hibubudi aimo fanifanidiyao ana toveya, ada medema tovai-nadi Yaubada keke gidanuwenuwedi vaita matahiwadi gidaveledi, tu tova adamoya kaliva moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya givehimeyedi be yadi dewa koyona hinavenikohiyena.

Hidedemi hinahagaviladi fa'ina vedewayauga ana tova ahe gisena be tomiyababi moya'aida ginavedewayaugida. Yada dewa kabi'ona be lakahina gihalamane-'owona fa'ina, yana vedewayauga au tunutunugina. Ada Kaliva sa'eyana givegidena be Bana ginavedewayaugida. Ada Bana Kalivai-nadi alikeya gisivemididina fa'ina, ide kahalamanena Bana velemona ginavedewayaugida.” Au hidedemi Folo yana laumamala.
Tu badi Folo yana gahe kaliva yana mididi-havagi fa'ina hinogalina againe, tufoidi hihawavelaigena tu tufoidi ma higahena higayo, “Nuwanuwama hidevama fa'ina unalukahihi-havagi be ananogalina.”
Ada au Folo Koniselo yadi vaga'auta againe gihobu.

Tu kaliva tufoidi Folo hivetobohiyanena, hivebutu hivetumagana. Ada badi agaidiya kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Daiyonisiyo, bana Aliyofago koniselo sa'eyana, kadu kwamayoku adi egana Damalisi, kadu kaliva velugadiyao.
Tu Folo ahe Aliyofago Koniselo agaidiya gilukahihi gihavaina, gikidewadewa be Adenisi ginuyabuyabuni tu gina melala ana egana Kolinita againe.

Medede againe Yuda kaliva sa'eyana ginuhagana, ana egana Akwila. Bana fafali ana egana Fonito againe gitubuga, ada vavinena adi egana Filisila. Au fafali ana egana Itali againe vavinena buye hitauya be Kolinita againe hiyemuna-mo'a. Itali hinuyabuyabuna fa'ina Loma Tokaiwabu lakahina, ana egana Sisa-Kelodiyo, givehimeya be miYuda moya'aidi Itali melalina lakahina Loma hinanuyabuyabu-'owona.
Au Folo gina gi'itadi, ada badi yadi faisewa bana yana faisewa amine higa falai ana i'ona'onaga, fa'ina badi agaidiya gina gimiyami buye hififaisewa.
Ada sabati sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe ginauna, miYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kavewagadi miGilika gigahegahe-ya'aya'alidi be yana laumamala hinavetumaganena.

Tu badi higawoluwoluyena ada hihawave'iyohoyohoyena againe, ana aikeva ana fwayafwaya badi matadiya gisibutuna be higa ana vehimeya badi agaidiya gihavaina-ma ana aituha. Au gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i keke yawai-vagahimi wananuhagani, au taumiyao. Keke aku vita. Au ganahawa'atuhenehenemi be yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya ganana ganalumamala.”
Ada au ginuyabuyabudi tu gina yo'o tulidiyao kalivana sa'eyana yana manuweya giluku gimiyami, ana egana Titiyo-Yasito. Bana Yaubada gihawadavadavana ada yana manuwa sinagogi liline.

Ada kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Kelisifo, bana sinagogi ana tovehimeya, Kaiwabu againe givetumagana, bana'e kadu yana manuwa hinagena buye hivetumagana. Kadu miKolinita tufoidi moya'aidi Folo yana laumamala hinogalini-yo hivetumagana ada hibafitaiso.
Iya o'eni buye kamimiyami fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginamunu, au hida melala againe yaku kaliva be yaku vevine moya'aidi himimiyami.” Au hidedemi Kaiwabu gigahe.
Ada au Folo Kolinita againe malamala sa'eyana kadu hafuna gimiyami, Yaubada bonana gilumamalena.
Tu bana Galiyo, kwanaLoma, fafali ana egana Akaiya againe gikabemani ana toveya, miYuda hivevai be Folo hikive'avina ada kotu againe hinauwena.
Higahe higayo, “Hida hima kaliva tova moya'aina kaliva gisisive'auyedi be eda tulina amine Yaubada hinahawadavadavana, ada edai-nadi yama vehimeya gihawatana.”

Tu omi yana hifufugaga fa'ina wavekwageyena, kadu egana tulina tulina kadu taumiyao yami vehimeya fa'ina wavekwageyena. Au taumiyao wanakivetuvetununa. Hida omi yami gaitoma fa'ina iya keke ganavedewayauga.”
Ada au giwavidi be vedewayauga ana manuwa againe hihobu.
Hihobu tu kaliva ana egana Sosidenisi hikive'avina, bana sinagogi ana tovehimeya. Hikive'avina digo abavedewayauga ana eda'awaneya himununa, tu bana Galiyo keke gidahawatadi.

Tu Folo tovetumagana Kolinita againe buye himiyami ma'i lauva tunugina yo gihegedi, ada gilowoga be ginana fafali ana egana Siliya againe. Ada badi Filisila Akwila hibwa'ulina. Taliya ana melala ana egana Senikeliya againe hiyemu tu bana Folo boi Yaubada againe giwonadabadaba fa'ina, u'una gitotona, higa yana wonadabadaba ana aituha giluyabuna. Au wakeya adi'itoto hidododi be hinauwedi.
Ada melala ana egana Efeso againe hiyemu ada medede againe badi Filisila Akwila himiya tu bana Folo ginuyabuyabudi be ginunudadana. Au sinagogi againe gina miYuda buye hive'agahegahe.
Ada badi hive'o'olena be agaidiya ginamiya lauva tunugina tu givekekeyedi.
Ada au gilowoga againe gigahedi gigayo, “Ka'i Yaubada ginahawahegeku amine, omi agaimiya ganayewaku.” Ada au gina wakeya giyage be Efeso ginuyabuyabuna.
Hinauna tu melala ana egana Sisaliya againe hiyemu au Folo gihobu be gina Yelusalema againe tovetumagana gilusiuleyedi-yo au Anidiyoka againe gihobu.

Ada Anidiyoka againe gimiyami ma'i lauva tunugina tu kadu givebutu ginunudadana, Galesiya ana fafali kadu Filidiya ana fafali agaidiya ginumiyamiyanana. Ada melala moya'aina agaidiya tovetumagana gilu'ageyedi be tova moya'aina Yesu hinavetuvetumaganena.

Ada Kaiwabu yana Eda againe gisikulu ada yana wadibumuhiga gilulumamala, Yesu kahihina gilulukahihiyena tunutunugina. Tu bafitaiso Yesu ana eganeya ma keke gidahalamaneni, au Yoni yana bafitaisogaga gihalamanena.

Au givebutu sinagogi againe ase'asena bouna gilumamala. Tu badi Filisila Akwila hinogalina againe, yadi manuweya hivega'aulena be Yaubada yana Eda fa'ina hikivetuvetununa. Gavadi aimo keke gidahalamane-hagihagiyeni, medema fa'ina hikivetuvetununa.

Himiyami tu tova sa'eyana Afolosi gigahe gigayo, “Fafali ana egana Akaiya againe iya ganana.” Au tovetumagana yana nuwanuwa hinogalini-yo hivelugana, leta Akaiya tovetumagana agaidiya hi'etoladina be higa Afolosi hinavetobohiyanena. Ada au gina giyemu tu tovetumagana medede againe givelugadi lakahina, badi Yaubada yana nuwadoga fa'ina Yesu Keliso againe ahe hivetumagana-ma kalivai-dina.
Givelugadi fa'ina yana laumamala againe miYuda gifaiwalahegedi, ada Veyao Tuwaina ana buki giyakayakahina be higa givehawaledi Bana Yesu velemo'ena Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso.
Badi higayo, “Keke. Alu'aluwa Mahalina ana egana boi keke tamo hakwadi gidayakahini-yo adanogalini.”
Bana Folo gigayo, “Taumadi! Gavaiya'amine wabafitaiso?”
Badi higayo, “Yoni yana gahe amine abafitaiso.”
Ada badi hidedemi hinogalini-yo au Kaiwabu Yesu ana eganeya hibafitaiso.
Ada Folo nimana badi agaidiya giseni tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina giluvaiyedi-yo mali meya agaidiya hilukahihi kadu Yaubada yana venuwa'ata gitunevehabalutugidi-yo hi'awatalatalainena.
Ada adi yo'o ma kaliva tuwelo amine.

Tu Folo givebutu manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe ginauna ada vaikohi tohiye agaidiya ase'asena bouna kaliva agaidiya gilulumamala, buye hive'agahegahe tu Folo Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina gilulukahihi toyogina, higa gidasive'auyedi.

Tu badi tufoidi tagadi kuluna, keke nuwanuwadi hinavetumagana, ada kaliva moya'aidi matadiya Kaiwabu yana Eda hihawavekoyoyena. Au Folo ginuyabuyabudi, ada tovetumagana gigahedi be buye hinuvehaila. Au aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana kaliva sa'eyana, ana egana Tilano, yana manuwa-abalaumamala againe kaliva buye hiveve'agahegahe.
Ada au hidedemi ginunauwena malamala luhei, fa'ina miYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kavewagadi miGilika moya'aidi fafali ana egana Esiya againe himiyami-ma Kaiwabu bonana hinogalina.

Ada Folo kaliva gihawahegedi be bana u'una ana kaleko hitana fa'ina kadu kaleko faisewa fa'ina goline gihifohifona-ma hivaivaina be hinunauwena, to'aulolo agaidiya hiseseni-yo hiyamuyamumu, kadu yafune badi to'aulolo agaidiya hiyemuyemu.

Tu Yuda tokwelikweli tufoidi hinunumiyamiyanana be yafune hiwaviwavidi. Ada au hinuwanuwa vaita ka'i Yesu ana egana hinayakahina, au yadi kwelikweli ginafaiwala, fa'ina hivebutu Kaiwabu Yesu ana egana hiyakayakahina be yafune hinawavidi fa'ina. Au yafune agaidiya higahe higayo, “Yesu Folo gilulumamalena amanadi, Bana ana eganeya avehimeyemi be wanayemu.” Hidedemi higahegahe.
Ada kwanaYuda sa'eyana, ana egana Siva, natuneyao kaliva seveni hidede amine hihuluhuluva. Bana Siva higa abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tonagona sa'eyana.
Badi kaliva adiveseveni hidedemi Yesu ana eganeya hihuluva tu tova sa'eyana yafune gigahedi gigayo, “Bana Yesu gahalamanena kadu bana Folo gahalamanena, tu omi'iyao ma kaliva gaveyao?”
Kaliva wayafunena hidemi gigahe-yo kaliva tabodiya gihegelakahina, yana wafaiwala gimunukoyokoyodi, au konekonediyao kadu wadayadayagidiyao yana manuwa himadu'otayabuyabuna.
Ada miYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kavewagadi miGilika moya'aidi Efeso againe himiyami-ma hida kaliva valeyana hinogalini-yo himatautave'ine, tu kadu Kaiwabu Yesu ana egana hikilakahi-mo'ena.
Ada au tovetumagana moya'aidi hi'ela adi yo'o matadiya yadi dewa uyu'uyuyuna higa yadi kwelikweli tulina tulina hiyakayakahina-ma hiyauna.

Ada tufoidi moya'aidi tokwelikweli yadi faisewa hi'abi'abina. Au yadi kwelikweli buki againe hi'etoladina-ma se'eyaine hi'aliyena be kaliva matadiya hikabuna. Au buki fatana hikilagalagana ada ana ve'atutamo'aina mani lakahi-mo'ena, kaliva fifiti tausani (50,000) yadi faisewa aiyeta sa'eyana fatana amine.

Ada au hida gaitoma lakahina gilakayemu fa'ina, Kaiwabu bonana au toyogina ma moya'aidi hi'itana, ada valeyana give'aliyahega be kaliva moya'aidi hivebutu hivetuvetumagana, kadu yadi vetumagana gitubutubuga.
Au ana toveluga adi'iselu Timoti Elasito gi'iveninisedi be Masedoniya againe hina tu bana tauna aimo fafali ana egana Esiya againe gimiyami.
Ada medema tovai-nadi vekwageya keke kabi'ona Efeso againe gilakayemu, au Kaiwabu yana Eda fa'ina kaliva hivekwageya.

Kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Demitiliyo, bana yana faisewa ma lokoloko siliva babiya hiyalayalana-ma againe gibububuna. Badi miEfeso ma yadi viviluwa kwamayoku, adi egana Atemisa hihawadavadavadi, ada bana Demitiliyo yana tofaisewa buye Atemisa yadi manuwa-tafalolo anununa kabikabi'ona siliva againe hibububuna higa kaliva yadi abahawadavadava fa'ina. Ada anununa moya'aina hififaisewadi be kaliva hikimokimonedi fa'ina, tofaisewai-dina yadi mani keke kabi'ona hivaivaina.
Au Demitiliyo yana tofaisewa kadu mali kaliva yadi faisewa bana amine ma buye gikovavaga'auhidi gigahedi gigayo, “Kaliva wanogali! Hida yada faisewa againe mani lakahina kavaivaina ma wahalamanena.

Au taumiyao Folo yana huluva wa'itana o ka'i valeyana wanogalina. Bana gigahe vaita kilumina kaliva nimadiya hibubudi-ma keke velemo'ena viviluwa, ada kaliva moya'aidi ginuwa'abiyedi. Hidedei yada melala Efeso againe kadu fafali ana egana Esiya matatabuna againe ginuwa'abiyedi be bonana hivenogalena.

Medema keke gidalubodani, fa'ina ka'i kaliva hinavebutu yada faisewa hinahawavekoyoyena, au yada mani inubana ginahavahavaina. Kadu'e ka'i yada viviluwa kwamayoku Atemisa yadi manuwa-tafalolo hinakilowena, ada badi taudi yadi kikaiwabu ginahavaina, badi yada viviluwa kwamayoku Esiya kaliva moya'aidi kadu fafali tulina tulina kalivadi hihawadavadavadi amanadi.”
Tu yo'o Demitiliyo yana gahe hinogalini-yo hi'ila'a, hivebutu hikovakova higayo, “Badi Atemisa adi egana lakahina, ide miEfeso yada viviluwa badi'e.”

Hidedei hikovakova tu melala kalivai-dina moya'aidi hive'atalalakalaka. Au yo'o miMasedoniya adi'iselu hikive'avidi, badi Folo ana bwa'uli adi egana Gaiyasi Alisitako. Hikive'avidi-yo abavaga'auta lakahina againe se'eyaine himadunauwedi.
Tu bana Folo nuwanuwana tauna ginana, yo'o matadiya ginamidi ginalukahihi tu tovetumagana hihawatana.

Kadu Esiya fafali ana tonagona tufoidi, badi Folo ahe hivetobohiyanena-ma kalivai-dina, venuwa'ata bana againe hi'iveninisena higayo, “Keke-mo'a abavaga'auta againe unaluku. Au siule, yama gahe udavenogalena.”

Tu abavaga'auta againe kaliva tufoidi hidede amine hikovakova kadu tufoidi medede amine hikovakova, yadi kova tulina tulina fa'ina tufoidi moya'aidi gavadi-yo hivaga'auta-ma keke hidahalamaneni, au hiyo'o-kawowo.

Kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Alekisanida, ada bana'e miYuda hituwamadumadugena be yo'o matadiya ginamidi, fa'ina yo'o hivaita bana'e vekwageya inubana gidahalamaneni. Au nimane giluhawatadi be yo'o ginakivetuvetunudi ada hinahalamanena vekwageya inubana keke bana againe.

Tu bana kwanaYuda ma hihalamanena againe, moya'aidi hivebutu seyaseya'aine hikovakova higayo, “Badi Atemisa adi egana lakahina, ide miEfeso yada viviluwa badi'e.” Ada yadi kovakova hinunauwena bai luhei.

Hidedemi hinunauwena tu kaliva sa'eyana, melala ana kalaka, gifaiwala be gigaheve'ilovedi. Hi'ilova-yo gigahedi gigayo, “Omi miEfeso wanogali! Kaliva moya'aidi hihalamanena ide miEfeso Atemisa yadi manuwa-tafalolo ka'ita'itave'avina, badi'e yada viviluwa kwamayoku lakahidi. Kadu'e ide yadi kabala tabutabuna lobameya gihobu be ka'ita'itave'avina ma moya'aidi hihalamanena.
Ada keke tamo hakwadi hida gaitoma anafaiweya ginahawavefwayayeni, fa'ina yami ago'uga auwe wa'iloveni. Keke kaliva kwavakwavadiyao amine wanahuluva.

Hida kalivai-dina keke manuwa-tafalolo ana lokoloko tabutabuna hidaki'afuni, kadu yada viviluwa kwamayoku agaidiya keke hida'ihawadamana. Keke hidedemi hidahuluva nonogana wakive'avidi be hidei abavaga'auta lakahina againe wa'aliyedi.
Ka'i bana Demitiliyo yana tofaisewa buye nuwanuwadi tamo hakwadi hinavekotuna digo, kotu ana aiyeta fa'ina vehimeya gidadauda, kadu tovedewayauga himimiyami. Au adifaiweya hinana hinavekotudi.
Tu ka'i tamo gavadi fa'ina kadu nuwanuwami wanalukahihiyena, au koniselo wadavenuwa'atadi ada yadi vaga'auta againe hidanuwenuwena be vehimeya hidasena.

Ka'i yada tovehimeya lakahidiyao Loma againe yada vekwageya valeyana hinanogalina, au vita kananuhagana. Ide kavekwageya-kawowo ada ka'i hinatoliluvaluva hinagayo, Gavadi-yo wavekwageya? Au keke-mo'a adafaiweya gavaimi kanagahedi, fa'ina keke kotu ana vehimeya amine kadahuluva.”
Ada au hidedemi gilukahihi gihavaina, yo'o gigahedi gigayo, “Auwe, wanana yami manuweya.”
Tu miEfeso yadi vekwageya ahe hiluyabuni-yo, au Folo tovetumagana gikovavaga'auhidi be ginalu'ageyedi. Ada gilumamaledi gihavaina, gilukafoiyedi be gilowoga Masedoniya againe gina.
Ada medema ana fafali againe ginunumiyamiyanana, ada yana laumamala moya'aina againe badi tovetumagana gilulu'ageyedi. Ada ginauna tu Gilika againe giyemu.

Au medede againe vaikohi tohiye gimiyami. Ada au givebutu gikidewadewa be wakeya ginayage be Siliya againe ginana tu miYuda yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana ginogalina, higa nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikana. Hidema fa'ina ginuwanuwa vaita Masedoniya ana fafali againe agene ginayewani-yo au ginana Siliya wa'amine.

Ada kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Sofata, Filasa natuna kwanaBeliya, bana buye hina. Kadu ana bwa'uli velugadiyao ma Alisitako Sekanido, adi'iselu miTesalonaika. Kadu Gaiyasi kwanaDebi, bana Timoti kadu kaliva adi'iselu Esiya ana fafali kalivai-dina adi egana Tikiko Talafimo.
Au badi kalivai-dina wai hinagona be melala ana egana Talowasi againe hibodema. (

Iya Luke Filifai againe gamiyami ma Folo ginuhagaku.) Tu ime'eyao ma tafalolo lakahina fa'ina Filifai againe amiyami, tafalolo ana egana Beledi keke Wa'isina. Ada tafalolo gihavaina, ime ayage ada aiyeta faifi ahegedi tu yama kaliva Talowasi againe hibodebodema amanadi agaidiya ayemu, ada medede againe amiyami tafalolo sa'eyana.
Tu Satadei bogi againe ime tovetumagana avaga'auta be buye ana'a sakalameni anavaina. Ada Folo gilumamala be mala ginalauna ginanuyabuyabudi fa'ina yana laumamala ginunauwena bogi nafone.
Ada yama abavaga'auta manuwa getane gidauda, ada lamufa moya'aina vetawaneya hikabuna.

Tu bana kwanatubulakahina sa'eyana, ana egana Yutiko, manuwa ana yogowahi againe gihiyoto. Ada bana Folo gilulumamala gilulumamala tu bana Yutiko gidunedune. Gidunedune tu gi'enomataiga ada gi'avelowoni tu gibe'u. Manuwa getana ana tutulagolota anaveto againe gimiyami tu gibe'u be gihobu babiya. Au himaduhobu digo hifewana tu ali'alikana.
Tu bana Folo gihobu kwamana gi'enotagona be gi'atulauhina. Au tovetumagana gigahedi gigayo, “Ase'asemi gina'ilova, au bana giyawa-havagi.”
Gigahe-yo abavaga'auta manuwa getane gilaka-havagi a'a gikihinena be tovetumagana buye hi'a. Ada badi buye hilulukahihi-malalau tu Folo gilowoga.
Tu badi tovetumagana ma kwanatubulakahina yawayawana hinauwena yana manuweya, ada au ase'asedi giyamumu.
Tu ime Folo ana bwa'uli wai anagona, wakeya ayage Asosa againe ana. Melalai-nadi againe Folo ginayage. Hidedemi bana givehimeyema be higa bana tauna agene ginana fa'ina.
Au Asosa againe ayemu tu bana ginuhagama ada adodona, kadu alowoga anauna tu Midilini againe ayemu.
Bogi ada mala gilauna kadu alowoga anauna tu Kaiyosi avaina. Kadu anauna aiyeta sa'eyana ahege tu Semosi againe adamana'ela. Kadu anauna aiyeta anavelu againe Mailito avaina.

Tu Folo keke nuwanuwana Esiya ana fafali againe ginamiya lauva tunugina fa'ina, tauna givehimeyena be Efeso amaduve'ewaiyena. Nuwanuwana Yelusalema againe ginamaduyemu. Ginuwanuwa ka'i ginamaduna, au anafaiweya tafalolo ana egana Fenidikosi ana tova ginayemu.
Au Folo Mailito againe giyemu-yo venuwa'ata Efeso againe gi'iveninisena be tovetumagana adi tonagona bana againe hina'ela.

Ada ahe hiyemu-yo givebutu gilumamaledi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, yaku dewa wahalamanena. Yaku dewa Esiya ana fafali againe gamidi'ela ana tova be yaku miya omi hinafamiya ana lauyabu againe ganauwena-ma wahalamanena.
Iya Kaiwabu yana tofaisewa, yaku wanuwahobu kadu yaku watagiya yana faisewa ga'abina. Kadu tova moya'aina miYuda nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikaku fa'ina tova vitana ganuhagana.

Kadu omi wahalamanena tova moya'aina nuwanuwa yamumuna matatabuna omi ami veluga fa'ina galukahihiyena, keke gada'ilova. Au vaga'auta lakahina againe kadu yami manuwa sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya galumamalemi ada gavehawalemi.
MiYuda kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina gagaheya'aya'alidi be higa yadi dewa koyona hidahegena, ada Yaubada againe hidahagaviladi kadu yada Kaiwabu Yesu againe hidavetumagana.
Gaitoma sa'eyanaga gahalamanena higa deliya hinaseku ada vita kaliva nimadiya gananuhagana. Melala moya'aina agaidiya galuku-ma hidede amine Alu'aluwa Mahalina givenuwa'ataku.

Tu iya'eku ma keke yawaiku fa'ina gananuwanuwa vaita keke ganabwavi. Medema gaitoma kabi'ona. Au yaku nuwanuwa sa'eyanaga. Nuwanuwaku aku vehimeya kadu yaku faisewa Kaiwabu Yesu giveleku-ma ganaluyabuna. Gavadi yaku faisewa? Yaku faisewa ma Venuwa'ata Yamumuna higa Yaubada yana nuwadoga ide kaliva agaideya gana'awatalatalainena.
Tu omi moya'aimi hinafamiya ahe ganudadana Kaiwabu yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina galumamala. Ada adamoya gahalamanena keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya magigiku aimo una'ita-havagileni.
Hidema fa'ina tova adamoya Yaubada matane gavenuwa'atami ka'i keke yawai-vagahimi wananuhagani digo, keke aku vita, au taumiyao ami vita.
Hidedemi gagahe fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa matatabuna omi agaimiya ga'awatalatalainena, keke tamo gadasevauyeni.

Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi, kadu Yaubada yana sifi moya'aidi wana'itave'avidi, fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina hida ami vehimeya givelemi. E, Yaubada yana kaliva wanave'adi, badi Yesu dayagine gitutuvehobudi amanadi.

Ahe gahalamanena iya ganalowoga be ganana-yo kaliva tufoidi omi hinafamiya hinaluku, ada galu'eta manimaninidiyao adi egana wolivi sifi hinavemaduyauyauledi amine, badi Yaubada yana sifi hinakivekoyodi.
E, kadu kaliva tufoidi taumiyao yami yo'o agaidiya hinamidi, fwaya amine hinalumamalemi be tovetumagana tufoidi hinavesihawadamadamanidi be hinamuliyedi.

Badi yadi ve'alololo fa'ina au wana'itave'avimi, kadu yaku kivetuvetunu againe nuwami ginanunauyena, higa malamala tohiye agaidiya tova moya'aina gakivetuvetunumi. E, uyadayada bogi yaku watagiya gakivetuvetunumi.
Tu iya'eku ma keke tamo hakwadi yana mani o yana lokoloko o ka'i ana vaigau gada'italuvadigeni.
Au omi taumiyao wahalamanena iya tauku nimakuya gafaisewa be akuga kadu aku toveluga adiga o ka'i ama vaigau, gavadi gavadi nuwanuwama anavaina, au yaku mani againe akimonena.

Hida yaku dewa againe tova moya'aina gavehawalemi be vehimeya wanahalamanena, higa gilubodada be yada faisewa toyogina againe kowakowadiyao kadavelugadi. Hidede amine kadafifaisewa tu Kaiwabu Yesu bonana againe nuwada gidanunauyena gigayo, Ka'i kaliva omi hinanuwakabubuyemi au ami ayauna yamumuna, tu ka'i omi kaliva wananuwakabubuyedi au ami ayauna yamumu-mo'ena.” Au hidedemi Folo miEfeso tovetumagana adi tonagona agaidiya gilumamala.
Tu Folo gilumamala gihavaina, kaliva moya'aidi bana buye tugadi hive'etodonena be Folo give'o'oledi.
Ada moya'aidi hitagitagi tu hilauhina ada navanavane hiveyaugina be hilukafoiyena.
Bana yana gahe sa'eyana fa'ina nuwadi givita-mo'a, higa vaita magigina keke kadu hina'ita-havagileni. Ada au edeya hivebwa'uliyena be hina taliyeya au wakeya hiveyagena.
Tu ime alukafoiyedi-yo wakeya ayage be alowoga. Au ni'uya atalalaka anauna tu Kosi againe adamana'ela. Bogi ada mala gilauna kadu anauna tu Lodesi avaina. Lodesi ahege tu anauna Fatala avaina.
Ada medede againe waka sa'eyana anuhagana, ginana fafali ana egana Finisiya againe. Au wakai-nadi againe ayage be alowoga.

Anauna tu himula ana egana Saifilasi yuwa lobama be lehaga gitubutamo'aina againe a'ita-yo i'imawameya ahege tu Siliya ana fafali againe anauna. Kadu anauna tu melala sa'eyana ana egana Tailo Siliya ana fafali againe ayemu be ahobu, fa'ina nuwanuwadi Tailo againe waka ana lokoloko hinasehobuyedi.

Au ime ana tovetumagana anuhagadi ada badi agaidiya amiyami tafalolo sa'eyana. Ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina gavadi Folo againe ginalakayemu-ma badi agaidiya gihawavemogatalena fa'ina Folo againe higaheya'aya'ala higayo, “Keke Yelusalema againe unana.”

Hidedemi higahe tu yama tova badi agaidiya aluyabuni-yo au alowoga be yamana kadu anavebutu. Badi tovetumagana moya'aidi vavinediyao natudiyao buye hivebwa'uliyema, melaleya ahegena ma taliyeya. Au moya'aima makameya tugama ave'etodonena be ave'o'ola.
Ave'o'ola gihavaina ave'alukafoiyema, ada ime wakeya ayage tu badi hiyewadi yadi manuweya.
Tu ime yamana wakeya anauwena, Taiya againe alowoga anauna tu melala ana egana Tolemaisi againe ayemu be ahobu. Ada tovetumagana agaidiya ana be ana'itadi, ada badi agaidiya bogi sa'eyana ada.

Aiyeta anavelu againe kadu alowoga be ana Sisaliya. Ayemu tu Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana tolaumamala sa'eyana ana egana Filifi againe ana awakawaka. Bana higa yo'o adiveseveni kalivadi boi Yelusalema againe a'a ana folaka fa'ina hivegidedi.
Ada bana Filifi natuneyao vevine fowa tamadi againe himiyami, keke hidanagi ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana tunevehabalutuga againe Yaubada yana venuwa'ata hi'awa'awatalatalainena.

Au ime agaimeya gi'ela, Folo ana gaiyona givaina digo tauna agena nimana giyogona gigayo, “Alu'aluwa Mahalina gigahe gigayo, Hai kaliva hida ana gaiyona, medema miYuda Yelusalema againe hidede amine hinayogona ada yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya hinahegenauwena.” Hidede amine Agabasi Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata gi'awatalatalainena.
Tu ime yana gahe anogalini-yo Folo againe agahe toyogina, ime kadu tovetumagana moya'aidi medede againe himiyami-ma buye'i agayo, “Keke-mo'a Yelusalema againe unana.”

Tu Folo gigahema gigayo, “Gavadi-yo watatagitagiya ase'aseku wa'i'ive'akolukoluni? Iya gahawahegeku be ka'i Yelusalema againe hinayogoku amine o hinayogoku, tu kadu gahawahegeku be ka'i Kaiwabu Yesu fa'ine medede againe gana'alika amine o gana'alika.” Hidedemi gigahe.
Au agahe-wayogena fa'ina a'ilova tu agayo, “Kaiwabu givehimeya amine, au ginalakayemu.”
Amiyami tu akidewadewa ada alowoga be Yelusalema againe anana.
Kadu Sisaliya tovetumagana tufoidi ime buye ana, ada kaliva yana manuweya anamiya-ma againe hinauwema. Bana ana egana Nesoni, kwanaSaifilasi, ada boi tuwaina Yesu againe givetumagana.
Tu Yelusalema ayemu againe, tovetumagana yadi wavemwamwala hilusiuleyema.
Bogi ada mala gilauna Folo ime buye ana be Yemesa buye analukahihi. Ada ide to'ekelesiya ada tonagona moya'aidi bana buye hivaga'auta.

Bana Folo gilusiuleyedi tu Yaubada yana gugai yo'o tulidiyao hinafadiya gi'awatalatalainena. Gavadi gavadi moya'aina Yaubada yana veluga againe bana tauna gilumamalena gifaisewana, medema gi'awatalatalainena.

Ada badi tonagona hinogalini-yo au moya'aidi Yaubada hihawadavadavani tu yadi togahe gimidi Folo gigahena gigayo, “Tobohiyama, unogali! Au uhalamanena miYuda moya'ai-mo'edi tausani gavaiyehi Yesu againe ahe hivetumagana, ada moya'aidi yada vehimeya Mosese tuwai-mo'ena givelema-ma tova moya'aina hidibudibumuhigena.

Ada o fa'iniya kaliva higahe-kawowo badi agaidiya higa vaita miYuda moya'aidi yo'o tulidiyao adi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya himimiyami-ma udavehawaledi be higa Mosese yana vehimeya hidakilowena. Higahe vaita udagahedi udagayo, Keke natumiyao kaliva wowodiya iya'iyaya wanatomogolohini, ada ide miYuda yada dewa tuwaina au wanahegena.
Tu o hidedei ulakayemu ma valeya makewa hinanogalina, fa'ina gavadi kanagani?
Au gavaimi anavehimeya o unahuluvina. Kaliva fowa agaimeya himimiyami ada Yaubada againe yadi wonadabadaba sa'eyana hisena. Bana Mosese yana vehimeya amine yadi wonadabadaba hisena.

Au hida kalivai-dina manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe buye wanana, ada gavaimi yadi yegayega Yaubada matane fa'ina hinahuluva, meda o buye unahuluva, ada kevakeva higa yadi abaveyao yadi yegayega fa'ina fatadi unasena. Fatadi unaseni-yo au yadi wonadabadaba hinaluyabuna ada adifaiweya u'udi hinatotona. Hida ya huluvai-nadi againe moya'aidi hinahalamanena o tauni Mosese yana vehimeya u'abi'abina. Kadu gavaimi o fa'iniya hinogalina vaita udavehawala be miYuda tovetumagana Mosese yana vehimeya hidahegeni, au hinahalamanena mema fwaya.

Tu yo'o tulidiyao tovetumagana ma yadi leta ahe a'etoladina be yama vehimeya fa'ina avenuwa'atadi. Agahedi higa vaita keke kevakeva kilumina agaidiya mali kaliva hihawadavadavayedi-ma hina'u'adi, kadu keke kevakeva dayagidi hinayuni, kadu kevakeva kikibahidiyao be dayagidi keke gidamadu-ma keke hina'u'ani. Kadu kaliva keke mali vevine buye hinadauda, ada meda anafaiweya vevine keke mali kaliva buye hinadauda. Au hidede amine agahedi.”

Yadi aiyeta seveni himiyami tu kabisona hinalauyabu, au miYuda tufoidi Esiya ana fafali kalivai-dina Folo manuwa-tafalolo againe hi'itana. Hi'ita-yo kaliva moya'aidi hisiveyo'odi ada Folo hikive'avina.

Hikive'avina digo hikovakova higayo, “MiIsileli ama veluga! Hida hima kaliva fafali moya'aina agaidiya ginauna, kaliva moya'aidi givehavehawaledi be yada yo'o gi'i'ihawadamanedi, kadu Mosese yana vehimeya ada hida yada manuwa-tafalolo lakahina tova moya'aina gihawahawatagona. Hidede amine gihuluva tu adamoya koyona kadu sa'eyana give'atutamo'aina, fa'ina ada hawata giyawelina be yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina manuwa-tafalolo againe gilukuwedi be yada manuwa-tabu gikivebwanenena.”
Hidedemi higahe fa'ina yo'o tulidiyao kalivana sa'eyana kwanaEfeso ana egana Talafimo hi'itana, Folo buye melala hinafane hinauna ada hivaitana manuwa-tafalolo againe gidalukuweni.
Tu melala kalivai-dina moya'aidi vekwageya fa'ina hiyo'odi, ha'amine ha'amine hi'abiyemuyemu, Folo hikive'avina digo manuwa-tafalolo againe hitaina be hisehobuyena, ada auhe'ama wana hifalina.
Au yo'o Folo himunumununa higa vaita hidaluve'alikana, tu badi miYelusalema moya'aidi hivekwavekwageya-ma valeyadi Loma tolugaviya adi togiyomatana lakahina ginogalina.
Ginogali-yo auhe'ama tolugaviya kadu adi tonagona tufoidi buye givaidi be yo'o agaidiya himaduna. Ada tovekwageya togiyomatana yana tolugaviya buye hi'itadi againe, Folo ana munuga hi'ilovena.

Ada yo'o gitoliluveluvedi-yo kaliva tufoidi hidede amine hikovakova kadu tufoidi medede amine hikovakova, yadi kova tulina tulina. Ada vekwageya butudi lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina togiyomatana vekwageya inubana velemo'ena keke anafaiweya gidanuhagani. Hidema fa'ina yana kalivamomo givehimeyedi be Folo tolugaviya yadi manuwa toyogina againe hinanauwena.
Au hivebutu hinauwena abavaga againe hiyemu tu tovekwageya hinuwakoyo-mo'a be hifaiwala fa'ina badi tolugaviya Folo hifewana be manuweya hinaselakahina.
Ada yo'oyo'o himulimuliyedi tu hikovakova agodi lakahina higayo, “Wa'ela be kana kaluve'alikani.”
Tu tolugaviya Folo manuweya hidalukuwena ma togiyomatana againe gigahe gigayo, “Nuwanuwaku ganagahe.”
Bana togiyomatana gigayo, “Ha! Bona Gilika uhalamanena.

Iya gavaita o'eni hima kwanaIdifita, bana boi vekwageya givebutuna be kabemani hivekwageyedi, ada yana yo'o fowa tausani (4,000) higa toluve'alika ginagoyedi be babigaga againe ginauwedi. Ka'i o keke bana kalivai-nadi?” Hidedemi togiyomatana gigahe.

Bana Folo gigayo, “Iya kwanaYuda, melala ana egana Tasasi againe gatubuga, medema Silisiya ana fafali againe, ada melalai-nadi ana egana keke kabi'ona kaliva matadiya, ada iya wada melala kalivana. Iya gave'o'ole udahawahegeku be yo'o agaidiya gadagahe.”
Au togiyomatana gihawahegena fa'ina Folo abavaga againe gimidi yo'o nimane giluhawatadi. Hi'ilova againe givebutu bona Hibeliu againe gilukahihi, higa badi miYuda taudiyao bonadi.
Folo yo'o agaidiya gilukahihi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao kamakweyao, iya ganalukahihi be wananogalina. Keke gavana fa'ina tu ganakivetuvetunumi be wanahalamanena aku vita keke.”
Hidedemi givebutu tu badi yo'o agona bona Hibeliu taudiyao bonadiya gilukahihi ma hinogalina againe hive'awa'ibode-mo'ena.
Ada badi kaliva Yesu yana Eda himulimuliyena-ma gakivekoyodi. Kaliva vevine gakive'avidi be yaku kalivamomo yaku vehimeya againe tufoidi deliya hihegenauwedi, kadu tufoidi hiluve'alikadi.

Iya gagahe velemo'ena ma abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu kadu koniselo moya'aidi adifaiweya hina'alakakila, fa'ina badi tobohiyaneyao tonagona Damasiko againe yadi leta hi'etoladina be iya gananauwena. Au galowoga be gana vaita Yesu yana Eda kalivai-dina ganakive'avidi ada yogoyogonidiyao Yelusalema againe gana'aliyedi be matahiwadi hinanuhagana fa'ina.” Hidedemi Folo gigahe.
Kadu gigayo, “Au edeya ganauna tu kauwana getadeya Damasiko liline gadayemu ma auhe'ama mahalina lakahina lobameya give'akinamanamalena, iya ganauna againe gituvemahali-'owona.
Au babiya gabe'u tu tamo hakwadi agona ganogalina gigaheku gigayo, Saulo, Saulo! Gavana fa'ina ukikivekoyoku?
Ada iya gagayo, Kaiwabu, O hakwa'adi? Bana gigayo, Iya'eku Yesu kwanaNasaledi ada Iya ukikivekoyoku. Hidemi gigahe.
Tu badi kaliva hivebwa'uliyeku-ma mahalina hi'itana tu kaliva iya agaikuya gilukahihi-ma agona keke hidanogali-hagihagiyeni.

Ada au iya gatoliluvaluva gagayo, Kaiwabu, gavadi ganagani? Ada Bana Kaiwabu gigaheku gigayo, Umidi, Damasiko againe unaluku ada medede againe kaliva sa'eyana gavaimi Yaubada o fa'iniya boi givehimeya ma ginavenuwa'ata. Hidedemi Kaiwabu gigahe.
Au mahalina ve'akinamanamalina fa'ina iya gavematakoyo, fa'ina aku bwa'uli nimakuya hi'abiku be Damasiko againe hinauweku.

Ayemu tu kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Ananaiyasi, ada bana Yaubada gimatamatausena kadu yada vehimeya lakahina gidibudibumuhigena. Ada tobohiyadeyao miYuda moya'aidi Damasiko againe himiyami-ma hive'amohimohinena lakahina.
E, bana kalivai-nadi iya gamiyami againe gi'ela, lilikuya gimidi gigaheku gigayo, Tobohiyaku Saulo, mata gina'italele. Gigahe-yo auhe'ama mataku kadu gi'italele, ada bana ga'itana.
Kadu bana gigayo, Yaubada bwanenedeyao hidavadavana amanadi o givegide be yana nuwanuwa unahalamanena, kadu yana Kaliva Mahamahalina edeya ahe u'itana be Tauna agona unogalina.
Ada gavaimi ahe u'itana be unogalina-ma kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya una'awatalatalainena, au o'eni aimo yana to'awatalatalaina.
Ada auwe, kadu keke tamo gavadi fa'ina unabodaboda. Umidi be unabafitaiso, Kaiwabu ana egana unahawadavadavani-yo ya koyona fa'ina ase'ase ginakolana. Hidedemi Ananaiyasi gigaheku.
Tu iya Yelusalema againe gayewaku, ada tova sa'eyana manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe galuku gave'ove'o'ola tu ga'eno'ita.
Ada yaku ita againe Kaiwabu ga'itana gigaheku gigayo, Umadumidi, Yelusalema unamadunuyabuyabuna, fa'ina miYelusalema ya awatalatalaina Iya fa'ikuya keke hinavetumaganeni.

Kadu'e boi ya to'awatalatalaina ana egana Sitiveni hiluve'alikana ana toveya, iya gamidive'eda'ufona, kaliva hitutuve'alikana-ma gahawaveyamumuyedi ada adi aikeva ga'itave'avina. Boi hidede amine ya kalivamomo gakivekoyodi tu adamoya ganuwavilana fa'ina au yaku awatalatalaina O fa'iniya hinavetumaganena. Hidedemi Kaiwabu againe gagahe.
Au higagakwelukwelulu, adi aikeveya hiluluwahiwahi, fwayafwaya hihegehegelakahina.

Hidedemi hihuluva fa'ina, togiyomatana yana kaliva givehimeyedi be Folo tolugaviya yadi manuwa toyogina againe hinalukuwena. Kadu gigahedi gigayo, “Bulava againe wanalauna be gavadi yana koyona ginayakahina fa'ina. Ka'i gavadi-yo yo'o agodi lakahina hihawavekoyoyena ma au kanahalamanena.”

Au hinauwena ada hiyogona be hinalauna ma Folo tolugaviya adi tonagona bana liline gimidimidi-ma gigahena gigayo, “Ka'i omi wanalauku? Iya Loma kaliva nonogana keke wadavedewayaugiku. Keke amifaiweya hidede amine wanalauku, fa'ina ime Loma kaliva yama vehimeya gihawatami.”
Tu bana tonagona yana gahe ginogalini-yo togiyomatana againe gina givenuwa'atana gigayo, “Mema gavadi unagani? Fa'ina bana wadevama Loma kaliva.”
Au togiyomatana Folo againe gina gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “Ka'i velemo'ena o Loma kaliva?” Bana Folo gigayo, “Ika, iya Loma kaliva.”
Togiyomatana gigayo, “Iya mani lakahina gaseni-yo gavekwanamiLoma.”
Bana Folo gigayo, “Tu iya'eku ma Loma kaliva, fa'ina bana kamaku boi givekwanamiLoma.”
Ada tolugaviya himidimidi vaita Folo hinalauna-ma auhe'ama hivagayewayewa, kadu togiyomatana bana Folo Loma kaliva ma ahe gihalamanena againe tauna gimatauta, fa'ina Loma kaliva nonogana giyogona.

Bogi sa'eyana hida mala gilauna togiyomatana nuwanuwana ginahalamane-hagihagiyena ka'i gavana fa'ina miYuda Folo hihawavekoyoyeni. Nuwanuwana ginahalamanena fa'ina yana kaliva givehimeyedi be Folo deliya hisehobuyena, kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao ada miYuda yadi Koniselo moya'aidi gikovavaga'auhidi. Ahe hivaga'auta againe, gina Folo givega'aulena be badi Koniselo moya'aidi matadiya gisena.

Tu Folo Koniselo gi'itakwanekwanedi be gigahedi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, tova moya'aina nuwafouku yegayegana Yaubada matane. E, boi kabi'okuya gahuluva yamumuna be ganunauwena tova adamoya, ada keke tamo gavadi koyona fa'ina Yaubada gadamatauseni-yo gadavenuwanauna.”
Folo hidedemi gigahe tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu, ana egana Ananaiyasi, badi kaliva Folo liline himidimidi-ma givehimeyedi be bana awane hinamununa.

Au Folo gigahena gigayo, “Yaubada makewa o ginamunu, o ya huluva vaita tuhi kwauna hikilumina ana ita yamumuna tu hinagena ma bwanebwanenena. O mene uvetoga be ide miYuda yada vehimeya amine unavedewayaugiku. O tovedewayauga nonogana vehimeyai-nadi keke uda'abini, fa'ina kaliva ugahedi be hinamunu-kawowoku.”
Gigahe-yo kaliva bana liline himidimidi-ma higahena higayo, “O hakwa'adi? Bana wadevama Yaubada yana abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna tu o u'ihawadamanena.”
Yami yo'o adi tovehimeya keke wanahawavekoyoyeni.”
Ada hidedemi gigahe-yo badi Falisi kadu Sadusi hivebutu hivekwageya, ada au hinuwanuwaluga.

Hinuwanuwaluga higa badi Sadusi ma higahe vaita kaliva keke alikeya hinamididi-havagi, kadu vaita lobama ana tovenuwa'ata keke, kadu balauma keke. Tu badi Falisi ma hinuwanuwa vaita hida gaitomai-dina tohiye au velemo'ena, mididi-havagi, lobama ana tovenuwa'ata, balauma.

Au buye hive'akovakova agodi gilakata, ada Mosese yana vehimeya ana tovehawala tufoidi, badi Falisi kalivai-dina, hitowamidi higahe toyogina higayo, “Keke tamo gavadi koyona bana againe adanuhagani. Ka'i velemo'ena balauma o ka'i lobama ana tovenuwa'ata edeya bana againe gilukahihi.”

Ada au yadi vekwageya againe hifaiwala-mo'a fa'ina, togiyomatana gimatauta vaita Folo hidave'asitaineni. Au yana tolugaviya givehimeyedi be yo'o hinafadiya hinahobu, Folo hinalemadi be yadi manuwa toyogina againe hinanauwena.
Mala gilauna tu miYuda tufoidi buye hivaga'auta be hivevai. Yaubada matane hiwonadabadaba higayo, “Keke tamo gavadi ana'ani o ka'i anayuni tu nagona Folo analuve'alikana. Yaubada, au uhalamanema.”
Ada tovevai adi yo'o foti (40) kadu gavaiyehi amine.

Hiwonadabadaba gihavaina, hina abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu kaliva lakahidiyao hivenuwa'atadi higayo, “Ime Yaubada matane awonadabadaba higa vaita keke tamo gavadi ana'ani tu nagona Folo analuve'alikana.

Au omi'iyao kadu Koniselo moya'aidi togiyomatana againe wanave'o'ola be yana kaliva Folo omi agaimiya hinasehobuyena. Omi wanagahe vaita nuwanuwami wadatoliluveluveni-yo yana dewa wadahalamane-hagihagiyeni. Tu Folo keke omi agaimiya ginayemu, fa'ina ime akidewadewa be edeya analuve'alikana.”
Hidedemi hivevai tu kaliva sa'eyana, Folo nouna natudi, kaliva yadi nuwanuwa higa edeya hinaluve'alikana ma ginogalina, au gina tolugaviya yadi manuwa toyogina againe giluku Folo givenuwa'atana.
Bana Folo ginogalini-yo tonagona sa'eyana gikovana be gigahena gigayo, “Hida kwanatubulakahina togiyomatana againe unanauwena. Yana nuwanuwa sa'eyana fa'ina ginavenuwa'atana.”

Au tonagona kwamana ginauwena be togiyomatana gigahena gigayo, “Bana filisina ana egana Folo gikovaku, ada give'o'oleku be hida kwanatubulakahina o againiya ga'aliyena, yana nuwanuwa sa'eyana ginalukahihiyena fa'ina.”
Ada togiyomatana nimane gi'abina be gisi'aliyeni tu gigahena gigayo, “Yavanuwanuwa unagaheyena.”

Bana gigayo, “MiYuda yama tonagona buye hivevai, ada bogiyadi hinave'o'ole be ya kaliva Folo Koniselo agaidiya hinasehobuyena. Hinagahe vaita hidatoliluveluveni-yo yana dewa hidahalamane-hagihagiyeni.

Tu keke unavenogaledi fa'ina yadi kaliva adi yo'o foti (40) kadu gavaiyehi amine edeya hinaveu be hinabodana. Badi hida kalivai-dina Yaubada matane hiwonadabadaba higa vaita keke tamo gavadi hina'ani tu nagona Folo hinaluve'alikana. Ada ahe hikidewadewa tu ya vehimeya higa Folo Koniselo agaidiya unahawahegena fa'ina hibodaboda.”
Au hidedemi kwamana givenuwa'ata ada togiyomatana gigahena gigayo, “Hida ya venuwa'ata iya agaikuya keke tamo hakwadi againe unalukahihiyeni. Au unana.”

Kwamana gina tu togiyomatana yana tolugaviya adi tonagona luhei gikovadi be gigahedi gigayo, “Wanakidewadewa. Adamoya uyuyuya kauwana ana bai naeni amine wanalowoga be Sisaliya againe wanana. Ami tolugaviya hanaledi luhei (200) agediya hinana, kadu kaliva seveniti (70) hosi agaidiya hinayage be hinana, kadu to'ai'onaga hanaledi luhei (200) yadi wagiyo hinana.
Kadu'e, hosi tufoidi Folo fa'ina wanakidewedewedi, ada kabemani lakahina ana egana Filikesi againe wananauwena. Au wana'itave'avi-hagihagiyena be keke tamo vita eda againe ginanuhagani.”
Togiyomatana yana kaliva adi'iselu givehimeyedi gihavaina, Filikesi yana leta gi'etoladina ada leta hidedemi gigahe.
Yo siule kabemani Filikesi, o kaliva lakahi. Adamoya iya Kelodiyo-Laisiyasa nimaku una'itana.
Iya nuwanuwaku ganahalamanena ka'i gavadi-yo hihawavekoyoyeni, fa'ina gasehobuyena be yadi Koniselo matadiya galukuwena.
Ada inubana ahe ganuhagana, higa keke tamo gavadi koyona gidafaisewani tu kadamiyaluve'alikana o ka'i deliya kadasena, au miYuda yadi vehimeya gaitomana fa'ina hihawavekoyoyena.

Tu muliya miYuda tufoidi hivevai be hinaluve'alikana, ada kaliva sa'eyana yadi nuwanuwa fa'ina givenuwa'ataku. Ganogalini-yo auhe'ama yaku kaliva gavehimeyedi be o againiya hina'aliyena. Kadu badi kaliva hihawavekoyoyena-ma gavehimeyedi be o againiya hinavekotuna.
Au hidedemi togiyomatana Filikesi yana leta gi'etoladina.
Tu tolugaviya yadi togiyomatana yana vehimeya hidibumuhigena. Folo hivega'aulena be hinauwena, ada medema bogi-nadi againe hina melala ana egana Adifadalisi againe hiyemu.
Mala gilauna tolugaviya agediya hinana-ma hilowoga, yadi manuwa toyogina againe hiyewadi tu badi hosi kwaudiya hinana-ma Folo hivebwa'uliyena be Sisaliya againe hinauwena.
Hiyemu tu kabemani lakahina yana leta hivelena, ada Folo bana nimane hisena.
Bana kabemani lakahina yana leta gihawana gihavaina, Folo gitoliluveluvena gigayo, “O gava fafali kalivana?” Ada Folo gigayo, “Iya Silisiya kaliva.”

Bana kabemani ginogalini-yo gigahena gigayo, “Badi nuwanuwadi hinavekotu-ma hina'ela-yo o kahihi gananogalina.” Au yana kaliva givehimeyedi be Folo Helodi yana manuwa lakahina againe hinalukuwena, ada medede againe tolugaviya hina'itave'avina.

Aiyeta faifi himiyami tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi tokaiwabu ana egana Ananaiyasi, kadu miYuda kaliva lakahidiyao tufoidi buye Sisaliya againe hiyemu. Badi higa Folo ana tohawavekoyo ada yadi hifufu ana tokivetuvetunu badi buye hi'ela, kaliva ana egana Tetelo. Au kotu againe hiluku ada kabemani Filikesi matane Folo hihawavekoyoyena.

Ada Folo hiyowanina be ahe gilakayemu againe, bana Tetelo givebutu Folo yana dewa fa'ine gilukahihi gigayo, “Kauveya lakahi, ime ya abavehimeya againe amimiyami ada o kaliva halamani fa'ina niwalova againe amiyami lauva tunugina. Kadu'e, ya vehimeya ivaguna moya'aina agaidiya ime yamumu anuhagana, ada au yama fafali u'ita'itave'avina yamumuna.
Hidema fa'ina o againiya avesiule lakahina. E, tova moya'aina melala moya'aina agaidiya ya leme fa'ina avesivesiule.
Tu keke vaita nuwanuwaku gana'ivewowologilogi fa'ina hida ganalukahihi keke lauva tunugina. Au udanuwakabubuyema be yama hifufu kali'uhona udanogalina.

Bana hidevama kaliva a'itana, vekwageya moya'aina inubana bana againe. E, bana yana laumamala fa'ina miYuda fafali moya'aina agaidiya gi'i'ive'ago'ugadi be hivekwavekwageya. Bana yo'o adi egana Yesu kwanaNasaledi kalivadi ginagoyedi.
Atu togiyomatana ana egana Laisiyo gihobu'ela ada yana tolugaviya hifaiwala lakahina be nimameya hilemama.

Hilemama-yo bana Laisiyo badi kaliva hihawavekoyoyena-ma givehimeyedi be o againiya hinakotu.] Ka'i hida kalivai-nadi unatoliluveluvena amine, yana koyona ime ayakahina-ma o tauni unahalamanena, au agahe velemo'ena ma unahalamanena.”
Au hidedemi Tetelo gigahe kadu miYuda bana buye hi'ela-ma higahe'alakakila higayo, “Folo yana huluva meda a gigaheyena amine.”

Tu kabemani lakahina Folo giveguwautulena be ginalukahihi fa'ina. Au bana gigahe gigayo, “Kauveya, malamala a gavaiyehi o'eni hida yama yo'o uvevedewayaugima ma iya gahalamanena. Hidema fa'ina o mataniya ganakotu ada tauku ganalugolegoleku fa'ina nuwaku giyamumu.
Badi unatoliluveluvedi be afaiweya tauni unahalamanena, aiyeta tuwelogaga kahege tu Yelusalema againe galaka be ganatafalolo Yaubada ganahawadavadavana.

Badi meneva'ama manuwa-tafalolo lakahine hi'itaku againe, keke tamo hakwadi buye adavekwageya, keke. Kadu keke manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi agaidiya o ka'i melaleya hida'itaku be vaita kaliva vekwageya fa'ina gadasiveyo'odi, keke.
Kadu dewai-nadi fa'ina hivekotuku-ma inubana keke afaiweya unanuhagani, fa'ina yadi gahe keke velemo'ena.

Tu yaku dewa sa'eyana fa'ina ganahawavemogatala. Yama Kaiwabu yana Eda iya gamulimuliyena tu Edai-nadi badi hihawavefwayayena. E, bwanenemeyao yadi Yaubada gahawadavadavana fa'ina Edai-nadi gamulimuliyena. Au kadu Mosese yana vehimeya moya'aina gavetumaganena, kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi buki ana nuwanuwa moya'aina gavetumaganena.
Ada badi hinuwanuwa amine meda iya kadu ganuwanuwa, higa Yaubada kaliva moya'aida alikeya ginasivemididida, kaliva yamumudiyao kadu koyodiyao ginasivemidididi.
Hidedemi iya ganuwanuwa fa'ina tova moya'aina gadibudibumuhiga be Yaubada matane kadu kaliva matadiya ganahuluva hagihagina, ada keke vita nuwafoukuya gana'ayauneni fa'ina.
Ada ahe gayegayega yama vehimeya amine yo abaveyao gaseuseni tu manuwa-tafalolo againe hinuhagaku. Keke yo'o buye adamiyami, kadu keke tamo hakwadi againe gadavekwageya.
Tu miYuda tufoidi manuwa tafalolo againe himiyami, Esiya ana fafali kalivai-dina, ada ka'i badi tamo gavadi fa'ina hidahawavekoyoyeku digo, badi adifaiweya o againiya hida'ela hidavekotuku.
O ka'i hida kaliva badi boi samuba hinagene himiyami be Koniselo agaidiya hivekotuku amanadi, adamoya o mataniya himidimidi, au ka'i tamo gavadi yaku koyona hinuhagana o hidayakahina.

Tu yaku dewa sa'eyanaga fa'ina ka'i hinahawavekoyoyeku, higa kotu againe badi matadiya gamidimidi tu gakova gagayo, Iya ganuwanuwa vaita kaliva alikeya hinamididi-havagi fa'ina adamoya wahawavekoyoyeku. Hidedemi gagahe.”

Hidede amine Folo gigahe tu bana Filikesi Kaiwabu yana Eda gihalamane-hagihagiyena fa'ina gahe velugana gihawatana gigayo, “Bana togiyomatana Laisiyo gina'ela-yo kotuya wanaluku-havagi be yami vekwageya ganayau-'owona.”

Ada tolugaviya adi tonagona Folo gimiyatagona-ma givehimeyena be manuwa toyogina againe gina'itave'avina. Gina'ita'itave'avina tu naudadana o ka'i gavadi yana nuwanuwa ma keke ginahawatani. Kadu givehimeya be tobohiyaneyao anaga o yana gavadi hina'aliyena, keke ginahawatadi.

Aiyeta tufona himiyami tu Filikesi gi'ela. Wavavinena hi'ela, adi egana Delusila vineYuda. Au Folo giyowanina be ginalukahihi. Ada Folo vetumagana Yesu Keliso againe gilulukahihiyena tu badi hivanevanenega.

Ada au Folo yana lukahihi ginunauwena ada dewa tunutunugina fa'ina gilukahihi, kadu kaliva taudiyao hinavehimeyedi be keke yadi nuwanuwa koyona amine hinahuluva ma gigaheyena. Kadu tova mulina vedewayauga be kaliva adi laufata ana tova ma gilukahihiyena. Hidedemi gilukahihi fa'ina, Filikesi gimatauta tauna yana dewa ginuwenuwena ada gigahena gigayo, “Auwe. Au unana be gava tova akufaiweya ya laumamala gananogalina, au ganayowani.”
Hidedemi gigahe tu kadu ginuwanuwa vaita ka'i Folo tamo mani gidaveleni-yo nuwana gida'iveyamumuna be deliya gidayauna fa'ina. Hidema fa'ina tova moya'aina hiyowayowanina be buye hilulukahihi.

Ada au malamala luhei hihegedi tu Filikesi gina ada ana hilafa higa kabemani velugana gilakayemu, ana egana Fosiyo-Fesito. Ada Filikesi nuwanuwana miYuda bana againe hinanuwa'abiyena fa'ina Folo deliya keke gidayauni.
Tu bana Fesito Sisaliya melala againe gilakayemu be yana abavehimeya givebutuna. Aiyeta tohiye gihegedi tu gina Yelusalema againe.
Ada medede againe abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu miYuda yadi tonagona buye Fesito againe hi'ela be Folo yana dewa koyona fa'ina hi'awatalatalainena.

Ada Fesito againe hive'o'ola be yadi nuwanuwa amine ginahuluva higa yana tolugaviya ginavehimeyedi be Folo Yelusalema againe hina'aliyena. Au badi ahe hivevai be edeya hinaluve'alikana fa'ina hidedemi hive'o'ola.
Tu bana Fesito gigahedi gigayo, “Folo Sisaliya deli againe gimimiyami, ada tova kabisona iya tauku medede againe ganayewaku.

Au yami tonagona tufoidi Sisaliya againe hidana. E, badi iya buye anana ada bana kalivai-nadi ka'i tamo gavadi koyona gidafaisewana digo, au medede againe wanakotu be yana dewa wana'awatalatalainena.” Hidedemi Fesito gigahedi.
Au aiyeta eita o ka'i teni Fesito Yelusalema againe gimiyami tu Sisaliya againe gihobu. Bogi sa'eyana gida mala gilauna vedewayauga ana manuweya giluku givetoga, ada givehimeya be Folo hina'aliyena.

Ada au Folo giyemu againe, miYuda yadi tonagona Yelusalema againe hitauya-ma himidififina, ada hivebutu hihawavekoyoyena vaita koyona lakahi-mo'ena moya'aina gidafaisewadi tu keke adifaiweya yadi gahe velemo'ena ma hidaseyemauneni.

Tu Folo tauna gilugolegolena gigayo, “Keke tamo gavadi koyona gadafaisewani, keke. Keke miYuda yama vehimeya gadakivekoyoni, keke manuwa-tafalolo lakahina gadakivebwaneneni, kadu keke Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa againe gadakoyo.”

Bana Folo gigahe gigayo, “Adamoya Sisa yana abavedewayauga againe gakotu. Gilubodana be o'eni yana kaliva udavedewayaugiku. Ada o tauni uhalamane-hagihagiyena keke tamo gavadi koyona miYuda agaidiya gadafaisewani.

Ka'i iya gadakoyo ada yaku koyona ana laufata alika amine digo, keke gadave'o'ola be unanuwakabubuyeku vaita keke unaluve'alikaku. Tu ka'i yaku koyona miYuda hi'awatalatalainena-ma keke velemo'ena digo, keke tamo hakwadi againe abavehimeya gidadauda-yo badi nimadiya ginahegenauweku. Au iya gave'o'ola be Loma Tokaiwabu higa Sisa tauna ginavedewayaugiku.”
Hidede amine Folo gigahe-yo Fesito yana tokivetuvetunu buye hilukahihi, ada au gigahena gigayo, “O uve'o'ola be Sisa againe unakotu. Au Sisa againe unana.”
Himiyami tu Kini Agelifa wanouna, adi egana Benisi, buye hi'ela Sisaliya againe be Fesito hinalusiuleyena, ada bana againe hiwakawaka.

Ada aiyeta gavaiyehi himiyami tu Fesito Folo yana huluva fa'ina kini gikivetuvetununa be buye hilukahihiyena. Au gigahena gigayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, bana Filikesi deliya gise-vagahina amanadi.

Ada boi Yelusalema againe gana ana toveya, miYuda yadi abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao kadu yadi kaliva lakahidiyao bana yana koyona fa'ina hi'awatalatalaineku, ada hive'o'oleku be alikeya ganahegena.

Tu iya gagahedi gagayo, Ime miLoma yama dewa keke hidede amine. Keke kaliva alikeya anamaduhegeni. Nagona badi hihawavekoyoyena-ma bana buye hinavemagigi'ita'ita ada yana dewa hi'awatalatalainena-ma fa'ina tauna anafaiweya ginalugolegolena. Muliya anavedewayaugina. Hidede amine gavenuwa'atadi.
Ada badi buye a'ela tu keke gada'i'abo'abobowa, au aiyeta anavelu abavedewayauga againe galuku, ada gavehimeya be kalivai-nadi hina'aliyena.
Hi'aliyeni-yo nibaineyao hitowamidi, ada iya gavaita dewa koyo-mo'ena fa'ina hidahawavekoyoyeni tu yadi hawavekoyo keke hidede amine.
Au taudiyao yadi tafalolo ana nuwanuwagaga fa'ina hivekwageyena, kadu kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Yesu fa'ine hivekwageyena, Bana'e amanadi boi gi'alika tu Folo gigahegahe vaita wayawaina gidamiyami.

Ada au nuwaku gifani gavaiya'amine halamana yadi tafalolo ana nuwanuwa fa'ina ganavaini-yo akufaiweya ganavedewayaugini ma keke gadahalamaneni. Hidema fa'ina Folo gatoliluveluvena be higa ka'i nuwanuwana Yelusalema againe ginana, ada medede againe hida awatalatalaina fa'ina ginakotu.

Tu bana Folo give'o'ola be deliya ginamiyami ada aimo Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa againe ginakotu. Give'o'ola-yo au iya gavehimeya be deliya hina'ita'itave'avina tu aimo gavatova-yo Sisa againe gana'iveninisena.” Au hidedemi Fesito Agelifa againe gigahe.
Au bana Agelifa gigahe gigayo, “Iya nuwanuwaku kaliva-mo'ena yana gahe tauku gananogalina.”
Fesito gigayo, “Bogiyadi unanogalina.”

Au Fesito givebutu gilukahihi gigayo, “Kini Agelifa kadu moya'aimiyao ime buye kavaga'auta amanadi. Keke gavana fa'ina tu hida kaliva wa'itana. MiYuda moya'aidi Yelusalema againe kadu hidedei Sisaliya againe bana fa'ine hive'o'ole-fa'iliku, hikova'awafatafata be higa keke aimo wayawaina ginamiyami.

Tu iya gavedewayaugina be keke tamo gavadi yana koyona gadanuhagani-yo alikeya ganahegeni. Ada bana tauna give'o'ola be Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa againe ginakotu fa'ina, iya gavehimeya be Loma againe gana'iveninisena.

Au yada Tokaiwabu Loma againe yana leta gana'etoladina tu gavaimi ganagahe? Kaliva gavadi yana koyona ganayakahini ma nuwaku giluhifufu. Hidema fa'ina gavehimeya be moya'aimi matamiya gimidimidi, ada kadu Kini Agelifa o mataniya gimidimidi be ya toliluvaluva againe unavedewayaugina. Unavedewayaugina be ka'i gavadi yana koyona unanuhagani-yo akufaiweya leta againe ganayakahina.
Au ka'i filisina Loma againe kotu fa'ina gana'iveninisena be keke tamo yana koyona ganayakahini, medema keke gidalubodani.” Au hidedemi Fesito gigahe.
Tu Agelifa Folo againe gigahe gigayo, “Au gahawahege be tauni fa'iniya unalukahihi.” Ada Folo nimana gikilakahina givebutu tauna gilugolegolena.
Gigayo, “Kini Agelifa, nuwaku giyamumu fa'ina adamoya o mataniya gamidimidi be gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina miYuda hihawavekoyoyeku-ma iya tauku ganalugolegoleku.

Wona velemona nuwaku giyamumu fa'ina o'eni miYuda yada dewa moya'aina kadu gaitoma moya'aina kavekwavekwageyena-ma uhalamane-hagihagiyena. Hidema fa'ina gave'o'ole be ya wa'atuvefa'ila yaku kahihi unavanenegena.

E, boi tuwaina hihalamaneku ada ka'i badi nuwanuwadi amine, au iya fa'ikuya adifaiweya hina'awatalatalaina higa boi kabi'okuya yada tafalolo ana yo'o sa'eyana againe galuku, adi egana Falisi. Badi Falisi Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe miYuda velugadiyao hitubuhegedi, ada iya Falisi fa'ina kadu hidedemi gahuluhuluva.

Ada tova adamoya yaku nuwanuwa sa'eyana fa'ina hivekotuku. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bwanenedeyao agaidiya giwonadabadaba higa yana Tovegida adi kibababala fa'ina gina'iveninisena. Hida Yaubada yana wonadabadaba iya ganuwave'avina fa'ina hivekotuku.

Ada au ide miYuda yada yo'o tuwelo matatabudi uyadayada be bogi Yaubada hihawahawadavadavana tu hinuwave'avina higa Yaubada giwonadabadaba amine, au badi agaidiya ginalakayemu. Ho Kauveya, miYuda higahe vaita hida nuwanuwai-nadi hidanuwave'avini tu iya kadu hidedemi ganuwave'avina nonogana hihawavekoyoyeku.
Ide omi miYuda, gavana fa'ina wagahe vaita Yaubada keke anafaiweya kaliva alikeya ginasivemidididi?
Tu boi iya tauku ganuwanuwa vaita gidalubodaku be gadavedivediwe kaliva Yesu kwanaNasaledi ana egana hivetumaganena-ma gadakivekoyodi.

Ada Yelusalema againe hidedemi gahuluva. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao yadi vehimeya againe Yaubada yana kaliva moya'aidi gakive'avidi be deliya gasedi. Muliya hivedewayaugidi againe, ka'i tovedewayauga hivehimeya be vaita alikeya hinahegedi, au iya gave'ehe.

Kadu tova keke sa'eyadi manuwa-abavehawala sinagogi tulina tulina agaidiya ganauna be gamunumunudi higa yadi vetumagana hidahegena. Au Yesu yana kaliva agaidiya ga'ila'a-mo'a fa'ina gana lauveya mali fafali melalai-dina agaidiya galuku be gakivekoyodi.
Tu tova sa'eyana gamidi be Damasiko againe ganana. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao hivegideku, ada aku vehimeya fefe againe hi'etoladina be ganauwena higa tovetumagana ganakivekoyodi fa'ina.
Kauveya unogali! Edeya ganauna tu mahalina lakahi-mo'ena lobameya ga'itana, mema kauwana yana mahala gitubuhegena. Ada iya'eku kadu kaliva hivebwa'uliyeku-ma buye gituvemahalima.

Au moya'aima babiya abe'u tu ago'ago sa'eyana ganogalina bona Hibeliu againe gigaheku gigayo, Saulo, Saulo! Gavana fa'ina ukikivekoyoku? Ya dewa vaita bulumakau amine. Wagana yana fuluma gi'utu'utu'atugena fa'ina, bulumakau tauna gi'ivekoliyana amine, meda o'eni yaku nuwanuwa udibudibutoyogena fa'ina tauni ase'ase una'ive'aulolona.
Ada iya gagayo, Kaiwabu, O hakwa'adi?
Bana Kaiwabu gigayo, Iya'eku Yesu, ada Iya ukikivekoyoku.

Au umidi. O againiya ga'ivemogataliku be yaku tofaisewa ganavegide. E, gavegide be tova adamoya u'itaku ma valeyaku una'awatalatalainena, kadu gavadi aimo tova mulina gana'ivemogatalina-ma una'awatalatalainena.
Tauni ya yo'o miIsileli agaidiya ganalugolegole, kadu yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya ganalugolegole be keke hinakivekoyo. Au badi agaidiya gana'iveninise be matadi unakivemahalina.

Unakivetuvetunudi be keke uyuyuya hinamiyami, au mahalina againe hinahagaviladi be hinamiyami, kadu keke Setani yana abavehimeya againe hinamiyami, au Yaubada yana abavehimeya againe hinahagaviladi be hinamiyami. E, hinahagaviladi be Iya agaikuya hinavetumagana, ada yadi vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada yadi koyona ginayawelina, ada yana yo'o mahamahalidiyao agaidiya ginalukuwedi. Hidemi Kaiwabu gigahe.
Kini Agelifa unogali! Hida vehimeya lobama ana Kaliva giveleku-ma keke gadadibutoyogeni.

Au nagona Damasiko kadu Yelusalema againe galumamala. Muliya miYuda yadi melala moya'aina agaidiya kadu yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya galumamala gagayo, Yami dewa koyona wanahegena be Yaubada againe wanahagavilami, ada yami hagavila velemo'ena ma yami huluva hagihagina againe wanaseyemaunena be moya'aidi hina'itana.
Hida yaku laumamala fa'ina miYuda manuwa-tafalolo lakahina againe hikive'aviku ada higaluvaluva be hidaluve'alikaku.

Tu Yaubada yana veluga agaikuya tuwaina be ginunauwena tova adamoya fa'ina, adamoya-mo'a hidedei gamidimidi be moya'aimi agaimiya ga'awa'awatalatalaina, kabi'omiyao kadu lakahimiyao leleleya. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Mosese kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina velugadiyao gavaimi aimo tova mulina ginalakayemu-ma higaheye-vagahina. Ada badi higahe amine, meda iya gagahe. Keke mali venuwa'ata gadalukahihiyeni.

Ada badi to'awatalatalaina higahe vaita Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso aulolo tagiya gidanuhagana, kadu gida'alika be gidamididi-havagi. Au Bana'e gidamiditowamidi fa'ina, miYuda agaideya kadu yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya mahalina fa'ina gidalumamala.”
Ada au hidedemi Folo tauna gilugolegoleni tu Fesito bana againe gikova agona lakahina gigayo, “Folo, o kabakabaleya. Tova moya'aina buki uhawahawana fa'ina uvekabakabaleya.”
Tu bana Folo gigahe gigayo, “Kauveya Fesito, iya keke gadavekabakabaleya, au nuwanuwa velemona kadu tunutunugina galukahihiyena.

Kini Agelifa, hida gaitoma ahe uhalamanena fa'ina akufaiweya o againiya ganagaheye-mo'ena, keke tamo gavadi ganasevauyeni. Gaitoma ahe gilakayemu-ma keke hukune gidalakayemu, au kabu'avane gilakayemu fa'ina iya gavaita hida gaitoma moya'aina uhalamane-'owona.
E, Kini Agelifa, gavaiyami? Ka'i Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi gahe uvetumaganena? Makewa uvetumaganena ma iya gahalamanena!”
Au bana Agelifa Folo againe gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i mene o unuwanuwa vaita tova adamoya ya laumamala kali'uhona againe udasive'auyeku-yo Yesu Keliso gadavetumaganeni?”

Bana Folo gigayo, “Ka'i laumamala kali'uhona o ka'i tunugina au ai'adi, tu Yaubada againe gave'o'ola be iya ganuhagana amine kadu o'eni unanuhagana, ada moya'aimiyao adamoya yaku gahe wavanevanenegena-ma kadu wananuhagana. Tu keke nuwanuwaku hida bulava kainumula againe omi hinayogomi.”
Hidedemi gigahe-yo bana kini gitowamidi kadu kabemani ada Benisi, kadu moya'aidi badi buye hihiyoto-ma himidi.
Ada hihobu be buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ayoma! Bana hida kalivai-nadi keke tamo gavadi koyona gidafaisewani tu hima gavana hidamiyaluve'alikani o ka'i deliya hidamiyaseni.”
Ada au Agelifa Fesito againe gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i bana hida kalivai-nadi keke gidave'o'ola be Loma Tokaiwabu againe gidakotu digo, adafaiweya kadayauna be gidana.”

Tu Fesito givehimeya be wakeya anayage anana Loma againe fafali ana egana Itali. Givehimeya-yo yana kalivamomo Folo kadu filisina velugadiyao buye hihegenauwedi togiyomatana sa'eyana againe, ana egana Yuliyasi, be bana gina'itave'avidi. Bana Yuliyasi Loma Tokaiwabu yana ame adi togiyomatana sa'eyana.

Ada Adalamitiumi ana waka sa'eyana againe ayage, wakai-nadi taliya ana melaleya ginanulukuluku Esiya ana fafaliya. Kadu kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Alisitako, kwanaTesalonaika, medema melala fafali ana egana Masedoniya againe. Ada au bana ime buye ayage be alowoga.
Kadu ayage Saidoni ahege tu alaka ma bolimana giluveyeveyewama fa'ina, himula ana egana Saifilasi aiwa'una anuve'uyena.
Anauna be fafali ana egana Silisiya ahegena, kadu anauna fafali ana egana Famifiliya ahege tu melala ana egana Maila avaina, medema fafali ana egana Laisiya againe.
Ada medede againe yama togiyomatana Alekisanidiya ana waka sa'eyana ginuhagana, medema tova kabi'ona ginalowoga fafali ana egana Itali againe ginana. Ada au ime giveyagevedamama be alowoga.

Ada aiyeta gavaiyehi ma'inuwameyao anauna tu bolimana gilulutunetunema fa'ina, vaita keke amafaiweya Naidasi anavaini. Tu anauna anauna Naidasi liline ayemu tu meda bolimana giluveyeveyewama fa'ina, keke amafaiweya mala wamatane anana. Hidema fa'ina ma'i anuviviya, himula ana egana Kelita aiwa'una anuve'uyena be kabuna ana egana Salamone amine a'ela anuwaliliuga.
Au taliya liline anauna tu bolimana fa'ina keke amafaiweya adamadunauna, au ma'inuwameyao abaluku sa'eyana avaina, ana egana Abahiwaga Yamumuna, medema melala ana egana Lasiya liline.

Tu medede againe aiyeta a gavaiyehi amiyami tu tova yamumuna ahegena, au ka'i adanu-havagi digo, yamana au vitana. Mala koyona ana aituha giluveda'ufo, fa'ina miYuda yadi tafalolo lakahina ahe gihavaina, tafalolo-nadi againe Koyona ana Aba'aiyawela hinuwa'udu'uduna. Mala koyona ana aituha giyemu fa'ina, bana Folo givenuwa'atadi gigayo, “Kaliva, keke kanana. Yadana vitana ma ga'ayaunena. Ka'i kanana digo, lokoloko kanave'alugena, waka kanakivekoyona kadu ide ka'i tufoida kana'alika.” Hidedemi Folo gigahe.
Tu togiyomatana Folo yana gahe keke gidavenogaleni, au badi waka ana tovehimeya kadu toniwaka higahe vaita hinana-ma bonadi hi'abina.

Bolimana ana aituheya abahiwaga againe amiyami-ma waka yana miya keke gidalubodani. Hidema fa'ina kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi nuwanuwadi hinatalalaka be hinagaluvaluva ka'i Finikesi againe hinana. Finikesi, medema abahiwaga himula ana egana Kelita againe, ada ana aba'ita keke wabolimaneya au niwalova wa'amine. Au hidede againe adifaiweya hinamiyami bolimana ana aituheya.
Tu mala dikudikukuna wabolimaneya gitowa fa'ina, kaliva hinuwanuwa vaita Finikesi againe adifaiweya hinana hinayemu. Au lomu hisilakahina digo Kelita taliyeya-mo'aya amadubala.
Aimo keke adana lauva tunugina tu mala koyona ana egana lauhanaga himula amine gilaka'ela.
Giyemu waka gi'abina ada ave'etolakalaka-wayoga, keke amafaiweya. Au a'ilova tu bolimana gibibima.
Gibibima digo himula kabi'ona ana egana Koda aiwa'une anuwaliliuga. Himula aiwa'une anauna tu avegavegala, waka kabi'ona ataitaina higa adasilakahina ada keke lefo ginayavalini fa'ina.

Au imolata hivegavegalena tu waka tabone hisilakahini-yo bulava o'olina againe waka lakahine hi'ubibina be keke lefo ginaluyavalini fa'ina. Kadu himatamatauta ka'i waka aimo lelega againe ginalaka, lelegai-nadi ana egana Saitasi. Hidedemi himatauta fa'ina naya hikakilina be bolimana waka gibibina.
Ada mala koyona keke ma'i gida'a'atagoni fa'ina tova anavelu againe hivebutu lokoloko hihebana.
Tu tova anaveto againe waka ana lokoloko taudiyao nimadiya hihebana.

Kadu aiyeta a gavaiyehi anauna tu keke ma'ita kauwana ada'itani, kadu ibadibadi keke ma'ita ada'itani fa'ina ha'amine ha'amine anauna ma keke adahalamaneni. Kadu'e bolimana aimo gimadumadu toyogina tu ime avaita ada'alika.
Tu omi wanogali! Wana'asevatu fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi agaideya gina'alika, au wakagaga gina'alu'alugena.

Hidema gahalamanena, fa'ina bogi againe yaku Yaubada gahawadavadavana-ma yana tovenuwa'ata iya agaikuya gi'ela gigahe gigayo, Folo, keke unamatauta. Aimo Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa matane unamidi be ginavedewayaugi. Kadu'e Yaubada tonuwakabubu fa'ina, au ginanuwakabubuye be keke tamo hakwadi wakeya buye wananauna-ma gina'alika. Au hidedemi yaku Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata gigaheku.
Tobohiyakweyao, hidema fa'ina wana'asevatu. Bana Yaubada gavetumaganena be yana tovenuwa'ata gigaheku amine, velemo'ena kananuhagana.
Ide keke kana'alika tu aimo hai himula sa'eyana againe bolimana ginalulakahida.” Hidedemi Folo gigahe.
Tu bogi fotini ahegedi tu aimo bolimana ha'amine ha'amine gibibaidadanema, lehaga againe anauna-ma ana egana Ediliya. Ada bogi nafone imolata hi'ayaunena taliya sa'eyana liline ayemuyemu.
Ada hidema fa'ina hitutuluva be lehaga ana tunuga hiwavana, nimada ana wava foti (40). Himiya kabisona kadu hitutuluva-havagi ada lehaga nimada ana wava teti (30) hinuhagana.
Au himatauta higayo, “Ka'i yama waka lai againe ginatula.” Au lomu fowa waka ulene hisehobuyena, ada yadi viviluwa agaidiya hive'ove'o'ola be higa mala gidamadulauna.
Ada imolata waka kabi'ona lehageya hisehobuyena higa waka lakahina hida'otayabuyabuna. Hive'alololo higayo, “Lomu waka mudune anasehobuyena.”
Tu bana Folo togiyomatana kadu yana tolugaviya agaidiya gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i hida imolata keke wakeya hinamiya digo, aimo keke amifaiweya yawayawamiyao wanamiyami, au lehageya wana'alika.”
Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina, tolugaviya bulava againe waka kabi'ona hiluhifona-ma hitalagolohina ada au hive'alugena.
Tu mala kabi'ona ginawedala ma Folo gigaheya'aya'alidi be a'a hina'ana gigayo, “Aiyeta fotini wamiyami yami wamatauta, keke ma'i a'a wada'u'ani, au mafu gilaumi.
Fa'ina gave'o'olemi toyogina ma'i a'a wada'ana. Ka'i keke wana'a yami faiwala keke, au wana'alika. Tu gagahemi keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya u'una sa'eyana gina'agolohini.”
Ada Folo hidemi gigahe-yo, au tauna a'a givaina digo moya'aidi matadiya Yaubada againe givesiule, gikihinena be givebutu gi'a.
Au moya'aidi hi'asevatu be kadu ma'i a'a hi'ana.
Ada ime kaliva wakeya amiyami-ma ama kilagalaga 276.
Ada au moya'aidi hi'ahiyauwa-yo a'a wakeya hidodona-ma lehageya hi'iyauyaulena be waka ginalu'aihaya fa'ina.
Tu mala gilauna imolata gava himula againe ayemu-ma hifaniyena, tu hukuna sa'eyana hi'itana, ana taliya makamakamina. Ada au hivevai be medede againe waka hinabilakahina.

Au tufoidi lomu hitalagolohina, kadu tufoidi bulava wayaisi ana sive'avina hiyauna. Hiyauna gihavaina, naya waka mudune hisilakahina be bolimana waka ginalutunetunena fa'ina. Ada taliya amine waka ginauna.
Tu waka lelega againe gitula. Waka muduna gilo'a, keke adifaiweya hinakakini tu ulena ma lefo lakahina be giluyaweyawelina.
Tu tolugaviya hivevai higa filisina hinaluve'alikadi be keke tamo hakwadi taliyeya hinakayolaka-yo hina'ota fa'ina.
Tu togiyomatana nuwanuwana Folo ginalugolegolena fa'ina gihawatadi. Au givehimeya be gaveyao adifaiweya hinakayo, medema hinamidi'auhifu be taliyeya hinakayolaka.

Velugadiyao kayo keke hidahalamaneni-ma ai againe o ka'i waka yogona againe hinakive'avina be taliyeya hinalaka. Ada au hidede amine moya'aima taliyeya alaka-'owoga, keke tamo hakwadi vita gidanuhagani.
Tu abavagave'avina againe ahe alaka-yo himula ana egana anogalina higa Molita.
Ada Molita kaliva veyaveyaodiyao ada hihinekalikaliyema be hilusiuleyema, ada ai hikulina be anavevala fa'ina wehi buye gilugaga againe ime avekwadudu.
Ada bana Folo gina ai giwahi be yana itava ai gi'ala'alata againe gidahegelakahina ma oloto koyona givala'inena fa'ina giyemu, ada nimane gi'aiyovaga tu gikudave'avina.

Ada badi Molita kaliva oloto Folo nimane gikudave'avina-ma hi'itana againe, buye hive'agahegahe higayo, “Ha! hida kaliva makewa toluve'alika, ada keke lehageya gidatowa'alika tu adamoya higa yana dewa ana laufata viviluwa nimane alika ginanuhagana.”
Tu Folo oloto gilukakina be ai againe gibe'u, ada keke tamo vita gidanuhagani.

Tu badi kaliva hilulubodena hivaita wowona gidatubuga o ka'i gidamadu'alika. Au hilulauboda hilulauboda tu keke tamo gavadi bana againe gidalakayemu fa'ina nuwanuwa tulina nuwadi gi'afolena, ada higayo, “Bana hidevama kadu viviluwa sa'eyana.”

Tu kaliva sa'eyana gimiyami, ana egana Fabiliyo, himulai-nadi ana tovehimeya, ada bana yana babi liline taliyeya ime alaka. Ada bana yana manuweya givega'aulema-yo aiyeta tohiye yana nuwakabubu againe amiyami.
Ada tamana gi'aulolo ana iviya gidauda, wowona vaita ai kadu kamona gihiwahegena lakahina. Au Folo to'aulolo againe giluku ada give'o'oleni-yo nimana bana againe gisena be gisiveyawana.
Bana giyamumu-yo kadu to'aulolo moya'aidi medema himulai-nadi againe himiyami-ma hivebutu hi'ela'ela, ada yadi yamumu hinuhagana.
Kadu nuwakabubu moya'aina hivelema, ada muliya akidewadewa be anayage ana toveya, amaga ama gufa yadi nuwakabubu hidodona.

Au Molita againe vaikohi tohiye amiyami tu waka sa'eyana againe ayage be alowoga. Wakai-nadi ma melala ana egana Alekisanidiya againe gitauya be himulai-nadi againe gimiyami bolimana ana aituheya. Ada waka ana egana Viviluwa Natuluga.
Au wakeya anauna tu melala ana egana Sailakusi againe ayemu be ahobu aiyeta tohiye amiyami.
Kadu ayage-havagi be anauna tu melala ana egana Legiumi againe ayemu. Bogi ada mala gilauna mala dikudikukuna giyemu, ada au aiyeta luhei ahegedi-yo melala ana egana Futiyolai againe ayemu.
Ada medede againe tovetumagana tufoidi anuhagadi be higahe fa'ina badi agaidiya awakawaka tafalolo sa'eyana. Ada ahegedi tu ana Loma tufone alakayemu.

Tu badi tovetumagana Loma againe valeyama hinogalina au hilowoga be hinamaduvega'aulema. Tufoidi abavaga'auta ana egana Afiyo againe ave'anauhaga. Kadu tufoidi melala ana egana Abamiyami Tohiye againe ave'anauhaga. Ada Folo gi'itadi-yo Yaubada againe givesiule ada gi'asevatu.
Tu Loma alakayemu againe, kabemani Folo hihawahegena be manuwa sa'eyana againe anakaibe ginamiyami, tu tolugaviya sa'eyana gi'ita'itave'avina be keke gina'ota fa'ina.

Ada au Folo aiyeta tohiye gimiyami tu miYuda yadi tonagona Loma againe gikovavaga'auhidi. Ada ahe hivaga'auta againe gigahedi gigayo, “Tobohiyakweyao, iya keke tamo gavadi koyona gadafaisewani, keke. Keke yada yo'o agaidiya gadakoyo, kadu keke yada dewa bwanenedeyao hivehawaleda-ma gadahawavekoyoyeni. Keke gadakoyo nonogana miYuda Yelusalema againe hikive'aviku be miLoma agaidiya hihegenauweku.
Au badi hivedewayaugiku tu gavadi koyona gafaisewani-yo alikeya hidahegeku-ma keke tamo hidanuhagani fa'ina nuwanuwadi hinayauku be ganana.

Tu badi miYuda higahedi be keke hinayauku, fa'ina eda sa'eyanaga againe akufaiweya ganana, higa gave'o'ola be Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa againe ganakotu. Hidedemi gave'o'ola tu keke vaita tamo gavadi fa'ina tauku yaku yo'o bana matane gadahawavekoyoyedi, keke.

Ada hida gaitoma iya agaikuya gilakayemu fa'ina omi gakovavaga'auhimi be buye kanalukahihi. Au adamoya yogoyogoniku wa'itaku. Bana'e ide miIsileli kabodabodana be ginakibababaleda amanadi iya gavetumaganena fa'ina, hida bulava kainumula againe yogoyogoniku gamimiyami.” Hidedemi Folo miYuda yadi tonagona gigahedi.

Tu badi higahena higayo, “Keke tamo leta o fa'iniya Yudiya againe hida'etoladini-yo adanuhagani, kadu keke tamo hakwadi tobohiyama sa'eyana medede againe gidatauya be gida'ela-yo o fa'iniya gidavenuwa'atama, o ka'i gidahawavekoyoye.
Tu ime nuwanuwama ya nuwanuwa ananogalina, fa'ina ahalamanena kaliva fafali moya'aina agaidiya hida Yesu kwanaNasaledi yana yo'o badi agaidiya o uluku amanadi hi'awalavedi.” Hidedemi higahe.

Hidemi higahe tu tova hisena be Folo againe hinavaga'auta-havagi. Ada tovai-nadi giyemu againe, yo'o keke kabi'ona bana againe hivaga'auta. Yana kivetuvetunu malalauga givebutu be ginunauwena mala gibogi, ada Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina gilumamaledi. Gigaluvaluva be yana gahe Yesu fa'ine velemo'ena ma ginaseyemaunena be badi hinavetumaganena fa'ina. Ada Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina velugadiyao yadi etoladi agaidiya bonai-nadi giyakahina, au badi Yesu fa'ine gavaimi higahegahe-ma giyakahina.
Ada tovanenega tufoidi higahe higayo, “Au wona velemo'ena,” ada hivetumaganena. Tu tufoidi ma keke nuwanuwadi hinavetumaganeni.
Au buye hivekwageya ada hivebutu hilowolowoga tu Folo yana gahe sa'eya-mo'ena badi gilukahihiyedi gigayo,
Tova moya'aina Yaubada bonana wananoganogalina
tu keke halamana wanavaini.
Kadu wana'ita'itana tu keke wana'itahalamaneni.
Au hida yo'o taudiyao nuwadi hikivefanina,
tagadi hi'ivekuluna, matadi hikive'uyuyuna.
Keke hidahawahegedi be matadi ganakivemahalini,
o ka'i tagadi ganakifoleni o nuwadi ganakiyauni.
Au keke nuwanuwadi Iya agaikuya hinahagaviladi
be ganakiveyamumudi fa'ina.
Au hidedemi Yaubada bana Aiseya awane gigahe.
Ada hidede amine gigahe-yo badi miYuda hivebutu hilowolowoga tu yana gahe fa'ina buye hivekwavekwageya.]
Tu bana Folo medede againe gimiyami malamala luhei. Kadu manuwa gimiyamiyanina-ma fatana tauna giseusena, ada gaveyao moya'aidi hi'ela be hina'itana medema yana wavemwamwala gilusiuleyedi.
Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ana luku fa'ina gilumamaledi, kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso fa'ina givehawaledi, ada au yana wa'asevatu gilukahihi ada keke tamo hakwadi gidahawatani. Au hidede amine.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina awadiya mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina giwonadabadaba-vagata, ada badi yana gahe Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina.

Natuna fa'ine buki-nadi againe gigaheye-vagahina, Bana'e yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso. Yana vekaliva ma babiya gihobu'ela be bwaneneda kikaiwabuna Devida ana yo'o agaidiya gitubuyemu. Gi'alika tu Yaubada to'alika agaidiya gisivemididina, ada yana mididi-havagi againe yana kaiwabu giseyemaunena higa Bana'e Yaubada Natuna yana wafaiwala kadu wa'Alu'aluwa Mahalina.

Yaubada gigahe-yo Yesu Keliso aku vehimeya giveleku be gave'afositolo, higa vaita yaku laumamala againe badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina fafali moya'aina agaidiya Bana againe hinavetumagana-yo bonana hina'abina be higa Keliso ana egana ginalakata.
Kadu omi tovetumagana Loma againe meda badi tovetumagana fafali moya'aina agaidiya buye Yaubada gikovami be Yesu Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine wanamiyami.

E, omi miLoma gaveyao moya'aimi Yaubada agaimiya ginuwanuwa ada givegidemi be yana kaliva mahamahalimiyao wanamiyami omi kalivai-mina yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Yaubada Tamada kadu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.
Yaubada fa'ine yaku wa'asehawahega gafififaisewa be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Natuna fa'ine galulumamalena. Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe tova moya'aina yaku ve'o'ola againe ami egana gayakayakahina.
E, gave'ove'o'ola higa boi keke akufaiweya gada'ela gada'itami fa'ina, ka'i tova adamoya Yaubada ginahawahegeku be tamo eda ginayauni-yo akufaiweya agaimiya gana'ela.
Nuwanuwaku lakahina gana'ela gana'itami be higa yaku ela omi agaimiya guwana Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tamo wananuhagani-yo Yesu Keliso ana halamana againe wanafaiwala.
Yaku nuwanuwa hidede amine higa buye kanave'aveluveluga. Yami vetumagana againe omi iya ase'aseku wanakivevatuna, ada yaku vetumagana againe iya omi ase'asemi ganakivevatuna.

Tobohiyakweyao nuwanuwaku wanahalamanena tova a gavaiyehi gavevevai yaku elavaguvagu agaimiya gada'ela tu gaga-wayoga. Yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina mali fafali agaidiya galumamaledi be yaku laumamala guwana ganuhagana amine, meda nuwanuwaku omi agaimiya gana'ela ganalulumamala-yo yaku faisewa guwana tamo gana'itana.

Yaubada aku vehimeya giveleku fa'ina gilubodaku be Yesu Keliso fa'ine kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya ganalulumamala. E, kaliva wamelaleya kadu kaliva wawala'aiya kaliva nuwanuwahuyadiyao kadu kaliva fanifanidiyao au kaliva moya'aidiyao agaidiya ganalulumamala.
Gilubodaku be kaliva moya'aidiyao ganalulumamaledi fa'ina nuwanuwaku lakahina omi kaliva Loma againe wamimiyami-ma agaimiya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ganalulumamalena.

Venuwa'ata Yamumuna gihawavemogatala gavaiya'amine Yaubada ginaseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane. Yada yegayega hidede amine. Yesu Keliso againe kavetumagana fa'ina, ide tokoyona nonogana Yaubada ide fa'ideya gigahe gigayo, “Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao.” Ada ka'i vetumagana againe kanamiyami inubane be gina ana abalauyabu, au ide yegayegadeyao Yaubada matane kanamiyami. Meda tuwaina Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya yada yegayega inubana fa'ina gigahe gigayo,
Hai kaliva vetumagana againe gimimiyami fa'ina
bana yegayegana Yaubada matane, medema
wayawaina velemo'ena ginamiyami.

Wa'ita, gavadi Yaubada fa'ine adifaiweya hinahalamanena medema keke gidasevauyeni, au gi'ivemogatalina. Gavaiya'amine gi'ivemogatalini? Me yana aibubuna againe. Boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada babi gibubuna ana toveya be ginunauwena tova hidevama Bana inubana kadu yana faiwala miyamiya-vagahina kabu'avane gidadauda be kaliva hi'itahalamanena. Keke matadiya Yaubada hida'itani tu yana aibubuna againe Bana'e velemo'ena gimiyamiya-vagata Yaubada kadu yana faiwala au miyamiya-vagahina ma hi'itahalamanena. Yaubada ana ita'ita yana aibubuna againe hi'itahalamanena fa'ina, keke adifaiweya hinagahe hinagayo, “Ime fanifanimeyao fa'ina, akoyo.” Taumadi Yaubada ana halamana au adifaiweya, tu Bana inubana keke hidanuwenuweni fa'ina givematahiwadiyedi.
Higahegahe higa vaita badi nuwanuwahuyadiyao tu tagadi gikulu.

Yaubada Tomiya-vagata ana hawadavadava hidibutoyogena kadu yana kaiwabu hagihagi-mo'ena hikilowena. Tu ikilukiluma hihawadavadavadi, ikilukilumai-dina adi ita vaita tomiyababi yawaidi keke miyamiya-vagahina amine, kadu vaita manuga amine kadu vaita kevakeva nunudadanidiyao amine kadu kevakeva gayagayagidiyao amine.

Tu badi mena dewa kwavakwavana againe hihawahegedi fa'ina, Yaubada yadi nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina agaidiya gihegedi-yo hihuluhuluva koyona. Dewa wowowomumuna hififaisewana higa wowodi buye hive'akikivekoyo.

Yaubada velemo'ena ma hikilowena tu gaitoma i'ibubunidi agaidiya hihawahegedi be hihawadavadavadi. Bana adi To'aibubuna keke hidanuwenuweni, Bana ana egana ma gilubodada be kanakikilakahina tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Tu mena gaitoma-kawowodi agaidiya hihawahawahegedi fa'ina, Yaubada yadi nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina wowowomumuna agaidiya gihegedi. Higa yadi vevine keke kaliva agaidiya hida'ayafana Yaubada adi ayauna giveledi amine. Au vevine mali vevine hi'aya'ayafanedi be hivemavemai.

Meda anafaiweya kaliva keke nuwanuwadi vevine buye hinadauda Yaubada adi ayauna giveledi amine. Au mali kaliva agaidiya matadi giludigadigaga-mo'a be dewa wowowomumuna buye hififaisewana. Medede amine hivetuvetubo fa'ina, adi matahiwadi mena dewa koyo-mo'ena gilubodana-ma amine wowodiya hinunuhagana.
Kadu'e hinuwanuwa vaita Yaubada ana halamana gaitoma-kawowo yo hivekwaulaugena fa'ina, Yaubada nuwadi uyu'uyuyuna againe gihegedi-yo dewa keke gidalubodadi-ma hihuluhuluvina.

Nuwanuwa koyo-mo'ena tulina tulina agaidiya himaga. Tova moya'aina dewa koyona hififaisewana, hi'ita'italuvadiga, hinuwanuwa vaita mali kaliva hinakikivekoyodi. Kadu ga'uma'uma luve'alika vekwageya ve'alololo itaveloi ve'awayahayaha nuwadi gi'abi-mo'ena.

Kadu hiveyaveyaina, mali kaliva adi egana hikikivekoyona, Yaubada hivenivenibainena, hi'i'ihawadamana, taudiyao adi egana hikikilakahina kadu hiseselakalaka. Koyona ivaguna ana huluva hi'iveyemaunina. Hinadiyao tamadiyao bonadi hidibudibutoyogena.
Badi kalivai-dina u'udi keke, yadi wonadabadaba vaita gahe-kawowo, nuwakabubu kadu hinekalikali keke ma'ita hidahalamaneni. Au hidede amine yadi koyona ana loi.

Yaubada vehimeya gisena vaita badi mena dewa koyona hififaisewana-ma kalivai-dina gilubodadi be alika hinanuhagana. Mena vehimeyai-nadi hihalamanena nonogana mena koyonai-dina agaidiya hihawahawahegedi tu keke hida'ilova. Ada keke taudiyaogaga koyonai-dina hidafifaisewadi, au mali kaliva meda hififaisewana-ma hihawaveyamumuyedi.

A, o'eni-ma mali kaliva yana dewa koyona fa'ina uhawavekoyoyena. Ugahe ugayo, “Bana gikoyo fa'ina Yaubada aimo ginalaufata.” O keke unagahe fa'ina koyona kadu mene o againiya gidadauda. Hida hima koyonai-dina bana gififaisewadi-ma kadu o ufifaisewadi fa'ina, bana uhawavekoyoyena tu kadu o tauni uhawavekoyoye.
Ide kahalamanena Yaubada gilubodana be kaliva yadi koyona fa'ina ginalaufata.

Au o vaita hakwadi yo unuwanuwa vaita Yaubada yana laufata una'oseni? Mali kaliva yadi koyona fa'ina uhawavekoyoyedi tu o tauni koyonai-dina ufifaisewadi. Makewa o keke afaiweya Yaubada yana laufata una'oseni.

Yaubada gihinekalikaliye. Ya koyona fa'ina keke gidamadulaufata, au gi'atuvefa'ile. Mena yana hinekalikali yana atuvefa'ila fa'ina ma'i uwowomumuyena o ka'i keke? Vaita udahalamaneni Yaubada gihinekalikaliye be higa ya dewa koyona unahegeni-yo Bana againe unahagavila.

Tu ide omi miYuda wanogali! Nuwami fanifanina kadu tagami kuluna ada keke wadahagavilami fa'ina, yami koyona ana laufata wakikiveba'una. Aimo tova mulina Yaubada kaliva ginavedewayaugida tunutunugina be badi koyodiyao yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana ana toveya, yami koyona ana laufata lakahi-mo'ena wanavaina.
Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gavaimi gavaimi hihuluhuluva, ka'i yamumuna o ka'i koyona, medemi adi laufata Yaubada ginaveledi.

Kaliva tufoidi tova moya'aina yadi wa'atuvefa'ila hihuluhuluva yamumuna be higa Yaubada ginahawaveyamumuyedi-yo hinakaiwabu be Bana buye hinamiyamiya-vagata. Yaubada badi kalivai-dina yawai-vagahidi ginaveledi.

Tu kaliva tufoidi taudiyaogaga yadi nuwanuwa hi'ita'itave'avina ada nuwanuwa velemo'ena hikilokilowena kadu dewa koyona himulimuliyena. Yaubada badi kalivai-dina agaidiya gina'ila'a be adi matahiwadi ginaveledi.

Tomiyababi gaveyao moya'aidi koyona hihuluhuluvina, medema vita ase'u'aulolo hinanuhagana. Nagona miYuda kalivai-dana ada laufata koyona kananuhagana tu kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina buye'i hinanuhagana.

Atu gaveyao moya'aidi hihuluhuluva hagihagina, medema kaiwabu davadava aseniwalova hinanuhagana. Nagona miYuda kalivai-dana mena laufata hagihagina kanamidinuhagana tu kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina buye'i hinanuhagana.
Fa'ina Yaubada yana laufata tunutunugina. Ka'i kwanamiYuda o ka'i keke kwanamiYuda tu yo'o tulina kalivana digo, adi laufata leleleya.
