Badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Mosese yana vehimeya keke hidahalamaneni. Ka'i badi kalivai-dina keke mena adi wavehimeya tu hinakoyo, au meda keke mena adi wavehimeya tu hinabwavi. Keke vehimeyai-nadi ana dibutoyoga fa'ina hinabwavi, au taudiyao hikoyo fa'ina hinabwavi be keke Yaubada buye hinamiyami. Ide miYuda Mosese yana vehimeya kahalamanena. Ka'i ide kalivai-dana we'a ada wavehimeya tu kanakoyo, au Yaubada mena vehimeyai-nadi ana dibutoyoga fa'ina ginavedewayaugida be ada laufata ginaveleda.

Wa'ita, gaveyao yegayegadiyao Yaubada matane? Keke vehimeya ana tonogala. Au vehimeya ana to'idibumuhiga yegayegadiyao Yaubada matane. Ka'i tamo hakwadi vehimeyai-nadi gida'ita'itave'avina, kadu medema fa'ine Yaubada gidagahe gidagayo, “Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.”

Badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Mosese yana vehimeya keke hidahalamaneni. Tu ka'i taudiyao yadi nuwenuweya vehimeyai-nadi gigahe amine ma hidahuluva, au mena keke adi wavehimeya nonogana vehimeya ana nuwanuwa yadi dewa againe hidaseyemaunena.

Mosese yana vehimeya badi keke agaidiya gidadauda tu mena vehimeyai-nadi ana nuwanuwa, vehimeya kadu hawata, ase'asediya gidadauda ma yadi dewa againe hiseyemaunena. Kadu togahe nuwafoudiya yana gahe againe hihalamanena vehimeya ana nuwanuwa ase'asediya gidadauda, fa'ina hinahuluva koyona amine o dakeya yadi nuwenuweya hi'ayaunena, o ka'i hinahuluva yamumuna amine o lugolagola yadi nuwenuweya hi'ayaunena. Au hidede amine kahalamanena vehimeya ana nuwanuwa ase'asediya gidadauda.

Aimo tova mulina Yaubada yana vedewayauga ana toveya au hidede amine ginalakayemu. Medema tovai-nadi Yaubada yana vehimeya againe Yesu Keliso ide kaliva yada nuwahinage kadu yada dewa sevasevauyana fa'ina ginavedewayaugida. Au hidede amine Venuwa'ata Yamumuna iya galulumamalena-ma gigahe.
Tu o'eni ma tauni a egana ukilakahina ugayo, “Iya kwanamiYuda, Mosese yana vehimeya againe galuluve'avina. Iya Yaubada gahalamanena fa'ina, iya Bana yana yo'o kalivana.”

Au hidede amine ugahegahe ada velemodi o halamani, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa uhalamanena, kadu Mosese yana vehimeya againe usikulu fa'ina hadema dewa yamumuna hadema dewa koyona ma afaiweya unaluve'uve'una.
O unuwave'avina vaita o badi matadi gi'uyuyuna-ma adi tokivetuvetunu kadu badi yadi nuwanuwa uyu'uyuyuna againe himimiyami-ma o tomahala nuwadi ana tokivemahala.
O badi fanifanidiyao ukivetuvetunudi kadu kabi'odiyao uvehavehawaledi. O Mosese yana vehimeya uhalamanena fa'ina, uvaitana halamana kadu nuwanuwa velemo'ena matatabuna udaluyabuni.
O mali kaliva uvehawaledi tu o'eni ma mene tamo halamana tauni uvehawale o ka'i keke? O kai'afu fa'ina ululumamala tu mene tamo gavadi o uki'afuna o ka'i keke?

O mali kaliva uhawatadi ugayo, “Keke wanakelele.” Tu hawata kelele fa'ina o ma'i u'itave'avina o ka'i keke? Kilumina uhawave'iyohoyohoyena. Mene tamo lokoloko kilumina yadi manuwa-tafalolo agaidiya uki'afuna o ka'i keke?

O'eni Mosese yana vehimeya fa'ina uselakalaka ugayo, “Ime miYuda Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese awane gilakayemu-ma ahalamanena. Mena vehimeyai-nadi ana kaiwabu lakahi-mo'ena.” Tu omi moya'aimi vehimeyai-nadi wayawelina fa'ina Yaubada mena vehimeya givelemi-ma u'ihawadamanena.
Mena ihawadamana fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Omi miYuda yami dewa koyona fa'ina, yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada ana egana hihawatagona.

Ide omi miYuda agaimiya kadu ganagahe. Tuwaina fwefweyamiya Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowomi againe hitomogolohina. Ka'i Mosese yana vehimeya wana'itave'avina, au ami tomogolota gaitoma lakahina. Atu ka'i vehimeya wanayawelina, au ami ita'ita vaita Yaubada yana iya'iyaya keke wowomiya hidatomogolohini.

Ka'i badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada yana iya'iyaya keke wowodiya hidatomogolohini-ma Mosese yana vehimeya ana nuwanuwa hi'idibumuhigena, au adi ita'ita Yaubada matane gavaiya'amine? Wona velemona badi vaita Yuda kaliva iya'iyayai-nadi wowodiya hitomogolohina-ma amidiya Yaubada matane.

Badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada yana iya'iyaya keke wowodiya hidatomogolohini tu vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina amanadi omi miYuda hinatubutagomi. Badi kalivai-dina adi tomogolota keke tu vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina. Omi miYuda Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese buki againe gi'etoladina-ma wahalamanena kadu yana iya'iyaya wowomiya gidadauda nonogana vehimeyai-nadi wayaweyawelina. Medema fa'ina yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina omi miYuda hinatubutagomi.

Tu mena yaku gahe Yuda kaliva wowoda ana tomogolota fa'ina ka'i kaliva sa'eyana ginagahe ginagayo, “Gava yamumu againe ide miYuda badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina katubuhegedi? Wowoda ana tomogolota againe gava yamumu kanuhagani?”

Me yamumu moya'aina, e yamumu tulina tulina ide miYuda kanuhagana. Yamumu sa'eyana ganamidiyakahina higa Yaubada Bana bona-mo'ena ide miYuda agaideya gihawavemogatalena be higa tomiyababi matatabudi kanahawaveleveledi. Hidedemi ada vehimeya giveleda.

Kadu'e tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana veyao ide miYuda agaideya gisena be giwonadabadaba vaita gina'itave'avida. Tu yada yo'o kalivadi tufoidi moya'aidi Yaubada bonana keke hidavetumaganeni ada yana veyao hikilowena. Gavaiyami? Badi hikilowena fa'ina, ka'i kanagahe vaita Yaubada yana wonadabadaba yada yo'o ada itave'avina fa'ina gidayawelini? Keke, keke-mo'a!
Omi wahalamanena kaliva ma hiveve'afwayafwaya tu Yaubada keke-mo'a gidafwaya. Au gavaimi gigahe medemi gigugai. Meda anafaiweya Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Ka'i O Yaubada unagahe, au makewa kaliva moya'aidi ya gahe au velemo'ena ma hina'itahalamanena. Ka'i kaliva hinahawavekoyoye, au makewa yadi gahe fwaya ma kabu'avane ginayemu.
Hidedemi tokaiwabu Devida Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gigahe.

Tu tamo hakwadi hida babi ana nuwanuwa amine ginagahe ginagayo, “Ka'i ide kahuluva koyona, au mali kaliva Yaubada yana huluva tunutunugi-mo'ena himadu'itana. Gavadi-yo yada koyona againe Yaubada yana huluva tunutunugina kakivemahalina nonogana givematahiwadiyeda? Bana hima Yaubada keke tunutunugina.” Ka'i hidede amine kanagahe o ka'i keke? Keke, keke-mo'a!
Yaubada gihuluhuluva tunutunuginaga. Ka'i Bana keke kaliva tunutunugina digo, kadu keke tomiyababi moya'aida anafaiweya ginavedewayaugida.

Kadu kaliva sa'eyana ginagahe ginagayo, “Yaku fwaya againe kaliva Yaubada yana gahe au velemo'ena ma himadu'itana. Gavadi-yo yaku fwaya Yaubada yana kaiwabu gikivetubugina nonogana tokoyona adi matahiwadi giveledi amine aku matahiwadi ginaveleku?”

Ka'i medema gahe velemo'ena digo, kaliva tufoidi kadu hinagahegahe hinagayo, “Kanahuluva koyona be higa mali kaliva yada koyona againe Yaubada kaliva hagihagi-mo'ena ma hinamadu'itana.” E, kaliva tufoidi hiveyaineku higa vaita mena gahe-nadi amine gadavehawala. Gaveyao medede amine higahegahe, medema gilubodadi be adi matahiwadi hinanuhagana.
Meda Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Keke tamo hakwadi yegayegana Yaubada matane, keke-mo'a.
Keke tamo hakwadi eda tunutunugina gidahalamaneni,
keke tamo hakwadi Yaubada gidaleleleni.
Kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada yana eda hihegena,
moya'aidi yadi nuwanuwa balana
keke tamo hakwadi gidahuluva yamumuna, keke-mo'a.
Meyadi fwaya againe gimaga.
Yadi veyaina ma vaita oloto awabugodi koyona amine.
Fafali moya'aina agaidiya hinunudadana
kaliva koyodiyao adi iya'iyaya gidadauda,
ase'u'aulolo kadu kaliva adi kivekoyo.
Kukuya ana eda keke hidahalamaneni.
Au hidedemi Yaubada kaliva moya'aida yada dewa fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gigahe.

Tu ide miYuda kahalamanena Yaubada vehimeya tulina tulina agaideya gisena, ada gilubodada be vehimeyai-dina matatabudi kana'itave'avidi. Atu keke kada'itave'avini fa'ina, ide miYuda kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina buye kahuluhuluva koyona ma moya'aida Yaubada matane kave'amata. E, Yaubada ide tomiyababi moya'aida yada koyona fa'ina ginavedewayaugida be ada laufata ginaveleda.

Moya'aida Yaubada yana vehimeya kayawelidi fa'ina, Yaubada keke tamo hakwadi fa'ine ginagahe ginagayo, “Bana yaku vehimeya gi'itave'avidi fa'ina, bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.” Mena vehimeyai-dina agaidiya keke yada yegayega gidayemu. Au vehimeyai-dina agaidiya yada nuwanuwa koyona ka'ayaunena.

Tu tova adamoya Yaubada mali eda yada yegayega Bana matane fa'ina givehawaleda. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi etoladi againe edai-nadi fa'ina hilukahihiyena. Ada mena yada yegayega Yaubada matane ana eda tulina keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana dibumuhiga againe gidave'inuba.

Au eda tulina inubana ma Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana againe. E, gaveyao moya'aidi Keliso againe hivetumagana, medema tokoyona nonogana Yaubada badi fa'idiya gigahe gigayo, “Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao Iya matakuya.” Yada koyona fa'ina ime miYuda kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina ada ita leleleya Yaubada matane, fa'ina ide kaliva moya'aida koyona kafaisewani-yo Yaubada ana ita mahamahali-mo'ena againe ada ita itababubabuna.

Meda ide moya'aida yada koyona fa'ina yogoyogonideyao kamiyami-tu Yesu Keliso gitutuvehobuda. Ada Yaubada yana nuwadoga kaliva moya'aida agaideya gihawahegena be Yesu Keliso yana tutuvehobu fa'ina ide tokoyona nonogana giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane.

Yaubada Yesu Keliso giyemaunena be gina'alika higa Bana dayagina gimadu-yo kaliva yadi koyona ana laufata giyawelina be Yaubada yana ila'a ginahavaina. Ada ka'i ide Yesu Keliso againe kanavetumagana, au Bana dayagina yada koyona ginayawelini-yo Yaubada yana ila'a agaideya ginahavaina. Gavadi-yo Yaubada Yesu Keliso giyemauneni-yo koyona ana laufata fa'ina gi'alika? Me mededemana againe kanahalamanena Bana kaliva tunutunugina higa kaliva yadi koyona fa'ina makewa gilaufata. Ka'i keke ginalaufata digo, kadu keke kaliva tunutunugina. Tova tuwaina Yaubada kaliva gi'atuvefa'iledi be yadi koyona keke gidamadulaufata, tu tova adamoya Yesu Keliso giyemaunena be koyona ana laufata fa'ina gi'alika.

E, tova adamoya kaliva yada koyona fa'ina Yaubada Yesu againe gilaufata be higa yana nuwanuwa tunutunugina ma ginaseyemaunena. Ada au hidede amine kahalamanena Yaubada kaliva tunutunugina. Kadu yada koyona Yesu againe gilaufata fa'ina, ide tokoyona gaveyao Yesu kavetumaganena, medema giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane.

Hai ada egana ana kailakata? Keke, keke-mo'a! Vehimeya ka'idibumuhigedi fa'ina, ka'i adafaiweya kanaselakalaka vaita ide kaliva yegayegadeyao? Keke, keke-mo'a! Fa'ina keke vehimeya ana idibumuhiga au yada vetumagana Yesu againe fa'ina ide kaliva yegayegadeyao Yaubada matane.
E, hidedemi kahalamanena, higa keke vaita Yaubada yana vehimeya kada'idibumuhigedi fa'ina au Yesu kavetumaganena fa'ina Yaubada giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane.

Gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Ka'i Bana Yaubada au miYudagaga yama Yaubada, ime agaimeya yana vehimeya Mosese awane gisena-ma kalivai-mana? Keke-mo'a. Au Bana'e kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina buye yadi Yaubada.

Yaubada Bana'e au sa'eyanaga ada yana nuwanuwa kaliva moya'aida agaideya sa'eyanaga. Ime miYuda gaveyao Yesu againe avetumagana, au medema Yaubada gisema yegayegameyao Bana matane. Omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina gaveyao Yesu againe wavetumagana, au medema Yaubada gisemi yegayegamiyao Bana matane.
Yesu againe kavetumagana fa'ina, keke-mo'a Yaubada yana vehimeya tuwai-mo'ena gisena-ma kadakiloweni. Au vehimeyai-nadi kahawaveyamumuyena.
Tu ide miYuda bwaneneda lakahina Abelahamo fa'ina ganagahe. Ka'i bana Yaubada yana vehimeya gidibumuhigena fa'ina Yaubada matane giyegayega o ka'i gavaiyami?

Ka'i bana yana idibumuhiga fa'ina Yaubada gidasena yegayegana Bana matane digo, yana idibumuhiga fa'ina anafaiweya tauna ana egana gidakilakahina. Atu keke tamo gavadi gidadauda-yo anafaiweya Yaubada matane tauna ana egana gidakilakahini.
Yana yegayega Yaubada matane fa'ina, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gavaimi gigahe? Gigayo,
Abelahamo Yaubada givetumaganena, ada yana vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.
Wa'ita, ka'i kaliva taubada sa'eyana againe ginafaisewa, bana taubada mani ginavelena. Keke gidagahe vaita nuwakabubu gidaveleni. Au gigayo, “Bana yana idibumuhiga fatana gavelena.”

Atu Yaubada kaliva yana yegayega Bana matane fa'ina keke faisewa ana nuwanuwa amine gidahuluva. Hai kaliva yana yegayega Yaubada matane fa'ina keke yana idibumuhiga againe ginaluluve'avina au yana vetumagana Yaubada againe ginasena, medema fa'ine Yaubada ginagahe ginagayo, “Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.” Ka'i ide tokoyona Yaubada againe kanavetumagana, au ide tokoyona nonogana yada vetumagana fa'ina ide fa'ideya ginagahe ginagayo, “Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao Iya matakuya.”

Meda anafaiweya tuwai-mo'ena tokaiwabu Devida kaliva yegayegana Yaubada matane fa'ine gigahe. Bana kaliva yana idibumuhiga fa'ina Yaubada keke gidanuwanuwa tu yana vetumagana ginuwenuweni-yo bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, “Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.” E, bana kalivai-nadi yana vemwamwala lakahina fa'ina Devida Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gilukahihi gigayo,
Yaubada giyawelina kadu
yadi koyona givekwaulaugena,
medema yadi vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Hai kaliva yana koyona fa'ina
Kaiwabu keke ginalaufata,
medema yana vemwamwala gavatubuga!
Hidedemi Devida gigahe.

Tu mena vemwamwala Devida gilukahihiyena-ma ka'i ime miYuda wowomeya iya'iyaya hitomogolohina-ma kalivai-mana ama loi gagana ananuhagana? Keke-mo'a. Au kadu badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina adi tomogolota keke ma yadi vetumagana againe vemwamwalai-nadi hinanuhagana. Hidedemi kahalamanena fa'ina Yaubada bonana ahe kayakahina gigayo, “Abelahamo yana vetumagana fa'ina, bana fa'ine Yaubada gigahe gigayo, Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.”

Gava tova Yaubada hidedemi gigahe? Yaubada yana iya'iyaya Abelahamo wowone ahe hitomogolohini-yo gigahe o ka'i aimo keke hidatomogolohini tu gigahe? Me Yaubada yana iya'iyaya Abelahamo wowone aimo keke hidatomogolohini tu Yaubada gigahe vaita bana kaliva yegayegana.

Nagona Yaubada gigahe vaita Abelahamo yana vetumagana fa'ina bana kaliva yegayegana Bana matane tu muliya Yaubada givehimeyena be yana iya'iyaya wowone hitomogolohina. Medema aituha higa vaita ginahalamanena aimo wowona ana tomogolota keke gidavaini tu yana vetumagana Yaubada againe gimadusena fa'ina yana yegayega Bana matane ginuhagana. Yana vetumagana wai ginagona tu iya'iyaya wai gimulina. Hidede amine Abelahamo againe gilakayemu be higa gaveyao moya'aidi Yaubada yana iya'iyaya keke wowodiya hidatomogolohini tu Bana againe hivetumagana-yo gigahe vaita badi yegayegadiyao Bana matane, medema vaita Abelahamo bwaneneneyao ada bana bwanenedi.

Bana Abelahamo kadu ime miYuda bwanenema, Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowomeya atomogolohina-ma kalivai-mana. Keke vaita wowoma ana tomogolota fa'ina bana bwanenema, keke. Au ime gaveyao Abelahamo tavagine ananauna higa bana aimo Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowone keke hidatomogolohini tu Yaubada againe gimaduvetumagana amine ime avetumagana, medema Abelahamo bwaneneneyao ada bana ime bwanenema.

Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Abelahamo againe giwonadabadaba gigayo, “O againiya kadu bwanenemomo agaidiya babi matatabuna ganavelemi.” Keke vaita Abelahamo Yaubada yana vehimeya gida'idibumuhigeni fa'ina, Yaubada hidedemi gidawonadabadaba. Au bana Yaubada givetumaganeni-yo gisena yegayegana Bana matane fa'ina, Yaubada yana wonadabadaba bana againe kadu bwaneneneyao agaidiya gisena.

Yaubada keke gidagahe vaita badi Mosese yana vehimeya hi'idibumuhigena-ma yana wonadabadaba guwana hinanuhagani. Au gigahe vaita badi Bana againe hivetumagana-ma hinanuhagana. Ka'i badi vehimeya ana todibumuhiga yana wonadabadaba guwana hidanuhagana digo, ide Yaubada ana tovetumagana kadavetumagana-kawowo kadu Yaubada yana wonadabadaba vaita gaitoma-kawowo.

Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe gidalakayemu. Fa'ina ka'i Mosese yana vehimeya kanayawelina, keke Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana kananuhagani au Yaubada yana ila'a guwana kananuhagana. Ada ka'i keke tamo vehimeya gidadauda digo, kadu keke tamo vehimeya ana aiyawela gidadauda.

Tu vehimeya againe Yaubada yana ila'a guwana gilakayemu fa'ina, yana wonadabadaba guwana keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe gidalakayemu. Au vetumagana againe gilakayemu be higa ide tovetumagana tokoyona nonogana Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe yana wonadabadaba kananuhagana, kadu Abelahamo bwaneneneyao gaveyao moya'aidi yadi wavetumagana ma adifaiweya hinanuhagana. E, Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana vetumagana againe gilakayemu be higa ide miYuda yada wavetumagana Mosese yana vehimeya ka'idibumuhigena-ma kalivai-dana ada loi gagana kananuhagana. Au ide gaveyao kavetumagana Abelahamo givetumagana amine, medema buye kananuhagana. Bana Abelahamo vaita ide moya'aida bwaneneda amine.
Meda anafaiweya tuwaina Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Iya ganagahe-yo yo'o tulidi tulidi o againiya hinatubuyemu.

Hidedemi Yaubada Abelahamo againe gigahe. Ada au bana ide tovetumagana yo'o tulidi tulidi kalivai-dana bwaneneda Yaubada matane. Abelahamo Yaubada againe givetumagana, Bana'e to'alika alikeya gisivemidididi kadu yana gahe againe gaitoma keke gidadauda-ma gilakayemu amanadi Yaubadai-nadi.

Boi Abelahamo ana malamala vaita wani hanaledi (100) amine. Wowona giwelolo-mo'a keke anafaiweya kwamana gina'ivetubugini. Kadu vavinena Sela utuna giwelolo-mo'a keke anafaiweya ginavehifuga. Atu tauna wowona kadu Sela yana vesilakai ginuwenuwena againe, yana vetumagana keke gidagakowakowa.
E, yana vetumagana keke gidahegeni kadu Yaubada yana wonadabadaba fa'ina keke gida'amalakibo. Au yana vetumagana againe gifaiwala be Yaubada ana egana gikilakahina.
Ginuwave'avi-mo'ena vaita Yaubada giwonadabadaba amine meda anafata ginahuluva.
Au hidede amine givetumaganadona fa'ina, Yaubada bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, “Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.”

Mena gahe ma keke bana anakaibe fa'ina Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina againe gidadauda. Au kadu ide fa'ideya Yaubada tuwaina gigaheye-vagahina, ide Bana'e Yesu yada Kaiwabu alikeya gisivemididina-ma againe kavetumagana-yo ide fa'ideya Yaubada ginagahe ginagayo, “Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao Iya matakuya” ma ide kalivai-dana.
Yada Kaiwabu Yesu yada koyona fa'ina alikeya hihegenauwena, ada yada yegayega Yaubada matane fa'ina Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina be wayawaina gimimiyami.

Yesu Keliso againe kavetumagana fa'ina, Bana'e Yaubada yana ala hinagene givega'auleda be tova adamoya yana nuwadoga ka'aya'ayaunena, ada kalulauboda vaita aimo Yaubada buye kanakaiwabu fa'ina kavemwavemwamwala.

Kadu'e keke mena kaiwabugaga fa'ina kadavemwamwala. Au vita tulina tulina kaliva nimadiya kavaivaina-ma fa'ina kavemwamwala. Fa'ina kahalamanena ka'i vita tulina tulina agaidiya kanamidi toyogina, au vitai-dina guwana atuvefa'ila.

Ada ka'i vita tulina tulina agaidiya kana'atu'atuvefa'ila, au Yaubada gina'italuveluveda-yo ginahawaveyamumuyeda. Ada ka'i yada atuvefa'ila fa'ina Yaubada ginahawaveyamumuyeda, au aimo Yaubada buye kanakaiwabu ana tova fa'ina kanalulauboda.

Ada au makewa higa keke kanalauboda-wayoga. Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina agaideya gihawahegena be higa Yaubada yana nuwanuwa lakahina lakahi-mo'ena nuwahinagedeya kana'aya'ayaunena. Hidedemi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa lakahi-mo'ena agaideya ka'aya'ayaunena fa'ina, keke kanalulauboda-wayoga yo kanawowomumu.

Wa'ita, ide kowakowadeyao fa'ina keke adafaiweya taudeyao kada'ihagihagiyeda. Ide aimo kowakowadeyao ana toveya Keliso ide Yaubada ana tovekwaulauga fa'ideya gi'alika. E, tova giluboda-mo'ena againe Keliso ide fa'ideya gi'alika.
Vehimeya ana todibumuhiga ana lugolagola fa'ina kaliva alika againe keke tauna ginamaduhawahegeni. Ka'iwa, ka'i tonuwadoga fa'ine kaliva sa'eyana alika againe tauna ginamaduhawahegena.

Atu ide keke toyamumu au aimo tokoyona tu Keliso ide fa'ideya gi'alika. E, hidede amine Yaubada yana nuwanuwa lakahina ide agaideya giseyemaunena higa ide aimo tokoyona tu Keliso gi'iveninisena be fa'ideya gi'alika.
Boi ide Yaubada nibaineyao tu Natuna yana alika againe giveyaoyeda. Bana Natuna yana alikeya veyao kanuhagana fa'ina, kadu makewa'e Keliso wayawaina ivaguna gimimiyami fa'ina kibababala kananuhagana.
Kadu'e keke veyaogaga fa'ina kadanuwave'avina. Au tova adamoya yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yada veyao ahe gifaisewana fa'ina Yaubada yada vemwamwala giveleda.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana vehimeya aimo keke Mosese awane gidalakayemu ana toveya, tomiyababi koyona hififaisewana tu vehimeya keke gidadauda fa'ina Yaubada kaliva yadi koyona keke gidahawadi vaita medema vehimeya ana aiyawela.

Atu kaliva Adama againe hitubuyemu be hinunauwena hinunauwena Mosese ana aituheya ma kalivai-dina koyona hihuluhuluvini-yo hi'ali'alika. Gavadi-yo moya'aidi alika ana eda againe hinauna? Me koyona hihuluhuluvina fa'ina hi'ali'alika. Tu vehimeya Mosese awane aimo keke gidalakayemu fa'ina, yadi koyona keke kadavewagadi vehimeya ana aiyawela Adama Yaubada yana vehimeya sa'eyana giyawelina-ma amine. Bana kaliva nagona ma bana kaliva velugana muliya gitubuyemu-ma ana abaluvefota, higa Adama yana dewa sa'eyana guwana kaliva moya'aida agaideya gidamana kadu Yesu yana dewa sa'eyana guwana kaliva moya'aida givelugada.

Atu mena kaliva adi'iselu yadi dewa guwana keke leleleya au tulina tulina, fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwadoga keke Adama yana koyona amine. Mena kalivai-nadi yana koyona fa'ina, kaliva moya'aida alika kanuhagana. Atu Kaliva sa'eyana yana nuwadoga fa'ina, kaliva tufoida moya'aida Yaubada yana nuwakabubu kanuhagana. E, Yaubada Yesu Keliso gihawahegena be Bana againe ginuwadogeda, ginuwadoge-mo'eda.

Kadu'e Yaubada yana nuwadoga guwana keke Adama yana koyona guwana amine. Bana kalivai-nadi Yaubada yana vehimeya sa'eyana giyawelini-yo Yaubada gilaufata gigayo, “Yaku vehimeya uyawelina fa'ina, una'alika.” Atu muliya ide kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya moya'aina kayaweyawelini-yo Yaubada Yesu Keliso fa'ine ginuwadogeda gigayo, “Omi kaliva yegayegamiyao Iya matakuya.”

Bana Adama yana koyona fa'ina ide kaliva moya'aida bana kalivai-nadi againe katubuyemu-ma alika ana abavehimeya againe kamimiyami. Au hidedemi Adama yana koyona guwana. Atu Kaliva sa'eyana higa Yesu Keliso yana dewa guwana Adama yana dewa guwana gitubuhegena, gitubuhege-mo'ena. E, Keliso yana alika fa'ina gaveyao moya'aida Yaubada yana nuwadoga lakahi-mo'ena kanuhagana kadu yana hawahega againe ide tokoyona nonogana yada yegayega Bana matane kavaina, medema vaita tofaiwala-mo'a amine wayawai-vagahida kamimiyami.

Kadu kaliva sa'eyana Yaubada yana vehimeya gidibutoyogena fa'ina, kaliva moya'aida kavetokoyona. Meda anafaiweya Kaliva sa'eyana Yaubada yana vehimeya gidibumuhigena fa'ina, moya'aida kavetoyegayegana Yaubada matane.

Tuwai-lokalokana Adama gikoyo againe, kaliva moya'aidi hikoyo hinunauwena tu muliya Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese awane gilakayemu. Vehimeyai-nadi gilakayemu be higa vehimeya ana aiyawela againe kaliva yadi nuwanuwa koyodi kabu'avane hinayemu-yo yadi koyona ginalakata. Yadi koyona gilakata tu Yaubada yana nuwadoga gilakata-mo'a.

Gavadi-yo Yaubada yana nuwadoga gilakata-mo'a? Me boi alika ana eda againe kanauna fa'ina koyona gifaiwala-mo'a amine, meda tova adamoya yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana alika againe Yaubada giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane fa'ina yana nuwadoga gifaiwala-mo'a be yawai-vagahida ana edeya kananauna.

Hida kagahe vaita Yaubada yana nuwadoga kaliva yada koyona gifaiwalahegena. Gavaiyami? Ka'i gilubodana be yada huluva koyona kananunauwena be higa Yaubada yana nuwadoga ginafaiwala-mo'a? Keke, keke-mo'a! Kaliva gi'alika againe yana miya babiya gihavaina amine, meda ide ka'alika be yada miyami dewa koyona againe gihavaina. Ahe ka'alika be koyona ana abavehimeya agaideya gihavaina fa'ina, keke-mo'a gidalubodada be huluva koyona againe kanamiyami.

Wa'ita, ide gaveyao Yesu Keliso ana eganeya kabafitaiso, au ide Bana buye kave'atutamo'aida. Ada gaveyao moya'aida bafitaiso againe Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida, Bana gi'alika amine meda ide ka'alika. Hidede amine ahe ka'alika ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke?

Au Keliso gi'alika be hitauna amine, meda ide yada bafitaiso againe gufeya katowa kagahe kagayo, “Adamoya ide Yesu buye ka'alika be ide wayawaida tuwaina kamiyami-ma kalivai-dana hitauda.” Hidede amine ka'alika be higa Tamada yana faiwala kikaiwabuna againe Keliso alikeya gisivemididina amine, meda ide ginasivemididida-yo wayawaida ivaguna kanamiyami.

Ahe ka'alika be wayawaida ivaguna kamimiyami-ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Ka'i Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida be Bana gi'alika againe ide buye ka'alika-yo koyona ana laufata gihavaina, kadu makewa Bana buye kave'atutamo'aida-yo Yaubada ide gisivemididida be yawaida ivaguna giveleda Keliso gisivemididina amine.

Ide kahalamanena Yesu keloseya hitutuvefosena ana toveya, kadu ide tuwaina yada nuwanuwa koyona againe kamiyami-ma kalivai-dana keloseya ka'alika be higa Yaubada dibuda huluva koyona nuwanuwana-ma ana faiwala ginadabana. E, dibuda koyona ana faiwala gidabana be higa koyona aimo keke ginavehimeyeda-yo koyona ana ve'agetogeya kanamiyami.
Wa'ita, hai kaliva ahe gi'alika, medema koyona ana laufata ahe givaina be yana ve'agetoga koyona againe gihavaina.
Meda ide'eyao. Ide Keliso buye ka'alika, kadu Bana buye wayawaida ivaguna kamimiyami. Au hidedemi kanuwave'avina.
Gavaiya'amine kahalamaneni wayawaida ivaguna kamimiyami? Me Yaubada Keliso alikeya gisivemididina fa'ina, keke-mo'a gina'alika-havagi. Alika yana abafaiwala Bana againe gihavaina, gihavai-mo'ena.
Yana alika ma, gi'alika be koyona ana laufata giwahina. Tova sa'eyanaga gi'alika be koyona fatana giluyabuna. Yana miyami ma, wayawaina ivaguna gimimiyami be Yaubada againe gihawahege-vagahina.
Tu Yesu buye wa'alika be wayawaimi ivaguna wamimiyami fa'ina, keke gidalubodami be koyona wowomiya ginavehimeyemi-yo ana nuwanuwa koyona wanamuliyeni.

Keke wowomi talaina koyona againe wanahawahegeni vaita Setani talaimi ginavegiyoyeni be higa nuwanuwa koyona ginafaiwala. Au omi vaita alikeya wadamididi-havagi be wayawaimi ivaguna wadamiyami-ma kalivai-mina taumiyao Yaubada againe wanahawahegemi, kadu talaimi wanahawahegena be vaita Yaubada talaimi ginavegiyoyena be higa nuwanuwa tunutunugina ginafaiwala-mo'a.

Wa'ita, kaliva tufoidi Yaubada yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe yadi yegayega hilelelena. Mena vehimeyai-nadi Mosese awane gilakayemu. Tu omi keke Mosese yana vehimeya dibune wadamiyami. Au yami yegayega Keliso ana vetumagana againe ahe wavaina be yana leme againe koyona wavenivenikohiyena fa'ina, Yaubada yana nuwadoga ana abavehimeya againe wamimiyami. Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe wamimiyami fa'ina, nuwanuwa koyona keke-mo'a ginavehimeyemi.

Wa'ita, ka'i tamo kaliva lakahina againe wanahawahegemi be vaita agetoga amine bonana wana'abina, au omi bana bonana wa'abi'abina-ma kalivai-nadi againe wave'agetoga. Meda ka'i dewa koyona againe wanahawahegemi, au koyona againe wave'agetoga be koyona guwana higa alika wananuhagana. O ka'i Yaubada ana dibumuhiga againe wanahawahegemi, au Yaubada againe wave'agetoga be yami yegayega Bana matane wananuhagana. Mena ve'agetoga ana dewa higa vaita hakwadi bonana wa'abina, ka'i koyona o ka'i Yaubada, medema againe wave'agetoga ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke?

Atu Yaubada againe gavesiule fa'ina tuwaina koyona againe wave'agetoga tu tova adamoya vehawala ana ita nuwanuwa velemo'ena amine Keliso yana kaliva hihawavelevelemi-ma yami wa'asehawahega wadibumuhigena.
E, Yaubada yami ve'agetoga koyona againe gidabana tu dewa tunutunugina againe wave'agetoga.

Wa'ita, mena nuwanuwai-dina galukahihiyena-ma aimo keke gidamadumahalini agaimiya fa'ina, tomiyababi yada dewa sa'eyana ve'agetoga ma againe abaluvefota galukahihiyena. Tuwaina koyona againe wave'agetoga ana toveya talaimi tulina tulina nuwanuwa bwanebwanenena againe wahawahegedi be dewa koyone watutuveguvegulana amine, meda tova adamoya Yaubada againe wave'agetoga-yo talaimi tulina tulina nuwanuwa tunutunugina againe wanahawahegedi be dewa mahamahalina agaimiya ginalakata.
Tuwaina koyona againe wave'agetoga ana toveya dewa tunutunugina ana vehimeya keke wadanuwenuweni.
Medema tovai-nadi yami dewa guwana againe gava yamumu wanuhagani? Keke tamo. Mena dewai-nadi guwana ma alika, ada kadu tova adamoya yami dewai-nadi fa'ina wawowomumu.

Tuwaina koyona againe wave'agetoga tu tova adamoya Yaubada koyona ana ve'agetoga gidabana be Bana againe wave'agetoga. Yaubada ana ve'agetoga againe yamumu lakahina wanuhagana. Dewa mahamahalina agaimiya gilakalakata ada dewai-nadi guwana ma yawai-vagahimi.
Fa'ina dewa koyona fatana alika. Atu Yaubada yana abahawahega ma yawai-vagata, higa omi Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi-yo yawai-vagahimi givelemi.

Tu tobohiyakweyao, omi Yaubada yana vehimeya wahalamanena-ma kalivai-mina agaimiya ganagahe. Omi makewa vehimeya ana nuwanuwa wahalamanena, higa ka'i kaliva wayawaina ginamiyami amine o bana ana wavehimeya gimimiyami ada gilubodana be vehimeya gina'itave'avina. Tu bana kalivai-nadi gina'alika amine o bana againe vehimeya ginahavaina.

Vehimeya ana abaluvefota sa'eyana ma kwamayoku naginagidi adi vehimeya hidede amine. Moganedi aimo wayawaina ginamiyami ana toveya, kwamayoku moganedi yana abavehimeya againe hinamiya-vagata. Tu ka'i moganedi gina'alika digo, nagi ana vehimeya badi agaidiya ginahavaina.

Ka'i moganedi aimo wayawaina ginamiyami tu hinana mali kaliva buye hinamiyami digo, badi adi egana to'udo. Nagi ana vehimeya au hidede amine. Atu ka'i moganedi gina'alika amine o mena nagi ana vehimeya badi agaidiya ginahavaina, ada ka'i mali kaliva hinanagina digo, badi keke to'udo au adifaiweya mali kaliva vavinena hinamiyami.

Tuwaina keke Yaubada au taudeyao dibuda koyona givehimeyeda ana toveya, Yaubada yana vehimeya o yana hawata koyona ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana agaideya gisilakahina be wowodeya gififaiwala ada guwada koyona kaseuseni-yo alika againe kalowoga.

Vehimeya ana dibumuhiga keke adafaiweya fa'ina yogoyogonideyao kamiyami, atu tova adamoya Keliso buye ka'alika kadu yada koyona ana laufata Bana giwahina fa'ina, Yaubada yana vehimeya tuwaina agaideya gihavaina. E, ide yauyaugideyao kamimiyami be higa Yaubada againe kanahawahawahegeda. Keke eda tuwaina higa vehimeya tulina tulina buki againe hi'etoladina-ma amine Yaubada fa'ine kadafifaisewa. Au eda ivaguna kamuliyena be againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina gifaiwalaveleda-yo Yaubada fa'ina kafififaisewa.

Bana koyona ma hawata againe eda ginuhagana be italuvadiga ginasilakahina. Nuwanuwa koyona agaikuya gidadauda fa'ina, mena hawata italuvadiga fa'ina ganogalina againe nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana tulina tulina ga'aya'ayaunena. Ka'i vehimeya o hawata keke gidadauda, kadu keke dewa koyona gadanuwenuweni. Au nuwanuwa koyona yana faiwala vaita keke.

Tuwaina aimo Yaubada yana vehimeya keke gadahalamaneni ana toveya, gamiyami hagihagina. Tu muliya mena vehimeyai-nadi italuvadiga fa'ina ganogalina againe, nuwanuwa koyona agaikuya gifaiwala be alika ana eda againe galowoga. Yaubada nuwanuwana ganamiyami hagihagina fa'ina mena yana vehimeya ana hawatai-nadi gisena, tu hawata keke gada'itave'avini fa'ina yaku miya gikoyo be alika ana eda againe galowoga.
Fa'ina bana koyona hawata againe eda ginuhagana be italuvadiga againe ginuwa'abiyeku, ada hawatai-nadi ana aiyawela againe koyona giluve'alikaku.

Au hidede amine koyona gififaiwala fa'ina, gavaimi kananuwanuwa Yaubada yana vehimeya fa'ina? Me vehimeya ana nuwanuwa matatabuna gaitoma mahamahalina, ada vehimeya o hawata tulina tulina kadu gaitoma mahamahalina ada eda tunutunugina kadu miya hagihagina givehawaleda.

Gavaiyami? Ka'i vaita kadagahe kadagayo, “Mena gaitoma hagihagina againe iya alika ganuhagana?” Keke, keke-mo'a! Au koyona againe alika ganuhagana. Bana koyona vehimeya hagihagina givaina be yaku alika gifaisewana be higa yaku nuwanuwa koyona ana ita koyona ma kabu'avane ginayemu. Ada au ide Yaubada yana vehimeya kanahalamaneni-yo yada nuwanuwa koyona fa'ina kanagahe kanagayo, “Wona velemona yaku koyona ana ita koyo-mo'ena.”

Ide kahalamanena vehimeya Yaubada againe give'inuba, ada alu'aluwada yana miya hagihagina fa'ina vehimeya giveleda. Tu iya'eku ma kaliva wawowoku ada wowoku ana nuwanuwa amine gahuluhuluva be koyona againe gave'agetoga.
Gavaimi yaku huluva keke gadahalamaneni. Fa'ina dewa hagihagina nuwanuwaku ma keke gadahuluvini, au dewa iya gavenikohiyena-ma gahuluhuluvina.
Ka'i dewa keke nuwanuwaku ma gahuluvina amine, au vaita nuwakuya gadagahe gadagayo, “Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese awane giyemu-ma vehimeya hagihagina.”
Au keke vaita dewa keke nuwanuwaku ma iya tauku gadahuluvini, au nuwanuwa koyona agaikuya gidadauda-ma dewai-nadi gihuluvina.
Iya gahalamanena keke tamo nuwanuwa yamumuna agaikuya higa dibuku koyona againe gidadauda. Fa'ina nuwanuwaku dewa hagihagina ganahuluvina tu gaga-wayoga, keke akufaiweya.
Dewa hagihagina nuwanuwaku ganahuluvina-ma keke gadahuluvini. Au dewa koyona keke nuwanuwaku ganahuluvini, medema gahuluvina.
Ka'i dewa keke nuwanuwaku tu gahuluvina digo, keke iya tauku gadahuluvini au bana nuwanuwa koyona agaikuya gidadauda-ma dewai-nadi gihuluvina.
Ma hidema ana nuwanuwa gavaiyami? Aku ayauna hidede amine higa ka'i iya nuwanuwaku dewa hagihagina ganahuluvina againe, dewa koyonaga akufaiweya.
Nuwahinagekuya nuwanuwaku lakahina Yaubada yana vehimeya.

Tu wowokuya nuwanuwa tulina ga'ayaunena, ada nuwanuwai-nadi koyona againe gitaiku tu mena nuwanuwa nuwakuya gidadauda-ma Yaubada yana vehimeya ana itave'avina againe gitaiku, au hive'asitaineku. Ada au nuwanuwa wowokuya gifaiwala-mo'a be koyona wowokuya gidadauda-ma giyogoku.
Ho, yaku miya gikoyo-mo'a! Koyona wowokuya giyogoku be alika againe galowoga. Hakwadi hida alika ana wowo againe ginakibababaleku?
Bana yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso aku Tokibababala ada Bana fa'ine Yaubada againe gavesiule, siule-mo'a!

Ma yaku gahe dobona hidede amine. Iya tauku nuwakuya Yaubada yana vehimeya againe gahawahegeku be gamuliyena. Nuwakuya Yaubada againe gahawahegeku nonogana dibuku koyona wowokuya gifaiwala-ma againe koyona yana vehimeyeya gahawahegeku be gamuliyena.
Tu Yesu Keliso yana alika againe yada koyona ana laufata giwahina fa'ina, ide gaveyao tova adamoya Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida medema ada matahiwadi keke, keke-mo'a.

Gavadi-yo ada matahiwadi keke? Me tuwaina koyona be alika ana abavehimeya againe yogoyogonideyao kamiyami, tu tova adamoya Yesu Keliso giyauda be Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana abavehimeya againe wayawaida ivaguna Bana againe give'inuba-ma kamimiyami.

Kadu tuwaina dibuda koyona ana nuwanuwa ka'itave'avina fa'ina, Mosese yana vehimeya keke adafaiweya kadamuliyeni-yo vehimeyai-nadi anafaiweya gida'ihagihagiyeda. Tu tova adamoya Yaubada gi'ihagihagiyeda. Tauna Natuna gi'iveninisena ada ide kaliva koyodeyao ada nuya gi'osena be yada koyona ana aiyawela fa'ina gi'alika. Ma Mosese yana vehimeya ana nuwanuwa tunutunugina hidede amine, higa Yaubada tokoyona yadi koyona ginalaufata. Tu Yaubada Tauna Natuna wowone yada koyona gilaufata be higa koyona ana laufata ide agaideya ahe'i, mena vehimeya ana nuwanuwa tunutunugina ahe gilakayemu agaideya, ide gaveyao keke dibuda koyona ana nuwanuwa amine kadahuluhuluva au Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana nuwanuwa amine kahuluhuluva-ma kalivai-dana.

Gaveyao dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa amine hihuluhuluva, medema dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa againe nuwadi hisena. Atu gaveyao Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana nuwanuwa amine hihuluhuluva, medema Yaubada Alu'aluwana ana nuwanuwa againe nuwadi hisena.
Ka'i dibuda koyona againe nuwada kanasena, alika kananuhagana. Ka'i Yaubada Alu'aluwana againe nuwada kanasena, wayawaida ivaguna kadu yada wa'aseniwalova kanamiyami.

Fa'ina hai kaliva dibuna koyona ana nuwanuwa againe nuwana gisena, medema Yaubada givenibainena. Dibuna koyona ana nuwanuwa nuwana gi'abina fa'ina, bana Yaubada yana vehimeya keke gida'idibumuhigeni kadu keke anafaiweya gina'idibumuhigeni.
Ada badi dibudi koyona givehimeyedi-ma keke-mo'a adifaiweya Yaubada nuwana hinakiveyamumuni.
Koyona fa'ina wowomi gina'alika, atu ka'i Keliso Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami, au Bana Alu'aluwana yawai-vagahimi givelemi, fa'ina Yaubada gisemi yegayegamiyao Bana matane.

Ada ka'i Yaubada Yesu alikeya gisivemididina-ma Alu'aluwana Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami, au Bana Yaubadai-nadi kadu omi wowomi aimo gina'alika-ma ginakiveyawayawana. E, Bana Alu'aluwana Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami-ma yana faiwaleya ginasivemididimi.

Omi tobohiyakweyao yaku gahe Yaubada Alu'aluwana fa'ina wananuwenuwena. Gilubodada be Yaubada Alu'aluwana givehimeyeda amine kanahuluhuluva. Keke gidalubodada be dibuda koyona ana nuwanuwa amine kanahuluhuluva.
Fa'ina ka'i dibumi koyona ana nuwanuwa amine wanahuluhuluva, au wana'alika. Atu ka'i Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana faiwala againe yami dewa koyodi wanaluve'alikadi, au wayawaimi ivaguna wanamiyami.
Gaveyao Yaubada Alu'aluwana hivenovenogalena, medema Bana natuneyao.

Tuwaina matauta againe wave'agetoga tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana givelemi keke vaita Bana gina'ivematauhimi be matauta againe wanave'agetoga-havagi. Au Yaubada Bana Alu'aluwana givelemi be Yaubada natuneyao watubuyemu. Ada Yaubada Alu'aluwana ide sa'eyana sa'eyana ada ayauna giveleda be kakova kagayo, “Baba, Kamaku.”
Ide Yaubada natuneyao ma taudeyao ka'ayaunena ada Yaubada Alu'aluwana alu'aluwadeya gi'alakakila gigayo, “E, o Yaubada natuna.”

Kadu'e ide Yaubada natuneyao fa'ina, aimo gavadi gavadi Yaubada badi natuneyao adi du'u fa'ina gisevehailena, medema kananuhagana, kadu gavadi gavadi Yaubada Keliso ana du'u fa'ina gisevehailena, medema ide Keliso buye kananuhagana. Gavaimi-yo Keliso ana du'u ide Bana buye kananuhagani? Me ka'i ve'umagigi Keliso ginuhagana-ma amine meda ide Bana buye kananuhagana, au kadu ide Bana buye kanakaiwabu.

E, ide Yaubada natuneyao Keliso buye kanakaiwabu, ada Yaubada yana aibubuna matatabudi nuwanuwadi lakahina Bana Yaubada badi natuneyao yadi wakikaiwabu gina'ivemogatalidi ada natuneyao adi ivemogatala fa'ina gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi hibodaboda.

Boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi fa'idiya gigayo, “Hida hima hinakoyo be hinave'iyohoyoho.” Keke taudiyao yadi nuwenuweya hidave'iyohoyoho, au babi koyona ana vita givaini-yo Yaubada givehimeya be gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi hive'iyohoyoho. Atu keke hidave'iyohoyoho-vagata.

Tova adamoya gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi hikoyokoyo ada havahavaidi. Tu tova mulina Yaubada mena yadi dewa havahavaina ginadabana. Ide Yaubada natuneyao babi ana vita againe ginayauda be yada wakikaiwabu kanamiyamiya-vagata amine, meda Yaubada yana aibubuna matatabudi ginayaudi be yadi wakikaiwabu hinaduva-vagata.
Ide kahalamanena tuwai-lokalokana be hinunauwena tova adamoya gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi hiyawayawai'ohi, vaita kwamayoku yadi venatuna ana yawai'ohi amine.

Atu keke gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidiga hidayawayawai'ohi. Au kadu ide taudeyao Yaubada Alu'aluwana agaideya gihawahegena be againe gisetagoda-ma nuwahinagedeya kayawayawai'ohi lakahina tu Yaubada fa'ina kalulauboda kagayo, “Ho gava tova-yo Yaubada ana unuma agaidiya ginavega'auleda be Bana natuneyao wawowoda ivaguna kanamiyami?”

Yaubada yada koyona agaidiya gikibababaleda ana toveya, ide kavebutu ada vega'aula ana unuma agaidiya be wowoda ivaguna ana nauhaga fa'ina kalulauboda. Ka'i tamo gavadi ahe kanuhagana-ma fa'ina aimo kalulauboda, medema keke velemo'ena lulauboda. Keke tamo hakwadi yana nuwanuwa sa'eyana ahe ginuhagana-ma fa'ina aimo ginalulauboda, fa'ina ahe ginuhagana.
Atu ka'i yada nuwanuwa mena ada ihagihagi fa'ina aimo keke kadanuhagani-ma kalulubodena, au yada wa'atuvefa'ila kabodaboda.

Kadu'e ide nuwadeya kagakowakowa tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina giveluvelugada. Gavaimi gilubodada be kanave'o'ola ma keke kadahalamaneni, tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwahinagedeya ve'o'ola toyogina gi'alaveleveleda, ana ayauna ma vaita yawai'ohi lakahina keke ana wahifufu.

Bana Yaubada ide kaliva nuwada gi'itafolena-ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana nuwanuwa gihalamanena. Ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina gihalamanena gavaimi Yaubada nuwanuwana ginagugai. Medema fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina giveluvelugada be ve'o'ola toyogina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine nuwahinagedeya gi'alaveleveleda.

Fa'ina gaveyao tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada givenuwadadane-vagahidi, medema kadu givegide-vagahidi be Natuna ana ita'ita amine hinavenuya be higa Bana tawadi kikaiwabu-mo'ena wai ginanagona tu badi taineyao moya'aidi Bana buye hinamiyami.

Ada badi givegide-vagahidi ma kadu gikovadi. Ada badi gikovadi-ma kadu gisedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane. Ada badi gisedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane ma kadu yana kaiwabu giveledi be Bana buye hikaiwabu.

Hida Yaubada yana inuba ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina ide yana kaliva yana vevine fa'ideya kalukahihiyena. Gavaiyami? Yaubada ide gilulugolegoleda fa'ina, badi hivenibaineda-ma yadi faiwala gaitoma-kawowo keke-mo'a adifaiweya hinafaiwalahegeda.
Yaubada Tauna Natuna keke gidanuwaloloneni, au moya'aida fa'ideya alikeya gihawahegena. Natuna gihawahegena fa'ina, kadu makewa abahawahega tulina tulina Bana buye ginaveleda.
Ide Yaubada giluwafada be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya kaluku-ma hai ada tohawavekoyo? Yaubada ahe giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginahawavekoyoyeda.

E, keke tamo hakwadi koyona ana laufata againe anafaiweya ginahegeda, fa'ina Yesu Keliso ada laufata giwahi-yo gi'alika. E, kadu gimididi-havagi be Yaubada i'atagine gimimiyami tu kadu ide fa'ideya give'ove'o'ola.

Keliso yana nuwanuwa agaideya lakahina, lakahi-mo'ena keke-mo'a ginahavaini. Gavadi ginalakayemu-yo Keliso nimane ginalemada? Keke, keke tamo. Ka'i vita tulina tulina agaideya ginalakayemu, ka'i ase'u'aulolo o ada kivekoyo kaliva nimadiya, o mafulauga o yada lifi keke, o abagilagi o luve'alika, ka'i mena vitai-dina agaideya hinalakayemu, au keke-mo'a Keliso nimane hinalemada.
Mena vitai-dina fa'idiya kaliva sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Mala gilauna gina mala gibogi ime O ya yo'o fa'ina nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikama.
Higahe higayo, Sifi kayogodi amine,
badi kanayogodi be kanaluve'alikadi.
Mena vitai-dina Keliso nimane keke-mo'a ginalemada. Au Bana'e ide agaideya Tauna gihawahegena amanadi gifaiwalaveleda-yo vitai-dina moya'aidi agaidiya kafaiwala-mo'a, e tofaiwalahega-mo'a kamimiyami.

Fa'ina Yaubada ginuwanuwa lakahina ide agaideya yo yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso gi'iveninisena be ide fa'ideya gi'alika. E, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa agaideya lakahina, lakahi-mo'ena ada iya ganuwave'avina vaita keke tamo gavadi o keke tamo hakwadi Yaubada nimane anafaiweya ginalemada. Ka'i kana'alika o ka'i wayawaida kanamiyami, au Bana nimane kanamiyamiya-vagata. Badi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata o ka'i balauma o ka'i lobama hinafana ana tofaiwala keke-mo'a adifaiweya Yaubada nimane hinalemada. Kadu keke tamo gavadi tova adamoya gidadauda o aimo tova mulina ginalakayemu amanadi, kadu keke tamo gavadi wesei getane o gava dibune, e keke tamo gavadi gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi agaidiya Yaubada nimane ginalemada, keke keke-mo'a.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, yaku nuwanuwa sa'eyana ganalukahihiyena. Iya Keliso yana kaliva yaku gahe velemo'ena. Keke gadafwaya. Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami-ma gi'alakakila be iya makewa gagahe velemo'ena ma nuwakuya ga'ayaunena.

Gagahe velemo'ena badi tobohiyakweyao higa tauku yaku yo'o kalivai-dina fa'idiya ganuwanuwavita, ada yaku ase'u'aulolo keke ma'ita gidahavaini. Badi yaku yo'o kalivadi Yesu hikilowena fa'ina, aimo adi matahiwadi lakahina hinavaina be Keliso ginalugolohidi-yo abaga koyona againe hinamiyami. Tu ka'i iya tauku akufaiweya digo, adi matahiwadi iya gadavaina be Keliso gidalugolohiku-yo badi Yaubada buye hidamiyami hagihagina.

Badi kalivai-dina adi egana miIsileli. Yadi yamumu tulina tulina ganalukahihiyena. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bwanenediyao giluwafadi be Tauna yana yo'o gisedi ada gigahedi gigayo, “Omi'iyao be bwanenemiyao ganahawavenatunemi.” Badi agaidiya yana veyao gisedi. Badi agaidiya yana vehimeya gilakayemu. Badi Yaubada ana tafalolo velemo'ena hihalamanena ada manuwa-tafalolo againe Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina giseyemaunena be hi'itana. Badi Yaubada yana wonadabadaba yadi miya hagihagina fa'ina hivaina.

Kaliva kikaiwabudiyao Abelahamo Aisake Isileli (kadu ana egana Yakobu) badi agaidiya hitubuyemu, kadu Bana Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso babiya gihobu'ela ana toveya badi yo'oi-dina agaidiya gitubuyemu, Bana'e anafaiweya Yaubada gaitoma moya'aidi givehimeyedi-ma kalivai-nadi. Bana ana egana kanakilakahina tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Tu yaku yo'o kalivadi Yesu hikilowena ma kahihidi gayakahina fa'ina, keke vaita gadagahe higa Yaubada yana wonadabadaba miIsileli agaimeya keke gidalakayemu. Au gilakayemu fa'ina keke kaliva matatabudi bana kaliva kikaiwabuna ana egana Isileli againe hitubuyemu-ma Yaubada yana yo'o velemo'ena kalivadi. Au tufoidiga, higa keke tokilowa au tovetumagana.

Kadu bana Abelahamo bwaneneneyao ma keke matatabudi Yaubada yana yo'o velemo'ena kalivadi. Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada keke Abelahamo natuneyao moya'aidi fa'idiya gidagahe au bana Aisake anakaibe fa'ine gigahe gigayo,
Bana natu Aisake kadu bwaneneneyao agaidiya a egana ginayemuyemu.

Mena gahe ana nuwanuwa ma keke Abelahamo natuneyao moya'aidi bana hagaline hitubuyemu-ma Yaubada yana yo'o kalivadi. Yaubada Abelahamo natuna sa'eyanaga higa Aisake fa'ine bana againe giwonadabadaba. Gaveyao Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana againe hitubuyemu, medema Yaubada yana yo'o kalivadi.
Yana wonadabadaba ana gahegahe ma hidede amine. Gigayo,
Tova gayakahina-ma againe ganayewa'ela be Sela natuna kaliva ginavenatunena.
Au hidedemi Yaubada Aisake fa'ine giwonadabadaba be yana lauwafa giseyemaunena.
Kadu'e yana lauwafa ana aba'ita sa'eyana ma natuluga Libeka hivenatunedi, tomo'ainagona ana egana Iso kadu kwamaneya ana egana Yakobu. Badi natuluga tamadi au sa'eyana bana bwaneneda Aisake.
Atu we'owe'o adi'iselu aimo keke hidatubuga kadu aimo keke dewa hagihagina o dewa koyona hidafaisewani tu Yaubada kwamayoku agaidiya gigahe gigayo,
Natumi ginamiditubuga-ma taina againe ginave'agetoga.

Yaubada hidedemi gigahe be higa yana lauwafa inubana ginaseyemaunena fa'ina. Natuluga aimo keke hidatubuga tu Tauna yana nuwenuweya kwamaneya giluwafana tu tomo'ainagona keke gidaluwafani. Yana lauwafa inubana ma keke kaliva yana dewa gida'italuveluveni-yo gidaluwafani, au Tauna yana nuwenuweya giluwafana.
Meda anafaiweya Yaubada kaliva adi'iselu adi lauwafa fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Bana Yakobu galuwafana tu bana Iso gakilowena.
Hida kagahe vaita Yaubada kaliva sa'eyana giluwafana tu sa'eyana gikilowena. Gavaimi kananuwanuwa? Ka'i kanagahe vaita Yaubada keke kaliva tunutunugina? Keke, keke-mo'a!
Fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Mosese againe gigahe gigayo,
Gaveyao nuwanuwaku ganahinekalikaliyedi,
medema ganahinekalikaliyedi.
Ada gaveyao nuwanuwaku gananuwakabubuyedi,
medema gananuwakabubuyedi.
Au hidedemi Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe.
Medema fa'ina kahalamanena Yaubada yana lauwafa inubana keke kaliva yana nuwanuwa o yana dewa, au Yaubada yana hinekalikali.
Fa'ina Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana Felo againe Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,

Iya gakilakahi be miIdifita adi tokaiwabu umiyami be higa vita tulina tulina ganavele-ma agaidiya yaku faiwala ganaseyemaunena, kadu fafali moya'aina kalivai-dina valeya hinanogali-yo Iya Yaubada aku egana hinahalamanena fa'ina.
Yaubada hidedemi gigahe fa'ina kahalamanena gaveyao Bana nuwanuwana ginahinekalikaliyedi medema ginahinekalikaliyedi, ada gaveyao Bana nuwanuwana tagadi gina'ivekuluna medema tagadi gina'ivekuluna.

Tu kaliva sa'eyana agaimiya ginatoliyeku ginagayo, “Ka'i Yaubada kaliva tufoidi tagadi gi'ivekuluna, gavadi-yo yadi koyona fa'ina gidakeyedi? Ka'i tagakulu amine hinahuluva, au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine hinahuluva fa'ina Bana Tauna tagadi gi'ivekuluna.”

Ada iya bonana ganafatana ganagayo, “Kumani, o vaita hakwa'adi yo Yaubada u'awafaseni?” Wa'ita, keke gidalubodani be avaeka ana to'aibubuna againe gina'awafata ginagayo, Gavadi-yo hidede amine ububuku?

Mena maikawa ma to'aibubuna yana abavehimeya. Ka'i nuwanuwana digo, anafaiweya maikawa ana monuna sa'eyana againe avaeka luhei ginabubudi, sa'eyana ana wavaigau a'a ana abavetagova fa'ina, sa'eyana avaeka-kawowo yogo ana abavedodoga fa'ina.

Yaubada anafaiweya avaeka ana to'aibubuna. Bana kaliva gibubuda. Kaliva tufoidi yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana, ada Tauna yana nuwenuweya gihawahegedi be agolaufofola ana eda againe hinanauna. Atu badi agaidiya keke gidamadulaufata au gi'atuvefa'iledi. Ka'i Yaubada nuwanuwana hidede amine ginahuluva be higa yana ila'a ginaseyemaunena kadu yana faiwala gina'ivemogatalina, au keke gidalubodami be wana'awafaseni.

Meda kaliva tufoidi yana hinekalikali hinanuhagana, ada Tauna yana nuwenuweya givegide-vagahidi be kaiwabu ana eda againe hinanauna. Kadu gavadi-yo badi yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana-ma gi'atuvefa'iledi? Me higa badi yana hinekalikali hinavaina-ma badi kalivai-dina adi agolaufofola hina'ita-yo hinagayo, “Yaubada yana kaiwabu gavatubuga!” Au hidede amine Yaubada yana kaiwabu badi agaidiya gina'ivemogatalina. Ada badi kalivai-dina ide'eyao Yaubada gikovada-ma kalivai-dana. Tufoida Isileli ana yo'o agaidiya katubuyemu tu tufoida yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya katubuyemu.

Ada Yaubada kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina gikovami ma bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Hoseya gi'alakakila. Tuwaina Hoseya Yaubada yana gahe omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina fa'imiya gi'etoladina be Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Badi keke yaku yo'o miIsileli kalivai-dina ma ganakovadi ganagayo, “Omi yaku yo'o.”
Mena yo'o boi keke nuwanuwaku ma ganagahedi ganagayo, “Nuwanuwaku omi'iyao.”
“Omi keke yaku yo'o kalivai-mina,”
medede againe ganakovadi ganagayo,
“Omi Iya Yaubada Tomiya-vagata natukweyao.”

MiIsileli yadi yo'o kalivai-dina moya'ai-mo'edi taliya ana makama amine. Moya'ai-mo'edi nonogana keke moya'aidi au tufoidiga adi kibababala hinanuhagana. Fa'ina Kaiwabu agaidiya babiya ginamadulaufata, e ginalaufata-vagata.
Ka'i Kaiwabu Tofaiwala-mo'a ada hilafa tufoidi agaideya keke gidahawahegedi digo, badi miSodoma kadu miGomola hi'alika-'owoga amine meda ide moya'aida kada'alika-'owoga.
Hidede amine Aiseya yana gahe Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda.

Hida ada gahe ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina yadi yegayega Yaubada matane keke hidanuwenuweni lakahina tu Yaubada againe hivetumagana fa'ina, Bana gisedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane.
Atu badi miIsileli Mosese yana vehimeya ana dibumuhiga hinuwenuwena lakahina, higa vaita medema fa'ina Yaubada gidasedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane. Tu yadi yegayega fa'ina higa-wayoga.
Gavadi-yo yadi yegayega fa'ina higa-wayoga? Me keke yadi vetumagana Yaubada againe hidaseni, au vehimeya ana dibumuhiga againe hiluluve'avina vaita medema againe hinayegayega Yaubada matane.

Bana Yesu Keliso yada yegayega ana eda tu Yesu hikilowena fa'ina Bana vaita ogola eda gilubodana-ma againe hitutumadumadu. Mena ogolai-nadi higa Yesu fa'ine Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Wa'ita, yaku melala Saiyoni againe
ogola sa'eyana gasena,
ada ogolai-nadi againe kaliva
hinatutumadumadu kadu hinabe'ube'u.
Tu hai kaliva Bana againe ginavetumagana,
medema keke ginavetumagana-wayoga.
Au hidedemi Yaubada Yesu fa'ine gigahe.
Omi tobohiyakweyao Loma againe, yaku nuwanuwa keke kabi'ona yaku yo'o miIsileli adi kibababala hinanuhagana, ada medema fa'ina Yaubada againe gave'ove'o'ola.
Badi Yaubada fa'ine hi'idibumuhiga ma iya akufaiweya gana'alakakila, tu yadi idibumuhiga keke nuwakaifolega againe gidave'inuba.

Gavaiya'amine Yaubada kaliva gisedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane ma hifaniyena, hivaitana taudiyao Mosese yana vehimeya hi'i'idibumuhigena fa'ina hinayegayega Yaubada matane. Medema fa'ina keke Yaubada againe hidahawahegedi be Bana Tauna ginasedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane.
Yesu Keliso Mosese yana vehimeya gitubutagona be vehimeyai-nadi ana abavehimeya gihavaina, higa vaita gaveyao Keliso againe hivetumagana, medema Yaubada gisedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane.

Tu miIsileli hinuwanuwa vaita vehimeya ana dibumuhiga againe Yaubada ginasedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane. Tuwai-mo'ena Mosese mena yegayega ana eda fa'ina gi'etoladina hidede amine. Gigayo, “Hai kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya gi'idibumuhigena, medema yawaina ginanuhagana.”

Tu kadu gahe sa'eyana vaita kaliva yada yegayega inubana Keliso ana vetumagana againe gigayo, “Keke nuwahinageniya unagahe unagayo, Hakwadi lobameya ginalaka be higa Keliso babiya gina'ihobuyeni? Hakwadi to'alika yadi abageya ginahobu be higa Keliso gina'ilakahini?” Keke medede amine unagahe fa'ina Keliso ahe gihobu'ela kadu alikeya ahe gimididi-havagi.
Au hida gahe Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Yaubada bonana liliniya gidadauda,
e ase'aseniya gidadauda kadu awaniya uyakayakahina.
Bonai-nadi ma venuwa'ata vetumagana fa'ina alulumamalena amanadi.
Higa ka'i yo'o matadiya unahawavemogatala unagayo, Yesu yaku Kaiwabu, kadu ase'aseniya unavetumagana vaita Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina, au hidema fa'ina Yaubada ya koyona agaidiya ginakibababale.
Fa'ina ase'asedeya kavetumaganeni-yo Yaubada giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane, ada yo'o matadiya Yesu kahawavekaiwabuyeni-yo Yaubada yada koyona agaidiya gikibababaleda.
Ada yada vetumagana Yesu againe fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Keke tamo hakwadi Bana againe givetumagana-ma ginavetumagana-wayoga.
Meda anafaiweya Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Gaveyao moya'aidi Kaiwabu againe hinakova,
medema adi kibababala hinanuhagana.
Badi venuwa'ata yamumuna hi'aliyena-ma yadi ela gavayamumu!
Kaiwabu, ime ya kaliva O bona alumamalena,
tu keke moya'aidi hidavenogaleni.
Ada au kahalamanena kaliva yadi vetumagana yana yemu inubana ma au Yaubada yana venuwa'ata ana nogala againe. Ada Yaubada yana venuwa'ata ana nogala inubana au tolaumamala Keliso fa'ine hilulumamala.
Babi matatabuna hinunuwaliliugina be kaliva tolaumamala agodi hinogalina. E, yadi laumamala fafali moya'aina agaidiya give'aliyahega.
Omi miIsileli badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina fa'idiya
wagahe wagayo, Badi iyohoyoho au kwavakwavadiyao.
Tu Iya ganagaheyedi ganagayo, Badi yaku yo'o kalivai-dina. Medema fa'ina omi wanaga'uma'uma,
e yaku gahe fa'ina wana'ago'uga.
Hidede amine Yaubada gigahe be Mosese gi'etoladina.
Tu muliya Aiseya Yaubada yana gahe toyogina keke yana wamatauta giyakahina yo'o tulidiyao fa'idiya be Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Badi kaliva keke hidaleleku-ma aku halamana hivaina.
Badi kaliva keke hidave'o'oleku-ma agaidiya gahawavemogataleku.
Mala gilauna gina mala gibogi nimaku gatunena be gana'atugogodi tu tagadi kuluna, bonaku keke hidavenogaleni.
Hidede amine Yaubada gigahe be Aiseya gi'etoladina.

E, Yaubada yana yo'o tuwai-lokalokana givenuwadadane-vagahidi amanadi keke gidakilowedi. Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina ana egana Elaiya kahihina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda-ma ma'i wahalamanena o ka'i keke? Buki ana bai sa'eyana againe Elaiya miIsileli gihawavekoyoyedi Yaubada matane.
Elaiya gigahe-kawowo gigayo,
Kaiwabu, O bona ana to'awatalatalaina moya'aidi
hiluve'alikadi ada ya atudidiga hiluyawelidi.
Iya au akukaibe-mo'a ada nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikaku.
Gavadi-yo hidedemi ugahe? Iya yaku kaliva seveni tausani (7,000) Tauku fa'ikuya gasevehailedi, higa badi keke yaubada kilumina ana egana Beli againe hida'odu'odu-ma kalivai-dina.
Meda anafaiweya tova adamoya miIsileli tufoidiga Yaubada yana nuwadoga fa'ina giluwafadi be yana kaliva himimiyami.

Yaubada keke kaliva yadi huluva yamumuna fa'ina gidaluwafadi, au Tauna yana nuwadogeya giluwafadi. Ka'i Yaubada kaliva yadi huluva yamumuna gida'italuveluveni-yo gidaluwafadi digo, yana nuwadoga vaita dewa yamumuna fatana au keke nuwadoga velemo'ena.

Yaubada yana lauwafa gavaiyami ana nuwanuwa? MiIsileli yadi yegayega Yaubada matane hilelelena tu keke moya'aidi hidanuhagani. Au tufoidiga Yaubada giluwafadi-ma kalivai-dina hinuhagana. Tu velugadiyao tagadi gikulu-mo'a.
Meda anafaiweya yadi tagakulu fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Yaubada nuwadi gikivefanina be
keke adifaiweya hinanuwanuwahagihagi,
kadu keke adifaiweya hina'itahalamana.
Boi hidedemi hivebutu be gi'ela tova adamoya.
Yadi avemwamwala ana toveya Yaubada
agedi ginavebahina be hinabe'u.
Adi matahiwadi ginaveledi.
Matadi ginakahuna be keke hina'ita.
Vita tulina tulina ginasive'odu-vagahidi.
Au hidedemi Devida gigahe.

Badi miIsileli hikoyo be Keliso hikilowena fa'ina, fafali moya'aina kalivai-dina Yaubada yana nuwakabubu lakahina hinuhagana. Yaubada yana nuwakabubu badi miIsileli hinuhagababuna fa'ina, badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada yana lokolokofou moya'aina hinuhagadi. Ka'i miIsileli yadi kilowa fa'ina mali yo'o Yaubada yana lokolokofou hinuhagadi, au aimo miIsileli moya'aidi Yaubada againe hinahagaviladi ana toveya, ide Yaubada yana kaliva moya'aida yana lokolokofou kananuhagadi-ma gavatubuga kadu gavavewaga!

Tu omi Loma againe wamimiyami-ma tufoimi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina. Adamoya omi agaimiya ganagahe be wananogalina. Yesu Keliso givegideku be Bana loseyanina omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina agaimiya gi'iveniniseku. Mena yaku faisewa ga'ivelakahina be higa tauku yaku yo'o kalivai-dina omi ami kibababala ana nauhaga fa'ina hina'ahukwahukwa-yo tufoidi Yesu Keliso againe hinahagaviladi-yo kadu adi kibababala buye hinanuhagana.

Wananuwanuwa Yaubada miIsileli gikilowedi againe fafali moya'aina kalivai-dina Yaubada buye hiveyao. Aimo tova mulina miIsileli hinahagaviladi be Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginavega'auledi againe, yadi miya gavayamumu! Au makewa'e yadi yewa vaita alikeya hinamididi-havagi be wayawaidi ivaguna hinamiyami.

Wa'ita, ka'i yami faha wa'aiyala be bavagu Yaubada againe wahawahegena, au vaita yami faha matatabuna Yaubada againe wadahawahegeni be Bana gidagayo, “Hida hima yaku faha.” Meda ka'i yami ai sa'eyana walamina fa'ina wanagahe wanagayo, “Medema Yaubada yana gaitoma,” au vaita dobona kadu laganina higa ai matatabuna Yaubada againe wadahawahegeni be Bana gidagayo, “Hida hima yaku ai.” Meda anafaiweya tuwai-mo'ena miIsileli bwanenediyao kikaiwabudiyao fa'idiya Yaubada gigahe gigayo, “Hida hima yaku kaliva,” fa'ina tova mulina bwanenediyao moya'aidi fa'idiya ginagahe ginagayo, “Hida hima yaku yo'o.”

Kadu abaluvefota sa'eyana ma miIsileli vaita ai melamelala ana egana olive amine, tu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina vaita olive walawala'a amine. Yaubada mena ai melamelala laganina tufoidi giludobodi be gisedi, tu ai walawala'a laganina tufoidi gikuyadi digo gi'aliyedi be ai melamelala dobone gihavidi ada uyona givedamana be hitubulatuna. Ai walawala'a laganina ai melamelala uyona hiyuyuna be hififaiwala amine, meda Yaubada yana nuwadoga tulina tulina miIsileli giveledi-ma agaidiya omi yami faiwala wavaivaina.

Badi miIsileli vaita ai laganina Yaubada giludobodi-ma keke wana'itatagotagodi. Wanogali! Ai laganina keke walamina gidave'ani, au walamina laganina give'adi. Omi ai walawala'a laganina miIsileli walamidiya yami faiwala wavaivaina fa'ina, keke-mo'a gidalubodami be wana'itatagotagodi.
Atu omi wadagahe wadagayo, “Ika tu Yaubada miIsileli giludobohegedi be yadi abaga ime fa'imeya gisiunana.”

Wagahe velemodi atu badi keke hidavetumagana fa'ina Yaubada giludobohegedi tu omi yami wavetumagana fa'ina wamimiyami. Keke wananuwanuwalaka, au taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be yami vetumagana keke wanahegeni.
MiIsileli vaita ai melamelala lagani-mo'ena ma hikoyo againe, Yaubada keke gidayavadi. Ka'i omi vaita ai walawala'a laganina gihavimi-ma wanakoyo digo, keke-mo'a omi ginayavami.
Ada ka'i miIsileli hinahagaviladi-yo hinavetumagana amine o, Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaseyewedi, fa'ina adi seyewa Bana ana tagalowalowa.

Ada au omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina vaita ai walawala'a laganina Yaubada gikuyadi be ai melamelala againe gihavidi-yo hivetubulatuna-ma amine. Ai walawala'a laganina keke ihayana ai melamelala againe hinavetubulatuni. Tu badi miIsileli vaita ai melamelala laganina Yaubada giludobodi-ma au Yaubada ihayana taudiyao yadi ai againe ginahaviyewedi, fa'ina medema lagani-mo'ena.

Tu tobohiyakweyao, nuwanuwaku Yaubada yana vevai boi gisevauyena tu tova adamoya gihawavemogatalena-ma wanahalamanena, be higa keke wananuwanuwalaka vaita omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina badi miIsileli wadakaiwabuhegedi. Yaubada yana vevai sevasevauyana hidede amine. MiIsileli keke matatabudi hidatagakulu. Au tufoidi Yesu Keliso hivetumaganena. Tu badi hitagakulu-ma yadi tagakulu hinanunauwena tu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina ami gavaiyehi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada giluwafami-ma ami kilagalaga amine yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wanaluku-'owoga yo badi tagadi gina'afolena.
Ada au medema tovai-nadi miIsileli adi yo'o matatabudi hinaluku-'owoga be adi kibababala hinanuhagana. Au hidedemi Yaubada yana vevai. Meda tuwaina Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigayo,
Yakobu bwaneneneyao adi Tokibababala
yadi melala lakahina Saiyoni againe
ginatubuyemu be nuwadi ganakiviviyeni-yo
yadi vekwaulauga ginahavaina.
Ada yadi nuwanuwa koyona ganavaihegena
be hidedemi yaku veyao agaidiya ganasena.
Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe miIsileli fa'idiya.

Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada miIsileli bwanenediyao kikaiwabudiyao giluwafadi be gigahedi vaita badi'iyao kadu bwanenediyao buye ginanuwakabubuyedi. Ma badi miIsileli Yesu Keliso ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hikilowena fa'ina, badi au Yaubada nibaineyao. Ma yadi kilowa againe omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina ami kibababala ana eda gi'ayauna. Atu tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada miIsileli bwanenediyao kikaiwabudiyao giluwafadi fa'ina, Bana aimo ginuwanuwa lakahina miIsileli agaidiya. Yaubada yana lauwafa kadu yana nuwakabubu keke-mo'a ginavaiyeweni.
Tuwaina omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina Yaubada wadibutoyogena tu tova adamoya badi miIsileli Yaubada hidibutoyogena fa'ina yami eda gi'ayauna be Yaubada yana hinekalikali wanuhagana.

Meda anafaiweya omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina Yaubada yana hinekalikali wanuhagana fa'ina, tova adamoya badi miIsileli Yaubada hidibutoyogena higa vaita aimo badi omi buye Yaubada yana hinekalikali hinanuhagana.
Fa'ina Yaubada kaliva moya'aida yada idibutoyoga fa'ina giseda yogoyogonideyao be higa moya'aida ginahinekalikaliyeda.

Yaubada yana nuwadoga gavadawana! Yana nuwahuya kadu yana halamana gavatubuga! Hakwa'adi yana nuwanuwa inubana anafaiweya ginahalamaneni? Au keke, keke tamo. Hakwa'adi yana faisewa tavagina anafaiweya gina'uyeni? Au keke, keke tamo.
Meda Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Hakwadi Kaiwabu nuwana gihalamaneni?
Hakwadi Yaubada ana tokivetuvetunu?
Au keke, keke tamo.
Hakwadi tamo gavadi Yaubada givele-yo
Bana ginalaufata? Au keke, keke-mo'a.

Badi kaliva hida babi ana nuwanuwa amine hihuluhuluva-ma adi ita amine omi keke wananuwanuwa. Au wanahawahegemi be Yaubada nuwami ginakive'ivaguni-yo ami ita tulina amine wanavenuya. Ada Yaubada nuwami ginakive'ivaguni-yo amifaiweya yana nuwanuwa wanahalamanena, higa gavadi gilubodani kadu gavadi nuwana gina'ivedivedigagini kadu gavadi hagihagi-mo'ena Bana matane ma wanahalamanena.
Wa'ita, ide sa'eyana sa'eyana wowoda talaina moya'aina gidadauda, ada talaida tulina tulina yana faisewa tulina tulina.

Meda anafaiweya ide Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine ma vaita Keliso wowona talaina. Ide au moya'aida tu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida fa'ina, ide Bana wowona sa'eyana kamimiyami. Ada kaliva wowona talaina tulina tulina buye give'ahavihavi amine ide Keliso wowona talaina buye kave'ahavihavi.

Yaubada ide sa'eyana sa'eyana yana abavetala tulina tulina giveleda-yo ada vehimeya kavaina. Ada yada faiwala hami ana tubuga amine agaideya gifolakena, gilubodada be medede amine kanafifaisewa. Wa'ita, yana abavetala sa'eyana ma ka'i ada vehimeya vaita Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata gitunevehabalutugida-ma kana'awatalatalainena, au gilubodada be yada vetumagana hami ana tubuga amine medemi kana'awatalatalainena.

Kadu sa'eyana ma ka'i ada vehimeya vaita tovetumagana adi veluga, au gilubodada be tovetumagana adi veluga againe kanafifaisewa. Ka'i kaliva adi vehawala digo, gilubodada be kaliva adi vehawala againe kanafifaisewa.

Kadu ka'i ada vehimeya vaita kaliva adi lau'age, au gilubodada be kaliva adi lau'age againe kanafifaisewa. Ka'i yada lokoloko ana folaka digo, gilubodada be yada wa'asehawahega kanafolafolaka. Ka'i kaliva adi itave'avina digo, gilubodada be yada wa'idibumuhiga kana'itave'avidi. Ka'i koyokoyo adi hinekalikali digo, gilubodada be yada wavemwamwala kanahinekalikaliyedi.
Omi Keliso yana yo'o agaidiya wavetobohiyana. Au buye wanave'ahawahawahega vaita tobohiyami velemo'ena amine. Tobohiyamiyao adi egana wanamadukilakahina vaita hidakaiwabuhegemi.
Yami dibumuhiga againe keke wanawowologilogi. Au nuwami yana wagakahikahi Kaiwabu fa'ine wanafifaisewa.

Aimo Yaubada omi fa'imiya gavaimi ginaga-ma fa'ina walulauboda. Mene yami walulauboda wamimiyami fa'ina, wanavemwamwala. Vita tulina tulina kaliva nimadiya wananuhagana againe, wana'atuvefa'ila. Yami ve'ove'o'ola againe wana'idibumuhiga.
Hai Yaubada yana kaliva o yana vevine tamo gavadi againe hikali'uho, medema agaidiya wanafolakena. Wakawaka yami manuweya wanamaduvega'auledi.
Gaveyao hivemwavemwamwala, medema wanavemwamwalavaisedi. Gaveyao hitagitagi, medema wanatagivaisedi.
Veyao againe wanamiyami yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana. Keke wananuwalaka au agetoga yana faisewa againe wanahawahegemi. Keke taumiyao nuwamiya wanakilakahimi vaita omi halamanimiyao.
Hami amifaiweya kukuya againe kaliva moya'aidi buye wanamiyami, au medede amine wanamiya.
Omi tobohiyakweyao, kaliva yadi koyona keke wanalaufata. Au wanamiya tu ka'i Yaubada nuwanuwana amine o Bana ginalaufata. Meda tuwaina Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Laufata yaku abavehimeya. Iya kaliva yadi koyona ganafatana.
Au hidedemi Kaiwabu gigahe.
E, keke omi wanalaufata tu Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe amine wanahuluva. Gigayo,
Ka'i ami tokivekoyo mafu gilauna, au wanave'ana.
Ka'i agona gitaina, bwai wanaveyuna.
Ka'i hidede amine wananuwakabubuyena,
au vaita wadalukufuwani be yana wowomumu ginayemu.
Keke tokivekoyo yadi koyona ginavehimeyemi higa vaita wanafatani. Au taumiyao yadi koyona wanavehimeyena be nuwakabubu againe wanaluvekwe'una.

Yaubada yada tovehimeya gisedi fa'ina, gaveyao kabemani yadi vehimeya hikilowena, medema kaliva yadi wa'abavehimeya Yaubada gisedi-ma hivekwageyedi. Ada badi hidede amine hihuluva-ma adi matahiwadi taudiyao hikovana.

Fa'ina badi hihuluva yamumuna keke yadi tovehimeya agaidiya hinamatauta, au badi hihuluva koyona hinamatauta. Ka'i mene o nuwanuwa ya tovehimeya againe keke unamatauta? Au unahuluva yamumuna be bana ginahawaveyamumuye.

Wa'ita, bana Yaubada yana tofaisewa be higa ami veluga fa'ina. Atu ka'i koyona wanafaisewana, au bana againe wanamatauta fa'ina abavehimeya keke gida'abi-kawowoni. Au anafaiweya matahiwadi ginavelemi. Bana'e Yaubada yana tofaisewa be higa yana ila'a guwana tovehimeyai-nadi nimane tokoyona hinanuhagana.

Medema fa'ina gilubodami be yami tovehimeya bonadi wana'abina. E, bonadi wana'abina tu keke matahiwadi ana matautagaga fa'ina, au bona'abi gilubodami ma nuwamiya wa'ayaunena fa'ina, bonadi wana'abina.

Kadu'e hidema fa'ina yami takesi wanaseusena. Badi yami tovehimeya adi vehimeya tulina tulina hi'ita'itave'avina againe Yaubada yana faisewa hififaisewana fa'ina, takesi yaudi ana toveya yami takesi wanaseusena.

Ada au kabemani ana kaliva koniselo tovehimeya tulina tulina gava vehimeya fa'ina hi'ela medemi wanaveledi. Ka'i takesi tulina tulina digo, takesi wanaveledi. Ka'i ve'amohimohina digo, wanave'amohimohinedi. Ka'i egana ana kailakata digo, adi egana wanakilakahina.

Tuwai-mo'ena Mosese Yaubada yana vehimeya teni gi'etoladina hidede amine. Keke una'udo keke unaluve'alika keke unakai'afu keke una'italauvadiga. Hida vehimeyai-dina kadu vehimeya velugadi matatabudi adi nuwanuwa vehimeya sa'eyana lakahina hinagene hidadauda, higa tauni unuwakabubuye amine tobohiyamomo unanuwakabubuyedi.

Wa'ita hai kaliva tobohiyana ginanuwakabubuyena, medema keke tobohiyana ginakivekoyoni. Medema fa'ina ka'i tobohiyadeyao kananuwakabubuyedi, au Yaubada yana vehimeya kadu yana hawata matatabudi ka'itave'avi-'owodi.

Kadu'e meda tobohiyamiyao fa'idiya wanahawahawahega, fa'ina gava aituha againe wamimiyami ma wahalamanena. Boi Yesu Keliso againe kamidivetumagana ana toveya kanuwanuwa vaita yana yewa'ela ana tova giluveda'ufo. Mena aituhai-nadi kabisona ginalakayemu. E, ada Tokibababala yana yewa'ela ana tova giluveda'ufo-mo'a. Medema fa'ina aimo keke wanadauda. Au kaliva ahe hidauda be hi'enoviladi amine omi wanamidi be wanafaisewa.
Kabisona bogi ginahavaina, kabisona mala ginalauna. Au uyuyu ana dewa againe kana'ilova be mahalina ana giyo kana'abina.

Kanahuluhuluva hagihagina mahalina ana kaliva gilubodadi amine. Auwe fati ana gakahikahi kwavakwavana kadu vekwavakwava gufa laulaugina ana yu-fa'ila fa'ina. Auwe udo kadu dewa yamayamadadana. Auwe ve'amunumunuga kadu ga'uma'uma.
Atu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso againe wanavaigau. Ada dibumi koyona ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigadi wanaki'ilovedi be keke agaidiya wanahawahegemi.

Wa'ita, tovetumagana tufoidi hinuwanuwa vaita Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina gihawahegena be adifaiweya hina'au'ana, tu tufoidi Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana againe nuwadi keke gidamahali-mo'eni ma kevakeva fa'ina adi hawata hisena be a'agaga hi'au'ana.

Gaveyao hinuwanuwa vaita Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina gihawahegena fa'ina hi'a'a-kawokawowo, medema keke gidalubodadi be tovetumagana hikudave'ove'o'owana-ma hina'itatagodi. Meda gaveyao hinuwanuwafani vaita Yaubada hawata tulina tulina gidaseni fa'ina hikudave'ove'o'owana, medema keke gidalubodadi be tovetumagana hi'a'a-kawokawowo ma hinahawavekoyoyedi. Fa'ina Yaubada to'a-kawokawowo kadu tokudave'o'owana yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ahe givega'auledi.

O vaita hakwadi yo mali kaliva ana agetoga yana faisewa ka'i hagihagina o ka'i koyona unalagani? Au bana agetoga ka'i gifaisewa yamumuna o ka'i koyona ma ana tovehimeya anakaibe ginalagana. Ada tovetumagana makewa yana vetumagana againe ginamidi toyogina, fa'ina ana Tovehimeya ginafaiwalavelena be ginamidi toyogina.

Kadu'e wa'ita, tovetumagana tufoidi aiyeta sa'eyana fa'ina hinagahe hinagayo, “Hida hima aiyeta lakahina.” Tu tovetumagana tufoidi hinuwanuwa vaita aiyeta moya'aina Yaubada yana tova. Au gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gavaimi anafaiweya gidanuwanuwa-ma tauna tauna ginavehimeya.

Hai kaliva sa'eyana ginagahe ginagayo, “Hida hima aiyeta lakahina,” medema nuwanuwana Kaiwabu ana egana ginakilakahina. Hai kaliva gi'a'a-kawokawowo, medema ginuwanuwa vaita Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina gihawahegena ada Bana againe givesivesiule-yo gi'au'a fa'ina Kaiwabu ana egana gikilakahina. Ada hai kaliva kevakeva o a'a tufona keke gida'u'ani, medema Yaubada againe givesivesiule-yo Kaiwabu ana egana gikilakahina. Medema fa'ina auwe awalava.

Keke tamo hakwadi agaideya tauna yana miyami o tauna yana alika gidavehimeyeni. Ka'i wayawaida kanamiyami, au yada Kaiwabu againe kahawahawahegeda. Meda ka'i kana'alika, au yada Kaiwabu againe kahawahegeda. E, ka'i wayawaida kamimiyami o ka'i kana'alika, au ide Kaiwabu yana abavehimeya.
Hidema ana inuba Keliso gi'alika be gimididi-havagi, higa Bana'e ide tovetumagana gaveyao hi'alika kadu gaveyao aimo wayawaida kamimiyami-ma ginavehimeyeda.

Bana Keliso ide tovetumagana moya'aida ada Tovehimeya. Mene o uvetovehimeya-yo tobohiya yana huluva ulagana? O vaita hakwadi yo tobohiya u'ita'itatagoni? Aimo tova mulina moya'aida Yaubada matane kanamidi be higa yada huluva fa'ina ginalagada.
Meda aimo Yaubada yana laufata ana tova fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Iya Kaiwabu gagahe. Iya Tomiya-vagata fa'ina,
yaku gahe velemo'ena. Kaliva moya'aidi Iya agaikuya
hina'ibo'ula-mo'a hinagayo, O'eni velemona Yaubada.

Tu Yaubada ada Tovehimeya fa'ina, tobohiyadeyao yadi dewa fa'ina keke kanalagadi vaita ide adi tovehimeya. Au taumiyao nuwamiya wanavehimeyemi hidede amine wanagayo, “Ka'i tobohiyaku yaku dewa gina'ita-yo nuwanuwa koyodi agaidiya ginalowoga o ka'i koyona againe ginabe'u, au dewai-nadi fa'ina ganahawataku.”

Wa'ita, iya Kaiwabu Yesu buye ave'atutamo'aima-ma kalivai-kuna ganuwave'avina higa vaita keke tamo a'a digo a'a koyona, ka'i kevakeva digo kevakeva koyona. Atu ka'i tamo hakwadi ginanuwanuwa vaita a'a sa'eyana o kevakeva sa'eyana koyona, au bana fa'ine gaitomai-nadi gikoyo be keke gina'u'ani.

Ka'i a'a o kevakeva sa'eyana vaita hawahawatana tobohiya matane ma una'ana be tobohiya gina'ita-yo kadu bana gina'ana tu muliya ase'asena gina'akolukoluna vaita ana hawata gidayawelini-yo vita ginanuhagana digo, mena ya dewa fa'ina aimo keke udanuwanuwa hagihagina tobohiya againe, au nuwana ukivevitana. Unogali, bana kalivai-nadi fa'ine Keliso gi'alika. Auwe, ya'a againe keke tobohiya koyona againe unavebe'uni be agolaufofola ginanuhagana.
Taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be gava dewa gava dewa fa'ina omi wagahe wagayo, “Hidema dewa hagihagina,” medema mali kaliva hina'itani-yo keke hinahawavekoyoyeni.

Ide Yaubada yana itave'avina againe kamimiyami be ase'asedeya givehivehimeya-ma ada vehimeya inubana keke a'a o ka'i bwai ana hawata. Medema gaitoma kabi'ona. Au gaitoma lakahina ma dewa yegayegana, aseniwalova, vemwamwala Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe give'inuba-ma gaitomai-dina.
Ada gaveyao hidede amine Keliso againe hihawahawahegedi, medema Yaubada nuwana hikiveyamumuna kadu kaliva yadi hawaveyamumu hivaina.

Keke a'a o kevakeva vaita hawahawatana ana'a againe Yaubada yana faisewa tobohiyamiyao ase'asediya wanayawelini. Yaubada a'a kevakeva matatabuna gihawahegena, atu keke gidalubodami be a'a o kevakeva sa'eyana wana'ani-yo tobohiyami koyona againe wanavebe'uni.
Gavadi gilubodami? Me ka'i gava kevakeva o gava oine againe o ka'i gavadi gavadi againe tobohiyami koyona againe wanavebe'una, au gilubodami be medema gaitomai-dina fa'idiya wanahawatami.

Hidema fa'ina kevakeva o oine o ka'i tabu tulina tulina gavaimi wanuwanuwa-ma omi'iyao tu Yaubada buye wanalukahihiyena. Keke mali tovetumagana agaidiya yami nuwanuwa wanahawavemogataleni. Hai kaliva tauna matane ginahuluva hagihagina tu muliya ana ayauna dewai-nadi fa'ina kadu hagihagina, medema yana vemwamwala gavatubuga!

Atu hai kaliva a'a o kevakeva sa'eyana ana'a fa'ina ginuwa'amalakibo, Yaubada medema kalivai-nadi gihawavekoyoyena fa'ina yana'a keke vetumagana againe gidave'inuba. Ada gava dewa kahuluvina-ma keke vetumagana againe gidave'inuba, medema dewa koyona.
Ide gaveyao kavetumaganadona, gilubodada be badi tovetumagana Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana againe nuwadi aimo keke gidamahali-mo'eni ma kanavelugadi. Gavadi ide nuwanuwada ma keke kananuwenuweni.
Gilubodada be ide sa'eyana sa'eyana gavadi tobohiyada nuwanuwana be yana yamumu fa'ina ma kananuwenuwena, higa vaita yana vetumagana againe kanakivetoyogina.
Wa'ita, Keliso gavadi Tauna nuwanuwana ma keke gidanuwenuweni. Meda Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe vaita Keliso Yaubada againe gidagahe gidagayo,
Kaliva O hi'ihawadamane tu yadi hawadamana Iya agaikuya gilakayemu.
Au hidede amine Keliso keke Tauna yana nuwanuwa gidanuwenuweni, au ihawadamana againe gihawahegena.

Gahe moya'aina tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana kaliva Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina-ma ide ada kivetuvetunu fa'ina hi'etoladina, be higa yada wa'atuvefa'ila kadu yada wa'asevatu Yaubada yana bukiya give'inuba-ma againe Yaubada buye kanakaiwabu ana tova kanalulubodena fa'ina.

Ada au gave'o'olemi be Yaubada atuvefa'ila be asevatu giveleveleda-ma yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana ginavelemi. Seyaseya'aine wananuwanuwa tu Yesu Keliso tavagine wananauna be higa moya'aimi nuwami sa'eyana agomi sa'eyana Yaubada Bana yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso Tamana ma ana egana wanakilakahina.
Kadu'e ganagahe. Keliso givega'aulemi amine meda omi buye wanave'avegavega'aula be higa Yaubada ana egana wanakilakahina fa'ina.

Wa'ita, Keliso gihobu'ela ada miYuda yama yo'o fa'imeya givetofaisewa higa vaita kanahalamanena Yaubada yana gahe au velemo'ena. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bwanenemeyao kikaiwabudiyao agaidiya ime bwanenediyao ama ihagihagi fa'ina giwonadabadaba, ada au Keliso gihobu'ela be higa Yaubada gavaimi giwonadabadaba medemi ginalakayemu velemo'ena.
Gihobu'ela be higa kadu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada yana hinekalikali fa'ina ana egana hinakilakahina. Meda Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe vaita Keliso gidagahe gidagayo,
Hidema fa'ina yo'o tulidiyao hinafadiya
O ganahawadavadava,
kadu a egana ganakweliye-davadavana.
Omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina
badi Yaubada yana yo'o miYuda
buye wanavemwamwala.
Omi yo'o tulimiyao moya'aimi
Kaiwabu wanadavadavana.
Omi fafali moya'aina kalivai-mina
Bana'e wanakweli-davadavana.
Bana Devida tamana ana egana Yese
yana yo'o agaidiya kaliva ginatubuyemu.
Yaubada kalivai-nadi ginakilakahina
be yo'o tulidiyao ginavehimeyedi,
ada adi leme fa'ina Bana againe hinaluluve'avina.
Hidedemi Aiseya Yaubada yana wonadabadaba giyakahina.
Siule tobohiyakweyao Loma againe, iya tauku ganuwave'avina vaita omi nuwanuwa hagihagidi agaidiya wamaga kadu Yesu ana vetumagana againe wanuwahuya-mo'a ada amifaiweya buye wanave'akivetuvetunu.

Atu hida leta againe nuwanuwa tufoidi fa'idiya galumatamata-mo'emi higa vaita nuwami ganatalafolena. Hidede amine galumatamatami, fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe aku vehimeya giveleku be Yesu Keliso yana tofaisewa yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya giseku. Iya abaveyao ana tofaisewa amine gafififaisewa be Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galulumamalena. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa yomuyomu Yaubada matane hi'ali'aliyedi amine, meda iya yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Yaubada againe ga'ali'aliyedi, higa vaita badi kalivai-dina Yaubada nuwana hinakiveyamumuna ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faisewa againe mahamahalidiyao hinamiyami.
Tobohiyakweyao, Yesu Keliso gifaiwalaveleku fa'ina yaku faisewa Yaubada fa'ine gimadu ada medema fa'ina gagakahikahiku.

E, keke ganawowomumu, au yaku faisewa fa'ina ganagahe-mo'emi. Tu keke yaku faiwala ganakilakahini. Au gavadi gavadi Keliso gifaiwalaveleku yo gafaisewana, medema ganalukahihiyena. Bana yana faiwala againe yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina ganuwa'abiyedi be Yaubada bonana hivenogalena. Yaku laumamala kadu yaku gugai agaidiya, abaveyaulowoga kadu aituha fifiwalana agaidiya, ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwaleya Yaubada againe ganuwa'abiyedi. E, melala tulina tulina agaidiya Yelusalema be gina Ililikumu ana fafaliya ganunuwaliliuga Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yesu Keliso fa'ine galumamalena be melalai-dina galuyabudi.

Tova moya'aina yaku nuwanuwa sa'eyanaga hidede amine. Gava melala gava melala agaidiya Keliso keke hidahalamaneni, medede againe nuwanuwaku lakahina Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Keliso fa'ine ganalulumamalena, be higa keke mali tolaumamala yadi faisewa ganaluvefofoni.
Au nuwanuwaku Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe amine ganahuluva gigayo,
Gaveyao keke tamo hakwadi Bana fa'ine gidavenuwa'atadi, medema hina'itahalamanena.
Ada gaveyao Bana valeyana keke hidanogalini,
medema Bana fa'ine nuwadi ginamahalina.
Au mena gahe amine kaliva yauyoga agaidiya galulumamala.
Tu nuwanuwaku kaliva Yesu keliso valeyana keke hidanogalini-ma agaidiya ganalulumamala fa'ina, tova moya'aina yaku ela omi miLoma agaimiya givita.

Atu tova hidevama hida fafali moya'aidi galuyabudi, ada malamala a gavaiyehi nuwanuwaku agaimiya gana'ela gana'itami fa'ina, gavevai be Sifeni ana fafaliya ganana againe omi agaimiya gananuve'abaga. Ganuwave'avina vaita yaku wavemwamwala iya omi buye kanamiyami-yo yakuna Sifeni againe yami veluga buye wana'atuhegeku.
Tu tova adamoya Yelusalema againe gananauna be Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine medede againe himimiyami-ma velekawowo adi veluga fa'ina gananauwena.
Fa'ina tovetumagana adi yo'o Masedoniya kadu Akaiya adi fafali agaidiya yadi velekawowo badi Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine Yelusalema againe ma yadi koyokoyo fa'idiya yadi wa'asehawahega hisena.

Yadi wa'asehawahega hisena, ada makewa gilubodadi be mena miYuda koyokoyoi-dina hidavelugadi. Wa'ita, ide miYuda kana Yesu Keliso bonana yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya kalumamalena. Ide yada laumamala againe badi keke miYuda ma alu'aluwadi yana eda kayauna be Yesu againe adi kibababala hinanuhagana fa'ina, gilubodadi be yadi mani againe ide miYuda yada koyokoyo wowodi hidanuwakabubuyena.
Ada au hida faisewa ganaluyabuna, higa velekawowo matatabuna tovetumagana badi fa'idiya hisena-ma agaidiya ganavele-'owodi yo ganana Sifeni againe, ada yakuna againe agaimiya gananuve'abaga.
