Ada omi agaimiya gana'ela amine gahalamanena gana'ela be Keliso yana ihagihagi ganayemaunena be moya'aida velugai-nadi againe kanamaga.

Wanave'o'ola be Yaubada badi todibutoyoga Yudiya ana fafaliya himimiyami-ma agaidiya ginalugolegoleku. Kadu wanave'o'ola be Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine Yelusalema againe himimiyami-ma velekawowo adi veluga fa'ina ganayemaunena ana toveya, keke hinakiloweni au yadi wanuwayamumu hinavaina.
Ka'i hidedemi ginalakayemu be Yaubada ginahawahegeku amine o akufaiweya yaku wavemwamwala agaimiya ganalakayemu be buye kanamiyami-yo aku ayauna hagihagina gananuhagana. Au hidedemi wanave'o'oleku.
Yaubada aseniwalova giveleveleda-ma agaimiya ginamiyami. Ehe hidedemi.
Tobohiyakweyao, nuwanuwaku wanahalamanena nouda Fibi kwamayoku hagihagina. Bana tovetumagana adi yo'o agaidiya Senikeliya againe givetonagona.

Au mene Loma againe ginayemu-yo wanavega'aulena vaita bana noumi Kaiwabu yana yo'o agaidiya omi yana kaliva mahamahalimiyao gilubodami amine. Kadu gava leme againe nuwanuwana wanavelugana, medema wanavelena, fa'ina iya givelugaku kadu kaliva vevine moya'aidi givelugadi.

Badi yawaidi hihawahegena be iya fa'ikuya kabisona hina'alika. Nuwaku givesiule agaidiya. Keke iya'ekugaga, au tovetumagana adi yo'o moya'aidi badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina badi agaidiya buye nuwadi givesiule.

Yaku nuwakabubu to'ekelesiya badi adi'iselu yadi manuweya hivagavaga'auta-ma agaidiya. Yaku nuwakabubu tobohiyanuwaku Efinito againe, bana Esiya ana fafali kalivana nagona Keliso againe gimidivetumagana.
Yaku nuwakabubu bana Meli againe, bana omi hinafamiya gifaisewa toyogina.

Yaku nuwakabubu Adulonaiko kadu Yuniyasi agaidiya, badi yaku yo'o kalivadi boi iya badi buye deliya amiyami. Kadu badi kaliva hagihagidiyao afositolo matadiya ada badi Keliso againe himidihawahegedi tu iya muliya.
Yaku nuwakabubu Amifiliyato againe, bana tobohiyanuwaku Kaiwabu yana yo'o agaidiya.
Yaku nuwakabubu Ebano againe, bana Keliso yana tofaisewa anafaiweya kadu ime'eyao. Kadu yaku nuwakabubu tobohiyanuwaku Sitakeso againe.
Yaku nuwakabubu Afelesi againe, bana kaliva ka'italuveluveni-yo yana hawahega Keliso againe au toyogina ka'itana. Yaku nuwakabubu Alisitobulo yana yo'o kalivai-dina agaidiya.
Yaku nuwakabubu Helodiyona againe bana yaku yo'o kalivana. Yaku nuwakabubu Nasiso yana yo'o gaveyao Kaiwabu againe himiyave'avina-ma kalivai-dina agaidiya.

Yaku nuwakabubu Telaifina kadu Telaifosa agaidiya, badi vevine-dina Kaiwabu fa'ine hififaisewa toyogina. Yaku nuwakabubu nouku hagihagina Fesisi againe, bana kadu kwamayoku sa'eyana Kaiwabu fa'ine gifaisewa toyogina.
Yaku nuwakabubu Lufasi againe, bana kalivai-nadi Kaiwabu ana tovetumagana hagihagi-mo'ena. Kadu yaku nuwakabubu Lufasi hinana agaidiya, badi kadu iya hihawavenatuneku.
Yaku nuwakabubu Asinikelito, Filegoni, Hemesa, Fateloba, Hemasa agaidiya kadu tobohiyadeyao badi kalivai-dina buye himimiyami-ma agaidiya.
Yaku nuwakabubu Filologo kadu Yuliya agaidiya, kadu Neleyo nouna buye'i agaidiya, ada Olimufa kadu Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine moya'aidi badi buye himimiyami-ma agaidiya.

Gaveyao medede amine hivehawala, medema keke yada Kaiwabu Keliso againe hidahawahegedi, au taudiyao wowodi ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana agaidiya hihawahegedi. Yadi gahe digadigagina kadu yadi bonayafayafa againe kaliva fanifanidiyao hinuwa'abiyedi.

Tu omi'iyao ma moya'aidi yami dibumuhiga Kaiwabu Keliso ana vehawala againe valeyami hinogalina. Hidema fa'ina omi fa'imiya gavemwamwala-mo'a. Atu nuwanuwaku dewa hagihagina againe wananuwahuya tu dewa koyona wanavekwavekwavena.
Bana Yaubada aseniwalova giveleveleda-ma Setani yana faiwala ginamadudabana be omi wanavagatagona. Yada Kaiwabu Yesu yana nuwadogeya wanamiyami.
Iya Tetiyo hida leta Folo fa'ine ga'etoladina-ma yaku lukafoi Kaiwabu ana eganeya.
Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadogeya moya'aimi wanamiyami. Ehe hidedemi.]
E, Yaubada Bana anakaibe Tonuwahuya-mo'a ma ana egana kanakilakahina ada Yesu Keliso yana faisewa fa'ina yana kaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
(Iya Folo bonaku)

Yo siule tobohiyakweyao moya'aimi Kolinita againe. Iya Folo Yaubada givegideku be gave'afositolo. E, Bana'e nuwanuwana iya Yesu Keliso yana kabu ganavaina fa'ina, Yesu Keliso yana afositolo adi maka giveleku. Iya'eku kadu tobohiyada Sosidenisi yama lukafoi omi agaimiya.

Omi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga Kolinita againe yami leta a'etoladina be wana'itana. Omi higa Yaubada yana yo'ogaga fa'ina gisevehailemi be Yesu Keliso againe wahawahegemi, kadu givegidemi be Yesu Keliso yana kaliva mahamahalimiyao wanamiyami. Omi givegidemi kadu gaveyao moya'aidi fafali matatabudi agaidiya yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana egana hikikilakahina, medema omi buye givegidemi, ada Bana'e yadi Kaiwabu kadu yada Kaiwabu, ada yo'o au sa'eyana.
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi ada ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Omi Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi fa'ina yana nuwakabubu moya'aina againe wamimiyami, ada au Bana ginuwadogemi fa'ina laumamala nuwa'abi'abina amine wagahegahe, kadu Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena wahalamane-hagihagiyena.
Yama hawavemogatala Keliso fa'ine ase'asemi gi'onana velemo'ena.
Fa'ina keke tamo Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala againe wadakali'uho, au yana abavetala matatabuna againe wamimiyami tu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana yewa'ela ana tova fa'ina walulauboda.
Bana ginakivetoyogimi be higa Yesu ana vetumagana againe wana'atu'atuvefa'ila tu tova ana abalauyabu, ada au aimo yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana yewa'ela againe wanamiyami keke ami wavita.
Hidede amine Yaubada ginakivetoyogimi fa'ina gikovami be Natuna yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso buye wanavevido. Ada Yaubada giwonadabadaba amine ginagugaiyena, fa'ina adafaiweya kanavetumaganena.

Tobohiyakweyao, vekwageya gayakahina fa'ina Keloi yadi yo'o kalivadi tufoidi buye wavekwavekwageya ma hivenuwa'ataku, higa gahe tulina tulina amine omi kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana walulukahihi. Tufoimi wagahe wagayo, “Ime Folo yana kaliva.” Kadu tufoimi wagayo, “Ime Afolosi yana kaliva.” Kadu tufoimi wagayo, “Ime Fita yana kaliva.” Ada kadu tufoimi wagayo, “Ime Keliso yana kaliva.”

Gavadi-yo hidedemi wagahegahe? Keke Keliso Tauna gidalugologolohini vaita yana yo'o tulina tulina. Iya Folo keke kelose againe gadalaka-yo omi fa'imiya gada'alika. Keke iya Folo aku eganeya wadabafitaiso. Keke, keke-mo'a. (Keliso omi fa'imiya gi'alika. Keliso ana eganeya wabafitaiso. Fa'ina omi Keliso yana yo'o, keke iya yaku yo'o.)
Iya Yaubada againe gavesiule fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya gadakivebafitaisoye, au yami yo'o kalivadi adi'iseluga gakivebafitaisoyedi, higa Kelisifo ada Gaiyasi.
Hidema fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya afaiweya unagahe vaita aku eganeya gadakivebafitaisoye be aku tomuliya fa'ina.
A, sa'eyana nuwaku gi'afolena, higa Sitefanasi kadu ana yo'o buye gakivebafitaisoyedi, tu kadu ka'i tamo hakwadi velugana gakivebafitaisoyena tu nuwaku giulu.

Keke kaliva ganakivebafitaisoyedi fa'ina, Keliso gida'iveniniseku. Au gi'iveniniseku be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ganalumamalena. E, Keliso yana alika kelose againe kaliva fa'ideya ma galulumamalena. Keke tomiyababi yadi laumamala nuwa'abi'abina amine gadalulumamaleni. Ka'i tomiyababi yadi laumamala nuwa'abi'abina amine gadalumamalena digo, Keliso yana alika kelose againe ana nuwanuwa keke ase'asemi gida'onani, au vaita gahe-kawowo wadanogalini.
Wa'ita, Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya tonuwahuya adi egana bwavibwavina fa'idiya gigahe gigayo,
Hida babi ana tonuwahuya yadi nuwahuya ganayawelina.
Hida babi ana tohalamana yadi halamana ganakive'iyohoyohona.
Hai tohalamana-mo'edi? Tonuwahuya hai yadi nuwahuya? Hai tova hidevama ana tolaumamala nuwa'abi'abidiyao? Tomiyababi keke tamo yadi nuwahuya. Yadi nuwahuya vaita iyohoyoho ma Yaubada giseyemaunena.

Yaubada Tonuwahuya-mo'a givehimeya be hida babi ana tonuwahuya keke taudiyao yadi nuwahuya againe Yaubada hinahalamaneni. Venuwa'ata ime alulumamalena-ma vaita iyohoyoho badi matadiya tu Yaubada givehimeya be gaveyao hida venuwa'ata hinavetumaganena, medema ginakibababaledi.

Badi miYuda ma nuwanuwadi nagona tamo iya'iyaya hina'itani-yo muliya venuwa'atai-nadi hinavetumaganena. Ada miGilika higa yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina ma nuwanuwadi laumamala nuwanuwahuyana hinanogalini-yo hinavetumaganena.

Tu ime'eyao ma Keliso yana alika kelose againe ide fa'ideya ma alulumamalena. MiYuda hivaitana Keliso ginanagoyedi tu yama laumamala Keliso yana alika fa'ina hinogalina againe hi'ago'uga. Ada badi yo'o tulidiyao ma yama laumamala Keliso yana alika keloseya hinogalina againe, hivelaiga higayo, “Mema iyohoyoho gahe-kawowo.”

Tu ide gaveyao ma Yaubada gikovada be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya giseda, tufoida miYuda tufoida yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina, medema Keliso ka'itahalamanena higa Bana'e Yaubada yana faiwala kadu yana nuwahuya.

Kaliva hivaitana Yaubada kwavakwavana fa'ina yana vehimeya againe Natuna gi'alika, tu hida Yaubada vaita yana vekwavakwava ma kaliva yadi nuwahuya gitubuhegena, kadu kaliva hivaitana Bana kowakowana tu yana gakowakowa kaliva yadi faiwala gitubuhegena.
Tu Yaubada Tauna badi fanifanidiyao tomiyababi matadiya giluwafadi be tonuwahuya ginakivewowomumudi. Kadu badi kowakowadiyao kaliva matadiya Yaubada giluwafadi be tofaiwala ginakivewowomumudi.

Kadu badi koyokoyo'avadiyao ada badi'iyao tomiyababi hivekiwogedi-ma Yaubada giluwafadi. E, badi hihawave'iyohoyohoyedi amanadi Yaubada giluwafadi be gaitoma kikaiwabuna tomiyababi matadiya ginaluyaweyawelina fa'ina.
Hidede amine Yaubada fanifanidiyao adi loi giluve'udi be keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginagakahikahini Bana matane.

Tu omi'iyao ma kadu Yaubada yana vehimeya againe Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi. Yaubada Keliso gi'iveninisena be nuwada ginakifolefolena, ada yana nuwahuya kanahalamanena fa'ina. E, Bana'e yada koyona ana aba'aiyawela ana eda gifaisewana be ide yegayegadeyao Yaubada matane kamimiyami, ada yada koyona fatana Tauna gisena be gitutuvehobuda.
Gaitoma hagihagina moya'aina inubana Keliso againe fa'ina, Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe amine kanahuluva gigayo,
Hai kaliva nuwanuwana gakahikahi, medema keke tauna ana egana ginakikilakahini. Au gilubodana be Kaiwabu ginagakahikahiyena.
Nuwahinagekuya gavehimeyeku higa vaita keke tamo gavana fa'ina gadanuwanuwa tu Yesu Keliso anakaibe gadalukahihiyena, higa yana alika keloseya fa'ina gadalulumamala.
Fa'ina omi agaimiya ga'ela ana toveya keke yaku wafaiwala gada'ela, tu yaku wamatauta yaku wa'asehawahega ga'ela.
Ada keke hifufu nuwa'abi'abina o ka'i gahe nuwanuwahuyana amine gadalulaumamala o gadavehavehawala keke. Alu'aluwa Mahalina gifaiwalaveleku be yaku laumamala gifaiwala-yo ase'asemi gi'onana.
Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala againe galumamala be yami vetumagana keke tomiyababi yadi nuwahuya againe ginave'inuba, au Yaubada yana faiwala againe ginave'inuba.

Atu gahe nuwanuwahuyana sa'eyana galulukahihiyena. Badi Yesu ana vetumagana againe hive'asevatu-ma agaidiya mena gahe nuwanuwahuyana galulukahihiyena. Gahe-nadi ma keke vaita tomiyababi tova hidevama himimiyami-ma yadi nuwahuya amine, o ka'i yadi tovehimeya yadi nuwahuya amine, keke. Fa'ina badi tovehimeyai-dina adi egana gihavahavaina.

Gahe nuwanuwahuyana iya galulukahihiyena-ma Yaubada yana nuwahinage, higa yana nuwahuya nuwahinagene gidadauda amanadi. Mena yana nuwahuya ma sevasevauyana, ada kadu boi tuwai-mo'ena hida babi aimo keke gidabubuni ana toveya givevai be yana nuwahuya againe ide tovetumagana Bana amine kanakikaiwabu fa'ina.
Tomiyababi tova hidevama himimiyami-ma yadi tovehimeya hida Yaubada yana nuwahuya hifaniyena. Ka'i hidahalamanena digo, Tokaiwabu-mo'a keke kelose againe hidatutuvefoseni.
Tu iya gavehavehawala Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe amine gigayo,

Gavadi gavadi keke tamo hakwadi gida'itadi o ka'i gidanogalidi, gavadi gavadi keke tamo hakwadi tauna nuwane gidanuwenuwedi, medema gaitoma yamumudi Yaubada gikidewedewedi badi yadi nuwanuwa Bana againe hisena-ma fa'idiya.

Hida gaitomai-dina sevasevauyadi tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana gi'iveninisena be ide tovetumagana agaideya gihawavemogataledi. Fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gaitoma moya'aina ana nuwanuwa gi'itahalamanena. E, kadu Yaubada Tauna yana nuwahinage gihalamane-'owona.

Kaliva ma yana nuwahinage keke kadahalamaneni, au bana tauna alu'aluwana anakaibe gihalamanena. Meda anafaiweya Yaubada yana nuwahinage keke kadahalamaneni, au Yaubada Alu'aluwana anakaibe yana nuwahinage gihalamanena.

Yaubada keke hida babi ana nuwanuwa gidaveleda. Tauna Alu'aluwana ide tovetumagana agaideya gi'iveninisena be yana nuwanuwa fa'ina ginakivetuvetunuda, ada Yaubada yana abavetala moya'aina ide agaideya kana'itahalamanena fa'ina.

Ada au mena Yaubada yana nuwanuwa nuwanuwahuyana alulumamalena. Yama hifufu inubana keke kaliva yadi nuwahuya againe au Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe, ada Bana gikivetuvetunuma amine alulumamala. Hai kaliva nuwahinagediya Alu'aluwa Mahalina Tauna gimimiyami, medema Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana nuwanuwa fa'ina akivetuvetunudi.

Hai kaliva nuwahinagene Alu'aluwa Mahalina Tauna gimimiyami, medema gaitoma moya'aina inubana fa'ina anafaiweya gina'itanuwanuwa, ka'i Yaubada againe o ka'i hida babi againe ma anafaiweya gina'itahalamanena. Atu bana kaliva nuwahinagene Alu'aluwa Mahalina Tauna keke gidamiyami, medema keke anafaiweya bana wa'Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'itanuwenuweni au yana nuwanuwa gifaniyena.
Mena itanuwanuwa keke anafata ma Veyao Tuwaina ana buki givehawaleda gigayo,
Hakwa'adi Kaiwabu nuwana gihalamaneni-yo anafaiweya ginakivetuvetununi? Keke tamo.

Tu ime'eyao ma Keliso nuwana gisevedamana agaimeya be Bana ginuwanuwa amine meda anafaiweya ime anuwanuwa. Fa'ina badi keke wa'Alu'aluwa Mahalina amine yo nuwama hidahalamaneni-yo adifaiweya hinakivetuvetunuma.

Huhu fwefweya hihuhuna-ma meda anafaiweya yaku laumamala omi agaimiya. Keke a'a o'olina lakahidiyao hi'au'ana-ma amine Yaubada yana nuwahinage yaku laumamala againe gadave'ami, fa'ina keke amifata. Kadu tova adamoya a'a o'olina keke amifata.

Omi aimo babi ana nuwanuwa amine wahuluhuluva. Wa'itami, aimo wagaga'uma'uma kadu buye wavekwavekwageya fa'ina makewa'e babi ana nuwanuwa amine wahuluhuluva. E, badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma amine wadedewadewa.
Mena dewa sa'eyana ma tufoimi wagayo, “Iya Folo yana kaliva,” kadu tufoimi wagayo, “Iya Afolosi yana kaliva.” Hida huluvai-nadi badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma yadi huluva amine.

Bana mena Afolosi vaita hakwa'adi? Iya Folo vaita hakwa'adi-yo fa'imeya wavekwavekwageya? Ime kaliva kabi'omeyao, ama egana tofaisewa ada gavaimi faisewa sa'eyana sa'eyana Kaiwabu givehimeyema, medede amine afifaisewa. Ime omi hinafamiya afaisewa fa'ina, Kaiwabu againe wavetumagana.
Wa'ita, yama faisewa vaita faha amine. Iya otova ase'asemiya gafahana, bana Afolosi yana kivetuvetunu againe faha gi'ita'itave'avina tu bana Yaubada anakaibe a'a gikivetubugina.
Fa'ina bana otova ana tofaha kadu faha ana to'itave'avina badi keke kikaiwabudiyao. Bana Yaubada anakaibe kikaiwabuna fa'ina Bana a'a gikivetubugina.
Bana otova ana tofaha kadu faha ana to'itave'avina yadi kaiwabu leleleya. Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana yadi faisewa amine Yaubada adi laufata ginaveledi.
Meda ime ama'iselu Yaubada yana tofaisewa Bana buye afififaisewa. Vaita Yaubada yana faha omi'iyao. Kadu vaita Yaubada yana manuwa'iyogoyogona omi'iyao.

Tu Yaubada yana manuwa'iyogoyogona fa'ina aku vehimeya giveleku be yana veluga againe omi yana manuwa ami aiyogona gavebutuna. Iya gamidilumamalemi higa vaita to'aiyogona halamanina amine manuwa ana ogola gakivemididina tu mali kaliva yadi vehawala againe lumalumana hiyogoyogona. Omi tovehawala wana'itave'avimi be vehawala vaita yowana o'olina againe manuwa wanayogo-hagihagiyena.

Bana mena holili'abi ma ahe gakivemididina higa Yesu Keliso au yami vetumagana luluna. Keke tamo hakwadi mali holili'abi anafaiweya ginakivemididini. Yaubada yana manuwa ana holili'abi au sa'eyanaga, higa Yesu Keliso.

Badi Yaubada bonana ana tovehawala vaita manuwa ana to'aiyogona amine. Tufoidi yadi vehawala againe vaita kasikasi, tutuwana, kainumula againe manuwa hidayogoyogoni. Tufoidi ma vaita mulumulu, dikwadikwa, mobo againe hidayogoyogoni.

Aimo vedewayauga ana tova kaliva moya'aida yada faisewa gina'ivemogatalina be yamumuna o ka'i koyona amine moya'aidi hina'itana. Fa'ina vedewayauga ana toveya ai'ala'alata yada faisewa gina'alahiluvaluvana, ka'i o'olina o fwalelena amine kayogona.
Hai kaliva yana vehawala tunutunugina ma ai'ala'alata mena yana iyogoyogona gina'ala'unaunana medema ana laufata ginavaina.

Tu hai kaliva yana iyogoyogona gina'ala-'owona medema yana faisewa ginayawowola, ada keke laufata ginavaini. Tu bana tauna keke ginabwavi, au kaliva lokoloko manuwa gi'ala'alahina againe hiluluvemauga amine, Yaubada bana kalivai-nadi ginalugolegolena.
Ka'i tamo hakwadi Yaubada yana manuwa ginakivekoyona digo, Yaubada bana kalivai-nadi ginaluyawelina. Fa'ina Yaubada yana manuwa au abaga sevesevehailana, ada omi'iyao Bana yana manuwa.
Keke taumiyao agaimiya wanave'alololo. Ka'i tamo hakwadi omi tovetumagana agaimiya unuwanuwa vaita o tonuwahuya, au tomiyababi matadiya udavekwavakwava-yo Yaubada matane udavetonuwahuya.
Fa'ina tomiyababi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma yadi nuwahuya vaita iyohoyoho amine Yaubada matane. E, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe amine gigayo,
Babi ana tonuwahuya aikaunuwanuwadiyao nonogana Yaubada agedi givebahina be yadi nuwahuya vaita iyohoyoho amine ginaseyemaunena.
Kaiwabu tonuwahuya yadi nuwanuwa gihalamane-'owona, higa mema yogo ma gaitoma-kawowo.
Yaubada babi ana tonuwahuya fa'idiya hidedemi gigahe fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya kaliva adi egana unayakahini vaita fa'idiya una'alatutula. Wa'ita, gaitoma moya'aina au mema yami gaitoma,

higa iya Folo ada badi Afolosi be Fita, kadu hida babi ana gaitoma, kadu yawaimi ana aiyeta, kadu alika ana tova, kadu gaitoma moya'aina tova adamoya gidadauda amanadi, kadu gaitoma moya'aina aimo tova mulina ginalakayemu amanadi. E, mena gaitoma moya'aina omi yami gaitoma, be ami veluga fa'ina.
Tu omi'iyao ma Keliso yana gaitoma, ada kadu Keliso Yaubada yana gaitoma.

Tu ime yami tovehawala ma fa'imeya ka'i gavaimi wananuwanuwa? Wananuwanuwa vaita ime Keliso yana tofaisewa kadu Yaubada yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana ana to'itave'avina, higa yana nuwanuwa fa'ina anakivetuvetunumi.
Omi wahalamanena hai kaliva to'itave'avina yadi faisewa gi'abina, medema gilubodana be yana wa'idibumuhiga ana vehimeya gida'itave'avina.

Kaiwabu anakaibe yaku faisewa yamumuna o koyona ma ginalagana. Ka'i omi tovetumagana wanalagaku o ka'i vedewayauga amine kaliva hina'itanuwenuweku o, keke hidema fa'ina gadanuwanuwa lakahina. Kadu keke tauku gadalagaku.

Keke tamo yaku faisewa ana koyona fa'ina vita ase'asekuya gada'ayauneni, tu hidedemi ga'ayaunena omi keke amifaiweya wadahalamaneni ka'i iya gagahe velemo'ena o ka'i keke. Kaiwabu anakaibe ase'aseku gihalamanena be gina'itanuwenuweku.

Kaiwabu babiya ginayewa'ela ana toveya gaitoma sevasevauyana uyu'uyuyune gidadauda-ma kabu'avane ginaseyemaunena, kadu kaliva yada nuwahinage gina'ivemogatalina. Ada medema tovai-nadi gaveyao yadi faisewa yamumuna, medema sa'eyana sa'eyana Yaubada Tauna ginahawaveyamumuyedi. Hidema fa'ina Kaiwabu yana tova wanabodana. Keke tova hidevama kaliva yadi faisewa ka'i hagihagina o ka'i koyona ma wanalagani.

Tobohiyakweyao, iya'eku Afolosi ami tonagona ama'iselu fa'imeya ahe galukahihi. Yama faisewa Yaubada fa'ine omi hinafamiya ahe galukahihiyena. Kadu hawata kaliva adi ailaga fa'ina galukahihiyena. Ama'iselu ama egana aba'ita fa'ina gayakahina be ami tonagona moya'aima fa'imeya wananuwanuwa tunutunugina. Nuwanuwaku gahe sa'eyana ana nuwanuwa wanahalamane-hagihagiyena higa “Hawata Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina againe wana'itave'avina.” Ka'i yana hawata wana'itave'avina amine, keke tonagona sa'eyana fa'ine wana'alatutula tu tonagona sa'eyana wanakihobuyeni.

Tobohiyaku, hakwadi gigahe-yo vaita o kikaiwabu tu tobohiya keke kikaiwabuna? Hai ya nuwahuya o ya gava'adi moya'aina inubana? Yaubada againe. Yaubada againe uvaina fa'ina, keke unaselakalaka vaita tauni ya nuwanuwa againe udavaini.

Fa'ina iya ganuwanuwa vaita Yaubada gidavehimeya be ime afositolo kaliva kabisomeyao amine adamiyami. Givehimeya be tuwaina tolugaviya nibaidiyao tufoidi hikive'avidi ada hinauwedi wai hinagoyedi be hinaluve'alikadi amine, mali kaliva ime wai hinagoyema be kaliva moya'aidi matadiya analika. E, tomiyalobama kadu tomiyababi hi'ita'ita-kwanekwanema vaita ime kaliva kowakowameyao.

Ime Keliso bonana alulumamalena fa'ina, kaliva matadiya ime tokwavakwava tu omi Keliso yana kaliva fa'ina mene vaita yami wanuwahuya lakahina. Ime kowakowameyao tu omi mene vaita ve tumagana againe fifiwalamiyao. Omi higa vaita kikaiwabumiyao tu ime kabisomeyao kaliva matadiya.
Ime kabisomeyao kaliva matadiya fa'ina tuwaina be anunauwena tova adamoya mafu gilaulauma, agoma gitaitaina, kaleko koyona a'ose'osena. Kaliva himunumunukoyokoyoma kadu ime togatogadadanimeyao.

Yama laumamala fatana keke adavivaini. Tova moya'aina taumeyao nimameya afififaisewa toyogina be amaga ama kevakeva ana mani ananuhagana fa'ina. Kaliva hihawave'avima againe, badi fa'idiya ave'o'ola be Yaubada ginanuwakabubuyedi. Kaliva hikivekoyoma againe, a'atuvefa'iledi.

Kaliva ama egana hihawavekabi'oyena digo, bona bikabikana amine bonadi afatana. E, tuwaina be hinunauwena hida bai-nadi ime vaita yogo amine yo'o matatabudi matadiya. Yogo uledi vevine melaleya higiligilina-ma amine, ime kaliva hihawave'iyohoyohoyema.
Natukweyao, keke hidede amine gadadakeyemi-yo ganakivewowomumumi fa'ina. Au omi vaita natu'ase'asekweyao amine fa'ina hidede amine ga'etoladi be ganakivetuvetunumi fa'ina.

Kaliva keke sa'eyadi vaita agetoga amine himiyamiyanemi, tu tamamiyao keke moya'aidi. Iya akukaibe tamami fa'ina Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya gamidilumamalena be Yesu Keliso yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku, ada au hidede amine ga'ivetubugimi.
Omi higa natukweyao fa'ina, gagahegahevagadonemi be tavagikuya wananunudadana.

Nuwanuwaku tavagikuya wananunudadana fa'ina, Timoti agaimiya ga'iveninisena. Bana'e natu'ase'aseku Kaiwabu yana yo'o agaidiya, kaliva bonabona'abina. Bana ga'iveninisena be iya Yesu Keliso yana kaliva yaku dewa fa'ina nuwami ginatalafolena, mena dewai-nadi tovetumagana yadi yo'o moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya gavehavehawala amine.
Atu tufoimi wanuwanuwa vaita aku tovelugagaga Timoti ga'iveninisena tu iya tauku keke gana'ela gana'itami fa'ina wanuwanuwalaka.
Tu Kaiwabu ginahawahegeku amine, tova kabi'ona omi agaimiya gana'ela be tauku ganahalamanena ka'i badi hiselakalaka kalivai-dina ma Yaubada yana faiwala againe hififaisewa o ka'i higahegahe-kawowo.
Wa'ita, Yaubada yana yo'ogaga kalivai-dina adi iya'iyaya keke gahegahe au dewa hagihagina ana seyemauna Yaubada yana faiwala againe giyemuyemu amanadi.

Gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Ka'i kaliva natuneyao tagadi kuluna gitafitafidi-ma amine gana'ela be ganakivetuvetunumi? O ka'i yami dewa ahe wa'ihagihagiyena fa'ina, yaku wanuwayamumu gana'ela be bona bikabikana amine ganagahegahemi? Aimo taumiyao.

Atu venuwa'ata koyona ganogalina, higa kaliva sa'eyana omi tovetumagana ami yo'o agaimiya tamana vavinena gidudauvedi. Kaliva keke Yaubada hidahalamaneni-ma adi hawata hisena, higa kaliva keke wagana buye hinadauda. Tu bana kalivai-nadi omi agaimiya ma tovetumagana nonogana wagana buye himimiyami buye hidauda.

Ha! Hidedemi yami ekelesiya kalivana gikoyo-mo'a tu omi'iyao ma taumiyao wagakahikahimi va ita omi to'ekelesiya yami wanuwahuya. Keke gakahikahi tu tagiya lakahina ma gilubodami. Kadu gilubodami be bana kalivai-nadi ana egana wanayawelina be keke bana omi buye wanavaga'auta.

Tu iya'eku ma keke hinafamiya gadamiyami tu nuwaku ma ahe gi'ela agaimiya. Ada vaita iya omi buye kadamiyami amine, iya mena kalivai-nadi yana dewa koyo-mo'ena ma ahe gavedewayaugina be matahiwadi ginanuhagana.

Omi Kaiwabu Yesu ana eganeya wanavaga'auta ana toveya, ada nuwaku ahe gina'ela agaimiya fa'ina iya omi buye kanavaga'auta amine, kadu Kaiwabu Yesu yana faiwala ide buye kana'ayauneni yo bana kalivai-nadi ana egana kanayawelina ada Setani againe kanahegenauwena. Setani againe kanahegenauwena be higa vita moya'aina againe wowona gina'ivebwavina. Wowona ana ivebwavi againe kaliva dibuna koyona ana nuwanuwa ginayawowola-yo alu'aluwana Yaubada ginakibababalena Kaiwabu yana vedewayauga ana toveya.

Atu taumiyao wagakahikahimi ma keke gidalubodani. Fa'ina dewa koyona agaimiya gidadauda. Isi gaitoma kabi'ona tu falawa hinagene ginauna tu beledi matatabuna gitubuga amine, meda kaliva sa'eyanaga yana dewa koyona ginanauna moya'aimi agaimiya ginadamadamana.

Yami dewa koyona vaita isi amine gitubutubuga-ma wanahegena be beledi keke isi buye hidavilani-ma amine wanayamumu. E, Keliso yami koyona ahe givaihegena fa'ina wayegayega. Tafalolo ana egana Abamaduviviya ana toveya yadi sifi kabi'ona himununa be gi'alika amine, meda Keliso yada sifi ide fa'ideya gi'alika be yada koyona ginavaihegena fa'ina.

Keliso yana alika ide fa'ideya yada wavemwamwala kananuwanuwa'udu'uduna higa badi miYuda Abamaduviviya ana toveya beledi isi buye hivilana-ma hihege-'owona amine, meda ide tobohiyadeyao adi kivekoyo ana nuwanuwa kadu yada dewa koyona matatabuna kanahege-'owona be kananuwanuwa sa'eyana kadu kananuwanuwa velemo'ena.
Kadu tobohiyakweyao, yami leta boi ga'etoladina-ma againe gagahemi gagayo, “Keke kaliva vevine udo'udodiyao buye wanamiyami.”

Badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma fa'idiya keke gadagahe, higa badi udo'udodiyao o matadi gi'alalaka ada kikai'afudiyao, o ka'i balauma agaidiya hivetuvetumagana amanadi. Ka'i nuwanuwami babi ana kaliva koyodiyao matatabudi wananuyabuyabudi digo, hami wanana? Au hida babi wanahegena, fa'ina melala moya'aina agaidiya koyona gidadauda. Keke amifaiweya.

Tu yaku nuwanuwa ga'etoladina-ma higa vaita hai kaliva tauna givewagana tovetumagana tu mali vevine buye hidauda o matana gi'alalaka o balauma agaidiya givetuvetumagana o kaliva giveyainedi o gufa koyona giyuyu-fa'ila o ka'i lokoloko gikiki'afuna, medema kalivai-nadi keke buye wanamiyami. E, keke bana yami manuweya wanavega'auleni be buye wana'a.
Kaliva sa'eyana omi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaimiya ginakoyo amine o, wanawavina be ginana.
Fa'ina bana kaliva wagana buye hidauda-ma wanawavina be ginana.

Tu tobohiyakweyao kadu ganagahe. Ka'i tamo hakwadi omi tovetumagana agaimiya tobohiya buye wanavekwageya amine, gavadi-yo usimana-yo miya-kawokawowodiyao agaidiya wakotu? Gavai'ona-yo keke tovetumagana ami yo'o agaidiya uda'aliyeni-yo hidavedewayaugini? Medema yami dewa keke gidalubodani.

Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ada vehimeya omi keke ma'i wadahalamaneni? Aimo tova mulina ide Yaubada yana yo'ogaga badi tomiyababi moya'aidi kanavedewayaugidi. Ka'i omi tovetumagana aimo tomiyababi moya'aidi wanavedewayaugidi, au makewa tova adamoya mena gaitoma kabi'ona fa'ina amifaiweya wanavedewayauga.

Kadu Yaubada yana yo'ogaga ada vehimeya sa'eyana ma'i wanuwenuwena o keke? Ide lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kanavedewayaugidi ma'i wahalamanena o keke? Ka'i mena faisewa lakahina aimo lobameya wana'abina, au makewa amifaiweya hida babi ana gaitoma fa'ina wanavehimeya.

Mene tamo kaliva adi egana keke lakahina omi tovetumagana agaimiya o keke? Ka'i nuwanuwami babi ana gaitoma fa'ina buye wanavekwageya amine, mena kaliva adi egana kabi'ona omi matamiya ma badi agaidiya wadakotu. Badi kaliva kabi'odiyao nonogana adifaiweya hinavedewayaugimi.
Au hidedemi gagahe be wanawowomumu fa'ina. Omi vaita keke tonuwahuya-yo badi tovetumagana hivekwageya-ma keke wadavedewayaugidi. Mene tamo kaliva tonuwahuya gimimiyami o keke?

Vaita yami vekwageya fa'ina tovetumagana yami yo'o agaidiya wadalukahihiyeni be ginahavaina fa'ina, tu keke. Au tovetumagana sa'eyana tobohiyana yana koyona fa'ina gisimana ada badi Yaubada keke hidavetumaganeni-ma hivedewayaugidi. Medema keke gidalubodani.
Tu omi'iyao ma keke tobohiyamiyao yadi kivekoyo wada'atuvefai'ileni. Au taumiyao tobohiyamiyao wakikivekoyodi, badi agaidiya wakikai'afu. E, tobohiyamiyao nonogana hidedemi wahuluhuluva.
o badi balauma agaidiya hivetuvetumagana,
o kaliva vavinena gikiloweni tu mali vevine buye hidauda, meda anafaiweya kwamayoku mali kaliva buye hidauda,
o badi kaliva hivetuvetubo o ka'i vevine hivemavemai,
o kikai'afudiyao o badi matadi gi'alalaka,
o badi gufa koyona ana yu-fa'ila againe hivekwavakwava,
o toveyaina o tomunugakai'afu,
e hida kaliva koyodiyao adi loi keke Yaubada yana abageya yana yo'ogaga buye hinaluku.

Boi tuwaina aimo keke wadavetumagana ana toveya, tufoimi mena kaliva koyodiyao adi loi amine wahuluhuluva. Tu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana eganeya kadu yada Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana faiwala againe ahe watowa be wayegayega, Yaubada yana yo'ogaga fa'ina ahe gisevehailemi be Yesu Keliso againe wahawahegemi, ada omi kaliva yegayegamiyao Yaubada matane.

Tu tufoimi wagahe wagayo, “Keke tamo gavadi hawahawatana iya fa'ikuya. Au dewa moya'aina akufaiweya.” Au wagahe velemona tu keke dewa moya'aina agaidiya yamumu kananuhagani. Taumadi dewa moya'aina akufaiweya tu dewa tufona keke ganahuluvini be dewai-nadi keke ginavehimeyeku fa'ina.

Kadu tufoimi wagahe wagayo, “A'a kamoda ana giba, ada kamoda gidadauda be a'a kana'ana fa'ina.” Hidedemi wagahe tu aimo tova mulina Yaubada yana vehimeya againe a'a ginahavaina, kadu kamoda ginahavaina. Tu wowoda ma keke gidadauda be kana'udo'udo fa'ina, keke. Wowoda gidadauda be Kaiwabu yana giba fa'ina, kadu Kaiwabu givehivehimeyena be gidadauda yamumuna.
Yaubada yana faiwala againe Kaiwabu wowona alikeya gisivemididina, kadu meda anafaiweya ide ginasivemididida.
Wanogali! Omi wowomi Yesu Keliso wowona talaina. Wowoku Keliso wowona talaina fa'ina, keke wowoku kwamayoku yamayamadadana wowona buye ganave'atutamo'aini, keke-mo'a.

Hai kaliva wowona kwamayoku yamayamadadana wowona buye hinave'atutamo'aina, medema wowodi au givesa'eya ma ma'i wahalamanena o keke? Meda Veyao Tuwaina ana buki kaliva kwamayoku yadida fa'ina gigahe gigayo,
Badi adi'iselu hinavewowotamo'ai.
Tu hai kaliva nuwana Kaiwabu nuwana buye ginave'atutamo'aina, medema Kaiwabu buye hive'aluwatamo'ai.
Dewa udo'udona wanavekwaulaugena. Mali dewa koyona keke kaliva wowona ginakivekoyoni, tu kaliva yana dewa udo'udona againe tauna wowona ginakivekoyona.
Ka'i mene wahalamanena omi wowomi Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana manuwa? Higa Bana Yaubada omi agaimiya gihawahegeni-yo nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami. Wowomi keke taumiyao yami giba. Omi Yaubada yana giba.

Fa'ina fata lakahina againe gitutuvehobumi be yana giba fa'ina. Hidema fa'ina keke wowomi dewa koyona againe wanahawahegeni, au wowomi wana'itave'avina be yami dewa hagihagina againe kaliva Yaubada ana egana hinakilakahina.
Siule tobohiyakweyao, yami toliluvaluva yaku leta againe wa'etoladina-ma ganafatana. Ka'i kaliva keke ginanagi, au medema gilubodana.

Hidedemi iya ganuwanuwa tu kaliva vevine moya'aidi hi'udo'udo fa'ina, gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana tauna yana kwamayoku gidavaina be buye hidamiyami, kadu kwamayoku sa'eyana sa'eyana tauna yana kaliva gidavaina be buye hidamiyami.

Kaliva kwamayoku hinagi againe, ka'i kwamayoku nuwanuwadi moganedi buye hinadauda amine, moganedi au keke ginadibutoyogedi. Meda anafaiweya ka'i kaliva nuwanuwana vavinena buye hinadauda amine, vavinena au keke hinadibutoyogeni.
Fa'ina kwamayoku keke taudi wowodi hidavehimeyeni, au mema moganedi givehimeyena. Meda anafaiweya kaliva keke tauna wowona gidavehimeyeni, au mema vavinena hivehimeyena.

Kaliva keke vavine unahawatadi, kadu kwamayoku keke moganemi wanahawatani be higa vaita keke buye wanadauda. Tu ka'i tova sa'eyana taumiyao buye wanavehimeyemi be dauva wanahawatana higa ve'o'ola-tafalolo againe wanahawahegemi fa'ina, medema gilubodana. Tu ka'i yami ve'o'ola ana aituha wanaluyabuna amine o wanavebutu-havagi buye wanadauda. Ka'i ami hawata dauva fa'ina lauva tunugina wananunauwena digo, matami ginaludigadigaga ada Setani gina'ela gina'aladibidibiyemi be mali vevine o mali kaliva buye wanadauda. Hidema fa'ina yami ve'o'ola ana aituha wanaluyabuna againe, kadu wanavebutu-havagi vavine o moganemi buye wanadauda.
Mena yaku gahe nagi fa'ina, dewai-nadi fa'ina keke vaita vehimeya amine gadavehimeyemi. Gahawahegemi tu nagi ana dewai-nadi galukahihiyena amine wanahuluva.

Yaubada yana veluga againe kilolokeku gamimiyami, ada nuwanuwaku kaliva vevine moya'aidi iya amine badi kilolokediyao hinamiyami. Tu Yaubada kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana ginuwakabubuyedi tulina tulina. Tufoidi yana veluga againe kilolokediyao himimiyami be Yaubada fa'ina hifififaisewa. Kadu tufoidi Yaubada yana veluga againe naginagidiyao himimiyami be Yaubada yana faisewa hi'abi'abina.
Tu kiloloke sikwasikwa sibauwe kadu agaimiya ganagahe. Ka'i iya keke naginagiku amine omi keke wananagi, au medema gilubodana.

Tu ka'i matami giludigadigaga be keke amifaiweya taumiyao wanahawatami au wananagi. Ka'i ai'ala'alata amine yami nuwanuwa nagi fa'ina ginatubuga-mo'a tu keke wananagi digo, medema keke gidalubodani. Tu matami giludigadigaga-mo'a fa'ina wananagi, medema gilubodana.
Tu kadu naginagimiyao agaimiya ganagahe. Keke vaita tauku yaku vehimeya, au hida Kaiwabu yana vehimeya ganalukahihiyena. Omi vevine keke wanaviholili.

Ka'i wanaviholili digo, kadu keke kaliva sa'eyana wananagini. Ka'i keke nuwanuwami amikaibe wanamiyami, au moganemi againe wanayewami be nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe wanamiyami. Kadu'e o kaliva vavine keke unakilowedi.

Tu omi velugamiyao keke wadanagitafalolo-ma agaimiya ganagahe. Higa keke vaita hida Kaiwabu yana vehimeya sa'eyana amine ganalukahihi, au iya tauku yaku gahe ganalukahihiyena. Hai kaliva Keliso uvetumaganena tu badi vavine keke hidavetumaganeni, tu nuwanuwadi o moganedi aimo buye wanamiyami, medema keke unakilowedi.
Meda anafaiweya hai kwamayoku Keliso wavetumaganena tu moganemi keke gidavetumaganeni, tu nuwanuwana omi vavinena aimo buye wanamiyami, medema keke wanaviholili.

Hai kaliva keke Keliso gidavetumaganeni tu vavinena tovetumagana. Vavinena yadi vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada moganedi givega'aulena be vaita hidanagitafalolo. Meda anafaiweya hai kwamayoku keke Keliso hidavetumaganeni tu moganedi tovetumagana. Moganedi yana vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada vavinena givega'auledi be vaita hinanagitafalolo. Hidede amine Yaubada kaliva vavinena yadi vetumagana fa'ina o ka'i kwamayoku moganedi yana vetumagana fa'ina adi'iselu givega'auledi fa'ina, natudiyao buye givega'auledi be vaita Keliso yana kaliva natudiyao hinamiyami. Ka'i tamadi o hinadi keke gidavega'auledi digo, natudiyao vaita miya-kawokawowodiyao natudiyao amine hidamiyami.

Omi kwamayoku Keliso againe wavetuvetumagana-ma wanogali! Ka'iwa, ka'i moganemi buye wanamiyami amine o, amifaiweya ase'asena wanakiviviyena be Keliso againe ginavetumagana. O ka'i o kaliva vavine buye wanamiyami amine o, ase'asedi afaiweya unakiviviyena be Keliso againe hinavetumagana.

Wa'ita dewa sa'eyana ma, hai kwanamiYuda tuwaina Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowone hitomogolohini tu Yaubada gikovana be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya giluku, medema keke ginagaluvaluva-yo ana bwaya ginasevauyeni. Hai yo'o tulidiyao kalivadi wowone keke iya'iyaya hidatomogolohini tu Yaubada gikovana be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya giluku, medema keke tova hidevama wowo ana tomogolota ginavaini.

Fa'ina ka'i iya'iyaya wowomiya gidadauda o ka'i keke gidadauda, medema keke gaitoma lakahina. Ka'i Yaubada yana vehimeya moya'aina wadibudibumuhigena o ka'i keke wadadibudibumuhigeni, medema gaitoma lakahina.
Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gava kaiwabu ka'i lakahina o kabi'ona amine tuwaina wamiyami tu Yaubada gikovami be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku, medede amine tova hidevama wanamiyami.

Kadu sa'eyana, ka'i kaliva againe wave'agetoga tu Yaubada gikovami, agetoga yadi faisewa koyona wa'abina fa'ina keke nuwami ginavita. Tu ka'i yami tovehimeya ginahawahegemi amine o, wanana taumiyao fa'imiya wanafaisewa.

Fa'ina omi agetoga yami tovehimeya yadi abavehimeya dibune wamimiyami amine, meda boi tuwaina dewa koyona yana abavehimeya dibune wamiyami. Tu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso gikovami be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku ana toveya, giyaumi be dewa koyona yana abavehimeya giyawelina. Ada au tova hidevama kaliva agaidiya wave'agetoga nonogana omi Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana kaliva yauyaugimiyao, fa'ina giyaumi be keke dewa koyona yana abavehimeya dibune wadamiyami. Meda anafaiweya omi kaliva keke tamo hakwadi againe wadave'agetoga amanadi, Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso omi gikovami be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku ana toveya, Bana againe wave'agetoga.
Yaubada fata lakahina againe gitutuvehobumi be yana kaliva ginavehimeyemi. Keke tomiyababi agaidiya wanave'agetoga be badi yami nuwanuwa hinavehimeyeni.
Tobohiyakweyao, kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gava kaiwabu ka'i lakahina o kabi'ona amine tuwaina wamiyami tu Yaubada gikovami be yana yo'o agaidiya waluku, mededemi tova adamoya Yaubada buye wanamiyami.

Tu yami toliluvaluva kilolokediyao fa'idiya ganafatana. Kaiwabu keke tamo vehimeya badi fa'idiya gidaveleku tu tauku yaku nuwanuwa ganalukahihiyena, ada Kaiwabu ginuwakabubuyeku be yana faiseweya givegideku fa'ina, amifaiweya yaku gahe wanavetumaganena.
Tova vitana ide tovetumagana agaideya giyemuyemu fa'ina, iya ganuwanuwa vaita kaliva vevine kilolokediyao hinamiyami, medema gilubodana.
Ka'i o'eni naginagi? Keke vavine unakilowedi. Ka'i keke udanagi? Au keke kwamayoku unanagini.

Tu ka'i kwamayoku unanagina digo, medema keke dewa koyona. Ada kadu ka'i kwamayoku kilolokena ginanagi, medema keke dewa koyona. Ma badi naginagidiyao vita tulina tulina hinanuhagana fa'ina, keke nuwanuwaku omi kilolokemiyao vitai-dina wananuhagani.
Tobohiyakweyao, mena yaku gahe ana kaivila hidede amine, higa hida tovai-nadi gikali'uho be babi ginayawowola. Fa'ina omi naginagimiyao Yaubada fa'ina wanafaisewa vaita omi kilolokediyao amine.

Kadu omi to'alika fa'idiya watagitagi amanadi Yaubada fa'ina wanafaisewa vaita keke yami watagiya. Kadu omi tamo gavadi fa'ina wavemwavemwamwala-ma Yaubada yana faisewa wananuwenuwena vaita keke wadavemwamwala. Kadu omi lokoloko wakimokimonena-ma Yaubada fa'ina wanafaisewa vaita yami lokoloko keke. Yaubada ana vetumagana wai ginanagona nuwamiya.
Kadu omi hida babi ana gaitoma fa'ina wafififaisewa amanadi, medema gaitomai-dina agaidiya keke nuwami wanahawahege-'owoni. Fa'ina hida babi ana gaitoma giyawoyawowola.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, keke nuwanuwaku babi ana gaitoma tulina tulina fa'idiya wanavenuwanauna. Kaliva keke naginagina Kaiwabu yana faisewa fa'ina anafaiweya tova moya'aina ginuwanuwa, fa'ina nuwanuwana Kaiwabu nuwana ginakiveyamumuna.
Tu kaliva naginagina ma tova moya'aina hida babi ana gaitoma fa'ina givenuwanauna, ada gifififaisewa be vavinena nuwadi ginakiveyamumuna fa'ina.

Ada au nuwanuwa luhei hive'asitainena, higa tova sa'eyana Yaubada fa'ine ginuwanuwa, tova sa'eyana vavinena fa'idiya ginuwanuwa. Meda anafaiweya kwamayoku kilolokena ada ulaulatanina tova moya'aina Kaiwabu yana faisewa fa'ina anafaiweya hinanuwanuwa, fa'ina nuwanuwadi wowodi kadu alu'aluwadi Kaiwabu againe hinahawahege-'owodi. Tu kwamayoku naginagidi hida babi ana gaitoma fa'ina hivenuwanauna, ada hifififaisewa be moganedi nuwana hinakiveyamumuna.
Hidede amine gagahe be higa keke vaita hawata omi agaimiya ganaseni. Omi ami veluga fa'ina gagahe be dewa tunutunugina amine wanahuluhuluva, ada Kaiwabu ana nuwanuwa'eya wanamiyami.

Tu ka'i kaliva sa'eyana gimimiyami ada nagona natuna kwamayoku gihawatana be higa keke ginanagi, tu ginuwanuwa gigayo, “Ka'i hima yaku hawata keke yamumuna fa'ina natuku nuwanuwana ginanagi tu a givevavine-lakata.” Ka'i hidede amine ginuwanuwa digo, aimo tauna. Ka'i nuwanuwana natuna kaliva againe ginahawahegena, au yamumuna. Keke vaita medema dewa koyona.

Ma ka'i tamo hakwadi tauna ginuwanuwa tu keke gidanuwanuwaluga, ada keke mali gaitoma gidavehimeyeni, au tauna anakaibe givehimeyena be higa vaita natuna kwamayoku keke ginavenagini, au medema kadu huluva hagihagina.
Fa'ina yaku nuwanuwa hidede amine, higa ka'i kaliva natuna kwamayoku ginavenagina, medema gilubodana. Ka'i kaliva natuna kwamayoku ginahawatana be keke ginanagi, medema giluboda-mo'ena.

Ka'i kilolokena digo, iya tauku ganuwanuwa vaita yana wavemwamwala ginamiyami. Ada Yaubada Alu'aluwana Tauna nuwahinagekuya we'a gimimiyami fa'ina, iya ganuwanuwa vaita Yaubada yana nuwenuweya mena nagi ana nuwanuwa galukahihiyena.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, yami toliluvaluva sa'eyana ganogalina-ma kadu ganafatana, higa kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena-ma fa'ina ganalukahihi. Mena kevakeva ana hawadavedaveya fa'ina omi wagahe wagayo, “Hida gaitoma ana nuwanuwa fa'ina ide halamanideyao.” Wagahe velemona tu wa'ita. Hai kaliva halamanina, medema nuwanuwana yana halamana fa'ina ginaselakalaka. Hai kaliva nuwana hawahawahegana, medema nuwanuwana tobohiyaneyao yadi vetumagana ginakivetubugina.
Kadu hai kaliva nuwahinagene gigahe gigayo, “Iya kaliva halamaniku,” gavaimi gilubodana be ginahalamanena-ma aimo keke gidahalamaneni.
Tu hai kaliva nuwanuwana velemo'ena Yaubada, medema fa'ine Yaubada gigayo, “Wada kalivai-nadi gahalamanena, higa bana yaku kaliva.”

E, kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena-ma fa'ina. Omi watoliluvaluva higa vaita ka'i kevakevai-nadi amifaiweya wana'ana o ka'i keke. Ahe kahalamanena Bana Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a. Keke tamo Yaubada velugana. Kadu badi kilumina ma ve'alololodiyao, keke velemo'ena yaubada ma ahe kahalamanena.
Gaitoma moya'aina lobameya kadu babiya hidadauda, ada medema gaitomai-dina fa'ina badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma higahe higayo, “Hida gaitoma yadi wafaiwala adi egana viviluwa kadu kaiwabu.”

Hidede amine badi hinuwanuwa tu ide kahalamanena keke viviluwa moya'aidi hidamiyami, au Yaubada sa'eyanaga gimimiyami, higa Tamada. Ada Bana Tamada gaitoma moya'aina gibubuna, kadu ide tovetumagana gibubuda be ana egana kanakilakahina fa'ina. Meda anafaiweya Kaiwabu sa'eyanaga gimimiyami, higa Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso. Ada Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Yesu Keliso givelena be gaitoma moya'aidi gibubudi, kadu yawaida ivaguna inubana Bana againe kavaina.

Tu keke tovetumagana moya'aidi hida vehawala Yaubada sa'eyanaga fa'ina hidahalamaneni. Tufoidi boi tuwaina malamala a gavaiyehi agaidiya hinuwanuwa vaita kilumina yaubada velemo'ediyao. Hidema fa'ina aimo tova hidevama yadi nuwanuwa hinunauwena, higa vaita kevakeva mali kaliva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena-ma hida'au'ana ana toveya, mena kevakevai-nadi againe kilumina yadi faiwala gidadauda. Ada kevakevai-nadi hi'au'a tu ase'asedi gi'a'akolukoluna. Hivaitana kilumina yadi gaitoma hi'au'ana fa'ina, adi wavita hinamiyami.

Atu gava kevakeva ka'au'ana-ma Yaubada keke gidanuwenuweni higa vaita yada'a againe Bana buye kanavetobohiyana. Ka'i keke kana'ani digo, Yaubada keke ginanuwenuweda vaita ide koyodeyao. Ka'i kana'ana digo, keke medema fa'ina kanayamumu Bana matane.

Omi mena kevakevai-nadi ana'a fa'ina halamanimiyao higa keke hawahawatana. Ka'i omi kilumina yadi manuwa-tabu againe wanaluku be wana'enolukekela wana'a, ada bana tovetumagana sa'eyana kilumina yadi kevakeva ana a'a fa'ina ase'asena gi'a'akolukoluna-ma gina'itami amine o, ginanuwanuwaluga ginagayo, “Gavaitana mena kevakeva ana'a hawahawatana tu badi tobohiyakweyao hi'au'ana fa'ina, ka'i iya akufaiweya gana'ana.” Ka'i omi mene wanuwanuwa vaita yami'a againe tobohiyami yana vetumagana wadakivetubugini? Keke, keke-mo'a!

Wanogali! Kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena-ma kevakeva-kawowo ma wahalamanena. Tu tobohiyami tovetumagana kowakowana ma omi tovetumagana halamanimiyao yami'a give'u'ulena be ana ayauna vaita kevakevai-nadi ana'a dewa koyona tu au ai'adi gi'ana, ada au omi agaimiya agolaufofola ana eda ginuhagana, bana kalivai-nadi ana kibababala fa'ina Keliso gi'alika amanadi.
Ka'i hidede amine tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wakoyo, ada ase'asedi matamatauhina wakivekoyodi amine, keke badi'iyaogaga agaidiya wadakoyo, au Keliso againe wakoyo, fa'ina badi Keliso yana kaliva.

Keke nuwanuwaku Keliso againe ganakoyo fa'ina, ganahawataku. Ka'i mena kevakevai-nadi gana'au'ana againe tobohiyakweyao koyona againe ganavebe'udi digo, keke tamo tova kevakeva gana'u'ani-yo tobohiyakweyao koyona againe ganavebe'udi.

Ka'i mali kaliva hinanuwanuwa vaita iya keke afositolo velemo'ena, au ai'adi. Omi'iyao ma iya afositolo velemo'ena ma wahalamanena. Tova adamoya Kaiwabu againe wamiyamiyave'avina fa'ina, omi iya afositolo yaku faisewa ana iya'iyaya.
Kaliva hi'awalaveku vaita iya keke afositolo velemo'ena againe, au hidede amine tauku galugolegoleku.

Tu afositolo yaku abavehimeya fa'ina ganagahe. Banabasi iya'eku ama'iselu Kaiwabu yana tofaisewa. Badi tovetumagana agaidiya alumamala be adi veluga hinuhagana amanadi, ka'i amaga ama kevakeva ama bwai yadi velekawowo againe anakimonena o ka'i keke? Ayoma, amafaiweya anakimonena, fa'ina mema yama faisewa fatana.

Badi afositolo velugadiyao kadu Kaiwabu Yesu tobohiyaneyao badi vavinediyao vetuvetumaganidiyao yadi nuwaliliuga againe buye hinunudadanedi. Kadu afositolo lakahina Fita vavinena vetuvetumaganidi ginunudadanedi. E, badi afositolo-dina vavinediyao buye hinunudadanedi be tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina kaliva yadi vevine buye hi'ita'itave'avidi. Badi yadi vevine buye hinunuwaliliuga tu ka'i omi wavaita ama'iseluga yama vevine hidamiya? Keke, au badi buye ananunudadanedi.

Badi afositolo velugadiyao tovetumagana yadi velekawowo againe himimiyami. Ka'i Banabasi iya'eku ama'iseluga taumeyao nimameya anafifaisewa-yo fatama againe amaga ama kevakeva ama kaleko anakimoneni? Keke-mo'a. Ka'i nuwanuwama digo, kadu ime amafaiweya velekawowo againe anamiyami.

Wa'ita, tolugaviya keke taudiyao adiga o adi kaleko hidakimoneni, keke. Meneva'ama kabemani hiveleveledi. Ka'i kaliva yana otova ginafahani-yo mali kaliva ginayaudi-kawowo? Keke-mo'a. Tauna tonifaha ginayaudi. Kaliva yana sifi give'ave'adi ka'i mali kaliva-kawowo adi loi hina'a? Keke-mo'a. Tauna tonive'a unumina buye hina'a.
Mena yaku gahe ma keke kalivagaga yada nuwanuwa, au Yaubada yana vehimeya againe meda anafaiweya gigahe.
E, Yaubada yana buki-vehimeya Mosese gi'etoladina-ma againe gigahe gigayo,
Bulumakau witi givagavagakolukoluna againe, keke gidalubodani be muduna bulava againe wanahifobodani
higa keke tamo gavadi gina'ani fa'ina.

Ka'i Yaubada bulumakaugaga ginuwenuwena? Keke-mo'a. Makewa'e ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa fa'imeya ginuwanuwa fa'ina medede amine gigahe, ada gahe-nadi Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda. Bulumakau yana faisewa fa'ina a'a gi'au'a amine, meda ime yama faisewa tovetumagana fa'idiya fatama higa amaga ama kevakeva ama kaleko ama gava'adi hidavelema. Wa'ita, babi ana to'aikeyova kadu witi ana to'aitalaga faheya hififaisewa ana toveya, gilubodadi be hinafifaisewa tu hinanuwanuwave'avina vaita a'a ana folaka againe badi buye hinavaina.
Meda anafaiweya ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa Bana bonana alu'aluwamiya afahana fa'ina, makewa'e gilubodana be a'a kaleko gavadi gavadi nuwanuwama wowoma fa'ina medema omi agaimiya anavaina.

Yami tovehawala velugadiyao a'a kevakeva lokoloko waveleveledi. Ka'i badi hidedemi lakahina wavelugadi, wadanuwanuwa be ime Yaubada bonana agaimiya amidilumamalena be Yesu Keliso yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku-ma wadavelugama lakahi-mo'ena. Gilubodama be ama veluga agaimiya adavaina tu keke tamo nimamiya adave'o'olemi, keke. Mafulauga agotaina vita moya'aina a'atuvefa'ilena be higa keke kaliva Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Yesu Keliso fa'ine hinakiloweni. Keke nuwanuwama kaliva hinanuwanuwa vaita yadi faha o yadi lokoloko anavaini fa'ina adalulaumamala, be medema fa'ina Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hinakiloweni.
Meda anafaiweya Kaiwabu givehimeya be yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana tolaumamala adiga adi kevakeva yadi lokoloko Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana tovanenega agaidiya hinavaina.

Tu iya'eku ma tauku gahawataku be hida tolaumamala fatama Yaubada givehimeyena-ma keke-mo'a omi agaimiya gadavaini. Ada keke hidede amine yami leta gada'etoladini be higa mena gaitomai-dina gayakahina-ma wanaveleku fa'ina, keke. Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya galumamalena tu keke tamo aku laufata nimamiya gadavaini. Hidedema fa'ina gagakahikahi. Ka'i omi agaimiya akuga aku kevakeva gadavaina digo, mena yaku gakahikahi inubana wadayawelina. Auwe, ka'i mafu ginalauku be gana'alika, medema gilubodaku.

Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galulumamalena fa'ina, keke akufaiweya aku egana ganakilakahini. Fa'ina Yaubada hida faisewa giveleku, keke tauku gadavaini. Ka'i gadadibutoyoga be keke Venuwa'ata Yamumuna gadalumamaleni digo, vita lakahina Yaubada nimane gadanuhagana.
Ka'i iya tauku hida faisewa gadavaina digo, gilubodana be aku laufata gadanuhagana. Tu keke tauku gadavaini, fa'ina Yaubada givegideku be faisewa giveleku.

Au mema aku laufata gavaiya'amine? Me laufata hidede amine, higa gavemwamwala fa'ina Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galulumamalena againe, keke tovanenega agaidiya akuga aku kevakeva o ka'i tamo mani gadave'o'ola. Mena gaitomai-dina yaku laumamala fatana akufaiweya ganavaina, tu tauku gahawataku be keke ganavaini. Hida yaku vemwamwala au aku laufata.

Keke tamo hakwadi againe laufata gadavivaini fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginavehimeyeku. Au iya tauku gavehivehimeyeku. Tu gahuluhuluva vaita kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya gadave'agetoga be mena yaku veluga againe tufoidi moya'aidi Yesu Keliso againe gananuwa'abiyedi.

Ka'i miYuda agaidiya gamiyami amine, miYuda yama dewa amine gahuluhuluva be nuwadi ganakiveyamumuna, ada Yesu Keliso againe gananuwa'abiyedi fa'ina. Ada iya keke Mosese yana vehimeya dibune gadamiyami tu gahuluhuluva vaita vehimeyai-nadi dibune gadamiyami be badi mena vehimeyai-nadi dibune himimiyami-ma Yesu Keliso againe gananuwa'abiyedi fa'ina.

Ka'i yo'o tulidiyao Yaubada yana vehimeya keke hidahalamaneni-ma agaidiya gamiyami amine, iya kwanamiYuda nonogana yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina yadi dewa amine gahuluhuluva be nuwadi ganavaina ada Yesu Keliso againe gananuwa'abiyedi fa'ina. Mena yaku dewa ma keke vaita Yaubada yana vehimeya gadadibutoyogeni. Au Keliso yana vehimeya dibune gamimiyami.

Kadu ka'i badi yadi vetumagana keke toyogina tu tova moya'aina dewa tulina tulina fa'ina ase'asedi gimatamatauta-ma agaidiya gamiyami amine, iya gahuluhuluva vaita badi amine yaku vetumagana keke toyogina, ada mena dewai-nadi fa'ina himatamatauta-ma keke gadahuluvini. Badi'iyao amine gahuluhuluva be yadi vetumagana Yesu Keliso againe ganakivetoyogina fa'ina. Nuwanuwaku kaliva vevine moya'aidi Yesu Keliso againe gananuwa'abiyedi fa'ina, yadi dewa o yadi nuwanuwa tulina tulina amine gahuluhuluva be ka'i tufoidi adi kibababala hinanuhagana.

Tova moya'aina hidedemi gahuluhuluva be Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya ginanauna, ada badi yaku laumamala ana tovanenega amine kadu iya Yaubada yana nuwakabubu gananuhagana fa'ina.

Badi tomadu nuwanuwadi wai hinanagona-ma taudiyao hi'ita'itave'avidi. Keke hidamiyamiya-kawowo, au yadi'a yadida yadi maduluvaluva ana vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina. Hidede amine taudiyao hi'ita'itave'avidi be ve'amadu ana toveya tomaduhega ana badau kikaiwabuna hinavaina. Mena badau gaitoma havahavaina fa'ina ginamadubou. Tu ide Yaubada yana eda againe kavedivediwe be badau miyamiya-vagahina kanavaina.

Nuwanuwaku mena badau-nadi ganavaina fa'ina keke gadamadumadu-kawowo, keke. Yaubada yana eda againe gamadumadu tunutunugina. Tutu'ubu'ubu againe kaliva sa'eyana mali kaliva wowona gina'ubu-hagihagiyena tu keke gidatutukakamini amine, iya Yaubada yana faisewa gafififaisewa-hagihagiyena.

We'owe'o katafitafidi be gahe hinavenogalena amine, wowoku gatafitafina be alu'aluwaku ana gahe ginavenogalena. Keke nuwanuwaku mali kaliva Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina galumamaledi-ma Yaubada yana nuwakabubu hinavaini tu iya keke. Medema fa'ina wowoku gavehivehimeyena toyogina, be tova mulina Yaubada yana nuwakabubu ganavaina.
Ada buhibuhi gilifidi kadu lehaga gi'awaina-ma againe hihobu, higa vaita moya'aidi hidabafitaiso be Mosese yana abavehimeya againe hinahawahegedi.
Babigaga againe a'a keke, gufa keke tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana bwanenedeyao moya'aidi a'a ana egana mana giveledi be hi'a-'owoga.
Ada moya'aidi Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana gufa hiyu-'owoga, fa'ina kuga againe gikivefoluna be hiyuna. Kugai-nadi vaita Keliso amine, ada ha'amine ha'amine hinauna Bana givebwa'uliyedi be giveyudi.

Tu Yaubada mena a'ai-nadi be gufai-nadi giveledi nonogana, tufoidi moya'aidi yadi dewa koyona againe Yaubada nuwana hikivekoyona. Fa'ina Yaubada giluyaweyawelidi be luludi babigaga matatabuna againe gi'iyauyaulena.
Atu mena gaitomai-nadi higa adi matahiwadi aba'ita ide fa'ideya, higa halamana kanavaina be badi gaitoma hawahawatana ma hi'italuvadigena amine ide keke kana'italuvadigeni.
Badi kilumina agaidiya hi'odu'odu amine, omi keke wanahuluvini. Badi yadi dewa fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Badi miIsileli hivetoga be a'a hi'au'a bwai hiyuyu tu
himidi be hivagavaga kilumina hihawadavadavana.

Badi tova moya'aina hihuluhuluva koyona amine, ide keke dewa koyona moya'aina agaidiya Kaiwabu yana atuvefa'ila kanagaluvaluvani. Tufoidi moya'aidi yadi dewa koyona againe Kaiwabu yana atuvefa'ila higaluvaluvana fa'ina, oloto koyodi hiyovadi be hi'alika.
Badi Yaubada againe hi'alawoluwolu amine, omi keke wana'alawoluwolu. Tufoidi moya'aidi yadi alawoluwolu fa'ina, Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata gi'iveninisena be giluyaweyawelidi.
Hai kaliva unuwanuwa ugayo, “Yaubada gavetumaganena toyogina fa'ina, keke koyona againe ganabe'u,” medema tauni ya dewa uda'itave'avina be keke unabe'u fa'ina.

Vita tulina tulina omi agaimiya gilakayemu-ma, keke vaita omi'iyaogaga agaimiya gidalakayemu. Kaliva vevine moya'aida agaideya gilakayemu. Tu Yaubada gigaheda vaita vita ana toveya ginalemeda. Hidedemi gigahe fa'ina yana leme amifaiweya wanavetumaganena. Vita toyogina gifaiwalahegemi-ma ginahawatana be keke koyona againe wanabe'u fa'ina. Aladibidibi agaimiya ginalakayemu againe, Yaubada yana leme ginavelemi be amifaiweya wana'atuvefa'ilena. Eda higa aba'ota ginavehawalemi be mena aladibidibi wana'otayabuyabuna.
Siule tobohiyakweyao, mena abakivetuvetunu wavaina fa'ina, nuwanuwaku lakahina kilumina wanavekwaulaugedi be keke wanahawadavadavadi.
Omi vaita kaliva halamanimiyao agaimiya gagahegahe. Omi keke tagatagakulumiyao fa'ina, omi taumiyao yaku gahe wananuwenuwena be wanahalamanena ka'i velemona o fwaya amine galukahihi.

Wa'ita, sakalameni kavaina againe, gufa wagowana fa'ina Yaubada againe kavesiule higa yana nuwakabubu ide agaideya givetalaiyena. Gufa kayuna againe, au vaita moya'aida Keliso dayagina kadayuni be ide Keliso buye kavedayaga ma kaseyemaunena. Meda anafaiweya a'a kakihinena amanadi. A'a ka'ana againe vaita moya'aida Keliso wowona kada'ani be ide Keliso buye kavevido ma kaseyemaunena. Higa a'a sa'eyanaga fa'ina, ide moya'aideyao nonogana ada yo'o sa'eyanaga, fa'ina moya'aida mena a'a sa'eyanaga againe ka'au'a.

Kadu'e miIsileli yadi dewa wananuwenuwena. Yadi abaveyao ka'i kevakeva o a'a Yaubada yana atudidigeya hiseni-yo hi'ana. Kevakeva o a'a atudidigeya hihawadavadavayena-ma hi'ana fa'ina, Yaubada ana hawadavadava againe yadi vetobohiyana hiseyemaunena.

Mena yaku gahe gavaiya'amine ana nuwanuwa? Me keke vaita gadagahe kilumina gaitoma lakahina, o ka'i kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena-ma gaitoma lakahina, keke. Kilumina au gaitoma-kawowo, kadu mena kevakevai-nadi gaitoma-kawowo.

Yaku nuwanuwa ma badi kaliva Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni amanadi kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena medema balauma agaidiya hihawadavadavayena, keke Yaubada againe. Kevakeva balauma agaidiya hihawadavadavayena fa'ina keke nuwanuwaku wana'ani be balauma buye wanavetobohiyana.

Keke amifaiweya Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana gowa wanayuyena kadu balauma yadi gowa seyaseya'aine wanayuyeni. Keke amifaiweya Kaiwabu yana tolameya a'a wana'ani, kadu balauma yadi tolameya a'a seyaseya'aine wana'ani. Keke amifaiweya Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana kadu balauma ana vetumagana buye wanave'atutamo'aini.
Wanogali! Keke Kaiwabu ana vetumagana kadu balauma ana vetumagana wanave'atutamo'aini be Kaiwabu wana'ive'ago'ugani. Ka'i Bana'e gifaiwalahegeda-ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o keke?

Tu tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, “Keke tamo gavadi hawahawatana iya fa'ikuya. Au dewa moya'aina akufaiweya.” Au gigahe velemona tu keke dewa moya'aina agaidiya yamumu kananuhagani. E, adafaiweya kanagahe kanagayo, “Dewa moya'aina Yaubada keke gidahawatani-ma adafaiweya kanahuluvina,” tu ka'i dewa tufona kanahuluvina amine keke yada vetumagana Keliso againe ginatubuga.
Keke taumiyaogaga yami yamumu fa'ina wananuwanuwa. Au tobohiyamiyao buye fa'idiya wananuwanuwa.

Tu omi taumiyao fa'imiya ma hidemi wananuwanuwa. Kevakeva o a'a gavadi gavadi abakimokimone againe gidadauda-ma amifaiweya wanakimonena be wana'ana. Keke kaliva agaidiya wanatoliluvaluva wanagayo, “Ka'i hida kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena o ka'i keke?” Keke hidede amine wanatoliluvaluva be higa ase'asemi wana'ivematauhina. Au wanakimone wana'a.
Fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Hida babi kadu gaitoma moya'aidi babiya himimiyami-ma au Kaiwabu yana giba.
Gaitoma moya'aidi Kaiwabu yana giba fa'ina, keke tamo kevakeva o a'a hawahawatana, au wana'ana.

Atu ka'i kaliva sa'eyana keke Yesu Keliso againe gidavetumagana-ma ginayowanimi be buye wana'a ada nuwanuwami bana againe wanana digo, wanana be gavadi kevakeva o a'a matamiya ginasena medema wana'ana. Keke kaliva againe wanatoliluvaluva wanagayo, “Ka'i hida kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena o ka'i keke?” Keke hidede amine wanatoliluvaluva be higa ase'asemi wana'ivematauhina. Au wana'a.

Tu tobohiyamiyao yadi yamumu fa'ina hidede amine wanahuluva. Ka'i tobohiyami sa'eyana ginavenuwa'atami ginagayo, “Hida kevakeva kilumina agaidiya hihawadavadavayena,” ka'i hidedemi ginavenuwa'atami digo, keke wana'ani. Bana kalivai-nadi givenuwa'atami-ma ka'i ginuwanuwa vaita mena kevakevai-nadi yadi kilumina fa'ina hawahawatana, ada ase'asena keke wana'ivematauhini fa'ina keke wana'ani.

Keke vaita taumiyao ase'asemi ginamatauta fa'ina gadagahe. Au tobohiyami ase'asena matamatauhina fa'ina hidede amine gagahe. Tobohiyamiyao yadi yamumu fa'ina yaku kahihi au hidedemi. Tu ahe gagahemi amine, ka'i ide taudeyaogaga, au adafaiweya kevakevai-nadi kana'ana. Wa'ita iya kaliva yauyaugiku, dewa moya'aina akufaiweya. Gavadi-yo tovetumagana ase'asena matamatauhina fa'ina iya ganahuluhuluva-venuwana be higa vaita yaku huluva bana gidavehimeyeni?
Ka'i akuga o aku kevakeva fa'ina Yaubada againe ganavesiule be gana'a, gavai'ona-yo tamo hakwadi mena a'a o kevakeva ga'ana fa'ina gina'awalaveku, higa vaita gaitoma hawahawatana gada'ani?
Hida gagahe ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Gavadi gavadi kanagana, ka'i kana'au'a o kanayuyu, yada havivila moya'aina againe Yaubada ana egana kanakilakahina.
Yami dewa wana'itave'avina be keke miYuda o yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina o ka'i tovetumagana higa Yaubada yana ekelesiya koyona againe wanavebe'udi.

Meda anafaiweya yaku dewa ga'itave'avina be kaliva moya'aidi nuwadi ganakiveyamumuna. Tova moya'aina gahuluhuluva be keke tauku ganavelugaku fa'ina. Au nuwanuwaku yaku huluva moya'aina againe kaliva moya'aidi ganavelugadi ada adi kibababala hinanuhagana fa'ina.
Iya Keliso tavagine ganunudadana amine, meda anafaiweya omi iya tavagikuya wananunudadana.
Yaku gahe gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina wanuwa-nunauyena ada tovetumagana yada dewa moya'aina gavehawalemi-ma wadibudibumuhigena fa'ina gahawaveyamumuyemi.
Tu nuwanuwaku wanahalamane-hagihagiyena Bana Keliso kaliva moya'aidi yadi tovehimeya kadu kwamayoku adi tovehimeya moganedi, kadu Keliso ma ana tovehimeya Yaubada.

Hai kaliva omi miKolinita agaimiya give'ove'o'ola o ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata gi'awa'awatalatalainena tu u'una ana aikeva keke gidavehalilini, medema mali kaliva givehimeyena ma giseyemaunena ada keke ana tovehimeya Keliso gidawowomumuyeni.

Tu hai kwamayoku hive'ove'o'ola o ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata hi'awa'awatalatalainena tu u'udi keke hidakevani, medema hihuluhuluva vaita kaliva amine ada moganedi keke hidawowomumuyeni. Yada dewa ana nuwanuwa ma kwamayoku yamayamadadadi u'udi hiyamana be hidedemi udo ana aituha hiseyemaunena amine, meda kwamayoku hitafatafalolo tu keke u'udi hidakevani-ma yadi huluva ana ita vaita yadi udo fa'ina u'udi hidayamani.

Ka'i kwamayoku hinadibutoyoga be u'udi keke hinakevani digo, u'udi hinatotona. Tu ka'i kwamayoku u'udi hinatotona o ka'i hinayamana amine, hinawowomumu lakahina higa vaita yadi udo ana iya'iyaya. Vevine manuwa-tafalolo againe u'udi hinakevana, be keke udo ana iya'iyaya amine hinaseyemauneni fa'ina.

Tu kaliva ma Yaubada Tauna anununa againe kaliva gibubuna be Yaubada yana kikaiwabu giyemaunena fa'ina, gilubodana be gitafatafalolo againe keke u'una ginakevani, ada medema againe keke mali kaliva tu Yaubada anakaibe ana tovehimeya ma ginaseyemaunena. Badi kwamayoku ma kaliva yana kikaiwabu hiyemaunena, fa'ina u'udi hinakevana, be medema againe bana kaliva adi tovehimeya ma hinaseyemaunena. Yada dewa u'uda ana ve'aikeva fa'ina ana nuwanuwa au hidede amine.
Fa'ina kaliva ma Yaubada keke kwamayoku luludiya gidabubuni. Kwamayoku kaliva lulune gibubudi.
Kadu kaliva keke kwamayoku fa'idiya gidabubudi, au kwamayoku kaliva fa'ine gibubudi.

Yaubada kwamayoku kaliva lulune gibubudi fa'ina, hitafatafalolo againe u'udi hinakevana be kaliva agevavane himimiyami ma hinaseyemaunena. Kadu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata hilulauboda fa'ina u'udi hinakevana, ada mena u'udi ana ve'aikeva againe moganedi yana abavehimeya dibune himimiyami ma ana iya'iyaya hinayemaunena.
Tu kaliva vevine Kaiwabu yana yo'ogaga agaidiya himimiyami-ma keke tulina tulina amine hinamiyami. Au kaliva vevine hinavelugadi, kadu vevine kaliva hinavelugadi.
Fa'ina boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada kwamayoku nagona kaliva lulune gibubuna amine, meda kadu tova hidevama kaliva vevine agaidiya hitubutubuga. Ada kaliva vevine gaitoma moya'aina inubadi Yaubada.
Tu taumiyao yada dewa wananuwenuwena be wanavehimeya ka'i kwamayoku sa'eyadi yo'o matadiya Yaubada againe hinave'ove'o'ola tu u'udi keke hinakevani amine, medema gilubodana o ka'i keke?
Keke gidalubodani fa'ina ide yada dewa wahalamanena, higa ka'i kaliva u'una tunugina, yana wawowomumu ginamiyami.
Tu kwamayoku ma Yaubada u'udi tunugina giveledi u'udi ana aikeva fa'ina, ada medema adi vaigau hagihagina.

Ka'i omi gaveyao nuwanuwami mena vevine yadi dewa fa'ina wanavekwageyeku digo, ganagahemi ganagayo, “Tova moya'aina ime afositolo hidede amine avehavehawala, higa vevine hinave'ove'o'ola o ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata hina'awa'awatalatalainena againe, u'udi hinakevana. Ada tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina agaidiya moya'aidi mena dewai-nadi hi'ita'itave'avina.” Au hidede amine yaku gahe.

Tu adamoya kadu vehimeya sa'eyana fa'ina ganalukahihi tu medema fa'ina keke ganahawaveyamumuyemi. Fa'ina wavagavaga'auta be Yaubada againe wanatafatafalolo ana toveya, keke ase'asemi ana leme wadanuhagani, au ase'asemi ana kivekoyo wanuhagana.

E, yaku gahe nagona ma valeyami sa'eyana ganogalina, higa tafalolo fa'ina wavagavaga'auta againe, yami kaiwabu fa'ina wave'alaudaka. Ada ganuwanuwa vaita mena valeyami ganogalina-ma tufona velemo'ena.
Fa'ina yami dewa gahalamanena tova moya'aina waveve'alaudaka, ada mena dewai-nadi againe gaveyao yadi vetumagana velemo'ena, ada keke kaiwabu fa'ina hidanuwanuwa, medema waseyemaunena.

Kadu ganagahe Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana anuwa'udu'udu fa'ina. Yada dewa ma kavaga'auta be au lakahina againe Kaiwabu kanuwa'udu'uduni tu sakalameni-mo'ena kavaina. E, mena se'eyaine wavagavaga'auta be Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana anuwa'udu'udu wana'au'ana againe, sakalameni wa'ivekoyona. Keke velemona Kaiwabu ana anuwa'udu'udu wada'u'ani.
Fa'ina kaliva vevine sa'eyana sa'eyana a'a wa'aliyena-ma taumiyao wamadu'ana tu keke tamo wadafolakeni, ada au tufoidi koyokoyo mafu gilaudi tu tufoidi wakalivadiyao hiyu-fa'ila be u'udi gikoyo.

Mene yami manuweya aba'au'a abayuyu gidadauda-ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Omi to'a-fa'ila toyu-fa'ila yami manuweya wada'a-yo wada'ela anuwa'udu'udu againe. Ka'i Yaubada yana yo'o hivaga'auta-ma ma'i wave'amohimohinedi o keke? Yana kaliva tufoidi keke wadave'amohimohinedi, fa'ina badi adiga keke ma matadiya amiga lakahina wa'au'a be wakivewowomumudi. Gavaimi ganagahe? Ka'i mena yami dewa fa'ina ganahawaveyamumuyemi? Keke, keke-mo'a!

Hi'a gihavaina, meda anafaiweya gowa givaina gigahedi gigayo, “Hida gowa ma Yaubada yana veyao ivaguna omi agaimiya gisena-ma ana iya'iyaya. Iya dayagiku omi fa'imiya ginamadu fa'ina Yaubada ginaveyaoyemi. Tova tova hida gowa wanayuyuyena againe, iya gahuluva amine omi wanahuluhuluva be wananuwa-nunauyeku fa'ina.” Hidede amine Kaiwabu Yesu gigahe.

Fa'ina tova tova hida a'a wa'au'ana kadu hida gowa wayuyuyena againe, Kaiwabu yana alika ide kaliva fa'ideya wahawavetuvetununa. E, tova moya'aina hidede amine Kaiwabu yana alika wahawahawavetuvetununa Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela ana maka.

Kaiwabu Yesu sakalameni ana nuwanuwa hidede amine gisena fa'ina, hai kaliva yana wa'ihawadamana Kaiwabu yana a'a gina'ana o yana gowa ginayuyena, medema vaita Kaiwabu wowona kadu dayagina gidakivekoyoni.
Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana ase'asemi wanatoliluveluvena be higa nuwanuwa koyona wanahegeni tu Kaiwabu yana a'a wana'ana yana gowa wanayuyena.
Fa'ina hai kaliva Kaiwabu yana a'a gi'a'a-kawowona yana gowa giyuyuye-kawowona be Kaiwabu wowona ana nuwanuwa sakalameni againe gifaniyena, medema yana'a yanayu againe matahiwadi ginavaina.
Kaiwabu wowona ana yaudi sakalameni againe wafaniyena fa'ina, tufoimi moya'aimi wagakowakowa kadu wa'aulolo, ada tufoimi wa'alika.
Tu ka'i taudeyao ase'aseda kadatoliluveluvena be nuwanuwa koyona kadahegena sakalameni ana toveya, au Kaiwabu keke gidavedewayaugida-yo matahiwadi gidaveleda.

Tu tova tova Kaiwabu givedevedewayaugida ada matahiwadi giveleveleda be higa kanahagavilada, ada ide ada egana keke gina'ivebwavini fa'ina. E, matahiwadi giveleveleda be tomiyababi Kaiwabu Yesu keke hidavetumaganeni-ma Yaubada adi egana gina'ivebwavina amine, kadu ide ada egana keke gina'ivebwavini.

Hai kaliva mafu gilauna, medema tauna yana manuweya gida'a-yo gida'ela. Ka'i Kaiwabu ana anuwa'udu'udu againe tufoimi wana'a-fa'ila o wanayu-fa'ila tu tufoimi amiga keke fa'ina wanawowomumu, au mena yami vaga'auta koyona fa'ina ami matahiwadi Yaubada nimane wananuhagana. Hidema fa'ina yami manuweya wana'a-yo wana'ela be keke matahiwadi wananuhagani. Tu nuwanuwa tufona aimo gidadauda ma omi agaimiya gana'ela-yo medema fa'ina ganakivetuvetunumi.
Siule tobohiyakweyao miKolinita, Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tulina tulina fa'ina ganakivetuvetunumi. Nuwanuwaku Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala inubana wanahalamane-hagihagiyena.
Wa'itana, boi tuwaina aimo Yaubada keke wadahalamaneni ana toveya, balauma yadi abavehimeya dibune wamiyami. Mena balaumai-dina ma keke wa'awadi. Ada Setani ginuwa'abiyemi be wavetuvetumaganedi.

Boi tuwaina balauma wahawadavadavadi tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina keke wadahalamaneni fa'ina, nuwanuwaku ganakivetuvetunumi higa hai kaliva Yesu gina'alatabutabuyena ginagayo, “Yaubada Yesu ginaluyawelina,” medema Alu'aluwa Mahalina keke gida'alaveleveleni. Kadu hai kaliva ginagahe ginagayo, “Yesu au Kaiwabu velemo'ena,” medema keke tauna yana nuwenuweya anafaiweya hidedemi ginagahe, au Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana kivetuvetunu againe hidedemi gigahe.
Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tulina tulina tu abavetalai-dina adi tovetavetala ma au sa'eyanaga higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina.
Kaiwabu fa'ine faisewa tulina tulina kafififaisewa tu yada tovehimeya ma au sa'eyanaga, higa Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso.
Yaubada faiwala tulina tulina giveleveleda be yana faisewa kafififaisewa, tu ide yana tofaisewa sa'eyana sa'eyana yada faiwala inubana au sa'eyanaga higa Yaubada.

E, Alu'aluwa Mahalina tovetumagana sa'eyana sa'eyana giluvaiyeda-yo yana abavetala givetavetalaiyena. Kaliva sa'eyana againe nuwahuya givetalaiyena be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa fa'ina gikikivetuvetunu. Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe halamana tulina tulina givetalaiyena be gavadi gavadi Yaubada nuwanuwana ide kanahalamanena, medema gihawahawavemogatalena.

Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe vetumagana toyogina givetalaiyena be gavaimi Yaubada gaitoma lakahina ginafaisewani, medema fa'ina ginavetumaganena. Ada kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe faiwala sa'eyana givetalaiyena be anafaiweya to'aulolo ginasisiveyawadi.

Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe faiwala givetalaiyena be aituha fifiwalana tulina tulina ginafifaisewana. Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gitunevehabalutugina be gina'awa'awatalatalainena. Kadu sa'eyana againe nuwave'uve'u mena gahe inubana fa'ina givetalaiyena, higa inubana ka'i Yaubada againe giyemu o ka'i balauma agaidiya o kaliva tauna alu'aluwane giyemu ma anafaiweya ginahawavemogatalena. Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe meya tulina tulina givetalaiyena, higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'ala'alavelevelena amine kaliva meya tuline gilulukahihi. Kadu kaliva sa'eyana againe mena meya tulina tulina ana kaivila givetalaiyena be gavaimi tobohiyana gilukahihiyena-ma ginakivilana.
Tu mena abavetala tulina tulina ana tovetavetala ma au sa'eyanaga higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina, ada Bana Tauna givehimeya amine yana abavetala kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana agaideya givetavetalaiyena.

Fa'ina Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe tovetumagana moya'aida gikivebafitaisoyeda be Keliso yana yo'o sa'eyanaga againe kaluku, higa Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida fa'ina ide vaita Keliso wowona amine kamimiyami. Tufoida miYuda ada tufoida yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina, kadu tufoida agetoga ada tufoida taudeyao yada faisewa kavehimeyena, tu Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gikivebafitaisoyeda, kadu mena Alu'aluwana sa'eyanaga againe giveyuda be gibababalida fa'ina moya'aideyao kavesa'eya.
Tu kaliva talaina keke sa'eyanaga au tulina tulina.
Ka'i kaliva agena gidagahe gidagayo, “Iya keke kaliva nimana fa'ina, iya keke kaliva talaina,” ka'i hidede amine gidagahe digo, medema gahe-kawowo fa'ina mena agena aimo kaliva wowone gidadauda.

Kadu ka'i kaliva tagana gidagahe gidagayo, “Iya keke kaliva matana fa'ina, iya keke kaliva talaina,” ka'i hidede amine gidagahe digo, medema kadu gahe-kawowo fa'ina mena tagana aimo kaliva wowone gidadauda.
Ka'i wowoda matadaga, bona ana nogala gavaiya'amine? Kadu ka'i wowoda tagadaga, gavaiya'amine magana kadayauni?

Tu Yaubada keke hidede amine wowoda gidabubuni. Au wowoda talaina tulina tulina gisedi. Tauna givehimeya amine wowoda talaina moya'aina gisedi. Meda anafaiweya kaliva vevine sa'eyana sa'eyana Yesu Keliso againe wavetumagana-ma Keliso wowona talaina tulina tulina gisemi.
Ka'i wowoda talaina sa'eyanaga, ka'i matadaga o tagadaga, au keke wowoda velemo'ena.
Tu Yaubada wowoda keke medede amine gidabubuni, keke matadaga o tagadaga amine gidabubuda. Au wowoda talaina moya'aina gibubuna tu wowoda au sa'eyana gibubuna.

Wa'ita, kaliva matana keke anafaiweya kaliva nimana againe anafaiweya ginagahe ginagayo, “Keke nuwanuwaku o'eni, tauku akufata.” Meda anafaiweya kaliva u'una keke agena againe anafaiweya ginagahe ginagayo, “Keke nuwanuwaku o'eni, tauku akufata.”
Au talaida vaita yadi faisewa kabi'ona ma ka'i keke wowodeya gidadauda, keke ada ayauna yamumuna kadamiyami.
Ada talaida tufona vaita ana ita keke yamumuna matadeya ma kavivigauyena, kadu nagoda keke nuwanuwada kaliva hina'itani-ma hiviga o doki againe kakevakevana.

Ma talaida ana ita fa'ina keke kadawowomumu-ma keke kadakevani. Tu Bana Yaubada wowoda givebubutamo'aina againe, talaida keke yamumuna o keke lakahina matadeya ma gisena be ada ayauna giveleda, ada mena talai-dana kana'itave'avi-hagihagiyena fa'ina.

Ada Yaubada hidede amine talaida givebubutamo'aina be keke ginaduvavehaila, au se'eyaine ginadauda be buye ginave'aveluveluga. Meda anafaiweya omi Keliso wowona talaina give'atutamo'aimi be keke wanamiyavehaila, au yami nuwanuwa leleleya wanamiyami be buye wanave'aveluveluga.
Ka'i talaida sa'eyana gina'aulolo, talaida moya'aina buye hina'aulolo. Ka'i tamo hakwadi talaida sa'eyana ginahawavelakahiyena, talaida moya'aina adi ayauna ginayamumu.
Ma Keliso wowona medema ide tovetumagana ada yo'o. Ada Yaubada faisewa tulina tulina yana yo'o kalivai-dina agaidiya gifolakena. Yana vegida hidede amine.
Faisewa kikaiwabu-mo'ena ma afositolo, badi Keliso yana
kabu hivaina be bonana hinawahidadanena kalivai-dina.
Anavelu ma yana venuwa'ata ana to'awatalatalaina.
Anaveto ma yana nuwanuwa ana tovehawala.
Kadu'e aituha fifiwalana ana tofaisewa,
kadu to'aulolo adi tosiveyawa,
fanifanidiyao adi toveluga,
tovetumagana yadi faisewa o yadi miyami ana tovehimeya,
meya tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alaveleveledi-ma ana tolukahihi.
Au hidede amine Yaubada yana vegida.

Yaubada wowoda ka'i matadaga o tagadaga amine keke gidabubuda. Meda anafaiweya ide Keliso wowona ma keke moya'aida faisewa sa'eyanaga gidaveleda. Yaubada keke afositolo yadi faisewa yana kaliva moya'aidi gidaveledi, au tufoidiga. Keke yana kaliva moya'aidi gidatunevehabalutugidi-yo yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina hida'awa'awatalatalaineni. Keke moya'aidi gidavegidedi be yana nuwanuwa fa'ina hinakikivetuvetunu. Keke moya'aidi faiwala gidaveledi be adifaiweya aituha fifiwalana hinafifaisewani.

Kadu keke yana kaliva moya'aidi faiwala sa'eyana gidaveledi be to'aulolo hinasisiveyawadi, au tufoidiga. Alu'aluwa Mahalina keke yana kaliva moya'aidi meya tulina tulina gida'alaveleveledi-yo hidalulukahihi. Keke yana kaliva moya'aidi mena bona meya tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina tobohiyadiyao gi'alaveleveledi-ma adifaiweya hinakivilani.

Yaubada keke kaliva sa'eyanaga mena faisewa matatabuna gidavele-'owoni fa'ina, au Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala wai hinagona-ma yami wa'idibumuhiga wanaleledi. Tu eda sa'eyana abavetalai-dina gikaiwabuhegedi-ma ganavehawalemi, ada edai-nadi ana egana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana.

Ka'i adafaiweya tomiyababi meyadi tulina tulina agaidiya kanalukahihi kadu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata meyadiya kanalukahihi tu'ena nuwanuwa hawahawahegana keke ase'asedeya gidadauda digo, yada gahe keke yamumuna. Au yada lukahihi vaita modawa hidalulubwekobwekoni, o ka'i vaita hiulega hidayuyuvedamadamani amine.

Ka'i adafaiweya Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina kana'awatalatalainena, ada adafaiweya Yaubada yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana kanahalamane-'owona, ada ka'i adafaiweya nuwahuya moya'aina kanavaina, ada ka'i yada vetumagana lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina adafaiweya oya kanaluya'alidi be hinahavivila, e ka'i mena gaitomai-dina moya'aina adafata tu'ena nuwanuwa hawahawahegana keke ase'asedeya gidadauda digo, ide vaita iyohoyoho amine.

Ka'i yada lokoloko matatabuna kanafolakena, ada wowoda kanahawahegena be kaliva hinakivekoyona higa vaita taudeyao ada egana kanakilakahina, tu'ena nuwanuwa hawahawahegana keke ase'asedeya gidadauda digo, yada folaka o wowoda ana hawahega fa'ina keke ada laufata hagihagina kananuhagani, keke-mo'a!
Hai kaliva nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asene gidadauda, medema keke tobohiyaneyao ginakivewowomumudi, keke gina'amaumaula, keke ginahawalumagibou, keke tobohiyaneyao yadi koyona ginanuwave'avini.
Hai kaliva nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asene gidadauda, medema tobohiyaneyao yadi huluva koyona againe keke ginavemwamwala atu yadi huluva yamumuna againe au ginavemwamwala.

Hai kaliva nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asene gidadauda, medema tobohiyaneyao yadi koyona moya'aina gi'atu'atuvefa'ilena, keke yo'o matadiya gidahawavemogataleni. Au tova moya'aina tobohiyaneyao fa'idiya ginuwanuwa vaita hinahuluva yamumuna keke koyona, yadi yamumu fa'ina gilulauboda, e vita moya'aina agaidiya gi'ase'asevatu.

Nuwanuwa hawahawahegana miyamiya-vagahina au keke gina'awowolini. Tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala medema aimo gina'awowolidi. Wa'ita, venuwa'ata tulina tulina ana awatalatalaina aimo tova mulina ginayawowola. Kadu meya tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alaveleveleda-ma ana lukahihi againe kana'ilova. Kadu halamana tulina tulina ana hawavemogatala ginahavaina. E, mena Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala gayakahidi-ma ginahavaidi tu nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ginamiyamiya-vagata.

Fa'ina tova adamoya halamana Yaubada giveleveleda-ma hinafanaga kahalamanena, Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina tabonaga ka'awatalatalainena, tu tova mulina Yaubada nuwanuwa velemo'ena inubane be tabone ginahawavemogatale-'owona, ada nuwanuwa tufonaga tova adamoya gidadauda-ma ginayawowola.
Wa'ita, iya kabi'okuya yaku gahe aku ayauna yaku nuwanuwa moya'aina kwanawe'owe'o amine. Tu tova adamoya a gavekaliva-lakata fa'ina kwanawe'owe'o yana huluva ganuyabuyabuna.

Meda anafaiweya tova adamoya ide vaita kwamana kabi'ona amine keke Yaubada yana gaitoma kada'ita'ita-hagihagiyeni, au ka'ita'ita-howehowena. Tova mulina matada ginamahalina be Yaubada buye kanave'amagigi'ita'ita. Tova adamoya tufonaga gahalamanena. Tova mulina Yaubada ase'aseku gihalamane-'owona amine, iya gaitoma moya'aina ganahalamane-'owona.

Tobohiyakweyao, Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetalai-dina ginayawowola, tu gaitoma tohiye miyamiya-vagahidi, higa yada vetumagana Yaubada againe, yada lulauboda aimo Yaubada ide fa'ideya gavaimi ginaga-ma fa'ina, yada nuwanuwa hawahawahegana moya'aidi agaidiya. Atu nuwanuwa hawahawahegana gaitoma luhei gitubuhegedi.

Hidede amine gagahe fa'ina hai kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline gi'alaveleveleni-yo gilulukahihi, medema keke kaliva agaidiya gidalulukahihi, au Yaubada againe gilulukahihi. Fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi kaliva yana gahe meya tulina againe gidahalamaneni. Bana Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'ala'alavelevelena amine Yaubada yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana meya tuline gilulukahihiyena.

Tu hai kaliva Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gitunevehabalutugini-yo gi'awa'awatalatalainena, medema kaliva agaidiya gilulukahihi be yadi vetumagana ginatubuga fa'ina. E, kaliva agaidiya gilulukahihi be ginalu'ageyedi, ase'asedi ginakivevatuna.

Bana kalivai-nadi Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alavelevelena be meya tuline gilulukahihi, medema tauna yana vetumagana gikivetubugina, tu bana kalivai-nadi Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina Alu'aluwana gitunevehabalutugini-yo gi'awa'awatalatalainena, medema tovetumagana ami yo'o moya'aimi yami vetumagana gikivetubugina.

Iya nuwanuwaku Alu'aluwa Mahalina moya'aimi meya tulina tulina gina'alavelevelemi be agaidiya wanalulukahihi. Ma nuwanuwaku lakahi-mo'ena Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina ginatunevehabalutugimi-yo wana'awa'awatalatalainena. Bana kaliva Yaubada yana venuwa'ata gi'awatalatalainena-ma, bana kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline gi'alaveleveleni-yo gilukahihi-ma gikaiwabuhegena. Tu ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana hawavemogatala againe mena bona meya tuline gilukahihiyena-ma ginakivilana, medema au gilubodana, fa'ina medede amine tovetumagana ami yo'o moya'aimi yami vetumagana ginakivetubugina.

Tobohiyakweyao, omi agaimiya gana'ela ana toveya, ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tulina tulina gina'alaveleveleku be agaidiya ganalulukahihi digo, keke ganavelugami, keke-mo'a. Tu ka'i Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gitunevehabalutugiku-ma gana'awatalatalainena digo, mena yaku gahe againe ganavelugami. O ka'i gavadi Yaubada nuwanuwana omi wanahalamanena, medema ganavehawalemi amine o, kadu mena yaku gahe againe ganalememi.

Au gaitoma tohiye meya tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alavelevelemi-ma ana aba'ita ganalukahihiyena. Hida kulele modawa ma wa'agodi tu keke yawayawadiyao. Ka'i kaliva yana kulele ginayuvedamadamana, tovanenega gava kweli giyuveyuvena-ma keke hinahalamaneni. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana yana modawa ginalulubwekobwekona, tovanenega gava kaiwesi gikalikalini-ma keke hinahalamaneni. Kadu'e, ka'i hiulega hinayuyuvedamadamana, tolugaviya gaviya fa'ina keke hinakidewadewa.
Meda anafaiweya omi'iyao. Ka'i meyami ginadaludalu, keke tamo hakwadi yami gahe ana ihi ginahalamaneni. Au yami gahe vaita bolimana butuna amine.
Tomiyababi bona tulina tulina agaidiya a gavaiyehi hilulukahihi, ada mena bonai-dina keke butudiga, au adi kaivila gidadauda.

Ma ka'i tamo kaliva bona sa'eyana againe ginalukahihi tu ana kaivila keke gadahalamaneni au butunaga digo, bana kalivai-nadi vaita hawahawala bonana tulina amine iya matakuya, kadu iya vaita hawahawala amine bana matane, ada yama gahe againe keke adave'aveluveluga.

Meda anafaiweya omi'iyao. Hai bona ana kaivila kaliva hihalamanena, medema wanalukahihiyena.
