Omi nuwanuwami lakahina Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tulina tulina wanavaina fa'ina, hadema abavetala agaidiya amifaiweya tovetumagana ami yo'o yadi vetumagana wanakivetubugina, medema abavetalai-dina wanalele-hagihagiyedi.

Ka'i nuwanuwada kaliva vevine yadi vetumagana kanakivetubugina, hidede amine kanahuluva. Hai kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline gi'alaveleveleni-yo gilulukahihi, medema Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala fa'ina ginave'o'ola be yana gahe ana kaivila fa'ina tovetumagana anafaiweya ginakivetuvetunudi.
Ka'i Alu'aluwa Mahalina yaku ve'o'ola meya tuline gina'alaveleveleku, alu'aluwaku give'ove'o'ola tu nuwaku ma giduva-kawowo ada keke tobohiyakweyao gadavelugadi.

Au gavaimi ganaga? Hidede amine ganagana. Ganahawahegeku be Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline ginave'o'ola-veleveleku, tu kadu yaku nuwenuweya ganave'o'ola. Meda anafaiweya ganahawahegeku be Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline ginakwelidava-veleveleku, tu kadu ganakwelikweli-davadava yaku nuwenuweya.

Ka'i tova sa'eyana Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline ginadavavelevelemi tu tovetumagana fanifanina omi agaimiya ginaluku be buye wanatafalolo. Bana mena kaliva fanifanina fa'ina, keke anafaiweya emeni ginayakahini be mena yana ve'ehe againe bana omi buye Yaubada wanahawadavadavani. Keke anafaiweya yana ve'ehe ginayakahini, fa'ina gavaimi meya tulina againe wagahegahe-ma gifaniyena.

Ka'i wona velemona omi wavesivesiule-hagihagi, yami hawadavadava gahe yamumuna amine wayakayakahina, tu bana kaliva fanifanina yana vetumagana yami gahedavadava againe keke wadakivetubugini, fa'ina agomiga ginogalina tu ana nuwanuwa keke gidahalamaneni.
Tu Yaubada againe gavesiule, fa'ina yaku lukahihi meya tulina tulina Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alaveleveleku-ma moya'ai-mo'ena tu yami lukahihi meya tulina tulina agaidiya gitubuhegena.

Ma kaliva vevine tafalolo fa'ine hivagavaga'auta againe, keke nuwanuwaku yaku gahe meya tuline Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'alaveleveleleku-ma lauva tunugina gananunauweni, fa'ina ana kaivila kaliva keke hinahalamaneni. Ka'i yaku gahe faifi ganayakahidi kaliva adi kivetuvetunu fa'ina be agaidiya ginamahalina, medema gilubodana. Atu ka'i yaku gahe meya tuline dawani-mo'ena ganasena tu ana kaivila kaliva agaidiya keke gidamahalini, medema keke-mo'a gidalubodani.
Wa'ita, Yaubada miIsileli boi tuwai-mo'ena himiyami-ma bonadiya gilukahihiyedi tu keke hidavenogaleni. Ada badi fa'idiya Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Mali kaliva meyadi tulina tulina awadiya miIsileli ganagahedi. Nibaidiyao bonadi tulina gana'iveninisedi
be higa vaita yadi ela againe yaku nuwakoyo ganahawavemogatalena. Tu meya tulina tulina hinanogalina nonogana keke bonaku hinavenogaleni.
Hidede amine Kaiwabu gigahe. Mene omi wavaitana lukahihi meya tuline Yaubada yana nuwakabubu ana iya'iyaya, tu badi dibudibutoyogidiyao medema againe Yaubada yana nuwakoyo hinuhagana.

Wa'ita, lukahihi meya tuline Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwala ana iya'iyaya giseyemaunena keke omi tovetumagana yami kaiwabu fa'ina, au badi todibutoyoga hinanogalini-yo ase'asedi gina'akoluna fa'ina. Atu Yaubada yana venuwa'ata ana tunevehabalutuga medema keke todibutoyoga fa'idiya, au Yaubada yana nuwadoga ana iya'iyaya mena omi tovetumagana fa'imiya.

Fa'ina ka'i tovetumagana ami yo'o matatabumi wanavaga'auta ada moya'aimi meya tulina tulina agaidiya wanalulukahihi, ada ka'i tovetumagana fanifanidiyao o miya-kawokawowodiyao agaimiya hinaluku amine, hinagahe vaita wadavekabakabaleya.

Tu ka'i moya'aimi Yaubada yana venuwa'ata Alu'aluwa Mahalina gitunevehabalutugimi-ma wa'awa'awatalatalainena tu tovetumagana fanifanidiyao o miya-kawokawowodiyao agaimiya hinaluku amine, yami gahe hinanogalina againe yadi koyona nuwadi gina'afolefolena. Ada venuwa'atai-dina moya'aimi awamiya hinanogalini-yo adi vita tulina tulina ase'asediya hina'ayaunena.

Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana hawavetavetala againe wa'awatalatalaina fa'ina, yami gahe yadi nuwahinage kabu'avane ginaseyemaunena. Hidema fa'ina yadi wamatauta babiya hinabe'u ada Yaubada hinahawadavadavana hinagayo, “Wona velemona Yaubada omi hinafamiya gimimiyami.”

Siule tobohiyakweyao miKolinita, tafalolo fa'ina wavagavaga'auta ana toveya, hidede amine wanahuluva. Kaliva sa'eyana kweli ginasilakahina, sa'eyana ginamidi Yaubada bonana fa'ina ginavehawala, sa'eyana nuwanuwa Yaubada bana againe gihawavemogatalena-ma ginagaheyena, sa'eyana meya tuline Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'alavelevelena-ma ginalukahihi, kadu sa'eyana mena bona meya tuline ana kaivila ginahawavemogatalena. Gilubodami be mena huluva moya'aina againe moya'aimi yami vetumagana wanakivetubugina.

Ka'i gaveyao nuwanuwadi Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'alaveleveledi be meya tuline hinalulukahihi digo, kaliva luhei o ka'i tohiyegaga hinalukahihi. Keke seyaseya'aine hinalukahihi, au sa'eyana sa'eyana, ada tamo hakwadi bona meya tuline higaheyena-ma ana kaivila ginahawavemogatalena.

Ka'i yami vaga'auta againe keke tamo hakwadi gidamiyami-yo mena lukahihi meya tulina againe anafaiweya gidakivilani, au meya tulina ana togahe tovetumagana ami yo'o matadiya hinave'awa'ibodena tu nuwahinagediya Yaubada againe meya tulina againe hinalulukahihi.

Tu ka'i tamo hakwadi yami vaga'auta againe gihiyoto tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata sa'eyana ginatunevehabalutugina digo, ginamidi be bana kaliva nagona gigahegahe-ma gina'ilova tu tobohiyana ginavebutu gina'awatalatalaina.

Hidede amine gaveyao agaimiya Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata ginatunevehabalutugimi, medema amifaiweya anakaibe anakaibe wana'awatalatalainena be higa tovetumagana moya'aimi halamana wanavaina ada yami vetumagana ginatubuga.

Wa'ita, Yaubada keke ve'ataladabwadabwa ana Yaubada. Bana'e kukuya ana Yaubada. Fa'ina gaveyao Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata hi'awa'awatalatalainena, medema taudiyao hinavehimeyedi be keke hinave'ataladabwadabwa. Au Yaubada yana kaliva adi yo'o tulidi tulidi agaidiya hitagatagavanenega amine, omi wanatagavanenega.

Ka'i nuwanuwadi tamo gavadi ana nuwanauwa fa'ina hinatoliluvaluva, aimo yadi manuweya yadi kaliva agaidiya hinatoliluvaluva be hinahalamanena. Tafalolo fa'ina wavagavaga'auta againe, ka'i vevine hinalulukahihi medema keke-mo'a gidalubodani.

Gavadi-yo mena vehimeyai-nadi vevine fa'idiya wakiloweni? Wa'ita, Yaubada yana vehimeya keke omi miKolinita agaimiya gidave'inuba ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o keke? Yaubada bonana keke omi'iyao gagana agaimiya gida'ela ma ma'i wahalamanena o keke? Tovetumagana adi yo'o moya'aidi hihuluhuluva amine, meda anafaiweya omi wadahuluhuluva.

Hai kaliva ginuwanuwa vaita Yaubada yana venuwa'ata ana awatalatalaina bana anafata o Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tulina tulina gidavaini, medema Kaiwabu yana vehimeya omi agaimiya ga'etoladina ma gida'alakakilina.
Ka'i bana kalivai-nadi mena vehimeya ginakilowena digo, bana keke kaliva halamanina Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya.

Tobohiyakweyao, hida gagahe ma nafona hidede amine. Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tulina tulina adi tunevehabalutuga yami wa'idibumuhiga wanalelena. Tu badi kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina meya tuline gi'alaveleveledi-yo hilulukahihi-ma keke wanahawatadi.
Tafalolo fa'ina wavavaga'auta ana toveya gavaimi gavaimi Yaubada ana tafalolo gilubodana, medemi wanahuluhuluva be yami vaga'auta imalamalabubunina wanaseseyemaunena. Au hidemi ana tubuga.

Siule tobohiyakweyao miKolinita, nuwanuwaku Yesu Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galumamalemi-ma fa'ina nuwami ganatalafolena. Mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna againe nuwami wasena be yami vetumagana gava gi'etodona.

Ada ka'i mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galumamalemi-ma wanakidonena au tova moya'aina Yaubada yana kibababala wana'aya'ayaunena. Tu ka'i yaku laumamala keke wadanogali-hagihagiyeni, au Yesu Keliso againe wavetumagana-kawowo.
Gi'alika ada tomohuyehuyeya hihuya-yo aiyeta luhei gidauda tu tova anaveto Yaubada gisivemididina, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigaheye-vagahina amine.
Gimididi-havagi yo Fita againe Tauna gi'ivemogatalina, ada muliya yana yo'o tuwelo kalivadi velugadiyao moya'aidi agaidiya Tauna gi'ivemogatalina.

Kadu muliya ana tomuliya ada yo'o lakahina se'eyaine himiyami ma agaidiya gilakayemu, adi kilagalaga faifi hanaledi (500) gitubuhegedi. Mena tobohiyadeyao tufoidi moya'aidi aimo yawayawadiyao himimiyami, tu tufoidi boi hi'alika.
Kadu muliya Yelusalema tovetumagana adi tonagona ana egana Yemesa againe gilakayemu, ada muliya afositolo moya'aidi agaidiya gilakayemu be hi'itana.
Ada muliya-mo'aya iya agaikuya gi'ivemogatalina. E, kwamana ana tubuga aimo keke hagihagina tu gimadutubuga amine, iya aku ita keke hagihagina tu iya agaikuya gilakayemu be ga'itana.

Tu Yaubada yana nuwadoga iya agaikuya givetalaiyena fa'ina, iya gave'afositolo. Ada yana nuwadoga iya agaikuya givetalaiyena-ma keke gidavele-wayogeku, keke. Yesu Keliso fa'ina gafifaisewa toyogina, ada yaku vediwe afositolo velugadiyao yadi vediwe gitubuhegena. Tu keke tauku yaku faiwala againe gadafifaisewa. Au Yaubada yana faiwala againe ginuwakabubuyeku fa'ina, gafifaisewa toyogina.

Ada au ka'i iya omi agaimiya galumamala o ka'i badi afositolo velugadiyao hilumamala, yama laumamala ana nuwanuwa au sa'eyana higa Yesu Keliso gi'alika be gimididi-havagi, ada yami vetumagana inubana au hidede amine.
Hida gagahe Yaubada Keliso alikeya gisivemididina-ma ime alulumamalena. Keliso yana mididi-havagi alulukahihiyena tu gavadi-yo tufoimi wagahegahe vaita Yaubada to'alika keke ginasivemidididi?
Wa'itana, ka'i to'alika keke velemona hinamididi-havagi, kadu Yaubada keke Keliso gidasivemididini.
Ada ka'i Yaubada keke velemona Keliso alika againe gidasivemididini digo, ime alulumamala-kawowo kadu omi wavetumagana-kawowo.

Kadu'e, ka'i Yaubada keke velemona Keliso alikeya gidasivemididini digo, yama hawavemogatala Yaubada fa'ine fwaya amine, fa'ina ime Yaubada fa'ine ahawavemogatala agayo, “Yaubada Keliso alikeya gisivemididina.” Tu ka'i aimo tova mulina Yaubada keke to'alika velemona ginasivemidididi be wayawaidi hinamiyami digo, kadu keke Keliso gidasivemididini, ada au vaita ime Yaubada fa'ine adafwaya.
Fa'ina ka'i tamo hakwadi ugahegahe ugayo, “To'alika keke hinamididi-havagi,” kadu vaita udagayo, “Keliso keke gidamididi-havagi.”

Keliso gi'alika ada gimididi-havagi be yami koyona ginayawelina fa'ina. Atu ka'i Keliso keke gidamididi-havagi digo, yami koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina Keliso wadavetumagane-wayoge. Aimo yami wakoyona Yaubada matane wamimiyami. Fa'ina Keliso gi'alika tu ka'i keke gidamididi-havagi digo, keke anafaiweya yami koyona gidavaihegeni.
Kadu'e, ka'i Keliso keke gidamididi-havagi, badi to'alika boi aimo wayawaidi himiyami tu Keliso againe hivetumagana-ma badi keke hinamididi-havagi, adi egana gibwavi.

Ada ka'i Keliso againe kavetumagana be hidei babiya yada vetumagana fa'ina leme kanuhagana tu keke wesei lobameya leme kananuhagani, au kaliva miya-kawokawowodiyao ide fa'ideya yadi wavelaiga hinagahe hinagayo, “Hoiyoi! Hagihagidiyao, hivetumagana-kawowo. Keke hinamididi-havagi.”
Bana kaliva sa'eyana higa kaliva nagona yana koyona fa'ina tomiyababi moya'aidi hi'ali'alika. Tu kadu kaliva sa'eyana yana faisewa kelose againe fa'ina aimo hinamididi-havagi.

Kaliva moya'aida Adama bwaneneneyao. Hidema fa'ina moya'aida bana amine kana'alika. Ada moya'aida Adama bwaneneneyao kana'alika amine, meda anafaiweya ide gaveyao Keliso yana yo'o kalivai-dana, medema moya'aida Yaubada alikeya ginasivemididida.

Tu Yaubada yana kaliva yadi mididi-havagi ana tova tulina tulina gisena. Keliso yana mididi-havagi wai ginagona, ada aimo tova mulina yana yewa'ela ana toveya ide yana kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya againe kanamididi-havagi.
Veyao Tuwaina ana buki Keliso yana abavehimeya Yaubada givelena-ma fa'ina gigahe gigayo,
Gaitoma moya'aidi Bana agevavane gisedi.

Tu mena bonai-nadi gigahe vaita gaitoma moya'aidi Keliso yana abavehimeya dibune hidamiyami, atu keke Yaubada Tauna fa'ine gidagahe. Bana Yaubada keke Keliso yana abavehimeya dibune gidamiyami, fa'ina Bana'e gaitoma moya'aidi Keliso agevavane gisedi.

Ada aimo Yaubada gaitoma moya'aidi Yesu agevavane ahe ginasedi-yo au Natuna Tauna Tamana agevavane ginasena. Yaubada gaitoma moya'aidi Natuna agevavane ginamidisedi, tu muliya Natuna Tauna Tamana agevavane ginasena be higa Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a kikaiwabuna, kikaiwabu-mo'ena ginamiyami.

Tu badi kaliva higahegahe vaita Yaubada keke to'alika ginasivemidididi amanadi badi fa'idiya kadu ganagahe. Ka'i Yaubada to'alika keke velemona ginasivemidididi, gavai'ona-yo kaliva tufoidi to'alika tuwaidiyao fa'idiya hibafitaiso be higa aimo lobameya Keliso buye hinamiyami fa'ina? Ka'i to'alika keke velemona hinamididi-havagi, gavana ana inuba badi to'alika fa'idiya hibafitaiso?

Tu ime afositolo ama toveluga buye ma Yesu Keliso bonana alulumamalena fa'ina, todibutoyoga tova moya'aina nuwanuwadi hinaluve'alikama. Ka'i Yaubada yana sivemidi alikeya keke adanuwenuweni digo, keke-mo'a abagilagi againe adahawahegema.

Tobohiyakweyao, Bana Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Omi yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana kaliva fa'ina nuwaku giyamumu. Medema gahe velemo'ena. Meda anafaiweya gahe velemo'ena sa'eyana ganayakahina, higa aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana abagilagi liline gamimiyami.

Kadu gahe sa'eyana lakahina ma “Ka'i kaliva koyodiyao buye wanamiyami, yadi dewa koyona yami dewa ginakivekoyona.” Mena gahe-nadi au velemo'ena, fa'ina wana'itave'avimi be kaliva koyodiyao mididi-havagi fa'ina keke hinalolomi.
Wamidi, nuwami gina'afolefolena be yami dewa koyona wanahege-mo'ena. Tufoimi Yaubada wafaniyena. Hida yaku gahe wananogalina be wanawowomumu.

Tu ka'i tamo hakwadi ginatoliluvaluva ginagayo, “Gavaiya'amine Yaubada to'alika ginasivemidididi? To'alika wowodi babiya hi'enolovena fa'ina, hinamididi-havagi againe wowodi ana ita gavaiya'amine hinalakayemu?”

Ada yana toliluvaluva hidede amine ganafatana. O kwavakwava! Wowoda yana afuwa otova amine. Otova babiya unafahana againe, ka'i keke ginave'afa be tubuna gina'afuwani, kadu keke a'a-mo'ena unanuhagani.
Ada ka'i witi nafona o gavadi tamo a'a nafona unafahana amine, keke a'a-mo'ena aimo ginatabo be ginatubuga-ma unafahani, keke. Nafonaga unafahana.

Tu Yaubada otova sa'eyana sa'eyana yana kabu againe a'a-mo'ena ana ita tulina tulina givelena. E, Bana'e tuwaina babi ana aibubuna againe givehimeyena amine, a'a-mo'ena sa'eyana sa'eyana ginakabu ana ita tulina tulina. Fa'ina keke wananuwanuwa lakahina aimo wowoda ana ita tulina fa'ina.
Kadu kevakeva ma adi ita higa wowodi au tulina tulina. Ide kaliva wowoda tulina, yomuyomu wowodi tulina, manuga wowodi tulina kadu igana wowodi tulina.
Meda anafaiweya badi tomiyalobama wowodi ana ita tulina, ada tomiyababi wowoda ana ita tulina. Tomiyalobama wowodi ana kaiwabu tulina, kadu tomiyababi wowoda ana kaiwabu tulina.

Meda anafaiweya kauwana yana kaiwabu tulina, ada vaikohi yana kaiwabu tulina, ada ibadibadi yadi kaiwabu tulina. Ada kadu ibadibadi ma adi ita'ita keke sa'eyanaga. Tufoidi yadi mahala lakahina, tufoidi yadi mahala kabi'ona.

E, Yaubada gaitoma moya'aidi adi ita tulina tulina giveledi amine, ide kaliva kanamididi-havagi ana toveya Yaubada wowoda tulina ginaveleda. Otova babiya kafahana be tubuna gi'afuwana amine, to'alika babiya katauna be wowona gi'alilina. Atu Yaubada to'alika vetuvetumaganina ana sivemidi againe, wowona ivaguna keke-mo'a gina'alilini-ma ginavaina.

To'alika katauna againe wowona vaita yogo amine. Atu Yaubada ginasivemididina againe, wowona ana kaiwabu yamumu-mo'ena ginavaina. To'alika katauna againe, wowona keke yana wafaiwala. Atu Yaubada ginasivemididina againe, wowona yana wafaiwala ginavaina.

To'alika katauna againe, wowona babi ana wowo, higa yana miyami babiya fa'ina. Atu Yaubada ginasivemididina againe, wowona lobama ana wowo amine ginalakayemu, higa alu'aluwana yana miyami lobameya fa'ina. Adamoya wowoda ka'ita'itana medema babi ana wowo yada miyami babiya fa'ina. Wowoi-dana gidadauda fa'ina, au kahalamanena aimo tova mulina lobama ana wowo yada miyami lobameya fa'ina kananuhagana.
Yaubada kaliva nagona Adama babiya gibubuna againe, wayawaina givekaliva.
Tu Adama wai gimulina-ma higa Yesu Keliso, wayawai-vagahina givekaliva be yawai-vagahida ginaveleda.
Lobama ana wowo yada miyami lobameya fa'ina keke kadamidinuhagani. Au babi ana wowo yada miyami babiya fa'ina kamidinuhagana, ada aimo tova mulina lobama ana wowo kananuhagana.
Yaubada kaliva nagona babi againe gibubuna, fa'ina bana babi ana kaliva. Tu kaliva wai gimulina-ma lobameya gitauya be babiya gihobu'ela.

Yaubada Adama babi againe gibubuna, ada ide tomiyababi moya'aida yada miyami au bana Adama yana miyami amine. Atu Yesu Keliso lobameya gitauya be babiya gihobu'ela, ada ide yana kaliva moya'aida yada miyami lobameya au bana lobama ana kaliva yana miyami amine.

Tova adamoya ide Yesu yana kaliva ada ita'ita bana Adama ana ita'ita Yaubada babiya gibubuna-ma amine. Meda anafaiweya aimo tova mulina ide ada ita'ita Yesu Keliso lobama ana kaliva ana ita'ita ma amine ginasevedamana.

Wanogali! Nuwanuwa sevasevauyana omi agaimiya ganahawavemogatalena. Keke ide tovetumagana moya'aida kana'alika, tu auhe'ama moya'ai-mo'eda kanamaduvenuya be lobama ana wowo kanavaina. E, nama gisinamana againe matada katulowona amine, auhe'ama kanamaduvenuya be lobama ana wowo kanamaduvaina. Tova ana abalauyabu againe Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata ginavehimeyena be hiulega ginayuvena. Mena hiulega ana aiyuve wai ginamulina-ma againe, Yaubada to'alika vetuvetumaganidiyao ginasivemidididi, lobama ana wowo keke-mo'a gina'alilini-ma ginaveledi, ada ide vetuvetumaganideyao aimo wayawaida kamimiyami-ma badi buye lobama ana wowo ginaveleda.

Fa'ina hida babi ana wowo againe kamimiyami-ma Yaubada yana vehimeya againe kanavehalilini tu lobama ana wowo aimo keke-mo'a gina'alilini-ma kana'osena. E, hida babi ana wowo yawoyawowolina kanavehalilina be lobama ana wowo miyamiya-vagahina kana'osena.
Yaubada alika giyawelina, giyaweli-'owona.
Ho alika! Hai ya abavehimeya?
A gihavaina, gihavai-mo'ena.
Hai ya aba'aiyovaga higa
ya abafaiwala koyo-mo'ena? Ahe'i.
Aimo keke tamo tova kaliva
unaluyaweyawelidi, keke-mo'a.

Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yada koyona fatana higa alika giyawelina, ada yana faiwala againe mena yada dewa koyona kahegehegena. Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana leme fa'ina Yaubada againe kanavesiule. Siule-mo'a!

Hidede amine ganavehimeyemi higa tafalolo sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya omi sa'eyana sa'eyana yami mani tufona velekawowo fa'ina wanasena. Fatami wiki sa'eyana sa'eyana ka'i lakahina o kabi'ona wavaivaina amine, meda ana tufo lakahina o kabi'ona velekawowo fa'ina wanasena be ginada. Ada aimo omi agaimiya gana'ela ana toveya, keke yami velekawowo fa'ina mani wanavebutu wanalele, au yami mani ahe wakidewedewena-ma gana'itana.

Yami kaliva wanavegidedi be yami velekawowo tovetumagana koyokoyodiyao Yelusalema againe hinanauwena, ada ahe ganayemu-yo mena kalivai-dina adi egana wanayakahina be yadi leta gana'etoladina, ada mani-nadi nimadiya ganasena be Yelusalema againe gana'iveninisedi.
Ada gananuwanuwa higa vaita iya tauku Yelusalema againe ganana o ka'i keke, ada ka'i yakuna we'a hagihagina agaikuya, au badi hinavebwa'uliyeku.
Ka'iwa, ka'i ma'ita lauva tunugina omi agaimiya ganamiyami, ka'i kwadudu ana tova higa bolimana ana aituheya buye kanamiyami be aimo hami ganana againe yami veluga buye wana'atuhegeku.
Keke nuwanuwaku gana'ela ma ganamadulowoga. Ka'i Kaiwabu ginahawahegeku amine, nuwanuwaku lauva tunugina omi agaimiya ganamiyami.
Tu adamoya hidei Efeso againe ganamiyami tu tafalolo ana egana Fenidikosi ana toveya, tu muliya gana'ela.

Hidei Efeso againe moya'aidi ase'asedi ana wana yauyaugina fa'ina, akufaiweya moya'aidi agaidiya ganalulumamala be yaku faisewa guwana gana'itana. Atu kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi nuwanuwadi hinahawataku.
Keke tamo hakwadi Timoti ginavekiwogeni. Au yanana againe yami veluga buye wana'atuhegena be yana wanuwayamumu iya agaikuya ginayewa'ela. Yana ela fa'ina tobohiyadeyao iya buye analulauboda.
Yami havivila moya'aina againe nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asemiya ginadauda.
Tobohiyakweyao, adamoya gagahevagadonemi be agevavadiya wanamiyami, kadu gaveyao moya'aidi hivetoleme be badi buye hififaisewa-ma wanave'amohimohinedi.
Keke buye kadamiyami fa'ina nuwaku givita tu tobohiyamiyao adi'itoto higa Sitefanasi Fotunato Akaiko wa'iveninisedi be hilaka'ela againe, gavemwamwala.
Au badi ase'aseku hikivevatuna, ada kadu omi ase'asemi hikivevatuna. Yadi huluvai-nadi fa'ina gilubodami be yami yo'o matadiya wanahawaveyamumuyedi.
Tobohiyamiyao moya'aidi hidei Efeso againe yadi lukafoi. Taumiyao wanave'alulusiule againe tobohiyamiyao wana'atulauhidi be higa yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana wanaseyemaunena.
Kaliva sa'eyana hida leta againe yaku nuwanuwa gi'etoladina, tu adamoya iya Folo yaku lukafoi agaimiya tauku nimakuya ga'etoladina.
Hai kaliva keke nuwanuwana Kaiwabu, medema Yaubada ginaluyaweyawelina be ginabwavi. Ho Yesu Kaiwabu, udamaduyewa'ela!
Kaiwabu Yesu yana nuwadoga againe wanamiyami.
Yaku nuwakabubu lakahina omi agaimiya, higa omi iya buye Yesu Keliso yana kaliva be yana vevine.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi ada ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Ide ada vita moya'aina agaidiya gihawavemoluvida be higa gaveyao vita tulina tulina hinuhagadi medema ide adafaiweya kanahawavemoluvidi. E, gavaimi ide ada vita agaidiya Yaubada givelugada, medema tobohiyadeyao adi vita ana toveya kanalukahihiyedi be ase'asedi kadu kanakivevatuna.

Wa'ita, Keliso aulolo tagiya ide fa'ideya giwahina amine, meda ide vita lakahina Bana fa'ine kawahiwahina. Ada ide Keliso againe kamiyave'avina fa'ina, kadu meda yana hawavemoluva lakahina kanunuhagana.

Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana laumamala fa'ina ime tolaumamala vita awahina. Keke adawahi-kawowoni, au Yaubada yana hawavemoluva kadu yana kibababala omi wananuhagana fa'ina vita awahina. Meda Yaubada yana hawavemoluva ime anuhagana be higa aimo ami vita ana toveya ime wananuwenuwema-yo kadu omi ase'asemi ginavatu. Au hidedemi omi vita wananuhagana ime anuhagana amine ma agaidiya yami wa'asevatu wana'atuvefa'ila.
Ada ime anuwave'avina-mo'a higa ime vita anuhagana amine kadu omi wanuhagana, meda ime asevatu anuhagana amine kadu omi wananuhagana.

Taumadi nuwahinagekuya ganuwanuwa vaita ka'i gana'alika o ka'i ganamiya tu gavaitana hidamiyaluve'alikaku. Tu hidedemi ga'ayaunena be higa keke tauku ganaluve'avineku au Yaubada to'alika adi sivemidi anafaiweya ma againe ganaluve'avina.

Mena abagilagi koyo-mo'ena againe ahe gikibababaleku kadu tova adamoya ginakibababaleku. Meda ganuwave'avina ka'i yami ve'o'ola againe wanaveluvelugaku amine, kadu tova moya'aina yana kibababala agaikuya ginanauna. Ka'i omi kaliva moya'aimi iya fa'ikuya wanave'ove'o'ola, au yami ve'o'ola guwana Yaubada aku nuwakabubu againe ginaseyemaunena be wananuhagani-yo moya'aimi wanavesiule-mo'a.

Wa'ita, yaku leta moya'aina agaidiya keke tamo gahe sevasevauyana gada'etoladini, au yaku nuwanuwa ga'etoladina-ma amifaiweya wanahawana kadu wanahalamanena. Tova adamoya yami halamana yaku nuwanuwa fa'ina tufona. Nuwanuwaku iya aku halamana agaimiya ginatubutubuga tu yaku nuwanuwa wanahalamane-'owona be higa Kaiwabu Yesu ginayewa'ela ana toveya iya omi fa'imiya ganagakahikahi amine, meda omi iya fa'ikuya amifaiweya wanagakahikahi.

Tu ahe ganuwave'avina omi iya wanagakahikahiyeku fa'ina, gavevai higa vaita yaku nuwaliliuga againe omi miKolinita agaimiya gadavebutu kadu agaimiya gada'ela gadalauyabu be abavemwamwala luhei gadavelemi.

E, gavevai vaita yakuna Masedoniya ana fafaliya ana toveya agaimiya gadamadugolota, kadu Masedoniya gadahegena againe agaimiya gadayewaku be tamo gavadi aku veluga buye wada'atuhegeku-yo gadana Yudiya ana fafaliya.

Mene gavaimi wanuwanuwa? Iya gagahe vaita gada'ela tu keke fa'ina ka'i wavaitana iya tove'alololo? Badi kaliva-kawowo hinagahe vaita hina'ela tu nuwadiya ela fa'ina keke velemona hidanuwanuwa. Tu iya keke medemi gadahuluva. Ka'i ve'ehe ganayakahina digo, ve'ehe amine ganahuluva. Ka'i vekeke digo, kadu vekeke.

Yaubada keke gidanuwaluga. Gavaimi ginagahe medemi makewa'e ginagugai. Meda anafaiweya ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa yama venuwa'ata agaimiya keke nuwaluga amine vaita nagona adave'ehe tu muliya adavekeke.

Fa'ina iya'eku kadu Sailosi Timoti buye Yaubada Natuna Yesu Keliso fa'ine omi hinafamiya alumamala. Bana Keliso keke tonuwaluga. Keke vaita gidave'ehe tu nuwahinagene vekeke amine gidanuwanuwa. Au gavaimi agaideya giwonadabadaba, medemi ginagugai.
Yaubada gavaimi giwonadabadaba, mena wonadabadabai-dina guwana Yesu Tauna giseyemaunena. Ada Yesu giseseyemaunena fa'ina, ide yada “Ehe hidedemi” kayakayakahina be Yaubada ana egana kakikilakahina.

Tu wanogali! Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Yami dewa ganuwenuwena fa'ina keke Kolinita againe gadamadu'ela-yo gada'itami. Keke nuwanuwaku kanave'a'ita'ita tu iya ganagolahegehegemi medema fa'ina keke gadamadu'ela.
Keke vaita gavaimi gavaimi wanavetumaganena-ma iya ganavehimeyeni, keke. Iya gahalamanena yami vetumagana wakidonena. Tu iya gaveluvelugami be higa yami vemwamwala fa'ina.
Ka'i iya ganakive'ase'aulolomi digo, gaveyao himimiyami-yo hinakivemwamwaliku? Omi'iyaogaga, omi gakive'ase'aulolomi-ma kalivai-mina.

Gavadi-yo boi yami leta ga'etoladina againe gakive'ase'aulolomi? Me dewa koyona againe aimo wamiyami fa'ina keke vemwamwala tu nuwavita waveleku. Leta againe gadakeyemi be higa yami dewa wana'ihagihagiyeni-yo yaku ela ana toveya keke nuwavita wanaveleku au wanakivemwamwaliku gavaimi gilubodami amine. Ganuwave'avina ka'i yaku wavemwamwala gana'ela digo, kadu omi moya'aimi ganavetutulakahimi be buye kanavemwamwala.

Fa'ina yami leta ga'etoladina ana toveya yaku wa'ase'u'aulolo yaku wanuwavita yaku watagiya ga'etoladina. Keke vaita ganakive'ase'aulolomi fa'ina hidedemi gada'etoladini, keke. Au yaku nuwanuwa agaimiya gavatubuga ma wanahalamanena fa'ina gagahe.
Au omi tufoimi moya'aimi wavematahiwadiyena. Medema auwe anafata.
Tu tova adamoya yana koyona wanavenuwauluyena kadu ase'asena wanakivevatuna be higa keke ginanuwavita-mo'a yo yana nuwavita ginalutautauni.
Medema fa'ina gagahegahevagadonemi be yami nuwanuwa bana againe kadu wanaseyemaunena.
Boi yami leta bana ana matahiwadi fa'ina ga'etoladina be yami bona'abi fa'ina ganagaluvaluvami. Ka'i tokoyonai-nadi fa'ina bonaku wana'abina, au ganahalamanena bonaku matatabuna wana'abina.

Hai kaliva yana koyona omi wavenuwauluyena, medema kadu iya gavenuwauluyena. Ka'i tamo hakwadi ginakoyo digo, yana koyona ganavenuwauluyena againe ami veluga fa'ina Keliso matane yana koyona ganavenuwauluyena.

Setani yana nuwanuwa koyona kahalamanena fa'ina, bana tokoyona yana koyona givenikohiyena-ma kananuwakabubuyena be higa Setani yana ve'alololo againe keke ide tovetumagana yada miyatamo'ai ginakivekoyoni.

Wa'ita, kaliva tufoidi kibababala ana edeya hinanauna tu tufoidi agolaufofola ana edeya hinanauna. Ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa badi hinafadiya Keliso ana halamana fa'ine alulumamala fa'ina, ime vaita Keliso yana vanedimodimo amine, maganai-nadi Yaubada nuwana gikivedigagina.

Badi agolaufofola ana edeya hinanauna-ma matadiya Keliso ana laumamala vaita lahi ana lada amine. Tu badi kibababala ana edeya hinanauna-ma matadiya maganai-nadi vaita yawai-vagahidi magana. Atu mena faisewai-nadi fa'ina hakwadi anafata?

Kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi Yaubada bonana hilulumamalena be higa taudiyao hinavelokoloko. Tu ime'eyao keke badi amine adahuluva. Yaubada givegidema fa'ina, Keliso againe amiyave'avina-ma yama wa'asehawahega Yaubada matane agahegahe. Hidema fa'ina mena faisewai-nadi amafata.

Tu omi Kolinita tovetumagana taumiyao nimaku ana iya'iyaya, aku hawaveyamumu agaimiya tauku ga'ayaunena. Kadu aku hawaveyamumu omi yaku faisewa guwana agaimiya kaliva moya'aidi adifaiweya hinahawana be hina'itahalamanena.

Ada moya'aidi agaidiya gimahalina higa omi vaita Keliso yana fefe amine iya awakuya gi'iveninisena amanadi. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana vehimeya kabala againe gikilumini-yo Mosese givelena. Tu Keliso yana fefe keke feni-mo'a gida'abini-yo kabala againe gida'etoladini. Au Yaubada Tomiya-vagata Alu'aluwana gi'abina be omi tomiyababi ase'asemiya gi'etoladina.
Au hidedemi yama faisewa guwana alukahihiyena fa'ina Keliso gifaiwalavelema-yo yama nuwave'avina Yaubada againe akidonena.
Keke tamo faiwala agaimeya gidadauda-yo faisewai-nadi fa'ina amafaiweya anagahe anagayo, “Faisewa au amafata.” Tu Yaubada gifaiwalavelema fa'ina amafatagaga.

Bana'e gifaiwalavelema-yo veyao ivaguna fa'ina a'awatalatalaina. Veyao ivaguna keke vehimeya Yaubada yana bukiya gidadauda amanadi. Au veyao-nadi Yaubada Alu'aluwana ase'asedeya gisena. Vehimeya eto'etoladina ana aiyawela againe kaliva alika hinuhagana. Tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana kaliva yawai-vagahidi giveledi.

Kadu ganagahe-havagi. Mosese yana vehimeya guwana ma koyona ana laufata ana eda againe kanauna. Tu vehimeyai-nadi Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina buye gilakayemu. Mosese yana vehimeya ana faisewa gaitoma kikaiwabuna tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana faisewa gaitoma kikaiwabu-mo'ena, fa'ina gifaiwalaveleda-yo dewa yegayegana ana edeya kananauna.

Kadu'e tuwai-mo'ena Mosese yana vehimeya ana abavehimeya kikaiwabuna tu adamoya Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana abavehimeya kikaiwabu-mo'ena, fa'ina adafaiweya kanagahe vaita Mosese yana vehimeya ana kaiwabu gitubutagoni-yo kaiwabu-nadi gihavaina.

Mosese yana vehimeya ana abavehimeya havahavaina tu kadu kikaiwabuna, fa'ina Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina buye gilakayemu. Tu Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana abavehimeya miyamiya-vagahina fa'ina, abavehimeyai-nadi ana kaiwabu gavatubuga!

Tu mena kaiwabu ivaguna miyamiya-vagahina fa'ina, ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa yama abaluve'avina lakahi-mo'ena anuhagana. Medema fa'ina keke gahe sevasevauyana amine adalulaumamala au yama wa'asevatu kaliva agahegahe-mo'edi.

Ime keke Mosese amine adahuluva. Ime veyao ivaguna ana kaiwabu miyamiya-vagahina keke adasevauyeni. Tu bana Mosese ma Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina magigina gituvemahali-'owona tu gihavahavaina-ma gisevauyena. Kaleko againe magigina gisebodana be higa miIsileli mahalinai-nadi gihavahavaina tu keke hina'ita'itani.

Badi miIsileli ma nuwadi gi'abodana. Boi tuwai-mo'ena tu hinunauwena tova adamoya Veyao Tuwaina ana buki hihawana againe, vaita mena kaleko-nadi badi nuwadi gidasebodani be Yaubada bonana keke agaidiya gidamahalini. Mena nuwadi ana abaseboda aimo gidadauda. Ka'i Keliso againe hinahawahegedi-yo buye hinave'atutamo'aidi amine, abaseboda Keliso ginayahina.
E, tuwaina dewai-nadi meda aimo hinunauwena. Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Mosese gi'etoladina-ma buki-dina hihawadi againe abaseboda nuwadi aimo giseboda-vagahina.
Tu gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe amine, gaveyao Kaiwabu againe hinahagaviladi, medema nuwadi ana abaseboda ginavaihegena.
Wa'ita, gahe-nadi “Kaiwabu” giyakahina. Bana Kaiwabu-nadi au Alu'aluwa Mahalina, ada gava kaliva nuwahinagene Kaiwabu Alu'aluwana Tauna gimimiyami, medema keke ve'agetogeya tu yauyaugina gimimiyami.

Tu ide tovetumagana moya'aida vaita Keliso magigida ana abaseboda givaihegena-ma kalivai-dana kamimiyami, ada kaliva anununa kelasi gi'iveyemaunina amine meda ide magigida sisiunagina Kaiwabu ka'itadonedoneni-yo yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina kaliva agaidiya ka'i'iveyemaunina. Kadu Kaiwabu anununa ka'i'iveyemaunina-ma amine ide kavenuvenuya tu yada mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gitubutubuga. Ada mena yada venuya Kaiwabu anununa amine au Kaiwabu againe give'inuba, Bana Alu'aluwa Mahalina Kalivai-nadi.
Tu Yaubada gihinekalikaliyema-yo veyao ivaguna kikaiwabu-mo'ena a'awa'awatalatalainena. Hida ama vehimeyai-nadi givelema fa'ina, vita tulina tulina anuhagadi againe ase'asema keke gida'ali'uli'uni.

Au dewa koyona sevasevauyana kadu wawowomumuna ahe avenikohiyena. Keke aikaunuwanuwadiyao amine adahuluva, kadu keke Yaubada bonana adakivilavilani-yo nuwanuwa tulina adavehawala. Au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena kaliva moya'aidi matadiya mahamahalina amine aseseyemaunena, ada Yaubada gihalamanema tu agahegahe-yo kaliva moya'aidi yama gahe au velemo'ena ma adifaiweya nuwafoudiya hi'aya'ayaunena.
Ka'i Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ime alulumamalena-ma keke gidamahalini, au gaveyao agaidiya keke gidamahalini? Me badi agolaufofola ana eda againe hinanauna-ma kalivai-dina agaidiya keke gidamahalini.

Bana Setani hida babi ana yaubada badi keke hidavetumagana amanadi nuwadi gikibodana be keke adifaiweya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana mahalina hina'itahalamaneni. Mena Venuwa'atai-nadi Keliso yana kaiwabu gi'ivemogatalina, Bana'e ana ita'ita meda Yaubada ana ita'ita amine, au anunudi sa'eyana.

Wa'ita, keke taumeyao fa'imeya adalaumamala-yo higa ama egana anakilakahini, keke. Au Yesu Keliso alulumamalena higa Bana'e Kaiwabu. Tu taumeyao fa'imeya agahe vaita ime Yesu againe ahawahegema-yo omi ami agetoga amimiyami.

Tuwai-lokalokana uyuyugaga gidauda ana toveya Yaubada gigahe gigayo, “Mahalina uyuyu gidatutufolena.” Meda Bana Yaubadai-nadi ime nuwama uyu'uyuyuna yana mahalina againe gituvemahalina be Keliso magigine Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina ana'itani-yo Yaubada Tauna anahalamanena be yana mahalina againe anamiyami.

Tu Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina Yesu Keliso gi'iveyemaunina-ma ana halamana vaita lokolokofou amine. Tu lokolokofou-nadi ime kaliva kowakowameyao vaita avaeka bikabikana amine nonogana agaimeya gisena be higa kaliva moya'aidi hinahalamanena faiwala lakahina lakahi-mo'ena aseseyemaunena-ma inubana keke ime agaimeya au Yaubada againe.
Vita moya'aina inubana tulina tulina hitutu'auhima tu keke hidavetutuvehawaliyema. Vitai-dina anunuhagadi fa'ina nuwama givegafo'uya'uya tu keke gidavegafo'uya'uya-mo'a.
Nibaimeyao hiluluvenegama tu Yaubada keke gidahegema. Himunukoyokoyoma tu keke hidaluve'alikama.

Boi Yesu hiluveki'onina be hiluve'alikana amine, meda tova moya'aina ime hiluluveki'onima higa hidaluve'alikama. Ki'onai-dina wowomeya gidadauda be higa Yesu yawaina wowomeya gidadauda ma kaliva moya'aidi hina'itahalamanena.

E, wayawaimeyao amimiyami tu ime Yesu yana kaliva fa'ina tova moya'aina abagilagi liline amimiyami. Alikeya hihegeluvaluvama nonogana aimo amimiyami be higa kaliva wowoma havahavaina hina'ita-yo hinahalamanena Yesu wayawaina agaimeya gimimiyami fa'ina keke adamadu'alika.
Yesu Keliso alulumamalena fa'ina kaliva koyodiyao hiveve'umagigiyema higa hidaluve'alikama. Tu omi'iyao ma laumamalai-nadi wanogalina fa'ina, wayawaimi ivaguna wamimiyami.
Tu Veyao Tuwaina ana buki hidedemi gigahe gigayo,
Yaubada gavetumaganena fa'ina, iya gagahe.
Mena kaliva Yaubada givetumaganena amine, kadu ime Yaubada avetumaganena be Bana bonana agahegaheyena.

Fa'ina ime ahalamanena Bana Yaubada Kaiwabu Yesu alikeya gisivemididina-ma kadu ime Yesu buye ginasivemididima. Meda omi ginasivemididimi be ime'eyao kadu omi'iyao buye Yaubada matane ginavega'auleda.

Mena vita moya'aina alukahihiyena-ma omi ami veluga fa'ina anuhagadi, higa vaita mali kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada yana nuwadoga hina'ayauneni-yo yadi vesiule magamagana Yaubada againe ginalakalaka be ana egana ana kailakata ginatubuga-mo'a.
Yaubada ime Yesu buye ginasivemididima fa'ina, ase'asema keke gida'ali'uli'uni. Wowoma ana faiwala gihavahavaina be gi'ali'alika'abobowa tu Yaubada tova be tova alu'aluwama gikikive'ivaguna.

Wa'ita, hida ama vita vaita kabi'ona amine kadu havahavaina tova adamoya a'aya'ayaunena-ma aimo tova mulina guwana higa kaiwabu lakahina kadu miyamiya-vagahina ananuhagana. Kaiwabu-nadi ama vita gitubuhegena, gitubuhege-mo'ena.

Medema fa'ina gaitoma a'ita'itadi-ma a'itamata'idiledi. Au gaitoma keke amafaiweya ana'itadi-ma a'itadonedonedi. Fa'ina gaitoma a'ita'itadi-ma havahavaidi tu gaitoma keke amafaiweya ana'itadi-ma miyamiya-vagahidi.
Ma tova adamoya kayawayawai'ohi nuwanuwada lakahina lobama ana manuwa kanavemanuwena.
Ada ka'i lobama ana manuwa kanavemanuwena vaita aikeva kada'osevefofoni amine, au keke alu'aluwadaga vaita konekonena wowona keke ma amine kanamiyami.

Wa'ita, babi ana wowo vaita vada amine ma againe aimo kamimiyami ana toveya, kayawayawai'ohi ada ayauna vaita vainuwana lakahina kadawahini. Au hidedemi kayawai'ohi keke vaita nuwanuwada babi ana wowo kanavehalilini fa'ina, keke. Au nuwanuwada lobama ana wowo buye kana'osevefofona be higa lobama ana wowo miyamiya-vagahina kana'oseni-yo babi ana wowo havahavaina ma gina'ana.
Mena venuyai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada Tauna ahe gikidewedeweda, ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gisetagoda be medema againe kahalamanena aimo lobama ana wowo au velemo'ena kananuhagana.
E, ime ase'aseboumeyao, keke alika adamatauseni. Ka'i babi ana wowo ananuvehailena be Kaiwabu buye anavemanuwa, au medema we'a hagihagi-mo'ena agaimeya.
Tu yama nuwanuwa lakahina hidede amine. Ka'i babi ana wowoya anavemanuwa o ka'i ananuvehailena, nuwanuwama lakahina Kaiwabu nuwana anakiveyamumuna.

Fa'ina aimo tova mulina Keliso ginavetoga be ide tovetumagana ginavedewayaugida ana toveya, moya'aida adafaiweya Bana matane kadamidi. Gavaimi gavaimi ide sa'eyana sa'eyana kahuluva aimo babi ana wowoya kamiyami ana toveya, ka'i yamumuna o ka'i koyona, medemi agaideya ginalaufata.

Tu Keliso yada dewa ginalaufata fa'ina, ime Kaiwabu ana matauta ahalamanena. Ada Kaiwabu au hidede amine ave'amohimohinena fa'ina, agagaluvaluva kaliva asisive'auyedi be Yaubada bonana alulumamalena-ma au velemo'ena hinahalamanena. Ime gavaimi yama nuwanuwa ma Yaubada a gihalamanena. Nuwanuwaku ime kaliva velemodi ma kadu omi nuwamiya wanahalamanena.

Keke vaita adagaluvaluva taumeyao ama egana kadu anakilakahini-yo wanahawaveyamumuyema, keke. Au hidedemi yama dewa fa'ina nuwami atalafolena be ime fa'imeya amifaiweya wanagakahikahi. Mene kaliva tufoidi adi ita kabu'avane fa'ina higakahikahi tu gavadi ase'asediya gidadauda-ma keke hidanuwenuweni. Mena yadi gakahikahi ana toveya amifaiweya yama dewa velemona wanayakahina be wanave'awa'ibodedi.

Hidedemi agahe fa'ina ka'i mene omi wanuwanuwa vaita ime adavekwavakwava? Yama hawahega Yaubada againe lakahi-mo'ena fa'ina, tufoidi hivaitana adavekwavakwava. O ka'i mene wanuwanuwa vaita ime wanuwameyao? E, wanuwameyao amine ahuluva be omi ami kivetuvetunu fa'ina.

Wa'ita, Keliso yana nuwanuwa lakahina agaimeya nuwama gitaitaina be yama dewa givehivehimeyena. Fa'ina halamana ahe avaina higa Kaliva sa'eyana kaliva moya'aida fa'ideya gi'alika ada ide Bana buye ka'alika.

E, kaliva moya'aida fa'ideya gi'alika be higa gaveyao wayawaidi himimiyami, medema keke taudiyao fa'idiya hinamiyami, au Bana fa'ine hinamiyami, Bana'e badi fa'idiya gi'alika tu Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina amanadi.

Boi tuwaina babi ana nuwanuwa amine kaliva wowodi ana ita fa'ina a'itanuwenuwedi agayo, “Wadema kaliva yamumuna,” o “Wadema kaliva koyona.” Tu halamana ahe avaini-yo keke aimo hidedemi kaliva ada'itanuwenuweni. Meda anafaiweya boi Keliso keke ana waegana keke yana walokoloko fa'ina a'itanuwenuwena vaita kaliva-kawowona tu adamoya au Bana yama Kaiwabu a'itayakahina.
Ada hai kaliva Keliso buye give'atutamo'aina medema kaliva tubuvaguna, fa'ina yana nuwanuwa tuwaina giyawowola tu nuwanuwa ivaguna a givaina.

Mena yada tubuvagu yo yada nuwanuwa ivaguna ana nauhaga matatabuna Yaubada againe give'inuba. Tuwaina ide Bana nibaineyao tu Keliso yana alika againe giveyaoyeda. Ada au ime yana tofaisewa ama vehimeya givelema higa kaliva anavenuwa'atadi gavaiya'amine Yaubada buye hinaveyao.

Yama laumamala hidede amine. Yaubada Keliso babiya gi'iveniniseni-yo yana alika againe koyona ana laufata giwahina be higa tomiyababi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya ginaveyaoyedi. Kaliva yadi koyona keke gidahawahawadi au giyaweyawelidi. Au hidedemi Yaubada kaliva giveyaveyaoyedi ma ana laumamala givelema.

Ada au ime Keliso loseyanineyao amimiyami be agaimiya agahegahevagadona vaita Yaubada Tauna omi agaimiya gidagahegahevagadona. Keliso ana eganeya yama hawanuwanuwa agaimiya asena be yami dewa koyone Yaubada wavenibainena-ma wanavenikohiyena be Yaubada buye wanaveyao.

Keke tamo koyona Keliso againe gidadauda, tu Yaubada ide yada koyona matatabuna Bana againe gisedamaneni-yo yana ila'a ide fa'ideya Bana giwahi-'owona. Au hidedemi Yaubada yana hawa againe Keliso koyona amine gihawana be higa ide gaveyao Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida, medema agaideya Yaubada yana yegayega gisedamanena.
Kadu'e ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa Yaubada buye afififaisewa-ma omi miKolinita ahawanuwenuwemi, be higa Yaubada yana nuwadoga wanuhagana-ma keke wanamiyane-kawowoni.
Wanogali! Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hidedemi gigahe gigayo,
Yaku nuwadoga ana toveya bonami ganogalina,
E, kibababala ana tova gasena medema tovai-nadi gavelugami.
Tu iya Folo gagahemi Yaubada yana kibababala ana tova aimo keke wanaleleni. Au tova adamoya Yaubada yana nuwadoga ana tova, adamoya tova againe kamimiyami-ma Yaubada yana kibababala ana tova.
Kadu'e yama faisewa fa'ina anagahe. Keke nuwanuwama tamo hakwadi yama faisewa gina'awalaveni fa'ina, keke tamo dewa adahuluvini-yo kaliva hina'itama-yo Yaubada bonana hinakiloweni.
Au yama havivila moya'aina agaidiya ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa ma aseseyemaunena. Yama seyemauna hidede amine. Vita tulina tulina aba'ase'u'aulolo agaidiya a'atuvefa'ila-mo'a.

Kaliva himunukoyokoyoma ana toveya, deliya hisema ana toveya, yadi wanuwakoyo himidififima be hidaluve'alikama ana toveya, au ai'adi amiyami. Kadu yama faisewa againe avedivediwe, bogi againe keke adadauda, mafulauga a'ayaunena.

Kadu yama dewa yegayegana againe, yama nuwahuya againe, yama atuvefa'ila againe, yama nuwakabubu againe ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa ma aseseyemaunena. Meda Alu'aluwa Mahalina Tauna nuwahinagemeya gimimiyami kadu kaliva agaidiya taumeyao ahawahawahegema velemo'ena ma hidedemi aseseyemaunena.

Kadu nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana hawavemogatala againe, kadu Yaubada yana faiwala ana seyemauna againe amiyami. Wa'ita, lugaviya againe kaliva abalugaviya hi'abina. I'atagidiya giyo hi'abina, i'imawadiya veve hi'abina. Meda anafaiweya nuwanuwa yegayegana vaita yama abalugaviya amine a'abina be higa nibaimeyao yadi nuwanuwa koyona anakwe'una kadu taumeyao anayavama.
Kaliva tufoidi hive'amohimohinema tu tufoidi hikivewowomumuma. Tufoidi ama egana hikilakahina tu tufoidi hiveyainema. Ime togahe velemo'ena nonogana hivewagama tofwaya.

Kaliva tufoidi ime fa'imeya higahe higayo, “Wadema kaliva-kawowo,” tu Yaubada yana kaliva buye ma hilukahihiyema higayo, “Badi kaliva kikaiwabudiyao.” Tufoidi hinuwanuwa vaita ime bwavibwavimeyao tu taumadi wayawaima amimiyami. Kadu ama vitai-dina agaidiya kivenuwavilana anunuhagana tu keke ada'alika.

Yama wa'ase'u'aulolo amimiyami tu au ai'adi tova moya'aina avemwamwala. Ime koyokoyo tu yama laumamala againe kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe hivekaiwabu. Yama giba keke tu gaitoma moya'aina au yama gaitoma. Au hidedemi ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa velemo'ena ma aseseyemaunena.
Omi miKolinita, keke tamo sevauya amine agaimiya adagaheyeni. Au yama nuwanuwa moya'aina againe ase'asema akibwatavilana be wa'itana.
Ime ase'asema omi agaimiya keke adakibodani. Tu omi'iyao ma ase'asemi ime agaimeya wakibodana.

Adamoya agaimiya gagahe vaita omi natukweyao amine. Ho natukweyao, yami laufata ime agaimeya wanaseyemaunena. Au kadu omi ase'asemi wanakibwatavilana be yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana agaimeya ana'itana.
Mene wanuwanuwa vaita Keliso Setani yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana? Keke-mo'a! Gavaimi-yo tovetumagana kadu bana keke tovetumagana ma hinanuwanuwa sa'eyana? Keke adifaiweya.

Yaubada yana manuwa inubana tulina babala inubadi tulina, keke-mo'a adafaiweya kanave'atutamo'aidi. Wa'ita, ide tovetumagana Yaubada Tomiya-vagata yana manuwa. Meda Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Yaku yo'ogaga agaidiya ganavemanuwa
be hinafadiya gananunudadana.
Iya yadi Yaubada amine ganamiyami,
badi yaku yo'ogaga amine hinamiyami.
Kaliva koyodiyao wananuyabuyabudi
be wanamiyavehailedi.
Gaitoma bwanebwanenedi wanavenikohiyedi
tu yaku alahinageya ganaselukuwemi.
ada omi ganahawavenatunemi kaliva vevine.
Iya Kaiwabu Tofaiwala-mo'a bonaku.
Au hidedemi Yaubada agaideya giwonadabadaba.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, wadanuwanuwa be nuwanuwa ase'asemiya tamo iya fa'ikuya wadavemididina. Yami yo'o agaimiya keke tamo hakwadi againe gadakoyo, keke tamo hakwadi koyona againe gadanuwa'abiyeni, keke tamo hakwadi gada'alasebesebeni.

Kaliva tufoidi au hi'awalaveku tu keke vaita hidedemi gadagahe-yo omi gadahawavekoyoyemi, keke. Boi gagahe amine ganuwanuwa lakahina agaimiya. Ka'i wayawaida buye kanamiyami o ka'i buye kana'alika, au nuwakuya wamimiyami.

Ganuwave'avimi fa'ina keke gadagahenuvagatugu. Yaku wavemwamwala ami egana mali kaliva agaidiya gakikilakahina. Valeyami hagihagina ganogalina fa'ina hawavemoluva lakahina ganuhagana. Aku vita moya'aina agaidiya vemwamwala againe gawahivemavemauga.

Tu Masedoniya ana fafaliya ahe gayemu-yo kadu vita ganuhagadi, vita againe keke tamo gadaveyawai. Masedoniya ana fafaliya ha'amine ha'amine ganauna amine vita tulina tulina ganuhagadi. Kaliva moya'aidi hivekwageyeku tu kadu nuwahinagekuya omi tovetumagana fa'imiya nuwaku ginauna lakahina ka'i yami vetumagana wakidonena o ka'i keke.
Atu Yaubada, Bana'e tonuwavita adi Tohawavemoluva amanadi, Taitasi yana yewa'ela againe gihawavemoluviku.

Aku hawavemoluva inubana keke Taitasi yana yewa'elagaga, au yami dewa againe tauna ana hawavemoluva ginuhagana fa'ina Yaubada kadu iya gihawavemoluviku. Yami tagi'uva yami talanuwa yami hawahega iya fa'ikuya ma hidedemi givenuwa'ataku, ada mena valeyami yaku vemwamwala boi lakahina tu adamoya gikivetubugi-mo'ena.

Yami leta boi ga'etoladina-ma againe gakivenuwavitami tu keke nuwahinagekuya gadagayo, “Gavadi-yo ga'etoladini?” Atu yaku leta fa'ina tova kabisona wa'ase'u'aulolo ma ga'itana fa'ina, ganuwanuwa vaita tauku gadahawataku be keke gada'etoladini.

Tu tova adamoya nuwaku giyamumu. Keke vaita omi gadakivenuwavitami fa'ina, au yami nuwavita guwana yami nuwavilana fa'ina gavemwamwala. Mena nuwavita omi wa'ayaunena-ma Yaubada nuwanuwana amine wa'ayaunena, ada au keke mena yaku leta againe gadakivekoyomi.

Nuwavita Yaubada nuwanuwana amine ka'ayaunena-ma guwana yada nuwavilana, ada ka'i Yaubada yada nuwavilana hidedemi ginaveleda, au yana kibababala kananuhagana. Nuwavitai-nadi gaitoma hagihagina tu gaveyao babi ana gaitomagaga hinuwenuwedi-ma vita hinuhagadi-yo hi'ago'uga tu keke hidanuwaviladi, medema keke hagihagina. Yadi dewa koyona keke hidavenikohiyeni fa'ina, yadi nuwavita guwana alika.

Tu taumadi nuwavita Yaubada nuwanuwana amine omi wa'ayaunena-ma guwana hagihagina waseyemaunena. Dewa koyona ami yo'o hinafamiya gidauda-ma fa'ina boi ga'etoladina be wanuhagana againe, wavediwe yami dewa wamadu'ihagihagiyena, nuwanuwami lakahina omi ami vita keke ma wanaseyemaunena. Wowomumu wa'ayaunena fa'ina yami ago'uga gavatubuga! Gadakeyemi fa'ina ase'asemi gi'akolukoluna. Au yami talanuwa agaikuya giyemuna-havagi, wahawahegemi be koyona Yaubada ana egana gikivekoyona-ma wamaduvaihegena ada au tokoyonai-nadi wavedewayaugina be wawavina. Boi ami wavita wamiyami tu adamoya yami dewa moya'aina wa'ihagihagiyedi fa'ina walu'aihaya.

Boi yami leta ga'etoladina-ma keke bana tokoyonagaga o ka'i bana yana koyona againe gikivekoyona-ma fa'idiya gada'etoladini. Yaubada gihalamaneku tu ga'etoladina nuwanuwaku ganavelugami be yami asehawahega iya agaikuya gavatubuga ma taumiyao wana'ayaunena.
Yaku leta guwana hidedemi waseyemaunena fa'ina hawavemoluva ganuhagana.

Tu keke asevatugaga gadanuhagani, au vemwamwala buye. Fa'ina Taitasi agaimiya gi'ela be moya'aimi yami hawahega gi'ita-yo yana nuwanuwa gi'ilova, ada mena yana nuwayamumu ga'itana againe iya gavemwamwala-mo'a.

Boi bana matane gagakahikahiyemi ada au amifata keke wowomumu wadaveleku. Tova moya'aina agaimiya gagahegahe velemo'ena. Meda anafaiweya gagakahikahiyemi amine Taitasi matane waseyemaunena velemo'ena.
Ada moya'aimi yami wamatauta yami wa'asehawahega wavega'aulena kadu bonana wavenogalena-ma huluvai-nadi againe nuwana ginunauyeni-yo gidu'udu'umi lakahi-mo'ena.
Ada akufaiweya yami bona'abi ganavetumagane-mo'ena fa'ina gavemwamwala-mo'a.

Yadi seyemauna hidede amine. Vita moya'aina agaidiya hiyemu be higaluvaluvadi lakahi-mo'ena tu vitai-dina agaidiya hivemwamwala-mo'a, kadu badi koyokoyo'avadiyao-mo'a nonogana yadi velekawowo againe yadi nuwadoga lakahina hiseyemaunena.

Iya tauku akufaiweya gana'awatalatalainedi gavaimi adifaiweya medemi hisena, kadu gavadi vaita taudiyao fa'idiya tu au ai'adi hisena be hikali'uho. Tovetumagana adi yo'o mali fafali agaidiya yadi velekawowo hiseusena Yaubada yana kaliva Yudiya ana fafali againe himimiyami-ma adi veluga fa'ina. Tu Masedoniya tovetumagana taudiyao yadi nuwenuweya hihawanuwenuwema, higa vaita anahawahegedi be badi buye yadi mani againe Yaubada yana kaliva hinavelugadi.

Ime anuwenuwedi vaita yadi mani hinasena. Tu hiveyaulowogima fa'ina keke yadi manigaga hidahawahegeni, au nagona taudiyao hihawahegedi Kaiwabu againe kadu ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa agaimeya Yaubada nuwanuwana amine.

MiMasedoniya hidedemi hihuluva fa'ina Taitasi agahevagadonena agayo, “Boi velekawowo fa'ina Kolinita tovetumagana agaidiya umidigahe-yo hivebutu hiseusena. Ma unana unavelugadi be yadi nuwadoga ana seyemauna hinaluyabuna.” Au hidedemi omi fa'imiya Taitasi agahena.

Omi gaitoma hagihagidi moya'aidi agaidiya wawahivemavemauga, vetumagana againe, laumamala nuwa'abi'abina againe, halamana againe, dibumuhiga tulina tulina agaidiya kadu ama nuwakabubu againe. Kadu nuwanuwama meda velekawowo ana nuwadoga againe wanawahivemavemauga.

Tu iya keke vaita velekawowo fa'ina gadavehimeyemi, keke. Au mali tovetumagana yadi asehawahega gayakahina be medema againe ganagaluvaluvami be ganahalamanena yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ka'i velemo'ena o ka'i keke.

Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadoga wahalamanena. Bana kikaiwabuna nonogana omi fa'imiya givekoyokoyo, higa vaita yana vekoyokoyo againe omi Yaubada againe wanavekikaiwabu. (Meda omi koyokoyo fa'idiya wanahawahegemi.)

Yami velekawowo fa'ina yaku kivetuvetunu hidede amine. Gilubodami be gavadi malamala kahegena againe wavebutuna, medema adamoya wanaluyabuna. Omi ami yo'o yami velekawowo wamidisena. Tu keke velekawowo-mo'enaga ana sewadi againe wai wadanagoni. Au velekawowo fa'ina yami nuwanuwa wamadusena.
Au yami mani ana tufo wanalele be yami velekawowo wanaluyabuna. Yami wa'asehawahega wavebutuna amine, meda yami wa'asehawahega wanaluyabuna. Gavaimi amifaiweya medemi wanaluyabuna.

Fa'ina ka'i yami wa'asehawahega yami velekawowo wanaseusena, au gavaimi amifaiweya medemi gilubodana Yaubada matane. Yaubada keke gidanuwanuwa vaita yada mani kabi'ona tu lakahina amine kanaseni. Au gavaimi agaideya gidadauda, medemi kanasena be ginalubodana Bana matane.
Meda gahe sa'eyana ada ita leleleya fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Hai kaliva a'a lakahina giyaudi, au anafata ana tufo keke.
Hai kaliva a'a kabi'ona giyaudi, au anafata keke gidakali'uho.
Au hidedemi a'a ana egana mana ana yaudi againe moya'aidi yadi ahiyauwa leleleya.
Tu Yaubada againe gavesiule fa'ina iya nuwanuwaku lakahina ganavelugami amine, Yaubada Taitasi ginuwanuwavelena be ami veluga fa'ina tauna gihawahegena.
Iya gave'o'olena be gina'ela gina'itami ma gimaduve'ehe. Tu nuwanuwana lakahina ginavelugami fa'ina, kadu tauna yana nuwenuweya givevai be agaimiya gina'ela.
Kadu kaliva sa'eyana buye a'iveninisedi, tobohiyadai-nadi yana hawahega Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana laumamala againe fa'ina tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina hihawaveyamumuyena.

Kadu'e keke yadi hawaveyamumugaga hidaveleni. Au ekelesiya moya'aidi bana kalivai-nadi hivegidena be ama vehimeya againe ginavebwa'uliyema. Higa ime ahawahegema be ekelesiya tulina tulina yadi velekawowo avaivaina-ma Yudiya tovetumagana agaidiya ananauwena, be medema againe Kaiwabu Tauna ana egana anakilakahina kadu taumeyao yama asehawahega koyokoyo adi veluga fa'ina anaseyemaunena.
Au hidedemi avevai be velekawowo lakahina ana itave'avina againe keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya gina'itaveloima.
Anuwanuwa-hagihagi be higa mani ana itave'avina againe yama huluva ginalubodana Kaiwabu matane, tu keke Kaiwabugaga au kaliva moya'aidi matadiya.

Kadu'e tobohiyada sa'eyana badi buye a'iveninisedi, bana'e tova a gavaiyehi agagaluvaluvana be medema againe yana asehawahega tova moya'aina kaliva adi veluga fa'ina ahalamanena. Ada adamoya yami bona'abi givetumagane-mo'ena fa'ina, kadu nuwanuwana lakahi-mo'ena ginavelugami.

Tu bana Taitasi ma aku aluna, bana iya buye afififaisewa ami veluga fa'ina. Tu tobohiyadeyao adi'iselu ma badi ekelesiya tulina tulina adi loseyana, ada mali kaliva yadi faisewa hi'ita-yo Keliso ana egana hikilakahina.

Medema fa'ina wanavega'auledi be hidedemi yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana badi agaidiya wanaseyemaunena, kadu dewai-nadi fa'ina gagakahikahiyemi medema wanavehawaledi, be medema againe tovetumagana adi yo'o moya'aidi omi velemodi ma hinahalamanena.

Ahe gahalamanena omi nuwanuwami lakahina koyokoyo wanavelugadi, kadu yami asehawahega fa'ina Masedoniya tovetumagana agaidiya gagakahikahiyemi. Omi miKolinita Akaiya ana fafaliya wamimiyami-ma fa'imiya gagahedi gagayo, “Tobohiyadeyao Akaiya ana fafaliya malamala kahegedi againe velekawowo fa'ina nuwadi ahe hisena.” Au hidedemi yami asehawahega valeyana hinogalini-yo tufoidi moya'aidi ase'asedi gi'ulaka be kadu badi hikidewadewa.

Hidedemi galukahihiyemi tu keke nuwanuwaku yaku gakahikahi yami asehawahega fa'ina, ana ita vaita gahe-kawowo amine agaimiya ananuhagani fa'ina mena tobohiyadeyao ga'iveninisedi be yami velekawowo ana sewadi againe hinavelugami-yo omi ahe wakidewadewa ma ananuhagami.

Wa'ita, ka'i miMasedoniya tufoidi iya buye agaimiya ana'ela be omi ka'i keke kikidewadewamiyao ananuhagami digo, iya yaku nuwave'avina agaimiya fa'ina ganawowomumu. Iya ganawowomumu tu omi'iyao ma yami wowomumu gavatubuga!

Keke nuwanuwaku ve'awowomumu fa'ina, gavaitana gilubodana be tobohiyadeyao gagahevagadonedi-yo agaimiya wai hinanagona be yami velekawowo ana kidewadewa hinaluyabuna, mena velekawowo-nadi boi wawonadabedabena amanadi. Ada au ime anayemu againe, keke wana'abigamagama, au yami wanuwadoga yami velekawowo ahe wakidewedewena-ma wanaseyemaunena.

Gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana tauna nuwahinagene ahe givehimeyena amine yana velekawowo ginasena. Keke yana wanuwalolona o ka'i ana wavehimeya amine ginaseni, au yana wa'asehawahega ginasena, fa'ina hai kaliva yana wavemwamwala gi'atu'atuhegahega, medema Yaubada nuwanuwana.

Ka'i gavadi gavadi agaidiya wanakali'uho, Yaubada anafaiweya agaimiya gina'atuhegahega be wanawahivemavemauga, higa vaita tova moya'aina yana atuhegahega yami nuwanuwa moya'aina anafata, kadu amifaiweya igibagiba hagihagina moya'aina agaidiya wanawahivemavemauga.
Meda gahe sa'eyana atuhegahega fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Yana folaka koyokoyo agaidiya gi'iyauyaulena,
yana igibagiba ana nuwanuwa dudauvina.

Tova moya'aina Yaubada ginakikivewakalivami be higa tova moya'aina yami wanuwadoga wana'atu'atuhegahega, ada kaliva moya'aidi yami atuhegahega ime nimameya hinanuhagana-ma fa'ina Yaubada againe hinavesivesiule.

Fa'ina yami velekawowo waseusena-ma guwana luhei. Sa'eyana ma Yaubada yana kaliva gavadi gavadi agaidiya hikali'uho-ma waveluvelugadi. Kadu sa'eyana ma kaliva moya'aidi Yaubada ana vesiule againe hiwahivemavemauga.

Mene yami velekawowo againe omi kaliva velemodi ma waseyemaunena fa'ina, kaliva omi fa'imiya Yaubada ana egana hinakilakahina hinagayo, “Badi miKolinita yadi wabona'abi Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana hawavemogatala hiluluve'avinena. Yadi bona'abi guwana yadi atuhegahega ide agaideya kadu mali tovetumagana agaidiya ka'itana.”
Au hidedemi badi hivekoyokoyo-ma Yaubada hinahawadavadavana, ada Bana ginuwadogavelemi ginuwadogavele-mo'emi fa'ina yadi watalanuwa lakahina hinave'o'olemi.
Tu Yaubada ma Natuna agaideya gihawahegena. Mena yana abahawahega keke kanawona. Au kanavesiule, siule-mo'a.

Iya ganuwanuwa vaita gana'ela agaimiya ana toveya mene kaliva tufoidi agaidiya ganagahe toyogina, badi hinuwanuwa vaita ime Yaubada yana tofaisewa babi ana nuwenuweya adahuluhuluva-ma kalivai-dina. Iya gahawanuwenuwemi keke wanakiluvaluvaku be badi ganadakeyedi amine, kadu omi agaimiya ganagahe toyogina.
Wona velemona babiya amimiyami tu keke babi ana nuwenuweya Yaubada yana faisewa againe adalulaugaviya.
Keke babi ana abalaugaviya ada'abini, au Yaubada yana abalaugaviya fifiwalana a'abina be medema againe amafaiweya Setani yana abavehimeya fifiwaladi analuyaweyawelidi.

Yaubada yana abalaugaviya fifiwalana againe babi ana nuwanuwa koyodi agaidiya kaliva hiluluve'avinedi-ma aluluvehawaliyedi. Setani yana kaliva Yaubada ana halamana ana eda nuwalaka tulina tulina agaidiya hisebodana tu abasebodai-dina aluluvehawaliyedi. Kaliva yadi nuwanuwa tulina tulina Setani gikive'avidi-ma yama abalaugaviya againe akakikakidi be Keliso againe asesedamanedi-yo Bana bonana hi'abi'abina.
Omi Kolinita tovetumagana fa'imiya abodaboda be Keliso ana bona'abi againe ahe wanahawahege-mo'emi yo gaveyao aimo hi'i'idibutoyoga medema makewa'e anavematahiwadiyedi.

Wa'itami, omi wa'italauva. Au wanana wana'ita-hagihagi. Mene hai kaliva tauna ginuwenuwena vaita bana Keliso yana kaliva, gilubodana be medema kadu ginanuwanuwa-hagihagi higa keke bana anakaibe Keliso yana kaliva, au ime buye bana amine.

Iya Kaiwabu yana afositolo aku vehimeya giveleku be yami vetumagana ganakivetoyogina, keke ami yo'o ganaluyawelini. Mena yaku abavehimeya fa'ina gagakahikahi ma'i lakahi-mo'ena nonogana keke yaku gakahikahi fa'ina ganawowomumu.
Keke nuwanuwaku yaku leta adi ita vaita iya gadagaluvaluva be gana'ivematauhimi.
Fa'ina kaliva tufoidi higahe higayo, “Folo yana leta vitana kadu toyogina tu tauna adahinafeya gimiyami ana toveya, bana vaita kaliva kowakowana amine, yana gahe vaita iyohoyoho.”

Badi kalivai-dina gilubodadi be hidahalamanena gamiyavehailemi ana toveya aku ita toyogina yaku leta agaidiya gaseyemaunena amine, meda aimo omi buye kanamiyami ana toveya yaku huluva toyogina agaimiya kadu ganaseyemaunena.

Mene kaliva tufoidi taudiyao adi egana hikilakahina vaita badi velemodi. Tu iya keke vaita ganaga'ase'asevatu be badi agaidiya ganahawaluveluveku o ka'i ganagahe vaita yaku kaiwabu badi yadi kaiwabu amine. Taudiyao yadi aba'ailaga againe yadi dewa hilagalagana kadu taudiyao buye hiveve'ahawaluvaluva. Hida hima kaliva kwavakwavadiyao.

Tu iya'eku ma Yaubada aku vehimeya giveleku be abavehimeyai-nadi ana ala gisena. Keke mali kaliva yadi faisewa fa'ina ganagakahikahi higa vaita gakahikahi keke yaku alakwauya ganatunevelowoni, au yaku abavehimeyagaga fa'ina ganagakahikahi, ada yaku abavehimeya ana ala omi miKolinita agaimiya give'onana.

Ka'i Yaubada keke gidavegideku-yo agaimiya gada'ela digo, yaku gakahikahi omi fa'imiya ana ita vaita yaku alakwauya gadatunevelowoni. Atu iya Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya gamidi'aliyena fa'ina, gilubodaku be ganagakahikahiyemi.

Yaubada yaku faisewa ana ala gimakana a galukahihiyena amine. Keke mali gaitoma yaku alakwauya hidadauda-ma fa'idiya ganagakahikahiku o ka'i mali kaliva yadi faisewa ganagakahikahiyeni. Tu yaku nuwave'avina hidede amine. Yami vetumagana ginatubutubuga ginatubutubuga tu Yaubada yaku ala ginaseliyena be akufaiweya mali fafaliya ganavagadamana be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaidiya ganalumamalena. Fa'ina keke nuwanuwaku faisewa mali kaliva yana ala hinagene ahe giluyabuna-ma ganagakahikahiyeni vaita yaku faisewa guwana.
Tu gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda-ma gigahe amine kanahuluva gigayo,
Hai kaliva nuwanuwana gakahikahi, medema keke tauna ana egana ginakilakahini. Au gilubodana be Kaiwabu ginagakahikahiyena.
Siule tobohiyakweyao, yaku gakahikahi fa'ina iya kaliva kwavakwavaku tu au ai'adi wada'atuvefa'ileku. Tu taumadi ahe wa'atu'atuvefa'ileku.

Yaubada yana kaliva ginuwenuwedi be higa Bana anakaibe yana giba hinamiyami amine, meda iya ganuwenuwemi. Keke nuwanuwaku mali kaliva yana abavehimeya againe wanadamana fa'ina kaliva natuna kwamayoku kaliva sa'eyana againe gihawakivefosena amine, meda iya omi moganemi sa'eyana higa Keliso againe gahawakivefosemi. E, ga'ita'itave'avimi be vaita kwamayoku yamumuna keke tamo kaliva hidadauveni-ma amine omi keke mali nuwanuwa wadamuliyeni-ma Keliso againe ganatunedamanemi be bana vavinena fa'ina.

Iya gamatauta vaita tuwai-lokalokana Setani oloto giluvaiyena be yana ve'alololo againe Ive ginuwa'abiyena amine, meda mene kaliva tufoidi aikaunuwanuwadiyao omi yamumumiyao yami wa'asehawahega Keliso anakaibe waluluve'avinena-ma hinanuwa'abiyemi be wananuyabuyabuna.

Boi tuwaina Yaubada gi'iveninisema be agaimiya amadu'ela Yesu fa'ine alumamalemi, yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna alukahihiyena be wavetumaganeni-yo Alu'aluwa Mahalina wanuhagana. Tu muliya mene kaliva tufoidi taudiyao yadi nuwenuweya agaimiya hi'ela Yesu ana ita'ita tulina hilumamalemi keke Bana ime alumamalemi-ma amine. Yadi vehawala tulina tuli-mo'ena nonogana wamaduvega'auledi be mali venuwa'ata yamumuna wamaduvetumaganeni-yo mali alu'aluwa wanuhagana.
Wa'itami, badi kalivai-dina wanuwenuwedi vaita yami afositolo kikaiwabudiyao kikaiwabu-mo'ediyao. Ka'i mene wanuwanuwa vaita badi hidakaiwabuhegeku? Keke-mo'a hidakaiwabuhegeku!

Wona velemona laumamala nuwa'abi'abina ana sikulu againe keke gadaluku tu we'a halamana agaikuya. Tova moya'aina yaku laumamala tulina tulina agaidiya yaku halamana gaseseyemaunena be agaimiya gimahali-mo'ena, fa'ina keke-mo'a badi hidakaiwabuhegeku.

Bonaku wanafatana. Boi Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina galumamalemi ana toveya, keke tamo akuga aku kevakeva o ka'i mani agaimiya gadavaini. Au hidede amine tauku gakihobuyeku be higa omi ganakilakahimi. Gavaiyami? Ka'i medema vaita gadadewa koyona matamiya?
Aku veluga fa'ina mali ekelesiya mani hiveleku againe vaita agaidiya gadakai'afu-yo higa omi hinafamiya akufaiweya gafaisewa.

Kadu boi omi buye kamiyami be tamo gavadi againe gakali'uho ana toveya, keke veluga agaimiya gadave'o'ola, au badi tobohiyadeyao Masedoniya againe hitauya be hi'ela-ma hivelugaku. Gavadi gavadi agaidiya gakali'uho, medema hiveleku. Tauku gahawataku be keke tamo vita aku itave'avina againe ganavelemi. Tuwaina hidedemi gahuluvimi, kadu aimo ganahuluvimi.

Keliso yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena we'a agaikuya gidadauda tu gagahegahe. Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna omi miAkaiya agaimiya galumamalena tu keke tamo aku laufata nimamiya gadavaini. Hidedemi gagakahikahiku ada keke tamo hakwadi mene Akaiya ana fafali matatabuna agaidiya yaku gakahikahi ginahawatani.
Gavana fa'ina gagakahikahi vaita aku veluga mali ekelesiya hiveleku tu omi keke? Ka'i keke agaimiya gadanuwanuwa fa'ina? Keke-mo'a! Yaku nuwanuwa lakahina agaimiya ma Yaubada gihalamanena.

Kadu'e boi gahuluvimi amine aimo kadu ganahuluvimi. Keke omi agaimiya mani ganavaini. Badi tove'alololo ma a'a mani agaimiya hivaivaina. Keke nuwanuwaku hinagahe hinagayo, “Bana Folo afositolo yadi faisewa gi'abina amine, meda ime afifaisewa be ave'afositolo,” fa'ina keke mani agaimiya ganavaini. E, keke tamo gavadi ganahuluvini be medema againe adifaiweya taudiyao hinagakahikahiyedi higa vaita yadi faisewa yaku faisewa adi ita leleleya.
Wa'ita, wama kalivai-dina afositolo fwayafwayadiyao, yadi wave'alololo hifififaisewa, taudiyao hikivenuyadi vaita badi Keliso yana afositolo velemo'edi.
Taumadi! Yadi ve'alololo keke wanayaulowogeni, fa'ina Setani tauna anafaiweya ginakivenuyana be ana nuya gina'osena-ma mahamahalina vaita Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata amine.

Setani vaita mahalina amine tauna gikivenuyana fa'ina, ka'i yana tofaisewa taudiyao hinakivenuyadi vaita badi eda tunutunugina ana tofaisewa, au keke kanayaulowogedi. Aimo adi laufata yadi dewa koyona amine hinanuhagana.

Kadu'e ganagahe-havagi. Keke gidalubodani be tamo hakwadi iya tokwavakwava ginanuwenuweku. Tu ka'i omi iya tokwavakwava wanuwenuweku digo, kaliva kwavakwavana wa'atuvefa'ilena amine iya wana'atuvefa'ileku be akufaiweya ma'i ganagakahikahiku.
Hida tauku gagakahikahiyeku ma keke Kaiwabu nuwanuwana amine. Au babi ana nuwenuweya kaliva kwavakwavaku amine gagakahikahiku.
Kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi babi ana gaitoma fa'idiya higagakahikahi fa'ina, kadu iya ganagakahikahiku.
Wa'itami, omi mene vaita yami wanuwahuya lakahina fa'ina tokwavakwava yami wa'asehawahega wa'atuvefa'iledi.

Ha! Omi atu'atuvefa'ilimiyao nonogana. Wa'itadi, kaliva higagakikaiwabu be vehimeya moya'aina agaidiya omi hive'agetogemi, o ka'i yami giba hi'a-'owona, o ka'i hi'alasebesebemi, o ka'i hi'itatagomi, o ka'i hitafimagigimi, tu gavadi-yo wa'atuvefa'iledi?
Mena huluva ase'asebouna kadu toyogina amine keke gadahuluvimi fa'ina, iya vaita kaliva kowakowaku ada au gawowomumu.
Tu iya vaita tokwavakwava amine ganagahe. Gavadi gavadi fa'ina mali kaliva yadi waselakalaka higakahikahidi, medemi yaku waselakalaka kadu iya ganagakahikahiku.
Gavaiyami? Ka'i badi Hibeliu kaliva? Meda iya Hibeliu kaliva. Ka'i badi Isileli yadi tubuga? Meda iya Isileli yadi tubuga. Ka'i badi Abelahamo againe hitubuyemu? Meda iya Abelahamo againe gatubuyemu.

Ka'i badi Keliso yana tofaisewa? Iya yana tofaisewa-mo'a. Iya hima vaita kabakabaleyaku amine gagahe. Yaku vediwe yaku luku deliya againe gatubuhegedi. Aku munugakoyokoyo a gavaiyehi tu badi'iyao ma'ita. Alikeya yaku lowogaluvaluva tova a gavaiyehi.
Tova faifi miYuda bulava metametana againe hilaulauku yadi ailauga teti-naeni (39) amine.
Tova tohiye miLoma fuluma againe hilaulauku, tova sa'eyana miYuda hifihafihaku higa hidatutuve'alikaku, tova tohiye laiya gatula, bogi sa'eyana aiyeta sa'eyana laiyoweya gakayokayo.

Tova moya'aina ganunumiyamiyana. Abagilagi vaita gufeya gadanuhagani, vaita tomunugakai'afu agaidiya, vaita tauku yaku yo'o kalivai-dina agaidiya, vaita yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya gadanuhagani. Kadu vaita melaleya vaita wala'aiya vaita lehageya abagilagi gadanuhagadi. Kadu vaita tobohiyakweyao ve'alololodiyao agaidiya gadagilagi.
Yaku wavediwe gafifaisewa kadu bogi a gavaiyehi keke gadadauda. Mafulauga agotaina ga'aya'ayaunena. Tova moya'aina akuga keke, yaku aiwa'u keke, yaku lifi keke.

Mena vitai-dina ahe gayakahidi tu kadu vita tufona moya'aina keke gadavehawadi-ma agaidiya badi afositolo fwayafwayadiyao gatubuhegedi. Kadu keke mena gaitomai-dinagaga gadanuhagadi, au aku vita sa'eyana lakahina ma tovetumagana adi yo'o fafali tulina tulina agaidiya nuwaku ginanauna lakahina, ka'i yadi vetumagana hikidonena o ka'i keke.

Hakwa'adi yana vetumagana againe gigakowakowa, medema iya buye gakowakowa ga'ayaunena. Kadu hakwa'adi dewa koyona ginuwa'abiyeni-yo gibe'u, medema fa'ina ga'ase'u'aulolo be ase'asekuya vaita ai gida'ala'alata. Au hidedemi aku vita tulina tulina gawahiwahidi.
Tu ka'i gilubodaku be gadagakahikahiku digo, gaitoma tulina tulina yaku gakowakowa hiseseyemaunedi-ma fa'idiya ganagakahikahiku.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, Bana Kaiwabu Yesu yana Yaubada kadu Tamana. Bana ana egana kanakilakahi-vagahina.
Boi tuwaina Damasiko againe gamiyami ana toveya, melala ana tovehimeya sa'eyana bana Kini Aletasi faisewai-nadi fa'ina givegidena-ma nuwanuwana ginakive'aviku fa'ina melala ana abaluku hibodafifina.
Tu tobohiyakweyao Yesu yana yo'o agaidiya feyawa againe hidodoku digo yogowaiya hisehobuyeku melala ana sifa kugakugana tabone hitunevelowoku, ada au Kini ga'otayabuyabuna.
Kadu akufaiweya gadagakahikahiku. Keke tamo aku veluga yaku gakahikahi againe ganavaini tu au ai'adi eno'ita kadu hawavemogatala Kaiwabu giveleku-ma fa'idiya ganalukahihi.

Keliso yana kaliva sa'eyana gahalamanena, malamala fotini kahegedi againe Yaubada bana kalivai-nadi lobama getane-mo'ane gimadusilakahina. Keke gadahalamaneni ka'i kaliva wawowona o ka'i alu'aluwanaga gisilakahina. Yaubada anakaibe gihalamanena.

Kadu ganagahe-havagi ka'iwa, ka'i kaliva wawowona o ka'i alu'aluwanaga gisilakahina ma keke gadahalamaneni au Yaubada anakaibe gihalamanena. Tu gaitoma sa'eyana gahalamanena higa Yaubada bana kalivai-nadi Faladaisi againe gisilakahina, ada medede againe nuwanuwa keke tamo hifufu againe anafaiweya ginalukahihiyedi-ma ginogalidi, nuwanuwai-dina fa'idiya Yaubada kaliva gihawatana be keke ginalukahihiyedi.

Bana kalivai-nadi Faladaisi againe gina-yo giyewana-ma ganagakahikahiyena tu keke tauku ganagakahikahiyeku au yaku gaitoma sa'eyanaga gilubodaku be medema ganagakahikahiyena higa gavadi gavadi agaidiya gagakowakowa, medema ganagakahikahiyedi.

Ka'i nuwanuwaku mena yaku ita fa'ina tauku gadagakahikahiyeku digo, iya keke vaita tokwavakwava fa'ina gavaimi tauku fa'ikuya gadagahe medema au velemo'ena. Tu yaku gakahikahi tauku gahawatana fa'ina keke nuwanuwaku eno'itai-dina fa'idiya kaliva hinakilakahiku. Au kaliva gavaimi yaku dewa hi'itana kadu yaku gahe hinogalina, medema fa'ina hina'itanuwenuweku ka'i iya kaliva lakahiku o ka'i kabi'oku.
Tova tohiye Kaiwabu gahawayafeyafena higa gidavaihegena.

Tu Kaiwabu gigaheku gigayo, “Yaku veluga afata, fa'ina ka'i yaku faiwala ya gakowakowa againe ganadodovedamana, au moya'aidi yaku faiwala gavatubuga hinamadu'itana.” Hidema fa'ina yaku wavemwamwala lakahina yaku gakowakowa ganagakahikahiyedi be higa Keliso yana faiwala agaikuya ginave'abaga.

Keliso yana faiwala yaku gakowakowa againe give'abaga-yo kaliva Bana ana egana hinakilakahina fa'ina, gakowakowa ihawadamana ase'u'aulolo ve'umagigi vita tulina tulina ganunuhagadi-ma fa'idiya ganavemwamwala. Fa'ina gagakowakowa againe Keliso gifaiwalaveleku-yo gafaiwala.

Mena kahihiku galukahihiyena-ma againe tauku gagakahikahiyeku be vekwavakwava amine gahuluva. Tu omi miKolinita taumiyao yami dewa fa'ina gakahikahi ana eda againe wawaviku. Iya afositolo yadi faisewa hinafamiya gafifaisewana fa'ina, vaita aku hawaveyamumu wadayakahini tu keke wadayakahini. Iya iyohoyoho nonogana badi yami afositolo kikaiwabudiyao, kikaiwabu-mo'ediyao keke-mo'a iya hidakaiwabuhegeku.

Afositolo velemo'ena ana iya'iyaya yaku wa'atuvefa'ila lakahina hinafamiya gaseyemaunedi. Yaubada gifaiwalaveleku-yo nimaku ana iya'iyaya kadu abaveyaulowoga kadu aituha fifiwalana gafifaisewadi be wa'itadi.

Gava'adi-ma againe mali ekelesiya gahuluvidi tu omi keke? Gaitoma sa'eyanaga, aku itave'avina fa'ina badi gahawahegedi tu omi gahawatami ada ka'i wawowomumu. Ka'i omi wanuwanuwa vaita hidemi agaimiya gakoyo digo, yaku koyona wadavenuwauluyena.

Tu we'a yaku ela anaveto agaimiya fa'ina ahe gakidewadewa, ada aku itave'avina fa'ina agaimiya keke tamo ganave'o'ola. Iya keke nuwanuwaku yami giba. Au nuwanuwaku omi taumiyao. Wa'ita, we'owe'o keke tamadiyao hinadiyao fa'idiya hidafaha. Au lakahidiyao natudiyao fa'idiya hifahafaha be hive'ave'adi. Meda iya nuwanuwaku vaita tamami amine gana'itave'avimi. E, yaku wavemwamwala ganahawahege-mo'eku be tova moya'aina omi fa'imiya ganavedivediwe ada ka'i yawaiku gananuhegena, au yamumuna. Gavaiyami? Iya ganuwanuwa lakahi-mo'ena agaimiya. Yaku nuwanuwa agaimiya gakivelakahina fa'ina, ka'i mene yami nuwanuwa agaikuya wakivekabi'ona?

Tu tufoimi wanagahe wanagayo, “Folo gigahe velemo'ena. Ana itave'avina fa'ina keke tamo agaideya gidave'o'ola. Tu bana kaliva aikaunuwanuwana. Yana alasebaseba againe yada mani givaina be tauna fa'ine gisewaimuliyena.”
Gavaiya'amine ga'alasebesebemi? Ka'i aku loseyana ga'iveninisedi-ma agaidiya vaita gada'alasebesebemi?

Taitasi gagahevagadonena be agaimiya gi'ela. Kadu tobohiyada bana buye ga'iveninisedi. Ka'i mene omi wanuwanuwa vaita Taitasi gida'alasebesebemi? Ime ama'iselu yama nuwanuwa sa'eyana kadu yama dewa meda sa'eyana agaimiya aseyemaunena-ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke?

Ka'iwa. Ka'i hida yaku leta wanahawahawana tu wananuwanuwa vaita omi matamiya taumeyao adalugolegolema? Keke, keke-mo'a! Ime Keliso buye ave'atutamo'aima-ma kalivai-mana Yaubada matane agahegahe. Kadu'e tobohiyanuwakweyao, yama havivila moya'aina omi yami vetumagana ana kivetoyoga fa'ina.

Fa'ina gamatamatauta vaita agaimiya gana'ela ana toveya, yami nuwanuwa tulina keke iya nuwanuwaku amine gananuhagami, kadu iya yaku nuwanuwa tulina keke omi nuwanuwami amine wananuhagaku. Gamatamatauta vaita vekwageya, ga'uma'uma, ila'a, tauda ada nuwanuwagaga, veyaina, ve'awayahayaha, selakalaka, ve'ataladabwadabwa agaimiya gananuhagadi.

E, gamatamatauta vaita agaimiya gana'ela ana toveya omi yami dewa keke wada'ihagihagiyeni fa'ina Yaubada wowomumu ginaveleku omi matamiya, ada tufoidi moya'aidi boi hihuluva koyona tu keke hidanuwaviladi-ma ganatagi'uvadi. Badi yadi dewa bwanebwanenena, yadi udo tulina tulina kadu nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina ana muliya keke hidavenikohiyedi-ma ganatagi'uvadi.
Gavadi gavadi fa'ina tobohiya uvekwageyena,
gilubodana be to'ita luhei o tohiye ya gahe adifaiweya
hina'alakakilina.
(Ka'i dewa aimo koyona amine, au hidedemi ganavedewayaugimi.).

Tuwaina yaku ela anavelu ana toveya badi boi nagona hikoyo kadu omi moya'aimi matahiwadi fa'ina gavenuwa'atami, kadu tova adamoya gamiyavehailemi tu gagahe-havagilemi hida yaku yewa'ela againe keke tamo hakwadi ganahinekalikaliyeni. Omi tokoyona moya'aimi ganavematahiwadiyemi.
Omi nuwanuwami iya Keliso loseyanina au velemo'ena ganaseyemaunena. Mena yaku vedewayauga againe wana'itana. Keliso keke kowakowana amine gidahuluvimi, au yana faiwala hinafamiya giseyemaunena.

Wona velemona Keliso yana wagakowakowa hikivekelosena tu adamoya Yaubada yana faiwaleya wayawaina gimimiyami. Keliso vitai-nadi ginuhagana ana toveya gakowakowa gi'ayaunena amine, meda ime Bana buye ave'atutamo'aima-ma agakowakowa. Atu Yaubada yana faiwaleya ime Bana buye wayawaima anamiyami-yo yama wafaiwala anahuluvimi.

Tu omi'iyao ma ase'asemi wanatoliluveluvena be wanahalamanena ka'i Keliso ana vetumagana againe wamimiyami o ka'i keke. E, hidedemi taumiyao wana'itanuwenuwemi. Vaita makewa'e wahalamanena Yesu Keliso Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami. Tu ka'i taumiyao ami itanuwanuwa againe keke yami vetumagana digo, kadu keke Yesu Keliso Tauna nuwahinagemiya gidamiyami.
Kadu ganuwave'avina yama vematahiwadi againe Yesu Keliso nuwahinagemeya gimimiyami-ma wana'itana. E, ime keke afositolo fwayafwayameyao ma wanahalamanena.

Ma Yaubada againe gave'ove'o'ola be omi keke tamo koyona wanafaisewani. Hidedemi gave'o'ola keke vaita mali kaliva yami dewa hagihagina hina'itani-yo hinagayo, “Makewa'e Folo velemodi.” Au nuwanuwaku omi wanahuluva hagihagina fa'ina hidedemi gave'o'ola. Kadu ka'i yami dewa ihagihagina digo, iya afositolo velemo'ena ma keke akufaiweya ami matahiwadi againe ganaseyemauneni ada au kaliva tufoidi hinanuwanuwa vaita iya keke velemodi. Tu mena aku hawaveyamumu keke gadanuwenuweni. Omi wanahuluva hagihagina medema nuwanuwaku.
Wa'ita, ime afositolo nuwanuwa velemo'ena keke-mo'a amafaiweya anasebodani. Au gilubodama be tova moya'aina nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana muliya fa'ina kaliva anagahegahevagadonedi.

Ka'i omi nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana muliya againe yami faiwala waseseyemaunena ada ime vaita kowakowameyao amine ahuluhuluvimi, au medema fa'ina avemwamwala. Ada ave'ove'o'olemi be dewa hagihaginaga agaimiya ginatubutubuga.

Iya Kaiwabu yana afositolo aku vehimeya giveleku be yami vetumagana ganakivetoyogina, keke ami yo'o ganaluyawelini. Keke nuwanuwaku yaku ela agaimiya ana toveya ami matahiwadi againe yaku abavehimeya ganaseyemauneni fa'ina, aimo gamiyavehailemi ana toveya yami dewa ana ihagihagi fa'ina au hidede amine ga'etoladina.

Au hidedemi bonaku ana tubuga. Kafoi tobohiyakweyao. Yami dewa wana'ihagihagiyena bonaku wanavenogalena yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana veyao againe wanamiyami. Ada Yaubada nuwakabubu kadu aseniwalova giveleveleda-ma agaimiya ginamiyami.
Taumiyao wanave'alulusiule againe tobohiyamiyao wana'atulauhidi be higa yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana wanaseyemaunena.
Yaubada yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao moya'aidi hilukafoi agaimiya.
Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadoga kadu Yaubada yana nuwakabubu kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana ve'aluna moya'aimi agaimiya ginadauda.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Bana Yesu Keliso yada koyona ana laufata fa'ina Tauna gihawahegena be medema againe hida aituhai-nadi ana dewa koyo-mo'ena againe gikibababaleda-yo koyona keke ginavehimeyeda. Yaubada Tamada yana nuwanuwa amine au hidedemi gikibababaleda.
Yaubada Tamada ana egana kanakilakahina be yana kaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Keke gavana fa'ina tu iya yami dewa fa'ina gayaulowoga. Adamoya Yaubada againe wavetumagana kadu adamoya wamadunuyabuyabuna, Bana Keliso yana nuwadogeya giluwafami amanadi. Taumadi Yaubada wamadunuyabuyabuna be mali Venuwa'ata Yamumuna amine wahagavilami!

Venuwa'ata Yamumuna keke tamo velugana tu hidedemi gayakahina fa'ina kaliva tufoidi nuwami hikivegafo'uya'uyana ada higagaluvaluva be Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hinakivilavilani-yo hinakivekoyona.

Boi ime omi agaimiya a'ela kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna alumamalena. Atu ka'i tova adamoya ime'eyao ada'ela o ka'i lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana gidahobu'ela be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana nuwanuwa tulina agaimiya adalumamalena digo, gidalubodama be Yaubada ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe gidahegema.

Wanogali! Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya alumamalena be omi wavetumaganena. Tu boi agahemi amine meda adamoya gagahe-havagilemi. Ka'i tova adamoya tamo hakwadi gi'ela be Venuwa'atai-nadi gikivilavilani-yo agaimiya gilulumamalena digo, gilubodana be Yaubada ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe gidahegena.
Keke tamo kaliva Venuwa'atai-nadi gidahawaveleveleku kadu keke tamo hakwadi ana nuwanuwa fa'ina gidavehawaleku, keke-mo'a. Au Bana Yesu Keliso Tauna agaikuya gihawavemogatalena.

Ime miYuda yama tafalolo ana idibumuhiga againe tobohiyave'ave'avalakweyao tufoidi moya'aidi gafaiwalahegehegedi. Tova moya'aina dewa tulina tulina bwanenemeyao hihawavelevelema-ma agaidiya gahawahege-mo'eku.

Au hidedemi gamiyami tu Yaubada aimo keke gadatubuga tu giluwafaku-ma yana nuwadogeya gikovaku be Bana againe ganavetofaisewa. Ada tova Bana matane gilubodana amine Natuna agaikuya gihawavemogatalena be badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Bana fa'ine ganalumamaledi fa'ina. Tovai-nadi Natuna agaikuya gihawavemogatalena, keke tamo kaliva againe gadana be higa ginakivetuvetunuku fa'ina. Kadu keke Yelusalema againe gadana higa badi gaveyao himidive'afositolo-ma gana'itadi fa'ina, keke-mo'a. Au auhe'amanadi gana fafali ana egana Alebiya againe tu muliya Damasiko againe gayewaku.
Gamiyami malamala tohiye tu Yelusalema againe galaka Fita gana'itana be yana nuwanuwa ganahalamanena. Ada bana againe gamiyami aiyeta fifitini.
Afositolo velugadiyao keke tamo gada'itani, au Yemesa gagana ga'itana, bana Kaiwabu taina.

Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe. Hida agaimiya ga'etoladina-ma keke-mo'a fwaya. Au hidedemi wahalamanena keke kaliva tu Keliso Tauna Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galumamalena-ma iya agaikuya gihawavemogatalena.
Muliya gana Siliya kadu Silisiya adi fafaliya.

Ada medema tovai-nadi Keliso ana tovetumagana adi yo'o tulina tulina Yudiya ana fafaliya himimiyami-ma keke tauku hidahalamaneku. Au valeyakuga kaliva hilukahihiyena-ma hinogalina higayo, “Bana kalivai-nadi boi ide tovetumagana gikikivekoyoda ada gigaluvaluva be ginaluyaweyaweli-'owoda, medema tova adamoya kaliva gilulumamaledi be higa Yesu Keliso againe hinavetumagana.”
Au hidedemi valeyaku hinogalina fa'ina, Yaubada againe higahevesiule.
Malamala fotini gahegedi tu Yelusalema againe galaka-havagi tu hida tovai-nadi Banabasi buye alaka. Kadu Taitasi buye ganauwena.

Gana fa'ina Yaubada agaikuya gihawavemogatala vaita gidalubodaku ganana. Gana Yemesa Yoni Fita kadu ekelesiya ana tonagona velugadiyao higa badi vaita adi waegana buye avaga'auta be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina galulumamaledi-ma tonagona agaidiya ga'awatalatalainedi. Badi tonagonagaga galukahihiyedi fa'ina nuwanuwaku gavaimi gavaimi gavehavehawala ma hinahalamanena. Keke nuwanuwaku hinahawataku be yaku faisewa yaku wa'idibumuhiga boi gafaisewana kadu adamoya gafifaisewana-ma ginahavaini-yo guwana keke.

Au yaku faisewa hihawaveyamumuyena ada Taitasi givebwa'uliyeku-ma fa'ine keke tamo gavaimi hidagahe. Higa bana keke kwanamiYuda au kwanamiGilika fa'ina Yaubada yana iya'iyaya bana wowone boi keke hidatomogolohini. Bana kwanamiGilika nonogana ana tomogolota fa'ina keke hidavehimeya.

Tu miYuda tufoidi Taitasi mena ana tomogolota fa'ina higaheya'aya'ala tu ime keke-mo'a adavenogaleni.
