Badi kalivai-dina hive'alololo vaita badi Yesu ana tovetumagana, ada taudiyao yadi nuwanuwa Yesu ana vetumaganasebaseba againe hikeva-yo yada yo'o agaidiya hiluku be hinanogalayavaga. Boi Mosese yana vehimeya dibune kamiyami-yo gilubodada be ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina kadamuliyena fa'ina ide vaita yogoyogonideyao kadamiyami. Tu adamoya Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-yo ada aiyauga kanuhagana be Mosese yana vehimeya agaideya gihavaina. Atu badi tove'alololo ime tonagona agaimeya hiluku be ama aiyauga hinanogaliyavagina. Nuwanuwadi Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe hinave'agetogema. Tu keke nuwanuwama vehimeyai-nadi ana muliya be Yesu ana vetumagana hinave'atutamo'aini-yo Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana nuwanuwa velemo'ena hinakivilavilani be omi Galesiya tovetumagana yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina amanadi nuwami hinakivegafo'uya'uyani fa'ina keke-mo'a adavenogaledi.

Badi kikaiwabudiyao keke vaita mali vehimeya hidaveleku. Au aku vehimeya Yaubada giveleku-ma hi'itahalamanena. Bana Fita Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna badi miYuda agaidiya ginalumamalena ma hidedemi ana vehimeya givelena amine, meda iya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina agaimiya ganalumamalena ma vehimeyai-nadi giveleku.
Fa'ina Yaubada Fita gifaiwalavelena be afositolo adi maka miYuda fa'idiya gi'abina amine, meda iya gifaiwalaveleku be afositolo adi maka yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina fa'imiya iya ga'abina.

Au hidedemi aku vehimeya Yaubada giveleku-ma hi'itahalamaneni-yo Yemesa, Fita be Yoni, badi vaita ogola amine to'ekelesiya matadiya amanadi, nimadi hitunena be buye ave'animasaibutu, higahe higayo, “Yaubada yana faisewa againe omi ime amine. Gilubodami be omi yo'o tulidiyao hinafadiya wanafaisewa tu ime yada yo'o miYuda hinafadiya anafaisewa. Tu yama ve'o'ola sa'eyanaga. Yama koyokoyo wavebutu wanuwenuwedi-ma adi nuwanuwa againe keke wana'ilova.” Au hidedemi higahe. Tu iya nuwanuwaku lakahina koyokoyo adi nuwanuwa.
Tu tova sa'eyana Fita Anidiyoka melala againe gilakayemu ada yana dewa sa'eyana keke-mo'a hagihagina fa'ina, gagahelumatana.

Gilakayemu hidede amine. MiYuda ama hawata sa'eyana wahalamanena higa ime keke omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina buye kada'au'a. Fita Anidiyoka againe gimidi'ela ana toveya, yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina buye hi'au'a, tu Yemesa tobohiyaneyao miYuda tufoidi gi'iveninisedi-ma Yelusalema againe hitauya be hilakayemu ana toveya, Fita givebutu giyewana be yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina gimiyavehailedi. MiYuda tovetumagana Yelusalema hitauya-ma tufoidi au ana hawata aimo hi'itave'avina kadu higahe vaita yo'o tulidiyao tovetumaganai-dina gilubodadi be wowodi ana tomogolota hidavaina. Fita yadi nuwanuwa keke gida'itave'avini fa'ina gimatausedi be yo'o tulidiyao gimiyavehailedi.
Meda miYuda tovetumagana Anidiyoka againe himiyami-ma hivebutu Fita amine hinuwanuwaluga be himiyavehailedi. Ada keke badi'iyaogaga au kadu Banabasi buye'i yadi nuwaluga againe hinuwa'abiyena.

Tu iya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana eda againe keke hidanauna ma ga'ita-yo kaliva moya'aidi matadiya Fita gagahelumatana gagayo, “O'eni kwanamiYuda. O kwanamiYuda nonogana keke miYuda ada hawata amine udahuluva, au badi yo'o tulidiyao yadi dewa amine uhuluva. Kadu gavadi-yo adamoya miYuda yada dewa amine uyewa-yo vaita yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina ya dewa againe aba'ita udavehawaledi udagayo, Omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina Yesu againe wavetumagana-ma gilubodami be ime miYuda ama vehimeya ama hawata tulina tulina agaidiya wadamiyami. Hima we'a keke hagihagina agaikuya.

Wa'ita, Mosese yana vehimeya yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya keke gidadauda fa'ina kavewagadi tokoyona. Tu ide keke tokoyona badi yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina keke adi wavehimeya amine. Au ide katubuga miYuda ada wavehimeya.

Katubuga miYuda nonogana kahalamanena kaliva yada yegayega keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe kadavaini, au Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana againe kavaina. Medema fa'ina kadu ide miYuda Yesu Keliso againe kavetumagana be Yaubada yada vetumagana Keliso againe fa'ina giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane. Mena yada yegayega keke Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe kadaleleni, fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi vehimeyai-nadi gina'idibumuhigeni-yo Yaubada ginaseni yegayegana Bana matane.

Kadu ganagahe. Yada yegayega Keliso againe kalelena, higa Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-yo Yaubada giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane. Yada yegayega keke vehimeya ana idibumuhiga tu Keliso ana ve'atutamo'aina againe kalelena fa'ina, vaita kadagayo, Vehimeya tulina tulina ana idibumuhiga keke akufaiweya, ada au badi yo'o tulidiyao keke adi wavehimeya ma adi ita vaita tokoyona amine, meda ide miYuda ada ita vaita tokoyona amine gilakayemu. Hida gavaiyami? Ka'i ana nuwanuwa vaita Keliso dewa koyona againe gidanuwa'abiyeda? Keke, keke-mo'a!

Wa'ita, boi yada yegayega ana nauhaga vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe ma nuwanuwai-nadi kakilowena. Ka'i adamoya kadavebutu vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe yada yegayega fa'ina kadaluve'avina-havagi digo, ide tokoyona velemo'ena ma kadaseyemaunena, fa'ina vehimeya ana idibumuhiga keke adafaiweya.

Tu yaku yegayega vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe aimo keke gadaleleni fa'ina, yaku miya hidede amine. Iya ga'alika be vehimeyai-nadi agaikuya gihavaina, higa vaita wayawaiku ivaguna gamimiyami be Yaubada againe gahawahege-vagahiku. Hida ga'alika ma gavaiyami? Yesu keloseya hitutuvefosena ana toveya, kadu iya tuwaina yaku nuwanuwa koyona againe gamiyami-ma kalivai-kuna keloseya ga'alika. Yaku miyami tuwaina gihavaina tu adamoya keke tauku yawaiku againe gadamiyami, au Keliso Tauna nuwahinagekuya gimimiyami-ma yawaine gamimiyami, Bana'e agaikuya ginuwanuwa-yo iya fa'ikuya Tauna gihawahegena amanadi.

Ka'i yaku yegayega fa'ina vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe gadaluve'avina digo, medema ana ita vaita Yaubada yana nuwadoga gadakiloweni vaita gaitoma-kawowo. Tu iya keke-mo'a ganakiloweni. Ka'i vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe yada koyona ana laufata ana aiyawela kadanuhagana digo, Keliso gida'alika-kawowo.” Au hidedemi ganuwenuwemi tu gagahe.
Omi miGalesiya kwavakwavamiyao! Wona velemona nuwami gifani. Boi Yesu Keliso yana alika keloseya kahihina matamiya galumamalena be gimahalina agaimiya. Tu gavadi-yo adamoya wanuwanuwafani?

Yaku toliluvaluva aimo taumiyao wanafatana. Alu'aluwa Mahalina ase'asemiya giluku-ma gavaiya'amine wavaini? Ka'i vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe o ka'i Yesu Keliso bonana ana vetumagana againe? Au bonaku wafata.

Gavadi-yo wavekwavakwava? Alu'aluwa Mahalina vetumagana againe wavaini-yo yana faiwala againe wavebutu Yaubada yana edeya wanauna. Ka'i mene nuwanuwami adamoya wanayewa taumiyao yami faiwaleya wanagaluvaluva be wanayegayega Yaubada matane?
Gaitoma moya'aina ami kibababala fa'ina wa'ayaunedi-ma ka'i wa'ayaune-kawowodi? Hima nuwaku wakivegafo'uya'uyana. Ami ayauna keke-mo'a gaitoma-kawowo.

Yaubada Alu'aluwana givelemi be aituha fifiwalana hinafamiya gififaisewana. Gavaiyami? Ka'i vehimeya wa'idibumuhigena fa'ina o ka'i Venuwa'ata Yamumuna wanogalina-ma wavetumaganena fa'ina hidedemi gihuluvimi? Taumadi makewa'e yami vetumagana fa'ina!
Bana Yaubada givetumaganena, ada yana vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya.
Yaubada hidedemi gigahe fa'ina wanahalamanena badi Abelahamo againe hitubuyemu-ma bana bwaneneneyao kaliva matadiya, tu badi yadi wavetumagana medema Abelahamo bwaneneneyao Yaubada matane.

Ada gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda be medema againe kahalamanena tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada givevai vaita yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina yadi vetumagana fa'ina ginasedi yegayegadiyao Bana matane. Ada au yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Abelahamo againe gigaheye-vagahina gigayo,
O againiya yo'o tulina tulina adi nuwakabubu hinanuhagana.
Au hidedemi Yaubada gigahe.
Medema fa'ina kahalamanena Abelahamo Yaubada againe givetumagana-yo nuwakabubu ginuhagana. Kadu meda gaveyao moya'aidi hivetumagana, medema nuwakabubu hinuhagana Abelahamo amine.
Gaveyao vehimeya matatabuna buki-vehimeya againe hi'etoladina-ma keke tova moya'aina hida'i'idibumuhige-'owoni, medema Yaubada yana alatabutabu dibune himimiyami.
Hai kaliva vetumagana againe gimimiyami fa'ina bana yegayegana Yaubada matane, medema wayawaina velemo'ena ginamiyami.
Hai kaliva vehimeya tulina tulina gina'idibumuhigedi, medema yawai-vagahina ginanuhagana.
Gaveyao moya'aidi ai againe hivekukedi,
medema Yaubada yana alatabutabu dibune himimiyami.

Yesu Keliso au hidedemi keloseya gitutuvehobuda be higa nuwakabubu Yaubada Abelahamo againe giwonadabedabena-ma omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina agaimiya ginalakayemu. E, omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi-ma nuwakabubu-nadi gilakayemaunimi, ada au Bana againe kavetumagana fa'ina, Alu'aluwa Mahalina Yaubada giwonadabedabena-ma agaideya giyemu.

Tobohiyakweyao, veyao tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada Abelahamo againe gisena-ma ide tomiyababi yada dewa sa'eyana againe ganaluvefosena. Ka'i kaliva adi'iselu nuwanuwadi hinaveyao, au yadi lukahihi againe yadi wonadabadaba hinayakahina be yadi'a againe veyao hinakivefaiwalana. Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya mali nuwanuwa againe yadi veyao ginasitunutunugini o ka'i ginaluvefovefofoni.

Meda anafaiweya Yaubada yana wonadabadaba Abelahamo againe kadu bwanenena againe giyakahina-ma keke ginayawelini. Gahe Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe ma keke gidagahe gidagayo, Bwanenemomo gananuwakabubuyedi, vaita kaliva moya'aidi gidagaheyedi. Au gigayo, Bana bwanene gananuwakabubuyena vaita kaliva sa'eyanaga gidagaheyeni, higa Bana Keliso.

Abaluvefota gamidilukahihiyena-ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Yaubada yana veyao Abelahamo againe gisena be yana wonadabadaba giyakahina higa yana veyao bana againe ginaduva-vagata. Malamala moya'ai-mo'ena (430) hihegedi tu Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese awane giyemu. Vehimeyai-nadi keke anafaiweya Yaubada yana veyao boi tuwaina Abelahamo againe gisena-ma ginasitunutunugini, kadu keke anafaiweya yana wonadabadaba ginatogahegeni, keke-mo'a.

Ide ada du'u Yaubada ginaveleda-ma yana wonadabadaba againe ginalakayemaunida. Ka'i du'u-nadi Mosese yana vehimeya againe gidave'inuba digo, aimo keke Yaubada yana wonadabadaba againe gidave'inuba. Tu Yaubada Abelahamo ginuwadogena be yana wonadabadaba againe ana du'u givelena.
Ma ka'i kaliva sa'eyanaga digo, keke nuwanuwana tomidihinafa. Ada au Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a ada yana wonadabadaba gisena ana toveya, keke tamo loseyanina au Bana Tauna giyakahina.

Tu Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe vaita tomiyababi moya'aida koyona ana abavehimeya dibune yogoyogonideyao kamimiyami. Gavadi-yo ada aiyogona fa'ina Yaubada yana bukiya hidedemi gigahe? Me Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana ana nauhaga inubana vetumagana Yesu Keliso againe, ada gaveyao hidedemi hivetumagana, medema Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana hinanuhagana.

Tu mena vetumagana ana eda aimo Yaubada keke gidayemauneni ana toveya, yana vehimeya Mosese awane giyemu-ma dibune yogoyogonideyao kamiyami. E, vehimeyai-nadi giyogoda ginunauwena tu Yaubada vetumagana ana eda giyemaunena ana toveya.

Ada au Yaubada yana vehimeya vaita ada tomiyatagona higa dewa fa'ina gikivetuvetunuda ginunauwena tu Keliso gihobu'ela. Au hidedemi vehimeyai-nadi gimiyatagoda be nuwada gitaina Keliso againe, higa nuwanuwada yada vetumagana Keliso againe kanaseni-yo Yaubada ginaseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane.
Tu vetumagana ana eda Yaubada ahe giyemaunena fa'ina, ide Mosese yana vehimeya yana miyatagona againe aimo keke kadamiyami.
Wa'ita, omi gaveyao Yesu Keliso ana eganeya wabafitaiso, au omi Bana buye wave'atutamo'aimi. Ada gaveyao moya'aimi bafitaiso againe Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi, medema Keliso againe wavaigau.

Tuwaina tufoimi miYuda tu tufoimi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina, tufoimi agetoga tu tufoimi taumiyao yami faisewa wavehimeyena, tufoimi kaliva tu tufoimi vevine. Atu tova adamoya Yesu Keliso againe wavesa'eya fa'ina au ami ita leleleya.
Ka'i omi Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine, au omi Abelahamo bwaneneneyao ada Yaubada yana nuwakabubu Abelahamo againe giwonadabedabena-ma omi wananuhagana.

Tu yaku gahe ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Kaliva sa'eyana gigahe vaita gina'alika yana babi yana lokoloko natuna nimane ginasena higa ana du'u. Natuna aimo kabi'ona tu gina'alikayabuyabuna ada ana tofayaya giyakahidi. Gaveyao kwamana hinafayayena be agaidiya ginave'agetoga medema yana giba hina'ita'itave'avina, tu kwamana ginave'asevatu au yana giba ana abavehimeya tauna ginavaina tamana tovai-nadi giyakahina amine.

Meda anafaiweya tuwaina ide aimo we'owe'o amine Yaubada keke kadahalamane-hagihagiyeni ana toveya, badi balauma fifiwaladiyao hida babi hivehivehimeyena-ma agaidiya kave'agetoga be yadi nuwanuwa kamuliyena.
Tu tova gilubodana-ma gilakayemu againe, Yaubada Natuna babiya gi'iveninisena be kwamayoku-mo'a hivenatunena ada gitubuga kwanamiYuda fa'ina Mosese yana vehimeya dibune gimiyami.
Au hidedemi giyemu be higa ide Mosese yana vehimeya dibune kamiyami-ma ginatutuvehobuda, higa vaita yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaseda-yo Yaubada natuneyao amine kanamiyami.
Ada omi Yaubada natuneyao fa'ina, Natuna Alu'aluwana ase'asemiya gi'iveninisena, Bana'e gi'alaveleveleda-yo kakovakova kagayo, “Baba, Kamaku.”
Medema fa'ina omi aimo keke agetoga au Yaubada natuneyao wamimiyami. Ada omi natuneyao fa'ina, aimo gavadi gavadi Yaubada badi natuneyao adi du'u fa'ina gisevehailena, medema wananuhagana.

Tu tova adamoya Yaubada buye wavetobohiyana, o ka'i ganagahe Yaubada omi givetobohiyanemi. Ma gavai'ona-yo balauma hida babi hivehivehimeyena-ma agaidiya wayewa? Badi keke velemona tofaiwala au gaitoma-kawowo. Ka'i mene nuwanuwami kadu badi agaidiya wanave'agetoga-havagi?
Tafalolo tulina tulina higa aiyeta vaikohi aituha malamala fa'idiya wanuwanuwa lakahina vaita medema tovai-dina tova lakahina be adi itave'avina againe yami yegayega Yaubada matane wanavaina.
Omi fa'imiya gamatamatauta vaita ami veluga fa'ina gadavediwe-kawowo.

Ho tobohiyakweyao, wadabona'abiyeku be iya vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe keke gadaluluve'avina amine kadu omi wadahuluva. Wa'ita, iya vaita gadaveyo'o tulimiyao yo omi keke ami wavehimeya amine gamimiyami. Keke tamo agaikuya wadakoyo.
Au ahe wahalamanena yaku ela nagona ma yaku wa'aulolo fa'ina agaimiya ga'ela be Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina galumamalemi.
Yaku aulolo fa'ina vita gavelemi tu au ai'adi keke wada'itatagoku kadu keke wadakiloweku. Au yami wavemwamwala wavega'auleku vaita iya lobama ana tovenuwa'ata amine, e vaita iya Yesu Keliso Tauna.
Boi yami vemwamwala lakahina ma hai waseni? Iya agaikuya wanuwanuwa lakahina fa'ina, akufaiweya omi fa'imiya gana'awatalatalaina higa ka'i amifaiweya digo, matami wadamwamwalina be wadaveleku.
Iya nuwanuwa velemo'ena agaimiya galukahihiyena fa'ina, ka'i adamoya mene wanuwanuwa iya vaita nibaimi amine?

Tu wama kalivai-dina ma tova moya'aina agaimiya hihawahawahegedi be higa yadi nuwanuweya hinanuwa'abiyemi tu yadi inuba keke hagihagina. Yadi nuwanuwa hidede amine. Nuwanuwadi hinavesidakami be wananuyabuyabuku-yo badi agaidiya wanahawahege-mo'emi.

Ka'i yada inuba hagihagina digo, gilubodada be mali kaliva fa'idiya kanahawahege-mo'eda. Meda boi iya omi buye kamiyami ana toveya iya fa'ikuya wahawahege-mo'emi. Tu keke vaita iya buye kamiyami ana toveyagaga wananuwenuweku, au gilubodami be tova moya'aina wadanuwenuweku.

Ho natu'ase'asekweyao, nuwanuwaku lakahina Keliso ana ita'ita amine omi ami ita'ita ginalakayemu. Tu kwamayoku hivefahedi be venatuna againe aulolo lakahina hi'ayaunena amine, meda omi fa'imiya kadu adamoya gavedivediwe-havahavagi tu Keliso ana ita'ita amine wanatubuyemu.

Ho gavaimi be adamoya iya omi buye kadamiyami! Ka'i buye kadave'amagigi'ita'ita, au agoku ana nogala tulina akufaiweya gadaseyemaunena. E, omi fa'imiya nuwaku givegafo'uya'uya fa'ina nuwanuwaku kanave'anauhaga.
Tu omi mene nuwanuwami Mosese yana vehimeya dibune wanamiyami-ma agaikuya wanabonalaufata. Vehimeyai-nadi gavaimi gigahe ma ma'i wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke?

Kahihi buki-vehimeya againe gidadauda-ma wa'ita hidede amine. Abelahamo natuneyao luhei. Sa'eyana badi agetoga adi egana Hega agaidiya gitubuga, tu velugana tauna vavinena Sela agaidiya gitubuga, badi keke agetoga.

Bana kwamana agetoga hivenatunena-ma ana egana Isimeli, bana babi ana dewa amine gitubuga. Tu kwamana Abelahamo tauna vavinena keke agetoga hivenatunena-ma ana egana Aisake, bana yana tubuga inubana Yaubada yana wonadabadaba againe.

Badi Hega ma vaita oya Sainai fafali ana egana Alebiya againe gidadauda-ma amine. Kadu badi kwamayoku abaluvefota babi ana Yelusalema fa'ina ada mena melalai-nadi miYuda hinadi, badi gaveyao Mosese yana vehimeya dibune ve'agetogeya himimiyami-ma kalivai-dina.
Tu lobama ana Yelusalema keke vehimeyai-nadi ana ve'agetogeya gidamiyami, ada mena melalai-nadi vaita ide Keliso ana tovetumagana hinada amine.
Wa'ita, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
O kwamayoku kakali
venatuna ana aulolo keke uda'ayauneni-ma
unavemwamwala, e unakovakovavemwamwala.
Fa'ina o mogane ginuyabuyabu-ma
aimo natumiyao moya'aidi wananuhagadi.
Badi kwamayoku wamoganedi ma natudiyao moya'aidi
tu omi natumiyao aimo moya'ai-mo'edi.
Au hidedemi Aiseya Yelusalema luhei vaita vevine luhei amine gilukahihiyedi be Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda.
Tu omi tobohiyakweyao Yesu yana yo'ogaga againe amanadi Aisake Yaubada yana wonadabadaba againe gitubuyemu amine, meda omi Yaubada yana wonadabadaba guwana.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena bana Isimeli babi ana deweya gitubuga-ma bana Aisake Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana faiwaleya gitubuga-ma yana miyami gikikivekoyona amine, meda tova adamoya badi nuwanuwadi Mosese yana vehimeya kanamuliyena-ma ide Alu'aluwa Mahalina yawaine katubuvagu-ma hikikivekoyoda.
Atu Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gavaimi gigahe? Gigayo,
Bana kwamayoku keke agetoga ma natudi anakaibe tamana ana du'u ginavaina. Tu bana kwamayoku agetoga natudi keke du'u-nadi buye hinavaini. Fa'ina kwamayoku agetoga wanatudi kaliva unawavidi.
Au hidedemi Yaubada Abelahamo againe gigahe.

Tobohiyakweyao ada gahe hidede amine. Auwe yada abaluve'avina Mosese yana vehimeya ana idibumuhiga againe, fa'ina ide keke kwamayoku agetoga natudiyao amine higa vaita Mosese yana vehimeya dibune yogoyogonideyao kadamiyami. Au ide kwamayoku keke agetoga ma natudiyao, Keliso ana vetumagana againe yauyaugideyao kamimiyami amanadi.
Wanogali! Iya Folo gagahemi. Ka'i wanahawahegemi be Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowomiya hinatomogolohina digo, ana nuwanuwa vaita keke tamo veluga Keliso againe wananuhagani.
Ganagahe-havagi. Gaveyao moya'aimi wowomi ana tomogolota againe wanahawahegemi, medema gilubodami be Mosese yana vehimeya ana nuwanuwa matatabuna wada'idibumuhige-'owona.

Omi gaveyao wagagaluvaluva be vehimeyai-nadi ana idibumuhiga againe yami yegayega Yaubada matane wanavaina, medema taumiyao Keliso againe walugolohimi. Keliso wahegena fa'ina, Yaubada yana nuwadoga ana alakwauya wamimiyami.
Tu ime'eyao ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina givetumaganavelema-yo anuwave'avina Yaubada ginasema yegayegameyao Bana matane. Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina gifaiwalavelema be mena yama yegayega-mo'a fa'ina alulauboda.

Ide Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ka'i wowoda ana tomogolota kavaina o ka'i keke kadavaini, au medema gaitoma-kawowo. Ka'i Keliso againe kanavetumagana, ada vetumaganai-nadi guwana tobohiyadeyao buye yada ve'aveluveluga againe kanaseyemaunena, medema gaitoma lakahina.
Boi Keliso yana eda againe wamadumadu toyogina. Gaveyao magigimi hisebodani-yo nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana idibumuhigeya hive'ilovemi?
Mena ve'ilova keke Bana gikovami-ma againe gidave'inuba.
Yada gahe sa'eyana ma “Isi gaitoma kabi'ona tu falawa hinagene ginauna tu beledi matatabuna gitubuga.”

Tu omi'iyao kadu iya'eku Kaiwabu buye kave'atutamo'aida fa'ina, iya tauku ganuwave'avina vaita iya ganuwanuwa amine meda omi wananuwanuwa. Gava kaliva nuwami gikikivegafo'uya'uyana, ka'i kikaiwabuna o kabi'ona, medema makewa'e ana matahiwadi ginanuhagana.
Tu badi tonuwasivebala ma nuwanuwaku hinana taudiyao hinakivetabovihilidi.
Mosese yana vehimeya matatabuna vehimeya sa'eyanaga hinagene hidadauda, higa “Tauni unuwakabubuye amine tobohiyamomo unanuwakabubuyedi.”
Tu ka'i tova moya'aina tobohiyamiyao buye wanave'aki'ofa'ofa buye wanave'adayadayaga, au wana'itave'avimi. Keke digo, omi wanave'akivekoyo be ami yo'o wanaluvehawaliyedi be au ginahavaidi.

Fa'ina dibumi koyona ana nuwanuwa kadu Yaubada Alu'aluwana yana nuwanuwa buye hive'avenivenibaina. Nuwanuwai-dina luhei buye hiveve'asitainemi fa'ina dewa hagihagina nuwanuwami wanahuluvina-ma keke amifata.
Tu ka'i Yaubada Alu'aluwana wavenovenogalena, au Mosese yana vehimeya dibune keke wadamiyami.

Wa'ita, dibuda koyona ana huluva moya'aida kahalamanena. Mena huluvai-dina ma udo tulina tulina, nuwanuwa bwanebwanenena, nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina ana muliya, balauma adi davadava, kwelikweli tulina tulina, venibaina vekwageya ga'uma'uma ila'a, tauda ada nuwanuwagaga, ve'adabwadabwa, yo'o tulina tulina ana ve'alaudaka, italuvadiga tulina tulina, gufa laulaugina againe u'u ana vekwavakwava, fati ana gakahikahi kwavakwavana kadu dewa tulina tulina hidede amine. Boi gagahevagadonemi amine kadu tova adamoya gagahegahevagadonemi gaveyao medede amine hihuluhuluva medema keke-mo'a Yaubada yana itave'avina againe hinamiyami.
Ide gaveyao Yesu Keliso againe kahawahegeda, medema dibuda koyona kakivekelosena be ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigadi tulina tulina gihavaidi.
Yaubada Alu'aluwana yawaida ivaguna giveleda. Gilubodada be Bana'e yada huluva gidavehimeyena.
Keke taudeyao ada egana kanakilakahini, keke tobohiyadeyao kana'ive'ago'ugadi o ka'i kana'ahukwehukwedi.
Yami vainuwana buye wanave'awahiwahivaita ada au hidede amine Keliso yana vehimeya wana'idibumuhigena.
Hai kaliva kwamana kabisona tu givaitana bana tauna kaliva kikaiwabuna, medema tauna againe give'alololo.

Gilubodana be kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana tauna tauna yana dewa gidaluve'uve'una be hadema yamumuna hadema koyona Yaubada matane ginahalamanena. Ka'i yamumuna digo, bana anafaiweya ginagakahikahi. Tu keke gidalubodani be yana dewa mali kaliva yana dewa ginahawaluveluveni. Medema keke etowava tunutunugina, fa'ina Yaubada kaliva tulina tulina ana vehimeya tulina tulina givelena ada anakaibe anakaibe gina'itave'avina.
Kadu'e, keke taumiyao agaimiya wanave'alololo. Keke amifaiweya Bana Yaubada againe wanavemeyakaiwaba. Gava dewa wanafahana, medemi ami laufata wanayaudi.

Hai kaliva dibuna koyona ana nuwanuwa ana babi againe ginafaha, medema fahai-nadi againe agolaufofola ginayaudi. Tu hai kaliva Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana nuwanuwa ana babi againe ginafaha, medema fahai-nadi againe yawai-vagahina ginayaudi.
Ada au tova moya'aina igibagiba hagihagina againe keke-mo'a dibumi ginatoyoga, fa'ina ka'i kana'atuvefa'ila-mo'a au tova gilubodana againe laufata hagihagina kanayaudi.

Medema fa'ina ka'i kaliva adi veluga ana eda kananuhagana amine o kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya kana'igibagiba hagihagina, tu tovetumagana adi yo'o kalivai-dina vevine-dina agaidiya kana'igibagiba hagihagi-mo'ena.
Kafoi tobohiyakweyao, kaliva sa'eyana hida leta againe yaku nuwanuwa gi'etoladina tu adamoya wa'ita egana matana lakahina againe ma iya tauku nimakuya ga'etoladina.

Badi wowo ana tomogolota dewai-nadi hi'itave'avina-ma fa'idiya ganagahe. Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowodiya hitomogolohina nonogana taudiyao Yaubada yana vehimeya keke hida'itave'avini. Tu nuwanuwadi wowomi ana tomogolota wanavaina be higa taudiyao hinagakahikahiyedi hinagayo, “Yama gahe amine wowodi ana tomogolota ahe hivaina.”

Tu iya'eku ma keke tamo gavadi fa'ina ganagakahikahi tu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana alika keloseya, medemagaga fa'ina ganagakahikahi be Bana ana egana ganakilakahina. Yesu kelose againe gi'alika againe, kadu vaita babi ana gaitoma keloseya gi'alika be ana ludigadigaga agaikuya gihavaina. Babi ana gaitoma vaita ali'alikana iya matakuya amine, meda iya vaita to'alika amine tomiyababi matadiya.
Ide Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ka'i wowoda ana tomogolota kavaina o ka'i keke kadavaini, au medema gaitoma-kawowo. Ka'i Yesu yawaine katubuvagu, au medema gaitoma lakahina.
Gaveyao moya'aimi mededemi watubuvagu be Yaubada yana yo'ogaga wamimiyami-yo ami egana miIsileli, medema aseniwalova kadu hinekalikali againe wanamiyami.
Kafoi tobohiyakweyao, yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadoga alu'aluwamiya ginamiyami. Ehe hidedemi.
(Iya Folo nimaku.)
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Bana'e yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana Yaubada kadu Tamana amanadi kanahawadavadavana. Fa'ina lobama ana lokolokofou moya'aina alu'aluwada yana miya hagihagina fa'ina gihawahegena be ide Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ginuwadogeda. Yaubada hidede amine ginuwadogeda fa'ina kanadavadavana.

Boi tuwai-lokalokana aimo babi keke gidabubuni ana toveya, Yaubada ide gaveyao Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ahe giluwafada be higa mahamahalideyao kadu keke ada wavita Bana matane kanamiyami. Ada nuwakabubu fa'ina tuwai-mo'ena givegide-vagahida be Yesu Keliso yana ihagihagi againe ide Bana natuneyao amine ginafayayeda. Bana Tauna yana inuba hagihagina fa'ina, au hidede amine givegide-vagahida be higa ginahawavenatuneda.
Mena yana nuwadoga lakahi-mo'ena againe ide Bana Natu'ase'asena buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ginuwadogeda be higa Bana ana egana kanakilakahina kanagayo, “Ho Yaubada, ya nuwadoga keke kanawona!”

Boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada Tauna nuwahinagene ginuwanuwa be givevai, ada mena yana nuwahinage boi sevasevauyana ma ide agaideya gihawavemogatalena. Bana Tauna yana inuba hagihagina againe Keliso fa'ina givevai.

Ada yana vevai hidede amine. Yana aibubuna matatabuna tomiyalobama kadu tomiyababi ginavaga'auhida-yo kanavesa'eya be u'uda sa'eyana, higa Keliso. Ada gaitoma moya'aina adi aituha hinaluyabuna be tova gilubodana-ma ginalakayemu amine, Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina ana vesa'eya Keliso dibune fa'ina gavaimi givehimeya, mededemi ginafaisewa.

Kadu'e, Yaubada ime Keliso buye ave'atutamo'aima-ma yana lokolokofou higa yana yo'o fa'ina giluwafama. E, boi tuwai-mo'ena yana vevai amine ime yana lokolokofou fa'ina givegide-vagahima. Bana'e gaitoma moya'aina givehimeyedi, ada Tauna yana inuba kadu yana vevai amine hilakayemu.

Ada au yana inuba kadu yana vevai amine givegide-vagahima be Yaubada yana kikaiwabu yama dewa hagihagina againe anayemaunena be kaliva hina'itadavadavana, ime Yaubada yana Tovegida Keliso yana hobu'ela fa'ina yama wavetumagana amaduvebutu alulauboda kalivai-mana.

Kadu omi'iyao meda anafaiweya laumamala Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena fa'ina, higa ami kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna wanogalini-yo Keliso wavetumaganena. Keliso againe wavetumagana be Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gikibwami higa Alu'aluwana gi'iveninisena be givemagami, boi tuwaina giwonadabadaba vaita yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginahawahegena amine.

Bana Alu'aluwa Mahalina ma vaita Yaubada yana kibwa ide agaideya amine, kadu kaliva kwamayoku gisetagona amine Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwahinagedeya gisena be gisetagoda, higa vaita gavaimi yana lokolokofou moya'aina ada du'u fa'ina giwonadabadaba, mededemi aimo ide agaideya ginasevefofona. Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gisetagoda be higa aimo ide Tauna yana yo'ogaga ada tutuvehobu ginaluyabuni-yo ada aiyauga-vagata kanavai-'owona. Hidede amine Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gikibwada, kadu aimo ada tutuvehobu fa'ina gisetagoda be higa yana kikaiwabu kaliva hina'itadavadavana.

Tova moya'aina gave'ove'o'ola be yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana Yaubada, higa Tamada Tokaiwabu-mo'a, tagami ginakifolefolena. Gave'ove'o'ola be Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe tagami ginakifolefolena kadu nuwami ginakiyauna be Yaubada ana halamana agaimiya ginakabu-fa'ila.

Kadu gave'o'ola be matami ginakivemahalina be higa Yaubada yana nuwanuwa omi fa'imiya wanahalamane-hagihagiyena. Yana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Sa'eyana wanahalamanena ma Yaubada givegidemi be aimo omi fa'imiya gavaimi yamuyamumu-'owogina ginaga-ma fa'ina walulauboda. Kadu sa'eyana ma Yaubada gaveyao moya'aida yana kaliva mahamahalideyao, medema agaideya yana lokolokofou moya'aina ada du'u fa'ina giwonadabadaba, ada mena du'u-nadi ana kikaiwabu gavatubuga! Kadu Yaubada yana faiwala lakahina ide tovetumagana agaideya keke tamo gavadi againe kanahawaluveluveni. Mena yana faiwala lakahi-mo'ena, Keliso yana mididi-havagi againe giyemaunena ana tubuga amine, meda ide tovetumagana agaideya giyemayemaunena.

Wese lobama getane-mo'ane givetoga be gikaiwabu-mo'a. E, tokikaiwabu kadu tovehimeya kadu tofaiwala kadu kauveya tulina tulina gikaiwabuhege-mo'edi. Kadu Bana ana egana lakahi-mo'ena, ada gaveyao moya'aidi adi egana kaliva hikikilakahina, medema Yesu gikaiwabuhegedi, ada keke vaita hida tovagaga againe gidakaiwabuhegedi, au kadu aimo tova mulina buye'i.

Kadu Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina Keliso agevavane gisedi, ada Bana gaitoma moya'aina adi tovehimeya ma ide tovetumagana ada yo'o Bana anakaibe ada to'itave'avina fa'ina gisena, higa ide tovetumagana vaita Keliso wowona amine ada Bana'e Tauna ma u'uda. Ada ide vaita wowona amine ma u'uda Keliso kaluyabuna, tu Bana'e Tauna gaitoma moya'aina givemagadi, au lobama be babi be ide buye givemaga-mo'eda be giluyabuda.

Mena dibutoyoga kadu dewa koyona ana eda againe tuwaina wanunudadana, hida babi ana nuwanuwa koyona amine wadewadewa, kadu Setani badi yafune lobama hinafane hinunudadana-ma adi tovehimeya yana abavehimeya againe wamiyami. Tova adamoya bana kalivai-nadi yana nuwanuwa koyona todibutoyoga ase'asediya gifahafahana.

Boi tuwaina ide moya'aida badi todibutoyoga adi yo'o kalivadi. Dibuda koyona ana ayafana amine kadewadewa, ada gavaimi gavaimi wowoda o nuwada giludigadigaga, mededemi taudeyao yada nuwanuwa koyona againe kahawahawahegeda. Todibutoyoga moya'aidi yadi koyona fa'ina Yaubada yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana. Ada tuwaina kadu ide dibuda koyona katubuga-ma kamiyami, ada vaita todibutoyoga moya'aidi amine Yaubada yana ila'a guwana kadanuhagana.

Atu Yaubada ma ana egana tohinekalikali. Yana nuwakabubu ide agaideya keke kabi'ona fa'ina, Keliso alikeya gisivemididina amine ide alu'aluwada ali'alikana gikiveyawayawana be Keliso buye wayawaida ivaguna kamimiyami. E, yada dewa koyona fa'ina alu'aluwada vaita ali'alikana amine kamiyami nonogana Yaubada yawaida ivaguna giveleda. Yaubada yana nuwadoga keke kanawona! Wa'ita, yana nuwadoga againe kibababala wanuhagana.
Ada ide Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma Bana'e buye gisivemididida, higa yawaida ivaguna giveleda be Yesu Keliso buye lobameya givehiyotoda.

Au hidede amine Yaubada ide Yesu Keliso buye gisivemididida ada givehiyotoda be higa aimo mulina tova keke ginahavaini yana nuwadoga lakahi-mo'ena ana iya'iyaya ide agaideya ginayemaunena. Ide gi'itanuwakabubuyeda be Yesu Keliso fa'ideya gihawahegena fa'ina, yana nuwadoga gavatubuga! Au keke adafaiweya kanalagani.
Wanogali! Yaubada Tauna ginuwadogemi be omi wavetumaganeni-yo ami kibababala wanuhagana. Tu keke taumiyao nuwamiya vetumagana gidayemu, au Yaubada yami vetumagana givelemi-yo wavetumaganena.

Kadu'e keke taumiyao yami vediwe fa'ina ami kibababala wadanuhagani. Au Yaubada givetumaganavelemi-yo ami kibababala wanuhagana be keke tamo hakwadi afaiweya tauni a egana unakilakahini unagayo, “Yaku vediwe fa'ina kibababala ganuhagana.” Keke amifaiweya hidede amine wanagahe.

Atu ide'eyao Bana Yaubada nimana ana iya'iyaya. Ide gavana anaga? Yaubada Yesu Keliso againe gibubuve'ivaguda be higa igibagiba kanaseseyemaunedi. Mena igibagiba ma boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada givevaiye-vagahina be higa igibagiba amine kananauna.

Tu omi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao agaidiya watubuyemu-ma yami miyami tuwaina wananuwa-nunauyena. MiYuda avewagami keke Yaubada yana yo'o, yana iya'iyaya keke wowodiya hidatomogolohini-ma kalivai-dina tu taumeyao avewagama ide Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowodeya katomogolohina-ma kalivai-dana, higa iya'iyayai-nadi kaliva wowodiyagaga gidadauda.

Yami miyami tuwaina keke nuwami ginaulu. Tuwaina keke Keliso againe wadamiyave'avina, au wamiyavehaila. Kadu omi keke Yaubada yana yo'o miIsileli kalivai-dina, au omi tulimiyao. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada ime miIsileli yama yo'o givenuwadadanema be yana veyao agaimeya giseusedi, higa ama kibababala fa'ina giwonadabedabema. Tu omi tulimiyao fa'ina, Yaubada keke hidede amine gidaveyaoyemi ada au hidei babiya wamiyami koyona, ase'asemi ana abaluve'avina keke, yami Yaubada keke.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena omi tulimiyao vaita lauveya wadamiyavehaila amine. Keke Yaubada wadahalamaneni o ka'i yana yo'o agaidiya wadamiyave'avina. Atu tova adamoya Keliso dayagina gimadu fa'ina, Yaubada gitaimi be omi Bana liline kadu ime Bana yana yo'o lilimeya wayemu-yo Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi.

Tuwaina ime'eyao be omi'iyao ma Yaubada nibaineyao tu Keliso kelose againe gi'alika be higa ide vaita yo'o sa'eyana amine gi'ivesa'eyada-yo Yaubada buye kanaveyao. Ada au ana kelose againe venibaina matatabuna giluve'alikana.

Kadu'e Keliso gi'ela be mena veyao gifaisewana-ma moya'aideyao agaideya gilumamalena. E, omi yo'o tulimiyao lauveya keke Yaubada liline wadamiyami-ma agaimiya veyao gilumamalena, kadu ime miYuda Yaubada liline amiyami-ma agaimeya veyao gilumamalena.

Bana Keliso yada eda gifaisewana be ada yo'o luhei adafaiweya Tamada matane kayemuyemu. Ime'eyao kadu omi'iyao Yaubada Alu'aluwana sa'eyanaga Tauna nuwahinagedeya gimimiyami-yo Tamada matane kayemuyemu.

Au hidede amine Keliso gi'ivesa'eyada fa'ina, omi keke tulimiyao vaita aimo hawahawala amine. Au Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku be omi'iyao kadu ime'eyao yana kaliva mahamahalideyao buye kamimiyami.

Kadu Yaubada Bana Keliso holili'abi-nadi againe ide huyavila give'etovefoseda be manuwa gilakalaka gilakalaka tu ide gaveyao Kaiwabu buye kave'atutamo'aida, medema vaita yana manuwa-tafalolo mahamahalina amine kayemu.

Ada kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao Kaiwabu buye wave'atutamo'aimi-ma Yaubada yana manuwa againe give'etohavihavimi be ide moya'aideyao vaita manuwa-mo'ena amine agaideya givemanuwa. E, Yaubada Alu'aluwana Tauna nuwahinagedeya gimimiyami fa'ina, Yaubada agaideya givemanuwa.
Ka'i valeyaku sa'eyana ahe wanogalina, higa Yaubada ginuwadogeku-yo givegideku be aku vehimeya omi yo'o tulimiyao ami kivetuvetunu fa'ina giveleku.

Yaubada yana vevai sevasevauyana keke tauku yaku nuwahuya againe gadahalamaneni, au Yaubada iya agaikuya gihawavemogatalena be gahalamanena, yami leta againe kabi'ona ahe galukahihiyena amine. Ka'i bonaku wanahawana amine o, yaku nuwahuya mena vevai sevasevauyana Keliso fa'ina wanahalamanena.

Yaubada mena yana vevai sevasevauyana badi kaliva boi tuwai-mo'ena aituha tulina tulina agaidiya himiyami-ma keke gidavehawaledi, tu tova adamoya ime yana afositolo kadu to'awatalatalaina higa yana kaliva mahamahalimeyao agaimeya gihawavemogatalena.

Mena yana vevai sevasevauyana hidede amine. Yesu Keliso kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna giyemaunena fa'ina, keke ime miYuda gagana ama du'u Yaubada yana lokolokofou moya'aina agaidiya anavaini, au kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao ami du'u ime ama du'u buye kanavaina. Kadu omi'iyao be ime'eyao yada yo'o au sa'eyana. Kadu gavaimi gavaimi hagihagina Yaubada giwonadabadaba, mededemi omi'iyao be ime'eyao Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ami du'u ama du'u buye kananuhagana.
Tu Yaubada givegideku be kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana laumamala againe gavetofaisewa. E, Yaubada ginuwadogeku be gifaiwalaveleku fa'ina, mena vehimeyai-nadi ga'abi'abina.

Iya'eku ma iya vaita kwamana kabiso-mo'eku amine Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya. Iya kabiso-mo'eku nonogana Yaubada ginuwadogeku-yo aku vehimeya giveleku be yana lokolokofou Keliso againe giyemaunena-ma omi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulimiyao agaimiya ganalulumamalena. Mena lokolokofou inubane be gina analauyabu ide keke adafaiweya kanahalamane-'owoni.

Yaubada aku vehimeya giveleku be kadu tomiyababi moya'aidi nuwadi ganakivemahalina be Yaubada yana vevai sevasevauyana ana faisewa fa'ina gavaimi gavaimi givevai ma hinahalamanena. Tuwai-lokalokana aituha a gavaiyehi kahegedi-ma agaidiya mena vevai sevasevauyana, Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina adi To'aibubuna ma Tauna nuwahinagene giduva'ima'ima.

Tuwai-mo'ena yana vevai sevasevauyana Yaubada nuwahinagene giduva'ima'ima be higa tova adamoya yana nuwahuya tulina tulina lobama ana tokikaiwabu kadu ana tofaiwala agaidiya gina'ivemogatalina. Hade'againe mena yana nuwahuya hina'itahalamaneni? Ide tovetumagana ada yo'o agaideya hina'itahalamanena.

Ada yana nuwahuya ana ivemogatala au hidede amine gilakayemu be gavaimi givevai babi ana abavebutu aimo keke ana toveya, mededemi gigugai. Ada yana vevai Yesu Keliso yada Kaiwabu againe gilakayemu velemo'ena.
Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida kadu Bana againe kavetumagana fa'ina, Yaubada matane yada wa'asevatu kadu yada wavetumagana adafaiweya kanayemuyemu.
Au gave'o'ola agaimiya be omi fa'imiya aulolo tagiya ganuhagana fa'ina, nuwami keke ginavita. Au mena yaku ase'u'aulolo fa'ina, omi kaiwabu wanuhagana.

Tu Yaubada au hidede amine yana wanuwahuya givevai-ma ganuwa-nunauyena againe, Tamada matane ga'ibo'ula-mo'a. Bana'e yana yo'o kalivai-dina gaveyao lobameya himimiyami kadu gaveyao babiya kamimiyami amanadi, au matatabuda Bana'e Tamadai-nadi ana egana kawahina.

Gave'ove'o'ola be Bana Tokaiwabu-mo'a nuwana nuwanuwadogana amine nuwahinagemiya ginafaiwalavelemi. E, Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwahinagemi ginakivetoyogina, kadu Keliso againe wanavetuvetumagana-yo ase'asemiya ginave'abaga. Kadu gave'o'ola be ai walamina gava gi'etodona kadu ogola gava gihobu-mo'a amine, omi nuwanuwa hawahawahegana againe wanafaiwala be higa omi kadu Yaubada yana yo'o moya'aidi buye Keliso yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana gavalalafa gavatunuga, e gavatubuga ma wanahalamane-hagihagiyena.

E, gave'o'ola be mena Keliso yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana inubane be gina ana abalauyabu ide keke adafaiweya kanahalamane-'owoni-ma ana halamana agaimiya ginatubuga, ada au hidedemi Yaubada yana dodobodaboda againe ginavemaga-mo'emi.

Kadu'e Yaubada ana egana kanakilakahina. Au hidede amine yana kikaiwabu ginalakalaka. E, ide tovetumagana higa yana yo'o agaideya kadu Bana Yesu Keliso againe ginalakalaka be ginanunauwena tu ginaduva-vagata, tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Tova moya'aina wananuwanuwahobu be kadu kaliva umaumadiyao amine wanahuluhuluva. Wana'atuvefa'ila, e yami wanuwakabubu tobohiyamiyao wana'atuvefa'iledi.
Wana'itave'avimi be Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'ivesa'eyami amine, yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe wanamiyami be niwalova ana ala hinagene wanamiyami.
Ide Kaiwabu wowona au sa'eyanaga kadu Alu'aluwana sa'eyanaga. Meda anafaiweya gavadi aimo omi fa'imiya ginaga-ma fa'ina gikovami be walulauboda, medema abalulauboda sa'eyanaga.
Kadu yada Kaiwabu sa'eyanaga, yada abavetumagana sa'eyanaga, yada bafitaiso sa'eyanaga.
Kadu moya'aida yada Yaubada sa'eyanaga ada Tamada sa'eyanaga, Bana'e moya'aida givehimeyeda, yana faiwala moya'aida agaideya gififaisewa, Tauna moya'aida nuwahinagedeya gimimiyami.
Meda Keliso yana folaka fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Wese getane-mo'ane gilaka ana toveya
nibaineyao agaidiya wai ginagona
be yogoyogonidiyao ginauwedi,
ada yana hawahega yana kaliva agaidiya gifolakena.
Hidede amine Yaubada buki-nadi againe gigahe.
Yana gahe sa'eyana “gilaka” ma, gavaimi ana nuwanuwa? Ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Nagona babi gava dibune gihobu'ela.
Ada Bana gihobu'ela Kalivai-nadi wese lobama getane-mo'ane gilaka be higa lobama be babi matatabudi Tauna againe ginavemaga-'owodi.

Ada yana abavetala yana yo'o agaidiya gifolakena-ma hidede amine. Tufoidi adi vehimeya ma afositolo yadi faisewa, tufoidi Yaubada yana venuwa'ata gitunevehabalutugidi-ma hina'awatalatalainena, tufoidi kibababala ana venuwa'ata hinalumamale-dadanena. Ada tufoidi adi vehimeya ma Yaubada yana sifi adi to'itave'avina kadu adi tovehawala.

Keliso vehimeya medede amine gifolakena be higa mena kalivai-dina yadi faisewa againe Yaubada yana yo'ogaga hina'ihagihagiyeda-yo tovetumagana moya'aida Keliso yana faisewa againe kana'idibumuhiga, ada au Keliso wowona ginatubutubuga.

Au hidedemi Keliso wowona ginatubutubuga tu ide yana kaliva yana vevine moya'aida yada vetumagana againe kadu Yaubada Natuna ana halamana againe kananuwanuwa sa'eyana be kanave'asevatu. E, Bana Keliso nuwanuwa yamumunaga againe gimaga-mo'a be give'asevatu amine, ide yana nuwanuwa yamumunaga againe kanamaga-mo'a be kanave'asevatu.
Keke medede amine kana'abinuwanuwa, au yada wanuwanuwa hawahawahegana nuwanuwa velemo'ena kanagahegaheyeni-yo au yada dewa moya'aina againe Keliso ana ita'ita amine kanalakalakata, higa Bana u'uda.

Ada Bana u'uda fa'ina, ide sa'eyana sa'eyana vaita waloga amine Keliso wowona againe kave'etohavihavida, ada ide waloga sa'eyana sa'eyana yada faiwala Keliso u'uda againe gi'ela'ela be moya'aida buye kave'aveluveluga. Kadu ka'i sa'eyana sa'eyana yada faisewa tulina tulina ka'ita'itave'avina amine, wowona matatabuna gitubutubuga gitubutubuga tu ide wowonai-nadi buye kave'ahawahawahega-yo taudeyao kakivetubugida be kave'asevatu.

Tu omi Keliso wowona fa'ina, iya Kaiwabu yana kaliva omi agaimiya Bana matane ganagahe. Badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma amine omi keke wanahuluhuluva. Badi gaitoma-kawowo fa'ina tova moya'aina hinuwanuwa, ada tagadi hi'ivekuluna fa'ina Yaubada hifaniyeni-yo yawai-vagata Bana givetalaiyena-ma keke hidahalamaneni. Au tulidiyao himiyamiyavehaila, ada nuwadi gi'uyuyu-mo'a.
Nuwadi givewaba be wowomumu ana ayauna keke hidahalamaneni fa'ina, nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina againe hivetalaiyedi be yamadada tulina tulina hihuluvidi, keke ma'ita hida'ilova.
Tu omi'iyao ma Keliso againe wasikulu tu ana halamana keke mena dewai-nadi koyo-mo'ena amine wadavaini.
Omi velemodi Keliso wa'itahalamanena ada Bana yana yo'o agaidiya waluku-yo vehawala nuwanuwa velemo'ena Yesu giyemaunena-ma amine wanogalina.

Ada vehawala hidede amine wanogalina. Tuwaina aimo keke Keliso againe wadavetumagana ana toveya, taumiyao nuwami ana nuwanuwa koyona dibune wamiyami. Yami nuwalauvadiga gilolomi be wanuwadigadigaga tu gikikivekoyomi. Atu kuvi tubuna gi'afuwana be bavagu againe gina amine, omi tubumi wanahegena be nuwami ivaguna wanavelakavina. E, wanahawahegemi be Yaubada ase'asemi kadu nuwami matatabuna ginakive'ivaguna. Ada mena nuwami ivaguna Yaubada Tauna ana ita'ita yegayegana kadu mahamahalina velemo'ena amine gibubuna be Bana amine wanahuluhuluva.
Dewa koyona fa'ina wananuwakoyo tu keke wananunauweni be taumiyao wanakoyo. Yami nuwakoyo keke wananunauweni mala ginabogi, au ginamaduhavaina.
Fa'ina keke taumiyao ami wanafali wanayauni be Setani ginaluku.
Hai kaliva gikikai'afu, medema kai'afu gina'ilovena, au ginavebutu ginafifaisewa. E, tauna nimane ginafaisewa hagihagina be higa badi koyokoyo tamo gavadi againe anafaiweya ginanuwakabubuyedi.
Ada keke Yaubada Alu'aluwana Mahamahalina ase'u'aulolo wanaveleni. Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina againe gikibwami be higa aimo tova mulina tutuvehobu ana toveya, ami aiyauga-vagata wanavai-'owona.
Nuwakoyove'ine agodadaga ila'a wanavenikohiyena. Auwe ve'afaifaina kadu veyaina. Tobohiyamiyao adi kivekoyo ana nuwanuwa matatabuna wanavekwaulaugena.
Au buye wanave'anuwakabubu kadu buye wanave'ahinekalikali. Ada Yaubada Keliso fa'ine yami koyona givenuwauluyena amine, meda omi tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona wanavenuwauluyena.
Tu Yaubada yami dewa koyona givenuwauluyena amine omi Bana'e natu'ase'aseneyao fa'ina, au Tamami wanave'uve'u'ulena.

Bana Keliso yana nuwanuwa ide agaideya gisena be ide fa'ideya yawaina gihawahegena amine, meda tova moya'aina tobohiyamiyao fa'idiya wanahawahawahegemi. Kevakeva hikabuna be magana yamumuna gilakalaka-yo Yaubada giyauna-ma amine, mena Keliso yana hawahega ide fa'ideya au abaveyao hagihagina Yaubada nuwana gikiveyamumuna amanadi.

Tu omi'iyao ma Yaubada yana kaliva mahamahalimiyao fa'ina, udo tulina tulina o ka'i nuwanuwa bwanebwanenena o ka'i italuvadiga keke-mo'a wanahuluveni, tu kadu keke ma'ita wanalukahihiyeni. Omi kaliva mahamahalimiyao fa'ina, dewai-dina keke-mo'a gidalubodami.
Kadu keke luhabohabola o ka'i gahe kabakabaleyana o ka'i wonakoyokoyo wanayakayakahini. Medema tovetumagana keke gidalubodami. Au yami gahe ma Yaubada againe wanavesivesiule.

Gaitoma sa'eyana wahalamane-hagihagiyena, higa hai kaliva to'udo o ka'i yamayamadadana o ka'i ita'italuvadigana, ame bana hidevama italuvadiga vaita nuwanuwa tulina tulina Yaubada yana abaga ase'asemiya gidalemani. E, hai kaliva mededemi gihuluhuluva, medema keke-mo'a ana du'u Keliso be Yaubada yadi abavehimeya againe ginavaini.

Wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi gahe-kawowo againe ginabonayafeyafemi, higa vaita mena dewai-dina au keke koyona. Mena dewai-dina fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya ana todibutoyoga yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana.
Hidema fa'ina keke badi todibutoyoga wanavetobohiyanedi.
Ada au wanalele be gavadi gavadi yamumuna Kaiwabu matane ma wanahalamanena.
Uyuyu ana dewa wanavenikohiyena. Mena dewai-dina guwana keke, au yami mahalina againe wanakivemogatalina be moya'aidi hinahalamanena mena dewai-dina adi ita koyona.
Gavadi gavadi isevasevauya againe hidewedewena medema koyo-mo'ena, ada ka'i tamo hakwadi gidalukahihiyena, au kadawowomumu lakahina.

Atu ka'i yadi dewa Kaiwabu yana mahalina againe wanakivemogatalina amine o, mena dewai-dina au adi ita koyo-mo'ena ma kabu'avane ginayemu. Fa'ina ka'i Kaiwabu yana mahalina kaliva yada dewa ginatuvemahalina, au dewa inubana ka'i koyona o yamumuna kabu'avane ginayemu. Medema fa'ina kweli sa'eyana gigahe gigayo,
O u'enonuwaulu-ma umidi,
au alikeya unamididi-havagi
be Keliso ginatuvemahali.
Tu omi mahalina ana kaliva yami dewa wana'itave'avina, wana'itave'avi-mo'ena. Keke fanifanidiyao amine wanadewadewa, au kaliva nuwanuwahuyamiyao amine wanahuluhuluva.
Hida tova au tova koyona fa'ina, keke wanamiya-kawowo. Au gavadi gavadi hagihagina amifaiweya wanagugaiyena, medema againe wanahawahegemi.
Fa'ina keke wanavekwavakwava, au tova tova wanalele be gavaimi gavaimi Kaiwabu nuwanuwana omi wanadewadewa, medemi wanadewa.
Gufa laulaugina keke wanayu-fa'ila be u'umi ginakoyo, fa'ina mena gufa ana yu-fa'ila againe yami miya matatabuna wanakivekoyona. Au Alu'aluwa Mahalina wanayuyuyena be ginavemagami.

Alu'aluwa Mahalina ginavemagami-yo yami ve'agahegahe againe kweli tulina tulina wanayakayakahina, higa same Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda amanadi, kadu kweli Yaubada ana hawadavadava fa'ina kaliva hi'etoladina-ma, kadu kweli Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'alavelevelemi-ma wanakwelikweliyena be yami wavemwamwala alu'aluwamiya Kaiwabu wanakwelidavadavana.
Kadu gaitoma sa'eyana sa'eyana fa'ina Yaubada Tamada againe yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana eganeya wanavesivesiule tova moya'aina.
Tu Keliso wave'amohimohinena fa'ina, taumiyao buye wanave'abona'abi'abi.
Omi vevine naginagimiyao moganemiyao wanawowomumuyedi be bonadi wana'abi'abina, higa vaita Kaiwabu wadawowomumuyeni be bonana wada'abi'abini.
Ide tovetumagana yada yo'o au Keliso wowona ada Bana'e u'uda. Bana Keliso ide yana yo'o u'uda amine, bana kaliva vavinena u'udi. Atu Keliso kadu wowona ada tolugolagola.
Ada au ide Keliso yana yo'o Bana'e kawowomumuyena be bonana ka'abi'abina amine, omi vevine moganemiyao agaidiya wanawowomumu be gavaimi gavaimi hinavehimeyemi, medemi bonadi wana'abi'abina.
E, Keliso yana yo'o fa'ideya yawaina gihawahegena be higa bonana ana gufa againe ase'aseda ginakolani-yo ginakiveyeveyegada be mahamahalideyao Yaubada matane kanamiyami.

Kaliva nuwanuwana vavinena adi ita yamumunaga keke tamo wowodi ana sili o ana atavatava o ana bwaya amine ginaluwafadi, meda anafaiweya Keliso nuwanuwana ide tovetumagana ada yo'o, higa vaita vavinena amine, ada ita mahamahalina kadu yamumunaga Tauna fa'ine ginaluwafada.

Meda anafaiweya omi kaliva yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana vavinemiyao agaidiya wanaseusena. Taumiyao wowomi wanuwenuwena be wa'ita'itave'avina amine, vavinemiyao adi itave'avina fa'ina wananuwanuwa-hagihagi. Hai kaliva vavinena ginuwenuwedi be gi'ita'itave'avidi, medema tauna wowona ginuwenuwena be gi'ita'itave'avina, fa'ina vavinena au bana wowona.

Wa'ita, keke tamo kaliva tauna wowona gidavenikohiyeni. Au wowona give'ave'ana kadu gi'ita'itave'avina. Meda anafaiweya Keliso Tauna wowona higa ide yana yo'o give'ave'ada kadu gi'ita'itave'avida, fa'ina ide Bana wowona talaina tulina tulina.
Mena kaliva wowona higa vavinena adi itave'avina ana nuwanuwa fa'ina, Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Kwamayoku kaliva lulune gabubuna fa'ina,
bana kaliva ma hinana tamana ginahegedi tu
ginavemanuwa-damana be vavinena againe
ginamiyave'avina, ada hinavewowotamo'ai.
Hidede amine Yaubada yana gahe.
Au nuwanuwa lakahi-mo'ena mena gahe-nadi hinagene sevasevauyana gidadauda, hida iya ganuwanuwa vaita Bana Keliso kadu ide tovetumagana yana yo'o yada vewowotamo'ai ana abaluvefota.

Ada au omi kaliva moya'aimi sa'eyana sa'eyana tauni unuwenuwe be u'ita'itave'avi amine, meda vavine unanuwenuwedi be una'ita'itave'avidi. Kadu omi vevine sa'eyana sa'eyana moganemi wanave'amohimohinena.
Yaubada givehimeya gigayo,
Tama be hina unave'amohimohinedi,
ada au unamiyami hagihagina
kadu babiya unamiya yawaini tunugina.
Au vehimeya teni agaidiya medema vehimeya nagona waguwana.

Wana'idibumuhigedi keke vaita matadiyagaga be higa hinahawaveyamumuyemi, au vaita Keliso ana ve'agetoga amine tova moya'aina yami wa'asehawahega wanafifaisewa, higa vaita Yaubada yana nuwanuwa wada'ita'itave'avini.
Yami wavemwamwala wanafifaisewa keke vaita kalivagaga fa'idiya wadafifaisewa, au Tovehimeya getane buye'i fa'ina.

E, wananuwanuwa vaita Tovehimeya getane fa'ine wadafifaisewa, fa'ina Bana'e kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana gavadi gavadi faisewa yamumuna gigana, medema fatana hagihagina ginavelena. Ka'i agetoga o ka'i keke agetoga, au laufata ginavaina.
Tu tobohiyakweyao, yaku gahe sa'eya-mo'ena. Kaiwabu buye wave'atutamo'aimi-yo Tauna yana faiwala lakahina againe wanafifaiwala.
Gaviya ana vaigau matatabuna Yaubada givelemi-ma wana'osena be higa Setani yana alaveyaveyafa amifaiweya wanamidihegena.

Fa'ina keke tomiyababi agaidiya kadave'alaliyaliya. Au Setani yana yo'o higa alu'aluwa bwanebwanenediyao tulidi tulidi lobama hinafane himimiyami-ma agaidiya kave'alaliyaliya. E, uyuyu ana tokikaiwabu agaidiya kadu ana tovehimeya ana tofaiwala agaidiya kave'alaliyaliya, badi yafuyafunediyao hida babi uyu'uyuyuna againe himimiyami unumai-dina.

Setani yana yo'o buye kalulugaviya fa'ina, gaviya ana vaigau matatabuna Yaubada givelemi-ma wana'osena be higa tova koyona ginayemu-yo au amifaiweya Setani wanaluveyewana, ada wanamunumununa wanamunumununa tu keke wanavihila, au wanamididi-mo'a.
Kadu veyao ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna againe wana'ihagihagiyemi vaita ami ageyafayafa wana'oseni-yo agemi fa'afa'ana wanalulugaviya.

Mena vaigau moya'aina wana'osena kadu vetumagana vaita yami veve amine wana'abina. Yami vetumagana ana veve againe giyo wa'i'ala'alahina moya'aina kaliva koyona omi agaimiya ginatugagena-ma amifaiweya wanaluvekwe'una.
Ami kibababala Keliso givelemi-ma wanavaina be vaita gaviya ana kedukedu amine wana'osena. Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana feto higa Yaubada bonana wanavaina.

Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faiwaleya tova moya'aina wanave'ove'o'ola. E, yami awalulau'u be tagivedadaga tulina tulina Yaubada againe wanaseusena. Mena inuba fa'ina wanavanevanenega kadu wana'atu'atuvefa'ila be Yaubada yana yo'o moya'aidi fa'idiya wanave'ove'o'ola tova moya'aina.

Yaubada loseyanina iya gi'iveniniseku be yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ganalulumamalena atu adamoya yogoyogoniku gamimiyami. Fa'ikuya wanave'o'ola be gavaimi gilubodaku, mededemi yaku wa'asevatu ganahawavemogatalena.
Hidema ana inuba iya bana ga'iveninisena be gavaimi ama valeya ginavenuwa'atami, kadu ase'asemi ginakivevatuna.
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso omi tobohiyameyao moya'aimi ase'asemi ginakiveniwalovina, kadu yami vetumagana nuwakabubu buye ginavelemi.
Gaveyao moya'aidi Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso againe yadi nuwanuwa hise-vagahina keke yawaidi hina'ani, medema Yaubada yana nuwadoga hinanuhagana.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.
Keke gavana fa'ina tu tova tova ganuwa-nunauyemi againe, Yaubada againe gavesivesiule omi fa'imiya.
Tova sa'eyana sa'eyana omi moya'aimi fa'imiya gave'ove'o'ola againe, yaku wavemwamwala gave'ove'o'ola tova moya'aina.
Boi tuwaina Yesu Keliso againe wamidivetumagana tu wanunauwena tova adamoya Yesu Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana faisewa againe waveluvelugaku fa'ina, omi fa'imiya gavesivesiule.
Ada ganuwave'avina vaita Yaubada ahe givebutu nuwahinagemi gi'ihagihagiyena amanadi ginanunauwena ginanunauwena tu Yesu Keliso ginayewa'ela ana toveya ginaluyabuna.

Gilubodana be medede amine omi fa'imiya ganuwanuwa, fa'ina tova moya'aina gatalatalanuwayemi. Kadu omi moya'aimi aku vehimeya Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe giveleku-ma ana faisewa againe waveluvelugaku. Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Keliso fa'ine kaliva matadiya galulugolegolena ana toveya o ka'i yogoyogoniku deliya gamimiyami ana toveya, au tova moya'aina waveluvelugaku.
Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe yaku talanuwa agaimiya inubana ma Yesu Keliso ginuwenuwemi amine meda iya ganuwenuwemi.
Kadu nuwanuwa tunutunugina guwana tulina tulina Yesu Keliso againe give'inuba-ma agaidiya wanamaga be kaliva guwai-mina hina'itani-yo Yaubada hinahawavekaiwabuyena be hinahawadavadavana.

Venuwa'ata Yamumuna yana madu hidede amine. Yaku miya deliya inubana kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya gimahalina. Iya Keliso ana vetumagana fa'ina bulava kainumula againe yogoyogoniku gamimiyami ma badi tolugaviya Loma Tokaiwabu lakahina yana manuwa lakahina ana tolugolagola moya'aidi kadu mali kaliva moya'aidi hihalamanena.

Kadu iya bulava kainumula againe yogoyogoniku gamimiyami fa'ina, Kaiwabu tobohiyadeyao tufoidi moya'aidi yadi asevatu giveledi be ase'aseboudiyao Kaiwabu bonana ana laumamala againe hitutuveguveguladi keke yadi wamatauta.

Wona velemona kaliva tufoidi aku egana lakahina fa'ina higaga'uma'uma kadu hivekwavekwageyeku. Nuwanuwadi adi egana ginalakata fa'ina Keliso hilulumamalena, tu tufoidi nuwadi yamumuna fa'ina hilulumamalena.
Badi nuwadi yamumuna ma yadi nuwanuwa iya agaikuya hisena fa'ina Keliso hilulumamalena, ada ahe hihalamanena iya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galugolegolena fa'ina deliya hiseku.

Badi higa'uma'uma ma keke yadi wa'asehawahega tu nuwanuwadi taudiyao adi egana hinakilakahina fa'ina, Keliso hilulumamalena. Hinuwanuwa vaita medede amine iya aimo deliya gamimiyami tu kadu vita agaikuya hinakivetubugini.
Ka'i nuwadi koyona o ka'i nuwadi yamumuna, ka'i velemodi o keke velemodi, medema gaitoma kabi'ona. Gaitoma lakahina ma Keliso ana laumamala ginanauna. Ada medema fa'ina gavemwamwala.

Nuwanuwaku lakahina ada hidedemi Yaubada againe galuluve'avina vaita keke-mo'a koyona ganafaisewani-yo ganawowomumu. Au nuwanuwaku boi tova moya'aina ga'ase'asevatu amine, meda tova adamoya gana'asevatu-mo'a be higa yaku dewa moya'aina againe Keliso ana egana ganakilakahina. E, ka'i wayawaiku ganamiyami o ka'i gana'alika, nuwanuwaku kaliva hina'itaku-yo Keliso ana egana hinakilakahina.
Iya'eku ma ka'i wayawaiku ganamiyami, au Keliso yawaina iya yawaiku. Ka'i hinaluve'alikaku, au yaku alika againe Keliso ana egana ana kailakata ginanauna ada iya yamumu lakahi-mo'ena gananuhagana.

Atu aimo wayawaiku hidei babiya ganamiyami againe faisewa yamumuna waguwana Keliso fa'ine akufaiweya gana'abina. Fa'ina ka'i wayawaiku ganamiyami, medema gilubodana. Ka'i gana'alika, kadu medema gilubodana. Au eda yamumuna luhei tu hadema giluboda-mo'ena be againe ganahawahegeku ma keke gadahalamaneni.

Yaku nuwanuwa hive'alulautaina. Nuwanuwaku lakahina hida babi ganahegena be Keliso buye anamiyami. Medema giluboda-mo'ena. Atu omi ami veluga fa'ina wayawaiku ganamiyami nuwanuwai-nadi nuwanuwa nagona gayakahina-ma gitubuhegena.

Hidedemi ganuwave'avina fa'ina, gahalamanena wayawaiku ganamiyami. E, hidei babiya iya aimo omi buye kanamiyami be higa yaku velugeya yami vetumagana againe wanafifaiwala wanafaiwalahegahega kadu wanavemwavemwamwala.
Ada au aimo deliya ganahobu tu omi agaimiya ganayewa'ela ana toveya, aku lugolagola fa'ina nuwami ginayamumu-mo'a ada Yesu Keliso ana egana wanakilakahina.

Nuwanuwaku valeyami gananogalina higa badi yami vetumagana fa'ina hivenibainemi-ma keke ma'ita wadamatausedi. Ka'i hidede amine keke-mo'a wanamatausedi, au hinahalamanena higa vaita omi wanafaiwalahegedi tu badi hinabwavi. Fa'ina badi hinabwavi ma Yaubada Tauna ginavehawaledi, ada au gina'ivehamumudi tu omi ginakibababalemi.

Au hidede amine ginalakayemu fa'ina, Yaubada ginuwadogemi be ami vehimeya hagihagidi luhei givelemi. Sa'eyana ma Keliso againe wanavetumagana. Tu keke vetumaganagaga, au kadu Bana ana vetumagana fa'ina vita tulina tulina wananuhagadi.

Tova adamoya omi'iyao kadu iya'eku yada lugaviya au sa'eyana. Tuwaina yaku lugaviya Keliso fa'ine wa'itana, ada tova adamoya aimo galulugaviya-ma valeyaku wanogalina. Iya amine meda omi Keliso fa'ine walulugaviya.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, iya gahalamanena omi Keliso nuwahinagene wamimiyami fa'ina wafifaiwala, kadu Bana'e ginuwanuwa agaimiya fa'ina wa'ase'asevatu. Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina buye waveve'aluna kadu omi taumiyao buye wave'a'ase'asehawahega buye wave'ahinekalikali.

Medede amine wahuluhuluva fa'ina nuwaku giyamumu. Tu gagahevagadonemi be higa yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana wanamiyami, buye wanave'ahawahawahega, ase'asemi be nuwami ana ayauna sa'eyana wanaseseyemaunena, ada au hidede amine nuwaku unakiveyamumu-mo'ena.
Yami huluva againe keke taumiyao yami kaiwabu wanaleleni kadu keke wanaselakalaka. Au yami wanuwahobu tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wananuwanuwa vaita badi hidakaiwabuhegemi.
Keke taumiyaogaga yami nuwanuwa fa'ina wanahawahegemi, au kadu tobohiyamiyao yadi nuwanuwa buye fa'ina wanahawahegemi.
Yesu Keliso ginuwanuwa amine meda tobohiyamiyao agaidiya wananuwanuwa. Yesu Keliso ginuwanuwa hidede amine.
yana kaiwabu Yaubada yana kaiwabu au leleleya
tu keke gidanuwanuwa vaita kaiwabu-nadi ginakive'avini.
kaliva ada nuya gi'osena,
ada tomiyababi amine gimiyami be give'agetoga.
alikeya Tauna gihawahegena, higa alika koyona keloseya.
yo egana lakahina mali egana
gikaiwabuhegena-ma givelena.
au moya'aida Yesu againe kana'ibo'ula-mo'a
be Bana ana egana kanakilakahina.
Au hidede amine moya'ai-mo'eda Yesu yana kaiwabu
kana'awatalatalainena be medema againe
Yaubada Tamada ana egana kanakilakahina.

Siule tobohiyanuwakweyao, Yesu Keliso bona'abi gi'itave'avina amine omi bona'abi wana'itave'avina. Boi tuwaina buye kamiyami ana toveya bonaku wa'abi'abina tova moya'aina. Tova adamoya giluboda-mo'ena be kamiyamiyavehaila againe bonaku wana'ita'itave'avina. Ada yami wamatauta kadu yami wa'asehawahega wana'idibumuhiga be ami kibababala guwana omi tovetumagana ami yo'o hinafamiya wanaseseyemaunena.
Au hidede amine omi wana'i'idibumuhiga, fa'ina tova moya'aina Yaubada Tauna omi hinafamiya gifififaisewa be ginanuwanuwavelemi kadu ginafaiwalavelemi-yo wanahuluhuluva Bana nuwanuwana amine.
Yami dewa moya'aina againe keke wana'alawoluwolu kadu keke wanavekwavekwageya.

Alawoluwolu kadu vekwageya wanavekwaulaugena be higa keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya yami dewa fa'ina ginadakeyemi, au omi Yaubada natuneyao ase'asemi yegayegana keke tamo yami wakoyona badi tomiyababi yadi nuwanuwa nubalabalana keke tunutunugina ma hinafadiya wanamiyami. Ibadibadi lobama hituvemahalina amine, meda omi yami dewa mahamahalina againe tomiyababi nuwadi uyu'uyuyuna wanakivemahalina.

Kadu yawai-vagata ana venuwa'ata wana'awa'awatalatalainena tu nuwadi wanakikivemahalina. Ka'i medede amine wanahuluhuluva au Keliso ginayewa'ela ana toveya omi fa'imiya akufaiweya ganagakahikahiku ganagayo, “Hida hima yaku faisewa guwana. Keke gadafifaisewa-kawowo, keke gadavedivediwe-kawowo.”

Yaku laumamala fa'ina Yesu Keliso againe wavetumagana, ada hidedemi wavetuvetumagana fa'ina, yami abahawahega Yaubada againe wasena. Tu ka'iwa. Totafalolo oine yadi abahawahega againe Yaubada matane hihiwana be gimadu amine, ka'i iya hinaluve'alikaku be dayagiku ginamadu yami abahawahega buye ginave'atutamo'aina. Ka'i hidede amine ginalakayemu, ganavemwamwala ada nuwanuwaku omi iya buye kanavemwamwala.
Meda anafaiweya gilubodana be omi iya fa'ikuya wanavemwamwala ada iya omi buye kanavemwamwala.
Tu tobohiyakweyao, ka'i Kaiwabu Yesu ginahawahegeku amine o nuwanuwaku tova kabisona Timoti omi agaimiya gana'iveninisena be higa valeyami gananogalini-yo ase'aseku ginavatu.
Bana anakaibe ana ayauna aku ayauna amine, kadu yami miya hagihagina fa'ina ginuwanuwa velemo'ena.
Mali kaliva moya'aidi keke Yesu Keliso yana nuwanuwa fa'ina hidahawahegedi. Au taudiyao yadi nuwanuwagaga hi'ita'itave'avina.
Tu omi wahalamanena Timoti yana dewa hagihagina ma ahe giseyemaunena, fa'ina kwamana tamana givelugana amine, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana faisewa againe bana Timoti iya givelugaku.
Medema fa'ina nuwanuwaku bana'e agaimiya ganamadu'iveninisena tu nagona gavaimi iya fa'ikuya kotu againe hinavehimeya ma ganahalamanena tu muliya gana'iveninisena.
Ka'i Kaiwabu ginavehimeya amine ganuwave'avina vaita tova kabisona iya tauku agaimiya gana'ela.
Bana gidu'udu'umi kadu omi valeyana higa vaita gida'aulolo ma wanogalina fa'ina gi'ase'u'aulolo.
Ada wona velemona gi'aulolo lakahina vaita gina'alika. Atu Yaubada gihinekalikaliyena, kadu keke bana anakaibe au kadu iya buye'i gihinekalikaliyeku be keke yaku nuwavita gidave'atutamo'aini.
Medema fa'ina nuwanuwaku lakahi-mo'ena agaimiya gana'iveninisena be higa omi bana'e wana'ita-havagileni yo nuwami ginayamumu kadu yaku nuwavita ma'ita ginahavaina.

Yami wavemwamwala wanavega'aulena vaita bana tobohiyami Kaiwabu yana yo'o agaidiya. Iya lauveya gamimiyami fa'ina, keke amifaiweya wadavelugaku tu Efafolodaito yawaina gihawahegena be Keliso yana faiseweya kabisona gina'alika. Kaliva gaveyao bana amine, medema wanave'amohimohinedi.

Kaliva tufoidi higahemi higayo, “Ka'i nuwanuwami Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya wanaluku, au yana iya'iyaya wowomiya wanatomogolohina.” Badi hidedemi higahe-ma ve'alololo ana tofaisewa. Vaita galu'eta manimaninidiyao kaliva wowodi hiluvetomona-ma amine, meda badi nuwanuwadi wowomi hinakivekoyona. Wama galu'etai-dina agaidiya wana'itave'avimi.

Badi wowodi hitomogolohina fa'ina hivaitana badi Yaubada natuneyao. Tu Yesu Keliso ide nuwadeya yana iya'iyaya gitomogolohina fa'ina, ide velemodi Yaubada natuneyao. Ide Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana veluga againe Yaubada kahawadavadavana kadu Yesu Keliso againe kamiyave'avina-yo kavemwamwala. Keke wowoda ana gaitoma againe kadaluluve'avina.

Tu iya'eku ma akufaiweya wowoku ana gaitoma againe ganaluluve'avina. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana ginuwanuwa vaita tauna wowona tauna yana dewa fa'ina bana kaliva yegayegana Yaubada matane digo, iya akufaiweya gananuwanuwa iya wowoku iya yaku dewa fa'ina iya kaliva moya'aidi gayegayegahegedi Yaubada matane.

Au wa'ita, iya aku aiyeta eita gavaini-yo Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowokuya hitomogolohina tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada ime miYuda givehimeyema amine. Iya kwanaIsileli, Beniyamina ana yo'o agaidiya gatubuyemu. Bwanenekweyao matatabudi Hibeliu kaliva fa'ina iya Hibeliu kaliva velemo'ena. Iya Falisi adi yo'o kalivana ime tafalolo ana vehimeya lakahina be kabi'ona matatabuna a'itave'avi-'owona kalivai-mana.

Yaubada againe gahawahege-mo'eku fa'ina, Keliso ana tovetumagana adi yo'o gakikivekoyodi. Mosese yana vehimeya matatabuna ga'itave'avina fa'ina, keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya yaku dewa fa'ina gidadakeyeku, au iya vaita kaliva yegayega-mo'eku.

Kadu'e keke mena gaitomai-dina gagana vaita gaitoma-kawowo. Au gaitoma moya'aina vaita gaitoma-kawowo iya matakuya. Gaitoma sa'eyanaga gaitoma lakahina, higa yaku Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana halamana. E, Yesu Keliso ana halamana gaitoma moya'aina gitubuhegena. Boi ime miYuda yama dewa matatabuna gamuliyena fa'ina, yaku kaiwabu gavaina. Tu mena kaiwabu-nadi matatabuna gahegena. Ganuwanuwa vaita medema yogo be higa Keliso anakaibe ganavaina be Bana buye anave'atutamo'aima. Boi ganuwanuwa vaita yaku yegayega inubana tauku yaku dibumuhiga, higa vehimeya ana itave'avina againe gadavaini. Tu tova adamoya yaku yegayega Keliso ana vetumagana againe gavaina. E, Keliso gavetumaganena fa'ina, Yaubada gigahe vaita iya kaliva yegayegaku Bana matane.

Yaku nuwanuwa au sa'eyanaga. Nuwanuwaku Keliso ganahalamane-hagihagiyena, higa Bana Tomididi-havagi gifaiwala amine iya ganafaiwala, kadu Bana vita tulina tulina giwahina amine iya ganawahina, kadu Bana kaliva yada nuwanuwa koyona fa'ina gi'alika amine, vaita yaku nuwanuwa koyona gina'alika-yo aku ita'ita Keliso ana ita'ita amine ginalakayemu.
Ada au hidede amine gananunauwena tu Yaubada alikeya ginasivemididiku.

Tobohiyakweyao, keke gadanuwanuwa vaita Keliso ana halamana ahe gadaluyabuni. Atu nuwanuwa sa'eyanaga againe hidede amine gahawahegeku. Tomadu ve'amadu againe keke tamo gavadi wamuline ginanuwenuweni tu maka againe ginamadukwelukwelulu amine, meda iya gavadi gavadi tuwaina ganuwenuwena o ka'i gahuluhuluvina, medema keke adamoya gadanuwa-nunauyeni. Au gavadi aimo gananuhagana medema againe ganuwanuwa toyogina.

E, gamadumadu toyogina be ve'amadu ana maka againe ganalakayemu be nuwakabubu ganavaina, higa Yaubada gikovaku be Yesu Keliso yana kibababala againe yawai-vagahiku wesedei gananuhagana-ma nuwakabubu-nadi.

Ide gaveyao Keliso ana vetumagana againe kave'asevatu, medema moya'aida gaitomai-dina a galukahihiyena-ma fa'ina adafaiweya kadanuwanuwa sa'eyana. Ada ka'i tamo gavadi fa'ina omi tufoimi wanuwanuwa tulina digo, Yaubada nuwami ginakivemahalina.
Tu gilubodana be Keliso ana halamana ahe kavaina-ma keke kanahegeni, au againe kanaluluve'avina.

Fa'ina tuwaina tova a gavaiyehi gavenuvenuwa'atami amine meda tova adamoya yaku watagiya gavenuwa'ata-havagilemi, higa to'ekelesiya tufoidi moya'aidi hihuluhuluva vaita badi Keliso nibaineyao yana alika kelose againe keke ma'ita hidanuwenuweni amanadi.

Taudiyao wowodi ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana agaidiya hihawahegedi vaita medema yadi yaubada. Vaita koyona hififaisewana-ma fa'ina hidawowomumu tu medema fa'ina higagakahikahidi. Kadu babi ana gaitomagaga fa'ina hinuwanuwa. Au hidede amine hihuluhuluva fa'ina, adi matahiwadi hinavaina be agolaufofola hinanuhagana.
Yadi melala abaga koyona tu ide yada melala lobama, kadu ada Tokibababala wesedei gimimiyami, higa yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso. Ada Bana yana yewa'ela fa'ina kalulauboda.

E, ada Tokibababala ginayewa'ela be wowoda kowakowana kadu havahavaina ana ita ginakivilani-yo wowoda tulina Tauna wowona ana kaiwabu miyamiya-vagahina amine ginaveleda. Yana faiwala lakahi-mo'ena againe hidede amine ginagugai, lobama be babi ana gaitoma moya'aidi Tauna agevavane anafaiweya ginasedi-ma faiwalai-nadi.
Kadu omi vevine ami'iselu Yuodiya be Sinidike agaimiya ganagahe. Omi Kaiwabu yana vevine fa'ina yami vekwageya wanaseni tu yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana wanamiyami.

Kadu o kusebo Kaiwabu yana faisewa buye ka'abina-ma o kaliva dibudibumuhigi badi vevine-dina unavelugadi be vekwageya hinasena. Fa'ina Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana faisewa againe badi iya buye avediwe. Meda bana Keleminiti ada Yesu Keliso yana tofaisewa velugadiyao anafaiweya kadu iya'eku ma badi iya buye avediwe. Badi kalivai-dina vevine-dina adi egana Yaubada yana buki againe giluku, gaveyao wayawaidi ivaguna himimiyami-yo adi egana gi'etoladina-ma buki-nadi.
Omi Kaiwabu againe wamiyamiyave'avina fa'ina, tova moya'aina wanavemwavemwamwala. Kadu ganagahe-havagi. Wanavemwavemwamwala.
Kaliva moya'aidi wana'atuvefa'iledi be bona bikabikana amine bonadi wanafatana. Tova kabisona Kaiwabu Yesu ginayewa'ela.
Keke tamo gavadi fa'ina yami wanuwavita wanavenuwanauna. Au yami nuwanuwa moya'aina fa'ina Yaubada againe wanalulukahihi, ada yami vesiule yami ve'o'ola tulina tulina buye wanave'atutamo'aina.

Ada au aseniwalova Yaubada againe give'inuba tu inubane be gina ana abalauyabu ide kaliva yada halamana gitubuhegena-ma, aseniwalovai-nadi vaita ase'asemi be nuwami ana to'itave'avina amine agaimiya ginamiyami omi Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi-ma kalivai-mina.

Kafoi tobohiyakweyao, hidede amine wananuwanuwa. Gava nuwanuwa velemo'ena, gava nuwanuwa nuwakuyakuyana, kadu gava nuwanuwa tunutunugina, gava nuwanuwa yegayegana, gava nuwanuwa nuwavaivaina, gava nuwanuwa gilubodana kaliva matadiya, e gava nuwanuwa hagihagi-mo'ena be ide kaliva kanahawaveyamumuyena, medema nuwanuwai-dina wananuwa-nunauyena.

Gava nuwanuwa fa'ina gakivetuvetunumi kadu gava dewa gahawavelevelemi, ka'i yaku laumamala againe wanogalina o yaku huluva againe wa'itana, medema wanahuluhuluvina. Ada Bana Yaubada aseniwalova giveleveleda-ma agaimiya ginamiyami.

Tu tobohiyakweyao, tuwaina yami velekawowo againe wavelugaku tu hinafane ma keke tamo yami veluga gadanuhagani. Keke vaita wadavenuwauluyeku tu yami nuwakabubu ana eda keke. Atu adamoya yami veluga kadu ganuhagana fa'ina, gavemwamwala-mo'a be Kaiwabu againe gavesiule.
Keke vaita yaku miya koyona fa'ina gadagahe, keke. Fa'ina iya'eku ma nuwanuwa sa'eyana againe gasikulu, higa ka'i yaku walokoloko o ka'i keke yaku walokoloko, au gavenuwakibokibo.

Miya koyona akuga keke ma gahalamanena. Kadu miya yamumuna akuga lakahina ma gahalamanena. E, halamana sa'eyana gavaina higa gavadi gavadi agaikuya ginalakayemu, ka'i ahiyauwa o ka'i mafulauga, ka'i yaku lokoloko moya'aina o ka'i yaku lokoloko keke, au akufaiweya ganavenuwakibokibo.
Bana Keliso gifaiwalaveleku fa'ina, gaitoma moya'aina au akufaiweya. Gavadi gavadi agaikuya ginalakayemu, medema moya'aina akufaiweya.
Atu aku vita tulina tulina agaidiya wavelugaku fa'ina gavesiule lakahina.

Kadu'e omi Filifai tovetumagana ahe wahalamane-hagihagiyena Masedoniya ana fafali gahegena ana toveya, tovetumagana adi yo'o keke tamo yadi velekawowo agaikuya hida'iveniniseni-yo gadanuhagani tu ami yo'ogaga wavelugaku. Medema boi tuwaina Yesu Keliso yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya gamidilumamalena-ma tovai-nadi.
Omi ganuyabuyabumi tu Tesalonaika againe galakayemu, ada yuwadedei gamiyami tu tova gavaiyehi mani aku veluga fa'ina wa'iveninisena.
Keke vaita yami mani ganavaini fa'ina gadagahe, keke. Au nuwanuwaku yami hawahega guwana ginamoya'ai be aimo ami laufata lakahina wananuhagana.

Yami veluga moya'aina fa'ina hida yami fefe againe yaku vesiule ga'etoladina. Yami hawahega yaku nuwanuwa gitubuhegena. E, yami nuwakabubu Efafolodaito nimane wa'iveninisena fa'ina keke tamo gavadi againe gadakali'uho. Mena yami nuwakabubu vaita abahawahega wamagana yamumuna Yaubada matane, ada vaita gidagahe gidagayo, “Yadi velekawowo we'a hagihagina agaikuya ada nuwaku hikivedigagina.”

Ada yaku Yaubada wakalivana, gaitoma moya'aina kikaiwabuna Bana againe gidadauda. Fa'ina ka'i tamo gavadi againe wanakali'uho, au omi nuwanuwami amine Bana ginavelemi, omi Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi-ma kalivai-mina.
Yada Yaubada higa Tamada ana egana kanakilakahina, ada yana kikaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Yaku lukafoi omi Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahalimiyao Yesu Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi amanadi. Tobohiyamiyao iya buye amimiyami-ma hilukafoiyemi.
Kadu tovetumagana bana Loma Tokaiwabu Sisa yana manuwa lakahina againe hififaisewa-ma yadi nuwakabubu hiyakahina, kadu Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine moya'aidi yadi nuwakabubu agaimiya.
Ada iya gave'o'olemi be Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadoga alu'aluwamiya wana'ayaunena.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)

Yo siule tobohiyakweyao moya'aimi Kolosi againe. Iya Folo Yaubada givegideku be Yesu Keliso yana kabu ganavaina higa yana afositolo adi maka giveleku. Iya Folo kadu tobohiyada Timoti yama lusiule agaimiya.

Omi Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahalimiyao Kolosi againe yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Omi higa tobohiyameyao dibudibumuhigimiyao Yaubada yana yo'o agaidiya, Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi amanadi. Tu Yaubada Tamada ginanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi ginakiveniwalovina.
Valeyami anogalina fa'ina avesivesiule, higa Yesu Keliso againe wavetuvetumagana kadu Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahalidiyao moya'aidi fa'idiya wahawahawahegemi.

Mena yami vetumagana kadu yami hawahega inubana ma yami lulauboda higa vaita aimo lobameya wanaluku-yo Yaubada omi fa'imiya gavaimi yamuyamumu-'owogina gikidewedewena-ma wananuhagana. Ada Yaubada medede amine omi fa'imiya gikidewadewa-yo walulauboda ma ahe wanogalina boi tuwaina Yaubada bonana velemo'ena higa Venuwa'ata Yamumuna omi agaimiya gimidilakayemu ana toveya.

Ada mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna omi agaimiya gilakayemu-ma kadu fafali tulina tulina agaidiya give'aliyahega, ada kaliva hinogalini-yo guwana yamumuna yadi dewa againe hiseseyemaunena. Meda anafaiweya omi agaimiya give'aliyahega fa'ina guwana yamumuna waseseyemaunena, boi tuwaina Yaubada velemo'ena omi ginuwadogemi ma wamidinogalina kadu wa'ayaunena ana toveya be wanunauwena tova adamoya.

Yaubada velemo'ena ginuwadogemi ma Bana Efafilasi givehawalemi. Efafilasi fa'ina ganagahe. Bana Keliso yana tofaisewa anafaiweya ime'eyao ada nuwanuwama bana'e. Kadu bana vaita ime loseyanima amine, Keliso yana faisewa againe kaliva dibudibumuhigina.
Ada Yaubada Alu'aluwana givemagami-yo hawahega ana nuwanuwa againe wamimiyami ma valeyami au hidede amine Efafilasi givenuwa'atama.

Mena valeyami anogalina fa'ina, omi fa'imiya ave'ove'o'ola tova moya'aina. Tuwaina valeyami amidinogalina againe avebutu ave'ove'o'olemi kadu keke ada'ilova. Ave'ove'o'ola be gavaimi Yaubada nuwanuwana omi wanadewa medemi yana nuwanuwa wanahalamane-hagihagiyena. E, ave'o'ola be Yaubada Alu'aluwana nuwami ginakifoleni-yo Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ana halamana againe omi wananuwahalamana-mo'a.

Medede amine ave'o'ola be higa gava dewa Kaiwabu yana kaliva gilubodadi, medede amine wanahuluhuluva, ada yami dewa matatabuna againe Bana nuwana wanakiveyamumuna. Ada kadu gugai hagihagina tulina tulina againe guwami wanaseseyemaunena, ada Yaubada ana halamana guwana agaimiya ginakabu-fa'ila.
Kadu'e ave'o'ola be Tokaiwabu-mo'a yana faiwala amine ginafaiwalavelemi-yo wanafaiwala-mo'a be higa vita tulina tulina ginalakayemu againe yami wavemwamwala wana'asevatu kadu wana'atuvefa'ila.

Kadu'e ave'o'ola be Tamada againe wanavesivesiule, fa'ina gi'ihagihagiyeda-yo yana lokolokofou moya'aina againe ide ada du'u adafaiweya kananuhagana. E, gavadi gavadi yana lokolokofou moya'aina yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao fa'idiya yana abaga mahamahalina againe gikidewedewena, medema kadu ide ada du'u adafaiweya kananuhagana. Au hidede amine omi fa'imiya ave'ove'o'ola.
Bana Tamada uyuyu ana abavehimeya againe gilugolegoleda ada Natu'ase'asena yana yo'ogaga agaidiya gisedamaneda be yana itave'avina againe kamimiyami.

Ada ide Yaubada Natuna buye kave'atutamo'aida-ma ada aiyauga kanuhagana. Yada dewa koyona fa'ina yogoyogonideyao kamiyami tu Bana Keliso gitutuvehobuda, higa yada koyona ana laufata Bana giseni tu Yaubada yada koyonai-dina giyawelidi.

Fa'ina Yaubada gigahe-yo Natuna gaitoma matatabudi i'ibubunidi lobameya kadu babiya gibubudi. Yaubada gigahe-yo gaitoma moya'aina ka'ita'itadi kadu keke kada'ita'itadi-ma gibubudi. Yaubada gigahe-yo lobama ana kaliva kikaiwabudiyao gibubudi, ka'i tokikaiwabu o ka'i tofaiwala o ka'i tovehimeya o ka'i kauveya tulina tulina au matatabudi gibubudi. E, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Natuna givelena be gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi gibubudi be higa Bana yana giba fa'ina.

Boi tuwai-lokalokana gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi aimo keke ana toveya, Keliso gimiyamiya-vagata, ada ahe gibubudi-yo Bana yana vehimeya againe gaitoma moya'aidi adi ivi tulina tulina agaidiya givefota-vagahidi be himimiyami.

Ada ide tovetumagana ada yo'o vaita Keliso wowona amine, ada Bana'e Tauna ma u'uda. Bana'e againe gaitoma moya'aina hive'inuba. Bana yana mididi-havagi wai ginagona ada au ide yana yo'ogaga yada mididi-havagi wai ginamulina. Au hidedemi Bana wai ginago-mo'ena be higa gaitoma moya'aidi ginakaiwabuhegedi.
Fa'ina Yaubada nuwanuwana yana kaiwabu matatabuna againe Natuna ginadodobodabodana be higa ana ita'ita meda Natuna ana ita'ita ginamiyami.

Kadu Yaubada nuwanuwana Natuna yana alika againe yana aibubuna matatabuda ginaveyaoyeda. Tuwaina ide tomiyababi kadu badi tomiyalobama vaita Yaubada nibaineyao amine kamiyami tu Yaubada Natuna kelose againe gi'alika be dayagina gimadu fa'ina, ide babi ana kaliva kadu badi lobama ana kaliva Bana Yaubada buye kaveyao.

Tuwaina omi Yaubada nibaineyao tu tova adamoya giveyaoyemi. Bana Natuna givekaliva be kelose againe gi'alika-yo Yaubada Tauna giveyaoyemi, be higa aimo tova mulina Keliso omi mahamahalimiyao keke tamo yami wakoyona Yaubada matane ginavega'aulemi, ada medema tovai-nadi keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya yami dewa fa'ina ginadakeyemi.

Omi Keliso againe wavetumagana. Ka'i tova moya'aina yami vetumagana againe wana'atuvefa'ila be keke wananuwanuwaluga, au mahamahalimiyao Yaubada matane ginavega'aulemi. Kadu kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ahe wanogalini-yo Yaubada omi fa'imiya gavadi yamuyamumu-'owogina gigaheyena, medema fa'ina wavebutu walulauboda. Ka'i tova moya'aina mena yami lulauboda wanakidonena tu keke wananuwayewa, au Keliso Yaubada matane ginavega'aulemi. Yaubada yana kaliva mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna tomiyababi fafali moya'aina agaidiya ahe hilumamalena, ada iya Folo mena Venuwa'ata Yamumunai-nadi ana laumamala againe gavetofaisewa.

Tu tova adamoya omi fa'imiya aulolo tagiya ganuhagana fa'ina gavemwamwala. Omi Keliso yana yo'ogaga ma vaita wowona amine. Adamoya omi fa'imiya aulolo tagiya ganuhagana fa'ina, Keliso yana vedivediwe Tauna wowona higa yana yo'ogaga fa'idiya aimo keke gidahavaini-ma tauku wowokuya galuluyabuna, ada au gavemwamwala.
Ada Yaubada givegideku be Keliso yana yo'ogaga adi itave'avina againe gavetofaisewa. E, Yaubada aku vehimeya giveleku be higa Bana bonana matatabuna omi agaimiya ganahawavemogatale-'owona.

Tuwai-lokalokana aituha a gavaiyehi ada kaliva adi hewahewa a gavaiyehi gihavaidi be Yaubada mena yana nuwanuwai-nadi gisevauyena, ada kaliva keke hidahalamaneni. Tu tova adamoya yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana yana yo'o mahamahalideyao agaideya gihawavemogatalena.

E, hidema Yaubada ana inuba higa yana nuwahinage gavayamumu kadu gavakaiwabu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina fafali tulina tulina agaidiya giseyemaunena be ide yana yo'o mahamahalideyao agaideya gihawavemogatalena. Ada mena nuwahinage hidede amine. Keke ime miYudagaga agaimeya Keliso gidamiyami, au kadu omi yo'o tulimiyao kalivai-mina agaimiya gimimiyami. Ada Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami fa'ina, aimo Yaubada buye wanakaiwabu ana tova walulubodena.

Bana Keliso alulumamalena. Yama wanuwahuya kaliva moya'aidi akivetuvetunudi kadu avehavehawaledi be higa kaliva vevine sa'eyana sa'eyana Keliso buye hinave'atutamo'aidi be ana halamana againe hinave'asevatu-yo Yaubada matane anavega'auledi.

Nuwanuwaku kaliva moya'aidi Keliso ana halamana againe hinave'asevatu fa'ina, gafifaisewa toyogina. Keliso yana faiwala lakahina againe gikivetoyogi-mo'eku amine, mena yaku nuwanuwai-nadi fa'ina gafifaiwala gafifaiwala tova moya'aina.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, nuwanuwaku wanahalamanena omi Kolosi tovetumagana fa'imiya kadu badi Leyodisiya tovetumagana fa'idiya kadu gaveyao moya'aidi keke magigiku hida'itani-ma fa'idiya yaku faisewa gavatoyoga.

E, omi moya'aimi fa'imiya gafifaisewa toyogina be higa wana'asevatu kadu buye wanave'ahawahawahega-yo wowomi sa'eyana amine wanave'etohavihavimi, higa vaita ami nuwakaifolega ginatubutubuga tu Yaubada yana nuwahinage ana halamana againe wananuwahuya-mo'a. Ada Yaubada yana nuwahinage au Keliso Tauna.
Yaubada yana nuwahuya kadu yana halamana vaita lokolokofou sevasevauyana amine, tu Bana Keliso Yaubada yana nuwanuwa tulina tulina ide agaideya gihawavemogatalena.
Hidedemi gavenuwa'atami be keke tamo hakwadi yadi bonayafayafa ana nogala vaita nuwanuwa velemo'ena amine ginanuwa'abiyemi.
Iya'eku ma keke hinafamiya gadamiyami tu nuwaku ma ahe gi'ela agaimiya, ada yami nuwanuwa sa'eyana wamididi-mo'a kadu Keliso againe wavetumaganadona ma ganuwenuwena againe, gavemwamwala-mo'a.
Tu boi Yesu Keliso ase'asemiya wamidivega'aulena be yami Tovehimeya wasena amine, tova moya'aina medede amine Bana againe wanamiyamiyave'avina.

Ai walamina gava gi'etodona amine, wanahawahegemi be yami vetumagana Keliso againe gina'etodona kadu ginatubutubuga. E, Keliso ana vetumagana againe wanafaiwala-mo'a Yaubada yana kaliva givehawalemi amine, kadu Yaubada ana vesivesiule againe wanawahivemavemauga.
