Tu taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi taudiyao yadi nuwahuya kadu yadi bonayafayafa againe hinanuwa'abiyemi be higa vaita badi agaidiya wanave'agetoga. Badi keke nuwanuwa velemo'ena hidalulukahihiyeni, au gahe fwayafwayana hilulukahihiyena. Yadi nuwanuwa keke Keliso againe gidave'inuba. Yadi nuwanuwa inubana ma kaliva yadi dewa badi bwanenediyao hihawaveleveledi amanadi kadu balauma fifiwaladiyao hida babi againe hivehivehimeya kalivai-dina mena yadi nuwanuwa.

Ada omi Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi fa'ina, yawai-vagata ahe wanuhagana be alu'aluwami keke tamo gavadi againe gidakali'uho. Ada Bana Keliso tokikaiwabu moya'aidi kadu tofaiwala moya'aidi lobama hinafane himimiyami-ma gikaiwabuhegedi, au Bana Tokaiwabu-mo'a badi givehimeyedi.

Ime miYuda Yaubada yana iya'iyaya yama kaliva wowodiya atomogolohina. Kadu omi Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi-ma Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wavaina. Keke wowomi ana tomogolota kaliva nimadiya amine wadavaini, au Keliso nuwamiya yana iya'iyaya gitomogolohina, higa dibumi koyona ana faiwala gidabana.

Boi wabafitaiso ana toveya, vaita Keliso buye wave'atutamo'aimi, higa Keliso gi'alika be hitauna-yo Yaubada alikeya gisivemididina amine, meda omi gufeya watowa higa vaita omi wayawaimi tuwaina wamiyami-ma kalivai-mina wa'alika be hitaumi-yo Yaubada gisivemididimi. E, Yaubada Keliso gisivemididina-ma yana faiwala wavetumaganena fa'ina, omi gisivemididimi be yawaimi ivaguna givelemi.

Yada koyona ana venuwaulu gavadi againe gilakayemu? Ide Yaubada yana vehimeya yana hawata keke kada'itave'avini, ada yada koyona moya'aina vaita fefe againe gidasegolohini-ma gilakata-mo'a Bana matane. Atu Keliso kelose againe gi'alika fa'ina, Yaubada keke ginalaufata au yada koyona ana vita matatabuna ahe giyawelina.

Ada Keliso kelose againe gi'alika fa'ina, vilakouko kadu balauma fifiwaladiyao moya'aidi lobama hinafane himimiyami-ma yadi faiwala givaihegena. Tuwaina tolugaviya nibaidiyao tufoidi hikive'avidi ada yogoyogonidiyao hinauwedi be wai hinagoyedi amine, Keliso mena kalivai-dina yogoyogonidiyao yadi wawowomumu moya'aidi matadiya wai ginagoyedi.

Iya ganagahe. Mena vehimeyai-dina au vaita kaliva anununa kauwana againe ka'itana amine. Nagona anununaga ka'itana tu muliya kaliva-mo'ena gilakayemu. Nagona Mosese yana vehimeya agaidiya gavadi aimo ginalakayemu-ma kaliva halamana hivaina. Tu kaliva-mo'ena higa Keliso Tauna a gilakayemu ada nuwanuwa velemo'ena kadu miyamiya-vagahina givehawaleda.

Ka'i mena mali kalivai-dina agaimiya hina'ela vaita yadi wanuwahobu hinavehawalemi hinagayo, “Omi fanifanimiyao. Au ime amine wanahuluva. Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kanahawadavadavadi, badi adi egana kanakilakahina tu taudeyao ada egana kanakihobuyena.” Ka'i keke badi yadi nuwanuwa amine wadahuluva fa'ina medede amine hinahawavefanifaniyemi, au bonadi gahe-kawowo keke wananuwa-nunauyeni. Badi kalivai-dina yadi eno'ita tulina tulina fa'ina hilulukahihi tova moya'aina, higa vaita Yaubada ana halamana againe hidakaiwabu. Mema iyohoyoho, mema taudiyao nuwadi ana alahawahawa-kawowo.

Bana Keliso u'uda ma againe badi keke-mo'a hidamiyave'avina. Bana u'uda tu ide sa'eyana sa'eyana vaita havi kadu waloga amine Keliso wowona againe kave'etohavihavida, ada yada faiwala Keliso u'uda againe gi'ela'ela be ide Bana wowona matatabuda katubutubuga katubutubuga Yaubada nuwanuwana amine.
Mena gaitomai-dina kaliva hi'abina o ka'i hi'au'ana-ma au havahavaina, fa'ina hawatai-dina inubadi kaliva yadi nuwanuwa againe, keke Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe.

Mena kalivai-dina hi'ela vaita yadi wanuwahobu hivehavehawalemi higayo, “Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata adi egana kanakilakahina tu taudeyao ada egana kanakihobuyena. Taumiyao wowomi wanamunukoyokoyona be yami nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana wanaluvekwe'una.” Badi hidede amine higahe tu tovanenega badi fa'idiya higahe higayo, “Wona velemona badi kaliva halamanidiyao.” Tu yadi gahe ma gahe-kawowo. Ka'i kaliva yadi gahe amine hinahuluva, au keke adifaiweya yadi nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana hinaluvekwe'uni. Au bonadi keke wanavenogaleni.
E, lobama ana gaitoma agaidiya nuwami wanase-mo'ena tu babi ana gaitoma keke wananuwenuwedi.

Keliso gi'alika againe kadu omi yami nuwanuwa tuwaina againe wamiyami-ma kalivai-mina wa'alika. Omi wa'alika tu wayawaimi ivaguna taumiyao Keliso nuwahinagene wamimiyami ada Keliso Tauna Yaubada nuwahinagene gimimiyami, au lugolagolamiyao wamimiyami.

Kadu Keliso Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami-yo Bana yawaina au omi yawaimi, ada aimo tova mulina Bana'e yana wakikaiwabu ginayemaunena ana toveya, kadu omi Bana buye wanayemaunemi ada Bana buye wanakaiwabu.
Mena dewai-dina fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya ana todibutoyoga yana ila'a guwana hinanuhagana.
Boi tuwaina badi todibutoyoga amine kadu omi mena dewai-dina ana eda againe wanunudadana.

Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku be nuwami matatabuna gikive'ivaguna fa'ina, keke tuwaina amine wananuwanuwa higa vaita yo'o tulina tulina agaidiya kadamiyami. Tuwaina tufoida miYuda tu tufoida yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina, tufoida wowodeya Yaubada yana iya'iyaya katomogolohina tu tufoida keke kadatomogolohini, tufoida hawahawala tufoida fanifanideyao tufoida agetoga kadu tufoida taudeyao yada faisewa kavehimeyena. Atu tova adamoya Keliso yana yo'o agaidiya moya'aida kavesa'eya, ada Bana'e anakaibe kikaiwabuna, kikaiwabu-mo'ena.

E, tobohiyamiyao wana'atuvefa'iledi. Ka'i tamo hakwadi agaimiya ginakoyo, au yana koyona wanavenuwauluyena. Kaiwabu Yesu yami koyona giyawelina be givenuwauluyena amine, meda tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona wanayawelina be wanavenuwauluyena.
Medede amine wanadewadewa tu huluva sa'eyana giluboda-mo'emi higa mena dewa hagihagina tulina tulina tobohiyamiyao adi nuwanuwa againe wana'itavana.

Gilubodami be Keliso bonana nuwamiya ginadauda be ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina agaidiya wanafaiwala. Keliso againe nuwahuya tulina tulina wanavaini-yo buye wanave'avehavehawala wanave'akivetuvetunu, kadu kweli tulina tulina wanakwelikweliyena, higa same Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda amanadi, kadu kweli Yaubada ana hawadavadava fa'ina kaliva hi'etoladina-ma, kadu kweli Alu'aluwa Mahalina gina'alavelevelemi-ma wanakwelikweliyena ada nuwamiya Yaubada againe wanavesivesiule.

Ada gavaimi gavaimi wanahuluvini, gahe againe o ka'i gugai againe, au matatabuna Kaiwabu Yesu ana tovetumagana gilubodadi amine wanahuluhuluvina tu Yaubada Tamada againe wanavesivesiule Keliso yana veluga agaimiya fa'ina.

Omi tove'agetoga, badi babi ana tovehimeya agaidiya wave'agetoga-ma yadi gahe matatabuna wana'idibumuhigena. Wana'idibumuhigedi keke vaita matadiyagaga be higa hinahawaveyamumuyemi, au omi Tovehimeya getane wave'amohimohinena fa'ina yami wa'asehawahega yami tovehimeya dibune wana'idibumuhigedi.
Gavaimi gavaimi wanafaisewa medema yami wa'asehawahega wanafifaisewa, keke vaita kalivagaga fa'idiya wadafifaisewa au Tovehimeya getane buye'i fa'ina.

E, yami wa'asehawahega wanafifaisewa, fa'ina aimo Tovehimeya getane ginalaufata. Gavadi gavadi yamuyamumu-'owogina giwonadabadaba be aimo ginavelemi, medema ami laufata wananuhagana. Gava tovehimeya fa'ina wafifaisewa? Bana Keliso ami Tovehimeya.
Hai kaliva koyona ginafaisewana, medema koyona ana laufata ginanuhagana, ada ka'i tovehimeya o ka'i agetoga digo ami laufata leleleya.
Tu omi tovehimeya ma ami agetoga agaidiya wana'ihagihagi keke wana'ivekoyodi, fa'ina wananuwa-nunauyena kadu omi yami Tovehimeya we'a lobameya gimimiyami.

Kadu ime fa'imeya wanave'o'ola be higa wana ginayauni-yo Yaubada bonana kaliva agaidiya amafaiweya analulumamalena, kadu Keliso yana kibababala ana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana anahawavemogatalena. Mena Keliso ana laumamala fa'ina deliya gamimiyami.
Au wanave'o'ola be gahe mahamahalina amine ganalulumamalena gavaimi gilubodaku amine.

Tova moya'aina wanagahegahe nuwavaivaina amine kadu yami gahe wanakivedigagina be higa kaliva vevine Keliso yana nuwanuwa fa'ina hinatoliluvaluva againe, amifaiweya sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya wanabonalaufata hagihagina.
Hidema ana inuba iya bana ga'iveninisena be gavaimi ama valeya ginavenuwa'atami, kadu ase'asemi ginakivevatuna.

Kadu Onesimo bana Tikiko buye ga'iveninisedi, bana kadu tobohiyanuwama kaliva dibubibumuhigina ada yami yo'o kalivana. Badi adi'iselu gavadi moya'aina hidede againe gilakalakayemu, medema fa'ina hinavenuwa'atami.

Bana Efafilasi yami yo'o kalivana kadu Yesu Keliso ana agetoga gilukafoiyemi. Tova moya'aina omi fa'imiya give'o'ola toyogina be higa yami vetumagana againe wana'atuvefa'ila, higa vaita Yaubada ana halamana againe wanave'asevatu ada yana nuwanuwa matatabuna nuwami ginavai-mo'ena.
Iya tauku ga'itana be gavenuwa'atami higa bana omi fa'imiya gififaisewa toyogina, kadu badi tovetumagana Leyodisiya melala againe be Hilafolisi melala againe.
Bana Luke yama doketa nuwanuwama lakahina bana'e amanadi kadu Dimasi yadi lukafoi.
Badi tobohiyadeyao Leyodisiya againe kadu nouda Nimufa be tovetumagana adi yo'o nouda yadi manuweya buye hivagavaga'auta amanadi yaku nuwakabubu agaidiya.

Hida leta ma tamo hakwadi omi yami yo'o agaimiya ginahawana be wananogalini-yo letai-nadi tovetumagana adi yo'o Leyodisiya againe wana'iveninisena be kadu badi hinahawana. Meda anafaiweya leta Leyodisiya againe ga'iveninisena-ma gina'ela be kadu omi wanahawana.
Bana Akifo wanagahena wanagayo, “Kaiwabu Yesu faisewa sa'eyana fa'ina givegide medema faisewai-nadi ya wa'atuvefa'ila unanunauwena tu unaluyabuna.” Hidemi wanagahena.

Kaliva sa'eyana hida leta againe yaku nuwanuwa gi'etoladina, tu adamoya iya Folo yaku lukafoi agaimiya tauku nimakuya ga'etoladina. Wananuwa-nunauyeku iya deliya gamimiyami be wanave'o'oleku. Ada iya gave'o'olemi be higa Yaubada yana nuwadogeya wanamiyami.
(Iya Folo nimaku.)

Yo siule tobohiyameyao Yaubada yana yo'ogaga Tesalonaika againe kalivai-mina. Ime Folo Sailosi Timoti yami leta a'etoladina be wana'itana. Omi higa Yaubada Tamada kadu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yadi kaliva yadi vevine ma hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Tova be tova Yaubada Tamada matane anuwa-nunauyemi higa Yesu Keliso wavetumaganena fa'ina wa'i'idibumuhiga, kadu Bana againe yami nuwanuwa wasena fa'ina yana faisewa againe wavedivediwe, kadu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana yewa'ela walulubodena fa'ina wa'atu'atuvefa'ila. Tova moya'aina mena yami dewa hagihagina yama ve'o'ola againe anuwa-nunauyena.
Tobohiyameyao, Yaubada nuwanuwana omi'iyao, ada ahalamanena Bana giluwafami be yana yo'ogaga wanamiyami.

Hidedemi ahalamanena, fa'ina Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna omi agaimiya alumamalena ana toveya keke adagahe-kawowo au Alu'aluwa Mahalina gifaiwalavelema-yo yama laumamala ase'asemi gi'onana, ada au ahalamanena makewa yama laumamala ma gahe velemo'ena. Ada ime boi hinafamiya amiyami ana toveya, omi wahalamanena gavaimi ahuluhuluva medemi ami veluga fa'ina ahuluvina.

Tu omi'iyao ma ime wave'u'ulema kadu Kaiwabu wave'u'ulena. Vita tulina tulina kaliva nimadiya wanuhagana. Hidedemi omi yami watagiya nonogana Yaubada bonana keke wadakiloweni, au Alu'aluwa Mahalina gifaiwalavelemi-yo yami wavemwamwala wavenogalena.
Ada au hidedemi wahuluva fa'ina, omi aba'ita tovetumagana moya'aidi Masedoniya kadu Akaiya ana fafaliya himimiyami-ma fa'idiya.

Kaliva hiulega hiyuvedonena be agona yuwa lauveya ginauna amine, meda omi yami huluva hagihagina againe venuwa'ata Kaiwabu fa'ine fafali moya'aina lauveya ginauna. Keke yami fafali Masedoniya o Akaiya agaidiyagaga gidanauna, au yami vetumagana Yaubada againe valeyana fafali moya'aina yuwa lauveya ginauna. Medema fa'ina ime keke tamo gavadi anagaheyeni.

Au mena mali fafali kalivadi taudiyao ime yama ela agaimiya ma hilukahihiyena, higa yami wa'asehawahega wavega'aulema. Higahe higa vaita balauma wavekwaulaugedi-yo Yaubada againe wahagavilami be Yaubada velemo'ena kadu miyamiya-vagahina againe wahawahegemi, ada higa Natuna lobameya ginatauya be babiya ginayewa'ela-ma wanamiyabodana. Natuna Yesu ma alikeya gisivemididina ada Bana'e Yaubada yana ila'a aimo tokoyona agaidiya ginalakayemu-ma againe gilulugolegoleda.
Siule tobohiyameyao, kadu omi taumiyao wahalamanena yama ela agaimiya au wa'agevavana. Keke ada'ela-kawowo higa vaita yama ela guwana keke.

Wahalamanena boi melala ana egana Filifai againe kaliva himunukoyokoyoma kadu hi'ihawadamanema tu muliya miTesalonaika agaimiya a'ela. Ada nibaimeyao nuwanuwadi hinakivekoyoma nonogana Yaubada ase'asema gikivetoyogini-yo yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya alukahihiyena.
Yama lau'age inubana ma keke ve'alololo, keke nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana fa'ina, kadu ime keke kaliva aikaunuwanuwameyao higa vaita yama bonayafayafa againe ananuwa'abiyemi, keke-mo'a.

Au Yaubada gavaimi yana nuwanuwa anagaheyeni, medemi tova moya'aina alulukahihi, higa vaita Yaubada yama dewa gida'itahalamaneni-yo ama vehimeya gidavelema, be yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna analulumamalena. Keke kaliva nuwadi anakiveyamumuni fa'ina adalulukahihi. Au Yaubada nuwana anakiveyamumuna fa'ina agahegahe, Bana'e yama nuwanuwa ka'i yamumuna o koyona gi'itanuwenuwena amanadi.
Omi wahalamanena keke tamo tova adabonayafeyafemi, keke tamo tova yami giba ada'italuvadigeni-yo bona digadigagina againe adasevauyeni, keke-mo'a. Agahe velemo'ena ma Yaubada gihalamanena.
Yama laumamala ana toveya keke kaliva agaidiya ama egana ana kailakata adaleleni, keke omi agaimiya kadu keke mali yo'o agaidiya adaleleni.

Ime Keliso yana afositolo yana kabu avaina fa'ina, gavadi gavadi ama itave'avina fa'ina agaimiya adave'o'ola digo, medema gidalubodana. Tu keke ama itave'avina fa'ina agaimiya adave'o'ola. Keke medede amine faisewa adavelemi. Au kwamayoku natudiyao kabi'odiyao hi'ita'itave'avidi amine, meda ime bonama bikabikana amine hinafamiya amiyami.

Yama nuwanuwa agaimiya ase-mo'ena fa'ina, ahawahegema be Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya anavetalaiyena, tu keke Venuwa'atagaga au taumeyao ahawahegena ami veluga fa'ina. Omi vaita tobohiyanuwameyao amine fa'ina omi fa'imiya taumeyao ahawahegema.

Tobohiyameyao, makewa nuwami giulu yama wavediwe afifaisewa. Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya alumamalena tu uyadayada be bogi taumeyao ama itave'avina fa'ina afifaisewa be keke ama ve'a fa'ina omi vita wananuhagani.

Tu yama dewa fa'ina omi amifaiweya wana'awatalatalaina kadu Yaubada anafaiweya gina'awatalatalaina, higa yama huluva omi tovetumagana agaimiya au hagihagina kadu tunutunugina, ada keke tamo gavadi koyona agaimiya adafaisewani.
Fa'ina wahalamanena kaliva natuneyao gi'itave'avidi amine, meda ime omi sa'eyana sa'eyana a'itave'avimi.

Boi tova moya'aina alulu'ageyemi, ase'asemi akikivevatuna kadu agahegahevagadonemi be gava dewa Yaubada yana kaliva gilubodadi, medede amine wanahuluhuluva. Yaubada gikovami be yana yo'ogaga kalivai-mina vevine-mina ase'asemiya ginavehivehimeya ada Bana buye wanakaiwabu.

Fa'ina tobohiyameyao wa'ita, Yaubada yana yo'o tulina tulina Yudiya ana fafaliya Yesu Keliso againe himiyave'avina-ma hinuhagana amine, meda omi wanuhagana. Badi miYuda taudiyao yadi yo'o kalivai-dina Yesu Keliso againe hivetumagana-ma hikivekoyodi amine, meda yami yo'o kalivai-dina omi hikivekoyomi.

Badi miYuda Kaiwabu Yesu hiluve'alikana ada Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina hiluve'alikadi kadu ime hiwavima. Wona velemona Yaubada nuwana hikivekoyona ada yadi venibaina fa'ina kaliva moya'aidi adi kibababala ana eda hisebodana.

Wa'ita, higaluvaluva be hinahawatama be higa kibababala ana eda yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina agaidiya keke analumamaleni. Au hidede amine yadi koyona ana gowa hivemagana. Tuwaina hivebutu koyona moya'aina hive'atutamo'aina be hinunauwena tova hidevama, ada yadi koyona ana gowa hivemagani-yo au adamoya Yaubada yana ila'a guwana badi agaidiya gilakalakayemu.

Tu tobohiyakweyao ide fa'ideya ganagahe. Tuwaina badi kalivai-dina hiwavima-yo ahegemi tu nuwama mene aimo agaimiya gimimiyami. Tova kabisona kanuvehaila tu avebutu eda alelelena be anayewa'ela, agaimiya atalatalanuwaiyemi fa'ina.
Fa'ina nuwanuwama agaimiya anayewa'ela. Iya Folo tova gavaiyehi gagaluvaluva be ganayewaku tu Setani yama eda gisebodana.

Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ginayewa'ela be Bana matane kanamiyami ana toveya, gava'adi yama abaluve'avina? Gava'adi yama abavemwamwala yama abagakahikahi? Me omi'iyao. Omi Yesu Keliso againe wamiyave'avina fa'ina, yama wavemwamwala anagakahikahi anagayo, “Hida hima yama faisewa guwana.”
E, wona velemona omi'iyao yama abagakahikahi kadu yama abavemwamwala.

Au tobohiyama Timoti agaimiya a'iveninisena, bana'e Yaubada buye hifififaisewa be Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Keliso fa'ine gilulumamalena. E, tobohiyama a'iveninisena be Keliso ana vetumagana againe ginakivetoyogimi, kadu ginalu'ageyemi higa vaita vita tulina tulina kaliva nimadiya wanuhagana fa'ina keke wananuwayewa. Omi taumiyao ahe wahalamane-hagihagiyena mena vitai-dina Yaubada yana vehimeya againe ide agaideya gilakayemu.
Ika, boi aimo buye kamiyami ana toveya avenuwa'ata-vagahimi vaita kaliva hinakivekoyoda. Ada taumadi wahalamanena medede amine gilakayemu.

Ada vitai-dina wanuhagana fa'ina ase'aseku gi'u'aulolo-mo'a againe, Timoti ga'iveninisena be higa yami vetumagana valeyana gananogalina. Gamatauta ka'i Setani tamo gavadi againe gida'aladibidibiyemi ada au yama faisewa guwana gidaluyaweyawelina.
Tu tobohiyameyao, yama ase'u'aulolo kadu ama vita tulina tulina agaidiya omi fa'imiya ase'asema givatu. E, yami vetumagana fa'ina a'asevatu.
Ka'i omi Kaiwabu againe wanavetumagana toyogina be keke ma'ita wananuwayewa amine o, ime wayawaima hagihagina anamiyami.
Omi fa'imiya Yaubada againe avesivesiule. Yama vemwamwala lakahina omi fa'imiya givelema ada Bana matane avemwamwala-mo'a. Yada Yaubada keke kanawona!
Bogi be uyadayada Yaubada againe a'awalulau'u higa vaita buye kanavemagigi'ita'ita ada gavaimi yami vetumagana againe wakali'uho, medema againe anavelugami be yami vetumagana ginatubuga-mo'a.
Tu ave'o'ola be Yaubada Tamada Tauna kadu yada Kaiwabu Yesu yama eda hina'ivetuvetununa be agaimiya ana'ela.

Kaiwabu Yesu againe ave'o'ola be yami ve'ahawahawahega kadu yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana kaliva moya'aidi agaidiya ginatubutubuga ginatubutubuga tu nuwanuwa hawahawahegana againe wanawahivemavemauga. Omi ami nuwakabubu againe ime awahivemavemauga amine, meda omi ve'anuwakabubu againe wanawahivemavemauga.

Kadu yada Yaubada ginafaiwalavelemi be aimo yada Kaiwabu Yesu ginayewa'ela ana toveya yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao buye'i, kadu omi mahamahalimiyao keke tamo yami wakoyona Yaubada Tamada matane wanamiyami.

Siule tobohiyameyao, kadu yaku gahe sa'eya-mo'ena. Boi akivetuvetunumi higa gavaimi wanahuluhuluva be Yaubada nuwana wanakiveyamumuna fa'ina. Ada au hidede amine wahuluhuluva. Tova adamoya Kaiwabu Yesu ana eganeya ave'o'olemi kadu agahevagadonemi be mena dewa hagihagina againe wanatutuveguvegulami.
Fa'ina ahe wahalamanena gava vehimeya Kaiwabu Yesu givelema, medema ahawavelevelemi.
Gilubodana be moya'aimi sa'eyana sa'eyana nagomi ana hawata fa'ina halamana wanavaina. E, dewa tunutunugina amine Yaubada matane kadu kaliva matadiya yami nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina wanavehimeyena.
Badi kaliva Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma matadigadigaga againe hihawahawahegedi be keke ma'ita taudiyao hidahawatadi. Keke badi amine wanahuluva.

Kaliva yadi huluva vevine agaidiya ma keke tamo hakwadi tobohiyana vavinena agaidiya ginakiluvaluva be hidede amine bana againe ginakivekoyo ada yana abavehimeya keke ginawowomumuyeni. Boi avenuwa'atami kadu agahemi toyogina, ka'i kaliva vevine agaidiya hinakoyo, au Kaiwabu adi matahiwadi ginaveledi.
Fa'ina Yaubada keke gidakovada-yo udo againe kanamiyami. Au gikovada be dewa yegayegana againe kanamiyami.

Hidema fa'ina hai kaliva mena yaku kivetuvetunu gikilowena, keke kaliva bonana gidakiloweni au Yaubada Bana Alu'aluwana givelemi-ma bonana gikilowena. Yaubada yana nuwanuwa omi fa'imiya au hidede amine.

Ada wona velemona tobohiyamiyao tovetumagana adi yo'o Masedoniya ana fafali matatabuna agaidiya ve'ahawahawahega amine wahuluhuluva. Tobohiyameyao, kadu anagahevagadonemi be ve'ahawahawahega againe wanatutuveguvegulami.
Giluboda-mo'emi be kukuya againe wanamiyami, ami mata'atubodagaga wana'itave'avina, keke wanamiya-kawowo au taumiyao nimamiya wanafaisewa-hagihagi boi akivetuvetunumi amine.

Medede amine wanahuluva be higa keke tamo hakwadi againe amiga ami kevakeva fa'ina wanavetumagana, au taumiyao yami faisewa againe wanavaivaina, ada au hidede amine yami dewa ginalubodana badi Yesu Keliso keke hidavetumaganeni-ma matadiya.

Ide kavetumagana higa vaita Yesu gi'alika be gimididi-havagi. Medema fa'ina kadu kavetumagana higa vaita Yesu ginayewa'ela ana toveya, Yaubada badi Yesu ana tovetumagana hi'alika-ma ginasivemidididi be Yesu buye ginanauwedi yana abageya.

Kaiwabu Tauna yana gahe amine hidedemi avenuwa'atami, higa Kaiwabu Yesu ginayewa'ela ana toveya ide gaveyao Yaubada keke gidavega'auleda tu aimo wayawaida kanamiyami, medema keke wai kananagoni. Au badi alika againe hi'enonuwaulu-ma wai hinanagona tu ide wai kanamulina.

Au Kaiwabu Tauna lobama amine ginahobu'ela wakova'awafatafatana kadu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kikaiwabuna wa'agona kadu Yaubada yana hiulega wa'agona. Ada nagona badi Keliso ana tovetumagana hi'alika-ma hinamididi-havagi au ide gaveyao Yaubada keke gidavega'auleda tu aimo wayawaida kanamiyami, medema auhe'ama ide buye se'eyaine ginakifatumida digo buhibuhi againe ginanauweda be lobama hinafane Kaiwabu buye kanave'anauhaga fa'ina. Ada au Kaiwabu buye kanamiyamiya-vagata.
Hidema fa'ina mena Kaiwabu yana gahe againe buye wanave'ahawahawavemoluva be yami tagiya to'alika fa'idiya ginahavaina.
Fa'ina omi taumiyao wahalamane-hagihagiyena tokai'afu bogi againe tonimanuwa ginavefuta'ana amine, Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela tova kaliva ginavefuta'adi.

Kaliva hinagahegahe hinagayo, “Fafali moya'aina agaidiya niwalova gisena. Keke tamo vita kananuhagani.” Hidedemi hinagahegahe tu auhe'ama agolaufofola lakahina badi agaidiya ginalakayemu. Kwamayoku wahifugadi auhe'ama hinavefahedi be yadi aulolo ginayemu amine, meda badi tomiyababi agaidiya aulolo lakahi-mo'ena ginalakayemu ada keke adifaiweya hina'ota.
Tu omi tobohiyameyao Yesu yana yo'ogaga agaidiya keke uyuyu againe wadamiyami fa'ina, Kaiwabu yana tova keke ginavefuta'ami tokai'afu tonimanuwa uyuyuya givefuta'ana amine.
Au omi moya'aimi mahalina ana kaliva, yami dewa kabu'avane uyadeyadeya waseseyemaunena. E, ide keke uyuyu ana kaliva higa vaita bogi againe yada dewa sevasevauyana kadafifaisewani.
Ide mahalina ana kaliva fa'ina, keke kanadauda badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma hidadauda amine. Au kanalulauboda ada taudeyao kanahawatada.
Au uyuyu againe kaliva hidadauda. Uyuyu againe kaliva gufa laulaugina hiyuyu-fa'ila be hivevekwavakwava.

Tu ide mahalina ana kaliva fa'ina, taudeyao kanahawatada. Vetumagana kadu nuwakabubu vaita manawada ana abaseboda amine kana'osena. Ada kibababala ana lulauboda vaita gaviya ana kedukedu amine kana'osena.
Keke vaita Yaubada yana ila'a guwana kananuhagani fa'ina gidavenuwadadaneda, keke. Au givenuwadadaneda be yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana veluga againe kibababala kananuhagana.
Bana'e ide fa'ideya gi'alika higa ka'i wayawaida kamimiyami o alikeya ka'enonuwaulu, au Bana buye kanamiyami fa'ina.
Medema fa'ina Kaiwabu ana vetumagana againe buye wanave'alulau'age kadu buye wanave'aveluveluga. Ada au wona velemona hidede amine mene wahuluhuluva.
Yadi faisewa hagihagina fa'ina yami wa'asehawahega wanave'amohimohinedi lakahina. Ada omi taumiyao veyao againe wanamiyami.

Kadu tobohiyameyao, agahevagadonemi be badi himiyamiya-kawowo wana'ago'abiyedi, badi matamatauhidiyao ase'asedi wanakivevatuna, badi kowakowadiyao wanavelugadi, tobohiyamiyao moya'aidi wana'atuvefa'iledi.
Hai kaliva nuwanuwana koyona kadu koyona againe ginalaufata, medema wanahawatana. Au giluboda-mo'emi be buye wanave'anuwanuwakabubu, kadu meda mali kaliva moya'aidi wananuwanuwakabubuyedi.
Tova be tova Yaubada againe wanave'ove'o'ola.
Gavadi gavadi moya'aina agaimiya ginalakayemu, medema fa'ina Yaubada againe wanavesivesiule. Omi Yesu Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine fa'ina, Yaubada nuwanuwana omi medede amine wanahuluva.
Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana faisewa keke wanahawatani.
Bana Yaubada yana venuwa'ata tovetumagana gitunevehabalutugidi-ma keke wanahawave'iyohoyohoyeni.
Gahe moya'aina inubana ka'i Yaubada againe o ka'i keke ma wananuwave'uve'una. Hadema gahe velemo'ena, medema wanavenogalena.
Koyona tulina tulina matatabuna wanavekwaulaugena.

Kafoi tobohiyameyao, Bana Yaubada aseniwalova giveleveleda-ma gina'ihagihagiyemi be yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahali-mo'emiyao wanamiyami. E, ave'o'ola be nuwahinagemi matatabuna kadu wowomi matatabuna gina'itave'avina ginanunauwena tu yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana yewa'ela ana toveya wanamiyami ami vita keke.
Bana gikovami be yana yo'ogaga agaidiya waluku-ma au hidede amine agaimiya ginagugai, ada Bana giwonadabadaba amine ginagugaiyena fa'ina adafaiweya kanavetumaganena.
Tobohiyameyao, ime fa'imeya wanave'o'ola.
Kafoi tobohiyameyao moya'aimi. Ime fa'imeya tobohiyamiyao wana'atulauhidi higa yama nuwanuwa hawahawahegana agaimiya wadaseyemaunena.
Kaiwabu ana eganeya gavehimeyemi be tamo hakwadi tovetumagana ami yo'o agaimiya hida leta a'etoladina-ma tobohiyameyao moya'aimi matamiya ginahawana.
Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadogeya wanamiyami.
(Ime Folo Sailosi Timoti bonama.)

Yo siule tobohiyameyao Yaubada yana yo'ogaga Tesalonaika againe kalivai-mina. Ime Folo Sailosi Timoti yami leta a'etoladina be wana'itana. Omi higa Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yadi kaliva yadi vevine.
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.

Medede amine wahuluhuluva fa'ina, Yaubada yana yo'ogaga melala tulina tulina agaidiya omi fa'imiya agagakahikahi agayo, “Badi tovetumagana Tesalonaika againe aulolo tagiya moya'aina kaliva nimadiya hinuhagana tu au ai'adi yadi wavetumagana hi'atu'atuvefa'iledi.” Hidedemi agahe.
Yaubada kaliva tunutunugina fa'ina, badi aulolo tagiya hivelemi-ma agaidiya ginalaufata. Badi kadu aulolo tagiya hinanuhagana.

Ada yami aulolo yami tagiya ginavaihegeni-yo ginahavaina tu omi'iyao kadu ime'eyao buye kanavemwamwala. Aimo yada Kaiwabu Yesu ana ivemogatala ana toveya Yaubada medede amine ginalaufata. Medema tovai-nadi yada Kaiwabu Yesu lobama amine ginahobu'ela yana tovenuwa'ata fifiwaladiyao buye'i.
Ai'ala'alata toyogina ginalufifidi tu hinahobu'ela, ada badi Yaubada hivekwaulaugena kadu Venuwa'ata Yamumuna Kaiwabu Yesu fa'ine keke hidavenogaleni-ma ginavematahiwadiyedi.

Adi matahiwadi hidede amine. Agolaufofola ana abageya hinamiyamiya-vagata, higa yadi abaluku Yaubada againe falifali-vagahina be keke-mo'a Kaiwabu matane hinayemu, keke-mo'a Kaiwabu yana faiwala kikaiwabuna hina'itani.

Kaiwabu ginayewa'ela ana toveya adi matahiwadi au hidede amine hinanuhagana. Medema tovai-nadi Kaiwabu ginayewa'ela be higa yana kikaiwabu kadu ana ita'ita yauyaulowogina yana yo'o mahamahalidiyao agaidiya kabu'avane ginayemu. E, badi gaveyao moya'aidi Bana againe hivetumagana-ma agaidiya kabu'avane ginayemu be moya'aidi matadiya ginakaiwabu-mo'a. Kadu omi yo'oi-mina buye'i, fa'ina venuwa'ata Keliso fa'ine avelemi-ma wavetumaganena.

Au hidede amine ave'o'ola be higa yami dewa againe yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana egana wanakilakahina. Yada Yaubada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ginuwadogemi fa'ina, yami dewa againe Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana egana wanakilakahina ada Bana'e ami egana ginakilakahina.

Wanogali! Ka'i valeya sa'eyana wananogalina higa vaita Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela ana tova ahe gilakayemu, nuwami keke ginamadufanifani kadu ase'asemi keke ginamadu'akolukoluni. Hakwadi againe mena valeya wanogalini? Ka'i mene kaliva sa'eyana gigahe vaita Alu'aluwa Mahalina gidahawavemogataleni? O ka'i tamo hakwadi givenuwa'atami vaita ime adagahe o leta againe ada'etoladini higa vaita Kaiwabu ahe gidayewa'ela? Ime keke-mo'a hidede amine adagahe.

Badi hive'alololo. Keke-mo'a wanavenogaledi. Fa'ina Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela ana tova keke ginamaduyemu tu nagona kaliva moya'aidi hinanuwayewa be Yaubada hinavekwaulaugena, ada kaliva koyo-mo'ena vehimeya moya'aina keke-mo'a gidanuwenuweni-ma kabu'avane ginayemu. Bana Setani yana kaliva ma kalivai-nadi agolaufofola ginanuhagana.

Kaliva yadi viviluwa o ka'i yadi abahawadavadava tulina tulina ginahawave'iyoyohoyedi. Au tauna ginakivekaiwabuna ginana Yaubada yana manuwa-tafalolo againe ginavetogana ginagayo, “Iya Yaubada akukaibe'u-mo'a.” Hidedemi ginahuluva tu muliya Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela ana tova ginayemu.
Boi iya omi buye kamiyami ana toveya gavadi aimo ginalakayemu-ma fa'ina gagahegahemi. Gavaita makewa'e hida gaitomai-dina fa'idiya nuwami gida'afolefoleni.
Tu tova adamoya tamo gavadi bana kaliva koyo-mo'ena yana eda gisebodana, ada gava faiwala gisesebodana-ma omi wahalamanena. Atu aimo tova ginalubodana againe ginalakayemu.

Bana kaliva koyo-mo'ena tauna keke kabu'avane gidalakayemu tu kaliva moya'aidi ahe hivebutu vehimeya tulina tulina keke-mo'a hidanuwenuweni, ada yadi dewa againe kaliva koyo-mo'ena yana faiwala sevasevauyana ka'itana. Ada hidede amine sevasevauyana ginafifaisewa ginanunauwena tu Yaubada yana vehimeya againe bana yana eda ana toseboda ginavagalowoga.

Au toseboda ginavagalowoga tu bana kaliva koyo-mo'ena vehimeya moya'aina keke-mo'a gidanuwenuweni-ma kabu'avane ginalakayemu, atu Kaiwabu Yesu ginayewa'ela be Tauna gina'ivemogatalina ana toveya, Bana awane kalivai-nadi ginayuvekwe'una, e yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina ginaluyawelina.

Meda ve'alololo againe koyona tulina tulina agaidiya badi adi egana bwavibwavina-ma ginanuwa'abiyedi. Badi kalivai-dina hidibutoyoga be keke nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe hidahawahegedi-yo adi kibababala hidavaini fa'ina, adi egana bwavibwavina.

Keke nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe hidahawahegedi fa'ina, Yaubada givehimeya be fwaya lakahina badi agaidiya giyemuyemu ada nuwadiya gififaiwala toyogina be higa nuwanuwa ve'alololona fa'ina badi hinagayo, “Hida hima wona velemona.”
Ada au hidede amine gaveyao moya'aidi nuwanuwa velemo'ena keke hidavetumaganeni tu dewa koyona againe hikasikasisi, medema matahiwadi hinanuhagana.
Kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna agaimiya alumamalena againe, mena yana lauwafa amine gikovami be higa omi yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso buye wanakaiwabu.
Tobohiyameyao, medema fa'ina wanamidi toyogina ada vehawala tulina tulina laumamala againe o leta againe ahawavelevelemi-ma agaidiya wanaluluve'avina.

Tu badi kaliva koyodiyao kadu nuwadi nubalabalana ma nuwanuwadi hinakivekoyoma. Wanave'o'ola be higa Yaubada badi agaidiya ime ginalugolegolema. Fa'ina keke kaliva moya'aidi yama laumamala hidavetumaganeni.
Atu Kaiwabu giwonadabadaba amine ginagugaiyena fa'ina ide adafaiweya Bana kanavetumaganena, ada Bana'e ginakivetoyogimi ada kaliva koyona Setani againe ginalugolegolemi.
Ada Kaiwabu omi fa'imiya yama nuwave'avina givelema higa gavaimi avehimeyemi, mededemi tova adamoya wadewadewa kadu aimo wananunauwena yami dewa.

Ada au Kaiwabu againe ave'o'ola be nuwami ginakifolefolena be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana agaimiya ase'asemiya wana'ayaunena, kadu Keliso vita tulina tulina gi'atuvefa'ilena amine, meda omi wana'atuvefa'ilena.
Fa'ina omi taumiyao wahalamanena gilubodami be yama huluva wanave'u'ulena. Ime omi buye kamiyami ana toveya, keke adamiya-kawowo.
Keke tamo hakwadi yana a'a ada'a'a-kawowoni, higa vaita fata keke adaseni. Au yama wavediwe afifaisewa. Uyadayada be bogi afifaisewa toyogina be higa keke ama ve'a fa'ina omi vita wananuhagani.
Gilubodana be amaga ama kevakeva fa'ina adave'o'olemi be wadavele-kawowoma. Tu keke medede amine adahuluva, fa'ina nuwanuwama yama huluva againe aba'ita anavelemi be wanave'u'ulema.
Boi aimo buye kamiyami ana toveya vehimeya avelemi agayo, “Hai kaliva faisewa hinadibutoyogena medema keke a'a wanaveledi.”
Au hidede amine agahe fa'ina tufoimi valeyami anogalina higa wamiyamiya-kawowo. E, tufoimi keke wadafifaisewa tu mali kaliva adi mata'atuboda wasesebodabodana.
Adamoya yada Kaiwabu Yesu ana eganeya avehimeyemi kadu agahevagadonemi vaita yami wa'aseniwalova yami faisewa wana'itave'avina be taumiyao yami faisewa guwana wana'au'ana.
Ka'i tamo hakwadi agaimiya kivetuvetunu hida yami leta againe a'etoladina-ma keke gina'abini, bana kalivai-nadi wana'ita-hagihagiyena. Au wanamiyavehailena be higa wowomumu gina'ayaunena.
Atu keke vaita bana nibaimi amine wanahuluvini. Au bana vaita tobohiyami amine wanadakeyena.
Yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadogeya moya'aimi wanamiyami.
(Ime Folo Sailosi Timoti bonama.)

Timoti o vaita natuku velemo'ena amine, fa'ina Keliso ana vetumagana againe iya gahawavenatune-mo'e. Yaubada Tamada kadu Yesu Keliso yada Kaiwabu hinanuwadoge hinahinekalikaliye kadu ase'ase hinakiveniwalovina.

Keke gavana fa'ina tu boi gatauya be Masedoniya ana fafaliya ganana ana toveya gagahevagadone amine, nuwanuwaku medei Efeso againe unamiyami be higa badi tovehawala ve'alololodiyao unahawatadi be hina'ilova.

Unavenuwa'atadi be keke tova moya'aina nainaiya higa gahe-kawowo kadu kaliva tulina tulina bwaneneneyao adi egana ana loi ana loi nuwadiya hinaseuseni. Medema gaitomai-dina adi nuwa-nunauya againe keke halamana Yaubada yana vevai fa'ina hidavivaini, au ve'alakwalakwakwa giyemu. Yaubada yana vevai vetumagana againe kahalamanena, keke ve'alakwalakwakwa againe.

Mena vehawala ve'alololona ana hawata gayakahina be higa nuwanuwa hawahawahegana hinaseyemaunena. Nuwanuwai-nadi inubana ma ase'asedi yegayegana hinamiyami, kadu keke tamo vita nuwafoudiya hina'ayauneni, kadu Keliso ana vetumagana keke kebuladiya tu nuwadiya ginadauda-yo au nuwanuwa hawahawahegana againe hinamaga.
Kaliva tufoidi mena edai-nadi hifaniyena ada gahe-kawowo ana edeya hidamana be hinanauna.

Nuwanuwadi Yaubada yana vehimeya kaliva hinavehawaledi tu mena vehimeyai-nadi ana nuwanuwa keke agaidiya gidamahalini kadu gaitoma tulina tulina fa'ina hivehavehawala toyogina higayo, “Ime Yaubada bonana aluyabuna,” tu yadi vehawala inubadi hifaniyena.
Tu ide kahalamanena Yaubada yana vehimeya Mosese awane giveleda, ada ka'i kaliva vehimeyai-dina hinamuliyedi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine, medema abaleme hagihagina.

Kadu'e kahalamanena Yaubada keke kaliva yegayegadiyao fa'idiya vehimeya kadu hawata gidasedi. Au kaliva koyodiyao fa'idiya gisedi, higa badi vehimeya ana tohawahegahega be ana todibutoyoga fa'idiya, badi Yaubada keke hidave'amohimohineni kadu dewa koyona hififaisewana-ma fa'idiya, badi yadi nuwanuwa keke mahamahalina kadu Yaubada bonana hihawatagona-ma fa'idiya, badi tamadiyao o hinadiyao hiluve'alikadi fa'idiya, badi mali kaliva adi toluve'alika fa'idiya, badi to'udo kadu tovetubo fa'idiya, badi mali kaliva hiki'afudi be higa hinave'agetogedi amanadi kadu tofwaya be badi Yaubada ana egana ana to'aiyakata-kawowo fa'idiya, au gava dewa tulina tulina yada Kaiwabu yana vehawala tunutunugina keke gidalubodani-ma kaliva hififaisewana, medema kaliva koyodiyao adi loi fa'idiya Yaubada vehimeya kadu hawata gisedi.

Mena Yaubada yana vehimeya ana vehawala tunutunugina au Venuwa'ata Yamumuna galulumamalena-ma ana nuwanuwa amine. Venuwa'atai-nadi Yaubada Bana vemwamwala inubana ma yana kikaiwabu gihawavemogatalena, ada Yaubada aku vehimeya giveleku be yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ganalulumamalena.
Boi tuwaina Yesu gahawatagona kadu gahawave'iyohoyohoyena ada yana kaliva gakivekoyodi nonogana Yaubada yana hinekalikali agaikuya givetalaiyena, fa'ina iya fanifaniku keke yaku wavetumagana.
Ada yada Kaiwabu yana nuwadoga iya agaikuya givewahivemavemauku, ada au tova adamoya Yesu Keliso againe gavetumagana ada Bana againe nuwaku gasena.

Atu iya tokoyona-mo'a tu Yaubada gihinekalikaliyeku be higa yana atuvefa'ila lakahi-mo'ena kaliva agaideya iya tokoyona-mo'a agaikuya ginaseyemaunena. Hidede amine gi'atuvefa'ile-mo'eku fa'ina iya aba'ita badi aimo hinavetumaganena be kibababala hinanuhagana-ma fa'idiya giseku.

Bana Tokaiwabu miyamiya-vagahina ana egana kanakilakahina. Bana keke-mo'a gina'alika kadu keke adafaiweya kana'itani. E, Bana'e Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a ana egana kanakilakahina be yana kikaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Kadu Keliso ana vetumagana againe unaluluve'avina ada tauni una'itave'avi be nuwafou yegayegana Yaubada matane unamiyami tu unalulugaviya. Kaliva tufoidi nuwafoudiya togahe keke hidavenogaleni ada au yadi vetumagana hinuhegena.

Badi tobe'u agaidiya kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Haimeniyo kadu sa'eyana Alekisanida. Badi adi egana gayawelina ada Setani againe gahegenauwedi be higa vita hina'ayauneni-yo halamana hinavaina be'ena Kaiwabu keke hinahawatagoni.
Tu natuku, yaku lau'age nagona ma omi tovetumagana badi kaliva moya'aidi fa'idiya wanave'ove'o'ola. E, yami awalulau'u yami tagivedadaga kadu yami vesiule Yaubada againe badi fa'idiya wanaseusena.
Tokikaiwabu kadu gaveyao moya'aidi yadi wa'abavehimeya ma fa'idiya wanave'o'ola be higa kukuya againe kadu yada wa'aseniwalova againe kanamiyami, yada dewa mahamahalina yada nuwanuwa tunutunugina.
Ka'i hidede amine kaliva moya'aidi fa'idiya kanave'o'ola, medema gilubodana kadu meda Yaubada ada Tokibababala matane hagihagina.
Bana'e nuwanuwana kaliva moya'aida kibababala kananuhagana ada nuwanuwa velemo'ena fa'ina halamana kanavaina.
Fa'ina yada Yaubada au sa'eyanaga kadu ada Toulayagiyagila sa'eyanaga Yaubada ide kaliva adahinafeya gimidimidi, Bana higa Yesu Keliso Tauna.
Bana yawaina gihawahegena be ide kaliva moya'aida gitutuvehobuda, ada au hidede amine tova gilubodana againe Yaubada nuwanuwana kaliva moya'aida kibababala kananuhagana ma givehawaleda.

Hidema ana inuba Yaubada givegideku be Keliso yana tolaumamala kadu yana afositolo gi'iveniniseku higa badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina Keliso ana vetumagana velemo'ena fa'ina ganavehawaledi. Hida yaku gahe keke gadave'alololo. Au Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe.

Tu nuwanuwaku melala tulina tulina agaidiya tovetumagana tafalolo fa'ina hivagavaga'auta againe, kaliva hinave'o'ola. Gilubodadi be badi kalivai-dina nimadi keke koyona gidafaisewani-ma ve'o'ola againe hinakilakahina, kadu keke yadi wanuwakoyo keke yadi wavekwageya.
Au adi aiwaka inubana ma igibagiba tulina tulina. Vevine gaveyao higahe vaita Yaubada hihawadavadavana, medema dewa hagihagina Yaubada ana tohawadavadava gilubodadi-ma amine hinadewadewa.
Kaliva Yaubada bonana fa'ina hivehavehawala againe, vevine hinave'awa'ibodedi be yadi wanuwahobu hinavenogala.
Iya keke vevine gadahawahegedi be kaliva hinavehawaledi o ka'i kaliva agaidiya hinavetonagona. Au hinave'awa'ibodedi.
Mena nuwanuwa inubana hidede amine. Yaubada Adama gimidibubuna tu muliya Ive gibubudi.
Ada keke Adama Setani yana ve'alololo gidavenogaleni. Au badi kwamayoku hivenogalena be Yaubada yana hawata hiyawelina.
Atu ka'i vevine yadi wanuwahobu vetumagana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana kadu dewa mahamahalina againe hinaluluve'avina, au yadi venatuna ana toveya lugolagola hinanuhagana.
Gahe sa'eyana ganayakahina-ma gahe velemo'ena. Ka'i tamo hakwadi nuwanuwana Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaveto'itave'avina, au nuwanuwana faisewa hagihagina.

Atu bana Yaubada yana yo'o adi to'itave'avina lakahina ana vehimeya hidede amine. Bana yana dewa yamumunaga kaliva matadiya ginamiyami, vavinena sa'eyanaga ginanagina, yana huluva moya'aina fa'ina ginanuwanuwa-hagihagi, yana wanuwahuya tauna ginahawatana be keke kwavakwavana amine ginahuluva, wakawaka adi ve'a ginamadu'itave'avina, kadu vehawala ase'ase'i'onagina bana anafata.

Kadu'e keke gufa laulaugina ana yu-fa'ila againe ginavekwavakwava, ada keke yana wa'agodadaga ginamaduve'amunumunuga au bona bikabikana amine kaliva ginakivetuvetunudi, ada keke tova moya'aina kaliva ginavekwavekwageyedi, ada keke mani gina'ita'italuvadigeni.
Gilubodana be tauna ana unuma ginavehimeye-hagihagiyedi, ada natuneyao bona'abi fa'ina ginakivetuvetunudi be yadi tagakulu ginahawatani-yo hinave'amohimohinena.
Ka'i keke anafaiweya tauna ana unuma ginakivetuvetunudi be bonana hina'abini, gavaimi be Yaubada yana ekelesiya gida'itave'avidi?

Kadu'e, keke Keliso ana tovetumagana ivaguna Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya ginaveto'itave'avina, fa'ina ka'i ginamadunuwalaka be Setani yana nuwalaka fa'ina matahiwadi givaina amine, bana ana matahiwadi ginavaina.

Kadu'e, gilubodana be yana huluva yamumuna fa'ina badi keke Keliso hidavetumaganeni-ma hinave'amohimohinena. Au ginadewadewa-hagihagi be higa kaliva keke adifaiweya hinahawavekoyoyeni, kadu keke Setani yana dai againe ginavebe'uni.

Tu badi toleme amanadi meda anafaiweya gilubodadi be hinanuwanuwa tunutunugina yo kaliva hinave'amohimohinedi, keke meyadi lagalaganina, keke gufa laulaugina ana toyu-fa'ila, kadu keke mani ana italuvadiga fa'ina toleme yadi faisewa hina'abini.
Yadi wanuwahinage yegayegana Yaubada yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana Keliso gihawavemogatalena-ma againe hinamiyave'avina.

Ka'i nuwanuwami kaliva tufoidi wanasilakahidi be hinavetoleme amine, nagona yadi dewa wana'ita-hagihagiyena. Ka'i yadi nuwanuwa yadi dewa hagihagi-mo'ena hinaseseyemaunena be keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginahawavekoyoyedi digo, au wanasilakahidi be hinavetoleme.

Tu yadi vevine meda anafaiweya gilubodadi be hinanuwanuwa tunutunugina yo moya'aidi hinave'amohimohinedi, keke gahe koyona ana to'alavedavedamana au tova moya'aina hinanuwanuwa-hagihagi, kadu yadi dewa moya'aina agaidiya ita'itave'avinidi.
Kadu'e toleme gilubodana be kwamayoku sa'eyanaga ginanagina, kadu natuneyao ada yana manuwa hinagena matatabudi ginavehimeye-hagihagiyedi be bonana hina'abi'abina.
Ada au gaveyao toleme yadi faisewa againe hina'i'idibumuhiga, medema adi waegana kaliva matadiya hinamiyami, kadu yadi wa'asevatu Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana fa'ina adifaiweya hinalulumamala.
Natuku, hida kivetuvetunu ya leta againe ga'eto'etoladina tu ganuwanuwa vaita tova kabisona againiya gana'ela.

Atu ka'i tamo gavadi ginasebodaku be ganavekwalu digo, unahalamanena gava huluva Yaubada yana yo'ogaga kalivai-dina be vevine-dina gilubodada. Mena Yaubada yana yo'o au Yaubada Tomiya-vagata yana ekelesiya, ada ogola o'olina manuwa gi'atu'atulakahina amine, meda ide Yaubada yana yo'ogaga nuwanuwa velemo'ena ka'atu'atulakahina.
Wona velemona yada tafalolo inubana Yaubada gihawavemogatalena-ma nuwanuwa lakahina. Yaubada keke kanawona!
Bana'e kaliva ada nuya gi'osena
be Tauna gi'ivemogatalina.
Bana kaliva yegayegana ma
Alu'aluwa Mahalina giseyemaunena.
Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata hi'itana,
yana kaliva Bana fa'ine hilumamala
yo'o tulidi tulidi agaidiya.
Hidei babiya kaliva hivetumaganena
ada yana wakikaiwabu gilaka lobameya.
Au hidede amine ma yada tafalolo ana nuwanuwa lakahina.
Mena vehawalai-dina tofwaya meyadi luhei ma agaidiya hiyemu, badi nuwafoudi gitutuma be keke adifaiweya yadi koyona ana vita hina'ayauneni.

Yadi vehawala ve'alololona hidede amine. Nagi hihawatana kadu a'a tufona ana hawata hisena. Atu Yaubada mena a'ai-nadi gibubuna be ide tovetumagana yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena kahalamanena-ma yada wavesiule kana'au'ana.
Gaitoma moya'aina Yaubada gibubuna-ma au hagihagina. Keke tamo gavadi kanakiloweni, au gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina yada vesiule kanayakahina be kanavaina.
E, Yaubada yana aibubuna gihawaveyamumuyena kadu adaga fa'ina gihawahegena, ada ide yada vesiule kayakahina fa'ina, a'a moya'aina Yaubada matane gilubodana ada ide keke kanakilowa.

Tu badi tovetumagana mena vehawalai-nadi ve'alololona galukahihiyena-ma fa'ina unakivetuvetunudi be higa Yesu Keliso yana tofaisewa yamumuna amine una'ita'itave'avidi, kadu o tauni yada abavetumagana ana nuwanuwa kadu vehawala hagihagina umulimuliyena-ma againe una'au'a-yo unafifaiwala.
Kaliva yadi gahegahe-kawowo ma keke Yaubada bonana, au gahe kwavakwavana. Medema keke unanogalini. Au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe unahawahege be yana dewa unavegavegalena.

Ka'i talaida kanavaga'oto'otogena, medema gilubodana tu ka'i alu'aluwada yana faiwala kanalelena be higa Yaubada amine kanahuluhuluva, medema giluboda-mo'ena. Yaubada ana ve'u'ula againe leme tulina tulina hidei babiya kananuhagana kadu aimo wesei lobameya meda kananuhagana. Medema fa'ina alu'aluwada ana vaga'oto'otoga giluboda-mo'ena.

E, Yaubada Tomiya-vagata againe yada nuwave'avina kasena vaita yana leme kananuhagana, ada medema fa'ina kavedivediwe kafifaisewa toyogina. Bana Yaubada kaliva moya'aida ada Tokibababala, higa ide gaveyao kavetumaganena-ma gikibababaleda.
Ada au badi tovetumagana mena gaitomai-dina fa'ina unavehimeyedi kadu unavehawaledi.

Tu O kwanatubulakahi fa'ina keke gidalubodani be kaliva hina'ihawadamane. O tauni aba'ita badi tovetumagana unaveledi, ya gahe againe, ya dewa againe, ya nuwakabubu againe, ya vetumagana againe, ya nuwanuwa mahamahalina againe.
Yaubada bonana ana hawa tovetumagana adi yo'o matadiya, kadu laumamala kadu vehawala againe unahawahawahege unanunauwena tu againiya gana'ela ana toveya.

Boi to'ekelesiya adi tonagona adi yo'o nimadi u'uniya hisena ana toveya, Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana venuwa'ata ya faisewa fa'ina yana kaliva gitunevehabalutugedi-yo hi'awatalatalainena, be againe a vehimeya givele. Keke dibu ginatoyoga, au a vehimeya una'itave'avina.

Ya faisewa againe unadibudibumuhiga. A vehimeya ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina agaidiya unahawahawahege be higa moya'aidi o hina'ita hinagayo, “Wona velemona Yaubada yana faisewa againe gifaiwala, au gifaiwala-mo'a.”
Tauni una'itave'avi kadu ya vehawala una'itave'avina be medema againe una'atu'atuvefa'ila. Fa'ina ka'i hidede amine una'atuvefa'ila, au tauni kadu ya vehawala ana tovanenega buye unakibababalemi.
Badi vevine lakahidiyao agaidiya unahuluhuluva vaita badi hinamomo amine, kadu badi ulaulatana agaidiya unahuluhuluva vaita noumomo, keke una'ita'ayafanedi.
Tu sikwasikwadiyao adi itave'avina fa'ina ganagahe. Badi sikwasikwadiyao keke wanatudiyao ma adi itave'avina fa'ina unanuwanuwa.

Atu ka'i kwamayoku hinasikwa ada natudiyao o tubudiyao hinamiyami, au badi'iyao hina'itave'avidi hinadi adi ve'amohimohina fa'ina Yaubada givehimeya amine. Sikwa adi itave'avina au natudiyao o tubudiyao yadi faisewa be higa adi itave'avina kabi'odiyaoya-ma hinafatana. Mena huluvai-nadi gilubodana Yaubada matane.
Badi sikwa natudiyao keke be adikaibe himimiyami amanadi Yaubada againe hiluluve'avina, ada bogi be uyadayada Yaubada againe hitagitagivedadaga be yana leme fa'ina hive'ove'o'ola.
Atu badi sikwa kasisi againe tova moya'aina hihawahawahegedi amanadi wayawaidi himimiyami nonogana alu'aluwadi au vaita ali'alikana amine.
Tovetumagana unakivetuvetunudi be hinadiyao o tubudiyao sikwasikwadiyao hina'itave'avidi be higa keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginadakeyedi.

Hai kaliva o kwamayoku tauna yana yo'o, e tauna yana manuwa hinagena keke gina'itave'avidi, medema Yaubada yana vehimeya givekwaulaugena, ada mena yana huluva koyona badi Yaubada keke hidavetumaganeni-ma yadi huluva koyona gitubuhegena. Au bana tokoyona-mo'a.
Sikwasikwadiyao adi egana ana etoladi fa'ina ganagahe. Ka'i kwamayoku hisikwa tu adi malamala sikisiti hivaidi ada moganedi tuwaina au sa'eyanaga, medema adi egana una'etoladina.

Kadu gilubodana be moya'aidi badi fa'idiya hidagahe hidagayo, “Wadema kwamayoku dibudibumuhigidi. Natudiyao hi'itave'avidi yamumuna, luve'a againe hihawahegedi, Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine yadi wanuwahobu hi'ihagihagiyedi, badi vita hinuhagana-ma hivelugadi ada au kaliva adi nuwakabubu tulina tulina agaidiya hihawahawahegedi tova moya'aina.”

Tu badi aimo ulaulatana tu hisikwa-ma adi egana keke ginaluku. Fa'ina hinamiyami tu yadi nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina ginafaiwala againe nuwanuwadi hinanagi-havagi be yadi hawahega Kelisogaga againe boi hiyakahina-ma hinayawelina.
Ada au hidema fa'ina kaliva hinagahe hinagayo, “Wa'itadi, yadi wonadabadaba nagona Keliso againe ahe hiyawelina.”

Kadu'e badi aimo ulaulatana tu hisikwa-ma dewa sa'eyana hivebutu hihuluvina, higa manuwa tulina tulina agaidiya hilakalakadadanana tu keke hidafifaisewa. Ada keke vaita miya-kawowogaga nuwanuwadi. Au mali kaliva fa'idiya higahegahe-kawowo kadu adi mata'atuboda hisesebodabodana. Ada nuwanuwa tulina tulina keke gidalubodani be hinahawavemogataleni-ma hilulukahihiyena.

Medema fa'ina nuwanuwaku badi aimo ulaulatana tu hisikwa-ma hinanagi-havagi, we'owe'o hinavenatunedi kadu yadi manuwa hina'itave'avina be higa ide tovetumagana nibaideyao keke tamo gavadi fa'ina adifaiweya hina'awalaveda.
Fa'ina sikwasikwadiyao tufoidi eda tunutunugina ahe hihegena be Setani yana eda againe hinanauna.

Hai kwamayoku vetuvetumaganidi adi yo'o agaidiya sikwasikwadiyao himimiyami, gilubodadi be hina'itave'avidi. To'ekelesiya adi yo'o badi vevine-dina adi itave'avina ana vita keke hinawahini. Au to'ekelesiya adi yo'o badi sikwasikwadi natudiyao keke be adikaibe himimiyami amanadi adifaiweya hina'itave'avidi.

Tu badi tovetumagana adi tonagona fa'idiya ganagahe. Tonagona gaveyao tovetumagana adi itave'avina againe hifaisewa yamumuna, medema adi laufata fa'ina hidanuwenuwedi hidagayo, “Nuwakabubu anavelu kanaveledi.” E, badi yadi faisewa laumamala kadu vehawala amanadi nuwakabubu againe wanave'amohimohinedi lakahina.
Wa'ita, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Bulumakau witi givagavagakolukoluna againe, keke
gidalubodani be muduna bulava againe wanahifobodani
higa keke tamo gavadi gina'ani fa'ina.
Kadu gahe sa'eyana ma gigayo,
Gilubodana be tofaisewa ana laufata ginavaina.
Au hidede amine Yaubada yana tofaisewa fatadi fa'ina gigahe.
Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana tovetumagana adi tonagona tamo gavadi fa'ina ginahawavekoyoyena digo, keke unavenogaleni. Atu ka'i to'ita luhei o tohiye buye hinahawavekoyoyena digo, yadi gahe unavenogalena.
Tonagona gaveyao hikoyo, medema tovetumagana adi yo'o matadiya unadakeyedi be higa tonagona velugadiyao hinamatauta.

Natuku Timoti, Yaubada matane kadu Yesu Keliso matane kadu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata mahamahalidiyao matadiya o gavehimeye be mena vehimeyai-dina gayakahidi-ma una'itave'avidi. Keke kiholiholi amine kaliva una'itanuwenuwedi. Nagona unahalamane-hagihagiyena tu muliya unagahe. Kadu'e keke kaliva o vevine tufoidi una'ita-hagihagiyedi tu tufoidi keke. Au moya'aidi una'itadi leleleya.

Keke kaliva u'une nima unamaduseni be higa ekelesiya agaidiya ginavetonagona. Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana yana dewa keke udahalamane-hagihagiyeni tu umadusilakahina-ma muliya ginakoyo digo, o tauni a vita. Keke mali kaliva yadi koyona ana vita unawahini. Au tauni ya dewa una'itave'avina.
Tova moya'aina kamo gi'u'aulolo fa'ina, keke gufa-mo'agaga unayuyuni. Oine kasimina unayuna be ya kamo'aulolo ma'i ginatuluna.

Kaliva tufoidi yadi koyona kabu'avane gidadauda be valeyana wai ginagona ada tovedewayauga gihalamane-vagahina. Tu kaliva tufoidi yadi koyona sevasevauyane gidadauda ada muliya kabu'avane giyemu. Medema fa'ina tonagona keke unamakahokohokodi.
Meda anafaiweya dewa hagihagina kabu'avane gidadauda atu ka'i kaliva tufoidi yadi dewa hagihagina keke yo'o matadiya hinafifaisewani, au keke sevasevauyana ginaduva-vagata.

Badi tove'agetoga tufoidi yadi tovehimeya Keliso againe hivetumagana. Yadi tovehimeya vaita tobohiyadiyao amine Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya fa'ina, keke hinanuwanuwa vaita adifaiweya hina'ihawadamanedi. Au yadi faisewa againe hina'idibumuhiga-mo'a, fa'ina hinanuwanuwa hinagayo, “Bana yaku tovehimeya yaku faisewa againe leme ginanuhagana-ma keke tomiya-kawowo. Au bana'e kadu tovetumagana, ada ada'iselu Yaubada yana nuwakabubu againe kamimiyami.” Ada au hidede amine unavehawaledi ada unagahevagadonedi be mena dewai-nadi amine hinahuluhuluva.

Kadu badi nuwanuwadi ve'alakwalakwakwa be vekwageya amanadi badi kalivai-dina tova moya'aina buye hive'avenivenibaina. Nuwadi gi'uyuyuna ada nuwanuwa velemo'ena boi agaidiya gimidimahalina-ma kadu hifaniyena. Kadu badi hinuwanuwafani vaita tafalolo againe lokoloko yana eda hinanuhagani-yo hinavewakalivana.
Hidei babiya yada tubuga be yada alika againe keke tamo gavadi kadawahini.
Fa'ina ka'i adaga yada lifi we'a agaideya gidadauda, au adafata be nuwada ginavenuwakibokibo.

Badi gaveyao nuwanuwadi lokoloko againe hinakaiwabu medema agaidiya aladibidibi ginalakayemu, ada yadi nuwalauvadiga agedi ginavebahina be hinabe'u. Nuwanuwa kwavakwavana nuwadi gina'abina be ginakivekoyodi-yo agolaufofola ana eda againe hinanauna be hinabwavi.

Mani ana italuvadiga au koyona tulina tulina inubana. Kaliva tufoidi mani hi'itanuwavaiyena toyogina fa'ina, Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana ana eda hihegena be ase'u'aulolo moya'aina againe taudiyao hi'onadi.

Tu o'eni Yaubada yana kaliva ma mena dewai-dina una'osedi. Tauni unahawahege be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine unahuluhuluva higa nuwanuwa yegayegana, vetumagana, nuwakabubu, atuvefa'ila, bona bikabikana unamuliyena.

Tuwaina to'ita moya'aidi matadiya ya vetumagana Keliso againe uhawavemogatalena ide Keliso yana kaliva gilubodada-ma amine ana toveya, Yaubada o gikova be yawai-vagata unanuhagana. Au togiyomatana yamumuna amine Keliso ana vetumagana ana gaviya againe unafifaiwala be mena yawai-vagata unakive'avina.
Yaubada matane, Bana gaitoma moya'aidi yawaidi inubana amanadi, kadu Yesu Keliso matane, Bana ana tovedewayauga Fonitiyo-Failato againe hawavemogatala gilubodana-ma giyakahina amanadi, o gavehimeye.
A vehimeya Kaiwabu givele amanadi una'ita'itave'avina be keke-mo'a unakivekoyoni-yo kaliva adifaiweya hinadakeye. Hidedemi unanunauwena yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana yewa'ela ana toveya.

Yaubada ginavehimeya be tova gilubodana againe yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ginayewa'ela. Bana Yaubada ma vemwamwala inubana kadu au anakaibe'u-mo'a Tovehimeya, tokikaiwabu adi Tokaiwabu, tovehimeya yadi Tovehimeya.

Bana anakaibe'u keke-mo'a gina'alika ada mahalina ve'akinamanamalina againe keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya gina'itani mahalinai-nadi againe gimimiyami. Keke tamo hakwadi Bana'e gida'itani, kadu keke-mo'a anafaiweya gina'itani. Bana ana egana kanakilakahina ada yana kikaiwabu yana faiwala ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Unavehimeyedi be kaliva hinanuwanuwakabubuyedi, igibagiba tulina tulina agaidiya hinakaiwabu kadu yadi wanuwadoga hinafolafolaka.
Au hidede amine yadi lokolokofou keke havahavaina ma aimo tova mulina fa'ina hinakidewedewena be higa yawai-vagahidi au yawaidi velemo'ena hinanuhagana.
Kaliva tufoidi higahe vaita mena nuwahuyai-nadi hidavaini, ada medema fa'ina Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana ana eda hihegena.
Yaubada yana nuwadogeya unamiyami.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)
Boi ganuyabuyabu tu utagi ma ganuwa-nunauyena ada nuwanuwaku lakahina gana'ita-havagile be higa Iya ganavemwamwala-mo'a.

Ya vetumagana toyogina Keliso againe ganuwa-nunauyena, anafaiweya nagona o hina Yunisi be tubu Loisi Keliso ana vetumagana againe hihawahege-vagahidi tu tova adamoya iya ganuwave'avina vaita kadu o Keliso ana vetumagana againe uhawahege-vagahi.

Ada medemi Keliso uvetumagane-mo'ena fa'ina, nuwa gatalafolena be faiwala Yaubada yana faisewa fa'ina givele-ma una'atu'auhina be keke ginakwe'u, au a vehimeya givele amanadi againe unafaiwala-mo'a. Boi nimaku againiya gaseni-yo gave'o'ole tovai-nadi Yaubada mena a vehimeya givele be yana faiwala unuhagana.

Au unafaiwala-mo'a, fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina Yaubada giveleda-ma guwana keke matauta. Au Bana gifaiwalaveleda be ka'ase'asevatu, tobohiyadeyao fa'idiya kahawahawahegeda, taudeyao yada nuwanuwa kahawahawatana.

Bana Yaubada gikibababaleda ada gikovada be yada dewa matatabuna mahamahalina Bana matane kanamiyami. Ada kibababala inubana ma keke ide yada dewa hagihagina, au Bana Tauna yana nuwanuwa kadu Tauna yana nuwadoga fa'ina gikibababaleda. Tuwai-lokalokana tova aimo keke gidave'inuba tu mena yana nuwadoga Yesu Keliso againe givele-vagahida.

Atu tova adamoya ada Tokibababala Yesu Keliso yana hobu'ela againe mena Yaubada yana nuwadoga kabu'avane giyemu. Bana Yesu Keliso alika yana faiwala giyawelina, giyaweli-'owona ada kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna againe yawai-vagahida ana eda gihawavemogatalena be kanamiyamiya-vagata.
Ada au Yaubada givegideku be mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ganalulumamalena kadu ganavehavehawala Keliso loseyanina amine yaku gahe wa'inubana.

Tova moya'aina Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana hawavemogatala againe gafififaisewa fa'ina, mena vita tulina tulina gawahiwahina. Tu yaku aulolo yaku tagiya fa'ina keke-mo'a gadawowomumu, fa'ina Bana'e gavetumaganena-ma gahalamane-hagihagiyena, ada ganuwave'avina vaita aku vehimeya giveleku-ma Bana anafaiweya ginayavayavana be hidede amine ginanunauwena Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela ana toveya.
Yaubada yana nuwanuwa tunutunugina ana vehawala mena a vehimeya givele. Alu'aluwa Mahalina ase'asedeya gimimiyami-ma yana faiwala againe a vehimeya hagihagina una'itave'avina.
Tu bana Onesifolo tova moya'aina ase'aseku gikikivevatuna ada iya deliya gamimiyami nonogana keke iya fa'ikuya gidawowomumu fa'ina, bana ana unuma agaidiya Kaiwabu yana hinekalikali gidavetalaiyena.
E, bana keke iya fa'ikuya gidawowomumu. Au Loma againe gilakayemu ana toveya yana wadibumuhiga gileleleku gileleleku tu ginuhagaku.

Medema fa'ina Kaiwabu gave'o'olena be aimo ginayewa'ela kaliva ginavedewayaugida ana toveya, bana Onesifolo Kaiwabu yana hinekalikali ginanuhagana. Ada o'eni ahe uhalamane-hagihagiyena yana veluga moya'aina agaikuya boi Efeso againe gamiyami ana toveya.
Siule natuku, yada faiwala inubana Yesu Keliso. Bana gifaiwalavele fa'ina tova moya'aina unafifaiwala.
Yaku laumamala kaliva moya'aidi matadiya o unogalina. Nuwanuwaku kaliva dibudibumuhigidiyao unavenuwadadanedi tu bonaku unavehawaledi be higa hinana adifaiweya mali kaliva hinavehawaledi.
Wa'ita, ide tovetumagana vaita Yesu Keliso yana tolugaviya amine, ada au tova moya'aina vita tulina tulina kanunuhagana. O keke una'ota, au mena vitai-dina agaidiya una'atuvefa'ila.
Hai tolugaviya nuwanuwana yana togiyomatana nuwana ginakiveyamumuna, medema keke mali nuwanuwa againe ginahawahegeni au laugaviya ana faisewagaga gina'itave'avina.
Meda anafaiweya hai tomadu ve'amadu againe ginamadu, medema ve'amadu ana vehimeya gina'itave'avina. Ka'i mali nuwanuwa amine ginamadu, keke tomaduhega ana badau kikaiwabuna ginavaini.
Kadu hai tofaha ve'ihifahifa againe gina'idibumuhiga, gilubodana be medema yana faha guwana ginamidi'ana.
Mena abaluvefota tohiye yada Kaiwabu yana faisewa fa'ina gayakahina-ma unanuwenuwena ada Bana yana kivetuvetunu againe ana nuwanuwa unahalamanena.
Mena Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ina vita ganuhagana, ada iya vaita tokoyona lakahina amine bulava kainumula againe hiyogoku. Iya hiyogoku tu keke adifaiweya Yaubada bonana hinayogoni.

Hidema fa'ina vita moya'aina ga'atuvefa'iledi be higa badi kaliva vevine Yaubada giluwafadi-ma adi kibababala hinanuhagana ide buye'i, ada Yaubada buye kanakaiwabu-vagata. Mena kibababalai-nadi Yesu Keliso againe give'inuba.
Hida gahe au gahe velemo'ena,
Ka'i ide Keliso buye ka'alika,
kadu aimo Bana buye kanamiyamiya-vagata.
kadu aimo Bana buye kanakaiwabu.
Ka'i Bana kanavekekeyena,
kadu aimo Bana ide ginavekekeyeda.
au Bana gavaimi gigahe medemi ginahuluva,
fa'ina Bana yana wonadabadaba
keke-mo'a anafaiweya ginayawelini.

O tauni ya faisewa againe una'idibumuhiga be higa aimo Yaubada matane unamidi ana toveya, keke unawowomumu. Au Bana ginahawaveyamumuye ginagayo, “Bana tofaisewa hagihagina. Yana wahalamana yaku gahe velemo'ena fa'ina givehawala tunutunugina.”

Tu gahe-kawokawowo keke Yaubada ana vetumagana gidalubodani-ma unavekwaulaugena. Badi gaveyao keke nuwanuwa velemo'ena tu gahe-kawokawowo againe hihawahegedi, medema Yaubada hivekwaulaugena ada yadi koyona gimoya'ai.

Wala ana koliya kaliva wowona matatabuna gidamana be gikivekoyona amine, meda badi togahe-kawowo yadi vehawala ginadamana be moya'aidi ginakivekoyodi. Mena tovehawalai-dina adi'iselu adi egana Haimeniyo kadu Fileto.

Badi nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana eda hihegena. Higahegahe higayo, “Ide Yesu againe kavetumagana-ma vaita ahe kadamididi-havagi. Aimo kana'alika tu keke wowo-mo'eda ginamididi-havagi.” Mena yadi gahe hinogalini-yo tovetumagana tufoidi hinuwanuwaluga ada yadi vetumagana gilewalewa.
Tu'ena nuwanuwa velemo'ena vaita ogola o'olina amine Yaubada gisedonena-ma keke gidalewalewa. Au o'olina gimidi ada yana venuwa'ata hidede amine gi'etoladina,
Kaiwabu Tauna yana kaliva gihalamanedi.
Kadu gahe sa'eyana ma,
Hai kaliva gigahe vaita bana Kaiwabu yana kaliva,
medema dewa koyona anafaiweya gidavekwaulaugena.
Iya Yaubada nimaku.

Mena nau'a anafaiweya kaliva. Hai kaliva nuwanuwa koyona givekwaulaugena be ase'asena gikolana, medema nau'a wafatana kikaiwabudiyao fa'idiya hisena-ma amine. Au bana kalivai-nadi sevesevehailana, faisewa yamumuna tulina tulina fa'ina kikidewadewana, ada Kaiwabu yana faisewa fa'ina bana ginaluwafana.

Tu natuku, tubulakata yadi nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana dewai-nadi una'osena. Tauni unahawahege be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine unahuluhuluva, ya wavetumagana ya wanuwakabubu ya wa'aseniwalova. Ka'i mena edai-nadi againe unanauna, au gaveyao moya'aidi wa'ase'asedi yegayegana Kaiwabu yana veluga fa'ina hive'ove'o'ola-ma o badi buye'i wananauna.
Kaliva tufoidi gaitoma-kawowo fa'ina tova moya'aina hiveve'alakwalakwakwa. Medema dewa kwavakwavana kadu fanifanina ada againe vekwageya tulina tulina gilakayemu. Ve'alakwalakwakwa una'otayabuyabuna.
Fa'ina vekwageya Kaiwabu yana tofaisewa keke gidalubodani. Au gilubodana be o Kaiwabu yana tofaisewa kaliva moya'aidi unahinekalikaliyedi, unavehavehawaledi mahamahalina kadu una'atuvefa'iledi.

Kadu badi hivekwageye kalivai-dina bona bikabikana againe unakivetuvetunudi. Badi nuwanuwa velemo'ena hikilowena-ma Setani yana dai againe givebe'udi-yo yana abavehimeya dibune himimiyami be yana nuwanuwa hi'idibumuhigena. Ka'i bona bikabikana againe unakivetuvetunudi, au Yaubada ka'i yadi nuwavilana ginaveledi be nuwanuwa velemo'ena nuwadi ginakifoleni-yo yadi nuwafani ginahavaina, ada Setani yana dai againe hinahobu.

Gavadi-yo tova vitana ginalakayemu? Kaliva taudiyaogaga hinanuwenuwedi, mani hina'ita'italuvadigena, taudiyao adi egana hinakikilakahina kadu hinaseselakalaka. Mali kaliva hinahawave'iyohoyohoyedi, hinadiyao tamadiyao bonadi keke hina'idibumuhigeni, mali kaliva yadi nuwakabubu fa'ina keke hinavesiuleyedi, kadu Yaubada keke ma'ita hinamatauseni.

Medema tovai-nadi keke tamo hinekalikali hinaseyemauneni, veyao hinakilowe-mo'ena, hinaveyaveyaina, keke ma'ita taudiyao hinahawatadi. Au badi kaliva luluvehawalidiyao ada dewa hagihagina keke ma'ita nuwadi ginavaini.

Kadu tobohiyadiyao nibaidiyao agaidiya hinahawavemogataledi, keke yadi wanuwanuwa tu hina'ihokohoko be tobohiyadiyao vita hinaveledi, ada nuwalaka adiga. Keke ma'ita Yaubada againe yadi nuwanuwa hinaseni, au taudiyao yadi vemwamwala againe hinanuwanuwa.
Kebuladiya hinatafatafalolo tu gava ase'asediya Yaubada yana faiwala keke ma'ita hina'ayauneni. Badi kalivai-dina keke unavetobohiyanedi, au una'otayabuyabudi.

Badi kalivai-dina tufoidi mali kaliva yadi manuweya hilukuluku-yo vevine u'udi keke ma yadi bonayafayafa againe hinuwanuwa'abiyedi. Badi vevine-dina yadi koyona moya'aina vaita vainuwana amine hi'ayaunena, ada tova be tova nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana agaidiya hihawahawahegedi. Kadu tova moya'aina vehawala tulina tulina hivenovenogalena tu keke-mo'a Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena fa'ina halamana hidavivaini.

Tuwai-mo'ena kaliva adi'iselu adi egana Yanesi be Yamibelesi Idifita againe Mosese hivenibainena amine, meda badi galukahihiyedi-ma kalivai-dina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena hivenibainena. Au nuwadi gi'uyuyuna ada Yaubada ana vetumagana againe keke hidahawahegedi velemo'ena.
Atu yadi nuwanuwa againe keke adifaiweya hinafaiwala-mo'a, fa'ina aimo yadi nuwanuwa kwavakwavana ma kaliva moya'aidi hina'itana, boi tuwai-mo'ena Yanesi be Yamibelesi agaidiya gilakayemu amine.
Siule natuku Timoti, iya keke badi amine o uhalamanena. Fa'ina yaku vehawala, yaku dewa, yaku inuba, yaku vetumagana, yaku atuvefa'ila, yaku nuwakabubu, yaku asevatu o u'ita-mo'ena.

Kadu aku ve'umagigi kaliva nimadiya be yaku vedivediwe u'ita-hagihagiyena. Boi melala tohiye Anidiyoka Aikoniumi Lisidila agaidiya vita lakahina lakahi-mo'ena Keliso fa'ine kaliva nimadiya ganuhagana-ma o uhalamane-hagihagiyena. Vita lakahi-mo'ena nonogana Kaiwabu vita matatabuna agaidiya gilugolegoleku.
E, ganagahe. Gaveyao moya'aidi nuwanuwadi Yesu Keliso againe hinamiyave'avina be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine hinahuluhuluva, medema vita kaliva nimadiya hinanuhagana.
Atu badi kaliva koyodiyao kadu tove'alololo yadi koyona hinave'atutamo'aina be hinakoyo-mo'a. Taudiyao hinave'alololo kadu mali kaliva badi hinalololodi.
Tu o'eni ma gava nuwanuwa gava nuwanuwa velemo'ena agaidiya usikulu be uvetumagana toyogina, vehawalai-nadi againe unaluluve'avina. Ime yami tovehawala uhalamanema.

Kadu unanuwa-nunauyena higa aimo kabi'oniya uvebutu Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina ana halamana uvaivaina be ununauwena tova adamoya. Yaubada bonana againe halamana afaiweya uvaini-yo Yesu Keliso againe uvetumagana be a kibababala unuhagana.

Yaubada bonana eto'etoladina ana gahegahe matatabuna Yaubada Alu'aluwana giyuvetunetunena. Gahe-nadi yana faisewa hidede amine. Nuwanuwa velemo'ena givehavehawaleda, yada koyona fa'ina gilulu'ageyeda, hagavila fa'ina gikivetuvetunuda, nuwanuwa tunutunugina fa'ina nuwada gikikifolena.
Ada au hidede amine Yaubada ide yana kaliva gikidewedeweda be faisewa yamumuna tulina tulina adafaiweya kana'itave'avina.

A vehimeya hidede amine. Yaubada bonana unalulumamalena. Ka'i tova gilubodana o ka'i keke gidalubodani, au ai'adi unalulumamalena. Kaliva unakivetuvetunudi, unadakedakeyedi kadu unalulu'ageyedi. Atuvefa'ila kadu vehawala againe unahawahege-vagahi.

Fa'ina tova gina'ela be againe kaliva vehawala tunutunugina hinakilowena. Au taudiyao yadi nuwanuwa hinamuliyena ada tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao tulidi tulidi hinaleledi be gava vehawala gava vehawala tagadi ginalubodana, medema hinavenogalena.
Ada Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana venogala hinakilowena be kaliva yadi nainaiya higa gahe-kawowo againe hinahawahegedi.

Tu o'eni ma tova moya'aina unamidi toyogina, vita tulina tulina agaidiya una'atuvefa'ila, Venuwa'ata Yamumuna unalulumamalena be higa kaliva Yesu Keliso againe hinahawahegedi, au a vehimeya ana faisewa tulina tulina una'itave'avidi.

Tu iya'eku ma yaku tova a giyemu be gana'alika. Totafalolo oine higa yadi abahawahega Yaubada matane hihiwana be gimadu amine, meda tova kabisona kaliva alikeya hinahegeku-yo dayagiku ginamadu ada hida babi ganahegena.

Iya Keliso yana tolugaviya yaku faisewa yamumuna againe ahe gafaiwala-mo'a. Tomadu yana ve'amadu giluyabuna amine, aku vehimeya matatabuna Kaiwabu giveleku-ma ahe galuyabuna. Keliso ana vetumagana againe ahe ga'idibumuhiga-mo'a.

Hidede amine ga'atuvefa'ila, ada yaku dewa tunutunugina Yaubada matane fa'ina aku badau kikaiwabuna higa aku laufata yamumuna gikidewedewena be gidadauda. Aimo tova mulina Kaiwabu Bana Tovedewayauga kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana agaideya ginalaufata tunutunugina amanadi ginayewa'ela ana toveya, mena aku laufata ginaveleku. Ada keke iya'ekugaga, au kadu gaveyao moya'aidi Kaiwabu againe hihawahegedi be yana yewa'ela fa'ina hilulauboda, medema buye adi laufata yamumuna ginaveledi.

Timoti, nuwanuwaku unamadu'ela, fa'ina tobohiyakweyao moya'aidi hinuyabuyabuku. Dimasi hida babi ana nuwanuwa nuwana givaina fa'ina, gikiloweku be ahe gina Tesalonaika againe. Bana Kelesekeni Galesiya ana fafali againe gina, ada bana Taitasi gina Dalimesiya ana fafali againe.
Tikiko Efeso againe ga'iveninisena be gina. Bana Luke anakaibe iya buye amimiyami. Maki unavega'aulena be buye wana'ela, fa'ina bana yaku faiseweya anafaiweya ginavelugaku.

Boi Talowasi melala gahegena againe aku aikeva vewabana Kafo againe gase-vagahina. Una'ela ana toveya una'aliyena, kadu yaku buki adi loi tu nuwanuwaku lakahina yaku buki vewabana yomuyomu kwalifidi againe hibubuna-ma buki-dina.
Bana yada laumamala givenibainena toyogina fa'ina, o'eni kadu tauni una'itave'avi bana againe.
Aku vedewayauga himidivebutu againe keke tamo hakwadi gidalugolegoleku. Au tobohiyakweyao moya'aidi hinuyabuyabuku. Nuwanuwaku Yaubada mena yadi koyona ginavenuwauluyena.

Badi hinuyabuyabuku tu yada Kaiwabu lilikuya gimiya ada gifaiwalaveleku be yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana nuwanuwa tulina tulina ga'awatalatalainena be badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao kalivai-dina hinogalina. Ada au Kaiwabu vita lakahi-mo'ena againe gilugolegoleku.

Ada Kaiwabu vita matatabuna agaidiya ginalugolegoleku ada iya lulukukuwaku lobameya ginavega'auleku be yana itave'avina againe ganamiyamiya-vagata. Bana ana egana kanakilakahina ada yana kikaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Bana Elasito Kolinita againe gimiya ada Talafimo gi'aulolo fa'ina Mailito againe ga'elayabuyabuna.
Nuwanuwaku unagaluvaluva be aimo kwadudu ana tova keke ginavebutu tu una'ela. Yubulo, Fudenisi, Laino, Kelodiya kadu tovetumagana moya'aidi hilukafoiye.
Kafoi natuku, Kaiwabu ginave'alune, ada omi tovetumagana moya'aimi ginanuwadogemi.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)

Yo siule natuku Taitasi. Iya Folo Yaubada ana agetoga kadu Yesu Keliso yana afositolo ya leta ga'etoladina. Yaubada mena faisewa fa'ina givegideku be higa badi Yaubada giluwafadi be yana yo'o agaidiya hiluku amanadi yadi vetumagana ganakivetubugina, kadu Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena fa'ina nuwadi ganakifolefolena. Mena nuwanuwa velemo'ena hinahalamane-hagihagiyeni yo au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine hina'idewadewa.

Ada ide Yaubada yana yo'ogaga yada vetumagana kadu yada halamana inubana au yawai-vagata yada wa'atuvefa'ila kalulubodena amanadi. Boi tuwai-lokalokana tova aimo keke gidave'inuba tu Yaubada giwonadabadaba be higa yawai-vagahida ginaveleda, ada Bana Yaubada keke-mo'a ginafwaya.

Ada tova gilubodana againe yana venuwa'ata yawai-vagahida fa'ina yaku laumamaleya gihawavemogatalena. Ada Yaubada ada Tokibababala mena aku vehimeya giveleku, higa yana venuwa'ata ana laumamala gana'itave'avina.

Keke gavana fa'ina tu a vehimeya sa'eyana fa'ina Kelita againe ganuyabuyabu, higa ekelesiya ana faisewa againe gavadi aimo keke gidalubodani-ma o una'ihagihagiyedi, ada melala sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya tonagona unavegidedi be to'ekelesiya adi kivetuvetunu fa'ina unasedi iya tauku gavehimeye amine.

Gilubodana be ekelesiya ana tonagona yana dewa yamumunaga kaliva matadiya ginamiyami, vavinena sa'eyanaga ginanagina kadu bana natuneyao yadi wavetumagana Keliso againe hinahawahegedi be keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginahawavekoyoyedi hinagayo, “Wama matadi digadigagina” o “Wa'itadi badi tagadi kuluna.”

Bana ekelesiya ana to'itave'avina kikaiwabuna ma Yaubada yana faisewa gi'itave'avina fa'ina, yana dewa yamumunaga kaliva matadiya ginamiyami. Keke tauna yana gaheselakalaka, keke tauna ginamadunuwakoyo, keke gufa laulaugina ana yu-fa'ila againe ginavekwavakwava, keke yana wa'agodadaga ayo ginamaduve'amunumunuga, keke mani ana italuvadiga fa'ina ginanuwanuwa.

Au wakawaka adi ve'a ginamadu'itave'avina, gaitoma yamumunaga nuwana ginanunauyena, nuwanuwa tunutunugina nuwana gina'abi-mo'ena, yana huluva matatabuna yegayegana, Yaubada againe tauna gihawahege-mo'ena, koyona yana ela againe tauna ginahawatana.

Kadu ana vehimeya sa'eyana ma Keliso yana venuwa'ata nuwa'abi'abina ginakidonena, venuwa'atai-nadi ime afositolo avehawala amine. Hidede amine vehawala tunutunugina againe kaliva anafaiweya ginalu'ageyedi, ada kadu badi Keliso yana venuwa'ata hivekwageyena-ma anafaiweya ginave'awa'ibodedi.

Fa'ina todibutoyoga moya'aidi himimiyami, yadi gahe-kawowo againe kaliva hinuwa'abiyedi. Ada badi miYuda tovetumagana Yaubada yana iya'iyaya wowodiya hitomogolohina-ma yo'oi-dina agaidiya tufoidi moya'aidi au hidedemi higahegahe-kawowo.

Yadi gahe-kawowo unahawatana, fa'ina yadi vehawala nubalabalana againe kaliva moya'aidi adi unuma buye hikivefavefanidi ada mena kalivai-dina hibonayafeyafedi be higa yadi mani hinavaina. Mema nuwanuwa hawasebasebana.

Boi kwanaKelita sa'eyana higa bona ana to'awatalatalaina sa'eyana tauna yana yo'o fa'idiya gigahe gigayo, “Badi miKelita ma tova moya'aina tofwaya, to'a-fa'ila, dibudibutoyogidiyao, kevakeva manimaninidiyao amine hikikivekoyo.”

Mema gahe velemo'ena. Mena yadi dewa koyo-mo'ena fa'ina unadakeyedi toyogina be higa Keliso ana vetumagana againe hinanuwanuwa tunutunugina, ada miYuda yadi nainaiya higa gahe-kawowo keke hinamuliyeni kadu badi kaliva nuwanuwa velemo'ena hikilowena-ma yadi vehimeya keke hina'itavaini.

Hai kaliva ase'asena yegayegana, medema yana nuwanuwa gaitoma moya'aina fa'ina au yegayegana. Atu hai kaliva ase'asena bwanebwanenena ada keke Yesu Keliso againe gidavetumagana, medema yana nuwanuwa au bwanebwanenena, fa'ina nuwana belona ada nuwafouna ana togahe gikoyo-mo'a.

Badi kalivai-dina nuwadi belona ma kebuladiya higahegahe higayo, “Ime Yaubada ahalamanena.” Atu Yaubada ana halamana yadi dewa againe keke kada'itani. Au badi koyo-mo'ediyao Yaubada matane, adi egana vehimeya ana todibutoyoga ada dewa hagihagina sa'eyanaga keke adifata.
Siule natuku Taitasi, o'eni ma gavaimi vehawala tunutunugina gilubodana, medemi unavehavehawala.

Badi kaliva lakahidiyao unavehawaledi be yadi huluva moya'aina fa'ina hinanuwanuwa-hagihagi, kadu hinanuwanuwa tunutunugina yo kaliva hinave'amohimohinedi, kadu yadi wanuwahuya taudiyao hinahawatadi. E, unavehawaledi vaita Keliso ana vetumagana be yadi hawahega be yadi atuvefa'ila againe hinanuwanuwa tunutunugina.

Meda anafaiweya vevine lakahidiyao unavehawaledi be gava dewa vevine mahamahalidiyao gilubodadi, medemi hinahuluhuluva tova moya'aina. Unagahedi be keke hinaveyaina, keke gufa laulaugina againe hinahawahegedi-yo gufai-nadi againe hinave'agetoga. Au dewa yamumuna ana vehawala againe hinahawahegedi.

Badi naginagi ana ulaulatana adifaiweya hinakivetuvetunudi be higa moganediyao natudiyao fa'idiya hinahawahawahegedi, yadi wanuwahuya taudiyao hinahawatadi, keke kaliva agaidiya hinagakahikahidi, vevine yadi faisewa hina'ita'itave'avina, itanuwakabubu amine hinadewadewa, moganediyao hinawowomumuyedi be bonadi hina'abi'abina. Au hidede amine naginagi ana ulaulatana hinahuluva be keke tamo hakwadi gina'itadi-yo Yaubada bonana anafaiweya ginahawatagoni ginagayo, “Wa'itadi, badi Yaubada yana vevine nonogana yadi dewa koyona.”
Meda anafaiweya tubulakata unalu'ageyedi be koyona yana ela againe taudiyao hinahawatadi.

O'eni ma ya havivila tulina tulina agaidiya unadewadewa yamumuna be badi hina'ita-yo meda gugai hagihagina againe hinamuliye. Ada uvehawaledi againe, nuwanuwa velemo'ena tu keke gahe-kawowo unayakayakahini kadu keke unagakahikahi.

Au tova moya'aina bona velemo'ena amine unalulukahihi be keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ya gahe gina'awalaveni. Medede amine badi hivekwageyeda-ma keke tamo gavadi fa'ina adifaiweya hinahawavekoyoyeda, au hinave'amata.

Kadu keke hinakai'afu, au yadi dewa matatabuna againe yamumunaga hinaseyemaunena be yadi tovehimeya hinagahe hinagayo, “Aku agetoga kaliva dibudibumuhigidiyao, akufaiweya ganavetumaganedi.” Tove'agetoga au hidedemi hinahuluva be higa yadi havivila moya'aina agaidiya Yaubada ada Tokibababala bonana hinakivenuwavaivaina.
Dewa hagihagina unavehawaledi, fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwadoga gi'ivemogatalina higa Natuna gihobu'ela be ide tomiyababi moya'aida ginakibababaleda.

Kadu ada kivetuvetunu Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe ka'itahalamanena, higa Yaubada ana venikohi kadu hida babi ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana kanavekwaulaugena, ada hida tovai-nadi kanadewadewa yamumuna, koyona yana ela againe taudeyao kanahawatada, badi kaliva agaidiya kadu Bana Yaubada againe kana'igibagiba hagihagina.

Kanadewadewa hagihagina tu yada Tokaiwabu-mo'a yana ivemogatala ana tova yada wavemwamwala kalulubodena. Medema tovai-nadi Yesu Keliso, yada Yaubada tu kadu ada Tokibababala, yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gina'ivemogatalina be kana'itana.

Yesu Keliso ide fa'ideya Tauna gihawahegena be vehimeya moya'aina ana dibutoyoga agaidiya ginalugolegoleda. Gi'alika be ginakiveyeveyegada-yo Tauna yana yo'o kanamiyami be tova moya'aina nuwanuwada lakahina gugai yamumunaga kanafifaisewana.
Unakivetuvetunudi be keke tamo hakwadi hinaveyaineni, au nuwanuwa veyaveyaona kadu umaumana amine hinahuluhuluva ada kaliva moya'aidi hina'atu'atuvefa'iledi tova moya'aina.
Tuwaina medede amine kahuluhuluva koyona. Atu Yaubada ada Tokibababala yana nuwakabubu kadu yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana gi'ivemogatalina ana toveya, Bana'e gikibababaleda.

Keke taudeyao yada igibagiba fa'ina gidakibababaleda. Au Tauna yana hinekalikali fa'ina gikibababaleda. Gavaimi gikibababaleda? Alu'aluwa Mahalina givetowada-yo yawaida ivaguna giveleda be yada nuwanuwa matatabuna gikive'ivaguna.
Ide ada Tokibababala Yesu Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine fa'ina, Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina ide agaideya gihawahegena gihawahege-mo'ena.

Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina ide agaideya gihawahegena be higa yana nuwadoga againe ide giseda yegayegadeyao Bana Yaubada matane, ada kadu ide Bana natuneyao ada du'u higa yawai-vagahida kanuhagana. Ada hidedemi kalulauboda.
Mena gahe-nadi ma au gahe velemo'ena ada ide adafaiweya kanavetumaganena.

Natuku, nuwanuwaku mena nuwanuwai-dina fa'ina unagahedonedi be higa badi Yaubada againe hivetumagana-ma gugai yamumuna tulina tulina agaidiya hinahawahege-mo'edi. Kadu mena nuwanuwai-dina au hagihagi-mo'ena ada medema againe kaliva adi ihagihagi giyemuyemu.

Atu gaveyao kwavakwavadiyao amine hinave'alakwalakwakwa, ada kaliva tulina tulina bwanenediyao adi egana ana loi fa'ina hive'agahegahe, ada vehimeya tulina tulina Mosese yana buki-vehimeya againe gidadauda-ma fa'ine buye hivekwavekwageya o hive'adabwadabwa, medema iyohoyoho mema gahe-kawowo, ada medema agaidiya kaliva adi ihagihagi keke gidayemuyemu. Fa'ina mena vekwageyai-dina againe keke unahawahege au una'otayabuyabuna.
Hai kaliva yana vehawala againe Keliso yana yo'o gidakadakadi, medema tova sa'eyana o ka'i luhei unakivetuvetununa. Ka'i keke ginavenogala, au unakilowena.
Ahe uhalamanena bana kalivai-nadi nuwana nubalabalana kadu Yaubada againe gikoyo-mo'a. Bana tauna yana koyona gihalamanena tu au ai'adi koyona gififaisewana.
Unahawahege be vehimeya ana tonuwahuya ana egana Senasi kadu Afolosi unavelugadi be yadina fa'ina gavadi gavadi nuwanuwadi amine, unaveledi.

Nuwanuwaku yada to'ekelesiya halamana hinavaina be gugai yamumuna tulina tulina agaidiya hinahawahege-mo'edi be higa tamo gavadi againe adifaiweya badi koyokoyo hinavelugadi. Hina'idibumuhiga, au keke hinamiya-kawokawowo.

Tu, kaliva moya'aidi iya buye amimiyami-ma yadi nuwakabubu againiya. Badi ime buye Yesu Keliso ana vetumagana againe kavetobohiyana-ma yama lukafoi badi agaidiya. Yaubada yana nuwadogeya moya'aimi wanamiyami.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)

Yo siule tobohiyanuwaku Filimoni, o'eni Yesu Keliso yana tofaisewa anafaiweya kadu iya'eku. Iya Folo deliya hiseku be Yesu Keliso fa'ina yogoyogoniku gamimiyami amanadi ya leta ga'etoladina be una'itana. Iya Folo kadu tobohiyada Timoti yama lusiule againiya.
Kadu nouda Afiya be natuda Akifo bana ama nimavelu Keliso fa'ine ime buye alulugaviya amanadi, be kadu tovetumagana ami yo'o yami manuweya hivagavaga'auta-ma yama lusiule badi agaidiya.
Yaubada Tamada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso hinanuwadogemi kadu ase'asemi hinakiveniwalovina.
Valeya ganogalina fa'ina Yaubada againe gavesivesiule, higa Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahalidiyao moya'aidi fa'idiya uhawahawahege-mo'e kadu Kaiwabu Yesu againe uvetuvetumagana-mo'a.
Iya gave'o'ola be Keliso ana vetumagana againe o'eni ime buye kavetobohiyana-yo gaitoma moya'aidi yamumudi Keliso againe hiyemuyemu-ma unahalamane-hagihagiyedi.
Tobohiyaku, ya hawahega againe Yaubada yana yo'ogaga adi ayauna ukivehavehagina fa'ina, mena ya hawahega againe kadu iya aku ayauna ukivehavehagina be gavemwamwala lakahina.

Keke gavana fa'ina tu o kaliva hawahawahegani fa'ina, hawahega amine ganave'o'ole. Keliso aku vehimeya giveleku fa'ina, iya akufaiweya vehimeya amine ganavehimeye be gaitoma sa'eyana unagana. Atu keke vehimeya au hawahega amine ganave'o'ole, iya Folo gavesilakahi ada adamoya deliya hiseku-yo iya Yesu Keliso fa'ine yogoyogoniku gamimiyami amanadi.
Natuku Onesimo fa'ine gave'o'ole. Deliya gamiyami tu Keliso ana vetumagana againe gahawavenatunena.
Tuwaina bana'e a agetoga ma keke-mo'a againiya gida'igibagiba hagihagina, tu tova adamoya nuwana gi'avilani-yo anafaiweya o ginaveluga kadu iya ginavelugaku.
Au againiya gaveyewana bana natu'ase'aseku amanadi.
Nuwanuwaku ma higa vaita gadahawatana be gidabwa'uliku, ada Venuwa'ata Yamumuna fa'ine be deliya gamimiyami againe gidavelugaku vaita o loseyani amine.
