Atu auwe keke ganahawatani fa'ina nuwanuwaku nagona ya nuwanuwa bana fa'ine ganahalamanena, ada ka'i o unanuwakabubuyeku digo, nuwanuwaku tauni ya nuwanuwa amine unahawahegena, keke luya'aya'ala fa'ina.
Ka'iwa, ka'i bana Onesimo ginuyabuyabu-yo tova kabisona gimiyavehaile be higa ginayewana againiya ginamiya-vagata.

Againiya ginayewana keke vaita agetogagaga amine. Au yana miya agetoga yadi miya ginatubuhegena, higa adamoya bana tobohiyanuwada. Iya nuwanuwaku lakahina bana'e, tu o'eni ma ya nuwanuwa bana againe gavatubuga! Bana a agetoga kadu'e o taini Kaiwabu yana yo'o agaidiya.
Medema fa'ina ka'i velemo'ena o mataniya kavetobohiyana, au ya wavemwamwala unavega'aulena vaita iya udavega'auleku amine.
Gavadi gavadi yana koyona o ka'i ana buki againiya medema unavenuwa'ataku be iya ganalaufata.

Iya Folo tauku nimakuya hidede amine ga'etoladina higa iya tauku matatabuna ganafatana. Atu ka'i nuwa ginunauyena higa yaku kivetuvetunu againe yawai ivaguna unuhagana fa'ina vaita iya agaikuya o udabuki be unalaufata.
Siule tobohiyaku, Kaiwabu Yesu fa'ina yaku ve'o'ola amine udanuwakabubuyeku. Ide Keliso yana kaliva fa'ina, udanuwakabubuyeku-yo aku ayauna udakivehavehagina.
Yaku nuwanuwa hidemi ya leta againe ga'etoladina ada gavetumagane higa wona velemona bonaku wana'abina, e gavaimi unaga ma yaku ve'o'ola ginatubuhegena.
Kadu badi Keliso yana tofaisewa anafaiweya iya'eku ma yadi lukafoi, Maki Alisitako Dimasi Luke.
Ada iya gave'o'olemi be Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso yana nuwadoga alu'aluwamiya wana'ayaunena.
(Iya Folo bonaku.)

Tova tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ana tufo ana tufo amine ide miIsileli bwanenedeyao agaidiya givehavehawaledi. Tova sa'eyana eda sa'eyana amine yana nuwanuwa gihawavemogatalena, kadu tova sa'eyana yana nuwanuwa ana hawavemogatala kadu eda tulina amine giseyemaunena. Ada yana nuwanuwa badi bonana ana to'awatalatalaina agaidiya gihawavemogatalena be bwanenedeyao agaidiya hi'awatalatalainena.

E, tova tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina awadiya gigahe, tu tova adamoya higa hida tova havahavaina againe yana nuwanuwa Natuna awane ide tovetumagana agaideya gihawavemogatalena. Boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Natuna givelena be gaitoma matatabudi babiya kadu lobameya gibubudi. Ada kadu boi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada Natuna givegidena be gaitoma moya'aidi ginavehimeye-'owodi fa'ina.

Kauwana yana mahalina kelasi againe kakivilavilana be give'akinamanamalena amine, Bana Yaubada Natuna Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gi'i'iveyemaunina. Ada Yaubada ana ita'ita amine meda anafaiweya Natuna ana ita'ita, au anunudi sa'eyana. Ada Yaubada Natuna gaitoma moya'aidi lobameya kadu babiya bonana fifiwalana againe gisedonedi be yana vehimeya againe givefota-vagahidi kadu gi'ita'itave'avidi. Bana'e yada koyona ana aba'aiyawela ana eda Tauna gifaisewani-yo lobameya gilaka, Yaubada Tokaiwabu-mo'a i'atagine givetoga. E, abavetoga kikaiwabuna Yaubada i'atagine givetoga be higa abavehimeya lakahina givaina.

Yaubada i'atagine givetoga-yo badi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata moya'aidi gikaiwabuhegedi. Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata adi egana lakahina tu Yaubada egana kikaiwabu-mo'ena Natuna givelena. Fa'ina Natuna ana egana tovenuwa'ata adi egana gikaiwabuhegena amine, Bana Tauna gikaiwabuhegedi.
O'eni Natuku.
Adamoya gahawavenatune.
Kadu gahe sa'eyana buki-nadi againe Natuna fa'ine gilukahihi gigayo,
Iya Bana Tamana,
Kadu Bana Iya Natuku.
Mena gahe ma keke lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana againe gidagahe, keke-mo'a. Bana Natuna anakaibe fa'ine hidede amine gigahe.
Ada Natuna anakaibe'u-mo'a babiya ginaseyemaunena ana toveya, yana hobu'ela fa'ina buki-nadi againe gigahe gigayo,
Omi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata
ami yo'o moya'aimi wanahawadavadavana.
Au hidede amine Yesu gikaiwabuhegedi.
Tu badi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata au kikaiwabudiyao ma kahalamanena fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigaheyedi gigayo,
Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata givehimeyedi
be bolimana ana ita'ita amine hivenuya.
Kadu yana tofaisewa lobameya givehimeyedi
be ai noya'aina ana ita'ita amine hivenuya.
O'eni Yaubada. Ya didiga'u'u kikaiwabuna,
keke ginahavaini, au ginaduva-vagata.
Ya yo'o agaidiya uvehivehimeya,
E, uvehivehimeya tunutunugi-vagahina.
O nuwanuwa lakahina dewa tunutunugina,
Keke nuwanuwa dewa koyona, keke-mo'a.
Hidedemi unuwanuwa fa'ina
Iya Yaubada, higa ya Yaubada,
a egana gakilakahi-mo'ena,
bunama ana egana vemwamwala
againe gabunami be higa unavemwamwala-mo'a.
E, tobohiyamomo adi waegana hivemwamwala,
atu O'eni ma uvemwamwala-mo'a.
Ho Kaiwabu, boi tuwai-lokalokana
babi ana abave'inuba againe
ya nuwanuwa amine babi ububuna
kadu lobama ana aibubuna O nima.
Aimo lobama kadu babi hinayawowola,
Tu O'eni umiyamiya-vagata.
Kaleko ginadauda tu ginakoyo-mo'a amine
lobama kadu babi aimo ginakoyo.
Lifi tuwaina gikoyo-mo'a ma
ka'uwana be kahegena amine,
hida lobama kadu babi aimo yogo amine unahegedi
be lobama babi adi ita tulina unaseyemaunedi.
Atu O'eni ma a ita'ita keke tulina ginalakayemu.
Fa'ina tuwai-mo'e umiyamiya-vagata amine,
meda anafaiweya tova mulina unamiyamiya-vagata.
Yawaini ana aituha keke, keke-mo'a.
Nima i'atagikuya unahiyoto. O unamiyami
tu nibaimomo ageyafayafaniya ganasedi.
Hidemi gigahe tu keke lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana againe hidede amine gidagahe. Au Bana Natuna anakaibe againe hidede amine gigahe.

Yaubada Natuna au kikaiwabu-mo'ena tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata ma adi egana tofaisewa. Yaubada fa'ina hififaisewa. Badi keke wawowodi, au alu'aluwadiga tu Yaubada gi'iveninisedi be badi kaliva Yaubada ginakibababaledi-ma hinavelugadi.

Yaubada yana nuwanuwa Natuna awane gihawavemogatalena fa'ina, Yaubada bonana kanogalina-ma nuwadeya kanasena be kanakidonena. Hidede amine kanakidonena be bolimana waka ma'inuwana ma'inuwana gi'alu'alugena amine, Bana bonana keke nuwada ma'inuwana ma'inuwana ginaulu'ulu.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana vehimeya lobama ana tovenuwa'ata awadiya kaliva lakahina ana egana Mosese givelena. Tovenuwa'ata awadiya gilakayemu ada au gahe velemo'ena ma kahalamanena, ada hai kaliva mena vehimeyai-nadi giyawelina o ka'i gikilowena, medema yana dewa fatana higa matahiwadi ginuhagana.

Atu tova adamoya keke lobama ana tovenuwa'ata au Kaiwabu Yesu kibababala ana eda givehawaleda. Mena kibababala ma gaitoma lakahina. Ka'i Kaiwabu yana gahe kibababala fa'ina kanaluhegehegena digo, keke adafaiweya yada dewa ana laufata kana'oseni, keke-mo'a. Bana Kaiwabu Yesu kibababala ana eda fa'ina gimidivehawala, ada muliya badi yana vehawala hinogalina-ma yana gahe hi'alakakilina.

Ada keke badi tomadunogalagaga hida'alakakila, au kadu Yaubada Tauna mena gahe kibababala fa'ina au velemo'ena giseyemaunena. Fa'ina Bana'e nimana ana iya'iyaya giseyemaunedi, ada abaveyaulowoga kadu aituha fifiwalana tulina tulina gifaisewadi. Meda anafaiweya Tauna yana nuwanuwa amine Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala, higa faiwala tulina tulina tovetumagana agaideya gifolakena be kanahalamanena yana kibababala au velemo'ena.

Keke gavana fa'ina tu kaliva yada miyami aimo aituha mulina ginalakayemu againe fa'ina galulukahihi. Yada miyami mena aituheya fa'ina Yaubada keke lobama ana tovenuwa'ata agaidiya gidagahe gidagayo, “Kaliva yadi miyami aimo aituha mulina ginalakayemu againe omi wanavehimeyena.”
Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata badi keke gidasedi tovehimeya aimo aituha mulina fa'ina, tu Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gahe sa'eyana gidadauda higa vaita kaliva sa'eyana Yaubada againe gidagahe gidagayo,
Ime tomiyababi au kabisomeyao.
Kabisomeyao tu gavadi-yo unuwa-nunauyema?
Ime kaliva ama egana keke lakahina
tu tova moya'aina uhinehinekalikaliyema.
Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kikaiwabudiyao
amine ime kaliva kadu kikaiwabumeyao.
Atu badi yadi kaiwabu wai ginagona,
ime yama kaiwabu ma'ita wai gimulina.
E, ime kaliva ama egana lakahina usena,
kadu yama kaiwabu lakahina uvelema.
Ada ime agaimeya ugahe ugayo,
Gaitoma moya'aidi wanavehimeyedi.

Au hidedemi Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe. Ada keke vaita gidagahe ide kaliva gaitoma tufona kadavehimeyeni. Au gigahe vaita gaitoma moya'aina kanavehimeyena. Atu tova adamoya keke gaitoma moya'aina agevavadeya kada'itani.

Keke gaitoma moya'aina agevavadeya kada'itani, tu kaliva sa'eyana higa Yesu ka'ita'itana. Yesu kaliva kikaiwabu-mo'ena, lobama ana tovenuwa'ata gikaiwabuhegedi tu Yaubada yana vehimeya againe gihobu'ela be yana kaiwabu ma'ita giyewa, ada tova kali'uhona lobama ana tovenuwa'ata ma'ita hikaiwabuhegena. Yesu yana kaiwabu au hidede amine giyewa be higa Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe ide kaliva moya'aida fa'ideya gina'alika. Ada alika ana aulolo golagolana ginuhagana fa'ina, Yaubada kikaiwabu lakahina givelena kadu ana egana gikilakahi-mo'ena. Ada au tova adamoya ide Yesu yana wakaiwabu lakahina ka'ita'itana.

Yesu ase'aseda gikola-yo gisevehaileda. Bana tosevehaila kadu ide gisevehaileda amanadi Tamada au sa'eyana. Bana'e ma Yaubada Natuna kikaiwabu-mo'ena nonogana ide gihawavetobohiyaneda, fa'ina Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya kaluku-yo Tamada au sa'eyana.
E, yana gahe Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
A egana kaikweyao agaidiya
ganahawavemogatalena be O hinahalamane.
Tovetumagana adi yo'o hinafadiya
O ganakweli-davadava.
Iya tauku Yaubada againe ganavetumagana.
Kadu gahe sa'eyana gigayo,
We'a Yaubada natuneyao giveleku-ma
iya badi buye amimiyami.
Yesu ide buye kavetobohiyana ma ana gahegahe Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe au hidede amine.

Kaliva vevine moya'aidi alika fa'ina himatamatauta, higa vaita alika ana matauta gidayogodi. Yesu gi'alika be Setani yana faiwala ginayawelina, ada gaveyao moya'aidi alika fa'ina tova moya'aina himatamatauta, medema ginakiyaudi be yadi matauta ginahavaina.
Yesu keke lobama ana tovenuwa'ata adi nuya gida'oseni be ginavelugadi fa'ina, keke. Ide kaliva Abelahamo bwaneneneyao ada nuya gi'osena be ginavelugada fa'ina.

Ide taineyao ginavelugada fa'ina, gilubodana be kaliva ada nuya gida'osena ada ide babiya kamimiyami amine Bana gidamiyami be higa vaita abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna ide fa'ideya ginafaisewa. Ide ada ayauna moya'aina gi'ayaunena fa'ina, faisewai-nadi Bana anafaiweya gina'abi-hagihagiyena, kadu yana faisewa againe ginahinekalikaliyeda. Tova moya'aina Yaubada matane veyao ana eda againe ginagonagoyeda be higa Bana Yaubada buye kanaveyao fa'ina. E, Bana ide taineyao amine givekaliva fa'ina, anafaiweya yada koyona ana laufata giyawelini-yo Yaubada yana ila'a agaideya gihavaina.

Setani Yesu gi'aladibidibiyena againe aladibidibi ana faiwala kadu ana aulolo gi'ayaunena. Mena aladibidibi ana vita moya'aina gi'ayaunena tu gifaiwalahegehegena fa'ina, aladibidibi ide agaideya ginalakayemu ana toveya, Bana anafaiweya ginavelugada.

Yesu mena faisewai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada givegidena-ma gibonabona'abiyena. E, tuwai-mo'ena Mosese Yaubada yana yo'o hinafadiya gi'idibumuhiga amine, meda anafaiweya tova moya'aina Yesu gi'idibumuhiga be Yaubada bonana matatabuna gi'abina.

Wa'ita, manuwa vewaga ana ita kaliva hinadavana tu manuwai-nadi ana to'aiyogona hinadava-mo'ena. Meda anafaiweya Mosese bana vaita Yaubada yana manuwa ana yowana amine ma kadavana, tu Yesu Tauna Yaubada yana manuwa ana to'aiyogona, higa yana yo'ogaga adi to'ihagihagi, kadava-mo'ena. Bana Mosese kikaiwabuna tu Bana Yesu kikaiwabu-mo'ena.

Manuwa sa'eyana sa'eyana keke tauna gidamidi, au kaliva hikivemididina. Meda anafaiweya Yaubada yana manuwa higa yana yo'o keke taudiyao hidatubuyemu, au Yaubada yana vehimeya againe hitubuyemu fa'ina Bana gaitoma moya'aidi inubadi.
Bana Mosese ma Yaubada ana agetoga, ada yana yo'o matatabudi hinafadiya bana bonabona'abina be gavaimi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa aimo tova mulina ginagaheyena, medema fa'ina gi'awatalatalaina.

Tu Bana Yesu ma keke Yaubada ana agetoga au Natuna, ada Bana bonabona'abina be Yaubada yana manuwa higa yana yo'ogaga agaidiya givehivehimeya. Ada ide Yaubada yana yo'ogaga. Ka'i yada wa'asevatu kana'atuvefa'ila be gavadi aimo Yaubada ide fa'ideya ginagani-ma yada wavemwamwala kanalubode-mo'ena amine o, ide velemo'ena Yaubada yana yo'ogaga kamimiyami.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena bwanenemiyao
babigaga againe hinunudadana ana toveya,
badi tagadi hi'ivekuluna be
Iya yadi Yaubada hivekwaulaugeku.
Kadu yaku atuvefa'ila higaluvaluvana.
Tu omi'iyao ma ka'i tova adamoya
bonaku wananogalina o,
keke bwanenemiyao amine tagami
wana'ivekuluni, au bonaku wanavenogalena.
Mene babigaga againe badi bwanenemiyao
yaku gugai malamala foti agaidiya hi'ita'itana.
Mena yaku gugai fifiwalana hi'ita'itana,
tu tova moya'aina yaku atuvefa'ila
yadi dewa koyona againe higagaluvaluvana,
ada bonaku keke hidavenogaleni.
Hidede amine hivekwaulaugeku fa'ina,
badi kalivai-dina agaidiya ganuwakoyo.
Badi fa'idiya gagahe gagayo,
Tova moya'aina tagadi kuluna
be eda tunutunugina hihegehegena
ada yaku nuwanuwa hifanifaniyena.
ada gawonadabadaba gagayo,
Abaga fa'idiya gahawahegena-ma keke againe
hinaluku be agaikuya hinaveyawai, keke-mo'a.
Au hidede amine Yaubada yana buki againe miIsileli fa'idiya gigahe.

Tobohiyakweyao, tuwai-mo'ena bwanenemiyao tagadi kuluna keke Yaubada yana abaveyawai againe hidaluku, fa'ina taumiyao wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya nuwanuwa koyona ase'asene ginadauda-yo yana vetumagana ginahegeni-yo Yaubada Tomiya-vagata ginavekwaulaugeni.

Yaubada ide kaliva agaideya tova gihawahegena be againe bonana kanavenogalena. Tovai-nadi givewagana tova adamoya, ada tovai-nadi aimo gidadauda againe, tova tova buye wanave'akivetuvetunu be yami vetumagana againe wanafaiwala ada keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya dewa koyona nuwana ginavaini-yo tagana ginakulukulu.
Boi tuwaina kavebutu Yesu againe kavetumagana. Ka'i yada vetumagana kanakive'avina, kana'atuvefa'ila kananunauwena yawaida ana aituheya, au ide velemo'ena Keliso buye kavetobohiyana.
Mena Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana ahe gayakahina-ma kadu kana'itanuwenuwena, gigayo,
Boi tuwai-mo'ena bwanenemiyao tagadi hi'ivekuluna
be Iya yadi Yaubada hivekwaulaugeku.
Tu omi'iyao ma ka'i tova adamoya
bonaku wananogalina o,
keke bwanenemiyao amine tagami
wana'ivekuluni, au bonaku wanavenogalena.
Kadu gaveyao agaidiya Yaubada ginuwanuwakoyo malamala foti agaidiya? Au badi dewa koyona hififaisewani-yo hi'alika be luludi babigaga againe gi'iyauyaulena-ma kalivai-dina.

Ada kadu gaveyao fa'idiya Yaubada giwonadabadaba gigayo, Abaga badi fa'idiya gahawahegena-ma keke againe hinaluku be Iya agaikuya hinaveyawai, keke-mo'a? Au badi bonana keke hidavenogaleni-ma agaidiya hidede amine gigahe.
Badi yadi dewa koyona againe halamana kavaina. Keke Yaubada hidavetumaganeni fa'ina, abaga Yaubada yadi abaveyawai fa'ina gikidewedewena-ma againe keke adifaiweya hidaluku.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada giwonadabadaba gigayo, “Yaku abageya wanaluku be Iya agaikuya wanaveyawai.” Badi bwanenedeyao ma yadi abaveyawai Yaubada gikidewedewena-ma againe keke hidaluku. Atu mena wonadabadaba veyawai fa'ina aimo gidadauda, fa'ina ide yada wamatauta kana'itave'avida be aimo keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya Yaubada ginagaheni ginagayo, “O keke unaluku be Iya agaikuya unaveyawai, fa'ina keke afata.”

Wananuwanuwa Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna badi bwanenedeyao miIsileli hinogalina amine, kadu ide kanogalina. Badi venuwa'atai-nadi hinogalina tu hinogali-kawokawowona, au keke hidavetumaganeni fa'ina keke adi leme hidanuhagani.
Atu ide gaveyao Yesu kavetumaganena, medema veyawai ana eda amine kananauna be Yaubada againe kanaveyawai. Badi keke hidavetumaganeni-ma fa'idiya Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gigahe gigayo,
Iya ganuwakoyo lakahina fa'ina gawonadabadaba gagayo,
Abaga badi fa'idiya gahawahegena keke againe hinaluku
be agaikuya hinaveyawai, keke-mo'a.

Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe tu boi tuwai-mo'ena veyawai ana vehimeya gisena, higa vaita Bana yana kaliva buye hinaveyawai. Fa'ina Bana babi gibubuna ada gaitoma moya'aina ana aibubuna givehavaini-yo Tauna giveyawai.
E, hai buki-nadi againe aiyeta anaveseveni fa'ina gigahe gigayo,
Yaubada yana aibubuna moya'aina giluyabuni-yo
aiyeta anaveseveni againe giveyawai.
Kadu yana gahe ahe gayakahina-ma amine gigayo, “Keke Iya agaikuya hinaluku hinaveyawai.”

Hidede amine gigahe ada badi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna hinogalina-ma yadi abaveyawai againe keke hidaluku be Yaubada buye hidaveyawai. Keke bonana hidavenogaleni fa'ina keke hidaluku. Atu Yaubada abaveyawai gikidewedewena fa'ina, kaliva tufoida aimo kanaluku be Yaubada buye kanaveyawai.
Yaubada nuwanuwana kaliva hinaluku fa'ina tova velugana gisena, ada tovai-nadi givewagana tova adamoya. Malamala a gavaiyehi kaliva hihege tu Yaubada Devida awane gigahe gigayo,
Ka'i tova adamoya Yaubada bonana wananogalina o
keke tagami wana'ivekuluni, au bonana wanavenogalena.

Tuwai-mo'ena Devida keke gidatubuyemu ana toveya, bana Yosuwa miIsileli ginagoyedi be higa vaita abaga Yaubada yadi abaveyawai fa'ina gikidewedewena-ma againe gidavega'auledi. Ka'i Yosuwa gidavega'auledi be Yaubada buye velemo'ena hidaveyawai digo, keke muliya Devida yana toveya Yaubada veyawai ana tova velugana fa'ina gidalukahihi.

Atu tova velugana muliya giyakahina fa'ina, kahalamanena ide Yaubada yana yo'ogaga yada veyawai aimo gidadauda. Yaubada aiyeta anaveseveni againe giveyawai amine, meda anafaiweya kadu ide yada veyawai kananuhagana.
Hai kaliva Yaubada againe ginaluku be ginaveyawai, medema yana faisewa ginasena be ginaveyawai Yaubada yana faisewa giseni tu giveyawai amine.

Yaubada yada abaveyawai gikidewedewena fa'ina, kanahawahegeda kanavedivediwe be Yaubada againe kanaluku Bana buye kanaveyawai. Keke bwanenedeyao amine kanadibutoyoga-yo kanabe'u, ada hidema fa'ina keke kanaluku.

Keke tamo gavadi Yaubada againe adafaiweya kanasevauyeni. Au gaitoma moya'aidi lobameya kadu babiya gibubudi-ma kabu'avane Yaubada matane. Ide moya'aida yada nuwahinage matatabuna gi'ita'itana, ada mena yada nuwahinage fa'ina ginavedewayaugida.

Aladibidibi tulina tulina ide agaideya gilakayemu amine, kadu Bana yada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna againe meda anafaiweya gilakayemu. Atu Bana'e ma keke ide amine koyona againe gidabe'u. Hidedemi aladibidibi gi'ayaunena fa'ina, Bana ide yada gakowakowa makewa'e anafaiweya gina'ayaunevaiseda be ginahinekalikaliyeda.

Yada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna anafaiweya ginahinekalikaliyeda fa'ina, keke kanamatauta au yada wa'asevatu Yaubada Tokaiwabu-mo'a againe kanayemu be yana leme fa'ina kanave'o'ola. E, Bana Tokaiwabu-mo'a tu kadu Tonuwadoga againe kanayemu be higa yada koyona fa'ina ginahinekalikaliyeda ada keke matahiwadi ginaveleda, kadu tova vitana ide agaideya ginalakayemu amine, yana nuwadoga againe ginavelugada.

Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna babiya ana vegida fa'ina ganalukahihi. Bana'e ma tomiyababi, ada tobohiyaneyao fa'idiya Yaubada matane gilukuluku. Ada ana vehimeya Yaubada givelena-ma hidede amine. Kaliva yadi abahawahega tulina tulina kadu kevakeva higa kaliva yadi abaveyao Yaubada matane giseusena be yadi koyona ginayawelina fa'ina. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna sa'eyana sa'eyana adi vehimeya au hidede amine.

Kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna kaliva agaidiya gitubuyemu-ma gakowakowa gihalamanena fa'ina, badi fanifanidiyao koyona againe hibe'u-ma gina'itadi amine, ginanuwanuwa ginagayo, “Ka'i kadu iya tamo tova badi amine ganabe'u.” Ada au hidedemi bana mena gakowakowa gi'ayaunena fa'ina anafaiweya bona bikabikana amine ginakivetuvetunudi.

Tamo tova bana gigakowakowa be koyona againe gibe'u fa'ina, gilubodana be tauna yana koyona fa'ina yana abaveyao Yaubada matane gidaseusena. Keke yana yo'ogaga yadi koyona fa'ina yadi abaveyao gidaseuseni, au kadu tauna yana koyona fa'ina giseusena.

Keke tamo hakwadi tauna gidakilakahini-yo abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna ana maka gidavaini. Bana Yaubada Tauna kaliva givegidena amine ana vehimeya givelena. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada kaliva sa'eyana ana egana Eloni givegidena be abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna yana faisewa give'abina amine, meda anafaiweya tova hinafane kaliva tulina tulina mena faisewai-nadi give'abidi.
O'eni Natuku.
Adamoya gahawavenatune.
Au hidede amine Yaubada Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya Natuna fa'ine gigahe.
Kadu yana gahe sa'eyana ma gigayo,
Abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka
O againiya ginaduva-vagata.
Tuwai-mo'ena Abelahamo yana toveya
Melikisedeki mena makai-nadi
gi'abina amine, kadu O una'abina.
Au O'eni bana yana yo'o kalivana.
Bana Yaubada Natuna nonogana tagiya aulolo ginuhagana. Mena yana tagiya yana aulolo againe bona'abi ana halamana givaina.

Bona'abi againe keke tamo gidakali'uho au ana vehimeya Yaubada givelena-ma fa'ina yana halamana gitubuga-mo'a. Hidedemi yana halamana ahe gitubuga-mo'a yo ide gaveyao bonana ka'abi'abina, medema ada kibababala ana eda gifaisewana be Yaubada buye kanamiyamiya-vagata.
Ada kibababala ana eda gifaisewana fa'ina Yaubada Tauna Bana givewagana gigayo, “O'eni abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabu, higa Melikisedeki yana yo'o kalivana.”

Nuwanuwaku nuwanuwa moya'aina Keliso Melikisedeki ana hilafa fa'ina ganalukahihiyena. Tu tagami wa'ivekuluna be Yaubada yana nuwanuwa keke agaimiya gidamadumahalini fa'ina, abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna ana vehimeya Keliso givaina-ma fa'ina keke ihayana ganakivetuvetunumi.

Wa'itami, tuwaina wavebutu Yesu againe wavetumagana, ada vaita adamoya yana nuwanuwa wadahalamane-hagihagiyeni yo fanifanidiyao wadavehawaledi. Tu omi aimo fanifanimiyao. Mene gavadi-yo Yaubada bonana inubana wavenuwauluyeni-yo tamo hakwadi ginavehawale-havagilemi? Omi vaita we'owe'o amine. Keke Yaubada wadahalamane-hagihagiyeni fa'ina, huhu fwefweya hihuhuna-ma meda anafaiweya Yaubada bonana ana nuwanuwa ihayanaga hinavehawalemi. Keke a'a o'olina lakahidiyao hi'au'ana-ma amine Yaubada bonana ana nuwanuwa vitana hinavehawalemi, fa'ina keke amifata.
Gaveyao huhugaga againe himimiyami, medema adi egana fwefweya. Ada fwefweya dewa yamumuna o dewa koyona aimo keke hidahalamaneni amine, vehawala dewa tunutunugina fa'ina keke amifata.

Atu a'a o'olina ma badi lakahidiyao adiga. Tovetumagana gaveyao Yaubada bonana ana halamana againe hive'asevatu, medema nuwave'uve'u fa'ina taudiyao hivehawaledi lauva tunugina yo nuwanuwa yamumuna kadu koyona adifaiweya hinaluve'uve'una.

Omi aimo fwefweya amine Yaubada bonana inubanaga againe wamimiyami fa'ina, nuwanuwaku hinafana kadu gina ana abalauyabu fa'ina ganakivetuvetunumi be moya'aida Yaubada bonana ana halamana matatabuna againe kanave'asevatu. Keke Keliso yana vehawala inubanaga kananuwenuweni. Manuwa ivaguna kayogona againe, keke tova moya'aina ogola kadakikivemididini kadaya'iya'ini, keke-mo'a. Meda anafaiweya keke tova moya'aina vehawala tuwaina kamidivetumagana ana toveya kanogalina-ma kanalulumamaleni kanagayo, “Wananuwavilami be higa keke yami dewa koyona fa'ina wana'alika, ada Yaubada againe wanavetumagana.” Laumamala tuwaina inubanaga fa'ina wana'ilova.

Meda anafaiweya keke tova moya'aina vehawala tuwaina kanalulumamaleni, higa bafitaiso fa'ina, ada nima ana sewadi kaliva u'udiya fa'ina, ada to'alika yadi mididi-havagi fa'ina ada vedewayauga be kaliva adi laufata againe tokoyona hina'alika-vagata ma fa'ina.
Ada Yaubada ginahawahegeku amine vehawala tuwaina gananuyabuyabuna be vehawala Keliso ana halamana againe kanave'asevatu fa'ina ganalukahihi.

Tu todibumuhiga kadu tovekwaulauga-mo'a adi abaluvefota sa'eyana ganalukahihiyena. Ka'i tova moya'aina wehi ginalugalugaga be babi ginakiveduvedubani-yo a'a tulina tulina ginakabu, au tofaha mena yadi babi yamumuna againe a'a tulina tulina adiga fa'ina hinanuhagana. Meda anafaiweya badi Yaubada ana halamana hi'ita'itave'avina-ma guwadi ka'itana ada Yaubada yana nuwakabubu hinunuhagana.

Tu badi Yaubada hivekwaulauge-mo'ena ma vaita babi koyona amine. Ka'i wehi ginalugalugaga tu aboda yogogaga faha againe ginakabu, medema kaliva hinakilowena ada ana ita ma vaita alatabutabu gidanuhagani. Ada au faha hinatuna be gina'alahi-'owona ada ginakoyo-vagata.
Siule tobohiyakweyao, tovekwaulauga-mo'a fa'idiya hidede amine gagahe tu omi gahalamanemi higa Yaubada ana halamana wa'ita'itave'avina be kibababala ana eda amine wananauna.

Yaubada fa'ina wafaisewa kadu yami nuwanuwa Bana againe wasena. Tuwaina tobohiyamiyao Yaubada yana yo'ogaga agaidiya wavelugadi kadu tova adamoya aimo waveluvelugadi, ada mena yami veluga againe yami nuwanuwa Yaubada againe waseseyemaunena. Bana Yaubada kaliva tunutunugina fa'ina, mena yami hawahega Bana fa'ine keke ginavenuwauluyeni, au ami laufata ginavelemi.

Yaubada fa'ina wahawahegemi ada nuwanuwaku lakahina moya'aimiyao sa'eyana sa'eyana yami hawahega wananunauwena wananunauwena tu tova ginalauyabu be higa gavadi Yaubada omi fa'imiya ginagani-ma walulubodena, medema matatabuna wananuhagana.

Keke nuwanuwaku dibumi ginatoyoga. Nuwanuwaku badi yadi wavetumagana yadi wa'atuvefa'ila Yaubada againe himiyamiyave'avina-ma wanave'u'uledi, ada hidede amine gavadi yamumuna fa'ina Yaubada giwonadabadaba-ma badi hinuhagana amine kadu omi wananuhagana.
Wona velemona gananuwakabubuye ada a unumamomo hinamoya'ai. Iya Yaubada gagahe.
Hidede amine Yaubada giwonadabadaba ada Abelahamo yana wa'atuvefa'ila gibodaboda-yo gavaimi Yaubada giwonadabadaba, medemi ginuhagana.

Ka'i kaliva nuwanuwadi hinawonadabadaba, kaliva sa'eyana ana egana hinayakahina higa Yaubada, fa'ina Bana ana egana lakahi-mo'ena. Kaliva lakahi-mo'ena ana egana hiyakahina be higa moya'aidi hinahalamanena yadi gahe au velemo'ena, ada kadu keke tamo hakwadi yadi gahe anafaiweya ginavekwageyeni.

Yaubada yana leme fa'ina giwonadabadaba, ada nuwanuwana badi yana wonadabadaba guwana hinanuhagana amanadi hinahalamanena yana gahe au velemo'ena, keke-mo'a ginayawelini. Medema fa'ina giwonadabadaba againe Tauna ana egana kikaiwabu-mo'ena giyakahina.

E, Yaubada yana wonadabadaba gisena kadu Tauna ana egana ana aiyakata gisena. Mena gaitoma luhei keke-mo'a ginayawelidi, ada mena Tauna ana egana ana aiyakata kadu yana wonadabadaba againe kahalamanena Yaubada keke-mo'a ginafwaya. Yaubada yana gahe toyogina ide agaideya hidede amine gisena fa'ina, ide ka'ota be Yaubada againe kaveu amanadi adafaiweya kana'asevatu toyogina, be gavaimi Yaubada yana leme fa'ina giwonadabadaba ada kalulauboda, medema kanakive'avina.

Mena Yaubada yana leme fa'ina giwonadabadaba ada ide kalulauboda-ma againe ase'aseda giluluve'avina. Mena ase'aseda ana abaluve'avina toyogina, keke vaita gina'akakini fa'ina Yaubada yana leme giwonadabedabena-ma keke kanalubode-wayogeni. Ada waka ana lomu lai againe hihegena be gikive'avina amine, ase'aseda ana abaluve'avina Yaubada yana abamiyami againe kahegena be gikive'avina. Hidei babiya abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna kaleko abaseboda gilauwaina be Yaubada yana abamiyami Vetawana Tabu-mo'a againe giluku amine, Bana Yesu Yaubada yana abamiyami lobameya againe giluku be ginalemeda, Bana wai ginagona tu ide wai kanamulina. Bana gimidiluku ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna ana maka givai-vagahina. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Melikisedeki mena makai-nadi gi'abina amine, tova adamoya Yesu gi'abi'abi-vagahina.

Ada Abelahamo lokoloko moya'aina gaviya againe giyabwana-ma bo'u teni amine gisedakana, ada bo'u sa'eyana Melikisedeki givelena. Tu Melikisedeki ana egana ana kaivila fa'ina kananuwanuwa. Nagona bana higa yegayegana ana kini. Ada kadu melala ana egana Salema ana kaivila ma niwalova. Bana Melikisedeki Salema ana tovehimeya fa'ina, kadu hivewagana niwalova ana kini. Ana egana luhei ana nuwanuwa au hidede amine.

Kadu tamana hinana adi egana Veyao Tuwaina ana buki keke gidayakahini, ada gaveyao bana bwaneneneyao ma kadu keke gidayakahidi. Yana tubuga kadu yana alika ana aituha keke gidayakahini. Au bana Melikisedeki anafaiweya Yaubada Natuna tuwai-lokalokana gimiyamiya-vagata amanadi. Ada Bana Yaubada Natuna abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka gi'abi'abi-vagahina amine, meda anafaiweya Melikisedeki makai-nadi gi'abi-vagahina.
Wa'ita, bana Melikisedeki kaliva kikaiwabuna. Fa'ina yada kaliva lakahina Abelahamo, higa bwaneneda nagona, yana yabwana bo'u teni amine gisedakana be bo'u sa'eyana givelena.

Ada Abelahamo gaisena sa'eyana muliya gitubuyemu-ma ana egana Livai wananuwenuwena. Livai bwaneneneyao abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka hivaina, ada Yaubada givehimeya be higa tobohiyadiyao agaidiya yadi gaitoma hivaivaina. Badi tobohiyadiyao kadu Abelahamo ana yo'o agaidiya hitubuyemu, au adi yo'o sa'eyana higa miIsileli. Tobohiyadiyao yadi faha o yadi lokoloko bo'u teni amine hisesedakana tu Livai bwaneneneyao bo'u sa'eyana hivaivaina. Tobohiyadiyao nonogana bo'u sa'eyana vaita takesi amine hivaivaina.

Bana Melikisedeki ma keke badi Abelahamo Livai yadi yo'o agaidiya gidatubuyemu. Atu Abelahamo yana lokoloko ana bo'u sa'eyana givaina ada gigahena gigayo, “Abelahamo, o againiya gagahe velemo'ena Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye.” Hidede amine bana kaliva kikaiwabuna gigahe. Bana Abelahamo againe Yaubada yana leme fa'ina giwonadabadaba tu Melikisedeki Abelahamo yana lokoloko ana bo'u sa'eyana givaina ada gigahenuwakabubuyena.

Hidede amine gigahenuwakabubuyena ada ide kahalamanena bana togahenuwakabubu yana gahenuwakabubu ana tonogala gikaiwabuhegena. Bwaneneda Abelahamo kikaiwabuna tu Melikisedeki gigahenuwakabubuyena fa'ina, bana kaliva kikaiwabu-mo'ena.

Kadu'e badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa Livai againe hitubuyemu ada kaliva yadi lokoloko ana bo'u teni againe bo'u sa'eyana hivaivaina-ma hi'ali'alika. Bana Melikisedeki ma Abelahamo yana lokoloko ana bo'u teni againe bo'u sa'eyana givaina-ma wayawaina gimimiyami Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe amine.

Ada kadu Melikisedeki Abelahamo edeya gimaduhagana be yana yabwana ana bo'u teni againe bo'u sa'eyana givelena ana toveya, bana Livai aimo gaisena Abelahamo hagaline gidauda, aimo keke gidatubuga. E, Livai aimo Abelahamo hagaline gidauda fa'ina, adafaiweya kanagahe vaita Melikisedeki bo'u sa'eyana Abelahamo againe givaina fa'ina, kadu bana Livai againe givaina. Livai ana yo'o higa badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa tobohiyadiyao agaidiya bo'u sa'eyana hivaivaina, atu Melikisedeki vaita Livai againe gidavaini. Hidede amine Melikisedeki Livai againe givaina fa'ina, kahalamanena bana abaveyao ana tofaisewa Melikisedeki badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa Livai ana yo'o agaidiya gikaiwabuhegedi.

Tu Livai ana yo'o kalivai-dina abaveyao ana tofaisewa yadi faisewa hi'abina. Vehimeya tuwaina inubana ma badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka againe giyemu be kaliva hiveledi. Ka'i abaveyao ana tofaisewa Livai ana yo'o agaidiya yadi faisewa againe kaliva moya'aida hidakiveyeveyegada be Yaubada buye kadaveyao-vagata digo, kadu abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina keke ada lauboda. Tu keke kadaveyao-vagata fa'ina, abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina a gilakayemu, ada keke Livai bwanenena ana egana Eloni ana maka amine gidavaini, au Melikisedeki ana maka tulina amine givaina.
Yaubada abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina gisena fa'ina, gilubodana be kadu vehimeya tulina gidasena.

Tuwaina vehimeya nagona againe Livai ana yo'o kalivai-dina abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka hivaina, ada Mosese Yuda ana yo'o kalivai-dina fa'idiya keke tamo gidagahe higa vaita abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka hina'abini-yo Yaubada yana atudidigeya abaveyao hinamunudi, keke-mo'a. Atu ide ahe kahalamanena mena abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina Bana yada Kaiwabu Yesu ma keke Livai ana yo'o kalivana, au Yuda ana yo'o agaidiya gitubuyemu. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina yo'o tulina kalivana fa'ina, Yaubada vehimeya tulina giseyemaunena.
Tu abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina Melikisedeki amine ahe gilakayemu. Fa'ina yaku gahe abaveyao ana tofaisewa tulina kadu vehimeya tulina fa'ina a gimahali-mo'ena.

Bana Yesu ahe gilakayemu ada abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka givaina. Mena makai-nadi inubana ma keke vaita Bana Yesu Livai ana yo'o kalivana yo higa abaveyao ana tofaisewa yadi faisewa gina'abini, keke. Mena makai-nadi givaina-ma inubana yawai-vagahina yana faiwala againe gimimiyami, ada keke-mo'a gina'alika. E, yawai-vagahina yana faiwala againe gimimiyami fa'ina abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka givaina, Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka
O againiya ginaduva-vagata.
Tuwai-mo'ena Abelahamo yana toveya
Melikisedeki mena makai-nadi
gi'abina amine, kadu O una'abina.
Au O'eni bana yana yo'o kalivana.
O'eni abaveyao ana tofaisewa
ana maka una'abi'abi-vagahina.
Iya Yaubada hidede amine gawonadabadaba
ada yaku gahe keke-mo'a ganayawelini.
Kadu badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa Livai ana yo'o agaidiya moya'ai-mo'edi, fa'ina hi'ali'alika tu adi hilafa himidimidi.
Bana Yesu ma gimiyamiya-vagata fa'ina, abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka gi'abi-vagahina, ana hilafa keke.

Bana gimiyamiya-vagata be ide fa'ideya Yaubada matane give'ove'o'ola toyogina fa'ina, ide gaveyao Yesu ana eganeya Yaubada liline kayemu, medema anafaiweya ginakibababale-mo'eda be tova moya'aina gina'ita'itave'avida.

Kadu Bana'e keke mali abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabudiyao Livai ana yo'o agaidiya amine. Badi'iyao ma tova moya'aina abaveyao hififaisewana. Nagona taudiyao yadi koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina yadi abaveyao hiseusena, tu mulina kaliva moya'aidi yadi koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina hiseusena. Tu Bana Yesu ma keke gidahuluva badi amine. Bana'e keke Tauna fa'ine abaveyao gidafaisewani, au ide tokoyona fa'ideya gifaisewana. Kadu keke tova moya'aina abaveyao gidafifaisewani, au tova sa'eyanaga Tauna wowona ana hawahega againe abaveyao gifaisewa-vagahina, ada mena abaveyao moya'aida yada koyona ana aiyawela anafata.

Mosese yana vehimeya ana huluva ma kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana abaveyao ana tofaisewa ana maka hivaivaina, ana hilafa ana hilafa amine. Badi tomiyababi kowakowadiyao. Mosese yana vehimeya lauva tunugina gidauda tu Yaubada Tauna ana egana giyakahina be yana wonadabadaba againe Natuna givegidena be abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna ana maka gina'abi-vagahina. Badi tomiyababi ma kowakowadiyao yadi wakoyona tu Bana Yaubada Natuna ma Toyegayegana-mo'a, ada yana halamana veyao-vagata ana faisewa fa'ina gitubuga-mo'a.

Kadu'e abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna sa'eyana sa'eyana adi vehimeya gidadauda, higa kaliva yadi abahawahega tulina tulina kadu kevakeva higa kaliva yadi abaveyao Yaubada matane hiseusena be yadi koyona ginayawelina fa'ina. Ada au gilubodana be yada abaveyao ana tofaisewa tamo gavadi yana abahawahega Yaubada againe ginasena, higa Tauna wowona.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena Mosese badi Livai yana yo'o kalivai-dina adi vehimeya giveledi, higa vaita abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka hida'abi'abini-yo abaveyao tulina tulina Yaubada matane hidaseuseni. Badi hiseusena fa'ina, ka'i Yesu babiya gidamiyami digo, Bana'e keke abaveyao ana tofaisewa adi maka gida'abini, fa'ina Bana keke Livai yana yo'o kalivana.

Boi tuwaina Mosese oya Sainai gilaka be Yaubada buye hilukahihi. Hilulukahihi tu vaita avayauna amine Yaubada yana manuwa lobameya gidadauda-ma gi'itana. Muliya falai lakahina Yaubada yana abamiya hidakivemididina ma Yaubada Mosese gikivetuvetununa gigayo, “Unogali! Aba'ita boi oyeya gavehawale amine yaku abamiya ana gaitoma moya'aina medemi wanabubuna.” Ada au manuwa hikivemididina, ada mena manuwai-nadi ma manuwa lobameya gidadauda-ma anununa amine. Keke manuwa-mo'ena au anununaga. Ada badi Livai yana yo'o kalivai-dina manuwa lobameya anununa babiya medede againe hififaisewa.

Atu Bana Yesu ma ana vehimeya abaveyao ana tofaisewa fa'ina givaina-ma badi Livai yana yo'o kalivai-dina adi vehimeya gitubuhegena. Meda anafaiweya Yesu Yaubada ide'eyao adahinafeya gimidi-yo giulayagiyagilida be veyao gi'ihagihagiyena ada veyao-nadi veyao tuwaina gitubuhegena, fa'ina veyao ivaguna ana wonadabadaba Yaubada Yesu awane giyakahina-ma, veyao tuwaina ana wonadabadaba Mosese awane giyakahina-ma gitubuhegena.

Veyao tuwaina ma keke wa'agevavana, fa'ina kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya keke hida'itave'avini. Ka'i veyao tuwaina againe kaliva faiwala hidavaini-yo Yaubada bonana hida'abina digo, kadu Yaubada veyao anavelu keke gidaseni-yo veyao nagona gidatubutagoni.
Badi bwanenedeyao yadi dewa keke yegeyegana Yaubada matane fa'ina gigahedi gigayo,
Iya Kaiwabu gagahe,
Aituha gi'ela'ela be
veyao ivaguna ganasena
badi miIsileli higa miYuda agaidiya.
Veyao ivaguna keke veyao tuwaina
bwanenediyao agaidiya gasena-ma amine.
Boi tuwai-mo'ena bwanenediyao
Idifita againe gana gavega'auledi ana toveya,
yaku veyao agaidiya gasena.
Tu yaku veyao keke hida'itave'avini,
fa'ina gavekwaulaugedi.
Hidedemi Iya Kaiwabu gagahe.
Kadu veyao ivaguna fa'ina Kaiwabu gigahe,
Tova tuwaina ginahavaini-yo
yaku veyao miIsileli adi yo'o agaidiya
hidede amine ganasena, higa
yaku vehimeya nuwadiya ganasena,
yaku kivetunu ase'asediya gana'etoladina.
Iya yadi Yaubada ganamiyami,
tu badi yaku yo'o hinamiyami.
Kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana
keke tawaneyao o taineyao
aku halamana fa'ina ginavehawaledi,
Gavadi-yo keke ginavehawaledi?
Me kaliva lakahina kadu kwamana kabisona
au moya'aidi hinahalamane-mo'eku.
Gavaimi-yo Iya yadi Yaubada hinahalamaneku?
Badi tokoyona nonogana ganahinekalikaliyedi
ada yadi koyona ganayawelina be
keke kadu gananuwa-nunauyeni.
Hidede amine Iya Kaiwabu gagahe.

Mena yana veyao givewagana veyao ivaguna fa'ina, yana veyao nagona gikivetuwaina ada ana vehimeya gihavaina be gisena. Ada gavadi gavadi tuwaina, medema ana faiwala havahavaina be tova kabisona ginayawowola.
Tu veyao nagona ana vehimeya Yaubada ana tafalolo fa'ina gidauda, kadu manuwa-tafalolo tomiyababi hibubudi-ma gidauda.

Falai lakahina Yaubada yana abamiya hikivemididina, ana vetawana luhei. Vetawana nagona againe lamufa noya'aina seveni, kadu beledi hawahawatana ana tolama buye gidauda. Mena vetawana hivewagana Vetawana Tabu.
Vetawana anavelu ma vetawana nagona wamuline gidauda, ada ana abaluku againe kaleko vewabana abaseboda fa'ina hivekukena. Vetawanai-nadi hivewagana Vetawana Tabu-mo'a.

Vetawana Tabu-mo'a hinagene tolama sa'eyana gidauda, gola againe hibubuna ada tolama tabone vanedimodimo ana egana inisenisi Yaubada ana hawadavadava fa'ina hikabuna. Kadu'e bokesi gola againe hikevana-ma gidauda, medema hivewagana Yaubada yana veyao ana bokesi, fa'ina bokesi-nadi hinagene kuga beyabeyadi luhei againe Mosese Yaubada yana veyao ana vehimeya teni gi'etoladidi-ma hidauda. Kadu nau'a gola againe hibubuna-ma bokesiya gidauda, ada nau'a hinagene a'a ana egana mana boi tuwaina lobameya gihobuhobu be bwanenedeyao hi'au'ana-ma a'ai-nadi gidauda. Kadu Eloni yana aiwala gi'akukuwana-ma buye gidauda.

Bokesi getane lobama ana kaliva luhei ofadi tunugina hikilumina, fafaline kadu fafaline. Hivewagadi selubimu, ada badi Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina ana iya'iyaya higa vaita Yaubada Tauna bokesi ana lubu againe gidavetoga. Mena lubu ma abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna yomuyomu dayagidi againe gikiveduvedubana be higa Yaubada kaliva yadi koyona ginayawelina. Ada badi selubimu mena Yaubada yana abavetoga againe koyona gi'i'iyawela-ma abavetogai-nadi ofadiya hiluveyavavana. Atu tova adamoya mena gaitomai-dina ana nuwanuwa kabi'ona kabi'ona keke amafaiweya analukahihiyeni.

Atu abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna anakaibe vetawana hinagene-mo'ane gilukuluku, ada aiyeta sa'eyanaga malamala sa'eyana sa'eyana againe giluku. Kadu keke makagekagena gidaluku, au yomuyomu dayagidi ginauwena be Yaubada yana abavetoga giluveduvedubana, higa tauna yana koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina kadu manuwafo yadi koyona hifaisewafanina ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina. Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna gilukuluku tu kaliva-kawowo ma keke.

Mena Vetawana Tabu-mo'a ana hawata lakahina againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina gikivetuvetunuda higa vaita abaluku Vetawana Tabu-mo'a againe aimo falifalina. Vetawana manuwa wamagigine aimo gidauda againe, Vetawana Tabu-mo'a eda'awana gi'abodana ada kaliva-kawowo keke adifaiweya Yaubada againe hidaluku.

Manuwa-tafalolo tuwaina ana vetawana luhei tu abaluku Vetawana Tabu-mo'a againe falifalina au aba'ita ide kaliva hida aituhai-nadi kamimiyami-ma fa'ideya. Medema againe kahalamanena boi kaliva vita nuwafoudiya hi'ayaunena-ma keke gidahavaini. Gavadi-yo keke gidahavaini? Me tova moya'aina yadi abahawahega Yaubada ana hawadavadava fa'ina kadu yadi abaveyao yadi koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina Yaubada matane hiseusena, tu vita nuwafoudiya aimo hi'aya'ayaunena.

Yadi abahawahega kadu yadi abaveyao hi'ali'aliyena be higa tafalolo-vehimeya tulina tulina tuwai-mo'ena Mosese giveledi-ma hinadibumuhigena. Vehimeyai-dina ma a'a kevakeva fa'ina, bwai fa'ina, taudiyao adi kivebuta o yadi lokoloko ana ikolakola tafalolo-vehimeya amine fa'ina, au vehimeya hidevama wowodi ana ihagihagi fa'ina. Yaubada vehimeyai-dina wowodi ana ihagihagi fa'ina gisena be hinunauwena tu vehimeya ivaguna higa nuwahinagedi ana ihagihagi ana tova ginalakayemu, au mena tova tuwaina ana vehimeya ginahavaina.

Atu veyao ivaguna ana miya hagihagina we'a ahe giyemu, fa'ina Keliso Tauna ahe gilakayemu, ada Bana'e abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna veyao ivaguna ana miya hagihagina ahe giyemu be gi'ita'itave'avina-ma kalivai-nadi. Hidei babiya abaveyao ana tofaisewa manuwa-tafalolo kaliva hikivemididina-ma againe hilukuluku be hififaisewa. Tu Keliso ma keke manuwai-nadi againe gidaluku, au Yaubada yana abamiyami wesei lobameya giluku. Mena abamiyai-nadi kaliva keke hidakivemididini higa keke hida babi ana gaitoma, au lobameya gidadauda. Ada kadu abamiyai-nadi babi ana manuwa-tafalolo gikaiwabuhegena kadu ana nuwanuwa gitubuhege-mo'ena.

Bana Keliso Yaubada yana abamiyami againe giluku ana toveya, keke manugose o ka'i bulumakau natudi dayagidi gidanunauweni-yo abaveyao ginafaisewani fa'ina. Au tova sa'eyanaga Bana Tauna dayagina gimadu-yo Vetawana Tabu-mo'a higa wesei Yaubada matane-mo'ane giluku-vagata, ada medede amine ide yada dewa koyona fa'ina yogoyogonideyao kamiyami-ma gitutuvehobuda, e gitutuvehobu-vagahida.

Yomuyomu dayagidi againe kaliva wowodi ana yegayega Yaubada matane hivaina. Atu Keliso dayagina yomuyomu dayagidi gitubuhege-mo'ena, fa'ina Bana'e yana koyona keke-mo'a tu Alu'aluwa miyamiya-vagahina yana veluga againe Tauna wowona Yaubada againe gihawahegena be gi'alika. Ada Keliso dayagina keke wowodaga gidakiveyeveyegani, au nuwafouda gikiveyeveyegana. Yada dewa koyona fatana alika ma fa'ina vita nuwafoudeya ka'aya'ayaunena, atu Keliso dayagina mena vitai-nadi givaihegena be nuwafouda gikiveyeveyegani-yo Yaubada Tomiya-vagata againe kanavetofaisewa.

Yada dewa sa'eyana ma, kaliva sa'eyana yana lokolokofou fa'ina ginanuwanuwa ginagayo, “Iya gana'alika ana toveya gaveyao hinavaini?” Hidedemi ginanuwanuwa tu gaveyao ginavenuwadadanedi be yana lokolokofou hinavaina, medema adi egana fefe againe gina'etoladina. Bana kaliva aimo wayawaina ginamiyami ana toveya mena fefe-nadi keke hina'itani, keke-mo'a. Atu yawaina ginahavaina be moya'aidi bana velemo'ena gi'alika ma hinahalamanena againe, au fefe hinahawana be gavaimi gi'etoladini medemi yana lokoloko hinafolakena.

Mena abaluvefota amine ide Yaubada yana lokolokofou ada du'u keke adafaiweya kadamadunuhagani, au Yesu gi'alika-yo kanuhagana. Meda anafaiweya Yaubana yana veyao nagona fa'ina hihuluva. Yomuyomu hiluve'alikadi digo dayagidi gimadu be higa gavaimi Yaubada giwonadabadaba, medemi ginalakayemu velemo'ena.

Giluluveduvedubadi tu gigahegahe gigayo, “Hida dayaga ma Yaubada yana veyao omi agaimiya gisena-ma ana iya'iyaya, higa gavaimi giwonadabadaba medemi ginalakayemu velemo'ena kadu gavaimi givehimeyemi, amine wanahuluva velemo'ena.” Hidedemi Mosese gigahe.
Meda anafaiweya dayaga againe falai lakahina Yaubada yana abamiyami manuwai-nadi ana lokoloko-tafalolo moya'aina buye giluveduvedubana.

E, wona velemona vaita kadagahe dayaga againe gaitoma moya'aina hikiveyeveyegana buki-vehimeya gigahe amine. Ada dewa koyona fatana alika fa'ina, ka'i dayaga keke ginamadu digo kadu keke Yaubada kaliva yada koyona ginayawelini.

Hida kagahe tuwaina kaliva adi kiveyeveyega kadu manuwa-tafalolo ana lokoloko-tafalolo buye kaliva babiya hibubudi-ma ana kiveyeveyega ana vehimeya gidauda, higa yomuyomu hiluve'alikadi be dayagidi againe hikiveyeveyegadi. Mena gaitomai-dina abaluvefota higa vaita lobama ana gaitoma anunudi amine. Tu lobama ana gaitoma-mo'edi ma adi kiveyeveyega yomuyomu dayagidi keke anafata. Au Yesu dayagina yomuyomu dayagidi gitubuhege-mo'ena be againe ide tokoyona yada abaluku Yaubada yana abamiyami lobameya fa'ina gikiveyeveyegada.

Kaliva manuwa-tafalolo Yaubada yana abamiyami lobameya ma anununa hidei babiya hibubuna. Tu Keliso alikeya gimididi-havagi yo keke manuwai-nadi againe gidaluku. Au gilaka be lobama-mo'ena againe giluku ada medede againe ide ada veluga fa'ina Yaubada matane giyemu.

Abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna malamala sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya keke tauna dayagina au yomuyomu dayagidi ginunauwena be Vetawana Tabu-mo'a againe gilukuluku. Atu Keliso keke tova sa'eyana sa'eyana lobameya gidalukuluku-yo Tauna wowona abaveyao amine ginahawahawahegeni, keke.

Ka'i malamala sa'eyana sa'eyana Keliso Tauna wowona alika fa'ina gidahawahawahegena digo, kadu babi ana abave'inuba againe gidavebutu be tova hidevama gidanunauwena aulolo tagiya tova moya'aina gidanunuhagana. Tu keke medede amine gidahuluva. Au tova hidevama higa hida aituha tuwaina ana abalauyabu againe tova sa'eyanaga babiya gihobu'ela be higa Tauna wowona abaveyao amine gihawahege-vagahini yo yada koyona ginavaihegena.
Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada vehimeya gisena gigayo, “Tova sa'eyanaga kaliva moya'aidi hina'alika. Hina'alika-yo Iya ganavedewayaugidi.”

Meda anafaiweya tova sa'eyanaga Keliso Tauna wowona ana hawahega againe abaveyao gifaisewana be higa kaliva moya'aida yada koyona ginawahinauwena. Ada aimo tova anavelu ginahobu'ela. Keke koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina ginahobu'ela. Au ginahobu'ela be ide Bana fa'ine kalulauboda-ma abakibababala againe ginanauweda.

Ka'i abaveyao tohawadavadava nuwahinagedi velemo'ena gida'ihagihagiye-vagahidi digo, keke malamala sa'eyana sa'eyana againe hidayewayewadi be yadi koyona fa'ina yomuyomu hidaluluve'alikadi. Ka'i yomuyomu dayagidi tohawadavadava yadi koyona gidayaweli-vagahina digo, aimo keke vita nuwafoudiya hida'ayauneni.
Tu malamala sa'eyana sa'eyana againe abaveyao fa'ina yomuyomu hiluluve'alikadi be againe kaliva yadi koyona fa'ina nuwadi gitalafolena.
Fa'ina bulumakau kadu manugose dayagidi keke anafaiweya kaliva yadi koyona ginayawelini, keke-mo'a.
O'eni-ma keke nuwanuwa
kaliva yomuyomu hinaluluve'alikadi
be a abaveyao hinafifaisewani,
o ka'i a'a tulina tulina hina'aliyeni
be yadi abahawahega hinaseuseni.
O keke nuwanuwa
kaliva yomuyomu hinakabukabudi
be kevakeva gina'ala'ala-'owodi,
o ka'i yomuyomu dayagidi ginamadumadu
be higa vaita koyona ginayawelini.
Medema keke nuwa gidakiveyamumuni,
tu tomiyababi adi nuya uveleku
be Iya wowoku ana hawahega againe
O nuwa ginayamumu.
Hidedemi ya nuwanuwa fa'ina, gagayo,
Ho Yaubada, we'a gamimiyami
be ya nuwanuwa ganadibumuhigena,
buki-vehimeya againe Iya fa'ikuya
tuwaina hi'etoladina amine.
Hidedemi Keliso Yaubada againe gigahe.

Abaveyao tulina tulina Mosese yana vehimeya givehimeyedi. Hidede amine Yaubada givehimeyedi nonogana mena Keliso yana gahe gayakahina-ma gigayo, “O keke nuwanuwa kaliva yomuyomu hinaluluve'alikadi be dayagidi ginamadumadu o ka'i kevakeva-mo'edi ai gina'ala'ala-'owodi kadu yadi abahawahega hinaseuseni, ada medema againe keke nuwa gidayamumu.”

Hidedemi Keliso gigahe tu gigayo, “We'a gamimiyami be ya nuwanuwa ganadibumuhigena.” Au hidede amine abaveyao tulina tulina ana dewa gidabana be dewa ivaguna gisena higa Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ana dibumuhiga.

Yesu Keliso Tauna wowona gihawahegena be dayagina gimadu. Keke tova moya'aina gida'alika-havahavagi, au tova sa'eyanaga gi'alika be dayagina gimadu-vagata, ada medede amine Yaubada yana nuwanuwa gidibumuhigena fa'ina, Yaubada ide gikiveyeveyegada.

Tova tova abaveyao ana tofaisewa sa'eyana sa'eyana Yaubada yana manuweya himidimidi be adi vehimeya hififaisewana. Tova tova yomuyomu hiluluve'alikadi be dayagidi gimadumadu, atu mena abaveyao-dina koyona ana aiyawela fa'ina keke-mo'a adifata.

Bana Yesu Keliso ma tova sa'eyanaga Tauna gi'alika be dayagina gimadu-vagata, ada mena abaveyao-nadi koyona ana aiyawela fa'ina anafata-mo'a tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Yesu abaveyao gifaisewana gihavaina, gina Yaubada i'atagine givetogana.
Medede againe tova adamoya gibodaboda tu nibaineyao ageyafayafane Yaubada ginasedi.

Ada au abaveyao sa'eyanaga higa Tauna yana alika againe ahe gise-vagahida yegayega-mo'edeyao Yaubada matane, ide nuwahinagedeya gifififaisewa be higa yada dewa mahamahalinaga kanaseseyemaunena-ma kalivai-dana.
Tova tuwaina ginahavaini-yo yaku veyao
yaku kaliva agaidiya hidedemi ganasena,
higa yaku vehimeya ase'asediya ganasena,
yaku kivetuvetunu nuwadiya gana'etoladina.
Hidedemi Iya Kaiwabu gagahe.
Kadu Alu'aluwa Mahalina gigayo,
Yadi dewa koyona ganayawelina be
keke kadu gananuwa-nunauyeni.
Ada au Yaubada yada dewa koyona ahe giyawelina be givenuwauluyena fa'ina, keke gidalubodani be yomuyomu dayagidi ginamadu-yo higa koyona ginayawelini. Koyona ana aba'aiyawela ahe'i.

Tuwaina kaliva moya'aidi Vetawana Tabu-mo'a kaleko vewabana higa abaseboda muline keke adifaiweya hinaluku. Tu tova adamoya mena abaseboda ahe gi'ahaina be abaluku Yaubada againe gi'ayauna amine, Yesu vidona keloseya hihaina ada medema againe Bana Tauna abaluku ivaguna Yaubada againe giyauna. E, abaluku ivaguna kadu miyamiya-vagahina giyauna.
Kadu Yesu yada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna, ada ide tovetumagana Yaubada yana yo'o gi'ita'itave'avida.

Abaluku yauyaugina kadu yada abaveyao ana tofaisewa kikaiwabuna we'a gimimiyami fa'ina, Yaubada liline kanayemuyemu. Yesu dayagina ase'aseda gikolana be vita nuwafoudeya ka'ayaunena-ma givaihegena, ada gufa yegayegana againe wowoda gi'ihagihagiyeni-yo Yaubada matane kanayemuyemu. Keke kananuwanuwaluga, au yada wa'asehawahega kadu yada wavetumagana Bana matane kanayemuyemu.

Ada Yaubada gavaimi ada leme fa'ina giwonadabadaba be ide kalulubodena, medema fa'ina kanahawavemogatala ada kadu yada lulauboda kanakidonena. Yaubada yana wonadabadaba amine ginagugaiyena fa'ina, adafaiweya kanavetumaganena. Medema fa'ina yada lulauboda kanakidonena.
Kadu kanave'a'itanuwanuwa gavaiya'amine buye kanave'agahegahedona be higa nuwakabubu igibagiba tulina tulina agaidiya kanahawahegeda.

Tovetumagana tufoidi boi tafalolo againe hi'ela'ela-ma hi'ilova. Ide keke kana'ilova, au tova moya'aina tafalolo fa'ina kanavagavaga'auta. Keliso yana yewa'ela be vedewayauga ana tova giluluveda'ufo fa'ina, giluboda-mo'emi be wanavagavaga'auta be Keliso ana vetumagana fa'ina buye wanave'alulau'age.

Au gaitoma sa'eyanaga gidadauda, matauta. E, gavadi ide agaideya ginalakayemu-ma fa'ina kanamatautave'ine, higa Yaubada ginavedewayaugida be yada koyona ana laufata ginaveleda. Ide gaveyao Yaubada kavekwaulaugena, medema Yaubada yana ila'a vaita ai'ala'alata amine kananuhagana be kanabwavi.

Tuwaina ka'i kaliva sa'eyana Mosese yana vehimeya gidayawelina ada to'ita luhei o tohiye hida'awatalatalainena digo, tovedewayauga keke gidahinekalikaliyeni, au bana kalivai-nadi vehimeya ana aiyawela fa'ina gida'alika.

Mena kaliva Mosese yana vehimeya giyawelina-ma ana laufata lakahina, tu bana tovetumagana Yaubada Natuna givekwaulaugena-ma ana laufata wananuwenuwena aimo gavatubuga! Tova moya'aina dewa koyona againe gihawahawahegena fa'ina huluvai-nadi againe Yaubada Natuna givekwaulaugena, Yesu dayagina Yaubada yana veyao ana iya'iyaya be againe gikivemahamahalina-ma dayaginai-nadi gihawave'iyohoyohoyena, Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwadoga givetalaiyena-ma gida'ihawadamanena. Mena dewai-nadi fa'ina ana matahiwadi lakahi-mo'ena ginanuhagana.
Fa'ina Yaubada a kahalamanena, Bana gigahe gigayo,
Iya'eku kaliva adi matahiwadi ganaveledi.
Iya ganalaufata.
Kadu yana gahe sa'eyana ma gigayo,
Iya Kaiwabu yaku kaliva ganavedewayaugidi.
Ka'i Yaubada Natuna kanavekwaulaugena amine o ada matahiwadi Yaubada Tomiya-vagata nimane kananuhagana, ada medema fa'ina kanamatautave'ine be higa keke Natuna kanavekwaulaugeni.

Tu gavadi gavadi tova tuwaina agaimiya hilakayemu-ma wananuwa-nunauyena. Bana Yesu ana halamana fa'ina nuwami gimahalini-yo Yesu nibaineyao hivebutu hikivekoyomi, ada aulolo tagiya lakahina ana vediwe againe wa'atuvefa'ila.
Tamo tova yo'o matadiya hi'ihawadamanemi kadu hikivekoyomi. Tamo tova tobohiyamiyao hikivekoyodi tu badi lilidiya wamidi be wavelugadi.

Tufoidi Yesu hivetumaganena fa'ina deliya hisedi tu yami wahinekalikali wamadubodadi. Ada badi tokivekoyo hi'ela be yami lokoloko hidei babiya hilemami againe keke nuwami gidakoyo, au wagahe wagayo, “Ide yada lokoloko yamuyamumu-'owogina kadu miyamiya-vagahina wese lobameya gidadauda.” Ada au wavemwamwala.
Medema fa'ina yami asevatu keke wanahegeni. Au wana'atuvefa'ila be aimo ami laufata yamumuna Yaubada ginavelemi.
Atuvefa'ila gilubodami be higa Yaubada yana nuwanuwa wanadibumuhigeni-yo yana laufata hagihagina giwonadabedabemi-ma wananuhagana.
Wana'atuvefa'ila fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigahe gigayo,
Tova kabiso-mo'ena Bana'e ginahobu'ela
amanadi gina'ela. Keke ginavekwalu.
vetumagana againe hinamiyami.
Hai kaliva yana matauta fa'ina
yana vetumagana ginasevauyena
medema fa'ine keke nuwaku ginayamumu.
Hidedemi Yaubada gigahe.
Atu ide'eyao keke badi yadi vetumagana hisevauyeni-yo agolaufofola hinuhagana-ma kalivai-dina, au ide badi vetumagana againe hi'atuvefa'ila be kibababala hinuhagana-ma kalivai-dana.
Tuwai-mo'ena bwanenedeyao gaveyao Yaubada hivetumaganena toyogina, Yaubada badi yadi vetumagana fa'ina gihawaveyamumuyedi.

Yada vetumagana againe kahalamanena lobama be babi matatabuna Yaubada yana gahe againe gilakayemu. Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina ka'ita'itana-ma gibubudi tu gaitomai-dina i'ibubunidi keke tamo gavadi ka'itana-ma againe gidabubudi.

Ada ka'i keke yada wavetumagana, kadu keke-mo'a adafaiweya Yaubada nuwana kanakiveyamumuni. Hai kaliva nuwanuwana Yaubada matane ginayemuyemu, medema gilubodana be gidavetumagana vaita Yaubada gimiyamiya-vagata ada gaveyao Yaubada hilelelena, medema ginanuwakabubuyedi.

Yana wavetumagana fa'ina, babi Yaubada giwonadabedabena-ma againe vaita hawahawala amine gimiyami. Keke manuwa gidayogoni, au falai manugose kwafilidiya hibubuna-ma againe gimiyami be ginumiyamiyanana. Meda anafaiweya natuna Aisake kadu tubuna Yakobu falai againe himiyami, ada Yaubada babi-nadi fa'ina Abelahamo againe giwonadabadaba amine kadu badi agaidiya giwonadabadaba.

Abelahamo hawahawala amine falai againe gimiyami fa'ina keke gidanuwanuwa lakahina. Gilulauboda be abamiya miyamiya-vagahine ginaluku. Yaubada Tauna yana nuwanuwa amine mena abamiyai-nadi lobameya gikivemididina.

Ada au Sela hivehifuga. Moganedi Abelahamo givekaliva higa vaita keke anafaiweya kwamana gina'ivetubugini. Givekaliva nonogana bana againe bwaneneneyao moya'ai-mo'edi hitubuyemu. Muliya adi yo'o vaita ibadibadi lobameya amine, kadu vaita makama taliyeya keke adafaiweya kanakilagalagani-ma amine.

Tu badi Abelahamo ana unuma kalivai-dina aimo vetumagana againe himiyami tu hi'alika. Gavaimi Yaubada giwonadabedabedi, medemi aimo keke hidanuhagani tu yadi wavetumagana hi'alika. Keke hidanuhagani tu mena Yaubada yana wonadabadaba aimo lauveya giyemuyemu-ma nuwadiya hi'itana, ada medema fa'ina hivesiule. Ada taudiyao higahe vaita badi hawahawala amine hida babi againe hidanumiyamiyanana.
Kaliva medede amine higahe againe, au kahalamanena taudiyao yadi melala hilelelena be againe hinamiyamiya-vagata.
Ka'i melala hihegena-ma hidanuwa-nunauyena digo, kadu nuwanuwadi medede againe hidayewadi.

Atu melala hihegena-ma keke hidanuwa-nunauyeni, au nuwanuwadi mali melala yamumu-mo'ena higa yadi melala lobama againe hinamiyami. Ada au Yaubada kikaiwabu-mo'ena nonogana nuwanuwana Abelahamo ana unuma kalivai-dina fa'idiya Tauna givewagana gigayo, “Iya yadi Yaubada.” Medema fa'ina yadi melala lobameya ahe gikidewedewena.

Nuwahinagene ginuwanuwa higa vaita Yaubada kaliva alikeya anafaiweya ginasivemididina, ada au natuna gidaluve'alikana ma Yaubada gihawatana. Hidema ana nuwanuwa ma vaita Aisake gida'alika tu alikeya gidamididi-havagi be tamana againe gidayewa'ela.

Bana Yakobu yana wavetumagana fa'ina, gi'ali'alika tu Yosefa natuneyao adi'iselu gigahenuwakabubuyedi. Yana wavetumagana yana aiwaleya giliyaliyave'avina tu Yaubada gihahawadavadavana ada au gi'alika.

Bana Yosefa yana wavetumagana fa'ina, yana alika ana tova giyemu againe yana yo'o miIsileli agaidiya gigahe vaita tova mulina Yaubada ginavega'auledi be Idifita hinanuyabuyabuna. Kadu vehimeya tauna luluna fa'ina giveledi, higa vaita babi againe aimo hinana-ma hinavetauna.

Gigahe gigayo, “Ka'i Felo yana manuweya ganamiyami digo, akufaiweya hida babi ana gaitoma hagihagina gananuhagana be yaku wavemwamwala ganamiyami. Tu mena gaitomai-dina au havahavaina ada iya Yaubada yana yo'o kalivana fa'ina, keke nuwanuwaku Felo yana manuweya ganamiyami-yo Yaubada ganakiloweni. Au ganana Yaubada yana yo'o miIsileli agaidiya ganamiyami. Ka'i miIdifita miIsileli hikikivekoyodi amine iya hinakivekoyoku digo, hinakivekoyoku.”

Au hidede amine Mosese ginuwanuwa, fa'ina gihalamanena lokolokofou moya'aina miIdifita adi tokaiwabu yana manuweya anafaiweya ginavaina, tu medema gaitoma-kawowo bana matane. Gina miIsileli buye himiyami fa'ina, ihawadamana lakahina ginuhagana tova mulina Bana Keliso ginuhagana amine, tu medema gaitoma lakahina Mosese matane. Tova moya'aina Yaubada yana laufata hagihagina ginuwa-nunauyena fa'ina, Keliso higa Yaubada yana Tovegida aimo ginahobu'ela-ma fa'ine kaliva yadi ihawadamana againe gihawahegena.

Yana wavetumagana fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya lobama ana tovenuwa'ata yana Abamaduviviya fa'ina gidibumuhigena. MiIsileli givehimeyedi be sifi kabi'ona hiluve'alikana digo yadi manuwa ana wanafali ana luhega dayagina againe hikiveduvedubana, be higa lobama ana tovenuwa'ata mena iya'iyaya gina'ita-yo ginamaduviviyedi be keke adi tomo'ainagona ginaluve'alikadi badi miIdifita adi tomo'ainagona ginaluve'alikadi amine.

Badi vineYeliko kwamayoku yamayamadadadi ma adi egana Leyabi yadi wavetumagana fa'ina, keke badi miYeliko Yaubada hidibutoyogena-ma buye hida'alika. (MiIsileli Yeliko ana fafaliya hiyemu-yo kaliva adi'iselu hi'iveninisedi be hinaluyavaga.) Badi Leyabi mena tolauyavaga adi'iselu yadi manuweya hivega'auledi be hilugolegoledi fa'ina, badi kwamayoku-dina keke hida'alika.

Tu kaliva moya'aidi yadi wavetumagana kahihidi aimo gidadauda tu ka'i ganalukahihiyena digo, tova ginahavaina. Badi kalivai-dina adi egana ma Gidiyona, Beleki, Samisoni, Yefeta, Devida, Samuwela kadu Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina tulina tulina.

Badi yadi wavetumagana fa'ina, tufoidi nibaidiyao agaidiya hilulugaviya be hi'ivehamumudi, tufoidi nuwanuwa tunutunugina amine yadi yo'o hivehimeyedi, tufoidi gavaimi Yaubada giwonadabadaba medemi hinuhagana. Kadu tufoidi kevakeva manimaninidi adi egana laiyoni hi'ela vaita hinayovadi againe, Yaubada awadi gikibodana.

Tufoidi yadi wavetumagana fa'ina, nibaidiyao ai'ala'alata toyogine hihegedi tu Yaubada ai giluvekwe'una. Tufoidi nibaidiyao hi'ela be yadi feto againe hinaluve'alikadi tu Yaubada gilugolegoledi. Tufoidi kowakowadiyao tu Yaubada gifaiwalaveledi. Tufoidi gaviya againe hifaiwala-mo'a be mali yo'o yadi tolugaviya hiluvilidi. Vevine tufoidi yadi wavetumagana fa'ina, Yaubada yadi to'alika gisivemidididi be giveleyewedi.
Kadu tufoidi Yaubada againe hivetumagana fa'ina, nibaidiyao hihawavelaigedi ada himunukoyokoyodi, kadu bulava againe hiyogodi be deliya hihegedi.

Tufoidi yadi wavetumagana fa'ina hitutuve'alikadi, tufoidi sowa againe hibobolugadi, tufoidi feto againe hiluve'alikadi, tufoidi hiwavidi be yadi melala hihege-yo adi kaleko keke fa'ina sifi manugose kwafilidi hi'osena be hitogatogadadana, adiga keke, lokoloko keke, abadauda keke. Ada au tova moya'aina nibaidiyao hikikivekoyodi.

E, hiwavidi be babigaga againe kadu oyeya hinunudadana, vatuluma kadu gou againe hivemanuwa. Badi tomiyababi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma nuwadi gi'uyuyu-mo'a fa'ina, badi tovetumagana vaita iyohoyoho badi matadiya. Tovetumagana kaliva hagihagidiyao nonogana yadi yamumu mena kaliva koyodiyao hifaniyena be hiwavidi.

Tu Yaubada mena kalivai-dina moya'aidi yadi vetumagana fa'ina gihawaveyamumuyedi be valeyadi kanogalina. Yadi wavetumagana nonogana gaitoma hagihagi-mo'ena badi ide tovetumagana moya'aida Yaubada giwonadabedabeda-ma keke hidanuhagani.

Gavadi-yo keke hidanuhagani? Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada kadu ide fa'ideya ginuwanuwa be yana vevai yamumu-mo'ena gikidewedewena, higa adi ihagihagi-mo'a keke hinamadunuhagani. Au yana vevai ana tova ginalakayemu againe badi'iyao kadu ide'eyao se'eyaine gina'ihagihagiye-mo'eda be mahamahalideyao Yaubada buye kanamiyamiya-vagata.

Medede amine kananauna tu Yesu kana'itadone-vagahina. Bana Yesu yada vetumagana inubana kadu yana veluga againe yada vetumagana ginatubuga-mo'a. Alika kelose againe abawowomumu lakahina. Atu Yesu ginuwanuwa gigayo, “Aimo vemwamwala lakahina Yaubada matane gananuhagana fa'ina, kelose ana wowomumu keke gananuwenuweni.” Ada au kelose ana aulolo kadu ana wowomumu gi'atuvefa'ilena be Yaubada yana didiga'u'u i'atagine givetogana.

Yesu wananuwa-nunauyena. Kaliva koyodiyao yadi kivekoyo gavadawana tu gi'atuvefa'iledi. Ka'i kaliva omi hinakivekoyomi, Yesu yana atuvefa'ila wananuwa-nunauyena be higa keke wowomi ginalogilogi keke yami asevatu ginahavaini.

Yesu koyona ana dibutoyoga againe givedivediwe tu nibaineyao hiluve'alikana be dayagina gimadu. Omi wavedivediwe be higa koyona wanadibutoyogena, tu nibaimiyao dayagimi aimo keke hidavemaduhegehegeni.
Yaubada yana gahe sa'eyana nuwami ma'i gi'afolefolena o ka'i keke? Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe vaita omi natuneyao gidalu'ageyemi gigayo,
Natuku, Iya ya Kaiwabu matahiwadi
abakivenuwavilana fa'ina gavele ana toveya,
unavenogala, keke unamiya-kawowo.
Iya gadakeye ana toveya,
keke unawowologilogi.
medema kivenuwavilana fa'ina gatafidi.
Gaveyao gahawavenatunedi,
medema gavematahiwadiyedi.
Hidema fa'ina Iya yami Kaiwabu
omi natukweyao gakivenuwavilami.
Hidedemi Yaubada natuneyao adi kivenuwavilana fa'ina gigahe.
Yaubada natuneyao moya'aida gitafitafida be ginakivenuwavilada. Ka'i omi keke gidatafitafimi digo, kadu omi keke natuneyao velemo'ena, au vaita eda natuna tamana keke ma amine wamimiyami.
Kadu'e, tamadeyao ide kabi'odeyaoya hikivenuwavilada be kawowomumuyedi. Atu Bana Yaubada alu'aluwada Tamana fa'ina, yada wawowomumu lakahina bonana kana'abina be kanamiyami hagihagina.

Tamadeyao babiya tova kabisonaga ide kabi'odeyaoya gavaimi hinuwanuwa amine hitafitafida be hinakivenuwavilada. Tu Yaubada Tamada lobameya ada ihagihagi fa'ina gitafitafida be higa Bana kaliva mahamahalina amine ide mahamahalideyao kanamiyami.

Abakivenuwavilana kanuhagana ana toveya, ada ayauna keke hagihagina, keke kadavemwamwala. Tu muliya ka'i Tamada yana kivetuvetunu kanavenogalena, au guwana nuwanuwa yegayegana yada dewa againe kanaseseyemaunena ada yada wanuwayamumu kanamiyami.
Ma aulolo tagiya againe Tamada gikikivenuwavilami fa'ina, nimami gi'amehomehona-ma wanakivefaiwalana, tugami gi'a'akulakulana-ma wanakivetoyogina be wana'asevatu Yaubada yana eda againe wananauna.
E, eda tubuyamuyamumuna againe wananauna be gaveyao hinuwanuwaluga vaita agedi felafelana amine, medema agedi keke wanavebahini. Au yami dewa hina'ita-yo nuwadi ginavesa'eya be hinanauna yamumuna.

Yaubada yana nuwadoga givetalaiyena be higa adafaiweya kanadewadewa mahamahalina. Wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya ginakali'uho higa vaita Yaubada yana nuwadoga keke ginavivaini. Kadu wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya nuwanuwa golagolana walamina ginavegilili ada guwana ginayemu be moya'aidi agaidiya ginadamadamana.

Wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi gina'udo. Kadu wana'itave'avimi be keke tamo hakwadi agaimiya bana bwaneneda Iso amine Yaubada ginavekwaulaugeni. (Wa'ita, Iso yana koyona hidede amine. Bana tomo'ainagona fa'ina vaita tamana Aisake yana lokolokofou kadu Yaubada yana veyao ana wonadabadaba guwana higa yana kaiwabu bana ginavaina.) Tova sa'eyana Iso mafu gilau-mo'ena ada ana du'u ma bana taina yana a'aya gikimonevedamanena. Yaubada yana wonadabadaba keke gidanuwenuweni. Au yana'a ana tova sa'eyanaga ginuwenuwena ada hidedemi Yaubada givekwaulaugena.

Ada wahalamanena muliya nuwanuwana tamana ginagahenuwakabubuyena tu gigahena gigayo, “Auwe. Ahe taini gavelena.” Ada au tuwaina Yaubada givekwaulaugena fa'ina, keke gidavaini. Gitagitagi lakahina higa vaita yana vekwaulauga ginayawelina tu keke anafaiweya.

Hiulega agona lakahina kadu Yaubada agona lakahina hinogalina, ada hidedemi Bana agona hinogalina againe himatautave'ine Mosese higahena higayo, “Auwe. Keke nuwanuwama Yaubada agona ananogali-havagileni.”

Fa'ina Yaubada ahe gigahe gigayo, “Keke tamo hakwadi hida oya hawahawatana againe ginalaka. Ka'i ginalaka digo, wanatutuve'alikana. Ka'i kevakeva digo, au ai'adi wanatutuve'alikana.” Mena Yaubada yana hawata fa'ina ase'asedi gi'akolukoluna.
Kadu Mosese tauna gaitomai-dina matamatauhidi gi'itadi againe gigahe gigayo, “Yaku wamatauta gavetavetatava.”

Omi badi Keliso yana yo'o agaidiya himidiluku be adi egana lobama ana buki againe Yaubada gi'etoladina kalivai-dina lilidiya wayemu. Bana Yaubada kaliva moya'aidi adi tovedewayauga ma liline omi wayemu. Badi kaliva yegayegadiyao hi'alika be alu'aluwadi hagihagidi lobameya himimiyami kalivai-dina lilidiya wayemu.

Omi Yesu liline wayemu, Bana'e Yaubada ide'eyao adahinafeya gimidi-yo giulayagiyagilida be veyao ivaguna gi'ihagihagiyena, ada Bana dayagina veyao-nadi ana iya'iyaya. Boi tuwai-mo'ena bana Ebeli dayagina gimadu againe ana toluve'alika laufata Yaubada nimane givaina. Tu bana Yesu dayagina Ebeli dayagina ana nuwanuwa gitubuhegena, fa'ina Yesu dayagina gimadu againe ide tokoyona yada koyona ana aiyawela Yaubada nimane kavaina.

Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada agona oya Sainai againe gikova ana toveya, babi gili'uli'u. Tova adamoya giwonadabadaba gigayo, “Tova sa'eya-mo'ena babi ganali'uli'una tu keke babigaga au kadu lobama buye ganali'uli'una.”
Mena hifufu “tova sa'eya-mo'ena” ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Gaitoma moya'aina i'ibubunidi ginali'udi-yo hinayawowola be higa gavadi gavadi keke-mo'a anafaiweya ginali'uli'u-ma ginaduva-vagata.

Au hidede amine Yaubada gaitoma moya'aina ginali'uli'una tu ide yana melala keke-mo'a ginali'uli'u-yo ginayawowola-ma againe kanaluku be yana itave'avina againe kanamiyamiya-vagata fa'ina, kanavesiule ada au yada wawowomumu kadu yada wamatauta Yaubada kanahawadavadavana be hidedemi nuwana kanakiveyamumuna.

Yada Yaubada vaita ai'ala'alata amine. Ai'ala'alata gaitoma moya'aina gi'alayauyaulena amine, yada Yaubada gaitoma koyona moya'aina ginaluyaweli-'owona. Medema fa'ina yada wamatauta kanahawadavadavana.

Ka'i Keliso yana kaliva boi keke wada'itadi-ma mali melaleya hinatauya be hina'ela, au badi agaidiya nuwami ginanauna ada yami manuweya wanavega'auledi be wana'itave'avidi. Boi kaliva tufoidi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata vaita wakawaka amine hi'ela-ma yadi manuweya hivega'auledi be hi'itave'avidi. Hivaitana badi wakawaka ma kaliva-kawowo, tu muliya hihalamanena badi Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata.

Tu badi tobohiyamiyao deliya himimiyami-ma wananuwa-nunauyedi vaita omi badi buye yogoyogonimiyao wadamiyami. Meda badi nibaidiyao hikivekoyodi-ma wananuwa-nunauyedi vaita omi badi buye aulolo tagiya wadanuhagani.

Ka'i omi naginagimiyao, medema hagihagina. Tu omi kaliva vavinemiyao agaidiya wanamiyave'avina be keke mali vevine buye wanadauda. Omi vevine moganemiyao agaidiya wanamiyave'avina be keke mali kaliva agaidiya wananauna. Yaubada badi to'udo kadu yamayamadadadiyao matahiwadi ginaveledi.

Wana'itave'avimi be keke tova moya'aina mani nuwami ginavivaini. Gavadi gavadi agaimiya hidadauda, medema fa'idiya wananuwanuwa wanagayo, “Medema gaitomai-dina au akufata.” Au hidede amine keke mani wana'itanuwavaiyeni, fa'ina Yaubada ami itave'avina fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gigahe gigayo,
Keke-mo'a gananuyabuyabu.
Keke-mo'a ganahege.
Bana Kaiwabu aku toveluga,
keke ganamatauta.
Kaliva agaikuya gavaimi hinaga?
Keke ganamatausedi.

Badi ami tonagona boi Yaubada bonana agaimiya hilumamalena-ma wananuwa'udu'ududi. Yadi wavetumagana Yesu Keliso againe hiluluve'avina yadi alika ana maka. Au wananuwa-nunauyedi be yadi vetumagana wanave'uve'u'ulena.

Yesu Keliso au gimiyamiya-vagata ada keke tamo tova yana nuwanuwa tulina tulina. Au boi tuwaina gimiyami amine, meda tova adamoya gimimiyami kadu tova mulina ginamiyami tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu.

Badi abaveyao ana tofaisewa Mosese yana vehimeya himuliyena-ma yomuyomu kaliva yadi abaveyao hiluluve'alikadi tu kevakeva tufona hi'au'ana. Tu yomuyomu koyona ana aba'aiyawela fa'ina hiluluve'alikadi-ma keke hida'u'ani, au kevakeva hikabuna be gi'ala-'owona. Tu ide Yesu kamuliyena-ma keke kevakeva againe leme kadanuhagani. Au Yesu Tauna yana alika kelose againe yada koyona ana aiyawela kanuhagana, ada badi aimo yomuyomu yadi alika againe leme hilelelena-ma keke adifaiweya Yesu yana alika againe yadi koyona ana aiyawela hinanuhagani.
Meda anafaiweya Yesu abaga Yelusalema melala kwaune gina yana watagiya gi'alika be Tauna dayagine yana yo'ogaga gikiveyeveyegada.

Au hidede amine Yesu dayagina abaveyao tuwaina gitubutagona fa'ina, mena tafalolo tuwaina kananuyabuyabuna be Yesu ana tafalologaga againe kanadamana. Ka'i ide Yesu againe kaluluve'avina fa'ina kaliva ginakivekoyoda be wowomumu ginaveleda, au Yesu wowomumu giwahina amine ide kanawahina.
Hidei babiya melala againe kamimiyami-ma keke melala miyamiya-vagahina. Au melala miyamiya-vagahine aimo kanaluku melalai-nadi fa'ina kalulauboda.

Tova moya'aina nuwakabubu againe nuwami ginanauna be yami giba againe tobohiyamiyao wanaveluvelugadi. Ka'i medede amine wanahawahawahega, au vaita Bana'e wahawadavadavana ada mena yami hawahega fa'ina nuwana giyamumu.

Tu ime fa'imeya wanave'o'ola. Ime anuwave'avina higa vaita yegayegameyao Yaubada matane adamiyami be keke tamo vita nuwafoumeya ada'ayauneni, ada nuwanuwama tova moya'aina anadewadewa hagihagina fa'ina wanave'o'olema.
Nuwanuwaku lakahina iya fa'ikuya wanave'o'ola toyogina be higa omi agaimiya ganamaduyewa'ela.

Gave'o'ola be Yaubada nuwanuwa yamumuna tulina tulina againe ginakivetoyogimi be higa yana vehimeya wana'idibumuhigena. E, Yesu Keliso yana veluga againe nuwahinagemi gina'ihagihagiyena be gavaimi Bana matane gilubodana, medemi wanadewadewa. Ada Yesu Keliso ana egana kanakilakahina tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Kafoi tobohiyakweyao, agaimiya ganave'o'ola. Wada'atuvefa'ileku be yaku kivetuvetunu hida yami leta againe ga'etoladina-ma wadanogali-hagihagiyena. Fa'ina keke vaita leta tunugi-mo'ena gada'etoladini, keke.
Tu nuwanuwaku wanahalamanena tobohiyada Timoti deliya gihobu. Ka'i iya agaikuya ginamadu'ela digo, bana ginavebwa'uliyeku be ama'iselu omi agaimiya ana'ela.

Yama nuwakabubu ami tonagona moya'aidi agaidiya kadu Yaubada yana kaliva yana vevine mahamahalidiyao adi yo'o tulina tulina agaidiya. Badi tovetumagana fafali ana egana Itali kalivai-dina hilukafoiyemi.
Yaubada moya'aimi ginanuwadogemi.

Iya Yemesa Yaubada kadu Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana agetoga omi tovetumagana vaita hawahawala amine fafali tulina tulina agaidiya wamiyavehavehaila-ma ami vesiule! Higa omi miIsileli yada yo'o tuwelo kalivai-mina.

Keke wanagaluvaluva-yo ami vita agaidiya wanakivelivelilimi. Au wanahawahegemi be yami atuvefa'ila ginakabukabu tu nuwanuwa hagihagina tulina tulina agaidiya wanave'asevatu be wanamaga-mo'a, ada au keke tamo gavadi againe wanakali'uho.
Tu wanave'o'ola againe keke yami wavenuwana au yami wavetumagana wanave'o'ola. Wa'ita, hai kaliva givenuvenuwana, medema vaita lefo lehaga tabone bolimana gilululiyeliyena be gi'alu'alugena-ma amine.
Bana tonuwaluga, yana nuwanuwa nagona hidedemi muliya wadedemi giseusena, fa'ina bana kalivai-nadi keke anafaiweya gidanuwanuwa gidagayo, “Gavaimi gave'o'ola medemi Kaiwabu ginaveleku.”

Atu hai tovetumagana tu wakalivana yana walokoloko, medema gilubodana be yana giba vaita iyohoyoho Yaubada matane ma gihalamanena fa'ina ginagakahikahi. Fa'ina isisi'u ana falafalawasi gi'akukuwana amine, meda tova kabisona wakalivana ginayawowola.

Wa'ita, kauwana gilaka yana lukalalava lakahina againe isisi'u gikabuna be gibou, ana falafalawasi gi'akukuwana ada ana aiwaka gibwavi. Meda anafaiweya bana wakalivana aimo yana giba ana itave'avina againe gi'i'idamodamo tu ginabwavi.

Aladibidibi ginayemaunida ana toveya, keke gidalubodada be kanagayo, “Hima Yaubada gi'aladibidibiyeku.” Fa'ina koyona keke anafaiweya Yaubada gina'aladibidibiyeni-yo ginabe'u, kadu Yaubada keke tamo hakwadi gina'aladibidibiyeni.
Aladibidibi ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Hai kaliva tauna yana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana koyona againe ginataini-yo agena ginavebahina, medema ana egana aladibidibi.
Au yana nuwanuwa koyona ginavehifuga tu muliya dewa koyona ginavenatunena. Ada dewa koyona ginalakata meda ginavenatuna natudi ana egana alika.
Tobohiyanuwakweyao, keke wananuwanuwafani vaita Yaubada gida'aladibidibiyemi.

Bana Yaubada abaveluga moya'aina kadu gaitoma hagihagidiga ana Tovetala. Gaitomai-dina inubadi lobameya, ada Bana Yaubada lobama ana mahala adi To'aibubuna amanadi mena nuwakabubu tulina tulina givetalaiyena. Bana ana ita keke gidakivilani. Kauwana againe ai aiwa'udi malalauga lakahina tu uyadayada kabi'ona. Tu Yaubada keke aiwa'u amine. Yana mahalina keke kivilavilana, au ana ita'ita sa'eyana.

Yaubada nuwanuwana amine Bana bonana againe katubuga-havagi ada yawaida ivaguna bonai-nadi againe give'inuba. Bonai-nadi au nuwanuwa velemo'ena. Au hidedemi katubuvagu be higa yana aibubuna matatabuna agaidiya ide vaita bavagu hagihagi-mo'ena amine wai kanagona Bana matane.

Yaubada nuwanuwana dewa yegayegana fa'ina, nuwanuwa bwanebwanenena kadu dewa koyona tulina tulina gikabu-fa'ila ma wanavenikohiyedi, ada yami wanuwahobu Yaubada againe wanahawahegemi be bonana nuwamiya gifahana-ma wana'abina, bonai-nadi anafaiweya ginakibababalemi.

Hai kaliva Yaubada bonana ginogalina tu gavaimi gigahe-ma keke gidahuluvini, medema vaita kaliva kelasi againe anununa gida'itamata'idileni. Gi'ita-yo auhe'ama gina ada anununa gavaimi ana ita ma nuwana giulu.

Atu hai kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya againe gina'itadonadona kadu yana ita ginanunauwena be gavaimi gi'itana o ka'i ginogalina-ma keke nuwana ginaulu tu tova moya'aina gina'idibumuhigena, medema yana havivila moya'aina agaidiya Yaubada yana nuwakabubu gina'ayaunena. Mena Yaubada yana vehimeya hagihagi-mo'ena ada ana idibumuhiga againe ide kaliva yauyaugideyao ma ka'ayaunena.

Hai kaliva yana tafalolo mahamahali-mo'ena kadu keke ma'ita koyona Yaubada Tamada matane, medema yana huluva hidede amine ginaseyemaunena. Natu'aeda sikwasikwa yadi wa'ase'u'aulolo himimiyami-ma gina'itave'avidi, kadu tauna yana huluva gina'itave'avina be tomiyababi Yaubada hivenikohiyena-ma yadi dewa koyona keke bana againe ginadamana fa'ina.
Wa'ita, ka'i wakalivana ana wavaigau fatadi lakahina kadu ana wanimakwasi gola fatana lakahina yami manuwa-tafalolo againe ginaluku, kadu koyokoyo ana wavaigau koyona ginaluku, gavaimi wanahuluvidi?

Ka'i wakalivana yami wave'amohimohina wanagahena wanagayo, “Kumani, hidei abavetoga hagihagina, au uhiyoto.” Tu ka'i koyokoyo wanagahena wanagayo, “Mene umidi,” o ka'i “Hidei efe'efeya agekuya uhiyoto.” Ka'i mededemi wanahuluvidi, au adi ita againe ahe walagadi vaita yo'o luhei agaimiya hidamiyami, sa'eyana kikaiwabudiyao sa'eyana fanifanidiyao, kadu omi to'ailaga taumiyao wakilakahimi au hida yami inuba koyo-mo'ena.
Tu omi'iyao ma koyokoyo wa'ihawadamanedi. Gavaiyami? Mene gaveyao hikikivekoyomi-yo kotu againe hisimadumadugemi? Me kikaiwabudiyao.
Wona velemona badi kikaiwabudiyao mena kalivai-dina yami Kaiwabu hihawahawatagona, Bana'e ana egana kikaiwabuna omi wawahina amanadi.
Gilubodami be yami Kaiwabu yana vehimeya lakahina wana'itave'avi-mo'ena. Vehimeyai-nadi Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Tauni unuwakabubuye amine, tobohiya unanuwakabubuyena.
Atu ka'i kaliva adi ita againe walagadi tu keke wada'itadi leleleya digo, omi vehimeyai-nadi ahe wayawelina ada omi vaita vehimeya ana to'aiyawela yami wakoyona Yaubada matane.
Wa'ita, gava kaliva Yaubada yana vehimeya matatabudi gina'itave'avidi tu vehimeya sa'eyanaga againe ginakali'uho, medema ana wavita vaita vehimeya matatabudi gidayaweli-'owodi.

Ide kahalamanena vehimeya matatabuna kayaweli-'owona fa'ina Bana Yaubada gigahe gigayo, “Keke una'udo,” kadu Bana Kalivai-nadi gigahe gigayo, “Keke unaluve'alika.” Ka'i keke wada'udo tu waluve'alika, au ami egana vehimeya ana to'aiyawela.

Siule tobohiyakweyao, ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, “Iya Yaubada againe gavetumagana,” tu yana vetumagana keke igibagiba againe gidaseyemauneni, au hai ana yamumu? Keke. Ka'i mene yana vetumagana againe ana kibababala ginanuhagana? Keke, keke-mo'a!

Wa'ita, ka'i tobohiyami o noumi sa'eyana Yesu Keliso yana yo'o agaidiya ana kaleko keke fa'ina givekwavekwadudu o ka'i mafu gilaulauna tu omi wanagahena wanagayo, “Siule, Yaubada ginanuwakabubuye. Keke unavekwadudu au a'a una'a be una'ahiyauwa.” Ka'i hidedemi wanagahe tu keke wowona ana gaitoma againe wanavelugani, yami gahe gahegaga. Au hai ana yamumu? Keke.
Meda anafaiweya ka'i yami vetumagana vetumaganagaga tu keke igibagiba againe wadaseyemauneni, au yami vetumagana gaitoma-kawowo.

Tu tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, “Kaliva sa'eyana yana wavetumagana tu sa'eyana ma yana wa'igibagiba.” Ada iya ganabonalaufata ganagayo, “Ka'i keke kaliva agaidiya una'igibagiba, gavaiya'amine o ya wavetumagana velemo'ena unaseyemauneni? Tu iya'eku ma yaku vetumagana yaku igibagiba againe ganaseyemaunena.”

Wa'ita, omi wanuwanuwa vaita vetumaganagaga gilubodana be wagayo, “Bana Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a.” Au yamumuna tu'ena balauma koyodiyao meda Yaubada anakaibe'u-mo'a amine hivetumagana. Yaubada hivetumaganena tu keke yana nuwanuwa amine hidahawahegedi fa'ina yadi vetumagana yadi wamatauta buye hivetavetatava.
Siule kaliva kwavakwava! Gava tova-yo unahalamaneni vetumaganagaga tu keke igibagiba buye'i ma gaitoma-kawowo? Unogali, iya ganavehawale.

Nagona bwaneneda Abelahamo againe ganaluvefosena. Natuna Aisake Bana Yaubada againe gihawahegena higa abaveyao amine atudidigeya gidamununa fa'ina Yaubada Abelahamo ginuwenuwena vaita yegayegana Bana matane.
Ka'i mene nuwa a gimahalina? Bana yana wavetumagana kadu yana wa'igibagiba buye gififaisewa. Yana igibagiba againe yana vetumagana ana abalauyabu giseyemaunena.

E, Abelahamo yana igibagiba Aisake ana hawahega againe giseyemaunena. Ada gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda-ma mena Abelahamo yana igibagiba againe ahe gilakayemu velemo'ena. Gahe-nadi gigayo,
Abelahamo Yaubada givetumaganena ada yana vetumagana fa'ina Yaubada bana fa'ine gigahe gigayo, Bana kaliva yegayegana Iya matakuya. Ada au Yaubada Abelahamo givewagana ana kusebo.
Mema au wa'itana keke kaliva yada vetumaganagaga tu yada igibagiba buye'i fa'ina Yaubada giseda yegayegadeyao Bana matane.
Au mema wa'ita, kaliva wowonaga tu alu'aluwana keke, medema kaliva ali'alikana. Meda hai vetumaganagaga tu igibagiba keke, medema vetumagana ali'alikana.

Moya'aida yada dewa againe tova moya'aina katututumadumadu. Hai kaliva yana gahe againe keke-mo'a tamo koyona gidayakayakahini, medema kaliva hagihaginaga higa tauna ana hawata tulina tulina au anafata.

Kadu aba'ita sa'eyana ma waka. Waka lakahi-mo'ena ada bolimana toyogina waka gimaduhinehinena tu ana wayaisi kabi'ona againe tovemadu hami nuwanuwana ginana amine anafaiweya waka ginasiviviyena. Mena wayaisi kabi'o-mo'ena nonogana tovemadu waka lakahina anafaiweya ginavehimeyena.
Meda anafaiweya meyada talaida kabikabi'ona nonogana gaitoma moya'aina adi faisewa fa'ina anafaiweya giseselakalaka.
Wa'ita, ai yana alavenimoga kabikabi'ona nonogana anafaiweya ubula lakahina gina'alaveyamalelena.

Meda meyada vaita ai'ala'alata amine. Babi ana nuwanuwa koyona tulina tulina meyada gi'iveyemaunidi. Meyada awadeya gidadauda tu guwana koyona wowoda matatabuna againe gisedamadamanena. Mema ai'ala'alata vaita Setani gidakulivenimogini-yo meyada ana ai fifiwalana againe yada miyami matatabuna gikivekoyona.
Kaliva adifaiweya kevakeva tulina tulina hina'ivemanavidi. E, kevakeva walawala'a kadu manuga kadu gayagayagidiyao kadu igana ahe hi'ivemanavidi.
Atu meyada ma keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya gina'ivemanavini. Meyada gaitoma koyona, tova moya'aina gi'eto'etodadana be yana faisewa vaita tuva uyona amine.
Ma meyada againe yada Kaiwabu Tamada kahawadavadavana kadu meyada againe kaliva ka'alatabutabuyedi, badi Yaubada anununa amine gibubudi amanadi.
