Awada sa'eyana againe tu hawadavadava kadu alatabutabu giyemuyemu. Tobohiyakweyao, hidedema keke-mo'a gidalubodani.
Wa'ita, guya sa'eyana againe keke-mo'a gufa yamumuna kadu gufa lehalehagina ginaguwaleni.

Tobohiyakweyao, mani'utu keke anafaiweya nila ginaveguwayeni o maugaya waiwa ginaveguwayeni. Kadu guya lehalehagina keke anafaiweya gufa yamumuna ginaguwaleni. Meda anafaiweya keke-mo'a gidalubodani be hawadavadava kadu alatabutabu awada sa'eyana againe ginayemu.

Atu ka'i nuwahinagemiya waga'uma'uma wanuwakoyove'ine taumiyao ami egana ana kailakata fa'ina wanuwanuwa, au keke medema fa'ina wanaselakalaka kadu keke yami nuwanuwa koyodi agaidiya nuwanuwa velemo'ena wanahawavekemeni.
Nuwanuwai-dina omi wavewagadi nuwahuya. Tu nuwahuyai-nadi keke Yaubada againe gidave'inuba au medema babi ana nuwanuwa, kaliva dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa ada Setani againe give'inuba.
Ka'i kaliva ga'uma'uma kadu taudiyao adi egana ana kailakata ana nuwanuwa againe hihawahegedi, au ve'ataladabwadabwa kadu dewa koyona tulina tulina hi'iveyemaunidi.
Ada gaveyao kukuya hi'ita'itave'avina medema vaita veyao ana tofaha amine, ada aimo guwana hinayaudi ma dewa yegayegana.

Gaitoma tulina tulina nuwanuwami tu keke wadavaidi fa'ina waluve'alika. Mali kaliva yadi giba wa'ita'italuvadigena tu keke amifaiweya wanavaini fa'ina wavebutu wavekwavekwageya buye wave'amunumunuga. Keke Yaubada againe wadave'o'ola fa'ina gavadi yami nuwanuwa keke wadanuhagani.
Ada ka'i Yaubada againe wave'o'ola amine keke wadavaini, fa'ina yami wa'inuba tu koyona wave'o'ola be higa taumiyaogaga yami abagakahikahi fa'ina.
Gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda vaita Yaubada nuwanuwa-mo'ena alu'aluwada nuwadeya gisena-ma Bana anakaibe againe kanahawahegeda. Keke wananuwanuwa vaita gahe-nadi gahe-kawowo.

Nuwanuwana Bana anakaibe againe kanahawahegeda. Gavaimi-yo keke mali nuwanuwa againe tu Yaubada anakaibe againe kanahawahegeda? Me Yaubada ginafaiwalavele-mo'eda yo alu'aluwada ginanauna Bana againe. Meda yana faiwala ana vetala fa'ina gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana buki againe gidadauda gigayo,
Yaubada toselakalaka givenivenibainedi tu
tonuwahobu giveluvelugadi.
Yaubada liline wanayemu tu Bana lilimiya-mo'aya ginayemu. Omi tokoyona nimami koyona againe watunena-ma, nimami wanakolana. Omi tonuwaluga, nuwami wanakiveyeveyegana.
Yami koyona fa'ina wana'ase'u'aulolo wanatagi'uvami wanalogita. Auwe velaiga vemwamwala tu tagiya nuwavita gilubodami.
Taumiyao wanakivenuwahobumi Kaiwabu matane ada Bana ginakilakahimi.

Yaubada anakaibe vehimeya ana to'aibubuna kadu Bana anakaibe yada dewa ginalagana ka'i hagihagina o ka'i koyona. Bana anakaibe anafaiweya ginakibababaleda o ginaluyawelida. Tu o'eni ma o vaita hakwa'adi-yo tobohiya yana dewa ulaga? Ka'i o tauni Yaubada?

Wa'itami, gavadi bogiyadi ginalakayemu-ma omi keke-mo'a wadahalamaneni. Mene yawaimi ana tunuga wanuwenuwena o ka'i keke? Malalaugeya yagihowa ka'itana tu tova kabisona gi'awowolina amine, meda yawaimi ana tunuga.
Au gilubodami be hidedemi wadagahe wadagayo, “Ka'i Kaiwabu ginahawahegeku be wayawaiku ganamiyami amine, hida faisewa o mena faisewa gana'abina.”
Tu omi keke Yaubada ana egana wadayakahini, au taumiyao yami vevai fa'ina yami wanuwalaka kadu wagakahikahi. Omi gaveyao au hidede amine wagakahikahiyemi, medema wakoyo.
O mene gava kaliva dewa hagihagina gihalamanena tu keke gidahuluvini, medema gikoyo.

Medema fa'ina ase'u'aulolo lakahina ginayemaunimi, fa'ina wanatagitagi wanatagitagi taumiyao wanatagi'uvami. Yami giba kikaiwabuna wasenuwauluyena-ma gikoyo, tumotumo ami vaigau hi'ana. Yami mani yami lokoloko wa'ive'ave'ahina be giduva-kawowo ma ahe gikoyo, ada yadi koyo againe taumiyao yami nuwanuwa koyona higa mali kaliva yami kikaiwabu againe keke wadavelugadi-ma gi'iveyemaunina. Au ai'ala'alata omi taumiyao kadu yami kikaiwabu buye gina'alahi-'owomi.
Meda anafaiweya omi wana'atuvefa'ila ase'asemi wanakivevatuna fa'ina Kaiwabu yana yewa'ela giluveda'ufo.
Tobohiyakweyao, keke taumiyao agaimiya wana'alawoluwolu be higa keke matahiwadi wananuhagani fa'ina. Wa'ita! Tovedewayauga eda'awana liline gimidikebukebu.

Yadi eda givita ana toveya hi'atuvefa'ila fa'ina kavewagadi kaliva yadi wavemwamwala. Kadu aba'ita sa'eyana ma Yobi yana wanuwavita lakahina tu yana vetumagana againe gi'atuvefa'ila-mo'a ma valeyana ahe wanogalina, kadu wahalamanena Kaiwabu yana vevai hagihagina Yobi fa'ina kahihina ana abalauyabu. Kaiwabu agobika kadu hinekalikali againe gimaga fa'ina, Yobi nuwakabubu lakahina ginuhagana.
Kadu ka'i mene tamo kaliva amihinafeya gi'aulolo? Gilubodana be ekelesiya adi tonagona gidakovadi be higa hinave'o'olena ada bunama againe Kaiwabu ana eganeya hinabunamina.
Yadi wavetumagana to'aulolo hinave'o'olena ada yadi ve'o'ola wavetumaganina againe to'aulolo ginabwaina. E, Kaiwabu ginasiveyawana. Ada ka'i gavadi koyona gifaisewadi, au Kaiwabu ginayawelidi.

Au mema yami koyona taumiyao wanave'a'iyauyauga kadu buye wanave'ave'ove'o'ola be higa aulolo againe yami yamumu wananuhagana. Hai kaliva yana dewa yegayegana tu ginave'o'ola, medema yana ve'o'ola ana wafaiwala kadu waguwana.
Kadu give'o'ola-havagi vaita wehi ginalugaga ada au Yaubada wehi givetalaiyeni-yo babi ana gaitoma moya'aina givebutu gitabotabo.
(Iya Yemesa bonaku.)

Yo siule omi Yaubada giluwafami be hida babi againe hawahawala amine wamimiyami-ma kalivai-mina. Iya Fita Yesu Keliso yana kabu gavaina be gave'afositolo-ma yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Badi Yesu againe hivenibaina-ma hiwavimi be mali fafali agaidiya wa'abinauna, fafali-dina Fonitasi, Galesiya, Fafadosiya, Esiya kadu Bidiniya.

Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada Tamada giluwafami kadu givegide-vagahimi ada Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana ihagihagi againe mahamahalimiyao wamimiyami. Hidedemi giluwafami be higa Yesu Keliso bonana wana'abi'abina ada Bana dayagine ami bwanene ginakolana.
Yaubada yana nuwadoga kadu yana aseniwalova ana ayauna againe wanatutuveguvegulami.

Yesu Keliso wavetumaganena fa'ina Yaubada yana faiwaleya giyavayavami ada ginanunauwena tu gaitoma moya'aidi koyodi agaidiya ginakibababaleda. Ada ahe gikidewadewa-vagata be aimo tova ana abalauyabu againe kibababalai-nadi gina'ivemogatalina.

Medema fa'ina wanavemwamwala lakahina. Tova hidevama ka'i gilubodami be badi Yesu hivenibainena-ma yadi ve'umagigi ana vita tulina tulina agaidiya ase'u'aulolo wa'aya'ayaunena. Tu mena vitai-dina keke hinaduva-vagata. Tova hidevama wa'ase'u'aulolo nonogana ami du'u Yaubada gikidewedewena be walulubodena-ma fa'ina wavemwamwala.

Yaubada mena vitai-dina agaidiya gihawahegemi be higa yami vetumagana ana galuvaluva againe ka'i velemo'ena o ka'i keke ma ginahalamanena. (Wa'ita, kaliva gola babiya hiyalana digo wayogona buye hivetagovina be gi'ulafuwana againe gola-mo'ena avaekeya gida tu momolu hihegena.) Gola ana kaiwabu lakahina tu gaitoma havahavaina. Kaliva gola ai againe hive'alave'uve'una amine, meda Yaubada yami vetumagana gola gikaiwabuhegena-ma vita agaidiya gigaluvaluvana ka'i velemo'ena ma kabu'avane ginalakayemu. Ada aimo Yesu yana yewa'ela ana toveya yami vetumaganadona fa'ina Bana Yaubada ginahawaveyamumuyemi kadu ami egana ginakilakahina kadu ginakivekaiwabumi.

Boi Yesu Keliso keke wada'itani nonogana nuwanuwami lakahina Bana'e. Kadu tova adamoya keke wada'ita'itani nonogana Bana againe wavetumagana kadu wavemwamwala-mo'a, yami vemwamwala gi'ive'alikami be keke tamo gavadi amifaiweya wanagaheyeni.
Gavadi-yo wavemwamwala-mo'a? Me yami vetumagana guwana higa alu'aluwami ana kibababala wanunuhagana.

Keliso Alu'aluwana giluvaiyedi-yo gihawaveleveledi gigayo, “Aimo Yaubada yana Tovegida vita tulina tulina ginanuhagana tu muliya ginakaiwabu-mo'a.” Ada badi to'awatalatalaina gava tova kadu gavaiya'amine mena gaitomai-dina ginayemu-ma ana halamana hilelelena.

Yaubada badi agaidiya gihawavemogatala keke vaita taudiyao adi veluga au omi ami veluga fa'ina hi'awatalatalaina. Ada gaitomai-dina fa'ina higaheye-vagahina amanadi valeyana kibababala ana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana tolaumamala agaidiya wanogalina. Yaubada Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'iveninisena, lobama amine gihobu'ela be badi tolaumamala giluvaiyedi-yo agaimiya hi'awatalatalaina. Badi Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata lobameya himimiyami nonogana ami kibababala ana nuwanuwa fa'ina halamana hilelele-hagihagiyena tu higa-wayoga.

Tuwaina Yaubada keke wadahalamaneni au fanifanimiyao wamimiyami be nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana agaidiya wahawahegemi. Tu tova adamoya Yaubada wahalamanena fa'ina, keke mena nuwanuwa koyodi amine wanahuluhuluva au we'owe'o dibudibumuhigidiyao amine Tamami fa'ine wanahawahegemi.
E, Bana giluwafami-ma kaliva mahamahalina amine, gilubodami be yami dewa moya'aina agaidiya mahamahalimiyao wanahuluhuluva.
Meda tuwaina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya Yaubada gigahe gigayo,
Iya mahamahaliku fa'ina, gilubodami be omi mahamahalimiyao wanahuluva.
Yaubada aimo babi keke gidabubuni tu Bana Keliso ami kibababala fa'ina givegide-vagahina, tu tova adamoya higa hida tova havahavaina againe omi fa'imiya gi'ivemogatalina.
Bana amihinafeya gihobu'ela fa'ina Yaubada againe yami nuwave'avina wasena, Bana alikeya gisivemididina be gikivekaiwabuna amanadi, ada au Yaubada againe wavetumagana kadu waluluve'avina.

Fa'ina Yaubada bonana miyamiya-vagahina againe watubuga-havagi ada yawaimi ivaguna bonai-nadi againe give'inuba. Tamamiyao hi'ivetubugimi-ma havahavaidiyao tu Tamami bonana againe yawaimi ivaguna wavaina medema miyamiya-vagahina.
Kaliva moya'aidi vaita isisi'u amine,
yadi kaiwabu vaita ana falafalawasi
yadi kaiwabu amine.
Isisi'u giboubou kadu ana falafalawasi gi'a'akukuwana,
atu Kaiwabu bonana giduva-vagata.
Ada mena bonai-nadi Yaubada yana kaliva agaimiya gilumamalena.
Fwefweya ivagudiyao tova moya'aina hihuhuhu amine, omi Yaubada bonana againe tova moya'aina wanahuhuhu wananunauwena tu ami kibababala ana nuwanuwa againe wanave'asevatu.
Meda gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Kaiwabu yana nuwakabubu wa'aluvaluvani.
Meda tuwaina Yaubada Keliso ana lauwafa fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gigahe gigayo,
Wa'ita, yaku melala Saiyoni againe
ogola sa'eyana gakivemididina,
ogolai-nadi nuwavaivaina
holili'abi fa'ina galuwafana.
Ada hai kaliva Bana againe ginavetumagana
medema keke ginavetumagana-wayoga.
Ogolai-nadi to'aiyogona hikilowena medema giveholili'abi.
Hida ogola ma abatutumadumadu kadu ababe'ube'u.
Yaubada bonana hidibutoyogena fa'ina hitutumadumadu be adi matahiwadi hinuhagana tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada givehimeye-vagahina amine.
Tuwaina omi kaliva-kawowo keke ami waegana, tu tova adamoya omi Yaubada yana kaliva. Tuwaina keke hinekalikali wadanuhagani, tu tova adamoya Yaubada yana hinekalikali ahe wanuhagana.

Gilubodami be badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma hinafadiya yami dewa hagihagi-mo'ena wanaseseyemaunena. Ka'i omi vaita tokoyona amine hinahawavekoyoyemi, au aimo Yaubada ide kaliva ginavedewayaugida ana toveya yami dewa hagihagi-mo'ena boi waseyemaunena-ma hina'itayakahina be Yaubada ana egana hinakilakahina.
Fa'ina Yaubada nuwanuwana omi tobona'abi yami dewa yamumuna againe badi totagakulu Yaubada hifaniyena-ma yadi awalava wanavetufagolohina.

Tuwaina yami koyona fa'ina yogoyogonimiyao wamiyami tu Yaubada giyaumi. Au kaliva yauyaugimiyao amine wanamiyami tu keke wanagahe wanagayo, “Yaubada yaku koyona giyawelini-yo giyauku fa'ina akufaiweya tauku yaku nuwanuwa amine ganahuluva.” Wona velemona Yaubada giyaumi tu keke mena Yaubada ana egana ana aiyakata againe yami dewa koyona wanakevani. Au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine wanafifaisewa vaita omi Bana ana agetoga amine.
Kaliva moya'aidi wanave'amohimohinedi. Badi tobohiyamiyao Yesu againe hivetumagana-ma yo'o-dina agaidiya yami nuwanuwa wanaseusena. Yaubada wanamatausena. Kabemani lakahina wanawowomumuyena.
Ka'i keke tamo gavadi koyona wadafaisewani be ve'umagigi wanuhagana tu Yaubada wanuwenuwena be wa'atuvefa'ila, au medema dewa hagihagina Yaubada matane.

Ka'i yami dewa koyona fa'ina munugakoyokoyo wanuhagana tu wana'atuvefa'ilena, hai ami hawaveyamumu? Keke. Atu ka'i yami dewa hagihagina fa'ina hinave'umagigiyemi tu wana'atuvefa'ila, au medema dewai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada ginahawaveyamumuyemi.
Atuvefa'ila vita agaidiya fa'ina Yaubada giluwafami. Wa'ita, Keliso omi fa'imiya vita gi'atuvefa'iledi ada aba'ita givelemi be higa Bana amine wanahuluva.
Keliso Tauna yada koyona ana laufata giwahina be kelose againe gi'alika higa vaita ide nuwanuwa koyodi kanavenikohiyedi-yo dewa koyona agaideya ginahavai-mo'ena. Bana ana ki'ona againe ide kayamumu.
Tuwaina omi vaita sifi hinunaufani-ma amine Yaubada yana eda wafaniyena tu tova adamoya ami Tolugolagola againe wahagavilami Bana alu'aluwami ana To'itave'avina amanadi.

Ami aiwaka ana ita inubana keke wowomi ana vaigau againe wananuhagani, higa vaita u'umi wana'amoni o ka'i odo'odo, mokula fatana lakahina wanavelakavini o ka'i doki nuwavaivaina wana'oseni-yo kaliva matadiya wanave'i'aiwaka.

Au ami aiwaka inubana ma nuwahinagemiya. Nuwami umaumana kadu niwaniwalovina amine wanahuluhuluva. Mena nuwahinagemi ana vaigau au fatana lakahi-mo'ena Yaubada matane, kadu gaitoma miyamiya-vagahina. Atu wowomi ana vaigau ma aimo ginayawowola.

Fa'ina badi vevine tuwai-mo'ena himiyami be Yaubada againe hihawahegedi, ada yana wonadabadaba guwana fa'ina hilulauboda-ma hidede amine adi aiwaka fa'ina taudiyao hi'ihagihagiyedi, au moganediyao adi wawowomumu agevavadiya himiyami.

Meda anafaiweya Sela moganedi Abelahamo hi'i'idibumuhigena be hivewagana yadi kauve'a. Ada ka'i omi'iyao wanahuluva yamumuna ada keke tamo gavadi fa'ina wanamatauta, au omi vaita Sela natudiyao nimadi wavaina.

Kaliva yadi koyona agaimiya keke koyona againe wanafatani, kadu yadi ihawadamana keke ihawadamana againe wanafatani. Keke medede amine wanahuluva, au badi fa'idiya wanave'o'ola be higa Yaubada ginanuwakabubuyedi. Yaubada gikovami be yana nuwakabubu wananuhagana fa'ina, kaliva yadi koyona nuwakabubu againe wanafatana.
Meda gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Hai kaliva nuwanuwana
yana wavemwamwala ginamiyami
kadu tova yamumuna ginanuhagana,
gilubodana be gahe koyona
kadu fwaya ginave'edu'eduyena.
Kadu dewa koyona ginavekwaulaugena
be gina'igibagiba yamumuna,
ada yana wa'atuvefa'ila veyao ginalelena.
Gilubodami be hidedemi wanahuluva,
fa'ina todewahagihagi agaidiya
Kaiwabu matana gise-vagahina,
kadu yadi ve'o'ola givenovenogalena,
atu tokoyona agaidiya gilumagibou.
Au hidedemi tuwaina Yaubada Devida awane gigahe.
Atu ka'i yami dewa hagihagina fa'ina ve'umagigi wananuhagana digo, Yaubada vemwamwala ginavelemi. Tove'umagigi keke wanamatausedi, kadu vita fa'ina keke nuwami ginanauna.

Au ase'asemiya Keliso wanave'amohimohinena, Bana yami Kaiwabu amanadi. Bana againe wahawahegemi-yo waluluve'avina. Gilubodami be yami abaluve'avina ana nuwanuwa wanahalamane-hagihagiyena be higa ka'i tamo hakwadi ginatoliluveluvemi ginagayo, “Gavana fa'ina Yesu againe ululuve'avina?”, au amifaiweya wanamadubonalaufata hagihagina. Tu bona bikabikana againe kadu yami wawowomumu agaidiya wanabonalaufata. Kadu yami dewa wana'itave'avina be higa keke tamo vita nuwafoumiya wana'ayauneni. Au hidede amine omi Keliso yana kaliva hinagahekoyokoyomi againe, yami dewa yamumuna hina'ita-yo yadi gahe-kawowo fa'ina wowomumu hina'ayaunena.
Ka'i yami dewa koyona fa'ina ve'umagigi wananuhagana, au taumiyao ami vita. Tu ka'i Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe yami dewa hagihagina fa'ina ve'umagigi wananuhagana, medema gilubodana.

Wa'ita, Keliso yana dewa hagihaginaga tu ve'umagigi ginuhagana be omi yami dewa keke hagihagina ma yami koyona fa'ina gi'alika. Tova sa'eyanaga gi'alika be koyona fatana giluyabu-vagahina. E, yami koyona fa'ina gi'alika be higa Yaubada againe ginavega'aulemi. Wowona hiluve'alikana tu alu'aluwane wayawaina ivaguna gimimiyami.
Keliso gi'alika-yo alu'aluwana gina to'alika aluwadi agaidiya gilumamala, badi to'alika yadi abageya yogoyogonidiyao himiyami-ma kalivai-dina.

Badi to'alikai-dina ma tuwai-mo'ena Nowa yana toveya Yaubada hidibutoyogena. Nowa waka giyogoyogona tu Yaubada yana wa'atuvefa'ila gibodaboda higa vaita mena kalivai-dina hidahagaviladi yo keke. Waka giyogona gihavaina kaliva hiyage, keke moya'aidi hidayage au eitagaga hiyage. Ilumonaita gi'adobodoboni-yo mala gituwa be waka gituwalakahini-yo badi toyage gufa againe adi kibababala hinuhagana.

Mena gufai-nadi yada abaluvefota bafitaiso fa'ina, ada tova adamoya medede againe ami kibababala wanunuhagana. Bafitaiso keke wowomi ana bwanene ana yaudihega fa'ina. Au hida bafitaiso ana nuwanuwa ma Yaubada kawonadabedabena vaita dewa koyona kavenikohiyeni-yo Bana nuwafouda ana bwanene givaihegena. Bafitaiso againe kibababala wanunuhagana fa'ina Yesu Keliso alikeya gimididi-havagi be lobameya gilaka ada Yaubada i'atagine gimimiyami tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kadu ana tovehimeya kadu ana tofaiwala givehivehimeyedi.

Dewa koyona givenikohiyena fa'ina, tova adamoya be ginana alika ana maka gilubodana be hidei babiya keke tauna yana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana againe ginamiyami, au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa againe ginamiyami.

Badi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma dewa koyona tulina tulina agaidiya hihawahawahegedi amine, meda tuwaina omi wahawahegemi ma'ita lauva tunugina. Au amifata tu gihavaina. Dewai-dina ma nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina kadu ita'italuvadigana agaidiya hivetalaiyedi, gufa laulaugina ana yu-fa'ila againe hivekwavakwava, vemwamwala kwavakwavana tulina tulina agaidiya higagakahikahi, balauma adi davadava againe, udo tulina tulina agaidiya hihawahegedi.
Mena dewai-dina wavenikohiyedi be keke badi buye wadavekwavakwava fa'ina, nuwadi givegafo'uya'uya kadu hivekabu'ala'alawemi.
Tu tova mulina Yaubada matane hinamidi be yadi dewa fa'ina hinabonalaufata. Bana ana egana Tovedewayauga, ada badi aimo wayawaidi himimiyami kadu ali'alikadiyao yadi dewa ginalaufata.

Gavana ana inuba badi ahe hi'alika-ma agaidiya Venuwa'ata Yamumuna ana laumamala gina? Me badi tomiyababi fa'ina yadi dewa fatana hinuhagana higa alika. Wowodi gi'alika nonogana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna adifaiweya hivenogaleni-yo alu'aluwadiya wayawai-vagahidi hinamiyami Yaubada gimiyamiya-vagata amine.
Gaitoma sa'eyana giluboda-mo'emi higa buye wanave'ahawahawahega lakahina, fa'ina yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana againe tobohiyamiyao yadi koyona amifaiweya wanaluluvetavetauna.
Keke yami wanuwalolona au yami wa'asehawahega tobohiyamiyao wanaluve'auyedi kadu badi hinaluve'auyemi.

Yaubada yana nuwadoga againe Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana abavetala tulina tulina omi sa'eyana sa'eyana givelemi-yo Bana fa'ine wafifaisewa. Wana'idibumuhigena be mene ami gava vehimeya Bana givelemi amine buye wanave'aveluveluga.

Wa'ita, ka'i tobohiyamiyao adi veluga fa'ina yana abavetala agaimiya lau'age amine, au gilubodami be wanalulau'age higa vaita Yaubada bona-mo'ena wadayakayakahini. Ka'i yana abavetala higa ami vehimeya givelemi vaita igibagiba amine, au gilubodami be Yaubada ginafaiwalavelemi amine yami igibagiba agaidiya tobohiyamiyao wanaveluvelugadi. Hidede amine wanafifaisewa be higa Yesu Keliso yana veluga fa'ina yami dewa matatabuna agaidiya Yaubada ana egana wanakilakahina. Bana yana kaiwabu kadu yana faiwala ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Tobohiya'ase'asekweyao, tova adamoya vita lakahi-mo'ena wa'ayaunena vaita ai gida'alahimi amine. Medema fa'ina keke wanayaulowoga vaita gava vita wadanuhagani.
Au Keliso vita lakahina giwahina amine omi wawahina fa'ina wanavemwamwala be higa yana yewa'ela ana toveya yana kaiwabu ana ivemogatala againe wanavemwamwala-mo'a.
Ka'i omi Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine fa'ina hinavekabu'ala'alawemi amine o yami vemwamwala gavatubuga! Fa'ina Yaubada Alu'aluwana kikaiwabuna gimiyamiyatagomi.
Ka'i waluve'alika, o ka'i wakai'afu, o mali kaliva ana mata'atuboda wasebodana, o kadu tamo dewa koyona velugana fa'ina vita wanuhagana, au taumiyao ami vita. Ada dewai-dina keke-mo'a gidalubodami.
Atu ka'i omi Keliso yana kaliva fa'ina vita wanuhagana, keke wanawowomumu, au Keliso ana egana wawahina fa'ina Yaubada wanahawadavadavana.

Tova ahe giyemu be Yaubada kaliva ginavedewayaugida be ada laufata ginaveleda. Givebutu ide yana yo'ogaga gimidivedewayaugida be higa yada nuwanuwa koyodi ginahavaina. Ide agaideya givebutu tu aimo ginanunauwena be badi Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna keke hidavenogaleni amanadi ginavedewayaugidi. Ka'i yana vedewayauga ide tovenogala agaideya givebutu be vita ka'ayaunena, au badi keke hidavenogala-ma aimo ginavedewayaugidi ana toveya adi vita gavatubuga!
Meda gahe sa'eyana Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda gigayo,
Kaliva yegayegadiyao vita lakahina hiwahi-yo adi
kibababala hinanuhagana. Au gavaimi be tokoyona
kadu badi Yaubada ana tovekwaulauga
kibababala hidanuhagani?
Yaku gahe dobona hidede amine.

Gaveyao vita tulina tulina hinuhagana Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine, medema gilubodadi be dewa hagihagina againe hina'atuvefa'ila, ada alu'aluwadi adi To'aibubuna nimane hinasena be Bana gina'itave'avidi ahe giwonadabadaba amine.

Tu omi to'ekelesiya adi tonagona agaimiya ganagahe. Omi tonagona meda anafaiweya iya'eku. Iya Keliso yana aulolo yana tagiya ana to'ita kadu aimo tova mulina yana kaiwabu ginamogatala ana toveya iya Bana buye anakaiwabu.

Omi'iyao ma ami vehimeya Yaubada givelemi-ma fa'ina tova adamoya gagahevagadonemi. Yana sifi yami itave'avina againe gisedi-ma wana'itave'avi-hagihagiyedi be keke yami wagadibudibutoyoga, au yami wa'asehawahega wana'itave'avidi Yaubada nuwanuwana amine. Keke ami laufata wananuwenuweni, au Yaubada againe wahawahegemi fa'ina wanafifaisewa.
Keke yami yo'o agaidiya wana'italakalakavemi, au yami dewa yamumuna againe aba'ita wanaveledi.
Ada sifi adi To'itave'avina kikaiwabuna ginayewa'ela ana toveya, badau kikaiwabuna keke havahavaina wanavaina be Bana buye wanakaiwabu-vagata.
Yaubada toselakalaka givenivenibainedi tu
tonuwahobu giveluvelugadi.
Gavadi gavadi fa'ina wanuwanuwa lakahina, medema moya'aina Yaubada againe wanavewahivedamana fa'ina tova moya'aina Bana gi'ita'itanuwakabubuyemi.
Au Setani wanavaga'unaunagena, yami vetumagana wanakidonena, tobohiyamiyao tovetumagana fafali moya'aina agaidiya wananuwenuwedi higa aulolo tagiya omi wawahina amine meda badi hiwahina.

Tu vitai-dina wawahiwahidi-ma wana'ayaunena wananunauwena tu tova kabisona ginahavaidi-yo Yaubada Tauna gina'ihagihagiyemi, ase'asemi ginakivevatuna ada yami vetumagana againe ginakivetoyogimi be wanamididi-mo'a. Bana Yaubadai-nadi againe veluga tulina tulina give'inuba, ada Bana gikovami be Yesu Keliso againe wanamiyave'avina-yo Bana buye wanakaiwabu-vagata.
Bana ana egana kanakilakahina ada yana faiwala ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
Taumiyao wanave'alulusiule againe tobohiyamiyao wana'atulauhidi be higa yami nuwanuwa hawahawahegana wanaseyemaunena. Omi moya'aimi Keliso yana kaliva yana vevine ase'asemi gina'ilova.
(Iya Fita bonaku.)

Yo siule omi Yesu Keliso againe wavetumagana-ma kalivai-mina, Bana'e yada Yaubada kadu ada Tokibababala. Iya Saimoni-Fita Yesu againe gave'agetoga kadu yana kabu gavaina be gave'afositolo-ma yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Bana Yesu Keliso yada Yaubada kadu ada Tokibababala kaliva tunutunugina fa'ina yada vetumagana giveleda omi'iyao be meda ime'eyao ada leleleya Bana matane.

Kadu mena yana nuwadoga againe yana veluga agaideya giwonadabedabena be higa nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigadi adafaiweya kanavekwaulaugedi, nuwanuwai-dina fa'idiya gaitoma moya'aina babiya hikoyokoyo. E, yana wonadabadaba fa'idiya nuwanuwa koyodi amifaiweya wa'osedi be Tauna yana nuwanuwa givelemi-yo ami ita'ita au vaita Bana ana ita'ita amine wavaina. Mena yana wonadabadaba fifiwala-mo'edi agaideya keke kanawona!

Kadu taumiyao yami nuwanuwa ana hawata Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ana halamana buye wanave'atutamo'aina. Kadu atuvefa'ila taumiyao yami nuwanuwa ana hawata buye wanave'atutamo'aina. Kadu Yaubada ana ve'amohimohina atuvefa'ila buye wanave'atutamo'aina.
Kadu Yaubada ana ve'amohimohina tobohiyamiyao adi nuwakabubu buye wanave'atutamo'aina. Kadu tobohiyamiyao adi nuwakabubu againe wanatutuveguvegulami-yo badi fa'idiya wanahawahege-mo'emi.
Ka'i mena dewa tulina tulina againe wanatutuveguvegulami, au yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso ana halamana againe wanafifaiwala. E, yami vetumagana ana ita keke vaita guwana keke. Au waguwami wanamiyami.

Tu gava kaliva mena dewai-dina keke gidaseyemaunedi, medema Yaubada yana nuwanuwa fa'ina matana lowolowogina be nuwana gi'uyuyuna, kadu yana koyona moya'aina boi gifaisewadi tu Yesu Keliso gikolahegedi ma nuwana giulu.

Tu tobohiyakweyao, ahe wahalamanena Yaubada giluwafami kadu gikovami be yana yo'ogaga wanamiyami. Hidedemi gikovaluwafami fa'ina, gilubodami be yami vegala moya'aina agaidiya yana lauwafa au velemo'ena ma wanaseyemaunena. Ka'i hidedemi wanahuluhuluva, au keke-mo'a wananuwayewa kadu Yaubada ginahawahegemi be abaluku kikaiwabuna ginayauni-yo Yesu Keliso yana abavehimeya miyamiya-vagahina againe wanaluku, Bana'e yada Kaiwabu kadu ada Tokibababala amanadi.
Tu omi nuwanuwai-dina galukahihiyedi-ma ahe wahalamanena kadu nuwanuwa velemo'ena agaimiya gi'ela-ma wakidonena. Omi halamanimiyao nonogana tova moya'aina nuwami ganatalafolefolena.

Iya gahalamanena tova kabisona hida babi ganahegena yada Kaiwabu Yesu Keliso agaikuya gihawavemogatalena amine. Gilubodaku be aimo babi ana wowoya vaita vada amine gamimiyami ana toveya, mena nuwanuwai-dina fa'idiya nuwami gadatalafolefolena.
Medema fa'ina yaku wa'idibumuhiga eda ganakidewedewena be aimo ahe gananuyabuyabumi-yo nuwanuwai-dina fa'idiya tova moya'aina anafaiweya nuwami gina'a'afolefolena.

Boi ime Yesu buye oya mahamahalina againe alaka ada buye amiyami tu auhe'ama-nadi Yaubada Tamada Yesu gikivekaiwabuna kadu ana egana gikivelakahina. Mahalina ve'akinamanamalina gihobu-yo Bana Tokaiwabu-mo'a agona Yesu againe gilakayemu gigayo, “Hida Natu'ase'aseku. Bana'e nuwaku gikiveyamumu-mo'ena.” Mena agonai-nadi lobameya gilakayemu-ma ime taumeyao anogalina.

Tu nuwanuwa sa'eyana wanahalamane-hagihagiyena, higa Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina yadi venuwa'ata keke taudiyao nuwadiya gidave'inuba. Au Alu'aluwa Mahalina giyuvetunetunedi amine Yaubada bonana hi'awatalatalainena. Medema fa'ina keke tamo hakwadi falofita yana venuwa'ata Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya gidadauda-ma tauna anafaiweya gihawavetuvetununi, tu Alu'aluwa Mahalina yana kivetuvetunu againe anafaiweya gihalamanena.
Tufoidi moya'aidi yadi dewa udo'udona keke ma'ita hidawowomumuyeni-ma hinamuliyena, ada mali kaliva yadi dewa koyona hina'ita-yo nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana eda hinahawatagona.

Badi tovehawalai-dina matadi gi'alalaka ada yadi vehawala taudiyao hive'inubena-ma againe hinanuwa'abiyemi-yo yami mani wanaveleveledi. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada badi adi matahiwadi gikidewedewena. E, Bana adi Tolauyawela matana keke gidatuvedamani, au gi'ita-vagahidi.

Meda anafaiweya tuwai-lokalokana Nowa yana toveya tova moya'aina tomiyababi moya'aidi koyona hififaisewadi againe Yaubada keke gidahinekalikaliyedi, au mala gituwa be givekayodi-yo hi'alika-'owoga. Tu Nowa dewa yegayegana ana tolaumamala fa'ina, Yaubada gikibababalena kadu ana yo'o kalivai-dina seveni buye'i.

Meda muliya Yaubada kaliva koyodiyao moya'aidi melala adi egana Sodoma Gomola agaidiya gi'itadi-yo givematahiwadiyedi. Ai'ala'alata againe gikabudi be wauyodiga. Mena melalai-dina aba'ita higa ka'i kaliva Yaubada hinavekwaulaugena digo, makewa'e yadi dewa koyona ana laufata hinanuhagana.

Tu Sodoma Gomola agaidiya Lota anakaibe yana dewa yegayegana fa'ina Yaubada gimidilugolegoleni-yo melala luhei giluyawelidi. Tova be tova Lota badi kalivai-dina hinafadiya gimiyami tu yadi dewa bwanebwanenena gi'ita'itana kadu yadi wonakoyokoyo ginoganogalina. Keke nuwanuwadi Yaubada yana vehimeya hina'idibumuhigedi, au udo tulina tulina agaidiya hihawahawahegedi. Bana Lota kaliva yegayegana ma yadi dewa koyo-mo'ena gi'ita-yo ginuwanuwavita ana ayauna keke ma'i yamumuna.

Wona velemona Yaubada badi Nowa kadu Lota gikibababaledi fa'ina kahalamanena Bana anafaiweya ide kave'amohimohinena-ma vita agaidiya ginakibababaleda. Atu kaliva koyodiyao matahiwadi againe anafaiweya ginakive'avidi ginanunauwena tu vedewayauga ana tova.

Au hidedemi kaliva koyodiyao moya'aidi hinanuhagana tu badi dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina agaidiya hihawahawahegedi kadu abavehimeya moya'aina hihawave'iyohoyohoyena-ma kalivai-dina makewa'e adi matahiwadi au hidede amine hinanuhagana.
Tu wa'itadi, tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao badi to'ihawadamana kadu toselakalaka. Lobama ana kaliva kikaiwabudiyao adi hawatagona fa'ina keke ma'ita hidamatauta.
Tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata badi tovehawalai-dina hifaiwalahegedi kadu hikaiwabuhegedi nonogana keke-mo'a yadi wa'ihawadamana Yaubada matane hidahawavekoyoyedi.

Tu wama kalivai-dina gaitoma tulina tulina keke hidahalamanedi-ma hihawavelaigedi. Wa'itadi, badi vaita kevakeva walawala'a amine keke wanuwadiyao higa-kawokawowo. Hitubutubuga be kaliva hikikive'avidi-yo hiluluyaweyawelidi. Meda anafaiweya badi tovehawalai-dina hinabwavi.

Tova moya'aina mali kaliva vita hiveleveledi tu ana laufata ma taudiyao vita hinanuhagana. Keke bogi au uyadeyadeya yadi nuwanuwa aya'ayafanidi agaidiya hihawahawahegedi, ada medema abavemwamwala lakahina badi matadiya. Yami anuwa'udu'udu Yesu fa'ine ana toveya hi'ela'ela be buye wa'au'a tu yami'a againe yadi nuwanuwa aya'ayafanina hiseusena fa'ina adi bwanene hivedamami be yami'a hikivekoyona.

Tova moya'aina vevine agaidiya matadi giludigaga-vagata, keke ma'ita agodi gidakibo. Yadi ve'alololo vaita mwau amine tovetumagana kowakowadiyao hive'alahidi. Nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana hisikuluye-'owona. Au Yaubada yana alatabutabu dibune himimiyami.

Eda tunutunugina hihegena be hinu-kawokawowo ada Belami Beyo natuna yana eda hi'itavaina. Bana Belami nuwanuwana lakahina mani fa'ina gikoyo. (Tovehimeya sa'eyana gilaufata Belami againe be higa miIsileli gina'alatabutabuyedi ada yana alatabutabu againe gina'ivebwavidi). Tu doniki kwaune ginauna tu doniki Belami yana koyona fa'ina gidakeyena. Doniki gahe keke anafata nonogana kaliva agona amine gigahe be yana dewa kwavakwavana gihawatana. Wona velemona wama tovehawala koyodiyao vaita Belami amine, matadi gi'alalaka.

Kadu'e wa'itadi, badi vaita guya gihayahaya amine, keke tamo alu'aluwami ana gufa yadi vehawala againe wananuhagani. Kadu badi vaita howahowa mala lakahina gi'alu'alugena amine, yadi nuwanuwa keke anafaiweya gahe gina'abini. Yaubada yadi abaga ahe gikidewedewena, au aimo umalovana kahu tunugi-vadavada'aina againe hinamiyami.

Yadi waselakalaka vaita nuwanuwahuyadiyao hilulumamala tu yadi gahe au kwavakwavana. Kadu kaliva dibumi koyona ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana hihawaveyamumuyena vaita hidedemi wanadewadewa. Au hidedemi hivehavehawala fa'ina, badi hivebutu Yesu againe hivetumagana be kaliva koyodiyao adi yo'o hi'otayabuyabudi-ma yadi mwau higa yadi vehawala againe hive'alahidi.

Higahedi higayo, “Ka'i yama vehawala wanamuliyena, au keke mali vehimeya againe wanave'agetoga, taumiyaogaga amine wanahuluva.” Au hidedemi higahegahe tu taudiyao dewa balana againe hive'agetoga. Fa'ina gavadi kaliva givehivehimeyena, medema againe give'agetoga.

Ka'i Yesu Keliso yada Kaiwabu kadu ada Tokibababala ana halamana hi'ayaunena be babi ana nuwanuwa koyodi hi'otayabuyabudi tu muliya nuwanuwai-dina agaidiya hiyewadi-yo koyona gifafadi be give'awawadi, ka'i hidedemi hinahuluva, au nagona yadi miya koyona tu muliya yadi miya gikoyo-mo'a.

Hoiyoi tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao! Ka'i Yesu yana eda tunutunugina keke hidahalamaneni digo, yadi koyona fa'ina vita hidanuhagana. Atu ahe hihalamanena tu Yaubada yana vehimeya mahamahalina hinogalina-ma hidibutoyogena fa'ina vita keke kabi'ona hinanuhagana.

Au yada gahegahe luhei amine hihuluva. Kagayo, “Ka'i galu'eta gina'ovala, au ginana ginayewana tauna ovalina gina'ana.” Kadu sa'eyana ma kagayo, “Ka'i kwamayoku bawe hinavetowana be hinasena, au ginayewana tofula ginatowana.”
Tobohiya'ase'asekweyao, hida fefe ga'eto'etoladina-ma yaku leta anavelu agaimiya. Mena yami leta luhei agaidiya nuwami gatalafolena be higa nuwanuwa yegayegana nuwami ginavai-mo'ena.

Boi tuwai-mo'ena falofita mahamahalidiyao Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hi'awatalatalainena, kadu yada Kaiwabu ada Tokibababala yana venuwa'ata ime yana afositolo avelemi. Nuwanuwaku mena venuwa'atai-dina agaidiya nuwami ginanunauyena.

Hinagahe hinagayo, “Boi Yesu giwonadabadaba vaita ginayewa'ela be kaliva ada laufata ginaveleda. Hai Yesu Tauna? Keke-mo'a ginayewa'ela. Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada babi gimidibubuna ana toveya be ginunauwena tova adamoya gaitoma moya'aina tuwaina hidauda amine meda adamoya hidadauda. Tuwai-mo'ena bwanenedeyao alika againe hi'enonuwaulu be tova adamoya kanunauwena yada miyami babiya au leleleya. Au babi ginaduva-vagata.” Au hidedemi higahe.

Tu badi kalivai-dina keke nuwanuwadi gavadi tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada yana vehimeya againe gilakayemu-ma hinanuwa-nunauyeni. Malatuwa nuwadi giulu. Gilakayemu ma hidede amine. Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada gigahe-yo lobama gilakayemu. Ma gufagaga gidauda tu Yaubada gigahe-yo gufa hinafane babi gifu'u ada wagufana gidauda. Tu kadu gufa againe babi-nadi medema tovai-nadi gidauda-ma ana matahiwadi ginuhagana. Malatuwa againe Yaubada tomiyababi moya'aidi giluyaweyawelidi.

Kadu meda Yaubada yana gahe againe lobama be babi adamoya hidadauda-ma adi matahiwadi hinanuhagana. Yaubada ahe givehimeya be aimo vedewayauga ana toveya ai'ala'alata againe ginakabudi be kaliva koyodiyao ginave'alayaweyawelidi.

Wona velemona gaitoma moya'aina gina'alahi-'owodi tu omi gavaiyami? Yaubada yana Tova walulubodena tu gilubodami be Bana againe wadahawahawahegemi-yo yana nuwanuwa amine wadahuluhuluva. Ka'i Yaubada yana nuwanuwa wana'idibumuhigena digo yana Tova wanakive'eda'ufona. Medema Tovai-nadi ai'ala'alata lobama gina'alayaweyawelina kadu ana lukalalava againe kauwana vaikohi ibadibadi babi ana gaitoma moya'aina gina'ulafuwadi be hinayawowola.
Tu Yaubada ahe giwonadabadaba higa lobama be babi ivagudi ginabubudi, ada medema agaidiya dewa hagihaginaga ginaduva-vagata. Ada mena lobama be babi ivagudi fa'ina kalulauboda.

Siule tobohiya'ase'asekweyao, au hidedemi babi ivaguna ana dewa hagihaginaga walulubodena fa'ina, yami wa'idibumuhiga wanavegavegala be yami dewa yegayegana keke ami wavita Yaubada matane wanamiyami kadu yami wa'aseniwalova wanamiyami.

Yada Kaiwabu yana vekwalu ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Gi'atuvefa'ilemi be higa moya'aimi yana kibababala wananuhagana. Meda anafaiweya tobohiyanuwada Folo agaimiya gi'etoladina, ada Yaubada ginuwahuyavelena.

Tova moya'aina Kaiwabu Yesu yana yewa'ela kadu ide yada dewa fa'ina yana leta moya'aina agaidiya au hidedemi gi'eto'etoladina, yama nuwanuwa leleleya. Tu yana leta agaidiya yana nuwanuwa tufona ana halamana vitana. Kaliva fanifanidiyao yadi vetumagana walamina keke ma nuwanuwai-dina hikivilaviladi be hikivekoyodi. E, Folo yana etoladi kadu mali gahe Yaubada yana kaliva Veyao Tuwaina ana bukiya hi'etoladina-ma hikivilaviladi-yo taudiyao adi agolaufofola hifaisewana.

Tu omi'iyao ma nuwanuwaku Yesu Keliso yada Kaiwabu be ada Tokibababala ana halamana kadu yana nuwadoga ana ayauna agaimiya ginatubutubuga. Bana ana egana kanakilakahina be yana kaiwabu ginaduva-vagata tova adamoya kadu tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.
(Iya Saimoni-Fita bonaku.)

E, kaliva ana egana Yawai-vagata velemo'ena Tauna gi'ivemogatalina be ime a'itana. Ada gavaimi a'itana amine a'awatalatalainemi kadu avenuwa'atami. Ada Bana Yawai-vagata amanadi boi tuwai-mo'ena Tamada buye himiyamiya-vagata, ada muliya ime agaimeya Tauna gi'ivemogatalina.

Ada ime Bana Yawai-vagata velemo'ena a'itana kadu yana gahe anogalina, ada Bana fa'ine avenuwa'atami. Au hidedemi avenuwa'atami be higa ime'eyao Badi Tamada kadu Natuna Yesu Keliso buye avevido avedayaga amine, meda kadu omi'iyao mena vevido-nadi wana'aya'ayaunena.
Ada keke gavana fa'ina tu omi agaimiya ga'etoladi be higa moya'aida kanavevido kanavedayaga yo kanavemwamwala-mo'a.
Ka'i kanagahe kanagayo, “Iya Bana'e buye avevido,” ka'i hidede amine kanagahe tu nuwanuwa uyu'uyuyuna againe kanunudadana, au kafwaya kadu keke nuwanuwa velemo'ena amine kadahuluhuluva.

Tu Yaubada mahalina againe gimiyamiya-vagata. Ka'i ide tovetumagana Bana amine mahalina againe kanunudadana, au ime'eyao kadu omi'iyao moya'aida ada ayauna kadu yada nuwanuwa sa'eyana kamimiyami, ada Yaubada Natuna Yesu dayagina gimadu-ma againe ase'aseda gikolakolana be yada nuwanuwa koyona moya'aina givaihegena.
Ka'i ide kanagahe kanagayo, “Keke nuwanuwa koyona ase'asekuya gidadauda,” au taudeyao agaideya kave'alololo kadu Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena keke nuwahinagedeya gidadauda.

Ka'i yada dewa koyona Yaubada matane kanayauyauna, au Bana giwonadabadaba amine ginafaisewa kadu yana nuwanuwa tunutunugina amine ginahuluva, higa yada dewa koyona ginayawelina kadu ase'aseda ana nuwanuwa koyona moya'aina ginakolahegehegena.

Ka'i ide kanagahe kanagayo, “Keke tamo dewa koyona gadafaisewani,” au vaita kadagahe kadagayo, “Bana Yaubada tofwaya,” fa'ina Bana'e kaliva fa'ideya ahe gigahe vaita moya'aida tokoyona. E, ka'i yada dewa koyona kanahawavekemena digo, Bana bonana keke ase'asedeya gidadauda.

E, Bana Tauna gi'alika higa yada koyona ana laufata Bana giyawelina be Yaubada yana ila'a ginahavaina fa'ina, tu keke ide'eyaogaga yada koyona ana laufata au tomiyababi moya'aida yada koyona ana laufata fa'ina gi'alika.
Atu ka'i Yaubada yana vehimeya ka'ita'itave'avina o, ide adafaiweya kanagahe kanagayo, “Wona velemona Yaubada gahalamanena.”
Hai kaliva hidedemi ugahe, vaita o Yaubada uhalamanena tu yana vehimeya udibudibutoyogena, au o'eni tofwaya, nuwanuwa velemo'ena keke ase'aseniya gidadauda.

Tu hai kaliva Yaubada bonana u'abi'abina, medema ya nuwanuwa Yaubada againe use-'owona. Ide Yaubada buye kave'atutamo'aida ma gavaiya'amine kanahalamaneni velemo'ena? Ka'i Bana bonana ka'abi'abina o, ide Yaubada againe kamiyave'avina.
E, hai kaliva gigahe gigayo, “Iya Yaubada buye ave'atutamo'aima,” medema gilubodana be Yesu Keliso gihuluva amine, kadu gidahuluhuluva.

Tu hida vehimeyai-nadi ma vaita ivaguna, fa'ina mahalina velemo'ena gilakalakata be gitutuvemahalida againe uyuyu ana tova gihavahavaina. Ada vehimeya ivaguna bana au velemo'ena ma Keliso giseyemaunena, kadu omi yami huluva againe waseyemaunena.

Hai kaliva tobohiyana fa'ina ginuwanuwa lakahina medema mahalina againe gimimiyami, ada keke tamo gavadi ase'asene gidadauda-yo ginatutumadumadu-yo koyona againe ginabe'u, fa'ina mahalina bana yana eda gitutuvemahalina.
Tu hai kaliva tobohiyana againe ginuwanuwakoyo, medema uyuyu againe gimimiyami kadu uyuyu againe ginunudadana, ada eda tunutunugina ginufaniyena fa'ina matana gi'uyuyuna.
Natukweyao, omi tovetumagana ma agaimiya ga'etoladi, fa'ina Yesu Keliso yana alika againe Yaubada yami koyona giyawelina.

Kadu kamakweyao, omi agaimiya ga'etoladi fa'ina Bana'e boi tuwai-mo'ena babi ana abave'inuba againe gimiyamiya-vagata ma wahalamanena. Kadu kaikweyao, omi agaimiya ga'etoladi fa'ina kaliva koyona Setani againe walugaviya be wafaiwalahegehegena.

Kadu natukweyao, omi agaimiya ahe ga'etoladi fa'ina Tamada wahalamanena. Kadu kamakweyao, omi agaimiya a ga'etoladi fa'ina Bana'e boi tuwai-mo'ena babi ana abave'inuba againe gimiyamiya-vagata amanadi wahalamanena. Kadu kaikweyao, omi agaimiya a ga'etoladi fa'ina ase'asemiya wafifaiwala, ada Yaubada bonana ase'asemiya gidadauda, ada Setani againe walugaviya be wafaiwalahegehegena.

Wa'ita, gavadi gavadi moya'aina babi againe hive'inuba, medema inubadi keke Tamada againe, higa kaliva dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana, kadu gavadi gavadi fa'idiya matadi itadawadawanina kadu gavadi moya'aina fa'ina taudiyao adi egana hikikilakahina. Mena gaitomai-dina inubadi ma keke Tamada againe, au hida babi againe hive'inuba.
Kadu hida babi ana nuwanuwa gihavahavaina, kadu gaitoma moya'aina tomiyababi hi'ita'italuvadigena-ma gihavahavaina tu hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa gidibudibumuhigena, medema ginamiyamiya-vagata.

Hida kalivai-dina keke velemo'ena ide tovetumagana yada yo'o kalivadi, ada hidema fa'ina himaduvehaileda. Ka'i badi velemo'ena yada yo'o kalivadi digo, badi ide buye aimo kadamiyami. Tu badi a hina, fa'ina ide kahalamane-hagihagiyena badi moya'aidi keke yada yo'o kalivadi.
Tu Kaliva Mahamahalina higa Keliso Bana Alu'aluwa Mahalina omi agaimiya gihawahegena be givemagami, ada hidema fa'ina omi moya'aimi nuwanuwa velemo'ena wahalamanena.

Tu hida leta ma keke vaita nuwanuwa velemo'ena wadafaniyeni fa'ina gada'etoladini, keke. Ga'etoladi fa'ina makewa omi nuwanuwa velemo'ena wahalamanena, kadu keke tamo fwaya Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe gidave'inuba ma wahalamanena.

Tu hakwa'adi ma tofwaya? Hai kaliva sa'eyana yo'o hinafadiya Yesu fa'ine ginagahe ginagayo, “Yesu keke Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida amanadi,” medema kalivai-nadi tofwaya, ada bana hidevama ana egana Keliso Nibaina Lakahina. E, Tamada kadu Natuna buye inubadi gikilowena higa vaita Yesu Keliso Tamana mali kaliva, keke Yaubada.
Gaveyao Yaubada Natuna inubana hikilowena, medema agaidiya keke Tamada gidamiyami. Tu gaveyao hinagahe hinagayo, “Yesu Bana Yaubada Natuna,” medema agaidiya Tamada gimimiyami.

Tu omi'iyao ma wana'itave'avimi be bona boi tuwaina wavebutu wavetumagana againe wanogalina amanadi nuwahinagemiya ginaduva-vagata. Ka'i mena bonai-nadi boi tuwaina wanogalina-ma ase'asemiya ginadauda, au Tamada againe kadu Natuna againe wanamiyamiyave'avina tova moya'aina.
Ada Keliso Tauna ide agaideya giwonadabadaba gigayo, “Yawai-vagahimi ganavelemi.”
Au hida Keliso nibaineyao yadi vehawala fa'ina ga'etoladi be badi nuwanuwadi yadi fwaya againe hinanuwa'abiyemi amanadi yadi dewa fa'ina ganavenuwa'atami.

Tu omi'iyao ma Keliso Alu'aluwa Mahalina agaimiya gihawahegena be givemagami, ada Tauna nuwahinagemiya gimimiyami tova moya'aina. Au ami vehawala fa'ina keke mali kaliva gidalubodami. Bana anakaibe ami tovehawala velemo'ena, nuwanuwa moya'aina givehavehawalemi, ada yana vehawala keke fwaya, au velemo'ena. Ada au Alu'aluwa Mahalina givehawalemi amine, Keliso againe wanamiyave'avina.
Au Keliso Bana yegayega-mo'ena ma wahalamanena. Kadu anafaiweya gaveyao yadi dewa yegayegana, medema Yaubada natuneyao. Au hidedemi amifaiweya wanahalamanena.

Ho tobohiya'ase'asekweyao, tova adamoya ide Yaubada natuneyao, tu tova mulina ide vaita gaveyao kikaiwabudiyao amine kanamiyami medema keke kadahalamane-hagihagiyeni. Tu gaitoma sa'eyana kahalamanena higa Keliso ginayewa'ela ana toveya, ide ada ita'ita Keliso ana ita'ita amine ginalakayemu, fa'ina kaliva-mo'ena ide kana'itana.

Ada gaveyao moya'aimi nuwanuwami Keliso ana ita'ita amine ami ita'ita ginalakayemu ma fa'ina walulauboda, medema ase'asemi wa'ita'itave'avina be Keliso yegayega-mo'ena gimimiyami amine, meda omi yegayegamiyao wanamiyami.
Tu hai kaliva koyona gifaisewana, medema Yaubada yana vehimeya giyawelina. E, dewa koyona ana egana vehimeya ana aiyawela.
Omi wahalamanena Keliso gihobu'ela be kaliva yada koyona ginavaihegena fa'ina. Kadu wahalamanena keke tamo gavadi koyona Bana againe gidadauda.

Gaveyao Keliso againe himiyamiyave'avina, medema keke hidahuluhuluva koyona, tu gaveyao tova moya'aina hihuluhuluva koyona, medema Keliso inubana keke hidahalamaneni kadu Keliso Tauna keke hidahalamaneni.

Hai kaliva tova moya'aina gihuluhuluva koyona, medema Setani yana kaliva, fa'ina huluva koyona medema Setani yana huluva. Boi tuwai-mo'ena babi ana abave'inuba againe huluva koyona givebutuna tu ginunauwena tova adamoya. Ada hidema ana inuba Yaubada Natuna gihobu'ela, higa Setani yana gugai ginayawelina fa'ina.

Hai kaliva Yaubada natuna, medema keke gidahuluhuluva koyona, fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa bana nuwane gidadauda. E, bana kaliva alu'aluwana Yaubada yawaine gitubuga-havagi fa'ina keke anafaiweya ginahuluhuluva koyona.

Gavaiya'amine kanahalamaneni gaveyao Yaubada natuneyao kadu gaveyao Setani natuneyao? Hai kaliva yana dewa keke tunutunugina, medema keke Yaubada natuna. Meda anafaiweya hai kaliva tobohiyana againe keke gidanuwanuwa, medema keke Yaubada natuna. Au hidede amine kahalamanena.

Ada keke Keni Adama natuna amine kanahuluva. Bana Setani yana kaliva ada taina velemo'ena giluve'alikana. Gavana fa'ina-yo giluve'alikani? Me Keni yana huluva koyona tu taina yana huluva tunutunugina, au hidema fa'ina giluve'alikana.

Tobohiyakweyao, ka'i tomiyababi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma omi agaimiya hinavenibaina amine, keke wanayaulowoga, fa'ina Keni Setani yana nuwanuwa koyona gihuluvina amine, kadu badi omi hinahuluvimi.

Tobohiyadeyao fa'idiya kahawahawahegeda fa'ina, ide kahalamanena alika-vagata ana eda kahege tu yawai-vagahida ana edeya kadamana be kananauna. Hai kaliva badi tobohiyamomo fa'idiya keke unahawahawahege, medema aimo alika ana eda againe unanauna.
Hakwa'adi tobohiyana againe ginuwanuwakoyo, medema toluve'alika, ada omi wahalamanena toluve'alika keke yawai-vagahina ana eda againe gidanauna.

Ka'i kaliva sa'eyana wakalivana tu tobohiyana gina'itana, anaga keke yana lokoloko keke ada keke gidahinekalikaliyeni yo gidavelugani, au hawahega Yaubada againe keke-mo'a bana nuwahinagene gidadauda.
Natukweyao, keke kebuladeya o ka'i meyadeya tobohiyadeyao fa'idiya kanahawahegeda, au kanahawahegeda velemo'ena be nimadeya o ka'i agedeya kanavelugadi.

Ka'i tobohiyadeyao fa'idiya kanahawahegeda velemo'ena, au Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe kamimiyami ma kanahalamanena. Kadu'e, ka'i kanahawahegeda velemo'ena, au Yaubada matane adafaiweya kanamiyami keke yada wamatauta.

E, ka'i yada koyona fa'ina vita ase'asedeya kana'ayaunena, au yada wanuwayamumu Yaubada matane adafaiweya kanamiyami, fa'ina Yaubada yana halamana ide yada halamana gitubuhegena, au Bana yada nuwanuwa moya'aina inubana gihalamane-'owona, ada Bana againe kahawahegeda fa'ina yada koyona ginayawelina.
Tu tobohiyakweyao, ka'i kahalamanena koyona keke kadafaisewani ada hidema fa'ina keke vita ase'asedeya kada'ayauneni, au yada wa'atuvefa'ila Yaubada matane adafaiweya kanamiyami.
Kadu gavadi gavadi fa'ina kanave'o'ola, medema ginaveleda, fa'ina yana vehimeya ka'ita'itave'avina ada yana nuwanuwa amine kahuluhuluva.
Ada yana vehimeya fa'ina ganakivetuvetunumi, higa Natuna Yesu Keliso ana egana kanavetumaganena, ada Keliso givehimeyeda amine taudeyao agaideya kanave'ahawahawahega.

Omi gaveyao Yaubada yana vehimeya wa'ita'itave'avina, medema Yaubada againe wamiyamiyave'avina ada Bana'e omi agaimiya meda anafaiweya gimiyamiyave'avina. Ada Yaubada ide agaideya gimiyamiyave'avina ma gavaiya'amine kahalamaneni? Me Bana Alu'aluwana giveleda be Tauna nuwahinagedeya gimimiyami fa'ina kahalamanena.

Gavaiya'amine wanahalamaneni Yaubada Alu'aluwana tolaumamala awane gilukahihi? Me hai kaliva yana laumamala againe ginagahe ginagayo, “Yesu Keliso babiya gihobu'ela be givekaliva,” medema againe Yaubada Alu'aluwana gimimiyami.

Atu hai kaliva ginagahe ginagayo, “Yesu Keliso keke babiya gidahobu'ela gidavekaliva,” medema againe Yaubada Alu'aluwana keke gidamiyami. Au hida gahe inubana amanadi bana Keliso Nibaina Lakahina alu'aluwana againe gilakayemu. Bana aimo gina'ela ma valeyana ahe wanogalina, ada au a gi'ela babiya gimimiyami.
Tu natukweyao, omi Yaubada yana kaliva, ada badi fwayafwayadiyao wafaiwalahegehegedi, fa'ina Alu'aluwa Mahalina omi agaimiya gimimiyami-ma babi ana kaliva adi tovehimeya gifaiwalahegena.
Badi tove'alololo ma babi ana kaliva keke Yaubada yana kaliva, ada au babi ana nuwanuwa fa'ina hilulumamala ada tomiyababi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma bonadi hivenogalena.

Tu ide'eyao ma Yaubada yana kaliva. Gaveyao Yaubada hihalamanena, medema bonada hivenogalena, ada gaveyao keke Yaubada yana kaliva, medema keke bonada hidavenogaleni. Au hidede amine alu'aluwa adi'iselu inubadi kanuwave'uve'una, higa Alu'aluwa Mahalina nuwanuwa velemo'ena inubana tu alu'aluwa uyu'uyuyuna ve'alololo inubana.

Tobohiyakweyao, taudeyao agaideya kanave'ahawahawahega, fa'ina Yaubada mena nuwanuwa hawahawahegana inubana. Ada gaveyao tobohiyadiyao fa'idiya hihawahawahegedi, medema Yaubada natuneyao ada Yaubada hihalamanena.

Wa'ita, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa matatabuna hawahawahegana. Hai kaliva keke tobohiyaneyao fa'idiya gidahawahegeni, medema keke Yaubada gidahalamaneni, fa'ina keke nuwanuwa hawahawahegana amine tobohiyaneyao gidahuluvidi.
Gavaiya'amine Yaubada yana hawahega ide agaideya giseyemauneni? Me Bana Natuna anakaibe'u-mo'a gi'iveninisena ada babiya gihobu'ela be yawaida velemo'ena Bana Natuna againe kanavaina.

Ada mena hawahega inubana ma keke ide Yaubada againe yada nuwanuwa kadaseni, au Bana'e ide agaideya yana nuwanuwa gisena, ada Natuna gi'iveninisena be Bana gina'alika, higa yada koyona ana laufata Bana ginawahina be Yaubada yana ila'a ginahavaina fa'ina.
Keke tamo hakwadi Yaubada gida'itani. Tu ka'i taudeyao agaideya kanave'ahawahawahega amine, Yaubada agaideya gimiyamiyave'avina ada yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asedeya gitubutubuga-mo'a.
Ada Tamada Natuna gi'iveninisena be tomiyababi ginakibababaleda ma ime a'itana kadu a'awatalatalainena.

Gava kaliva yo'o hinafadiya ginagahe ginagayo, “Yesu velemo'ena Yaubada Natuna,” ka'i hidede amine ginagahe, au Yaubada bana againe gimiyamiyave'avina, ada bana kaliva Yaubada againe gimiyamiyave'avina.
Ada au ide taudeyao kahalamanena kadu kanuwave'avina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ide agaideya giseusena.

E, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa matatabuna hawahawahegana, ada gava kaliva mena Yaubada yana nuwanuwai-nadi amine gihuluhuluva, bana Yaubada againe gimiyamiyave'avina ada Yaubada bana kaliva againe gimiyamiyave'avina.

Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ase'asedeya giseusena be gitubutubuga-mo'a, higa vaita adafaiweya kana'asevatu vedewayauga ana toveya. Ada au medema tovai-nadi adafaiweya kana'asevatu, fa'ina Keliso yana wa'asevatu Yaubada matane gimimiyami amine, meda ide hidei babiya kamimiyami yada wa'asevatu Yaubada matane.

Hai kaliva Yaubada yana nuwanuwa bana againe gi'aya'ayaunena, medema matauta keke anafaiweya ase'asena gina'onani. E, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana agaideya gitubuga-mo'a fa'ina, matauta giwavina. Ka'i kamatamatauta, au yada matauta inubana vaita Yaubada ginavematahiwadiyeda. Ada gaveyao tomatauta, medema agaidiya Yaubada yana nuwanuwa hawahawahegana ana halamana aimo keke gidatubuga-mo'a.

Ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagahe ginagayo, “Iya nuwanuwaku Yaubada,” tu tobohiyana againe ginuwanuwakoyo, bana kalivai-nadi tofwaya, keke velemo'ena nuwanuwana Yaubada. Wa'ita, ka'i keke nuwanuwana tobohiyana ahe gi'ita'itana amanadi, kadu keke nuwanuwana Yaubada, Bana'e keke gida'itani amanadi.
Ada au Keliso hida vehimeya giveleda, higa gava kaliva yana nuwanuwa Yaubada againe giseusena, gilubodana be kadu tobohiyana againe yana nuwanuwa gidaseusena.
Kadu'e, gaveyao hivetumagana higayo, “Yesu au Keliso Yaubada yana Tovegida amanadi,” medema Yaubada natuneyao. Ada gaveyao nuwanuwadi Tamada, medema kadu nuwanuwana natuneyao.
Gavaiya'amine kahalamaneni Yaubada natuneyao agaidiya yada nuwanuwa kaseuseni? Me Tamada Yaubada againe yada nuwanuwa kaseusena ada yana vehimeya ka'ita'itave'avina.
Ka'i velemo'ena Yaubada againe yada nuwanuwa kasena, au yana vehimeya ka'ita'itave'avina. Ada yana vehimeya keke vitana, au ihayana.

Ada au adafaiweya kana'ita'itave'avina, fa'ina gaveyao Yaubada natuneyao, medema adifaiweya babi ana nuwanuwa hinafifaiwalahegehegedi. Ada gavaiya'amine babi ana nuwanuwa kanafaiwalahegehegedi? Me yada vetumagana againe adafaiweya wai kananagona be babi ana nuwanuwa ginayewa.
E, hakwa'adi anafaiweya babi ana nuwanuwa ginafaiwalahegehegedi? Bana givetuvetumagana amanadi hida Yesu au Yaubada Natuna, au bana anakaibe anafaiweya wai ginanagona be babi ana nuwanuwa ginayewa.
Ada Yesu yana ela au hidede amine ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina gi'alakakilina, ada Bana yana hawavemogatala keke fwaya, au velemo'ena.

E, gaitoma tohiye Bana Yesu Keliso fa'ine hihawahawavemogatala, sa'eyana ma Alu'aluwa Mahalina, anavelu gufa, kadu anaveto dayaga. Ada hida tohawavemogatala tohiye yadi gahe leleleya, higa Yesu au Yaubada Natuna.

Tomiyababi yadi awatalatalaina kavetumaganena ada medema gaitoma lakahina, tu Yaubada yana awatalatalaina gaitoma lakahi-mo'ena, fa'ina yana awatalatalaina kanavetumagane-mo'ena. Ada au Bana Yaubada gavaimi gihawavemogatala? Me Natuna fa'ine gihawavemogatala.

Gava kaliva Yaubada Natuna givetuvetumaganena, medema Yaubada yana hawavemogatala Natuna fa'ine bana ase'asene gidadauda. Tu gava kaliva Yaubada yana gahe Natuna fa'ine keke gidavetumaganeni, medema vaita gidagayo, “Yaubada tofwaya,” fa'ina Yaubada yana hawavemogatala Natuna fa'ine keke gidavetumaganeni.
Ada hawavemogatalai-nadi hidede amine. Yaubada yawai-vagahida giveleda ada mena yawai-vagata Natuna againe give'inuba.
Gaveyao nuwahinagemiya Yaubada Natuna Tauna gimimiyami, medema yawai-vagahimi ahe wanuhagana, tu gaveyao nuwahinagemiya Yaubada Natuna Tauna keke gidamiyami, medema yawai-vagahimi keke wadanuhagani.
Ka'i Yaubada yana nuwanuwa amine kanave'o'ola, au gavadi gavadi fa'ina kanave'o'ola, medema ginavenogaleda. Ada hidedemi ginavenogaleda fa'ina, ide Yaubada matane adafaiweya kana'asevatu.
E, tova moya'aina yada ve'o'ola givenovenogalena. Ada givenogaleda velemo'ena ma kahalamanena fa'ina, kadu yada ve'o'ola guwana ahe kanuhagana ma kahalamanena.
Huluva koyona tulina tulina ana egana au koyona, tu tamo koyona sa'eyanaga fa'ina alika-vagata kananuhagana.
Kadu kahalamanena ide Yaubada natuneyao, ada tomiyababi moya'aidi Yaubada keke hidahalamaneni-ma kaliva koyona Setani nimane himimiyami.

Kadu kahalamanena Yaubada Natuna ahe gihobu'ela, ada halamana giveleda be higa Yaubada Bana anakaibe velemo'ena ma kanahalamanena. Ada ide Yaubada Bana velemo'ena amanadi buye kave'atutamo'aida, higa Natuna Yesu Keliso buye kave'atutamo'aida. Bana'e au Yaubada velemo'ena ada Bana'e yawai-vagahida inubana.
(Iya Yoni bonaku.)

Yo siule neve'a, omi'e Yaubada giluwafami amanadi, kadu natumiyao buye siule. Iya to'ekelesiya adi Tonagona yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Wona velemona nuwanuwaku omi'iyao tu keke iya akukaibe, au moya'aidi Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena hihalamanena-ma kadu nuwanuwadi omi'iyao.
Iya nuwanuwaku omi'iyao fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa velemo'ena ase'asedeya gidadauda ada ide agaideya ginaduva-vagata.
Yaubada Tamada kadu Yesu Keliso Tamada Natuna yadi nuwadoga, yadi hinekalikali yadi aseniwalova agaidiya kanamiyami, ide kavetumagana velemo'ena kadu tobohiyadeyao fa'idiya kahawahawahegeda amanadi.
Keke gavana fa'ina tu iya gavemwamwala lakahina, fa'ina natumiyao tufoidi valeyadi ganogalina higa Tamada givehimeyeda amine nuwanuwa velemo'ena hidibudibumuhigena.

Siule neve'a, gahawanuwenuwemi moya'aida taudeyao agaideya kanave'ahawahawahega. Hida yaku gahe hawahega fa'ina ga'etoladina-ma keke vehimeya ivaguna, au boi kavebutu kavetumagana ana toveya vehimeyai-nadi kanogalina.

Ada nuwanuwa hawahawahegana hidede amine, higa Yaubada yana vehimeya moya'aina ana itave'avina againe kanamiyami. Meda boi wavebutu wavetumagana ana toveya hida vehimeya wanogalina, higa nuwanuwa hawahawahegana againe wanamiyami.

Tu tove'alololo moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya ahe hilakayemu. Badi kalivai-dina hive'alololo higayo, “Yesu Keliso keke babiya gidavekaliva.” Hai kaliva hidede amine gigahe, medema Tove'alololo Lakahina, ana egana Keliso Nibaina.
Au yadi ve'alololo fa'ina wana'itave'avimi be yami faisewa fatana keke wananuhegeni, au ami laufata matatabuna wananuhagana.

Hai kaliva Yesu yana vehawala againe keke gidamiyave'avina tu tauna yana nuwanuwa give'atutamo'aina, medema nuwahinagene Yaubada Tauna keke gidamiyami. Tu hai kaliva Keliso yana vehawalagaga againe gimiyamiyave'avina, medema nuwahinagene Tamada kadu Natuna Taudiyao himimiyami.
Ka'i tamo hakwadi tolaumamala omi agaimiya gina'ela ada keke Yesu yana vehawalagaga gidalumamalemi, keke yami manuweya wanalukuweni kadu keke wanalusiuleyeni.
Ka'i wanalusiuleyena digo, kadu omi vaita yana faisewa koyona buye wadafifaisewani.

Au nuwanuwaku gaitoma moya'aina omi agaimiya ganalukahihiyena tu keke nuwanuwaku fefe againe ganalukahihi. Au ganuwave'avina vaita omi agaimiya tauku gana'ela ada kanavebonanoganogala be higa buye kanavemwamwala-mo'a.
Au tobohiyami Yaubada giluwafadi-ma natudiyao buye yadi lusiule agaimiya.
(Iya to'ekelesiya adi Tonagona bonaku.)
Ho tobohiyaku, o fa'iniya gave'o'ola be unamiyami yamumuna, kadu aulolo keke ginavaini. Alu'aluwa yana miyami yamumuna Yaubada matane ma a gahalamanena.

Tobohiyadeyao tufoidi hidedei hilakayemu be valeya hilukahihiyena fa'ina nuwaku giyamumu lakahina. O fa'iniya higahe higayo, “Nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana muliya againe bana kaliva dibudibumuhigina. E, kadu nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe tova moya'aina gimimiyami.”
Ka'i natukweyao nuwanuwa velemo'ena againe himimiyami-ma valeyadi hidede amine gananogalina, au nuwaku ginayamumu lakahina. E, hidedema againe yaku vemwamwala gitubuga-mo'a.
Ada badi kalivai-dina to'ekelesiya ama yo'o agaimeya ya nuwanuwa hawahawahegana. Au badi Yaubada yana faisewa hi'abi'abina fa'ina, giluboda be yadina fa'ina gavadi gavadi nuwanuwadi amine, unaveledi.
Au Keliso fa'ine tolaumamalai-dina yadi melala hihegena ada kaliva Yesu Keliso keke hidavetumaganeni-ma agaidiya keke tamo gavadi adi veluga fa'ina hidavivaini.
Au ide tovetumagana gilubodada be hida kalivai-dina kadavelugadi be nuwanuwa velemo'ena ana ve'aliyahega againe ide badi buye moya'aida kanakilakahina.
Tu to'ekelesiya ana yo'o ya melala againe yami leta boi ga'etoladina, tu bana Daiyotelefo nuwanuwana lakahina ginanagoyemi-ma keke gidabona'abiyeku.

Au aimo gana'ela ana toveya, yana dewa omi matamiya ganayakahina, higa giveyaveyaineku tu mema gigahegahe-kawowo. Ada yana koyona give'atutamo'aina, fa'ina tobohiyadeyao tolaumamalai-dina hilakayemu againe keke gidavetobohiyanedi, kadu badi nuwanuwadi hinavetobohiyanedi-ma gihawatadi, ada adi egana giyawelina be keke manuwa-tafalolo againe hinaluku.
Au nuwanuwaku gaitoma moya'aina o againiya ganalukahihiyena tu keke nuwanuwaku feni againe ganalukahihi.
Au ganuwave'avina be tova kabi'ona kanave'amagigi'ita'ita ada kanavebonanoganogala.
Yaubada aseniwalova ginavele. Tobohiyamomo yadi nuwakabubu againiya, kadu tobohiyameyao ya melala againe yama nuwakabubu agaidiya unagaheyena.
(Iya to'ekelesiya adi Tonagona bonaku.)

Yo siule omi Yaubada giluwafami-ma kalivai-mina. Iya Yuda Yesu Keliso ana agetoga kadu bana Yemesa taina yami leta ga'etoladina be wana'itana. Omi higa Yaubada Tamada agaimiya ginuwanuwa kadu Yesu Keliso giyavayavami.
Yaubada yana hinekalikali yana aseniwalova yana nuwakabubu ana ayauna againe wanatutuveguvegulami.

Tobohiya'ase'asekweyao, keke gavana fa'ina tu nagona ganuwanuwa vaita ada kibababala Yaubada againe omi kadu ime buye kanuhagana-ma fa'ina agaimiya gada'etoladini, tu adamoya nuwanuwa sa'eyana magigiku gimadubodana. Fa'ina nuwanuwaku ganagahevagadonemi be tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao agaidiya Keliso ana vetumagana velemo'ena wanalugolegolena, vetumaganai-nadi boi tuwaina tova sa'eyanaga Yaubada ime afositolo awameya ide yana yo'ogaga gihawaveleveleda.

Wa'ita, kaliva tufoidi Yaubada hivenikohiyena-ma yami yo'o agaimiya hilukukau be hilolomi. Yaubada yana gahe hikivilavilana higahe higayo, “Dewa udo'udona au adafaiweya fa'ina Yaubada ginanuwadogeda be yada koyona keke ginalaufata.” Au hidedemi hivehawala be Yesu Keliso hivekekeyena, Bana anakaibe yada Tovehimeya kadu yada Kaiwabu. Tuwai-mo'ena tovehawalai-dina fwayafwayadiyao adi matahiwadi fa'ina Veyao Tuwaina ana buki gigaheye-vagahina.

Kadu badi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata dibudibutoyogidiyao wananuwenuwedi. Yaubada abavehimeya giveledi tu adi vehimeya keke hida'itave'avini. Keke nuwanuwadi Bana hina'idibumuhigeni fa'ina, yadi abamiya hihegena ada Yaubada umalovaneya gikive'avidi-yo bulava miyamiya-vagahina againe giyogodi be hinamiyami tu vedewayauga ana toveya.

Meda anafaiweya Sodoma be Gomola kadu adi awa'awaneya melala tufoidi wananuwenuwedi. Badi kalivai-dina dewa udo'udona againe hihawahegedi lobama ana tovenuwa'ata koyodiyao amine. Yaubada adi ayauna giveledi amine keke hidahuluva, au mali kaliva agaidiya matadi giludigadigaga-mo'a. Mena melalai-dina aba'ita higa kaliva gaveyao dewa udo'udona tulina tulina agaidiya hinahawahegedi digo, ai gi'alata-vagata ma againe adi matahiwadi hinanuhagana.

Kadu meda anafaiweya badi tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao hihuluhuluva. Yadi avayauna hiyauyauna vaita Yaubada gidahawahegedi be dewa udo'udona againe taudiyao wowodi hikikivekoyona, abavehimeya hihawave'iyohoyohoyena, lobama ana kaliva kikaiwabudiyao hi'ihawadamanedi.

Gilubodadi be keke hina'ihawadamanedi. Boi tuwai-mo'ena Mosese gi'alika againe Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata adi tonagona ana egana Maikeli Mosese ana aitauna fa'ina gi'iveninisena, ada wowona fa'ina Setani buye hivekwageya. Tu bana Maikeli kaliva kikaiwabu-mo'ena nonogana keke-mo'a yana wa'ihawadamana Yaubada matane Setani gidahawavekoyoyeni. Au gigahe'abobowena gigayo, “Kaiwabu ginadakeye.”

Maikeli kaliva kikaiwabuna nonogana yana wawowomumu Setani gigahena. Badi tovehawalai-dina kaliva-kawowodiyao fa'ina gilubodadi be lobama ana kaliva kikaiwabudiyao hidawowomumuyedi. Tu badi kwavakwavadiyao gaitoma tulina tulina keke hidahalamanedi-ma hihawavelaigedi. Ada gaitoma higa-kawokawowoyedi vaita kevakeva walawala'a keke wanuwadiyao amine, medema gaitomai-dina agaidiya adi agolaufofola hinuhagana.

Lefo dokidoki wabugobugona taliyeya gilulakahina amine, badi yadi dewa wowowomumuna hiseseyemaunena. Kadu badi vaita ibadibadi akolukoludiyao amine. Nagona ka'itadi vaita mahamahalidiyao tu muliya gimaduhavaidi. Yadi abaga umalovana-kahukahu againe Yaubada ahe gikidewedewena ada medema againe hinamiyamiya-vagata.

Tu boi tuwai-mo'ena bana Inoki badi tovehawala fwayafwayadiyao fa'idiya gigaheye-vagahina. Bana hima Inoki Adama yana yo'o anaveseveni ada gigaheye-vagahina gigayo, “Wa'ita, Kaiwabu ginahobu'ela kadu yana tovenuwa'ata mahamahalidiyao tausani tausani a gavaiyehi buye hinahobu'ela be kaliva moya'aida ginavedewayaugida. Ginavehimeya be kaliva gaveyao moya'aidi Yaubada hivenikohiyena, medema adi matahiwadi hinanuhagana. Yadi dewa koyona moya'aina hififaisewadi kadu yadi wonakoyokoyo Yaubada againe hiyakayakahina-ma vaita Yaubada hidavenikohiyeni. Yadi venikohihegahega fa'ina Yaubada ginavematahiwadiyedi.” Au hidedemi Inoki gigahe.

Tova moya'aina hida hima tovehawalai-dina hi'ala'alawoluwolu kadu vita taudiyao hinuhagana-ma fa'ina mali kaliva hikiholiholina. Taudiyao yadi nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana hihuluvina. Taudiyao adi egana hikilakahina kadu mali kaliva hive'amohinesebesebedi.
Hida hima kalivai-dina omi tovetumagana hiludakami, dibudi koyona ana nuwanuwa hihuluvina, badi agaidiya Alu'aluwa Mahalina keke gidamiyami.
(Iya Yuda bonaku.)

Hida buki ana gahegahe ma Yaubada Yesu Keliso givelena be higa gavadi gavadi tova kabisona makewa'e hinalakayemu, medema Yesu Keliso ide Yaubada ana agetoga agaideya ginahawavemogatalena. Yesu Keliso yana tovenuwa'ata lobama amine gi'iveninisena be mena gaitomai-dina hinalakayemu-ma iya Yoni gihawaveleveleku, iya Bana ana agetoga amanadi.
Iya Yoni gaitoma matatabuna ga'eno'itayena-ma agaimiya omi ga'awatalatalainena. E, Yaubada yana inuba gihawavemogatalena be Yesu Keliso gi'awatalatalainena-ma fa'ina hida buki againe gavenuwa'atami.

Gaitomai-dina hinalakayemu-ma adi aituha giluveda'ufo. Mena aituha giluveda'ufo fa'ina, hai kaliva hida Yaubada yana venuwa'ata ana gahegahe yo'o matadiya ginahawana, medema vemwamwala ginanuhagana. Kadu kaliva gaveyao hida buki ana hawa hinanogalina be ana nuwanuwa hinavenogalena, medema vemwamwala hinanuhagana.

Tu ide Bana Yesu Keliso kanahawadavadavana, fa'ina Bana agaideya ginuwanuwa ada dayagina gimadu-yo yada koyona ana laufata gisena be giyauda, kadu gikilakahida be yana abavehimeya againe ide Bana buye kavehivehimeya, kadu yana Yaubada Tamana ana hawadavadava ana tofaisewa giseda. E, Yesu Keliso ana egana kanakilakahina ada yana kikaiwabu yana faiwala ginaduva-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Ehe hidedemi.

Wese wa'ita, buhibuhi againe gi'ela'ela ada kaliva moya'ai-mo'eda kana'itana. E, badi hi'onana-ma taumadi hina'itana ada tomiyababi moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya Bana tovematahiwadi gi'ela'ela fa'ina taudiyao fa'idiya hinatagilulaukuhi. Wona velemona ehe hidedemi.

Yaubada Kaiwabu Bana'e tova moya'aina gimiyamiya-vagata, e tuwaina gimiyami adamoya gimimiyami aimo ginamiyami amanadi gigahe gigayo, “Iya inubane kadu tabone.” Hidedemi Yaubada Tofaiwala-mo'a gigahe.

Tu iya'eku kadu omi'iyao Yesu yana kaliva fa'ina, iya Yoni omi tawami, ada omi amine meda iya'eku vita lakahina Yesu fa'ine kanunuhagana kadu yana abavehimeya againe kamimiyami kadu yana veluga againe ka'atu'atuvefa'ila. Iya Yaubada bonana galumamalena kadu Yesu fa'ine ga'awatalatalaina fa'ina hikive'aviku-yo yadi aba'aiyogona himula ana egana Fatimo againe hinauweku.
Fatimo gamiyami tu tafaloloya higa yada Kaiwabu yana aiyeta Bana Alu'aluwana giluvaiyeku-yo tamo hakwadi agona vaita hiulega agona amine wamulikuya ganogalina.

Bana gigahe'awafatafata gigayo, “Gavadi gavadi wana'itadi medema bukiya wana'etoladina be tovetumagana adi yo'o seveni agaidiya wana'iveninisena be hina'itana. Yo'oi-dina seveni yadi melala hidede amine, Efeso, Simena, Fegamo, Daiyataila, Sadisi, Filadelifiya, Leyodisiya.” Hidedemi gigahe.
Tu iya gahagavilaku higa hakwadi gigahegaheku ma gada'itana. Gahagavilaku-yo lamufa ana abasewadi seveni gola againe hibubudi-ma ga'itadi.

Ada lamufa ana abasewadi hinafadiya kaliva sa'eyana ga'itana, ana ita vaita Bana'e givekaliva-ma amine. Vaigau kikaiwabuna gi'osena higa ana aikeva tunugina agena gilifi-'owona, ada niniwala gola againe hibubuna-ma avaune gihifona.
U'una vaita galu'eguhi amine, au gikwayanuwanuwa howahowa amine kadu matana give'akinamanamalena vaita ai'ala'alata amine.
Kadu agena ve'akinamanamalina ana ita vaita kainumula yagoyagona ai'ala'alata lakahina againe hikabuna be give'akinamanamalena amine. Kadu agona vaita gufa lakahina gihobuhobu butuna amine.
Nimana i'atagine ibadibadi seveni gi'abidi ada feto nigona luhei sinasinahina awane giyemu. Magigina give'akinamanamalena vaita kauwana getadeya ana ita amine.
Tu iya ga'itana againe Bana agene babiya gabe'u vaita ali'alikaku amine. Au nimana i'atagina agaikuya gisena gigaheku gigayo, “Keke unamatauta. Iya Abave'inuba kadu Abalauyabu.
Iya Tomiya-vagata. Boi ga'alika tu u'ita, wayawaiku gamimiyami ada ganamiyamiya-vagata tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Iya alika kadu to'alika yadi abaga ana tovehimeya, ana kihi Iya nimakuya.
Au hidema fa'ina gavadi gavadi u'ita'itadi, medema una'etoladina. E, gavadi tova adamoya ahe gilakayemu kadu gavadi aimo tova mulina ginalakayemu, medema bukiya una'etoladina.

Ibadibadi seveni i'atagikuya ga'abidi be u'itadi-ma kadu lamufa ana abasewadi gola againe hibubuna-ma adi nuwanuwa sevasevauyana hidede amine. Ibadibadi seveni au Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata badi tovetumagana adi yo'o seveni hi'ita'itave'avidi. Ada lamufa ana abasewadi seveni au tovetumagana adi yo'o seveni.” Hidedemi gigahe.

Kadu Keliso gigaheku gigayo, “Fefe una'etoladina be Efeso againe ginana, higa bana Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata tovetumagana adi yo'o gi'ita'itave'avidi-ma yana leta. Hidedemi yaku nuwanuwa una'etoladina badi miEfeso unagahedi unagayo,
Ibadibadi seveni i'atagikuya ga'abidi be lamufa ana abasewadi gola hinafadiya ganunudadana-ma Iya bonaku hidede amine.

Yami dewa gahalamanena. Yami vediwe kadu yami atuvefa'ila gahalamanena. Kadu omi gahalamanemi, keke nuwanuwami badi tove'alololo kaliva koyodiyao buye wanamiyami, ada badi higahe vaita taudiyao afositolo tu keke velemodi ma ahe wagaluvaluvadi-yo wahalamanena badi hive'alololo.
Omi yaku kaliva fa'ina vita tulina tulina wanuhagana tu tova moya'aina wa'atu'atuvefa'iledi be yami vetumagana againe keke wadagakowakowa, au wa'ase'asevatu.
Mena yami dewa hagihagina tu huluva sa'eyana fa'ina ganadakeyemi. Boi nagona ve'ahawahawahega againe wamiyami, tu adamoya keke.

Ve'ahawahawahega againe wa'ilova fa'ina, yami be'u lakahi-mo'ena. Au nuwami ginanunauyena be gavaiya'amine wabe'u ma wanahalamanena. Wananuwavilami be boi nagona Iya fa'ikuya wanuwanuwa amine adamoya wanahuluhuluva. Ka'i mena yami koyona keke wanavenikohiyeni digo, agaimiya gana'ela yami lamufa ana abasewadi ganalemami be wanamiya-kawowo.
Tu yami dewa sa'eyana nuwaku gikiveyamumuna. Badi Nikolesi yana yo'o adi tufo yadi dewa koyo-mo'ena wavenikohiyena, meda Iya gavenikohiyena amine.

Kadu'e Keliso gigaheku gigayo, “Fefe una'etoladina be Simena againe ginana, higa bana Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata tovetumagana adi yo'o gi'ita'itave'avidi-ma yana leta. Hidedemi yaku nuwanuwa una'etoladina miSimena unagahedi unagayo,
Iya Abave'inuba kadu Abalauyabu. Boi ga'alika tu gamididi-havagi ma bonaku hidede amine.

Omi vita tulina tulina wanuhagana ma gahalamanena. Kadu gahalamanena omi koyokoyomiyao yami lokoloko hilemami tu Yaubada matane omi wakalivamiyao. Iya gahalamanena miYuda tufoidi hiveyaveyainemi. Badi kalivai-dina higahe vaita badi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga. Manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe hitafatafalolo nonogana yadi dewa againe kahalamanedi higa badi Setani yana yo'o.

Tova kabisona ve'umagigi lakahina Iya fa'ikuya wananuhagana tu keke wanamatauta. Gagahemi Setani yana vehimeya againe tufoimi deliya hinasemi be yami vetumagana hinagaluvaluvana, ada aiyeta teni agaidiya vita lakahina wananuhagana be ginahavaina. Ka'i nibaikweyao hinakivekoyomi higa hidaluve'alikami, au ai'adi yami wavetumagana agaikuya wanaluve'avina-vagata ada yami atuvefa'ila fatana higa yawai-vagahimi ganavelemi.
Feto nigona luhei sinasinahina Iya awakuya giyemu-ma bonaku hidede amine.

Yami abamiyami gahalamanena. Mededei Setani givehivehimeya kaliva moya'aidi bana againe hihawahegedi fa'ina. Atu omi'iyao ma Iya agaikuya aimo waluluve'avina, yami vetumagana keke wadahegeni. Mene yami melala Setani yana abavehimeya ma againe yaku tohawavemogatala ana egana Anidifasi Iya fa'ikuya gi'atuvefa'ila tu hiluve'alikana. Ana luve'alika wa'itana nonogana keke wadanuyabuyabuku.
Meda anafaiweya kaliva tufoimi yami yo'o agaimiya badi Nikolesi yana yo'o adi tufo yadi vehawala koyo-mo'ena himuliyena.
Mena dewai-dina gavenikohiyena fa'ina wananuwavilami. Ka'i keke wananuwavilami digo, tova kabi'ona agaimiya gana'ela badi kaliva koyodiyao feto awakuya giyemu-ma againe ganalugaviyadi.
Iya Yaubada Natuna mataku vaita ai'ala'alata amine kadu ageku give'akinamanamalena vaita kainumula yagoyagona kaliva hiyahayahana-ma amine ma bonaku hidede amine.
Yami dewa gahalamanena, yami ve'ahawahawahega kadu yami vetumagana, yami idibumuhiga kadu yami atuvefa'ila. Boi nagona yami hawahega agaikuya tufona tu adamoya lakahi-mo'ena.

Mena yami dewa galukahihiyena-ma hagihagina tu huluva sa'eyana fa'ina ganadakeyemi. Mene yami yo'o agaimiya kwamayoku sa'eyadi himimiyami, yadi dewa ma tuwaina Isileli tokaiwabu vavinena adi egana Yesebeli yadi dewa koyo-mo'ena amine. Wama kwamayoku koyodi taudi hivewagadi vaita badi Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina, ada yadi vehawala againe yaku tofaisewa tufoidi dewa koyona againe hinuwa'abiyedi. Hivehawaledi vaita udo tulina tulina kadu kevakeva kilumina agaidiya mali kaliva hihawadavadavayedi-ma ana'a au gilubodadi. Hidedemi yaku tofaisewa hinuwa'abiyedi tu omi keke kwamayoku wadahawatadi au wahawahegedi.
Iya tova gaveledi higa yadi udo hidavenikohiyena be Iya agaikuya hidahagaviladi, tu hidibutoyoga.

Keke nuwanuwadi yadi dewa udo'udona hinahegeni fa'ina, aulolo ana iviya ganahegedi ada badi buye hi'udo'udo-ma vita keke kabi'ona ganaveledi. E, ka'i badi'e adi tufo keke yadi dewa udo'udona hinavenikohiyeni digo, adamoya aulolo tagiya lakahina ganaveledi.

Badi yadi vehawala nuwadi givaina amanadi vaita natudiyao amine, ada kadu badi'iyao ganaluve'alikadi. Ada au tovetumagana adi yo'o melala tulina tulina agaidiya hinahalamanena Iya kaliva ase'asedi kadu nuwadi ga'ita'itafolena, ada omi sa'eyana sa'eyana yami dewa amine ganalaufata.

Tu omi velugamiyao Daiyataila againe wamimiyami-ma kadu agaimiya ganagahe, higa omi mena vehawala koyona wadibutoyogena ada keke nuwanuwa i'ikauna hivewagana Setani yana nuwahinage ma againe wadasikulu. Yaku gahe hidede amine. Keke vehimeya vitana kadu ganavelemi. Au mena yami dewa hagihagina ahe galukahihiyena-ma wanakidonena wananunauwena tu yaku yewa'ela ana tova.
Omi watagami, gavaimi Yaubada Alu'aluwana omi tovetumagana ami yo'oi-mina agaimiya gigahegahe, medema wanavenogalena. Au hidedemi bonaku.”

Kadu'e Keliso gigaheku gigayo, “Fefe una'etoladina be Sadisi againe ginana, higa bana Yaubada yana tovenuwa'ata tovetumagana adi yo'o gi'ita'itave'avidi-ma yana leta. Hidedemi yaku nuwanuwa una'etoladina miSadisi unagahedi unagayo,

Iya Yaubada Alu'aluwana ana ita vaita alu'aluwa seveni amine kadu ibadibadi seveni agaikuya hidadauda-ma bonaku hidedemi. Yami dewa gahalamanena. Omi valeyami ma vaita yami vetumagana toyogina amine kaliva matadiya, atu wona velemona omi to'alika yami vetumagana kabisona ginahavaina.
Wamidi! Mene yami vetumagana kabisona ginayawowola-ma wanakivetoyogina. Wa'ita, Iya gahalamanena yami dewa aimo keke hagihagi-mo'ena yaku Yaubada matane.

Aimo keke velemona wadanuwanuwa-hagihagi fa'ina, gavaimi yaku kaliva givehawalemi be wanogalina, medemi wananuwa-nunauyena. Au vehawala wavenogale be wanuwavilami. Atu ka'i keke wanamidi, au tokai'afu amine gana'elakau be matahiwadi againe ganaveyaulowogimi.

Hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya yana atuvefa'ila againe gifaiwala-mo'a, medema badi'iyao amine kaleko kwayakwayane ginavaigau. Kadu bana ana egana yaku buki againe keke-mo'a ganayawelini. Buki-nadi againe badi wayawai-vagahidi ma adi egana gidadauda. E, keke ganayawelini, au Kamaku matane kadu badi yana tovenuwa'ata matadiya bana fa'ine ganagahe ganagayo, Bana hidevama yaku kaliva.
Omi watagami, gavaimi Yaubada Alu'aluwana omi tovetumagana ami yo'oi-mina agaimiya gigahegahe, medema wanavenogalena. Bonaku au hidedemi.”

Iya kaliva mahamahaliku kadu velemodi ma bonaku hidedemi. Tuwai-mo'ena tokaiwabu Devida Yelusalema ana tovehimeya, ada kihi bana againe kaliva yadi luku fa'ina. Meda Iya Yelusalema ivaguna ana tovehimeya ada kihi we'a agaikuya. Ka'i mena yaku abaga ana wanafali ganayauna, au keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginafalini. Kadu ka'i ganafalina, keke tamo hakwadi ginayauni.
Yami dewa gahalamanena. Yami faiwala kabi'ona nonogana bonaku wa'abina kadu keke wadavekekeyeku. Au wanafali omi matamiya gayauna tu keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginafalini.

Kadu ganagahe. MiYuda tufoidi yami melaleya higahe vaita badi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga tu hifwaya. Manuwa-abavehawala ana egana sinagogi againe hitafatafalolo nonogana badi Setani yana manuwa kalivai-dina. Yaku vehimeya againe badi kalivai-dina agaimiya hina'ela hina'ibo'ula-mo'a, ada hinahalamanena Iya Tauku agaimiya ganuwanuwa.

Boi gavehimeyemi higa vaita yami wa'asevatu Iya fa'ikuya wada'atuvefa'ila. Mena bonaku wa'abina fa'ina, aimo vita lakahi-mo'ena fafali tulina tulina agaidiya ginalakayemu be tomiyababi moya'aidi ginagaluvaluvadi ana toveya, Iya omi ganalugolegolemi.

Hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya yana atuvefa'ila againe ginafaiwala-mo'a, ganavehimeya be bana yaku Yaubada yana manuwa ginave'ogolena. Keke-mo'a ginahobu, Yaubada matane ginamiyamiya-vagata. Bana againe egana tohiye gana'etoladidi, eganai-dina yaku Yaubada ana egana, yaku Yaubada yana melala ana egana higa Yelusalema ivaguna aimo yaku Yaubada againe walobameya ginahobu'ela-ma melalai-nadi, kadu aku egana ivaguna.
Omi watagami, gavaimi Yaubada Alu'aluwana omi tovetumagana ami yo'oi-mina agaimiya gigahegahe, medema wanavenogalena. Au hidedemi bonaku.”
Iya aku egana To'asevatu, Iya Yaubada ana tohawavemogatala dibudibumuhigiku yaku gahe velemo'ena, Yaubada yana aibubuna Iya agaikuya give'inuba-ma kalivai-kuna bonaku hidede amine.
Yami dewa gahalamanena. Keke wadakiloweku tu kadu wakiloweku. Iya nuwanuwaku wana'idibumuhigeku. Ka'i keke wana'idibumuhigeku au wanakiloweku.

Keke wadakiloweku tu kadu wakiloweku fa'ina, omi vaita gufaleda wayawayana kaliva hikilowena amanadi. Omi keke bwai ginaginana amine kadu keke gufa tutumina amine. Omi vaita wayawayamiyao fa'ina gana'alahiwagemi.

Omi wagahe wagayo, Ide wakalivadeyao. Lokoloko moya'aina kanuhagana, gaitoma moya'aina adafaiweya. Hidedemi wagahe tu keke wadahalamaneni omi koyokoyo'avamiyao yami miya koyona, Yaubada yana lokoloko ana yaudi wafaniyena, omi vaita tovematakoyo kadu tovekonekone amine.

Au gagahevagadonemi be lokolokofou gola-mo'enaga amine Iya agaikuya wanakimonena be amifaiweya wanakaiwabu. Mena gola ma babiya hiyalana digo wayogona buye hivetagovina be gi'ulafuwana againe gola-mo'ena avaekeya gida tu momolu hihegena. Kadu kaleko yegayegana agaikuya wanakimonena be yami vekonekone wanakevani-yo yami wowomumu ginahavaina. Kadu vematakoyo ana mulamula agaikuya wanakimonena be matamiya wanaseni-yo nuwanuwa velemo'ena amifaiweya wana'itahalamanena.

Iya we'a lilimiya gamidimidi. Kaliva tobohiyana yana eda'awaneya gilautoli higa vaita gidaluku amine, meda Iya nuwami ana eda'awaneya galulautoli higa nuwamiya gadaluku. Gava kaliva agoku ginogalina be gihawahegeku, medema againe ganaluku be bana ganavetobohiyanena kadu Iya ginavetobohiyaneku.

Boi yaku atuvefa'ila againe gafaiwala-mo'a be Kamaku yana didiga'u'u againe buye avetogama. Meda anafaiweya hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya yana atuvefa'ila againe ginafaiwala-mo'a, medema ganahawahegena be yaku didiga'u'u againe buye anavetogama.
Omi watagami, gavaimi Yaubada Alu'aluwana omi tovetumagana ami yo'oi-mina agaimiya gigahegahe, medema wanavenogalena. Au hidedemi bonaku.”

Tu Keliso yana venuwa'ata tovetumagana adi yo'o seveni agaidiya gilukahihi gihavaina, kadu ga'eno'ita. Gamiyami tu auhe'ama wanafali yauyaugina lobameya ga'itana. Bana agonai-nadi vaita hiulega amine boi gamidinogalina-ma gigahe-havagileku gigayo, “Ulaka'ela we'ai, be aimo kabisona gavadi gavadi makewa'e hinalakayemu-ma ganavehawale.”
Gigahe-yo auhe'ama Yaubada Alu'aluwana giluvaiyeku ada mene lobameya didiga'u'u matakuya gidadauda ada Kaliva Sa'eyana didiga'u'uya givetogana.

Ada Bana didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma ana ita'ita mahamahali-mo'ena vaita kabala yabeyabelidi luhei yamuyamumu-'owogina kadu ve'akinamanamalina amine. Kabalai-dina adi egana diyasifa kadu kaneliyani. Kadu mena didiga'u'uya bowa gidonena ana ita vaita kabala matamatagina ana egana emelodi amine.

Mena didiga'u'u kikaiwabuna hinafane gidadauda ada didiga'u'u kadu tuweniti-fowa himidififina, tu didiga'u'u-dina agaidiya tomiyalobama adi tonagona tuweniti-fowa hivetogadi. Kaleko kwayakwayana againe hivaigau ada u'udiya badau kikaiwabuna gola againe hibubuna-ma gidadauda.

Ada mena Yaubada yana didiga'u'u kikaiwabuna againe tova moya'aina nama gisisinamana, vaita gaveyao agodi amine butuna lakahina gilaulauga, atala gihegehegena. Kadu didiga'u'u wamagigine daki seveni hi'ala'alata, higa Yaubada Alu'aluwana ana ita alu'aluwa seveni.
Kadu didiga'u'u gava wamagigine tamo gavadi ga'itana ana ita ma vaita lehaga atumanamanahina amine, e kabala vaita kelasi amine ve'akinamanamalina.
Tu hinafane-mo'ane gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa Yaubada yana didiga'u'u himidififina, ada matadi wowodi matatabuna gilagana wamagigidiya kadu wakwaudiya.

Ada badi gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa sa'eyana ma ana ita vaita kevakeva manimaninina ana egana laiyoni amine, kadu sa'eyana ana ita vaita bulumakau hala amine, kadu sa'eyana magigina ana ita vaita kaliva amine, kadu sa'eyana ana ita vaita manubutu giyaveyavega-ma amine.

Ada badi gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao sa'eyana sa'eyana wa'ofadi sikisi ada wowodi matatabuna agaidiya tabone kadu dibune matadi gilagana. Tova moya'aina hikwelidavadava uyadayada be bogi hinunauwena tu keke ma'i hida'ilova higayo,
Mahamahalina, mahamahalina
Yaubada Kaiwabu Tofaiwala-mo'a
Bana'e au mahamahalina.
Tova moya'aina gimiyamiya-vagata,
tuwaina gimiyami adamoya gimimiyami
aimo ginamiyami keke ana abalauyabu.
Au hidedemi yadi kwelidavadava.
O'eni yama Kaiwabu kadu yama Yaubada.
Gilubodama be anahawavekaiwabuye,
kadu O anave'amohimohine be
a egana fifiwala-mo'ena anakilakahina.
E, yama hawadavadava O giluboda.
Fa'ina gaitoma moya'aidi O ububudi,
ya nuwanuwa againe hilakayemu
be adamoya himimiyami.
Au hidedemi yadi kwelidavadava.
