Gamiyami tu Bana'e didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma buki uwa'uwana nimana i'atagine ga'itana. Buki-nadi againe etoladi wafafalina gidadauda, ana itava bulava seveni vaita autafa amine.
Ada lobama ana tovenuwa'ata fifiwalana ga'itana, bana gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Hakwa'adi yana wa'abavehimeya gimimiyami-yo anafaiweya bulava ginagolohini-yo buki ginasiyagilini?”
Tu keke tamo hakwadi lobameya o babiya o to'alika yadi abageya gidamiyami-yo anafaiweya buki gidasiyagilini-yo hinagene gida'ita.
Ada keke tamo hakwadi yana wa'abavehimeya hidanuhagani-yo anafaiweya buki gidasiyagilini be hinagene gida'ita amanadi fa'ina, iya gatagitagi lakahina.

Gatagitagi tu tomiyalobama adi tonagona adi yo'o kalivana sa'eyana Yesu fa'ine gigaheku gigayo, “Keke unatagitagiya. U'ita, bana tokaiwabu Devida bwanenena kikaiwabuna Yuda yana yo'o kalivana gifaiwalahegahega-mo'a. Bana'e kaliva fifiwala-mo'ena ana egana Yuda yana yo'o ana Laiyoni. Bana gifaiwalahegahega-mo'a fa'ina anafaiweya bulava seveni ginagolohidi be buki ginasiyagilina.”
Bana gina buki Yaubada i'atagine gidadauda-ma givaina.

Givaini-yo badi wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa kadu tomiyalobama adi tonagona tuweniti-fowa Sifi kabi'ona againe hi'ibo'ula-mo'a. Badi sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya kweli ana aba'iveyamumu vaita kita hagihagina amine hidadauda, kadu nau'a gola againe hibubuna-ma hi'abina. Vanedimodimo ana egana inisenisi nau'a gola himaga, inisenisi ana nuwanuwa ma Yaubada yana yo'ogaga yadi ve'o'ola Yaubada againe.
Ada kweli ivaguna Yesu againe hikwelikweliyena higayo,
Ya wa'abavehimeya fa'ina giluboda
buki unavaina be ana bulava unagolohina.
O giluboda fa'ina hiluve'alika
ada O dayaginiya kaliva moya'aidi
ututuvehobudi be Yaubada yana giba fa'ina.
Badi kalivai-dina yo'o tulina tulina
meyadi tulina tulina
kadu adi loi tulina tulina
ada fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hive'inuba.
badi O buye wavehivehimeya,
kadu yada Yaubada ana hawadavadava
ana tofaisewa usedi,
ada babi matatabuna hinavehivehimeyena.
Au hidede amine badi wayawaidi adivefowa kadu tonagona tuweniti-fowa yadi kwelidavadava.
Agodi lakahina hikwelikweli higayo,
Yaubada yana Sifi kabi'ona hiluve'alikana.
Gilubodana be Bana ide ginavehivehimeyeda,
Yana lokolokofou yana nuwahuya
yana faiwala fa'ina kanakilakahina.
Gilubodada be Bana kanave'amohimohinena
be kanakivekaiwabuyena be kanadavadavana.
E, yada hawadavadava Bana gilubodana.
Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata yadi kwelidavadava.
Kadu'e gaitoma moya'aidi i'ibubunidi lobameya babiya to'alika yadi abageya lehageya, e fafali moya'aina agaidiya himimiyami-ma yadi kweli ganogalina. Higayo,
Bana'e didiga'u'uya givetogana kadu
Sifi kabi'ona adi egana kanakilakahina
kadu kanave'amohimohinedi.
Yadi kikaiwabu kadu yadi faiwala
kanakivetubugina tova inaga inaga
keke ana abalauyabu.

Au hidede amine moya'aidi yadi kwelidavadava tu badi wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa higahe higayo, “Ehe hidedemi,” kadu badi tomiyalobama adi tonagona hi'ibo'ula-mo'a be Kaiwabu luhei hihawadavadavadi.

Ga'ita tu auhe'ama hosi kwayakwayana mene matakuya gimidi. Hosi kwaune kaliva sa'eyana gihiyoto yana sufi gi'abina ada badau kikaiwabuna u'une hihifona. Au bana gitauya higa gidalugaviya be gidafaiwalahega-mo'a.
Bana gina tu Sifi kabi'ona buki ana bulava anavelu gigolohini-yo gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao anavelu agona ganogalina gigahe gigayo, “U'ela.”
Au hosi velugana gilakayemu ana ita yabeyabeli-mo'ena. Bana kaliva kwaune gihiyoto ana vehimeya ma kukuya babi againe ginavaihegeni-yo kaliva buye hinave'amunumunuga. Ada feto lakahina hivelena.

Yana feto hivelena gihavaina, Sifi kabi'ona buki ana bulava anaveto gigolohini-yo gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao anaveto agona ganogalina gigahe gigayo, “U'ela.” Ga'ita tu auhe'ama hosi kukwauhi-mo'ena, mene matakuya gimidi. Bana kaliva hosi kwaune gihiyoto-ma lokoloko ana abasivekuke gi'abina.

Au ago'ago ganogalina vaita tamo hakwadi gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa agaidiya gidakova gidagayo, “Kaliva moya'aidi hinafifaisewa be fatadi aiyeta sa'eyana analaga hinavaina tu mani-nadi againe a'a kabi'onaga vaita kuvi sa'eyana o ka'i tafiyoko tohiye adifaiweya hinakimonena. Atu ai hagihagidi keke unakivekoyodi be higa bunama kadu oine aimo ginadauda.”
Gilukahihi gihavaina Sifi kabi'ona buki ana bulava anavefowa gigolohini-yo gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao anavefowa agona ganogalina gigahe gigayo, “U'ela.”

Ga'ita tu auhe'ama hosi ana ita vaita gidahaniwedalini-ma amine mene matakuya gimidi. Bana kaliva hosi kwaune gihiyoto-ma ana egana Alika ada bana wakwaune hosi velugana gimuliyena ana kaliva ana egana To'alika yadi Abaga. Badi adi'iseluga yadi wa'abavehimeya, adi vehimeya hidede amine. Tomiyababi tufoidi moya'aidi hinaluve'alikadi. Tufoidi ma buye hinave'amunumunuga be hina'alika, tufoidi lokeya hina'alika, tufoidi auloloya hina'alika, tufoidi kevakeva manimaninidiyao hinayovadi be hina'alika. Tomiyababi hina'alika-ma adi kilagalaga hidede amine. Ka'i kanadakadi bo'u fowa againe digo, bo'u sa'eyana kalivai-dina hina'alika.

Badi kaliva aluwadi moya'aidi hikova'awafatafata higayo, “Yama Kaiwabu Fifiwala-mo'e, O mahamahali, ya nuwanuwa matatabuna velemo'ena. Gava tova badi tomiyababi hiluve'alikama amanadi unavedewayaugidi-yo agaidiya dayagima unafatani?”

Hidedemi higahe tu vaigau kwayakwayana badi sa'eyana sa'eyana giveledi ada gigahedi gigayo, “Tova kabisona yami wa'atuvefa'ila kadu wanaboda. Nagona tobohiyamiyao higa yaku tofaisewa anafaiweya omi'iyao hinaluve'alikadi hinanunauwena tu moya'aimi ami kilagalaga Iya gavehimeyena amine hinaluyabuna, au adi laufata hinavaina.” Hidedemi gigahedi.
Kadu ibadibadi babiya hibe'u vaita bolimana-kouko gidamadu be nila bouna gidatafimwanumwanuni amine.
Kadu lobama giyawowola vaita ivi hi'uwana be hisenauwena amine. Kadu oya be himula matatabudi hili'uli'u be hitogadamadamana.
Oya kadu kuga lakahidi agaidiya hikovakova higayo, “Agaimeya wanabe'u be Bana didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma magigina againe wanasevauyema kadu Sifi kabi'ona yana ila'a againe wanasevauyema.
Au yadi ila'a ana tova lakahina ahe gilakayemu be ama laufata anavaina. Gavaimi be Badi adi'iselu yadi ila'a kada'atuvefa'ileni?”

Yaubada yana ila'a yana lakayemu ga'itana tu kadu ga'eno'ita. Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata fowa babi matatabuna himidififina-ma ga'itadi, ada bolimana matatabuna hihawatadi, yavalata bolimana newalidebola newali'oya be higa keke avaleya o lehageya ginamadu kadu keke tamo ai lukumina ginalewalewa.

Tovenuwa'ata fowa ga'itadi tu kadu tovenuwa'ata velugana kauwana abalakavine gilaka-ma ga'itana, Yaubada yana abasetagona gi'abina. Badi tovenuwa'ata fowa agaidiya gikova'awafatafata, badi Yaubada gihawahegedi be avala lehaga kadu ai bolimana yadi madu againe hinakivekoyodi-ma kalivai-dina.
Gikovadi gigayo, “Keke avala o lehaga o ai wanamadukivekoyodi tu nagona yada Yaubada yana iya'iyaya againe yana tofaisewa deba'aidiya ana'atuvefotana higa anasetagodi.”
Gisetagodi-yo adi kilagalaga ganogalina higa miIsileli adi yo'o sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya kaliva gisetagodi-ma adi ve'atutamo'aina 144,000 (hanaledi foti fowa tausani).
Yuda ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Lubeni ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Gada ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Asa ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Nafitalai ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Manasa ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Simiyoni ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Livai ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Isaka ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Sebuloni ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Yosefa ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Beniyamina ana yo'o agaidiya 12,000 gisetagodi.
Mena yo'o kalivai-dina 144,000 Yaubada yana iya'iyaya againe gisetagodi.
Ada hikova'awafatafata higayo,
Yada Yaubada didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma
kadu yana Sifi kabi'ona agaidiya
ada kibababala give'inuba.

Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata matatabudi Yaubada yana didiga'u'u kadu tomiyalobama adi tonagona kadu gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa himidififidi. Didiga'u'u wamagigine hi'ibo'ula-mo'a be Yaubada hihawadavadavana higayo,
Yada nuwanuwa hidede amine.
Yada Yaubada kanadavadavana,
kanakivekaiwabuyena kanavesiuleyena,
yana nuwahuya, yana abavehimeya
yana faiwala fa'ina kanakilakahina.
E, Bana'e kanave'amohimohinena
tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu.
Ehe hidedemi.
Au hidedemi yo'oyo'o matatabu-mo'edi yadi kwelidavadava.
Ada bana gigayo, “Badi ve'umagigi lakahi-mo'ena hinagene hiyemuyemu. Nuwahinagedi ana vaigau Sifi kabi'ona dayagine hikolana be gikwaya-mo'ena.
Yaubada yana didiga'u'u wamagigine himimiyami
ada uyadayada be bogi Yaubada yana manuwa
wese lobameya Bana matane hifififaisewa.
Ada Bana didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma
yana lifi lakahina againe give'aiwa'udi.
Keke-mo'a mafu ginalau-havagiledi,
keke-mo'a agodi ginataina-havagi.
Kauwana lakahina keke ginakabudi,
keke kalalava ginakalalavidi.
Sifi kabi'ona Yaubada yana didiga'u'u hinafane-mo'ane
gimimiyami-ma badi yana sifi adi To'itave'avina.
Gufa miyamiya-vagahina ana guya againe ginaveyudi.
Ada Yaubada matailudi sa'eyana sa'eyana
ginaluhegehegena.”
Au hidedemi tomiyalobama adi tonagona sa'eyana givenuwa'ataku.
Tu Sifi kabi'ona buki ana bulava anaveseveni gigolohina againe, moya'aidi hi'ilova bai hafuna amine amumu gikuluna lobameya.
Ada lobama ana tovenuwa'ata seveni tova moya'aina Yaubada matane himidimidi-ma ga'itadi, ada badi agaidiya hiulega seveni gifolakedi.

Au bana tovenuwa'atai-nadi gina ai'ala'alata atudidiga againe givaina digo inisenisi ana nau'a givemagana au babiya gihegehobuyena. Auhe'ama atala gihegehegena, butuna gilaulauga, nama gisisinamana kadu babi gili'uli'udona.
Tu bana tovenuwa'ata ai'ala'alata babiya gihegehobuyena gihavaina, badi tovenuwa'ata seveni hikidewadewa be higa yadi hiulega seveni hinayuvedi.

Bana tovenuwa'ata nagona yana hiulega giyuvena, au wehi kugakugana aisi amine kadu ai'ala'alata dayaga buye give'atutamo'aina-ma babiya gi'alilihiwana. Babi ana tufo tohiye ma ana tufo luhei auwe yamumuna tu ana tufo sa'eyana ma gi'ala-'owona, meda ai kadu isisi'u ana tufo sa'eyana gi'ala-'owona.

Tu bana tovenuwa'ata anaveto yana hiulega giyuvena, au badibadi lakahina vaita daki giyabeyabela-ma amine lobameya gi'akakilina be gufa lakahidi kadu guya agaidiya gihobu. Gufa guya ana tufo tohiye ada ana tufo luhei au yamumuna tu ana tufo sa'eyana ma givegolagola ada kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi gufai-nadi hiyuna-ma hi'alika. Mena badibadi ana egana Golagola.

Tu bana tovenuwa'ata anavefowa yana hiulega giyuvena, au kauwana vaikohi ibadibadi hi'uyuyu. Kauwana ana tufo tohiye ma ana tufo luhei auwe yamumuna tu ana tufo sa'eyana ma gi'uyuyu. Meda anafaiweya vaikohi kadu ibadibadi adi tufo sa'eyana hi'uyuyu. Uyadayada ana tufo sa'eyana keke tamo mahalina kadu bogi ana tufo sa'eyana keke tamo mahalina.

Tu bana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata anavefaifi yana hiulega giyuvena, au kaliva sa'eyana ana ita vaita badibadi sa'eyana lobameya gi'akakilina-ma babiya gihobu'ela. Bana balauma yadi abaga ana kihi givaina, abagai-nadi ana egana Kahu Tunugi-vadavada'aina.
Kahu giyauna againe, siyo lakahina gilaka vaita ubula lakahi-mo'ena siyona amine. Siyo Kahuya gilaka-ma againe kauwana kadu lobama gi'uyuyubodena.
Ada siyo-nadi hinagene koloma lakahidiyao babiya hihobu, ada faiwala tulina hivaina be yadi aiyovaga vaita atagikwamana amine.

Yaubada yana vehimeya againe adi hawata hivaina higa isisi'u ai a'a gikabukabu-ma keke hinakivekoyoni, tu adi vehimeya ma badi kaliva Yaubada yana iya'iyaya deba'aidiya keke gidadauda-ma hinakivekoyodi.

Keke gidahawahegedi be hinaluve'alikadi, au vaikohi faifi agaidiya yadi aiyovaga againe aulolo lakahina hinaveledi. Ada aulolo lakahi-mo'ena againe hivedivediwe vaita atagikwamana kaliva giyovana be givedivediwe amine.
Medema vaikohi faifi agaidiya alika hinalelena tu hinalele-wayoga keke adifata. Hinagahe hinagayo, “Hoi! Hima kavedivediwe kada'alika.” Hidedemi hinagahegahe tu Yaubada keke alikeya ginahawahegedi.
Tu mena kolomai-dina adi ita ma vaita hosi gaviya fa'ina hivevigauna-ma amine. Badau kikaiwabuna gola u'udiya hisedi ada magigidi ana ita vaita kaliva magigidi ana ita amine.
U'udi vaita vevine u'udi tunugina amine, nigodi sinasinahina vaita laiyoni manimaninina nigona amine.
Manawadi ana vaigau vaita abaseboda kainumula amine, ofadi butuna vaita ubula lakahina giluluvetaveta'ala-ma amine.
Giudi ana wagiyo vaita atagikwamana amine, ada mena giudi againe kaliva hina'i'iyovaga be aulolo lakahina againe hinavedivediwe vaikohi faifi agaidiya.

Kadu bana Kahu Tunugi-vadavada'aina ana tokaiwabu meda badi kolomai-dina adi tokaiwabu. Bana ana egana bona Hibeliu againe ma Abadoni tu bona Gilika againe Afoliyoni. (Egana ana kaivila ma Toluyaweyawela.)

Tu bana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata anavesikisi yana hiulega giyuvena, au ago'ago sa'eyana ganogalina, inisenisi ana aba'akabu gola hukuna fowa againe giyemu. Mena aba'akabu Yaubada yana didiga'u'u wamagigine gidadauda.

Bana agona ganogalina-ma tovenuwa'ata anavesikisi yana hiulega gi'abina-ma againe gigahe gigayo, “Badi tovenuwa'ata fowa boi hiyogodi be gufa lakahina ana egana Yufalete againe himimiyami-ma unayaudi be hinana.”

Au badi tovenuwa'ata fowa boi hida bai-nadi, hida aiyetai-nadi, hida vaikohi-nadi, hida malamalai-nadi fa'ina Yaubada yana vehimeya againe hikidewedewedi be hisedi amanadi giyaudi be higa kaliva tufoidi moya'aidi hinaluve'alikadi. Tomiyababi adi tufo tohiye ma adi tufo luhei auwe yamumuna tu adi tufo sa'eyana ma hiluve'alikadi.
Badi tovenuwa'ata fowa tolugaviya hosi agaidiya hiyage-ma moya'ai-mo'edi hinagoyedi, adi kilagalaga ganogalina 200 miliyoni (200,000,000).

Kadu'e yaku eno'ita againe badi tolugaviya yadi hosi agaidiya hiyage-ma ga'itadi, adi ita ma hidede amine. Manawadi ana abaseboda ana ita yabeyabeli-mo'ena vaita ai'ala'alata amine kadu matamatagina vaita lehaga amine kadu yagoyagona vaita luwaluwa boyalina amine. Hosi u'udi ana ita vaita laiyoni u'udi amine ada ai nolana siyo kadu gaitoma yagoyagona alamatafifailina magana koyo-mo'ena awadiya giyemuyemu, ada mena aba'alikai-dina agaidiya tomiyababi adi tufo sa'eyana hiluve'alikadi.
Badi hosi yadi wafaiwala, u'udiya kadu giudiya kaliva hiluluve'alikadi fa'ina giudi wa'u'una vaita oloto amine ada medema againe kaliva hi'i'iyovaga.
Kadu badi kaliva yadi luve'alika yadi kwelikweli yadi udo yadi kai'afu au hida yadi huluvai-dina keke hidavenikohiyeni-yo Yaubada againe hidahagaviladi.

Kadu'e ga'eno'ita be tovenuwa'ata kikaiwabuna lobama amine gihobuhobu'ela-ma ga'itana. Buhibuhi againe givaigau ada u'una getane bowa gidonena. Magigina ana ita vaita kauwana amine kadu agena ana ita vaita ogola i'ala'alahina amine.

Buki uwa'uwana kabi'ona luluyagilina gi'abina. Agena i'atagina lehageya gisena tu i'imawana avaleya gisena, ada gikova'awafatafata agona vaita gufa lakahina gihobu-ma butuna amine. Gikova'awafatafata againe atalai-dina seveni agodi gilakayemu.
Ada atala seveni higahe againe, yadi gahe gada'etoladina ma tamo hakwadi agona lobameya ganogalina gigayo, “Badi atalai-dina seveni yadi gahe unasevauyena keke una'etoladini.”

Tu bana tovenuwa'ata lehageya be avaleya givagahalahalala be ga'itana-ma nimana i'atagina lobameya gikilakahina be gikova gigayo, “Yaubada gihalamaneku tu gagahegahe, Bana'e Tomiya-vagata lobama be avala be lehaga adi gaitomai-dina matatabudi buye'i gibubudi amanadi ana eganeya gagahe. Boda ana tova a gihavaina.

Tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata anaveseveni yana hiulega ginayuvena ana toveya, Yaubada yana nuwanuwa sevasevauyana ginafaisewa-'owona boi tuwai-mo'ena yana tofaisewa bonana ana to'awatalatalaina agaidiya gihawavemogatalena amine.” Hidedemi tovenuwa'ata buki gi'abina-ma gigahe.
Gigahe-yo ago'ago lobameya ahe ganogalina-ma kadu gigahe-havagileku gigayo, “Una tovenuwa'ata nimane buki luluyagilina gidadauda-ma uvaini, bana lehageya be avaleya givagahalahalala amanadi.”

Au gana tovenuwa'ata againe gave'o'ola higa buki uwa'uwana kabi'ona gidaveleku. Ma gigaheku gigayo, “Uvaini be u'ani. Awaniya ana digadigaga vaita ma'awa gufadi amine tu muliya kamoniya ginavegolagola.”
Au buki kabi'ona tovenuwa'ata nimane gavaina be ga'ana. Ana digadigaga awakuya vaita ma'awa gufadi amine tu ahe gatonona againe kamokuya givegolagola.

Au higaheku higayo, “Unana Yaubada yana venuwa'ata yo'o moya'aidi adi tokikaiwabu buye'i fa'idiya kadu una'awatalatalaina-havagi. Badi yo'oi-dina meyadi tulina tulina kadu fafali tulina tulina agaidiya himimiyami.” Hidedemi higaheku.
Tu aiwala giveleku vaita aba'etowava amine ada gigaheku gigayo, “Unana Yaubada yana manuwa-tafalolo kadu yana atudidiga una'etowavana, kadu tohawadavadava unahawadi.

Manuwai-nadi ala gimidififina tu melala ala hinagene ma keke una'etowavani, fa'ina Yaubada badi keke miYuda tu yo'o tulidiyao mena melalai-nadi giveledi. Tu Yelusalema yaku melala mahamahalina ma vaikohi 42 agaidiya hinavehimeyena be gaitoma moya'aidi hinaluyaweyawelidi.

Tu yaku to'awatalatalaina adi'iselu ganafaiwalaveledi be yaku venuwa'ata hina'awatalatalainena hinanunauwena aiyeta 1,260 higa vaikohi 42 agaidiya. Adi vaigau koyona vaita kofala baiki amine hina'osena, medema kaliva yadi koyona fa'ina hitagitagi-ma ana iya'iyaya.”
Ka'i tamo hakwadi ginagaluvaluva be ginakivekoyodi, au ai'ala'alata awadiya ginayemu be nibaidiyao gina'ala-'owodi. Hai kaliva nuwanuwana ginakivekoyodi, medema makewa'e hidede amine gina'alika.

Kadu badi kalivai-dina adi'iselu vaikohi 42 agaidiya Yaubada yana venuwa'ata hina'awatalatalaina ana toveya yadi faiwala hidede amine. Adifaiweya hinagahe be lobama gina'abodana be keke wehi ginalugaga. Kadu tova a gavaiyehi nuwanuwadi amine, adifaiweya hinagahe be gufa hinavedayaga, kadu vita koyodi tulina tulina babiya hinaseyemaunedi.
Wowodi melala lakahina ana egana Yelusalema ana edeya hinase-kawowona, melalai-nadi againe tuwaina yadi Kaiwabu hikivekelosena. Mena melala gahe sevasevauyana againe hivewagana Sodoma kadu Idifita.

Aiyeta tohiye kadu hafuna agaidiya kaliva moya'aidi hina'ela wowodi hina'itakwanekwanena be adi aitauna hinahawatana. Badi kalivai-dina adi loi tulina tulina kadu adi yo'o tulina tulina, meda meyadi tulina tulina kadu yadi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya hinatauya be hina'ela.

Tomiyababi kaliva adi'iselu yadi alika fa'ina hinagakahikahi, hinavemwamwala be nuwakabubu hinave'atunevedavedama, fa'ina mena Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina adi'iselu aulolo lakahina tomiyababi hiveledi-yo hivedivediwe lauva tunugina.
Aimo ga'eno'eno'ita tu aiyeta tohiye kadu hafuna gihavaina againe, Yaubada yawaina badi agaidiya giya'avedamana be himididi-mo'a. Ada badi hi'itadi-ma himatautave'ine.
Au kaliva adi'iselu ago'ago lakahina lobameya hinogalina, gikovadi gigayo, “Walaka'ela we'ai.” Ada buhibuhi againe lobameya hilakalaka tu nibaidiyao hilulubodedi.

Lobameya hiluku tu auhe'ama babi gili'uli'u toyogi-mo'ena ada kaliva seveni tausani (7,000) hi'alika. Hida melalai-nadi ana tufo teni ada naeni auwe yamumuna tu ana tufo sa'eyana againe manuwa hibe'u. Badi li'uli'u againe wayawaidi himimiyami-ma himatautave'ine be Yaubada lobameya yana faiwala fa'ina hidavadavana.
Tova adamoya yada Kaiwabu kadu yana Tovegida Keliso
abavehimeya babi againe hivai-havagilena,
ada tomiyababi hinavehivehimeyedi tova inaga inaga
keke ana abalauyabu.
tuwaina umiyami be ununauwena tu
adamoya aimo umiyamiya-vagata.
O againiya avesivesiule fa'ina
ya faiwala lakahina uvai-vagahina
be uvebutu uvehivehimeya.
Yo'o moya'aidi O againiya hi'ago'uga
fa'ina ya ila'a ana tova a gilakayemu
be to'alika unavedewayaugidi.
Kadu ya tofaisewa bona ana to'awatalatalaina
adi laufata ana tova a giyemu.
Meda ya kaliva mahamahalidiyao
kadu gaveyao a egana hive'amohimohinena
lakahidiyao kadu kabi'odiyao,
medema adi laufata ana tova a giyemu.
Tu badi tomiyababi hiluyaweyawelidi-ma
adi veluyauyaula ana tova a gilakayemu.
Au hidedemi tomiyalobama adi tonagona yadi kwelidavadava.

Kadu'e ga'eno'eno'ita tu matakuya Yaubada yana manuwa-tafalolo lobameya hiyauna, ada manuwa hinagene Yaubada yana veyao ana bokesi ga'itana. Auhe'ama nama gisisinamana, butuna gilaulauga, atala gihegehegena, babi gili'uli'u, wehi kugakugana vaita aisi amine gi'alilihiwana.

Kadu'e ga'eno'ita tu iya'iyaya lakahina kadu yauyaulowogina lobameya gilakayemu, higa kwamayoku kauwana againe givaigau ada vaikohi tabone gimidimidi. Badau kikaiwabuna ibadibadi tuwelo buye hikivefotadi-ma u'une ga'itana.
Bana wahifugana ada givefahena fa'ina yana aulolo giyemu againe gitatawayana.
Au kadu iya'iyaya velugana lobameya gilakayemu, higa wayo'o abokakaina yabeyabelina u'una seveni ana siko seveni kadu badau kikaiwabuna seveni meda u'una seveni agaidiya gidadauda-ma ga'itana.

Giuna againe ibadibadi tufoidi moya'aidi gilukakikakidi be babiya hibe'u. Ibadibadi adi tufo tohiye ma adi tufo luhei auwe yamumudi tu adi tufo sa'eyana ma babiya gihegehobuyena. Bana wayo'o-nadi kwamayoku kabisona ginavenatuna-ma wamagigine gimidi be higa kwamana ginatubuga digo auhe'ama ginatonona.

Au hivenatuna natudi kaliva, Bana'e aimo yana wafuluma kainumula yo'o tulina tulina gina'itave'avidi amanadi. Wayo'o-nadi kwamana gidatonona ma tamo hakwadi gilemana be Yaubada againe kadu yana didiga'u'u buye againe ginauwena.
Badi kwamayoku ma babigaga againe hi'ota, abaga sa'eyana badi fa'idiya boi Yaubada gikidewedewena-ma againe hina. Medede againe aiyeta 1,260 agaidiya gina'ita'itave'avidi.
Lobama ana tovenuwa'ata Maikeli ginagoyedi-ma wayo'o hifaiwalahege-mo'ena, ada Yaubada bana wayo'o yana yo'o buye yadi abaga lobameya gilemadi be giwavidi.

Bana wayo'o abokakaina babiya gihegehobuyena, bana'e ma oloto tuwaina hivewagana Diyabolo yo Setani, tomiyababi matatabudi koyona againe ginuwa'abiyedi-ma kalivai-nadi. E, bana'e babiya hihegehobuyena kadu yana yo'o tomiyalobama buye'i.
Adamoya yada Yaubada gikibababaleda,
Yada Tokaiwabu yana faiwala gi'ivemogatalina
be yana itave'avina againe kamimiyami.
Adamoya yana Tovegida Keliso
yana abavehimeya giseyemaunena.
Setani babiya hihegehobuyena,
boi uyadayada be bogi tobohiyadeyao
Yaubada matane gihawavekoyoye-kawowodi.
tobohiyadeyao Setani hifaiwalahege-mo'ena
Kadu yadi yegayega Yesu dayagine
mali kaliva agaidiya hi'awatalatalainena
fa'ina Setani hifaiwalahege-mo'ena,
yawaidi keke hidanuwaloloneni
au alikeya hihawahegedi.
Yaubada gifaiwalahegahega-mo'a fa'ina
omi tomiyalobama wanavemwamwala.
Tu hoiyoi, omi tomiyababi tomiyalehaga
fa'ina Setani agaimiya gihobu'ela.
Ila'a givemagana be vita ginavelemi
fa'ina gihalamanena yana tova a gikali'uho.
Au hidedemi ago'ago lobameya gigahe.
Tu bana wayo'o-nadi babiya hihegehobuyena ma tauna gi'itana againe, kwamayoku kwamana kaliva hivenatunena-ma givenegadi.

Gidakive'avidi ma Yaubada manubutu ofana luhei kwamayoku giveledi be higa abaga babigaga againe badi fa'idiya gikidewedewena-ma againe adifaiweya hinamadu'ota. Medede againe malamala tohiye kadu hafuna agaidiya gina'ita'itave'avidi be bana wayo'o-nadi keke anafaiweya ginamunudi.
Au wayo'o awana gila'ana ada gufa lakahina gi'ahiwahiwana be higa kwamayoku ginave'alugedi.
Tu babi kwamayoku givelugadi. Babi gi'ayavalina be gufa wayo'o awane gi'alahiwagena-ma babi giyuna.

Au wayo'o kwamayoku agaidiya gi'ago'uga-mo'a ada gitauya be natudiyao velugadiyao agaidiya ginalulugaviya. Badi kalivai-dina Yaubada yana vehimeya hi'ita'itave'avina kadu nuwanuwa velemo'ena Yesu gi'awatalatalainena-ma againe hiluluve'avina.
Au wayo'o gina taliyeya gimidi tu gibodaboda.

Kevakeva manimaninina ga'itana-ma ana ita vaita fusi walawala'a abokakaina ana egana lefadi amine, tu agena vaita kevakeva koyona ana egana beya agena amine, ada awana lakahina vaita laiyoni awana amine. Bana wayo'o yana faiwala yana didiga'u'u yana abavehimeya lakahina kevakevai-nadi manimaninina againe gisedamanena.
Bana kevakeva u'une vaita ki'ona gidadauda, higa boi gi'alika tu kadu gimididi-havagi. Tomiyababi moya'aidi yana mididi-havagi fa'ina hiyaulowoga be yana vehimeya hi'itavaina.

Bana wayo'o yana abavehimeya kevakeva manimaninina againe gisedamanena fa'ina, kaliva wayo'o hihawadavadavana kadu kevakeva manimaninina hihawadavadavana higayo, “Mene tamo hakwadi kevakeva manimaninina amine? Keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya bana againe ginalaugaviya, keke-mo'a.”
Tu vaikohi 42 agaidiya Yaubada kevakeva manimaninina gihawahegena be giseselakalaka kadu Yaubada gihawahawatagona, ada yana wa'abavehimeya gififaisewa.
Nuwanuwana tauna ginakilakahina vaita Yaubada amine fa'ina givebutu Yaubada Tauna gihawatagona, Yaubada ana egana kadu yana abamiyami kadu yana kaliva tomiyalobama gi'ihawadamanedi.

Yaubada gihawahegena be yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao agaidiya ginalugaviya be ginafaiwalahege-mo'edi. Ada yo'o tulina tulina ginavehivehimeyedi, adi loi tulina tulina meyadi tulina tulina yadi fafali tulina tulina.

Tomiyababi tufoidi moya'aidi kevakevai-nadi manimaninina hinahawadavadavana, higa gaveyao moya'aidi Sifi kabi'ona yana buki againe adi egana keke gida'etoladini, medema hinahawadavadavana. Buki-nadi Sifi kabi'ona yana buki, Bana'e tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada aimo babi keke gidabubuni ana toveya yana vevai againe alika ginanuhagana amanadi. Ada buki againe badi wayawai-vagahidi adi egana gidadauda.
Omi watagami, wananogala.

Hai kaliva Yaubada ginahawahegena be Keliso fa'ine deliya ginaluku, medema makewa ginaluku. Hai kaliva Yaubada ginahawahegena be Keliso fa'ine feto againe alika ginanuhagana, medema makewa gina'alika. Hidema fa'ina omi Yaubada yana kaliva mahamahalimiyao yami wa'asevatu wana'atuvefa'ila, yami vetumagana wanakidonena.
Kadu'e ga'eno'ita tu kevakeva manimaninina velugana babiya giyemu-ma ga'itana. Ana siko luhei vaita sifi kabi'ona ana siko amine tu agona ma fifiwalana vaita wayo'o amine.

Bana kevakeva manimaninina nagona yana abavehimeya matatabuna bana kevakeva manimaninina anavelu againe gisedamanena, ada loseyanina amine tomiyababi moya'aidi givehivehimeyedi. Giluluya'aya'alidi be kevakeva manimaninina nagona hihawadavadavana, bana gi'alika tu gimididi-havagi ma kalivai-nadi.
Kadu iya'iyaya lakahidi be yauyaulowogidi gififaisewadi, e yana faiwala againe ai'ala'alata lobameya gisehobuyena kaliva moya'aidi matadiya.

Bana kevakeva manimaninina anavelu bana kevakeva manimaninina nagona ana eganeya mena iya'iyaya yauyaulowogina gififaisewana, fa'ina yana ve'alololoya tomiyababi ginuwa'abiyedi. Kadu givehimeyedi gigayo, “Ikilukiluma bana kevakeva manimaninina nagona boi feto againe gi'alika tu gimididi-havagi ma ana ita amine wanabubuni-yo wanakivemididina be againe wana'ibo'ula.” Hidedemi gigahe.

Hibubuna gihavaina, Yaubada gihawahegena fa'ina kevakeva manimaninina anavelu yawaina ikilukilumai-nadi againe giya'avedamana, ada mena ikilukiluma ana ita vaita kevakeva manimaninina nagona amine ma anafaiweya gilulukahihi kadu yana vehimeya againe gaveyao moya'aidi ikilukiluma ana hawadavadava hidibutoyogena-ma hiluve'alikadi.

Kadu kaliva moya'aidi giluya'aya'alidi, lakahidiyao be kabi'odiyao, wakalivadiyao be koyokoyodiyao, agetoga yadi kauve'a buye'i giluya'aya'alidi be iya'iyaya sa'eyana i'atagidiya o ka'i deba'aidiya hivaina.

Badi gaveyao iya'iyayai-nadi keke hidavaini, medema keke adifaiweya lokoloko hidakimoneni o hidakimonevedamaneni. Mena iya'iyaya amanadi kevakeva manimaninina nagona ana egana o ka'i bana ana egana ana naba.

Tobohiyakweyao, gilubodami be yami wanuwahuya mena gaitomai-nadi wananuwenuwena. Kevakeva manimaninina ana naba vaita gahesevauya amine. Ana naba 666. Hai kaliva halamanina, medema gahesevauya ana kaivila fa'ina anafaiweya gidanuwanuwa be egana-mo'ena gidanuhagana. Mena eganai-nadi kevakeva manimaninina ana egana tu egana ana nogala ma vaita kaliva ana egana amine.

Ada ago'ago lobameya ganogalina, ana nogala vaita gufa lakahina gihobuhobu-ma amine, kadu vaita atala gihegena toyogina ma amine. Ago'ago ganogalina-ma kadu ana nogala vaita yo'o lakahidi hikwelikweli tu yadi kweli ana aba'iveyamumu vaita kita hagihagina amine hilaulauna.

Mena yo'oi-dina kaliva 144,000 Yaubada yana didiga'u'u wamagigine kadu gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa be tonagona lakahidiyao matadiya himidimidi tu kweli ivaguna hikwelikweliyena. Kweli-nadi keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginanogalavaini, au badi kaliva 144,000 gagana hihalamanena. Badi kalivai-dina Yaubada babi ana koyona againe gitutuvehobudi.

Yadi dewa hagihagi-mo'ena Yaubada matane. Kaliva vavinediyao keke hidahegedi-yo mali vevine hidakeleleyedi amine, badi kaliva 144,000 keke Yaubada hidahegeni-yo mali yaubada agaidiya hida'odu'odu. Ha'amine ha'amine Sifi kabi'ona ginanauna, badi hivebwa'uliyena. Yaubada tomiyababi adi yo'o agaidiya gitutuvehobudi ada Yaubada kadu yana Sifi kabi'ona badi kalivai-dina vaita bavagu amine hinuhagadi.
Kadu badi kalivai-dina keke tamo fwaya awadiya gidayemuyemu, au adi vita keke.

Kadu'e ga'eno'ita tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana lobama hinafane giyaveyavega-ma ga'itana. Bana Yaubada yana Venuwa'ata Yamumuna miyamiya-vagahina gi'aliyena be tomiyababi agaidiya gina'awatalatalainena. E, fafali tulina tulina kadu yo'o tulina tulina agaidiya gina'awatalatalainena, kaliva meyadi tulina tulina, adi loi tulina tulina.

Bana tovenuwa'ata gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Yaubada wanamatausena kadu wanakivekaiwabuna, fa'ina yana vedewayauga ana tova a gilakayemu. Bana'e lobama, babi, lehaga, guya gibubudi-ma wanahawadavadavana.”

Mena ai giyabeyabela-yo aulolo hinuhagana-ma ai-nadi siyona gilutowamididiyena tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu. Medema fa'ina gaveyao bana kevakeva manimaninina kadu ana ikilukiluma buye hihawadavadavadi o ka'i ana egana ana iya'iyaya hivaina, medema yadi aulolo keke-mo'a gida'aloveni. E, uyadayada be bogi hivedivediwe-vagata.” Hidedemi tovenuwa'ata anaveto gigahe.

Ada Bana Yaubada Alu'aluwana gi'alakakila gigayo, “Wona velemona, au yadi faisewa ana wavita againe hinaveyawai tu guwana lobameya hinanauwena be moya'aidi matadiya adi laufata hagihagina hinanuhagana.”

Au kadu tovenuwa'ata velugana manuwa-tafalolo againe gihobu ada Bana buhibuhi againe givetogana-ma againe gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Gaitoma moya'aidi babiya giboyalidi fa'ina yaudi ana tova ahe gilakayemu. Au ya ilama tubu'oduna uvaini be utalaga.”
Hidedemi gigahe-yo Bana buhibuhi againe givetogana-ma yana ilama tubu'oduna babiya giwainena be yana kaliva vaita hiboyala-ma giyaudi.
Kadu'e tovenuwa'ata velugana manuwa-tafalolo lobameya gidadauda-ma againe gihobu ada kadu bana ilama tubu'oduna sinasinahina gi'abina.

Kadu tovenuwa'ata sa'eya-mo'ena manuwa-tafalolo ana atudidigeya gitauya, bana atudidiga ana ai'ala'alata ana tovehimeya ma kalivana, gihobu be bana tovenuwa'ata ilama tubu'oduna sinasinahina gi'abina-ma againe gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Gava babiya kelefi hiboyala fa'ina, ya ilama uvaini be utalaga-yo oine hinabubuna.”

Au bana tovenuwa'ata yana ilama tubu'oduna babiya giwainena digo babi ana kelefi giyaudi au kelefi ana abavagafuwafuwa againe ginauwedi be giselukuwedi. Mena abavagafuwafuwa vaita Yaubada yana ila'a ana abanauhaga, ada medema againe tomiyababi Yaubada yana ila'a hinanuhagana.

Mena abavagafuwafuwa melala lakahina wakwaune gidadauda ada medede againe kelefi hivagafuwafuwadi. Hivagavagafuwafuwadi tu tomiyababi dayagidi gimadumadu gimadumadu tu gituwa yana laka badi miGilika yadi etowava amine 1,600 sitediya, higa vaita 300 kilomita amine. E, dayagidi yana laka tunugi-mo'ena, keke adafaiweya kanamidiluvani.

Kadu ga'ita tu tamo gavadi ana ita vaita lehaga atumanamanahina amine tu hinagene giyabela vaita ai'ala'alata amine ga'itana. Mena lehaga liline kaliva moya'aidi ga'itadi, badi hifaiwalahegahega-mo'a be kevakeva manimaninina ana ikilukiluma buye kadu ana egana ana naba hidibutoyogedi. Kweli ana aba'iveyamumu vaita kita hagihagina amine Yaubada giveledi-ma hi'abina.
Moya'aidi hikwelikweli, yadi kweli ma Mosese Yaubada yana tofaisewa againe kadu Yaubada yana Sifi kabi'ona againe give'inuba. Kweli hidede amine.
Yaubada Kaiwabu O Tofaiwala-mo'a
Ya gugai lakahidi, keke kanawona.
O yo'o tulina tulina adi Tokaiwabu,
Ya dewa tunutunugina kadu velemona.
Ho Kaiwabu kaliva moya'aidi O hinamatause
kadu a egana hinakivekaiwabuna.
O akaibe'u-mo'a mahamahali,
Yo'o moya'aidi againiya hina'ela
yadi wave'amohimohina hina'ibo'ula,
fa'ina ya laufata tunutunugina
u'ivemogatalina be ka'itana.
Au hidede amine hikwelikweli.
Au lobama ana tovenuwa'ata seveni vita koyo-mo'ena seveni hi'abina-ma manuwa-tafalolo againe hihobu. Kaleko kwayakwayana ve'akinamanamalina againe hivaigau ada niniwala gola manawadiya hihifona.
Au gaitoma wayawaidi fifiwaladiyao adivefowa ana kaliva sa'eyana nau'a gola seveni givaidi be tovenuwa'ata seveni giveledi. Mena nau'a Yaubada Tomiya-vagata yana ila'a againe himaga.

Giveledi tu Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina kadu yana faiwala siyo amine manuwa-tafalolo ana vetawana gibabalina be keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya gidaluku tu nagona tovenuwa'ata seveni vita koyo-mo'ena seveni babiya hinahege-'owona.

Au bana tovenuwa'ata nagona gina yana nau'a babiya gibihiwana tu tomiyababi kevakeva manimaninina yana iya'iyaya hivaina kadu ana ikilukiluma hihawadavadavana-ma agaidiya koliya lakahina wamagana kadu wa'aulolona gi'afolefoledi.
Tu tovenuwa'ata anaveto yana nau'a gufa lakahidi kadu guya agaidiya gibihiwana tu hivedayaga.
Gibihiwani-yo tovenuwa'ata kadu sa'eyana, bana gufa ana to'itave'avina yana gahe ganogalina gigayo,
O Yaubada, Kaliva mahamahali,
tuwaina umiyami kadu adamoya umimiyami.
O uvehimeya be tomiyababi mena matahiwadi
hinuhagana. Adi laufata uveledi-ma tunutunugina.
O bona ana to'awatalatalaina himunudi
be dayagidi gimadu.
Ada au gufa givedayaga-ma againe uveyudi
Yadi koyona gilubodadi amine.
Au hidedemi gufa ana to'itave'avina gigahe.
Ada ago'ago sa'eyana Yaubada yana atudidigeya giyemu-ma ganogalina gigayo,
Ehe, Yaubada Kaiwabu O Tofaiwala-mo'a,
ya laufata velemo'ena kadu tunutunugina.
Gigahe-yo tovenuwa'ata anavefowa yana nau'a kauwana againe gibihiwana tu Yaubada kauwana gikivegivegina-mo'ena ada vaita ai'ala'alata amine tomiyababi gi'alahidi.

Kauwana gilukalalava vaita ai ma gi'alahidi, au hi'ago'uga be Yaubada ana egana hihawatagona, Bana yana abavehimeya againe vitai-dina hidadauda-ma Kalivai-nadi. Atu nuwavilana hidibutoyogena be keke Yaubada hidakivekaiwabuni.

Yana kaliva hi'aulolove'ine fa'ina meyadi hiyovayovana ada yadi aulolo kadu adi koliya lakahina fa'ina Yaubada lobameya hihawatagona. Atu nuwavilana hidibutoyogena be keke yadi dewa koyona hidavenikohiyeni.
Tu tovenuwa'ata anavesikisi yana nau'a gufa lakahina ana egana Yufalete againe gibihiwana tu gufa gi'ahalina be tokikaiwabu yadi tolugaviya buye lauhanaga amine hina'ela-ma yadi eda gikidewedewena.

Au balauma koyodiyao adi'itoto adi ita vaita kalikali amine ma ga'itadi. Bana kaliva vaita wayo'o amine kadu bana kevakeva manimaninina kadu bana falofita ve'alololona, (higa mena kevakeva manimaninina ana nimavelu), awadiya kalikali-dina hiyemu.

Mena balauma Setani yana yo'o kalivai-dina ada fafali moya'aina adi tokikaiwabu matadiya aituha fifiwaladi hififaisewadi. Hidedemi hinuwa'abiyedi be lugaviya fa'ine hivaga'auhidi ada mena tokikaiwabu moya'aidi Yaubada Tofaiwala-mo'a yana tova lakahina againe hinalugaviya.

Hidedemi Yesu yana gahe giyemu tu balaumai-dina koyodiyao kadu ganalukahihiyedi. Au balauma badi tokikaiwabu lauhanaga amine hina'ela-ma higahedi be fafali bona Hibeliu againe hivewagana Amagedoni againe hivaga'auta.

Auhe'ama nama gisisinamana, butuna gilaulauga, atala gihegehegena kadu babi gili'uli'u lakahi-mo'ena. Tuwai-mo'ena Yaubada kaliva gimidibubuna ana toveya be ginauwena tova adamoya babi keke tamo tova hidede amine gidali'uli'u toyogina.

Au melala lakahina gili'uyavalina ana tufo tohiye au gihavaina. Kadu fafali tulina tulina ana melala matatabudi gili'uyaweyawelina. MiBabiloni higa melala lakahina kalivai-dina yadi koyona moya'aina Yaubada ginuwa-nunauyena be yana vehimeya againe yana ila'a lakahi-mo'ena ana gowa hiyuyena.
Himula matatabudi hiyawowola kadu oya moya'aidi gili'uvekavivilidi.

Wehi kugakugana vaita aisi amine, kugai-nadi abokakaina ana vita vaita bawe halahalana amine (higa 50 kilo) lobameya gi'alilihiwana be kaliva gifihafihadi. Ada mena vita koyo-mo'ena fa'ina, kaliva Yaubada hihawahawatagona, fa'ina vitai-nadi koyona, koyo-mo'ena.

Tu mena vita anaveseveni ana tova gihavaina, bana tovenuwa'ata adiveseveni wanau'adi seveni adi yo'o kalivana agaikuya gi'ela gigaheku gigayo, “U'ela be kana melala kikaiwabuna gufa moya'aidi lilidiya hive'alahina-ma ana matahiwadi ganavehawale. Melalai-nadi vaita kwamayoku lakahidi yamayamadadadi amine.

Fafali tulina tulina ana tokikaiwabu Yaubada hivekwaulaugena fa'ina yadi huluva vaita badi buye hida'udo'udo kadu yadi nuwanuwa koyodi tomiyababi moya'aidi nuwadi givaina, higa vaita yadi udo ana oine hiyuyena be hivekwavakwava.” Hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigaheku.

Kwamayoku kaleko likelikena kadu yabeyabelina againe hivaigau vaita wakwamayokudi, kadu vaigau tulina tulina hivigauyena, gola, kabala ve'akinamanamalidi, bidi fatana lakahina. Gowa gola againe hibubuna-ma hi'abina, gowai-nadi dewa moya'aidi koyodi Yaubada givenikohiyedi-ma agaidiya gimaga, kadu yadi udo tulina tulina ana bwanene againe gimaga.
Badi deba'aidiya kwamayoku adi egana hi'etoladina ada adi egana ana halamana vitana vaita gahesevauya amine. Adi egana hidede amine.
Hida hima Babiloni melala lakahina.
Badi'e ma yamayamadadadiyao hinadi
kadu babi ana dewa koyodi moya'aidi
badi hivenatunedi.

Bana tovenuwa'ata gitoliyeku gigayo, “Gavadi-yo hidede amine uyaulowoga? Hida kevakeva manimaninina u'una seveni ana siko teni kadu kwamayoku kwaune hivetogadi-ma fa'idiya ganakivetuvetunu. Badi adi halamana sevasevauyana tu againiya ganalukahihiyena.

Hida kevakeva manimaninina u'itana-ma tuwaina gimiyami, adamoya keke wayawaina gidamiyami tu aimo tova mulina Kahu Tunugi-vadavada'aina balauma yadi abageya ginalakayemu be ana agolaufofola ginanuhagana. Tuwai-lokalokana Yaubada aimo babi keke gidabubuni ana toveya, kaliva tufoidi yawai-vagahidi ginaveledi-ma adi egana yana buki againe gi'etoladina. Tu badi tomiyababi adi egana keke gida'etoladini-ma kevakevai-nadi manimaninina hina'itana againe hinayaulowoga, fa'ina tuwaina gimiyami, adamoya keke wayawaina gidamiyami tu tova mulina ginayemuna-havagi.

Tobohiyaku, giluboda be ya wanuwahuya mena gaitomai-nadi unanuwenuwena. Ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. U'una seveni au oya seveni kwamayoku hivetogadi-ma oyai-dina higa oya seveni kabune melala hive'alahina.

Kadu mena u'una seveni ana nuwanuwa sa'eyana ma tokikaiwabu seveni. Tokikaiwabu adivefaifi yadi abavehimeya gihavaina, tova adamoya bana anavesikisi givehivehimeya tu bana anaveseveni aimo keke gidalakayemu. Tu ginalakayemu againe tova kabisonaga yana abavehimeya ginamiyami tu ginahavaina.

Bana kevakeva manimaninina tuwaina gimiyami tu adamoya keke wayawaina gidamiyami-ma au tokikaiwabu adiveseveni adi yo'o kalivana. Tu aimo ginayemuna-havagi be bana tauna ginavehivehimeya tokikaiwabu anave'eita. Bana'e ma yana abavehimeya ginahavaini-yo au ginana ana agolaufofola ginanuhagana.

Tu ana siko teni u'itana-ma au tokikaiwabu teni tu aimo keke hidavebutu hidavehivehimeya. Atu aimo abavehimeya hinavaina be bai sa'eyanaga againe tokikaiwabu amine bana kevakeva manimaninina buye hinavehimeya.
Badi tokikaiwabu teni yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana ada yadi faiwala kadu yadi abavehimeya kevakeva manimaninina againe hinasedamanena.

Yaubada yana Sifi kabi'ona againe hinalugaviya tu Sifi kabi'ona yana yo'o buye hinafaiwalahege-mo'edi, fa'ina Bana'e tovehimeya yadi Tovehimeya, tokikaiwabu adi Tokaiwabu. Boi tuwaina mena yana yo'o kalivai-dina gikovadi be giluwafadi ada badi yadi wa'atuvefa'ila himulimuliyena.” Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gikivetuvetunuku.

Kadu'e tovenuwa'ata gigaheku gigayo, “Gufa moya'aina agaidiya kwamayoku yamayamadadadi hivetogadi be u'itadi-ma ana nuwanuwa hidede amine. Gufa ma yo'o tulina tulina, adi loi tulina tulina, meyadi tulina tulina, yadi fafali tulina tulina.

Kevakeva manimaninina kadu ana siko teni u'itadi-ma kwamayoku yamayamadadadi hinavenikohiyedi. Yadi lokoloko moya'aina hinalemadi be konekonedi hinanuyabuyabudi. Muliya vidodi hina'ana tu luludi aiya hinakabudi.

Au hidede amine kwamayoku hinakivekoyodi fa'ina Yaubada yana nuwanuwa ase'asediya ahe gisena be yadi nuwanuwa sa'eyana yadi abavehimeya kevakeva manimaninina againe hisedamanena. Ada kwamayoku hinakivekoyodi-yo Yaubada yana gahe ginalakayemu velemo'ena.
Badi kwamayoku u'itadi-ma au melala lakahina babi ana tokikaiwabu matatabudi givehivehimeyedi.” Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigaheku.

Tu kwamayoku adi nuwanuwa vaita melala lakahina amine ga'itadi-yo kadu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata velugana lobama amine gihobuhobu'ela-ma ga'itana. Bana'e ma yana wa'abavehimeya lakahina ada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina babi matatabuna gituvemahalina.
Au aimo gavadi ginalakayemu-ma fa'ina gikova'awafatafata gigayo,
Babiloni hida hima melala lakahina
hiluyawelina, hiluyaweli-'owona.
Medede againe Setani yana yo'o hive'abaga,
balauma koyodi moya'aidi hivevadalauga
kadu manuga koyodiyao itamatamatauhidi
melalai-nadi ana autu'u hivaina.
Babi ana tokikaiwabu tulina tulina
yadi yo'o kalivai-dina buye'i
melalai-nadi ana nuwanuwa ita'italuvadigana
nuwadi gi'abina, gi'abi-mo'ena.
Wa'ita, kwamayoku kaliva higayena be
gufa laulaugina hiveyuni-yo givekwavakwava
tu buye hi'udo'udo amine,
meda kaliva moya'aidi melalai-nadi againe
udo tulina tulina agaidiya hihawahegedi.
MiBabiloni nuwanuwadi lakahina babi ana lokoloko
fa'ina fafali tulina tulina ana tonilokoloko
hilukuluku'ela be kimone moya'aina againe
mani keke kabi'ona hivivaini-yo hikikaiwabu-mo'a.
Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata kikaiwabuna gigahe.
Omi yaku yo'o melalai-nadi wanahegena,
yadi dewa koyona keke badi buye wanahuluvini,
Vita koyo-mo'edi ganaveledi-ma
keke nuwanuwaku omi wananuhagadi.
Wa'ita, yadi koyona hi'ive'ave'ahina
vaita gidalaka lobameya, ada
Yaubada yadi dewa baladi ginuwa-nunauyena.
Au hidedemi gahe ganogalina.
Kadu tovematahiwadi agaidiya gigahe gigayo,
MiBabiloni yaku yo'o hikivekoyodi amine
meda badi kalivai-dina omi wanakivekoyodi.
Yadi koyona sa'eyana sa'eyana
matahiwadi luhei luhei wanalaufata.
Vita lakahina ana gowa hikidewedewena
be yaku yo'o hiveyudi amine,
meda gowai-nadi luhei wanakidewedewedi
be badi hinayuyedi adi matahiwadi.
Yadi kikaiwabu lakahina fa'ina hiselakalaka,
au yadi selakalaka analaga amine
aulolo tagiya lakahina wanaveledi.
Gilubodadi be aulolo-dina hinanuhagadi
fa'ina tova moya'aina taudiyao hikikilakahidi
higayo, Ime tokikaiwabu, vita keke ana'ayauneni.
Ime keke sikwasikwadiyao amine anatagitagiya.
adi vita lakahi-mo'ena agaidiya ginalakayemu,
alika tagiya loka.
Au ai'ala'alata gina'ala-'owodi,
fa'ina Yaubada Kaiwabu adi Tovematahiwadi
amanadi Kaliva Fifiwalana.
Au hidedemi kadu gahe ganogalina.
MiBabiloni yadi aulolo yadi vediwe fa'ina tokikaiwabu-dina hinamatautave'ine be hinamidilauva hinakova hinagayo,
Hoiyoi! Hoiyoi! Ho melala lakahina!
Ho Babiloni melala fifiwalana!
Bai sa'eyanaga againe adi matahiwadi hinuhagana.
Au hidedemi babi ana tokikaiwabu hinagahe.
Tu babi ana tonilokoloko melala ana ivebwavi fa'ina hinatagitagi hinalulaukuhi hinagayo, “Melala a gibwavi. Keke tamo hakwadi gidamiyami-yo yada lokoloko gidakimoneni fa'ina kanavekoyokoyo.

Yada lokoloko ma gola siliva kabala yamuyamumu-'owogidi kadu bidi fatana lakahina, kaleko tulina tulina kwayakwayana likelikena yabeyabelina wowobikabikana, higa wakalivadiyao adi vaigau. Kadu ai wamagana tulina tulina kadu ikilukiluma tulina tulina vaita manuwa ana vaigau fa'ina, gaitomai-dina tufona kevakeva halana againe hibubuna, kadu tufona ai fatana lakahina, tufona kofa, tufona kainumula, tufona kabala kwayakwayana hawahawaviyanina againe hibubudi.

Kadu yada lokoloko velugana ma gaitoma tulina tulina wamagana vaigau fa'ina, kadu vanedimodimo ana egana inisenisi mulo falanikisenisi, kadu oine, kadu bunama guwana ana egana olive againe hibubuna amanadi, kadu falawa be witi, kadu bulumakau be sifi, kadu hosi be waka abalulautaina. Kadu kaliva vevine vaita lokoloko amine akimokimonevedamanedi be kaliva adi agetoga fa'ina.” Au hidedemi tonilokoloko yadi lokoloko fa'ina hinagahe.

Kadu vaita miBabiloni-mo'edi agaidiya hinagahe hinagayo, “Lokoloko tulina tulina nuwanuwami lakahina ma hiyawowola. Yami kikaiwabu yami giba ve'akinamanamalina gihavaina, gihavai-mo'ena. Au aimo keke wanavai-havagiledi.”

Badi tonilokoloko lokoloko-dina melalai-nadi againe hikimokimonevedamanedi-yo hivewakalivadiyao amanadi hinamidilauva miBabiloni yadi vediwe fa'ina hinamatautave'ine. Hinatagitagi hinalulaukuhi hinagayo,
Hoiyoi! Hoiyoi! Ho melala lakahina!
Boi ami vaigau hagihagi-mo'ena,
kaleko kwayakwayana likelikena yabeyabelina,
kadu gola, kabala yamuyamumu-'owogidi,
bidi fatana lakahina wavivigauyedi.
Hidedemi ami ita ve'akinamanamalina
tu mena yami kikaiwabu gavatubuga ma
bai sa'eyanaga againe giyawowola.
Au hidedemi tonilokoloko hitagilulauhawa.

Tu waka ana tovemadu kadu toyage, badi waka ana tofaisewa kadu badi fatadi fa'ina hivetobayauma-ma hinamidilauva melalai-nadi gina'ala'alata-ma siyona hina'itana againe hinakova hinagayo, “Hida hima melala ma keke tamo melala amine, keke-mo'a.”
Au hitagitagi hilulaukuhi lokoloko hiluyauyaula hikovakova higayo,
Hoiyoi! Hoiyoi! Ho melala lakahina!
Toniwaka moya'aidi melalai-nadi againe
yadi lokoloko hi'ali'aliyeni-yo hivewakalivana.
Au bai sa'eyanaga againe adi lauyawela hinuhagana.
Au hidedemi waka ana kaliva hitagilulauhawa.
Mena melala ana matahiwadi givaina fa'ina
omi tomiyalobama wanavemwamwala.
Kadu omi Yaubada yana yo'ogaga
kadu omi afositolo be falofita
moya'aimi wanavemwamwala.
Wa'ita, miBabiloni omi hikivekoyomi
fa'ina Yaubada badi agaidiya gilaufata.
Tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata fifiwalana kuga abokakaina vaita kugawauwaula amine gifewana be lehageya gihegehobuyena gigahe gigayo,
Kuga yaku wafaiwala lehageya gahegehobuyena
be aimo keke wana'itani amine,
meda melala lakahina Babiloni
yadi wafaiwala hinaluyawelina be aimo keke wana'itani.
Hida melala ana abavemwamwala ginahavaina.
Au keke tamo vemwamwala ana ago'ago kananogalini,
modawa kulele hiulega agodi ginahavaina,
kadu keke kananogali-havagileni.
Tofaisewa yadi faisewa tulina tulina
keke hina'abi-havagileni.
Nila ana a'oli'oli butuna
aimo keke kananogali-havagileni.
Lamufa mahalina melalai-nadi againe
aimo keke kana'ita-havagileni.
Badi nagivagu yadi wavemwamwala agodi
kadu keke kananogali-havagileni.
Hida melala ana tonilokoloko ma boi
vaita babi ana kaliva kikaiwabudiyao amine.
Yo'o tulina tulina kalivai-dina
yana alavedivedigaga againe ginuwa'abiyedi.
Kadu hida melala kalivai-dina
Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina
be yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao
hiluve'alikadi be dayagidi gimadu.
E, gaveyao moya'aidi fafali tulina tulina agaidiya
Yesu Keliso fa'ine alika hinuhagana,
medema vaita dayagidi Babiloni againe gidamadu.
Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata fifiwalana gigahe.
Tu Babiloni ana lauyawela ga'ita-yo butuna lakahina ganogalina, vaita yo'oyo'o lakahi-mo'edi lobameya hikovakova higayo,
Aleluya! Ada kibababala Yaubada againe give'inuba,
Bana'e kikaiwabuna kadu fifiwalana.
Mena melala vaita kwamayoku yamayamadadadi amine
yadi dewa udo'udona agaidiya gilaufata.
Dewai-nadi againe tomiyababi hinuwa'abiyedi.
Tu yana tofaisewa hiluve'alikadi-ma dayagidi gilaufata.
Au hidedemi hikova.
Kadu hikova-havagilena higayo,
Aleluya! Yaubada kanadavadavana
fa'ina melalai-nadi siyona gilakalaka-vagata.
Aleluya! Yama nuwanuwa ehe hidedemi.
Tu ago'ago sa'eyana Yaubada yana didiga'u'uya giyemu gigayo,
Omi Yaubada yana tofaisewa
kadu omi Bana'e wamatausena
lakahimiyao kadu kabi'omiyao
yada Yaubada wanadavadavana.
Aleluya! Yada Yaubada Kaiwabu
givebutu givehivehimeya, Bana'e Tofaiwala-mo'a.
au Bana'e kanakivekaiwabuna.
Fa'ina yana Sifi kabi'ona
yana nagi ana tova a gilakayemu,
ada yana kwamayoku ma higa
Yesu ana tovetumagana moya'aidi
nagi fa'ina ahe gikidewadewa.
yegayegana kadu ve'akinamanamalina.
Au hidedemi yo'oyo'o hikovakova.
[Mena kaleko kwayakwayana ana nuwanuwa ma Yaubada yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao yadi dewa yegayegana.]

Tu tovenuwa'ata gilukahihi gihavaina, lobama ana wanafali yauyaugina ga'itana, ada mene matakuya hosi kwayakwayana gimidi tu Bana Kaliva kwaune gihiyoto-ma ana egana Todibumuhiga kadu Togahe velemona. Yana abavehimeya tunutunugina againe gilulugaviya kadu kaliva agaidiya gilulaufata.

Matana give'akinamanamalena vaita ai'ala'alata amine kadu u'une badau kikaiwabuna moya'aina hidadauda. Kadu Bana wowone egana kilukilumina gidadauda, eganai-nadi keke tamo hakwadi gidahalamaneni tu Bana anakaibe gihalamanena.
Kaleko againe givaigau-ma dayaga lakahina gifotana, ada Bana ana egana Bona higa Yaubada bonana amanadi.
Bana Bona wai ginagona tu badi lobama ana tolugaviya adi yo'o adi yo'o wai himulina. Hosi kwayakwayadiyao agaidiya hiyage ada kaleko kwayakwayana yegayegana kadu ve'akinamanamalina againe hivaigau.

Bana Bona awane feto sinasinahina giyemu be medema againe yo'o tulina tulina ginalaulaudi-yo agevavane ginasedi. E, yana fuluma kainumula againe ginavehivehimeyedi. Kaliva kelefi abavagafuwafuwa againe hivagafuwafuwana amine, meda Yaubada yana ila'a ana abanauhaga againe Bana Bona Tauna tokoyona ginavagafuwafuwadi be Yaubada yana ila'a lakahi-mo'ena hinanuhagana.
Ada ana aikeva kadu ubuna againe egana kilukilumina gidadauda. Egana hidede amine.

Kadu'e ga'eno'ita tu lobama ana tovenuwa'ata kauwana againe gimidimidi-ma ga'itana. Bana manuga moya'aidi lobama hinafane hiyaveyavega-ma agaidiya gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Moya'aimi wa'ela be Yaubada yana abutu fa'ina wanavaga'auta.

Abutu-nadi againe kaliva moya'aidi gaviya againe hina'alika-ma vidodi wana'au'ana, tokikaiwabu tolugaviya adi togiyomatana kikaiwabudiyao buye'i, kadu hosi adi kaliva buye'i, e kaliva moya'aidi lakahidiyao kadu kabi'odiyao, agetoga adi tovehimeya buye'i vidodi wana'au'ana.” Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gikova.

Atu Bana Bona yana yo'o buye'i nibaidiyao hifaiwalahegehege-mo'edi, ada bana kevakeva manimaninina kadu falofita ve'alololona hikive'avidi. Mena falofita boi kevakeva manimaninina loseyanina amine iya'iyaya yauyaulowogidi gififaisewadi be medema againe kaliva kevakeva manimaninina ana iya'iyaya hivaina, kadu ana ikilukiluma hihawadavadavana-ma ginuwa'abiyedi. Au adi'iselu hikive'avidi-yo wayawaidi muna gaitoma yagoyagona alamatafifailina giyabeyabela-ma againe hihegehobuyedi.

Tu adi tolugaviya moya'aidi Kaliva yana feto awane giyemu-ma againe yadi alika hinuhagana. Kalivai-nadi hosi kwayakwayana kwaune gihiyoto. Tu au hi'alika-'owoga ada manuga moya'aidi hi'ela vidodi hi'au'a hi'au'a tu hi'a-wayoga.

Au bana wayo'o abokakaina gikive'avina digo giyogona tu Kahuya gihegehobuyena au Kahu gifalidonena be medede againe malamala wani tausani (1,000) agaidiya balauma buye hinamiyami. Bana wayo'o ma hida hima oloto tuwai-lokalokana gimiyami-ma ana egana Diyabolo yo Setani. Au gifalidonena tu keke tamo hakwadi anafaiweya ginayauni be higa keke anafaiweya tomiyababi kadu ginanuwa'abiyedi. Malamala wani tausani ginahavaidi-yo Yaubada ginahawahegena be ginalakayemu ada tova kabisonaga yauyaugina ginamiyami.
Hidevama mididi-havagi nagona atu to'alika velugadiyao ma malamala wani tausani ginahavaidi-yo hinamididi-havagi.

Badi nagona hinamididi-havagi ma Yaubada yana kaliva mahamahalidiyao ada yadi wavemwamwala hinamiyami. Aimo alika anavelu kaliva koyodiyao ai'ala'alata againe hinanuhagana ana toveya, badi Yaubada yana kaliva ma kadu keke-mo'a aulolo hinanuhagani. Au Yaubada kadu Keliso ana hawadavadava ana tofaisewa hinamiyami, ada malamala wani tausani agaidiya Keliso buye hinavehivehimeya.
Tu malamala wani tausani (1,000) ginahavaidi-yo Yaubada Setani ginahawahegena be ana aba'aiyogona higa Kahu Tunugi-vadavada'aina againe ginahobu.

Ginahobu-yo ginana babi matatabuna ana fafali agaidiya yo'o tulina tulina ginanuwa'abiyedi be gaviya fa'ina ginavaga'auhidi. Yo'oi-dina adi loi luhei, sa'eyana adi egana Gogi kadu sa'eyana Megogi. Ada yo'oi-dina adi kilagalaga vaita taliya ana makama amine.

Badi kalivai-dina hinatauya hinalulaudeli babi matatabuna hinave'iyogiyogina be Yaubada yana yo'o yana melala nuwanuwana lakahina amanadi hinabodafifidi. Atu ai'ala'ala'ata lobama amine ginahobu'ela be gina'alahi-'owodi.

Kadu bana Setani kaliva ginuwa'abiyedi-ma Yaubada yana vehimeya againe muna lakahina gaitoma yagoyagona alamatafifailina giyabeyabela-ma againe hinahegehobuyena, munai-nadi againe boi kevakeva manimaninina kadu falofita ve'alololona badi adi'iselu hihegehobuyedi. Uyadayada be bogi medede againe hinavedivediwe tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu.

Kadu'e ga'eno'ita tu didiga'u'u lakahina kwayakwayana ga'itana kadu ana Kaliva ga'itana. Bana'e didiga'u'uya givetogana amanadi ana ita kikaiwabu-mo'ena kadu ve'akinamanamalina fa'ina babi be lobama vaita hida'ota au hiyawowola.

Kadu to'alika ga'itadi, lakahidiyao kadu kabi'odiyao didiga'u'u wamagigine himidimidi, ada au Yaubada yana vehimeya againe buki hikiyavalidi. Buki-dina agaidiya badi kaliva moya'aidi yadi dewa matatabuna valeyana hi'etoladina be medema againe Yaubada adi laufata ginafolakena. Kadu buki velugana hikiyavalina, buki-nadi againe badi yawai-vagahidi Yaubada giveledi-ma adi egana hidadauda.

Au gaveyao lehageya hitowa'alika kadu gaveyao avaleya hi'alika, medema Yaubada yana vehimeya againe alika ana abageya hitauya be himididi-havagi. Au kaliva sa'eyana sa'eyana Tovedewayauga matane hi'ela himidi be yadi dewa yadi dewa amine adi laufata giveledi.
To'alika givedewayaugidi gihavaina, alika kadu alika ana abaga muna lakahina giyabeyabela-vagata ma againe hihegehobuyedi be gihavaidi. Munai-nadi au alika anavelu.
Tu yawai-vagata ana buki againe kaliva adi egana hilele-hagihagiyena, ada gava kaliva ana egana Yaubada keke gida'etoladini, medema muna lakahina giyabeyabela-vagata ma againe hihegehobuyena.

Kadu Bana Yaubada yana melala mahamahalina ana egana Yelusalema ivaguna Yaubada againe gitauya be lobama amine gihobuhobu'ela-ma ga'itana. Ana ita hagihagi-mo'ena vaita kwamayoku yana nagi fa'ina gidavevigauni be gidana yana kaliva againe.

Ada ago'ago sa'eyana Yaubada yana didiga'u'uya giyemu-ma ganogalina gikova'awafatafata gigayo, “Wa'ita, adamoya Yaubada kaliva agaidiya give'abaga ada Bana badi buye hinamiyami. Badi yana yo'ogaga amine hinamiyami, ada Yaubada Tauna ginave'alunedi be Bana badi yadi Yaubada ginamiyami.

Matailudi sa'eyana sa'eyana ginaluhegehegedi. Aimo keke tamo alika o ase'u'aulolo o tagiya o aulolo, fa'ina mena vitai-dina a gihavaidi kadu babi tuwaina ana gaitoma moya'aina a hiyawowola.” Au hidedemi gigahe.

Tu Bana didiga'u'uya givetogana-ma gigahe gigayo, “Wa'ita, adamoya gaitoma moya'aina gakikive'ivagudi.” Kadu iya agaikuya gigahe gigayo, “Mena gahe-nadi una'etoladina, fa'ina gahe-nadi au velemo'ena ada omi kaliva amifaiweya wanavetumaganena.”
Hai kaliva Iya fa'ikuya yana atuvefa'ila againe gifaiwala-mo'a, ana du'u gawonadabedabena-ma ginanuhagana, ada Iya yana Yaubada amine ganamiyami tu bana kadu natuku amine ginamiyami.

Atu gaveyao keke Iya fa'ikuya hida'atuvefa'ila higa yadi wamatauta fa'ina keke Iya fa'ikuya ve'umagigi againe hidahawahegedi, badi keke hidavetumaganeku, badi dewa koyodi Yaubada givenikohiyedi-ma agaidiya hihawahegedi, badi toluve'alika kadu to'udo, badi kwelikweli tulina tulina hi'abina, badi mali yaubada agaidiya hi'odu'odu kadu tove'alololo moya'aidi, medema kalivai-dina adi loi aulolo keke kabi'ona hinanuhagana. Badi yadi abaga ma muna lakahina ai'ala'alata kadu gaitoma yagoyagona alamatafifailina againe giyabeyabela amanadi againe hinavedivediwe. Mena vedivediwe ana egana alika anavelu.” Au hidedemi Yaubada gigahe.
Gigahe-yo Yaubada Alu'aluwana giluvaiyeku be oya tunugi-mo'ena kabune gilakaveku, ada melala mahamahalina Yelusalema Yaubada againe gitauya be lobama amine gihobuhobu'ela-ma givehawaleku.
Melalai-nadi Yaubada yana kaiwabu againe give'akinamanamalena, ada ana ita vaita kabala yamuyamumu-'owogina amine, e kabala vaita kelasi amine ve'akinamanamalina ana egana diyasifa.

Melala mena kabala ve'akinamanamalina agaidiya hi'alana, alai-nadi tunugi-mo'ena kadu ana abaluku tuwelo ada abaluku sa'eyana sa'eyana agaidiya lobama ana tovenuwa'ata sa'eyana sa'eyana himidimidi adi yo'o tuwelo. Ada abaluku agaidiya miIsileli adi yo'o tuwelo adi egana kilukilumina hidadauda.
Lauhanaga amine abaluku tohiye, mwaigugu amine kadu abaluku tohiye, bolimana amine kadu abaluku tohiye, yavalata amine kadu abaluku tohiye.
Ada melala ana ala ana avalalakata ma kabala lalafana beyabeyana tuwelo, ada medema agaidiya Yaubada yana Sifi kabi'ona yana afositolo tuwelo adi egana hidadauda.

Tu bana lobama ana tovenuwa'ata iya buye alulukahihi-ma aiwala vaita aba'etowava amine gola againe hibubuna-ma gi'abina higa mena aba'etowava againe melala-mo'ena kadu ana abaluku kadu ana ala gida'etowavana.

Ada melala ana ita hidede amine higa yana bala yana laka au sa'eyana. Au tovenuwa'ata yana aba'etowava againe melala gi'etowavana, ada yana bala yana laka yana tunuga ana etowava au sa'eyana ma ginuhagana, badi miGilika yadi etowava amine 12,000 sitediya higa vaita 2,800 kilomita amine.
Ada melala ana ala gi'etowavana, ada ime miYuda yama etowava amine tovenuwa'ata gi'etowavana-ma ala ana tunuga 144 kiubiti higa vaita 64 mita amine.
Mena melala gola hagihagi-mo'ena againe hibubuna, golai-nadi vaita kelasi lu'anu'anunuyana amine, ada ana ala kabala vaita kelasi amine ve'akinamanamalina ana egana diyasifa againe hibubuna.
Ada melala ana ala ana avalalakata kabala yamuyamumu-'owogina tulina tulina agaidiya hivevigauna, ada kabalai-dina adi egana hidede amine.
Avalalakata nagona ma diyasifa againe hivevigauna
ana ita ma vaita kelasi ve'akinamanamalina amine.
Anavelu ma safaiya, matamatagina vaita
lobama matamatagina amine.
Anaveto ma agate, matamatagina vaita isisi'u amine.
Anavefowa ma emelodi, matamatagi-mo'ena.
Anavefaifi ma onikisi, lugologolohina yabeyabelina
kadu kwayakwayana.
Anavesikisi ma kaneliyani, yabeyabelina.
Anaveseveni ma kilisolaiti, yagoyagona.
Anave'eita ma beleli, matamatagina vaita
lehaga matamatagina amine.
Anavenaeni ma tofasi, yagoyagona tu lu'anu'anunuyana.
Anaveteni ma kilisofesi, matamatagina tu
ve'akinamanamalina.
Anave'ileveni ma diyasito, likelikena.
Anavetuwelo ma ametisi, likelikena tu lu'anu'anunuyana.
Hida kabalai-dina tufona ve'akinamanamalina kadu tufona lu'anu'anunuyana.

Melala ana abaluku tuwelo ma bidi lakahidi tuwelo agaidiya hibubudi higa abaluku sa'eyana bidi sa'eyana againe hibubuna. Bidi-dina ve'akinamanamalidi fatadi lakahina adi egana feli. Melala ana eda gola hagihagi-mo'ena againe hibubuna ana ita vaita kelasi lu'anu'anunuyana amine. Melala ana ita au hidede amine.
Tu keke tamo manuwa-tafalolo melalai-nadi againe gada'itani, fa'ina Yaubada Kaiwabu Tofaiwala-mo'a kadu yana Sifi kabi'ona kaliva buye hive'abaga-yo adifata hihawadavadava-mo'edi.
Melalai-nadi ana mahalina keke kauwana o vaikohi againe gidamahalini. Au Yaubada yana mahalina ve'akinamanamalina melala gituvemahalina kadu yana Sifi kabi'ona vaita melala ana lamufa amine.
Kadu mena mahalina babi ana yo'o tulina tulina yadi mahalina ada medema againe hinamiyami. Ada babi ana tokikaiwabu melalai-nadi againe yadi kikaiwabu hina'ali'aliyena.
Medede againe keke tamo mala gidabogi fa'ina, keke tamo tova ana abaluku hinafalini.
Yo'o tulina tulina yadi wave'amohimohina yadi kikaiwabu melalai-nadi againe hina'ali'aliyena.

Tu keke tamo gavadi bwanebwanenena melalai-nadi againe ginaluku, keke-mo'a. Kadu keke tamo to'udo o tove'alololo hinaluku, keke-mo'a. Au badi adi egana Sifi kabi'ona yana buki againe gi'etoladina be yawai-vagahidi giveledi-ma, badi'iyaogaga hinaluku.

Boi Yaubada babi tuwaina gi'alatabutabuyena tu adamoya hida yana melala againe keke tamo gavadi againe alatabutabu gidadauda. Au melala hinagene Yaubada kadu yana Sifi kabi'ona yadi didiga'u'uya hivetogadi, ada yana tofaisewa ana hawadavadava againe hinafifaisewa.
Bana ana egana deba'aidiya ginadauda ada tova moya'aina badi Bana magigina hina'ita'itana.

Uyuyu gihavai-mo'ena. Au Yaubada Kaiwabu Tauna yadi mahalina fa'ina, keke nuwanuwadi lamufa ana mahalina o ka'i kauwana ana mahalina. Ada badi'iyao Yaubada buye hinavehivehimeya tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu.

Tu tovenuwa'ata gigaheku gigayo, “Hida gahegahe ahe u'etoladina-ma au gahe velemo'ena ada omi kaliva amifaiweya wanavetumaganena. Tuwaina Yaubada Kaiwabu Alu'aluwana bonana ana to'awatalatalaina giluvaiyedi-yo yana venuwa'ata hi'awatalatalainena. Meda adamoya yana tovenuwa'ata gi'iveninisena be higa gavadi gavadi tova kabisona makewa'e hinalakayemu, medema Bana ana agetoga agaidiya ginahawavemogatalena.” Au hidedemi tovenuwa'ata gigaheku.

Tu iya'eku Yoni ma gaitomai-dina ganogalidi kadu ga'itadi-ma kalivai-kuna. Ada ahe ganogalidi kadu ga'itadi-yo lobama ana tovenuwa'ata givehawaleku-ma agene ga'ibo'ula-mo'a higa gadahawadavadavana tu gihawataku gigayo, “Auwe, keke unahawadavadavaku. Iya'eku Yesu yana tofaisewa anafaiweya kadu o'eni kadu tobohiyamomo, higa Yaubada bonana ana to'awatalatalaina kadu gaveyao moya'aidi hida buki ana gahegahe hi'ita'itave'avina amanadi. Keke iya unahawadavadavaku, au Bana Yaubada unahawadavadavana.”

Kadu gigaheku gigayo, “Yaubada yana venuwa'ata gigaheye-vagahina be hida bukiya gidadauda-ma keke unasevauyeni. Au unahawavemogatalena fa'ina gaitomai-dina hinalakayemu-ma adi tova ahe giluve'eda'ufo.

Yesu auhe'ama ginayemaunida fa'ina gaveyao adamoya hihuluhuluva koyona, au tovai-nadi kadu aimo hinahuluhuluva koyona. Gaveyao adamoya ase'asedi bwanebwanenena, au tovai-nadi kadu aimo bwanebwanenena. Tu gaveyao adamoya hihuluhuluva yamumuna, au tovai-nadi kadu aimo hinahuluhuluva yamumuna. Kadu gaveyao adamoya yadi dewa mahamahalina, au tovai-nadi kadu aimo yadi dewa mahamahalina.”
Iya'eku inubane kadu tabone, Iya wai ganagona kadu wai gamulina, Iya Abave'inuba kadu Abalauyabu.” Hidemi Yesu gigahe.

Tu melalai-nadi kwaune kaliva koyodiyao hinamiyami, badi kwelikweli tulina tulina hi'abina, to'udo toluve'alika, badi mali yaubada agaidiya hi'odu'odu kadu gaveyao moya'aidi nuwanuwadi ve'alololo ada tova moya'aina hiveve'alololo, medema kalivai-dina adi loi keke adifaiweya hinaluku.

Meda hai kaliva Yaubada yana venuwa'ata hida bukiya gidadauda-ma ana nuwanuwa tufona ginavaihegena, Yaubada mena kaliva ana du'u ginavaihegena be keke yana melala mahamahalina againe ginamiyami kadu keke yawai-vagata ana ai againe gina'a, gaitomai-dina hagihagidi hida buki gilukahihiyedi amanadi. Au hidedemi Yoni gigahevagadona.
Ika, Kaiwabu Yesu udamaduyewa'ela. Yama nuwanuwa ehe hidedemi.
Omi Yaubada yana kaliva moya'aimi Kaiwabu Yesu yana nuwadogeya wanamiyami. Ehe hidedemi.
Tamama lobameya umimiyami,
a egana mahamahalina anave'amohimohinena.
Ya abavehimeya ana tova gidalakayemu ase'asemeya.
Ya vehimeya lobameya hi'ita'itave'avina amine
meda ime babiya ada'ita'itave'avina.
Aiyeta sa'eyana sa'eyana amaga udavelevelema.
Ime nagona tobohiyameyao yadi koyona
avenuwauluyena amine,
meda yama koyona kadu O udavenuwauluyena.
Keke aba'aladibidibi againe unahawhegema tu
kaliva koyona Setani againe unalugolegolema.
Fa'ina O'eni ya wabavehimeya,
O'eni ya wafaiwala, O'eni ya wakikaiwabu
tova inaga inaga keke ana abalauyabu.
Ehe hidedemi.
